genesis 1:1	bereishit bara ’elohim ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets. 
genesis 1:2	veha’arets hayetah tohu vawohu vekhoshekh ‘al penei tehom veruakh ’elohim merakhefet ‘al penei hamayim. 
genesis 1:3	vayomer ’elohim yehi ’or vayhi ’or. 
genesis 1:4	vayar ’elohim ’et ha’or ki tow vayawdel ’elohim ben ha’or uwen hakhoshekh. 
genesis 1:5	vayiqra ’elohim la’or yom velakhoshekh qara layelah vayhi ‘erew vayhi woqer yom ’ekhad. 
genesis 1:6	vayomer ’elohim yehi raqia‘ betokh hamayim vihi mawdil ben mayim lamayim. 
genesis 1:7	vaya‘as ’elohim ’et haraqia‘ vayawdel ben hamayim ’asher mitakhat laraqia‘ uwen hamayim ’asher mei‘al laraqia‘ vayhi khen. 
genesis 1:8	vayiqra ’elohim laraqia‘ shamayim vayhi ‘erew vayhi woqer yom sheini. 
genesis 1:9	vayomer ’elohim yiqavu hamayim mitakhat hashamayim ’el maqom ’ekhad veteira’eh hayabashah vayhi khen. 
genesis 1:10	vayiqra ’elohim layabashah ’erets ulemiqveh hamayim qara yamim vayar ’elohim ki tow. 
genesis 1:11	vayomer ’elohim tadshei ha’arets deshe ‘eisew mazria‘ zera‘ ‘ets peri ‘oseh peri lemino ’asher zar‘o wo ‘al ha’arets vayhi khen. 
genesis 1:12	vatotsei ha’arets deshe ‘eisew mazria‘ zera‘ lemineihu ve‘ets ‘oseh peri ’asher zar‘o wo lemineihu vayar ’elohim ki tow. 
genesis 1:13	vayhi ‘erew vayhi woqer yom shelishi. 
genesis 1:14	vayomer ’elohim yehi me’orot birqia‘ hashamayim lehawdil ben hayom uwen halayelah vehayu le’otot ulemo‘adim uleyamim veshanim. 
genesis 1:15	vehayu lim’orot birqia‘ hashamayim leha’ir ‘al ha’arets vayhi khen. 
genesis 1:16	vaya‘as ’elohim ’et shenei hame’orot hagedolim ’et hama’or hagadol lememshelet hayom ve’et hama’or haqaton lememshelet halaylah ve’et hakokhawim. 
genesis 1:17	vayiten ’otam ’elohim birqia‘ hashamayim leha’ir ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 1:18	velimshol bayom uwalaylah ulahawdil ben ha’or uwen hakhoshekh vayar ’elohim ki tow. 
genesis 1:19	vayhi ‘erew vayhi woqer yom rewi‘i. 
genesis 1:20	vayomer ’elohim yishretsu hamayim sherets nefesh khayah ve‘of ye‘ofef ‘al ha’arets ‘al penei reqia‘ hashamayim. 
genesis 1:21	vayiwra ’elohim ’et hataninim hagedolim ve’et kal nefesh hakhayah haromeset ’asher sharetsu hamayim lemineihem ve’et kal ‘of kanaf lemineihu vayar ’elohim ki tow. 
genesis 1:22	vaywarekh ’otam ’elohim leimor peru urewu umil’u ’et hamayim bayamim veha‘of yirew ba’arets. 
genesis 1:23	vayhi ‘erew vayhi woqer yom khamishi. 
genesis 1:24	vayomer ’elohim totsei ha’arets nefesh khayah leminah beheimah varemes vekhayto ’erets leminah vayhi khen. 
genesis 1:25	vaya‘as ’elohim ’et khayat ha’arets leminah ve’et habeheimah leminah ve’et kal remes ha’adamah lemineihu vayar ’elohim ki tow. 
genesis 1:26	vayomer ’elohim na‘aseh ’adam betsalmeinu kidmuteinu veyirdu widgat hayam uwe‘of hashamayim uwabeheimah uwekhal ha’arets uwekhal haremes haromes ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 1:27	vayiwra ’elohim ’et ha’adam betsalmo betselem ’elohim bara ’oto zakhar uneqeiwah bara ’otam. 
genesis 1:28	vaywarekh ’otam ’elohim vayomer lahem ’elohim peru urewu umil’u ’et ha’arets vekhiwshuha uredu bidgat hayam uwe‘of hashamayim uwekhal khayah haromeset ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 1:29	vayomer ’elohim hineh natati lakhem ’et kal ‘eisew zoreia‘ zera‘ ’asher ‘al penei khal ha’arets ve’et kal ha‘ets ’asher bo feri ‘ets zoreia‘ zara‘ lakhem yihyeh le’akhlah 
genesis 1:30	ulekhal khayat ha’arets ulekhal ‘of hashamayim ulekhol romes ‘al ha’arets ’asher bo nefesh khayah ’et kal yereq ‘eisew le’akhlah vayhi khen. 
genesis 1:31	vayar ’elohim ’et kal ’asher ‘asah vehineh tow me’od vayhi ‘erew vayhi woqer yom hashishi. 
genesis 2:1	vaykhulu hashamayim veha’arets vekhal tsewa’am. 
genesis 2:2	vaykhal ’elohim bayom hashewi‘i melakhto ’asher ‘asah vayishbot bayom hashewi‘i mikal melakhto ’asher ‘asah. 
genesis 2:3	vaywarekh ’elohim ’et yom hashewi‘i vayqadesh ’oto ki wo shawat mikal melakhto ’asher bara ’elohim la‘asot. 
genesis 2:4	’eleh toldot hashamayim veha’arets behibare’am beyom ‘asot yhoh ’elohim ’erets veshamayim. 
genesis 2:5	vekhol siakh hasadeh terem yihyeh wa’arets vekhal ‘eisew hasadeh terem yitsmakh ki lo himtir yhoh ’elohim ‘al ha’arets ve’adam ’ayin la‘awod ’et ha’adamah. 
genesis 2:6	ve’ed ya‘aleh min ha’arets vehishqah ’et kal penei ha’adamah. 
genesis 2:7	vayitser yhoh ’elohim ’et ha’adam ‘afar min ha’adamah vayipakh be’apav nishmat khayim vayhi ha’adam lenefesh khayah. 
genesis 2:8	vayita‘ yhoh ’elohim gan be‘eiden miqedem vayasem sham ’et ha’adam ’asher yatsar. 
genesis 2:9	vayatsmakh yhoh ’elohim min ha’adamah kal ‘ets nekhmad lemar’eh vetow lema’akhal ve‘ets hakhayim betokh hagan ve‘ets hada‘at tow vara‘. 
genesis 2:10	venahar yotsei mei‘eiden lehashqot ’et hagan umisham yipared vehayah le’arba‘ah rashim. 
genesis 2:11	shem ha’ekhad pishon hu hasowew ’et kal ’erets hakhavilah ’asher sham hazahaw. 
genesis 2:12	uzahaw ha’arets hahiv tow sham habedolakh ve’ewen hashoham. 
genesis 2:13	veshem hanahar hasheini gikhon hu hasowew ’et kal ’erets kush. 
genesis 2:14	veshem hanahar hashelishi khideqel hu haholekh qidmat ’ashur vehanahar harewi‘i hu ferat. 
genesis 2:15	vayiqakh yhoh ’elohim ’et ha’adam vayanikheihu wegan ‘eiden le‘awedah uleshamerah. 
genesis 2:16	vaytsav yhoh ’elohim ‘al ha’adam leimor mikol ‘ets hagan ’akhol tokhel. 
genesis 2:17	umei‘ets hada‘at tow vara‘ lo tokhal mimenu ki beyom ’akhalekha mimenu mot tamut. 
genesis 2:18	vayomer yhoh ’elohim lo tow heyot ha’adam lewado ’e‘eseh lo ‘eizer kenegdo. 
genesis 2:19	vayitser yhoh ’elohim min ha’adamah kal khayat hasadeh ve’et kal ‘of hashamayim vayawei ’el ha’adam lir’ot mah yiqra lo vekhol ’asher yiqra lo ha’adam nefesh khayah hu shemo. 
genesis 2:20	vayiqra ha’adam sheimot lekhal habeheimah ule‘of hashamayim ulekhol khayat hasadeh ule’adam lo matsa ‘eizer kenegdo. 
genesis 2:21	vayapel yhoh ’elohim tardeimah ‘al ha’adam vayishan vayiqakh ’akhat mitsal‘otav vayisgor basar takhtenah. 
genesis 2:22	vayiwen yhoh ’elohim ’et hatseila‘ ’asher laqakh min ha’adam le’ishah vaywi’eha ’el ha’adam. 
genesis 2:23	vayomer ha’adam zot hapa‘am ‘etsem mei‘atsamai uwasar mibesari lezot yiqarei ’ishah ki mei’ish luqokhah zot. 
genesis 2:24	‘al ken ya‘azaw ’ish ’et ’awiv ve’et ’imo vedawaq be’ishto vehayu lewasar ’ekhad. 
genesis 2:25	vayihyu sheneihem ‘arumim ha’adam ve’ishto velo yitboshashu. 
genesis 3:1	vehanakhash hayah ‘arum mikol khayat hasadeh ’asher ‘asah yhoh ’elohim vayomer ’el ha’ishah ’af ki ’amar ’elohim lo tokhelu mikol ‘ets hagan. 
genesis 3:2	vatomer ha’ishah ’el hanakhash miperi ‘ets hagan nokhel. 
genesis 3:3	umiperi ha‘ets ’asher betokh hagan ’amar ’elohim lo tokhelu mimenu velo tige‘u bo pen temutun. 
genesis 3:4	vayomer hanakhash ’el ha’ishah lo mot temutun. 
genesis 3:5	ki yodeia‘ ’elohim ki beyom ’akhalekhem mimenu venifqekhu ‘eineikhem vihyitem keilohim yode‘ei tow vara‘. 
genesis 3:6	vateire ha’ishah ki tow ha‘ets lema’akhal vekhi ta’avah hu la‘einayim venekhmad ha‘ets lehaskil vatiqakh mipiryo vatokhal vatiten gam le’ishah ‘imah vayokhal. 
genesis 3:7	vatipaqakhnah ‘einei sheneihem vayeide‘u ki ‘eirumim hem vayitperu ‘aleh te’einah vaya‘asu lahem khagorot. 
genesis 3:8	vayishme‘u ’et qol yhoh ’elohim mithalekh bagan leruakh hayom vayitkhabei ha’adam ve’ishto mipenei yhoh ’elohim betokh ‘ets hagan. 
genesis 3:9	vayiqra yhoh ’elohim ’el ha’adam vayomer lo ’ayekah. 
genesis 3:10	vayomer ’et qolekha shama‘ti bagan va’ira ki ‘eirom ’anokhi va’eikhawei. 
genesis 3:11	vayomer mi higid lekha ki ‘eirom ’atah hamin ha‘ets ’asher tsivitikha lewilti ’akhal mimenu ’akhaleta. 
genesis 3:12	vayomer ha’adam ha’ishah ’asher natatah ‘imadi hi natenah li min ha‘ets va’okhel. 
genesis 3:13	vayomer yhoh ’elohim la’ishah mah zot ‘asit vatomer ha’ishah hanakhash hishi’ani va’okhel. 
genesis 3:14	vayomer yhoh ’elohim ’el hanakhash ki ‘asita zot ’arur ’atah mikal habeheimah umikol khayat hasadeh ‘al gekhonekha teilekh ve‘afar tokhal kal yemei khayekha. 
genesis 3:15	ve’eiwah ’ashit beinekha uwen ha’ishah uwen zar‘akha uwen zar‘ah hu yeshufekha rosh ve’atah teshufenu ‘aqew. 
genesis 3:16	’el ha’ishah ’amar harbah ’arbeh ‘itsewonekh veheironekh be‘etsew teiledi wanim ve’el ’ishekh teshuqatekh vehu yimshal bakh. 
genesis 3:17	ule’adam ’amar ki shama‘ta leqol ’ishtekha vatokhal min ha‘ets ’asher tsivitikha leimor lo tokhal mimenu ’arurah ha’adamah ba‘awurekha be‘itsawon tokhalenah kol yemei khayekha. 
genesis 3:18	veqots vedardar tatsmiakh lakh ve’akhalta ’et ‘eisew hasadeh. 
genesis 3:19	bezei‘at ’apekha tokhal lekhem ‘ad shuwekha ’el ha’adamah ki mimenah luqakheta ki ‘afar ’atah ve’el ‘afar tashuw. 
genesis 3:20	vayiqra ha’adam shem ’ishto khavah ki hi hayetah ’em kal khai. 
genesis 3:21	vaya‘as yhoh ’elohim le’adam ule’ishto katenot ‘or vayalbishem. 
genesis 3:22	vayomer yhoh ’elohim hen ha’adam hayah ke’akhad mimenu lada‘at tow vara‘ ve‘atah pen yishlakh yado velaqakh gam mei‘ets hakhayim ve’akhal vakhai le‘olam. 
genesis 3:23	vayshalekheihu yhoh ’elohim migan ‘eiden la‘awod ’et ha’adamah ’asher luqakh misham. 
genesis 3:24	vaygaresh ’et ha’adam vayashken miqedem legan ‘eiden ’et hakeruwim ve’et lahat hakherew hamithapekhet lishmor ’et derekh ‘ets hakhayim. 
genesis 4:1	veha’adam yada‘ ’et khavah ’ishto vatahar vateiled ’et qayin vatomer qaniti ’ish ’et yhoh. 
genesis 4:2	vatosef laledet ’et ’akhiv ’et hawel vayhi hewel ro‘eh tson veqayin hayah ‘owed ’adamah. 
genesis 4:3	vayhi miqets yamim vayawei qayin miperi ha’adamah minkhah yhoh. 
genesis 4:4	vehewel heiwi gam hu mibekhorot tsono umeikhelweihen vayisha‘ yhoh ’el hewel ve’el minkhato. 
genesis 4:5	ve’el qayin ve’el minkhato lo sha‘ah vayikhar leqayin me’od vayipelu panav. 
genesis 4:6	vayomer yhoh ’el qayin lamah kharah lakh velamah nafelu fanekha. 
genesis 4:7	halo ’im teitiw se’et ve’im lo teitiw lapetakh khatat rowets ve’eilekha teshuqato ve’atah timshal bo. 
genesis 4:8	vayomer qayin ’el hewel ’akhiv vayhi bihyotam basadeh vayaqam qayin ’el hewel ’akhiv vayahargeihu. 
genesis 4:9	vayomer yhoh ’el qayin ’ei hewel ’akhikha vayomer lo yada‘ti hashomer ’akhi ’anokhi. 
genesis 4:10	vayomer meh ‘asita qol demei ’akhikha tso‘aqim ’eilai min ha’adamah. 
genesis 4:11	ve‘atah ’arur ’atah min ha’adamah ’asher patsetah ’et piha laqakhat ’et demei ’akhikha miyadekha. 
genesis 4:12	ki ta‘awod ’et ha’adamah lo tosef tet kokhah lakh na‘ vanad tihyeh wa’arets. 
genesis 4:13	vayomer qayin ’el yhoh gadol ‘avoni mineso. 
genesis 4:14	hen geirashta ’oti hayom mei‘al penei ha’adamah umipanekha ’esater vehayiti na‘ vanad ba’arets vehayah khal motse’i yahargeini. 
genesis 4:15	vayomer lo yhoh lakhen kal horeg qayin shiw‘atayim yuqam vayasem yhoh leqayin ’ot lewilti hakot ’oto kal motse’o. 
genesis 4:16	vayeitsei qayin milifnei yhoh vayeishew be’erets nod qidmat ‘eiden. 
genesis 4:17	vayeida‘ qayin ’et ’ishto vatahar vateiled ’et khanokh vayhi boneh ‘ir vayiqra shem ha‘ir keshem beno khanokh. 
genesis 4:18	vayivaled lakhanokh ’et ‘irad ve‘irad yalad ’et mekhuya’el umekhiya’el yalad ’et metusha’el umetusha’el yalad ’et lamekh. 
genesis 4:19	vayiqakh lo lemekh shetei nashim shem ha’akhat ‘adah veshem hasheinit tsilah. 
genesis 4:20	vateiled ‘adah ’et yawal hu hayah ’awi yoshew ’ohel umiqneh. 
genesis 4:21	veshem ’akhiv yuwal hu hayah ’awi kal tofes kinor ve‘ugaw. 
genesis 4:22	vetsilah gam hi yaledah ’et tuwal qayin lotesh kal khoresh nekhoshet uwarzel va’akhot tuwal qayin na‘amah. 
genesis 4:23	vayomer lemekh lenashav ‘adah vetsilah shema‘an qoli neshei lemekh ha’zenah ’imrati ki ’ish haragti lefits‘i veyeled lekhaburati. 
genesis 4:24	ki shiw‘atayim yuqam qayin velemekh shiw‘im veshiw‘ah. 
genesis 4:25	vayeida‘ ’adam ‘od ’et ’ishto vateiled ben vatiqra ’et shemo shet ki shat li ’elohim zera‘ ’akher takhat hewel ki harago qayin. 
genesis 4:26	uleshet gam hu yulad ben vayiqra ’et shemo ’enosh ’az hukhal liqro beshem yhoh. 
genesis 5:1	zeh seifer toldot ’adam beyom bero ’elohim ’adam bidmut ’elohim ‘asah ’oto. 
genesis 5:2	zakhar uneqeiwah bera’am vaywarekh ’otam vayiqra ’et shemam ’adam beyom hibare’am. 
genesis 5:3	vaykhi ’adam sheloshim ume’at shanah vayoled bidmuto ketsalmo vayiqra ’et shemo shet. 
genesis 5:4	vayihyu yemei ’adam ’akharei holido ’et shet shemoneh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:5	vayihyu kal yemei ’adam ’asher khai tesha‘ mei’ot shanah usheloshim shanah vayamot. 
genesis 5:6	vaykhi shet khamesh shanim ume’at shanah vayoled ’et ’enosh. 
genesis 5:7	vaykhi shet ’akharei holido ’et ’enosh shewa‘ shanim ushemoneh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:8	vayihyu kal yemei shet shetem ‘esreh shanah utesha‘ mei’ot shanah vayamot. 
genesis 5:9	vaykhi ’enosh tish‘im shanah vayoled ’et qeinan. 
genesis 5:10	vaykhi ’enosh ’akharei holido ’et qeinan khamesh ‘esreh shanah ushemoneh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:11	vayihyu kal yemei ’enosh khamesh shanim utesha‘ mei’ot shanah vayamot. 
genesis 5:12	vaykhi qeinan shiw‘im shanah vayoled ’et mahalal’el. 
genesis 5:13	vaykhi qeinan ’akharei holido ’et mahalal’el ’arba‘im shanah ushemoneh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:14	vayihyu kal yemei qeinan ‘eser shanim utesha‘ mei’ot shanah vayamot. 
genesis 5:15	vaykhi mahalal’el khamesh shanim veshishim shanah vayoled ’et yared. 
genesis 5:16	vaykhi mahalal’el ’akharei holido ’et yered sheloshim shanah ushemoneh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:17	vayihyu kal yemei mahalal’el khamesh vetish‘im shanah ushemoneh mei’ot shanah vayamot. 
genesis 5:18	vaykhi yered shetayim veshishim shanah ume’at shanah vayoled ’et khanokh. 
genesis 5:19	vaykhi yered ’akharei holido ’et khanokh shemoneh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:20	vayihyu kal yemei yered shetayim veshishim shanah utesha‘ mei’ot shanah vayamot. 
genesis 5:21	vaykhi khanokh khamesh veshishim shanah vayoled ’et metushalakh. 
genesis 5:22	vayithalekh khanokh ’et ha’elohim ’akharei holido ’et metushelakh shelosh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:23	vayhi kal yemei khanokh khamesh veshishim shanah ushelosh mei’ot shanah. 
genesis 5:24	vayithalekh khanokh ’et ha’elohim ve’einenu ki laqakh ’oto ’elohim. 
genesis 5:25	vaykhi metushelakh shewa‘ ushemonim shanah ume’at shanah vayoled ’et lamekh. 
genesis 5:26	vaykhi metushelakh ’akharei holido ’et lemekh shetayim ushemonim shanah ushewa‘ mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:27	vayihyu kal yemei metushelakh teisha‘ veshishim shanah utesha‘ mei’ot shanah vayamot. 
genesis 5:28	vaykhi lemekh shetayim ushemonim shanah ume’at shanah vayoled ben. 
genesis 5:29	vayiqra ’et shemo noakh leimor zeh yenakhameinu mima‘aseinu umei‘itsewon yadeinu min ha’adamah ’asher ’eirerah yhoh. 
genesis 5:30	vaykhi lemekh ’akharei holido ’et noakh khamesh vetish‘im shanah vakhamesh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 5:31	vayhi kal yemei lemekh shewa‘ veshiw‘im shanah ushewa‘ mei’ot shanah vayamot. 
genesis 5:32	vayhi noakh ben khamesh mei’ot shanah vayoled noakh ’et shem ’et kham ve’et yafet. 
genesis 6:1	vayhi ki heikhel ha’adam larow ‘al penei ha’adamah uwanot yuledu lahem. 
genesis 6:2	vayir’u wenei ha’elohim ’et benot ha’adam ki towot henah vayiqkhu lahem nashim mikol ’asher bakharu. 
genesis 6:3	vayomer yhoh lo yadon rukhi wa’adam le‘olam beshagam hu wasar vehayu yamav mei’ah ve‘esrim shanah. 
genesis 6:4	hanefilim hayu wa’arets bayamim hahem vegam ’akharei khen ’asher yawo’u benei ha’elohim ’el benot ha’adam veyaledu lahem hemah hagiborim ’asher mei‘olam ’anshei hashem. 
genesis 6:5	vayar yhoh ki rabah ra‘at ha’adam ba’arets vekhal yeitser makhshewot libo raq ra‘ kal hayom. 
genesis 6:6	vayinakhem yhoh ki ‘asah ’et ha’adam ba’arets vayit‘atsew ’el libo. 
genesis 6:7	vayomer yhoh ’emkheh ’et ha’adam ’asher barati mei‘al penei ha’adamah mei’adam ‘ad beheimah ‘ad remes ve‘ad ‘of hashamayim ki nikhamti ki ‘asitim. 
genesis 6:8	venoakh matsa khen be‘einei yhoh. 
genesis 6:9	’eleh toldot noakh noakh ’ish tsadiq tamim hayah bedorotav ’et ha’elohim hithalekh noakh. 
genesis 6:10	vayoled noakh sheloshah wanim ’et shem ’et kham ve’et yafet. 
genesis 6:11	vatishakhet ha’arets lifnei ha’elohim vatimalei ha’arets khamas. 
genesis 6:12	vayar ’elohim ’et ha’arets vehineh nishkhatah ki hishkhit kal basar ’et darko ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 6:13	vayomer ’elohim lenoakh qets kal basar ba lefanai ki male’ah ha’arets khamas mipeneihem vehini mashkhitam ’et ha’arets. 
genesis 6:14	‘aseh lekha teiwat ‘atsei gofer qinim ta‘aseh ’et hateiwah vekhafarta ’otah mibayit umikhuts bakofer. 
genesis 6:15	vezeh ’asher ta‘aseh ’otah shelosh mei’ot ’amah ’orekh hateiwah khamishim ’amah rakhebah usheloshim ’amah qomatah. 
genesis 6:16	tsohar ta‘aseh lateiwah ve’el ’amah tekhalenah milma‘lah ufetakh hateiwah betsidah tasim takhtiyim sheniyim ushelishim ta‘aseha. 
genesis 6:17	va’ani hini meiwi ’et hamabul mayim ‘al ha’arets leshakhet kal basar ’asher bo ruakh khayim mitakhat hashamayim kol ’asher ba’arets yigva‘. 
genesis 6:18	vahaqimoti ’et beriti ’itakh uwata ’el hateiwah ’atah uwanekha ve’ishtekha uneshei wanekha ’itakh. 
genesis 6:19	umikal hakhai mikal basar shenayim mikol tawi ’el hateiwah lehakhayot ’itakh zakhar uneqeiwah yihyu. 
genesis 6:20	meiha‘of lemineihu umin habeheimah leminah mikol remes ha’adamah lemineihu shenayim mikol yawo’u ’eilekha lehakhayot. 
genesis 6:21	ve’atah qakh lekha mikal ma’akhal ’asher yei’akhel ve’asafta ’eilekha vehayah lekha velahem le’akhlah 
genesis 6:22	vaya‘as noakh kekhol ’asher tsivah ’oto ’elohim ken ‘asah. 
genesis 7:1	vayomer yhoh lenoakh bo ’atah vekhal beitekha ’el hateiwah ki ’otekha ra’iti tsadiq lefanai bador hazeh. 
genesis 7:2	mikol habeheimah hatehorah tiqakh lekha shiw‘ah shiw‘ah ’ish ve’ishto umin habeheimah ’asher lo tehorah hi shenayim ’ish ve’ishto. 
genesis 7:3	gam mei‘of hashamayim shiw‘ah shiw‘ah zakhar uneqeiwah lekhayot zera‘ ‘al penei khal ha’arets. 
genesis 7:4	ki leyamim ‘od shiw‘ah ’anokhi mamtir ‘al ha’arets ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im layelah umakhiti ’et kal hayqum ’asher ‘asiti mei‘al penei ha’adamah. 
genesis 7:5	vaya‘as noakh kekhol ’asher tsivahu yhoh. 
genesis 7:6	venoakh ben shesh mei’ot shanah vehamabul hayah mayim ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 7:7	vayawo noakh uwanav ve’ishto uneshei wanav ’ito ’el hateiwah mipenei mei hamabul. 
genesis 7:8	min habeheimah hatehorah umin habeheimah ’asher ’einenah tehorah umin ha‘of vekhol ’asher romes ‘al ha’adamah. 
genesis 7:9	shenayim shenayim ba’u ’el noakh ’el hateiwah zakhar uneqeiwah ka’asher tsivah ’elohim ’et noakh. 
genesis 7:10	vayhi leshiw‘at hayamim umei hamabul hayu ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 7:11	bishnat shesh mei’ot shanah lekhayei noakh bakhodesh hasheini beshiw‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh bayom hazeh niwqe‘u kal ma‘yenot tehom rabah va’arubot hashamayim niftakhu. 
genesis 7:12	vayhi hageshem ‘al ha’arets ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im layelah. 
genesis 7:13	be‘etsem hayom hazeh ba noakh veshem vekham vayefet benei noakh ve’eishet noakh usheloshet neshei wanav ’itam ’el hateiwah. 
genesis 7:14	hemah vekhal hakhayah leminah vekhal habeheimah leminah vekhal haremes haromes ‘al ha’arets lemineihu vekhal ha‘of lemineihu kol tsipor kal kanaf. 
genesis 7:15	vayawo’u ’el noakh ’el hateiwah shenayim shenayim mikal habasar ’asher bo ruakh khayim. 
genesis 7:16	vehaba’im zakhar uneqeiwah mikal basar ba’u ka’asher tsivah ’oto ’elohim vayisgor yhoh ba‘ado. 
genesis 7:17	vayhi hamabul ’arba‘im yom ‘al ha’arets vayirbu hamayim vayis’u ’et hateiwah vataram mei‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 7:18	vayigberu hamayim vayirbu me’od ‘al ha’arets vateilekh hateiwah ‘al penei hamayim. 
genesis 7:19	vehamayim gaweru me’od me’od ‘al ha’arets vaykhusu kal heharim hagewohim ’asher takhat kal hashamayim. 
genesis 7:20	khamesh ‘esreh ’amah milma‘lah gaweru hamayim vaykhusu heharim. 
genesis 7:21	vayigva‘ kal basar haromes ‘al ha’arets ba‘of uwabeheimah uwakhayah uwekhal hasherets hashorets ‘al ha’arets vekhol ha’adam. 
genesis 7:22	kol ’asher nishmat ruakh khayim be’apav mikol ’asher bekharawah meitu. 
genesis 7:23	vayimakh ’et kal hayqum ’asher ‘al penei ha’adamah mei’adam ‘ad beheimah ‘ad remes ve‘ad ‘of hashamayim vayimakhu min ha’arets vayisha’er ’akh noakh va’asher ’ito bateiwah. 
genesis 7:24	vayigberu hamayim ‘al ha’arets khamishim ume’at yom. 
genesis 8:1	vayizkor ’elohim ’et noakh ve’et kal hakhayah ve’et kal habeheimah ’asher ’ito bateiwah vaya‘awer ’elohim ruakh ‘al ha’arets vayashoku hamayim. 
genesis 8:2	vayisakheru ma‘yenot tehom va’arubot hashamayim vayikalei hageshem min hashamayim. 
genesis 8:3	vayashuwu hamayim mei‘al ha’arets halokh vashow vayakhseru hamayim miqtseh khamishim ume’at yom. 
genesis 8:4	vatanakh hateiwah bakhodesh hashewi‘i beshiw‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh ‘al harei ’ararat. 
genesis 8:5	vehamayim hayu halokh vekhasor ‘ad hakhodesh ha‘asiri ba‘asiri be’ekhad lakhodesh nir’u rashei heharim. 
genesis 8:6	vayhi miqets ’arba‘im yom vayiftakh noakh ’et khalon hateiwah ’asher ‘asah. 
genesis 8:7	vayshalakh ’et ha‘orew vayeitsei yatso vashow ‘ad yewoshet hamayim mei‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 8:8	vayshalakh ’et hayonah mei’ito lir’ot haqalu hamayim mei‘al penei ha’adamah. 
genesis 8:9	velo matse’ah hayonah manoakh lekhaf raglah vatashaw ’eilav ’el hateiwah ki mayim ‘al penei khal ha’arets vayishlakh yado vayiqakheha vayawei ’otah ’eilav ’el hateiwah. 
genesis 8:10	vayakhel ‘od shiw‘at yamim ’akheirim vayosef shalakh ’et hayonah min hateiwah. 
genesis 8:11	vatawo ’eilav hayonah le‘et ‘erew vehineh ‘aleh zayit taraf befiha vayeida‘ noakh ki qalu hamayim mei‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 8:12	vayiyakhel ‘od shiw‘at yamim ’akheirim vayshalakh ’et hayonah velo yasefah shuw ’eilav ‘od. 
genesis 8:13	vayhi be’akhat veshesh mei’ot shanah barishon be’ekhad lakhodesh kharewu hamayim mei‘al ha’arets vayasar noakh ’et mikhseh hateiwah vayar vehineh kharewu penei ha’adamah. 
genesis 8:14	uwakhodesh hasheini beshiw‘ah ve‘esrim yom lakhodesh yaweshah ha’arets. 
genesis 8:15	vaydaber ’elohim ’el noakh leimor. 
genesis 8:16	tsei min hateiwah ’atah ve’ishtekha uwanekha uneshei wanekha ’itakh. 
genesis 8:17	kal hakhayah ’asher ’itekha mikal basar ba‘of uwabeheimah uwekhal haremes haromes ‘al ha’arets hotsei haytsei ’itakh vesharetsu wa’arets ufaru verawu ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 8:18	vayeitsei noakh uwanav ve’ishto uneshei wanav ’ito. 
genesis 8:19	kal hakhayah kal haremes vekhal ha‘of kol romes ‘al ha’arets lemishpekhoteihem yatse’u min hateiwah. 
genesis 8:20	vayiwen noakh mizbeiakh yhoh vayiqakh mikol habeheimah hatehorah umikol ha‘of hatahor vaya‘al ‘olot bamizbeiakh. 
genesis 8:21	vayarakh yhoh ’et reiakh hanikhoakh vayomer yhoh ’el libo lo ’osif leqalel ‘od ’et ha’adamah ba‘awur ha’adam ki yeitser lew ha’adam ra‘ mine‘urav velo ’osif ‘od lehakot ’et kal khai ka’asher ‘asiti. 
genesis 8:22	‘od kal yemei ha’arets zera‘ veqatsir veqor vakhom veqayits vakhoref veyom valaylah lo yishbotu. 
genesis 9:1	vaywarekh ’elohim ’et noakh ve’et banav vayomer lahem peru urewu umil’u ’et ha’arets. 
genesis 9:2	umora’akhem vekhitekhem yihyeh ‘al kal khayat ha’arets ve‘al kal ‘of hashamayim bekhol ’asher tirmos ha’adamah uwekhal degei hayam beyedkhem nitanu. 
genesis 9:3	kal remes ’asher hu khai lakhem yihyeh le’akhlah keyereq ‘eisew natati lakhem ’et kol. 
genesis 9:4	’akh basar benafsho damo lo tokheilu. 
genesis 9:5	ve’akh ’et dimkhem lenafshoteikhem ’edrosh miyad kal khayah ’edreshenu umiyad ha’adam miyad ’ish ’akhiv ’edrosh ’et nefesh ha’adam. 
genesis 9:6	shofekh dam ha’adam ba’adam damo yishafekh ki betselem ’elohim ‘asah ’et ha’adam. 
genesis 9:7	ve’atem peru urewu shirtsu wa’arets urewu wah. 
genesis 9:8	vayomer ’elohim ’el noakh ve’el banav ’ito leimor. 
genesis 9:9	va’ani hini meiqim ’et beriti ’itekhem ve’et zar‘akhem ’akhareikhem. 
genesis 9:10	ve’et kal nefesh hakhayah ’asher ’itekhem ba‘of babeheimah uwekhal khayat ha’arets ’itekhem mikol yotse’ei hateiwah lekhol khayat ha’arets. 
genesis 9:11	vahaqimoti ’et beriti ’itekhem velo yikaret kal basar ‘od mimei hamabul velo yihyeh ‘od mabul leshakhet ha’arets. 
genesis 9:12	vayomer ’elohim zot ’ot haberit ’asher ’ani noten beini uweineikhem uwen kal nefesh khayah ’asher ’itekhem ledorot ‘olam. 
genesis 9:13	’et qashti natati be‘anan vehayetah le’ot berit beini uwen ha’arets. 
genesis 9:14	vehayah be‘ani ‘anan ‘al ha’arets venir’atah haqeshet be‘anan. 
genesis 9:15	vezakharti ’et beriti ’asher beini uweineikhem uwen kal nefesh khayah bekhal basar velo yihyeh ‘od hamayim lemabul leshakhet kal basar. 
genesis 9:16	vehayetah haqeshet be‘anan ure’itiha lizkor berit ‘olam ben ’elohim uwen kal nefesh khayah bekhal basar ’asher ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 9:17	vayomer ’elohim ’el noakh zot ’ot haberit ’asher haqimoti beini uwen kal basar ’asher ‘al ha’arets. 
genesis 9:18	vayihyu wenei noakh hayotse’im min hateiwah shem vekham vayafet vekham hu ’awi khena‘an. 
genesis 9:19	sheloshah ’eleh benei noakh umei’eleh nafetsah khal ha’arets. 
genesis 9:20	vayakhel noakh ’ish ha’adamah vayita‘ karem. 
genesis 9:21	vayeishet min hayayin vayishkar vayitgal betokh ’aholoh 
genesis 9:22	vayar kham ’awi khena‘an ’et ‘ervat ’awiv vayaged lishnei ’ekhav bakhuts. 
genesis 9:23	vayiqakh shem vayefet ’et hasimlah vayasimu ‘al shekhem sheneihem vayeilekhu ’akhoranit vaykhasu ’et ‘ervat ’awihem ufeneihem ’akhoranit ve‘ervat ’awihem lo ra’u. 
genesis 9:24	vayiqets noakh miyeino vayeida‘ ’et ’asher ‘asah lo beno haqatan. 
genesis 9:25	vayomer ’arur kena‘an ‘ewed ‘awadim yihyeh le’ekhav. 
genesis 9:26	vayomer barukh yhoh ’elohei shem vihi khena‘an ‘ewed lamo. 
genesis 9:27	yaft ’elohim leyefet veyishkon be’aholei shem vihi khena‘an ‘ewed lamo. 
genesis 9:28	vaykhi noakh ’akhar hamabul shelosh mei’ot shanah vakhamishim shanah. 
genesis 9:29	vayihyu kal yemei noakh tesha‘ mei’ot shanah vakhamishim shanah vayamot. 
genesis 10:1	ve’eleh toldot benei noakh shem kham vayafet vayivaledu lahem banim ’akhar hamabul. 
genesis 10:2	benei yefet gomer umagog umadai veyavan vetuwal umeshekh vetiras. 
genesis 10:3	uwenei gomer ’ashkanaz verifat vetogarmah. 
genesis 10:4	uwenei yavan ’elishah vetarshish kitim vedodanim. 
genesis 10:5	mei’eleh nifredu ’iyei hagoyim be’artsotam ’ish lilshono lemishpekhotam begoyeihem. 
genesis 10:6	uwenei kham kush umitsrayim ufut ukhena‘an. 
genesis 10:7	uwenei khush sewa vakhavilah vesawtah vera‘mah vesawtekha uwenei ra‘mah shewa udedan. 
genesis 10:8	vekhush yalad ’et nimrod hu heikhel lihyot gibor ba’arets. 
genesis 10:9	hu hayah gibor tsayid lifnei yhoh ‘al ken yei’amar kenimrod gibor tsayid lifnei yhoh. 
genesis 10:10	vatehi reishit mamlakhto bawel ve’erekh ve’akad vekhalneh be’erets shin‘ar. 
genesis 10:11	min ha’arets hahiv yatsa ’ashur vayiwen ’et nineveh ve’et rekhowot ‘ir ve’et kalakh. 
genesis 10:12	ve’et resen ben nineveh uwen kalakh hi ha‘ir hagedolah. 
genesis 10:13	umitsrayim yalad ’et ludim ve’et ‘anamim ve’et lehawim ve’et naftukhim. 
genesis 10:14	ve’et patrusim ve’et kaslukhim ’asher yatse’u misham pelishtim ve’et kaftorim. 
genesis 10:15	ukhena‘an yalad ’et tsidon bekhoro ve’et khet. 
genesis 10:16	ve’et haywusi ve’et ha’emori ve’et hagirgashi. 
genesis 10:17	ve’et hakhivi ve’et ha‘arqi ve’et hasini. 
genesis 10:18	ve’et ha’arvadi ve’et hatsemari ve’et hakhamati ve’akhar nafotsu mishpekhot hakena‘ani. 
genesis 10:19	vayhi gewul hakena‘ani mitsidon bo’akhah gerarah ‘ad ‘azah bo’akhah sedomah va‘amorah ve’admah utsewoyim ‘ad lasha‘. 
genesis 10:20	’eleh wenei kham lemishpekhotam lilshonotam be’artsotam begoyeihem. 
genesis 10:21	uleshem yulad gam hu ’awi kal benei ‘eiwer ’akhi yefet hagadol. 
genesis 10:22	benei shem ‘eilam ve’ashur ve’arpakhshad velud va’aram. 
genesis 10:23	uwenei ’aram ‘uts vekhul vegeter vamash. 
genesis 10:24	ve’arpakhshad yalad ’et shalakh veshelakh yalad ’et ‘eiwer. 
genesis 10:25	ule‘eiwer yulad shenei wanim shem ha’ekhad peleg ki weyamav niflegah ha’arets veshem ’akhiv yaqetan. 
genesis 10:26	veyaqetan yalad ’et ’almodad ve’et shalef ve’et khatsarmavet ve’et yarakh. 
genesis 10:27	ve’et hadoram ve’et ’uzal ve’et diqlah. 
genesis 10:28	ve’et ‘owal ve’et ’awima’el ve’et shewa. 
genesis 10:29	ve’et ’ofir ve’et khavilah ve’et yowaw kal ’eleh benei yaqetan. 
genesis 10:30	vayhi moshawam mimeisha bo’akhah sefarah har haqedem. 
genesis 10:31	’eleh wenei shem lemishpekhotam lilshonotam be’artsotam legoyeihem. 
genesis 10:32	’eleh mishpekhot benei noakh letoldotam begoyeihem umei’eleh nifredu hagoyim ba’arets ’akhar hamabul. 
genesis 11:1	vayhi khal ha’arets safah ’ekhat udewarim ’akhadim. 
genesis 11:2	vayhi benase‘am miqedem vayimtse’u wiq‘ah be’erets shin‘ar vayeishewu sham. 
genesis 11:3	vayomeru ’ish ’el rei‘eihu hawah nilbenah leweinim venisrefah lisreifah vatehi lahem haleweinah le’awen vehakheimar hayah lahem lakhomer. 
genesis 11:4	vayomeru hawah niwneh lanu ‘ir umigdal verosho washamayim vena‘aseh lanu shem pen nafuts ‘al penei khal ha’arets. 
genesis 11:5	vayeired yhoh lir’ot ’et ha‘ir ve’et hamigdal ’asher banu benei ha’adam. 
genesis 11:6	vayomer yhoh hen ‘am ’ekhad vesafah ’akhat lekhulam vezeh hakhilam la‘asot ve‘atah lo yibatser meihem kol ’asher yazemu la‘asot. 
genesis 11:7	hawah neiredah venawelah sham sefatam ’asher lo yishme‘u ’ish sefat rei‘eihu. 
genesis 11:8	vayafets yhoh ’otam misham ‘al penei khal ha’arets vayakhdelu liwnot ha‘ir. 
genesis 11:9	‘al ken qara shemah bawel ki sham balal yhoh sefat kal ha’arets umisham hefitsam yhoh ‘al penei kal ha’arets. 
genesis 11:10	’eleh toldot shem m ben me’at shanah vayoled ’et ’arpakhshad shenatayim ’akhar hamabul. 
genesis 11:11	vaykhi shem ’akharei holido ’et ’arpakhshad khamesh mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 11:12	ve’arpakhshad khai khamesh usheloshim shanah vayoled ’et shalakh. 
genesis 11:13	vaykhi ’arpakhshad ’akharei holido ’et shelakh shalosh shanim ve’arba‘ mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 11:14	veshelakh khai sheloshim shanah vayoled ’et ‘eiwer. 
genesis 11:15	vaykhi shelakh ’akharei holido ’et ‘eiwer shalosh shanim ve’arba‘ mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 11:16	vaykhi ‘eiwer ’arba‘ usheloshim shanah vayoled ’et paleg. 
genesis 11:17	vaykhi ‘eiwer ’akharei holido ’et peleg sheloshim shanah ve’arba‘ mei’ot shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 11:18	vaykhi feleg sheloshim shanah vayoled ’et re‘u. 
genesis 11:19	vaykhi feleg ’akharei holido ’et re‘u teisha‘ shanim umatayim shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 11:20	vaykhi re‘u shetayim usheloshim shanah vayoled ’et serug. 
genesis 11:21	vaykhi re‘u ’akharei holido ’et serug shewa‘ shanim umatayim shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 11:22	vaykhi serug sheloshim shanah vayoled ’et nakhor. 
genesis 11:23	vaykhi serug ’akharei holido ’et nakhor matayim shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 11:24	vaykhi nakhor teisha‘ ve‘esrim shanah vayoled ’et tarakh. 
genesis 11:25	vaykhi nakhor ’akharei holido ’et terakh tesha‘ ‘esreh shanah ume’at shanah vayoled banim uwanot. 
genesis 11:26	vaykhi terakh shiw‘im shanah vayoled ’et ’awram ’et nakhor ve’et haran. 
genesis 11:27	ve’eleh toldot terakh terakh holid ’et ’awram ’et nakhor ve’et haran veharan holid ’et lot. 
genesis 11:28	vayamat haran ‘al penei terakh ’awiv be’erets moladto be’ur kasdim. 
genesis 11:29	vayiqakh ’awram venakhor lahem nashim shem ’eishet ’awram sarai veshem ’eishet nakhor milkah bat haran ’awi milkah va’awi yiskah. 
genesis 11:30	vatehi sarai ‘aqarah ’en lah valad. 
genesis 11:31	vayiqakh terakh ’et ’awram beno ve’et lot ben haran ben beno ve’et sarai kalato ’eishet ’awram beno vayeitse’u ’itam mei’ur kasdim lalekhet ’artsah kena‘an vayawo’u ‘ad kharan vayeishewu sham. 
genesis 11:32	vayihyu yemei terakh khamesh shanim umatayim shanah vayamat terakh bekharan. 
genesis 12:1	vayomer yhoh ’el ’awram lekh lekha mei’artsekha umimoladtekha umibet ’awikha ’el ha’arets ’asher ’ar’eka. 
genesis 12:2	ve’e‘eskha lego gadol va’awarekhkha va’agadelah shemekha vehyeh berakhah. 
genesis 12:3	va’awarakhah mewarekhekha umeqalelkha ’a’or veniwrekhu wekha kol mishpekhot ha’adamah. 
genesis 12:4	vayeilekh ’awram ka’asher diber ’eilav yhoh vayeilekh ’ito lot ve’awram ben khamesh shanim veshiw‘im shanah betseito meikharan. 
genesis 12:5	vayiqakh ’awram ’et sarai ’ishto ve’et lot ben ’akhiv ve’et kal rekhusham ’asher rakhashu ve’et hanefesh ’asher ‘asu wekharan vayeitse’u lalekhet ’artsah kena‘an vayawo’u ’artsah kena‘an. 
genesis 12:6	vaya‘awor ’awram ba’arets ‘ad meqom shekhem ‘ad ’eilon moreh vehakena‘ani ’az ba’arets. 
genesis 12:7	vayeira yhoh ’el ’awram vayomer lezar‘akha ’eten ’et ha’arets hazot vayiwen sham mizbeiakh yhoh hanir’eh ’eilav. 
genesis 12:8	vaya‘teq misham haharah miqedem lewet ’el vayet ’aholoh bet ’el miyam veha‘ai miqedem vayiwen sham mizbeiakh yhoh vayiqra beshem yhoh. 
genesis 12:9	vayisa‘ ’awram halokh venasoa‘ hanegbah. 
genesis 12:10	vayhi ra‘aw ba’arets vayeired ’awram mitsraymah lagur sham ki khawed hara‘aw ba’arets. 
genesis 12:11	vayhi ka’asher hiqriw lawo mitsrayemah vayomer ’el sarai ’ishto hineh na yada‘ti ki ’ishah yefat mar’eh ’at. 
genesis 12:12	vehayah ki yir’u ’otakh hamitsrim ve’ameru ’ishto zot veharegu ’oti ve’otakh yekhayu. 
genesis 12:13	’imri na ’akhoti ’at lema‘an yitaw li wa‘awurekh vekhayetah nafshi biglalekh. 
genesis 12:14	vayhi kewo ’awram mitsrayemah vayir’u hamitsrim ’et ha’ishah ki yafah hi me’od. 
genesis 12:15	vayir’u ’otah sarei far‘oh vayhalelu ’otah ’el par‘oh vatuqakh ha’ishah bet par‘oh. 
genesis 12:16	ule’awram heitiw ba‘awurah vayhi lo tson uwaqar vakhamorim va‘awadim ushefakhot va’atonot ugemalim. 
genesis 12:17	vaynaga‘ yhoh ’et par‘oh nega‘im gedolim ve’et beito ‘al dewar sarai ’eishet ’awram. 
genesis 12:18	vayiqra far‘oh le’awram vayomer mah zot ‘asita li lamah lo higadta li ki ’ishtekha hi 
genesis 12:19	lamah ’amarta ’akhoti hi va’eqakh ’otah li le’ishah ve‘atah hineh ’ishtekha qakh valekh. 
genesis 12:20	vaytsav ‘alav par‘oh ’anashim vayshalekhu ’oto ve’et ’ishto ve’et kal ’asher lo. 
genesis 13:1	vaya‘al ’awram mimitsrayim hu ve’ishto vekhal ’asher lo velot ‘imo hanegbah. 
genesis 13:2	ve’awram kawed me’od bamiqneh bakesef uwazahaw. 
genesis 13:3	vayeilekh lemasa‘av minegew ve‘ad bet ’el ‘ad hamaqom ’asher hayah sham ’aholoh ’aholo batekhilah ben bet ’el uwen ha‘ai. 
genesis 13:4	’el meqom hamizbeiakh ’asher ‘asah sham barishonah vayiqra sham ’awram beshem yhoh. 
genesis 13:5	vegam lelot haholekh ’et ’awram hayah tson uwaqar ve’ohalim. 
genesis 13:6	velo nasa ’otam ha’arets lashewet yakhdav ki hayah rekhusham raw velo yakhelu lashewet yakhdav. 
genesis 13:7	vayhi riw ben ro‘ei miqneh ’awram uwen ro‘ei miqneh lot vehakena‘ani vehaperizi ’az yoshew ba’arets. 
genesis 13:8	vayomer ’awram ’el lot ’al na tehi meriwah beini uweinekha uwen ro‘ai uwen ro‘ekha ki ’anashim ’akhim ’anakhenu. 
genesis 13:9	halo khal ha’arets lefanekha hipared na mei‘alai ’im hasemol ve’eiminah ve’im hayamin ve’asme’ilah. 
genesis 13:10	vayisa lot ’et ‘einav vayar ’et kal kikar hayarden ki khulah mashqeh lifnei shakhet yhoh ’et sedom ve’et ‘amorah kegan yhoh ke’erets mitsrayim bo’akhah tso‘ar. 
genesis 13:11	vayiwkhar lo lot ’et kal kikar hayarden vayisa‘ lot miqedem vayiparedu ’ish mei‘al ’akhiv. 
genesis 13:12	’awram yashaw be’erets kena‘an velot yashaw be‘arei hakikar vaye’ehal ‘ad sedom. 
genesis 13:13	ve’anshei sedom ra‘im vekhata’im yhoh me’od. 
genesis 13:14	yhoh ’amar ’el ’awram ’akharei hipared lot mei‘imo sa na ‘einekha ure’eh min hamaqom ’asher ’atah sham tsafonah vanegbah vaqeidemah vayamah. 
genesis 13:15	ki ’et kal ha’arets ’asher ’atah ro’eh lekha ’etenenah ulezar‘akha ‘ad ‘olam. 
genesis 13:16	vesamti ’et zar‘akha ka‘afar ha’arets ’asher ’im yukhal ’ish limnot ’et ‘afar ha’arets gam zar‘akha yimaneh. 
genesis 13:17	qum hithalekh ba’arets le’arekah ulerakhebah ki lekha ’etenenah. 
genesis 13:18	vaye’ehal ’awram vayawo vayeishew be’eilonei mamrei ’asher bekhewron vayiwen sham mizbeiakh yhoh. 
genesis 14:1	vayhi bimei ’amrafel melekh shin‘ar ’aryokh melekh ’elasar kedarela‘omer melekh ‘eilam vetid‘al melekh goyim. 
genesis 14:2	‘asu milkhamah ’et bera‘ melekh sedom ve’et birsha‘ melekh ‘amorah shin’aw melekh ’admah veshem’eiwer melekh tsewoyim tsewoyim umelekh bela‘ hi tso‘ar. 
genesis 14:3	kal ’eleh khaweru ’el ‘eimeq hasidim hu yam hamelakh. 
genesis 14:4	shetem ‘esreh shanah ‘awedu ’et kedarela‘omer ushelosh ‘esreh shanah maradu. 
genesis 14:5	uwe’arba‘ ‘esreh shanah ba khedarela‘omer vehamelakhim ’asher ’ito vayaku ’et refa’im be‘ashterot qarnayim ve’et hazuzim beham ve’et ha’eimim beshaveh qiryatayim. 
genesis 14:6	ve’et hakhori beharam sei‘ir ‘ad ’el paran ’asher ‘al hamidbar. 
genesis 14:7	vayashuwu vayawo’u ’el ‘en mishpat hi qadesh vayaku ’et kal sedeh ha‘amaleiqi vegam ’et ha’emori hayoshew bekhatson tamar. 
genesis 14:8	vayeitsei melekh sedom umelekh ‘amorah umelekh ’admah umelekh tsewoyim tsewoyim umelekh bela‘ hi tso‘ar vaya‘arkhu ’itam milkhamah be‘eimeq hasidim. 
genesis 14:9	’et kedarela‘omer melekh ‘eilam vetid‘al melekh goyim ve’amrafel melekh shin‘ar ve’aryokh melekh ’elasar ’arba‘ah melakhim ’et hakhamishah. 
genesis 14:10	ve‘eimeq hasidim be’erot be’erot kheimar vayanusu melekh sedom va‘amorah vayipelu shamah vehanish’arim herah nasu. 
genesis 14:11	vayiqkhu ’et kal rekhush sedom va‘amorah ve’et kal ’akhelam vayeileikhu. 
genesis 14:12	vayiqkhu ’et lot ve’et rekhusho ben ’akhi ’awram vayeileikhu vehu yoshew bisdom. 
genesis 14:13	vayawo hapalit vayaged le’awram ha‘iwri vehu shokhen be’eilonei mamrei ha’emori ’akhi ’eshkol va’akhi ‘aner vehem ba‘alei werit ’awram. 
genesis 14:14	vayishma‘ ’awram ki nishbah ’akhiv vayareq ’et khanikhav yelidei weito shemonah ‘asar ushelosh mei’ot vayirdof ‘ad dan. 
genesis 14:15	vayeikhaleq ‘aleihem laylah hu va‘awadav vayakem vayirdefem ‘ad khowah ’asher misemol ledamaseq. 
genesis 14:16	vayashew ’et kal harekhush vegam ’et lot ’akhiv urekhusho heishiw vegam ’et hanashim ve’et ha‘am. 
genesis 14:17	vayeitsei melekh sedom liqrato ’akharei shuwo meihakot ’et la‘omer ve’et hamelakhim ’asher ’ito ’el ‘eimeq shaveh hu ‘eimeq hamelekh. 
genesis 14:18	umalki tsedeq melekh shalem hotsi lekhem vayayin vehu khohen le’el ‘elyon. 
genesis 14:19	vaywarekheihu vayomar barukh ’awram le’el ‘elyon qoneh shamayim va’arets. 
genesis 14:20	uwarukh ’el ‘elyon ’asher migen tsarekha beyadekha vayiten lo ma‘aser mikol. 
genesis 14:21	vayomer melekh sedom ’el ’awram ten li hanefesh veharekhush qakh lakh. 
genesis 14:22	vayomer ’awram ’el melekh sedom harimoti yadi ’el yhoh ’el ‘elyon qoneh shamayim va’arets. 
genesis 14:23	’im mikhut ve‘ad serokh na‘al ve’im ’eqakh mikal ’asher lakh velo tomar ’ani he‘esharti ’et ’awram. 
genesis 14:24	bil‘adai raq ’asher ’akhelu hane‘arim vekheileq ha’anashim ’asher halekhu ’iti ‘aner ’eshkol umamrei hem yiqkhu khelqam. 
genesis 15:1	’akhar hadewarim ha’eleh hayah dewar yhoh ’el ’awram bamakhazeh leimor ’al tira ’awram ’anokhi magen lakh sekharekha harbeh me’od. 
genesis 15:2	vayomer ’awram ’adonai yhoh mah titen li ve’anokhi holekh ‘ariri uwen mesheq beiti hu dameseq ’eli‘ezer. 
genesis 15:3	vayomer ’awram hen li lo natatah zara‘ vehineh wen beiti yoresh ’oti. 
genesis 15:4	vehineh dewar yhoh ’eilav leimor lo yirashekha zeh ki ’im ’asher yeitsei mimei‘ekha hu yirashekha. 
genesis 15:5	vayotsei ’oto hakhutsah vayomer habet na hashamaymah usefor hakokhawim ’im tukhal lispor ’otam vayomer lo koh yihyeh zar‘ekha. 
genesis 15:6	vehe’emin yhoh vayakhsheweha lo tsedaqah. 
genesis 15:7	vayomer ’eilav ’ani yhoh ’asher hotseitikha mei’ur kasdim latet lekha ’et ha’arets hazot lerishtah. 
genesis 15:8	vayomar ’adonai yhoh bamah ’eida‘ ki ’irashenah. 
genesis 15:9	vayomer ’eilav qekhah li ‘eglah meshuleshet ve‘ez meshuleshet ve’ayil meshulash vetor vegozal. 
genesis 15:10	vayiqakh lo ’et kal ’eleh vaywater ’otam batavekh vayiten ’ish bitro liqrat rei‘eihu ve’et hatsipor lo watar. 
genesis 15:11	vayeired ha‘ayit ‘al hapegarim vayashew ’otam ’awram. 
genesis 15:12	vayhi hashemesh lawo vetardeimah nafelah ‘al ’awram vehineh ’eimah khasheikhah gedolah nofelet ‘alav. 
genesis 15:13	vayomer le’awram yadoa‘ teida‘ ki ger yihyeh zar‘akha be’erets lo lahem va‘awadum ve‘inu ’otam ’arba‘ mei’ot shanah. 
genesis 15:14	vegam ’et hago ’asher ya‘awodu dan ’anokhi ve’akharei khen yeitse’u birkhush gadol. 
genesis 15:15	ve’atah tawo ’el ’awotekha beshalom tiqawer beseiwah towah. 
genesis 15:16	vedor rewi‘i yashuwu henah ki lo shalem ‘avon ha’emori ‘ad henah. 
genesis 15:17	vayhi hashemesh ba’ah va‘alatah hayah vehineh tanur ‘ashan velapid ’esh ’asher ‘awar ben hagezarim ha’eleh. 
genesis 15:18	bayom hahu karat yhoh ’et ’awram berit leimor lezar‘akha natati ’et ha’arets hazot minehar mitsrayim ‘ad hanahar hagadol nehar perat. 
genesis 15:19	’et haqeini ve’et haqenizi ve’et haqadmoni. 
genesis 15:20	ve’et hakhiti ve’et haperizi ve’et harefa’im. 
genesis 15:21	ve’et ha’emori ve’et hakena‘ani ve’et hagirgashi ve’et haywusi. 
genesis 16:1	vesarai ’eishet ’awram lo yaledah lo velah shifkhah mitsrit ushemah hagar. 
genesis 16:2	vatomer sarai ’el ’awram hineh na ‘atsarani yhoh miledet bo na ’el shifkhati ’ulai ’ibaneh mimenah vayishma‘ ’awram leqol sarai. 
genesis 16:3	vatiqakh sarai ’eishet ’awram ’et hagar hamitsrit shifkhatah miqets ‘eser shanim leshewet ’awram be’erets kena‘an vatiten ’otah le’awram ’ishah lo le’ishah. 
genesis 16:4	vayawo ’el hagar vatahar vateire ki haratah vateiqal gewirtah be‘eineha. 
genesis 16:5	vatomer sarai ’el ’awram khamasi ‘alekha ’anokhi natati shifkhati bekheiqekha vateire ki haratah va’eiqal be‘eineha yishpot yhoh beini uweinekha 
genesis 16:6	vayomer ’awram ’el sarai hineh shifkhatekh beyadekh ‘asi lah hatow be‘einayikh vate‘aneha sarai vatiwrakh mipaneha. 
genesis 16:7	vayimtsa’ah mal’akh yhoh ‘al ‘en hamayim bamidbar ‘al ha‘ayin bederekh shur. 
genesis 16:8	vayomar hagar shifkhat sarai ’ei mizeh wat ve’anah teileikhi vatomer mipenei sarai gewirti ’anokhi borakhat. 
genesis 16:9	vayomer lah mal’akh yhoh shuwi ’el gewirtekh vehit‘ani takhat yadeha. 
genesis 16:10	vayomer lah mal’akh yhoh harbah ’arbeh ’et zar‘ekh velo yisafer meirow. 
genesis 16:11	vayomer lah mal’akh yhoh hinakh harah veyoladt ben veqarat shemo yishma‘el ki shama‘ yhoh ’el ‘aneyekh. 
genesis 16:12	vehu yihyeh pere ’adam yado wakol veyad kol bo ve‘al penei khal ’ekhav yishkon. 
genesis 16:13	vatiqra shem yhoh hadower ’eileha ’atah ’el ro’i ki ’amerah hagam halom ra’iti ’akharei ro’i. 
genesis 16:14	‘al ken qara labe’er be’er lakhai ro’i hineh wen qadesh uwen bared. 
genesis 16:15	vateiled hagar le’awram ben vayiqra ’awram shem beno ’asher yaledah hagar yishma‘el. 
genesis 16:16	ve’awram ben shemonim shanah veshesh shanim beledet hagar ’et yishma‘el le’awram. 
genesis 17:1	vayhi ’awram ben tish‘im shanah veteisha‘ shanim vayeira yhoh ’el ’awram vayomer ’eilav ’ani ’el shadai hithalekh lefanai vehyeh tamim. 
genesis 17:2	ve’etenah weriti beini uweinekha ve’arbeh ’otkha bim’od me’od. 
genesis 17:3	vayipol ’awram ‘al panav vaydaber ’ito ’elohim leimor. 
genesis 17:4	’ani hineh weriti ’itakh vehayita le’aw hamon goyim. 
genesis 17:5	velo yiqarei ‘od ’et shimkha ’awram vehayah shimkha ’awraham ki ’aw hamon goyim netatikha. 
genesis 17:6	vehifreiti ’otekha bim’od me’od unetatikha legoyim umelakhim mimekha yeitsei’u. 
genesis 17:7	vahaqimoti ’et beriti beini uweinekha uwen zar‘akha ’akharekha ledorotam liwrit ‘olam lihyot lekha leilohim ulezar‘akha ’akharekha. 
genesis 17:8	venatati lekha ulezar‘akha ’akharekha ’et ’erets megurekha ’et kal ’erets kena‘an la’akhuzat ‘olam vehayiti lahem leilohim. 
genesis 17:9	vayomer ’elohim ’el ’awraham ve’atah ’et beriti tishmor ’atah vezar‘akha ’akharekha ledorotam. 
genesis 17:10	zot beriti ’asher tishmeru beini uweineikhem uwen zar‘akha ’akharekha himol lakhem kal zakhar. 
genesis 17:11	unemaltem ’et besar ‘arelatkhem vehayah le’ot berit beini uweineikhem. 
genesis 17:12	uwen shemonat yamim yimol lakhem kal zakhar ledoroteikhem yelid bayit umiqnat kesef mikol ben neikhar ’asher lo mizar‘akha hu. 
genesis 17:13	himol yimol yelid beitekha umiqnat kaspekha vehayetah weriti biwsarkhem liwrit ‘olam. 
genesis 17:14	ve‘arel zakhar ’asher lo yimol ’et besar ‘arelato venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei‘ameha ’et beriti heifar. 
genesis 17:15	vayomer ’elohim ’el ’awraham sarai ’ishtekha lo tiqra ’et shemah sarai ki sarah shemah. 
genesis 17:16	uweirakhti ’otah vegam natati mimenah lekha ben uweirakhtiha vehayetah legoyim malkhei ‘amim mimenah yihyu. 
genesis 17:17	vayipol ’awraham ‘al panav vayitskhaq vayomer belibo halewen mei’ah shanah yivaled ve’im sarah hawat tish‘im shanah teiled. 
genesis 17:18	vayomer ’awraham ’el ha’elohim lu yishma‘el yikhyeh lefanekha. 
genesis 17:19	vayomer ’elohim ’awal sarah ’ishtekha yoledet lekha ben veqarata ’et shemo yitskhaq vahaqimoti ’et beriti ’ito liwrit ‘olam lezar‘o ’akharav. 
genesis 17:20	uleyishma‘el shema‘tikha hineh beirakhti ’oto vehifreiti ’oto vehirbeiti ’oto bim’od me’od shenem ‘asar nesi’im yolid unetativ lego gadol. 
genesis 17:21	ve’et beriti ’aqim ’et yitskhaq ’asher teiled lekha sarah lamo‘ed hazeh bashanah ha’akheret. 
genesis 17:22	vaykhal ledaber ’ito vaya‘al ’elohim mei‘al ’awraham. 
genesis 17:23	vayiqakh ’awraham ’et yishma‘el beno ve’et kal yelidei weito ve’et kal miqnat kaspo kal zakhar be’anshei bet ’awraham vayamal ’et besar ‘arelatam be‘etsem hayom hazeh ka’asher diber ’ito ’elohim. 
genesis 17:24	ve’awraham ben tish‘im vateisha‘ shanah behimolo besar ‘arelato. 
genesis 17:25	veyishma‘el beno ben shelosh ‘esreh shanah behimolo ’et besar ‘arelato. 
genesis 17:26	be‘etsem hayom hazeh nimol ’awraham veyishma‘el beno. 
genesis 17:27	vekhal ’anshei weito yelid bayit umiqnat kesef mei’et ben neikhar nimolu ’ito. 
genesis 18:1	vayeira ’eilav yhoh be’eilonei mamrei vehu yoshew petakh ha’ohel kekhom hayom. 
genesis 18:2	vayisa ‘einav vayar vehineh sheloshah ’anashim nitsawim ‘alav vayar vayarats liqratam mipetakh ha’ohel vayishtakhu ’aretsah. 
genesis 18:3	vayomar ’adonai ’im na matsati khen be‘einekha ’al na ta‘awor mei‘al ‘awdekha. 
genesis 18:4	yuqakh na me‘at mayim verakhatsu ragleikhem vehisha‘anu takhat ha‘ets. 
genesis 18:5	ve’eqkhah fat lekhem vesa‘adu libekhem ’akhar ta‘aworu ki ‘al ken ‘awartem ‘al ‘awdekhem vayomeru ken ta‘aseh ka’asher dibarta. 
genesis 18:6	vaymaher ’awraham ha’ohelah ’el sarah vayomer mahari shelosh se’im qemakh solet lushi va‘asi ‘ugot. 
genesis 18:7	ve’el habaqar rats ’awraham vayiqakh ben baqar rakh vatow vayiten ’el hana‘ar vaymaher la‘asot ’oto. 
genesis 18:8	vayiqakh khem’ah vekhalaw uwen habaqar ’asher ‘asah vayiten lifneihem vehu ‘omed ‘aleihem takhat ha‘ets vayokheilu. 
genesis 18:9	vayomeru ’eilav ’ayeh sarah ’ishtekha vayomer hineh wa’ohel. 
genesis 18:10	vayomer show ’ashuw ’eilekha ka‘et khayah vehineh wen lesarah ’ishtekha vesarah shoma‘at petakh ha’ohel vehu ’akharav. 
genesis 18:11	ve’awraham vesarah zeqeinim ba’im bayamim khadal lihyot lesarah ’orakh kanashim. 
genesis 18:12	vatitskhaq sarah beqirbah leimor ’akharei weloti hayetah li ‘ednah vadoni zaqen. 
genesis 18:13	vayomer yhoh ’el ’awraham lamah zeh tsakhaqah sarah leimor ha’af ’umnam ’eiled va’ani zaqanti. 
genesis 18:14	hayipalei yhoh dawar lamo‘ed ’ashuw ’eilekha ka‘et khayah ulesarah wen. 
genesis 18:15	vatekhakhesh sarah leimor lo tsakhaqti ki yarei’ah vayomer lo ki tsakhaqet. 
genesis 18:16	vayaqumu misham ha’anashim vayashqifu ‘al penei sedom ve’awraham holekh ‘imam leshalekham. 
genesis 18:17	yhoh ’amar hamkhaseh ’ani mei’awraham ’asher ’ani ‘oseh. 
genesis 18:18	ve’awraham hayo yihyeh lego gadol ve‘atsum veniwrekhu wo kol goyei ha’arets. 
genesis 18:19	ki yeda‘tiv lema‘an ’asher yetsaveh ’et banav ve’et beito ’akharav veshameru derekh yhoh la‘asot tsedaqah umishpat lema‘an hawi yhoh ‘al ’awraham ’et ’asher diber ‘alav. 
genesis 18:20	vayomer yhoh za‘aqat sedom va‘amorah ki rabah vekhatatam ki khawedah me’od. 
genesis 18:21	’eiradah na ve’er’eh haketsa‘aqatah haba’ah ’eilai ‘asu kalah ve’im lo ’eida‘ah. 
genesis 18:22	vayifnu misham ha’anashim vayeilekhu sedomah ve’awraham ‘odenu ‘omed lifnei yhoh. 
genesis 18:23	vayigash ’awraham vayomar ha’af tispeh tsadiq ‘im rasha‘. 
genesis 18:24	’ulai yesh khamishim tsadiqim betokh ha‘ir ha’af tispeh velo tisa lamaqom lema‘an khamishim hatsadiqim ’asher beqirbah. 
genesis 18:25	khalilah lekha mei‘asot kadawar hazeh lehamit tsadiq ‘im rasha‘ vehayah khatsadiq karasha‘ khalilah lakh hashofet kal ha’arets lo ya‘aseh mishpat. 
genesis 18:26	vayomer yhoh ’im ’emtsa wisdom khamishim tsadiqim betokh ha‘ir venasati lekhal hamaqom ba‘awuram. 
genesis 18:27	vaya‘an ’awraham vayomar hineh na ho’alti ledaber ’el ’adonai ve’anokhi ‘afar va’eifer. 
genesis 18:28	’ulai yakhserun khamishim hatsadiqim khamishah hatashkhit bakhamishah ’et kal ha‘ir vayomer lo ’ashkhit ’im ’emtsa sham ’arba‘im vakhamishah. 
genesis 18:29	vayosef ‘od ledaber ’eilav vayomar ’ulai yimatse’un sham ’arba‘im vayomer lo ’e‘eseh ba‘awur ha’arba‘im. 
genesis 18:30	vayomer ’al na yikhar ladonai va’adabeirah ’ulai yimatse’un sham sheloshim vayomer lo ’e‘eseh ’im ’emtsa sham sheloshim. 
genesis 18:31	vayomer hineh na ho’alti ledaber ’el ’adonai ’ulai yimatse’un sham ‘esrim vayomer lo ’ashkhit ba‘awur ha‘esrim. 
genesis 18:32	vayomer ’al na yikhar ladonai va’adaberah ’akh hapa‘am ’ulai yimatse’un sham ‘asarah vayomer lo ’ashkhit ba‘awur ha‘asarah. 
genesis 18:33	vayeilekh yhoh ka’asher kilah ledaber ’el ’awraham ve’awraham shaw limqomo. 
genesis 19:1	vayawo’u shenei hamal’akhim sedomah ba‘erew velot yoshew besha‘ar sedom vayar lot vayaqam liqratam vayishtakhu ’apayim ’aretsah. 
genesis 19:2	vayomer hineh na ’adonai suru na ’el bet ‘awdekhem velinu verakhatsu ragleikhem vehishkamtem vahalakhtem ledarkekhem vayomeru lo ki warekhow nalin. 
genesis 19:3	vayiftsar bam me’od vayasuru ’eilav vayawo’u ’el beito vaya‘as lahem mishteh umatsot ’afah vayokheilu. 
genesis 19:4	terem yishkawu ve’anshei ha‘ir ’anshei sedom nasabu ‘al habayit mina‘ar ve‘ad zaqen kal ha‘am miqatseh. 
genesis 19:5	vayiqre’u ’el lot vayomeru lo ’ayeh ha’anashim ’asher ba’u ’eilekha halayelah hotsi’em ’eileinu veneide‘ah ’otam. 
genesis 19:6	vayeitsei ’aleihem lot hapetkhah vehadelet sagar ’akharav. 
genesis 19:7	vayomar ’al na ’akhai tarei‘u. 
genesis 19:8	hineh na li shetei wanot ’asher lo yade‘u ’ish ’otsi’ah na ’ethen ’aleikhem va‘asu lahen katow be‘eineikhem raq la’anashim ha’el ’al ta‘asu dawar ki ‘al ken ba’u betsel qorati. 
genesis 19:9	vayomeru gesh hale’ah vayomeru ha’ekhad ba lagur vayishpot shafot ‘atah nara‘ lekha meihem vayiftseru wa’ish belot me’od vayigeshu lishbor hadalet. 
genesis 19:10	vayishlekhu ha’anashim ’et yadam vayawi’u ’et lot ’aleihem habayetah ve’et hadelet sagaru. 
genesis 19:11	ve’et ha’anashim ’asher petakh habayit hiku basanveirim miqaton ve‘ad gadol vayil’u limtso hapatakh. 
genesis 19:12	vayomeru ha’anashim ’el lot ‘od mi lekha foh khatan uwanekha uwenotekha vekhol ’asher lekha ba‘ir hotsei min hamaqom. 
genesis 19:13	ki mashkhitim ’anakhnu ’et hamaqom hazeh ki gadelah tsa‘aqatam ’et penei yhoh vayshalekheinu yhoh leshakhatah. 
genesis 19:14	vayeitsei lot vaydaber ’el khatanav loqekhei wenotav vayomer qumu tse’u min hamaqom hazeh ki mashkhit yhoh ’et ha‘ir vayhi khimtsakheq be‘einei khatanav. 
genesis 19:15	ukhemo hashakhar ‘alah vaya’itsu hamal’akhim belot leimor qum qakh ’et ’ishtekha ve’et shetei wenotekha hanimtsa’ot pen tisafeh ba‘avon ha‘ir. 
genesis 19:16	vayitmahmah vayakhaziqu ha’anashim beyado uweyad ’ishto uweyad shetei wenotav bekhemlat yhoh ‘alav vayotsi’uhu vayanikhuhu mikhuts la‘ir. 
genesis 19:17	vayhi khehotsi’am ’otam hakhutsah vayomer himalet ‘al nafshekha ’al tabit ’akharekha ve’al ta‘amod bekhal hakikar haharah himalet pen tisafeh. 
genesis 19:18	vayomer lot ’aleihem ’al na ’adonai. 
genesis 19:19	hineh na matsa ‘awdekha khen be‘einekha vatagdel khasdekha ’asher ‘asita ‘imadi lehakhayot ’et nafshi ve’anokhi lo ’ukhal lehimalet haharah pen tidbaqani hara‘ah vamati. 
genesis 19:20	hineh na ha‘ir hazot qerowah lanus shamah vehi mits‘ar ’imaletah na shamah halo mits‘ar hi utekhi nafshi. 
genesis 19:21	vayomer ’eilav hineh nasati fanekha gam ladawar hazeh lewilti hafeki ’et ha‘ir ’asher dibarta. 
genesis 19:22	maher himalet shamah ki lo ’ukhal la‘asot dawar ‘ad bo’akha shamah ‘al ken qara shem ha‘ir tso‘ar. 
genesis 19:23	hashemesh yatsa ‘al ha’arets velot ba tso‘arah. 
genesis 19:24	yhoh himtir ‘al sedom ve‘al ‘amorah gaferit va’esh mei’et yhoh min hashamayim. 
genesis 19:25	vayahafokh ’et he‘arim ha’el ve’et kal hakikar ve’et kal yoshewei he‘arim vetsemakh ha’adamah. 
genesis 19:26	vatabet ’ishto mei’akharav vatehi netsiw melakh. 
genesis 19:27	vayashkem ’awraham baboqer ’el hamaqom ’asher ‘amad sham ’et penei yhoh. 
genesis 19:28	vayashqef ‘al penei sedom va‘amorah ve‘al kal penei ’erets hakikar vayar vehineh ‘alah qitor ha’arets keqitor hakiwshan. 
genesis 19:29	vayhi beshakhet ’elohim ’et ‘arei hakikar vayizkor ’elohim ’et ’awraham vayshalakh ’et lot mitokh hahafeikhah bahafokh ’et he‘arim ’asher yashaw bahen lot. 
genesis 19:30	vaya‘al lot mitso‘ar vayeishew bahar ushetei wenotav ‘imo ki yarei lashewet betso‘ar vayeishew bame‘arah hu ushetei wenotav. 
genesis 19:31	vatomer habekhirah ’el hatse‘irah ’awinu zaqen ve’ish ’en ba’arets lawo ‘aleinu kederekh kal ha’arets. 
genesis 19:32	lekhah nashqeh ’et ’awinu yayin venishkewah ‘imo unekhayeh mei’awinu zara‘. 
genesis 19:33	vatashqena ’et ’awihen yayin balaylah hu vatawo habekhirah vatishkaw ’et ’awiha velo yada‘ beshikhwah uwequmah 
genesis 19:34	vayhi mimakhorat vatomer habekhirah ’el hatse‘irah hen shakhawti ’emesh ’et ’awi nashqenu yayin gam halaylah uwo’i shikhwi ‘imo unekhayeh mei’awinu zara‘. 
genesis 19:35	vatashqena gam balaylah hahu ’et ’awihen yayin vataqam hatse‘irah vatishkaw ‘imo velo yada‘ beshikhwah uwequmah. 
genesis 19:36	vataharena shetei wenot lot mei’awihen. 
genesis 19:37	vateiled habekhirah ben vatiqra shemo mo’aw hu ’awi mo’aw ‘ad hayom. 
genesis 19:38	vehatse‘irah gam hi yaledah ben vatiqra shemo ben ‘ami hu ’awi wenei ‘amon ‘ad hayom. 
genesis 20:1	vayisa‘ misham ’awraham ’artsah hanegew vayeishew ben qadesh uwen shur vayagar bigrar. 
genesis 20:2	vayomer ’awraham ’el sarah ’ishto ’akhoti hi vayishlakh ’awimelekh melekh gerar vayiqakh ’et sarah. 
genesis 20:3	vayawo ’elohim ’el ’awimelekh bakhalom halayelah vayomer lo hinekha met ‘al ha’ishah ’asher laqakhta vehiv be‘ulat ba‘al. 
genesis 20:4	va’awimelekh lo qaraw ’eileha vayomar ’adonai hago gam tsadiq taharog. 
genesis 20:5	halo hu ’amar li ’akhoti hi vehi gam hi ’amerah ’akhi hu betam lewawi uweniqyon kapai ‘asiti zot. 
genesis 20:6	vayomer ’eilav ha’elohim bakhalom gam ’anokhi yada‘ti ki wetam lewawekha ‘asita zot va’ekhsokh gam ’anokhi ’otkha meikhato li ‘al ken lo netatikha lingoa‘ ’eileha. 
genesis 20:7	ve‘atah hashew ’eishet ha’ish ki nawi hu veyitpalel ba‘adkha vekhyeh ve’im ’einekha meishiw da‘ ki mot tamut ’atah vekhal ’asher lakh. 
genesis 20:8	vayashkem ’awimelekh baboqer vayiqra lekhal ‘awadav vaydaber ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh be’azeneihem vayire’u ha’anashim me’od. 
genesis 20:9	vayiqra ’awimelekh le’awraham vayomer lo meh ‘asita lanu umeh khatati lakh ki heiweita ‘alai ve‘al mamlakhti khata’ah gedolah ma‘asim ’asher lo yei‘asu ‘asita ‘imadi. 
genesis 20:10	vayomer ’awimelekh ’el ’awraham mah ra’ita ki ‘asita ’et hadawar hazeh. 
genesis 20:11	vayomer ’awraham ki ’amarti raq ’en yir’at ’elohim bamaqom hazeh vaharaguni ‘al dewar ’ishti. 
genesis 20:12	vegam ’amenah ’akhoti wat ’awi hi ’akh lo wat ’imi vatehi li le’ishah. 
genesis 20:13	vayhi ka’asher hit‘u ’oti ’elohim mibet ’awi va’omar lah zeh khasdekh ’asher ta‘asi ‘imadi ’el kal hamaqom ’asher nawo shamah ’imri li ’akhi hu. 
genesis 20:14	vayiqakh ’awimelekh tson uwaqar va‘awadim ushefakhot vayiten le’awraham vayashew lo ’et sarah ’ishto. 
genesis 20:15	vayomer ’awimelekh hineh ’artsi lefanekha batow be‘einekha shew. 
genesis 20:16	ulesarah ’amar hineh natati ’elef kesef le’akhikh hineh hu lakh kesut ‘einayim lekhol ’asher ’itakh ve’et kol venokhakhat. 
genesis 20:17	vayitpalel ’awraham ’el ha’elohim vayirpa ’elohim ’et ’awimelekh ve’et ’ishto ve’amhotav vayeileidu. 
genesis 20:18	ki ‘atsor ‘atsar yhoh be‘ad kal rekhem lewet ’awimelekh ‘al dewar sarah ’eishet ’awraham. 
genesis 21:1	yhoh paqad ’et sarah ka’asher ’amar vaya‘as yhoh lesarah ka’asher diber. 
genesis 21:2	vatahar vateiled sarah le’awraham ben lizqunav lamo‘ed ’asher diber ’oto ’elohim. 
genesis 21:3	vayiqra ’awraham ’et shem beno hanolad lo ’asher yaledah lo sarah yitskhaq. 
genesis 21:4	vayamal ’awraham ’et yitskhaq beno ben shemonat yamim ka’asher tsivah ’oto ’elohim. 
genesis 21:5	ve’awraham ben me’at shanah behivaled lo ’et yitskhaq beno. 
genesis 21:6	vatomer sarah tsekhoq ‘asah li ’elohim kal hashomeia‘ yitskhaq li. 
genesis 21:7	vatomer mi milel le’awraham heiniqah wanim sarah ki yaladti wen lizqunav. 
genesis 21:8	vayigdal hayeled vayigamal vaya‘as ’awraham mishteh gadol beyom higamel ’et yitskhaq. 
genesis 21:9	vateire sarah ’et ben hagar hamitsrit ’asher yaledah le’awraham metsakheq. 
genesis 21:10	vatomer le’awraham garesh ha’amah hazot ve’et benah ki lo yirash ben ha’amah hazot ‘im beni ‘im yitskhaq. 
genesis 21:11	vayeira‘ hadawar me’od be‘einei ’awraham ‘al ’odot beno. 
genesis 21:12	vayomer ’elohim ’el ’awraham ’al yeira‘ be‘einekha ‘al hana‘ar ve‘al ’amatekha kol ’asher tomar ’eilekha sarah shema‘ beqolah ki weyitskhaq yiqarei lekha zara‘. 
genesis 21:13	vegam ’et ben ha’amah lego ’asimenu ki zar‘akha hu. 
genesis 21:14	vayashkem ’awraham baboqer vayiqakh lekhem vekheimat mayim vayiten ’el hagar sam ‘al shikhmah ve’et hayeled vayshalekheha vateilekh vateita‘ bemidbar be’er shawa‘. 
genesis 21:15	vayikhlu hamayim min hakheimet vatashlekh ’et hayeled takhat ’akhad hasikhim. 
genesis 21:16	vateilekh vateishew lah mineged harkheq kimtakhavei qeshet ki ’amerah ’al ’er’eh bemot hayaled vateishew mineged vatisa ’et qolah vateiwek. 
genesis 21:17	vayishma‘ ’elohim ’et qol hana‘ar vayiqra mal’akh ’elohim ’el hagar min hashamayim vayomer lah mah lakh hagar ’al tire’i ki shama‘ ’elohim ’el qol hana‘ar ba’asher hu sham. 
genesis 21:18	qumi se’i ’et hana‘ar vehakhaziqi ’et yadekh bo ki lego gadol ’asimenu. 
genesis 21:19	vayifqakh ’elohim ’et ‘eineha vateire be’er mayim vateilekh vatemalei ’et hakheimet mayim vatashq ’et hana‘ar. 
genesis 21:20	vayhi ’elohim ’et hana‘ar vayigdal vayeishew bamidbar vayhi roweh qashat. 
genesis 21:21	vayeishew bemidbar paran vatiqakh lo ’imo ’ishah mei’erets mitsrayim. 
genesis 21:22	vayhi ba‘et hahiv vayomer ’awimelekh ufikhol sar tsewa’o ’el ’awraham leimor ’elohim ‘imekha bekhol ’asher ’atah ‘oseh. 
genesis 21:23	ve‘atah hishawe‘ah li weilohim henah ’im tishqor li ulenini ulenekhdi kakhesed ’asher ‘asiti ‘imekha ta‘aseh ‘imadi ve‘im ha’arets ’asher gartah bah. 
genesis 21:24	vayomer ’awraham ’anokhi ’ishaweia‘. 
genesis 21:25	vehokhiakh ’awraham ’et ’awimelekh ‘al ’odot be’er hamayim ’asher gazelu ‘awdei ’awimelekh. 
genesis 21:26	vayomer ’awimelekh lo yada‘ti mi ‘asah ’et hadawar hazeh vegam ’atah lo higadta li vegam ’anokhi lo shama‘ti bilti hayom. 
genesis 21:27	vayiqakh ’awraham tson uwaqar vayiten la’awimelekh vayikhretu sheneihem berit. 
genesis 21:28	vayatsew ’awraham ’et shewa‘ kiwsot hatson lewadehen. 
genesis 21:29	vayomer ’awimelekh ’el ’awraham mah henah shewa‘ kewasot ha’eleh ’asher hitsawta lewadanah. 
genesis 21:30	vayomer ki ’et shewa‘ kewasot tiqakh miyadi ba‘awur tihyeh li le‘eidah ki khafarti ’et habe’er hazot. 
genesis 21:31	‘al ken qara lamaqom hahu be’er shawa‘ ki sham nishbe‘u sheneihem. 
genesis 21:32	vayikhretu werit biw’er shawa‘ vayaqam ’awimelekh ufikhol sar tsewa’o vayashuwu ’el ’erets pelishtim. 
genesis 21:33	vayita‘ ’eshel biw’er shawa‘ vayiqra sham beshem yhoh ’el ‘olam. 
genesis 21:34	vayagar ’awraham be’erets pelishtim yamim rabim. 
genesis 22:1	vayhi ’akhar hadewarim ha’eleh veha’elohim nisah ’et ’awraham vayomer ’eilav ’awraham vayomer hineini. 
genesis 22:2	vayomer qakh na ’et binkha ’et yekhidekha ’asher ’ahawta ’et yitskhaq velekh lekha ’el ’erets hamoriyah veha‘aleihu sham le‘olah ‘al ’akhad heharim ’asher ’omar ’eilekha. 
genesis 22:3	vayashkem ’awraham baboqer vayakhawosh ’et khamoro vayiqakh ’et shenei ne‘arav ’ito ve’et yitskhaq beno vaywaqa‘ ‘atsei ‘olah vayaqam vayeilekh ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amar lo ha’elohim. 
genesis 22:4	bayom hashelishi vayisa ’awraham ’et ‘einav vayar ’et hamaqom meirakhoq. 
genesis 22:5	vayomer ’awraham ’el ne‘arav shewu lakhem poh ‘im hakhamor va’ani vehana‘ar neilekhah ‘ad koh venishtakhaveh venashuwah ’aleikhem. 
genesis 22:6	vayiqakh ’awraham ’et ‘atsei ha‘olah vayasem ‘al yitskhaq beno vayiqakh beyado ’et ha’esh ve’et hama’akhelet vayeilekhu sheneihem yakhdav. 
genesis 22:7	vayomer yitskhaq ’el ’awraham ’awiv vayomer ’awi vayomer hineni weni vayomer hineh ha’esh veha‘eitsim ve’ayeh haseh le‘olah. 
genesis 22:8	vayomer ’awraham ’elohim yir’eh lo haseh le‘olah beni vayeilekhu sheneihem yakhdav. 
genesis 22:9	vayawo’u ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amar lo ha’elohim vayiwen sham ’awraham ’et hamizbeiakh vaya‘arokh ’et ha‘eitsim vaya‘aqod ’et yitskhaq beno vayasem ’oto ‘al hamizbeiakh mima‘al la‘eitsim. 
genesis 22:10	vayishlakh ’awraham ’et yado vayiqakh ’et hama’akhelet lishkhot ’et beno. 
genesis 22:11	vayiqra ’eilav mal’akh yhoh min hashamayim vayomer ’awraham ’awraham vayomer hineini. 
genesis 22:12	vayomer ’al tishlakh yadekha ’el hana‘ar ve’al ta‘as lo me’umah ki ‘atah yada‘ti ki yerei ’elohim ’atah velo khasakhta ’et binkha ’et yekhidekha mimeni. 
genesis 22:13	vayisa ’awraham ’et ‘einav vayar vehineh ’ayil ’akhar ne’ekhaz basewakh beqarnav vayeilekh ’awraham vayiqakh ’et ha’ayil vaya‘aleihu le‘olah takhat beno. 
genesis 22:14	vayiqra ’awraham shem hamaqom hahu yhoh yir’eh ’asher yei’amer hayom behar yhoh yeira’eh. 
genesis 22:15	vayiqra mal’akh yhoh ’el ’awraham sheinit min hashamayim. 
genesis 22:16	vayomer bi nishba‘ti ne’um yhoh ki ya‘an ’asher ‘asita ’et hadawar hazeh velo khasakhta ’et binkha ’et yekhidekha. 
genesis 22:17	ki warekh ’awarekhkha veharbah ’arbeh ’et zar‘akha kekhokhwei hashamayim vekhakhol ’asher ‘al sefat hayam veyirash zar‘akha ’et sha‘ar ’oyewav. 
genesis 22:18	vehitbarakhu wezar‘akha kol goyei ha’arets ‘eiqew ’asher shama‘ta beqoli. 
genesis 22:19	vayashaw ’awraham ’el ne‘arav vayaqumu vayeilekhu yakhdav ’el be’er shawa‘ vayeishew ’awraham biw’er shawa‘. 
genesis 22:20	vayhi ’akharei hadewarim ha’eleh vayugad le’awraham leimor hineh yaledah milkah gam hi banim lenakhor ’akhikha. 
genesis 22:21	’et ‘uts bekhoro ve’et buz ’akhiv ve’et qemu’el ’awi ’aram. 
genesis 22:22	ve’et kesed ve’et khazo ve’et pildash ve’et yidlaf ve’et betu’el. 
genesis 22:23	uwetu’el yalad ’et riwqah shemonah ’eleh yaledah milkah lenakhor ’akhi ’awraham. 
genesis 22:24	ufilagsho ushemah re’umah vateiled gam hi ’et tewakh ve’et gakham ve’et takhash ve’et ma‘akhah. 
genesis 23:1	vayihyu khayei sarah mei’ah shanah ve‘esrim shanah veshewa‘ shanim shenei khayei sarah. 
genesis 23:2	vatamat sarah beqiryat ’arba‘ hi khewron be’erets kena‘an vayawo ’awraham lispod lesarah veliwkotah. 
genesis 23:3	vayaqam ’awraham mei‘al penei meito vaydaber ’el benei khet leimor. 
genesis 23:4	ger vetoshaw ’anokhi ‘imakhem tenu li ’akhuzat qewer ‘imakhem ve’eqberah meiti milefanai. 
genesis 23:5	vaya‘anu wenei khet ’et ’awraham leimor lo. 
genesis 23:6	shema‘einu ’adoni nesi ’elohim ’atah betokheinu bemiwkhar qewareinu qewor ’et meitekha ’ish mimenu ’et qiwro lo yikhleh mimekha miqewor meitekha. 
genesis 23:7	vayaqam ’awraham vayishtakhu le‘am ha’arets liwnei khet. 
genesis 23:8	vaydaber ’itam leimor ’im yesh ’et nafshekhem liqbor ’et meiti milefanai shema‘uni ufig‘u li be‘efron ben tsokhar. 
genesis 23:9	veyiten li ’et me‘arat hamakhpeilah ’asher lo ’asher biqtseh sadeihu bekhesef malei yitenenah li betokhkhem la’akhuzat qawer. 
genesis 23:10	ve‘efron yoshew betokh benei khet vaya‘an ‘efron hakhiti ’et ’awraham be’azenei wenei khet lekhol ba’ei sha‘ar ‘iro leimor. 
genesis 23:11	lo ’adoni shema‘eini hasadeh natati lakh vehame‘arah ’asher bo lekha netatiha le‘einei wenei ‘ami netatiha lakh qewor meitekha. 
genesis 23:12	vayishtakhu ’awraham lifnei ‘am ha’arets. 
genesis 23:13	vaydaber ’el ‘efron be’azenei ‘am ha’arets leimor ’akh ’im ’atah lu shema‘eini natati kesef hasadeh qakh mimeni ve’eqberah ’et meiti shamah. 
genesis 23:14	vaya‘an ‘efron ’et ’awraham leimor lo. 
genesis 23:15	’adoni shema‘eini ’erets ’arba‘ mei’ot sheqel kesef beini uweinekha mah hi ve’et meitekha qewor. 
genesis 23:16	vayishma‘ ’awraham ’el ‘efron vayishqol ’awraham le‘efron ’et hakesef ’asher diber be’azenei wenei khet ’arba‘ mei’ot sheqel kesef ‘ower lasokher. 
genesis 23:17	vayaqam sedeh ‘efron ’asher bamakhpeilah ’asher lifnei mamrei hasadeh vehame‘arah ’asher bo vekhal ha‘ets ’asher basadeh ’asher bekhal gewulo sawiw. 
genesis 23:18	le’awraham lemiqnah le‘einei wenei khet bekhol ba’ei sha‘ar ‘iro. 
genesis 23:19	ve’akharei khen qawar ’awraham ’et sarah ’ishto ’el me‘arat sedeh hamakhpeilah ‘al penei mamrei hi khewron be’erets kena‘an. 
genesis 23:20	vayaqam hasadeh vehame‘arah ’asher bo le’awraham la’akhuzat qawer mei’et benei khet. 
genesis 24:1	ve’awraham zaqen ba bayamim yhoh beirakh ’et ’awraham bakol. 
genesis 24:2	vayomer ’awraham ’el ‘awdo zeqan beito hamoshel bekhal ’asher lo sim na yadekha takhat yereikhi. 
genesis 24:3	ve’ashbi‘akha yhoh ’elohei hashamayim veilohei ha’arets ’asher lo tiqakh ’ishah liwni mibenot hakena‘ani ’asher ’anokhi yoshew beqirbo. 
genesis 24:4	ki ’el ’artsi ve’el moladti teilekh velaqakhta ’ishah liwni leyitskhaq. 
genesis 24:5	vayomer ’eilav ha‘ewed ’ulai lo toweh ha’ishah lalekhet ’akharai ’el ha’arets hazot hehashew ’ashiw ’et binkha ’el ha’arets ’asher yatsata misham. 
genesis 24:6	vayomer ’eilav ’awraham hishamer lekha pen tashiw ’et beni shamah. 
genesis 24:7	yhoh ’elohei hashamayim ’asher leqakhani mibet ’awi umei’erets moladti va’asher diber li va’asher nishba‘ li leimor lezar‘akha ’eten ’et ha’arets hazot hu yishlakh mal’akho lefanekha velaqakhta ’ishah liwni misham. 
genesis 24:8	ve’im lo toweh ha’ishah lalekhet ’akharekha veniqita mishewu‘ati zot raq ’et beni lo tashew shamah. 
genesis 24:9	vayasem ha‘ewed ’et yado takhat yerekh ’awraham ’adonav vayishawa‘ lo ‘al hadawar hazeh. 
genesis 24:10	vayiqakh ha‘ewed ‘asarah gemalim migemalei ’adonav vayeilekh vekhal tuw ’adonav beyado vayaqam vayeilekh ’el ’aram naharayim ’el ‘ir nakhor. 
genesis 24:11	vayawrekh hagemalim mikhuts la‘ir ’el be’er hamayim le‘et ‘erew le‘et tset hasho’awot. 
genesis 24:12	vayomar yhoh ’elohei ’adoni ’awraham haqreh na lefanai hayom va‘aseh khesed ‘im ’adoni ’awraham. 
genesis 24:13	hineh ’anokhi nitsaw ‘al ‘en hamayim uwenot ’anshei ha‘ir yotse’ot lish’ow mayim. 
genesis 24:14	vehayah hana‘ara ’asher ’omar ’eileha hati na khadekh ve’eshteh ve’amerah sheteh vegam gemalekha ’ashqeh ’otah hokhakhta le‘awdekha leyitskhaq uwah ’eida‘ ki ‘asita khesed ‘im ’adoni. 
genesis 24:15	vayhi hu terem kilah ledaber vehineh riwqah yotset ’asher yuledah liwtu’el ben milkah ’eishet nakhor ’akhi ’awraham vekhadah ‘al shikhmah. 
genesis 24:16	vehana‘ara towat mar’eh me’od betulah ve’ish lo yeda‘ah vateired ha‘aynah vatemalei khadah vata‘al. 
genesis 24:17	vayarats ha‘ewed liqratah vayomer hagmi’ini na me‘at mayim mikadekh. 
genesis 24:18	vatomer sheteh ’adoni vatemaher vatored kadah ‘al yadah vatashqeihu. 
genesis 24:19	vatekhal lehashqoto vatomer gam ligmalekha ’esh’aw ‘ad ’im kilu lishtot. 
genesis 24:20	vatemaher vate‘ar kadah ’el hashoqet vatarats ‘od ’el habe’er lish’ow vatish’aw lekhal gemalav. 
genesis 24:21	veha’ish mishta’eh lah makharish lada‘at hahitsliakh yhoh darko ’im lo. 
genesis 24:22	vayhi ka’asher kilu hagemalim lishtot vayiqakh ha’ish nezem zahaw beqa‘ mishqalo ushenei tsemidim ‘al yadeha ‘asarah zahaw mishqalam. 
genesis 24:23	vayomer bat mi ’at hagidi na li hayesh bet ’awikh maqom lanu lalin. 
genesis 24:24	vatomer ’eilav bat betu’el ’anokhi ben milkah ’asher yaledah lenakhor. 
genesis 24:25	vatomer ’eilav gam tewen gam mispo raw ‘imanu gam maqom lalun. 
genesis 24:26	vayiqod ha’ish vayishtakhu yhoh. 
genesis 24:27	vayomer barukh yhoh ’elohei ’adoni ’awraham ’asher lo ‘azaw khasdo va’amito mei‘im ’adoni ’anokhi baderekh nakhani yhoh bet ’akhei ’adoni. 
genesis 24:28	vatarats hana‘ara vataged lewet ’imah kadewarim ha’eleh. 
genesis 24:29	uleriwqah ’akh ushemo lawan vayarats lawan ’el ha’ish hakhutsah ’el ha‘ayin. 
genesis 24:30	vayhi kir’ot ’et hanezem ve’et hatsemidim ‘al yedei ’akhoto ukheshame‘o ’et diwrei riwqah ’akhoto leimor koh diber ’eilai ha’ish vayawo ’el ha’ish vehineh ‘omed ‘al hagemalim ‘al ha‘ayin. 
genesis 24:31	vayomer bo berukh yhoh lamah ta‘amod bakhuts ve’anokhi piniti habayit umaqom lagemalim. 
genesis 24:32	vayawo ha’ish habaytah vayfatakh hagemalim vayiten tewen umispo lagemalim umayim lirkhots raglav veraglei ha’anashim ’asher ’ito. 
genesis 24:33	vayisem vayusam lefanav le’ekhol vayomer lo ’okhal ‘ad ’im dibarti dewarai vayomer daber. 
genesis 24:34	vayomar ‘ewed ’awraham ’anokhi. 
genesis 24:35	yhoh beirakh ’et ’adoni me’od vayigdal vayiten lo tson uwaqar vekhesef vezahaw va‘awadim ushefakhot ugemalim vakhamorim. 
genesis 24:36	vateiled sarah ’eishet ’adoni wen ladoni ’akharei ziqnatah vayiten lo ’et kal ’asher lo. 
genesis 24:37	vayashbi‘eini ’adoni leimor lo tiqakh ’ishah liwni mibenot hakena‘ani ’asher ’anokhi yoshew be’artso. 
genesis 24:38	’im lo ’el bet ’awi teilekh ve’el mishpakhti velaqakhta ’ishah liwni. 
genesis 24:39	va’omar ’el ’adoni ’ulai lo teilekh ha’ishah ’akharai. 
genesis 24:40	vayomer ’eilai yhoh ’asher hithalakhti lefanav yishlakh mal’akho ’itakh vehitsliakh darkekha velaqakhta ’ishah liwni mimishpakhti umibet ’awi. 
genesis 24:41	’az tinaqeh mei’alati ki tawo ’el mishpakhti ve’im lo yitenu lakh vehayita naqi mei’alati. 
genesis 24:42	va’awo hayom ’el ha‘ayin va’omar yhoh ’elohei ’adoni ’awraham ’im yeshkha na matsliakh darki ’asher ’anokhi holekh ‘aleha. 
genesis 24:43	hineh ’anokhi nitsaw ‘al ‘en hamayim vehayah ha‘almah hayotset lish’ow ve’amarti ’eileha hashqini na me‘at mayim mikadekh. 
genesis 24:44	ve’amerah ’eilai gam ’atah sheteh vegam ligmalekha ’esh’aw hi ha’ishah ’asher hokhiakh yhoh lewen ’adoni. 
genesis 24:45	’ani terem ’akhaleh ledaber ’el libi vehineh riwqah yotset vekhadah ‘al shikhmah vateired ha‘aynah vatish’aw va’omar ’eileha hashqini na. 
genesis 24:46	vatemaher vatored kadah mei‘aleha vatomer sheteh vegam gemalekha ’ashqeh va’eishet vegam hagemalim hishqatah. 
genesis 24:47	va’esh’al ’otah va’omar bat mi ’at vatomer bat betu’el ben nakhor ’asher yaledah lo milkah va’asim hanezem ‘al ’apah vehatsemidim ‘al yadeha. 
genesis 24:48	va’eqod va’eshtakhaveh yhoh va’awarekh ’et yhoh ’elohei ’adoni ’awraham ’asher hinkhani bederekh ’emet laqakhat ’et bat ’akhi ’adoni liwno. 
genesis 24:49	ve‘atah ’im yeshkhem ‘osim khesed ve’emet ’et ’adoni hagidu li ve’im lo hagidu li ve’efneh ‘al yamin ’o ‘al semol. 
genesis 24:50	vaya‘an lawan uwetu’el vayomeru yhoh yatsa hadawar lo nukhal daber ’eilekha ra‘ ’o tow. 
genesis 24:51	hineh riwqah lefanekha qakh valekh utehi ’ishah lewen ’adonekha ka’asher diber yhoh. 
genesis 24:52	vayhi ka’asher shama‘ ‘ewed ’awraham ’et diwreihem vayishtakhu ’artsah yhoh. 
genesis 24:53	vayotsei ha‘ewed kelei khesef ukhelei zahaw uwegadim vayiten leriwqah umigdanot natan le’akhiha ule’imah. 
genesis 24:54	vayokhelu vayishtu hu veha’anashim ’asher ‘imo vayalinu vayaqumu waboqer vayomer shalekhuni ladoni. 
genesis 24:55	vayomer ’akhiha ve’imah teishew hana‘ara ’itanu yamim ’o ‘asor ’akhar teilekh. 
genesis 24:56	vayomer ’aleihem ’al te’akharu ’oti yhoh hitsliakh darki shalekhuni ve’eilekhah ladoni. 
genesis 24:57	vayomeru niqra lana‘ara venish’alah ’et piha. 
genesis 24:58	vayiqre’u leriwqah vayomeru ’eileha hateilekhi ‘im ha’ish hazeh vatomer ’eilekh. 
genesis 24:59	vayshalekhu ’et riwqah ’akhotam ve’et meiniqtah ve’et ‘ewed ’awraham ve’et ’anashav. 
genesis 24:60	vaywarakhu ’et riwqah vayomeru lah ’akhoteinu ’at hayi le’alfei rewawah veyirash zar‘ekh ’et sha‘ar sone’av. 
genesis 24:61	vataqam riwqah vena‘aroteha vatirkawnah ‘al hagemalim vateilakhnah ’akharei ha’ish vayiqakh ha‘ewed ’et riwqah vayeilakh. 
genesis 24:62	veyitskhaq ba mibo be’er lakhai ro’i vehu yoshew be’erets hanegew. 
genesis 24:63	vayeitsei yitskhaq lasuakh basadeh lifnot ‘arew vayisa ‘einav vayar vehineh gemalim ba’im. 
genesis 24:64	vatisa riwqah ’et ‘eineha vateire ’et yitskhaq vatipol mei‘al hagamal. 
genesis 24:65	vatomer ’el ha‘ewed mi ha’ish halazeh haholekh basadeh liqrateinu vayomer ha‘ewed hu ’adoni vatiqakh hatsa‘if vatitkas. 
genesis 24:66	vaysaper ha‘ewed leyitskhaq ’et kal hadewarim ’asher ‘asah. 
genesis 24:67	vaywi’eha yitskhaq ha’ohelah sarah ’imo vayiqakh ’et riwqah vatehi lo le’ishah vaye’ehaweha vayinakhem yitskhaq ’akharei ’imo. 
genesis 25:1	vayosef ’awraham vayiqakh ’ishah ushemah qeturah. 
genesis 25:2	vateiled lo ’et zimran ve’et yaqeshan ve’et medan ve’et midyan ve’et yishbaq ve’et shuakh. 
genesis 25:3	veyaqeshan yalad ’et shewa ve’et dedan uwenei dedan hayu ’ashurim uletushim ule’umim. 
genesis 25:4	uwenei midyan ‘eifah va‘eifer vakhanokh va’awida‘ ve’elda‘ah kal ’eleh benei qeturah. 
genesis 25:5	vayiten ’awraham ’et kal ’asher lo leyitskhaq. 
genesis 25:6	veliwnei hapilagshim ’asher le’awraham natan ’awraham matanot vayshalekhem mei‘al yitskhaq beno be‘odenu khai qeidemah ’el ’erets qedem. 
genesis 25:7	ve’eleh yemei shenei khayei ’awraham ’asher khai me’at shanah veshiw‘im shanah vekhamesh shanim. 
genesis 25:8	vayigva‘ vayamat ’awraham beseiwah towah zaqen vesaweia‘ vayei’asef ’el ‘amav. 
genesis 25:9	vayiqberu ’oto yitskhaq veyishma‘el banav ’el me‘arat hamakhpeilah ’el sedeh ‘efron ben tsokhar hakhiti ’asher ‘al penei mamrei. 
genesis 25:10	hasadeh ’asher qanah ’awraham mei’et benei khet shamah qubar ’awraham vesarah ’ishto. 
genesis 25:11	vayhi ’akharei mot ’awraham vaywarekh ’elohim ’et yitskhaq beno vayeishew yitskhaq ‘im be’er lakhai ro’i. 
genesis 25:12	ve’eleh toledot yishma‘el ben ’awraham ’asher yaledah hagar hamitsrit shifkhat sarah le’awraham. 
genesis 25:13	ve’eleh shemot benei yishma‘el bishmotam letoldotam bekhor yishma‘el newayot veqeidar ve’adbe’el umiwsam. 
genesis 25:14	umishma‘ vedumah umasa. 
genesis 25:15	khadad veteima yetur nafish vaqeidemah. 
genesis 25:16	eleh hem benei yishma‘el ve’eleh shemotam bekhatsreihem uwetirotam shenem ‘asar nesi’im le’umotam. 
genesis 25:17	ve’eleh shenei khayei yishma‘el me’at shanah usheloshim shanah veshewa‘ shanim vayigva‘ vayamat vayei’asef ’el ‘amav. 
genesis 25:18	vayishkenu meikhavilah ‘ad shur ’asher ‘al penei mitsrayim bo’akhah ’ashurah ‘al penei khal ’ekhav nafal. 
genesis 25:19	ve’eleh toldot yitskhaq ben ’awraham ’awraham holid ’et yitskhaq. 
genesis 25:20	vayhi yitskhaq ben ’arba‘im shanah beqakhto ’et riwqah bat betu’el ha’arami mipadan ’aram ’akhot lawan ha’arami lo le’ishah. 
genesis 25:21	vaye‘tar yitskhaq yhoh lenokhakh ’ishto ki ‘aqarah hi vayei‘ater lo yhoh vatahar riwqah ’ishto. 
genesis 25:22	vayitrotsatsu habanim beqirbah vatomer ’im ken lamah zeh ’anokhi vateilekh lidrosh ’et yhoh. 
genesis 25:23	vayomer yhoh lah shenei goyim goyim bewitnekh ushenei le’umim mimei‘ayikh yipareidu ule’om mil’om ye’emats veraw ya‘awod tsa‘ir. 
genesis 25:24	vayimle’u yameha laledet vehineh tomim bewitnah. 
genesis 25:25	vayeitsei harishon ’admoni kulo ke’aderet sei‘ar vayiqre’u shemo ‘eisav. 
genesis 25:26	ve’akharei khen yatsa ’akhiv veyado ’okhezet ba‘aqew ‘eisav vayiqra shemo ya‘aqow veyitskhaq ben shishim shanah beledet ’otam. 
genesis 25:27	vayigdelu hane‘arim vayhi ‘eisav ’ish yodeia‘ tsayid ’ish sadeh veya‘aqow ’ish tam yoshew ’ohalim. 
genesis 25:28	vaye’ehaw yitskhaq ’et ‘eisav ki tsayid befiv veriwqah ’ohewet ’et ya‘aqow. 
genesis 25:29	vayazed ya‘aqow nazid vayawo ‘eisav min hasadeh vehu ‘ayef. 
genesis 25:30	vayomer ‘eisav ’el ya‘aqow hal‘iteini na min ha’adom ha’adom hazeh ki ‘ayef ’anokhi ‘al ken qara shemo ’edom. 
genesis 25:31	vayomer ya‘aqow mikhrah khayom ’et bekhoratekha li. 
genesis 25:32	vayomer ‘eisav hineh ’anokhi holekh lamut velamah zeh li bekhorah. 
genesis 25:33	vayomer ya‘aqow hishawe‘ah li kayom vayishawa‘ lo vayimkor ’et bekhorato leya‘aqow. 
genesis 25:34	veya‘aqow natan le‘eisav lekhem unezid ‘adashim vayokhal vayeishet vayaqam vayeilakh vayiwez ‘eisav ’et habekhorah. 
genesis 26:1	vayhi ra‘aw ba’arets milewad hara‘aw harishon ’asher hayah bimei ’awraham vayeilekh yitskhaq ’el ’awimelekh melekh pelishtim gerarah. 
genesis 26:2	vayeira ’eilav yhoh vayomer ’al teired mitsrayemah shekhon ba’arets ’asher ’omar ’eilekha. 
genesis 26:3	gur ba’arets hazot ve’ehyeh ‘imekha va’awarekheka ki lekha ulezar‘akha ’eten ’et kal ha’aratsot ha’el vahaqimoti ’et hashewu‘ah ’asher nishba‘ti le’awraham ’awikha. 
genesis 26:4	vehirbeiti ’et zar‘akha kekhokhwei hashamayim venatati lezar‘akha ’et kal ha’aratsot ha’el vehitbarakhu wezar‘akha kol goyei ha’arets. 
genesis 26:5	‘eiqew ’asher shama‘ ’awraham beqoli vayishmor mishmarti mitsvotai khuqotai vetorotai. 
genesis 26:6	vayeishew yitskhaq bigrar. 
genesis 26:7	vayish’alu ’anshei hamaqom le’ishto vayomer ’akhoti hi ki yarei leimor ’ishti pen yaharguni ’anshei hamaqom ‘al riwqah ki towat mar’eh hi. 
genesis 26:8	vayhi ki ’arekhu lo sham hayamim vayashqef ’awimelekh melekh pelishtim be‘ad hakhalon vayar vehineh yitskhaq metsakheq ’et riwqah ’ishto. 
genesis 26:9	vayiqra ’awimelekh leyitskhaq vayomer ’akh hineh ’ishtekha hi ve’ekh ’amarta ’akhoti hi vayomer ’eilav yitskhaq ki ’amarti pen ’amut ‘aleha. 
genesis 26:10	vayomer ’awimelekh mah zot ‘asita lanu kim‘at shakhaw ’akhad ha‘am ’et ’ishtekha veheiweita ‘aleinu ’asham. 
genesis 26:11	vaytsav ’awimelekh ’et kal ha‘am leimor hanogeia‘ ba’ish hazeh uwe’ishto mot yumat. 
genesis 26:12	vayizra‘ yitskhaq ba’arets hahiv vayimtsa bashanah hahiv mei’ah she‘arim vaywarakheihu yhoh. 
genesis 26:13	vayigdal ha’ish vayeilekh halokh vegadel ‘ad ki gadal me’od. 
genesis 26:14	vayhi lo miqneh tson umiqneh waqar va‘awudah rabah vayqan’u ’oto pelishtim. 
genesis 26:15	vekhal habe’eirot ’asher khaferu ‘awdei ’awiv bimei ’awraham ’awiv sitemum pelishtim vaymal’um ‘afar. 
genesis 26:16	vayomer ’awimelekh ’el yitskhaq lekh mei‘imanu ki ‘atsamta mimenu me’od. 
genesis 26:17	vayeilekh misham yitskhaq vayikhan benakhal gerar vayeishew sham. 
genesis 26:18	vayashaw yitskhaq vayakhpor ’et be’eirot hamayim ’asher khaferu bimei ’awraham ’awiv vaysatemum pelishtim ’akharei mot ’awraham vayiqra lahen sheimot kasheimot ’asher qara lahen ’awiv. 
genesis 26:19	vayakhperu ‘awdei yitskhaq banakhal vayimtse’u sham be’er mayim khayim. 
genesis 26:20	vayariwu ro‘ei gerar ‘im ro‘ei yitskhaq leimor lanu hamayim vayiqra shem habe’er ‘eiseq ki hit‘asequ ‘imo. 
genesis 26:21	vayakhperu be’er ’akheret vayariwu gam ‘aleha vayiqra shemah sitnah. 
genesis 26:22	vaya‘teq misham vayakhpor be’er ’akheret velo rawu ‘aleha vayiqra shemah rekhowot vayomer ki ‘atah hirkhiw yhoh lanu ufarinu wa’arets. 
genesis 26:23	vaya‘al misham be’er shawa‘. 
genesis 26:24	vayeira ’eilav yhoh balaylah hahu vayomer ’anokhi ’elohei ’awraham ’awikha ’al tira ki ’itekha ’anokhi uweirakhtikha vehirbeiti ’et zar‘akha ba‘awur ’awraham ‘awdi. 
genesis 26:25	vayiwen sham mizbeiakh vayiqra beshem yhoh vayet sham ’aholo vayikhru sham ‘awdei yitskhaq be’er. 
genesis 26:26	va’awimelekh halakh ’eilav migerar va’akhuzat meirei‘eihu ufikhol sar tsewa’o. 
genesis 26:27	vayomer ’aleihem yitskhaq madua‘ batem ’eilai ve’atem seneitem ’oti vateshalekhuni mei’itekhem. 
genesis 26:28	vayomeru ra’o ra’inu ki hayah yhoh ‘imakh vanomer tehi na ’alah beinoteinu beineinu uweinekha venikhretah werit ‘imakh. 
genesis 26:29	’im ta‘aseh ‘imanu ra‘ah ka’asher lo nega‘anukha vekha’asher ‘asinu ‘imekha raq tow vaneshaleikhakha beshalom ’atah ‘atah berukh yhoh. 
genesis 26:30	vaya‘as lahem mishteh vayokhelu vayishtu. 
genesis 26:31	vayashkimu waboqer vayishawe‘u ’ish le’akhiv vayshalekhem yitskhaq vayeilekhu mei’ito beshalom. 
genesis 26:32	vayhi bayom hahu vayawo’u ‘awdei yitskhaq vayagidu lo ‘al ’odot habe’er ’asher khafaru vayomeru lo matsanu mayim. 
genesis 26:33	vayiqra ’otah shiw‘ah ‘al ken shem ha‘ir be’er shewa‘ ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
genesis 26:34	vayhi ‘eisav ben ’arba‘im shanah vayiqakh ’ishah ’et yehudit bat be’eiri hakhiti ve’et basemat bat ’eilon hakhiti. 
genesis 26:35	vatihyena morat ruakh leyitskhaq uleriwqah. 
genesis 27:1	vayhi ki zaqen yitskhaq vatikhhena ‘einav meire’ot vayiqra ’et ‘eisav beno hagadol vayomer ’eilav beni vayomer ’eilav hineini. 
genesis 27:2	vayomer hineh na zaqanti lo yada‘ti yom moti. 
genesis 27:3	ve‘atah sa na kheilekha telyekha veqashtekha vetsei hasadeh vetsudah li tseidah tsayid.
