joshua 15:7	ve‘alah hagewul dewirah mei‘eimeq ‘akhor vetsafonah poneh ’el hagilgal ’asher nokhakh lema‘aleh ’adumim ’asher minegew lanakhal ve‘awar hagewul ’el mei ‘en shemesh vehayu totse’otav ’el ‘en rogel. 
joshua 15:8	ve‘alah hagewul gei wen hinom ’el ketef haywusi minegew hi yerushalim ve‘alah hagewul ’el rosh hahar ’asher ‘al penei gei hinom yamah ’asher biqtseh ‘eimeq refa’im tsafonah. 
joshua 15:9	veta’ar hagewul meirosh hahar ’el ma‘yan mei neftoakh veyatsa ’el ‘arei har ‘efron veta’ar hagewul ba‘alah hi qiryat ye‘arim. 
joshua 15:10	venasaw hagewul miba‘alah yamah ’el har sei‘ir ve‘awar ’el ketef har ye‘arim mitsafonah hi khesalon veyarad bet shemesh ve‘awar timnah. 
joshua 15:11	veyatsa hagewul ’el ketef ‘eqron tsafonah veta’ar hagewul shikeronah ve‘awar har haba‘alah veyatsa yawne’el vehayu totse’ot hagewul yamah. 
joshua 15:12	ugewul yam hayamah hagadol ugewul zeh gewul benei yehudah sawiw lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 15:13	ulekhalew ben yefuneh natan kheileq betokh benei yehudah ’el pi yhoh lihoshua‘ ’et qiryat ’arba‘ ’awi ha‘anaq hi khewron. 
joshua 15:14	vayoresh misham kalew ’et sheloshah benei ha‘anaq ’et sheishai ve’et ’akhiman ve’et talmai yelidei ha‘anaq. 
joshua 15:15	vaya‘al misham ’el yoshewei dewir veshem dewir lefanim qiryat seifer. 
joshua 15:16	vayomer kalew ’asher yakeh ’et qiryat seifer ulekhadah venatati lo ’et ‘akhsah witi le’ishah. 
joshua 15:17	vayilkedah ‘ateni’el ben qenaz ’akhi khalew vayiten lo ’et ‘akhsah wito le’ishah. 
joshua 15:18	vayhi bewo’ah vatesiteihu lish’ol mei’et ’awiha sadeh vatitsnakh mei‘al hakhamor vayomer lah kalew mah lakh. 
joshua 15:19	vatomer tenah li werakhah ki ’erets hanegew netatani venatatah li gulot mayim vayiten lah ’et gulot ‘iliyot ve’et gulot takhtiyot. 
joshua 15:20	zot nakhalat mateh wenei yehudah lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 15:21	vayihyu he‘arim miqtseh lemateh wenei yehudah ’el gewul ’edom banegbah qawtse’el ve‘eider veyagur. 
joshua 15:22	veqinah vedimonah ve‘ad‘adah. 
joshua 15:23	veqedesh vekhatsor veyitnan. 
joshua 15:24	zif vatelem uwe‘alot. 
joshua 15:25	vekhatsor khadatah uqeriyot khetsron hi khatsor. 
joshua 15:26	’amam ushema‘ umoladah. 
joshua 15:27	vakhatsar gadah vekheshmon uwet palet. 
joshua 15:28	vakhatsar shu‘al uwe’er shewa‘ uwizyotyah. 
joshua 15:29	ba‘alah ve‘iyim va‘atsem. 
joshua 15:30	ve’eltolad ukhesil vekharemah. 
joshua 15:31	vetsiqlag umadmanah vesansanah. 
joshua 15:32	ulewa’ot veshilkhim ve‘ayin verimon kal ‘arim ‘esrim vateisha‘ vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:33	bashefeilah ’eshta’ol vetsare‘ah ve’ashnah. 
joshua 15:34	vezanoakh ve‘en ganim tapuakh veha‘einam. 
joshua 15:35	yarmut va‘adulam sokhoh va‘azeiqah. 
joshua 15:36	vesha‘arayim va‘aditayim vehagedeirah ugedeirotayim ‘arim ’arba‘ ‘esreh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:37	tsenan vakhadashah umigdal gad. 
joshua 15:38	vedil‘an vehamitspeh veyaqete’el. 
joshua 15:39	lakhish uwatseqat ve‘eglon. 
joshua 15:40	vekhabon velakhmas vekhitlish. 
joshua 15:41	ugedeirot bet dagon vena‘amah umaqeidah ‘arim shesh ‘esreh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:42	liwnah va‘eter ve‘ashan. 
joshua 15:43	veyiftakh ve’ashnah unetsiw. 
joshua 15:44	uqe‘ilah ve’akhziw umareishah ‘arim teisha‘ vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:45	‘eqron uwenoteha vakhatseireha. 
joshua 15:46	mei‘eqron vayamah kol ’asher ‘al yad ’ashdod vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:47	’ashdod benoteha vakhatseireha ‘azah benoteha vakhatseireha ‘ad nakhal mitsrayim vehayam hagawol hagadol ugewul. 
joshua 15:48	uwahar shamir veyatir vesokhoh. 
joshua 15:49	vedanah veqiryat sanah hi dewir. 
joshua 15:50	va‘anaw ve’eshtemoh ve‘anim. 
joshua 15:51	vegoshen vekholon vegiloh ‘arim ’akhat ‘esreh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:52	’araw verumah ve’esh‘an. 
joshua 15:53	veyanim veyanum uwet tapuakh va’afeiqah. 
joshua 15:54	vekhumtah veqiryat ’arba‘ hi khewron vetsi‘or ‘arim teisha‘ vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:55	ma‘on karmel vazif veyutah. 
joshua 15:56	veyizre‘el veyaqede‘am vezanoakh. 
joshua 15:57	haqayin giw‘ah vetimnah ‘arim ‘eser vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:58	khalkhul bet tsur ugedor. 
joshua 15:59	uma‘arat uwet ‘anot ve’elteqon ‘arim shesh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:60	qiryat ba‘al hi qiryat ye‘arim veharabah ‘arim shetayim vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:61	bamidbar bet ha‘arawah midin usekhakhah. 
joshua 15:62	vehaniwshan ve‘ir hamelakh ve‘en gedi ‘arim shesh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 15:63	ve’et haywusi yoshewei yerushalim lo yukhelu yakhelu wenei yehudah lehorisham vayeishew haywusi ’et benei yehudah birushalim ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
joshua 16:1	vayeitsei hagoral liwnei yosef miyarden yerikho lemei yerikho mizrakhah hamidbar ‘oleh mirikho bahar bet ’el. 
joshua 16:2	veyatsa mibet ’el luzah ve‘awar ’el gewul ha’arki ‘atarot. 
joshua 16:3	veyarad yamah ’el gewul hayafleiti ‘ad gewul bet khoron takhton ve‘ad gazer vehayu totse’oto totse’otav yamah. 
joshua 16:4	vayinkhalu wenei yosef menasheh ve’efrayim. 
joshua 16:5	vayhi gewul benei ’efrayim lemishpekhotam vayhi gewul nakhalatam mizrakhah ‘atrot ’adar ‘ad bet khoron ‘elyon. 
joshua 16:6	veyatsa hagewul hayamah hamikhmetat mitsafon venasaw hagewul mizrakhah ta’anat shiloh ve‘awar ’oto mimizrakh yanokhah. 
joshua 16:7	veyarad miyanokhah ‘atarot vena‘aratah ufaga‘ birikho veyatsa hayarden. 
joshua 16:8	mitapuakh yeilekh hagewul yamah nakhal qanah vehayu totse’otav hayamah zot nakhalat mateh wenei ’efrayim lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 16:9	vehe‘arim hamiwdalot liwnei ’efrayim betokh nakhalat benei menasheh kal he‘arim vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 16:10	velo horishu ’et hakena‘ani hayoshew begazer vayeishew hakena‘ani beqerew ’efrayim ‘ad hayom hazeh vayhi lemas ‘owed. 
joshua 17:1	vayhi hagoral lemateh menasheh ki hu bekhor yosef lemakhir bekhor menasheh ’awi hagil‘ad ki hu hayah ’ish milkhamah vayhi lo hagil‘ad vehabashan. 
joshua 17:2	vayhi liwnei menasheh hanotarim lemishpekhotam liwnei ’awi‘ezer veliwnei kheileq veliwnei ’asri’el veliwnei shekhem veliwnei kheifer veliwnei shemida‘ ’eleh benei menasheh ben yosef hazekharim lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 17:3	velitslafekhad ben kheifer ben gil‘ad ben makhir ben menasheh lo hayu lo banim ki ’im banot ve’eleh shemot benotav makhlah veno‘ah khagelah milkah vetirtsah. 
joshua 17:4	vatiqrawnah lifnei ’el‘azar hakohen velifnei yehoshua‘ bin nun velifnei hanesi’im leimor yhoh tsivah ’et mosheh latet lanu nakhalah betokh ’akheinu vayiten lahem ’el pi yhoh nakhalah betokh ’akhei ’awihen. 
joshua 17:5	vayipelu khawlei menasheh ‘asarah lewad mei’erets hagil‘ad vehabashan ’asher mei‘eiwer layarden. 
joshua 17:6	ki benot menasheh nakhalu nakhalah betokh banav ve’erets hagil‘ad hayetah liwnei menasheh hanotarim. 
joshua 17:7	vayhi gewul menasheh mei’asher hamikhmetat ’asher ‘al penei shekhem vehalakh hagewul ’el hayamin ’el yoshewei ‘en tapuakh. 
joshua 17:8	limnasheh hayetah ’erets tapuakh vetapuakh ’el gewul menasheh liwnei ’efrayim. 
joshua 17:9	veyarad hagewul nakhal qanah negbah lanakhal ‘arim ha’eleh le’efrayim betokh ‘arei menasheh ugewul menasheh mitsefon lanakhal vayhi totse’otav hayamah. 
joshua 17:10	negbah le’efrayim vetsafonah limnasheh vayhi hayam gewulo uwe’asher yifge‘un mitsafon uweyisashkhar mimizrakh. 
joshua 17:11	vayhi limnasheh beyisashkhar uwe’asher bet she’an uwenoteha veyiwle‘am uwenoteha ve’et yoshewei dor uwenoteha veyoshewei ‘en dor uwenoteha veyoshewei ta‘nakh uwenoteha veyoshewei megido uwenoteha sheloshet hanafet. 
joshua 17:12	velo yakhelu benei menasheh lehorish ’et he‘arim ha’eleh vayo’el hakena‘ani lashewet ba’arets hazot. 
joshua 17:13	vayhi ki khazequ benei yisra’el vayitenu ’et hakena‘ani lamas vehoresh lo horisho. 
joshua 17:14	vaydaberu benei yosef ’et yehoshua‘ leimor madua‘ natatah li nakhalah goral ’ekhad vekhewel ’ekhad va’ani ‘am raw ‘ad ’asher ‘ad koh beirekhani yhoh. 
joshua 17:15	vayomer ’aleihem yehoshua‘ ’im ‘am raw ’atah ‘aleh lekha haya‘rah uweireita lekha sham be’erets haperizi veharefa’im ki ’ats lekha har ’efrayim. 
joshua 17:16	vayomeru benei yosef lo yimatsei lanu hahar verekhew barzel bekhal hakena‘ani hayoshew be’erets ha‘eimeq la’asher bewet she’an uwenoteha vela’asher be‘eimeq yizre‘el. 
joshua 17:17	vayomer yehoshua‘ ’el bet yosef le’efrayim velimnasheh leimor ‘am raw ’atah vekhoakh gadol lakh lo yihyeh lekha goral ’ekhad. 
joshua 17:18	ki har yihyeh lakh ki ya‘ar hu uweireito vehayah lekha totse’otav ki torish ’et hakena‘ani ki rekhew barzel lo ki khazaq hu. 
joshua 18:1	vayiqahalu kal ‘adat benei yisra’el shiloh vayashkinu sham ’et ’ohel mo‘ed veha’arets nikhbeshah lifneihem. 
joshua 18:2	vayivateru biwnei yisra’el ’asher lo khalequ ’et nakhalatam shiw‘ah shewatim. 
joshua 18:3	vayomer yehoshua‘ ’el benei yisra’el ‘ad ’anah ’atem mitrapim lawo lareshet ’et ha’arets ’asher natan lakhem yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem. 
joshua 18:4	hawu lakhem sheloshah ’anashim lashawet ve’eshlakhem veyaqumu veyithalekhu wa’arets veyikhtewu ’otah lefi nakhalatam veyawo’u ’eilai. 
joshua 18:5	vehitkhalequ ’otah leshiw‘ah khalaqim yehudah ya‘amod ‘al gewulo minegew uwet yosef ya‘amdu ‘al gewulam mitsafon. 
joshua 18:6	ve’atem tikhtewu ’et ha’arets shiw‘ah khalaqim vahaweitem ’eilai henah veyariti lakhem goral poh lifnei yhoh ’eloheinu. 
joshua 18:7	ki ’en kheileq lalviyim beqirbekhem ki khehunat yhoh nakhalato vegad ure’uwen vakhatsi sheiwet hamnasheh laqekhu nakhalatam mei‘eiwer layarden mizrakhah ’asher natan lahem mosheh ‘ewed yhoh. 
joshua 18:8	vayaqumu ha’anashim vayeileikhu vaytsav yehoshua‘ ’et haholekhim likhtow ’et ha’arets leimor lekhu vehithalekhu wa’arets vekhitwu ’otah veshuwu ’eilai ufoh ’ashlikh lakhem goral lifnei yhoh beshiloh. 
joshua 18:9	vayeilekhu ha’anashim vaya‘awru wa’arets vayikhtewuha le‘arim leshiw‘ah khalaqim ‘al seifer vayawo’u ’el yehoshua‘ ’el hamakhaneh shiloh. 
joshua 18:10	vayashlekh lahem yehoshua‘ goral beshiloh lifnei yhoh vaykhaleq sham yehoshua‘ ’et ha’arets liwnei yisra’el kemakhleqotam. 
joshua 18:11	vaya‘al goral mateh wenei winyamin lemishpekhotam vayeitsei gewul goralam ben benei yehudah uwen benei yosef. 
joshua 18:12	vayhi lahem hagewul lif’at tsafonah min hayarden ve‘alah hagewul ’el ketef yerikho mitsafon ve‘alah wahar yamah vehayah vehayu totse’otav midbarah bet ’aven. 
joshua 18:13	ve‘awar misham hagewul luzah ’el ketef luzah negbah hi bet ’el veyarad hagewul ‘atrot ’adar ‘al hahar ’asher minegew lewet khoron takhton. 
joshua 18:14	veta’ar hagewul venasaw lif’at yam negbah min hahar ’asher ‘al penei wet khoron negbah vehayah vehayu totse’otav ’el qiryat ba‘al hi qiryat ye‘arim ‘ir benei yehudah zot pe’at yam. 
joshua 18:15	ufe’at negbah miqtseh qiryat ye‘arim veyatsa hagewul yamah veyatsa ’el ma‘yan mei neftoakh. 
joshua 18:16	veyarad hagewul ’el qetseh hahar ’asher ‘al penei gei wen hinom ’asher be‘eimeq refa’im tsafonah veyarad gei hinom ’el ketef haywusi negbah veyarad ‘en rogel. 
joshua 18:17	veta’ar mitsafon veyatsa ‘en shemesh veyatsa ’el gelilot ’asher nokhakh ma‘aleh ’adumim veyarad ’ewen bohan ben re’uwen. 
joshua 18:18	ve‘awar ’el ketef mul ha‘arawah tsafonah veyarad ha‘arawatah. 
joshua 18:19	ve‘awar hagewul ’el ketef bet khagelah tsafonah vehayah vehayu totse’otav totse’ot hagewul ’el leshon yam hamelakh tsafonah ’el qetseh hayarden negbah zeh gewul negew. 
joshua 18:20	vehayarden yigbol ’oto lif’at qeidemah zot nakhalat benei winyamin ligwuloteha sawiw lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 18:21	vehayu he‘arim lemateh benei winyamin lemishpekhoteihem yerikho uwet khagelah ve‘eimeq qetsits. 
joshua 18:22	uwet ha‘arawah utsemarayim uwet ’el. 
joshua 18:23	veha‘avim vehaparah ve‘aferah. 
joshua 18:24	ukhefar ha‘amoni ha‘amonah veha‘afeni vagawa‘ ‘arim shetem ‘esreh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 18:25	giw‘on veharamah uwe’eirot. 
joshua 18:26	vehamitspeh vehakefirah vehamotsah. 
joshua 18:27	vereqem veyirpe’el vetar’alah. 
joshua 18:28	vetseila‘ ha’elef vehaywusi hi yerushalim giw‘at qiryat ‘arim ’arba‘ ‘esreh vekhatsreihen zot nakhalat benei winyamin lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 19:1	vayeitsei hagoral hasheini leshim‘on lemateh wenei shim‘on lemishpekhotam vayhi nakhalatam betokh nakhalat benei yehudah. 
joshua 19:2	vayhi lahem benakhalatam be’er shewa‘ veshewa‘ umoladah. 
joshua 19:3	vakhatsar shu‘al uwalah va‘atsem. 
joshua 19:4	ve’eltolad uwetul vekharemah. 
joshua 19:5	vetsiqlag uwet hamarkawot vakhatsar susah. 
joshua 19:6	uwet lewa’ot vesharukhen ‘arim shelosh ‘esreh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:7	‘ayin rimon va‘eter ve‘ashan ‘arim ’arba‘ vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:8	vekhal hakhatseirim ’asher sewiwot he‘arim ha’eleh ‘ad ba‘alat be’er ramat negew zot nakhalat mateh wenei shim‘on lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 19:9	meikhewel benei yehudah nakhalat benei shim‘on ki hayah kheileq benei yehudah raw meihem vayinkhalu wenei shim‘on betokh nakhalatam. 
joshua 19:10	vaya‘al hagoral hashelishi liwnei zewulun lemishpekhotam vayhi gewul nakhalatam ‘ad sarid. 
joshua 19:11	ve‘alah gewulam layamah umar‘alah ufaga‘ bedabashet ufaga‘ ’el hanakhal ’asher ‘al penei yaqene‘am. 
joshua 19:12	veshaw misarid qeidemah mizrakh hashemesh ‘al gewul kislot tawor veyatsa ’el hadawerat ve‘alah yafia‘. 
joshua 19:13	umisham ‘awar qeidemah mizrakhah gitah kheifer ‘itah qatsin veyatsa rimon hameto’ar hanei‘ah. 
joshua 19:14	venasaw ’oto hagewul mitsefon khanaton vehayu totse’otav gei yiftakh ’el. 
joshua 19:15	veqatat venahalal veshimron veyid’alah uwet lakhem ‘arim shetem ‘esreh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:16	zot nakhalat benei zewulun lemishpekhotam he‘arim ha’eleh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:17	leyisashkhar yatsa hagoral harewi‘i liwnei yisashkhar lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 19:18	vayhi gewulam yizre‘elah vehakesulot veshunem. 
joshua 19:19	vakhafarayim veshi’on va’anakharat. 
joshua 19:20	veharabit veqishyon va’awets. 
joshua 19:21	veremet ve‘en ganim ve‘en khadah uwet patsets. 
joshua 19:22	ufaga‘ hagewul betawor veshakhatsumah veshakhatsimah uwet shemesh vehayu totse’ot gewulam hayarden ‘arim shesh ‘esreh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:23	zot nakhalat mateh wenei yisashkhar lemishpekhotam he‘arim vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:24	vayeitsei hagoral hakhamishi lemateh wenei ’asher lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 19:25	vayhi gewulam khelqat vakhali vaweten ve’akhshaf. 
joshua 19:26	ve’alamelekh ve‘am‘ad umish’al ufaga‘ bekharmel hayamah uweshikhor liwnat. 
joshua 19:27	veshaw mizrakh hashemesh bet dagon ufaga‘ bizwulun uwegei yiftakh ’el tsafonah bet ha‘eimeq une‘i’el veyatsa ’el kawul misemol. 
joshua 19:28	ve‘ewron urekhow vekhamon veqanah ‘ad tsidon rabah. 
joshua 19:29	veshaw hagewul haramah ve‘ad ‘ir miwtsar tsor veshaw hagewul khosah veyihyu vehayu totse’otav hayamah meikhewel ’akhziwah. 
joshua 19:30	ve‘umah va’afeq urekhow ‘arim ‘esrim ushetayim vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:31	zot nakhalat mateh wenei ’asher lemishpekhotam he‘arim ha’eleh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:32	liwnei naftali yatsa hagoral hashishi liwnei naftali lemishpekhotam. 
joshua 19:33	vayhi gewulam meikheilef mei’eilon betsa‘ananim va’adami haneqew veyawne’el ‘ad laqum vayhi totse’otav hayarden. 
joshua 19:34	veshaw hagewul yamah ’aznot tawor veyatsa misham khuqoqah ufaga‘ bizwulun minegew uwe’asher paga‘ miyam uwihudah hayarden mizrakh hashamesh. 
joshua 19:35	ve‘arei miwtsar hatsidim tser vekhamat raqat vekhinaret. 
joshua 19:36	va’adamah veharamah vekhatsor. 
joshua 19:37	veqedesh ve’edre‘i ve‘en khatsor. 
joshua 19:38	veyir’on umigdal ’el khorem uwet ‘anat uwet shamesh ‘arim tesha‘ ‘esreh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:39	zot nakhalat mateh wenei naftali lemishpekhotam he‘arim vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:40	lemateh wenei dan lemishpekhotam yatsa hagoral hashewi‘i. 
joshua 19:41	vayhi gewul nakhalatam tsare‘ah ve’eshta’ol ve‘ir shamesh. 
joshua 19:42	vesha‘alabin ve’ayalon veyitlah. 
joshua 19:43	ve’eilon vetimnatah ve‘eqron. 
joshua 19:44	ve’elteqeh vegibeton uwa‘alat. 
joshua 19:45	vihud uwenei weraq vegat rimon. 
joshua 19:46	umei hayarqon veharaqon ‘im hagewul mul yafo. 
joshua 19:47	vayeitsei gewul benei dan meihem vaya‘alu wenei dan vayilakhamu ‘im leshem vayilkedu ’otah vayaku ’otah lefi kherew vayirshu ’otah vayeishewu wah vayiqre’u leleshem dan keshem dan ’awihem. 
joshua 19:48	zot nakhalat mateh wenei dan lemishpekhotam he‘arim ha’eleh vekhatsreihen. 
joshua 19:49	vaykhalu linkhol ’et ha’arets ligwuloteha vayitenu wenei yisra’el nakhalah lihoshua‘ bin nun betokham. 
joshua 19:50	‘al pi yhoh natenu lo ’et ha‘ir ’asher sha’al ’et timnat serakh behar ’efrayim vayiwneh ’et ha‘ir vayeishew bah. 
joshua 19:51	’eleh hanekhalot ’asher nikhalu ’el‘azar hakohen vihoshua‘ bin nun verashei ha’awot lematot benei yisra’el begoral beshiloh lifnei yhoh petakh ’ohel mo‘ed vaykhalu meikhaleq ’et ha’arets. 
joshua 20:1	vaydaber yhoh ’el yehoshua‘ leimor. 
joshua 20:2	daber ’el benei yisra’el leimor tenu lakhem ’et ‘arei hamiqlat ’asher dibarti ’aleikhem beyad mosheh. 
joshua 20:3	lanus shamah rotseiakh makeh nefesh bishgagah biwli da‘at vehayu lakhem lemiqlat migo’el hadam. 
joshua 20:4	venas ’el ’akhat meihe‘arim ha’eleh ve‘amad petakh sha‘ar ha‘ir vediber be’azenei ziqnei ha‘ir hahi ’et dewarav ve’asefu ’oto ha‘irah ’aleihem venatenu lo maqom veyashaw ‘imam. 
joshua 20:5	vekhi yirdof go’el hadam ’akharav velo yasgiru ’et harotseiakh beyado ki wiwli da‘at hikah ’et rei‘eihu velo sonei hu lo mitemol shilshom. 
joshua 20:6	veyashaw ba‘ir hahi ‘ad ‘amedo lifnei ha‘eidah lamishpat ‘ad mot hakohen hagadol ’asher yihyeh bayamim hahem ’az yashuw harotseiakh uwa ’el ‘iro ve’el beito ’el ha‘ir ’asher nas misham. 
joshua 20:7	vayaqdishu ’et qedesh bagalil behar naftali ve’et shekhem behar ’efrayim ve’et qiryat ’arba‘ hi khewron behar yehudah. 
joshua 20:8	umei‘eiwer leyarden yerikho mizrakhah natenu ’et betser bamidbar bamishor mimateh re’uwen ve’et ramot bagil‘ad mimateh gad ve’et galon golan babashan mimateh menasheh. 
joshua 20:9	’eleh hayu ‘arei hamu‘adah lekhol benei yisra’el velager hagar betokham lanus shamah kal makeh nefesh bishgagah velo yamut beyad go’el hadam ‘ad ‘amedo lifnei ha‘eidah. 
joshua 21:1	vayigeshu rashei ’awot halviyim ’el ’el‘azar hakohen ve’el yehoshua‘ bin nun ve’el rashei ’awot hamatot liwnei yisra’el. 
joshua 21:2	vaydaberu ’aleihem beshiloh be’erets kena‘an leimor yhoh tsivah weyad mosheh latet lanu ‘arim lashawet umigresheihen liwhemteinu. 
joshua 21:3	vayitenu wenei yisra’el lalviyim minakhalatam ’el pi yhoh ’et he‘arim ha’eleh ve’et migresheihen. 
joshua 21:4	vayeitsei hagoral lemishpekhot haqehati vayhi liwnei ’aharon hakohen min halviyim mimateh yehudah umimateh hashim‘oni umimateh winyamin bagoral ‘arim shelosh ‘esreh. 
joshua 21:5	veliwnei qehat hanotarim mimishpekhot mateh ’efrayim umimateh dan umeikhatsi mateh menasheh bagoral ‘arim ‘aser. 
joshua 21:6	veliwnei geireshon mimishpekhot mateh yisashkhar umimateh ’asher umimateh naftali umeikhatsi mateh menasheh wabashan bagoral ‘arim shelosh ‘esreh. 
joshua 21:7	liwnei merari lemishpekhotam mimateh re’uwen umimateh gad umimateh zewulun ‘arim shetem ‘esreh. 
joshua 21:8	vayitenu wenei yisra’el lalviyim ’et he‘arim ha’eleh ve’et migresheihen ka’asher tsivah yhoh beyad mosheh bagoral. 
joshua 21:9	vayitenu mimateh benei yehudah umimateh benei shim‘on ’et he‘arim ha’eleh ’asher yiqra ’ethen beshem. 
joshua 21:10	vayhi liwnei ’aharon mimishpekhot haqehati mibenei leivi ki lahem hayah hagoral rishonah. 
joshua 21:11	vayitenu lahem ’et qiryat ’arba‘ ’awi ha‘anoq hi khewron behar yehudah ve’et migrasheha sewiwoteha. 
joshua 21:12	ve’et sedeh ha‘ir ve’et khatseireha natenu lekhalew ben yefuneh ba’akhuzato. 
joshua 21:13	veliwnei ’aharon hakohen natenu ’et ‘ir miqlat harotseiakh ’et khewron ve’et migrasheha ve’et liwnah ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:14	ve’et yatir ve’et migrasheha ve’et ’eshtemoa‘ ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:15	ve’et kholon ve’et migrasheha ve’et dewir ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:16	ve’et ‘ayin ve’et migrasheha ve’et yutah ve’et migrasheha ’et bet shemesh ve’et migrasheha ‘arim teisha‘ mei’et shenei hashewatim ha’eleh. 
joshua 21:17	umimateh winyamin ’et giw‘on ve’et migrasheha ’et gewa‘ ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:18	’et ‘anatot ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘almon ve’et migrasheha ‘arim ’arba‘. 
joshua 21:19	kal ‘arei wenei ’aharon hakohanim shelosh ‘esreh ‘arim umigresheihen. 
joshua 21:20	ulemishpekhot benei qehat halviyim hanotarim mibenei qehat vayhi ‘arei goralam mimateh ’efrayim. 
joshua 21:21	vayitenu lahem ’et ‘ir miqlat harotseiakh ’et shekhem ve’et migrasheha behar ’efrayim ve’et gezer ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:22	ve’et qiwtsayim ve’et migrasheha ve’et bet khoron ve’et migrasheha ‘arim ’arba‘. 
joshua 21:23	umimateh dan ’et ’elteqei ve’et migrasheha ’et gibeton ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:24	’et ’ayalon ve’et migrasheha ’et gat rimon ve’et migrasheha ‘arim ’arba‘. 
joshua 21:25	umimakhatsit mateh menasheh ’et ta‘nakh ve’et migrasheha ve’et gat rimon ve’et migrasheha ‘arim shetayim. 
joshua 21:26	kal ‘arim ‘eser umigresheihen lemishpekhot benei qehat hanotarim. 
joshua 21:27	veliwnei geireshon mimishpekhot halviyim meikhatsi mateh menasheh ’et ‘ir miqlat harotseiakh ’et galon golan babashan ve’et migrasheha ve’et be‘eshterah ve’et migrasheha ‘arim shetayim. 
joshua 21:28	umimateh yisashkhar ’et qishyon ve’et migrasheha ’et dawerat ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:29	’et yarmut ve’et migrasheha ’et ‘en ganim ve’et migrasheha ‘arim ’arba‘. 
joshua 21:30	umimateh ’asher ’et mish’al ve’et migrasheha ’et ‘awdon ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:31	’et khelqat ve’et migrasheha ve’et rekhow ve’et migrasheha ‘arim ’arba‘. 
joshua 21:32	umimateh naftali ’et ‘ir miqlat harotseiakh ’et qedesh bagalil ve’et migrasheha ve’et khamot dor ve’et migrasheha ve’et qartan ve’et migrasheha ‘arim shalosh. 
joshua 21:33	kal ‘arei hageireshuni lemishpekhotam shelosh ‘esreh ‘ir umigresheihen. 
joshua 21:34	ulemishpekhot benei merari halviyim hanotarim mei’et mateh zewulun ’et yaqene‘am ve’et migrasheha ’et qartah ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:35	’et dimnah ve’et migrasheha ’et nahalal ve’et migrasheha ‘arim ’arba‘. 
joshua 21:36	umimateh re’uwen ’et betser ve’et migrasheha ve’et yahtsah ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:37	’et qedeimot ve’et migrasheha ve’et meifa‘at ve’et migrasheha ‘arim ’arba‘. 
joshua 21:38	umimateh gad ’et ‘ir miqlat harotseiakh ’et ramot bagil‘ad ve’et migrasheha ve’et makhanayim ve’et migrasheha. 
joshua 21:39	’et kheshbon ve’et migrasheha ’et ya‘zer ve’et migrasheha kal ‘arim ’arba‘. 
joshua 21:40	kal he‘arim liwnei merari lemishpekhotam hanotarim mimishpekhot halviyim vayhi goralam ‘arim shetem ‘esreh. 
joshua 21:41	kol ‘arei halviyim betokh ’akhuzat benei yisra’el ‘arim ’arba‘im ushemoneh umigresheihen. 
joshua 21:42	tihyenah he‘arim ha’eleh ‘ir ‘ir umigrasheha sewiwoteha ken lekhal he‘arim ha’eleh. 
joshua 21:43	vayiten yhoh leyisra’el ’et kal ha’arets ’asher nishba‘ latet la’awotam vayirashuha vayeishewu wah. 
joshua 21:44	vayanakh yhoh lahem misawiw kekhol ’asher nishba‘ la’awotam velo ‘amad ’ish bifneihem mikal ’oyeweihem ’et kal ’oyeweihem natan yhoh beyadam. 
joshua 21:45	lo nafal dawar mikol hadawar hatow ’asher diber yhoh ’el bet yisra’el hakol ba. 
joshua 22:1	’az yiqra yehoshua‘ lar’uweini velagadi velakhatsi mateh menasheh. 
joshua 22:2	vayomer ’aleihem ’atem shemartem ’et kal ’asher tsivah ’etkhem mosheh ‘ewed yhoh vatishme‘u weqoli lekhol ’asher tsiviti ’etkhem. 
joshua 22:3	lo ‘azawtem ’et ’akheikhem zeh yamim rabim ‘ad hayom hazeh ushemartem ’et mishmeret mitsvat yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
joshua 22:4	ve‘atah heiniakh yhoh ’eloheikhem la’akheikhem ka’asher diber lahem ve‘atah penu ulekhu lakhem le’aholeikhem ’el ’erets ’akhuzatkhem ’asher natan lakhem mosheh ‘ewed yhoh be‘eiwer hayarden. 
joshua 22:5	raq shimru me’od la‘asot ’et hamitsvah ve’et hatorah ’asher tsivah ’etkhem mosheh ‘ewed yhoh le’ahawah ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem velalekhet bekhal derakhav velishmor mitsvotav uledaweqah wo ule‘awedo bekhal lewawkhem uwekhal nafshekhem. 
joshua 22:6	vaywarekhem yehoshua‘ vayshalekhem vayeilekhu ’el ’aholeihem. 
joshua 22:7	velakhatsi sheiwet hamnasheh natan mosheh babashan ulekhetsyo natan yehoshua‘ ‘im ’akheihem mei‘eiwer be‘eiwer hayarden yamah vegam ki shilekham yehoshua‘ ’el ’aholeihem vaywarakhem. 
joshua 22:8	vayomer ’aleihem leimor binkhasim rabim shuwu ’el ’aholeikhem uwemiqneh raw me’od bekhesef uwezahaw uwinkhoshet uwewarzel uwislamot harbeh me’od khilqu shelal ’oyeweikhem ‘im ’akheikhem. 
joshua 22:9	vayashuwu vayeilekhu benei re’uwen uwenei gad vakhatsi sheiwet hamnasheh mei’et benei yisra’el mishiloh ’asher be’erets kena‘an lalekhet ’el ’erets hagil‘ad ’el ’erets ’akhuzatam ’asher nokhazu wah ‘al pi yhoh beyad mosheh. 
joshua 22:10	vayawo’u ’el gelilot hayarden ’asher be’erets kena‘an vayiwnu wenei re’uwen uwenei gad vakhatsi sheiwet hamnasheh sham mizbeiakh ‘al hayarden mizbeiakh gadol lemar’eh. 
joshua 22:11	vayishme‘u wenei yisra’el leimor hineh wanu wenei re’uwen uwenei gad vakhatsi sheiwet hamnasheh ’et hamizbeiakh ’el mul ’erets kena‘an ’el gelilot hayarden ’el ‘eiwer benei yisra’el. 
joshua 22:12	vayishme‘u benei yisra’el vayiqahalu kal ‘adat benei yisra’el shiloh la‘alot ‘aleihem latsawa. 
joshua 22:13	vayishlekhu wenei yisra’el ’el benei re’uwen ve’el benei gad ve’el khatsi sheiwet menasheh ’el ’erets hagil‘ad ’et pinekhas ben ’el‘azar hakohen. 
joshua 22:14	va‘asarah nesi’im ‘imo nasi ’ekhad nasi ’ekhad lewet ’aw lekhol matot yisra’el ve’ish rosh bet ’awotam hemah le’alfei yisra’el. 
joshua 22:15	vayawo’u ’el benei re’uwen ve’el benei gad ve’el khatsi sheiwet menasheh ’el ’erets hagil‘ad vaydaberu ’itam leimor. 
joshua 22:16	koh ’ameru kol ‘adat yhoh mah hama‘al hazeh ’asher me‘altem beilohei yisra’el lashuw hayom mei’akharei yhoh biwnotkhem lakhem mizbeiakh limradekhem hayom yhoh. 
joshua 22:17	ham‘at lanu ’et ‘avon pe‘or ’asher lo hitaharnu mimenu ‘ad hayom hazeh vayhi hanegef ba‘adat yhoh. 
joshua 22:18	ve’atem tashuwu hayom mei’akharei yhoh vehayah ’atem timredu hayom yhoh umakhar ’el kal ‘adat yisra’el yiqtsof. 
joshua 22:19	ve’akh ’im temei’ah ’erets ’akhuzatkhem ‘iwru lakhem ’el ’erets ’akhuzat yhoh ’asher shakhan sham mishkan yhoh vehei’akhazu betokheinu yhoh ’al timrodu ve’otanu ’el timrodu biwnotekhem lakhem mizbeiakh mibal‘adei mizbakh yhoh ’eloheinu. 
joshua 22:20	halo ‘akhan ben zerakh ma‘al ma‘al bakheirem ve‘al kal ‘adat yisra’el hayah qatsef vehu ’ish ’ekhad lo gava‘ ba‘avono. 
joshua 22:21	vaya‘anu benei re’uwen uwenei gad vakhatsi sheiwet hamnasheh vaydaberu ’et rashei ’alfei yisra’el. 
joshua 22:22	’el ’elohim yhoh ’el ’elohim yhoh hu yodeia‘ veyisra’el hu yeida‘ ’im bemered ve’im bema‘al yhoh ’al toshi‘einu hayom hazeh. 
joshua 22:23	liwnot lanu mizbeiakh lashuw mei’akharei yhoh ve’im leha‘alot ‘alav ‘olah uminkhah ve’im la‘asot ‘alav ziwkhei shelamim yhoh hu yewaqesh. 
joshua 22:24	ve’im lo mide’agah midawar ‘asinu ’et zot leimor makhar yomeru weneikhem lewaneinu leimor mah lakhem yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
joshua 22:25	ugewul natan yhoh beineinu uweineikhem benei re’uwen uwenei gad ’et hayarden ’en lakhem kheileq yhoh vehishbitu weneikhem ’et baneinu lewilti yero ’et yhoh. 
joshua 22:26	vanomer na‘aseh na lanu liwnot ’et hamizbeiakh lo le‘olah velo lezawakh. 
joshua 22:27	ki ‘ed hu beineinu uweineikhem uwen doroteinu ’akhareinu la‘awod ’et ‘awodat yhoh lefanav be‘oloteinu uwizwakheinu uwishlameinu velo yomeru weneikhem makhar lewaneinu ’en lakhem kheileq yhoh. 
joshua 22:28	vanomer vehayah ki yomeru ’eileinu ve’el doroteinu makhar ve’amarnu re’u ’et tawnit mizbakh yhoh ’asher ‘asu ’awoteinu lo le‘olah velo lezewakh ki ‘ed hu beineinu uweineikhem. 
joshua 22:29	khalilah lanu mimenu limrod yhoh velashuw hayom mei’akharei yhoh liwnot mizbeiakh le‘olah leminkhah ulezawakh milewad mizbakh yhoh ’eloheinu ’asher lifnei mishkano. 
joshua 22:30	vayishma‘ pinekhas hakohen unesi’ei ha‘eidah verashei ’alfei yisra’el ’asher ’ito ’et hadewarim ’asher diberu benei re’uwen uwenei gad uwenei menasheh vayitaw be‘eineihem. 
joshua 22:31	vayomer pinekhas ben ’el‘azar hakohen ’el benei re’uwen ve’el benei gad ve’el benei menasheh hayom yada‘nu ki wetokheinu yhoh ’asher lo me‘altem yhoh hama‘al hazeh ’az hitsaltem ’et benei yisra’el miyad yhoh. 
joshua 22:32	vayashaw pinekhas ben ’el‘azar hakohen vehanesi’im mei’et benei re’uwen umei’et benei gad mei’erets hagil‘ad ’el ’erets kena‘an ’el benei yisra’el vayashiwu ’otam dawar. 
joshua 22:33	vayitaw hadawar be‘einei benei yisra’el vaywarakhu ’elohim benei yisra’el velo ’ameru la‘alot ‘aleihem latsawa leshakhet ’et ha’arets ’asher benei re’uwen uwenei gad yoshewim bah. 
joshua 22:34	vayiqre’u benei re’uwen uwenei gad lamizbeiakh ki ‘ed hu beinoteinu ki yhoh ha’elohim. 
joshua 23:1	vayhi miyamim rabim ’akharei ’asher heiniakh yhoh leyisra’el mikal ’oyeweihem misawiw vihoshua‘ zaqen ba bayamim. 
joshua 23:2	vayiqra yehoshua‘ lekhal yisra’el lizqeinav ulerashav uleshofetav uleshoterav vayomer ’aleihem ’ani zaqanti bati bayamim. 
joshua 23:3	ve’atem re’item ’et kal ’asher ‘asah yhoh ’eloheikhem lekhal hagoyim ha’eleh mipeneikhem ki yhoh ’eloheikhem hu hanilkham lakhem. 
joshua 23:4	re’u hipalti lakhem ’et hagoyim hanish’arim ha’eleh benakhalah leshiwteikhem min hayarden vekhal hagoyim ’asher hikhrati vehayam hagadol mewo hashamesh. 
joshua 23:5	yhoh ’eloheikhem hu yehdofem mipeneikhem vehorish ’otam milifneikhem virishtem ’et ’artsam ka’asher diber yhoh ’eloheikhem lakhem. 
joshua 23:6	vakhazaqtem me’od lishmor vela‘asot ’et kal hakatuw beseifer torat mosheh lewilti sur mimenu yamin usemol. 
joshua 23:7	lewilti wo bagoyim ha’eleh hanish’arim ha’eleh ’itekhem uweshem ’eloheihem lo tazkiru velo tashbi‘u velo ta‘awdum velo tishtakhavu lahem. 
joshua 23:8	ki ’im yhoh ’eloheikhem tidbaqu ka’asher ‘asitem ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
joshua 23:9	vayoresh yhoh mipeneikhem goyim gedolim va‘atsumim ve’atem lo ‘amad ’ish bifneikhem ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
joshua 23:10	’ish ’ekhad mikem yirdaf ’alef ki yhoh ’eloheikhem hu hanilkham lakhem ka’asher diber lakhem. 
joshua 23:11	venishmartem me’od lenafshoteikhem le’ahawah ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
joshua 23:12	ki ’im show tashuwu udewaqtem beyeter hagoyim ha’eleh hanish’arim ha’eleh ’itekhem vehitkhatantem bahem uwatem bahem vehem bakhem. 
joshua 23:13	yadoa‘ teide‘u ki lo yosif yhoh ’eloheikhem lehorish ’et hagoyim ha’eleh milifneikhem vehayu lakhem lefakh ulemoqesh uleshotet betsideikhem velitsninim be‘eineikhem ‘ad ’awadekhem mei‘al ha’adamah hatowah hazot ’asher natan lakhem yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
joshua 23:14	vehineh ’anokhi holekh hayom bederekh kal ha’arets vida‘tem bekhal lewawkhem uwekhal nafshekhem ki lo nafal dawar ’ekhad mikol hadewarim hatowim ’asher diber yhoh ’eloheikhem ‘aleikhem hakol ba’u lakhem lo nafal mimenu dawar ’ekhad. 
joshua 23:15	vehayah ka’asher ba ‘aleikhem kal hadawar hatow ’asher diber yhoh ’eloheikhem ’aleikhem ken yawi yhoh ‘aleikhem ’et kal hadawar hara‘ ‘ad hashmido ’otkhem mei‘al ha’adamah hatowah hazot ’asher natan lakhem yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
joshua 23:16	be‘awerekhem ’et berit yhoh ’eloheikhem ’asher tsivah ’etkhem vahalakhtem va‘awadtem ’elohim ’akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem vekharah ’af yhoh bakhem va’awadtem meheirah mei‘al ha’arets hatowah ’asher natan lakhem. 
joshua 24:1	vaye’esof yehoshua‘ ’et kal shiwtei yisra’el shekhemah vayiqra leziqnei yisra’el ulerashav uleshofetav uleshoterav vayityatsewu lifnei ha’elohim. 
joshua 24:2	vayomer yehoshua‘ ’el kal ha‘am koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el be‘eiwer hanahar yashewu ’awoteikhem mei‘olam terakh ’awi ’awraham va’awi nakhor vaya‘awdu ’elohim ’akheirim. 
joshua 24:3	va’eqakh ’et ’awikhem ’et ’awraham mei‘eiwer hanahar va’olekh ’oto bekhal ’erets kena‘an va’erew va’arbeh ’et zar‘o va’eten lo ’et yitskhaq. 
joshua 24:4	va’eten leyitskhaq ’et ya‘aqow ve’et ‘eisav va’eten le‘eisav ’et har sei‘ir lareshet ’oto veya‘aqow uwanav yaredu mitsrayim. 
joshua 24:5	va’eshlakh ’et mosheh ve’et ’aharon va’egof ’et mitsrayim ka’asher ‘asiti beqirbo ve’akhar hotseiti ’etkhem. 
joshua 24:6	va’otsi ’et ’awoteikhem mimitsrayim vatawo’u hayamah vayirdefu mitsrayim ’akharei ’awoteikhem berekhew uwefarashim yam suf. 
joshua 24:7	vayits‘aqu ’el yhoh vayasem ma’afel beineikhem uwen hamitsrim vayawei ‘alav ’et hayam vaykhaseihu vatir’enah ‘eineikhem ’et ’asher ‘asiti bemitsrayim vateishewu wamidbar yamim rabim. 
joshua 24:8	va’awi’ah va’awi ’etkhem ’el ’erets ha’emori hayoshew be‘eiwer hayarden vayilakhamu ’itekhem va’eten ’otam beyedkhem vatireshu ’et ’artsam va’ashmidem mipeneikhem. 
joshua 24:9	vayaqam balaq ben tsipor melekh mo’aw vayilakhem beyisra’el vayishlakh vayiqra lewil‘am ben be‘or leqalel ’etkhem. 
joshua 24:10	velo ’awiti lishmoa‘ lewil‘am vaywarekh barokh ’etkhem va’atsil ’etkhem miyado. 
joshua 24:11	vata‘awru ’et hayarden vatawo’u ’el yerikho vayilakhamu wakhem ba‘alei yerikho ha’emori vehaperizi vehakena‘ani vehakhiti vehagirgashi hakhivi vehaywusi va’eten ’otam beyedkhem. 
joshua 24:12	va’eshlakh lifneikhem ’et hatsir‘ah vategaresh ’otam mipeneikhem shenei malkhei ha’emori lo wekharbekha velo weqashtekha. 
joshua 24:13	va’eten lakhem ’erets ’asher lo yaga‘ta bah ve‘arim ’asher lo wenitem vateishewu bahem keramim vezeitim ’asher lo neta‘tem ’atem ’okhelim. 
joshua 24:14	ve‘atah yer’u ’et yhoh ve‘iwdu ’oto betamim uwe’emet vehasiru ’et ’elohim ’asher ‘awedu ’awoteikhem be‘eiwer hanahar uwemitsrayim ve‘iwdu ’et yhoh. 
joshua 24:15	ve’im ra‘ be‘eineikhem la‘awod ’et yhoh bakharu lakhem hayom ’et mi ta‘awodun ’im ’et ’elohim ’asher ‘awedu ’awoteikhem ’asher be‘eiwer mei‘eiwer hanahar ve’im ’et ’elohei ha’emori ’asher ’atem yoshewim be’artsam ve’anokhi uweiti na‘awod ’et yhoh. 
joshua 24:16	vaya‘an ha‘am vayomer khalilah lanu mei‘azow ’et yhoh la‘awod ’elohim ’akheirim. 
joshua 24:17	ki yhoh ’eloheinu hu hama‘aleh ’otanu ve’et ’awoteinu mei’erets mitsrayim mibet ‘awadim va’asher ‘asah le‘eineinu ’et ha’otot hagedolot ha’eleh vayishmereinu bekhal haderekh ’asher halakhnu wah uwekhol ha‘amim ’asher ‘awarnu beqirbam. 
joshua 24:18	vaygaresh yhoh ’et kal ha‘amim ve’et ha’emori yoshew ha’arets mipaneinu gam ’anakhnu na‘awod ’et yhoh ki hu ’eloheinu. 
joshua 24:19	vayomer yehoshua‘ ’el ha‘am lo tukhelu la‘awod ’et yhoh ki ’elohim qedoshim hu ’el qano hu lo yisa lefish‘akhem ulekhatoteikhem. 
joshua 24:20	ki ta‘azwu ’et yhoh va‘awadtem ’elohei neikhar veshaw veheira‘ lakhem vekhilah ’etkhem ’akharei ’asher heitiw lakhem. 
joshua 24:21	vayomer ha‘am ’el yehoshua‘ lo ki ’et yhoh na‘awod. 
joshua 24:22	vayomer yehoshua‘ ’el ha‘am ‘eidim ’atem bakhem ki ’atem bekhartem lakhem ’et yhoh la‘awod ’oto vayomeru ‘eidim. 
joshua 24:23	ve‘atah hasiru ’et ’elohei haneikhar ’asher beqirbekhem vehatu ’et lewawkhem ’el yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
joshua 24:24	vayomeru ha‘am ’el yehoshua‘ ’et yhoh ’eloheinu na‘awod uweqolo nishma‘. 
joshua 24:25	vayikhrot yehoshua‘ berit la‘am bayom hahu vayasem lo khoq umishpat bishkhem. 
joshua 24:26	vayikhtow yehoshua‘ ’et hadewarim ha’eleh beseifer torat ’elohim vayiqakh ’ewen gedolah vayqimeha sham takhat ha’alah ’asher bemiqdash yhoh. 
joshua 24:27	vayomer yehoshua‘ ’el kal ha‘am hineh ha’ewen hazot tihyeh banu le‘eidah ki hi shame‘ah ’et kal ’imrei yhoh ’asher diber ‘imanu vehayetah wakhem le‘eidah pen tekhakhashun beiloheikhem. 
joshua 24:28	vayshalakh yehoshua‘ ’et ha‘am ’ish lenakhalato. 
joshua 24:29	vayhi ’akharei hadewarim ha’eleh vayamat yehoshua‘ bin nun ‘ewed yhoh ben mei’ah va‘eser shanim. 
joshua 24:30	vayiqberu ’oto bigwul nakhalato betimnat serakh ’asher behar ’efrayim mitsefon lehar ga‘ash 
joshua 24:31	vaya‘awod yisra’el ’et yhoh kol yemei yehoshua‘ vekhol yemei hazeqeinim ’asher he’erikhu yamim ’akharei yehoshua‘ va’asher yade‘u ’et kal ma‘aseh yhoh ’asher ‘asah leyisra’el. 
joshua 24:32	ve’et ‘atsmot yosef ’asher he‘elu wenei yisra’el mimitsrayim qaweru wishkhem bekhelqat hasadeh ’asher qanah ya‘aqow mei’et benei khamor ’awi shekhem bemei’ah qesitah vayihyu liwnei yosef lenakhalah. 
joshua 24:33	ve’el‘azar ben ’aharon met vayiqberu ’oto begiw‘at pinekhas beno ’asher nitan lo behar ’efrayim. 
judges 1:1	vayhi ’akharei mot yehoshua‘ vayish’alu benei yisra’el yhoh leimor mi ya‘aleh lanu ’el hakena‘ani batekhilah lehilakhem bo. 
judges 1:2	vayomer yhoh yehudah ya‘aleh hineh natati ’et ha’arets beyado. 
judges 1:3	vayomer yehudah leshim‘on ’akhiv ‘aleh ’iti wegorali venilakhamah bakena‘ani vehalakhti gam ’ani ’itekha begoralekha vayeilekh ’ito shim‘on. 
judges 1:4	vaya‘al yehudah vayiten yhoh ’et hakena‘ani vehaperizi beyadam vayakum bewezeq ‘aseret ’alafim ’ish. 
judges 1:5	vayimtse’u ’et ’adoni wezeq bewezeq vayilakhamu bo vayaku ’et hakena‘ani ve’et haperizi. 
judges 1:6	vayanas ’adoni wezeq vayirdefu ’akharav vayokhazu ’oto vayqatsetsu ’et behonot yadav veraglav. 
judges 1:7	vayomer ’adoni wezeq shiw‘im melakhim behonot yedeihem veragleihem mequtsatsim hayu melaqetim takhat shulkhani ka’asher ‘asiti ken shilam li ’elohim vaywi’uhu yerushalim vayamat sham. 
judges 1:8	vayilakhamu wenei yehudah birushalim vayilkedu ’otah vayakuha lefi kharew ve’et ha‘ir shilekhu wa’esh. 
judges 1:9	ve’akhar yaredu benei yehudah lehilakhem bakena‘ani yoshew hahar vehanegew vehashefeilah. 
judges 1:10	vayeilekh yehudah ’el hakena‘ani hayoshew bekhewron veshem khewron lefanim qiryat ’arba‘ vayaku ’et sheishai ve’et ’akhiman ve’et talmai. 
judges 1:11	vayeilekh misham ’el yoshewei dewir veshem dewir lefanim qiryat seifer. 
judges 1:12	vayomer kalew ’asher yakeh ’et qiryat seifer ulekhadah venatati lo ’et ‘akhsah witi le’ishah. 
judges 1:13	vayilkedah ‘ateni’el ben qenaz ’akhi khalew haqaton mimenu vayiten lo ’et ‘akhsah wito le’ishah. 
judges 1:14	vayhi bewo’ah vatesiteihu lish’ol mei’et ’awiha hasadeh vatitsnakh mei‘al hakhamor vayomer lah kalew mah lakh. 
judges 1:15	vatomer lo hawah li werakhah ki ’erets hanegew netatani venatatah li gulot mayim vayiten lah kalew ’et gulot ‘ilit ve’et gulot takhtit. 
judges 1:16	uwenei qeini khoten mosheh ‘alu mei‘ir hatemarim ’et benei yehudah midbar yehudah ’asher benegew ‘arad vayeilekh vayeishew ’et ha‘am. 
judges 1:17	vayeilekh yehudah ’et shim‘on ’akhiv vayaku ’et hakena‘ani yoshew tsefat vayakharimu ’otah vayiqra ’et shem ha‘ir kharemah. 
judges 1:18	vayilkod yehudah ’et ‘azah ve’et gewulah ve’et ’ashqelon ve’et gewulah ve’et ‘eqron ve’et gewulah. 
judges 1:19	vayhi yhoh ’et yehudah vayoresh ’et hahar ki lo lehorish ’et yoshewei ha‘eimeq ki rekhew barzel lahem. 
judges 1:20	vayitenu lekhalew ’et khewron ka’asher diber mosheh vayoresh misham ’et sheloshah benei ha‘anaq. 
judges 1:21	ve’et haywusi yoshew yerushalim lo horishu benei winyamin vayeishew haywusi ’et benei winyamin birushalim ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
judges 1:22	vaya‘alu wet yosef gam hem bet ’el yhoh ‘imam. 
judges 1:23	vayatiru wet yosef bewet ’el veshem ha‘ir lefanim luz. 
judges 1:24	vayir’u hashomerim ’ish yotsei min ha‘ir vayomeru lo har’einu na ’et mewo ha‘ir ve‘asinu ‘imekha khased. 
judges 1:25	vayar’em ’et mewo ha‘ir vayaku ’et ha‘ir lefi kharew ve’et ha’ish ve’et kal mishpakhto shileikhu. 
judges 1:26	vayeilekh ha’ish ’erets hakhitim vayiwen ‘ir vayiqra shemah luz hu shemah ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
judges 1:27	velo horish menasheh ’et bet she’an ve’et benoteha ve’et ta‘nakh ve’et benoteha ve’et yoshew yoshewei dor ve’et benoteha ve’et yoshewei yiwle‘am ve’et benoteha ve’et yoshewei megido ve’et benoteha vayo’el hakena‘ani lashewet ba’arets hazot. 
judges 1:28	vayhi ki khazaq yisra’el vayasem ’et hakena‘ani lamas vehoresh lo horisho. 
judges 1:29	ve’efrayim lo horish ’et hakena‘ani hayoshew begazer vayeishew hakena‘ani beqirbo begazer. 
judges 1:30	zewulun lo horish ’et yoshewei qitron ve’et yoshewei nahalol vayeishew hakena‘ani beqirbo vayihyu lamas. 
judges 1:31	’asher lo horish ’et yoshewei ‘ako ve’et yoshewei tsidon ve’et ’akhlaw ve’et ’akhziw ve’et khelbah ve’et ’afiq ve’et rekhow. 
judges 1:32	vayeishew ha’asheiri beqerew hakena‘ani yoshewei ha’arets ki lo horisho. 
judges 1:33	naftali lo horish ’et yoshewei wet shemesh ve’et yoshewei wet ‘anat vayeishew beqerew hakena‘ani yoshewei ha’arets veyoshewei wet shemesh uwet ‘anat hayu lahem lamas. 
judges 1:34	vayilkhatsu ha’emori ’et benei dan haharah ki lo netano laredet la‘eimeq. 
judges 1:35	vayo’el ha’emori lashewet behar kheres be’ayalon uwesha‘alwim vatikhbad yad bet yosef vayihyu lamas. 
judges 1:36	ugewul ha’emori mima‘aleh ‘aqrabim meihasela‘ vama‘elah. 
judges 2:1	vaya‘al mal’akh yhoh min hagilgal ’el habokhim vayomer ’a‘aleh ’etkhem mimitsrayim va’awi ’etkhem ’el ha’arets ’asher nishba‘ti la’awoteikhem va’omar lo ’afer beriti ’itekhem le‘olam. 
judges 2:2	ve’atem lo tikhretu werit leyoshewei ha’arets hazot mizbekhoteihem titotsun velo shema‘tem beqoli mah zot ‘asitem. 
judges 2:3	vegam ’amarti lo ’agaresh ’otam mipeneikhem vehayu lakhem letsidim veiloheihem yihyu lakhem lemoqesh. 
judges 2:4	vayhi kedaber mal’akh yhoh ’et hadewarim ha’eleh ’el kal benei yisra’el vayis’u ha‘am ’et qolam vayiwku. 
judges 2:5	vayiqre’u shem hamaqom hahu bokhim vayizbekhu sham yhoh. 
judges 2:6	vayshalakh yehoshua‘ ’et ha‘am vayeilekhu wenei yisra’el ’ish lenakhalato lareshet ’et ha’arets. 
judges 2:7	vaya‘awdu ha‘am ’et yhoh kol yemei yehoshua‘ vekhol yemei hazeqeinim ’asher he’erikhu yamim ’akharei yehoshua‘ ’asher ra’u ’et kal ma‘aseh yhoh hagadol ’asher ‘asah leyisra’el. 
judges 2:8	vayamat yehoshua‘ bin nun ‘ewed yhoh ben mei’ah va‘eser shanim. 
judges 2:9	vayiqberu ’oto bigwul nakhalato betimnat kheres behar ’efrayim mitsefon lehar ga‘ash. 
judges 2:10	vegam kal hador hahu ne’esfu ’el ’awotav vayaqam dor ’akher ’akhareihem ’asher lo yade‘u ’et yhoh vegam ’et hama‘aseh ’asher ‘asah leyisra’el. 
judges 2:11	vaya‘asu wenei yisra’el ’et hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vaya‘awdu ’et habe‘alim. 
judges 2:12	vaya‘azwu ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotam hamotsi ’otam mei’erets mitsrayim vayeilekhu ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim mei’elohei ha‘amim ’asher sewiwoteihem vayishtakhavu lahem vayakh‘isu ’et yhoh. 
judges 2:13	vaya‘azwu ’et yhoh vaya‘awdu laba‘al vela‘ashtarot. 
judges 2:14	vayikhar ’af yhoh beyisra’el vayitenem beyad shosim vayashosu ’otam vayimkerem beyad ’oyweihem misawiw velo yakhelu ‘od la‘amod lifnei ’oyweihem. 
judges 2:15	bekhol ’asher yatse’u yad yhoh hayetah bam lera‘ah ka’asher diber yhoh vekha’asher nishba‘ yhoh lahem vayeitser lahem me’od. 
judges 2:16	vayaqem yhoh shofetim vayoshi‘um miyad shoseihem. 
judges 2:17	vegam ’el shofeteihem lo shamei‘u ki zanu ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim vayishtakhavu lahem saru maher min haderekh ’asher halekhu ’awotam lishmoa‘ mitsvot yhoh lo ‘asu khen. 
judges 2:18	vekhi heiqim yhoh lahem shofetim vehayah yhoh ‘im hashofet vehoshi‘am miyad ’oyeweihem kol yemei hashofet ki yinakhem yhoh mina’aqatam mipenei lokhatseihem vedokhaqeihem. 
judges 2:19	vehayah bemot hashofet yashuwu vehishkhitu mei’awotam lalekhet ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim le‘awedam ulehishtakhavot lahem lo hipilu mima‘aleihem umidarkam haqashah. 
judges 2:20	vayikhar ’af yhoh beyisra’el vayomer ya‘an ’asher ‘aweru hago hazeh ’et beriti ’asher tsiviti ’et ’awotam velo shame‘u leqoli. 
judges 2:21	gam ’ani lo ’osif lehorish ’ish mipeneihem min hagoyim ’asher ‘azaw yehoshua‘ vayamot. 
judges 2:22	lema‘an nasot bam ’et yisra’el hashomerim hem ’et derekh yhoh lalekhet bam ka’asher shameru ’awotam ’im lo. 
judges 2:23	vayanakh yhoh ’et hagoyim ha’eleh lewilti horisham maher velo netanam beyad yehoshua‘. 
judges 3:1	ve’eleh hagoyim ’asher hiniakh yhoh lenasot bam ’et yisra’el ’et kal ’asher lo yade‘u ’et kal milkhamot kena‘an. 
judges 3:2	raq lema‘an da‘at dorot benei yisra’el lelamedam milkhamah raq ’asher lefanim lo yeda‘um. 
judges 3:3	khameishet sarnei felishtim vekhal hakena‘ani vehatsidoni vehakhivi yoshew har halewanon meihar ba‘al khermon ‘ad lewo khamat. 
judges 3:4	vayihyu lenasot bam ’et yisra’el lada‘at hayishme‘u ’et mitsvot yhoh ’asher tsivah ’et ’awotam beyad mosheh. 
judges 3:5	uwenei yisra’el yashewu beqerew hakena‘ani hakhiti veha’emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaywusi. 
judges 3:6	vayiqkhu ’et benoteihem lahem lenashim ve’et benoteihem natenu liwneihem vaya‘awdu ’et ’eloheihem. 
judges 3:7	vaya‘asu wenei yisra’el ’et hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayishkekhu ’et yhoh ’eloheihem vaya‘awdu ’et habe‘alim ve’et ha’asheirot. 
judges 3:8	vayikhar ’af yhoh beyisra’el vayimkerem beyad kushan rish‘atayim melekh ’aram naharayim vaya‘awdu wenei yisra’el ’et kushan rish‘atayim shemoneh shanim. 
judges 3:9	vayiz‘aqu wenei yisra’el ’el yhoh vayaqem yhoh moshia‘ liwnei yisra’el vayoshi‘em ’et ‘ateni’el ben qenaz ’akhi khalew haqaton mimenu. 
judges 3:10	vatehi ‘alav ruakh yhoh vayishpot ’et yisra’el vayeitsei lamilkhamah vayiten yhoh beyado ’et kushan rish‘atayim melekh ’aram vata‘az yado ‘al kushan rish‘atayim. 
judges 3:11	vatishqot ha’arets ’arba‘im shanah vayamat ‘ateni’el ben qenaz. 
judges 3:12	vayosifu benei yisra’el la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vaykhazeq yhoh ’et ‘eglon melekh mo’aw ‘al yisra’el ‘al ki ‘asu ’et hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
judges 3:13	vaye’esof ’eilav ’et benei ‘amon va‘amaleq vayeilekh vayakh ’et yisra’el vayireshu ’et ‘ir hatemarim. 
judges 3:14	vaya‘awdu wenei yisra’el ’et ‘eglon melekh mo’aw shemoneh ‘esreh shanah. 
judges 3:15	vayiz‘aqu wenei yisra’el ’el yhoh vayaqem yhoh lahem moshia‘ ’et ’eihud ben geira ben haymini ’ish ’iter yad yemino vayishlekhu wenei yisra’el beyado minkhah le‘eglon melekh mo’aw. 
judges 3:16	vaya‘as lo ’eihud kherew velah shenei feiyot gomed ’arekah vayakhgor ’otah mitakhat lemadav ‘al yerekh yemino. 
judges 3:17	vayaqrew ’et haminkhah le‘eglon melekh mo’aw ve‘eglon ’ish bari me’od. 
judges 3:18	vayhi ka’asher kilah lehaqriw ’et haminkhah vayshalakh ’et ha‘am nose’ei haminkhah. 
judges 3:19	vehu shaw min hapesilim ’asher ’et hagilgal vayomer dewar seiter li ’eilekha hamelekh vayomer has vayeitse’u mei‘alav kal ha‘omedim ‘alav. 
judges 3:20	ve’eihud ba ’eilav vehu yoshew ba‘aliyat hameqeirah ’asher lo lewado vayomer ’eihud dewar ’elohim li ’eilekha vayaqam mei‘al hakisei. 
judges 3:21	vayishlakh ’eihud ’et yad semolo vayiqakh ’et hakherew mei‘al yerekh yemino vayitqa‘eha bewitno. 
judges 3:22	vayawo gam hanitsaw ’akhar halahaw vayisgor hakheilew be‘ad halahaw ki lo shalaf hakherew mibitno vayeitsei haparshedonah. 
judges 3:23	vayeitsei ’eihud hamisderonah vayisgor daltot ha‘aliyah ba‘ado vena‘al. 
judges 3:24	vehu yatsa va‘awadav ba’u vayir’u vehineh daltot ha‘aliyah ne‘ulot vayomeru ’akh meisikh hu ’et raglav bakhadar hameqeirah. 
judges 3:25	vayakhilu ‘ad bosh vehineh ’einenu foteiakh daltot ha‘aliyah vayiqkhu ’et hamafteiakh vayiftakhu vehineh ’adoneihem nofel ’artsah met. 
judges 3:26	ve’eihud nimlat ‘ad hitmahmeham vehu ‘awar ’et hapesilim vayimalet hase‘iratah. 
judges 3:27	vayhi bewo’o vayitqa‘ bashofar behar ’efrayim vayeiredu ‘imo wenei yisra’el min hahar vehu lifneihem. 
judges 3:28	vayomer ’aleihem ridfu ’akharai ki natan yhoh ’et ’oyeweikhem ’et mo’aw beyedkhem vayeiredu ’akharav vayilkedu ’et ma‘berot hayarden lemo’aw velo natenu ’ish la‘awor. 
judges 3:29	vayaku ’et mo’aw ba‘et hahi ka‘aseret ’alafim ’ish kal shamen vekhal ’ish khayil velo nimlat ’ish. 
judges 3:30	vatikana‘ mo’aw bayom hahu takhat yad yisra’el vatishqot ha’arets shemonim shanah. 
judges 3:31	ve’akharav hayah shamgar ben ‘anat vayakh ’et pelishtim shesh mei’ot ’ish bemalmad habaqar vayosha‘ gam hu ’et yisra’el. 
judges 4:1	vayosifu benei yisra’el la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ve’eihud met. 
judges 4:2	vayimkerem yhoh beyad yawin melekh kena‘an ’asher malakh bekhatsor vesar tsewa’o sisera vehu yoshew bakharoshet hagoyim. 
judges 4:3	vayits‘aqu wenei yisra’el ’el yhoh ki tesha‘ mei’ot rekhew barzel lo vehu lakhats ’et benei yisra’el bekhazeqah ‘esrim shanah. 
judges 4:4	udeworah ’ishah newi’ah ’eishet lapidot hi shofetah ’et yisra’el ba‘et hahi. 
judges 4:5	vehi yoshewet takhat tomer deworah ben haramah uwen bet ’el behar ’efrayim vaya‘alu ’eileha benei yisra’el lamishpat. 
judges 4:6	vatishlakh vatiqra lewaraq ben ’awino‘am miqedesh naftali vatomer ’eilav halo tsivah yhoh ’elohei yisra’el lekh umashakhta behar tawor velaqakhta ‘imekha ‘aseret ’alafim ’ish mibenei naftali umibenei zewulun. 
judges 4:7	umashakhti ’eilekha ’el nakhal qishon ’et sisera sar tsewa yawin ve’et rikhbo ve’et hamono unetatihu beyadekha. 
judges 4:8	vayomer ’eileha baraq ’im teilekhi ‘imi vehalakheti ve’im lo teilekhi ‘imi lo ’eilekh. 
judges 4:9	vatomer halokh ’eilekh ‘imakh ’efes ki lo tihyeh tif’artekha ‘al haderekh ’asher ’atah holekh ki weyad ’ishah yimkor yhoh ’et sisera vataqam deworah vateilekh ‘im baraq qedshah. 
judges 4:10	vayaz‘eq baraq ’et zewulun ve’et naftali qedshah vaya‘al beraglav ‘aseret ’alfei ’ish vata‘al ‘imo deworah. 
judges 4:11	vekhewer haqeini nifrad miqayin mibenei khowaw khoten mosheh vayet ’aholo ‘ad ’eilon bats‘anim betsa‘ananim ’asher ’et qedesh. 
judges 4:12	vayagidu lesisera ki ‘alah baraq ben ’awino‘am har tawor. 
judges 4:13	vayaz‘eq sisera ’et kal rikhbo tesha‘ mei’ot rekhew barzel ve’et kal ha‘am ’asher ’ito meikharoshet hagoyim ’el nakhal qishon. 
judges 4:14	vatomer deworah ’el baraq qum ki zeh hayom ’asher natan yhoh ’et sisera beyadekha halo yhoh yatsa lefanekha vayeired baraq meihar tawor va‘aseret ’alafim ’ish ’akharav. 
judges 4:15	vayaham yhoh ’et sisera ve’et kal harekhew ve’et kal hamakhaneh lefi kherew lifnei waraq vayeired sisera mei‘al hamerkawah vayanas beraglav. 
judges 4:16	uwaraq radaf ’akharei harekhew ve’akharei hamakhaneh ‘ad kharoshet hagoyim vayipol kal makhaneh sisera lefi kherew lo nish’ar ‘ad ’ekhad. 
judges 4:17	vesisera nas beraglav ’el ’ohel ya‘el ’eishet khewer haqeini ki shalom ben yawin melekh khatsor uwen bet khewer haqeini. 
judges 4:18	vateitsei ya‘el liqrat sisera vatomer ’eilav surah ’adoni surah ’eilai ’al tira vayasar ’eileha ha’ohelah vatekhaseihu basemikhah. 
judges 4:19	vayomer ’eileha hashqini na me‘at mayim ki tsameiti vatiftakh ’et nod hekhalaw vatashqeihu vatekhaseihu. 
judges 4:20	vayomer ’eileha ‘amod petakh ha’ohel vehayah ’im ’ish yawo ushe’eilekh ve’amar hayesh poh ’ish ve’amart ’ayin. 
judges 4:21	vatiqakh ya‘el ’eishet khewer ’et yetad ha’ohel vatasem ’et hamaqewet beyadah vatawo ’eilav balat vatitqa‘ ’et hayated beraqato vatitsnakh ba’arets vehu nirdam vaya‘af vayamot. 
judges 4:22	vehineh waraq rodef ’et sisera vateitsei ya‘el liqrato vatomer lo lekh ve’ar’eka ’et ha’ish ’asher ’atah mewaqesh vayawo ’eileha vehineh sisera nofel met vehayated beraqato. 
judges 4:23	vayakhna‘ ’elohim bayom hahu ’et yawin melekh kena‘an lifnei benei yisra’el. 
judges 4:24	vateilekh yad benei yisra’el halokh veqashah ‘al yawin melekh kena‘an ‘ad ’asher hikhritu ’et yawin melekh kena‘an. 
judges 5:1	vatashar deworah uwaraq ben ’awino‘am bayom hahu leimor. 
judges 5:2	bifroa‘ pera‘ot beyisra’el behitnadew ‘am barakhu yhoh. 
judges 5:3	shim‘u melakhim ha’azinu rozenim ’anokhi yhoh ’anokhi ’ashirah ’azamer yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
judges 5:4	yhoh betseitekha misei‘ir betsa‘dekha misedeh ’edom ’erets ra‘ashah gam shamayim natafu gam ‘awim natefu mayim. 
judges 5:5	harim nazelu mipenei yhoh zeh sinai mipenei yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
judges 5:6	bimei shamgar ben ‘anat bimei ya‘el khadelu ’orakhot veholekhei netiwot yeilekhu ’orakhot ‘aqalqalot. 
judges 5:7	khadelu ferazon beyisra’el khadelu ‘ad shaqamti deworah shaqamti ’em beyisra’el. 
judges 5:8	yiwkhar ’elohim khadashim ’az lakhem she‘arim magen ’im yeira’eh varomakh be’arba‘im ’elef beyisra’el. 
judges 5:9	libi lekhoqei yisra’el hamitnadewim ba‘am barakhu yhoh. 
judges 5:10	rokhewei ’atonot tsekhorot yoshewei ‘al midin veholekhei ‘al derekh sikhu. 
judges 5:11	miqol mekhatsim ben mash’abim sham yetanu tsidqot yhoh tsidqot pirzono beyisra’el ’az yaredu lashe‘arim ‘am yhoh. 
judges 5:12	‘uri ‘uri deworah ‘uri ‘uri daberi shir qum baraq ushaweh shewyekha ben ’awino‘am. 
judges 5:13	’az yerad sarid le’adirim ‘am yhoh yerad li bagiborim. 
judges 5:14	mini ’efrayim sharesham ba‘amaleq ’akharekha winyamin ba‘amamekha mini makhir yaredu mekhoqeqim umizewulun moshekhim besheiwet sofer. 
judges 5:15	vesarai beyisashkhar ‘im deworah veyisashkhar ken baraq ba‘eimeq shulakh beraglav biflagot re’uwen gedolim khiqei lew. 
judges 5:16	lamah yashawta ben hamishpetayim lishmoa‘ sheriqot ‘adarim liflagot re’uwen gedolim khiqrei lew. 
judges 5:17	gil‘ad be‘eiwer hayarden shakhen vedan lamah yagur ’oniyot ’asher yashaw lekhof yamim ve‘al mifratsav yishkon. 
judges 5:18	zewulun ‘am kheiref nafsho lamut venaftali ‘al meromei sadeh. 
judges 5:19	ba’u melakhim nilkhamu ’az nilkhamu malkhei khena‘an beta‘nakh ‘al mei megido betsa‘ kesef lo laqakhu. 
judges 5:20	min shamayim nilkhamu hakokhawim mimesilotam nilkhamu ‘im sisera. 
judges 5:21	nakhal qishon gerafam nakhal qedumim nakhal qishon tidrekhi nafshi ‘oz. 
judges 5:22	’az halemu ‘iqewei sus midaharot daharot ’abirav. 
judges 5:23	’oru meiroz ’amar mal’akh yhoh ’oru ’aror yosheweha ki lo wa’u le‘ezrat yhoh le‘ezrat yhoh bagiborim. 
judges 5:24	teworakh minashim ya‘el ’eishet khewer haqeini minashim ba’ohel teworakh. 
judges 5:25	mayim sha’al khalaw natanah beseifel ’adirim hiqriwah khem’ah. 
judges 5:26	yadah layated tishlakhnah viminah lehalmut ‘ameilim vehalemah sisera makhaqah rosho umakhatsah vekhalefah raqato. 
judges 5:27	ben ragleha kara‘ nafal shakhaw ben ragleha kara‘ nafal ba’asher kara‘ sham nafal shadud. 
judges 5:28	be‘ad hakhalon nishqefah vateyabew ’em sisera be‘ad ha’eshnaw madua‘ boshesh rikhbo lawo madua‘ ’ekheru pa‘amei markewotav. 
judges 5:29	khakhmot saroteha ta‘anenah ’af hi tashiw ’amareha lah. 
judges 5:30	halo yimtse’u yekhalequ shalal rakham rakhamatayim lerosh gewer shelal tsewa‘im lesisera shelal tsewa‘im riqmah tsewa‘ riqmatayim letsaverei shalal. 
judges 5:31	ken yowedu khal ’oywekha yhoh ve’ohawav ketset hashemesh bigwurato vatishqot ha’arets ’arba‘im shanah. 
judges 6:1	vaya‘asu wenei yisra’el hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayitenem yhoh beyad midyan shewa‘ shanim. 
judges 6:2	vata‘az yad midyan ‘al yisra’el mipenei midyan ‘asu lahem benei yisra’el ’et haminharot ’asher beharim ve’et hame‘arot ve’et hametsadot. 
judges 6:3	vehayah ’im zara‘ yisra’el ve‘alah midyan va‘amaleq uwenei qedem ve‘alu ‘alav. 
judges 6:4	vayakhanu ‘aleihem vayashkhitu ’et yewul ha’arets ‘ad bo’akha ‘azah velo yash’iru mikhyah beyisra’el veseh vashor vakhamor. 
judges 6:5	ki hem umiqneihem ya‘alu ve’aholeihem yawo’u uwa’u khedei ’arbeh larow velahem veligmaleihem ’en mispar vayawo’u wa’arets leshakhatah. 
judges 6:6	vayidal yisra’el me’od mipenei midyan vayiz‘aqu wenei yisra’el ’el yhoh. 
judges 6:7	vayhi ki za‘aqu wenei yisra’el ’el yhoh ‘al ’odot midyan. 
judges 6:8	vayishlakh yhoh ’ish nawi ’el benei yisra’el vayomer lahem koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’anokhi he‘eleiti ’etkhem mimitsrayim va’otsi ’etkhem mibet ‘awadim. 
judges 6:9	va’atsil ’etkhem miyad mitsrayim umiyad kal lokhatseikhem va’agaresh ’otam mipeneikhem va’etenah lakhem ’et ’artsam. 
judges 6:10	va’omerah lakhem ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem lo tire’u ’et ’elohei ha’emori ’asher ’atem yoshewim be’artsam velo shema‘tem beqoli. 
judges 6:11	vayawo mal’akh yhoh vayeishew takhat ha’eilah ’asher be‘aferah ’asher leyo’ash ’awi ha‘ezri vegid‘on beno khowet khitim bagat lehanis mipenei midyan. 
judges 6:12	vayeira ’eilav mal’akh yhoh vayomer ’eilav yhoh ‘imekha gibor hekhayil. 
judges 6:13	vayomer ’eilav gid‘on bi ’adoni veyesh yhoh ‘imanu velamah metsa’atnu kal zot ve’ayeh khal nifle’otav ’asher siperu lanu ’awoteinu leimor halo mimitsrayim he‘elanu yhoh ve‘atah netashanu yhoh vayiteneinu bekhaf midyan. 
judges 6:14	vayifen ’eilav yhoh vayomer lekh bekhokhakha zeh vehosha‘ta ’et yisra’el mikaf midyan halo shelakhtikha. 
judges 6:15	vayomer ’eilav bi ’adonai bamah ’oshia‘ ’et yisra’el hineh ’alpi hadal bimnasheh ve’anokhi hatsa‘ir bewet ’awi. 
judges 6:16	vayomer ’eilav yhoh ki ’ehyeh ‘imakh vehikita ’et midyan ke’ish ’ekhad. 
judges 6:17	vayomer ’eilav ’im na matsati khen be‘einekha ve‘asita li ’ot sha’atah medaber ‘imi. 
judges 6:18	’al na tamush mizeh ‘ad bo’i ’eilekha vehotseiti ’et minkhati vehinakhti lefanekha vayomar ’anokhi ’eishew ‘ad shuwekha. 
judges 6:19	vegid‘on ba vaya‘as gedi ‘izim ve’eifat qemakh matsot habasar sam basal vehamaraq sam baparur vayotsei ’eilav ’el takhat ha’eilah vayagash. 
judges 6:20	vayomer ’eilav mal’akh ha’elohim qakh ’et habasar ve’et hamatsot vehanakh ’el hasela‘ halaz ve’et hamaraq shefokh vaya‘as ken. 
judges 6:21	vayishlakh mal’akh yhoh ’et qetseh hamish‘enet ’asher beyado vayiga‘ babasar uwamatsot vata‘al ha’esh min hatsur vatokhal ’et habasar ve’et hamatsot umal’akh yhoh halakh mei‘einav. 
judges 6:22	vayar gid‘on ki mal’akh yhoh hu vayomer gid‘on ’ahah ’adonai yhoh ki ‘al ken ra’iti mal’akh yhoh panim ’el panim. 
judges 6:23	vayomer lo yhoh shalom lekha ’al tira lo tamut. 
judges 6:24	vayiwen sham gid‘on mizbeiakh yhoh vayiqra lo yhoh shalom ‘ad hayom hazeh ‘odenu be‘aferat ’awi ha‘ezri. 
judges 6:25	vayhi balaylah hahu vayomer lo yhoh qakh ’et par hashor ’asher le’awikha ufar hasheini shewa‘ shanim veharasta ’et mizbakh haba‘al ’asher le’awikha ve’et ha’asheirah ’asher ‘alav tikhrot. 
judges 6:26	uwanita mizbeiakh yhoh ’elohekha ‘al rosh hama‘oz hazeh bama‘arakhah velaqakhta ’et hapar hasheini veha‘alita ‘olah ba‘atsei ha’asheirah ’asher tikhrot. 
judges 6:27	vayiqakh gid‘on ‘asarah ’anashim mei‘awadav vaya‘as ka’asher diber ’eilav yhoh vayhi ka’asher yarei ’et bet ’awiv ve’et ’anshei ha‘ir mei‘asot yomam vaya‘as layelah. 
judges 6:28	vayashkimu ’anshei ha‘ir baboqer vehineh nutats mizbakh haba‘al veha’asheirah ’asher ‘alav koratah ve’et hapar hasheini ho‘alah ‘al hamizbeiakh habanui. 
judges 6:29	vayomeru ’ish ’el rei‘eihu mi ‘asah hadawar hazeh vayidreshu vaywaqshu vayomeru gid‘on ben yo’ash ‘asah hadawar hazeh. 
judges 6:30	vayomeru ’anshei ha‘ir ’el yo’ash hotsei ’et binkha veyamot ki natats ’et mizbakh haba‘al vekhi kharat ha’asheirah ’asher ‘alav. 
judges 6:31	vayomer yo’ash lekhol ’asher ‘amedu ‘alav ha’atem teriwun laba‘al ’im ’atem toshi‘un ’oto ’asher yariw lo yumat ‘ad haboqer ’im ’elohim hu yarew lo ki natats ’et mizbekho. 
judges 6:32	vayiqra lo wayom hahu yeruba‘al leimor yarew bo haba‘al ki natats ’et mizbekho. 
judges 6:33	vekhal midyan va‘amaleq uwenei qedem ne’esfu yakhdav vaya‘awru vayakhanu be‘eimeq yizre‘el. 
judges 6:34	veruakh yhoh laweshah ’et gid‘on vayitqa‘ bashofar vayiza‘eq ’awi‘ezer ’akharav. 
judges 6:35	umal’akhim shalakh bekhal menasheh vayiza‘eq gam hu ’akharav umal’akhim shalakh be’asher uwizwulun uwenaftali vaya‘alu liqratam. 
judges 6:36	vayomer gid‘on ’el ha’elohim ’im yeshkha moshia‘ beyadi ’et yisra’el ka’asher dibarta. 
judges 6:37	hineh ’anokhi matsig ’et gizat hatsemer bagoren ’im tal yihyeh ‘al hagizah lewadah ve‘al kal ha’arets khorew veyada‘ti ki toshia‘ beyadi ’et yisra’el ka’asher dibarta. 
judges 6:38	vayhi khen vayashkem mimakhorat vayazar ’et hagizah vayimets tal min hagizah melo haseifel mayim. 
judges 6:39	vayomer gid‘on ’el ha’elohim ’al yikhar ’apekha bi va’adaberah ’akh hapa‘am ’anaseh na raq hapa‘am bagizah yehi na khorew ’el hagizah lewadah ve‘al kal ha’arets yihyeh tal. 
judges 6:40	vaya‘as ’elohim ken balaylah hahu vayhi khorew ’el hagizah lewadah ve‘al kal ha’arets hayah tal. 
judges 7:1	vayashkem yeruba‘al hu gid‘on vekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito vayakhanu ‘al ‘en kharod umakhaneh midyan hayah lo mitsafon migiw‘at hamoreh ba‘eimeq. 
judges 7:2	vayomer yhoh ’el gid‘on raw ha‘am ’asher ’itakh mititi ’et midyan beyadam pen yitpa’er ‘alai yisra’el leimor yadi hoshi‘ah li. 
judges 7:3	ve‘atah qera na be’azenei ha‘am leimor mi yarei vekhared yashow veyitspor meihar hagil‘ad vayashaw min ha‘am ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef va‘aseret ’alafim nish’aru. 
judges 7:4	vayomer yhoh ’el gid‘on ‘od ha‘am raw hored ’otam ’el hamayim ve’etsrefenu lekha sham vehayah ’asher ’omar ’eilekha zeh yeilekh ’itakh hu yeilekh ’itakh vekhol ’asher ’omar ’eilekha zeh lo yeilekh ‘imakh hu lo yeilekh. 
judges 7:5	vayored ’et ha‘am ’el hamayim vayomer yhoh ’el gid‘on kol ’asher yaloq bilshono min hamayim ka’asher yaloq hakelew tatsig ’oto lewad vekhol ’asher yikhra‘ ‘al birkav lishtot. 
judges 7:6	vayhi mispar hamalaqim beyadam ’el pihem shelosh mei’ot ’ish vekhol yeter ha‘am kare‘u ‘al birkheihem lishtot mayim. 
judges 7:7	vayomer yhoh ’el gid‘on bishlosh mei’ot ha’ish hamalaqim ’oshia‘ ’etkhem venatati ’et midyan beyadekha vekhal ha‘am yeilekhu ’ish limqomo. 
judges 7:8	vayiqkhu ’et tseidah ha‘am beyadam ve’et shofroteihem ve’et kal ’ish yisra’el shilakh ’ish le’ohalav uwishlosh mei’ot ha’ish hekheziq umakhaneh midyan hayah lo mitakhat ba‘eimeq. 
judges 7:9	vayhi balaylah hahu vayomer ’eilav yhoh qum red bamakhaneh ki netativ beyadekha. 
judges 7:10	ve’im yarei ’atah laredet red ’atah ufurah na‘arkha ’el hamakhaneh. 
judges 7:11	veshama‘ta mah yedabeiru ve’akhar tekhezaqnah yadekha veyaradta bamakhaneh vayeired hu ufurah na‘aro ’el qetseh hakhamushim ’asher bamakhaneh. 
judges 7:12	umidyan va‘amaleq vekhal benei qedem nofelim ba‘eimeq ka’arbeh larow veligmaleihem ’en mispar kakhol she‘al sefat hayam larow. 
judges 7:13	vayawo gid‘on vehineh ’ish mesaper lerei‘eihu khalom vayomer hineh khalom khalamti vehineh tselol tselil lekhem se‘orim mithapekh bemakhaneh midyan vayawo ‘ad ha’ohel vayakeihu vayipol vayahafkheihu lema‘lah venafal ha’ohel. 
judges 7:14	vaya‘an rei‘eihu vayomer ’en zot bilti ’im kherew gid‘on ben yo’ash ’ish yisra’el natan ha’elohim beyado ’et midyan ve’et kal hamakhaneh. 
judges 7:15	vayhi khishmoa‘ gid‘on ’et mispar hakhalom ve’et shiwro vayishtakhu vayashaw ’el makhaneh yisra’el vayomer qumu ki natan yhoh beyedkhem ’et makhaneh midyan. 
judges 7:16	vayakhats ’et shelosh mei’ot ha’ish sheloshah rashim vayiten shofarot beyad kulam vekhadim reiqim velapidim betokh hakadim. 
judges 7:17	vayomer ’aleihem mimeni tir’u vekhen ta‘asu vehineh ’anokhi wa biqtseh hamakhaneh vehayah kha’asher ’e‘eseh ken ta‘asun. 
judges 7:18	vetaqa‘ti bashofar ’anokhi vekhal ’asher ’iti uteqa‘tem bashofarot gam ’atem sewiwot kal hamakhaneh va’amartem yhoh ulegid‘on. 
judges 7:19	vayawo gid‘on umei’ah ’ish ’asher ’ito biqtseh hamakhaneh rosh ha’ashmoret hatikhonah ’akh haqem heiqimu ’et hashomerim vayitqe‘u bashofarot venafots hakadim ’asher beyadam. 
judges 7:20	vayitqe‘u sheloshet harashim bashofarot vayishberu hakadim vayakhaziqu weyad sem’olam balapidim uweyad yeminam hashofarot litqoa‘ vayiqre’u kherew yhoh ulegid‘on. 
judges 7:21	vaya‘amdu ’ish takhtav sawiw lamakhaneh vayarats kal hamakhaneh vayari‘u vayanisu vayanusu. 
judges 7:22	vayitqe‘u shelosh mei’ot hashofarot vayasem yhoh ’et kherew ’ish berei‘eihu uwekhal hamakhaneh vayanas hamakhaneh ‘ad bet hashitah tsereiratah ‘ad sefat ’awel mekholah ‘al tabat. 
judges 7:23	vayitsa‘eq ’ish yisra’el minaftali umin ’asher umin kal menasheh vayirdefu ’akharei midyan. 
judges 7:24	umal’akhim shalakh gid‘on bekhal har ’efrayim leimor redu liqrat midyan velikhdu lahem ’et hamayim ‘ad bet barah ve’et hayarden vayitsa‘eq kal ’ish ’efrayim vayilkedu ’et hamayim ‘ad bet barah ve’et hayarden. 
judges 7:25	vayilkedu shenei sarei midyan ’et ‘orew ve’et ze’ew vayahargu ’et ‘orew betsur ‘orew ve’et ze’ew haregu weyeqew ze’ew vayirdefu ’el midyan verosh ‘orew uze’ew heiwi’u ’el gid‘on mei‘eiwer layarden. 
judges 8:1	vayomeru ’eilav ’ish ’efrayim mah hadawar hazeh ‘asita lanu lewilti qerot lanu ki halakhta lehilakhem bemidyan vayriwun ’ito bekhazeqah. 
judges 8:2	vayomer ’aleihem meh ‘asiti ‘atah kakhem halo tow ‘olelot ’efrayim miwtsir ’awi‘ezer. 
judges 8:3	beyedkhem natan ’elohim ’et sarei midyan ’et ‘orew ve’et ze’ew umah yakholeti ‘asot kakhem ’az rafetah rukham mei‘alav bedabero hadawar hazeh. 
judges 8:4	vayawo gid‘on hayardeinah ‘ower hu ushelosh mei’ot ha’ish ’asher ’ito ‘ayeifim verodefim. 
judges 8:5	vayomer le’anshei sukot tenu na kikerot lekhem la‘am ’asher beraglai ki ‘ayeifim hem ve’anokhi rodef ’akharei zewakh vetsalmuna‘ malkhei midyan. 
judges 8:6	vayomer sarei sukot hakhaf zewakh vetsalmuna‘ ‘atah beyadekha ki niten litswa’akha lakhem. 
judges 8:7	vayomer gid‘on lakhen betet yhoh ’et zewakh ve’et tsalmuna‘ beyadi vedashti ’et besarkhem ’et qotsei hamidbar ve’et habarqonim. 
judges 8:8	vaya‘al misham penu’el vaydaber ’aleihem kazot vaya‘anu ’oto ’anshei fenu’el ka’asher ‘anu ’anshei sukot. 
judges 8:9	vayomer gam le’anshei fenu’el leimor beshuwi weshalom ’etots ’et hamigdal hazeh. 
judges 8:10	vezewakh vetsalmuna‘ baqarqor umakhaneihem ‘imam kakhameishet ‘asar ’elef kol hanotarim mikol makhaneh wenei qedem vehanofelim mei’ah ve‘esrim ’elef ’ish sholef kharew. 
judges 8:11	vaya‘al gid‘on derekh hashekhunei wa’ohalim miqedem lenowakh veyagebohah vayakh ’et hamakhaneh vehamakhaneh hayah wetakh. 
judges 8:12	vayanusu zewakh vetsalmuna‘ vayirdof ’akhareihem vayilkod ’et shenei malkhei midyan ’et zewakh ve’et tsalmuna‘ vekhal hamakhaneh hekherid. 
judges 8:13	vayashaw gid‘on ben yo’ash min hamilkhamah milma‘aleh hekhares. 
judges 8:14	vayilkad na‘ar mei’anshei sukot vayish’aleihu vayikhtow ’eilav ’et sarei sukot ve’et zeqeineha shiw‘im veshiw‘ah ’ish. 
judges 8:15	vayawo ’el ’anshei sukot vayomer hineh zewakh vetsalmuna‘ ’asher kheiraftem ’oti leimor hakhaf zewakh vetsalmuna‘ ‘atah beyadekha ki niten la’anashekha haye‘eifim lakhem. 
judges 8:16	vayiqakh ’et ziqnei ha‘ir ve’et qotsei hamidbar ve’et habarqonim vayoda‘ bahem ’et ’anshei sukot. 
judges 8:17	ve’et migdal penu’el natats vayaharog ’et ’anshei ha‘ir. 
judges 8:18	vayomer ’el zewakh ve’el tsalmuna‘ ’eifoh ha’anashim ’asher haragtem betawor vayomeru kamokha khemohem ’ekhad keto’ar benei hamelekh. 
judges 8:19	vayomar ’akhai benei ’imi hem khai yhoh lu hakhayitem ’otam lo haragti ’etkhem. 
judges 8:20	vayomer leyeter bekhoro qum harog ’otam velo shalaf hana‘ar kharbo ki yarei ki ‘odenu na‘ar. 
judges 8:21	vayomer zewakh vetsalmuna‘ qum ’atah ufega‘ banu ki kha’ish gewurato vayaqam gid‘on vayaharog ’et zewakh ve’et tsalmuna‘ vayiqakh ’et hasaharonim ’asher betsaverei gemaleihem. 
judges 8:22	vayomeru ’ish yisra’el ’el gid‘on meshal banu gam ’atah gam binkha gam ben benekha ki hosha‘tanu miyad midyan. 
judges 8:23	vayomer ’aleihem gid‘on lo ’emshol ’ani bakhem velo yimshol beni bakhem yhoh yimshol bakhem. 
judges 8:24	vayomer ’aleihem gid‘on ’esh’alah mikem she’eilah utenu li ’ish nezem shelalo ki nizmei zahaw lahem ki yishme‘eilim hem. 
judges 8:25	vayomeru naton niten vayifresu ’et hasimlah vayashlikhu shamah ’ish nezem shelalo. 
judges 8:26	vayhi mishqal nizmei hazahaw ’asher sha’al ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot zahaw lewad min hasaharonim vehanetifot uwigdei ha’argaman she‘al malkhei midyan ulewad min ha‘anaqot ’asher betsaverei gemaleihem. 
judges 8:27	vaya‘as ’oto gid‘on le’eifod vayatseg ’oto we‘iro be‘aferah vayiznu khal yisra’el ’akharav sham vayhi legid‘on uleweito lemoqesh. 
judges 8:28	vayikana‘ midyan lifnei benei yisra’el velo yasefu laset rosham vatishqot ha’arets ’arba‘im shanah bimei gid‘on. 
judges 8:29	vayeilekh yeruba‘al ben yo’ash vayeishew beweito. 
judges 8:30	ulegid‘on hayu shiw‘im banim yotse’ei yereikho ki nashim rabot hayu lo. 
judges 8:31	ufilagsho ’asher bishkhem yaledah lo gam hi ben vayasem ’et shemo ’awimelekh. 
judges 8:32	vayamat gid‘on ben yo’ash beseiwah towah vayiqawer beqewer yo’ash ’awiv be‘aferah ’awi ha‘ezri. 
judges 8:33	vayhi ka’asher met gid‘on vayashuwu benei yisra’el vayiznu ’akharei habe‘alim vayasimu lahem ba‘al berit leilohim. 
judges 8:34	velo zakheru benei yisra’el ’et yhoh ’eloheihem hamatsil ’otam miyad kal ’oyeweihem misawiw. 
judges 8:35	velo ‘asu khesed ‘im bet yeruba‘al gid‘on kekhal hatowah ’asher ‘asah ‘im yisra’el. 
judges 9:1	vayeilekh ’awimelekh ben yeruba‘al shekhemah ’el ’akhei ’imo vaydaber ’aleihem ve’el kal mishpakhat bet ’awi ’imo leimor. 
judges 9:2	daberu na be’azenei khal ba‘alei shekhem mah tow lakhem hamshol bakhem shiw‘im ’ish kol benei yeruba‘al ’im meshol bakhem ’ish ’ekhad uzekhartem ki ‘atsmeikhem uwesarkhem ’ani. 
judges 9:3	vaydaberu ’akhei ’imo ‘alav be’azenei kal ba‘alei shekhem ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh vayet libam ’akharei ’awimelekh ki ’ameru ’akhinu hu. 
judges 9:4	vayitenu lo shiw‘im kesef mibet ba‘al berit vayiskor bahem ’awimelekh ’anashim reiqim ufokhazim vayeilekhu ’akharav. 
judges 9:5	vayawo wet ’awiv ‘aferatah vayaharog ’et ’ekhav benei yeruba‘al shiw‘im ’ish ‘al ’ewen ’ekhat vayivater yotam ben yeruba‘al haqaton ki nekhba. 
judges 9:6	vayei’asefu kal ba‘alei shekhem vekhal bet milo vayeilekhu vayamlikhu ’et ’awimelekh lemelekh ‘im ’eilon mutsaw ’asher bishkhem. 
judges 9:7	vayagidu leyotam vayeilekh vaya‘amod berosh har gerizim vayisa qolo vayiqra vayomer lahem shim‘u ’eilai ba‘alei shekhem veyishma‘ ’aleikhem ’elohim. 
judges 9:8	halokh halekhu ha‘eitsim limshoakh ‘aleihem melekh vayomeru lazayit melokhah malekhah ‘aleinu. 
judges 9:9	vayomer lahem hazayit hekhodalti ’et dishni ’asher bi yekhabedu ’elohim va’anashim vehalakhti lanua‘ ‘al ha‘eitsim. 
judges 9:10	vayomeru ha‘eitsim late’einah lekhi ’at malekhi ‘aleinu. 
judges 9:11	vatomer lahem hate’einah hekhodalti ’et mateqi ve’et tenuwati hatowah vehalakhti lanua‘ ‘al ha‘eitsim. 
judges 9:12	vayomeru ha‘eitsim lagafen lekhi ’at malokhi malekhi ‘aleinu. 
judges 9:13	vatomer lahem hagefen hekhodalti ’et tiroshi hamsameiakh ’elohim va’anashim vehalakhti lanua‘ ‘al ha‘eitsim. 
judges 9:14	vayomeru khal ha‘eitsim ’el ha’atad lekh ’atah melakh ‘aleinu. 
judges 9:15	vayomer ha’atad ’el ha‘eitsim ’im be’emet ’atem moshekhim ’oti lemelekh ‘aleikhem bo’u khasu wetsili ve’im ’ayin teitsei ’esh min ha’atad vetokhal ’et ’arzei halewanon. 
judges 9:16	ve‘atah ’im be’emet uwetamim ‘asitem vatamlikhu ’et ’awimelekh ve’im towah ‘asitem ‘im yeruba‘al ve‘im beito ve’im kigmul yadav ‘asitem lo. 
judges 9:17	’asher nilkham ’awi ‘aleikhem vayashlekh ’et nafsho mineged vayatsel ’etkhem miyad midyan. 
judges 9:18	ve’atem qamtem ‘al bet ’awi hayom vatahargu ’et banav shiw‘im ’ish ‘al ’ewen ’ekhat vatamlikhu ’et ’awimelekh ben ’amato ‘al ba‘alei shekhem ki ’akhikhem hu. 
judges 9:19	ve’im be’emet uwetamim ‘asitem ‘im yeruba‘al ve‘im beito hayom hazeh simkhu ba’awimelekh veyismakh gam hu bakhem. 
judges 9:20	ve’im ’ayin teitsei ’esh mei’awimelekh vetokhal ’et ba‘alei shekhem ve’et bet milo veteitsei ’esh miba‘alei shekhem umibet milo vetokhal ’et ’awimelekh. 
judges 9:21	vayanas yotam vayiwrakh vayeilekh be’eirah vayeishew sham mipenei ’awimelekh ’akhiv. 
judges 9:22	vayasar ’awimelekh ‘al yisra’el shalosh shanim. 
judges 9:23	vayishlakh ’elohim ruakh ra‘ah ben ’awimelekh uwen ba‘alei shekhem vayiwgedu wa‘alei shekhem ba’awimelekh. 
judges 9:24	lawo khamas shiw‘im benei yeruba‘al vedamam lasum ‘al ’awimelekh ’akhihem ’asher harag ’otam ve‘al ba‘alei shekhem ’asher khizequ ’et yadav laharog ’et ’ekhav. 
judges 9:25	vayasimu lo wa‘alei shekhem me’arewim ‘al rashei heharim vayigzelu ’et kal ’asher ya‘awor ‘aleihem badarekh vayugad la’awimelekh. 
judges 9:26	vayawo ga‘al ben ‘ewed ve’ekhav vaya‘awru bishkhem vayiwtekhu wo ba‘alei shekhem. 
judges 9:27	vayeitse’u hasadeh vayiwtseru ’et karmeihem vayidrekhu vaya‘asu hilulim vayawo’u bet ’eloheihem vayokhelu vayishtu vayqalu ’et ’awimelekh. 
judges 9:28	vayomer ga‘al ben ‘ewed mi ’awimelekh umi shekhem ki na‘awdenu halo wen yeruba‘al uzewul peqido ‘iwdu ’et ’anshei khamor ’awi shekhem umadua‘ na‘awdenu ’anakhenu. 
judges 9:29	umi yiten ’et ha‘am hazeh beyadi ve’asirah ’et ’awimelekh vayomer la’awimelekh rabeh tsewa’akha vatsei’ah. 
judges 9:30	vayishma‘ zewul sar ha‘ir ’et diwrei ga‘al ben ‘awed vayikhar ’apo. 
judges 9:31	vayishlakh mal’akhim ’el ’awimelekh betaremah leimor hineh ga‘al ben ‘ewed ve’ekhav ba’im shekhemah vehinam tsarim ’et ha‘ir ‘alekha. 
judges 9:32	ve‘atah qum laylah ’atah veha‘am ’asher ’itakh ve’erow basadeh. 
judges 9:33	vehayah waboqer kizroakh hashemesh tashkim ufashata ‘al ha‘ir vehineh hu veha‘am ’asher ’ito yotse’im ’eilekha ve‘asita lo ka’asher timtsa yadekha. 
judges 9:34	vayaqam ’awimelekh vekhal ha‘am ’asher ‘imo layelah vaye’erwu ‘al shekhem ’arba‘ah rashim. 
judges 9:35	vayeitsei ga‘al ben ‘ewed vaya‘amod petakh sha‘ar ha‘ir vayaqam ’awimelekh veha‘am ’asher ’ito min hama’raw. 
judges 9:36	vayar ga‘al ’et ha‘am vayomer ’el zewul hineh ‘am yored meirashei heharim vayomer ’eilav zewul ’et tsel heharim ’atah ro’eh ka’anashim. 
judges 9:37	vayosef ‘od ga‘al ledaber vayomer hineh ‘am yordim mei‘im tabur ha’arets verosh ’ekhad ba miderekh ’eilon me‘onim. 
judges 9:38	vayomer ’eilav zewul ’ayeh ’eifo fikha ’asher tomar mi ’awimelekh ki na‘awdenu halo zeh ha‘am ’asher ma’astah bo tsei na ‘atah vehilakhem bo. 
judges 9:39	vayeitsei ga‘al lifnei ba‘alei shekhem vayilakhem ba’awimelekh. 
judges 9:40	vayirdefeihu ’awimelekh vayanas mipanav vayipelu khalalim rabim ‘ad petakh hasha‘ar. 
judges 9:41	vayeishew ’awimelekh barumah vaygaresh zewul ’et ga‘al ve’et ’ekhav mishewet bishkhem. 
judges 9:42	vayhi mimakhorat vayeitsei ha‘am hasadeh vayagidu la’awimelekh. 
judges 9:43	vayiqakh ’et ha‘am vayekhetsem lishloshah rashim vaye’erow basadeh vayar vehineh ha‘am yotsei min ha‘ir vayaqam ‘aleihem vayakem. 
judges 9:44	va’awimelekh veharashim ’asher ‘imo pashetu vaya‘amdu petakh sha‘ar ha‘ir ushenei harashim pashetu ‘al kal ’asher basadeh vayakum. 
judges 9:45	va’awimelekh nilkham ba‘ir kol hayom hahu vayilkod ’et ha‘ir ve’et ha‘am ’asher bah harag vayitots ’et ha‘ir vayizra‘eha melakh. 
judges 9:46	vayishme‘u kal ba‘alei migdal shekhem vayawo’u ’el tseriakh bet ’el berit. 
judges 9:47	vayugad la’awimelekh ki hitqabetsu kal ba‘alei migdal shekhem. 
judges 9:48	vaya‘al ’awimelekh har tsalmon hu vekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito vayiqakh ’awimelekh ’et haqardumot beyado vayikhrot sokhat ‘eitsim vayisa’eha vayasem ‘al shikhmo vayomer ’el ha‘am ’asher ‘imo mah re’item ‘asiti maharu ‘asu khamoni. 
judges 9:49	vayikhretu gam kal ha‘am ’ish sokhoh vayeilekhu ’akharei ’awimelekh vayasimu ‘al hatseriakh vayatsitu ‘aleihem ’et hatseriakh ba’esh vayamutu gam kal ’anshei migdal shekhem ke’elef ’ish ve’ishah. 
judges 9:50	vayeilekh ’awimelekh ’el teiwets vayikhan beteiwets vayilkedah. 
judges 9:51	umigdal ‘oz hayah wetokh ha‘ir vayanusu shamah kal ha’anashim vehanashim vekhol ba‘alei ha‘ir vayisgeru ba‘adam vaya‘alu ‘al gag hamigdal. 
judges 9:52	vayawo ’awimelekh ‘ad hamigdal vayilakhem bo vayigash ‘ad petakh hamigdal lesarefo wa’esh. 
judges 9:53	vatashlekh ’ishah ’akhat pelakh rekhew ‘al rosh ’awimelekh vatarits ’et gulgaleto. 
judges 9:54	vayiqra meheirah ’el hana‘ar nosei kheilav vayomer lo shelof kharbekha umoteini pen yomeru li ’ishah haragatehu vayidqereihu na‘aro vayamot. 
judges 9:55	vayir’u ’ish yisra’el ki met ’awimelekh vayeilekhu ’ish limqomo. 
judges 9:56	vayashew ’elohim ’et ra‘at ’awimelekh ’asher ‘asah le’awiv laharog ’et shiw‘im ’ekhav. 
judges 9:57	ve’et kal ra‘at ’anshei shekhem heishiw ’elohim berosham vatawo ’aleihem qilalat yotam ben yeruba‘al. 
judges 10:1	vayaqam ’akharei ’awimelekh lehoshia‘ ’et yisra’el tola‘ ben pu’ah ben dodo ’ish yisashkhar vehu yoshew beshamir behar ’efrayim. 
judges 10:2	vayishpot ’et yisra’el ‘esrim veshalosh shanah vayamat vayiqawer beshamir. 
judges 10:3	vayaqam ’akharav ya’ir hagil‘adi vayishpot ’et yisra’el ‘esrim ushetayim shanah. 
judges 10:4	vayhi lo sheloshim banim rokhewim ‘al sheloshim ‘ayarim usheloshim ‘ayarim lahem lahem yiqre’u khavot ya’ir ‘ad hayom hazeh ’asher be’erets hagil‘ad. 
judges 10:5	vayamat ya’ir vayiqawer beqamon. 
judges 10:6	vayosifu benei yisra’el la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vaya‘awdu ’et habe‘alim ve’et ha‘ashtarot ve’et ’elohei ’aram ve’et ’elohei tsidon ve’et ’elohei mo’aw ve’et ’elohei wenei ‘amon ve’et ’elohei felishtim vaya‘azwu ’et yhoh velo ‘awaduhu. 
judges 10:7	vayikhar ’af yhoh beyisra’el vayimkerem beyad pelishtim uweyad benei ‘amon. 
judges 10:8	vayir‘atsu vayrotsetsu ’et benei yisra’el bashanah hahi shemoneh ‘esreh shanah ’et kal benei yisra’el ’asher be‘eiwer hayarden be’erets ha’emori ’asher bagil‘ad. 
judges 10:9	vaya‘awru wenei ‘amon ’et hayarden lehilakhem gam bihudah uwewinyamin uwewet ’efrayim vateitser leyisra’el me’od. 
judges 10:10	vayiz‘aqu benei yisra’el ’el yhoh leimor khatanu lakh vekhi ‘azawnu ’et ’eloheinu vana‘awod ’et habe‘alim. 
judges 10:11	vayomer yhoh ’el benei yisra’el halo mimitsrayim umin ha’emori umin benei ‘amon umin pelishtim. 
judges 10:12	vetsidonim va‘amaleq uma‘on lakhatsu ’etkhem vatits‘aqu ’eilai va’oshi‘ah ’etkhem miyadam. 
judges 10:13	ve’atem ‘azawtem ’oti vata‘awdu ’elohim ’akheirim lakhen lo ’osif lehoshia‘ ’etkhem. 
judges 10:14	lekhu veza‘aqu ’el ha’elohim ’asher bekhartem bam hemah yoshi‘u lakhem be‘et tsaratkhem. 
judges 10:15	vayomeru wenei yisra’el ’el yhoh khatanu ‘aseh ’atah lanu kekhal hatow be‘einekha ’akh hatsileinu na hayom hazeh. 
judges 10:16	vayasiru ’et ’elohei haneikhar miqirbam vaya‘awdu ’et yhoh vatiqtsar nafsho ba‘amal yisra’el. 
judges 10:17	vayitsa‘aqu benei ‘amon vayakhanu bagil‘ad vayei’asefu benei yisra’el vayakhanu bamitspah. 
judges 10:18	vayomeru ha‘am sarei gil‘ad ’ish ’el rei‘eihu mi ha’ish ’asher yakhel lehilakhem biwnei ‘amon yihyeh lerosh lekhol yoshewei gil‘ad. 
judges 11:1	veyiftakh hagil‘adi hayah gibor khayil vehu ben ’ishah zonah vayoled gil‘ad ’et yiftakh. 
judges 11:2	vateiled ’eishet gil‘ad lo banim vayigdelu wenei ha’ishah vaygareshu ’et yiftakh vayomeru lo lo tinkhal bewet ’awinu ki ben ’ishah ’akheret ’atah. 
judges 11:3	vayiwrakh yiftakh mipenei ’ekhav vayeishew be’erets tow vayitlaqetu ’el yiftakh ’anashim reiqim vayeitse’u ‘imo. 
judges 11:4	vayhi miyamim vayilakhamu wenei ‘amon ‘im yisra’el. 
judges 11:5	vayhi ka’asher nilkhamu wenei ‘amon ‘im yisra’el vayeilekhu ziqnei gil‘ad laqakhat ’et yiftakh mei’erets tow. 
judges 11:6	vayomeru leyiftakh lekhah vehayitah lanu leqatsin venilakhamah biwnei ‘amon. 
judges 11:7	vayomer yiftakh leziqnei gil‘ad halo ’atem seneitem ’oti vategareshuni mibet ’awi umadua‘ batem ’eilai ‘atah ka’asher tsar lakhem. 
judges 11:8	vayomeru ziqnei gil‘ad ’el yiftakh lakhen ‘atah shawnu ’eilekha vehalakhta ‘imanu venilkhamta biwnei ‘amon vehayita lanu lerosh lekhol yoshewei gil‘ad. 
judges 11:9	vayomer yiftakh ’el ziqnei gil‘ad ’im meshiwim ’atem ’oti lehilakhem biwnei ‘amon venatan yhoh ’otam lefanai ’anokhi ’ehyeh lakhem lerosh. 
judges 11:10	vayomeru ziqnei gil‘ad ’el yiftakh yhoh yihyeh shomeia‘ beinoteinu ’im lo khidwarekha ken na‘aseh. 
judges 11:11	vayeilekh yiftakh ‘im ziqnei gil‘ad vayasimu ha‘am ’oto ‘aleihem lerosh uleqatsin vaydaber yiftakh ’et kal dewarav lifnei yhoh bamitspah. 
judges 11:12	vayishlakh yiftakh mal’akhim ’el melekh benei ‘amon leimor mah li valakh ki wata ’eilai lehilakhem be’artsi. 
judges 11:13	vayomer melekh benei ‘amon ’el mal’akhei yiftakh ki laqakh yisra’el ’et ’artsi ba‘aloto mimitsrayim mei’arnon ve‘ad hayaboq ve‘ad hayarden ve‘atah hashiwah ’ethen beshalom. 
judges 11:14	vayosef ‘od yiftakh vayishlakh mal’akhim ’el melekh benei ‘amon. 
judges 11:15	vayomer lo koh ’amar yiftakh lo laqakh yisra’el ’et ’erets mo’aw ve’et ’erets benei ‘amon. 
judges 11:16	ki ba‘alotam mimitsrayim vayeilekh yisra’el bamidbar ‘ad yam suf vayawo qadeishah. 
judges 11:17	vayishlakh yisra’el mal’akhim ’el melekh ’edom leimor ’e‘berah na we’artsekha velo shama‘ melekh ’edom vegam ’el melekh mo’aw shalakh velo ’awah vayeishew yisra’el beqadesh. 
judges 11:18	vayeilekh bamidbar vayasaw ’et ’erets ’edom ve’et ’erets mo’aw vayawo mimizrakh shemesh le’erets mo’aw vayakhanun be‘eiwer ’arnon velo wa’u bigwul mo’aw ki ’arnon gewul mo’aw. 
judges 11:19	vayishlakh yisra’el mal’akhim ’el sikhon melekh ha’emori melekh kheshbon vayomer lo yisra’el na‘berah na we’artsekha ‘ad meqomi. 
judges 11:20	velo he’emin sikhon ’et yisra’el ‘awor bigwulo vaye’esof sikhon ’et kal ‘amo vayakhanu beyahetsah vayilakhem ‘im yisra’el. 
judges 11:21	vayiten yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’et sikhon ve’et kal ‘amo beyad yisra’el vayakum vayirash yisra’el ’et kal ’erets ha’emori yoshew ha’arets hahi. 
judges 11:22	vayireshu ’et kal gewul ha’emori mei’arnon ve‘ad hayaboq umin hamidbar ve‘ad hayarden. 
judges 11:23	ve‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’el horish ’et ha’emori mipenei ‘amo yisra’el ve’atah tirashenu. 
judges 11:24	halo ’et ’asher yorishekha kemosh ’elohekha ’oto tirash ve’et kal ’asher horish yhoh ’eloheinu mipaneinu ’oto nirash. 
judges 11:25	ve‘atah hatow tow ’atah mibalaq ben tsipor melekh mo’aw harow raw ‘im yisra’el ’im nilkhom nilkham bam. 
judges 11:26	beshewet yisra’el bekheshbon uwiwnoteha uwe‘ar‘or uwiwnoteha uwekhal he‘arim ’asher ‘al yedei ’arnon shelosh mei’ot shanah umadua‘ lo hitsaltem ba‘et hahi. 
judges 11:27	ve’anokhi lo khatati lakh ve’atah ‘oseh ’iti ra‘ah lehilakhem bi yishpot yhoh hashofet hayom ben benei yisra’el uwen benei ‘amon. 
judges 11:28	velo shama‘ melekh benei ‘amon ’el diwrei yiftakh ’asher shalakh ’eilav. 
judges 11:29	vatehi ‘al yiftakh ruakh yhoh vaya‘awor ’et hagil‘ad ve’et menasheh vaya‘awor ’et mitspeh gil‘ad umimitspeh gil‘ad ‘awar benei ‘amon.
