judges 11:30	vayidar yiftakh neder yhoh vayomar ’im naton titen ’et benei ‘amon beyadi. 
judges 11:31	vehayah hayotsei ’asher yeitsei midaltei weiti liqrati beshuwi weshalom mibenei ‘amon vehayah yhoh veha‘alitihu ‘olah. 
judges 11:32	vaya‘awor yiftakh ’el benei ‘amon lehilakhem bam vayitenem yhoh beyado. 
judges 11:33	vayakem mei‘aro‘er ve‘ad bo’akha minit ‘esrim ‘ir ve‘ad ’awel keramim makah gedolah me’od vayikane‘u benei ‘amon mipenei benei yisra’el. 
judges 11:34	vayawo yiftakh hamitspah ’el beito vehineh wito yotset liqrato wetupim uwimkholot veraq hi yekhidah ’en lo mimenu ben ’o wat. 
judges 11:35	vayhi khir’oto ’otah vayiqra‘ ’et begadav vayomer ’ahah biti hakhreia‘ hikhra‘tini ve’at hayit be‘okherai ve’anokhi patsiti fi ’el yhoh velo ’ukhal lashuw. 
judges 11:36	vatomer ’eilav ’awi patsitah ’et pikha ’el yhoh ‘aseh li ka’asher yatsa mipikha ’akharei ’asher ‘asah lekha yhoh neqamot mei’oyewekha mibenei ‘amon. 
judges 11:37	vatomer ’el ’awiha yei‘aseh li hadawar hazeh harpeh mimeni shenayim khodashim ve’eilekhah veyaradti ‘al heharim ve’ewkeh ‘al betulai ’anokhi vera‘iti verei‘otai. 
judges 11:38	vayomer leikhi vayishlakh ’otah shenei khodashim vateilekh hi verei‘oteha vateiwek ‘al betuleha ‘al heharim. 
judges 11:39	vayhi miqets shenayim khodashim vatashaw ’el ’awiha vaya‘as lah ’et nidro ’asher nadar vehi lo yade‘ah ’ish vatehi khoq beyisra’el. 
judges 11:40	miyamim yamimah teilakhnah benot yisra’el letanot lewat yiftakh hagil‘adi ’arba‘at yamim bashanah. 
judges 12:1	vayitsa‘eq ’ish ’efrayim vaya‘awor tsafonah vayomeru leyiftakh madua‘ ‘awarta lehilakhem biwnei ‘amon velanu lo qarata lalekhet ‘imakh beitekha nisrof ‘alekha ba’esh. 
judges 12:2	vayomer yiftakh ’aleihem ’ish riw hayiti ’ani ve‘ami uwenei ‘amon me’od va’ez‘aq ’etkhem velo hosha‘tem ’oti miyadam. 
judges 12:3	va’er’eh ki ’einekha moshia‘ va’asimah nafshi wekhapi va’e‘berah ’el benei ‘amon vayitenem yhoh beyadi velamah ‘alitem ’eilai hayom hazeh lehilakhem bi. 
judges 12:4	vayiqbots yiftakh ’et kal ’anshei gil‘ad vayilakhem ’et ’efrayim vayaku ’anshei gil‘ad ’et ’efrayim ki ’ameru pelitei ’efrayim ’atem gil‘ad betokh ’efrayim betokh menasheh. 
judges 12:5	vayilkod gil‘ad ’et ma‘berot hayarden le’efrayim vehayah ki yomeru pelitei ’efrayim ’e‘eworah vayomeru lo ’anshei gil‘ad ha’efrati ’atah vayomer lo. 
judges 12:6	vayomeru lo ’emar na shibolet vayomer sibolet velo yakhin ledaber ken vayokhazu ’oto vayishkhatuhu ’el ma‘berot hayarden vayipol ba‘et hahi mei’efrayim ’arba‘im ushenayim ’alef. 
judges 12:7	vayishpot yiftakh ’et yisra’el shesh shanim vayamat yiftakh hagil‘adi vayiqawer be‘arei gil‘ad. 
judges 12:8	vayishpot ’akharav ’et yisra’el ’iwtsan mibet lakhem. 
judges 12:9	vayhi lo sheloshim banim usheloshim banot shilakh hakhutsah usheloshim banot heiwi lewanav min hakhuts vayishpot ’et yisra’el shewa‘ shanim. 
judges 12:10	vayamat ’iwtsan vayiqawer bewet lakhem. 
judges 12:11	vayishpot ’akharav ’et yisra’el ’eilon hazewuloni vayishpot ’et yisra’el ‘eser shanim. 
judges 12:12	vayamat ’eilon hazewuloni vayiqawer be’ayalon be’erets zewulun. 
judges 12:13	vayishpot ’akharav ’et yisra’el ‘awdon ben hilel hapir‘atoni. 
judges 12:14	vayhi lo ’arba‘im banim usheloshim benei wanim rokhewim ‘al shiw‘im ‘ayarim vayishpot ’et yisra’el shemoneh shanim. 
judges 12:15	vayamat ‘awdon ben hilel hapir‘atoni vayiqawer befir‘aton be’erets ’efrayim behar ha‘amaleiqi. 
judges 13:1	vayosifu benei yisra’el la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayitenem yhoh beyad pelishtim ’arba‘im shanah. 
judges 13:2	vayhi ’ish ’ekhad mitsare‘ah mimishpakhat hadani ushemo manoakh ve’ishto ‘aqarah velo yaladah. 
judges 13:3	vayeira mal’akh yhoh ’el ha’ishah vayomer ’eileha hineh na ’at ‘aqarah velo yaladt veharit veyaladt ben. 
judges 13:4	ve‘atah hishameri na ve’al tishti yayin vesheikhar ve’al tokheli kal tamei. 
judges 13:5	ki hinakh harah veyoladt ben umorah lo ya‘aleh ‘al rosho ki nezir ’elohim yihyeh hana‘ar min habaten vehu yakhel lehoshia‘ ’et yisra’el miyad pelishtim. 
judges 13:6	vatawo ha’ishah vatomer le’ishah leimor ’ish ha’elohim ba ’eilai umar’eihu kemar’eh mal’akh ha’elohim nora me’od velo she’iltihu ’ei mizeh hu ve’et shemo lo higid li. 
judges 13:7	vayomer li hinakh harah veyoladt ben ve‘atah ’al tishti yayin vesheikhar ve’al tokheli kal tum’ah ki nezir ’elohim yihyeh hana‘ar min habeten ‘ad yom moto. 
judges 13:8	vaye‘tar manoakh ’el yhoh vayomar bi ’adonai ’ish ha’elohim ’asher shalakhta yawo na ‘od ’eileinu veyoreinu mah na‘aseh lana‘ar hayulad. 
judges 13:9	vayishma‘ ha’elohim beqol manoakh vayawo mal’akh ha’elohim ‘od ’el ha’ishah vehi yoshewet basadeh umanoakh ’ishah ’en ‘imah. 
judges 13:10	vatemaher ha’ishah vatarats vataged le’ishah vatomer ’eilav hineh nir’ah ’eilai ha’ish ’asher ba wayom ’eilai. 
judges 13:11	vayaqam vayeilekh manoakh ’akharei ’ishto vayawo ’el ha’ish vayomer lo ha’atah ha’ish ’asher dibarta ’el ha’ishah vayomer ’ani. 
judges 13:12	vayomer manoakh ‘atah yawo dewarekha mah yihyeh mishpat hana‘ar uma‘aseihu. 
judges 13:13	vayomer mal’akh yhoh ’el manoakh mikol ’asher ’amarti ’el ha’ishah tishamer. 
judges 13:14	mikol ’asher yeitsei migefen hayayin lo tokhal veyayin vesheikhar ’al teishet vekhal tum’ah ’al tokhal kol ’asher tsivitiha tishmor. 
judges 13:15	vayomer manoakh ’el mal’akh yhoh na‘tserah na ’otakh vena‘aseh lefanekha gedi ‘izim. 
judges 13:16	vayomer mal’akh yhoh ’el manoakh ’im ta‘tsereini lo ’okhal belakhmekha ve’im ta‘aseh ‘olah yhoh ta‘alenah ki lo yada‘ manoakh ki mal’akh yhoh hu. 
judges 13:17	vayomer manoakh ’el mal’akh yhoh mi shemekha ki yawo diwreikha dewarekha vekhibadnukha. 
judges 13:18	vayomer lo mal’akh yhoh lamah zeh tish’al lishmi vehu feli. 
judges 13:19	vayiqakh manoakh ’et gedi ha‘izim ve’et haminkhah vaya‘al ‘al hatsur yhoh umafli la‘asot umanoakh ve’ishto ro’im. 
judges 13:20	vayhi wa‘alot halahaw mei‘al hamizbeiakh hashamaymah vaya‘al mal’akh yhoh belahaw hamizbeiakh umanoakh ve’ishto ro’im vayipelu ‘al peneihem ’aretsah. 
judges 13:21	velo yasaf ‘od mal’akh yhoh leheira’oh ’el manoakh ve’el ’ishto ’az yada‘ manoakh ki mal’akh yhoh hu. 
judges 13:22	vayomer manoakh ’el ’ishto mot namut ki ’elohim ra’inu. 
judges 13:23	vatomer lo ’ishto lu khafets yhoh lahamiteinu lo laqakh miyadeinu ‘olah uminkhah velo her’anu ’et kal ’eleh vekha‘et lo hishmi‘anu kazot. 
judges 13:24	vateiled ha’ishah ben vatiqra ’et shemo shimshon vayigdal hana‘ar vaywarekheihu yhoh. 
judges 13:25	vatakhel ruakh yhoh lefa‘amo bemakhaneh dan ben tsare‘ah uwen ’eshta’ol. 
judges 14:1	vayeired shimshon timnatah vayar ’ishah betimnatah mibenot pelishtim. 
judges 14:2	vaya‘al vayaged le’awiv ule’imo vayomer ’ishah ra’iti wetimnatah mibenot pelishtim ve‘atah qekhu ’otah li le’ishah. 
judges 14:3	vayomer lo ’awiv ve’imo ha’en biwnot ’akhekha uwekhal ‘ami ’ishah ki ’atah holekh laqakhat ’ishah mipelishtim ha‘areilim vayomer shimshon ’el ’awiv ’otah qakh li ki hi yasherah we‘einai. 
judges 14:4	ve’awiv ve’imo lo yade‘u ki yhoh hi ki to’anah hu mewaqesh mipelishtim uwa‘et hahi pelishtim moshelim beyisra’el. 
judges 14:5	vayeired shimshon ve’awiv ve’imo timnatah vayawo’u ‘ad karmei timnatah vehineh kefir ’arayot sho’eg liqrato. 
judges 14:6	vatitslakh ‘alav ruakh yhoh vayshase‘eihu keshasa‘ hagedi ume’umah ’en beyado velo higid le’awiv ule’imo ’et ’asher ‘asah. 
judges 14:7	vayeired vaydaber la’ishah vatishar be‘einei shimshon. 
judges 14:8	vayashaw miyamim leqakhtah vayasar lir’ot ’et mapelet ha’aryeh vehineh ‘adat deworim bigviyat ha’aryeh udewash. 
judges 14:9	vayirdeihu ’el kapav vayeilekh halokh ve’akhol vayeilekh ’el ’awiv ve’el ’imo vayiten lahem vayokheilu velo higid lahem ki migeviyat ha’aryeh radah hadewash. 
judges 14:10	vayeired ’awihu ’el ha’ishah vaya‘as sham shimshon mishteh ki ken ya‘asu habakhurim. 
judges 14:11	vayhi kir’otam ’oto vayiqkhu sheloshim meirei‘im vayihyu ’ito. 
judges 14:12	vayomer lahem shimshon ’akhudah na lakhem khidah ’im haged tagidu ’otah li shiw‘at yemei hamishteh umetsatem venatati lakhem sheloshim sedinim usheloshim khalifot begadim. 
judges 14:13	ve’im lo tukhelu lehagid li unetatem ’atem li sheloshim sedinim usheloshim khalifot begadim vayomeru lo khudah khidatekha venishma‘enah. 
judges 14:14	vayomer lahem meiha’okhel yatsa ma’akhal umei‘az yatsa matoq velo yakhelu lehagid hakhidah sheloshet yamim. 
judges 14:15	vayhi bayom hashewi‘i vayomeru le’eishet shimshon pati ’et ’ishekh veyaged lanu ’et hakhidah pen nisrof ’otakh ve’et bet ’awikh ba’esh halyaresheinu qeratem lanu halo. 
judges 14:16	vateiwek ’eishet shimshon ‘alav vatomer raq seneitani velo ’ahawtani hakhidah khadta liwnei ‘ami veli lo higadtah vayomer lah hineh le’awi ule’imi lo higadti velakh ’agid. 
judges 14:17	vateiwek ‘alav shiw‘at hayamim ’asher hayah lahem hamishteh vayhi bayom hashewi‘i vayaged lah ki hetsiqathu vataged hakhidah liwnei ‘amah. 
judges 14:18	vayomeru lo ’anshei ha‘ir bayom hashewi‘i beterem yawo hakharsah mah matoq midewash umeh ‘az mei’ari vayomer lahem lulei kharashtem be‘eglati lo metsatem khidati. 
judges 14:19	vatitslakh ‘alav ruakh yhoh vayeired ’ashqelon vayakh meihem sheloshim ’ish vayiqakh ’et khalitsotam vayiten hakhalifot lemagidei hakhidah vayikhar ’apo vaya‘al bet ’awihu. 
judges 14:20	vatehi ’eishet shimshon lemeirei‘eihu ’asher rei‘ah lo. 
judges 15:1	vayhi miyamim bimei qetsir khitim vayifqod shimshon ’et ’ishto bigdi ‘izim vayomer ’awo’ah ’el ’ishti hekhaderah velo netano ’awiha lawo. 
judges 15:2	vayomer ’awiha ’amor ’amarti ki sano seneitah va’etenenah lemeirei‘ekha halo ’akhotah haqetanah towah mimenah tehi na lekha takhteha. 
judges 15:3	vayomer lahem shimshon niqeiti hapa‘am mipelishtim ki ‘oseh ’ani ‘imam ra‘ah. 
judges 15:4	vayeilekh shimshon vayilkod shelosh mei’ot shu‘alim vayiqakh lapidim vayefen zanaw ’el zanaw vayasem lapid ’ekhad ben shenei hazenawot batavekh. 
judges 15:5	vayaw‘er ’esh balapidim vayshalakh beqamot pelishtim vayaw‘er migadish ve‘ad qamah ve‘ad kerem zayit. 
judges 15:6	vayomeru felishtim mi ‘asah zot vayomeru shimshon khatan hatimni ki laqakh ’et ’ishto vayitenah lemeirei‘eihu vaya‘alu felishtim vayisrefu ’otah ve’et ’awiha ba’esh. 
judges 15:7	vayomer lahem shimshon ’im ta‘asun kazot ki ’im niqamti wakhem ve’akhar ’ekhdal. 
judges 15:8	vayakh ’otam shoq ‘al yarekh makah gedolah vayeired vayeishew bis‘if sela‘ ‘eitam. 
judges 15:9	vaya‘alu felishtim vayakhanu bihudah vayinateshu balekhi. 
judges 15:10	vayomeru ’ish yehudah lamah ‘alitem ‘aleinu vayomeru le’esor ’et shimshon ‘alinu la‘asot lo ka’asher ‘asah lanu. 
judges 15:11	vayeiredu sheloshet ’alafim ’ish mihudah ’el se‘if sela‘ ‘eitam vayomeru leshimshon halo yada‘ta ki moshelim banu pelishtim umah zot ‘asita lanu vayomer lahem ka’asher ‘asu li ken ‘asiti lahem. 
judges 15:12	vayomeru lo le’esarekha yaradnu letitekha beyad pelishtim vayomer lahem shimshon hishawe‘u li pen tifge‘un bi ’atem. 
judges 15:13	vayomeru lo leimor lo ki ’asor ne’esarekha unetanukha weyadam vehamet lo nemitekha vaya’asruhu bishnayim ‘awotim khadashim vaya‘aluhu min hasala‘. 
judges 15:14	hu wa ‘ad lekhi ufelishtim heiri‘u liqrato vatitslakh ‘alav ruakh yhoh vatihyenah ha‘awotim ’asher ‘al zero‘otav kapishtim ’asher ba‘aru wa’esh vayimasu ’esurav mei‘al yadav. 
judges 15:15	vayimtsa lekhi khamor teriyah vayishlakh yado vayiqakheha vayakh bah ’elef ’ish. 
judges 15:16	vayomer shimshon bilkhi hakhamor khamor khamoratayim bilkhi hakhamor hikeiti ’elef ’ish. 
judges 15:17	vayhi kekhaloto ledaber vayashlekh halekhi miyado vayiqra lamaqom hahu ramat lekhi. 
judges 15:18	vayitsma me’od vayiqra ’el yhoh vayomar ’atah natata weyad ‘awdekha ’et hateshu‘ah hagedolah hazot ve‘atah ’amut batsama venafalti beyad ha‘areilim. 
judges 15:19	vayiwqa‘ ’elohim ’et hamakhtesh ’asher balekhi vayeitse’u mimenu mayim vayeishet vatashaw rukho vayekhi ‘al ken qara shemah ‘en haqorei ’asher balekhi ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
judges 15:20	vayishpot ’et yisra’el bimei felishtim ‘esrim shanah. 
judges 16:1	vayeilekh shimshon ‘azatah vayar sham ’ishah zonah vayawo ’eileha. 
judges 16:2	la‘azatim leimor ba shimshon henah vayasobu vaye’erwu lo khal halaylah besha‘ar ha‘ir vayitkhareshu khal halaylah leimor ‘ad ’or haboqer vahargenuhu 
judges 16:3	vayishkaw shimshon ‘ad khatsi halaylah vayaqam bakhatsi halaylah vaye’ekhoz bedaltot sha‘ar ha‘ir uwishtei hamezuzot vayisa‘em ‘im haberiakh vayasem ‘al keteifav vaya‘alem ’el rosh hahar ’asher ‘al penei khewron. 
judges 16:4	vayhi ’akharei khen vaye’ehaw ’ishah benakhal soreq ushemah delilah. 
judges 16:5	vaya‘alu ’eileha sarnei felishtim vayomeru lah pati ’oto ure’i bameh kokho gadol uwameh nukhal lo va’asarnuhu le‘anoto va’anakhnu nitan lakh ’ish ’elef umei’ah kasef. 
judges 16:6	vatomer delilah ’el shimshon hagidah na li bameh kokhakha gadol uwameh tei’aser le‘anotekha. 
judges 16:7	vayomer ’eileha shimshon ’im ya’asruni beshiw‘ah yetarim lakhim ’asher lo khorawu vekhaliti vehayiti ke’akhad ha’adam. 
judges 16:8	vaya‘alu lah sarnei felishtim shiw‘ah yetarim lakhim ’asher lo khorawu vata’asreihu bahem. 
judges 16:9	veha’orew yoshew lah bakheder vatomer ’eilav pelishtim ‘alekha shimshon vaynateq ’et haytarim ka’asher yinateq petil hane‘oret baharikho ’esh velo noda‘ kokho. 
judges 16:10	vatomer delilah ’el shimshon hineh heitalta bi vatedaber ’eilai kezawim ‘atah hagidah na li bameh tei’aser. 
judges 16:11	vayomer ’eileha ’im ’asor ya’asruni ba‘awotim khadashim ’asher lo na‘asah wahem melakhah vekhaliti vehayiti ke’akhad ha’adam. 
judges 16:12	vatiqakh delilah ‘awotim khadashim vata’asreihu wahem vatomer ’eilav pelishtim ‘alekha shimshon veha’orew yoshew bekhader vaynateqem mei‘al zero‘otav kakhut. 
judges 16:13	vatomer delilah ’el shimshon ‘ad henah heitalta bi vatedaber ’eilai kezawim hagidah li bameh tei’aser vayomer ’eileha ’im ta’argi ’et shewa‘ makhlefot roshi ‘im hamasakhet. 
judges 16:14	vatitqa‘ bayated vatomer ’eilav pelishtim ‘alekha shimshon vayiqats mishenato vayisa‘ ’et haytad ha’ereg ve’et hamasakhet. 
judges 16:15	vatomer ’eilav ’ekh tomar ’ahawtikh velibekha ’en ’iti zeh shalosh pe‘amim heitalta bi velo higadta li bameh kokhakha gadol. 
judges 16:16	vayhi ki heitsiqah lo widwareha kal hayamim vate’alatseihu vatiqtsar nafsho lamut. 
judges 16:17	vayaged lah ’et kal libo vayomer lah morah lo ‘alah ‘al roshi ki nezir ’elohim ’ani mibeten ’imi ’im gulakhti vesar mimeni khokhi vekhaliti vehayiti kekhal ha’adam. 
judges 16:18	vateire delilah ki higid lah ’et kal libo vatishlakh vatiqra lesarnei felishtim leimor ‘alu hapa‘am ki higid lah li ’et kal libo ve‘alu ’eileha sarnei felishtim vaya‘alu hakesef beyadam. 
judges 16:19	vateyasheneihu ‘al birkeha vatiqra la’ish vategalakh ’et shewa‘ makhlefot rosho vatakhel le‘anoto vayasar kokho mei‘alav. 
judges 16:20	vatomer pelishtim ‘alekha shimshon vayiqats mishenato vayomer ’eitsei kefa‘am befa‘am ve’ina‘er vehu lo yada‘ ki yhoh sar mei‘alav. 
judges 16:21	vayokhazuhu felishtim vaynaqeru ’et ‘einav vayoridu ’oto ‘azatah vaya’asruhu bankhushtayim vayhi tokhen bewet ha’asirim ha’asurim. 
judges 16:22	vayakhel se‘ar rosho letsameiakh ka’asher gulakh. 
judges 16:23	vesarnei felishtim ne’esfu lizboakh zewakh gadol ledagon ’eloheihem ulesimkhah vayomeru natan ’eloheinu beyadeinu ’et shimshon ’oyweinu. 
judges 16:24	vayir’u ’oto ha‘am vayhalelu ’et ’eloheihem ki ’ameru natan ’eloheinu weyadeinu ’et ’oyweinu ve’et makhariw ’artseinu va’asher hirbah ’et khalaleinu. 
judges 16:25	vayhi ki tow ketow libam vayomeru qir’u leshimshon visakheq lanu vayiqre’u leshimshon mibet ha’asirim ha’asurim vaytsakheq lifneihem vaya‘amidu ’oto ben ha‘amudim. 
judges 16:26	vayomer shimshon ’el hana‘ar hamakhaziq beyado hanikhah ’oti vaheimisheini vahamisheini ’et ha‘amudim ’asher habayit nakhon ‘aleihem ve’esha‘en ‘aleihem. 
judges 16:27	vehabayit malei ha’anashim vehanashim veshamah kol sarnei felishtim ve‘al hagag kishloshet ’alafim ’ish ve’ishah haro’im biskhoq shimshon. 
judges 16:28	vayiqra shimshon ’el yhoh vayomar ’adonai yhoh zakhereini na vekhazeqeini na ’akh hapa‘am hazeh ha’elohim ve’inaqemah neqam ’akhat mishetei ‘einai mipelishtim. 
judges 16:29	vayilpot shimshon ’et shenei ‘amudei hatavekh ’asher habayit nakhon ‘aleihem vayisamekh ‘aleihem ’ekhad bimino ve’ekhad bismolo. 
judges 16:30	vayomer shimshon tamot nafshi ‘im pelishtim vayet bekhoakh vayipol habayit ‘al haseranim ve‘al kal ha‘am ’asher bo vayihyu hameitim ’asher heimit bemoto rabim mei’asher heimit bekhayav. 
judges 16:31	vayeiredu ’ekhav vekhal bet ’awihu vayis’u ’oto vaya‘alu vayiqberu ’oto ben tsare‘ah uwen ’eshta’ol beqewer manoakh ’awiv vehu shafat ’et yisra’el ‘esrim shanah. 
judges 17:1	vayhi ’ish meihar ’efrayim ushemo mikhayehu. 
judges 17:2	vayomer le’imo ’elef umei’ah hakesef ’asher luqakh lakh ve’ati ve’at ’alit vegam ’amart be’azenai hineh hakesef ’iti ’ani leqakhtiv vatomer ’imo barukh beni yhoh. 
judges 17:3	vayashew ’et ’elef umei’ah hakesef le’imo vatomer ’imo haqdesh hiqdashti ’et hakesef yhoh miyadi liwni la‘asot pesel umaseikhah ve‘atah ’ashiwenu lakh. 
judges 17:4	vayashew ’et hakesef le’imo vatiqakh ’imo matayim kesef vatiteneihu latsoref vaya‘aseihu pesel umaseikhah vayhi bewet mikhayehu. 
judges 17:5	veha’ish mikhah lo bet ’elohim vaya‘as ’eifod uterafim vaymalei ’et yad ’akhad mibanav vayhi lo lekhohen. 
judges 17:6	bayamim hahem ’en melekh beyisra’el ’ish hayashar be‘einav ya‘aseh. 
judges 17:7	vayhi na‘ar mibet lekhem yehudah mimishpakhat yehudah vehu leivi vehu gar sham. 
judges 17:8	vayeilekh ha’ish meiha‘ir mibet lekhem yehudah lagur ba’asher yimtsa vayawo har ’efrayim ‘ad bet mikhah la‘asot darko. 
judges 17:9	vayomer lo mikhah mei’ayin tawo vayomer ’eilav leivi ’anokhi mibet lekhem yehudah ve’anokhi holekh lagur ba’asher ’emtsa. 
judges 17:10	vayomer lo mikhah shewah ‘imadi vehyeh li le’aw ulekhohen ve’anokhi ’eten lekha ‘aseret kesef layamim ve‘eirekh begadim umikhyatekha vayeilekh haleivi. 
judges 17:11	vayo’el haleivi lashewet ’et ha’ish vayhi hana‘ar lo ke’akhad mibanav. 
judges 17:12	vaymalei mikhah ’et yad haleivi vayhi lo hana‘ar lekhohen vayhi bewet mikhah. 
judges 17:13	vayomer mikhah ‘atah yada‘ti ki yeitiw yhoh li ki hayah li haleivi lekhohen. 
judges 18:1	bayamim hahem ’en melekh beyisra’el uwayamim hahem sheiwet hadani mewaqesh lo nakhalah lashewet ki lo nafelah lo ‘ad hayom hahu betokh shiwtei yisra’el benakhalah. 
judges 18:2	vayishlekhu wenei dan mimishpakhtam khamishah ’anashim miqtsotam ’anashim benei khayil mitsare‘ah umei’eshta’ol leragel ’et ha’arets ulekhaqerah vayomeru ’aleihem lekhu khiqru ’et ha’arets vayawo’u har ’efrayim ‘ad bet mikhah vayalinu sham. 
judges 18:3	hemah ‘im bet mikhah vehemah hikiru ’et qol hana‘ar haleivi vayasuru sham vayomeru lo mi hewi’akha halom umah ’atah ‘oseh bazeh umah lekha foh. 
judges 18:4	vayomer ’aleihem kazoh vekhazeh ‘asah li mikhah vayiskereini va’ehi lo lekhohen. 
judges 18:5	vayomeru lo she’al na weilohim veneide‘ah hatatsliakh darkeinu ’asher ’anakhnu holekhim ‘aleha. 
judges 18:6	vayomer lahem hakohen lekhu leshalom nokhakh yhoh darkekhem ’asher teilekhu wah. 
judges 18:7	vayeilekhu khameishet ha’anashim vayawo’u layeshah vayir’u ’et ha‘am ’asher beqirbah yoshewet lawetakh kemishpat tsidonim shoqet uwoteiakh ve’en makhlim dawar ba’arets yoresh ‘etser urekhoqim hemah mitsidonim vedawar ’en lahem ‘im ’adam. 
judges 18:8	vayawo’u ’el ’akheihem tsare‘ah ve’eshta’ol vayomeru lahem ’akheihem mah ’atem. 
judges 18:9	vayomeru qumah vena‘aleh ‘aleihem ki ra’inu ’et ha’arets vehineh towah me’od ve’atem makhshim ’al tei‘atselu lalekhet lawo lareshet ’et ha’arets. 
judges 18:10	kewo’akhem tawo’u ’el ‘am boteiakh veha’arets rakhawat yadayim ki netanah ’elohim beyedkhem maqom ’asher ’en sham makhsor kal dawar ’asher ba’arets. 
judges 18:11	vayis‘u misham mimishpakhat hadani mitsare‘ah umei’eshta’ol shesh mei’ot ’ish khagur kelei milkhamah. 
judges 18:12	vaya‘alu vayakhanu beqiryat ye‘arim bihudah ‘al ken qare’u lamaqom hahu makhaneh dan ‘ad hayom hazeh hineh ’akharei qiryat ye‘arim. 
judges 18:13	vaya‘awru misham har ’efrayim vayawo’u ‘ad bet mikhah. 
judges 18:14	vaya‘anu khameishet ha’anashim haholekhim leragel ’et ha’arets layish vayomeru ’el ’akheihem hayda‘tem ki yesh babatim ha’eleh ’eifod uterafim ufesel umaseikhah ve‘atah de‘u mah ta‘asu. 
judges 18:15	vayasuru shamah vayawo’u ’el bet hana‘ar haleivi bet mikhah vayish’alu lo leshalom. 
judges 18:16	veshesh mei’ot ’ish khagurim kelei milkhamtam nitsawim petakh hasha‘ar ’asher mibenei dan. 
judges 18:17	vaya‘alu khameishet ha’anashim haholekhim leragel ’et ha’arets ba’u shamah laqekhu ’et hapesel ve’et ha’eifod ve’et haterafim ve’et hamaseikhah vehakohen nitsaw petakh hasha‘ar veshesh mei’ot ha’ish hekhagur kelei hamilkhamah. 
judges 18:18	ve’eleh ba’u bet mikhah vayiqkhu ’et pesel ha’eifod ve’et haterafim ve’et hamaseikhah vayomer ’aleihem hakohen mah ’atem ‘osim. 
judges 18:19	vayomeru lo hakharesh sim yadekha ‘al pikha velekh ‘imanu vehyeh lanu le’aw ulekhohen hatow heyotkha khohen lewet ’ish ’ekhad ’o heyotkha khohen lesheiwet ulemishpakhah beyisra’el. 
judges 18:20	vayitaw lew hakohen vayiqakh ’et ha’eifod ve’et haterafim ve’et hapasel vayawo beqerew ha‘am. 
judges 18:21	vayifnu vayeileikhu vayasimu ’et hataf ve’et hamiqneh ve’et hakewudah lifneihem. 
judges 18:22	hemah hirkhiqu mibet mikhah veha’anashim ’asher babatim ’asher ‘im bet mikhah niz‘aqu vayadbiqu ’et benei dan. 
judges 18:23	vayiqre’u ’el benei dan vayasebu peneihem vayomeru lemikhah mah lekha ki niz‘aqeta. 
judges 18:24	vayomer ’et ’elohai ’asher ‘asiti leqakhtem ve’et hakohen vateilekhu umah li ‘od umah zeh tomeru ’eilai mah lakh. 
judges 18:25	vayomeru ’eilav benei dan ’al tashma‘ qolkha ‘imanu pen yifge‘u wakhem ’anashim marei nefesh ve’asaftah nafshekha venefesh beitekha. 
judges 18:26	vayeilekhu wenei dan ledarkam vayar mikhah ki khazaqim hemah mimenu vayifen vayashaw ’el beito. 
judges 18:27	vehemah laqekhu ’et ’asher ‘asah mikhah ve’et hakohen ’asher hayah lo vayawo’u ‘al layish ‘al ‘am shoqet uwoteiakh vayaku ’otam lefi kharew ve’et ha‘ir sarefu wa’esh. 
judges 18:28	ve’en matsil ki rekhoqah hi mitsidon vedawar ’en lahem ‘im ’adam vehi ba‘eimeq ’asher lewet rekhow vayiwnu ’et ha‘ir vayeishewu wah. 
judges 18:29	vayiqre’u shem ha‘ir dan beshem dan ’awihem ’asher yulad leyisra’el ve’ulam layish shem ha‘ir larishonah. 
judges 18:30	vayaqimu lahem benei dan ’et hapasel vihonatan ben geireshom ben menasheh hu uwanav hayu khohanim lesheiwet hadani ‘ad yom gelot ha’arets. 
judges 18:31	vayasimu lahem ’et pesel mikhah ’asher ‘asah kal yemei heyot bet ha’elohim beshiloh. 
judges 19:1	vayhi bayamim hahem umelekh ’en beyisra’el vayhi ’ish leivi gar beyarketei har ’efrayim vayiqakh lo ’ishah filegesh mibet lekhem yehudah. 
judges 19:2	vatizneh ‘alav pilagsho vateilekh mei’ito ’el bet ’awiha ’el bet lekhem yehudah vatehi sham yamim ’arba‘ah khodashim. 
judges 19:3	vayaqam ’ishah vayeilekh ’akhareha ledaber ‘al libah lahashiwo lahashiwah vena‘aro ‘imo vetsemed khamorim vatewi’eihu bet ’awiha vayir’eihu ’awi hana‘arah vayismakh liqrato. 
judges 19:4	vayekhezaq bo khoteno ’awi hana‘arah vayeishew ’ito sheloshet yamim vayokhelu vayishtu vayalinu sham. 
judges 19:5	vayhi bayom harewi‘i vayashkimu waboqer vayaqam lalekhet vayomer ’awi hana‘arah ’el khatano se‘ad libekha pat lekhem ve’akhar teileikhu. 
judges 19:6	vayeishewu vayokhelu sheneihem yakhdav vayishtu vayomer ’awi hana‘arah ’el ha’ish ho’el na velin veyitaw libekha. 
judges 19:7	vayaqam ha’ish lalekhet vayiftsar bo khoteno vayashaw vayalen sham. 
judges 19:8	vayashkem baboqer bayom hakhamishi lalekhet vayomer ’awi hana‘arah se‘ad na lewawekha vehitmahmehu ‘ad netot hayom vayokhelu sheneihem. 
judges 19:9	vayaqam ha’ish lalekhet hu ufilagsho vena‘aro vayomer lo khoteno ’awi hana‘arah hineh na rafah hayom la‘arow linu na hineh khanot hayom lin poh veyitaw lewawekha vehishkamtem makhar ledarkekhem vehalakhta le’ohalekha. 
judges 19:10	velo ’awah ha’ish lalun vayaqam vayeilekh vayawo ‘ad nokhakh yewus hi yerushalim ve‘imo tsemed khamorim khawushim ufilagsho ‘imo. 
judges 19:11	hem ‘im yewus vehayom rad me’od vayomer hana‘ar ’el ’adonav lekhah na venasurah ’el ‘ir haywusi hazot venalin bah. 
judges 19:12	vayomer ’eilav ’adonav lo nasur ’el ‘ir nakheri ’asher lo mibenei yisra’el henah ve‘awarnu ‘ad giw‘ah. 
judges 19:13	vayomer lena‘aro lekha veniqrewah be’akhad hameqomot velanu wagiw‘ah ’o waramah. 
judges 19:14	vaya‘awru vayeileikhu vatawo lahem hashemesh ’eitsel hagiw‘ah ’asher lewinyamin. 
judges 19:15	vayasuru sham lawo lalun bagiw‘ah vayawo vayeishew birkhow ha‘ir ve’en ’ish me’asef ’otam habaytah lalun. 
judges 19:16	vehineh ’ish zaqen ba min ma‘aseihu min hasadeh ba‘erew veha’ish meihar ’efrayim vehu gar bagiw‘ah ve’anshei hamaqom benei yemini. 
judges 19:17	vayisa ‘einav vayar ’et ha’ish ha’oreiakh birkhow ha‘ir vayomer ha’ish hazaqen ’anah teilekh umei’ayin tawo. 
judges 19:18	vayomer ’eilav ‘owerim ’anakhnu mibet lekhem yehudah ‘ad yarketei har ’efrayim misham ’anokhi va’eilekh ‘ad bet lekhem yehudah ve’et bet yhoh ’ani holekh ve’en ’ish me’asef ’oti habayetah. 
judges 19:19	vegam tewen gam mispo yesh lakhamoreinu vegam lekhem vayayin yesh li vela’amatekha velana‘ar ‘im ‘awadekha ’en makhsor kal dawar. 
judges 19:20	vayomer ha’ish hazaqen shalom lakh raq kal makhsorkha ‘alai raq barekhow ’al talan. 
judges 19:21	vaywi’eihu leweito vayibol lakhamorim vayirkhatsu ragleihem vayokhelu vayishtu. 
judges 19:22	hemah meitiwim ’et libam vehineh ’anshei ha‘ir ’anshei wenei weliya‘al nasabu ’et habayit mitdapeqim ‘al hadalet vayomeru ’el ha’ish ba‘al habayit hazaqen leimor hotsei ’et ha’ish ’asher ba ’el beitekha veneida‘enu. 
judges 19:23	vayeitsei ’aleihem ha’ish ba‘al habayit vayomer ’aleihem ’al ’akhai ’al tarei‘u na ’akharei ’asher ba ha’ish hazeh ’al beiti ’al ta‘asu ’et hanewalah hazot. 
judges 19:24	hineh witi habetulah ufilagsheihu ’otsi’ah na ’otam ve‘anu ’otam va‘asu lahem hatow be‘eineikhem vela’ish hazeh lo ta‘asu dewar hanewalah hazot. 
judges 19:25	velo ’awu ha’anashim lishmoa‘ lo vayakhazeq ha’ish befilagsho vayotsei ’aleihem hakhuts vayeide‘u ’otah vayit‘alelu wah kal halaylah ‘ad haboqer vayshalekhuha ba‘alot ka‘alot hashakhar. 
judges 19:26	vatawo ha’ishah lifnot haboqer vatipol petakh bet ha’ish ’asher ’adoneha sham ‘ad ha’or. 
judges 19:27	vayaqam ’adoneha baboqer vayiftakh daltot habayit vayeitsei lalekhet ledarko vehineh ha’ishah filagsho nofelet petakh habayit veyadeha ‘al hasaf. 
judges 19:28	vayomer ’eileha qumi veneileikhah ve’en ‘oneh vayiqakheha ‘al hakhamor vayaqam ha’ish vayeilekh limqomo. 
judges 19:29	vayawo ’el beito vayiqakh ’et hama’akhelet vayakhazeq befilagsho vaynatekheha la‘atsameha lishnem ‘asar netakhim vayshalekheha bekhol gewul yisra’el. 
judges 19:30	vehayah khal haro’eh ve’amar lo nihyetah velo nir’atah kazot lemiyom ‘alot benei yisra’el mei’erets mitsrayim ‘ad hayom hazeh simu lakhem ‘aleha ‘utsu vedabeiru. 
judges 20:1	vayeitse’u kal benei yisra’el vatiqahel ha‘eidah ke’ish ’ekhad lemidan ve‘ad be’er shewa‘ ve’erets hagil‘ad ’el yhoh hamitspah. 
judges 20:2	vayityatsewu pinot kal ha‘am kol shiwtei yisra’el biqhal ‘am ha’elohim ’arba‘ mei’ot ’elef ’ish ragli sholef kharew. 
judges 20:3	vayishme‘u benei winyamin ki ‘alu wenei yisra’el hamitspah vayomeru benei yisra’el daberu ’eikhah nihyetah hara‘ah hazot. 
judges 20:4	vaya‘an ha’ish haleivi ’ish ha’ishah hanirtsakhah vayomar hagiw‘atah ’asher lewinyamin bati ’ani ufilagshi lalun. 
judges 20:5	vayaqumu ‘alai ba‘alei hagiw‘ah vayasobu ‘alai ’et habayit layelah ’oti dimu laharog ve’et pilagshi ‘inu vatamot. 
judges 20:6	va’okhez befilagshi va’anatekheha va’ashalekheha bekhal sedeh nakhalat yisra’el ki ‘asu zimah unewalah beyisra’el. 
judges 20:7	hineh khulekhem benei yisra’el hawu lakhem dawar ve‘eitsah halom. 
judges 20:8	vayaqam kal ha‘am ke’ish ’ekhad leimor lo neilekh ’ish le’aholo velo nasur ’ish leweito. 
judges 20:9	ve‘atah zeh hadawar ’asher na‘aseh lagiw‘ah ‘aleha begoral. 
judges 20:10	velaqakhnu ‘asarah ’anashim lamei’ah lekhol shiwtei yisra’el umei’ah la’elef ve’elef larewawah laqakhat tseidah la‘am la‘asot lewo’am legewa‘ binyamin kekhal hanewalah ’asher ‘asah beyisra’el. 
judges 20:11	vayei’asef kal ’ish yisra’el ’el ha‘ir ke’ish ’ekhad khaweirim. 
judges 20:12	vayishlekhu shiwtei yisra’el ’anashim bekhal shiwtei winyamin leimor mah hara‘ah hazot ’asher nihyetah bakhem. 
judges 20:13	ve‘atah tenu ’et ha’anashim benei weliya‘al ’asher bagiw‘ah unemitem unewa‘arah ra‘ah miyisra’el velo ’awu benei binyamin lishmoa‘ beqol ’akheihem benei yisra’el. 
judges 20:14	vayei’asefu wenei winyamin min he‘arim hagiw‘atah latset lamilkhamah ‘im benei yisra’el. 
judges 20:15	vayitpaqedu wenei winyamin bayom hahu meihe‘arim ‘esrim veshishah ’elef ’ish sholef kharew lewad miyoshewei hagiw‘ah hitpaqedu shewa‘ mei’ot ’ish bakhur. 
judges 20:16	mikol ha‘am hazeh shewa‘ mei’ot ’ish bakhur ’iter yad yemino kal zeh qoleia‘ ba’ewen ’el hasa‘arah velo yakhati. 
judges 20:17	ve’ish yisra’el hitpaqedu lewad mibinyamin ’arba‘ mei’ot ’elef ’ish sholef kharew kal zeh ’ish milkhamah. 
judges 20:18	vayaqumu vaya‘alu wet ’el vayish’alu weilohim vayomeru benei yisra’el mi ya‘aleh lanu watekhilah lamilkhamah ‘im benei winyamin vayomer yhoh yehudah watekhilah. 
judges 20:19	vayaqumu wenei yisra’el baboqer vayakhanu ‘al hagiw‘ah. 
judges 20:20	vayeitsei ’ish yisra’el lamilkhamah ‘im binyamin vaya‘arkhu ’itam ’ish yisra’el milkhamah ’el hagiw‘ah. 
judges 20:21	vayeitse’u wenei winyamin min hagiw‘ah vayashkhitu weyisra’el bayom hahu shenayim ve‘esrim ’elef ’ish ’aretsah. 
judges 20:22	vayitkhazeq ha‘am ’ish yisra’el vayosifu la‘arokh milkhamah bamaqom ’asher ‘arekhu sham bayom harishon. 
judges 20:23	vaya‘alu wenei yisra’el vayiwku lifnei yhoh ‘ad ha‘erew vayish’alu yhoh leimor ha’osif lageshet lamilkhamah ‘im benei winyamin ’akhi vayomer yhoh ‘alu ’eilav. 
judges 20:24	vayiqrewu wenei yisra’el ’el benei winyamin bayom hasheini. 
judges 20:25	vayeitsei winyamin liqratam min hagiw‘ah bayom hasheini vayashkhitu wiwnei yisra’el ‘od shemonat ‘asar ’elef ’ish ’aretsah kal ’eleh sholefei kharew. 
judges 20:26	vaya‘alu khal benei yisra’el vekhal ha‘am vayawo’u wet ’el vayiwku vayeishewu sham lifnei yhoh vayatsumu wayom hahu ‘ad ha‘arew vaya‘alu ‘olot ushelamim lifnei yhoh. 
judges 20:27	vayish’alu wenei yisra’el yhoh vesham ’aron berit ha’elohim bayamim hahem. 
judges 20:28	ufinekhas ben ’el‘azar ben ’aharon ‘omed lefanav bayamim hahem leimor ha’osif ‘od latset lamilkhamah ‘im benei winyamin ’akhi ’im ’ekhdal vayomer yhoh ‘alu ki makhar ’etenenu weyadekha. 
judges 20:29	vayasem yisra’el ’orewim ’el hagiw‘ah sawiw. 
judges 20:30	vaya‘alu wenei yisra’el ’el benei winyamin bayom hashelishi vaya‘arkhu ’el hagiw‘ah kefa‘am befa‘am. 
judges 20:31	vayeitse’u wenei winyamin liqrat ha‘am hanetequ min ha‘ir vayakhelu lehakot meiha‘am khalalim kefa‘am befa‘am bamsilot ’asher ’akhat ‘olah wet ’el ve’akhat giw‘atah basadeh kishloshim ’ish beyisra’el. 
judges 20:32	vayomeru benei winyamin nigafim hem lefaneinu kewarishonah uwenei yisra’el ’ameru nanusah unetaqenuhu min ha‘ir ’el hamsilot. 
judges 20:33	vekhol ’ish yisra’el qamu mimeqomo vaya‘arkhu bewa‘al tamar ve’orew yisra’el meigiakh mimeqomo mima‘areh gawa‘. 
judges 20:34	vayawo’u mineged lagiw‘ah ‘aseret ’alafim ’ish bakhur mikal yisra’el vehamilkhamah kaweidah vehem lo yade‘u ki noga‘at ‘aleihem hara‘ah. 
judges 20:35	vayigof yhoh ’et binyamin lifnei yisra’el vayashkhitu wenei yisra’el bewinyamin bayom hahu ‘esrim vakhamishah ’elef umei’ah ’ish kal ’eleh sholef kharew. 
judges 20:36	vayir’u wenei winyamin ki nigafu vayitenu ’ish yisra’el maqom lewinyamin ki watekhu ’el ha’orew ’asher samu ’el hagiw‘ah. 
judges 20:37	veha’orew heikhishu vayifshetu ’el hagiw‘ah vayimshokh ha’orew vayakh ’et kal ha‘ir lefi kharew. 
judges 20:38	vehamo‘ed hayah le’ish yisra’el ‘im ha’orew herew leha‘alotam mas’at he‘ashan min ha‘ir. 
judges 20:39	vayahafokh ’ish yisra’el bamilkhamah uwinyamin heikhel lehakot khalalim be’ish yisra’el kishloshim ’ish ki ’ameru ’akh nigof nigaf hu lefaneinu kamilkhamah harishonah. 
judges 20:40	vehamas’et heikhelah la‘alot min ha‘ir ‘amud ‘ashan vayifen binyamin ’akharav vehineh ‘alah khelil ha‘ir hashamayemah. 
judges 20:41	ve’ish yisra’el hafakh vayibahel ’ish binyamin ki ra’ah ki nage‘ah ‘alav hara‘ah. 
judges 20:42	vayifnu lifnei ’ish yisra’el ’el derekh hamidbar vehamilkhamah hidbiqatehu va’asher meihe‘arim mashkhitim ’oto betokho. 
judges 20:43	kiteru ’et binyamin hirdifuhu menukhah hidrikhuhu ‘ad nokhakh hagiw‘ah mimizrakh shamesh. 
judges 20:44	vayipelu mibinyamin shemonah ‘asar ’elef ’ish ’et kal ’eleh ’anshei khayil. 
judges 20:45	vayifnu vayanusu hamidbarah ’el sela‘ harimon vai‘oleluhu bamsilot khameishet ’alafim ’ish vayadbiqu ’akharav ‘ad gid‘om vayaku mimenu ’alpayim ’ish. 
judges 20:46	vayhi khal hanofelim mibinyamin ‘esrim vakhamishah ’elef ’ish sholef kherew bayom hahu ’et kal ’eleh ’anshei khayil. 
judges 20:47	vayifnu vayanusu hamidbarah ’el sela‘ harimon shesh mei’ot ’ish vayeishewu besela‘ rimon ’arba‘ah khodashim. 
judges 20:48	ve’ish yisra’el shawu ’el benei winyamin vayakum lefi kherew mei‘ir metom ‘ad beheimah ‘ad kal hanimtsa gam kal he‘arim hanimtsa’ot shilekhu wa’esh. 
judges 21:1	ve’ish yisra’el nishba‘ bamitspah leimor ’ish mimenu lo yiten bito lewinyamin le’ishah. 
judges 21:2	vayawo ha‘am bet ’el vayeishewu sham ‘ad ha‘erew lifnei ha’elohim vayis’u qolam vayiwku bekhi gadol. 
judges 21:3	vayomeru lamah yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hayetah zot beyisra’el lehipaqed hayom miyisra’el sheiwet ’ekhad. 
judges 21:4	vayhi mimakhorat vayashkimu ha‘am vayiwnu sham mizbeiakh vaya‘alu ‘olot ushelamim. 
judges 21:5	vayomeru benei yisra’el mi ’asher lo ‘alah waqahal mikal shiwtei yisra’el ’el yhoh ki hashewu‘ah hagedolah hayetah la’asher lo ‘alah ’el yhoh hamitspah leimor mot yumat. 
judges 21:6	vayinakhamu benei yisra’el ’el binyamin ’akhiv vayomeru nigda‘ hayom sheiwet ’ekhad miyisra’el. 
judges 21:7	mah na‘aseh lahem lanotarim lenashim va’anakhnu nishba‘nu yhoh lewilti tet lahem mibenoteinu lenashim. 
judges 21:8	vayomeru mi ’ekhad mishiwtei yisra’el ’asher lo ‘alah ’el yhoh hamitspah vehineh lo wa ’ish ’el hamakhaneh miyawesh gil‘ad ’el haqahal. 
judges 21:9	vayitpaqed ha‘am vehineh ’en sham ’ish miyoshewei yawesh gil‘ad. 
judges 21:10	vayishlekhu sham ha‘eidah shenem ‘asar ’elef ’ish mibenei hekhayil vaytsavu ’otam leimor lekhu vehikitem ’et yoshewei yawesh gil‘ad lefi kherew vehanashim vehataf. 
judges 21:11	vezeh hadawar ’asher ta‘asu kal zakhar vekhal ’ishah yoda‘at mishkaw zakhar takharimu. 
judges 21:12	vayimtse’u miyoshewei yawesh gil‘ad ’arba‘ mei’ot na‘arah wetulah ’asher lo yade‘ah ’ish lemishkaw zakhar vayawi’u ’otam ’el hamakhaneh shiloh ’asher be’erets kena‘an. 
judges 21:13	vayishlekhu kal ha‘eidah vaydaberu ’el benei winyamin ’asher besela‘ rimon vayiqre’u lahem shalom. 
judges 21:14	vayashaw binyamin ba‘et hahi vayitenu lahem hanashim ’asher khiyu mineshei yawesh gil‘ad velo matse’u lahem ken. 
judges 21:15	veha‘am nikham lewinyamin ki ‘asah yhoh perets beshiwtei yisra’el. 
judges 21:16	vayomeru ziqnei ha‘eidah mah na‘aseh lanotarim lenashim ki nishmedah mibinyamin ’ishah. 
judges 21:17	vayomeru yerushat peleitah lewinyamin velo yimakheh sheiwet miyisra’el. 
judges 21:18	va’anakhnu lo nukhal latet lahem nashim mibenoteinu ki nishbe‘u wenei yisra’el leimor ’arur noten ’ishah lewinyamin. 
judges 21:19	vayomeru hineh khag yhoh beshilo miyamim yamimah ’asher mitsefonah lewet ’el mizrekhah hashemesh limsilah ha‘olah mibet ’el shekhemah uminegew lilwonah. 
judges 21:20	vaytsav vaytsavu ’et benei winyamin leimor lekhu va’arawtem bakeramim. 
judges 21:21	ure’item vehineh ’im yeitse’u wenot shilo lakhul bamekholot vitsatem min hakeramim vakhataftem lakhem ’ish ’ishto mibenot shilo vahalakhtem ’erets binyamin. 
judges 21:22	vehayah ki yawo’u ’awotam ’o ’akheihem larow lariw ’eileinu ve’amarnu ’aleihem khanunu ’otam ki lo laqakhnu ’ish ’ishto bamilkhamah ki lo ’atem netatem lahem ka‘et te’shamu. 
judges 21:23	vaya‘asu khen benei winyamin vayis’u nashim lemisparam min hamekholelot ’asher gazalu vayeilekhu vayashuwu ’el nakhalatam vayiwnu ’et he‘arim vayeishewu bahem. 
judges 21:24	vayithalekhu misham benei yisra’el ba‘et hahi ’ish leshiwto ulemishpakhto vayeitse’u misham ’ish lenakhalato. 
judges 21:25	bayamim hahem ’en melekh beyisra’el ’ish hayashar be‘einav ya‘aseh. 
1_samuel 1:1	vayhi ’ish ’ekhad min haramatayim tsofim meihar ’efrayim ushemo ’elqanah ben yerokham ben ’elihu ben tokhu wen tsuf ’efrati. 
1_samuel 1:2	velo shetei nashim shem ’akhat khanah veshem hasheinit peninah vayhi lifninah yeladim ulekhanah ’en yeladim. 
1_samuel 1:3	ve‘alah ha’ish hahu mei‘iro miyamim yamimah lehishtakhavot velizboakh yhoh tsewa’ot beshiloh vesham shenei wenei ‘eili khafeni ufinkhas kohanim yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:4	vayhi hayom vayizbakh ’elqanah venatan lifninah ’ishto ulekhal baneha uwenoteha manot. 
1_samuel 1:5	ulekhanah yiten manah ’akhat ’apayim ki ’et khanah ’ahew yhoh sagar rakhmah. 
1_samuel 1:6	vekhi‘asatah tsaratah gam ka‘as ba‘awur hare‘imah ki sagar yhoh be‘ad rakhmah. 
1_samuel 1:7	vekhen ya‘aseh shanah weshanah midei ‘alotah bewet yhoh ken takh‘isenah vatiwkeh velo tokhal. 
1_samuel 1:8	vayomer lah ’elqanah ’ishah khanah lameh tiwki velameh lo tokheli velameh yeira‘ lewawekh halo ’anokhi tow lakh mei‘asarah banim. 
1_samuel 1:9	vataqam khanah ’akharei ’akhelah weshiloh ve’akharei shatoh ve‘eili hakohen yoshew ‘al hakisei ‘al mezuzat heikhal yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:10	vehi marat nafesh vatitpalel ‘al yhoh uwakhoh tiwkeh. 
1_samuel 1:11	vatidor neder vatomar yhoh tsewa’ot ’im ra’oh tir’eh ba‘oni ’amatekha uzekhartani velo tishkakh ’et ’amatekha venatatah la’amatekha zera‘ ’anashim unetativ yhoh kal yemei khayav umorah lo ya‘aleh ‘al rosho. 
1_samuel 1:12	vehayah ki hirbetah lehitpalel lifnei yhoh ve‘eili shomer ’et piha. 
1_samuel 1:13	vekhanah hi medaberet ‘al libah raq sefateha na‘ot veqolah lo yishameia‘ vayakhsheweha ‘eili leshikorah. 
1_samuel 1:14	vayomer ’eileha ‘eili ‘ad matai tishtakarin hasiri ’et yeinekh mei‘alayikh. 
1_samuel 1:15	vata‘an khanah vatomer lo ’adoni ’ishah qeshat ruakh ’anokhi veyayin vesheikhar lo shatiti va’eshpokh ’et nafshi lifnei yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:16	’al titen ’et ’amatekha lifnei bat beliya‘al ki meirow sikhi vekha‘si dibarti ‘ad henah. 
1_samuel 1:17	vaya‘an ‘eili vayomer lekhi leshalom veilohei yisra’el yiten ’et sheilatekh ’asher sha’alt mei‘imo. 
1_samuel 1:18	vatomer timtsa shifkhatekha khen be‘einekha vateilekh ha’ishah ledarkah vatokhal ufaneha lo hayu lah ‘od. 
1_samuel 1:19	vayashkimu waboqer vayishtakhavu lifnei yhoh vayashuwu vayawo’u ’el beitam haramatah vayeida‘ ’elqanah ’et khanah ’ishto vayizkereha yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:20	vayhi litqufot hayamim vatahar khanah vateiled ben vatiqra ’et shemo shemu’el ki yhoh she’iltiv. 
1_samuel 1:21	vaya‘al ha’ish ’elqanah vekhal beito lizboakh yhoh ’et zewakh hayamim ve’et nidro. 
1_samuel 1:22	vekhanah lo ‘alatah ki ’amerah le’ishah ‘ad yigamel hana‘ar vahawi’otiv venir’ah ’et penei yhoh veyashaw sham ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_samuel 1:23	vayomer lah ’elqanah ’ishah ‘asi hatow be‘einayikh shewi ‘ad gamelekh ’oto ’akh yaqem yhoh ’et dewaro vateishew ha’ishah vateineq ’et benah ‘ad gamelah ’oto. 
1_samuel 1:24	vata‘aleihu ‘imah ka’asher gemalatu befarim sheloshah ve’eifah ’akhat qemakh veneiwel yayin vatewi’eihu wet yhoh shilo vehana‘ar na‘ar. 
1_samuel 1:25	vayishkhatu ’et hapar vayawi’u ’et hana‘ar ’el ‘eili. 
1_samuel 1:26	vatomer bi ’adoni khei nafshekha ’adoni ’ani ha’ishah hanitsewet ‘imekhah bazeh lehitpalel ’el yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:27	’el hana‘ar hazeh hitpalaleti vayiten yhoh li ’et she’eilati ’asher sha’alti mei‘imo. 
1_samuel 1:28	vegam ’anokhi hish’iltihu yhoh kal hayamim ’asher hayah hu sha’ul yhoh vayishtakhu sham yhoh. 
1_samuel 2:1	vatitpalel khanah vatomar ‘alats libi yhoh ramah qarni yhoh rakhaw pi ‘al ’oywai ki samakhti bishu‘atekha. 
1_samuel 2:2	’en qadosh yhoh ki ’en biltekha ve’en tsur keiloheinu. 
1_samuel 2:3	’al tarbu tedaberu gewohah gewohah yeitsei ‘ataq mipikhem ki ’el dei‘ot yhoh velo velo nitkenu ‘alilot. 
1_samuel 2:4	qeshet giborim khatim venikhshalim ’azeru khayil. 
1_samuel 2:5	sewei‘im balekhem niskaru ure‘eiwim khadelu ‘ad ‘aqarah yaledah shiw‘ah verabat banim ’umlalah. 
1_samuel 2:6	yhoh meimit umekhayeh morid she’ol vaya‘al. 
1_samuel 2:7	yhoh morish uma‘ashir mashpil ’af meromem. 
1_samuel 2:8	meiqim mei‘afar dal mei’ashpot yarim ’ewyon lehoshiw ‘im nediwim vekhisei khawod yankhilem ki yhoh metsuqei ’erets vayashet ‘aleihem teiwel. 
1_samuel 2:9	raglei khasido khasidav yishmor uresha‘im bakhoshekh yidamu ki lo wekhoakh yigbar ’ish. 
1_samuel 2:10	yhoh yeikhatu meriwo meriwav ‘alo ‘alav bashamayim yar‘em yhoh yadin ’afsei ’arets veyiten ‘oz lemalko veyarem qeren meshikho. 
1_samuel 2:11	vayeilekh ’elqanah haramatah ‘al beito vehana‘ar hayah mesharet ’et yhoh ’et penei ‘eili hakohen. 
1_samuel 2:12	uwenei ‘eili benei weliya‘al lo yade‘u ’et yhoh. 
1_samuel 2:13	umishpat hakohanim ’et ha‘am kal ’ish zoweiakh zewakh uwa na‘ar hakohen kewashel habasar vehamazleg shelosh hashinayim beyado. 
1_samuel 2:14	vehikah wakiyor ’o wadud ’o waqalakhat ’o waparur kol ’asher ya‘aleh hamazleg yiqakh hakohen bo kakhah ya‘asu lekhal yisra’el haba’im sham beshiloh. 
1_samuel 2:15	gam beterem yaqtirun ’et hakheilew uwa na‘ar hakohen ve’amar la’ish hazoweiakh tenah wasar litslot lakohen velo yiqakh mimekha basar mewushal ki ’im khai. 
1_samuel 2:16	vayomer ’eilav ha’ish qater yaqtirun kayom hakheilew veqakh lekha ka’asher te’aveh nafshekha ve’amar lo lo ki ‘atah titen ve’im lo laqakhti wekhazeqah. 
1_samuel 2:17	vatehi khatat hane‘arim gedolah me’od ’et penei yhoh ki ni’atsu ha’anashim ’et minkhat yhoh. 
1_samuel 2:18	ushemu’el mesharet ’et penei yhoh na‘ar khagur ’eifod bad. 
1_samuel 2:19	ume‘il qaton ta‘aseh lo ’imo veha‘altah lo miyamim yamimah ba‘alotah ’et ’ishah lizboakh ’et zewakh hayamim. 
1_samuel 2:20	uweirakh ‘eili ’et ’elqanah ve’et ’ishto ve’amar yasem yhoh lekha zera‘ min ha’ishah hazot takhat hashe’eilah ’asher sha’al yhoh vehalekhu limqomo. 
1_samuel 2:21	ki faqad yhoh ’et khanah vatahar vateiled sheloshah wanim ushetei wanot vayigdal hana‘ar shemu’el ‘im yhoh. 
1_samuel 2:22	ve‘eili zaqen me’od veshama‘ ’et kal ’asher ya‘asun banav lekhal yisra’el ve’et ’asher yishkewun ’et hanashim hatsowe’ot petakh ’ohel mo‘ed. 
1_samuel 2:23	vayomer lahem lamah ta‘asun kadewarim ha’eleh ’asher ’anokhi shomeia‘ ’et diwreikhem ra‘im mei’et kal ha‘am ’eleh. 
1_samuel 2:24	’al banai ki lo towah hashemu‘ah ’asher ’anokhi shomeia‘ ma‘awirim ‘am yhoh. 
1_samuel 2:25	’im yekheta ’ish le’ish ufilo ’elohim ve’im yhoh yekheta ’ish mi yitpalel lo velo yishme‘u leqol ’awihem ki khafets yhoh lahamitam. 
1_samuel 2:26	vehana‘ar shemu’el holekh vegadel vatow gam ‘im yhoh vegam ‘im ’anashim. 
1_samuel 2:27	vayawo ’ish ’elohim ’el ‘eili vayomer ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh hanigloh nigleiti ’el bet ’awikha bihyotam bemitsrayim lewet par‘oh. 
1_samuel 2:28	uwakhor ’oto mikal shiwtei yisra’el li lekhohen la‘alot ‘al mizbekhi lehaqtir qetoret laset ’eifod lefanai va’etenah lewet ’awikha ’et kal ’ishei benei yisra’el. 
1_samuel 2:29	lamah tiw‘atu beziwkhi uweminkhati ’asher tsiviti ma‘on vatekhabed ’et banekha mimeni lehawri’akhem meireishit kal minkhat yisra’el le‘ami. 
1_samuel 2:30	lakhen ne’um yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’amor ’amarti beitekha uwet ’awikha yithalekhu lefanai ‘ad ‘olam ve‘atah ne’um yhoh khalilah li ki mekhabedai ’akhabed uwozai yeiqalu. 
1_samuel 2:31	hineh yamim ba’im vegada‘ti ’et zero‘akha ve’et zeroa‘ bet ’awikha mihyot zaqen beweitekha. 
1_samuel 2:32	vehibata tsar ma‘on bekhol ’asher yeitiw ’et yisra’el velo yihyeh zaqen beweitekha kal hayamim. 
1_samuel 2:33	ve’ish lo ’akhrit lekha mei‘im mizbekhi lekhalot ’et ‘einekha vela’adiw ’et nafshekha vekhal marbit beitekha yamutu ’anashim. 
1_samuel 2:34	vezeh lekha ha’ot ’asher yawo ’el shenei wanekha ’el khafeni ufinekhas beyom ’ekhad yamutu sheneihem. 
1_samuel 2:35	vahaqimoti li kohen ne’eman ka’asher bilwawi uwenafshi ya‘aseh uwaniti lo bayit ne’eman vehthalekh lifnei meshikhi kal hayamim. 
1_samuel 2:36	vehayah kal hanotar beweitekha yawo lehishtakhavot lo la’agorat kesef vekhikar lakhem ve’amar sefakheini na ’el ’akhat hakehunot le’ekhol pat lakhem. 
1_samuel 3:1	vehana‘ar shemu’el mesharet ’et yhoh lifnei ‘eili udewar yhoh hayah yaqar bayamim hahem ’en khazon nifrats. 
1_samuel 3:2	vayhi bayom hahu ve‘eili shokhew bimqomo ve‘eino ve‘einav heikhelu kheihot lo yukhal lir’ot. 
1_samuel 3:3	vener ’elohim terem yikhbeh ushemu’el shokhew beheikhal yhoh ’asher sham ’aron ’elohim. 
1_samuel 3:4	vayiqra yhoh ’el shemu’el vayomer hineini. 
1_samuel 3:5	vayarats ’el ‘eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayomer lo qarati shuw shekhaw vayeilekh vayishkaw. 
1_samuel 3:6	vayosef yhoh qero ‘od shemu’el vayaqam shemu’el vayeilekh ’el ‘eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayomer lo qarati weni shuw shekhaw. 
1_samuel 3:7	ushemu’el terem yada‘ ’et yhoh veterem yigaleh ’eilav dewar yhoh. 
1_samuel 3:8	vayosef yhoh qero shemu’el bashelishit vayaqam vayeilekh ’el ‘eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayawen ‘eili ki yhoh qorei lana‘ar. 
1_samuel 3:9	vayomer ‘eili lishmu’el lekh shekhaw vehayah ’im yiqra ’eilekha ve’amarta daber yhoh ki shomeia‘ ‘awdekha vayeilekh shemu’el vayishkaw bimqomo. 
1_samuel 3:10	vayawo yhoh vayityatsaw vayiqra khefa‘am befa‘am shemu’el shemu’el vayomer shemu’el daber ki shomeia‘ ‘awdekha. 
1_samuel 3:11	vayomer yhoh ’el shemu’el hineh ’anokhi ‘oseh dawar beyisra’el ’asher kal shome‘o tetsilenah shetei ’azenav. 
1_samuel 3:12	bayom hahu ’aqim ’el ‘eili ’et kal ’asher dibarti ’el beito hakhel vekhaleh. 
1_samuel 3:13	vehigadti lo ki shofet ’ani ’et beito ‘ad ‘olam ba‘avon ’asher yada‘ ki meqalim lahem banav velo khihah bam. 
1_samuel 3:14	velakhen nishba‘ti lewet ‘eili ’im yitkaper ‘avon bet ‘eili bezewakh uweminkhah ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_samuel 3:15	vayishkaw shemu’el ‘ad haboqer vayiftakh ’et daltot bet yhoh ushemu’el yarei meihagid ’et hamar’ah ’el ‘eili. 
1_samuel 3:16	vayiqra ‘eili ’et shemu’el vayomer shemu’el beni vayomer hineini. 
1_samuel 3:17	vayomer mah hadawar ’asher diber ’eilekha ’al na tekhakhed mimeni koh ya‘aseh lekha ’elohim vekhoh yosif ’im tekhakhed mimeni dawar mikal hadawar ’asher diber ’eilekha. 
1_samuel 3:18	vayaged lo shemu’el ’et kal hadewarim velo khikhed mimenu vayomar yhoh hu hatow be‘einav ya‘aseh. 
1_samuel 3:19	vayigdal shemu’el yhoh hayah ‘imo velo hipil mikal dewarav ’aretsah. 
1_samuel 3:20	vayeida‘ kal yisra’el midan ve‘ad be’er shawa‘ ki ne’eman shemu’el lenawi yhoh. 
1_samuel 3:21	vayosef yhoh leheira’oh weshiloh ki niglah yhoh ’el shemu’el beshilo bidwar yhoh. 
1_samuel 4:1	vayhi dewar shemu’el lekhal yisra’el vayeitsei yisra’el liqrat pelishtim lamilkhamah vayakhanu ‘al ha’ewen ha‘eizer ufelishtim khanu wa’afeq. 
1_samuel 4:2	vaya‘arkhu felishtim liqrat yisra’el vatitosh hamilkhamah vayinagef yisra’el lifnei felishtim vayaku wama‘arakhah basadeh ke’arba‘at ’alafim ’ish. 
1_samuel 4:3	vayawo ha‘am ’el hamakhaneh vayomeru ziqnei yisra’el lamah negafanu yhoh hayom lifnei felishtim niqkhah ’eileinu mishiloh ’et ’aron berit yhoh veyawo weqirbeinu veyoshi‘einu mikaf ’oyeweinu. 
1_samuel 4:4	vayishlakh ha‘am shiloh vayis’u misham ’et ’aron berit yhoh tsewa’ot yoshew hakeruwim vesham shenei wenei ‘eili ‘im ’aron berit ha’elohim khafeni ufinekhas. 
1_samuel 4:5	vayhi kewo ’aron berit yhoh ’el hamakhaneh vayari‘u khal yisra’el teru‘ah gedolah vateihom ha’arets. 
1_samuel 4:6	vayishme‘u felishtim ’et qol hateru‘ah vayomeru meh qol hateru‘ah hagedolah hazot bemakhaneh ha‘iwrim vayeide‘u ki ’aron yhoh ba ’el hamakhaneh. 
1_samuel 4:7	vayir’u hapelishtim ki ’ameru ba ’elohim ’el hamakhaneh vayomeru ’o lanu ki lo hayetah kazot ’etmol shilshom. 
1_samuel 4:8	’o lanu mi yatsileinu miyad ha’elohim ha’adirim ha’eleh ’eleh hem ha’elohim hamakim ’et mitsrayim bekhal makah bamidbar. 
1_samuel 4:9	hitkhazequ vihyu la’anashim pelishtim pen ta‘awdu la‘iwrim ka’asher ‘awedu lakhem vihyitem la’anashim venilkhamtem. 
1_samuel 4:10	vayilakhamu felishtim vayinagef yisra’el vayanusu ’ish le’ohalav vatehi hamakah gedolah me’od vayipol miyisra’el sheloshim ’elef ragli. 
1_samuel 4:11	va’aron ’elohim nilqakh ushenei wenei ‘eili meitu khafeni ufinekhas. 
1_samuel 4:12	vayarats ’ish binyamin meihama‘arakhah vayawo shiloh bayom hahu umadav qeru‘im va’adamah ‘al rosho. 
1_samuel 4:13	vayawo vehineh ‘eili yoshew ‘al hakisei yakh yad derekh metsapeh ki hayah libo khared ‘al ’aron ha’elohim veha’ish ba lehagid ba‘ir vatiz‘aq kal ha‘ir. 
1_samuel 4:14	vayishma‘ ‘eili ’et qol hatse‘aqah vayomer meh qol hehamon hazeh veha’ish mihar vayawo vayaged le‘eili. 
1_samuel 4:15	ve‘eili ben tish‘im ushemoneh shanah ve‘einav qamah velo yakhol lir’ot. 
1_samuel 4:16	vayomer ha’ish ’el ‘eili ’anokhi haba min hama‘arakhah va’ani min hama‘arakhah nasti hayom vayomer meh hayah hadawar beni. 
1_samuel 4:17	vaya‘an hamwaser vayomer nas yisra’el lifnei felishtim vegam mageifah gedolah hayetah wa‘am vegam shenei wanekha meitu khafeni ufinekhas va’aron ha’elohim nilqakhah. 
1_samuel 4:18	vayhi kehazkiro ’et ’aron ha’elohim vayipol mei‘al hakisei ’akhoranit be‘ad yad hasha‘ar vatishawer mafraqto vayamot ki zaqen ha’ish vekhawed vehu shafat ’et yisra’el ’arba‘im shanah. 
1_samuel 4:19	vekhalato ’eishet pinekhas harah lalat vatishma‘ ’et hashemu‘ah ’el hilaqakh ’aron ha’elohim umet khamiha ve’ishah vatikhra‘ vateiled ki nehefkhu ‘aleha tsireha. 
1_samuel 4:20	ukhe‘et mutah vatedabeirenah hanitsawot ‘aleha ’al tire’i ki wen yaladet velo ‘anetah velo shatah libah. 
1_samuel 4:21	vatiqra lana‘ar ’i khawod leimor galah khawod miyisra’el ’el hilaqakh ’aron ha’elohim ve’el khamiha ve’ishah. 
1_samuel 4:22	vatomer galah khawod miyisra’el ki nilqakh ’aron ha’elohim. 
1_samuel 5:1	ufelishtim laqekhu ’et ’aron ha’elohim vaywi’uhu mei’ewen ha‘eizer ’ashdodah. 
1_samuel 5:2	vayiqkhu felishtim ’et ’aron ha’elohim vayawi’u ’oto bet dagon vayatsigu ’oto ’eitsel dagon. 
1_samuel 5:3	vayashkimu ’ashdodim mimakhorat vehineh dagon nofel lefanav ’artsah lifnei ’aron yhoh vayiqkhu ’et dagon vayashiwu ’oto limqomo. 
1_samuel 5:4	vayashkimu waboqer mimakhorat vehineh dagon nofel lefanav ’artsah lifnei ’aron yhoh verosh dagon ushetei kapot yadav kerutot ’el hamiftan raq dagon nish’ar ‘alav. 
1_samuel 5:5	‘al ken lo yidrekhu khohanei dagon vekhal haba’im bet dagon ‘al miftan dagon be’ashdod ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_samuel 5:6	vatikhbad yad yhoh ’el ha’ashdodim vayshimem vayakh ’otam ba‘ofalim batekhorim ’et ’ashdod ve’et gewuleha. 
1_samuel 5:7	vayir’u ’anshei ’ashdod ki khen ve’ameru lo yeishew ’aron ’elohei yisra’el ‘imanu ki qashetah yado ‘aleinu ve‘al dagon ’eloheinu. 
1_samuel 5:8	vayishlekhu vaya’asfu ’et kal sarnei felishtim ’aleihem vayomeru mah na‘aseh la’aron ’elohei yisra’el vayomeru gat yisow ’aron ’elohei yisra’el vayasebu ’et ’aron ’elohei yisra’el. 
1_samuel 5:9	vayhi ’akharei heisabu ’oto vatehi yad yhoh ba‘ir mehumah gedolah me’od vayakh ’et ’anshei ha‘ir miqaton ve‘ad gadol vayisateru lahem ‘ofalim tekhorim. 
1_samuel 5:10	vayshalekhu ’et ’aron ha’elohim ‘eqron vayhi kewo ’aron ha’elohim ‘eqron vayiz‘aqu ha‘eqronim leimor heisabu ’eilai ’et ’aron ’elohei yisra’el lahamiteini ve’et ‘ami. 
1_samuel 5:11	vayishlekhu vaya’asfu ’et kal sarnei felishtim vayomeru shalekhu ’et ’aron ’elohei yisra’el veyashow limqomo velo yamit ’oti ve’et ‘ami ki hayetah mehumat mavet bekhal ha‘ir kawedah me’od yad ha’elohim sham. 
1_samuel 5:12	veha’anashim ’asher lo meitu huku ba‘ofalim batekhorim vata‘al shav‘at ha‘ir hashamayim. 
1_samuel 6:1	vayhi ’aron yhoh bisdeh felishtim shiw‘ah khodashim. 
1_samuel 6:2	vayiqre’u felishtim lakohanim velaqosemim leimor mah na‘aseh la’aron yhoh hodi‘unu bameh neshalekhenu limqomo. 
1_samuel 6:3	vayomeru ’im meshalekhim ’et ’aron ’elohei yisra’el ’al teshalekhu ’oto reiqam ki hashew tashiwu lo ’asham ’az teirafe’u venoda‘ lakhem lamah lo tasur yado mikem. 
1_samuel 6:4	vayomeru mah ha’asham ’asher nashiw lo vayomeru mispar sarnei felishtim khamishah ‘afelei tekhorei zahaw vakhamishah ‘akhberei zahaw ki mageifah ’akhat lekhulam ulesarneikhem. 
1_samuel 6:5	va‘asitem tsalmei ‘afeleikhem tekhoreikhem vetsalmei ‘akhbereikhem hamashkhitim ’et ha’arets unetatem leilohei yisra’el kawod ’ulai yaqel ’et yado mei‘aleikhem umei‘al ’eloheikhem umei‘al ’artsekhem. 
1_samuel 6:6	velamah tekhabedu ’et lewawkhem ka’asher kibedu mitsrayim ufar‘oh ’et libam halo ka’asher hit‘alel bahem vayshalekhum vayeileikhu. 
1_samuel 6:7	ve‘atah qekhu va‘asu ‘agalah khadashah ’ekhat ushetei farot ‘alot ’asher lo ‘alah ‘aleihem ‘ol va’asartem ’et haparot ba‘agalah vahasheiwotem beneihem mei’akhareihem habayetah. 
1_samuel 6:8	uleqakhtem ’et ’aron yhoh unetatem ’oto ’el ha‘agalah ve’et kelei hazahaw ’asher hasheiwotem lo ’asham tasimu wa’argaz mitsido veshilakhtem ’oto vehalakh. 
1_samuel 6:9	ure’item ’im derekh gewulo ya‘aleh bet shemesh hu ‘asah lanu ’et hara‘ah hagedolah hazot ve’im lo veyada‘nu ki lo yado nage‘ah banu miqreh hu hayah lanu. 
1_samuel 6:10	vaya‘asu ha’anashim ken vayiqkhu shetei farot ‘alot vaya’asrum ba‘agalah ve’et beneihem kalu wabayit. 
1_samuel 6:11	vayasimu ’et ’aron yhoh ’el ha‘agalah ve’et ha’argaz ve’et ‘akhberei hazahaw ve’et tsalmei tekhoreihem. 
1_samuel 6:12	vayisharnah haparot baderekh ‘al derekh bet shemesh bimsilah ’akhat halekhu halokh vega‘o velo saru yamin usemol vesarnei felishtim holekhim ’akhareihem ‘ad gewul bet shamesh. 
1_samuel 6:13	uwet shemesh qotserim qetsir khitim ba‘eimeq vayis’u ’et ‘eineihem vayir’u ’et ha’aron vayismekhu lir’ot. 
1_samuel 6:14	veha‘agalah ba’ah ’el sedeh yehoshua‘ bet hashimshi vata‘amod sham vesham ’ewen gedolah vaywaqe‘u ’et ‘atsei ha‘agalah ve’et haparot he‘elu ‘olah yhoh. 
1_samuel 6:15	vehalviyim horidu ’et ’aron yhoh ve’et ha’argaz ’asher ’ito ’asher bo khelei zahaw vayasimu ’el ha’ewen hagedolah ve’anshei wet shemesh he‘elu ‘olot vayizbekhu zewakhim bayom hahu yhoh. 
1_samuel 6:16	vakhamishah sarnei felishtim ra’u vayashuwu ‘eqron bayom hahu. 
1_samuel 6:17	ve’eleh tekhorei hazahaw ’asher heishiwu felishtim ’asham yhoh le’ashdod ’ekhad le‘azah ’ekhad le’ashqelon ’ekhad legat ’ekhad le‘eqron ’ekhad. 
1_samuel 6:18	ve‘akhberei hazahaw mispar kal ‘arei felishtim lakhameishet haseranim mei‘ir miwtsar ve‘ad kofer haperazi ve‘ad ’awel hagedolah ’asher hinikhu ‘aleha ’et ’aron yhoh ‘ad hayom hazeh bisdeh yehoshua‘ bet hashimshi. 
1_samuel 6:19	vayakh be’anshei wet shemesh ki ra’u ba’aron yhoh vayakh ba‘am shiw‘im ’ish khamishim ’elef ’ish vayit’abelu ha‘am ki hikah yhoh ba‘am makah gedolah 
1_samuel 6:20	vayomeru ’anshei wet shemesh mi yukhal la‘amod lifnei yhoh ha’elohim haqadosh hazeh ve’el mi ya‘aleh mei‘aleinu. 
1_samuel 6:21	vayishlekhu mal’akhim ’el yoshewei qiryat ye‘arim leimor heishiwu felishtim ’et ’aron yhoh redu ha‘alu ’oto ’aleikhem. 
1_samuel 7:1	vayawo’u ’anshei qiryat ye‘arim vaya‘alu ’et ’aron yhoh vayawi’u ’oto ’el bet ’awinadaw bagiw‘ah ve’et ’el‘azar beno qideshu lishmor ’et ’aron yhoh. 
1_samuel 7:2	vayhi miyom shewet ha’aron beqiryat ye‘arim vayirbu hayamim vayihyu ‘esrim shanah vayinahu kal bet yisra’el ’akharei yhoh. 
1_samuel 7:3	vayomer shemu’el ’el kal bet yisra’el leimor ’im bekhal lewawkhem ’atem shawim ’el yhoh hasiru ’et ’elohei haneikhar mitokhkhem veha‘ashtarot vehakhinu lewawkhem ’el yhoh ve‘iwduhu lewado veyatsel ’etkhem miyad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 7:4	vayasiru benei yisra’el ’et habe‘alim ve’et ha‘ashtarot vaya‘awdu ’et yhoh lewado. 
1_samuel 7:5	vayomer shemu’el qiwtsu ’et kal yisra’el hamitspatah ve’etpalel ba‘adkhem ’el yhoh. 
1_samuel 7:6	vayiqawetsu hamitspatah vayish’awu mayim vayishpekhu lifnei yhoh vayatsumu bayom hahu vayomeru sham khatanu yhoh vayishpot shemu’el ’et benei yisra’el bamitspah. 
1_samuel 7:7	vayishme‘u felishtim ki hitqabetsu wenei yisra’el hamitspatah vaya‘alu sarnei felishtim ’el yisra’el vayishme‘u benei yisra’el vayir’u mipenei felishtim. 
1_samuel 7:8	vayomeru wenei yisra’el ’el shemu’el ’al takharesh mimenu mize‘oq ’el yhoh ’eloheinu veyoshi‘einu miyad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 7:9	vayiqakh shemu’el teleh khalaw ’ekhad vaya‘aleh vaya‘aleihu ‘olah kalil yhoh vayiz‘aq shemu’el ’el yhoh be‘ad yisra’el vaya‘aneihu yhoh. 
1_samuel 7:10	vayhi shemu’el ma‘aleh ha‘olah ufelishtim nigeshu lamilkhamah beyisra’el vayar‘em yhoh beqol gadol bayom hahu ‘al pelishtim vayhumem vayinagefu lifnei yisra’el. 
1_samuel 7:11	vayeitse’u ’anshei yisra’el min hamitspah vayirdefu ’et pelishtim vayakum ‘ad mitakhat lewet kar. 
1_samuel 7:12	vayiqakh shemu’el ’ewen ’akhat vayasem ben hamitspah uwen hashen vayiqra ’et shemah ’ewen ha‘azer vayomar ‘ad henah ‘azaranu yhoh. 
1_samuel 7:13	vayikane‘u hapelishtim velo yasefu ‘od lawo bigwul yisra’el vatehi yad yhoh bapelishtim kol yemei shemu’el. 
1_samuel 7:14	vatashowenah he‘arim ’asher laqekhu felishtim mei’et yisra’el leyisra’el mei‘eqron ve‘ad gat ve’et gewulan hitsil yisra’el miyad pelishtim vayhi shalom ben yisra’el uwen ha’emori. 
1_samuel 7:15	vayishpot shemu’el ’et yisra’el kol yemei khayav. 
1_samuel 7:16	vehalakh midei shanah beshanah vesawaw bet ’el vehagilgal vehamitspah veshafat ’et yisra’el ’et kal hameqomot ha’eleh. 
1_samuel 7:17	uteshuwato haramatah ki sham beito vesham shafat ’et yisra’el vayiwen sham mizbeiakh yhoh. 
1_samuel 8:1	vayhi ka’asher zaqen shemu’el vayasem ’et banav shofetim leyisra’el. 
1_samuel 8:2	vayhi shem beno habekhor yo’el veshem mishneihu ’awiyah shofetim biw’er shawa‘. 
1_samuel 8:3	velo halekhu wanav bedarkho bidrakhav vayitu ’akharei habatsa‘ vayiqkhu shokhad vayatu mishpat. 
1_samuel 8:4	vayitqabetsu kol ziqnei yisra’el vayawo’u ’el shemu’el haramatah. 
1_samuel 8:5	vayomeru ’eilav hineh ’atah zaqanta uwanekha lo halekhu bidrakhekha ‘atah simah lanu melekh leshafeteinu kekhal hagoyim. 
1_samuel 8:6	vayeira‘ hadawar be‘einei shemu’el ka’asher ’ameru tenah lanu melekh leshafeteinu vayitpalel shemu’el ’el yhoh. 
1_samuel 8:7	vayomer yhoh ’el shemu’el shema‘ beqol ha‘am lekhol ’asher yomeru ’eilekha ki lo ’otekha ma’asu ki ’oti ma’asu mimelokh ‘aleihem. 
1_samuel 8:8	kekhal hama‘asim ’asher ‘asu miyom ha‘aloti ’otam mimitsrayim ve‘ad hayom hazeh vaya‘azwuni vaya‘awdu ’elohim ’akheirim ken hemah ‘osim gam lakh. 
1_samuel 8:9	ve‘atah shema‘ beqolam ’akh ki ha‘ed ta‘id bahem vehigadta lahem mishpat hamelekh ’asher yimlokh ‘aleihem. 
1_samuel 8:10	vayomer shemu’el ’et kal diwrei yhoh ’el ha‘am hasho’alim mei’ito melekh. 
1_samuel 8:11	vayomer zeh yihyeh mishpat hamelekh ’asher yimlokh ‘aleikhem ’et beneikhem yiqakh vesam lo bemerkawto uwefarashav veratsu lifnei merkawto. 
1_samuel 8:12	velasum lo sarei ’alafim vesarei khamishim velakharosh kharisho veliqtsor qetsiro vela‘asot kelei milkhamto ukhelei rikhbo. 
1_samuel 8:13	ve’et benoteikhem yiqakh leraqakhot uletabakhot ule’ofot. 
1_samuel 8:14	ve’ets doteikhem ve’et karmeikhem vezeiteikhem hatowim yiqakh venatan la‘awadav. 
1_samuel 8:15	vezar‘eikhem vekharmeikhem ya‘sor venatan lesarisav vela‘awadav. 
1_samuel 8:16	ve’et ‘awdeikhem ve’et shifkhoteikhem ve’et bakhureikhem hatowim ve’et khamoreikhem yiqakh ve‘asah limlakhto. 
1_samuel 8:17	tsonekhem ya‘sor ve’atem tihyu lo la‘awadim. 
1_samuel 8:18	uze‘aqtem bayom hahu milifnei malkekhem ’asher bekhartem lakhem velo ya‘aneh yhoh ’etkhem bayom hahu. 
1_samuel 8:19	vayma’anu ha‘am lishmoa‘ beqol shemu’el vayomeru lo ki ’im melekh yihyeh ‘aleinu. 
1_samuel 8:20	vehayinu gam ’anakhnu kekhal hagoyim ushefatanu malkeinu veyatsa lefaneinu venilkham ’et milkhamoteinu. 
1_samuel 8:21	vayishma‘ shemu’el ’et kal diwrei ha‘am vaydaberem be’azenei yhoh. 
1_samuel 8:22	vayomer yhoh ’el shemu’el shema‘ beqolam vehimlakhta lahem melekh vayomer shemu’el ’el ’anshei yisra’el lekhu ’ish le‘iro. 
1_samuel 9:1	vayhi ’ish mibin yamin mibinyamin ushemo qish ben ’awi’el ben tseror ben bekhorat ben ’afiakh ben ’ish yemini gibor khayil. 
1_samuel 9:2	velo hayah wen ushemo sha’ul bakhur vatow ve’en ’ish mibenei yisra’el tow mimenu mishikhmo vama‘lah gawoah mikal ha‘am. 
1_samuel 9:3	vatowadnah ha’atonot leqish ’awi sha’ul vayomer qish ’el sha’ul beno qakh na ’itekha ’et ’akhad meihane‘arim vequm lekh baqesh ’et ha’atonot. 
1_samuel 9:4	vaya‘awor behar ’efrayim vaya‘awor be’erets shalishah velo matsa’u vaya‘awru we’erets sha‘alim va’ayin vaya‘awor be’erets yemini velo matsa’u. 
1_samuel 9:5	hemah ba’u be’erets tsuf vesha’ul ’amar lena‘aro ’asher ‘imo lekhah venashuwah pen yekhdal ’awi min ha’atonot veda’ag lanu. 
1_samuel 9:6	vayomer lo hineh na ’ish ’elohim ba‘ir hazot veha’ish nikhbad kol ’asher yedaber bo yawo ‘atah neilakhah sham ’ulai yagid lanu ’et darkeinu ’asher halakhnu ‘aleha. 
1_samuel 9:7	vayomer sha’ul lena‘aro vehineh neilekh umah nawi la’ish ki halekhem ’azal mikeileinu uteshurah ’en lehawi le’ish ha’elohim mah ’itanu. 
1_samuel 9:8	vayosef hana‘ar la‘anot ’et sha’ul vayomer hineh nimtsa weyadi rewa‘ sheqel kasef venatati le’ish ha’elohim vehigid lanu ’et darkeinu. 
1_samuel 9:9	lefanim beyisra’el koh ’amar ha’ish belekhto lidrosh ’elohim lekhu veneilekhah ‘ad haro’eh ki lanawi hayom yiqarei lefanim haro’eh. 
1_samuel 9:10	vayomer sha’ul lena‘aro tow dewarekha lekhah neileikhah vayeilekhu ’el ha‘ir ’asher sham ’ish ha’elohim. 
1_samuel 9:11	hemah ‘olim bema‘aleh ha‘ir vehemah matse’u ne‘arot yotse’ot lish’ow mayim vayomeru lahen hayesh bazeh haro’eh. 
1_samuel 9:12	vata‘anenah ’otam vatomarnah yesh hineh lefanekha maher ‘atah ki hayom ba la‘ir ki zewakh hayom la‘am babamah. 
1_samuel 9:13	kewo’akhem ha‘ir ken timtse’un ’oto beterem ya‘aleh habamatah le’ekhol ki lo yokhal ha‘am ‘ad bo’o ki hu yewarekh hazewakh ’akharei khen yokhelu haqeru’im ve‘atah ‘alu ki ’oto khehayom timtse’un ’oto. 
1_samuel 9:14	vaya‘alu ha‘ir hemah ba’im betokh ha‘ir vehineh shemu’el yotsei liqratam la‘alot habamah. 
1_samuel 9:15	yhoh galah ’et ’ozen shemu’el yom ’ekhad lifnei wo sha’ul leimor. 
1_samuel 9:16	ka‘et makhar ’eshlakh ’eilekha ’ish mei’erets binyamin umeshakhto lenagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el vehoshia‘ ’et ‘ami miyad pelishtim ki ra’iti ’et ‘ami ki ba’ah tsa‘aqato ’eilai. 
1_samuel 9:17	ushemu’el ra’ah ’et sha’ul yhoh ‘anahu hineh ha’ish ’asher ’amarti ’eilekha zeh ya‘tsor be‘ami. 
1_samuel 9:18	vayigash sha’ul ’et shemu’el betokh hasha‘ar vayomer hagidah na li ’ei zeh bet haro’eh. 
1_samuel 9:19	vaya‘an shemu’el ’et sha’ul vayomer ’anokhi haro’eh ‘aleh lefanai habamah va’akhaltem ‘imi hayom veshilakhtikha waboqer vekhol ’asher bilwawekha ’agid lakh. 
1_samuel 9:20	vela’atonot ha’owedot lekha hayom sheloshet hayamim ’al tasem ’et libekha lahem ki nimtsa’u ulemi kal khemdat yisra’el halo lekha ulekhol bet ’awikha. 
1_samuel 9:21	vaya‘an sha’ul vayomer halo wen yemini ’anokhi miqatanei shiwtei yisra’el umishpakhti hatse‘irah mikal mishpekhot shiwtei winyamin velamah dibarta ’eilai kadawar hazeh. 
1_samuel 9:22	vayiqakh shemu’el ’et sha’ul ve’et na‘aro vaywi’em lishkatah vayiten lahem maqom berosh haqeru’im vehemah kishloshim ’ish. 
1_samuel 9:23	vayomer shemu’el latabakh tenah ’et hamanah ’asher natati lakh ’asher ’amarti ’eilekha sim ’otah ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 9:24	vayarem hatabakh ’et hashoq vehe‘aleha vayasem lifnei sha’ul vayomer hineh hanish’ar sim lefanekha ’ekhol ki lamo‘ed shamur lekha leimor ha‘am qarati vayokhal sha’ul ‘im shemu’el bayom hahu. 
1_samuel 9:25	vayeiredu meihabamah ha‘ir vaydaber ‘im sha’ul ‘al hagag. 
1_samuel 9:26	vayashkimu vayhi ka‘alot hashakhar vayiqra shemu’el ’el sha’ul hagag hagagah leimor qumah va’ashalekheka vayaqam sha’ul vayeitse’u sheneihem hu ushemu’el hakhutsah. 
1_samuel 9:27	hemah yordim biqtseh ha‘ir ushemu’el ’amar ’el sha’ul ’emor lana‘ar veya‘awor lefaneinu vaya‘awor ve’atah ‘amod kayom ve’ashmi‘akha ’et dewar ’elohim. 
1_samuel 10:1	vayiqakh shemu’el ’et pakh hashemen vayitsoq ‘al rosho vayishaqeihu vayomer halo ki meshakhakha yhoh ‘al nakhalato lenagid. 
1_samuel 10:2	belekhtekha hayom mei‘imadi umatsata shenei ’anashim ‘im qewurat rakhel bigwul binyamin betseltsakh ve’ameru ’eilekha nimtse’u ha’atonot ’asher halakhta lewaqesh vehineh natash ’awikha ’et diwrei ha’atonot veda’ag lakhem leimor mah ’e‘eseh liwni. 
1_samuel 10:3	vekhalafta misham vahale’ah uwata ‘ad ’eilon tawor umetsa’ukha sham sheloshah ’anashim ‘olim ’el ha’elohim bet ’el ’ekhad nosei sheloshah gedayim ve’ekhad nosei sheloshet kikerot lekhem ve’ekhad nosei neiwel yayin. 
1_samuel 10:4	vesha’alu lekha leshalom venatenu lekha shetei lekhem velaqakhta miyadam. 
1_samuel 10:5	’akhar ken tawo giw‘at ha’elohim ’asher sham netsiwei felishtim vihi khewo’akha sham ha‘ir ufaga‘ta khewel newi’im yoredim meihabamah velifneihem neiwel vetof vekhalil vekhinor vehemah mitnabe’im. 
1_samuel 10:6	vetsalekhah ‘alekha ruakh yhoh vehitnabita ‘imam venehpakhta le’ish ’akher. 
1_samuel 10:7	vehayah ki tewo’enah tawonah ha’otot ha’eleh lakh ‘aseh lekha ’asher timtsa yadekha ki ha’elohim ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 10:8	veyaradta lefanai hagilgal vehineh ’anokhi yored ’eilekha leha‘alot ‘olot lizboakh ziwkhei shelamim shiw‘at yamim tokhel ‘ad bo’i ’eilekha vehoda‘ti lekha ’et ’asher ta‘aseh. 
1_samuel 10:9	vehayah kehafnoto shikhmo lalekhet mei‘im shemu’el vayahafakh lo ’elohim lew ’akher vayawo’u kal ha’otot ha’eleh bayom hahu. 
1_samuel 10:10	vayawo’u sham hagiw‘atah vehineh khewel newi’im liqrato vatitslakh ‘alav ruakh ’elohim vayitnabei betokham. 
1_samuel 10:11	vayhi kal yod‘o mei’itemol shilshom vayir’u vehineh ‘im newi’im niba vayomer ha‘am ’ish ’el rei‘eihu mah zeh hayah lewen qish hagam sha’ul banewi’im. 
1_samuel 10:12	vaya‘an ’ish misham vayomer umi ’awihem ‘al ken hayetah lemashal hagam sha’ul banewi’im. 
1_samuel 10:13	vaykhal meihitnabot vayawo habamah. 
1_samuel 10:14	vayomer dod sha’ul ’eilav ve’el na‘aro ’an halakhtem vayomer lewaqesh ’et ha’atonot vanir’eh khi ’ayin vanawo ’el shemu’el. 
1_samuel 10:15	vayomer dod sha’ul hagidah na li mah ’amar lakhem shemu’el. 
1_samuel 10:16	vayomer sha’ul ’el dodo haged higid lanu ki nimtse’u ha’atonot ve’et dewar hamelukhah lo higid lo ’asher ’amar shemu’el. 
1_samuel 10:17	vayats‘eq shemu’el ’et ha‘am ’el yhoh hamitspah. 
1_samuel 10:18	vayomer ’el benei yisra’el koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’anokhi he‘eleiti ’et yisra’el mimitsrayim va’atsil ’etkhem miyad mitsrayim umiyad kal hamamlakhot halokhatsim ’etkhem. 
1_samuel 10:19	ve’atem hayom me’astem ’et ’eloheikhem ’asher hu moshia‘ lakhem mikal ra‘oteikhem vetsaroteikhem vatomeru lo ki melekh tasim ‘aleinu ve‘atah hityatsewu lifnei yhoh leshiwteikhem ule’alfeikhem. 
1_samuel 10:20	vayaqrew shemu’el ’et kal shiwtei yisra’el vayilakhed sheiwet binyamin. 
1_samuel 10:21	vayaqrew ’et sheiwet binyamin lemishpekhoto lemishpekhotav vatilakhed mishpakhat hamatri vayilakhed sha’ul ben qish vaywaqshuhu velo nimtsa. 
1_samuel 10:22	vayish’alu ‘od yhoh hawa ‘od halom ’ish vayomer yhoh hineh hu nekhba ’el hakeilim. 
1_samuel 10:23	vayarutsu vayiqakhuhu misham vayityatsew betokh ha‘am vayigbah mikal ha‘am mishikhmo vama‘elah. 
1_samuel 10:24	vayomer shemu’el ’el kal ha‘am hare’item ’asher bakhar bo yhoh ki ’en kamohu bekhal ha‘am vayari‘u khal ha‘am vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. 
1_samuel 10:25	vaydaber shemu’el ’el ha‘am ’et mishpat hamelukhah vayikhtow baseifer vayanakh lifnei yhoh vayshalakh shemu’el ’et kal ha‘am ’ish leweito. 
1_samuel 10:26	vegam sha’ul halakh leweito giw‘atah vayeilekhu ‘imo hakhayil ’asher naga‘ ’elohim belibam. 
1_samuel 10:27	uwenei weliya‘al ’ameru mah yoshi‘einu zeh vayiwzuhu velo heiwi’u lo minkhah vayhi kemakharish. 
1_samuel 11:1	vaya‘al nakhash ha‘amoni vayikhan ‘al yawesh gil‘ad vayomeru kal ’anshei yawesh ’el nakhash kerat lanu werit vena‘awdeka. 
1_samuel 11:2	vayomer ’aleihem nakhash ha‘amoni bezot ’ekhrot lakhem binqor lakhem kal ‘en yamin vesamtiha kherpah ‘al kal yisra’el. 
1_samuel 11:3	vayomeru ’eilav ziqnei yawesh heref lanu shiw‘at yamim venishlekhah mal’akhim bekhol gewul yisra’el ve’im ’en moshia‘ ’otanu veyatsanu ’eilekha. 
1_samuel 11:4	vayawo’u hamal’akhim giw‘at sha’ul vaydaberu hadewarim be’azenei ha‘am vayis’u khal ha‘am ’et qolam vayiwku. 
1_samuel 11:5	vehineh sha’ul ba ’akharei habaqar min hasadeh vayomer sha’ul mah la‘am ki yiwku vaysaperu lo ’et diwrei ’anshei yawesh. 
1_samuel 11:6	vatitslakh ruakh ’elohim ‘al sha’ul beshame‘o keshame‘o ’et hadewarim ha’eleh vayikhar ’apo me’od. 
1_samuel 11:7	vayiqakh tsemed baqar vaynatekheihu vayshalakh bekhal gewul yisra’el beyad hamal’akhim leimor ’asher ’einenu yotsei ’akharei sha’ul ve’akhar shemu’el koh yei‘aseh liwqaro vayipol pakhad yhoh ‘al ha‘am vayeitse’u ke’ish ’ekhad. 
1_samuel 11:8	vayifqedem bewazeq vayihyu wenei yisra’el shelosh mei’ot ’elef ve’ish yehudah sheloshim ’alef. 
1_samuel 11:9	vayomeru lamal’akhim haba’im koh tomerun le’ish yawesh gil‘ad makhar tihyeh lakhem teshu‘ah bekhom kekhom hashamesh vayawo’u hamal’akhim vayagidu le’anshei yawesh vayismakhu. 
1_samuel 11:10	vayomeru ’anshei yawesh makhar neitsei ’aleikhem va‘asitem lanu kekhal hatow be‘eineikhem. 
1_samuel 11:11	vayhi mimakhorat vayasem sha’ul ’et ha‘am sheloshah rashim vayawo’u wetokh hamakhaneh be’ashmoret haboqer vayaku ’et ‘amon ‘ad khom hayom vayhi hanish’arim vayafutsu velo nish’aru wam shenayim yakhad. 
1_samuel 11:12	vayomer ha‘am ’el shemu’el mi ha’omer sha’ul yimlokh ‘aleinu tenu ha’anashim unemitem. 
1_samuel 11:13	vayomer sha’ul lo yumat ’ish bayom hazeh ki hayom ‘asah yhoh teshu‘ah beyisra’el. 
1_samuel 11:14	vayomer shemu’el ’el ha‘am lekhu veneilekhah hagilgal unekhadesh sham hamelukhah. 
1_samuel 11:15	vayeilekhu khal ha‘am hagilgal vayamlikhu sham ’et sha’ul lifnei yhoh bagilgal vayizbekhu sham zewakhim shelamim lifnei yhoh vayismakh sham sha’ul vekhal ’anshei yisra’el ‘ad me’od. 
1_samuel 12:1	vayomer shemu’el ’el kal yisra’el hineh shama‘ti weqolekhem lekhol ’asher ’amartem li va’amlikh ‘aleikhem melekh. 
1_samuel 12:2	ve‘atah hineh hamelekh mithalekh lifneikhem va’ani zaqanti vasawti uwanai hinam ’itekhem va’ani hithalakhti lifneikhem mine‘urai ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_samuel 12:3	hini ‘anu wi neged yhoh veneged meshikho ’et shor mi laqakhti vakhamor mi laqakhti ve’et mi ‘ashaqti ’et mi ratsoti umiyad mi laqakhti khofer ve’a‘lim ‘einai bo ve’ashiw lakhem. 
1_samuel 12:4	vayomeru lo ‘ashaqtanu velo ratsotanu velo laqakhta miyad ’ish me’umah. 
1_samuel 12:5	vayomer ’aleihem ‘ed yhoh bakhem ve‘ed meshikho hayom hazeh ki lo metsatem beyadi me’umah vayomer ‘ed. 
1_samuel 12:6	vayomer shemu’el ’el ha‘am yhoh ’asher ‘asah ’et mosheh ve’et ’aharon va’asher he‘elah ’et ’awoteikhem mei’erets mitsrayim. 
1_samuel 12:7	ve‘atah hityatsewu ve’ishafetah ’itekhem lifnei yhoh ’et kal tsidqot yhoh ’asher ‘asah ’itekhem ve’et ’awoteikhem. 
1_samuel 12:8	ka’asher ba ya‘aqow mitsrayim vayiz‘aqu ’awoteikhem ’el yhoh vayishlakh yhoh ’et mosheh ve’et ’aharon vayotsi’u ’et ’awoteikhem mimitsrayim vayoshiwum bamaqom hazeh. 
1_samuel 12:9	vayishkekhu ’et yhoh ’eloheihem vayimkor ’otam beyad sisera sar tsewa khatsor uweyad pelishtim uweyad melekh mo’aw vayilakhamu bam. 
1_samuel 12:10	vayiz‘aqu ’el yhoh vayomer vayomeru khatanu ki ‘azawnu ’et yhoh vana‘awod ’et habe‘alim ve’et ha‘ashtarot ve‘atah hatsileinu miyad ’oyeweinu vena‘awdeka. 
1_samuel 12:11	vayishlakh yhoh ’et yeruba‘al ve’et bedan ve’et yiftakh ve’et shemu’el vayatsel ’etkhem miyad ’oyeweikhem misawiw vateishewu betakh. 
1_samuel 12:12	vatir’u ki nakhash melekh benei ‘amon ba ‘aleikhem vatomeru li lo ki melekh yimlokh ‘aleinu yhoh ’eloheikhem malkekhem. 
1_samuel 12:13	ve‘atah hineh hamelekh ’asher bekhartem ’asher she’eltem vehineh natan yhoh ‘aleikhem melekh. 
1_samuel 12:14	’im tire’u ’et yhoh va‘awadtem ’oto ushema‘tem beqolo velo tamru ’et pi yhoh vihyitem gam ’atem vegam hamelekh ’asher malakh ‘aleikhem ’akhar yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
1_samuel 12:15	ve’im lo tishme‘u beqol yhoh umeritem ’et pi yhoh vehayetah yad yhoh bakhem uwa’awoteikhem. 
1_samuel 12:16	gam ‘atah hityatsewu ure’u ’et hadawar hagadol hazeh ’asher yhoh ‘oseh le‘eineikhem. 
1_samuel 12:17	halo qetsir khitim hayom ’eqra ’el yhoh veyiten qolot umatar ude‘u ure’u ki ra‘atkhem rabah ’asher ‘asitem be‘einei yhoh lish’ol lakhem melekh. 
1_samuel 12:18	vayiqra shemu’el ’el yhoh vayiten yhoh qolot umatar bayom hahu vayira khal ha‘am me’od ’et yhoh ve’et shemu’el. 
1_samuel 12:19	vayomeru khal ha‘am ’el shemu’el hitpalel be‘ad ‘awadekha ’el yhoh ’elohekha ve’al namut ki yasafnu ‘al kal khatoteinu ra‘ah lish’ol lanu melekh. 
1_samuel 12:20	vayomer shemu’el ’el ha‘am ’al tira’u ’atem ‘asitem ’et kal hara‘ah hazot ’akh ’al tasuru mei’akharei yhoh va‘awadtem ’et yhoh bekhal lewawkhem. 
1_samuel 12:21	velo tasuru ki ’akharei hatohu ’asher lo yo‘ilu velo yatsilu ki tohu hemah. 
1_samuel 12:22	ki lo yitosh yhoh ’et ‘amo ba‘awur shemo hagadol ki ho’il yhoh la‘asot ’etkhem lo le‘am. 
1_samuel 12:23	gam ’anokhi khalilah li meikhato yhoh meikhadol lehitpalel ba‘adkhem vehoreiti ’etkhem bederekh hatowah vehaysharah. 
1_samuel 12:24	’akh yer’u ’et yhoh va‘awadtem ’oto be’emet bekhal lewawkhem ki re’u ’et ’asher higdil ‘imakhem. 
1_samuel 12:25	ve’im hareia‘ tarei‘u gam ’atem gam malkekhem tisafu. 
1_samuel 13:1	ben shanah sha’ul bemalekho ushetei shanim malakh ‘al yisra’el. 
1_samuel 13:2	vayiwkhar lo sha’ul sheloshet ’alafim miyisra’el vayihyu ‘im sha’ul ’alpayim bemikhmas uwehar bet ’el ve’elef hayu ‘im yonatan begiw‘at binyamin veyeter ha‘am shilakh ’ish le’ohalav. 
1_samuel 13:3	vayakh yonatan ’et netsiw pelishtim ’asher begewa‘ vayishme‘u pelishtim vesha’ul taqa‘ bashofar bekhal ha’arets leimor yishme‘u ha‘iwrim. 
1_samuel 13:4	vekhal yisra’el shame‘u leimor hikah sha’ul ’et netsiw pelishtim vegam niw’ash yisra’el bapelishtim vayitsa‘aqu ha‘am ’akharei sha’ul hagilgal. 
1_samuel 13:5	ufelishtim ne’esfu lehilakhem ‘im yisra’el sheloshim ’elef rekhew vesheishet ’alafim parashim ve‘am kakhol ’asher ‘al sefat hayam larow vaya‘alu vayakhanu wemikhmas qidmat bet ’aven. 
1_samuel 13:6	ve’ish yisra’el ra’u ki tsar lo ki nigas ha‘am vayitkhabe’u ha‘am bame‘arot uwakhavakhim uwasela‘im uwatserikhim uwaborot. 
1_samuel 13:7	ve‘iwrim ‘aweru ’et hayarden ’erets gad vegil‘ad vesha’ul ‘odenu wagilgal vekhal ha‘am kharedu ’akharav. 
1_samuel 13:8	vayikhel vayokhel shiw‘at yamim lamo‘ed ’asher shemu’el velo wa shemu’el hagilgal vayafets ha‘am mei‘alav. 
1_samuel 13:9	vayomer sha’ul hagishu ’eilai ha‘olah vehashelamim vaya‘al ha‘olah. 
1_samuel 13:10	vayhi kekhaloto leha‘alot ha‘olah vehineh shemu’el ba vayeitsei sha’ul liqrato lewarakho. 
1_samuel 13:11	vayomer shemu’el meh ‘asita vayomer sha’ul ki ra’iti khi nafats ha‘am mei‘alai ve’atah lo wata lemo‘ed hayamim ufelishtim ne’esafim mikhmas. 
1_samuel 13:12	va’omar ‘atah yeiredu felishtim ’eilai hagilgal ufenei yhoh lo khiliti va’et’apaq va’a‘aleh ha‘olah. 
1_samuel 13:13	vayomer shemu’el ’el sha’ul niskaleta lo shamarta ’et mitsvat yhoh ’elohekha ’asher tsivakh ki ‘atah heikhin yhoh ’et mamlakhtekha ’el yisra’el ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_samuel 13:14	ve‘atah mamlakhtekha lo taqum biqesh yhoh lo ’ish kilwawo vaytsaveihu yhoh lenagid ‘al ‘amo ki lo shamarta ’et ’asher tsivekha yhoh. 
1_samuel 13:15	vayaqam shemu’el vaya‘al min hagilgal giw‘at binyamin vayifqod sha’ul ’et ha‘am hanimtse’im ‘imo keshesh mei’ot ’ish. 
1_samuel 13:16	vesha’ul veyonatan beno veha‘am hanimtsa ‘imam yoshewim begewa‘ binyamin ufelishtim khanu wemikhmas. 
1_samuel 13:17	vayeitsei hamashkhit mimakhaneh felishtim sheloshah rashim harosh ’ekhad yifneh ’el derekh ‘aferah ’el ’erets shu‘al. 
1_samuel 13:18	veharosh ’ekhad yifneh derekh bet khoron veharosh ’ekhad yifneh derekh hagewul hanishqaf ‘al gei hatsewo‘im hamidbarah. 
1_samuel 13:19	vekharash lo yimatsei bekhol ’erets yisra’el ki ’amar ’ameru felishtim pen ya‘asu ha‘iwrim kherew ’o khanit. 
1_samuel 13:20	vayeiredu khal yisra’el hapelishtim liltosh ’ish ’et makharashto ve’et ’eito ve’et qardumo ve’et makhareishato. 
1_samuel 13:21	vehayetah hapetsirah fim lamakhareishot vela’eitim velishlosh qileshon ulehaqardumim ulehatsiw hadarewan. 
1_samuel 13:22	vehayah beyom milkhemet velo nimtsa kherew vakhanit beyad kal ha‘am ’asher ’et sha’ul ve’et yonatan vatimatsei lesha’ul uleyonatan beno. 
1_samuel 13:23	vayeitsei matsaw pelishtim ’el ma‘awar mikhmas. 
1_samuel 14:1	vayhi hayom vayomer yonatan ben sha’ul ’el hana‘ar nosei kheilav lekhah vena‘berah ’el matsaw pelishtim ’asher mei‘eiwer halaz ule’awiv lo higid. 
1_samuel 14:2	vesha’ul yoshew biqtseh hagiw‘ah takhat harimon ’asher bemigron veha‘am ’asher ‘imo keshesh mei’ot ’ish. 
1_samuel 14:3	va’akhiyah wen ’akhituw ’akhi ’ikhawod ben pinekhas ben ‘eili kohen yhoh beshilo nosei ’eifod veha‘am lo yada‘ ki halakh yonatan. 
1_samuel 14:4	uwen hama‘berot ’asher biqesh yonatan la‘awor ‘al matsaw pelishtim shen hasela‘ meiha‘eiwer mizeh veshen hasela‘ meiha‘eiwer mizeh veshem ha’ekhad botsets veshem ha’ekhad seneh. 
1_samuel 14:5	hashen ha’ekhad matsuq mitsafon mul mikhmas veha’ekhad minegew mul gawa‘. 
1_samuel 14:6	vayomer yehonatan ’el hana‘ar nosei kheilav lekhah vena‘berah ’el matsaw ha‘areilim ha’eleh ’ulai ya‘aseh yhoh lanu ki ’en yhoh ma‘tsor lehoshia‘ beraw ’o wim‘at. 
1_samuel 14:7	vayomer lo nosei kheilav ‘aseh kal ’asher bilwawekha neteh lakh hini ‘imekha kilwawekha. 
1_samuel 14:8	vayomer yehonatan hineh ’anakhnu ‘owerim ’el ha’anashim veniglinu ’aleihem. 
1_samuel 14:9	’im koh yomeru ’eileinu domu ‘ad hagi‘einu ’aleikhem ve‘amadnu takhteinu velo na‘aleh ’aleihem. 
1_samuel 14:10	ve’im koh yomeru ‘alu ‘aleinu ve‘alinu ki netanam yhoh beyadeinu vezeh lanu ha’ot. 
1_samuel 14:11	vayigalu sheneihem ’el matsaw pelishtim vayomeru felishtim hineh ‘iwrim yotse’im min hakhorim ’asher hitkhabe’u sham. 
1_samuel 14:12	vaya‘anu ’anshei hamatsawah ’et yonatan ve’et nosei kheilav vayomeru ‘alu ’eileinu venodi‘ah ’etkhem dawar vayomer yonatan ’el nosei kheilav ‘aleh ’akharai ki netanam yhoh beyad yisra’el. 
1_samuel 14:13	vaya‘al yonatan ‘al yadav ve‘al raglav venosei kheilav ’akharav vayipelu lifnei yonatan venosei kheilav memotet ’akharav. 
1_samuel 14:14	vatehi hamakah harishonah ’asher hikah yonatan venosei kheilav ke‘esrim ’ish kewakhatsi ma‘anah tsemed sadeh. 
1_samuel 14:15	vatehi kharadah wamakhaneh wasadeh uwekhal ha‘am hamatsaw vehamashkhit kharedu gam hemah vatirgaz ha’arets vatehi lekherdat ’elohim. 
1_samuel 14:16	vayir’u hatsofim lesha’ul begiw‘at binyamin vehineh hehamon namog vayeilekh vahalom. 
1_samuel 14:17	vayomer sha’ul la‘am ’asher ’ito piqdu na ure’u mi halakh mei‘imanu vayifqedu vehineh ’en yonatan venosei kheilav. 
1_samuel 14:18	vayomer sha’ul la’akhiyah hagishah ’aron ha’elohim ki hayah ’aron ha’elohim bayom hahu uwenei yisra’el. 
1_samuel 14:19	vayhi ‘ad diber sha’ul ’el hakohen vehehamon ’asher bemakhaneh felishtim vayeilekh halokh varaw vayomer sha’ul ’el hakohen ’esof yadekha. 
1_samuel 14:20	vayiza‘eq sha’ul vekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito vayawo’u ‘ad hamilkhamah vehineh hayetah kherew ’ish berei‘eihu mehumah gedolah me’od. 
1_samuel 14:21	veha‘iwrim hayu lapelishtim ke’etmol shilshom ’asher ‘alu ‘imam bamakhaneh sawiw vegam hemah lihyot ‘im yisra’el ’asher ‘im sha’ul veyonatan. 
1_samuel 14:22	vekhol ’ish yisra’el hamitkhabe’im behar ’efrayim shame‘u ki nasu pelishtim vayadbequ gam hemah ’akhareihem bamilkhamah. 
1_samuel 14:23	vayosha‘ yhoh bayom hahu ’et yisra’el vehamilkhamah ‘awerah ’et bet ’aven. 
1_samuel 14:24	ve’ish yisra’el nigas bayom hahu vayo’el sha’ul ’et ha‘am leimor ’arur ha’ish ’asher yokhal lekhem ‘ad ha‘erew veniqamti mei’oyewai velo ta‘am kal ha‘am lakhem. 
1_samuel 14:25	vekhal ha’arets ba’u waya‘ar vayhi dewash ‘al penei hasadeh. 
1_samuel 14:26	vayawo ha‘am ’el haya‘ar vehineh heilekh dewash ve’en masig yado ’el piv ki yarei ha‘am ’et hashewu‘ah. 
1_samuel 14:27	veyonatan lo shama‘ behashbia‘ ’awiv ’et ha‘am vayishlakh ’et qetseh hamateh ’asher beyado vayitbol ’otah beya‘rat hadewash vayashew yado ’el piv vataronah vata’orenah ‘einav. 
1_samuel 14:28	vaya‘an ’ish meiha‘am vayomer hashbeia‘ hishbia‘ ’awikha ’et ha‘am leimor ’arur ha’ish ’asher yokhal lekhem hayom vaya‘af ha‘am. 
1_samuel 14:29	vayomer yonatan ‘akhar ’awi ’et ha’arets re’u na ki ’oru ‘einai ki ta‘amti me‘at dewash hazeh. 
1_samuel 14:30	’af ki lu ’akhol ’akhal hayom ha‘am mishelal ’oyewav ’asher matsa ki ‘atah lo rawetah makah bapelishtim. 
1_samuel 14:31	vayaku bayom hahu bapelishtim mimikhmas ’ayalonah vaya‘af ha‘am me’od. 
1_samuel 14:32	vaya‘as vaya‘at ha‘am ’el shalal hashalal vayiqkhu tson uwaqar uwenei waqar vayishkhatu ’aretsah vayokhal ha‘am ‘al hadam. 
1_samuel 14:33	vayagidu lesha’ul leimor hineh ha‘am khotim yhoh le’ekhol ‘al hadam vayomer begadtem golu ’eilai hayom ’ewen gedolah.
