1_samuel 14:34	vayomer sha’ul putsu wa‘am va’amartem lahem hagishu ’eilai ’ish shoro ve’ish seyeihu ushekhatem bazeh va’akhaltem velo tekhet’u yhoh le’ekhol ’el hadam vayagishu khal ha‘am ’ish shoro weyado halaylah vayishkhatu sham. 
1_samuel 14:35	vayiwen sha’ul mizbeiakh yhoh ’oto heikhel liwnot mizbeiakh yhoh. 
1_samuel 14:36	vayomer sha’ul neiredah ’akharei felishtim laylah venawozah wahem ‘ad ’or haboqer velo nash’er bahem ’ish vayomeru kal hatow be‘einekha ‘aseh vayomer hakohen niqrewah halom ’el ha’elohim. 
1_samuel 14:37	vayish’al sha’ul beilohim ha’eired ’akharei felishtim hatitenem beyad yisra’el velo ‘anahu bayom hahu. 
1_samuel 14:38	vayomer sha’ul goshu halom kol pinot ha‘am ude‘u ure’u bamah hayetah hakhatat hazot hayom. 
1_samuel 14:39	ki khai yhoh hamoshia‘ ’et yisra’el ki ’im yeshno beyonatan beni ki mot yamut ve’en ‘oneihu mikal ha‘am. 
1_samuel 14:40	vayomer ’el kal yisra’el ’atem tihyu le‘eiwer ’ekhad va’ani veyonatan beni nihyeh le‘eiwer ’ekhad vayomeru ha‘am ’el sha’ul hatow be‘einekha ‘aseh. 
1_samuel 14:41	vayomer sha’ul ’el yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hawah tamim vayilakhed yonatan vesha’ul veha‘am yatsa’u. 
1_samuel 14:42	vayomer sha’ul hapilu beini uwen yonatan beni vayilakhed yonatan. 
1_samuel 14:43	vayomer sha’ul ’el yonatan hagidah li meh ‘asitah vayaged lo yonatan vayomer ta‘om ta‘amti biqtseh hamateh ’asher beyadi me‘at dewash hini ’amut. 
1_samuel 14:44	vayomer sha’ul koh ya‘aseh ’elohim vekhoh yosif ki mot tamut yonatan. 
1_samuel 14:45	vayomer ha‘am ’el sha’ul hayonatan yamut ’asher ‘asah hayshu‘ah hagedolah hazot beyisra’el khalilah khai yhoh ’im yipol misa‘arat rosho ’artsah ki ‘im ’elohim ‘asah hayom hazeh vayifdu ha‘am ’et yonatan velo met. 
1_samuel 14:46	vaya‘al sha’ul mei’akharei pelishtim ufelishtim halekhu limqomam. 
1_samuel 14:47	vesha’ul lakhad hamelukhah ‘al yisra’el vayilakhem sawiw bekhal ’oyewav bemo’aw uwiwnei ‘amon uwe’edom uwemalkhei tsowah uwapelishtim uwekhol ’asher yifneh yarshia‘. 
1_samuel 14:48	vaya‘as khayil vayakh ’et ‘amaleq vayatsel ’et yisra’el miyad shoseihu. 
1_samuel 14:49	vayihyu benei sha’ul yonatan veyishvi umalki shua‘ veshem shetei wenotav shem habekhirah meiraw veshem haqetanah mikhal. 
1_samuel 14:50	veshem ’eishet sha’ul ’akhino‘am bat ’akhima‘ats veshem sar tsewa’o ’awiner ben ner dod sha’ul. 
1_samuel 14:51	veqish ’awi sha’ul vener ’awi ’awner ben ’awi’el. 
1_samuel 14:52	vatehi hamilkhamah khazaqah ‘al pelishtim kol yemei sha’ul vera’ah sha’ul kal ’ish gibor vekhal ben khayil vaya’asfeihu ’eilav. 
1_samuel 15:1	vayomer shemu’el ’el sha’ul ’oti shalakh yhoh limshakhokha lemelekh ‘al ‘amo ‘al yisra’el ve‘atah shema‘ leqol diwrei yhoh. 
1_samuel 15:2	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot paqadti ’et ’asher ‘asah ‘amaleq leyisra’el ’asher sam lo baderekh ba‘aloto mimitsrayim. 
1_samuel 15:3	‘atah lekh vehikitah ’et ‘amaleq vehakharamtem ’et kal ’asher lo velo takhmol ‘alav veheimatah mei’ish ‘ad ’ishah mei‘olel ve‘ad yoneq mishor ve‘ad seh migamal ve‘ad khamor. 
1_samuel 15:4	vayshama‘ sha’ul ’et ha‘am vayifqedem batela’im matayim ’elef ragli va‘aseret ’alafim ’et ’ish yehudah. 
1_samuel 15:5	vayawo sha’ul ‘ad ‘ir ‘amaleq vayarew banakhal. 
1_samuel 15:6	vayomer sha’ul ’el haqeini lekhu suru redu mitokh ‘amaleiqi pen ’osifkha ‘imo ve’atah ‘asitah khesed ‘im kal benei yisra’el ba‘alotam mimitsrayim vayasar qeini mitokh ‘amaleq. 
1_samuel 15:7	vayakh sha’ul ’et ‘amaleq meikhavilah bo’akha shur ’asher ‘al penei mitsrayim. 
1_samuel 15:8	vayitpos ’et ’agag melekh ‘amaleq khai ve’et kal ha‘am hekherim lefi kharew. 
1_samuel 15:9	vayakhmol sha’ul veha‘am ‘al ’agag ve‘al meitaw hatson vehabaqar vehamishnim ve‘al hakarim ve‘al kal hatow velo ’awu hakharimam vekhal hamelakhah nemiwzah venames ’otah hekherimu. 
1_samuel 15:10	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el shemu’el leimor. 
1_samuel 15:11	nikhamti ki himlakhti ’et sha’ul lemelekh ki shaw mei’akharai ve’et dewarai lo heiqim vayikhar lishmu’el vayiz‘aq ’el yhoh kal halayelah. 
1_samuel 15:12	vayashkem shemu’el liqrat sha’ul baboqer vayugad lishmu’el leimor ba sha’ul hakarmelah vehineh matsiw lo yad vayisow vaya‘awor vayeired hagilgal. 
1_samuel 15:13	vayawo shemu’el ’el sha’ul vayomer lo sha’ul barukh ’atah yhoh haqimoti ’et dewar yhoh. 
1_samuel 15:14	vayomer shemu’el umeh qol hatson hazeh be’azenai veqol habaqar ’asher ’anokhi shomeia‘. 
1_samuel 15:15	vayomer sha’ul mei‘amaleiqi hewi’um ’asher khamal ha‘am ‘al meitaw hatson vehabaqar lema‘an zewoakh yhoh ’elohekha ve’et hayoter hekheramnu. 
1_samuel 15:16	vayomer shemu’el ’el sha’ul heref ve’agidah lekha ’et ’asher diber yhoh ’eilai halayelah vayomeru vayomer lo daber. 
1_samuel 15:17	vayomer shemu’el halo ’im qaton ’atah be‘einekha rosh shiwtei yisra’el ’atah vayimshakhakha yhoh lemelekh ‘al yisra’el. 
1_samuel 15:18	vayishlakhakha yhoh bedarekh vayomer lekh vehakharamtah ’et hakhata’im ’et ‘amaleq venilkhamta wo ‘ad kalotam ’otam. 
1_samuel 15:19	velamah lo shama‘ta beqol yhoh vata‘at ’el hashalal vata‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
1_samuel 15:20	vayomer sha’ul ’el shemu’el ’asher shama‘ti beqol yhoh va’eilekh baderekh ’asher shelakhani yhoh va’awi ’et ’agag melekh ‘amaleq ve’et ‘amaleq hekheramti. 
1_samuel 15:21	vayiqakh ha‘am meihashalal tson uwaqar reishit hakheirem lizboakh yhoh ’elohekha bagilgal. 
1_samuel 15:22	vayomer shemu’el hakheifets yhoh be‘olot uzewakhim kishmoa‘ beqol yhoh hineh shemoa‘ mizewakh tow lehaqshiw meikheilew ’eilim. 
1_samuel 15:23	ki khatat qesem meri ve’aven uterafim haftsar ya‘an ma’asta ’et dewar yhoh vayim’asekha mimelekh. 
1_samuel 15:24	vayomer sha’ul ’el shemu’el khatati ki ‘awarti ’et pi yhoh ve’et dewarekha ki yareiti ’et ha‘am va’eshma‘ beqolam. 
1_samuel 15:25	ve‘atah sa na ’et khatati veshuw ‘imi ve’eshtakhaveh yhoh. 
1_samuel 15:26	vayomer shemu’el ’el sha’ul lo ’ashuw ‘imakh ki ma’astah ’et dewar yhoh vayim’asekha yhoh mihyot melekh ‘al yisra’el. 
1_samuel 15:27	vayisow shemu’el lalekhet vayakhazeq bikhnaf me‘ilo vayiqara‘. 
1_samuel 15:28	vayomer ’eilav shemu’el qara‘ yhoh ’et mamlekhut yisra’el mei‘alekha hayom unetanah lerei‘akha hatow mimeka. 
1_samuel 15:29	vegam neitsakh yisra’el lo yeshaqer velo yinakhem ki lo ’adam hu lehinakhem. 
1_samuel 15:30	vayomer khatati ‘atah kabedeini na neged ziqnei ‘ami veneged yisra’el veshuw ‘imi vehishtakhaveiti yhoh ’elohekha. 
1_samuel 15:31	vayashaw shemu’el ’akharei sha’ul vayishtakhu sha’ul yhoh. 
1_samuel 15:32	vayomer shemu’el hagishu ’eilai ’et ’agag melekh ‘amaleq vayeilekh ’eilav ’agag ma‘adanot vayomer ’agag ’akhen sar mar hamavet. 
1_samuel 15:33	vayomer shemu’el ka’asher shikelah nashim kharbekha ken tishkal minashim ’imekha vayshasef shemu’el ’et ’agag lifnei yhoh bagilgal. 
1_samuel 15:34	vayeilekh shemu’el haramatah vesha’ul ‘alah ’el beito giw‘at sha’ul. 
1_samuel 15:35	velo yasaf shemu’el lir’ot ’et sha’ul ‘ad yom moto ki hit’abel shemu’el ’el sha’ul yhoh nikham ki himlikh ’et sha’ul ‘al yisra’el. 
1_samuel 16:1	vayomer yhoh ’el shemu’el ‘ad matai ’atah mit’abel ’el sha’ul va’ani me’astiv mimelokh ‘al yisra’el malei qarnekha shemen velekh ’eshlakhakha ’el yishai bet halakhmi ki ra’iti bewanav li melekh. 
1_samuel 16:2	vayomer shemu’el ’ekh ’eilekh veshama‘ sha’ul vaharagani vayomer yhoh ‘eglat baqar tiqakh beyadekha ve’amarta lizboakh yhoh bati. 
1_samuel 16:3	veqarata leyishai bazawakh ve’anokhi ’odi‘akha ’et ’asher ta‘aseh umashakhta li ’et ’asher ’omar ’eilekha. 
1_samuel 16:4	vaya‘as shemu’el ’et ’asher diber yhoh vayawo bet lakhem vayekherdu ziqnei ha‘ir liqrato vayomer shalom bo’ekha. 
1_samuel 16:5	vayomer shalom lizboakh yhoh bati hitqadeshu uwatem ’iti bazawakh vayqadesh ’et yishai ve’et banav vayiqra lahem lazawakh. 
1_samuel 16:6	vayhi bewo’am vayar ’et ’eli’aw vayomer ’akh neged yhoh meshikho. 
1_samuel 16:7	vayomer yhoh ’el shemu’el ’al tabet ’el mar’eihu ve’el gewoah qomato ki me’astihu ki lo ’asher yir’eh ha’adam ki ha’adam yir’eh la‘einayim yhoh yir’eh laleiwaw. 
1_samuel 16:8	vayiqra yishai ’el ’awinadaw vaya‘awireihu lifnei shemu’el vayomer gam bazeh lo wakhar yhoh. 
1_samuel 16:9	vaya‘awer yishai shamah vayomer gam bazeh lo wakhar yhoh. 
1_samuel 16:10	vaya‘awer yishai shiw‘at banav lifnei shemu’el vayomer shemu’el ’el yishai lo wakhar yhoh ba’eleh. 
1_samuel 16:11	vayomer shemu’el ’el yishai hatamu hane‘arim vayomer ‘od sha’ar haqatan vehineh ro‘eh batson vayomer shemu’el ’el yishai shilkhah veqakhenu ki lo nasow ‘ad bo’o foh. 
1_samuel 16:12	vayishlakh vaywi’eihu vehu ’admoni ‘im yefeh ‘einayim vetow ro’i vayomer yhoh qum meshakheihu ki zeh hu. 
1_samuel 16:13	vayiqakh shemu’el ’et qeren hashemen vayimshakh ’oto beqerew ’ekhav vatitslakh ruakh yhoh ’el david meihayom hahu vama‘elah vayaqam shemu’el vayeilekh haramatah. 
1_samuel 16:14	veruakh yhoh sarah mei‘im sha’ul uwi‘atatu ruakh ra‘ah mei’et yhoh. 
1_samuel 16:15	vayomeru ‘awdei sha’ul ’eilav hineh na ruakh ’elohim ra‘ah mewa‘itekha. 
1_samuel 16:16	yomar na ’adoneinu ‘awadekha lefanekha yewaqshu ’ish yodeia‘ menagen bakinor vehayah bihyot ‘alekha ruakh ’elohim ra‘ah venigen beyado vetow lakh. 
1_samuel 16:17	vayomer sha’ul ’el ‘awadav re’u na li ’ish meitiw lenagen vahawi’otem ’eilai. 
1_samuel 16:18	vaya‘an ’ekhad meihane‘arim vayomer hineh ra’iti ben leyishai bet halakhmi yodeia‘ nagen vegibor khayil ve’ish milkhamah unewon dawar ve’ish to’ar yhoh ‘imo. 
1_samuel 16:19	vayishlakh sha’ul mal’akhim ’el yishai vayomer shilkhah ’eilai ’et david binkha ’asher batson. 
1_samuel 16:20	vayiqakh yishai khamor lekhem venod yayin ugedi ‘izim ’ekhad vayishlakh beyad david beno ’el sha’ul. 
1_samuel 16:21	vayawo david ’el sha’ul vaya‘amod lefanav vaye’ehaweihu me’od vayhi lo nosei kheilim. 
1_samuel 16:22	vayishlakh sha’ul ’el yishai leimor ya‘amad na david lefanai ki matsa khen be‘einai. 
1_samuel 16:23	vehayah bihyot ruakh ’elohim ’el sha’ul velaqakh david ’et hakinor venigen beyado veravakh lesha’ul vetow lo vesarah mei‘alav ruakh hara‘ah. 
1_samuel 17:1	vaya’asfu felishtim ’et makhaneihem lamilkhamah vayei’asefu sokhoh ’asher lihudah vayakhanu ben sokhoh uwen ‘azeiqah be’efes damim. 
1_samuel 17:2	vesha’ul ve’ish yisra’el ne’esfu vayakhanu be‘eimeq ha’eilah vaya‘arkhu milkhamah liqrat pelishtim. 
1_samuel 17:3	ufelishtim ‘omedim ’el hahar mizeh veyisra’el ‘omedim ’el hahar mizeh vehagai beineihem. 
1_samuel 17:4	vayeitsei ’ish habeinayim mimakhanot pelishtim galeyat shemo migat gaweho shesh ’amot vazaret. 
1_samuel 17:5	vekhowa‘ nekhoshet ‘al rosho veshiryon qasqasim hu lawush umishqal hashiryon khameishet ’alafim sheqalim nekhoshet. 
1_samuel 17:6	umitskhat nekhoshet ‘al raglav vekhidon nekhoshet ben keteifav. 
1_samuel 17:7	vekhats ve‘ets khanito kimnor ’oregim velahewet khanito shesh mei’ot sheqalim barzel venosei hatsinah holekh lefanav. 
1_samuel 17:8	vaya‘amod vayiqra ’el ma‘arkhot yisra’el vayomer lahem lamah teitse’u la‘arokh milkhamah halo ’anokhi hapelishti ve’atem ‘awadim lesha’ul beru lakhem ’ish veyeired ’eilai. 
1_samuel 17:9	’im yukhal lehilakhem ’iti vehikani vehayinu lakhem la‘awadim ve’im ’ani ’ukhal lo vehikitiv vihyitem lanu la‘awadim va‘awadtem ’otanu. 
1_samuel 17:10	vayomer hapelishti ’ani kheirafti ’et ma‘arkhot yisra’el hayom hazeh tenu li ’ish venilakhamah yakhad. 
1_samuel 17:11	vayishma‘ sha’ul vekhal yisra’el ’et diwrei hapelishti ha’eleh vayeikhatu vayir’u me’od. 
1_samuel 17:12	vedavid ben ’ish ’efrati hazeh mibet lekhem yehudah ushemo yishai velo shemonah wanim veha’ish bimei sha’ul zaqen ba wa’anashim. 
1_samuel 17:13	vayeilekhu sheloshet benei yishai hagedolim halekhu ’akharei sha’ul lamilkhamah veshem sheloshet banav ’asher halekhu bamilkhamah ’eli’aw habekhor umishneihu ’awinadaw vehashelishi shamah. 
1_samuel 17:14	vedavid hu haqatan usheloshah hagedolim halekhu ’akharei sha’ul. 
1_samuel 17:15	vedavid holekh vashaw mei‘al sha’ul lir‘ot ’et tson ’awiv bet lakhem. 
1_samuel 17:16	vayigash hapelishti hashkem veha‘arew vayityatsew ’arba‘im yom. 
1_samuel 17:17	vayomer yishai ledavid beno qakh na le’akhekha ’eifat haqali hazeh va‘asarah lekhem hazeh veharets hamakhaneh le’akhekha. 
1_samuel 17:18	ve’et ‘aseret kharitsei hekhalaw ha’eleh tawi lesar ha’alef ve’et ’akhekha tifqod leshalom ve’et ‘arubatam tiqakh. 
1_samuel 17:19	vesha’ul vehemah vekhal ’ish yisra’el be‘eimeq ha’eilah nilkhamim ‘im pelishtim. 
1_samuel 17:20	vayashkem david baboqer vayitosh ’et hatson ‘al shomer vayisa vayeilekh ka’asher tsivahu yishai vayawo hama‘galah vehakhayil hayotsei ’el hama‘arakhah veheirei‘u bamilkhamah. 
1_samuel 17:21	vata‘arokh yisra’el ufelishtim ma‘arakhah liqrat ma‘arakhah. 
1_samuel 17:22	vayitosh david ’et hakeilim mei‘alav ‘al yad shomer hakeilim vayarats hama‘arakhah vayawo vayish’al le’ekhav leshalom. 
1_samuel 17:23	vehu medaber ‘imam vehineh ’ish habeinayim ‘oleh galeyat hapelishti shemo migat mima‘arot mima‘arkhot pelishtim vaydaber kadewarim ha’eleh vayishma‘ david. 
1_samuel 17:24	vekhol ’ish yisra’el bir’otam ’et ha’ish vayanusu mipanav vayire’u me’od. 
1_samuel 17:25	vayomer ’ish yisra’el hare’item ha’ish ha‘oleh hazeh ki lekharef ’et yisra’el ‘oleh vehayah ha’ish ’asher yakenu ya‘sherenu hamelekh ‘osher gadol ve’et bito yiten lo ve’et bet ’awiv ya‘aseh khafeshi beyisra’el. 
1_samuel 17:26	vayomer david ’el ha’anashim ha‘omedim ‘imo leimor mah yei‘aseh la’ish ’asher yakeh ’et hapelishti halaz veheisir kherpah mei‘al yisra’el ki mi hapelishti he‘arel hazeh ki kheiref ma‘arkhot ’elohim khayim. 
1_samuel 17:27	vayomer lo ha‘am kadawar hazeh leimor koh yei‘aseh la’ish ’asher yakenu. 
1_samuel 17:28	vayishma‘ ’eli’aw ’akhiv hagadol bedabero ’el ha’anashim vayikhar ’af ’eli’aw bedavid vayomer lamah zeh yaradta ve‘al mi natashta me‘at hatson hahenah bamidbar ’ani yada‘ti ’et zedonekha ve’et roa‘ lewawekha ki lema‘an re’ot hamilkhamah yaradeta. 
1_samuel 17:29	vayomer david meh ‘asiti ‘atah halo dawar hu. 
1_samuel 17:30	vayisow mei’etslo ’el mul ’akher vayomer kadawar hazeh vayshiwuhu ha‘am dawar kadawar harishon. 
1_samuel 17:31	vayeshame‘u hadewarim ’asher diber david vayagidu lifnei sha’ul vayiqakheihu. 
1_samuel 17:32	vayomer david ’el sha’ul ’al yipol lew ’adam ‘alav ‘awdekha yeilekh venilkham ‘im hapelishti hazeh. 
1_samuel 17:33	vayomer sha’ul ’el david lo tukhal lalekhet ’el hapelishti hazeh lehilakhem ‘imo ki na‘ar ’atah vehu ’ish milkhamah mine‘urav. 
1_samuel 17:34	vayomer david ’el sha’ul ro‘eh hayah ‘awdekha le’awiv batson uwa ha’ari ve’et hadow venasa seh meiha‘eider. 
1_samuel 17:35	veyatsati ’akharav vehikitiv vehitsalti mipiv vayaqam ‘alai vehekhezaqti bizqano vehikitiv vahamitiv. 
1_samuel 17:36	gam ’et ha’ari gam hadow hikah ‘awdekha vehayah hapelishti he‘arel hazeh ke’akhad meihem ki kheiref ma‘arkhot ’elohim khayim. 
1_samuel 17:37	vayomer david yhoh ’asher hitsilani miyad ha’ari umiyad hadow hu yatsileini miyad hapelishti hazeh vayomer sha’ul ’el david lekh yhoh yihyeh ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 17:38	vayalbesh sha’ul ’et david madav venatan qowa‘ nekhoshet ‘al rosho vayalbesh ’oto shiryon. 
1_samuel 17:39	vayakhgor david ’et kharbo mei‘al lemadav vayo’el lalekhet ki lo nisah vayomer david ’el sha’ul lo ’ukhal lalekhet ba’eleh ki lo nisiti vaysirem david mei‘alav. 
1_samuel 17:40	vayiqakh maqlo beyado vayiwkhar lo khamishah khaluqei ’awanim min hanakhal vayasem ’otam bikhli haro‘im ’asher lo uwayalqut veqale‘o weyado vayigash ’el hapelishti. 
1_samuel 17:41	vayeilekh hapelishti holekh veqarew ’el david veha’ish nosei hatsinah lefanav. 
1_samuel 17:42	vayabet hapelishti vayir’eh ’et david vayiwzeihu ki hayah na‘ar ve’admoni ‘im yefeh mar’eh. 
1_samuel 17:43	vayomer hapelishti ’el david hakhelew ’anokhi ki ’atah wa ’eilai bamaqlot vayqalel hapelishti ’et david beilohav. 
1_samuel 17:44	vayomer hapelishti ’el david lekhah ’eilai ve’etenah ’et besarekha le‘of hashamayim ulewehemat hasadeh. 
1_samuel 17:45	vayomer david ’el hapelishti ’atah ba ’eilai bekherew uwakhanit uwekhidon ve’anokhi wa ’eilekha beshem yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei ma‘arkhot yisra’el ’asher kheirafta. 
1_samuel 17:46	hayom hazeh yesagerkha yhoh beyadi vehikitikha vahasiroti ’et roshekha mei‘alekha venatati peger makhaneh felishtim hayom hazeh le‘of hashamayim ulekhayat ha’arets veyeide‘u kal ha’arets ki yesh ’elohim leyisra’el. 
1_samuel 17:47	veyeide‘u kal haqahal hazeh ki lo bekherew uwakhanit yehoshia‘ yhoh ki yhoh hamilkhamah venatan ’etkhem beyadeinu. 
1_samuel 17:48	vehayah ki qam hapelishti vayeilekh vayiqraw liqrat david vaymaher david vayarats hama‘arakhah liqrat hapelishti. 
1_samuel 17:49	vayishlakh david ’et yado ’el hakeli vayiqakh misham ’ewen vayqala‘ vayakh ’et hapelishti ’el mitskho vatitba‘ ha’ewen bemitskho vayipol ‘al panav ’aretsah. 
1_samuel 17:50	vayekhezaq david min hapelishti baqela‘ uwa’ewen vayakh ’et hapelishti vaymiteihu vekherew ’en beyad david. 
1_samuel 17:51	vayarats david vaya‘amod ’el hapelishti vayiqakh ’et kharbo vayishlefah mita‘rah vaymoteteihu vayikhrat bah ’et rosho vayir’u hapelishtim ki met giboram vayanusu. 
1_samuel 17:52	vayaqumu ’anshei yisra’el vihudah vayari‘u vayirdefu ’et hapelishtim ‘ad bo’akha gai ve‘ad sha‘arei ‘eqron vayipelu khalei felishtim bederekh sha‘arayim ve‘ad gat ve‘ad ‘eqron. 
1_samuel 17:53	vayashuwu benei yisra’el mideloq ’akharei felishtim vayashosu ’et makhaneihem. 
1_samuel 17:54	vayiqakh david ’et rosh hapelishti vaywi’eihu yerushalim ve’et keilav sam be’aholo. 
1_samuel 17:55	vekhir’ot sha’ul ’et david yotsei liqrat hapelishti ’amar ’el ’awner sar hatsawa ben mi zeh hana‘ar ’awner vayomer ’awner khei nafshekha hamelekh ’im yada‘eti. 
1_samuel 17:56	vayomer hamelekh she’al ’atah ben mi zeh ha‘alem. 
1_samuel 17:57	ukheshuw david meihakot ’et hapelishti vayiqakh ’oto ’awner vaywi’eihu lifnei sha’ul verosh hapelishti beyado. 
1_samuel 17:58	vayomer ’eilav sha’ul ben mi ’atah hana‘ar vayomer david ben ‘awdekha yishai bet halakhmi. 
1_samuel 18:1	vayhi kekhaloto ledaber ’el sha’ul venefesh yehonatan niqsherah benefesh david vaye’ehawo vaye’ehaweihu yehonatan kenafsho. 
1_samuel 18:2	vayiqakheihu sha’ul bayom hahu velo netano lashuw bet ’awiv. 
1_samuel 18:3	vayikhrot yehonatan vedavid berit be’ahawato ’oto kenafsho. 
1_samuel 18:4	vayitpashet yehonatan ’et hame‘il ’asher ‘alav vayiteneihu ledavid umadav ve‘ad kharbo ve‘ad qashto ve‘ad khagoro. 
1_samuel 18:5	vayeitsei david bekhol ’asher yishlakhenu sha’ul yaskil vaysimeihu sha’ul ‘al ’anshei hamilkhamah vayitaw be‘einei khal ha‘am vegam be‘einei ‘awdei sha’ul. 
1_samuel 18:6	vayhi bewo’am beshuw david meihakot ’et hapelishti vateitsenah hanashim mikal ‘arei yisra’el lashor lashir vehamekholot liqrat sha’ul hamelekh betupim besimkhah uweshalishim. 
1_samuel 18:7	vata‘anenah hanashim hamsakhaqot vatomarna hikah sha’ul ba’elfo ba’alafav vedavid beriwwotav. 
1_samuel 18:8	vayikhar lesha’ul me’od vayeira‘ be‘einav hadawar hazeh vayomer natenu ledavid rewawot veli natenu ha’alafim ve‘od lo ’akh hamelukhah. 
1_samuel 18:9	vayhi sha’ul ‘avon ‘oyen ’et david meihayom hahu vahale’ah. 
1_samuel 18:10	vayhi mimakhorat vatitslakh ruakh ’elohim ra‘ah ’el sha’ul vayitnabei wetokh habayit vedavid menagen beyado keyom beyom vehakhanit beyad sha’ul. 
1_samuel 18:11	vayatel sha’ul ’et hakhanit vayomer ’akeh wedavid uwaqir vayisow david mipanav pa‘amayim. 
1_samuel 18:12	vayira sha’ul milifnei david ki hayah yhoh ‘imo umei‘im sha’ul sar. 
1_samuel 18:13	vaysireihu sha’ul mei‘imo vaysimeihu lo sar ’alef vayeitsei vayawo lifnei ha‘am. 
1_samuel 18:14	vayhi david lekhal darekhav maskil yhoh ‘imo. 
1_samuel 18:15	vayar sha’ul ’asher hu maskil me’od vayagar mipanav. 
1_samuel 18:16	vekhal yisra’el vihudah ’ohew ’et david ki hu yotsei vawa lifneihem. 
1_samuel 18:17	vayomer sha’ul ’el david hineh witi hagedolah meiraw ’otah ’eten lekha le’ishah ’akh heyeh li lewen khayil vehilakhem milkhamot yhoh vesha’ul ’amar ’al tehi yadi bo utehi wo yad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 18:18	vayomer david ’el sha’ul mi ’anokhi umi khayai mishpakhat ’awi beyisra’el ki ’ehyeh khatan lamelekh. 
1_samuel 18:19	vayhi be‘et tet ’et meiraw bat sha’ul ledavid vehi nitenah le‘adri’el hamekholati le’ishah. 
1_samuel 18:20	vate’ehaw mikhal bat sha’ul ’et david vayagidu lesha’ul vayishar hadawar be‘einav. 
1_samuel 18:21	vayomer sha’ul ’etenenah lo utehi lo lemoqesh utehi wo yad pelishtim vayomer sha’ul ’el david bishtayim titkhaten bi hayom. 
1_samuel 18:22	vaytsav sha’ul ’et ‘awadav daberu ’el david balat leimor hineh khafets bekha hamelekh vekhal ‘awadav ’aheiwukha ve‘atah hitkhaten bamelekh. 
1_samuel 18:23	vaydaberu ‘awdei sha’ul be’azenei david ’et hadewarim ha’eleh vayomer david hanqalah we‘eineikhem hitkhaten bamelekh ve’anokhi ’ish rash veniqleh. 
1_samuel 18:24	vayagidu ‘awdei sha’ul lo leimor kadewarim ha’eleh diber david. 
1_samuel 18:25	vayomer sha’ul koh tomeru ledavid ’en kheifets lamelekh bemohar ki bemei’ah ‘arelot pelishtim lehinaqem be’oyewei hamelekh vesha’ul khashaw lehapil ’et david beyad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 18:26	vayagidu ‘awadav ledavid ’et hadewarim ha’eleh vayishar hadawar be‘einei david lehitkhaten bamelekh velo male’u hayamim. 
1_samuel 18:27	vayaqam david vayeilekh hu va’anashav vayakh bapelishtim matayim ’ish vayawei david ’et ‘areloteihem vaymal’um lamelekh lehitkhaten bamelekh vayiten lo sha’ul ’et mikhal bito le’ishah. 
1_samuel 18:28	vayar sha’ul vayeida‘ ki yhoh ‘im david umikhal bat sha’ul ’aheiwathu. 
1_samuel 18:29	vayosef sha’ul leiro mipenei david ‘od vayhi sha’ul ’oyew ’et david kal hayamim. 
1_samuel 18:30	vayeitse’u sarei felishtim vayhi midei tseitam sakhal david mikol ‘awdei sha’ul vayiqar shemo me’od. 
1_samuel 19:1	vaydaber sha’ul ’el yonatan beno ve’el kal ‘awadav lehamit ’et david vihonatan ben sha’ul khafets bedavid me’od. 
1_samuel 19:2	vayaged yehonatan ledavid leimor mewaqesh sha’ul ’awi lahamitekha ve‘atah hishamer na waboqer veyashawta waseiter venakhbeita. 
1_samuel 19:3	va’ani ’eitsei ve‘amadti leyad ’awi basadeh ’asher ’atah sham va’ani ’adaber bekha ’el ’awi vera’iti mah vehigadti lakh. 
1_samuel 19:4	vaydaber yehonatan bedavid tow ’el sha’ul ’awiv vayomer ’eilav ’al yekheta hamelekh be‘awdo wedavid ki lo khata lakh vekhi ma‘asav tow lekha me’od. 
1_samuel 19:5	vayasem ’et nafsho wekhapo vayakh ’et hapelishti vaya‘as yhoh teshu‘ah gedolah lekhal yisra’el ra’ita vatismakh velamah tekheta bedam naqi lehamit ’et david khinam. 
1_samuel 19:6	vayishma‘ sha’ul beqol yehonatan vayishawa‘ sha’ul khai yhoh ’im yumat. 
1_samuel 19:7	vayiqra yehonatan ledavid vayaged lo yehonatan ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh vayawei yehonatan ’et david ’el sha’ul vayhi lefanav ke’etmol shilshom. 
1_samuel 19:8	vatosef hamilkhamah lihyot vayeitsei david vayilakhem bapelishtim vayakh bahem makah gedolah vayanusu mipanav. 
1_samuel 19:9	vatehi ruakh yhoh ra‘ah ’el sha’ul vehu beweito yoshew vakhanito beyado vedavid menagen beyad. 
1_samuel 19:10	vaywaqesh sha’ul lehakot bakhanit bedavid uwaqir vayiftar mipenei sha’ul vayakh ’et hakhanit baqir vedavid nas vayimalet balaylah hu. 
1_samuel 19:11	vayishlakh sha’ul mal’akhim ’el bet david leshamero velahamito baboqer vataged ledavid mikhal ’ishto leimor ’im ’einekha memalet ’et nafshekha halaylah makhar ’atah mumat. 
1_samuel 19:12	vatored mikhal ’et david be‘ad hakhalon vayeilekh vayiwrakh vayimalet. 
1_samuel 19:13	vatiqakh mikhal ’et haterafim vatasem ’el hamitah ve’et kewir ha‘izim samah mera’ashotav vatekhas babaged. 
1_samuel 19:14	vayishlakh sha’ul mal’akhim laqakhat ’et david vatomer kholeh hu. 
1_samuel 19:15	vayishlakh sha’ul ’et hamal’akhim lir’ot ’et david leimor ha‘alu ’oto wamitah ’eilai lahamito. 
1_samuel 19:16	vayawo’u hamal’akhim vehineh haterafim ’el hamitah ukhewir ha‘izim mera’ashotav. 
1_samuel 19:17	vayomer sha’ul ’el mikhal lamah kakhah rimitini vateshalekhi ’et ’oyewi vayimalet vatomer mikhal ’el sha’ul hu ’amar ’eilai shalekhini lamah ’amitekh. 
1_samuel 19:18	vedavid barakh vayimalet vayawo ’el shemu’el haramatah vayaged lo ’et kal ’asher ‘asah lo sha’ul vayeilekh hu ushemu’el vayeishewu benoit benayot. 
1_samuel 19:19	vayugad lesha’ul leimor hineh david benoit benayot baramah. 
1_samuel 19:20	vayishlakh sha’ul mal’akhim laqakhat ’et david vayar ’et lahaqat hanewi’im nibe’im ushemu’el ‘omed nitsaw ‘aleihem vatehi ‘al mal’akhei sha’ul ruakh ’elohim vayitnabe’u gam hemah. 
1_samuel 19:21	vayagidu lesha’ul vayishlakh mal’akhim ’akheirim vayitnabe’u gam hemah vayosef sha’ul vayishlakh mal’akhim shelishim vayitnabe’u gam hemah. 
1_samuel 19:22	vayeilekh gam hu haramatah vayawo ‘ad bor hagadol ’asher basekhu vayish’al vayomer ’eifoh shemu’el vedavid vayomer hineh benoit benayot baramah. 
1_samuel 19:23	vayeilekh sham ’el noit nayot baramah vatehi ‘alav gam hu ruakh ’elohim vayeilekh halokh vayitnabei ‘ad bo’o benoit benayot baramah. 
1_samuel 19:24	vayifshat gam hu begadav vayitnabei gam hu lifnei shemu’el vayipol ‘arom kal hayom hahu vekhal halayelah ‘al ken yomeru hagam sha’ul banewi’im. 
1_samuel 20:1	vayiwrakh david minoivt minayot baramah vayawo vayomer lifnei yehonatan meh ‘asiti meh ‘avoni umeh khatati lifnei ’awikha ki mewaqesh ’et nafshi. 
1_samuel 20:2	vayomer lo khalilah lo tamut hineh lo ‘asah lo ya‘aseh ’awi dawar gadol ’o dawar qaton velo yigleh ’et ’azeni umadua‘ yastir ’awi mimeni ’et hadawar hazeh ’en zot. 
1_samuel 20:3	vayishawa‘ ‘od david vayomer yadoa‘ yada‘ ’awikha ki matsati khen be‘einekha vayomer ’al yeida‘ zot yehonatan pen yei‘atsew ve’ulam khai yhoh vekhei nafshekha ki khefesa‘ beini uwen hamavet. 
1_samuel 20:4	vayomer yehonatan ’el david mah tomar nafshekha ve’e‘eseh lakh. 
1_samuel 20:5	vayomer david ’el yehonatan hineh khodesh makhar ve’anokhi yashow ’eishew ‘im hamelekh le’ekhol veshilakhtani venistarti wasadeh ‘ad ha‘erew hashelishit. 
1_samuel 20:6	’im paqod yifqedeini ’awikha ve’amarta nish’ol nish’al mimeni david laruts bet lekhem ‘iro ki zewakh hayamim sham lekhal hamishpakhah. 
1_samuel 20:7	’im koh yomar tow shalom le‘awdekha ve’im kharoh yekhereh lo da‘ ki khaletah hara‘ah mei‘imo. 
1_samuel 20:8	ve‘asita khesed ‘al ‘awdekha ki biwrit yhoh heiweita ’et ‘awdekha ‘imakh ve’im yesh bi ‘avon hamiteini ’atah ve‘ad ’awikha lamah zeh tewi’eini. 
1_samuel 20:9	vayomer yehonatan khalilah lakh ki ’im yadoa‘ ’eida‘ ki khaletah hara‘ah mei‘im ’awi lawo ‘alekha velo ’otah ’agid lakh. 
1_samuel 20:10	vayomer david ’el yehonatan mi yagid li ’o mah ya‘ankha ’awikha qashah. 
1_samuel 20:11	vayomer yehonatan ’el david lekhah veneitsei hasadeh vayeitse’u sheneihem hasadeh. 
1_samuel 20:12	vayomer yehonatan ’el david yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ki ’ekhqor ’et ’awi ka‘et makhar hashelishit vehineh tow ’el david velo ’az ’eshlakh ’eilekha vegaliti ’et ’azenekha. 
1_samuel 20:13	koh ya‘aseh yhoh lihonatan vekhoh yosif ki yeitiw ’el ’awi ’et hara‘ah ‘alekha vegaliti ’et ’azenekha veshilakhtikha vehalakhta leshalom vihi yhoh ‘imakh ka’asher hayah ‘im ’awi. 
1_samuel 20:14	velo ’im ‘odeni khai velo ta‘aseh ‘imadi khesed yhoh velo ’amut. 
1_samuel 20:15	velo takhrit ’et khasdekha mei‘im beiti ‘ad ‘olam velo behakhrit yhoh ’et ’oyewei david ’ish mei‘al penei ha’adamah. 
1_samuel 20:16	vayikhrot yehonatan ‘im bet david uwiqesh yhoh miyad ’oyewei david. 
1_samuel 20:17	vayosef yehonatan lehashbia‘ ’et david be’ahawato ’oto ki ’ahawat nafsho ’aheiwo. 
1_samuel 20:18	vayomer lo yehonatan makhar khodesh venifqadta ki yipaqed moshawekha. 
1_samuel 20:19	veshilashta teired me’od uwata ’el hamaqom ’asher nistarta sham beyom hama‘aseh veyashawta ’eitsel ha’ewen ha’azel. 
1_samuel 20:20	va’ani sheloshet hakhitsim tsidah ’oreh leshalakh li lematarah. 
1_samuel 20:21	vehineh ’eshlakh ’et hana‘ar lekh metsa ’et hakhitsim ’im ’amor ’omar lana‘ar hineh hakhitsim mimekha vahenah qakhenu vawo’ah ki shalom lekha ve’en dawar khai yhoh. 
1_samuel 20:22	ve’im koh ’omar la‘elem hineh hakhitsim mimekha vahale’ah lekh ki shilakhakha yhoh. 
1_samuel 20:23	vehadawar ’asher dibarnu ’ani va’atah hineh yhoh beini uweinekha ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_samuel 20:24	vayisater david basadeh vayhi hakhodesh vayeishew hamelekh ‘al ’el halekhem le’ekhol. 
1_samuel 20:25	vayeishew hamelekh ‘al moshawo kefa‘am befa‘am ’el moshaw haqir vayaqam yehonatan vayeishew ’awner mitsad sha’ul vayipaqed meqom david. 
1_samuel 20:26	velo diber sha’ul me’umah bayom hahu ki ’amar miqreh hu bilti tahor hu ki lo tahor. 
1_samuel 20:27	vayhi mimakhorat hakhodesh hasheini vayipaqed meqom david vayomer sha’ul ’el yehonatan beno madua‘ lo wa wen yishai gam temol gam hayom ’el halakhem. 
1_samuel 20:28	vaya‘an yehonatan ’et sha’ul nish’ol nish’al david mei‘imadi ‘ad bet lakhem. 
1_samuel 20:29	vayomer shalekheini na ki zewakh mishpakhah lanu ba‘ir vehu tsivah li ’akhi ve‘atah ’im matsati khen be‘einekha ’imaletah na ve’er’eh ’et ’ekhai ‘al ken lo wa ’el shulkhan hamelekh. 
1_samuel 20:30	vayikhar ’af sha’ul bihonatan vayomer lo ben na‘avat hamardut halo yada‘ti ki wokher ’atah lewen yishai lewashetekha ulewoshet ‘ervat ’imekha. 
1_samuel 20:31	ki khal hayamim ’asher ben yishai khai ‘al ha’adamah lo tikon ’atah umalkhutekha ve‘atah shelakh veqakh ’oto ’eilai ki wen mavet hu. 
1_samuel 20:32	vaya‘an yehonatan ’et sha’ul ’awiv vayomer ’eilav lamah yumat meh ‘asah. 
1_samuel 20:33	vayatel sha’ul ’et hakhanit ‘alav lehakoto vayeida‘ yehonatan ki khalah hi mei‘im ’awiv lehamit ’et david. 
1_samuel 20:34	vayaqam yehonatan mei‘im hashulkhan bakhori ’af velo ’akhal beyom hakhodesh hasheini lekhem ki ne‘tsaw ’el david ki hikhlimo ’awiv. 
1_samuel 20:35	vayhi waboqer vayeitsei yehonatan hasadeh lemo‘ed david vena‘ar qaton ‘imo. 
1_samuel 20:36	vayomer lena‘aro ruts metsa na ’et hakhitsim ’asher ’anokhi moreh hana‘ar rats vehu yarah hakheitsi leha‘awiro. 
1_samuel 20:37	vayawo hana‘ar ‘ad meqom hakheitsi ’asher yarah yehonatan vayiqra yehonatan ’akharei hana‘ar vayomer halo hakheitsi mimekha vahale’ah. 
1_samuel 20:38	vayiqra yehonatan ’akharei hana‘ar meheirah khushah ’al ta‘amod vaylaqet na‘ar yehonatan ’et hakheitsi hakhitsim vayawo ’el ’adonav. 
1_samuel 20:39	vehana‘ar lo yada‘ me’umah ’akh yehonatan vedavid yade‘u ’et hadawar. 
1_samuel 20:40	vayiten yehonatan ’et keilav ’el hana‘ar ’asher lo vayomer lo lekh hawei ha‘ir. 
1_samuel 20:41	hana‘ar ba vedavid qam mei’eitsel hanegew vayipol le’apav ’artsah vayishtakhu shalosh pe‘amim vayishequ ’ish ’et rei‘eihu vayiwku ’ish ’et rei‘eihu ‘ad david higdil. 
1_samuel 20:42	vayomer yehonatan ledavid lekh leshalom ’asher nishba‘nu sheneinu ’anakhnu beshem yhoh leimor yhoh yihyeh beini uweinekha uwen zar‘i uwen zar‘akha ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_samuel 21:1	vayaqam vayeilakh vihonatan ba ha‘ir. 
1_samuel 21:2	vayawo david noweh ’el ’akhimelekh hakohen vayekherad ’akhimelekh liqrat david vayomer lo madua‘ ’atah lewadekha ve’ish ’en ’itakh. 
1_samuel 21:3	vayomer david la’akhimelekh hakohen hamelekh tsivani dawar vayomer ’eilai ’ish ’al yeida‘ me’umah ’et hadawar ’asher ’anokhi sholeikhakha va’asher tsivitikha ve’et hane‘arim yoda‘ti ’el meqom peloni ’almoni. 
1_samuel 21:4	ve‘atah mah yesh takhat yadekha khamishah lekhem tenah weyadi ’o hanimtsa. 
1_samuel 21:5	vaya‘an hakohen ’et david vayomer ’en lekhem khol ’el takhat yadi ki ’im lekhem qodesh yesh ’im nishmeru hane‘arim ’akh mei’ishah. f 
1_samuel 21:6	vaya‘an david ’et hakohen vayomer lo ki ’im ’ishah ‘atsurah lanu kitmol shilshom betseiti vayihyu khelei hane‘arim qodesh vehu derekh khol ve’af ki hayom yiqdash bakeli. 
1_samuel 21:7	vayiten lo hakohen qodesh ki lo hayah sham lekhem ki ’im lekhem hapanim hamusarim milifnei yhoh lasum lekhem khom beyom hilaqekho. 
1_samuel 21:8	vesham ’ish mei‘awdei sha’ul bayom hahu ne‘tsar lifnei yhoh ushemo do’eg ha’adomi ’abir haro‘im ’asher lesha’ul. 
1_samuel 21:9	vayomer david la’akhimelekh ve’in yesh poh takhat yadekha khanit ’o kharew ki gam kharbi vegam keilai lo laqakhti weyadi ki hayah dewar hamelekh nakhuts. s 
1_samuel 21:10	vayomer hakohen kherew galeyat hapelishti ’asher hikita be‘eimeq ha’eilah hineh hi lutah wasimlah ’akharei ha’eifod ’im ’otah tiqakh lekha qakh ki ’en ’akheret zulatah bazeh vayomer david ’en kamoha tenenah li. 
1_samuel 21:11	vayaqam david vayiwrakh bayom hahu mipenei sha’ul vayawo ’el ’akhish melekh gat. 
1_samuel 21:12	vayomeru ‘awdei ’akhish ’eilav halo zeh david melekh ha’arets halo lazeh ya‘anu wamekholot leimor hikah sha’ul ba’alafo ba’alafav vedavid beriwwoto beriwwotav. 
1_samuel 21:13	vayasem david ’et hadewarim ha’eleh bilwawo vayira me’od mipenei ’akhish melekh gat. 
1_samuel 21:14	vayshano ’et ta‘mo be‘eineihem vayitholel beyadam vaytav vaytav ‘al daltot hasha‘ar vayored riro ’el zeqano. 
1_samuel 21:15	vayomer ’akhish ’el ‘awadav hineh tir’u ’ish mishtageia‘ lamah tawi’u ’oto ’eilai. khasar meshuga‘im ’ani ki haweitem ’et zeh lehishtageia‘ ‘alai hazeh yawo ’el beiti. 
1_samuel 22:1	vayeilekh david misham vayimalet ’el me‘arat ‘adulam vayishme‘u ’ekhav vekhal bet ’awiv vayeiredu ’eilav shamah. 
1_samuel 22:2	vayitqabetsu ’eilav kal ’ish matsoq vekhal ’ish ’asher lo noshe vekhal ’ish mar nefesh vayhi ‘aleihem lesar vayihyu ‘imo ke’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish. 
1_samuel 22:3	vayeilekh david misham mitspeh mo’aw vayomer ’el melekh mo’aw yeitsei na ’awi ve’imi ’itekhem ‘ad ’asher ’eida‘ mah ya‘aseh li ’elohim. 
1_samuel 22:4	vayankhem ’et penei melekh mo’aw vayeishewu ‘imo kal yemei heyot david bametsudah. 
1_samuel 22:5	vayomer gad hanawi ’el david lo teishew bametsudah lekh uwata lekha ’erets yehudah vayeilekh david vayawo ya‘ar kharet. 
1_samuel 22:6	vayishma‘ sha’ul ki noda‘ david va’anashim ’asher ’ito vesha’ul yoshew bagiw‘ah takhat ha’eshel baramah vakhanito weyado vekhal ‘awadav nitsawim ‘alav. 
1_samuel 22:7	vayomer sha’ul la‘awadav hanitsawim ‘alav shim‘u na benei yemini gam lekhulekhem yiten ben yishai sadot ukheramim lekhulekhem yasim sarei ’alafim vesarei mei’ot. 
1_samuel 22:8	ki qeshartem kulekhem ‘alai ve’en goleh ’et ’azeni bikhrat beni ‘im ben yishai ve’en kholeh mikem ‘alai vegoleh ’et ’azeni ki heiqim beni ’et ‘awdi ‘alai le’orew kayom hazeh. 
1_samuel 22:9	vaya‘an do’eg ha’adomi vehu nitsaw ‘al ‘awdei sha’ul vayomar ra’iti ’et ben yishai ba noweh ’el ’akhimelekh ben ’akhituw. 
1_samuel 22:10	vayish’al lo yhoh vetseidah natan lo ve’et kherew galeyat hapelishti natan lo. 
1_samuel 22:11	vayishlakh hamelekh liqro ’et ’akhimelekh ben ’akhituw hakohen ve’et kal bet ’awiv hakohanim ’asher benow vayawo’u khulam ’el hamelekh. 
1_samuel 22:12	vayomer sha’ul shema‘ na ben ’akhituw vayomer hini ’adoni. 
1_samuel 22:13	vayomer ’eilo ’eilav sha’ul lamah qeshartem ‘alai ’atah uwen yishai betitekha lo lekhem vekherew vesha’ol lo beilohim laqum ’eilai le’orew kayom hazeh. 
1_samuel 22:14	vaya‘an ’akhimelekh ’et hamelekh vayomar umi wekhal ‘awadekha kedavid ne’eman vakhatan hamelekh vesar ’el mishma‘tekha venikhbad beweitekha. 
1_samuel 22:15	hayom hakhiloti lesha’ol lish’al lo weilohim khalilah li ’al yasem hamelekh be‘awdo dawar bekhal bet ’awi ki lo yada‘ ‘awdekha bekhal zot dawar qaton ’o gadol. 
1_samuel 22:16	vayomer hamelekh mot tamut ’akhimelekh ’atah vekhal bet ’awikha. 
1_samuel 22:17	vayomer hamelekh laratsim hanitsawim ‘alav sobu vehamitu kohanei yhoh ki gam yadam ‘im david vekhi yade‘u ki woreiakh hu velo galu ’et ’azeno ’azeni velo ’awu ‘awdei hamelekh lishloakh ’et yadam lifgoa‘ bekhohanei yhoh. 
1_samuel 22:18	vayomer hamelekh ledoyeg ledo’eg sow ’atah ufega‘ bakohanim vayisow doyeg do’eg ha’adomi vayifga‘ hu bakohanim vayamet bayom hahu shemonim vakhamishah ’ish nosei ’eifod bad. 
1_samuel 22:19	ve’et now ‘ir hakohanim hikah lefi kherew mei’ish ve‘ad ’ishah mei‘olel ve‘ad yoneq veshor vakhamor vaseh lefi kharew. 
1_samuel 22:20	vayimalet ben ’ekhad la’akhimelekh ben ’akhituw ushemo ’ewyatar vayiwrakh ’akharei david. 
1_samuel 22:21	vayaged ’ewyatar ledavid ki harag sha’ul ’et kohanei yhoh. 
1_samuel 22:22	vayomer david le’ewyatar yada‘ti bayom hahu ki sham doyeg do’eg ha’adomi ki haged yagid lesha’ul ’anokhi saboti bekhal nefesh bet ’awikha. 
1_samuel 22:23	shewah ’iti ’al tira ki ’asher yewaqesh ’et nafshi yewaqesh ’et nafshekha ki mishmeret ’atah ‘imadi. 
1_samuel 23:1	vayagidu ledavid leimor hineh felishtim nilkhamim biq‘ilah vehemah shosim ’et hagoranot. 
1_samuel 23:2	vayish’al david yhoh leimor ha’eilekh vehikeiti bapelishtim ha’eleh vayomer yhoh ’el david lekh vehikita wapelishtim vehosha‘ta ’et qe‘ilah. 
1_samuel 23:3	vayomeru ’anshei david ’eilav hineh ’anakhnu foh bihudah yerei’im ve’af ki neilekh qe‘ilah ’el ma‘arkhot pelishtim. 
1_samuel 23:4	vayosef ‘od david lish’ol yhoh vaya‘aneihu yhoh vayomer qum red qe‘ilah ki ’ani noten ’et pelishtim beyadekha. 
1_samuel 23:5	vayeilekh david va’insho va’anashav qe‘ilah vayilakhem bapelishtim vayinhag ’et miqneihem vayakh bahem makah gedolah vayosha‘ david ’et yoshewei qe‘ilah. 
1_samuel 23:6	vayhi biwroakh ’ewyatar ben ’akhimelekh ’el david qe‘ilah ’eifod yarad beyado. 
1_samuel 23:7	vayugad lesha’ul ki wa david qe‘ilah vayomer sha’ul nikar ’oto ’elohim beyadi ki nisgar lawo be‘ir delatayim uweriakh. 
1_samuel 23:8	vayshama‘ sha’ul ’et kal ha‘am lamilkhamah laredet qe‘ilah latsur ’el david ve’el ’anashav. 
1_samuel 23:9	vayeida‘ david ki ‘alav sha’ul makharish hara‘ah vayomer ’el ’ewyatar hakohen hagishah ha’eifod. 
1_samuel 23:10	vayomer david yhoh ’elohei yisra’el shamoa‘ shama‘ ‘awdekha ki mewaqesh sha’ul lawo ’el qe‘ilah leshakhet la‘ir ba‘awuri. 
1_samuel 23:11	hayasgiruni wa‘alei qe‘ilah weyado hayeired sha’ul ka’asher shama‘ ‘awdekha yhoh ’elohei yisra’el haged na le‘awdekha vayomer yhoh yeired. 
1_samuel 23:12	vayomer david hayasgiru ba‘alei qe‘ilah ’oti ve’et ’anashai beyad sha’ul vayomer yhoh yasgiru. 
1_samuel 23:13	vayaqam david va’anashav keshesh mei’ot ’ish vayeitse’u miqe‘ilah vayithalekhu ba’asher yithalakhu ulesha’ul hugad ki nimlat david miqe‘ilah vayekhdal latset. 
1_samuel 23:14	vayeishew david bamidbar bametsadot vayeishew bahar bemidbar zif vaywaqsheihu sha’ul kal hayamim velo netano ’elohim beyado. 
1_samuel 23:15	vayar david ki yatsa sha’ul lewaqesh ’et nafsho vedavid bemidbar zif bakhoreshah. 
1_samuel 23:16	vayaqam yehonatan ben sha’ul vayeilekh ’el david khoreshah vaykhazeq ’et yado beilohim. 
1_samuel 23:17	vayomer ’eilav ’al tira ki lo timtsa’akha yad sha’ul ’awi ve’atah timlokh ‘al yisra’el ve’anokhi ’ehyeh lekha lemishneh vegam sha’ul ’awi yodeia‘ ken. 
1_samuel 23:18	vayikhretu sheneihem berit lifnei yhoh vayeishew david bakhoreshah vihonatan halakh leweito. 
1_samuel 23:19	vaya‘alu zifim ’el sha’ul hagiw‘atah leimor halo david mistater ‘imanu wametsadot bakhoreshah begiw‘at hakhakhilah ’asher mimin hayshimon. 
1_samuel 23:20	ve‘atah lekhal ’avat nafshekha hamelekh laredet red velanu hasgiro beyad hamelekh. 
1_samuel 23:21	vayomer sha’ul berukhim ’atem yhoh ki khamaltem ‘alai. 
1_samuel 23:22	lekhu na hakhinu ‘od ude‘u ure’u ’et meqomo ’asher tihyeh raglo mi ra’ahu sham ki ’amar ’eilai ‘arom ya‘rim hu. 
1_samuel 23:23	ure’u ude‘u mikol hamakhawo’im ’asher yitkhabei sham veshawtem ’eilai ’el nakhon vehalakhti ’itekhem vehayah ’im yeshno wa’arets vekhipasti ’oto bekhol ’alfei yehudah. 
1_samuel 23:24	vayaqumu vayeilekhu zifah lifnei sha’ul vedavid va’anashav bemidbar ma‘on ba‘arawah ’el yemin hayshimon. 
1_samuel 23:25	vayeilekh sha’ul va’anashav lewaqesh vayagidu ledavid vayeired hasela‘ vayeishew bemidbar ma‘on vayishma‘ sha’ul vayirdof ’akharei david midbar ma‘on. 
1_samuel 23:26	vayeilekh sha’ul mitsad hahar mizeh vedavid va’anashav mitsad hahar mizeh vayhi david nekhpaz lalekhet mipenei sha’ul vesha’ul va’anashav ‘oterim ’el david ve’el ’anashav letafesam. 
1_samuel 23:27	umal’akh ba ’el sha’ul leimor maharah veleikhah ki fashetu felishtim ‘al ha’arets. 
1_samuel 23:28	vayashaw sha’ul mirdof ’akharei david vayeilekh liqrat pelishtim ‘al ken qare’u lamaqom hahu sela‘ hamakhleqot. 
1_samuel 23:29	vaya‘al david misham vayeishew bimtsadot ‘en gedi. 
1_samuel 24:1	vayhi ka’asher shaw sha’ul mei’akharei pelishtim vayagidu lo leimor hineh david bemidbar ‘en gedi. 
1_samuel 24:2	vayiqakh sha’ul sheloshet ’alafim ’ish bakhur mikal yisra’el vayeilekh lewaqesh ’et david va’anashav ‘al penei tsurei haye‘eilim. 
1_samuel 24:3	vayawo ’el gidrot hatson ‘al haderekh vesham me‘arah vayawo sha’ul lehasekh ’et raglav vedavid va’anashav beyarketei hame‘arah yoshewim. 
1_samuel 24:4	vayomeru ’anshei david ’eilav hineh hayom ’asher ’amar yhoh ’eilekha hineh ’anokhi noten ’et ’oyeweikha ’oyiwkha beyadekha ve‘asita lo ka’asher yitaw be‘einekha vayaqam david vayikhrot ’et kenaf hame‘il ’asher lesha’ul balat. 
1_samuel 24:5	vayhi ’akharei khen vayakh lew david ’oto ‘al ’asher karat ’et kanaf ’asher lesha’ul. 
1_samuel 24:6	vayomer la’anashav khalilah li yhoh ’im ’e‘eseh ’et hadawar hazeh ladoni limshiakh yhoh lishloakh yadi bo ki meshiakh yhoh hu. 
1_samuel 24:7	vayshasa‘ david ’et ’anashav badewarim velo netanam laqum ’el sha’ul vesha’ul qam meihame‘arah vayeilekh badarekh. 
1_samuel 24:8	vayaqam david ’akharei khen vayeitsei min hame‘arah meihame‘arah vayiqra ’akharei sha’ul leimor ’adoni hamelekh vayabet sha’ul ’akharav vayiqod david ’apayim ’artsah vayishtakhu. 
1_samuel 24:9	vayomer david lesha’ul lamah tishma‘ ’et diwrei ’adam leimor hineh david mewaqesh ra‘atekha. 
1_samuel 24:10	hineh hayom hazeh ra’u ‘einekha ’et ’asher netanekha yhoh hayom beyadi bame‘arah ve’amar laharagakha vatakhas ‘alekha va’omar lo ’eshlakh yadi badoni ki meshiakh yhoh hu. 
1_samuel 24:11	ve’awi re’eh gam re’eh ’et kenaf me‘ilekha beyadi ki bekhareti ’et kenaf me‘ilekha velo haragtikha da‘ ure’eh ki ’en beyadi ra‘ah vafesha‘ velo khatati lakh ve’atah tsodeh ’et nafshi leqakhtah. 
1_samuel 24:12	yishpot yhoh beini uweinekha uneqamani yhoh mimeka veyadi lo tihyeh bakh. 
1_samuel 24:13	ka’asher yomar meshal haqadmoni meiresha‘im yeitsei resha‘ veyadi lo tihyeh bakh. 
1_samuel 24:14	’akharei mi yatsa melekh yisra’el ’akharei mi ’atah rodef ’akharei kelew met ’akharei par‘osh ’ekhad. 
1_samuel 24:15	vehayah yhoh ledayan veshafat beini uweinekha veyeire veyarew ’et riwi veyishpeteini miyadekha. 
1_samuel 24:16	vayhi kekhalot david ledaber ’et hadewarim ha’eleh ’el sha’ul vayomer sha’ul haqolekha zeh beni david vayisa sha’ul qolo vayeiwek. 
1_samuel 24:17	vayomer ’el david tsadiq ’atah mimeni ki ’atah gemaltani hatowah va’ani gemaltikha hara‘ah. 
1_samuel 24:18	ve’at ve’atah higadta hayom ’et ’asher ‘asitah ’iti towah ’et ’asher sigerani yhoh beyadekha velo haragtani. 
1_samuel 24:19	vekhi yimtsa ’ish ’et ’oyewo veshilekho bederekh towah yhoh yeshalemkha towah takhat hayom hazeh ’asher ‘asitah li. 
1_samuel 24:20	ve‘atah hineh yada‘ti ki malokh timlokh veqamah beyadekha mamlekhet yisra’el. 
1_samuel 24:21	ve‘atah hishawe‘ah li yhoh ’im takhrit ’et zar‘i ’akharai ve’im tashmid ’et shemi mibet ’awi. 
1_samuel 24:22	vayishawa‘ david lesha’ul vayeilekh sha’ul ’el beito vedavid va’anashav ‘alu ‘al hametsudah. 
1_samuel 25:1	vayamat shemu’el vayiqawetsu khal yisra’el vayispedu lo vayiqberuhu beweito baramah vayaqam david vayeired ’el midbar paran. 
1_samuel 25:2	ve’ish bema‘on uma‘aseihu wakarmel veha’ish gadol me’od velo tson sheloshet ’alafim ve’elef ‘izim vayhi bigzoz ’et tsono bakarmel. 
1_samuel 25:3	veshem ha’ish nawal veshem ’ishto ’awigayil veha’ishah towat sekhel vifat to’ar veha’ish qasheh vera‘ ma‘alalim vehu khalewo khalibi. 
1_samuel 25:4	vayishma‘ david bamidbar ki gozez nawal ’et tsono. 
1_samuel 25:5	vayishlakh david ‘asarah ne‘arim vayomer david lane‘arim ‘alu kharmelah uwatem ’el nawal ushe’eltem lo wishmi leshalom. 
1_samuel 25:6	va’amartem koh lekhai ve’atah shalom uweitekha shalom vekhol ’asher lekha shalom. 
1_samuel 25:7	ve‘atah shama‘ti ki gozezim lakh ‘atah haro‘im ’asher lekha hayu ‘imanu lo hekhlamnum velo nifqad lahem me’umah kal yemei heyotam bakarmel. 
1_samuel 25:8	she’al ’et ne‘arekha veyagidu lakh veyimtse’u hane‘arim khen be‘einekha ki ‘al yom tow banu tenah na ’et ’asher timtsa yadekha la‘awadekha ulewinkha ledavid. 
1_samuel 25:9	vayawo’u na‘arei david vaydaberu ’el nawal kekhal hadewarim ha’eleh beshem david vayanukhu. 
1_samuel 25:10	vaya‘an nawal ’et ‘awdei david vayomer mi david umi wen yishai hayom rabu ‘awadim hamitparetsim ’ish mipenei ’adonav. 
1_samuel 25:11	velaqakhti ’et lakhmi ve’et meimai ve’et tiwkhati ’asher tawakhti legozezai venatati la’anashim ’asher lo yada‘ti ’ei mizeh hemah. 
1_samuel 25:12	vayahafkhu na‘arei david ledarkam vayashuwu vayawo’u vayagidu lo kekhol hadewarim ha’eleh. 
1_samuel 25:13	vayomer david la’anashav khigru ’ish ’et kharbo vayakhgeru ’ish ’et kharbo vayakhgor gam david ’et kharbo vaya‘alu ’akharei david ke’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish umatayim yashewu ‘al hakeilim. 
1_samuel 25:14	vela’awigayil ’eishet nawal higid na‘ar ’ekhad meihane‘arim leimor hineh shalakh david mal’akhim meihamidbar lewarekh ’et ’adoneinu vaya‘at bahem. 
1_samuel 25:15	veha’anashim towim lanu me’od velo hakhelamnu velo faqadnu me’umah kal yemei hithalakhnu ’itam bihyoteinu basadeh. 
1_samuel 25:16	khomah hayu ‘aleinu gam laylah gam yomam kal yemei heyoteinu ‘imam ro‘im hatson. 
1_samuel 25:17	ve‘atah de‘i ure’i mah ta‘asi ki khaletah hara‘ah ’el ’adoneinu ve‘al kal beito vehu ben beliya‘al midaber ’eilav. 
1_samuel 25:18	vatemaher ’awogayil ’awigayil vatiqakh matayim lekhem ushenayim niwlei yayin vekhamesh tson ‘asavot ‘asuyot vekhamesh se’im qali umei’ah tsimuqim umatayim deweilim vatasem ‘al hakhamorim. 
1_samuel 25:19	vatomer lin‘areha ‘iwru lefanai hini ’akhareikhem ba’ah ule’ishah nawal lo higidah. 
1_samuel 25:20	vehayah hi rokhewet ‘al hakhamor veyoredet beseiter hahar vehineh david va’anashav yoredim liqratah vatifgosh ’otam. 
1_samuel 25:21	vedavid ’amar ’akh lasheqer shamarti ’et kal ’asher lazeh bamidbar velo nifqad mikal ’asher lo me’umah vayashew li ra‘ah takhat towah. 
1_samuel 25:22	koh ya‘aseh ’elohim le’oyewei david vekhoh yosif ’im ’ash’ir mikal ’asher lo ‘ad haboqer mashtin beqir. 
1_samuel 25:23	vateire ’awigayil ’et david vatemaher vateired mei‘al hakhamor vatipol le’apei david ‘al paneha vatishtakhu ’arets. 
1_samuel 25:24	vatipol ‘al raglav vatomer bi ’ani ’adoni he‘avon utedaber na ’amatekha be’azenekha ushema‘ ’et diwrei ’amatekha. 
1_samuel 25:25	’al na yasim ’adoni ’et libo ’el ’ish habeliya‘al hazeh ‘al nawal ki khishmo ken hu nawal shemo unewalah ‘imo va’ani ’amatekha lo ra’iti ’et na‘arei ’adoni ’asher shalakheta. 
1_samuel 25:26	ve‘atah ’adoni khai yhoh vekhei nafshekha ’asher mena‘akha yhoh mibo wedamim vehosheia‘ yadekha lakh ve‘atah yihyu khenawal ’oyewekha vehamwaqshim ’el ’adoni ra‘ah. 
1_samuel 25:27	ve‘atah haberakhah hazot ’asher heiwi shifkhatekha ladoni venitenah lane‘arim hamithalekhim beraglei ’adoni. 
1_samuel 25:28	sa na lefesha‘ ’amatekha ki ‘asoh ya‘aseh yhoh ladoni bayit ne’eman ki milkhamot yhoh ’adoni nilkham vera‘ah lo timatsei wekha miyamekha. 
1_samuel 25:29	vayaqam ’adam lirdafekha ulewaqesh ’et nafshekha vehayetah nefesh ’adoni tserurah bitsror hakhayim ’et yhoh ’elohekha ve’et nefesh ’oyewekha yeqale‘enah betokh kaf haqala‘. 
1_samuel 25:30	vehayah ki ya‘aseh yhoh ladoni kekhol ’asher diber ’et hatowah ‘alekha vetsivekha lenagid ‘al yisra’el. 
1_samuel 25:31	velo tihyeh zot lekha lefuqah ulemikhshol lew ladoni velishpakh dam khinam ulehoshia‘ ’adoni lo veheitiw yhoh ladoni vezakharta ’et ’amatekha. 
1_samuel 25:32	vayomer david la’awigal barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher shelakhekh hayom hazeh liqrati. 
1_samuel 25:33	uwarukh ta‘mekh uwerukhah ’at ’asher kelitini hayom hazeh mibo wedamim vehosheia‘ yadi li. 
1_samuel 25:34	ve’ulam khai yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher mena‘ani meihara‘ ’otakh ki lulei mihart vatawoti vatawot liqrati ki ’im notar lenawal ‘ad ’or haboqer mashtin beqir. 
1_samuel 25:35	vayiqakh david miyadah ’et ’asher heiwi’ah lo velah ’amar ‘ali leshalom leweitekh re’i shama‘ti weqolekh va’esa panayikh. 
1_samuel 25:36	vatawo ’awigayil ’el nawal vehineh lo mishteh beweito kemishteh hamelekh velew nawal tow ‘alav vehu shikor ‘ad me’od velo higidah lo dawar qaton vegadol ‘ad ’or haboqer. 
1_samuel 25:37	vayhi waboqer betset hayayin minawal vataged lo ’ishto ’et hadewarim ha’eleh vayamat libo beqirbo vehu hayah le’awen. 
1_samuel 25:38	vayhi ka‘aseret hayamim vayigof yhoh ’et nawal vayamot. 
1_samuel 25:39	vayishma‘ david ki met nawal vayomer barukh yhoh ’asher raw ’et riw kherpati miyad nawal ve’et ‘awdo khasakh meira‘ah ve’et ra‘at nawal heishiw yhoh berosho vayishlakh david vaydaber ba’awigayil leqakhtah lo le’ishah. 
1_samuel 25:40	vayawo’u ‘awdei david ’el ’awigayil hakarmelah vaydaberu ’eileha leimor david shelakhanu ’eilayikh leqakhtekh lo le’ishah. 
1_samuel 25:41	vataqam vatishtakhu ’apayim ’aretsah vatomer hineh ’amatekha leshifkhah lirkhots raglei ‘awdei ’adoni. 
1_samuel 25:42	vatemaher vataqam ’awigayil vatirkaw ‘al hakhamor vekhamesh na‘aroteha haholekhot leraglah vateilekh ’akharei mal’akhei david vatehi lo le’ishah. 
1_samuel 25:43	ve’et ’akhino‘am laqakh david miyizre‘el vatihyena gam sheteihen lo lenashim. 
1_samuel 25:44	vesha’ul natan ’et mikhal bito ’eishet david lefalti wen layish ’asher migalim. 
1_samuel 26:1	vayawo’u hazifim ’el sha’ul hagiw‘atah leimor halo david mistater begiw‘at hakhakhilah ‘al penei hayshimon. 
1_samuel 26:2	vayaqam sha’ul vayeired ’el midbar zif ve’ito sheloshet ’alafim ’ish bekhurei yisra’el lewaqesh ’et david bemidbar zif. 
1_samuel 26:3	vayikhan sha’ul begiw‘at hakhakhilah ’asher ‘al penei hayshimon ‘al hadarekh vedavid yoshew bamidbar vayar ki wa sha’ul ’akharav hamidbarah. 
1_samuel 26:4	vayishlakh david meragelim vayeida‘ ki wa sha’ul ’el nakhon. 
1_samuel 26:5	vayaqam david vayawo ’el hamaqom ’asher khanah sham sha’ul vayar david ’et hamaqom ’asher shakhaw sham sha’ul ve’awner ben ner sar tsewa’o vesha’ul shokhew bama‘gal veha‘am khonim sewiwoto sewiwotav. 
1_samuel 26:6	vaya‘an david vayomer ’el ’akhimelekh hakhiti ve’el ’awishai ben tseruyah ’akhi yo’aw leimor mi yeired ’iti ’el sha’ul ’el hamakhaneh vayomer ’awishai ’ani ’eired ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 26:7	vayawo david va’awishai ’el ha‘am laylah vehineh sha’ul shokhew yashen bama‘gal vakhanito me‘ukhah wa’arets mera’ashoto mera’ashotav ve’awner veha‘am shokhewim sewiwoto sewiwotav. 
1_samuel 26:8	vayomer ’awishai ’el david sigar ’elohim hayom ’et ’oyiwkha beyadekha ve‘atah ’akenu na bakhanit uwa’arets pa‘am ’akhat velo ’eshneh lo. 
1_samuel 26:9	vayomer david ’el ’awishai ’al tashkhiteihu ki mi shalakh yado bimshiakh yhoh veniqah. 
1_samuel 26:10	vayomer david khai yhoh ki ’im yhoh yigafenu ’o yomo yawo vamet ’o wamilkhamah yeired venispah. 
1_samuel 26:11	khalilah li yhoh misheloakh yadi bimshiakh yhoh ve‘atah qakh na ’et hakhanit ’asher mera’ashoto mera’ashotav ve’et tsapakhat hamayim veneilakhah lanu. 
1_samuel 26:12	vayiqakh david ’et hakhanit ve’et tsapakhat hamayim meira’ashotei sha’ul vayeilekhu lahem ve’en ro’eh ve’en yodeia‘ ve’en meiqits ki khulam yesheinim ki tardeimat yhoh nafelah ‘aleihem. 
1_samuel 26:13	vaya‘awor david ha‘eiwer vaya‘amod ‘al rosh hahar meirakhoq raw hamaqom beineihem. 
1_samuel 26:14	vayiqra david ’el ha‘am ve’el ’awner ben ner leimor halo ta‘aneh ’awner vaya‘an ’awner vayomer mi ’atah qarata ’el hamelekh. 
1_samuel 26:15	vayomer david ’el ’awner halo ’ish ’atah umi khamokha beyisra’el velamah lo shamarta ’el ’adonekha hamelekh ki wa ’akhad ha‘am lehashkhit ’et hamelekh ’adonekha. 
1_samuel 26:16	lo tow hadawar hazeh ’asher ‘asita khai yhoh ki wenei mavet ’atem ’asher lo shemartem ‘al ’adoneikhem ‘al meshiakh yhoh ve‘atah re’eh ’ei khanit hamelekh ve’et tsapakhat hamayim ’asher mera’ashoto mera’ashotav. 
1_samuel 26:17	vayaker sha’ul ’et qol david vayomer haqolkha zeh beni david vayomer david qoli ’adoni hamelekh. 
1_samuel 26:18	vayomer lamah zeh ’adoni rodef ’akharei ‘awdo ki meh ‘asiti umah beyadi ra‘ah. 
1_samuel 26:19	ve‘atah yishma‘ na ’adoni hamelekh ’et diwrei ‘awdo ’im yhoh hesitekha wi yarakh minkhah ve’im benei ha’adam ’arurim hem lifnei yhoh ki geireshuni hayom meihistapeiakh benakhalat yhoh leimor lekh ‘awod ’elohim ’akheirim. 
1_samuel 26:20	ve‘atah ’al yipol dami ’artsah mineged penei yhoh ki yatsa melekh yisra’el lewaqesh ’et par‘osh ’ekhad ka’asher yirdof haqorei beharim. 
1_samuel 26:21	vayomer sha’ul khatati shuw beni david ki lo ’ara‘ lekha ‘od takhat ’asher yaqerah nafshi be‘einekha hayom hazeh hineh hiskalti va’eshgeh harbeh me’od. 
1_samuel 26:22	vaya‘an david vayomer hineh hakhanit khanit hamelekh veya‘awor ’ekhad meihane‘arim veyiqakheha. 
1_samuel 26:23	yhoh yashiw la’ish ’et tsidqato ve’et ’emunato ’asher netanekha yhoh hayom beyad velo ’awiti lishloakh yadi bimshiakh yhoh. 
1_samuel 26:24	vehineh ka’asher gadelah nafshekha hayom hazeh be‘einai ken tigdal nafshi be‘einei yhoh veyatsileini mikal tsarah. 
1_samuel 26:25	vayomer sha’ul ’el david barukh ’atah beni david gam ‘asoh ta‘aseh vegam yakhol tukhal vayeilekh david ledarko vesha’ul shaw limqomo. 
1_samuel 27:1	vayomer david ’el libo ‘atah ’esafeh yom ’ekhad beyad sha’ul ’en li tow ki himalet ’imalet ’el ’erets pelishtim veno’ash mimeni sha’ul lewaqsheini ‘od bekhal gewul yisra’el venimlati miyado. 
1_samuel 27:2	vayaqam david vaya‘awor hu veshesh mei’ot ’ish ’asher ‘imo ’el ’akhish ben ma‘okh melekh gat. 
1_samuel 27:3	vayeishew david ‘im ’akhish begat hu va’anashav ’ish uweito david ushetei nashav ’akhino‘am hayizre‘eilit va’awigayil ’eishet nawal hakarmelit. 
1_samuel 27:4	vayugad lesha’ul ki warakh david gat velo yosaf yasaf ‘od lewaqsho. 
1_samuel 27:5	vayomer david ’el ’akhish ’im na matsati khen be‘einekha yitenu li maqom be’akhat ‘arei hasadeh ve’eishewah sham velamah yeishew ‘awdekha be‘ir hamamlakhah ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 27:6	vayiten lo ’akhish bayom hahu ’et tsiqlag lakhen hayetah tsiqlag lemalkhei yehudah ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_samuel 27:7	vayhi mispar hayamim ’asher yashaw david bisdeh felishtim yamim ve’arba‘ah khodashim. 
1_samuel 27:8	vaya‘al david va’anashav vayifshetu ’el hageshuri vehagirzi vehagizri veha‘amaleiqi ki henah yoshewot ha’arets ’asher mei‘olam bo’akha shurah ve‘ad ’erets mitsrayim. 
1_samuel 27:9	vehikah david ’et ha’arets velo yekhayeh ’ish ve’ishah velaqakh tson uwaqar vakhamorim ugemalim uwegadim vayashaw vayawo ’el ’akhish. 
1_samuel 27:10	vayomer ’akhish ’al peshatem hayom vayomer david ‘al negew yehudah ve‘al negew hayarkheme’eili ve’el negew haqeini. 
1_samuel 27:11	ve’ish ve’ishah lo yekhayeh david lehawi gat leimor pen yagidu ‘aleinu leimor koh ‘asah david vekhoh mishpato kal hayamim ’asher yashaw bisdeh felishtim. 
1_samuel 27:12	vaya’amen ’akhish bedavid leimor haw’esh hiw’ish be‘amo weyisra’el vehayah li le‘ewed ‘olam. 
1_samuel 28:1	vayhi bayamim hahem vayiqbetsu felishtim ’et makhaneihem latsawa lehilakhem beyisra’el vayomer ’akhish ’el david yadoa‘ teida‘ ki ’iti teitsei wamakhaneh ’atah va’anashekha. 
1_samuel 28:2	vayomer david ’el ’akhish lakhen ’atah teida‘ ’et ’asher ya‘aseh ‘awdekha vayomer ’akhish ’el david lakhen shomer leroshi ’asimekha kal hayamim. 
1_samuel 28:3	ushemu’el met vayispedu lo kal yisra’el vayiqberuhu waramah uwe‘iro vesha’ul heisir ha’owot ve’et hayide‘onim meiha’arets. 
1_samuel 28:4	vayiqawetsu felishtim vayawo’u vayakhanu weshunem vayiqbots sha’ul ’et kal yisra’el vayakhanu bagilboa‘. 
1_samuel 28:5	vayar sha’ul ’et makhaneh felishtim vayira vayekherad libo me’od. 
1_samuel 28:6	vayish’al sha’ul yhoh velo ‘anahu yhoh gam bakhalomot gam ba’urim gam banewi’im. 
1_samuel 28:7	vayomer sha’ul la‘awadav baqeshu li ’eishet ba‘alat ’ow ve’eilekhah ’eileha ve’edreshah bah vayomeru ‘awadav ’eilav hineh ’eishet ba‘alat ’ow be‘en dor. 
1_samuel 28:8	vayitkhapes sha’ul vayilbash begadim ’akheirim vayeilekh hu ushenei ’anashim ‘imo vayawo’u ’el ha’ishah layelah vayomer qasomi qasomi na li ba’ow veha‘ali li ’et ’asher ’omar ’eilayikh. 
1_samuel 28:9	vatomer ha’ishah ’eilav hineh ’atah yada‘ta ’et ’asher ‘asah sha’ul ’asher hikhrit ’et ha’owot ve’et hayide‘oni min ha’arets velamah ’atah mitnaqesh benafshi lahamiteini. 
1_samuel 28:10	vayishawa‘ lah sha’ul yhoh leimor khai yhoh ’im yiqerekh ‘avon badawar hazeh. 
1_samuel 28:11	vatomer ha’ishah ’et mi ’a‘aleh lakh vayomer ’et shemu’el ha‘ali li. 
1_samuel 28:12	vateire ha’ishah ’et shemu’el vatiz‘aq beqol gadol vatomer ha’ishah ’el sha’ul leimor lamah rimitani ve’atah sha’ul. 
1_samuel 28:13	vayomer lah hamelekh ’al tire’i ki mah ra’it vatomer ha’ishah ’el sha’ul ’elohim ra’iti ‘olim min ha’arets. 
1_samuel 28:14	vayomer lah mah ta’oro vatomer ’ish zaqen ‘oleh vehu ‘oteh me‘il vayeida‘ sha’ul ki shemu’el hu vayiqod ’apayim ’artsah vayishtakhu. 
1_samuel 28:15	vayomer shemu’el ’el sha’ul lamah hirgaztani leha‘alot ’oti vayomer ’ul tsar li me’od ufelishtim nilkhamim bi veilohim sar mei‘alai velo ‘anani ‘od gam beyad hanewi’im gam bakhalomot va’eqra’eh lekha lehodi‘eini mah ’e‘eseh. 
1_samuel 28:16	vayomer shemu’el velamah tish’aleini yhoh sar mei‘alekha vayhi ‘arekha. 
1_samuel 28:17	vaya‘as yhoh lo ka’asher diber beyadi vayiqra‘ yhoh ’et hamamlakhah miyadekha vayitenah lerei‘akha ledavid. 
1_samuel 28:18	ka’asher lo shama‘ta beqol yhoh velo ‘asita kharon ’apo ba‘amaleq ‘al ken hadawar hazeh ‘asah lekha yhoh hayom hazeh. 
1_samuel 28:19	veyiten yhoh gam ’et yisra’el ‘imekha beyad pelishtim umakhar ’atah uwanekha ‘imi gam ’et makhaneh yisra’el yiten yhoh beyad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 28:20	vaymaher sha’ul vayipol melo qomato ’artsah vayira me’od midiwrei shemu’el gam koakh lo hayah wo ki lo ’akhal lekhem kal hayom vekhal halayelah. 
1_samuel 28:21	vatawo ha’ishah ’el sha’ul vateire ki niwhal me’od vatomer ’eilav hineh shame‘ah shifkhatekha beqolekha va’asim nafshi bekhapi va’eshma‘ ’et dewarekha ’asher dibarta ’eilai. 
1_samuel 28:22	ve‘atah shema‘ na gam ’atah beqol shifkhatekha ve’asimah lefanekha pat lekhem ve’ekhol vihi wekha koakh ki teilekh badarekh. 
1_samuel 28:23	vayma’en vayomer lo ’okhal vayifretsu wo ‘awadav vegam ha’ishah vayishma‘ leqolam vayaqam meiha’arets vayeishew ’el hamitah. 
1_samuel 28:24	vela’ishah ‘eigel marbeq babayit vatemaher vatizbakheihu vatiqakh qemakh vatalash vatofeihu matsot. 
1_samuel 28:25	vatagesh lifnei sha’ul velifnei ‘awadav vayokheilu vayaqumu vayeilekhu balaylah hahu. 
1_samuel 29:1	vayiqbetsu felishtim ’et kal makhaneihem ’afeiqah veyisra’el khonim ba‘ayin ’asher beyizre‘el. 
1_samuel 29:2	vesarnei felishtim ‘owerim lemei’ot vela’alafim vedavid va’anashav ‘owerim ba’akharonah ‘im ’akhish. 
1_samuel 29:3	vayomeru sarei felishtim mah ha‘iwrim ha’eleh vayomer ’akhish ’el sarei felishtim halo zeh david ‘ewed sha’ul melekh yisra’el ’asher hayah ’iti zeh yamim ’o zeh shanim velo matsati wo me’umah miyom nafelo ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_samuel 29:4	vayiqtsefu ‘alav sarei felishtim vayomeru lo sarei felishtim hashew ’et ha’ish veyashow ’el meqomo ’asher hifqadto sham velo yeired ‘imanu bamilkhamah velo yihyeh lanu lesatan bamilkhamah uwameh yitratseh zeh ’el ’adonav halo berashei ha’anashim hahem. 
1_samuel 29:5	halo zeh david ’asher ya‘anu lo bamekholot leimor hikah sha’ul ba’alafav vedavid beriwwoto beriwwotav. 
1_samuel 29:6	vayiqra ’akhish ’el david vayomer ’eilav khai yhoh ki yashar ’atah vetow be‘einai tseitekha uwo’akha ’iti bamakhaneh ki lo matsati wekha ra‘ah miyom bo’akha ’eilai ‘ad hayom hazeh uwe‘einei haseranim lo tow ’atah. 
1_samuel 29:7	ve‘atah shuw velekh beshalom velo ta‘aseh ra‘ be‘einei sarnei felishtim. 
1_samuel 29:8	vayomer david ’el ’akhish ki meh ‘asiti umah matsata we‘awdekha miyom ’asher hayiti lefanekha ‘ad hayom hazeh ki lo ’awo venilkhamti be’oyewei ’adoni hamelekh. 
1_samuel 29:9	vaya‘an ’akhish vayomer ’el david yada‘ti ki tow ’atah be‘einai kemal’akh ’elohim ’akh sarei felishtim ’ameru lo ya‘aleh ‘imanu bamilkhamah. 
1_samuel 29:10	ve‘atah hashkem baboqer ve‘awdei ’adonekha ’asher ba’u ’itakh vehishkamtem baboqer ve’or lakhem valeikhu. 
1_samuel 29:11	vayashkem david hu va’anashav lalekhet baboqer lashuw ’el ’erets pelishtim ufelishtim ‘alu yizre‘el. 
1_samuel 30:1	vayhi bewo david va’anashav tsiqlag bayom hashelishi va‘amaleiqi fashetu ’el negew ve’el tsiqlag vayaku ’et tsiqlag vayisrefu ’otah ba’esh. 
1_samuel 30:2	vayishbu ’et hanashim ’asher bah miqaton ve‘ad gadol lo heimitu ’ish vayinhagu vayeilekhu ledarkam. 
1_samuel 30:3	vayawo david va’anashav ’el ha‘ir vehineh serufah ba’esh unesheihem uweneihem uwenoteihem nishbu. 
1_samuel 30:4	vayisa david veha‘am ’asher ’ito ’et qolam vayiwku ‘ad ’asher ’en bahem koakh liwkot. 
1_samuel 30:5	ushetei neshei david nishbu ’akhino‘am hayizre‘eilit va’awigayil ’eishet nawal hakarmeli. 
1_samuel 30:6	vateitser ledavid me’od ki ’ameru ha‘am lesaqelo ki marah nefesh kal ha‘am ’ish ‘al beno banav ve‘al benotav vayitkhazeq david yhoh ’elohav. 
1_samuel 30:7	vayomer david ’el ’ewyatar hakohen ben ’akhimelekh hagishah na li ha’eifod vayagesh ’ewyatar ’et ha’eifod ’el david. 
1_samuel 30:8	vayish’al david yhoh leimor ’erdof ’akharei hagedud hazeh ha’asigenu vayomer lo redof ki haseg tasig vehatsel tatsil. 
1_samuel 30:9	vayeilekh david hu veshesh mei’ot ’ish ’asher ’ito vayawo’u ‘ad nakhal habesor vehanotarim ‘amadu. 
1_samuel 30:10	vayirdof david hu ve’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish vaya‘amdu matayim ’ish ’asher pigeru mei‘awor ’et nakhal habesor. 
1_samuel 30:11	vayimtse’u ’ish mitsri basadeh vayiqkhu ’oto ’el david vayitenu lo lekhem vayokhal vayashquhu mayim. 
1_samuel 30:12	vayitenu lo felakh deweilah ushenei tsimuqim vayokhal vatashaw rukho ’eilav ki lo ’akhal lekhem velo shatah mayim sheloshah yamim usheloshah leilot. 
1_samuel 30:13	vayomer lo david lemi ’atah ve’ei mizeh ’atah vayomer na‘ar mitsri ’anokhi ‘ewed le’ish ‘amaleiqi vaya‘azweini ’adoni ki khaliti hayom sheloshah. 
1_samuel 30:14	’anakhnu pashatnu negew hakereiti ve‘al ’asher lihudah ve‘al negew kalew ve’et tsiqlag sarafnu wa’esh. 
1_samuel 30:15	vayomer ’eilav david hatorideini ’el hagedud hazeh vayomer hishawe‘ah li weilohim ’im temiteini ve’im tasgireini beyad ’adoni ve’oridkha ’el hagedud hazeh. 
1_samuel 30:16	vayorideihu vehineh netushim ‘al penei khal ha’arets ’okhelim veshotim vekhogegim bekhol hashalal hagadol ’asher laqekhu mei’erets pelishtim umei’erets yehudah. 
1_samuel 30:17	vayakem david meihaneshef ve‘ad ha‘erew lemakhoratam velo nimlat meihem ’ish ki ’im ’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish na‘ar ’asher rakhewu ‘al hagemalim vayanusu. 
1_samuel 30:18	vayatsel david ’et kal ’asher laqekhu ‘amaleq ve’et shetei nashav hitsil david. 
1_samuel 30:19	velo ne‘dar lahem min haqaton ve‘ad hagadol ve‘ad banim uwanot umishalal ve‘ad kal ’asher laqekhu lahem hakol heishiw david. 
1_samuel 30:20	vayiqakh david ’et kal hatson vehabaqar nahagu lifnei hamiqneh hahu vayomeru zeh shelal david. 
1_samuel 30:21	vayawo david ’el matayim ha’anashim ’asher pigeru milekhet ’akharei david vayoshiwum benakhal habesor vayeitse’u liqrat david veliqrat ha‘am ’asher ’ito vayigash david ’et ha‘am vayish’al lahem leshalom. 
1_samuel 30:22	vaya‘an kal ’ish ra‘ uweliya‘al meiha’anashim ’asher halekhu ‘im david vayomeru ya‘an ’asher lo halekhu ‘imi lo niten lahem meihashalal ’asher hitsalnu ki ’im ’ish ’et ’ishto ve’et banav veyinhagu veyeileikhu. 
1_samuel 30:23	vayomer david lo ta‘asu khen ’ekhai ’et ’asher natan yhoh lanu vayishmor ’otanu vayiten ’et hagedud haba ‘aleinu beyadeinu. 
1_samuel 30:24	umi yishma‘ lakhem ladawar hazeh ki kekheileq hayored bamilkhamah ukhekheileq hayoshew ‘al hakeilim yakhdav yakhaloqu. 
1_samuel 30:25	vayhi meihayom hahu vama‘elah vaysimeha lekhoq ulemishpat leyisra’el ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_samuel 30:26	vayawo david ’el tsiqlag vayshalakh meihashalal leziqnei yehudah lerei‘eihu leimor hineh lakhem berakhah mishelal ’oyewei yhoh. 
1_samuel 30:27	la’asher bewet ’el vela’asher beramot negew vela’asher beyatir. 
1_samuel 30:28	vela’asher ba‘aro‘er vela’asher besifmot vela’asher be’eshtemoa‘. 
1_samuel 30:29	vela’asher berakhal vela’asher be‘arei hayerakhme’eili vela’asher be‘arei haqeini. 
1_samuel 30:30	vela’asher bekharemah vela’asher bewor ‘ashan vela’asher ba‘atakh. 
1_samuel 30:31	vela’asher bekhewron ulekhal hameqomot ’asher hithalekh sham david hu va’anashav. 
1_samuel 31:1	ufelishtim nilkhamim beyisra’el vayanusu ’anshei yisra’el mipenei felishtim vayipelu khalalim behar hagilboa‘. 
1_samuel 31:2	vayadbequ felishtim ’et sha’ul ve’et banav vayaku felishtim ’et yehonatan ve’et ’awinadaw ve’et malki shua‘ benei sha’ul. 
1_samuel 31:3	vatikhbad hamilkhamah ’el sha’ul vayimtsa’uhu hamorim ’anashim baqashet vayakhel me’od meihamorim. 
1_samuel 31:4	vayomer sha’ul lenosei kheilav shelof kharbekha vedaqereini wah pen yawo’u ha‘areilim ha’eleh udeqaruni vehit‘alelu wi velo ’awah nosei kheilav ki yarei me’od vayiqakh sha’ul ’et hakherew vayipol ‘aleha. 
1_samuel 31:5	vayar nosei kheilav ki met sha’ul vayipol gam hu ‘al kharbo vayamat ‘imo. 
1_samuel 31:6	vayamat sha’ul usheloshet banav venosei kheilav gam kal ’anashav bayom hahu yakhdav. 
1_samuel 31:7	vayir’u ’anshei yisra’el ’asher be‘eiwer ha‘eimeq va’asher be‘eiwer hayarden ki nasu ’anshei yisra’el vekhi meitu sha’ul uwanav vaya‘azwu ’et he‘arim vayanusu vayawo’u felishtim vayeishewu bahen. 
1_samuel 31:8	vayhi mimakhorat vayawo’u felishtim lefashet ’et hakhalalim vayimtse’u ’et sha’ul ve’et sheloshet banav nofelim behar hagilboa‘. 
1_samuel 31:9	vayikhretu ’et rosho vayafshitu ’et keilav vayshalekhu we’erets pelishtim sawiw lewaser bet ‘atsabeihem ve’et ha‘am. 
1_samuel 31:10	vayasimu ’et keilav bet ‘ashtarot ve’et geviyato taqe‘u bekhomat bet shan. 
1_samuel 31:11	vayishme‘u ’eilav yoshewei yawesh gil‘ad ’et ’asher ‘asu felishtim lesha’ul. 
1_samuel 31:12	vayaqumu kal ’ish khayil vayeilekhu khal halaylah vayiqkhu ’et geviyat sha’ul ve’et geviyot banav meikhomat bet shan vayawo’u yaweishah vayisrefu ’otam sham. 
1_samuel 31:13	vayiqkhu ’et ‘atsmoteihem vayiqberu takhat ha’eshel beyaweishah vayatsumu shiw‘at yamim. 
2_samuel 1:1	vayhi ’akharei mot sha’ul vedavid shaw meihakot ’et ha‘amaleq vayeishew david betsiqlag yamim shenayim. 
2_samuel 1:2	vayhi bayom hashelishi vehineh ’ish ba min hamakhaneh mei‘im sha’ul uwegadav qeru‘im va’adamah ‘al rosho vayhi bewo’o ’el david vayipol ’artsah vayishtakhu. 
2_samuel 1:3	vayomer lo david ’ei mizeh tawo vayomer ’eilav mimakhaneh yisra’el nimlateti. 
2_samuel 1:4	vayomer ’eilav david meh hayah hadawar haged na li vayomer ’asher nas ha‘am min hamilkhamah vegam harbeh nafal min ha‘am vayamutu vegam sha’ul vihonatan beno meitu. 
2_samuel 1:5	vayomer david ’el hana‘ar hamagid lo ’ekh yada‘ta ki met sha’ul vihonatan beno. 
2_samuel 1:6	vayomer hana‘ar hamagid lo niqro niqreiti behar hagilboa‘ vehineh sha’ul nish‘an ‘al khanito vehineh harekhew uwa‘alei haparashim hidbiquhu. 
2_samuel 1:7	vayifen ’akharav vayir’eini vayiqra ’eilai va’omar hineini. 
2_samuel 1:8	vayomer li mi ’atah vayomer va’omar ’eilav ‘amaleiqi ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 1:9	vayomer ’eilai ‘amad na ‘alai umoteteini ki ’akhazani hashawats ki khal ‘od nafshi bi. 
2_samuel 1:10	va’e‘emod ‘alav va’amoteteihu ki yada‘ti ki lo yikhyeh ’akharei niflo va’eqakh haneizer ’asher ‘al rosho ve’ets‘adah ’asher ‘al zero‘o va’awi’em ’el ’adoni henah. 
2_samuel 1:11	vayakhazeq david biwgado biwgadav vayiqra‘em vegam kal ha’anashim ’asher ’ito. 
2_samuel 1:12	vayispedu vayiwku vayatsumu ‘ad ha‘arew ‘al sha’ul ve‘al yehonatan beno ve‘al ‘am yhoh ve‘al bet yisra’el ki nafelu bekharew. 
2_samuel 1:13	vayomer david ’el hana‘ar hamagid lo ’ei mizeh ’atah vayomer ben ’ish ger ‘amaleiqi ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 1:14	vayomer ’eilav david ’ekh lo yareita lishloakh yadekha leshakhet ’et meshiakh yhoh. 
2_samuel 1:15	vayiqra david le’akhad meihane‘arim vayomer gash pega‘ bo vayakeihu vayamot. 
2_samuel 1:16	vayomer ’eilav david dameikha damekha ‘al roshekha ki fikha ‘anah wekha leimor ’anokhi motati ’et meshiakh yhoh. 
2_samuel 1:17	vayqonen david ’et haqinah hazot ‘al sha’ul ve‘al yehonatan beno. 
2_samuel 1:18	vayomer lelamed benei yehudah qashet hineh khetuwah ‘al seifer hayashar. 
2_samuel 1:19	hatsewi yisra’el ‘al bamotekha khalal ’ekh nafelu giborim. 
2_samuel 1:20	’al tagidu wegat ’al tewaseru bekhutsot ’ashqelon pen tismakhnah benot pelishtim pen ta‘alozenah benot ha‘areilim. 
2_samuel 1:21	harei wagilboa‘ ’al tal ve’al matar ‘aleikhem usedei terumot ki sham nig‘al magen giborim magen sha’ul beli mashiakh bashamen. 
2_samuel 1:22	midam khalalim meikheilew giborim qeshet yehonatan lo nasog ’akhor vekherew sha’ul lo tashuw reiqam. 
2_samuel 1:23	sha’ul vihonatan hane’ehawim vehane‘imim bekhayeihem uwemotam lo nifradu minesharim qalu mei’arayot gaweiru. 
2_samuel 1:24	benot yisra’el ’el sha’ul bekhenah hamalbishkhem shani ‘im ‘adanim hama‘aleh ‘adi zahaw ‘al lewushekhen. 
2_samuel 1:25	’ekh nafelu giborim betokh hamilkhamah yehonatan ‘al bamotekha khalal. 
2_samuel 1:26	tsar li ‘alekha ’akhi yehonatan na‘amta li me’od nifle’atah ’ahawatekha li mei’ahawat nashim. 
2_samuel 1:27	’ekh nafelu giborim vayowedu kelei milkhamah. 
2_samuel 2:1	vayhi ’akharei khen vayish’al david yhoh leimor ha’e‘eleh be’akhat ‘arei yehudah vayomer yhoh ’eilav ‘aleh vayomer david ’anah ’e‘eleh vayomer khewronah. 
2_samuel 2:2	vaya‘al sham david vegam shetei nashav ’akhino‘am hayizre‘eilit va’awigayil ’eishet nawal hakarmeli. 
2_samuel 2:3	va’anashav ’asher ‘imo he‘elah david ’ish uweito vayeishewu be‘arei khewron. 
2_samuel 2:4	vayawo’u ’anshei yehudah vayimshekhu sham ’et david lemelekh ‘al bet yehudah vayagidu ledavid leimor ’anshei yawesh gil‘ad ’asher qaweru ’et sha’ul. 
2_samuel 2:5	vayishlakh david mal’akhim ’el ’anshei yawesh gil‘ad vayomer ’aleihem berukhim ’atem yhoh ’asher ‘asitem hakhesed hazeh ‘im ’adoneikhem ‘im sha’ul vatiqberu ’oto. 
2_samuel 2:6	ve‘atah ya‘as yhoh ‘imakhem khesed ve’emet vegam ’anokhi ’e‘eseh ’itekhem hatowah hazot ’asher ‘asitem hadawar hazeh. 
2_samuel 2:7	ve‘atah tekhezaqnah yedeikhem vihyu liwnei khayil ki met ’adoneikhem sha’ul vegam ’oti mashekhu wet yehudah lemelekh ‘aleihem. 
2_samuel 2:8	ve’awner ben ner sar tsawa ’asher lesha’ul laqakh ’et ’ish boshet ben sha’ul vaya‘awireihu makhanayim. 
2_samuel 2:9	vayamlikheihu ’el hagil‘ad ve’el ha’ashuri ve’el yizre‘el ve‘al ’efrayim ve‘al binyamin ve‘al yisra’el kuloh. 
2_samuel 2:10	ben ’arba‘im shanah ’ish boshet ben sha’ul bemalekho ‘al yisra’el ushetayim shanim malakh ’akh bet yehudah hayu ’akharei david. 
2_samuel 2:11	vayhi mispar hayamim ’asher hayah david melekh bekhewron ‘al bet yehudah shewa‘ shanim veshishah khodashim. 
2_samuel 2:12	vayeitsei ’awner ben ner ve‘awdei ’ish boshet ben sha’ul mimakhanayim giw‘onah. 
2_samuel 2:13	veyo’aw ben tseruyah ve‘awdei david yatse’u vayifgeshum ‘al bereikhat giw‘on yakhdav vayeishewu ’eleh ‘al habereikhah mizeh ve’eleh ‘al habereikhah mizeh. 
2_samuel 2:14	vayomer ’awner ’el yo’aw yaqumu na hane‘arim visakhaqu lefaneinu vayomer yo’aw yaqumu. 
2_samuel 2:15	vayaqumu vaya‘awru wemispar shenem ‘asar lewinyamin ule’ish boshet ben sha’ul ushenem ‘asar mei‘awdei david. 
2_samuel 2:16	vayakhaziqu ’ish berosh rei‘eihu vekharbo betsad rei‘eihu vayipelu yakhdav vayiqra lamaqom hahu khelqat hatsurim ’asher begiw‘on. 
2_samuel 2:17	vatehi hamilkhamah qashah ‘ad me’od bayom hahu vayinagef ’awner ve’anshei yisra’el lifnei ‘awdei david. 
2_samuel 2:18	vayihyu sham sheloshah benei tseruyah yo’aw va’awishai va‘asah’el va‘asah’el qal beraglav ke’akhad hatsewayim ’asher basadeh. 
2_samuel 2:19	vayirdof ‘asah’el ’akharei ’awner velo natah lalekhet ‘al hayamin ve‘al hasemol mei’akharei ’awner. 
2_samuel 2:20	vayifen ’awner ’akharav vayomer ha’atah zeh ‘asah’el vayomer ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 2:21	vayomer lo ’awner neteh lekha ‘al yeminekha ’o ‘al semolekha ve’ekhoz lekha ’ekhad meihane‘arim veqakh lekha ’et khalitsato velo ’awah ‘asah’el lasur mei’akharav. 
2_samuel 2:22	vayosef ‘od ’awner leimor ’el ‘asah’el sur lekha mei’akharai lamah ’akekah ’artsah ve’ekh ’esa fanai ’el yo’aw ’akhikha. 
2_samuel 2:23	vayma’en lasur vayakeihu ’awner be’akharei hakhanit ’el hakhomesh vateitsei hakhanit mei’akharav vayipal sham vayamat takhato takhtav vayhi kal haba ’el hamaqom ’asher nafal sham ‘asah’el vayamot vaya‘amodu. 
2_samuel 2:24	vayirdefu yo’aw va’awishai ’akharei ’awner vehashemesh ba’ah vehemah ba’u ‘ad giw‘at ’amah ’asher ‘al penei giakh derekh midbar giw‘on. 
2_samuel 2:25	vayitqabetsu wenei winyamin ’akharei ’awner vayihyu la’agudah ’ekhat vaya‘amdu ‘al rosh giw‘ah ’ekhat. 
2_samuel 2:26	vayiqra ’awner ’el yo’aw vayomer halanetsakh tokhal kherew halo yada‘tah ki marah tihyeh ba’akharonah ve‘ad matai lo tomar la‘am lashuw mei’akharei ’akheihem. 
2_samuel 2:27	vayomer yo’aw khai ha’elohim ki lulei dibarta ki ’az meihaboqer na‘alah ha‘am ’ish mei’akharei ’akhiv. 
2_samuel 2:28	vayitqa‘ yo’aw bashofar vaya‘amdu kal ha‘am velo yirdefu ‘od ’akharei yisra’el velo yasefu ‘od lehilakhem. 
2_samuel 2:29	ve’awner va’anashav halekhu ba‘arawah kol halaylah hahu vaya‘awru ’et hayarden vayeilekhu kal habitron vayawo’u makhanayim. 
2_samuel 2:30	veyo’aw w mei’akharei ’awner vayiqbots ’et kal ha‘am vayipaqedu mei‘awdei david tish‘ah ‘asar ’ish va‘asah ’el 
2_samuel 2:31	ve‘awdei david hiku mibinyamin uwe’anshei ’awner shelosh mei’ot veshishim ’ish meitu. 
2_samuel 2:32	vayis’u ’et ‘asah’el vayiqberuhu beqewer ’awiv ’asher bet lakhem vayeilekhu khal halaylah yo’aw va’anashav vayei’or lahem bekhewron. 
2_samuel 3:1	vatehi hamilkhamah ’arukah ben bet sha’ul uwen bet david vedavid holekh vekhazeq uwet sha’ul holekhim vedalim. 
2_samuel 3:2	vayeiledu vayivaledu ledavid banim bekhewron vayhi wekhoro ’amnon la’akhino‘am hayizre‘eilit. 
2_samuel 3:3	umishneihu khil’aw la’awigel la’awigayil ’eishet nawal hakarmeli vehashelishi ’awshalom ben ma‘akhah bat talmai melekh geshur. 
2_samuel 3:4	veharewi‘i ’adoniyah wen khagit vehakhamishi shefatyah wen ’awital. 
2_samuel 3:5	vehashishi yitre‘am le‘eglah ’eishet david ’eleh yuledu ledavid bekhewron. 
2_samuel 3:6	vayhi bihyot hamilkhamah ben bet sha’ul uwen bet david ve’awner hayah mitkhazeq bewet sha’ul. 
2_samuel 3:7	ulesha’ul pilegesh ushemah ritspah wat ’ayah vayomer ’el ’awner madua‘ batah ’el pilegesh ’awi. 
2_samuel 3:8	vayikhar le’awner me’od ‘al diwrei ’ish boshet vayomer harosh kelew ’anokhi ’asher lihudah hayom ’e‘eseh khesed ‘im bet sha’ul ’awikha ’el ’ekhav ve’el meirei‘eihu velo himtsitikha beyad david vatifqod ‘alai ‘avon ha’ishah hayom. 
2_samuel 3:9	koh ya‘aseh ’elohim le’awner vekhoh yosif lo ki ka’asher nishba‘ yhoh ledavid ki khen ’e‘eseh lo. 
2_samuel 3:10	leha‘awir hamamlakhah mibet sha’ul ulehaqim ’et kisei david ‘al yisra’el ve‘al yehudah midan ve‘ad be’er shawa‘. 
2_samuel 3:11	velo yakhol ‘od lehashiw ’et ’awner dawar miyir’ato ’oto. 
2_samuel 3:12	vayishlakh ’awner mal’akhim ’el david takhato takhtav leimor lemi ’arets leimor karetah weritekha ’iti vehineh yadi ‘imakh lehasew ’eilekha ’et kal yisra’el. 
2_samuel 3:13	vayomer tow ’ani ’ekhrot ’itekha berit ’akh dawar ’ekhad ’anokhi sho’el mei’itekha leimor lo tir’eh ’et panai ki ’im lifnei hewi’akha ’et mikhal bat sha’ul bewo’akha lir’ot ’et panai. 
2_samuel 3:14	vayishlakh david mal’akhim ’el ’ish boshet ben sha’ul leimor tenah ’et ’ishti ’et mikhal ’asher ’eirasti li bemei’ah ‘arelot pelishtim. 
2_samuel 3:15	vayishlakh ’ish boshet vayiqakheha mei‘im ’ish mei‘im palti’el ben lush layish. 
2_samuel 3:16	vayeilekh ’itah ’ishah halokh uwakhoh ’akhareha ‘ad bakhurim vayomer ’eilav ’awner lekh shuw vayashow. 
2_samuel 3:17	udewar ’awner hayah ‘im ziqnei yisra’el leimor gam temol gam shilshom heyitem mewaqshim ’et david lemelekh ‘aleikhem. 
2_samuel 3:18	ve‘atah ‘asu ki yhoh ’amar ’el david leimor beyad david ‘awdi hoshia‘ ’et ‘ami yisra’el miyad pelishtim umiyad kal ’oyeweihem. 
2_samuel 3:19	vaydaber gam ’awner be’azenei winyamin vayeilekh gam ’awner ledaber be’azenei david bekhewron ’et kal ’asher tow be‘einei yisra’el uwe‘einei kal bet binyamin. 
2_samuel 3:20	vayawo ’awner ’el david khewron ve’ito ‘esrim ’anashim vaya‘as david le’awner vela’anashim ’asher ’ito mishteh. 
2_samuel 3:21	vayomer ’awner ’el david ’aqumah ve’eileikhah ve’eqbetsah ’el ’adoni hamelekh ’et kal yisra’el veyikhretu ’itekha berit umalakhta bekhol ’asher te’aveh nafshekha vayeshalakh david ’et ’awner vayeilekh beshalom. 
2_samuel 3:22	vehineh ‘awdei david veyo’aw ba meihagedud veshalal raw ‘imam heiwi’u ve’awner ’einenu ‘im david bekhewron ki shilekho vayeilekh beshalom. 
2_samuel 3:23	veyo’aw vekhal hatsawa ’asher ’ito ba’u vayagidu leyo’aw leimor ba ’awner ben ner ’el hamelekh vayshalekheihu vayeilekh beshalom. 
2_samuel 3:24	vayawo yo’aw ’el hamelekh vayomer meh ‘asitah hineh wa ’awner ’eilekha lamah zeh shilakhto vayeilekh halokh. 
2_samuel 3:25	yada‘ta ’et ’awner ben ner ki lefatotekha ba velada‘at ’et motsa’akha ve’et miwo’ekha mowa’ekha velada‘at ’et kal ’asher ’atah ‘oseh. 
2_samuel 3:26	vayeitsei yo’aw mei‘im david vayishlakh mal’akhim ’akharei ’awner vayashiwu ’oto mibor hasirah vedavid lo yada‘. 
2_samuel 3:27	vayashaw ’awner khewron vayateihu yo’aw ’el tokh hasha‘ar ledaber ’ito basheli vayakeihu sham hakhomesh vayamat bedam ‘asah ’el ’akhiv. 
2_samuel 3:28	vayishma‘ david mei’akharei khen vayomer naqi ’anokhi umamlakhti mei‘im yhoh ‘ad ‘olam midemei ’awner ben ner. 
2_samuel 3:29	yakhulu ‘al rosh yo’aw ve’el kal bet ’awiv ve’al yikaret mibet yo’aw zaw umetsora‘ umakhaziq bapelekh venofel bakherew vakhasar lakhem. 
2_samuel 3:30	veyo’aw va’awishai ’akhiv haregu le’awner ‘al ’asher heimit ’et ‘asah’el ’akhihem begiw‘on bamilkhamah. 
2_samuel 3:31	vayomer david ’el yo’aw ve’el kal ha‘am ’asher ’ito qir‘u wigdeikhem vekhigru saqim vesifdu lifnei ’awner vehamelekh david holekh ’akharei hamitah. 
2_samuel 3:32	vayiqberu ’et ’awner bekhewron vayisa hamelekh ’et qolo vayeiwek ’el qewer ’awner vayiwku kal ha‘am. 
2_samuel 3:33	vayqonen hamelekh ’el ’awner vayomar hakemot nawal yamut ’awner. 
2_samuel 3:34	yadekha lo ’asurot veraglekha lo linkhushtayim hugashu kinfol lifnei wenei ‘avlah nafaleta vayosifu khal ha‘am liwkot ‘alav. 
2_samuel 3:35	vayawo khal ha‘am lehawrot ’et david lekhem be‘od hayom vayishawa‘ david leimor koh ya‘aseh li ’elohim vekhoh yosif ki ’im lifnei wo hashemesh ’et‘am lekhem ’o khal me’umah. 
2_samuel 3:36	vekhal ha‘am hikiru vayitaw be‘eineihem kekhol ’asher ‘asah hamelekh be‘einei khal ha‘am tow. 
2_samuel 3:37	vayeide‘u khal ha‘am vekhal yisra’el bayom hahu ki lo hayetah meihamelekh lehamit ’et ’awner ben ner. 
2_samuel 3:38	vayomer hamelekh ’el ‘awadav halo teide‘u ki sar vegadol nafal hayom hazeh beyisra’el. 
2_samuel 3:39	ve’anokhi hayom rakh umashuakh melekh veha’anashim ha’eleh benei tseruyah qashim mimeni yeshalem yhoh le‘oseh hara‘ah kera‘ato. 
2_samuel 4:1	vayishma‘ ben sha’ul ki met ’awner bekhewron vayirpu yadav vekhal yisra’el niwhalu. 
2_samuel 4:2	ushenei ’anashim sarei gedudim hayu wen sha’ul shem ha’ekhad ba‘anah veshem hasheini reikhaw benei rimon habe’eroti mibenei winyamin ki gam be’eirot teikhashew ‘al binyamin. 
2_samuel 4:3	vayiwrekhu habe’eirotim gitayemah vayihyu sham garim ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_samuel 4:4	velihonatan ben sha’ul ben nekheh raglayim ben khamesh shanim hayah bewo shemu‘at sha’ul vihonatan miyizre‘el vatisa’eihu ’omanto vatanos vayhi bekhafezah lanus vayipol vayipaseiakh ushemo mefiwoshet. 
2_samuel 4:5	vayeilekhu benei rimon habe’eiroti reikhaw uwa‘anah vayawo’u kekhom hayom ’el bet ’ish boshet vehu shokhew ’et mishkaw hatsahorayim. 
2_samuel 4:6	vehenah ba’u ‘ad tokh habayit loqekhei khitim vayakuhu ’el hakhomesh vereikhaw uwa‘anah ’akhiv nimlatu. 
2_samuel 4:7	vayawo’u habayit vehu shokhew ‘al mitato bakhadar mishkawo vayakuhu vaymituhu vayasiru ’et rosho vayiqkhu ’et rosho vayeilekhu derekh ha‘arawah kal halayelah. 
2_samuel 4:8	vayawi’u ’et rosh ’ish boshet ’el david khewron vayomeru ’el hamelekh hineh rosh ’ish boshet ben sha’ul ’oyiwkha ’asher biqesh ’et nafshekha vayiten yhoh ladoni hamelekh neqamot hayom hazeh misha’ul umizar‘o. 
2_samuel 4:9	vaya‘an david ’et reikhaw ve’et ba‘anah ’akhiv benei rimon habe’eiroti vayomer lahem khai yhoh ’asher padah ’et nafshi mikal tsarah. 
2_samuel 4:10	ki hamagid li leimor hineh met sha’ul vehu hayah khimwaser be‘einav va’okhazah wo va’ehregeihu betsiqlag ’asher letiti lo besorah. 
2_samuel 4:11	’af ki ’anashim resha‘im haregu ’et ’ish tsadiq beweito ‘al mishkawo ve‘atah halo ’awaqesh ’et damo miyedkhem uwi‘arti ’etkhem min ha’arets. 
2_samuel 4:12	vaytsav david ’et hane‘arim vayahargum vayqatsetsu ’et yedeihem ve’et ragleihem vayitlu ‘al habereikhah bekhewron ve’et rosh ’ish boshet laqakhu vayiqberu weqewer ’awner bekhewron. 
2_samuel 5:1	vayawo’u kal shiwtei yisra’el ’el david khewronah vayomeru leimor hinu ‘atsmekha uwesarekha ’anakhenu. 
2_samuel 5:2	gam ’etmol gam shilshom bihyot sha’ul melekh ‘aleinu ’atah hayitah hayita motsi hamotsi vehameiwi vehameiwi ’et yisra’el vayomer yhoh lekha ’atah tir‘eh ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’el ve’atah tihyeh lenagid ‘al yisra’el. 
2_samuel 5:3	vayawo’u kal ziqnei yisra’el ’el hamelekh khewronah vayikhrot lahem hamelekh david berit bekhewron lifnei yhoh vayimshekhu ’et david lemelekh ‘al yisra’el.
