2_samuel 5:4	ben sheloshim shanah david bemalekho ’arba‘im shanah malakh. 
2_samuel 5:5	bekhewron malakh ‘al yehudah shewa‘ shanim veshishah khodashim uwirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh shanah ‘al kal yisra’el vihudah. 
2_samuel 5:6	vayeilekh hamelekh va’anashav yerushalim ’el haywusi yoshew ha’arets vayomer ledavid leimor lo tawo henah ki ’im hesirekha ha‘ivrim vehapiskhim leimor lo yawo david henah. 
2_samuel 5:7	vayilkod david ’et metsudat tsiyon hi ‘ir david. 
2_samuel 5:8	vayomer david bayom hahu kal makeh yewusi veyiga‘ batsinor ve’et hapiskhim ve’et ha‘ivrim seno senu’ei nefesh david ‘al ken yomeru ‘iver ufiseiakh lo yawo ’el habayit. 
2_samuel 5:9	vayeishew david bametsudah vayiqra lah ‘ir david vayiwen david sawiw min hamilo vawayetah. 
2_samuel 5:10	vayeilekh david halokh vegadol yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot ‘imo. 
2_samuel 5:11	vayishlakh khiram melekh tsor mal’akhim ’el david va‘atsei ’arazim vekharashei ‘ets vekharashei ’ewen qir vayiwnu wayit ledavid. 
2_samuel 5:12	vayeida‘ david ki hekhino yhoh lemelekh ‘al yisra’el vekhi nisei mamlakhto ba‘awur ‘amo yisra’el. 
2_samuel 5:13	vayiqakh david ‘od pilagshim venashim mirushalim ’akharei bo’o meikhewron vayivaledu ‘od ledavid banim uwanot. 
2_samuel 5:14	ve’eleh shemot hayilodim lo birushalim shamua‘ veshowaw venatan ushelomoh. 
2_samuel 5:15	veyiwkhar ve’elishua‘ venefeg veyafia‘. 
2_samuel 5:16	ve’elishama‘ ve’elyada‘ ve’elifalet. 
2_samuel 5:17	vayishme‘u felishtim ki mashekhu ’et david lemelekh ‘al yisra’el vaya‘alu khal pelishtim lewaqesh ’et david vayishma‘ david vayeired ’el hametsudah. 
2_samuel 5:18	ufelishtim ba’u vayinateshu be‘eimeq refa’im. 
2_samuel 5:19	vayish’al david yhoh leimor ha’e‘eleh ’el pelishtim hatitenem beyadi vayomer yhoh ’el david ‘aleh ki naton ’eten ’et hapelishtim beyadekha. 
2_samuel 5:20	vayawo david bewa‘al peratsim vayakem sham david vayomer parats yhoh ’et ’oyewai lefanai keferets mayim ‘al ken qara shem hamaqom hahu ba‘al peratsim. 
2_samuel 5:21	vaya‘azwu sham ’et ‘atsabeihem vayisa’em david va’anashav. 
2_samuel 5:22	vayosifu ‘od pelishtim la‘alot vayinateshu be‘eimeq refa’im. 
2_samuel 5:23	vayish’al david yhoh vayomer lo ta‘aleh hasew ’el ’akhareihem uwata lahem mimul bekha’im. 
2_samuel 5:24	vihi beshame‘akha keshame‘akha ’et qol tse‘adah berashei habekha’im ’az tekherats ki ’az yatsa yhoh lefanekha lehakot bemakhaneh felishtim. 
2_samuel 5:25	vaya‘as david ken ka’asher tsivahu yhoh vayakh ’et pelishtim migewa‘ ‘ad bo’akha gazer. 
2_samuel 6:1	vayosef ‘od david ’et kal bakhur beyisra’el sheloshim ’alef. 
2_samuel 6:2	vayaqam vayeilekh david vekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito miba‘alei yehudah leha‘alot misham ’et ’aron ha’elohim ’asher niqra shem shem yhoh tsewa’ot yoshew hakeruwim ‘alav. 
2_samuel 6:3	vayarkiwu ’et ’aron ha’elohim ’el ‘agalah khadashah vayisa’uhu mibet ’awinadaw ’asher bagiw‘ah ve‘uza ve’akhyo benei ’awinadaw nohagim ’et ha‘agalah khadashah. 
2_samuel 6:4	vayisa’uhu mibet ’awinadaw ’asher bagiw‘ah ‘im ’aron ha’elohim ve’akhyo holekh lifnei ha’aron. 
2_samuel 6:5	vedavid vekhal bet yisra’el mesakhaqim lifnei yhoh bekhol ‘atsei weroshim uwekhinorot uwinwalim uwetupim uwimna‘an‘im uwetseltselim. 
2_samuel 6:6	vayawo’u ‘ad goren nakhon vayishlakh ‘uza ’el ’aron ha’elohim vayokhez bo ki shametu habaqar. 
2_samuel 6:7	vayikhar ’af yhoh be‘uzah vayakeihu sham ha’elohim ‘al hashal vayamat sham ‘im ’aron ha’elohim. 
2_samuel 6:8	vayikhar ledavid ‘al ’asher parats yhoh perets be‘uzah vayiqra lamaqom hahu perets ‘uzah ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_samuel 6:9	vayira david ’et yhoh bayom hahu vayomer ’ekh yawo ’eilai ’aron yhoh. 
2_samuel 6:10	velo ’awah david lehasir ’eilav ’et ’aron yhoh ‘al ‘ir david vayateihu david bet ‘owed ’edom hagiti. 
2_samuel 6:11	vayeishew ’aron yhoh bet ‘owed ’edom hagiti sheloshah khodashim vaywarekh yhoh ’et ‘owed ’edom ve’et kal beito. 
2_samuel 6:12	vayugad lamelekh david leimor beirakh yhoh ’et bet ‘owed ’edom ve’et kal ’asher lo ba‘awur ’aron ha’elohim vayeilekh david vaya‘al ’et ’aron ha’elohim mibet ‘owed ’edom ‘ir david besimkhah. 
2_samuel 6:13	vayhi ki tsa‘adu nose’ei ’aron yhoh shishah tse‘adim vayizbakh shor umeri. 
2_samuel 6:14	vedavid mekharker bekhal ‘oz lifnei yhoh vedavid khagur ’eifod bad. 
2_samuel 6:15	vedavid vekhal bet yisra’el ma‘alim ’et ’aron yhoh bitru‘ah uweqol shofar. 
2_samuel 6:16	vehayah ’aron yhoh ba ‘ir david umikhal bat sha’ul nishqefah be‘ad hakhalon vateire ’et hamelekh david mefazez umekharker lifnei yhoh vatiwez lo belibah. 
2_samuel 6:17	vayawi’u ’et ’aron yhoh vayatsigu ’oto bimqomo betokh ha’ohel ’asher natah lo david vaya‘al david ‘olot lifnei yhoh ushelamim. 
2_samuel 6:18	vaykhal david meiha‘alot ha‘olah vehashelamim vaywarekh ’et ha‘am beshem yhoh tsewa’ot. 
2_samuel 6:19	vaykhaleq lekhal ha‘am lekhal hamon yisra’el lemei’ish ve‘ad ’ishah le’ish khalat lekhem ’akhat ve’eshpar ’ekhad va’ashishah ’ekhat vayeilekh kal ha‘am ’ish leweito. 
2_samuel 6:20	vayashaw david lewarekh ’et beito vateitsei mikhal bat sha’ul liqrat david vatomer mah nikhbad hayom melekh yisra’el ’asher niglah hayom le‘einei ’amhot ‘awadav kehigalot niglot ’akhad hareiqim. 
2_samuel 6:21	vayomer david ’el mikhal lifnei yhoh ’asher bakhar bi mei’awikh umikal beito letsavot ’oti nagid ‘al ‘am yhoh ‘al yisra’el vesikhaqti lifnei yhoh. 
2_samuel 6:22	uneqaloti ‘od mizot vehayiti shafal be‘einai ve‘im ha’amahot ’asher ’amart ‘imam ’ikaweidah. 
2_samuel 6:23	ulemikhal bat sha’ul lo hayah lah yaled ‘ad yom motah. 
2_samuel 7:1	vayhi ki yashaw hamelekh beweito yhoh heiniakh lo misawiw mikal ’oyewav. 
2_samuel 7:2	vayomer hamelekh ’el natan hanawi re’eh na ’anokhi yoshew bewet ’arazim va’aron ha’elohim yoshew betokh hayri‘ah. 
2_samuel 7:3	vayomer natan ’el hamelekh kol ’asher bilwawekha lekh ‘aseh ki yhoh ‘imakh. 
2_samuel 7:4	vayhi balaylah hahu vayhi dewar yhoh ’el natan leimor. 
2_samuel 7:5	lekh ve’amarta ’el ‘awdi ’el david koh ’amar yhoh ha’atah tiwneh li wayit leshiwti. 
2_samuel 7:6	ki lo yashawti bewayit lemiyom ha‘aloti ’et benei yisra’el mimitsrayim ve‘ad hayom hazeh va’ehyeh mithalekh be’ohel uwemishkan. 
2_samuel 7:7	bekhol ’asher hithalakhti bekhal benei yisra’el hadawar dibarti ’et ’akhad shiwtei yisra’el ’asher tsiviti lir‘ot ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’el leimor lamah lo wenitem li bet ’arazim. 
2_samuel 7:8	ve‘atah koh tomar le‘awdi ledavid koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’ani leqakhtikha min hanaveh mei’akhar hatson lihyot nagid ‘al ‘ami ‘al yisra’el. 
2_samuel 7:9	va’ehyeh ‘imekha bekhol ’asher halakhta va’akhritah ’et kal ’oyewekha mipanekha ve‘asiti lekha shem gadol keshem hagedolim ’asher ba’arets. 
2_samuel 7:10	vesamti maqom le‘ami leyisra’el uneta‘tiv veshakhan takhtav velo yirgaz ‘od velo yosifu wenei ‘avlah le‘anoto ka’asher barishonah. 
2_samuel 7:11	ulemin hayom ’asher tsiviti shofetim ‘al ‘ami yisra’el vahanikhoti lekha mikal ’oyewekha vehigid lekha yhoh ki wayit ya‘aseh lekha yhoh. 
2_samuel 7:12	ki yimle’u yamekha veshakhawta ’et ’awotekha vahaqimoti ’et zar‘akha ’akharekha ’asher yeitsei mimei‘ekha vahakhinoti ’et mamlakhto. 
2_samuel 7:13	hu yiwneh bayit lishmi vekhonanti ’et kisei mamlakhto ‘ad ‘olam. 
2_samuel 7:14	’ani ’ehyeh lo le’aw vehu yihyeh li lewen ’asher beha‘avoto vehokhakhtiv besheiwet ’anashim uwenig‘ei benei ’adam. 
2_samuel 7:15	vekhasdi lo yasur mimenu ka’asher hasiroti mei‘im sha’ul ’asher hasiroti milefanekha. 
2_samuel 7:16	vene’man beitekha umamlakhtekha ‘ad ‘olam lefanekha kis’akha yihyeh nakhon ‘ad ‘olam. 
2_samuel 7:17	kekhol hadewarim ha’eleh ukhekhol hakhizayon hazeh ken diber natan ’el david. 
2_samuel 7:18	vayawo hamelekh david vayeishew lifnei yhoh vayomer mi ’anokhi ’adonai yhoh umi weiti ki hawi’otani ‘ad halom. 
2_samuel 7:19	vatiqtan ‘od zot be‘einekha ’adonai yhoh vatedaber gam ’el bet ‘awdekha lemeirakhoq vezot torat ha’adam ’adonai yhoh. 
2_samuel 7:20	umah yosif david ‘od ledaber ’eilekha ve’atah yada‘ta ’et ‘awdekha ’adonai yhoh. 
2_samuel 7:21	ba‘awur dewarekha ukhelibekha ‘asita ’et kal hagedulah hazot lehodia‘ ’et ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 7:22	‘al ken gadalta ’adonai yhoh ki ’en kamokha ve’en ’elohim zulatekha bekhol ’asher shama‘nu be’azeneinu. 
2_samuel 7:23	umi khe‘amekha keyisra’el go ’ekhad ba’arets ’asher halekhu ’elohim lifdot lo le‘am velasum lo shem vela‘asot lakhem hagedulah venora’ot le’artsekha mipenei ‘amekha ’asher padita lekha mimitsrayim goyim veilohav. 
2_samuel 7:24	vatekhonen lekha ’et ‘amekha yisra’el lekha le‘am ‘ad ‘olam ve’atah yhoh hayita lahem leilohim. 
2_samuel 7:25	ve‘atah yhoh ’elohim hadawar ’asher dibarta ‘al ‘awdekha ve‘al beito haqem ‘ad ‘olam va‘aseh ka’asher dibarta. 
2_samuel 7:26	veyigdal shimkha ‘ad ‘olam leimor yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohim ‘al yisra’el uwet ‘awdekha david yihyeh nakhon lefanekha. 
2_samuel 7:27	ki ’atah yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el galitah ’et ’ozen ‘awdekha leimor bayit ’ewneh lakh ‘al ken matsa ‘awdekha ’et libo lehitpalel ’eilekha ’et hatefilah hazot. 
2_samuel 7:28	ve‘atah ’adonai yhoh ’atah hu ha’elohim udewarekha yihyu ’emet vatedaber ’el ‘awdekha ’et hatowah hazot. 
2_samuel 7:29	ve‘atah ho’el uwarekh ’et bet ‘awdekha lihyot le‘olam lefanekha ki ’atah ’adonai yhoh dibarta umibirkhatekha yeworakh bet ‘awdekha le‘olam. 
2_samuel 8:1	vayhi ’akharei khen vayakh david ’et pelishtim vayakhni‘em vayiqakh david ’et meteg ha’amah miyad pelishtim. 
2_samuel 8:2	vayakh ’et mo’aw vaymadedem bakhewel hashkew ’otam ’artsah vaymaded shenei khawalim lehamit umelo hakhewel lehakhayot vatehi mo’aw ledavid la‘awadim nose’ei minkhah. 
2_samuel 8:3	vayakh david ’et hadad‘ezer ben rekhow melekh tsowah belekhto lehashiw yado binhar perat 
2_samuel 8:4	vayilkod david mimenu ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot parashim ve‘esrim ’elef ’ish ragli vai‘aqer david ’et kal harekhew vayoter mimenu mei’ah rakhew. 
2_samuel 8:5	vatawo ’aram dameseq la‘zor lahadad‘ezer melekh tsowah vayakh david ba’aram ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef ’ish. 
2_samuel 8:6	vayasem david netsiwim ba’aram dameseq vatehi ’aram ledavid la‘awadim nos’ei minkhah vayosha‘ yhoh ’et david bekhol ’asher halakh. 
2_samuel 8:7	vayiqakh david ’et shiltei hazahaw ’asher hayu ’el ‘awdei hadad‘azer vaywi’em yerushalim. 
2_samuel 8:8	umibetakh umibeirotai ‘arei hadad‘azer laqakh hamelekh david nekhoshet harbeh me’od. 
2_samuel 8:9	vayishma‘ to‘i melekh khamat ki hikah david ’et kal khel hadad‘azer. 
2_samuel 8:10	vayishlakh to‘i ’et yoram beno ’el hamelekh david lish’al lo leshalom ulewarakho ‘al ’asher nilkham bahadad‘ezer vayakeihu ki ’ish milkhamot to‘i hayah hadad‘azer uweyado hayu kelei khesef ukhelei zahaw ukhelei nekhoshet. 
2_samuel 8:11	gam ’otam hiqdish hamelekh david yhoh ‘im hakesef vehazahaw ’asher hiqdish mikal hagoyim ’asher kibesh. 
2_samuel 8:12	mei’aram umimo’aw umibenei ‘amon umipelishtim umei‘amaleq umishelal hadad‘ezer ben rekhow melekh tsowah. 
2_samuel 8:13	vaya‘as david shem beshuwo meihakoto ’et ’aram begei melakh shemonah ‘asar ’alef. 
2_samuel 8:14	vayasem be’edom netsiwim bekhal ’edom sam netsiwim vayhi khal ’edom ‘awadim ledavid vayosha‘ yhoh ’et david bekhol ’asher halakh. 
2_samuel 8:15	vayimlokh david ‘al kal yisra’el vayhi david ‘oseh mishpat utsedaqah lekhal ‘amo. 
2_samuel 8:16	veyo’aw ben tseruyah ‘al hatsawa vihoshafat ben ’akhilud mazkir. 
2_samuel 8:17	vetsadoq ben ’akhituw va’akhimelekh ben ’ewyatar kohanim userayah sofer. 
2_samuel 8:18	uwenayahu ben yehoyada‘ vehakereiti vehapeleiti uwenei david kohanim hayu. 
2_samuel 9:1	vayomer david hakhi yesh ‘od ’asher notar lewet sha’ul ve’e‘eseh ‘imo khesed ba‘awur yehonatan. 
2_samuel 9:2	ulewet sha’ul ‘ewed ushemo tsiwa vayiqre’u lo ’el david vayomer hamelekh ’eilav ha’atah tsiwa vayomer ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 9:3	vayomer hamelekh ha’efes ‘od ’ish lewet sha’ul ve’e‘eseh ‘imo khesed ’elohim vayomer tsiwa ’el hamelekh ‘od ben lihonatan nekheh raglayim. 
2_samuel 9:4	vayomer lo hamelekh ’eifoh hu vayomer tsiwa ’el hamelekh hineh hu bet makhir ben ‘ami’el belo dewar. 
2_samuel 9:5	vayishlakh hamelekh david vayiqakheihu mibet makhir ben ‘ami’el milo dewar. 
2_samuel 9:6	vayawo mefiwoshet ben yehonatan ben sha’ul ’el david vayipol ‘al panav vayishtakhu vayomer david mefiwoshet vayomer hineh ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 9:7	vayomer lo david ’al tira ki ‘asoh ’e‘eseh ‘imekha khesed ba‘awur yehonatan ’awikha vahashiwoti lekha ’et kal sedeh sha’ul ’awikha ve’atah tokhal lekhem ‘al shulkhani tamid. 
2_samuel 9:8	vayishtakhu vayomer meh ‘awdekha ki fanita ’el hakelew hamet ’asher kamoni. 
2_samuel 9:9	vayiqra hamelekh ’el tsiwa na‘ar sha’ul vayomer ’eilav kol ’asher hayah lesha’ul ulekhal beito natati lewen ’adonekha. 
2_samuel 9:10	ve‘awadta lo ’et ha’adamah ’atah uwanekha va‘awadekha veheiweita vehayah lewen ’adonekha lekhem va’akhalo umefiwoshet ben ’adonekha yokhal tamid lekhem ‘al shulkhani uletsiwa khamishah ‘asar banim ve‘esrim ‘awadim. 
2_samuel 9:11	vayomer tsiwa ’el hamelekh kekhol ’asher yetsaveh ’adoni hamelekh ’et ‘awdo ken ya‘aseh ‘awdekha umefiwoshet ’okhel ‘al shulkhani ke’akhad mibenei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 9:12	velimfiwoshet ben qatan ushemo mikha vekhol moshaw bet tsiwa ‘awadim limfiwoshet. 
2_samuel 9:13	umefiwoshet yoshew birushalim ki ‘al shulkhan hamelekh tamid hu ’okhel vehu piseiakh shetei raglav. 
2_samuel 10:1	vayhi ’akharei khen vayamat melekh benei ‘amon vayimlokh khanun beno takhtav. 
2_samuel 10:2	vayomer david ’e‘eseh khesed ‘im khanun ben nakhash ka’asher ‘asah ’awiv ‘imadi khesed vayishlakh david lenakhamo beyad ‘awadav ’el ’awiv vayawo’u ‘awdei david ’erets benei ‘amon. 
2_samuel 10:3	vayomeru sarei wenei ‘amon ’el khanun ’adoneihem hamkhabed david ’et ’awikha be‘einekha ki shalakh lekha menakhamim halo ba‘awur khaqor ’et ha‘ir uleragelah ulehafekhah shalakh david ’et ‘awadav ’eilekha. 
2_samuel 10:4	vayiqakh khanun ’et ‘awdei david vaygalakh ’et khatsi zeqanam vayikhrot ’et madveihem bakheitsi ‘ad shetoteihem vayshalekhem. 
2_samuel 10:5	vayagidu ledavid vayishlakh liqratam ki hayu ha’anashim nikhlamim me’od vayomer hamelekh shewu wireikho ‘ad yetsamakh zeqankhem veshawtem. 
2_samuel 10:6	vayir’u benei ‘amon ki niw’ashu bedavid vayishlekhu wenei ‘amon vayiskeru ’et ’aram bet rekhow ve’et ’aram tsowa ‘esrim ’elef ragli ve’et melekh ma‘akhah ’elef ’ish ve’ish tow shenem ‘asar ’elef ’ish. 
2_samuel 10:7	vayishma‘ david vayishlakh ’et yo’aw ve’et kal hatsawa hagiborim. 
2_samuel 10:8	vayeitse’u benei ‘amon vaya‘arkhu milkhamah petakh hasha‘ar va’aram tsowa urekhow ve’ish tow uma‘akhah lewadam basadeh. 
2_samuel 10:9	vayar yo’aw ki hayetah ’eilav penei hamilkhamah mipanim umei’akhor vayiwkhar mikol bekhurei beyisra’el yisra’el vaya‘arokh liqrat ’aram. 
2_samuel 10:10	ve’et yeter ha‘am natan beyad ’awshai ’akhiv vaya‘arokh liqrat benei ‘amon. 
2_samuel 10:11	vayomer ’im tekhezaq ’aram mimeni vehayitah li lishu‘ah ve’im benei ‘amon yekhezqu mimekha vehalakhti lehoshia‘ lakh. 
2_samuel 10:12	khazaq venitkhazaq be‘ad ‘ameinu uwe‘ad ‘arei ’eloheinu yhoh ya‘aseh hatow be‘einav. 
2_samuel 10:13	vayigash yo’aw veha‘am ’asher ‘imo lamilkhamah ba’aram vayanusu mipanav. 
2_samuel 10:14	uwenei ‘amon ra’u ki nas ’aram vayanusu mipenei ’awishai vayawo’u ha‘ir vayashaw yo’aw mei‘al benei ‘amon vayawo yerushalim. 
2_samuel 10:15	vayar ’aram ki nigaf lifnei yisra’el vayei’asefu yakhad. 
2_samuel 10:16	vayishlakh hadad‘ezer vayotsei ’et ’aram ’asher mei‘eiwer hanahar vayawo’u kheilam veshowakh sar tsewa hadad‘ezer lifneihem. 
2_samuel 10:17	vayugad ledavid vaye’esof ’et kal yisra’el vaya‘awor ’et hayarden vayawo kheilamah vaya‘arkhu ’aram liqrat david vayilakhamu ‘imo. 
2_samuel 10:18	vayanas ’aram mipenei yisra’el vayaharog david mei’aram shewa‘ mei’ot rekhew ve’arba‘im ’elef parashim ve’et showakh sar tsewa’o hikah vayamat sham. 
2_samuel 10:19	vayir’u khal hamelakhim ‘awdei hadad‘ezer ki nigefu lifnei yisra’el vayashlimu ’et yisra’el vaya‘awdum vayir’u ’aram lehoshia‘ ‘od ’et benei ‘amon. 
2_samuel 11:1	vayhi litshuwat hashanah le‘et tset hamalkhim vayishlakh david ’et yo’aw ve’et ‘awadav ‘imo ve’et kal yisra’el vayashkhitu ’et benei ‘amon vayatsuru ‘al rabah vedavid yoshew birushalim. 
2_samuel 11:2	vayhi le‘et ha‘erew vayaqam david mei‘al mishkawo vayithalekh ‘al gag bet hamelekh vayar ’ishah rokhetset mei‘al hagag veha’ishah towat mar’eh me’od. 
2_samuel 11:3	vayishlakh david vayidrosh la’ishah vayomer halo zot bat shewa‘ bat ’eli‘am ’eishet ’uriyah hakhiti. 
2_samuel 11:4	vayishlakh david mal’akhim vayiqakheha vatawo ’eilav vayishkaw ‘imah vehi mitqadeshet mitum’atah vatashaw ’el beitah. 
2_samuel 11:5	vatahar ha’ishah vatishlakh vataged ledavid vatomer harah ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 11:6	vayishlakh david ’el yo’aw shelakh ’eilai ’et ’uriyah hakhiti vayishlakh yo’aw ’et ’uriyah ’el david. 
2_samuel 11:7	vayawo ’uriyah ’eilav vayish’al david lishlom yo’aw velishlom ha‘am velishlom hamilkhamah. 
2_samuel 11:8	vayomer david le’uriyah red leweitekha urekhats raglekha vayeitsei ’uriyah mibet hamelekh vateitsei ’akharav mas’at hamelekh. 
2_samuel 11:9	vayishkaw ’uriyah petakh bet hamelekh ’et kal ‘awdei ’adonav velo yarad ’el beito. 
2_samuel 11:10	vayagidu ledavid leimor lo yarad ’uriyah ’el beito vayomer david ’el ’uriyah halo miderekh ’atah wa madua‘ lo yaradta ’el beitekha. 
2_samuel 11:11	vayomer ’uriyah ’el david ha’aron veyisra’el vihudah yoshewim basukot vadoni yo’aw ve‘awdei ’adoni ‘al penei hasadeh khonim va’ani ’awo ’el beiti le’ekhol velishtot velishkaw ‘im ’ishti khayekha vekhei nafshekha ’im ’e‘eseh ’et hadawar hazeh. 
2_samuel 11:12	vayomer david ’el ’uriyah shew bazeh gam hayom umakhar ’ashalekheka vayeishew ’uriyah wirushalim bayom hahu umimakhorat. 
2_samuel 11:13	vayiqra lo david vayokhal lefanav vayeishet vayshakereihu vayeitsei wa‘erew lishkaw bemishkawo ‘im ‘awdei ’adonav ve’el beito lo yarad. 
2_samuel 11:14	vayhi waboqer vayikhtow david seifer ’el yo’aw vayishlakh beyad ’uriyah. 
2_samuel 11:15	vayikhtow baseifer leimor hawu ’et ’uriyah ’el mul penei hamilkhamah hakhazaqah veshawtem mei’akharav venikah vamet. 
2_samuel 11:16	vayhi bishmor yo’aw ’el ha‘ir vayiten ’et ’uriyah ’el hamaqom ’asher yada‘ ki ’anshei khayil sham. 
2_samuel 11:17	vayeitse’u ’anshei ha‘ir vayilakhamu ’et yo’aw vayipol min ha‘am mei‘awdei david vayamat gam ’uriyah hakhiti. 
2_samuel 11:18	vayishlakh yo’aw vayaged ledavid ’et kal diwrei hamilkhamah. 
2_samuel 11:19	vaytsav ’et hamal’akh leimor kekhalotkha ’et kal diwrei hamilkhamah ledaber ’el hamelekh. 
2_samuel 11:20	vehayah ’im ta‘aleh khamat hamelekh ve’amar lekha madua‘ nigashtem ’el ha‘ir lehilakhem halo yeda‘tem ’et ’asher yoru mei‘al hakhomah. 
2_samuel 11:21	mi hikah ’et ’awimelekh ben yerubeshet halo ’ishah hishlikhah ‘alav pelakh rekhew mei‘al hakhomah vayamat beteiwets lamah nigashtem ’el hakhomah ve’amarta gam ‘awdekha ’uriyah hakhiti met. 
2_samuel 11:22	vayeilekh hamal’akh vayawo vayaged ledavid ’et kal ’asher shelakho yo’aw. 
2_samuel 11:23	vayomer hamal’akh ’el david ki gaweru ‘aleinu ha’anashim vayeitse’u ’eileinu hasadeh vanihyeh ‘aleihem ‘ad petakh hasha‘ar. 
2_samuel 11:24	vayore’u vayoru hamor’im hamorim ’el ‘awadekha mei‘al hakhomah vayamutu mei‘awdei hamelekh vegam ‘awdekha ’uriyah hakhiti met. 
2_samuel 11:25	vayomer david ’el hamal’akh koh tomar ’el yo’aw ’al yeira‘ be‘einekha ’et hadawar hazeh ki khazoh vekhazeh tokhal hekharew hakhazeq milkhamtekha ’el ha‘ir veharesah vekhazeqeihu. 
2_samuel 11:26	vatishma‘ ’eishet ’uriyah ki met ’uriyah ’ishah vatispod ‘al ba‘lah. 
2_samuel 11:27	vaya‘awor ha’eiwel vayishlakh david vaya’asfah ’el beito vatehi lo le’ishah vateiled lo ben vayeira‘ hadawar ’asher ‘asah david be‘einei yhoh. 
2_samuel 12:1	vayishlakh yhoh ’et natan ’el david vayawo ’eilav vayomer lo shenei ’anashim hayu be‘ir ’ekhat ’ekhad ‘ashir ve’ekhad rash. 
2_samuel 12:2	le‘ashir hayah tson uwaqar harbeh me’od. 
2_samuel 12:3	velarash ’en kol ki ’im kiwsah ’akhat qetanah ’asher qanah vaykhayeha vatigdal ‘imo ve‘im banav yakhdav mipito tokhal umikoso tishteh uwekheiqo tishkaw vatehi lo kewat. 
2_samuel 12:4	vayawo heilekh le’ish he‘ashir vayakhmol laqakhat mitsono umibeqaro la‘asot la’oreiakh haba lo vayiqakh ’et kiwsat ha’ish harash vaya‘aseha la’ish haba ’eilav. 
2_samuel 12:5	vayikhar ’af david ba’ish me’od vayomer ’el natan khai yhoh ki wen mavet ha’ish ha‘oseh zot. 
2_samuel 12:6	ve’et hakiwsah yeshalem ’arba‘tayim ‘eiqew ’asher ‘asah ’et hadawar hazeh ve‘al ’asher lo khamal. 
2_samuel 12:7	vayomer natan ’el david ’atah ha’ish koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’anokhi meshakhtikha lemelekh ‘al yisra’el ve’anokhi hitsaltikha miyad sha’ul. 
2_samuel 12:8	va’etenah lekha ’et bet ’adonekha ve’et neshei ’adonekha bekheiqekha va’etenah lekha ’et bet yisra’el vihudah ve’im me‘at ve’osifah lekha kahenah vekhahenah. 
2_samuel 12:9	madua‘ bazita ’et dewar yhoh la‘asot hara‘ be‘eino be‘einai ’et ’uriyah hakhiti hikita wakherew ve’et ’ishto laqakhta lekha le’ishah ve’oto haragta bekherew benei ‘amon. 
2_samuel 12:10	ve‘atah lo tasur kherew mibeitekha ‘ad ‘olam ‘eiqew ki wezitani vatiqakh ’et ’eishet ’uriyah hakhiti lihyot lekha le’ishah. 
2_samuel 12:11	koh ’amar yhoh hini meiqim ‘alekha ra‘ah mibeitekha velaqakhti ’et nashekha le‘einekha venatati lerei‘ekha veshakhaw ‘im nashekha le‘einei hashemesh hazot. 
2_samuel 12:12	ki ’atah ‘asita wasater va’ani ’e‘eseh ’et hadawar hazeh neged kal yisra’el veneged hashamesh. 
2_samuel 12:13	vayomer david ’el natan khatati yhoh vayomer natan ’el david gam yhoh he‘ewir khatatekha lo tamut. 
2_samuel 12:14	’efes ki ni’ets ni’atsta ’et ’oyewei yhoh badawar hazeh gam haben hayilod lekha mot yamut. 
2_samuel 12:15	vayeilekh natan ’el beito vayigof yhoh ’et hayeled ’asher yaledah ’eishet ’uriyah ledavid vayei’anash. 
2_samuel 12:16	vaywaqesh david ’et ha’elohim be‘ad hana‘ar vayatsam david tsom uwa velan veshakhaw ’aretsah. 
2_samuel 12:17	vayaqumu ziqnei weito ‘alav lahaqimo min ha’arets velo ’awah velo wara ’itam lakhem. 
2_samuel 12:18	vayhi bayom hashewi‘i vayamat hayaled vayir’u ‘awdei david lehagid lo ki met hayeled ki ’ameru hineh wihyot hayeled khai dibarnu ’eilav velo shama‘ beqoleinu ve’ekh nomar ’eilav met hayeled ve‘asah ra‘ah. 
2_samuel 12:19	vayar david ki ‘awadav mitlakhashim vayawen david ki met hayaled vayomer david ’el ‘awadav hamet hayeled vayomeru met. 
2_samuel 12:20	vayaqam david meiha’arets vayirkhats vayasekh vaykhalef simloto simlotav vayawo wet yhoh vayishtakhu vayawo ’el beito vayish’al vayasimu lo lekhem vayokhal. 
2_samuel 12:21	vayomeru ‘awadav ’eilav mah hadawar hazeh ’asher ‘asitah ba‘awur hayeled khai tsamta vateiwek vekha’asher met hayeled qamta vatokhal lakhem. 
2_samuel 12:22	vayomer be‘od hayeled khai tsamti va’ewkeh ki ’amarti mi yodeia‘ yekhanani vekhanani yhoh vekhai hayaled. 
2_samuel 12:23	ve‘atah met lamah zeh ’ani tsam ha’ukhal lahashiwo ‘od ’ani holekh ’eilav vehu lo yashuw ’eilai. 
2_samuel 12:24	vaynakhem david ’et bat shewa‘ ’ishto vayawo ’eileha vayishkaw ‘imah vateiled ben vayiqra vatiqra ’et shemo shelomoh yhoh ’aheiwo. 
2_samuel 12:25	vayishlakh beyad natan hanawi vayiqra ’et shemo yedideyah ba‘awur yhoh. 
2_samuel 12:26	vayilakhem yo’aw berabat benei ‘amon vayilkod ’et ‘ir hamelukhah. 
2_samuel 12:27	vayishlakh yo’aw mal’akhim ’el david vayomer nilkhamti werabah gam lakhadti ’et ‘ir hamayim. 
2_samuel 12:28	ve‘atah ’esof ’et yeter ha‘am vakhaneh ‘al ha‘ir velakhedah pen ’elkod ’ani ’et ha‘ir veniqra shemi ‘aleha. 
2_samuel 12:29	vaye’esof david ’et kal ha‘am vayeilekh rabatah vayilakhem bah vayilkedah. 
2_samuel 12:30	vayiqakh ’et ‘ateret malkam mei‘al rosho umishqalah kikar zahaw ve’ewen yeqarah vatehi ‘al rosh david ushelal ha‘ir hotsi harbeh me’od. 
2_samuel 12:31	ve’et ha‘am ’asher bah hotsi vayasem bamegeirah uwakharitsei habarzel uwemagzerot habarzel vehe‘ewir ’otam bamalken bamalben vekhen ya‘aseh lekhol ‘arei wenei ‘amon vayashaw david vekhal ha‘am yerushalim. 
2_samuel 13:1	vayhi ’akharei khen ule’awshalom ben david ’akhot yafah ushemah tamar vaye’ehaweha ’amnon ben david. 
2_samuel 13:2	vayeitser le’amnon lehitkhalot ba‘awur tamar ’akhoto ki wetulah hi vayipalei be‘einei ’amnon la‘asot lah me’umah. 
2_samuel 13:3	ule’amnon reia‘ ushemo yonadaw ben shim‘ah ’akhi david veyonadaw ’ish khakham me’od. 
2_samuel 13:4	vayomer lo madua‘ ’atah kakhah dal ben hamelekh baboqer baboqer halo tagid li vayomer lo ’amnon ’et tamar ’akhot ’awshalom ’akhi ’ani ’ohew. 
2_samuel 13:5	vayomer lo yehonadaw shekhaw ‘al mishkawekha vehitkhal uwa ’awikha lir’otekha ve’amarta ’eilav tawo na tamar ’akhoti vetawreini lekhem ve‘asetah le‘einai ’et habiryah lema‘an ’asher ’er’eh ve’akhalti miyadah. 
2_samuel 13:6	vayishkaw ’amnon vayitkhal vayawo hamelekh lir’oto vayomer ’amnon ’el hamelekh tawo na tamar ’akhoti utelabew le‘einai shetei lewiwot ve’ewreh miyadah. 
2_samuel 13:7	vayishlakh david ’el tamar habaytah leimor lekhi na bet ’amnon ’akhikh va‘asi lo habiryah. 
2_samuel 13:8	vateilekh tamar bet ’amnon ’akhiha vehu shokhew vatiqakh ’et habatseq vatalosh vatalash vatelabew le‘einav vatewashel ’et halewiwot. 
2_samuel 13:9	vatiqakh ’et hamasret vatitsoq lefanav vayma’en le’ekhol vayomer ’amnon hotsi’u khal ’ish mei‘alai vayeitse’u khal ’ish mei‘alav. 
2_samuel 13:10	vayomer ’amnon ’el tamar hawi’i habiryah hakheder ve’ewreh miyadekh vatiqakh tamar ’et halewiwot ’asher ‘asatah vatawei le’amnon ’akhiha hekhaderah. 
2_samuel 13:11	vatagesh ’eilav le’ekhol vayakhazeq bah vayomer lah bo’i shikhwi ‘imi ’akhoti. 
2_samuel 13:12	vatomer lo ’al ’akhi ’al te‘aneini ki lo yei‘aseh khen beyisra’el ’al ta‘aseh ’et hanewalah hazot. 
2_samuel 13:13	va’ani ’anah ’olikh ’et kherpati ve’atah tihyeh ke’akhad hanewalim beyisra’el ve‘atah daber na ’el hamelekh ki lo yimna‘eini mimeka. 
2_samuel 13:14	velo ’awah lishmoa‘ beqolah vayekhezaq mimenah vai‘aneha vayishkaw ’otah. 
2_samuel 13:15	vayisna’eha ’amnon sin’ah gedolah me’od ki gedolah hasin’ah ’asher senei’ah mei’ahawah ’asher ’aheiwah vayomer lah ’amnon qumi leikhi. 
2_samuel 13:16	vatomer lo ’al ’odot hara‘ah hagedolah hazot mei’akheret ’asher ‘asita ‘imi leshalekheini velo ’awah lishmoa‘ lah. 
2_samuel 13:17	vayiqra ’et na‘aro meshareto vayomer shilkhu na ’et zot mei‘alai hakhutsah une‘ol hadelet ’akhareha. 
2_samuel 13:18	ve‘aleha ketonet pasim ki khen tilbashna wenot hamelekh habetulot me‘ilim vayotsei ’otah meshareto hakhuts vena‘al hadelet ’akhareha. 
2_samuel 13:19	vatiqakh tamar ’eifer ‘al roshah ukhetonet hapasim ’asher ‘aleha qara‘ah vatasem yadah ‘al roshah vateilekh halokh veza‘aqah. 
2_samuel 13:20	vayomer ’eileha ’awshalom ’akhiha ha’aminon ’akhikh hayah ‘imakh ve‘atah ’akhoti hakharishi ’akhikh hu ’al tashiti ’et libekh ladawar hazeh vateishew tamar veshomeimah bet ’awshalom ’akhiha. 
2_samuel 13:21	vehamelekh david shama‘ ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh vayikhar lo me’od. 
2_samuel 13:22	velo diber ’awshalom ‘im ’amnon lemeira‘ ve‘ad tow ki sanei ’awshalom ’et ’amnon ‘al dewar ’asher ‘inah ’et tamar ’akhoto. 
2_samuel 13:23	vayhi lishnatayim yamim vayihyu gozezim le’awshalom bewa‘al khatsor ’asher ‘im ’efrayim vayiqra ’awshalom lekhal benei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 13:24	vayawo ’awshalom ’el hamelekh vayomer hineh na gozezim le‘awdekha yeilekh na hamelekh va‘awadav ‘im ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 13:25	vayomer hamelekh ’el ’awshalom ’al beni ’al na neilekh kulanu velo nikhbad ‘alekha vayifrats bo velo ’awah lalekhet vaywarakheihu. 
2_samuel 13:26	vayomer ’awshalom valo yeilekh na ’itanu ’amnon ’akhi vayomer lo hamelekh lamah yeilekh ‘imakh. 
2_samuel 13:27	vayifrats bo ’awshalom vayishlakh ’ito ’et ’amnon ve’et kal benei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 13:28	vaytsav ’awshalom ’et ne‘arav leimor re’u na ketow lew ’amnon bayayin ve’amarti ’aleikhem haku ’et ’amnon vahamitem ’oto ’al tira’u halo ki ’anokhi tsiviti ’etkhem khizqu vihyu liwnei khayil. 
2_samuel 13:29	vaya‘asu na‘arei ’awshalom le’amnon ka’asher tsivah ’awshalom vayaqumu kal benei hamelekh vayirkewu ’ish ‘al pirdo vayanusu. 
2_samuel 13:30	vayhi hemah waderekh vehashemu‘ah wa’ah ’el david leimor hikah ’awshalom ’et kal benei hamelekh velo notar meihem ’ekhad. 
2_samuel 13:31	vayaqam hamelekh vayiqra‘ ’et begadav vayishkaw ’aretsah vekhal ‘awadav nitsawim qeru‘ei wegadim. 
2_samuel 13:32	vaya‘an yonadaw ben shim‘ah ’akhi david vayomer ’al yomar ’adoni ’et kal hane‘arim benei hamelekh heimitu ki ’amnon lewado met ki ‘al pi ’awshalom hayetah sumah miyom ‘anoto ’et tamar ’akhoto. 
2_samuel 13:33	ve‘atah ’al yasem ’adoni hamelekh ’el libo dawar leimor kal benei hamelekh meitu ki ’im ’amnon lewado met. 
2_samuel 13:34	vayiwrakh ’awshalom vayisa hana‘ar hatsofeh ’et ‘eino ‘einav vayar vehineh ‘am raw holekhim miderekh ’akharav mitsad hahar. 
2_samuel 13:35	vayomer yonadaw ’el hamelekh hineh wenei hamelekh ba’u kidwar ‘awdekha ken hayah. 
2_samuel 13:36	vayhi kekhaloto ledaber vehineh wenei hamelekh ba’u vayis’u qolam vayiwku vegam hamelekh vekhal ‘awadav bakhu bekhi gadol me’od. 
2_samuel 13:37	ve’awshalom barakh vayeilekh ’el talmai ben ‘amikhur ‘amihud melekh geshur vayit’abel ‘al beno kal hayamim. 
2_samuel 13:38	ve’awshalom barakh vayeilekh geshur vayhi sham shalosh shanim. 
2_samuel 13:39	vatekhal david hamelekh latset ’el ’awshalom ki nikham ‘al ’amnon ki met. 
2_samuel 14:1	vayeida‘ yo’aw ben tseruyah ki lew hamelekh ‘al ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 14:2	vayishlakh yo’aw teqo‘ah vayiqakh misham ’ishah khakhamah vayomer ’eileha hit’abeli na veliwshi na wigdei ’eiwel ve’al tasukhi shemen vehayit ke’ishah zeh yamim rabim mit’abelet ‘al met. 
2_samuel 14:3	uwat ’el hamelekh vedibart ’eilav kadawar hazeh vayasem yo’aw ’et hadewarim befiha. 
2_samuel 14:4	vatomer ha’ishah hateqo‘it ’el hamelekh vatipol ‘al ’apeha ’artsah vatishtakhu vatomer hoshi‘ah hamelekh. 
2_samuel 14:5	vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh vatomer ’awal ’ishah ’almanah ’ani vayamat ’ishi. 
2_samuel 14:6	uleshifkhatekha shenei wanim vayinatsu sheneihem basadeh ve’en matsil beineihem vayako ha’ekhad ’et ha’ekhad vayamet ’oto. 
2_samuel 14:7	vehineh qamah khal hamishpakhah ‘al shifkhatekha vayomeru teni ’et makeh ’akhiv unemiteihu benefesh ’akhiv ’asher harag venashmidah gam ’et hayoresh vekhibu ’et gakhalti ’asher nish’arah lewilti som sim le’ishi shem ushe’eirit ‘al penei ha’adamah. 
2_samuel 14:8	vayomer hamelekh ’el ha’ishah lekhi leweitekh va’ani ’atsaveh ‘alayikh. 
2_samuel 14:9	vatomer ha’ishah hateqo‘it ’el hamelekh ‘alai ’adoni hamelekh he‘avon ve‘al bet ’awi vehamelekh vekhis’o naqi. 
2_samuel 14:10	vayomer hamelekh hamdaber ’eilayikh vahaweito ’eilai velo yosif ‘od laga‘at bakh. 
2_samuel 14:11	vatomer yizkar na hamelekh ’et yhoh ’elohekha meiharwit meiharbat go’el hadam leshakhet velo yashmidu ’et beni vayomer khai yhoh ’im yipol misa‘arat benekh ’aretsah. 
2_samuel 14:12	vatomer ha’ishah tedaber na shifkhatekha ’el ’adoni hamelekh dawar vayomer dabeiri. 
2_samuel 14:13	vatomer ha’ishah velamah khashawtah kazot ‘al ‘am ’elohim umidaber hamelekh hadawar hazeh ke’ashem lewilti hashiw hamelekh ’et nidekho. 
2_samuel 14:14	ki mot namut vekhamayim hanigarim ’artsah ’asher lo yei’aseifu velo yisa ’elohim nefesh vekhashaw makhashawot lewilti yidakh mimenu nidakh. 
2_samuel 14:15	ve‘atah ’asher bati ledaber ’el hamelekh ’adoni ’et hadawar hazeh ki yeire’uni ha‘am vatomer shifkhatekha ’adaberah na ’el hamelekh ’ulai ya‘aseh hamelekh ’et dewar ’amato. 
2_samuel 14:16	ki yishma‘ hamelekh lehatsil ’et ’amato mikaf ha’ish lehashmid ’oti ve’et beni yakhad minakhalat ’elohim. 
2_samuel 14:17	vatomer shifkhatekha yihyeh na dewar ’adoni hamelekh limnukhah ki kemal’akh ha’elohim ken ’adoni hamelekh lishmoa‘ hatow vehara‘ yhoh ’elohekha yehi ‘imakh. 
2_samuel 14:18	vaya‘an hamelekh vayomer ’el ha’ishah ’al na tekhakhadi mimeni dawar ’asher ’anokhi sho’el ’otakh vatomer ha’ishah yedaber na ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 14:19	vayomer hamelekh hayad yo’aw ’itakh bekhal zot vata‘an ha’ishah vatomer khei nafshekha ’adoni hamelekh ’im ’ish leheimin ulehasmil mikol ’asher diber ’adoni hamelekh ki ‘awdekha yo’aw hu tsivani vehu m befi shifkhatekha ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh. 
2_samuel 14:20	lewa‘awur sabew ’et penei hadawar ‘asah ‘awdekha yo’aw ’et hadawar hazeh vadoni khakham kekhakhemat mal’akh ha’elohim lada‘at ’et kal ’asher ba’arets. 
2_samuel 14:21	vayomer hamelekh ’el yo’aw hineh na ‘asiti ’et hadawar hazeh velekh hashew ’et hana‘ar ’et ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 14:22	vayipol yo’aw ’el panav ’artsah vayishtakhu vaywarekh ’et hamelekh vayomer yo’aw hayom yada‘ ‘awdekha ki matsati khen be‘einekha ’adoni hamelekh ’asher ‘asah hamelekh ’et dewar ‘awdo ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 14:23	vayaqam yo’aw vayeilekh geshurah vayawei ’et ’awshalom yerushalim. 
2_samuel 14:24	vayomer hamelekh yisow ’el beito ufanai lo yir’eh vayisow ’awshalom ’el beito ufenei hamelekh lo ra’ah. 
2_samuel 14:25	ukhe’awshalom lo hayah ’ish yafeh bekhal yisra’el lehalel me’od mikaf raglo ve‘ad qadeqodo lo hayah wo mum. 
2_samuel 14:26	uwegalekho ’et rosho vehayah miqets yamim layamim ’asher yegaleiakh ki khawed ‘alav vegilekho veshaqal ’et se‘ar rosho matayim sheqalim be’ewen hamelekh. 
2_samuel 14:27	vayivaledu le’awshalom sheloshah wanim uwat ’akhat ushemah tamar hi hayetah ’ishah yefat mar’eh. 
2_samuel 14:28	vayeishew ’awshalom birushalim shenatayim yamim ufenei hamelekh lo ra’ah. 
2_samuel 14:29	vayishlakh ’awshalom ’el yo’aw lishloakh ’oto ’el hamelekh velo ’awah lawo ’eilav vayishlakh ‘od sheinit velo ’awah lawo. 
2_samuel 14:30	vayomer ’el ‘awadav re’u khelqat yo’aw ’el yadi velo sham se‘orim lekhu vehotsiteiha vehatsituha wa’esh vayatsitu ‘awdei ’awshalom ’et hakhelqah ba’esh. 
2_samuel 14:31	vayaqam yo’aw vayawo ’el ’awshalom habayetah vayomer ’eilav lamah hitsitu ‘awadekha ’et hakhelqah ’asher li ba’esh. 
2_samuel 14:32	vayomer ’awshalom ’el yo’aw hineh shalakhti ’eilekha leimor bo henah ve’eshlekhah ’otekha ’el hamelekh leimor lamah bati migeshur tow li ‘od ’ani sham ve‘atah ’er’eh penei hamelekh ve’im yesh bi ‘avon vehemitani. 
2_samuel 14:33	vayawo yo’aw ’el hamelekh vayaged lo vayiqra ’el ’awshalom vayawo ’el hamelekh vayishtakhu lo ‘al ’apav ’artsah lifnei hamelekh vayishaq hamelekh le’awshalom. 
2_samuel 15:1	vayhi mei’akharei khen vaya‘as lo ’awshalom merkawah vesusim vakhamishim ’ish ratsim lefanav. 
2_samuel 15:2	vehishkim ’awshalom ve‘amad ‘al yad derekh hasha‘ar vayhi kal ha’ish ’asher yihyeh lo riw lawo ’el hamelekh lamishpat vayiqra ’awshalom ’eilav vayomer ’ei mizeh ‘ir ’atah vayomer mei’akhad shiwtei yisra’el ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 15:3	vayomer ’eilav ’awshalom re’eh dewarekha towim unekhokhim veshomeia‘ ’en lekha mei’et hamelekh. 
2_samuel 15:4	vayomer ’awshalom mi yesimeini shofet ba’arets ve‘alai yawo kal ’ish ’asher yihyeh lo riw umishpat vehitsdaqtiv. 
2_samuel 15:5	vehayah biqraw ’ish lehishtakhavot lo veshalakh ’et yado vehekheziq lo venashaq lo. 
2_samuel 15:6	vaya‘as ’awshalom kadawar hazeh lekhal yisra’el ’asher yawo’u lamishpat ’el hamelekh vayganew ’awshalom ’et lew ’anshei yisra’el. 
2_samuel 15:7	vayhi miqets ’arba‘im shanah vayomer ’awshalom ’el hamelekh ’eilakhah na va’ashalem ’et nidri ’asher nadarti yhoh bekhewron. 
2_samuel 15:8	ki neider nadar ‘awdekha beshiwti wigshur ba’aram leimor ’im yeshiw yashow yeshiweini yhoh yerushalim ve‘awadti ’et yhoh. 
2_samuel 15:9	vayomer lo hamelekh lekh beshalom vayaqam vayeilekh khewronah. 
2_samuel 15:10	vayishlakh ’awshalom meragelim bekhal shiwtei yisra’el leimor keshame‘akhem ’et qol hashofar va’amartem malakh ’awshalom bekhewron. 
2_samuel 15:11	ve’et ’awshalom halekhu matayim ’ish mirushalim qeru’im veholekhim letumam velo yade‘u kal dawar. 
2_samuel 15:12	vayishlakh ’awshalom ’et ’akhitofel hagiloni yo‘ets david mei‘iro migiloh bezawekho ’et hazewakhim vayhi haqesher ’amits veha‘am holekh varaw ’et ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 15:13	vayawo hamagid ’el david leimor hayah lew ’ish yisra’el ’akharei ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 15:14	vayomer david lekhal ‘awadav ’asher ’ito wirushalim qumu veniwrakhah ki lo tihyeh lanu feleitah mipenei ’awshalom maharu lalekhet pen yemaher vehisiganu vehidiakh ‘aleinu ’et hara‘ah vehikah ha‘ir lefi kharew. 
2_samuel 15:15	vayomeru ‘awdei hamelekh ’el hamelekh kekhol ’asher yiwkhar ’adoni hamelekh hineh ‘awadekha. 
2_samuel 15:16	vayeitsei hamelekh vekhal beito beraglav vaya‘azow hamelekh ’et ‘eser nashim pilagshim lishmor habayit. 
2_samuel 15:17	vayeitsei hamelekh vekhal ha‘am beraglav vaya‘amdu bet hamerkhaq. 
2_samuel 15:18	vekhal ‘awadav ‘owerim ‘al yado vekhal hakereiti vekhal hapeleiti vekhal hagitim shesh mei’ot ’ish ’asher ba’u weraglo migat ‘owerim ‘al penei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 15:19	vayomer hamelekh ’el ’itai hagiti lamah teilekh gam ’atah ’itanu shuw veshew ‘im hamelekh ki nakheri ’atah vegam goleh ’atah limqomekha. 
2_samuel 15:20	temol bo’ekha vehayom ’ano‘akha ’ani‘akha ‘imanu lalekhet va’ani holekh ‘al ’asher ’ani holekh shuw vehashew ’et ’akhekha ‘imakh khesed ve’emet. 
2_samuel 15:21	vaya‘an ’itai ’et hamelekh vayomar khai yhoh vekhei ’adoni hamelekh ki ’im bimqom ’asher yihyeh sham ’adoni hamelekh ’im lemavet ’im lekhayim ki sham yihyeh ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 15:22	vayomer david ’el ’itai lekh va‘awor vaya‘awor ’itai hagiti vekhal ’anashav vekhal hataf ’asher ’ito. 
2_samuel 15:23	vekhal ha’arets bokhim qol gadol vekhal ha‘am ‘owerim vehamelekh ‘ower benakhal qidron vekhal ha‘am ‘owerim ‘al penei derekh ’et hamidbar. 
2_samuel 15:24	vehineh gam tsadoq vekhal halviyim ’ito nose’im ’et ’aron berit ha’elohim vayatsiqu ’et ’aron ha’elohim vaya‘al ’ewyatar ‘ad tom kal ha‘am la‘awor min ha‘ir. 
2_samuel 15:25	vayomer hamelekh letsadoq hashew ’et ’aron ha’elohim ha‘ir ’im ’emtsa khen be‘einei yhoh veheshiwani vehir’ani ’oto ve’et naveihu. 
2_samuel 15:26	ve’im koh yomar lo khafatsti bakh hini ya‘aseh li ka’asher tow be‘einav. 
2_samuel 15:27	vayomer hamelekh ’el tsadoq hakohen haro’eh ’atah shuwah ha‘ir beshalom va’akhima‘ats binkha vihonatan ben ’ewyatar shenei weneikhem ’itekhem. 
2_samuel 15:28	re’u ’anokhi mitmahmeiah be‘awrot be‘arwot hamidbar ‘ad bo dawar mei‘imakhem lehagid li. 
2_samuel 15:29	vayashew tsadoq ve’ewyatar ’et ’aron ha’elohim yerushalim vayeishewu sham. 
2_samuel 15:30	vedavid ‘oleh wema‘aleh hazeitim ‘oleh uwokheh verosh lo khafui vehu holekh yakhef vekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito khafu ’ish rosho ve‘alu ‘aloh uwakhoh. 
2_samuel 15:31	vedavid higid leimor ’akhitofel baqosherim ‘im ’awshalom vayomer david sakel na ’et ‘atsat ’akhitofel yhoh. 
2_samuel 15:32	vayhi david ba ‘ad harosh ’asher yishtakhaveh sham leilohim vehineh liqrato khushai ha’arki qarua‘ kutaneto va’adamah ‘al rosho. 
2_samuel 15:33	vayomer lo david ’im ‘awarta ’iti vehayita ‘alai lemasa. 
2_samuel 15:34	ve’im ha‘ir tashuw ve’amarta le’awshalom ‘awdekha ’ani hamelekh ’ehyeh ‘ewed ’awikha va’ani mei’az ve‘atah va’ani ‘awdekha veheifartah li ’et ‘atsat ’akhitofel. 
2_samuel 15:35	vahalo ‘imekha sham tsadoq ve’ewyatar hakohanim vehayah kal hadawar ’asher tishma‘ mibet hamelekh tagid letsadoq ule’ewyatar hakohanim. 
2_samuel 15:36	hineh sham ‘imam shenei weneihem ’akhima‘ats letsadoq vihonatan le’ewyatar ushelakhtem beyadam ’eilai kal dawar ’asher tishma‘u. 
2_samuel 15:37	vayawo khushai rei‘eh david ha‘ir ve’awshalom yawo yerushalim. 
2_samuel 16:1	vedavid ‘awar me‘at meiharosh vehineh tsiwa na‘ar mefi woshet liqrato vetsemed khamorim khawushim va‘aleihem matayim lekhem umei’ah tsimuqim umei’ah qayits veneiwel yayin. 
2_samuel 16:2	vayomer hamelekh ’el tsiwa mah ’eleh lakh vayomer tsiwa hakhamorim lewet hamelekh lirkow ulehalekhem vehalekhem vehaqayits le’ekhol hane‘arim vehayayin lishtot haya‘ef bamidbar. 
2_samuel 16:3	vayomer hamelekh ve’ayeh ben ’adonekha vayomer tsiwa ’el hamelekh hineh yoshew birushalim ki ’amar hayom yashiwu li bet yisra’el ’et mamlekhut ’awi. 
2_samuel 16:4	vayomer hamelekh letsiwa hineh lekha kol ’asher limfi woshet vayomer tsiwa hishtakhaveiti ’emtsa khen be‘einekha ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 16:5	uwa hamelekh david ‘ad bakhurim vehineh misham ’ish yotsei mimishpakhat bet sha’ul ushemo shim‘i wen geira yotsei yatso umeqalel. 
2_samuel 16:6	vaysaqel ba’awanim ’et david ve’et kal ‘awdei hamelekh david vekhal ha‘am vekhal hagiborim mimino umisemolo. 
2_samuel 16:7	vekhoh ’amar shim‘i beqalo tsei tsei ’ish hadamim ve’ish habeliya‘al. 
2_samuel 16:8	heishiw ‘alekha yhoh kol demei wet sha’ul ’asher malakhta takhto takhtav vayiten yhoh ’et hamelukhah beyad ’awshalom benekha vehinekha bera‘atekha ki ’ish damim ’atah. 
2_samuel 16:9	vayomer ’awishai ben tseruyah ’el hamelekh lamah yeqalel hakelew hamet hazeh ’et ’adoni hamelekh ’e‘berah na ve’asirah ’et rosho. 
2_samuel 16:10	vayomer hamelekh mah li velakhem benei tseruyah ki koh yeqalel vekhi ki yhoh ’amar lo qalel ’et david umi yomar madua‘ ‘asitah ken. 
2_samuel 16:11	vayomer david ’el ’awishai ve’el kal ‘awadav hineh weni ’asher yatsa mimei‘ai mewaqesh ’et nafshi ve’af ki ‘atah ben haymini hanikhu lo viqalel ki ’amar lo yhoh. 
2_samuel 16:12	’ulai yir’eh yhoh be‘ovoni be‘eini veheishiw yhoh li towah takhat qilato hayom hazeh. 
2_samuel 16:13	vayeilekh david va’anashav badarekh veshim‘i holekh betseila‘ hahar le‘umato halokh vayqalel vaysaqel ba’awanim le‘umato ve‘ipar be‘afar. 
2_samuel 16:14	vayawo hamelekh vekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito ‘ayeifim vayinafesh sham. 
2_samuel 16:15	ve’awshalom vekhal ha‘am ’ish yisra’el ba’u yerushalim va’akhitofel ’ito. 
2_samuel 16:16	vayhi ka’asher ba khushai ha’arki rei‘eh david ’el ’awshalom vayomer khushai ’el ’awshalom yekhi hamelekh yekhi hamelekh. 
2_samuel 16:17	vayomer ’awshalom ’el khushai zeh khasdekha ’et rei‘ekha lamah lo halakhta ’et rei‘ekha. 
2_samuel 16:18	vayomer khushai ’el ’awshalom lo ki ’asher bakhar yhoh veha‘am hazeh vekhal ’ish yisra’el lo lo ’ehyeh ve’ito ’eishew. 
2_samuel 16:19	vehasheinit lemi ’ani ’e‘ewod halo lifnei weno ka’asher ‘awadti lifnei ’awikha ken ’ehyeh lifanekha. 
2_samuel 16:20	vayomer ’awshalom ’el ’akhitofel hawu lakhem ‘eitsah mah na‘aseh. 
2_samuel 16:21	vayomer ’akhitofel ’el ’awshalom bo ’el pilagshei ’awikha ’asher hiniakh lishmor habayit veshama‘ kal yisra’el ki niw’ashta ’et ’awikha vekhazequ yedei kal ’asher ’itakh. 
2_samuel 16:22	vayatu le’awshalom ha’ohel ‘al hagag vayawo ’awshalom ’el pilagshei ’awiv le‘einei kal yisra’el. 
2_samuel 16:23	va‘atsat ’akhitofel ’asher ya‘ats bayamim hahem ka’asher yish’al ’ish bidwar ha’elohim ken kal ‘atsat ’akhitofel gam ledavid gam le’awshalom. 
2_samuel 17:1	vayomer ’akhitofel ’el ’awshalom ’ewkharah na shenem ‘asar ’elef ’ish ve’aqumah ve’erdefah ’akharei david halayelah. 
2_samuel 17:2	ve’awo ‘alav vehu yageia‘ urefeh yadayim vehakharadti ’oto venas kal ha‘am ’asher ’ito vehikeiti ’et hamelekh lewado. 
2_samuel 17:3	ve’ashiwah khal ha‘am ’eilekha keshuw hakol ha’ish ’asher ’atah mewaqesh kal ha‘am yihyeh shalom. 
2_samuel 17:4	vayishar hadawar be‘einei ’awshalom uwe‘einei kal ziqnei yisra’el. 
2_samuel 17:5	vayomer ’awshalom qera na gam lekhushai ha’arki venishme‘ah mah befiv gam hu. 
2_samuel 17:6	vayawo khushai ’el ’awshalom vayomer ’awshalom ’eilav leimor kadawar hazeh diber ’akhitofel hana‘aseh ’et dewaro ’im ’ayin ’atah daber. 
2_samuel 17:7	vayomer khushai ’el ’awshalom lo towah ha‘eitsah ’asher ya‘ats ’akhitofel bapa‘am hazot. 
2_samuel 17:8	vayomer khushai ’atah yada‘ta ’et ’awikha ve’et ’anashav ki giborim hemah umarei nefesh hemah kedow shakul basadeh ve’awikha ’ish milkhamah velo yalin ’et ha‘am. 
2_samuel 17:9	hineh ‘atah hu nekhba be’akhat hapekhatim ’o be’akhad hameqomot vehayah kinfol bahem batekhilah veshama‘ hashomeia‘ ve’amar hayetah mageifah ba‘am ’asher ’akharei ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 17:10	vehu gam ben khayil ’asher libo kelew ha’aryeh himes yimas ki yodeia‘ kal yisra’el ki gibor ’awikha uwenei khayil ’asher ’ito. 
2_samuel 17:11	ki ya‘atsti hei’asof yei’asef ‘alekha khal yisra’el midan ve‘ad be’er shewa‘ kakhol ’asher ‘al hayam larow ufanekha holekhim baqraw. 
2_samuel 17:12	uwanu ’eilav be’akhat be’akhad hameqomot ’asher nimtsa sham venakhnu ‘alav ka’asher yipol hatal ‘al ha’adamah velo notar bo uwekhal ha’anashim ’asher ’ito gam ’ekhad. 
2_samuel 17:13	ve’im ’el ‘ir yei’asef vehisi’u khal yisra’el ’el ha‘ir hahi khawalim vesakhawnu ’oto ‘ad hanakhal ‘ad ’asher lo nimtsa sham gam tseror. 
2_samuel 17:14	vayomer ’awshalom vekhal ’ish yisra’el towah ‘atsat khushai ha’arki mei‘atsat ’akhitofel yhoh tsivah lehafer ’et ‘atsat ’akhitofel hatowah lewa‘awur hawi yhoh ’el ’awshalom ’et hara‘ah. 
2_samuel 17:15	vayomer khushai ’el tsadoq ve’el ’ewyatar hakohanim kazot vekhazot ya‘ats ’akhitofel ’et ’awshalom ve’et ziqnei yisra’el vekhazot vekhazot ya‘atsti ’ani. 
2_samuel 17:16	ve‘atah shilkhu meheirah vehagidu ledavid leimor ’al talen halaylah be‘arwot hamidbar vegam ‘awor ta‘awor pen yewula‘ lamelekh ulekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito. 
2_samuel 17:17	vihonatan va’akhima‘ats ‘omedim be‘en rogel vehalekhah hashifkhah vehigidah lahem vehem yeilekhu vehigidu lamelekh david ki lo yukhelu leheira’ot lawo ha‘irah. 
2_samuel 17:18	vayar ’otam na‘ar vayaged le’awshalom vayeilekhu sheneihem meheirah vayawo’u ’el bet ’ish bewakhurim velo we’er bakhatseiro vayeiredu sham. 
2_samuel 17:19	vatiqakh ha’ishah vatifros ’et hamasakh ‘al penei habe’er vatishtakh ‘alav harifot velo noda‘ dawar. 
2_samuel 17:20	vayawo’u ‘awdei ’awshalom ’el ha’ishah habaytah vayomeru ’ayeh ’akhima‘ats vihonatan vatomer lahem ha’ishah ‘aweru mikhal hamayim vaywaqshu velo matsa’u vayashuwu yerushalim. 
2_samuel 17:21	vayhi ’akharei lekhtam vaya‘alu meihabe’er vayeilekhu vayagidu lamelekh david vayomeru ’el david qumu ve‘iwru meheirah ’et hamayim ki khakhah ya‘ats ‘aleikhem ’akhitofel. 
2_samuel 17:22	vayaqam david vekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito vaya‘awru ’et hayarden ‘ad ’or haboqer ‘ad ’akhad lo ne‘dar ’asher lo ‘awar ’et hayarden. 
2_samuel 17:23	va’akhitofel ra’ah ki lo ne‘estah ‘atsato vayakhawosh ’et hakhamor vayaqam vayeilekh ’el beito ’el ‘iro vaytsav ’el beito vayeikhanaq vayamat vayiqawer beqewer ’awiv. 
2_samuel 17:24	vedavid ba makhanayemah ve’awshalom ‘awar ’et hayarden hu vekhal ’ish yisra’el ‘imo. 
2_samuel 17:25	ve’et ‘amasa sam ’awshalom takhat yo’aw ‘al hatsawa va‘amasa wen ’ish ushemo yitra hayisre’eili ’asher ba ’el ’awigal bat nakhash ’akhot tseruyah ’em yo’aw. 
2_samuel 17:26	vayikhan yisra’el ve’awshalom ’erets hagil‘ad. 
2_samuel 17:27	vayhi kewo david makhanayemah veshowi wen nakhash meirabat benei ‘amon umakhir ben ‘ami’el milo dewar uwarzilai hagil‘adi meirogelim. 
2_samuel 17:28	mishkaw vesapot ukheli yotser vekhitim use‘orim veqemakh veqali ufol va‘adashim veqali. 
2_samuel 17:29	udewash vekhem’ah vetson ushefot baqar higishu ledavid vela‘am ’asher ’ito le’ekhol ki ’ameru ha‘am ra‘ew ve‘ayef vetsamei bamidbar. 
2_samuel 18:1	vayifqod david ’et ha‘am ’asher ’ito vayasem ‘aleihem sarei ’alafim vesarei mei’ot. 
2_samuel 18:2	vayshalakh david ’et ha‘am hashelishit beyad yo’aw vehashelishit beyad ’awishai ben tseruyah ’akhi yo’aw vehashelishit beyad ’itai hagiti vayomer hamelekh ’el ha‘am yatso ’eitsei gam ’ani ‘imakhem. 
2_samuel 18:3	vayomer ha‘am lo teitsei ki ’im nos nanus lo yasimu ’eileinu lew ve’im yamutu khetsyeinu lo yasimu ’eileinu lew ki ‘atah khamonu ‘asarah ’alafim ve‘atah tow ki tihyeh lanu mei‘ir la‘zir la‘zor. 
2_samuel 18:4	vayomer ’aleihem hamelekh ’asher yitaw be‘eineikhem ’e‘eseh vaya‘amod hamelekh ’el yad hasha‘ar vekhal ha‘am yatse’u lemei’ot vela’alafim. 
2_samuel 18:5	vaytsav hamelekh ’et yo’aw ve’et ’awishai ve’et ’itai leimor le’at li lana‘ar le’awshalom vekhal ha‘am shame‘u betsavot hamelekh ’et kal hasarim ‘al dewar ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 18:6	vayeitsei ha‘am hasadeh liqrat yisra’el vatehi hamilkhamah beya‘ar ’efrayim. 
2_samuel 18:7	vayinagefu sham ‘am yisra’el lifnei ‘awdei david vatehi sham hamageifah gedolah bayom hahu ‘esrim ’alef. 
2_samuel 18:8	vatehi sham hamilkhamah nafotset nafotset ‘al penei khal ha’arets vayerew haya‘ar le’ekhol ba‘am mei’asher ’akhelah hakherew bayom hahu. 
2_samuel 18:9	vayiqarei ’awshalom lifnei ‘awdei david ve’awshalom rokhew ‘al hapered vayawo hapered takhat sowekh ha’eilah hagedolah vayekhezaq rosho wa’eilah vayutan ben hashamayim uwen ha’arets vehapered ’asher takhtav ‘awar. 
2_samuel 18:10	vayar ’ish ’ekhad vayaged leyo’aw vayomer hineh ra’iti ’et ’awshalom talui ba’eilah. 
2_samuel 18:11	vayomer yo’aw la’ish hamagid lo vehineh ra’ita umadua‘ lo hikito sham ’aretsah ve‘alai latet lekha ‘asarah khesef vakhagorah ’ekhat. 
2_samuel 18:12	vayomer ha’ish ’el yo’aw velo velu ’anokhi shoqel ‘al kapai ’elef kesef lo ’eshlakh yadi ’el ben hamelekh ki we’azeneinu tsivah hamelekh ’otekha ve’et ’awishai ve’et ’itai leimor shimru mi bana‘ar be’awshalom. 
2_samuel 18:13	’o ‘asiti wenafsho wenafshi sheqer vekhal dawar lo yikakhed min hamelekh ve’atah tityatsew mineged. 
2_samuel 18:14	vayomer yo’aw lo khen ’okhilah lefanekha vayiqakh sheloshah shewatim bekhapo vayitqa‘em belew ’awshalom ‘odenu khai belew ha’eilah. 
2_samuel 18:15	vayasobu ‘asarah ne‘arim nose’ei kelei yo’aw vayaku ’et ’awshalom vaymituhu. 
2_samuel 18:16	vayitqa‘ yo’aw bashofar vayashaw ha‘am mirdof ’akharei yisra’el ki khasakh yo’aw ’et ha‘am. 
2_samuel 18:17	vayiqkhu ’et ’awshalom vayashlikhu ’oto waya‘ar ’el hapakhat hagadol vayatsiwu ‘alav gal ’awanim gadol me’od vekhal yisra’el nasu ’ish le’oheilo le’ohalav. 
2_samuel 18:18	ve’awshalom laqakh vayatsew lo wekhayav wekhayav ’et matsewet ’asher be‘eimeq hamelekh ki ’amar ’en li wen ba‘awur hazkir shemi vayiqra lamatsewet ‘al shemo vayiqarei lah yad ’awshalom ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_samuel 18:19	va’akhima‘ats ben tsadoq ’amar ’arutsah na va’awaserah ’et hamelekh ki shefato yhoh miyad ’oyewav. 
2_samuel 18:20	vayomer lo yo’aw lo ’ish besorah ’atah hayom hazeh uwisarta beyom ’akher vehayom hazeh lo tewaser ki ‘al ‘al ken ben hamelekh met. 
2_samuel 18:21	vayomer yo’aw lakushi lekh haged lamelekh ’asher ra’itah vayishtakhu khushi leyo’aw vayarots. 
2_samuel 18:22	vayosef ‘od ’akhima‘ats ben tsadoq vayomer ’el yo’aw vihi mah ’arutsah na gam ’ani ’akharei hakushi vayomer yo’aw lamah zeh ’atah rats beni ulekhah ’en besorah motset. 
2_samuel 18:23	vihi mah ’aruts vayomer lo ruts vayarats ’akhima‘ats derekh hakikar vaya‘awor ’et hakushi. 
2_samuel 18:24	vedavid yoshew ben shenei hashe‘arim vayeilekh hatsofeh ’el gag hasha‘ar ’el hakhomah vayisa ’et ‘einav vayar vehineh ’ish rats lewado. 
2_samuel 18:25	vayiqra hatsofeh vayaged lamelekh vayomer hamelekh ’im lewado besorah befiv vayeilekh halokh veqarew. 
2_samuel 18:26	vayar hatsofeh ’ish ’akher rats vayiqra hatsofeh ’el hasho‘er vayomer hineh ’ish rats lewado vayomer hamelekh gam zeh mewaser. 
2_samuel 18:27	vayomer hatsofeh ’ani ro’eh ’et merutsat harishon kimrutsat ’akhima‘ats ben tsadoq vayomer hamelekh ’ish tow zeh ve’el besorah towah yawo. 
2_samuel 18:28	vayiqra ’akhima‘ats vayomer ’el hamelekh shalom vayishtakhu lamelekh le’apav ’aretsah vayomer barukh yhoh ’elohekha ’asher sigar ’et ha’anashim ’asher nase’u ’et yadam badoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 18:29	vayomer hamelekh shalom lana‘ar le’awshalom vayomer ’akhima‘ats ra’iti hehamon hagadol lishloakh ’et ‘ewed hamelekh yo’aw ve’et ‘awdekha velo yada‘ti mah. 
2_samuel 18:30	vayomer hamelekh sow hityatsew koh vayisow vaya‘amod. 
2_samuel 18:31	vehineh hakushi ba vayomer hakushi yitbaser ’adoni hamelekh ki shefatekha yhoh hayom miyad kal haqamim ‘alekha. 
2_samuel 18:32	vayomer hamelekh ’el hakushi hashalom lana‘ar le’awshalom vayomer hakushi yihyu khana‘ar ’oyewei ’adoni hamelekh vekhol ’asher qamu ‘alekha lera‘ah. 
2_samuel 18:33	vayirgaz hamelekh vaya‘al ‘al ‘aliyat hasha‘ar vayeiwek vekhoh ’amar belekhto beni ’awshalom beni weni ’awshalom mi yiten muti ’ani takhtekha ’awshalom beni weni. 
2_samuel 19:1	vayugad leyo’aw hineh hamelekh bokheh vayit’abel ‘al ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 19:2	vatehi hateshu‘ah bayom hahu le’eiwel lekhal ha‘am ki shama‘ ha‘am bayom hahu leimor ne‘etsaw hamelekh ‘al beno. 
2_samuel 19:3	vayitganew ha‘am bayom hahu lawo ha‘ir ka’asher yitganew ha‘am hanikhlamim benusam bamilkhamah. 
2_samuel 19:4	vehamelekh la’at ’et panav vayiz‘aq hamelekh qol gadol beni ’awshalom ’awshalom beni weni. 
2_samuel 19:5	vayawo yo’aw ’el hamelekh habayit vayomer howashta hayom ’et penei khal ‘awadekha hamaletim ’et nafshekha hayom ve’et nefesh banekha uwenotekha venefesh nashekha venefesh pilagshekha. 
2_samuel 19:6	le’ahawah ’et sone’ekha velisno ’et ’ohawekha ki higadta hayom ki ’en lekha sarim va‘awadim ki yada‘ti hayom ki lo lu ’awshalom khai vekhulanu hayom meitim ki ’az yashar be‘einekha. 
2_samuel 19:7	ve‘atah qum tsei vedaber ‘al lew ‘awadekha ki yhoh nishba‘ti ki ’einekha yotsei ’im yalin ’ish ’itekha halaylah vera‘ah lekha zot mikal hara‘ah ’asher ba’ah ‘alekha mine‘urekha ‘ad ‘atah. 
2_samuel 19:8	vayaqam hamelekh vayeishew basha‘ar ulekhal ha‘am higidu leimor hineh hamelekh yoshew basha‘ar vayawo khal ha‘am lifnei hamelekh veyisra’el nas ’ish le’ohalav. 
2_samuel 19:9	vayhi khal ha‘am nadon bekhal shiwtei yisra’el leimor hamelekh hitsilanu mikaf ’oyeweinu vehu miletanu mikaf pelishtim ve‘atah barakh min ha’arets mei‘al ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 19:10	ve’awshalom ’asher mashakhnu ‘aleinu met bamilkhamah ve‘atah lamah ’atem makharishim lehashiw ’et hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:11	vehamelekh david lakh ’el tsadoq ve’el ’ewyatar hakohanim leimor daberu ’el ziqnei yehudah leimor lamah tihyu ’akharonim lehashiw ’et hamelekh ’el beito udewar kal yisra’el ba ’el hamelekh ’el beito. 
2_samuel 19:12	’akhai ’atem ‘atsmi uwesari ’atem velamah tihyu ’akharonim lehashiw ’et hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:13	vela‘amasa tomeru halo ‘atsmi uwesari ’atah koh ya‘aseh li ’elohim vekhoh yosif ’im lo sar tsawa tihyeh lefanai kal hayamim takhat yo’aw. 
2_samuel 19:14	vayat ’et lewaw kal ’ish yehudah ke’ish ’ekhad vayishlekhu ’el hamelekh shuw ’atah vekhal ‘awadekha. 
2_samuel 19:15	vayashaw hamelekh vayawo ‘ad hayarden vihudah ba hagilgalah lalekhet liqrat hamelekh leha‘awir ’et hamelekh ’et hayarden. 
2_samuel 19:16	vaymaher shim‘i wen geira ben haymini ’asher mibakhurim vayeired ‘im ’ish yehudah liqrat hamelekh david. 
2_samuel 19:17	ve’elef ’ish ‘imo mibinyamin vetsiwa na‘ar bet sha’ul vakhameishet ‘asar banav ve‘esrim ‘awadav ’ito vetsalekhu hayarden lifnei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:18	ve‘awerah ha‘awarah la‘awir ’et bet hamelekh vela‘asot hatow be‘ayno be‘einav veshim‘i wen geira nafal lifnei hamelekh be‘awero bayarden. 
2_samuel 19:19	vayomer ’el hamelekh ’al yakhashaw li ’adoni ‘avon ve’al tizkor ’et ’asher he‘evah ‘awdekha bayom ’asher yatsa ’adoni hamelekh mirushalim lasum hamelekh ’el libo. 
2_samuel 19:20	ki yada‘ ‘awdekha ki ’ani khatati vehineh wati hayom rishon lekhal bet yosef laredet liqrat ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:21	vaya‘an ’awishai ben tseruyah vayomer hatakhat zot lo yumat shim‘i ki qilel ’et meshiakh yhoh. 
2_samuel 19:22	vayomer david mah li velakhem benei tseruyah ki tihyu li hayom lesatan hayom yumat ’ish beyisra’el ki halo yada‘ti ki hayom ’ani melekh ‘al yisra’el. 
2_samuel 19:23	vayomer hamelekh ’el shim‘i lo tamut vayishawa‘ lo hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:24	umefiwoshet ben sha’ul yarad liqrat hamelekh velo ‘asah raglav velo ‘asah sefamo ve’et begadav lo khibes lemin hayom lekhet hamelekh ‘ad hayom ’asher ba weshalom. 
2_samuel 19:25	vayhi ki wa yerushalim liqrat hamelekh vayomer lo hamelekh lamah lo halakhta ‘imi mefiwoshet. 
2_samuel 19:26	vayomar ’adoni hamelekh ‘awdi rimani ki ’amar ‘awdekha ’ekhbeshah li hakhamor ve’erkaw ‘aleha ve’eilekh ’et hamelekh ki fiseiakh ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 19:27	vayragel be‘awdekha ’el ’adoni hamelekh vadoni hamelekh kemal’akh ha’elohim va‘aseh hatow be‘einekha. 
2_samuel 19:28	ki lo hayah kal bet ’awi ki ’im ’anshei mavet ladoni hamelekh vatashet ’et ‘awdekha be’okhelei shulkhanekha umah yesh li ‘od tsedaqah veliz‘oq ‘od ’el hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:29	vayomer lo hamelekh lamah tedaber ‘od dewarekha ’amarti ’atah vetsiwa takhlequ ’et hasadeh. 
2_samuel 19:30	vayomer mefiwoshet ’el hamelekh gam ’et hakol yiqakh ’akharei ’asher ba ’adoni hamelekh beshalom ’el beito. 
2_samuel 19:31	uwarzilai hagil‘adi yarad meirogelim vaya‘awor ’et hamelekh hayarden leshalekho ’et wayarden hayarden. 
2_samuel 19:32	uwarzilai zaqen me’od ben shemonim shanah vehu khilkal ’et hamelekh weshiwato wemakhanayim ki ’ish gadol hu me’od. 
2_samuel 19:33	vayomer hamelekh ’el barzilai ’atah ‘awor ’iti vekhilkalti ’otekha ‘imadi birushalim. 
2_samuel 19:34	vayomer barzilai ’el hamelekh kamah yemei shenei khayai ki ’e‘eleh ’et hamelekh yerushalim. 
2_samuel 19:35	ben shemonim shanah ’anokhi hayom ha’eida‘ ben tow lera‘ ’im yit‘am ‘awdekha ’et ’asher ’okhal ve’et ’asher ’eshteh ’im ’eshma‘ ‘od beqol sharim vesharot velamah yihyeh ‘awdekha ‘od lemasa ’el ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:36	kim‘at ya‘awor ‘awdekha ’et hayarden ’et hamelekh velamah yigmeleini hamelekh hagemulah hazot. 
2_samuel 19:37	yashaw na ‘awdekha ve’amut be‘iri ‘im qewer ’awi ve’imi vehineh ‘awdekha khimham ya‘awor ‘im ’adoni hamelekh va‘aseh lo ’et ’asher tow be‘einekha. 
2_samuel 19:38	vayomer hamelekh ’iti ya‘awor kimham va’ani ’e‘eseh lo ’et hatow be‘einekha vekhol ’asher tiwkhar ‘alai ’e‘eseh lakh. 
2_samuel 19:39	vaya‘awor kal ha‘am ’et hayarden vehamelekh ‘awar vayishaq hamelekh lewarzilai vaywarakheihu vayashaw limqomo. 
2_samuel 19:40	vaya‘awor hamelekh hagilgalah vekhimhan ‘awar ‘imo vekhal ‘am yehudah vai‘ewiru he‘ewiru ’et hamelekh vegam khatsi ‘am yisra’el. 
2_samuel 19:41	vehineh kal ’ish yisra’el ba’im ’el hamelekh vayomeru ’el hamelekh madua‘ genawukha ’akheinu ’ish yehudah vaya‘awiru ’et hamelekh ve’et beito ’et hayarden vekhal ’anshei david ‘imo. 
2_samuel 19:42	vaya‘an kal ’ish yehudah ‘al ’ish yisra’el ki qarow hamelekh ’eilai velamah zeh kharah lekha ‘al hadawar hazeh he’akhol ’akhalnu min hamelekh ’im niset nisa lanu. 
2_samuel 19:43	vaya‘an ’ish yisra’el ’et ’ish yehudah vayomer ‘eser yadot li wamelekh vegam bedavid ’ani mimekha umadua‘ heqilotani velo hayah dewari rishon li lehashiw ’et malki vayiqesh dewar ’ish yehudah midewar ’ish yisra’el. 
2_samuel 20:1	vesham niqra ’ish beliya‘al ushemo shewa‘ ben bikhri ’ish yemini vayitqa‘ bashofar vayomer ’en lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah lanu bewen yishai ’ish le’ohalav yisra’el. 
2_samuel 20:2	vaya‘al kal ’ish yisra’el mei’akharei david ’akharei shewa‘ ben bikhri ve’ish yehudah dawequ wemalkam min hayarden ve‘ad yerushalim. 
2_samuel 20:3	vayawo david ’el beito yerushalim vayiqakh hamelekh ’et ‘eser nashim pilagshim ’asher hiniakh lishmor habayit vayitenem bet mishmeret vaykhalkelem va’aleihem lo wa vatihyenah tserurot ‘ad yom mutan ’almenut khayut. 
2_samuel 20:4	vayomer hamelekh ’el ‘amasa haz‘eq li ’et ’ish yehudah sheloshet yamim ve’atah poh ‘amod. 
2_samuel 20:5	vayeilekh ‘amasa lehaz‘iq ’et yehudah vayikher vayokher min hamo‘ed ’asher ye‘ado. 
2_samuel 20:6	vayomer david ’el ’awishai ‘atah yeira‘ lanu shewa‘ ben bikhri min ’awshalom ’atah qakh ’et ‘awdei ’adonekha uredof ’akharav pen matsa lo ‘arim betsurot vehitsil ‘eineinu. 
2_samuel 20:7	vayeitse’u ’akharav ’anshei yo’aw vehakereiti vehapeleiti vekhal hagiborim vayeitse’u mirushalim lirdof ’akharei shewa‘ ben bikhri. 
2_samuel 20:8	hem ‘im ha’ewen hagedolah ’asher begiw‘on va‘amasa ba lifneihem veyo’aw khagur mido lewushu ve‘alo ve‘alav khagor kherew metsumedet ‘al matenav beta‘rah vehu yatsa vatipol. 
2_samuel 20:9	vayomer yo’aw la‘amasa hashalom ’atah ’akhi vatokhez yad yemin yo’aw bizqan ‘amasa linshaq lo. 
2_samuel 20:10	va‘amasa lo nishmar bakherew ’asher beyad yo’aw vayakeihu wah ’el hakhomesh vayishpokh mei‘av ’artsah velo shanah lo vayamot veyo’aw va’awishai ’akhiv radaf ’akharei shewa‘ ben bikhri. 
2_samuel 20:11	ve’ish ‘amad ‘alav mina‘arei yo’aw vayomer mi ’asher khafets beyo’aw umi ’asher ledavid ’akharei yo’aw. 
2_samuel 20:12	va‘amasa mitgolel badam betokh hamesilah vayar ha’ish ki ‘amad kal ha‘am vayasew ’et ‘amasa min hamsilah hasadeh vayashlekh ‘alav beged ka’asher ra’ah kal haba ‘alav ve‘amad. 
2_samuel 20:13	ka’asher hogah min hamsilah ‘awar kal ’ish ’akharei yo’aw lirdof ’akharei shewa‘ ben bikhri. 
2_samuel 20:14	vaya‘awor bekhal shiwtei yisra’el ’aweilah uwet ma‘akhah vekhal habeirim vayiqleihu vayiqahalu vayawo’u ’af ’akharav. 
2_samuel 20:15	vayawo’u vayatsuru ‘alav be’aweilah bet hama‘akhah vayishpekhu solelah ’el ha‘ir vata‘amod bakhel vekhal ha‘am ’asher ’et yo’aw mashkhitim lehapil hakhomah. 
2_samuel 20:16	vatiqra ’ishah khakhamah min ha‘ir shim‘u shim‘u ’imru na ’el yo’aw qeraw ‘ad henah va’adaberah ’eilekha. 
2_samuel 20:17	vayiqraw ’eileha vatomer ha’ishah ha’atah yo’aw vayomer ’ani vatomer lo shema‘ diwrei ’amatekha vayomer shomeia‘ ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 20:18	vatomer leimor daber yedaberu warishonah leimor sha’ol yesha’alu be’awel vekhen heitamu. 
2_samuel 20:19	’anokhi shelumei ’emunei yisra’el ’atah mewaqesh lehamit ‘ir ve’em beyisra’el lamah tewala‘ nakhalat yhoh. 
2_samuel 20:20	vaya‘an yo’aw vayomar khalilah khalilah li ’im ’awala‘ ve’im ’ashkhit. 
2_samuel 20:21	lo khen hadawar ki ’ish meihar ’efrayim shewa‘ ben bikhri shemo nasa yado bamelekh bedavid tenu ’oto lewado ve’eilekhah mei‘al ha‘ir vatomer ha’ishah ’el yo’aw hineh rosho mushlakh ’eilekha be‘ad hakhomah. 
2_samuel 20:22	vatawo ha’ishah ’el kal ha‘am bekhakhematah vayikhretu ’et rosh shewa‘ ben bikhri vayashlikhu ’el yo’aw vayitqa‘ bashofar vayafutsu mei‘al ha‘ir ’ish le’ohalav veyo’aw shaw yerushalim ’el hamelekh. 
2_samuel 20:23	veyo’aw ’el kal hatsawa yisra’el uwenayah ben yehoyada‘ ‘al hakeri hakereiti ve‘al hapeleiti. 
2_samuel 20:24	va’adoram ‘al hamas vihoshafat ben ’akhilud hamazkir. 
2_samuel 20:25	usheiya usheva sofer vetsadoq ve’ewyatar kohanim. 
2_samuel 20:26	vegam ‘ira haya’iri hayah khohen ledavid. 
2_samuel 21:1	vayhi ra‘aw bimei david shalosh shanim shanah ’akharei shanah vaywaqesh david ’et penei yhoh vayomer yhoh ’el sha’ul ve’el bet hadamim ‘al ’asher heimit ’et hagiw‘onim. 
2_samuel 21:2	vayiqra hamelekh lagiw‘onim vayomer ’aleihem vehagiw‘onim lo mibenei yisra’el hemah ki ’im miyeter ha’emori uwenei yisra’el nishbe‘u lahem vaywaqesh sha’ul lehakotam beqanoto liwnei yisra’el vihudah. 
2_samuel 21:3	vayomer david ’el hagiw‘onim mah ’e‘eseh lakhem uwamah ’akhaper uwarekhu ’et nakhalat yhoh. 
2_samuel 21:4	vayomeru lo hagiw‘onim ’en li lanu kesef vezahaw ‘im sha’ul ve‘im beito ve’en lanu ’ish lehamit beyisra’el vayomer mah ’atem ’omerim ’e‘eseh lakhem. 
2_samuel 21:5	vayomeru ’el hamelekh ha’ish ’asher kilanu va’asher dimah lanu nishmadnu meihityatsew bekhal gewul yisra’el. 
2_samuel 21:6	yenatan yutan lanu shiw‘ah ’anashim mibanav vehoqa‘anum yhoh begiw‘at sha’ul bekhir yhoh vayomer hamelekh ’ani ’eten. 
2_samuel 21:7	vayakhmol hamelekh ‘al mefi woshet ben yehonatan ben sha’ul ‘al shewu‘at yhoh ’asher beinotam ben david uwen yehonatan ben sha’ul. 
2_samuel 21:8	vayiqakh hamelekh ’etosh nei benei ritspah wat ’ayah ’asher yaledah lesha’ul ’et ’armoni ve’et mefiwoshet ve’et khameishet benei mikhal bat sha’ul ’asher yaledah le‘adri’el ben barzilai hamekholati. 
2_samuel 21:9	vayitenem beyad hagiw‘onim vayoqi‘um bahar lifnei yhoh vayipelu shiwa‘tayim shewa‘tam yakhad vehem vehemah humtu bimei qatsir barishonim tekhilat bitkhilat qetsir se‘orim. 
2_samuel 21:10	vatiqakh ritspah wat ’ayah ’et hasaq vatateihu lah ’el hatsur mitekhilat qatsir ‘ad nitakh mayim ‘aleihem min hashamayim velo natenah ‘of hashamayim lanuakh ‘aleihem yomam ve’et khayat hasadeh layelah. 
2_samuel 21:11	vayugad ledavid ’et ’asher ‘asetah ritspah wat ’ayah pilegesh sha’ul. 
2_samuel 21:12	vayeilekh david vayiqakh ’et ‘atsmot sha’ul ve’et ‘atsmot yehonatan beno mei’et ba‘alei yawesh gil‘ad ’asher ganewu ’otam meirekhow bet shan ’asher telum tela’um sham hapelishtim shamah pelishtim beyom hakot pelishtim ’et sha’ul bagilboa‘. 
2_samuel 21:13	vaya‘al misham ’et ‘atsmot sha’ul ve’et ‘atsmot yehonatan beno vaya’asfu ’et ‘atsmot hamuqa‘im. 
2_samuel 21:14	vayiqberu ’et ‘atsmot sha’ul vihonatan beno be’erets binyamin betseila‘ beqewer qish ’awiv vaya‘asu kol ’asher tsivah hamelekh vayei‘ater ’elohim la’arets ’akharei khen. 
2_samuel 21:15	vatehi ‘od milkhamah lapelishtim ’et yisra’el vayeired david va‘awadav ‘imo vayilakhamu ’et pelishtim vaya‘af david. 
2_samuel 21:16	veyishbo veyishbi benow ’asher bilidei harafah umishqal qeino shelosh mei’ot mishqal nekhoshet vehu khagur khadashah vayomer lehakot ’et david. 
2_samuel 21:17	vaya‘azar lo ’awishai ben tseruyah vayakh ’et hapelishti vaymiteihu ’az nishbe‘u ’anshei david lo leimor lo teitsei ‘od ’itanu lamilkhamah velo tekhabeh ’et ner yisra’el. 
2_samuel 21:18	vayhi ’akharei khen vatehi ‘od hamilkhamah begow ‘im pelishtim ’az hikah sibekhai hakhushati ’et saf ’asher bilidei harafah. 
2_samuel 21:19	vatehi ‘od hamilkhamah begow ‘im pelishtim vayakh ’elkhanan ben ya‘rei ’oregim bet halakhmi ’et galeyat hagiti ve‘ets khanito kimnor ’oregim. 
2_samuel 21:20	vatehi ‘od milkhamah begat vayhi ’ish madin madon ve’etsbe‘ot yadav ve’etsbe‘ot raglav shesh vashesh ‘esrim ve’arba‘ mispar vegam hu yulad leharafah. 
2_samuel 21:21	vaykharef ’et yisra’el vayakeihu yehonatan ben shim‘i shim‘ah ’akhi david. 
2_samuel 21:22	’et ’arba‘at ’eleh yuledu leharafah begat vayipelu weyad david uweyad ‘awadav. 
2_samuel 22:1	vaydaber david yhoh ’et diwrei hashirah hazot beyom hitsil yhoh ’oto mikaf kal ’oyewav umikaf sha’ul. 
2_samuel 22:2	vayomar yhoh sal‘i umetsudati umefalti li. 
2_samuel 22:3	’elohei tsuri ’ekheseh bo magini veqeren yish‘i misgabi umenusi moshi‘i meikhamas toshi‘eini. 
2_samuel 22:4	mehulal ’eqra yhoh umei’oyewai ’ivasheia‘. 
2_samuel 22:5	ki ’afafuni mishberei mavet nakhalei weliya‘al yewa‘atuni. 
2_samuel 22:6	khewlei she’ol sabuni qidemuni moqeshei mavet. 
2_samuel 22:7	batsar li ’eqra yhoh ve’el ’elohai ’eqra vayishma‘ meiheikhalo qoli veshav‘ati be’azenav. 
2_samuel 22:8	vatga‘ash vayitga‘ash vatir‘ash ha’arets mosdot hashamayim yirgazu vayitga‘ashu ki kharah lo. 
2_samuel 22:9	‘alah ‘ashan be’apo ve’esh mipiv tokhel gekhalim ba‘aru mimenu. 
2_samuel 22:10	vayet shamayim vayeirad va‘arafel takhat raglav. 
2_samuel 22:11	vayirkaw ‘al keruw vaya‘of vayeira ‘al kanfei ruakh. 
2_samuel 22:12	vayashet khoshekh sewiwotav sukot khashrat mayim ‘awei shekhaqim. 
2_samuel 22:13	minogah negdo ba‘aru gakhalei ’esh. 
2_samuel 22:14	yar‘em min shamayim yhoh ve‘elyon yiten qolo. 
2_samuel 22:15	vayishlakh khitsim vayfitsem baraq vayehumem vayahom. 
2_samuel 22:16	vayeira’u ’afiqei yam yigalu mosedot teiwel bega‘arat yhoh minishmat ruakh ’apo. 
2_samuel 22:17	yishlakh mimarom yiqakheini yamsheini mimayim rabim. 
2_samuel 22:18	yatsileini mei’oyewi ‘az misone’ai ki ’ametsu mimeni. 
2_samuel 22:19	yeqademuni beyom ’eidi vayhi yhoh mish‘an li. 
2_samuel 22:20	vayotsei lamerkhaw ’oti yekhaletseini ki khafets bi. 
2_samuel 22:21	yigmeleini yhoh ketsidqati kewor yadai yashiw li. 
2_samuel 22:22	ki shamarti darkhei yhoh velo rasha‘ti mei’elohai. 
2_samuel 22:23	ki khal mishpoto mishpatav lenegdi vekhuqotav lo ’asur mimenah. 
2_samuel 22:24	va’ehyeh tamim lo va’eshtamerah mei‘avoni. 
2_samuel 22:25	vayashew yhoh li ketsidqati kewori leneged ‘einav. 
2_samuel 22:26	‘im khasid titkhasad ‘im gibor tamim titamam. 
2_samuel 22:27	‘im nawar titawar ve‘im ‘iqesh titapal. 
2_samuel 22:28	ve’et ‘am ‘ani toshia‘ ve‘einekha ‘al ramim tashpil. 
2_samuel 22:29	ki ’atah neiri yhoh yhoh yagiah khasheki. 
2_samuel 22:30	ki wekhah ’aruts gedud beilohai ’adaleg shur. 
2_samuel 22:31	ha’el tamim darko ’imrat yhoh tserufah magen hu lekhol hakhosim bo. 
2_samuel 22:32	ki mi ’el mibal‘adei yhoh umi tsur mibal‘adei ’eloheinu. 
2_samuel 22:33	ha’el ma‘uzi khayil vayater tamim darko darki. 
2_samuel 22:34	meshaveh raglav raglai ka’ayalot ve‘al bamotai ya‘amideini. 
2_samuel 22:35	melamed yadai lamilkhamah venikhat qeshet nekhushah zero‘otai. 
2_samuel 22:36	vatiten li magen yish‘ekha va‘anotekha tarbeini. 
2_samuel 22:37	tarkhiw tsa‘adi takhteini velo ma‘adu qarsulai. 
2_samuel 22:38	’erdefah ’oyewai va’ashmidem velo ’ashuw ‘ad kalotam. 
2_samuel 22:39	va’akhalem va’emkhatsem velo yequmun vayipelu takhat raglai. 
2_samuel 22:40	vatazreini khayil lamilkhamah takhria‘ qamai takhteini. 
2_samuel 22:41	ve’oyewai tatah li ‘oref mesan’ai va’atsmitem. 
2_samuel 22:42	yish‘u ve’en moshia‘ ’el yhoh velo ‘anam. 
2_samuel 22:43	ve’eshkhaqem ka‘afar ’arets ketit khutsot ’adiqem ’erqa‘em. 
2_samuel 22:44	vatefaleteini meiriwei ‘ami tishmereini lerosh goyim ‘am lo yada‘ti ya‘awduni. 
2_samuel 22:45	benei neikhar yitkakhashu li lishmoa‘ ’ozen yishame‘u li. 
2_samuel 22:46	benei neikhar yibolu veyakhgeru mimisgerotam. 
2_samuel 22:47	khai yhoh uwarukh tsuri veyarum ’elohei tsur yish‘i. 
2_samuel 22:48	ha’el hanoten neqamot li umorid ‘amim takhteini. 
2_samuel 22:49	umotsi’i mei’oyewai umiqamai teromeini mei’ish khamasim tatsileini. 
2_samuel 22:50	‘al ken ’odkha yhoh bagoyim uleshimkha ’azamer. 
2_samuel 22:51	migdil migdol yeshu‘ot malko ve‘oseh khesed limshikho ledavid ulezar‘o ‘ad ‘olam. 
2_samuel 23:1	ve’eleh diwrei david ha’akharonim ne’um david ben yishai une’um hagewer huqam ‘al meshiakh ’elohei ya‘aqow une‘im zemirot yisra’el. 
2_samuel 23:2	ruakh yhoh diber bi umilato ‘al leshoni. 
2_samuel 23:3	’amar ’elohei yisra’el li diber tsur yisra’el moshel ba’adam tsadiq moshel yir’at ’elohim. 
2_samuel 23:4	ukhe’or boqer yizrakh shamesh boqer lo ‘awot minogah mimatar deshe mei’arets. 
2_samuel 23:5	ki lo khen beiti ‘im ’el ki werit ‘olam sam li ‘arukhah wakol ushemurah ki khal yish‘i vekhal kheifets ki lo yatsmiakh. 
2_samuel 23:6	uweliya‘al keqots munad kulaham ki lo weyad yiqakhu. 
2_samuel 23:7	ve’ish yiga‘ bahem yimalei warzel ve‘ets khanit uwa’esh sarof yisarefu bashawet. 
2_samuel 23:8	’eleh shemot hagiborim ’asher ledavid yoshew bashewet takhkemoni rosh hashalishi hu ‘adino ha‘etsno ha‘etsni ‘al shemoneh mei’ot khalal befa‘am ’ekhad ’ekhat. 
2_samuel 23:9	ve’akharo ve’akharav ’el‘azar ben dodi dodo ben ’akhokhi bishloshah giborim hagiborim ‘im david bekharefam bapelishtim ne’esfu sham lamilkhamah vaya‘alu ’ish yisra’el. 
2_samuel 23:10	hu qam vayakh bapelishtim ‘ad ki yage‘ah yado vatidbaq yado ’el hakherew vaya‘as yhoh teshu‘ah gedolah bayom hahu veha‘am yashuwu ’akharav ’akh lefashet. 
2_samuel 23:11	ve’akharav shama wen ’agei harari vayei’asefu felishtim lakhayah vatehi sham khelqat hasadeh melei’ah ‘adashim veha‘am nas mipenei felishtim. 
2_samuel 23:12	vayityatsew betokh hakhelqah vayatsileha vayakh ’et pelishtim vaya‘as yhoh teshu‘ah gedolah. 
2_samuel 23:13	vayeiredu sheloshim sheloshah meihasheloshim rosh vayawo’u ’el qatsir ’el david ’el me‘arat ‘adulam vekhayat pelishtim khonah be‘eimeq refa’im. 
2_samuel 23:14	vedavid ’az bametsudah umatsaw pelishtim ’az bet lakhem. 
2_samuel 23:15	vayit’aveh david vayomar mi yashqeini mayim mibor bet lekhem ’asher basha‘ar. 
2_samuel 23:16	vayiwqe‘u sheloshet hagiborim bemakhaneh felishtim vayish’awu mayim mibor bet lekhem ’asher basha‘ar vayis’u vayawi’u ’el david velo ’awah lishtotam vayasekh ’otam yhoh. 
2_samuel 23:17	vayomer khalilah li yhoh mei‘asoti zot hadam ha’anashim haholekhim benafshotam velo ’awah lishtotam ’eleh ‘asu sheloshet hagiborim. 
2_samuel 23:18	va’awishai ’akhi yo’aw ben tseruyah hu rosh hasheloshi hasheloshah vehu ‘orer ’et khanito ‘al shelosh mei’ot khalal velo shem basheloshah. 
2_samuel 23:19	min hasheloshah hakhi nikhbad vayhi lahem lesar ve‘ad hasheloshah lo wa. 
2_samuel 23:20	uwenayahu wen yehoyada‘ ben ’ish khai khayil raw pe‘alim miqawtse’el hu hikah ’et shenei ’ari’el mo’aw vehu yarad vehikah ’et ha’ariyah ha’ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. 
2_samuel 23:21	vehu hikah ’et ’ish mitsri ’asher ’ish mar’eh uweyad hamitsri khanit vayeired ’eilav bashawet vayigzol ’et hakhanit miyad hamitsri vayahargeihu bakhanito. 
2_samuel 23:22	’eleh ‘asah benayahu ben yehoyada‘ velo shem bishloshah hagiborim. 
2_samuel 23:23	min hasheloshim nikhbad ve’el hasheloshah lo wa vaysimeihu david ’el mishma‘to. 
2_samuel 23:24	‘asah ’el ’akhi yo’aw basheloshim ’elkhanan ben dodo bet lakhem. 
2_samuel 23:25	shamah hakharodi ’eliqa hakharodi. 
2_samuel 23:26	khelets hapalti ‘ira wen ‘iqesh hateqo‘i. 
2_samuel 23:27	’awi‘ezer ha‘anetoti mewunai hakhushati. 
2_samuel 23:28	tsalmon ha’akhokhi mahrai hanetofati. 
2_samuel 23:29	kheilew ben ba‘anah hanetofati ’itai ben riwai migiw‘at benei winyamin. 
2_samuel 23:30	benayahu pir‘atoni hidai minakhalei ga‘ash. 
2_samuel 23:31	’awi ‘alwon ha‘arwati ‘azmavet habarkhumi. 
2_samuel 23:32	’elyakhba hasha‘alwoni benei yashen yehonatan. 
2_samuel 23:33	shamah haharari ’akhi’am ben sharar harari. 
2_samuel 23:34	’elifelet ben ’akhasbai ben hama‘akhati ’eli‘am ben ’akhitofel hagiloni. 
2_samuel 23:35	khetsro khetsrai hakarmeli pa‘arai ha’arbi. 
2_samuel 23:36	yig’al ben natan mitsowah bani hagadi. 
2_samuel 23:37	tseleq ha‘amoni nakhrai habe’eiroti nose’ei nosei kelei yo’aw ben tseruyah. 
2_samuel 23:38	‘ira hayitri garew hayitri. 
2_samuel 23:39	’uriyah hakhiti kol sheloshim veshiw‘ah. 
2_samuel 24:1	vayosef ’af yhoh lakharot beyisra’el vayaset ’et david bahem leimor lekh meneh ’et yisra’el ve’et yehudah. 
2_samuel 24:2	vayomer hamelekh ’el yo’aw sar hakhayil ’asher ’ito shut na bekhal shiwtei yisra’el midan ve‘ad be’er shewa‘ ufiqdu ’et ha‘am veyada‘ti ’et mispar ha‘am. 
2_samuel 24:3	vayomer yo’aw ’el hamelekh veyosef yhoh ’elohekha ’el ha‘am kahem vekhahem mei’ah fe‘amim ve‘einei ’adoni hamelekh ro’ot vadoni hamelekh lamah khafets badawar hazeh. 
2_samuel 24:4	vayekhezaq dewar hamelekh ’el yo’aw ve‘al sarei hekhayil vayeitsei yo’aw vesarei hakhayil lifnei hamelekh lifqod ’et ha‘am ’et yisra’el. 
2_samuel 24:5	vaya‘awru ’et hayarden vayakhanu wa‘aro‘er yemin ha‘ir ’asher betokh hanakhal hagad ve’el ya‘zer. 
2_samuel 24:6	vayawo’u hagil‘adah ve’el ’erets takhtim khadeshi vayawo’u danah ya‘an vesawiw ’el tsidon. 
2_samuel 24:7	vayawo’u miwtsar tsor vekhal ‘arei hakhivi vehakena‘ani vayeitse’u ’el negew yehudah be’er shawa‘. 
2_samuel 24:8	vayashutu bekhal ha’arets vayawo’u miqtseh tish‘ah khodashim ve‘esrim yom yerushalim. 
2_samuel 24:9	vayiten yo’aw ’et mispar mifqad ha‘am ’el hamelekh vatehi yisra’el shemoneh mei’ot ’elef ’ish khayil sholef kherew ve’ish yehudah khamesh mei’ot ’elef ’ish. 
2_samuel 24:10	vayakh lew david ’oto ’akharei khen safar ’et ha‘am vayomer david ’el yhoh khatati me’od ’asher ‘asiti ve‘atah yhoh ha‘awer na ’et ‘avon ‘awdekha ki niskalti me’od. 
2_samuel 24:11	vayaqam david baboqer udewar yhoh hayah ’el gad hanawi khozeh david leimor. 
2_samuel 24:12	halokh vedibarta ’el david koh ’amar yhoh shalosh ’anokhi notel ‘alekha bekhar lekha ’akhat meihem ve’e‘eseh lakh. 
2_samuel 24:13	vayawo gad ’el david vayaged lo vayomer lo hatawo lekha shewa‘ shanim ra‘aw be’artsekha ’im sheloshah khodashim nuskha lifnei tsarekha vehu rodefekha ve’im heyot sheloshet yamim dewer be’artsekha ‘atah da‘ ure’eh mah ’ashiw sholekhi dawar. 
2_samuel 24:14	vayomer david ’el gad tsar li me’od nipelah na weyad yhoh ki rabim rakhamo rakhamav uweyad ’adam ’al ’epolah. 
2_samuel 24:15	vayiten yhoh dewer beyisra’el meihaboqer ve‘ad ‘et mo‘ed vayamat min ha‘am midan ve‘ad be’er shewa‘ shiw‘im ’elef ’ish. 
2_samuel 24:16	vayishlakh yado hamal’akh yerushalim leshakhatah vayinakhem yhoh ’el hara‘ah vayomer lamal’akh hamashkhit ba‘am raw ‘atah heref yadekha umal’akh yhoh hayah ‘im goren ha’ornah ha’aravnah haywusi. 
2_samuel 24:17	vayomer david ’el yhoh bir’oto ’et hamal’akh hamakeh wa‘am vayomer hineh ’anokhi khatati ve’anokhi he‘eveiti ve’eleh hatson meh ‘asu tehi na yadekha bi uwewet ’awi. 
2_samuel 24:18	vayawo gad ’el david bayom hahu vayomer lo ‘aleh haqem yhoh mizbeiakh begoren ’araneyah ’aravnah haywusi. 
2_samuel 24:19	vaya‘al david kidwar gad ka’asher tsivah yhoh. 
2_samuel 24:20	vayashqef ’aravnah vayar ’et hamelekh ve’et ‘awadav ‘owerim ‘alav vayeitsei ’aravnah vayishtakhu lamelekh ’apav ’aretsah. 
2_samuel 24:21	vayomer ’aravnah madua‘ ba ’adoni hamelekh ’el ‘awdo vayomer david liqnot mei‘imekha ’et hagoren liwnot mizbeiakh yhoh vetei‘atsar hamageifah mei‘al ha‘am. 
2_samuel 24:22	vayomer ’aravnah ’el david yiqakh veya‘al ’adoni hamelekh hatow be‘ayno be‘einav re’eh habaqar la‘olah vehamorigim ukhelei habaqar la‘eitsim. 
2_samuel 24:23	hakol natan ’aravnah hamelekh lamelekh vayomer ’aravnah ’el hamelekh yhoh ’elohekha yirtsekha. 
2_samuel 24:24	vayomer hamelekh ’el ’aravnah lo ki qano ’eqneh mei’otkha bimkhir velo ’a‘aleh yhoh ’elohai ‘olot khinam vayiqen david ’et hagoren ve’et habaqar bekhesef sheqalim khamishim. 
2_samuel 24:25	vayiwen sham david mizbeiakh yhoh vaya‘al ‘olot ushelamim vayei‘ater yhoh la’arets vatei‘atsar hamageifah mei‘al yisra’el. 
1_kings 1:1	vehamelekh david zaqen ba bayamim vaykhasuhu babegadim velo yikham lo. 
1_kings 1:2	vayomeru lo ‘awadav yewaqshu ladoni hamelekh na‘arah wetulah ve‘amedah lifnei hamelekh utehi lo sokhenet veshakhewah wekheiqekha vekham ladoni hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:3	vaywaqshu na‘arah yafah bekhol gewul yisra’el vayimtse’u ’et ’awishag hashunamit vayawi’u ’otah lamelekh. 
1_kings 1:4	vehana‘arah yafah ‘ad me’od vatehi lamelekh sokhenet vateshareteihu vehamelekh lo yeda‘ah. 
1_kings 1:5	va’adoniyah wen khagit mitnasei leimor ’ani ’emlokh vaya‘as lo rekhew ufarashim vakhamishim ’ish ratsim lefanav. 
1_kings 1:6	velo ‘atsawo ’awiv miyamav leimor madua‘ kakhah ‘asita vegam hu tow to’ar me’od ve’oto yaledah ’akharei ’awshalom. 
1_kings 1:7	vayihyu dewarav ‘im yo’aw ben tseruyah ve‘im ’ewyatar hakohen vaya‘zeru ’akharei ’adoniyah. 
1_kings 1:8	vetsadoq hakohen uwenayahu wen yehoyada‘ venatan hanawi veshim‘i verei‘i vehagiborim ’asher ledavid lo hayu ‘im ’adoniyahu. 
1_kings 1:9	vayizbakh ’adoniyahu tson uwaqar umeri ‘im ’ewen hazokhelet ’asher ’eitsel ‘en rogel vayiqra ’et kal ’ekhav benei hamelekh ulekhal ’anshei yehudah ‘awdei hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:10	ve’et natan hanawi uwenayahu ve’et hagiborim ve’et shelomoh ’akhiv lo qara. 
1_kings 1:11	vayomer natan ’el bat shewa‘ ’em shelomoh leimor halo shama‘at ki malakh ’adoniyahu wen khagit va’adoneinu david lo yada‘. 
1_kings 1:12	ve‘atah lekhi ’i‘atsekh na ‘eitsah umaleti ’et nafshekh ve’et nefesh benekh shelomoh. 
1_kings 1:13	lekhi uwo’i ’el hamelekh david ve’amart ’eilav halo ’atah ’adoni hamelekh nishba‘ta la’amatekha leimor ki shelomoh wenekh yimlokh ’akharai vehu yeishew ‘al kis’i umadua‘ malakh ’adoniyahu 
1_kings 1:14	hineh ‘odakh medaberet sham ‘im hamelekh va’ani ’awo ’akharayikh umileiti ’et dewarayikh. 
1_kings 1:15	vatawo wat shewe‘ ’el hamelekh hakhadrah vehamelekh zaqen me’od va’awishag hashunamit mesharat ’et hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:16	vatiqod bat shewa‘ vatishtakhu lamelekh vayomer hamelekh mah lakh. 
1_kings 1:17	vatomer lo ’adoni ’atah nishba‘ta yhoh ’elohekha la’amatekha ki shelomoh wenekh yimlokh ’akharai vehu yeishew ‘al kis’i. 
1_kings 1:18	ve‘atah hineh ’adoniyah malakh ve‘atah ’adoni hamelekh lo yada‘eta. 
1_kings 1:19	vayizbakh shor umeri vetson larow vayiqra lekhal benei hamelekh ule’ewyatar hakohen uleyo’aw sar hatsawa velishlomoh ‘awdekha lo qara. 
1_kings 1:20	ve’atah ’adoni hamelekh ‘einei khal yisra’el ‘alekha lehagid lahem mi yeishew ‘al kisei ’adoni hamelekh ’akharav. 
1_kings 1:21	vehayah kishkhaw ’adoni hamelekh ‘im ’awotav vehayiti ’ani uweni shelomoh khata’im. 
1_kings 1:22	vehineh ‘odenah medaberet ‘im hamelekh venatan hanawi ba. 
1_kings 1:23	vayagidu lamelekh leimor hineh natan hanawi vayawo lifnei hamelekh vayishtakhu lamelekh ‘al ’apav ’aretsah. 
1_kings 1:24	vayomer natan ’adoni hamelekh ’atah ’amarta ’adoniyahu yimlokh ’akharai vehu yeishew ‘al kis’i. 
1_kings 1:25	ki yarad hayom vayizbakh shor umeri vetson larow vayiqra lekhal benei hamelekh ulesarei hatsawa ule’ewyatar hakohen vehinam ’okhelim veshotim lefanav vayomeru yekhi hamelekh ’adoniyahu. 
1_kings 1:26	veli ’ani ‘awdekha uletsadoq hakohen veliwnayahu wen yehoyada‘ velishlomoh ‘awdekha lo qara. 
1_kings 1:27	’im mei’et ’adoni hamelekh nihyah hadawar hazeh velo hoda‘ta ’et ‘awdekha ‘awdekha mi yeishew ‘al kisei ’adoni hamelekh ’akharav. 
1_kings 1:28	vaya‘an hamelekh david vayomer qir’u li lewat shawa‘ vatawo lifnei hamelekh vata‘amod lifnei hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:29	vayishawa‘ hamelekh vayomar khai yhoh ’asher padah ’et nafshi mikal tsarah. 
1_kings 1:30	ki ka’asher nishba‘ti lakh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el leimor ki shelomoh wenekh yimlokh ’akharai vehu yeishew ‘al kis’i takhtai ki ken ’e‘eseh hayom hazeh. 
1_kings 1:31	vatiqod bat shewa‘ ’apayim ’erets vatishtakhu lamelekh vatomer yekhi ’adoni hamelekh david le‘olam. 
1_kings 1:32	vayomer hamelekh david qir’u li letsadoq hakohen ulenatan hanawi veliwnayahu ben yehoyada‘ vayawo’u lifnei hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:33	vayomer hamelekh lahem qekhu ‘imakhem ’et ‘awdei ’adoneikhem vehirkawtem ’et shelomoh weni ‘al hapirdah ’asher li vehoradtem ’oto ’el gikhon. 
1_kings 1:34	umashakh ’oto m tsadoq hakohen venatan hanawi lemelekh ‘al yisra’el uteqa‘tem bashofar va’amartem yekhi hamelekh shelomoh.
