1_kings 1:35	va‘alitem ’akharav uwa veyashaw ‘al kis’i vehu yimlokh takhtai ve’oto tsiviti lihyot nagid ‘al yisra’el ve‘al yehudah. 
1_kings 1:36	vaya‘an benayahu wen yehoyada‘ ’et hamelekh vayomer ’amen ken yomar yhoh ’elohei ’adoni hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:37	ka’asher hayah yhoh ‘im ’adoni hamelekh ken yehi yihyeh ‘im shelomoh vigadel ’et kis’o mikisei ’adoni hamelekh david. 
1_kings 1:38	vayeired tsadoq hakohen venatan hanawi uwenayahu wen yehoyada‘ vehakereiti vehapeleiti vayarkiwu ’et shelomoh ‘al pirdat hamelekh david vayolikhu ’oto ‘al gikhon. 
1_kings 1:39	vayiqakh tsadoq hakohen ’et qeren hashemen min ha’ohel vayimshakh ’et shelomoh vayitqe‘u bashofar vayomeru kal ha‘am yekhi hamelekh shelomoh. 
1_kings 1:40	vaya‘alu khal ha‘am ’akharav veha‘am mekhalelim bakhalilim usemeikhim simkhah gedolah vatibaqa‘ ha’arets beqolam. 
1_kings 1:41	vayishma‘ ’adoniyahu vekhal haqeru’im ’asher ’ito vehem kilu le’ekhol vayishma‘ yo’aw ’et qol hashofar vayomer madua‘ qol haqiryah homah. 
1_kings 1:42	‘odenu medaber vehineh yonatan ben ’ewyatar hakohen ba vayomer ’adoniyahu bo ki ’ish khayil ’atah vetow tewaser. 
1_kings 1:43	vaya‘an yonatan vayomer la’adoniyahu ’awal ’adoneinu hamelekh david himlikh ’et shelomoh. 
1_kings 1:44	vayishlakh ’ito hamelekh ’et tsadoq hakohen ve’et natan hanawi uwenayahu ben yehoyada‘ vehakereiti vehapeleiti vayarkiwu ’oto ‘al pirdat hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:45	vayimshekhu ’oto tsadoq hakohen venatan hanawi lemelekh begikhon vaya‘alu misham semeikhim vateihom haqiryah hu haqol ’asher shema‘tem. 
1_kings 1:46	vegam yashaw shelomoh ‘al kisei hamelukhah. 
1_kings 1:47	vegam ba’u ‘awdei hamelekh lewarekh ’et ’adoneinu hamelekh david leimor yeitew ’elohekha ’elohim ’et shem shelomoh mishemekha vigadel ’et kis’o mikis’ekha vayishtakhu hamelekh ‘al hamishkaw. 
1_kings 1:48	vegam kakhah ’amar hamelekh barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher natan hayom yoshew ‘al kis’i ve‘einai ro’ot. 
1_kings 1:49	vayekherdu vayaqumu kal haqeru’im ’asher la’adoniyahu vayeilekhu ’ish ledarko. 
1_kings 1:50	va’adoniyahu yarei mipenei shelomoh vayaqam vayeilekh vayakhazeq beqarnot hamizbeiakh. 
1_kings 1:51	vayugad lishlomoh leimor hineh ’adoniyahu yarei ’et hamelekh shelomoh vehineh ’akhaz beqarnot hamizbeiakh leimor yishawa‘ li khayom hamelekh shelomoh ’im yamit ’et ‘awdo bekharew. 
1_kings 1:52	vayomer shelomoh ’im yihyeh lewen khayil lo yipol misa‘arato ’aretsah ve’im ra‘ah timatsei wo vamet. 
1_kings 1:53	vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh vayoriduhu mei‘al hamizbeiakh vayawo vayishtakhu lamelekh shelomoh vayomer lo shelomoh lekh leweitekha. 
1_kings 2:1	vayiqrewu yemei david lamut vaytsav ’et shelomoh weno leimor. 
1_kings 2:2	’anokhi holekh bederekh kal ha’arets vekhazaqta vehayita le’ish. 
1_kings 2:3	veshamarta ’et mishmeret yhoh ’elohekha lalekhet bidrakhav lishmor khuqotav mitsvotav umishpatav ve‘eidevotav kakatuw betorat mosheh lema‘an taskil ’et kal ’asher ta‘aseh ve’et kal ’asher tifneh sham. 
1_kings 2:4	lema‘an yaqim yhoh ’et dewaro ’asher diber ‘alai leimor ’im yishmeru wanekha ’et darkam lalekhet lefanai be’emet bekhal lewawam uwekhal nafsham leimor lo yikaret lekha ’ish mei‘al kisei yisra’el. 
1_kings 2:5	vegam ’atah yada‘ta ’et ’asher ‘asah li yo’aw ben tseruyah ’asher ‘asah lishnei sarei tsiw’ot yisra’el le’awner ben ner vela‘amasa wen yeter vayahargem vayasem demei milkhamah beshalom vayiten demei milkhamah bakhagorato ’asher bematenav uwena‘alo ’asher beraglav. 
1_kings 2:6	ve‘asita kekhakhematekha velo tored seiwato beshalom she’ol. 
1_kings 2:7	veliwnei warzilai hagil‘adi ta‘aseh khesed vehayu be’okhelei shulkhanekha ki khen qarewu ’eilai bewarekhi mipenei ’awshalom ’akhikha. 
1_kings 2:8	vehineh ‘imekha shim‘i wen geira wen haymini mibakhurim vehu qilani qelalah nimretset beyom lekhti makhanayim vehu yarad liqrati hayarden va’eshawa‘ lo yhoh leimor ’im ’amitekha bekharew. 
1_kings 2:9	ve‘atah ’al tenaqeihu ki ’ish khakham ’atah veyada‘ta ’et ’asher ta‘aseh lo vehoradta ’et seiwato bedam she’ol. 
1_kings 2:10	vayishkaw david ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer be‘ir david. 
1_kings 2:11	vehayamim ’asher malakh david ‘al yisra’el ’arba‘im shanah bekhewron malakh shewa‘ shanim uwirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh shanim. 
1_kings 2:12	ushelomoh yashaw ‘al kisei david ’awiv vatikon malkhuto me’od. 
1_kings 2:13	vayawo ’adoniyahu wen khaget ’el bat shewa‘ ’em shelomoh vatomer hashalom bo’ekha vayomer shalom. 
1_kings 2:14	vayomer dawar li ’eilayikh vatomer daber. 
1_kings 2:15	vayomer ’at yada‘at ki li hayetah hamelukhah ve‘alai samu khal yisra’el peneihem limlokh vatisow hamelukhah vatehi le’akhi ki yhoh hayetah lo. 
1_kings 2:16	ve‘atah she’eilah ’akhat ’anokhi sho’el mei’itakh ’al tashiwi ’et panai vatomer ’eilav daber. 
1_kings 2:17	vayomer ’imri na lishlomoh hamelekh ki lo yashiw ’et panayikh veyiten li ’et ’awishag hashunamit le’ishah. 
1_kings 2:18	vatomer bat shewa‘ tow ’anokhi ’adaber ‘alekha ’el hamelekh. 
1_kings 2:19	vatawo wat shewa‘ ’el hamelekh shelomoh ledaber lo ‘al ’adoniyahu vayaqam hamelekh liqratah vayishtakhu lah vayeishew ‘al kis’o vayasem kisei le’em hamelekh vateishew limino. 
1_kings 2:20	vatomer she’eilah ’akhat qetanah ’anokhi sho’elet mei’itakh ’al tashew ’et panai vayomer lah hamelekh sha’ali ’imi ki lo ’ashiw ’et panayikh. 
1_kings 2:21	vatomer yutan ’et ’awishag hashunamit la’adoniyahu ’akhikha le’ishah. 
1_kings 2:22	vaya‘an hamelekh shelomoh vayomer le’imo velamah ’at sho’elet ’et ’awishag hashunamit la’adoniyahu vesha’ali lo ’et hamelukhah ki hu ’akhi hagadol mimeni velo ule’ewyatar hakohen uleyo’aw ben tseruyah. 
1_kings 2:23	vayishawa‘ hamelekh shelomoh yhoh leimor koh ya‘aseh li ’elohim vekhoh yosif ki wenafsho diber ’adoniyahu ’et hadawar hazeh. 
1_kings 2:24	ve‘atah khai yhoh ’asher hekhinani vayoshiwini vayoshiwani ‘al kisei david ’awi va’asher ‘asah li bayit ka’asher diber ki hayom yumat ’adoniyahu. 
1_kings 2:25	vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh beyad benayahu wen yehoyada‘ vayifga‘ bo vayamot. 
1_kings 2:26	ule’ewyatar hakohen ’amar hamelekh ‘anatot lekh ‘al sadekha ki ’ish mavet ’atah uwayom hazeh lo ’amitekha ki nasata ’et ’aron ’adonai yhoh lifnei david ’awi vekhi hit‘anita bekhol ’asher hit‘anah ’awi. 
1_kings 2:27	vaygaresh shelomoh ’et ’ewyatar mihyot kohen yhoh lemalei ’et dewar yhoh ’asher diber ‘al bet ‘eili beshiloh. 
1_kings 2:28	vehashemu‘ah ba’ah ‘ad yo’aw ki yo’aw natah ’akharei ’adoniyah ve’akharei ’awshalom lo natah vayanas yo’aw ’el ’ohel yhoh vayakhazeq beqarnot hamizbeiakh. 
1_kings 2:29	vayugad lamelekh shelomoh ki nas yo’aw ’el ’ohel yhoh vehineh ’eitsel hamizbeiakh vayishlakh shelomoh ’et benayahu wen yehoyada‘ leimor lekh pega‘ bo. 
1_kings 2:30	vayawo wenayahu ’el ’ohel yhoh vayomer ’eilav koh ’amar hamelekh tsei vayomer lo ki foh ’amut vayashew benayahu ’et hamelekh dawar leimor koh diber yo’aw vekhoh ‘anani. 
1_kings 2:31	vayomer lo hamelekh ‘aseh ka’asher diber ufega‘ bo uqewarto vahasirota demei khinam ’asher shafakh yo’aw mei‘alai umei‘al bet ’awi. 
1_kings 2:32	veheishiw yhoh ’et damo ‘al rosho ’asher paga‘ bishnei ’anashim tsadiqim vetowim mimenu vayahargem bakherew ve’awi david lo yada‘ ’et ’awner ben ner sar tsewa yisra’el ve’et ‘amasa wen yeter sar tsewa yehudah. 
1_kings 2:33	veshawu demeihem berosh yo’aw uwerosh zar‘o le‘olam uledavid ulezar‘o uleweito ulekhis’o yihyeh shalom ‘ad ‘olam mei‘im yhoh. 
1_kings 2:34	vaya‘al benayahu ben yehoyada‘ vayifga‘ bo vaymiteihu vayiqawer beweito bamidbar. 
1_kings 2:35	vayiten hamelekh ’et benayahu wen yehoyada‘ takhtav ‘al hatsawa ve’et tsadoq hakohen natan hamelekh takhat ’ewyatar. 
1_kings 2:36	vayishlakh hamelekh vayiqra leshim‘i vayomer lo beneh lekha wayit birushalim veyashawta sham velo teitsei misham ’aneh va’anah. 
1_kings 2:37	vehayah beyom tseitekha ve‘awarta ’et nakhal qidron yadoa‘ teida‘ ki mot tamut damekha yihyeh weroshekha. 
1_kings 2:38	vayomer shim‘i lamelekh tow hadawar ka’asher diber ’adoni hamelekh ken ya‘aseh ‘awdekha vayeishew shim‘i birushalim yamim rabim. 
1_kings 2:39	vayhi miqets shalosh shanim vayiwrekhu shenei ‘awadim leshim‘i ’el ’akhish ben ma‘akhah melekh gat vayagidu leshim‘i leimor hineh ‘awadekha begat. 
1_kings 2:40	vayaqam shim‘i vayakhawosh ’et khamoro vayeilekh gatah ’el ’akhish lewaqesh ’et ‘awadav vayeilekh shim‘i vayawei ’et ‘awadav migat. 
1_kings 2:41	vayugad lishlomoh ki halakh shim‘i mirushalim gat vayashow. 
1_kings 2:42	vayishlakh hamelekh vayiqra leshim‘i vayomer ’eilav halo hishba‘tikha yhoh va’a‘id bekha leimor beyom tseitekha vehalakhta ’aneh va’anah yadoa‘ teida‘ ki mot tamut vatomer ’eilai tow hadawar shama‘eti. 
1_kings 2:43	umadua‘ lo shamarta ’et shewu‘at yhoh ve’et hamitsvah ’asher tsiviti ‘alekha. 
1_kings 2:44	vayomer hamelekh ’el shim‘i ’atah yada‘ta ’et kal hara‘ah ’asher yada‘ lewawekha ’asher ‘asita ledavid ’awi veheishiw yhoh ’et ra‘atekha beroshekha. 
1_kings 2:45	vehamelekh shelomoh barukh vekhisei david yihyeh nakhon lifnei yhoh ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_kings 2:46	vaytsav hamelekh ’et benayahu ben yehoyada‘ vayeitsei vayifga‘ bo vayamot vehamamlakhah nakhonah beyad shelomoh. 
1_kings 3:1	vayitkhaten shelomoh ’et par‘oh melekh mitsrayim vayiqakh ’et bat par‘oh vaywi’eha ’el ‘ir david ‘ad kaloto liwnot ’et beito ve’et bet yhoh ve’et khomat yerushalim sawiw. 
1_kings 3:2	raq ha‘am mezabekhim babamot ki lo niwnah wayit leshem yhoh ‘ad hayamim hahem. 
1_kings 3:3	vaye’ehaw shelomoh ’et yhoh lalekhet bekhuqot david ’awiv raq babamot hu mezabeiakh umaqtir. 
1_kings 3:4	vayeilekh hamelekh giw‘onah lizboakh sham ki hi habamah hagedolah ’elef ‘olot ya‘aleh shelomoh ‘al hamizbeiakh hahu. 
1_kings 3:5	begiw‘on nir’ah yhoh ’el shelomoh bakhalom halayelah vayomer ’elohim she’al mah ’eten lakh. 
1_kings 3:6	vayomer shelomoh ’atah ‘asita ‘im ‘awdekha david ’awi khesed gadol ka’asher halakh lefanekha be’emet uwitsdaqah uweyishrat leiwaw ‘imakh vatishmar lo ’et hakhesed hagadol hazeh vatiten lo wen yoshew ‘al kis’o kayom hazeh. 
1_kings 3:7	ve‘atah yhoh ’elohai ’atah himlakhta ’et ‘awdekha takhat david ’awi ve’anokhi na‘ar qaton lo ’eida‘ tset vawo. 
1_kings 3:8	ve‘awdekha betokh ‘amekha ’asher bakhareta ‘am raw ’asher lo yimaneh velo yisafer meirow. 
1_kings 3:9	venatata le‘awdekha lew shomeia‘ lishpot ’et ‘amekha lehawin ben tow lera‘ ki mi yukhal lishpot ’et ‘amekha hakawed hazeh. 
1_kings 3:10	vayitaw hadawar be‘einei ’adonai ki sha’al shelomoh ’et hadawar hazeh. 
1_kings 3:11	vayomer ’elohim ’eilav ya‘an ’asher sha’alta ’et hadawar hazeh velo sha’alta lekha yamim rabim velo sha’alta lekha ‘osher velo sha’alta nefesh ’oyewekha vesha’alta lekha hawin lishmoa‘ mishpat. 
1_kings 3:12	hineh ‘asiti kidwarekha hineh natati lekha lew khakham venawon ’asher kamokha lo hayah lefanekha ve’akharekha lo yaqum kamokha. 
1_kings 3:13	vegam ’asher lo sha’alta natati lakh gam ‘osher gam kawod ’asher lo hayah khamokha ’ish bamelakhim kal yamekha. 
1_kings 3:14	ve’im teilekh bidrakhai lishmor khuqai umitsvotai ka’asher halakh david ’awikha veha’arakhti ’et yamekha. 
1_kings 3:15	vayiqats shelomoh vehineh khalom vayawo yerushalim vaya‘amod lifnei ’aron berit ’adonai vaya‘al ‘olot vaya‘as shelamim vaya‘as mishteh lekhal ‘awadav. 
1_kings 3:16	’az tawonah shetayim nashim zonot ’el hamelekh vata‘amodenah lefanav. 
1_kings 3:17	vatomer ha’ishah ha’akhat bi ’adoni ’ani veha’ishah hazot yoshewot bewayit ’ekhad va’eiled ‘imah babayit. 
1_kings 3:18	vayhi bayom hashelishi lelidti vateiled gam ha’ishah hazot va’anakhnu yakhdav ’en zar ’itanu babayit zulati shetayim ’anakhnu babayit. 
1_kings 3:19	vayamat ben ha’ishah hazot layelah ’asher shakhewah ‘alav. 
1_kings 3:20	vataqam betokh halaylah vatiqakh ’et beni mei’etsli va’amatekha yesheinah vatashkiweihu bekheiqah ve’et benah hamet hishkiwah wekheiqi. 
1_kings 3:21	va’aqum baboqer leheiniq ’et beni vehineh met va’etbonen ’eilav baboqer vehineh lo hayah weni ’asher yaladeti. 
1_kings 3:22	vatomer ha’ishah ha’akheret lo khi beni hakhai uwenekh hamet vezot ’omeret lo khi benekh hamet uweni hekhai vatedabeirenah lifnei hamelekh. 
1_kings 3:23	vayomer hamelekh zot ’omeret zeh beni hakhai uwenekh hamet vezot ’omeret lo khi benekh hamet uweni hekhai. 
1_kings 3:24	vayomer hamelekh qekhu li kharew vayawi’u hakherew lifnei hamelekh. 
1_kings 3:25	vayomer hamelekh gizru ’et hayeled hakhai lishnayim utenu ’et hakhatsi le’akhat ve’et hakhatsi le’ekhat. 
1_kings 3:26	vatomer ha’ishah ’asher benah hakhai ’el hamelekh ki nikhmeru rakhameha ‘al benah vatomer bi ’adoni tenu lah ’et hayalud hakhai vehamet ’al temituhu vezot ’omeret gam li gam lakh lo yihyeh gezoru. 
1_kings 3:27	vaya‘an hamelekh vayomer tenu lah ’et hayalud hakhai vehamet lo temituhu hi ’imo. 
1_kings 3:28	vayishme‘u khal yisra’el ’et hamishpat ’asher shafat hamelekh vayir’u mipenei hamelekh ki ra’u ki khakhemat ’elohim beqirbo la‘asot mishpat. 
1_kings 4:1	vayhi hamelekh shelomoh melekh ‘al kal yisra’el. 
1_kings 4:2	ve’eleh hasarim ’asher lo ‘azaryahu wen tsadoq hakohen. 
1_kings 4:3	’elikhoref va’akhiyah benei shisha soferim yehoshafat ben ’akhilud hamazkir. 
1_kings 4:4	uwenayahu wen yehoyada‘ ‘al hatsawa vetsadoq ve’ewyatar kohanim. 
1_kings 4:5	va‘azaryahu wen natan ‘al hanitsawim vezawud ben natan kohen rei‘eh hamelekh. 
1_kings 4:6	va’akhishar ‘al habayit va’adoniram ben ‘awda ‘al hamas. 
1_kings 4:7	velishlomoh shenem ‘asar nitsawim ‘al kal yisra’el vekhilkelu ’et hamelekh ve’et beito khodesh bashanah yihyeh ‘al ’ekhad ha’ekhad lekhalkel. 
1_kings 4:8	ve’eleh shemotam ben khur behar ’efrayim. 
1_kings 4:9	ben deqer bemaqats uwesha‘alwim uwet shamesh ve’eilon bet khanan. 
1_kings 4:10	ben khesed ba’arubot lo sokhoh vekhal ’erets kheifer. 
1_kings 4:11	ben ’awinadaw kal nafat dor tafat bat shelomoh hayetah lo le’ishah. 
1_kings 4:12	ba‘ana ben ’akhilud ta‘nakh umegido vekhal bet she’an ’asher ’eitsel tsaretanah mitakhat leyizre‘el mibet she’an ‘ad ’awel mekholah ‘ad mei‘eiwer leyaqemo‘am. 
1_kings 4:13	ben gewer beramot gil‘ad lo khavot ya’ir ben menasheh ’asher bagil‘ad lo khewel ’argow ’asher babashan shishim ‘arim gedolot khomah uweriakh nekhoshet. 
1_kings 4:14	’akhinadaw ben ‘ido makhanayemah. 
1_kings 4:15	’akhima‘ats benaftali gam hu laqakh ’et basemat bat shelomoh le’ishah. 
1_kings 4:16	ba‘ana ben khushai be’asher uwe‘alot. 
1_kings 4:17	yehoshafat ben paruakh beyisashkhar. 
1_kings 4:18	shim‘i wen ’eila bewinyamin. 
1_kings 4:19	gewer ben ’uri be’erets gil‘ad ’erets sikhon melekh ha’emori ve‘og melekh habashan unetsiw ’ekhad ’asher ba’arets. 
1_kings 4:20	yehudah veyisra’el rabim kakhol ’asher ‘al hayam larow ’okhelim veshotim usemeikhim. 
1_kings 4:21	ushelomoh hayah moshel bekhal hamamlakhot min hanahar ’erets pelishtim ve‘ad gewul mitsrayim magishim minkhah ve‘owedim ’et shelomoh kal yemei khayav. 
1_kings 4:22	vayhi lekhem shelomoh leyom ’ekhad sheloshim kor solet veshishim kor qamakh. 
1_kings 4:23	‘asarah waqar beri’im ve‘esrim baqar re‘i umei’ah tson lewad mei’ayal utsewi veyakhmur uwarburim ’awusim. 
1_kings 4:24	ki hu rodeh bekhal ‘eiwer hanahar mitifsakh ve‘ad ‘azah bekhal malkhei ‘eiwer hanahar veshalom hayah lo mikal ‘awarav misawiw. 
1_kings 4:25	vayeishew yehudah veyisra’el lawetakh ’ish takhat gafno vetakhat te’einato midan ve‘ad be’er shawa‘ kol yemei shelomoh. 
1_kings 4:26	vayhi lishlomoh ’arba‘im ’elef ’urvot susim lemerkawo ushenem ‘asar ’elef parashim. 
1_kings 4:27	vekhilkelu hanitsawim ha’eleh ’et hamelekh shelomoh ve’et kal haqarew ’el shulkhan hamelekh shelomoh ’ish khadesho lo ye‘aderu dawar. 
1_kings 4:28	vehase‘orim vehatewen lasusim velarakhesh yawi’u ’el hamaqom ’asher yihyeh sham ’ish kemishpato. 
1_kings 4:29	vayiten ’elohim khakhmah lishlomoh utewunah harbeh me’od verokhaw lew kakhol ’asher ‘al sefat hayam. 
1_kings 4:30	vateirew khakhemat shelomoh meikhakhemat kal benei qedem umikol khakhemat mitsrayim. 
1_kings 4:31	vayekhkam mikal ha’adam mei’eitan ha’ezrakhi veheiman vekhalkol vedarda‘ benei makhol vayhi shemo wekhal hagoyim sawiw. 
1_kings 4:32	vaydaber sheloshet ’alafim mashal vayhi shiro khamishah va’alef. 
1_kings 4:33	vaydaber ‘al ha‘eitsim min ha’erez ’asher balewanon ve‘ad ha’eizow ’asher yotsei baqir vaydaber ‘al habeheimah ve‘al ha‘of ve‘al haremes ve‘al hadagim. 
1_kings 4:34	vayawo’u mikal ha‘amim lishmoa‘ ’et khakhemat shelomoh mei’et kal malkhei ha’arets ’asher shame‘u ’et khakhemato. 
1_kings 5:1	vayishlakh khiram melekh tsor ’et ‘awadav ’el shelomoh ki shama‘ ki ’oto mashekhu lemelekh takhat ’awihu ki ’ohew hayah khiram ledavid kal hayamim. 
1_kings 5:2	vayishlakh shelomoh ’el khiram leimor. 
1_kings 5:3	’atah yada‘ta ’et david ’awi ki lo yakhol liwnot bayit leshem yhoh ’elohav mipenei hamilkhamah ’asher sewawuhu ‘ad tet yhoh ’otam takhat kapot raglo raglai. 
1_kings 5:4	ve‘atah heiniakh yhoh ’elohai li misawiw ’en satan ve’en pega‘ ra‘. 
1_kings 5:5	vehini ’omer liwnot bayit leshem yhoh ’elohai ka’asher diber yhoh ’el david ’awi leimor binkha ’asher ’eten takhtekha ‘al kis’ekha hu yiwneh habayit lishmi. 
1_kings 5:6	ve‘atah tsaveh veyikhretu li ’arazim min halewanon va‘awadai yihyu ‘im ‘awadekha usekhar ‘awadekha ’eten lekha kekhol ’asher tomer ki ’atah yada‘ta ki ’en banu ’ish yodeia‘ likhrat ‘eitsim katsidonim. 
1_kings 5:7	vayhi kishmoa‘ khiram ’et diwrei shelomoh vayismakh me’od vayomer barukh yhoh hayom ’asher natan ledavid ben khakham ‘al ha‘am haraw hazeh. 
1_kings 5:8	vayishlakh khiram ’el shelomoh leimor shama‘ti ’et ’asher shalakhta ’eilai ’ani ’e‘eseh ’et kal kheftsekha ba‘atsei ’arazim uwa‘atsei weroshim. 
1_kings 5:9	‘awadai yoridu min halewanon yamah va’ani ’asimem dowerot bayam ‘ad hamaqom ’asher tishlakh ’eilai venipatstim sham ve’atah tisa ve’atah ta‘aseh ’et kheftsi latet lekhem beiti. 
1_kings 5:10	vayhi khirom noten lishlomoh ‘atsei ’arazim va‘atsei weroshim kal kheftso. 
1_kings 5:11	ushelomoh natan lekhiram ‘esrim ’elef kor khitim makolet leweito ve‘esrim kor shemen katit koh yiten shelomoh lekhiram shanah weshanah. 
1_kings 5:12	yhoh natan khakhmah lishlomoh ka’asher diber lo vayhi shalom ben khiram uwen shelomoh vayikhretu werit sheneihem. 
1_kings 5:13	vaya‘al hamelekh shelomoh mas mikal yisra’el vayhi hamas sheloshim ’elef ’ish. 
1_kings 5:14	vayishlakhem lewanonah ‘aseret ’alafim bakhodesh khalifot khodesh yihyu walewanon shenayim khodashim beweito va’adoniram ‘al hamas. 
1_kings 5:15	vayhi lishlomoh shiw‘im ’elef nosei sabal ushemonim ’elef khotsew bahar. 
1_kings 5:16	lewad misarei hanitsawim lishlomoh ’asher ‘al hamelakhah sheloshet ’alafim ushelosh mei’ot harodim ba‘am ha‘osim bamelakhah. 
1_kings 5:17	vaytsav hamelekh vayasi‘u ’awanim gedolot ’awanim yeqarot leyased habayit ’awnei gazit. 
1_kings 5:18	vayifselu bonei shelomoh uwonei khirom vehagiwlim vayakhinu ha‘eitsim veha’awanim liwnot habayit. 
1_kings 6:1	vayhi wishmonim shanah ve’arba‘ mei’ot shanah letset benei yisra’el mei’erets mitsrayim bashanah harewi‘it bekhodesh ziv hu hakhodesh hasheini limlokh shelomoh ‘al yisra’el vayiwen habayit yhoh. 
1_kings 6:2	vehabayit ’asher banah hamelekh shelomoh yhoh shishim ’amah ’areko ve‘esrim rakhebo usheloshim ’amah qomato. 
1_kings 6:3	veha’ulam ‘al penei heikhal habayit ‘esrim ’amah ’areko ‘al penei rokhaw habayit ‘eser ba’amah rakhebo ‘al penei habayit. 
1_kings 6:4	vaya‘as labayit khalonei shequfim ’atumim. 
1_kings 6:5	vayiwen ‘al qir habayit yatsoa‘ yatsia‘ sawiw ’et qirot habayit sawiw laheikhal veladewir vaya‘as tsela‘ot sawiw. 
1_kings 6:6	hayatsoa‘ hayatsia‘ hatakhtonah khamesh ba’amah rakhebah vehatikhonah shesh ba’amah rakhebah vehashelishit shewa‘ ba’amah rakhebah ki migra‘ot natan labayit sawiw khutsah lewilti ’akhoz beqirot habayit. 
1_kings 6:7	vehabayit behibanoto ’ewen sheleimah masa‘ niwnah umaqawot vehagarzen kal keli warzel lo nishma‘ babayit behibanoto. 
1_kings 6:8	petakh hatseila‘ hatikhonah ’el ketef habayit haymanit uwelulim ya‘alu ‘al hatikhonah umin hatikhonah ’el hashelishim. 
1_kings 6:9	vayiwen ’et habayit vaykhaleihu vayispon ’et habayit geiwim usedeirot ba’arazim. 
1_kings 6:10	vayiwen ’et hayatsoa‘ hayatsia‘ ‘al kal habayit khamesh ’amot qomato vaye’ekhoz ’et habayit ba‘atsei ’arazim. 
1_kings 6:11	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el shelomoh leimor. 
1_kings 6:12	habayit hazeh ’asher ’atah woneh ’im teilekh bekhuqotai ve’et mishpatai ta‘aseh veshamarta ’et kal mitsvotai lalekhet bahem vahaqimoti ’et dewari ’itakh ’asher dibarti ’el david ’awikha. 
1_kings 6:13	veshakhanti betokh benei yisra’el velo ’e‘ezow ’et ‘ami yisra’el. 
1_kings 6:14	vayiwen shelomoh ’et habayit vaykhaleihu. 
1_kings 6:15	vayiwen ’et qirot habayit mibaytah betsal‘ot ’arazim miqarqa‘ habayit ‘ad qirot hasipun tsipah ‘ets mibayit vaytsaf ’et qarqa‘ habayit betsal‘ot beroshim. 
1_kings 6:16	vayiwen ’et ‘esrim ’amah miyarkotei miyarketei habayit betsal‘ot ’arazim min haqarqa‘ ‘ad haqirot vayiwen lo mibayit lidwir leqodesh haqodashim. 
1_kings 6:17	ve’arba‘im ba’amah hayah habayit hu haheikhal lifnai. 
1_kings 6:18	ve’erez ’el habayit penimah miqla‘at peqa‘im ufeturei tsitsim hakol ’erez ’en ’ewen nir’ah. 
1_kings 6:19	udewir betokh habayit mipenimah heikhin letiten sham ’et ’aron berit yhoh. 
1_kings 6:20	velifnei hadewir ‘esrim ’amah ’orekh ve‘esrim ’amah rokhaw ve‘esrim ’amah qomato vaytsapeihu zahaw sagur vaytsaf mizbeiakh ’arez. 
1_kings 6:21	vaytsaf shelomoh ’et habayit mipenimah zahaw sagur vai‘aber beratiqot beratuqot zahaw lifnei hadewir vaytsapeihu zahaw. 
1_kings 6:22	ve’et kal habayit tsipah zahaw ‘ad tom kal habayit vekhal hamizbeiakh ’asher ladewir tsipah zahaw. 
1_kings 6:23	vaya‘as badewir shenei kheruwim ‘atsei shamen ‘eser ’amot qomato. 
1_kings 6:24	vekhamesh ’amot kenaf hakeruw ha’ekhat vekhamesh ’amot kenaf hakeruw hasheinit ‘eser ’amot miqtsot kenafav ve‘ad qetsot kenafav. 
1_kings 6:25	ve‘eser ba’amah hakeruw hasheini midah ’akhat veqetsew ’ekhad lishnei hakeruwim. 
1_kings 6:26	qomat hakeruw ha’ekhad ‘eser ba’amah vekhen hakeruw hasheini. 
1_kings 6:27	vayiten ’et hakeruwim betokh habayit hapenimi vayifresu ’et kanfei hakeruwim vatiga‘ kenaf ha’ekhad baqir ukhenaf hakeruw hasheini noga‘at baqir hasheini vekhanfeihem ’el tokh habayit noge‘ot kanaf ’el kanaf. 
1_kings 6:28	vaytsaf ’et hakeruwim zahaw. 
1_kings 6:29	ve’et kal qirot habayit meisaw qala‘ pitukhei miqle‘ot keruwim vetimorot ufeturei tsitsim milifnim velakhitson. 
1_kings 6:30	ve’et qarqa‘ habayit tsipah zahaw lifnimah velakhitson. 
1_kings 6:31	ve’et petakh hadewir ‘asah daltot ‘atsei shamen ha’ayil mezuzot khamishit. 
1_kings 6:32	ushetei daltot ‘atsei shemen veqala‘ ‘aleihem miqle‘ot keruwim vetimorot ufeturei tsitsim vetsipah zahaw vayared ‘al hakeruwim ve‘al hatimorot ’et hazahaw. 
1_kings 6:33	vekhen ‘asah lefetakh haheikhal mezuzot ‘atsei shamen mei’et rewi‘it. 
1_kings 6:34	ushetei daltot ‘atsei weroshim shenei tsela‘im hadelet ha’akhat gelilim ushenei qela‘im hadelet hasheinit gelilim. 
1_kings 6:35	veqala‘ keruwim vetimorot ufeturei tsitsim vetsipah zahaw meyushar ‘al hamekhuqeh. 
1_kings 6:36	vayiwen ’et hekhatser hapenimit sheloshah turei gazit vetur kerutot ’arazim. 
1_kings 6:37	bashanah harewi‘it yusad bet yhoh beyerakh ziv. 
1_kings 6:38	uwashanah ha’akhat ‘esreh beyerakh bul hu hakhodesh hashemini kalah habayit lekhal dewarav ulekhal mishpato mishpatav vayiwneihu shewa‘ shanim. 
1_kings 7:1	ve’et beito banah shelomoh shelosh ‘esreh shanah vaykhal ’et kal beito. 
1_kings 7:2	vayiwen ’et bet ya‘ar halewanon mei’ah ’amah ’areko vakhamishim ’amah rakhebo usheloshim ’amah qomato ‘al ’arba‘ah turei ‘amudei ’arazim ukherutot ’arazim ‘al ha‘amudim. 
1_kings 7:3	vesafun ba’erez mima‘al ‘al hatsela‘ot ’asher ‘al ha‘amudim ’arba‘im vakhamishah khamishah ‘asar hatur. 
1_kings 7:4	ushequfim sheloshah turim umekhezah ’el mekhezah shalosh pe‘amim. 
1_kings 7:5	vekhal hapetakhim vehamezuzot rewu‘im shaqef umul mekhezah ’el mekhezah shalosh pe‘amim. 
1_kings 7:6	ve’et ’ulam ha‘amudim ‘asah khamishim ’amah ’areko usheloshim ’amah rakhebo ve’ulam ‘al peneihem ve‘amudim ve‘aw ‘al peneihem. 
1_kings 7:7	ve’ulam hakisei ’asher yishpat sham ’ulam hamishpat ‘asah vesafun ba’erez meihaqarqa‘ ‘ad haqarqa‘. 
1_kings 7:8	uweito ’asher yeishew sham khatser ha’akheret mibet la’ulam kama‘aseh hazeh hayah uwayit ya‘aseh lewat par‘oh ’asher laqakh shelomoh ka’ulam hazeh. 
1_kings 7:9	kal ’eleh ’awanim yeqarot kemidot gazit megorarot bamegeirah mibayit umikhuts umimasad ‘ad hatefakhot umikhuts ‘ad hekhatser hagedolah. 
1_kings 7:10	umeyusad ’awanim yeqarot ’awanim gedolot ’awnei ‘eser ’amot ve’awnei shemoneh ’amot. 
1_kings 7:11	umilma‘lah ’awanim yeqarot kemidot gazit va’arez. 
1_kings 7:12	vekhatser hagedolah sawiw sheloshah turim gazit vetur kerutot ’arazim velakhatsar bet yhoh hapenimit ule’ulam habayit. 
1_kings 7:13	vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh vayiqakh ’et khiram mitsor. 
1_kings 7:14	ben ’ishah ’almanah hu mimateh naftali ve’awiv ’ish tsori khoresh nekhoshet vayimalei ’et hakhakhemah ve’et hatewunah ve’et hada‘at la‘asot kal melakhah banekhoshet vayawo ’el hamelekh shelomoh vaya‘as ’et kal melakhto. 
1_kings 7:15	vayatsar ’et shenei ha‘amudim nekhoshet shemoneh ‘esreh ’amah qomat ha‘amud ha’ekhad vekhut shetem ‘esreh ’amah yasow ’et ha‘amud hasheini. 
1_kings 7:16	ushetei khotarot ‘asah latet ‘al rashei ha‘amudim mutsaq nekhoshet khamesh ’amot qomat hakoteret ha’ekhat vekhamesh ’amot qomat hakoteret hasheinit. 
1_kings 7:17	sewakhim ma‘aseh sewakhah gedilim ma‘aseh sharsherot lakotarot ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim shiw‘ah lakoteret ha’ekhat veshiw‘ah lakoteret hasheinit. 
1_kings 7:18	vaya‘as ’et ha‘amudim ushenei turim sawiw ‘al hasewakhah ha’ekhat lekhasot ’et hakotarot ’asher ‘al rosh harimonim vekhen ‘asah lakoteret hasheinit. 
1_kings 7:19	vekhotarot ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim ma‘aseh shushan ba’ulam ’arba‘ ’amot. 
1_kings 7:20	vekhotarot ‘al shenei ha‘amudim gam mima‘al mile‘umat habeten ’asher le‘eiwer sewakhah hasewakhah veharimonim matayim turim sawiw ‘al hakoteret hasheinit. 
1_kings 7:21	vayaqem ’et ha‘amudim le’ulam haheikhal vayaqem ’et ha‘amud haymani vayiqra ’et shemo yakhin vayaqem ’et ha‘amud hasemali vayiqra ’et shemo bo‘az. 
1_kings 7:22	ve‘al rosh ha‘amudim ma‘aseh shoshan vatitom melekhet ha‘amudim. 
1_kings 7:23	vaya‘as ’et hayam mutsaq ‘eser ba’amah misefato ‘ad sefato ‘agol sawiw vekhamesh ba’amah qomato uqeveh veqav sheloshim ba’amah yasow ’oto sawiw. 
1_kings 7:24	ufeqa‘im mitakhat lisfato sawiw sowewim ’oto ‘eser ba’amah maqifim ’et hayam sawiw shenei turim hapeqa‘im yetsuqim bitsuqato. 
1_kings 7:25	‘omed ‘al shenei ‘asar baqar sheloshah fonim tsafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah usheloshah ponim mizrakhah vehayam ‘aleihem milma‘elah vekhal ’akhoreihem bayetah. 
1_kings 7:26	ve‘aweyo tefakh usefato kema‘aseh sefat kos perakh shoshan ’alpayim bat yakhil. 
1_kings 7:27	vaya‘as ’et hamekhonot ‘eser nekhoshet ’arba‘ ba’amah ’orekh hamekhonah ha’ekhat ve’arba‘ ba’amah rakhebah veshalosh ba’amah qomatah. 
1_kings 7:28	vezeh ma‘aseh hamekhonah misgerot lahem umisgerot ben hashlabim. 
1_kings 7:29	ve‘al hamisgerot ’asher ben hashlabim ’arayot baqar ukheruwim ve‘al hashlabim ken mima‘al umitakhat la’arayot velabaqar loyot ma‘aseh morad. 
1_kings 7:30	ve’arba‘ah ’ofanei nekhoshet lamekhonah ha’akhat vesarnei nekhoshet ve’arba‘ah fa‘amotav keteifot lahem mitakhat lakiyor haketeifot yetsuqot mei‘eiwer ’ish loyot. 
1_kings 7:31	ufihu mibet lakoteret vama‘lah ba’amah ufiha ‘agol ma‘aseh khen ’amah vakhatsi ha’amah vegam ‘al piha miqla‘ot umisgeroteihem meruba‘ot lo ‘agulot. 
1_kings 7:32	ve’arba‘at ha’ofanim lemitakhat lamisgerot vidot ha’ofanim bamekhonah veqomat ha’ofan ha’ekhad ’amah vakhatsi ha’amah. 
1_kings 7:33	uma‘aseh ha’ofanim kema‘aseh ’ofan hamerkawah yedotam vegabeihem vekhishuqeihem vekhishureihem hakol mutsaq. 
1_kings 7:34	ve’arba‘ keteifot ’el ’arba‘ pinot hamekhonah ha’ekhat min hamekhonah keteifeha. 
1_kings 7:35	uwerosh hamekhonah khatsi ha’amah qomah ‘agol sawiw ve‘al rosh hamekhonah yedoteha umisgeroteha mimenah. 
1_kings 7:36	vayfatakh ‘al halukhot yedoteha ve‘al vamisgeroteha misgeroteha keruwim ’arayot vetimorot kema‘ar ’ish veloyot sawiw. 
1_kings 7:37	kazot ‘asah ’et ‘eser hamekhonot mutsaq ’ekhad midah ’akhat qetsew ’ekhad lekhulahenah. 
1_kings 7:38	vaya‘as ‘asarah khiyorot nekhoshet ’arba‘im bat yakhil hakiyor ha’ekhad ’arba‘ ba’amah hakiyor ha’ekhad kiyor ’ekhad ‘al hamekhonah ha’akhat le‘eser hamekhonot. 
1_kings 7:39	vayiten ’et hamekhonot khamesh ‘al ketef habayit miyamin vekhamesh ‘al ketef habayit misemolo ve’et hayam natan miketef habayit haymanit qeidemah mimul negew. 
1_kings 7:40	vaya‘as khirom ’et hakiyorot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamizraqot vaykhal khiram la‘asot ’et kal hamelakhah ’asher ‘asah lamelekh shelomoh bet yhoh. 
1_kings 7:41	‘amudim shenayim vegulot hakotarot ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim shetayim vehasewakhot shetayim lekhasot ’et shetei gulot hakotarot ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim. 
1_kings 7:42	ve’et harimonim ’arba‘ mei’ot lishtei hasewakhot shenei turim rimonim lasewakhah ha’ekhat lekhasot ’et shetei gulot hakotarot ’asher ‘al penei ha‘amudim. 
1_kings 7:43	ve’et hamekhonot ‘aser ve’et hakiyorot ‘asarah ‘al hamekhonot. 
1_kings 7:44	ve’et hayam ha’ekhad ve’et habaqar shenem ‘asar takhat hayam. 
1_kings 7:45	ve’et hasirot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamizraqot ve’et kal hakeilim ha’ohel ha’eleh ’asher ‘asah khiram lamelekh shelomoh bet yhoh nekhoshet memorat. 
1_kings 7:46	bekhikar hayarden yetsaqam hamelekh bema‘aweh ha’adamah ben sukot uwen tsaretan. 
1_kings 7:47	vayanakh shelomoh ’et kal hakeilim meirow me’od me’od lo nekhqar mishqal hanekhoshet. 
1_kings 7:48	vaya‘as shelomoh ’et kal hakeilim ’asher bet yhoh ’et mizbakh hazahaw ve’et hashulkhan ’asher ‘alav lekhem hapanim zahaw. 
1_kings 7:49	ve’et hamenorot khamesh miyamin vekhamesh misemol lifnei hadewir zahaw sagur vehaperakh vehaneirot vehamelqakhayim zahaw. 
1_kings 7:50	vehasipot vehamzamerot vehamizraqot vehakapot vehamakhtot zahaw sagur vehapotot ledaltot habayit hapenimi leqodesh haqodashim ledaltei habayit laheikhal zahaw. 
1_kings 7:51	vatishlam kal hamelakhah ’asher ‘asah hamelekh shelomoh bet yhoh vayawei shelomoh ’et qadeshei david ’awiv ’et hakesef ve’et hazahaw ve’et hakeilim natan be’otserot bet yhoh. 
1_kings 8:1	’az yaqhel shelomoh ’et ziqnei yisra’el ’et kal rashei hamatot nesi’ei ha’awot liwnei yisra’el ’el hamelekh shelomoh yerushalim leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhoh mei‘ir david hi tsiyon. 
1_kings 8:2	vayiqahalu ’el hamelekh shelomoh kal ’ish yisra’el beyerakh ha’eitanim bekhag hu hakhodesh hashewi‘i. 
1_kings 8:3	vayawo’u kol ziqnei yisra’el vayis’u hakohanim ’et ha’aron. 
1_kings 8:4	vaya‘alu ’et ’aron yhoh ve’et ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et kal kelei haqodesh ’asher ba’ohel vaya‘alu ’otam hakohanim vehalviyim. 
1_kings 8:5	vehamelekh shelomoh vekhal ‘adat yisra’el hano‘adim ‘alav ’ito lifnei ha’aron mezabekhim tson uwaqar ’asher lo yisaferu velo yimanu meirow. 
1_kings 8:6	vayawi’u hakohanim ’et ’aron berit yhoh ’el meqomo ’el dewir habayit ’el qodesh haqodashim ’el takhat kanfei hakeruwim. 
1_kings 8:7	ki hakeruwim poresim kenafayim ’el meqom ha’aron vayasoku hakeruwim ‘al ha’aron ve‘al badav milma‘elah. 
1_kings 8:8	vaya’arikhu habadim vayeira’u rashei habadim min haqodesh ‘al penei hadewir velo yeira’u hakhutsah vayihyu sham ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_kings 8:9	’en ba’aron raq shenei lukhot ha’awanim ’asher hiniakh sham mosheh bekhorew ’asher karat yhoh ‘im benei yisra’el betseitam mei’erets mitsrayim. 
1_kings 8:10	vayhi betset hakohanim min haqodesh vehe‘anan malei ’et bet yhoh. 
1_kings 8:11	velo yakhelu hakohanim la‘amod lesharet mipenei he‘anan ki malei khewod yhoh ’et bet yhoh. 
1_kings 8:12	’az ’amar shelomoh yhoh ’amar lishkon ba‘arafel. 
1_kings 8:13	banoh waniti bet zewul lakh makhon leshiwtekha ‘olamim. 
1_kings 8:14	vayasew hamelekh ’et panav vaywarekh ’et kal qehal yisra’el vekhal qehal yisra’el ‘omed. 
1_kings 8:15	vayomer barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher diber befiv ’et david ’awi uweyado milei leimor. 
1_kings 8:16	min hayom ’asher hotseiti ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’el mimitsrayim lo wakharti we‘ir mikol shiwtei yisra’el liwnot bayit lihyot shemi sham va’ewkhar bedavid lihyot ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. 
1_kings 8:17	vayhi ‘im lewaw david ’awi liwnot bayit leshem yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
1_kings 8:18	vayomer yhoh ’el david ’awi ya‘an ’asher hayah ‘im lewawekha liwnot bayit lishmi hetiwota ki hayah ‘im lewawekha. 
1_kings 8:19	raq ’atah lo tiwneh habayit ki ’im binkha hayotsei meikhalatsekha hu yiwneh habayit lishmi. 
1_kings 8:20	vayaqem yhoh ’et dewaro ’asher diber va’aqum takhat david ’awi va’eishew ‘al kisei yisra’el ka’asher diber yhoh va’ewneh habayit leshem yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
1_kings 8:21	va’asim sham maqom la’aron ’asher sham berit yhoh ’asher karat ‘im ’awoteinu behotsi’o ’otam mei’erets mitsrayim. 
1_kings 8:22	vaya‘amod shelomoh lifnei mizbakh yhoh neged kal qehal yisra’el vayifros kapav hashamayim. 
1_kings 8:23	vayomar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’en kamokha ’elohim bashamayim mima‘al ve‘al ha’arets mitakhat shomer haberit vehakhesed la‘awadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. 
1_kings 8:24	’asher shamarta le‘awdekha david ’awi ’et ’asher dibarta lo vatedaber befikha uweyadekha mileita kayom hazeh. 
1_kings 8:25	ve‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’el mor le‘awdekha david ’awi ’et ’asher dibarta lo leimor lo yikaret lekha ’ish milefanai yoshew ‘al kisei yisra’el raq ’im yishmeru wanekha ’et darkam lalekhet lefanai ka’asher halakhta lefanai. 
1_kings 8:26	ve‘atah ’elohei yisra’el yei’amen na dewarekha dewarekha ’asher dibarta le‘awdekha david ’awi. 
1_kings 8:27	ki ha’umnam yeishew ’elohim ‘al ha’arets hineh hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha ’af ki habayit hazeh ’asher baniti. 
1_kings 8:28	ufanita ’el tefilat ‘awdekha ve’el tekhinato yhoh ’elohai lishmoa‘ ’el harinah ve’el hatefilah ’asher ‘awdekha mitpalel lefanekha hayom. 
1_kings 8:29	lihyot ‘einekha fetukhot ’el habayit hazeh laylah vayom ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amarta yihyeh shemi sham lishmoa‘ ’el hatefilah ’asher yitpalel ‘awdekha ’el hamaqom hazeh. 
1_kings 8:30	veshama‘ta ’el tekhinat ‘awdekha ve‘amekha yisra’el ’asher yitpalu ’el hamaqom hazeh ve’atah tishma‘ ’el meqom shiwtekha ’el hashamayim veshama‘ta vesalakheta. 
1_kings 8:31	’et ’asher yekheta ’ish lerei‘eihu venasha wo ’alah leha’aloto uwa ’alah lifnei mizbakhakha babayit hazeh. 
1_kings 8:32	ve’atah tishma‘ hashamayim ve‘asita veshafata ’et ‘awadekha leharshia‘ rasha‘ latet darko berosho ulehatsdiq tsadiq latet lo ketsidqato. 
1_kings 8:33	behinagef ‘amekha yisra’el lifnei ’oyew ’asher yekhet’u lakh veshawu ’eilekha vehodu ’et shemekha vehitpalu vehitkhanenu ’eilekha babayit hazeh. 
1_kings 8:34	ve’atah tishma‘ hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat ‘amekha yisra’el vahasheiwotam ’el ha’adamah ’asher natata la’awotam. 
1_kings 8:35	behei‘atser shamayim velo yihyeh matar ki yekhet’u lakh vehitpalu ’el hamaqom hazeh vehodu ’et shemekha umeikhatatam yeshuwun ki ta‘anem. 
1_kings 8:36	ve’atah tishma‘ hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat ‘awadekha ve‘amekha yisra’el ki torem ’et haderekh hatowah ’asher yeilekhu wah venatatah matar ‘al ’artsekha ’asher natatah le‘amekha lenakhalah. 
1_kings 8:37	ra‘aw ki yihyeh wa’arets dewer ki yihyeh shidafon yeiraqon ’arbeh khasil ki yihyeh ki yatsar lo ’oyewo be’erets she‘arav kal nega‘ kal makhalah. 
1_kings 8:38	kal tefilah khal tekhinah ’asher tihyeh lekhal ha’adam lekhol ‘amekha yisra’el ’asher yeide‘un ’ish nega‘ lewawo ufaras kapav ’el habayit hazeh. 
1_kings 8:39	ve’atah tishma‘ hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha vesalakhta ve‘asita venatata la’ish kekhal derakhav ’asher teida‘ ’et lewawo ki ’atah yada‘ta lewadekha ’et lewaw kal benei ha’adam. 
1_kings 8:40	lema‘an yira’ukha kal hayamim ’asher hem khayim ‘al penei ha’adamah ’asher natatah la’awoteinu. 
1_kings 8:41	vegam ’el hanakheri ’asher lo mei‘amekha yisra’el hu uwa mei’erets rekhoqah lema‘an shemekha. 
1_kings 8:42	ki yishme‘un ’et shimkha hagadol ve’et yadekha hakhazaqah uzero‘akha hanetuyah uwa vehitpalel ’el habayit hazeh. 
1_kings 8:43	’atah tishma‘ hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha ve‘asita kekhol ’asher yiqra ’eilekha hanakheri lema‘an yeide‘un kal ‘amei ha’arets ’et shemekha leyir’ah ’otekha ke‘amekha yisra’el velada‘at ki shimkha niqra ‘al habayit hazeh ’asher baniti. 
1_kings 8:44	ki yeitsei ‘amekha lamilkhamah ‘al ’oyewo baderekh ’asher tishlakhem vehitpalu ’el yhoh derekh ha‘ir ’asher bakharta bah vehabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. 
1_kings 8:45	veshama‘ta hashamayim ’et tefilatam ve’et tekhinatam ve‘asita mishpatam. 
1_kings 8:46	ki yekhet’u lakh ki ’en ’adam ’asher lo yekheta ve’anafta wam unetatam lifnei ’oyew veshawum showeihem ’el ’erets ha’oyew rekhoqah ’o qerowah. 
1_kings 8:47	veheishiwu ’el libam ba’arets ’asher nishbu sham veshawu vehitkhanenu ’eilekha be’erets showeihem leimor khatanu vehe‘evinu rasha‘enu. 
1_kings 8:48	veshawu ’eilekha bekhal lewawam uwekhal nafsham be’erets ’oyeweihem ’asher shawu ’otam vehitpalu ’eilekha derekh ’artsam ’asher natatah la’awotam ha‘ir ’asher bakharta vehabayit ’asher banita baniti lishmekha. 
1_kings 8:49	veshama‘ta hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha ’et tefilatam ve’et tekhinatam ve‘asita mishpatam. 
1_kings 8:50	vesalakhta le‘amekha ’asher khate’u lakh ulekhal pish‘eihem ’asher pashe‘u wakh unetatam lerakhamim lifnei showeihem verikhamum. 
1_kings 8:51	ki ‘amekha venakhalatekha hem ’asher hotseita mimitsrayim mitokh kur habarzel. 
1_kings 8:52	lihyot ‘einekha fetukhot ’el tekhinat ‘awdekha ve’el tekhinat ‘amekha yisra’el lishmoa‘ ’aleihem bekhol qare’am ’eilekha. 
1_kings 8:53	ki ’atah hiwdaltam lekha lenakhalah mikol ‘amei ha’arets ka’asher dibarta beyad mosheh ‘awdekha behotsi’akha ’et ’awoteinu mimitsrayim ’adonai yhoh. 
1_kings 8:54	vayhi kekhalot shelomoh lehitpalel ’el yhoh ’et kal hatefilah vehatekhinah hazot qam milifnei mizbakh yhoh mikeroa‘ ‘al birkav vekhapav perusot hashamayim. 
1_kings 8:55	vaya‘mod vaywarekh ’et kal qehal yisra’el qol gadol leimor. 
1_kings 8:56	barukh yhoh ’asher natan menukhah le‘amo yisra’el kekhol ’asher diber lo nafal dawar ’ekhad mikol dewaro hatow ’asher diber beyad mosheh ‘awdo. 
1_kings 8:57	yehi yhoh ’eloheinu ‘imanu ka’asher hayah ‘im ’awoteinu ’al ya‘azweinu ve’al yitesheinu. 
1_kings 8:58	lehatot lewaweinu ’eilav lalekhet bekhal derakhav velishmor mitsvotav vekhuqav umishpatav ’asher tsivah ’et ’awoteinu. 
1_kings 8:59	veyihyu dewarai ’eleh ’asher hitkhananti lifnei yhoh qerowim ’el yhoh ’eloheinu yomam valayelah la‘asot mishpat ‘awdo umishpat ‘amo yisra’el dewar yom beyomo. 
1_kings 8:60	lema‘an da‘at kal ‘amei ha’arets ki yhoh hu ha’elohim ’en ‘od. 
1_kings 8:61	vehayah lewawkhem shalem ‘im yhoh ’eloheinu lalekhet bekhuqav velishmor mitsvotav kayom hazeh. 
1_kings 8:62	vehamelekh vekhal yisra’el ‘imo zowekhim zewakh lifnei yhoh. 
1_kings 8:63	vayizbakh shelomoh ’et zewakh hashelamim ’asher zawakh yhoh baqar ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef vetson mei’ah ve‘esrim ’alef vayakhnekhu ’et bet yhoh hamelekh vekhal benei yisra’el. 
1_kings 8:64	bayom hahu qidash hamelekh ’et tokh hekhatser ’asher lifnei wet yhoh ki ‘asah sham ’et ha‘olah ve’et haminkhah ve’et khelwei hashelamim ki mizbakh hanekhoshet ’asher lifnei yhoh qaton meihakhil ’et ha‘olah ve’et haminkhah ve’et khelwei hashelamim. 
1_kings 8:65	vaya‘as shelomoh wa‘et hahi ’et hekhag vekhal yisra’el ‘imo qahal gadol milewo khamat ‘ad nakhal mitsrayim lifnei yhoh ’eloheinu shiw‘at yamim veshiw‘at yamim ’arba‘ah ‘asar yom. 
1_kings 8:66	bayom hashemini shilakh ’et ha‘am vaywarakhu ’et hamelekh vayeilekhu le’aholeihem semeikhim vetowei lew ‘al kal hatowah ’asher ‘asah yhoh ledavid ‘awdo uleyisra’el ‘amo. 
1_kings 9:1	vayhi kekhalot shelomoh liwnot ’et bet yhoh ve’et bet hamelekh ve’et kal kheisheq shelomoh ’asher khafets la‘asot. 
1_kings 9:2	vayeira yhoh ’el shelomoh sheinit ka’asher nir’ah ’eilav begiw‘on. 
1_kings 9:3	vayomer yhoh ’eilav ma‘ti ’et tefilatekha ve’et tekhinatekha ’asher hitkhanantah lefanai hiqdashti ’et habayit hazeh ’asher banitah lasum shemi sham ‘ad ‘olam vehayu ‘einai velibi sham kal hayamim. 
1_kings 9:4	ve’atah ’im teilekh lefanai ka’asher halakh david ’awikha betam leiwaw uweyosher la‘asot kekhol ’asher tsivitikha khuqai umishpatai tishmor. 
1_kings 9:5	vahaqimoti ’et kisei mamlakhtekha ‘al yisra’el le‘olam ka’asher dibarti ‘al david ’awikha leimor lo yikaret lekha ’ish mei‘al kisei yisra’el. 
1_kings 9:6	’im show teshuwun ’atem uweneikhem mei’akharai velo tishmeru mitsvotai khuqotai ’asher natati lifneikhem vahalakhtem va‘awadtem ’elohim ’akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. 
1_kings 9:7	vehikhrati ’et yisra’el mei‘al penei ha’adamah ’asher natati lahem ve’et habayit ’asher hiqdashti lishmi ’ashalakh mei‘al panai vehayah yisra’el lemashal velishninah bekhal ha‘amim. 
1_kings 9:8	vehabayit hazeh yihyeh ‘elyon kal ‘ower ‘alav yishom vesharaq ve’ameru ‘al meh ‘asah yhoh kakhah la’arets hazot velabayit hazeh. 
1_kings 9:9	ve’ameru ‘al ’asher ‘azewu ’et yhoh ’eloheihem ’asher hotsi ’et ’awotam mei’erets mitsrayim vayakhaziqu beilohim ’akheirim vayishtakhu vayishtakhavu lahem vaya‘awdum ‘al ken heiwi yhoh ‘aleihem ’et kal hara‘ah hazot. 
1_kings 9:10	vayhi miqtseh ‘esrim shanah ’asher banah shelomoh ’et shenei habatim ’et bet yhoh ve’et bet hamelekh. 
1_kings 9:11	khiram melekh tsor nisa ’et shelomoh ba‘atsei ’arazim uwa‘atsei weroshim uwazahaw lekhal kheftso ’az yiten hamelekh shelomoh lekhiram ‘esrim ‘ir be’erets hagalil. 
1_kings 9:12	vayeitsei khiram mitsor lir’ot ’et he‘arim ’asher natan lo shelomoh velo yasheru be‘einav. 
1_kings 9:13	vayomer mah he‘arim ha’eleh ’asher natatah li ’akhi vayiqra lahem ’erets kawul ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_kings 9:14	vayishlakh khiram lamelekh mei’ah ve‘esrim kikar zahaw. 
1_kings 9:15	vezeh dewar hamas ’asher he‘elah hamelekh shelomoh liwnot ’et bet yhoh ve’et beito ve’et hamilo ve’et khomat yerushalim ve’et khatsor ve’et megido ve’et gazer. 
1_kings 9:16	par‘oh melekh mitsrayim ‘alah vayilkod ’et gezer vayisrefah ba’esh ve’et hakena‘ani hayoshew ba‘ir harag vayitenah shilukhim lewito ’eishet shelomoh. 
1_kings 9:17	vayiwen shelomoh ’et gazer ve’et bet khoron takhton. 
1_kings 9:18	ve’et ba‘alat ve’et tamar tadmor bamidbar ba’arets. 
1_kings 9:19	ve’et kal ‘arei hamiskenot ’asher hayu lishlomoh ve’et ‘arei harekhew ve’et ‘arei haparashim ve’et kheisheq shelomoh ’asher khashaq liwnot birushalim uwalewanon uwekhol ’erets memshalto. 
1_kings 9:20	kal ha‘am hanotar min ha’emori hakhiti haperizi hakhivi vehaywusi ’asher lo mibenei yisra’el hemah. 
1_kings 9:21	beneihem ’asher noteru ’akhareihem ba’arets ’asher lo yakhelu benei yisra’el lehakharimam vaya‘alem shelomoh lemas ‘owed ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_kings 9:22	umibenei yisra’el lo natan shelomoh ‘awed ki hem ’anshei hamilkhamah va‘awadav vesarav veshalishav vesarei rikhbo ufarashav. 
1_kings 9:23	’eleh sarei hanitsawim ’asher ‘al hamelakhah lishlomoh khamishim vakhamesh mei’ot harodim ba‘am ha‘osim bamelakhah. 
1_kings 9:24	’akh bat par‘oh ‘aletah mei‘ir david ’el beitah ’asher banah lah ’az banah ’et hamilo. 
1_kings 9:25	vehe‘elah shelomoh shalosh pe‘amim bashanah ‘olot ushelamim ‘al hamizbeiakh ’asher banah yhoh vehaqter ’ito ’asher lifnei yhoh veshilam ’et habayit. 
1_kings 9:26	va’oni ‘asah hamelekh shelomoh be‘etsyon gewer ’asher ’et ’eilot ‘al sefat yam suf be’erets ’edom. 
1_kings 9:27	vayishlakh khiram ba’oni ’et ‘awadav ’anshei ’oniyot yode‘ei hayam ‘im ‘awdei shelomoh. 
1_kings 9:28	vayawo’u ’ofirah vayiqkhu misham zahaw ’arba‘ mei’ot ve‘esrim kikar vayawi’u ’el hamelekh shelomoh. 
1_kings 10:1	umalkat shewa shoma‘at ’et sheima‘ shelomoh leshem yhoh vatawo lenasoto bekhidot. 
1_kings 10:2	vatawo yerushalemah bekhayil kawed me’od gemalim nose’im besamim vezahaw raw me’od ve’ewen yeqarah vatawo ’el shelomoh vatedaber ’eilav ’et kal ’asher hayah ‘im lewawah. 
1_kings 10:3	vayaged lah shelomoh ’et kal dewareha lo hayah dawar ne‘lam min hamelekh ’asher lo higid lah. 
1_kings 10:4	vateire malkat shewa ’et kal khakhemat shelomoh vehabayit ’asher banah. 
1_kings 10:5	uma’akhal shulkhano umoshaw ‘awadav uma‘amad meshareto mesharetav umalbusheihem umashqav ve‘olato ’asher ya‘aleh bet yhoh velo hayah wah ‘od ruakh. 
1_kings 10:6	vatomer ’el hamelekh ’emet hayah hadawar ’asher shama‘ti be’artsi ‘al dewarekha ve‘al khakhematekha. 
1_kings 10:7	velo he’emanti ladewarim ‘ad ’asher bati vatir’enah ‘einai vehineh lo hugad li hakheitsi hosafta khakhmah vatow ’el hashemu‘ah ’asher shama‘eti. 
1_kings 10:8	’ashrei ’anashekha ’ashrei ‘awadekha ’eleh ha‘omedim lefanekha tamid hashome‘im ’et khakhematekha. 
1_kings 10:9	yehi yhoh ’elohekha barukh ’asher khafets bekha letitekha ‘al kisei yisra’el be’ahawat yhoh ’et yisra’el le‘olam vaysimekha lemelekh la‘asot mishpat utsedaqah. 
1_kings 10:10	vatiten lamelekh mei’ah ve‘esrim kikar zahaw uwesamim harbeh me’od ve’ewen yeqarah lo wa khabosem hahu ‘od larow ’asher natenah malkat shewa lamelekh shelomoh. 
1_kings 10:11	vegam ’oni khiram ’asher nasa zahaw mei’ofir heiwi mei’ofir ‘atsei ’almugim harbeh me’od ve’ewen yeqarah. 
1_kings 10:12	vaya‘as hamelekh ’et ‘atsei ha’almugim mis‘ad lewet yhoh ulewet hamelekh vekhinorot unewalim lasharim lo wa khen ‘atsei ’almugim velo nir’ah ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_kings 10:13	vehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat shewa ’et kal kheftsah ’asher sha’alah milewad ’asher natan lah keyad hamelekh shelomoh vateifen vateilekh le’artsah hi va‘awadeha. 
1_kings 10:14	vayhi mishqal hazahaw ’asher ba lishlomoh beshanah ’ekhat shesh mei’ot shishim vashesh kikar zahaw. 
1_kings 10:15	lewad mei’anshei hatarim umiskhar harokhelim vekhal malkhei ha‘erew ufakhot ha’arets. 
1_kings 10:16	vaya‘as hamelekh shelomoh matayim tsinah zahaw shakhut shesh mei’ot zahaw ya‘aleh ‘al hatsinah ha’ekhat. 
1_kings 10:17	ushelosh mei’ot maginim zahaw shakhut sheloshet manim zahaw ya‘aleh ‘al hamagen ha’ekhat vayitenem hamelekh bet ya‘ar halewanon. 
1_kings 10:18	vaya‘as hamelekh kisei shen gadol vaytsapeihu zahaw mufaz. 
1_kings 10:19	shesh ma‘alot lakiseh verosh ‘agol lakiseh mei’akharav veyadot mizeh umizeh ’el meqom hashawet ushenayim ’arayot ‘omedim ’eitsel hayadot. 
1_kings 10:20	ushenem ‘asar ’arayim ‘omedim sham ‘al shesh hama‘alot mizeh umizeh lo na‘asah khen lekhal mamlakhot. 
1_kings 10:21	vekhol kelei mashqeh hamelekh shelomoh zahaw vekhol kelei bet ya‘ar halewanon zahaw sagur ’en kesef lo nekhshaw bimei shelomoh lim’umah. 
1_kings 10:22	ki ’oni tarshish lamelekh bayam ‘im ’oni khiram ’akhat leshalosh shanim tawo ’oni tarshish nose’et zahaw vakhesef shenhabim veqofim vetukiyim. 
1_kings 10:23	vayigdal hamelekh shelomoh mikol malkhei ha’arets le‘osher ulekhakhemah. 
1_kings 10:24	vekhal ha’arets mewaqshim ’et penei shelomoh lishmoa‘ ’et khakhemato ’asher natan ’elohim belibo. 
1_kings 10:25	vehemah mewi’im ’ish minkhato kelei khesef ukhelei zahaw uselamot veneisheq uwesamim susim uferadim dewar shanah beshanah. 
1_kings 10:26	vaye’esof shelomoh rekhew ufarashim vayhi lo ’elef ve’arba‘ mei’ot rekhew ushenem ‘asar ’elef parashim vayankhem be‘arei harekhew ve‘im hamelekh birushalim. 
1_kings 10:27	vayiten hamelekh ’et hakesef birushalim ka’awanim ve’et ha’arazim natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larow. 
1_kings 10:28	umotsa hasusim ’asher lishlomoh mimitsrayim umiqveh sokharei hamelekh yiqkhu miqveh bimkhir. 
1_kings 10:29	vata‘aleh vateitsei merkawah mimitsrayim beshesh mei’ot kesef vesus bakhamishim umei’ah vekhen lekhal malkhei hakhitim ulemalkhei ’aram beyadam yotsi’u. 
1_kings 11:1	vehamelekh shelomoh ’ahaw nashim nakheriyot rabot ve’et bat par‘oh mo’awiyot ‘amoniyot ’adomiyot tseideniyot khitiyot. 
1_kings 11:2	min hagoyim ’asher ’amar yhoh ’el benei yisra’el lo tawo’u wahem vehem lo yawo’u wakhem ’akhen yatu ’et lewawkhem ’akharei ’eloheihem bahem dawaq shelomoh le’ahawah. 
1_kings 11:3	vayhi lo nashim sarot shewa‘ mei’ot ufilagshim shelosh mei’ot vayatu nashav ’et libo. 
1_kings 11:4	vayhi le‘et ziqnat shelomoh nashav hitu ’et lewawo ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim velo hayah lewawo shalem ‘im yhoh ’elohav kilwaw david ’awiv. 
1_kings 11:5	vayeilekh shelomoh ’akharei ‘ashtoret ’elohei tsidonim ve’akharei milkom shiquts ‘amonim. 
1_kings 11:6	vaya‘as shelomoh hara‘ be‘einei yhoh velo milei ’akharei yhoh kedavid ’awiv. 
1_kings 11:7	’az yiwneh shelomoh bamah likhmosh shiquts mo’aw bahar ’asher ‘al penei yerushalim ulemolekh shiquts benei ‘amon. 
1_kings 11:8	vekhen ‘asah lekhal nashav hanakheriyot maqtirot umezabekhot leiloheihen. 
1_kings 11:9	vayit’anaf yhoh bishlomoh ki natah lewawo mei‘im yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hanir’ah ’eilav pa‘amayim. 
1_kings 11:10	vetsivah ’eilav ‘al hadawar hazeh lewilti lekhet ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim velo shamar ’et ’asher tsivah yhoh. 
1_kings 11:11	vayomer yhoh lishlomoh ya‘an ’asher hayetah zot ‘imakh velo shamarta beriti vekhuqotai ’asher tsiviti ‘alekha qaroa‘ ’eqra‘ ’et hamamlakhah mei‘alekha unetatiha le‘awdekha. 
1_kings 11:12	’akh beyamekha lo ’e‘esenah lema‘an david ’awikha miyad binkha ’eqra‘enah. 
1_kings 11:13	raq ’et kal hamamlakhah lo ’eqra‘ sheiwet ’ekhad ’eten liwnekha lema‘an david ‘awdi ulema‘an yerushalim ’asher bakhareti. 
1_kings 11:14	vayaqem yhoh satan lishlomoh ’et hadad ha’adomi mizera‘ hamelekh hu be’edom. 
1_kings 11:15	vayhi bihyot david ’et ’edom ba‘alot yo’aw sar hatsawa leqaber ’et hakhalalim vayakh kal zakhar be’edom. 
1_kings 11:16	ki sheishet khodashim yashaw sham yo’aw vekhal yisra’el ‘ad hikhrit kal zakhar be’edom. 
1_kings 11:17	vayiwrakh ’adad hu va’anashim ’adomiyim mei‘awdei ’awiv ’ito lawo mitsrayim vahadad na‘ar qatan. 
1_kings 11:18	vayaqumu mimidyan vayawo’u paran vayiqkhu ’anashim ‘imam miparan vayawo’u mitsrayim ’el par‘oh melekh mitsrayim vayiten lo wayit velekhem ’amar lo ve’erets natan lo. 
1_kings 11:19	vayimtsa hadad khen be‘einei far‘oh me’od vayiten lo ’ishah ’et ’akhot ’ishto ’akhot takhpenes hagewirah. 
1_kings 11:20	vateiled lo ’akhot takhpenes ’et genuwat beno vatigmeleihu takhpenes betokh bet par‘oh vayhi genuwat bet par‘oh betokh benei far‘oh. 
1_kings 11:21	vahadad shama‘ bemitsrayim ki shakhaw david ‘im ’awotav vekhi met yo’aw sar hatsawa vayomer hadad ’el par‘oh shalekheini ve’eilekh ’el ’artsi. 
1_kings 11:22	vayomer lo far‘oh ki mah ’atah khaser ‘imi vehinekha mewaqesh lalekhet ’el ’artsekha vayomer lo ki shaleiakh teshalekheini. 
1_kings 11:23	vayaqem ’elohim lo satan ’et rezon ben ’elyada‘ ’asher barakh mei’et hadad‘ezer melekh tsowah ’adonav. 
1_kings 11:24	vayiqbots ‘alav ’anashim vayhi sar gedud baharog david ’otam vayeilekhu dameseq vayeishewu wah vayimlekhu bedamaseq. 
1_kings 11:25	vayhi satan leyisra’el kal yemei shelomoh ve’et hara‘ah ’asher hadad vayaqats beyisra’el vayimlokh ‘al ’aram. 
1_kings 11:26	veyarawe‘am ben newat ’efrati min hatsereidah veshem ’imo tseru‘ah ’ishah ’almanah ‘ewed lishlomoh vayarem yad bamelekh. 
1_kings 11:27	vezeh hadawar ’asher heirim yad bamelekh shelomoh banah ’et hamilo sagar ’et perets ‘ir david ’awiv. 
1_kings 11:28	veha’ish yarawe‘am gibor khayil vayar shelomoh ’et hana‘ar ki ‘oseh melakhah hu vayafqed ’oto lekhal seiwel bet yosef. 
1_kings 11:29	vayhi ba‘et hahi veyarawe‘am yatsa mirushalim vayimtsa ’oto ’akhiyah hashiloni hanawi baderekh vehu mitkaseh besalmah khadashah usheneihem lewadam basadeh. 
1_kings 11:30	vayitpos ’akhiyah basalmah hakhadashah ’asher ‘alav vayiqra‘eha shenem ‘asar qera‘im. 
1_kings 11:31	vayomer leyarawe‘am qakh lekha ‘asarah qera‘im ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hini qoreia‘ ’et hamamlakhah miyad shelomoh venatati lekha ’et ‘asarah hashewatim. 
1_kings 11:32	vehasheiwet ha’ekhad yihyeh lo lema‘an ‘awdi david ulema‘an yerushalim ha‘ir ’asher bakharti wah mikol shiwtei yisra’el. 
1_kings 11:33	ya‘an ’asher ‘azawuni vayishtakhavu le‘ashtoret ’elohei tsidonin likhmosh ’elohei mo’aw ulemilkom ’elohei wenei ‘amon velo halekhu widrakhai la‘asot hayashar be‘einai vekhuqotai umishpatai kedavid ’awiv. 
1_kings 11:34	velo ’eqakh ’et kal hamamlakhah miyado ki nasi ’ashitenu kol yemei khayav lema‘an david ‘awdi ’asher bakharti ’oto ’asher shamar mitsvotai vekhuqotai. 
1_kings 11:35	velaqakhti hamelukhah miyad beno unetatiha lekha ’et ‘aseret hashewatim. 
1_kings 11:36	veliwno ’eten sheiwet ’ekhad lema‘an heyot nir ledavid ‘awdi kal hayamim lefanai birushalim ha‘ir ’asher bakharti li lasum shemi sham. 
1_kings 11:37	ve’otekha ’eqakh umalakhta bekhol ’asher te’aveh nafshekha vehayita melekh ‘al yisra’el. 
1_kings 11:38	vehayah ’im tishma‘ ’et kal ’asher ’atsavekha vehalakhta widrakhai ve‘asita hayashar be‘einai lishmor khuqotai umitsvotai ka’asher ‘asah david ‘awdi vehayiti ‘imakh uwaniti lekha wayit ne’eman ka’asher baniti ledavid venatati lekha ’et yisra’el. 
1_kings 11:39	va‘aneh ’et zera‘ david lema‘an zot ’akh lo khal hayamim. 
1_kings 11:40	vaywaqesh shelomoh lehamit ’et yarawe‘am vayaqam yarawe‘am vayiwrakh mitsrayim ’el shishaq melekh mitsrayim vayhi wemitsrayim ‘ad mot shelomoh. 
1_kings 11:41	veyeter diwrei shelomoh vekhal ’asher ‘asah vekhakhemato halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei shelomoh. 
1_kings 11:42	vehayamim ’asher malakh shelomoh wirushalim ‘al kal yisra’el ’arba‘im shanah. 
1_kings 11:43	vayishkaw shelomoh ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer be‘ir david ’awiv vayimlokh rekhaw‘am beno takhtav. 
1_kings 12:1	vayeilekh rekhaw‘am shekhem ki shekhem ba khal yisra’el lehamlikh ’oto. 
1_kings 12:2	vayhi kishmoa‘ yarawe‘am ben newat vehu ‘odenu wemitsrayim ’asher barakh mipenei hamelekh shelomoh vayeishew yarawe‘am bemitsrayim. 
1_kings 12:3	vayishlekhu vayiqre’u lo vayawo’u vayawo yarawe‘am vekhal qehal yisra’el vaydaberu ’el rekhaw‘am leimor. 
1_kings 12:4	’awikha hiqshah ’et ‘uleinu ve’atah ‘atah haqel mei‘awodat ’awikha haqashah umei‘ulo hakawed ’asher natan ‘aleinu vena‘awdeka. 
1_kings 12:5	vayomer ’aleihem lekhu ‘od sheloshah yamim veshuwu ’eilai vayeilekhu ha‘am. 
1_kings 12:6	vayiva‘ats hamelekh rekhaw‘am ’et hazeqeinim ’asher hayu ‘omedim ’et penei shelomoh ’awiv bihyoto khai leimor ’ekh ’atem no‘atsim lehashiw ’et ha‘am hazeh dawar. 
1_kings 12:7	vaydaber vaydaberu ’eilav leimor ’im hayom tihyeh ‘ewed la‘am hazeh va‘awadtam va‘anitam vedibarta ’aleihem dewarim towim vehayu lekha ‘awadim kal hayamim. 
1_kings 12:8	vaya‘azow ’et ‘atsat hazeqeinim ’asher ye‘atsuhu vayiva‘ats ’et hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito ’asher ha‘omedim lefanav. 
1_kings 12:9	vayomer ’aleihem mah ’atem no‘atsim venashiw dawar ’et ha‘am hazeh ’asher diberu ’eilai leimor haqel min ha‘ol ’asher natan ’awikha ‘aleinu. 
1_kings 12:10	vaydaberu ’eilav hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito leimor koh tomar la‘am hazeh ’asher diberu ’eilekha leimor ’awikha hikhbid ’et ‘uleinu ve’atah haqel mei‘aleinu koh tedaber ’aleihem qatani ‘awah mimatenei ’awi. 
1_kings 12:11	ve‘atah ’awi he‘mis ‘aleikhem ‘ol kawed va’ani ’osif ‘al ‘ulekhem ’awi yisar ’etkhem bashotim va’ani ’ayaser ’etkhem ba‘aqrabim. 
1_kings 12:12	vayawo vayawo yarawe‘am vekhal ha‘am ’el rekhaw‘am bayom hashelishi ka’asher diber hamelekh leimor shuwu ’eilai bayom hashelishi. 
1_kings 12:13	vaya‘an hamelekh ’et ha‘am qashah vaya‘azow ’et ‘atsat hazeqeinim ’asher ye‘atsuhu. 
1_kings 12:14	vaydaber ’aleihem ka‘atsat hayladim leimor ’awi hikhbid ’et ‘ulekhem va’ani ’osif ‘al ‘ulekhem ’awi yisar ’etkhem bashotim va’ani ’ayaser ’etkhem ba‘aqrabim. 
1_kings 12:15	velo shama‘ hamelekh ’el ha‘am ki hayetah sibah mei‘im yhoh lema‘an haqim ’et dewaro ’asher diber yhoh beyad ’akhiyah hashiloni ’el yarawe‘am ben newat. 
1_kings 12:16	vayar kal yisra’el ki lo shama‘ hamelekh ’aleihem vayashiwu ha‘am ’et hamelekh dawar leimor mah lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah bewen yishai le’ohalekha yisra’el ‘atah re’eh weitekha david vayeilekh yisra’el le’ohalav. 
1_kings 12:17	uwenei yisra’el hayoshewim be‘arei yehudah vayimlokh ‘aleihem rekhaw‘am. 
1_kings 12:18	vayishlakh hamelekh rekhaw‘am ’et ’adoram ’asher ‘al hamas vayirgemu khal yisra’el bo ’ewen vayamot vehamelekh rekhaw‘am hit’amets la‘alot bamerkawah lanus yerushalim. 
1_kings 12:19	vayifshe‘u yisra’el bewet david ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_kings 12:20	vayhi kishmoa‘ kal yisra’el ki shaw yarawe‘am vayishlekhu vayiqre’u ’oto ’el ha‘eidah vayamlikhu ’oto ‘al kal yisra’el lo hayah ’akharei wet david zulati sheiwet yehudah lewado. 
1_kings 12:21	vayawo’u vayawo rekhaw‘am yerushalim vayaqhel ’et kal bet yehudah ve’et sheiwet binyamin mei’ah ushemonim ’elef bakhur ‘oseh milkhamah lehilakhem ‘im bet yisra’el lehashiw ’et hamelukhah lirkhaw‘am ben shelomoh. 
1_kings 12:22	vayhi dewar ha’elohim ’el shema‘yah ’ish ha’elohim leimor. 
1_kings 12:23	’emor ’el rekhaw‘am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah ve’el kal bet yehudah uwinyamin veyeter ha‘am leimor. 
1_kings 12:24	koh ’amar yhoh lo ta‘alu velo tilakhamun ‘im ’akheikhem benei yisra’el uwu ’ish leweito ki mei’iti nihyah hadawar hazeh vayishme‘u ’et dewar yhoh vayashuwu lalekhet kidwar yhoh. 
1_kings 12:25	vayiwen yarawe‘am ’et shekhem behar ’efrayim vayeishew bah vayeitsei misham vayiwen ’et penu’el. 
1_kings 12:26	vayomer yarawe‘am belibo ‘atah tashuw hamamlakhah lewet david. 
1_kings 12:27	’im ya‘aleh ha‘am hazeh la‘asot zewakhim bewet yhoh birushalim veshaw lew ha‘am hazeh ’el ’adoneihem ’el rekhaw‘am melekh yehudah vaharaguni veshawu ’el rekhaw‘am melekh yehudah. 
1_kings 12:28	vayiva‘ats hamelekh vaya‘as shenei ‘eglei zahaw vayomer ’aleihem raw lakhem mei‘alot yerushalim hineh ’elohekha yisra’el ’asher he‘elukha mei’erets mitsrayim. 
1_kings 12:29	vayasem ’et ha’ekhad bewet ’el ve’et ha’ekhad natan bedan. 
1_kings 12:30	vayhi hadawar hazeh lekhatat vayeilekhu ha‘am lifnei ha’ekhad ‘ad dan. 
1_kings 12:31	vaya‘as ’et bet bamot vaya‘as kohanim miqtsot ha‘am ’asher lo hayu mibenei leivi. 
1_kings 12:32	vaya‘as yarawe‘am khag bakhodesh hashemini bakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh kekhag ’asher bihudah vaya‘al ‘al hamizbeiakh ken ‘asah bewet ’el lezabeiakh la‘agalim ’asher ‘asah vehe‘emid bewet ’el ’et kohanei habamot ’asher ‘asah. 
1_kings 12:33	vaya‘al ‘al hamizbeiakh ’asher ‘asah bewet ’el bakhamishah ‘asar yom bakhodesh hashemini bakhodesh ’asher bada milibad milibo vaya‘as khag liwnei yisra’el vaya‘al ‘al hamizbeiakh lehaqtir. 
1_kings 13:1	vehineh ’ish ’elohim ba mihudah bidwar yhoh ’el bet ’el veyarawe‘am ‘omed ‘al hamizbeiakh lehaqtir. 
1_kings 13:2	vayiqra ‘al hamizbeiakh bidwar yhoh vayomer mizbeiakh mizbeiakh koh ’amar yhoh hineh wen nolad lewet david yoshiyahu shemo vezawakh ‘alekha ’et kohanei habamot hamaqtirim ‘alekha ve‘atsmot ’adam yisrefu ‘alekha. 
1_kings 13:3	venatan bayom hahu mofet leimor zeh hamofet ’asher diber yhoh hineh hamizbeiakh niqra‘ venishpakh hadeshen ’asher ‘alav. 
1_kings 13:4	vayhi khishmoa‘ hamelekh ’et dewar ’ish ha’elohim ’asher qara ‘al hamizbeiakh bewet ’el vayishlakh yarawe‘am ’et yado mei‘al hamizbeiakh leimor tifsuhu vatiwash yado ’asher shalakh ‘alav velo yakhol lahashiwah ’eilav. 
1_kings 13:5	vehamizbeiakh niqra‘ vayishafekh hadeshen min hamizbeiakh kamofet ’asher natan ’ish ha’elohim bidwar yhoh. 
1_kings 13:6	vaya‘an hamelekh vayomer ’el ’ish ha’elohim khal na ’et penei yhoh ’elohekha vehitpalel ba‘adi vetashow yadi ’eilai vaykhal ’ish ha’elohim ’et penei yhoh vatashaw yad hamelekh ’eilav vatehi kewarishonah. 
1_kings 13:7	vaydaber hamelekh ’el ’ish ha’elohim bo’ah ’iti habaytah use‘adah ve’etenah lekha matat. 
1_kings 13:8	vayomer ’ish ha’elohim ’el hamelekh ’im titen li ’et khatsi weitekha lo ’awo ‘imakh velo ’okhal lekhem velo ’eshteh mayim bamaqom hazeh. 
1_kings 13:9	ki khen tsivah ’oti bidwar yhoh leimor lo tokhal lekhem velo tishteh mayim velo tashuw baderekh ’asher halakheta. 
1_kings 13:10	vayeilekh bederekh ’akher velo shaw baderekh ’asher ba wah ’el bet ’el. 
1_kings 13:11	venawi ’ekhad zaqen yoshew bewet ’el vayawo weno vaysaper lo ’et kal hama‘aseh ’asher ‘asah ’ish ha’elohim hayom bewet ’el ’et hadewarim ’asher diber ’el hamelekh vaysaperum la’awihem. 
1_kings 13:12	vaydaber ’aleihem ’awihem ’ei zeh haderekh halakh vayir’u wanav ’et haderekh ’asher halakh ’ish ha’elohim ’asher ba mihudah. 
1_kings 13:13	vayomer ’el banav khiwshu li hakhamor vayakhbeshu lo hakhamor vayirkaw ‘alav. 
1_kings 13:14	vayeilekh ’akharei ’ish ha’elohim vayimtsa’eihu yoshew takhat ha’eilah vayomer ’eilav ha’atah ’ish ha’elohim ’asher bata mihudah vayomer ’ani. 
1_kings 13:15	vayomer ’eilav lekh ’iti habayetah ve’ekhol lakhem. 
1_kings 13:16	vayomer lo ’ukhal lashuw ’itakh velawo ’itakh velo ’okhal lekhem velo ’eshteh ’itekha mayim bamaqom hazeh. 
1_kings 13:17	ki dawar ’eilai bidwar yhoh lo tokhal lekhem velo tishteh sham mayim lo tashuw lalekhet baderekh ’asher halakhta bah. 
1_kings 13:18	vayomer lo gam ’ani nawi kamokha umal’akh diber ’eilai bidwar yhoh leimor hashiweihu ’itekha ’el beitekha veyokhal lekhem veyeishet mayim kikhesh lo. 
1_kings 13:19	vayashaw ’ito vayokhal lekhem beweito vayeishet mayim. 
1_kings 13:20	vayhi hem yoshewim ’el hashulkhan vayhi dewar yhoh ’el hanawi ’asher heshiwo. 
1_kings 13:21	vayiqra ’el ’ish ha’elohim ’asher ba mihudah leimor koh ’amar yhoh ya‘an ki marita pi yhoh velo shamarta ’et hamitsvah ’asher tsivekha yhoh ’elohekha. 
1_kings 13:22	vatashaw vatokhal lekhem vateishet mayim bamaqom ’asher diber ’eilekha ’al tokhal lekhem ve’al teishet mayim lo tawo niwlatekha ’el qewer ’awotekha. 
1_kings 13:23	vayhi ’akharei ’akhelo lekhem ve’akharei shetoto vayakhawash lo hakhamor lanawi ’asher heshiwo. 
1_kings 13:24	vayeilekh vayimtsa’eihu ’aryeh baderekh vaymiteihu vatehi niwlato mushlekhet baderekh vehakhamor ‘omed ’etslah veha’aryeh ‘omed ’eitsel haneweilah. 
1_kings 13:25	vehineh ’anashim ‘owerim vayir’u ’et haneweilah mushlekhet baderekh ve’et ha’aryeh ‘omed ’eitsel haneweilah vayawo’u vaydaberu wa‘ir ’asher hanawi hazaqen yoshew bah. 
1_kings 13:26	vayishma‘ hanawi ’asher heshiwo min haderekh vayomer ’ish ha’elohim hu ’asher marah ’et pi yhoh vayiteneihu yhoh la’aryeh vayishbereihu vaymiteihu kidwar yhoh ’asher diber lo. 
1_kings 13:27	vaydaber ’el banav leimor khiwshu li ’et hakhamor vayakhawoshu. 
1_kings 13:28	vayeilekh vayimtsa ’et niwlato mushlekhet baderekh vakhamor veha’aryeh ‘omedim ’eitsel haneweilah lo ’akhal ha’aryeh ’et haneweilah velo shawar ’et hakhamor. 
1_kings 13:29	vayisa hanawi ’et niwlat ’ish ha’elohim vayanikheihu ’el hakhamor vayshiweihu vayawo ’el ‘ir hanawi hazaqen lispod uleqawero. 
1_kings 13:30	vayanakh ’et niwlato beqiwro vayispedu ‘alav ho ’akhi. 
1_kings 13:31	vayhi ’akharei qawero ’oto vayomer ’el banav leimor bemoti uqewartem ’oti baqewer ’asher ’ish ha’elohim qawur bo ’eitsel ‘atsmotav hanikhu ’et ‘atsmotai. 
1_kings 13:32	ki hayoh yihyeh hadawar ’asher qara bidwar yhoh ‘al hamizbeiakh ’asher bewet ’el ve‘al kal batei habamot ’asher be‘arei shomeron. 
1_kings 13:33	’akhar hadawar hazeh lo shaw yarawe‘am midarko hara‘ah vayashaw vaya‘as miqtsot ha‘am kohanei wamot hekhafets yemalei ’et yado vihi kohanei wamot. 
1_kings 13:34	vayhi badawar hazeh lekhatat bet yarawe‘am ulehakhkhid ulehashmid mei‘al penei ha’adamah. 
1_kings 14:1	ba‘et hahi khalah ’awiyah wen yarawe‘am. 
1_kings 14:2	vayomer yarawe‘am le’ishto qumi na vehishtanit velo yeide‘u ki ’ati ’at ’eishet yarawe‘am vehalakht shiloh hineh sham ’akhiyah hanawi hu diber ‘alai lemelekh ‘al ha‘am hazeh. 
1_kings 14:3	velaqakhat beyadekh ‘asarah lekhem veniqudim uwaqbuq dewash uwat ’eilav hu yagid lakh mah yihyeh lana‘ar. 
1_kings 14:4	vata‘as ken ’eishet yarawe‘am vataqam vateilekh shiloh vatawo bet ’akhiyah va’akhiyahu lo yakhol lir’ot ki qamu ‘einav miseiwo. 
1_kings 14:5	yhoh ’amar ’el ’akhiyahu hineh ’eishet yarawe‘am ba’ah lidrosh dawar mei‘imekha ’el benah ki kholeh hu kazoh vekhazeh tedaber ’eileha vihi khewo’ah vehi mitnakeirah. 
1_kings 14:6	vayhi khishmoa‘ ’akhiyahu ’et qol ragleha ba’ah wapetakh vayomer bo’i ’eishet yarawe‘am lamah zeh ’at mitnakeirah ve’anokhi shaluakh ’eilayikh qashah. 
1_kings 14:7	lekhi ’imri leyarawe‘am koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ya‘an ’asher harimotikha mitokh ha‘am va’etenkha nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. 
1_kings 14:8	va’eqra‘ ’et hamamlakhah mibet david va’eteneha lakh velo hayita ke‘awdi david ’asher shamar mitsvotai va’asher halakh ’akharai bekhal lewawo la‘asot raq hayashar be‘einai. 
1_kings 14:9	vatara‘ la‘asot mikol ’asher hayu lefanekha vateilekh vata‘aseh lekha ’elohim ’akheirim umaseikhot lehakh‘iseini ve’oti hishlakhta ’akharei gavekha. 
1_kings 14:10	lakhen hini meiwi ra‘ah ’el bet yarawe‘am vehikhrati leyarawe‘am mashtin beqir ‘atsur ve‘azuw beyisra’el uwi‘arti ’akharei wet yarawe‘am ka’asher yewa‘er hagalal ‘ad tumo. 
1_kings 14:11	hamet leyarawe‘am ba‘ir yokhelu hakelawim vehamet basadeh yokhelu ‘of hashamayim ki yhoh diber. 
1_kings 14:12	ve’at qumi lekhi leweitekh bewo’ah raglayikh ha‘irah umet hayaled. 
1_kings 14:13	vesafedu lo khal yisra’el veqaweru ’oto ki zeh lewado yawo leyarawe‘am ’el qawer ya‘an nimtsa wo dawar tow ’el yhoh ’elohei yisra’el bewet yarawe‘am. 
1_kings 14:14	veheiqim yhoh lo melekh ‘al yisra’el ’asher yakhrit ’et bet yarawe‘am zeh hayom umeh gam ‘atah. 
1_kings 14:15	vehikah yhoh ’et yisra’el ka’asher yanud haqaneh bamayim venatash ’et yisra’el mei‘al ha’adamah hatowah hazot ’asher natan la’awoteihem vezeiram mei‘eiwer lanahar ya‘an ’asher ‘asu ’et ’asheireihem makh‘isim ’et yhoh. 
1_kings 14:16	veyiten ’et yisra’el biglal khatot yarawe‘am ’asher khata va’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
1_kings 14:17	vataqam ’eishet yarawe‘am vateilekh vatawo tirtsatah hi ba’ah wesaf habayit vehana‘ar met. 
1_kings 14:18	vayiqberu ’oto vayispedu lo kal yisra’el kidwar yhoh ’asher diber beyad ‘awdo ’akhiyahu hanawi. 
1_kings 14:19	veyeter diwrei yarawe‘am ’asher nilkham va’asher malakh hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
1_kings 14:20	vehayamim ’asher malakh yarawe‘am ‘esrim ushetayim shanah vayishkaw ‘im ’awotav vayimlokh nadaw beno takhtav. 
1_kings 14:21	urekhaw‘am ben shelomoh malakh bihudah ben ’arba‘im ve’akhat shanah rekhaw‘am bemalekho ushawa‘ ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim ha‘ir ’asher bakhar yhoh lasum ’et shemo sham mikol shiwtei yisra’el veshem ’imo na‘amah ha‘amonit. 
1_kings 14:22	vaya‘as yehudah hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayqan’u ’oto mikol ’asher ‘asu ’awotam bekhatotam ’asher khata’u. 
1_kings 14:23	vayiwnu gam hemah lahem bamot umatseiwot va’asheirim ‘al kal giw‘ah gewohah vetakhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan. 
1_kings 14:24	vegam qadesh hayah wa’arets ‘asu kekhol hato‘awot hagoyim ’asher horish yhoh mipenei benei yisra’el. 
1_kings 14:25	vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lamelekh rekhaw‘am ‘alah shushaq shishaq melekh mitsrayim ‘al yerushalim. 
1_kings 14:26	vayiqakh ’et ’otserot bet yhoh ve’et ’otsrot bet hamelekh ve’et hakol laqakh vayiqakh ’et kal maginei hazahaw ’asher ‘asah shelomoh. 
1_kings 14:27	vaya‘as hamelekh rekhaw‘am takhtam maginei nekhoshet vehifqid ‘al yad sarei haratsim hashomerim petakh bet hamelekh. 
1_kings 14:28	vayhi midei wo hamelekh bet yhoh yisa’um haratsim veheshiwum ’el ta haratsim. 
1_kings 14:29	veyeter diwrei rekhaw‘am vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hemah khetuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
1_kings 14:30	umilkhamah hayetah wen rekhaw‘am uwen yarawe‘am kal hayamim. 
1_kings 14:31	vayishkaw rekhaw‘am ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david veshem ’imo na‘amah ha‘amonit vayimlokh ’awiyam beno takhtav. 
1_kings 15:1	uwishnat shemoneh ‘esreh lamelekh yarawe‘am ben newat malakh ’awiyam ‘al yehudah. 
1_kings 15:2	shalosh shanim malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ma‘akhah bat ’awishalom. 
1_kings 15:3	vayeilekh bekhal khatot ’awiv ’asher ‘asah lefanav velo hayah lewawo shalem ‘im yhoh ’elohav kilwaw david ’awiv. 
1_kings 15:4	ki lema‘an david natan yhoh ’elohav lo nir birushalim lehaqim ’et beno ’akharav uleha‘amid ’et yerushalim. 
1_kings 15:5	’asher ‘asah david ’et hayashar be‘einei yhoh velo sar mikol ’asher tsivahu kol yemei khayav raq bidwar ’uriyah hakhiti. 
1_kings 15:6	umilkhamah hayetah wen rekhaw‘am uwen yarawe‘am kal yemei khayav. 
1_kings 15:7	veyeter diwrei ’awiyam vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah umilkhamah hayetah ben ’awiyam uwen yarawe‘am. 
1_kings 15:8	vayishkaw ’awiyam ‘im ’awotav vayiqberu ’oto be‘ir david vayimlokh ’asa weno takhtav. 
1_kings 15:9	uwishnat ‘esrim leyarawe‘am melekh yisra’el malakh ’asa melekh yehudah. 
1_kings 15:10	ve’arba‘im ve’akhat shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ma‘akhah bat ’awishalom. 
1_kings 15:11	vaya‘as ’asa hayashar be‘einei yhoh kedavid ’awiv. 
1_kings 15:12	vaya‘awer haqedeishim min ha’arets vayasar ’et kal hagilulim ’asher ‘asu ’awotav. 
1_kings 15:13	vegam ’et ma‘akhah ’imo vaysireha migewirah ’asher ‘asetah mifletset la’asheirah vayikhrot ’asa ’et miflatstah vayisrof benakhal qidron. 
1_kings 15:14	vehabamot lo saru raq lewaw ’asa hayah shalem ‘im yhoh kal yamav. 
1_kings 15:15	vayawei ’et qadeshei ’awiv veqadesho veqadeshei bet yhoh kesef vezahaw vekheilim. 
1_kings 15:16	umilkhamah hayetah ben ’asa uwen ba‘sha melekh yisra’el kal yemeihem. 
1_kings 15:17	vaya‘al ba‘sha melekh yisra’el ‘al yehudah vayiwen ’et haramah lewilti tet yotsei vawa le’asa melekh yehudah. 
1_kings 15:18	vayiqakh ’asa ’et kal hakesef vehazahaw hanotarim be’otsrot bet yhoh ve’et ’otsrot bet melekh hamelekh vayitenem beyad ‘awadav vayishlakhem hamelekh ’asa ’el ben hadad ben tawrimon ben khezyon melekh ’aram hayoshew bedameseq leimor. 
1_kings 15:19	berit beini uweinekha ben ’awi uwen ’awikha hineh shalakhti lekha shokhad kesef vezahaw lekh hafeirah ’et beritekha ’et ba‘sha melekh yisra’el veya‘aleh mei‘alai. 
1_kings 15:20	vayishma‘ ben hadad ’el hamelekh ’asa vayishlakh ’et sarei hakhayalim ’asher lo ‘al ‘arei yisra’el vayakh ’et ‘iyon ve’et dan ve’et ’awel bet ma‘akhah ve’et kal kinrot ‘al kal ’erets naftali. 
1_kings 15:21	vayhi kishmoa‘ ba‘sha vayekhdal mibenot ’et haramah vayeishew betirtsah. 
1_kings 15:22	vehamelekh ’asa hishmia‘ ’et kal yehudah ’en naqi vayis’u ’et ’awnei haramah ve’et ‘eitseha ’asher banah ba‘sha vayiwen bam hamelekh ’asa ’et gewa‘ binyamin ve’et hamitspah. 
1_kings 15:23	veyeter kal diwrei ’asa vekhal gewurato vekhal ’asher ‘asah vehe‘arim ’asher banah halo hemah khetuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah raq le‘et ziqnato khalah ’et raglav. 
1_kings 15:24	vayishkaw ’asa ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david ’awiv vayimlokh yehoshafat beno takhtav. 
1_kings 15:25	venadaw ben yarawe‘am malakh ‘al yisra’el bishnat shetayim le’asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh ‘al yisra’el shenatayim. 
1_kings 15:26	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayeilekh bederekh ’awiv uwekhatato ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
1_kings 15:27	vayiqshor ‘alav ba‘sha wen ’akhiyah lewet yisashkhar vayakeihu wa‘sha begibeton ’asher lapelishtim venadaw vekhal yisra’el tsarim ‘al gibeton. 
1_kings 15:28	vaymiteihu wa‘sha bishnat shalosh le’asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh takhtav. 
1_kings 15:29	vayhi khemalekho hikah ’et kal bet yarawe‘am lo hish’ir kal neshamah leyarawe‘am ‘ad hishmido kidwar yhoh ’asher diber beyad ‘awdo ’akhiyah hashiloni. 
1_kings 15:30	‘al khatot yarawe‘am ’asher khata va’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el bekha‘so ’asher hikh‘is ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
1_kings 15:31	veyeter diwrei nadaw vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
1_kings 15:32	umilkhamah hayetah ben ’asa uwen ba‘sha melekh yisra’el kal yemeihem. 
1_kings 15:33	bishnat shalosh le’asa melekh yehudah malakh ba‘sha wen ’akhiyah ‘al kal yisra’el betirtsah ‘esrim ve’arba‘ shanah. 
1_kings 15:34	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayeilekh bederekh yarawe‘am uwekhatato ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
1_kings 16:1	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yeihu wen khanani ‘al ba‘sha leimor. 
1_kings 16:2	ya‘an ’asher harimotikha min he‘afar va’etenkha nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el vateilekh bederekh yarawe‘am vatakhati ’et ‘ami yisra’el lehakh‘iseini bekhatotam. 
1_kings 16:3	hini maw‘ir ’akharei wa‘sha ve’akharei weito venatati ’et beitekha kewet yarawe‘am ben newat. 
1_kings 16:4	hamet lewa‘sha ba‘ir yokhelu hakelawim vehamet lo basadeh yokhelu ‘of hashamayim. 
1_kings 16:5	veyeter diwrei wa‘sha va’asher ‘asah ugewurato halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
1_kings 16:6	vayishkaw ba‘sha ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer betirtsah vayimlokh ’eilah weno takhtav. 
1_kings 16:7	vegam beyad yeihu wen khanani hanawi dewar yhoh hayah ’el ba‘sha ve’el beito ve‘al kal hara‘ah ’asher ‘asah be‘einei yhoh lehakh‘iso bema‘aseh yadav lihyot kewet yarawe‘am ve‘al ’asher hikah ’oto. 
1_kings 16:8	bishnat ‘esrim vashesh shanah le’asa melekh yehudah malakh ’eilah wen ba‘sha ‘al yisra’el betirtsah shenatayim. 
1_kings 16:9	vayiqshor ‘alav ‘awdo zimri sar makhatsit harakhew vehu wetirtsah shoteh shikor bet ’artsa ’asher ‘al habayit betirtsah. 
1_kings 16:10	vayawo zimri vayakeihu vaymiteihu bishnat ‘esrim vashewa‘ le’asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh takhtav. 
1_kings 16:11	vayhi wemalekho keshiwto ‘al kis’o hikah ’et kal bet ba‘sha lo hish’ir lo mashtin beqir vego’alav verei‘eihu. 
1_kings 16:12	vayashmed zimri ’et kal bet ba‘sha kidwar yhoh ’asher diber ’el ba‘sha beyad yeihu hanawi. 
1_kings 16:13	’el kal khatot ba‘sha vekhatot ’eilah weno ’asher khate’u va’asher hekheti’u ’et yisra’el lehakh‘is ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’el behawleihem. 
1_kings 16:14	veyeter diwrei ’eilah vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
1_kings 16:15	bishnat ‘esrim vashewa‘ shanah le’asa melekh yehudah malakh zimri shiw‘at yamim betirtsah veha‘am khonim ‘al gibeton ’asher lapelishtim. 
1_kings 16:16	vayishma‘ ha‘am hakhonim leimor qashar zimri vegam hikah ’et hamelekh vayamlikhu khal yisra’el ’et ‘ameri sar tsawa ‘al yisra’el bayom hahu bamakhaneh. 
1_kings 16:17	vaya‘aleh ‘ameri vekhal yisra’el ‘imo migibeton vayatsuru ‘al tirtsah. 
1_kings 16:18	vayhi kir’ot zimri ki nilkedah ha‘ir vayawo ’el ’armon bet hamelekh vayisrof ‘alav ’et bet melekh ba’esh vayamot. 
1_kings 16:19	‘al khatato khatotav ’asher khata la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lalekhet bederekh yarawe‘am uwekhatato ’asher ‘asah lehakhati ’et yisra’el. 
1_kings 16:20	veyeter diwrei zimri veqishro ’asher qashar halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
1_kings 16:21	’az yeikhaleq ha‘am yisra’el lakheitsi khatsi ha‘am hayah ’akharei tiwni wen ginat lehamlikho vehakhatsi ’akharei ‘ameri. 
1_kings 16:22	vayekhezaq ha‘am ’asher ’akharei ‘ameri ’et ha‘am ’asher ’akharei tiwni wen ginat vayamat tiwni vayimlokh ‘ameri. 
1_kings 16:23	bishnat sheloshim ve’akhat shanah le’asa melekh yehudah malakh ‘ameri ‘al yisra’el shetem ‘esreh shanah betirtsah malakh shesh shanim. 
1_kings 16:24	vayiqen ’et hahar shomeron mei’et shemer bekhikerayim kasef vayiwen ’et hahar vayiqra ’et shem ha‘ir ’asher banah ‘al shem shemer ’adonei hahar shomeron. 
1_kings 16:25	vaya‘aseh ‘ameri hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayara‘ mikol ’asher lefanav. 
1_kings 16:26	vayeilekh bekhal derekh yarawe‘am ben newat uwekhatotav uwekhatato ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el lehakh‘is ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’el behawleihem 
1_kings 16:27	veyeter diwrei ‘ameri ’asher ‘asah ugewurato ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
1_kings 16:28	vayishkaw ‘ameri ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer beshomeron vayimlokh ’akh’aw beno takhtav. 
1_kings 16:29	ve’akh’aw ben ‘ameri malakh ‘al yisra’el bishnat sheloshim ushemoneh shanah le’asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh ’akh’aw ben ‘ameri ‘al yisra’el beshomeron ‘esrim ushetayim shanah. 
1_kings 16:30	vaya‘as ’akh’aw ben ‘ameri hara‘ be‘einei yhoh mikol ’asher lefanav. 
1_kings 16:31	vayhi hanaqel lekhto bekhatot yarawe‘am ben newat vayiqakh ’ishah ’et ’izewel bat ’etba‘al melekh tsidonim vayeilekh vaya‘awod ’et haba‘al vayishtakhu lo. 
1_kings 16:32	vayaqem mizbeiakh laba‘al bet haba‘al ’asher banah beshomeron. 
1_kings 16:33	vaya‘as ’akh’aw ’et ha’asheirah vayosef ’akh’aw la‘asot lehakh‘is ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’el mikol malkhei yisra’el ’asher hayu lefanav. 
1_kings 16:34	beyamav banah khi’el bet ha’eli ’et yerikhoh ba’awiram bekhoro yisedah uwisgiw uwisguw tse‘iro hitsiw delateha kidwar yhoh ’asher diber beyad yehoshua‘ bin nun. 
1_kings 17:1	vayomer ’eiliyahu hatishbi mitoshawei gil‘ad ’el ’akh’aw khai yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher ‘amadti lefanav ’im yihyeh hashanim ha’eleh tal umatar ki ’im lefi dewari. 
1_kings 17:2	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilav leimor. 
1_kings 17:3	lekh mizeh ufanita lekha qeidemah venistarta benakhal kerit ’asher ‘al penei hayarden. 
1_kings 17:4	vehayah meihanakhal tishteh ve’et ha‘orewim tsiviti lekhalkelkha sham. 
1_kings 17:5	vayeilekh vaya‘as kidwar yhoh vayeilekh vayeishew benakhal kerit ’asher ‘al penei hayarden. 
1_kings 17:6	veha‘orewim mewi’im lo lekhem uwasar baboqer velekhem uwasar ba‘arew umin hanakhal yishteh. 
1_kings 17:7	vayhi miqets yamim vayiwash hanakhal ki lo hayah geshem ba’arets. 
1_kings 17:8	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilav leimor. 
1_kings 17:9	qum lekh tsarefatah ’asher letsidon veyashawta sham hineh tsiviti sham ’ishah ’almanah lekhalkelekha. 
1_kings 17:10	vayaqam vayeilekh tsarefatah vayawo ’el petakh ha‘ir vehineh sham ’ishah ’almanah meqosheshet ‘eitsim vayiqra ’eileha vayomar qekhi na li me‘at mayim bakeli ve’eshteh. 
1_kings 17:11	vateilekh laqakhat vayiqra ’eileha vayomar liqkhi na li pat lekhem beyadekh. 
1_kings 17:12	vatomer khai yhoh ’elohekha ’im yesh li ma‘og ki ’im melo khaf qemakh bakad ume‘at shemen batsapakhat vehini meqosheshet shenayim ‘eitsim uwati va‘asitihu li veliwni va’akhalnuhu vamatenu. 
1_kings 17:13	vayomer ’eileha ’eiliyahu ’al tire’i bo’i ‘asi khidwarekh ’akh ‘asi li misham ‘ugah qetanah warishonah vehotset li velakh veliwnekh ta‘asi ba’akharonah. 
1_kings 17:14	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el kad haqemakh lo tikhlah vetsapakhat hashemen lo tekhsar ‘ad yom titen tet hashem geshem ‘al penei ha’adamah. 
1_kings 17:15	vateilekh vata‘aseh kidwar ’eiliyahu vatokhal hu vahi hi vahu uweitah yamim. 
1_kings 17:16	kad haqemakh lo khalatah vetsapakhat hashemen lo khaser kidwar yhoh ’asher diber beyad ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 17:17	vayhi ’akhar hadewarim ha’eleh khalah ben ha’ishah ba‘alat habayit vayhi khaleyo khazaq me’od ‘ad ’asher lo notrah bo neshamah. 
1_kings 17:18	vatomer ’el ’eiliyahu mah li valakh ’ish ha’elohim bata ’eilai lehazkir ’et ‘avoni ulehamit ’et beni. 
1_kings 17:19	vayomer ’eileha teni li ’et benekh vayiqakheihu meikheiqah vaya‘aleihu ’el ha‘aliyah ’asher hu yoshew sham vayashkiweihu ‘al mitato. 
1_kings 17:20	vayiqra ’el yhoh vayomar yhoh ’elohai hagam ‘al ha’almanah ’asher ’ani mitgorer ‘imah harei‘ota lehamit ’et benah. 
1_kings 17:21	vayitmoded ‘al hayeled shalosh pe‘amim vayiqra ’el yhoh vayomar yhoh ’elohai tashaw na nefesh hayeled hazeh ‘al qirbo. 
1_kings 17:22	vayishma‘ yhoh beqol ’eiliyahu vatashaw nefesh hayeled ‘al qirbo vayekhi. 
1_kings 17:23	vayiqakh ’eiliyahu ’et hayeled vayorideihu min ha‘aliyah habaytah vayiteneihu le’imo vayomer ’eiliyahu re’i khai benekh. 
1_kings 17:24	vatomer ha’ishah ’el ’eiliyahu ‘atah zeh yada‘ti ki ’ish ’elohim ’atah udewar yhoh befikha ’emet. 
1_kings 18:1	vayhi yamim rabim udewar yhoh hayah ’el ’eiliyahu bashanah hashelishit leimor lekh heira’eh ’el ’akh’aw ve’etenah matar ‘al penei ha’adamah. 
1_kings 18:2	vayeilekh ’eiliyahu leheira’ot ’el ’akh’aw vehara‘aw khazaq beshomeron. 
1_kings 18:3	vayiqra ’akh’aw ’el ‘owadyahu ’asher ‘al habayit ve‘owadyahu hayah yarei ’et yhoh me’od. 
1_kings 18:4	vayhi behakhrit ’izewel ’et newi’ei yhoh vayiqakh ‘owadyahu mei’ah newi’im vayakhbi’em khamishim ’ish bame‘arah vekhilkelam lekhem vamayim. 
1_kings 18:5	vayomer ’akh’aw ’el ‘owadyahu lekh ba’arets ’el kal ma‘yenei hamayim ve’el kal hanekhalim ’ulai nimtsa khatsir unekhayeh sus vafered velo nakhrit meihabeheimah. 
1_kings 18:6	vaykhalequ lahem ’et ha’arets la‘awar bah ’akh’aw halakh bederekh ’ekhad lewado ve‘owadyahu halakh bederekh ’ekhad lewado. 
1_kings 18:7	vayhi ‘owadyahu baderekh vehineh ’eiliyahu liqrato vayakireihu vayipol ‘al panav vayomer ha’atah zeh ’adoni ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 18:8	vayomer lo ’ani lekh ’emor ladonekha hineh ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 18:9	vayomer meh khatati ki ’atah noten ’et ‘awdekha beyad ’akh’aw lahamiteini. 
1_kings 18:10	khai yhoh ’elohekha ’im yesh go umamlakhah ’asher lo shalakh ’adoni sham lewaqeshkha ve’ameru ’ayin vehishbia‘ ’et hamamlakhah ve’et hago ki lo yimtsa’ekah. 
1_kings 18:11	ve‘atah ’atah ’omer lekh ’emor ladonekha hineh ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 18:12	vehayah ’ani ’eilekh mei’itakh veruakh yhoh yisa’akha ‘al ’asher lo ’eida‘ uwati lehagid le’akh’aw velo yimtsa’akha vaharagani ve‘awdekha yarei ’et yhoh mine‘urai. 
1_kings 18:13	halo hugad ladoni ’et ’asher ‘asiti baharog ’izewel ’et newi’ei yhoh va’akhbi minewi’ei yhoh mei’ah ’ish khamishim khamishim ’ish bame‘arah va’akhalkelem lekhem vamayim. 
1_kings 18:14	ve‘atah ’atah ’omer lekh ’emor ladonekha hineh ’eiliyahu vaharagani. 
1_kings 18:15	vayomer ’eiliyahu khai yhoh tsewa’ot ’asher ‘amadti lefanav ki hayom ’eira’eh ’eilav.
