1_kings 18:16	vayeilekh ‘owadyahu liqrat ’akh’aw vayaged lo vayeilekh ’akh’aw liqrat ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 18:17	vayhi kir’ot ’akh’aw ’et ’eiliyahu vayomer ’akh’aw ’eilav ha’atah zeh ‘okher yisra’el. 
1_kings 18:18	vayomer lo ‘akharti ’et yisra’el ki ’im ’atah uwet ’awikha ba‘azawekhem ’et mitsvot yhoh vateilekh ’akharei habe‘alim. 
1_kings 18:19	ve‘atah shelakh qewots ’eilai ’et kal yisra’el ’el har hakarmel ve’et newi’ei haba‘al ’arba‘ mei’ot vakhamishim unewi’ei ha’asheirah ’arba‘ mei’ot ’okhelei shulkhan ’izawel. 
1_kings 18:20	vayishlakh ’akh’aw bekhal benei yisra’el vayiqbots ’et hanewi’im ’el har hakarmel. 
1_kings 18:21	vayigash ’eiliyahu ’el kal ha‘am vayomer ‘ad matai ’atem posekhim ‘al shetei hase‘ipim ’im yhoh ha’elohim lekhu ’akharav ve’im haba‘al lekhu ’akharav velo ‘anu ha‘am ’oto dawar. 
1_kings 18:22	vayomer ’eiliyahu ’el ha‘am ’ani notarti nawi yhoh lewadi unewi’ei haba‘al ’arba‘ mei’ot vakhamishim ’ish. 
1_kings 18:23	veyitenu lanu shenayim parim veyiwkharu lahem hapar ha’ekhad vinatekhuhu veyasimu ‘al ha‘eitsim ve’esh lo yasimu va’ani ’e‘eseh ’et hapar ha’ekhad venatati ‘al ha‘eitsim ve’esh lo ’asim. 
1_kings 18:24	uqeratem beshem ’eloheikhem va’ani ’eqra weshem yhoh vehayah ha’elohim ’asher ya‘aneh wa’esh hu ha’elohim vaya‘an kal ha‘am vayomeru tow hadawar. 
1_kings 18:25	vayomer ’eiliyahu linwi’ei haba‘al bakharu lakhem hapar ha’ekhad va‘asu rishonah ki ’atem harabim veqir’u beshem ’eloheikhem ve’esh lo tasimu. 
1_kings 18:26	vayiqkhu ’et hapar ’asher natan lahem vaya‘asu vayiqre’u weshem haba‘al meihaboqer ve‘ad hatsahorayim leimor haba‘al ‘aneinu ve’en qol ve’en ‘oneh vayfasekhu ‘al hamizbeiakh ’asher ‘asah. 
1_kings 18:27	vayhi watsahorayim vayhatel bahem ’eiliyahu vayomer qir’u weqol gadol ki ’elohim hu ki siakh vekhi sig lo vekhi derekh lo ’ulai yashen hu veyiqats. 
1_kings 18:28	vayiqre’u beqol gadol vayitgodedu kemishpatam bakharawot uwaremakhim ‘ad shefakh dam ‘aleihem. 
1_kings 18:29	vayhi ka‘awor hatsahorayim vayitnabe’u ‘ad la‘alot haminkhah ve’en qol ve’en ‘oneh ve’en qashew. 
1_kings 18:30	vayomer ’eiliyahu lekhal ha‘am geshu ’eilai vayigeshu khal ha‘am ’eilav vayrapei ’et mizbakh yhoh heharus. 
1_kings 18:31	vayiqakh ’eiliyahu shetem ‘esreh ’awanim kemispar shiwtei wenei ya‘aqow ’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’eilav leimor yisra’el yihyeh shemekha. 
1_kings 18:32	vayiwneh ’et ha’awanim mizbeiakh beshem yhoh vaya‘as te‘alah kewet satayim zera‘ sawiw lamizbeiakh. 
1_kings 18:33	vaya‘arokh ’et ha‘eitsim vaynatakh ’et hapar vayasem ‘al ha‘eitsim. 
1_kings 18:34	vayomer mil’u ’arba‘ah khadim mayim veyitsqu ‘al ha‘olah ve‘al ha‘eitsim vayomer shenu vayishnu vayomer shaleishu vayshaleishu. 
1_kings 18:35	vayeilekhu hamayim sawiw lamizbeiakh vegam ’et hate‘alah milei mayim. 
1_kings 18:36	vayhi ba‘alot haminkhah vayigash ’eiliyahu hanawi vayomar yhoh ’elohei ’awraham yitskhaq veyisra’el hayom yivada‘ ki ’atah ’elohim beyisra’el va’ani ‘awdekha uwediwreikha uwidwarekha ‘asiti ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh. 
1_kings 18:37	‘aneini yhoh ‘aneini veyeide‘u ha‘am hazeh ki ’atah yhoh ha’elohim ve’atah hasibota ’et libam ’akhoranit. 
1_kings 18:38	vatipol ’esh yhoh vatokhal ’et ha‘olah ve’et ha‘eitsim ve’et ha’awanim ve’et he‘afar ve’et hamayim ’asher bate‘alah likheikhah. 
1_kings 18:39	vayar kal ha‘am vayipelu ‘al peneihem vayomeru yhoh hu ha’elohim yhoh hu ha’elohim. 
1_kings 18:40	vayomer ’eiliyahu lahem tifsu ’et newi’ei haba‘al ’ish ’al yimalet meihem vayitpesum vayoridem ’eiliyahu ’el nakhal qishon vayishkhatem sham. 
1_kings 18:41	vayomer ’eiliyahu le’akh’aw ‘aleh ’ekhol usheteh ki qol hamon hagashem. 
1_kings 18:42	vaya‘aleh ’akh’aw le’ekhol velishtot ve’eiliyahu ‘alah ’el rosh hakarmel vayighar ’artsah vayasem panav ben berakho birkav. 
1_kings 18:43	vayomer ’el na‘aro ‘aleh na habet derekh yam vaya‘al vayabet vayomer ’en me’umah vayomer shuw shewa‘ pe‘amim. 
1_kings 18:44	vayhi bashewi‘it vayomer hineh ‘aw qetanah kekhaf ’ish ‘olah miyam vayomer ‘aleh ’emor ’el ’akh’aw ’esor vared velo ya‘atsarekhah hagashem. 
1_kings 18:45	vayhi ‘ad koh ve‘ad koh vehashamayim hitqaderu ‘awim veruakh vayhi geshem gadol vayirkaw ’akh’aw vayeilekh yizre‘elah. 
1_kings 18:46	veyad yhoh hayetah ’el ’eiliyahu vayshanes matenav vayarats lifnei ’akh’aw ‘ad bo’akhah yizre‘elah. 
1_kings 19:1	vayaged ’akh’aw le’izewel ’et kal ’asher ‘asah ’eiliyahu ve’et kal ’asher harag ’et kal hanewi’im bekharew. 
1_kings 19:2	vatishlakh ’izewel mal’akh ’el ’eiliyahu leimor koh ya‘asun ’elohim vekhoh yosifun ki kha‘et makhar ’asim ’et nafshekha kenefesh ’akhad meihem. 
1_kings 19:3	vayar vayaqam vayeilekh ’el nafsho vayawo be’er shewa‘ ’asher lihudah vayanakh ’et na‘aro sham. 
1_kings 19:4	vehu halakh bamidbar derekh yom vayawo vayeishew takhat rotem ’ekhat ’ekhad vayish’al ’et nafsho lamut vayomer raw ‘atah yhoh qakh nafshi ki lo tow ’anokhi mei’awotai. 
1_kings 19:5	vayishkaw vayishan takhat rotem ’ekhad vehineh zeh mal’akh nogeia‘ bo vayomer lo qum ’ekhol. 
1_kings 19:6	vayabet vehineh mera’ashotav ‘ugat retsafim vetsapakhat mayim vayokhal vayeishet vayashaw vayishkaw. 
1_kings 19:7	vayashaw mal’akh yhoh sheinit vayiga‘ bo vayomer qum ’ekhol ki raw mimekha hadarekh. 
1_kings 19:8	vayaqam vayokhal vayishteh vayeilekh bekhoakh ha’akhilah hahi ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im laylah ‘ad har ha’elohim khorew. 
1_kings 19:9	vayawo sham ’el hame‘arah vayalen sham vehineh dewar yhoh ’eilav vayomer lo mah lekha foh ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 19:10	vayomer qano qineiti yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot ki ‘azewu weritekha benei yisra’el ’et mizbekhotekha harasu ve’et newi’ekha haregu wekharew va’ivater ’ani lewadi vaywaqshu ’et nafshi leqakhtah. 
1_kings 19:11	vayomer tsei ve‘amadta wahar lifnei yhoh vehineh yhoh ‘ower veruakh gedolah vekhazaq mefareq harim umeshaber sela‘im lifnei yhoh lo waruakh yhoh ve’akhar haruakh ra‘ash lo wara‘ash yhoh. 
1_kings 19:12	ve’akhar hara‘ash ’esh lo wa’esh yhoh ve’akhar ha’esh qol demamah daqah. 
1_kings 19:13	vayhi kishmoa‘ ’eiliyahu vayalet panav be’adarto vayeitsei vaya‘amod petakh hame‘arah vehineh ’eilav qol vayomer mah lekha foh ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 19:14	vayomer qano qineiti yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot ki ‘azewu weritekha benei yisra’el ’et mizbekhotekha harasu ve’et newi’ekha haregu wekharew va’ivater ’ani lewadi vaywaqshu ’et nafshi leqakhtah. 
1_kings 19:15	vayomer yhoh ’eilav lekh shuw ledarkekha midbarah damaseq uwata umashakhta ’et khaza’el lemelekh ‘al ’aram. 
1_kings 19:16	ve’et yeihu wen nimshi timshakh lemelekh ‘al yisra’el ve’et ’elisha‘ ben shafat mei’awel mekholah timshakh lenawi takhtekha. 
1_kings 19:17	vehayah hanimlat meikherew khaza’el yamit yeihu vehanimlat meikherew yeihu yamit ’elisha‘. 
1_kings 19:18	vehish’arti weyisra’el shiw‘at ’alafim kal habirkayim ’asher lo khare‘u laba‘al vekhal hapeh ’asher lo nashaq lo. 
1_kings 19:19	vayeilekh misham vayimtsa ’et ’elisha‘ ben shafat vehu khoresh shenem ‘asar tsemadim lefanav vehu bishnem he‘asar vaya‘awor ’eiliyahu ’eilav vayashlekh ’adarto ’eilav. 
1_kings 19:20	vaya‘azow ’et habaqar vayarats ’akharei ’eiliyahu vayomer ’esheqah na le’awi ule’imi ve’eilekhah ’akharekha vayomer lo lekh shuw ki meh ‘asiti lakh. 
1_kings 19:21	vayashaw mei’akharav vayiqakh ’et tsemed habaqar vayizbakheihu uwikhli habaqar bishelam habasar vayiten la‘am vayokheilu vayaqam vayeilekh ’akharei ’eiliyahu vayshareteihu. 
1_kings 20:1	uwen hadad melekh ’aram qawats ’et kal kheilo usheloshim ushenayim melekh ’ito vesus varakhew vaya‘al vayatsar ‘al shomeron vayilakhem bah. 
1_kings 20:2	vayishlakh mal’akhim ’el ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el ha‘irah. 
1_kings 20:3	vayomer lo koh ’amar ben hadad kaspekha uzehawekha li hu venashekha uwanekha hatowim li hem. 
1_kings 20:4	vaya‘an melekh yisra’el vayomer kidwarekha ’adoni hamelekh lekha ’ani vekhal ’asher li. 
1_kings 20:5	vayashuwu hamal’akhim vayomeru koh ’amar ben hadad leimor ki shalakhti ’eilekha leimor kaspekha uzehawekha venashekha uwanekha li titen. 
1_kings 20:6	ki ’im ka‘et makhar ’eshlakh ’et ‘awadai ’eilekha vekhipesu ’et beitekha ve’et batei ‘awadekha vehayah kal makhmad ‘einekha yasimu weyadam velaqakhu. 
1_kings 20:7	vayiqra melekh yisra’el lekhal ziqnei ha’arets vayomer de‘u na ure’u ki ra‘ah zeh mewaqesh ki shalakh ’eilai lenashai ulewanai ulekhaspi velizhawi velo mana‘ti mimenu. 
1_kings 20:8	vayomeru ’eilav kal hazeqeinim vekhal ha‘am ’al tishma‘ velo toweh. 
1_kings 20:9	vayomer lemal’akhei wen hadad ’imru ladoni hamelekh kol ’asher shalakhta ’el ‘awdekha warishonah ’e‘eseh vehadawar hazeh lo ’ukhal la‘asot vayeilekhu hamal’akhim vayshiwuhu dawar. 
1_kings 20:10	vayishlakh ’eilav ben hadad vayomer koh ya‘asun li ’elohim vekhoh yosifu ’im yispoq ‘afar shomeron lish‘alim lekhal ha‘am ’asher beraglai. 
1_kings 20:11	vaya‘an melekh yisra’el vayomer daberu ’al yithalel khoger kimfateiakh. 
1_kings 20:12	vayhi kishmoa‘ ’et hadawar hazeh vehu shoteh hu vehamelakhim basukot vayomer ’el ‘awadav simu vayasimu ‘al ha‘ir. 
1_kings 20:13	vehineh nawi ’ekhad nigash ’el ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el vayomer koh ’amar yhoh hera’ita ’et kal hehamon hagadol hazeh hini noteno weyadekha hayom veyada‘ta ki ’ani yhoh. 
1_kings 20:14	vayomer ’akh’aw bemi vayomer koh ’amar yhoh bena‘arei sarei hamedinot vayomer mi ye’sor hamilkhamah vayomer ’atah. 
1_kings 20:15	vayifqod ’et na‘arei sarei hamedinot vayihyu matayim shenayim usheloshim ve’akhareihem paqad ’et kal ha‘am kal benei yisra’el shiw‘at ’alafim. 
1_kings 20:16	vayeitse’u batsahorayim uwen hadad shoteh shikor basukot hu vehamelakhim sheloshim ushenayim melekh ‘ozer ’oto. 
1_kings 20:17	vayeitse’u na‘arei sarei hamedinot barishonah vayishlakh ben hadad vayagidu lo leimor ’anashim yatse’u mishomeron. 
1_kings 20:18	vayomer ’im leshalom yatsa’u tifsum khayim ve’im lemilkhamah yatsa’u khayim tifsum. 
1_kings 20:19	ve’eleh yatse’u min ha‘ir na‘arei sarei hamedinot vehakhayil ’asher ’akhareihem. 
1_kings 20:20	vayaku ’ish ’isho vayanusu ’aram vayirdefem yisra’el vayimalet ben hadad melekh ’aram ‘al sus ufarashim. 
1_kings 20:21	vayeitsei melekh yisra’el vayakh ’et hasus ve’et harakhew vehikah wa’aram makah gedolah. 
1_kings 20:22	vayigash hanawi ’el melekh yisra’el vayomer lo lekh hitkhazaq veda‘ ure’eh ’et ’asher ta‘aseh ki litshuwat hashanah melekh ’aram ‘oleh ‘alekha. 
1_kings 20:23	ve‘awdei melekh ’aram ’ameru ’eilav ’elohei harim ’eloheihem ‘al ken khazequ mimenu ve’ulam nilakhem ’itam bamishor ’im lo nekhezaq meihem. 
1_kings 20:24	ve’et hadawar hazeh ‘aseh haser hamelakhim ’ish mimeqomo vesim pakhot takhteihem. 
1_kings 20:25	ve’atah timneh lekha khayil kakhayil hanofel mei’otakh vesus kasus verekhew karekhew venilakhamah ’otam bamishor ’im lo nekhezaq meihem vayishma‘ leqolam vaya‘as ken. 
1_kings 20:26	vayhi litshuwat hashanah vayifqod ben hadad ’et ’aram vaya‘al ’afeiqah lamilkhamah ‘im yisra’el. 
1_kings 20:27	uwenei yisra’el hatepaqedu vekhalekelu vayeilekhu liqratam vayakhanu wenei yisra’el negdam kishnei khasifei ‘izim va’aram mil’u ’et ha’arets. 
1_kings 20:28	vayigash ’ish ha’elohim vayomer ’el melekh yisra’el vayomer koh ’amar yhoh ya‘an ’asher ’ameru ’aram ’elohei harim yhoh velo ’elohei ‘amaqim hu venatati ’et kal hehamon hagadol hazeh beyadekha vida‘tem ki ’ani yhoh. 
1_kings 20:29	vayakhanu ’eleh nokhakh ’eleh shiw‘at yamim vayhi bayom hashewi‘i vatiqraw hamilkhamah vayaku wenei yisra’el ’et ’aram mei’ah ’elef ragli beyom ’ekhad. 
1_kings 20:30	vayanusu hanotarim ’afeiqah ’el ha‘ir vatipol hakhomah ‘al ‘esrim veshiw‘ah ’elef ’ish hanotarim uwen hadad nas vayawo ’el ha‘ir kheder bekhader. 
1_kings 20:31	vayomeru ’eilav ‘awadav hineh na shama‘nu ki malkhei bet yisra’el ki malkhei khesed hem nasimah na saqim bemateneinu vakhawalim berosheinu veneitsei ’el melekh yisra’el ’ulai yekhayeh ’et nafshekha. 
1_kings 20:32	vayakhgeru saqim bemateneihem vakhawalim berasheihem vayawo’u ’el melekh yisra’el vayomeru ‘awdekha wen hadad ’amar tekhi na nafshi vayomer ha‘odenu khai ’akhi hu. 
1_kings 20:33	veha’anashim yenakhashu vaymaharu vayakhletu hamimenu vayomeru ’akhikha wen hadad vayomer bo’u qakhuhu vayeitsei ’eilav ben hadad vaya‘aleihu ‘al hamerkawah. 
1_kings 20:34	vayomer ’eilav he‘arim ’asher laqakh ’awi mei’et ’awikha ’ashiw vekhutsot tasim lekha wedameseq ka’asher sam ’awi beshomeron va’ani baberit ’ashalekheka vayikhrat lo werit vayshalekheihu. 
1_kings 20:35	ve’ish ’ekhad mibenei hanewi’im ’amar ’el rei‘eihu bidwar yhoh hakeini na vayma’en ha’ish lehakoto. 
1_kings 20:36	vayomer lo ya‘an ’asher lo shama‘ta beqol yhoh hinekha holekh mei’iti vehikekha ha’aryeh vayeilekh mei’etslo vayimtsa’eihu ha’aryeh vayakeihu. 
1_kings 20:37	vayimtsa ’ish ’akher vayomer hakeini na vayakeihu ha’ish hakeh ufatsoa‘. 
1_kings 20:38	vayeilekh hanawi vaya‘amod lamelekh ‘al hadarekh vayitkhapes ba’afer ‘al ‘einav. 
1_kings 20:39	vayhi hamelekh ‘ower vehu tsa‘aq ’el hamelekh vayomer ‘awdekha yatsa weqerew hamilkhamah vehineh ’ish sar vayawei ’eilai ’ish vayomer shemor ’et ha’ish hazeh ’im hipaqed yipaqed vehayetah nafshekha takhat nafsho ’o khikar kesef tishqol. 
1_kings 20:40	vayhi ‘awdekha ‘oseh henah vahenah vehu ’einenu vayomer ’eilav melekh yisra’el ken mishpatekha ’atah kharatseta. 
1_kings 20:41	vaymaher vayasar ’et ha’afer mei‘al mei‘alei ‘einav vayaker ’oto melekh yisra’el ki meihanewi’im hu. 
1_kings 20:42	vayomer ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh ya‘an shilakhta ’et ’ish khermi miyad vehayetah nafshekha takhat nafsho ve‘amekha takhat ‘amo. 
1_kings 20:43	vayeilekh melekh yisra’el ‘al beito sar veza‘ef vayawo shomeronah. 
1_kings 21:1	vayhi ’akhar hadewarim ha’eleh kerem hayah lenawot hayizre‘eili ’asher beyizre‘el ’eitsel heikhal ’akh’aw melekh shomeron. 
1_kings 21:2	vaydaber ’akh’aw ’el nawot leimor tenah li ’et karmekha vihi li legan yaraq ki hu qarow ’eitsel beiti ve’etenah lekha takhtav kerem tow mimenu ’im tow be‘einekha ’etenah lekha khesef mekhir zeh. 
1_kings 21:3	vayomer nawot ’el ’akh’aw khalilah li yhoh mititi ’et nakhalat ’awotai lakh. 
1_kings 21:4	vayawo ’akh’aw ’el beito sar veza‘ef ‘al hadawar ’asher diber ’eilav nawot hayizre‘eili vayomer lo ’eten lekha ’et nakhalat ’awotai vayishkaw ‘al mitato vayasew ’et panav velo ’akhal lakhem. 
1_kings 21:5	vatawo ’eilav ’izewel ’ishto vatedaber ’eilav mah zeh rukhakha sarah ve’einekha ’okhel lakhem. 
1_kings 21:6	vaydaber ’eileha ki ’adaber ’el nawot hayizre‘eili va’omar lo tenah li ’et karmekha bekhesef ’o ’im khafets ’atah ’etenah lekha kherem takhtav vayomer lo ’eten lekha ’et karmi. 
1_kings 21:7	vatomer ’eilav ’izewel ’ishto ’atah ‘atah ta‘aseh melukhah ‘al yisra’el qum ’ekhal lekhem veyitaw libekha ’ani ’eten lekha ’et kerem nawot hayizre‘eili. 
1_kings 21:8	vatikhtow sefarim beshem ’akh’aw vatakhtom bekhotamo vatishlakh hasfarim sefarim ’el hazqeinim ve’el hakhorim ’asher be‘iro hayoshewim ’et nawot. 
1_kings 21:9	vatikhtow basefarim leimor qir’u tsom vehoshiwu ’et nawot berosh ha‘am. 
1_kings 21:10	vehoshiwu shenayim ’anashim benei weliya‘al negdo vi‘iduhu leimor beirakhta ’elohim vamelekh vehotsi’uhu vesiqluhu veyamot. 
1_kings 21:11	vaya‘asu ’anshei ‘iro hazeqeinim vehakhorim ’asher hayoshewim be‘iro ka’asher shalekhah ’aleihem ’izawel ka’asher katuw basefarim ’asher shalekhah ’aleihem. 
1_kings 21:12	qare’u tsom vehoshiwu ’et nawot berosh ha‘am. 
1_kings 21:13	vayawo’u shenei ha’anashim benei weliya‘al vayeishewu negdo vai‘iduhu ’anshei habeliya‘al ’et nawot neged ha‘am leimor beirakh nawot ’elohim vamelekh vayotsi’uhu mikhuts la‘ir vayisqeluhu wa’awanim vayamot. 
1_kings 21:14	vayishlekhu ’el ’izewel leimor suqal nawot vayamot. 
1_kings 21:15	vayhi kishmoa‘ ’izewel ki suqal nawot vayamot vatomer ’izewel ’el ’akh’aw qum resh ’et kerem nawot hayizre‘eili ’asher mei’en latet lekha wekhesef ki ’en nawot khai ki met. 
1_kings 21:16	vayhi kishmoa‘ ’akh’aw ki met nawot vayaqam ’akh’aw laredet ’el kerem nawot hayizre‘eili lerishto. 
1_kings 21:17	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el ’eiliyahu hatishbi leimor. 
1_kings 21:18	qum red liqrat ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el ’asher beshomeron hineh bekherem nawot ’asher yarad sham lerishto. 
1_kings 21:19	vedibarta ’eilav leimor koh ’amar yhoh haratsakhta vegam yarasheta vedibarta ’eilav leimor koh ’amar yhoh bimqom ’asher laqequ hakelawim ’et dam nawot yaloqu hakelawim ’et damekha gam ’atah. 
1_kings 21:20	vayomer ’akh’aw ’el ’eiliyahu hamtsatani ’oyewi vayomer matsati ya‘an hitmakerkha la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
1_kings 21:21	hini meiwi meiwi ’eilekha ra‘ah uwi‘arti ’akharekha vehikhrati le’akh’aw mashtin beqir ve‘atsur ve‘azuw beyisra’el. 
1_kings 21:22	venatati ’et beitekha kewet yarawe‘am ben newat ukhewet ba‘sha wen ’akhiyah ’el haka‘as ’asher hikh‘asta vatakhati ’et yisra’el. 
1_kings 21:23	vegam le’izewel diber yhoh leimor hakelawim yokhelu ’et ’izewel bekhel yizre‘el. 
1_kings 21:24	hamet le’akh’aw ba‘ir yokhelu hakelawim vehamet basadeh yokhelu ‘of hashamayim. 
1_kings 21:25	raq lo hayah khe’akh’aw ’asher hitmaker la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ’asher heisatah ’oto ’izewel ’ishto. 
1_kings 21:26	vayat‘ew me’od lalekhet ’akharei hagilulim kekhol ’asher ‘asu ha’emori ’asher horish yhoh mipenei benei yisra’el. 
1_kings 21:27	vayhi khishmoa‘ ’akh’aw ’et hadewarim ha’eleh vayiqra‘ begadav vayasem saq ‘al besaro vayatsom vayishkaw basaq vayhalekh ’at. 
1_kings 21:28	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el ’eiliyahu hatishbi leimor. 
1_kings 21:29	hara’ita ki nikhna‘ ’akh’aw milefanai ya‘an ki nikhna‘ mipanai lo ’awi ’awi hara‘ah beyamav bimei weno ’awi hara‘ah ‘al beito. 
1_kings 22:1	vayeishewu shalosh shanim ’en milkhamah ben ’aram uwen yisra’el. 
1_kings 22:2	vayhi bashanah hashelishit vayeired yehoshafat melekh yehudah ’el melekh yisra’el. 
1_kings 22:3	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el ‘awadav hayda‘tem ki lanu ramot gil‘ad va’anakhnu makhshim miqakhat ’otah miyad melekh ’aram. 
1_kings 22:4	vayomer ’el yehoshafat hateilekh ’iti lamilkhamah ramot gil‘ad vayomer yehoshafat ’el melekh yisra’el kamoni khamokha ke‘ami khe‘amekha kesusai kesusekha. 
1_kings 22:5	vayomer yehoshafat ’el melekh yisra’el derash na khayom ’et dewar yhoh. 
1_kings 22:6	vayiqbots melekh yisra’el ’et hanewi’im ke’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish vayomer ’aleihem ha’eilekh ‘al ramot gil‘ad lamilkhamah ’im ’ekhdal vayomeru ‘aleh veyiten ’adonai beyad hamelekh. 
1_kings 22:7	vayomer yehoshafat ha’en poh nawi yhoh ‘od venidreshah mei’oto. 
1_kings 22:8	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat ‘od ’ish ’ekhad lidrosh ’et yhoh mei’oto va’ani seneitiv ki lo yitnabei ‘alai tow ki ’im ra‘ mikhayehu ben yimlah vayomer yehoshafat ’al yomar hamelekh ken. 
1_kings 22:9	vayiqra melekh yisra’el ’el saris ’ekhad vayomer maharah mikhayehu wen yimlah. 
1_kings 22:10	umelekh yisra’el vihoshafat melekh yehudah yoshewim ’ish ‘al kis’o melubashim begadim begoren petakh sha‘ar shomeron vekhal hanewi’im mitnabe’im lifneihem. 
1_kings 22:11	vaya‘as lo tsidqiyah wen kena‘anah qarnei warzel vayomer koh ’amar yhoh be’eleh tenagakh ’et ’aram ‘ad kalotam. 
1_kings 22:12	vekhal hanewi’im nibe’im ken leimor ‘aleh ramot gil‘ad vehatslakh venatan yhoh beyad hamelekh. 
1_kings 22:13	vehamal’akh ’asher halakh liqro mikhayehu diber ’eilav leimor hineh na diwrei hanewi’im peh ’ekhad tow ’el hamelekh yehi na diwreikha dewarekha kidwar ’akhad meihem vedibarta tow. 
1_kings 22:14	vayomer mikhayehu khai yhoh ki ’et ’asher yomar yhoh ’eilai ’oto ’adaber. 
1_kings 22:15	vayawo ’el hamelekh vayomer hamelekh ’eilav mikhayehu haneilekh ’el ramot gil‘ad lamilkhamah ’im nekhdal vayomer ’eilav ‘aleh vehatslakh venatan yhoh beyad hamelekh. 
1_kings 22:16	vayomer ’eilav hamelekh ‘ad kameh fe‘amim ’ani mashbi‘ekha ’asher lo tedaber ’eilai raq ’emet beshem yhoh. 
1_kings 22:17	vayomer ra’iti ’et kal yisra’el nefotsim ’el heharim katson ’asher ’en lahem ro‘eh vayomer yhoh lo ’adonim la’eleh yashuwu ’ish leweito beshalom. 
1_kings 22:18	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat halo ’amarti ’eilekha lo yitnabei ‘alai tow ki ’im ra‘. 
1_kings 22:19	vayomer lakhen shema‘ dewar yhoh ra’iti ’et yhoh yoshew ‘al kis’o vekhal tsewa hashamayim ‘omed ‘alav mimino umisemolo. 
1_kings 22:20	vayomer yhoh mi yefateh ’et ’akh’aw veya‘al veyipol beramot gil‘ad vayomer zeh bekhoh vezeh ’omer bekhoh. 
1_kings 22:21	vayeitsei haruakh vaya‘amod lifnei yhoh vayomer ’ani ’afatenu vayomer yhoh ’eilav bamah. 
1_kings 22:22	vayomer ’eitsei vehayiti ruakh sheqer befi kal newi’av vayomer tefateh vegam tukhal tsei va‘aseh khen. 
1_kings 22:23	ve‘atah hineh natan yhoh ruakh sheqer befi kal newi’ekha ’eleh yhoh diber ‘alekha ra‘ah. 
1_kings 22:24	vayigash tsidqiyahu wen kena‘anah vayakeh ’et mikhayehu ‘al halekhi vayomer ’ei zeh ‘awar ruakh yhoh mei’iti ledaber ’otakh. 
1_kings 22:25	vayomer mikhayehu hinekha ro’eh bayom hahu ’asher tawo kheder bekheder leheikhaweh. 
1_kings 22:26	vayomer melekh yisra’el qakh ’et mikhayehu vahashiweihu ’el ’amon sar ha‘ir ve’el yo’ash ben hamelekh. 
1_kings 22:27	ve’amarta koh ’amar hamelekh simu ’et zeh bet hakele veha’akhiluhu lekhem lakhats umayim lakhats ‘ad bo’i weshalom. 
1_kings 22:28	vayomer mikhayehu ’im show tashuw beshalom lo diber yhoh bi vayomer shim‘u ‘amim kulam. 
1_kings 22:29	vaya‘al melekh yisra’el vhoshafat melekh yehudah ramot gil‘ad. 
1_kings 22:30	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat hitkhapes vawo wamilkhamah ve’atah lewash begadekha vayitkhapes melekh yisra’el vayawo bamilkhamah. 
1_kings 22:31	umelekh ’aram tsivah ’et sarei harekhew ’asher lo sheloshim ushenayim leimor lo tilakhamu ’et qaton ve’et gadol ki ’im ’et melekh yisra’el lewado. 
1_kings 22:32	vayhi kir’ot sarei harekhew ’et yehoshafat vehemah ’ameru ’akh melekh yisra’el hu vayasuru ‘alav lehilakhem vayiz‘aq yehoshafat. 
1_kings 22:33	vayhi kir’ot sarei harekhew ki lo melekh yisra’el hu vayashuwu mei’akharav. 
1_kings 22:34	ve’ish mashakh baqeshet letumo vayakeh ’et melekh yisra’el ben hadewaqim uwen hashiryan vayomer lerakawo hafokh yadekha vehotsi’eini min hamakhaneh ki hakholeiti. 
1_kings 22:35	vata‘aleh hamilkhamah bayom hahu vehamelekh hayah ma‘omad bamerkawah nokhakh ’aram vayamat ba‘erew vayitseq dam hamakah ’el kheq harakhew. 
1_kings 22:36	vaya‘awor harinah bamakhaneh kewo hashemesh leimor ’ish ’el ‘iro ve’ish ’el ’artso. 
1_kings 22:37	vayamat hamelekh vayawo shomeron vayiqberu ’et hamelekh beshomeron. 
1_kings 22:38	vayishtof ’et harekhew ‘al bereikhat shomeron vayaloqu hakelawim ’et damo vehazonot rakhatsu kidwar yhoh ’asher diber. 
1_kings 22:39	veyeter diwrei ’akh’aw vekhal ’asher ‘asah uwet hashen ’asher banah vekhal he‘arim ’asher banah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
1_kings 22:40	vayishkaw ’akh’aw ‘im ’awotav vayimlokh ’akhazyahu weno takhtav. 
1_kings 22:41	vihoshafat ben ’asa malakh ‘al yehudah bishnat ’arba‘ le’akh’aw melekh yisra’el. 
1_kings 22:42	yehoshafat ben sheloshim vekhamesh shanah bemalekho ve‘esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ‘azuwah bat shilkhi. 
1_kings 22:43	vayeilekh bekhal derekh ’asa ’awiv lo sar mimenu la‘asot hayashar be‘einei yhoh. ’akh habamot lo saru ‘od ha‘am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. 
1_kings 22:44	vayashlem yehoshafat ‘im melekh yisra’el. 
1_kings 22:45	veyeter diwrei yehoshafat ugewurato ’asher ‘asah va’asher nilkham halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
1_kings 22:46	veyeter haqadesh ’asher nish’ar bimei ’asa ’awiv bi‘er min ha’arets. 
1_kings 22:47	umelekh ’en be’edom nitsaw melekh. 
1_kings 22:48	yehoshafat ‘asar ‘asah ’oniyot tarshish lalekhet ’ofirah lazahaw velo halakh ki nishberah nishberu ’oniyot be‘etsyon gawer. 
1_kings 22:49	’az ’amar ’akhazyahu wen ’akh’aw ’el yehoshafat yeilekhu ‘awadai ‘im ‘awadekha ba’oniyot velo ’awah yehoshafat. 
1_kings 22:50	vayishkaw yehoshafat ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david ’awiv vayimlokh yehoram beno takhtav. 
1_kings 22:51	’akhazyahu wen ’akh’aw malakh ‘al yisra’el beshomeron bishnat shewa‘ ‘esreh lihoshafat melekh yehudah vayimlokh ‘al yisra’el shenatayim. 
1_kings 22:52	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayeilekh bederekh ’awiv uwederekh ’imo uwederekh yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
1_kings 22:53	vaya‘awod ’et haba‘al vayishtakhaveh lo vayakh‘es ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’el kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’awiv. 
2_kings 1:1	vayifsha‘ mo’aw beyisra’el ’akharei mot ’akh’aw. 
2_kings 1:2	vayipol ’akhazyah be‘ad hasewakhah ba‘aliyato ’asher beshomeron vayakhal vayishlakh mal’akhim vayomer ’aleihem lekhu dirshu bewa‘al zewuw ’elohei ‘eqron ’im ’ekhyeh meikholi zeh. 
2_kings 1:3	umal’akh yhoh diber ’el ’eiliyah hatishbi qum ‘aleh liqrat mal’akhei melekh shomeron vedaber ’aleihem hamibeli ’en ’elohim beyisra’el ’atem holekhim lidrosh bewa‘al zewuw ’elohei ‘eqron. 
2_kings 1:4	velakhen koh ’amar yhoh hamitah ’asher ‘alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut vayeilekh ’eiliyah. 
2_kings 1:5	vayashuwu hamal’akhim ’eilav vayomer ’aleihem mah zeh shawtem. 
2_kings 1:6	vayomeru ’eilav ’ish ‘alah liqrateinu vayomer ’eileinu lekhu shuwu ’el hamelekh ’asher shalakh ’etkhem vedibartem ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh hamibeli ’en ’elohim beyisra’el ’atah sholeiakh lidrosh bewa‘al zewuw ’elohei ‘eqron lakhen hamitah ’asher ‘alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut. 
2_kings 1:7	vaydaber ’aleihem meh mishpat ha’ish ’asher ‘alah liqratkhem vaydaber ’aleikhem ’et hadewarim ha’eleh. 
2_kings 1:8	vayomeru ’eilav ’ish ba‘al sei‘ar ve’eizor ‘or ’azur bematenav vayomar ’eiliyah hatishbi hu. 
2_kings 1:9	vayishlakh ’eilav sar khamishim vakhamishav vaya‘al ’eilav vehineh yoshew ‘al rosh hahar vaydaber ’eilav ’ish ha’elohim hamelekh diber reidah. 
2_kings 1:10	vaya‘aneh ’eiliyahu vaydaber ’el sar hakhamishim ve’im ’ish ’elohim ’ani teired ’esh min hashamayim vetokhal ’otekha ve’et khamishekha vateired ’esh min hashamayim vatokhal ’oto ve’et khamishav. 
2_kings 1:11	vayashaw vayishlakh ’eilav sar khamishim ’akher vakhamishav vaya‘an vaydaber ’eilav ’ish ha’elohim koh ’amar hamelekh meheirah reidah. 
2_kings 1:12	vaya‘an ’eiliyah vaydaber ’aleihem ’im ’ish ha’elohim ’ani teired ’esh min hashamayim vetokhal ’otekha ve’et khamishekha vateired ’esh ’elohim min hashamayim vatokhal ’oto ve’et khamishav. 
2_kings 1:13	vayashaw vayishlakh sar khamishim shelishim vakhamishav vaya‘al vayawo sar hakhamishim hashelishi vayikhra‘ ‘al birkav leneged ’eiliyahu vayitkhanen ’eilav vaydaber ’eilav ’ish ha’elohim tiqar na nafshi venefesh ‘awadekha ’eleh khamishim be‘einekha. 
2_kings 1:14	hineh yaredah ’esh min hashamayim vatokhal ’et shenei sarei hakhamishim harishonim ve’et khamisheihem ve‘atah tiqar nafshi be‘einekha. 
2_kings 1:15	vaydaber mal’akh yhoh ’el ’eiliyahu red ’oto ’al tira mipanav vayaqam vayeired ’oto ’el hamelekh. 
2_kings 1:16	vaydaber ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh ya‘an ’asher shalakhta mal’akhim lidrosh bewa‘al zewuw ’elohei ‘eqron hamibeli ’en ’elohim beyisra’el lidrosh bidwaro lakhen hamitah ’asher ‘alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut. 
2_kings 1:17	vayamat kidwar yhoh ’asher diber ’eiliyahu vayimlokh yehoram takhtav bishnat shetayim lihoram ben yehoshafat melekh yehudah ki lo hayah lo ben. 
2_kings 1:18	veyeter diwrei ’akhazyahu ’asher ‘asah halo hemah khetuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 2:1	vayhi beha‘alot yhoh ’et ’eiliyahu bas‘arah hashamayim vayeilekh ’eiliyahu ve’elisha‘ min hagilgal. 
2_kings 2:2	vayomer ’eiliyahu ’el ’elisha‘ shew na foh ki yhoh shelakhani ‘ad bet ’el vayomer ’elisha‘ khai yhoh vekhei nafshekha ’im ’e‘ezweka vayeiredu bet ’el. 
2_kings 2:3	vayeitse’u wenei hanewi’im ’asher bet ’el ’el ’elisha‘ vayomeru ’eilav hayada‘ta ki hayom yhoh loqeiakh ’et ’adonekha mei‘al roshekha vayomer gam ’ani yada‘ti hekheshu. 
2_kings 2:4	vayomer lo ’eiliyahu ’elisha‘ shew na foh ki yhoh shelakhani yerikho vayomer khai yhoh vekhei nafshekha ’im ’e‘ezweka vayawo’u yerikho. 
2_kings 2:5	vayigeshu wenei hanewi’im ’asher birikho ’el ’elisha‘ vayomeru ’eilav hayada‘ta ki hayom yhoh loqeiakh ’et ’adonekha mei‘al roshekha vayomer gam ’ani yada‘ti hekheshu. 
2_kings 2:6	vayomer lo ’eiliyahu shew na foh ki yhoh shelakhani hayardeinah vayomer khai yhoh vekhei nafshekha ’im ’e‘ezweka vayeilekhu sheneihem. 
2_kings 2:7	vakhamishim ’ish mibenei hanewi’im halekhu vaya‘amdu mineged meirakhoq usheneihem ‘amedu ‘al hayarden. 
2_kings 2:8	vayiqakh ’eiliyahu ’et ’adarto vayiglom vayakeh ’et hamayim vayeikhatsu henah vahenah vaya‘awru sheneihem bekharawah. 
2_kings 2:9	vayhi khe‘aweram ve’eiliyahu ’amar ’el ’elisha‘ she’al mah ’e‘eseh lakh beterem ’elaqakh mei‘imakh vayomer ’elisha‘ vihi na pi shenayim berukhakha ’eilai. 
2_kings 2:10	vayomer hiqshita lish’ol ’im tir’eh ’oti luqakh mei’itakh yehi lekha khen ve’im ’ayin lo yihyeh. 
2_kings 2:11	vayhi hemah holekhim halokh vedaber vehineh rekhew ’esh vesusei ’esh vayafridu ben sheneihem vaya‘al ’eiliyahu base‘arah hashamayim. 
2_kings 2:12	ve’elisha‘ ro’eh vehu metsa‘eq ’awi ’awi rekhew yisra’el ufarashav velo ra’ahu ‘od vayakhazeq biwgadav vayiqra‘em lishnayim qera‘im. 
2_kings 2:13	vayarem ’et ’aderet ’eiliyahu ’asher nafelah mei‘alav vayashaw vaya‘amod ‘al sefat hayarden. 
2_kings 2:14	vayiqakh ’et ’aderet ’eiliyahu ’asher nafelah mei‘alav vayakeh ’et hamayim vayomar ’ayeh yhoh ’elohei ’eiliyahu ’af hu vayakeh ’et hamayim vayeikhatsu henah vahenah vaya‘awor ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 2:15	vayir’uhu wenei hanewi’im ’asher birikho mineged vayomeru nakhah ruakh ’eiliyahu ‘al ’elisha‘ vayawo’u liqrato vayishtakhavu lo ’aretsah. 
2_kings 2:16	vayomeru ’eilav hineh na yesh ’et ‘awadekha khamishim ’anashim benei khayil yeilekhu na viwaqshu ’et ’adonekha pen nesa’o ruakh yhoh vayashlikheihu be’akhad heharim ’o be’akhat hageya’ot hagei’ayot vayomer lo tishlakhu. 
2_kings 2:17	vayiftseru wo ‘ad bosh vayomer shelakhu vayishlekhu khamishim ’ish vaywaqshu sheloshah yamim velo metsa’uhu. 
2_kings 2:18	vayashuwu ’eilav vehu yoshew birikho vayomer ’aleihem halo ’amarti ’aleikhem ’al teileikhu. 
2_kings 2:19	vayomeru ’anshei ha‘ir ’el ’elisha‘ hineh na moshaw ha‘ir tow ka’asher ’adoni ro’eh vehamayim ra‘im veha’arets meshakalet. 
2_kings 2:20	vayomer qekhu li tselokhit khadashah vesimu sham melakh vayiqkhu ’eilav. 
2_kings 2:21	vayeitsei ’el motsa hamayim vayashlekh sham melakh vayomer koh ’amar yhoh ripiti lamayim ha’eleh lo yihyeh misham ‘od mavet umeshakalet. 
2_kings 2:22	vayeirafu hamayim ‘ad hayom hazeh kidwar ’elisha‘ ’asher diber. 
2_kings 2:23	vaya‘al misham bet ’el vehu ‘oleh waderekh une‘arim qetanim yatse’u min ha‘ir vayitqalesu wo vayomeru lo ‘aleh qeireiakh ‘aleh qeireiakh. 
2_kings 2:24	vayifen ’akharav vayir’em vayqalem beshem yhoh vateitsenah shetayim dubim min haya‘ar vatewaqa‘nah meihem ’arba‘im ushenei yeladim. 
2_kings 2:25	vayeilekh misham ’el har hakarmel umisham shaw shomeron. 
2_kings 3:1	vihoram ben ’akh’aw malakh ‘al yisra’el beshomeron bishnat shemoneh ‘esreh lihoshafat melekh yehudah vayimlokh shetem ‘esreh shanah. 
2_kings 3:2	vaya‘aseh hara‘ be‘einei yhoh raq lo khe’awiv ukhe’imo vayasar ’et matsewat haba‘al ’asher ‘asah ’awiv. 
2_kings 3:3	raq bekhatot yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el daweq lo sar mimenah. 
2_kings 3:4	umeisha‘ melekh mo’aw hayah noqed veheishiw lemelekh yisra’el mei’ah ’elef karim umei’ah ’elef ’eilim tsamer. 
2_kings 3:5	vayhi kemot ’akh’aw vayifsha‘ melekh mo’aw bemelekh yisra’el. 
2_kings 3:6	vayeitsei hamelekh yehoram bayom hahu mishomeron vayifqod ’et kal yisra’el. 
2_kings 3:7	vayeilekh vayishlakh ’el yehoshafat melekh yehudah leimor melekh mo’aw pasha‘ bi hateilekh ’iti ’el mo’aw lamilkhamah vayomer ’e‘eleh kamoni khamokha ke‘ami khe‘amekha kesusai kesusekha. 
2_kings 3:8	vayomer ’ei zeh haderekh na‘aleh vayomer derekh midbar ’edom. 
2_kings 3:9	vayeilekh melekh yisra’el umelekh yehudah umelekh ’edom vayasobu derekh shiw‘at yamim velo hayah mayim lamakhaneh velabeheimah ’asher beragleihem. 
2_kings 3:10	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’ahah ki qara yhoh lishloshet hamelakhim ha’eleh latet ’otam beyad mo’aw. 
2_kings 3:11	vayomer yehoshafat ha’en poh nawi yhoh venidreshah ’et yhoh mei’oto vaya‘an ’ekhad mei‘awdei melekh yisra’el vayomer poh ’elisha‘ ben shafat ’asher yatsaq mayim ‘al yedei ’eiliyahu. 
2_kings 3:12	vayomer yehoshafat yesh ’oto dewar yhoh vayeiredu ’eilav melekh yisra’el vihoshafat umelekh ’edom. 
2_kings 3:13	vayomer ’elisha‘ ’el melekh yisra’el mah li valakh lekh ’el newi’ei ’awikha ve’el newi’ei ’imekha vayomer lo melekh yisra’el ’al ki qara yhoh lishloshet hamelakhim ha’eleh latet ’otam beyad mo’aw. 
2_kings 3:14	vayomer ’elisha‘ khai yhoh tsewa’ot ’asher ‘amadti lefanav ki lulei penei yehoshafat melekh yehudah ’ani nosei ’im ’abit ’eilekha ve’im ’er’eka. 
2_kings 3:15	ve‘atah qekhu li menagen vehayah kenagen hamnagen vatehi ‘alav yad yhoh. 
2_kings 3:16	vayomer koh ’amar yhoh ‘asoh hanakhal hazeh geiwim geiwim. 
2_kings 3:17	ki khoh ’amar yhoh lo tir’u ruakh velo tir’u geshem vehanakhal hahu yimalei mayim ushetitem ’atem umiqneikhem uwehemtekhem. 
2_kings 3:18	venaqal zot be‘einei yhoh venatan ’et mo’aw beyedkhem. 
2_kings 3:19	vehikitem kal ‘ir miwtsar vekhal ‘ir miwkhor vekhal ‘ets tow tapilu vekhal ma‘yenei mayim tistomu vekhol hakhelqah hatowah takh’iwu ba’awanim. 
2_kings 3:20	vayhi waboqer ka‘alot haminkhah vehineh mayim ba’im miderekh ’edom vatimalei ha’arets ’et hamayim. 
2_kings 3:21	vekhal mo’aw shame‘u ki ‘alu hamelakhim lehilakhem bam vayitsa‘aqu mikol khoger khagorah vama‘lah vaya‘amdu ‘al hagewul. 
2_kings 3:22	vayashkimu waboqer vehashemesh zarekhah ‘al hamayim vayir’u mo’aw mineged ’et hamayim ’adumim kadam. 
2_kings 3:23	vayomeru dam zeh hakhorew nekherwu hamelakhim vayaku ’ish ’et rei‘eihu ve‘atah lashalal mo’aw. 
2_kings 3:24	vayawo’u ’el makhaneh yisra’el vayaqumu yisra’el vayaku ’et mo’aw vayanusu mipeneihem vayawo vayaku wah vehakot ’et mo’aw. 
2_kings 3:25	vehe‘arim yaharosu vekhal khelqah towah yashlikhu ’ish ’awno umil’uha vekhal ma‘yan mayim yistomu vekhal ‘ets tow yapilu ‘ad hish’ir ’awaneha baqir kharaset vayasobu haqala‘im vayakuha. 
2_kings 3:26	vayar melekh mo’aw ki khazaq mimenu hamilkhamah vayiqakh ’oto shewa‘ mei’ot ’ish sholef kherew lehawqia‘ ’el melekh ’edom velo yakholu. 
2_kings 3:27	vayiqakh ’et beno habekhor ’asher yimlokh takhtav vaya‘aleihu ‘olah ‘al hakhomah vayhi qetsef gadol ‘al yisra’el vayis‘u mei‘alav vayashuwu la’arets. 
2_kings 4:1	ve’ishah ’akhat mineshei wenei hanewi’im tsa‘aqah ’el ’elisha‘ leimor ‘awdekha ’ishi met ve’atah yada‘ta ki ‘awdekha hayah yarei ’et yhoh vehanosheh ba laqakhat ’et shenei yeladai lo la‘awadim. 
2_kings 4:2	vayomer ’eileha ’elisha‘ mah ’e‘eseh lakh hagidi li mah yesh lekhi lakh babayit vatomer ’en leshifkhatekha khol babayit ki ’im ’asukh shamen. 
2_kings 4:3	vayomer lekhi sha’ali lakh keilim min hakhuts mei’et kal shikhnakhei shekheinayikh keilim reiqim ’al tam‘iti. 
2_kings 4:4	uwat vesagart hadelet ba‘adekh uwe‘ad banayikh veyatsaqt ‘al kal hakeilim ha’eleh vehamalei tasi‘i. 
2_kings 4:5	vateilekh mei’ito vatisgor hadelet ba‘adah uwe‘ad baneha hem magishim ’eileha vehi meitsaqet motsaqet. 
2_kings 4:6	vayhi kimlot hakeilim vatomer ’el benah hagishah ’eilai ‘od keli vayomer ’eileha ’en ‘od keli vaya‘amod hashamen. 
2_kings 4:7	vatawo vataged le’ish ha’elohim vayomer lekhi mikhri ’et hashemen veshalemi ’et nishyeikhi nishyekh ve’at beneikhi uwanayikh tikhyi banotar. 
2_kings 4:8	vayhi hayom vaya‘awor ’elisha‘ ’el shunem vesham ’ishah gedolah vatakhazeq bo le’ekhal lakhem vayhi midei ‘awero yasur shamah le’ekhal lakhem. 
2_kings 4:9	vatomer ’el ’ishah hineh na yada‘ti ki ’ish ’elohim qadosh hu ‘ower ‘aleinu tamid. 
2_kings 4:10	na‘aseh na ‘aliyat qir qetanah venasim lo sham mitah veshulkhan vekhisei umenorah vehayah bewo’o ’eileinu yasur shamah. 
2_kings 4:11	vayhi hayom vayawo shamah vayasar ’el ha‘aliyah vayishkaw shamah. 
2_kings 4:12	vayomer ’el geikhazi na‘aro qera lashunamit hazot vayiqra lah vata‘amod lefanav. 
2_kings 4:13	vayomer lo ’emar na ’eileha hineh kharadt ’eileinu ’et kal hakharadah hazot meh la‘asot lakh hayesh ledaber lakh ’el hamelekh ’o ’el sar hatsawa vatomer betokh ‘ami ’anokhi yoshawet. 
2_kings 4:14	vayomer umeh la‘asot lah vayomer geikhazi ’awal ben ’en lah ve’ishah zaqen. 
2_kings 4:15	vayomer qera lah vayiqra lah vata‘amod bapatakh. 
2_kings 4:16	vayomer lamo‘ed hazeh ka‘et khayah ’ati ’at khoweqet ben vatomer ’al ’adoni ’ish ha’elohim ’al tekhazew beshifkhatekha. 
2_kings 4:17	vatahar ha’ishah vateiled ben lamo‘ed hazeh ka‘et khayah ’asher diber ’eileha ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 4:18	vayigdal hayaled vayhi hayom vayeitsei ’el ’awiv ’el haqotserim. 
2_kings 4:19	vayomer ’el ’awiv roshi roshi vayomer ’el hana‘ar sa’eihu ’el ’imo. 
2_kings 4:20	vayisa’eihu vaywi’eihu ’el ’imo vayeishew ‘al birkeha ‘ad hatsahorayim vayamot. 
2_kings 4:21	vata‘al vatashkiweihu ‘al mitat ’ish ha’elohim vatisgor ba‘ado vateitsei. 
2_kings 4:22	vatiqra ’el ’ishah vatomer shilkhah na li ’ekhad min hane‘arim ve’akhat ha’atonot ve’arutsah ‘ad ’ish ha’elohim ve’ashuwah. 
2_kings 4:23	vayomer madua‘ ’ati ’at holakhti holekhet ’eilav hayom lo khodesh velo shabat vatomer shalom. 
2_kings 4:24	vatakhawosh ha’aton vatomer ’el na‘arah nehag valekh ’al ta‘atsar li lirkow ki ’im ’amarti lakh. 
2_kings 4:25	vateilekh vatawo ’el ’ish ha’elohim ’el har hakarmel vayhi kir’ot ’ish ha’elohim ’otah mineged vayomer ’el geikhazi na‘aro hineh hashunamit halaz. 
2_kings 4:26	‘atah ruts na liqratah ve’emar lah hashalom lakh hashalom le’ishekh hashalom layaled vatomer shalom. 
2_kings 4:27	vatawo ’el ’ish ha’elohim ’el hahar vatakhazeq beraglav vayigash geikhazi lehadefah vayomer ’ish ha’elohim harpeh lah ki nafshah marah lah yhoh he‘lim mimeni velo higid li. 
2_kings 4:28	vatomer hasha’alti wen mei’et ’adoni halo ’amarti lo tashleh ’oti. 
2_kings 4:29	vayomer legeikhazi khagor matenekha veqakh mish‘anti weyadekha valekh ki timtsa ’ish lo tewarekhenu vekhi yewarekhkha ’ish lo ta‘anenu vesamta mish‘anti ‘al penei hana‘ar. 
2_kings 4:30	vatomer ’em hana‘ar khai yhoh vekhei nafshekha ’im ’e‘ezweka vayaqam vayeilekh ’akhareha. 
2_kings 4:31	vegeikhazi ‘awar lifneihem vayasem ’et hamish‘enet ‘al penei hana‘ar ve’en qol ve’en qashew vayashaw liqrato vayaged lo leimor lo heiqits hana‘ar. 
2_kings 4:32	vayawo ’elisha‘ habayetah vehineh hana‘ar met mushkaw ‘al mitato. 
2_kings 4:33	vayawo vayisgor hadelet be‘ad sheneihem vayitpalel ’el yhoh. 
2_kings 4:34	vaya‘al vayishkaw ‘al hayeled vayasem piv ‘al piv ve‘einav ‘al ‘einav vekhapav ‘al kapo kapav vayighar ‘alav vayakham besar hayaled. 
2_kings 4:35	vayashaw vayeilekh babayit ’akhat henah ve’akhat henah vaya‘al vayighar ‘alav vayzorer hana‘ar ‘ad shewa‘ pe‘amim vayifqakh hana‘ar ’et ‘einav. 
2_kings 4:36	vayiqra ’el geikhazi vayomer qera ’el hashunamit hazot vayiqra’eha vatawo ’eilav vayomer se’i wenekh. 
2_kings 4:37	vatawo vatipol ‘al raglav vatishtakhu ’aretsah vatisa ’et benah vateitsei. 
2_kings 4:38	ve’elisha‘ shaw hagilgalah vehara‘aw ba’arets uwenei hanewi’im yoshewim lefanav vayomer lena‘aro shefot hasir hagedolah uwashel nazid liwnei hanewi’im. 
2_kings 4:39	vayeitsei ’ekhad ’el hasadeh lelaqet ’orot vayimtsa gefen sadeh vaylaqet mimenu paqu‘ot sadeh melo wigdo vayawo vayfalakh ’el sir hanazid ki lo yada‘u. 
2_kings 4:40	vayitsqu la’anashim le’ekhol vayhi ke’akhelam meihanazid vehemah tsa‘aqu vayomeru mavet basir ’ish ha’elohim velo yakhelu le’ekhol. 
2_kings 4:41	vayomer uqekhu qemakh vayashlekh ’el hasir vayomer tsaq la‘am veyokheilu velo hayah dawar ra‘ basir. 
2_kings 4:42	ve’ish ba miba‘al shalishah vayawei le’ish ha’elohim lekhem bikurim ‘esrim lekhem se‘orim vekharmel betsiqlono vayomer ten la‘am veyokheilu. 
2_kings 4:43	vayomer meshareto mah ’eten zeh lifnei mei’ah ’ish vayomer ten la‘am veyokheilu ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’akhol vehoter. 
2_kings 4:44	vayiten lifneihem vayokhelu vayotiru kidwar yhoh. 
2_kings 5:1	vena‘aman sar tsewa melekh ’aram hayah ’ish gadol lifnei ’adonav unesu fanim ki wo natan yhoh teshu‘ah la’aram veha’ish hayah gibor khayil metsora‘. 
2_kings 5:2	va’aram yatse’u gedudim vayishbu mei’erets yisra’el na‘arah qetanah vatehi lifnei ’eishet na‘aman. 
2_kings 5:3	vatomer ’el gewirtah ’akhalei ’adoni lifnei hanawi ’asher beshomeron ’az ye’esof ’oto mitsara‘to. 
2_kings 5:4	vayawo vayaged ladonav leimor kazot vekhazot diberah hana‘arah ’asher mei’erets yisra’el. 
2_kings 5:5	vayomer melekh ’aram lekh bo ve’eshlekhah seifer ’el melekh yisra’el vayeilekh vayiqakh beyado ‘eser kikerei khesef vesheishet ’alafim zahaw ve‘eser khalifot begadim. 
2_kings 5:6	vayawei haseifer ’el melekh yisra’el leimor ve‘atah kewo haseifer hazeh ’eilekha hineh shalakhti ’eilekha ’et na‘aman ‘awdi va’asafto mitsara‘to. 
2_kings 5:7	vayhi kiqro melekh yisra’el ’et haseifer vayiqra‘ begadav vayomer ha’elohim ’ani lehamit ulehakhayot ki zeh sholeiakh ’eilai le’esof ’ish mitsara‘to ki ’akh de‘u na ure’u ki mit’aneh hu li. 
2_kings 5:8	vayhi kishmoa‘ ’elisha‘ ’ish ha’elohim ki qara‘ melekh yisra’el ’et begadav vayishlakh ’el hamelekh leimor lamah qara‘ta begadekha yawo na ’eilai veyeida‘ ki yesh nawi beyisra’el. 
2_kings 5:9	vayawo na‘aman besuso besusav uwerikhbo vaya‘amod petakh habayit le’elisha‘. 
2_kings 5:10	vayishlakh ’eilav ’elisha‘ mal’akh leimor halokh verakhatsta shewa‘ pe‘amim bayarden veyashow besarekha lekha utehar. 
2_kings 5:11	vayiqtsof na‘aman vayeilakh vayomer hineh ’amarti ’eilai yeitsei yatso ve‘amad veqara beshem yhoh ’elohav veheinif yado ’el hamaqom ve’asaf hametsora‘. 
2_kings 5:12	halo tow ’awanah ’amanah ufarpar naharot dameseq mikol meimei yisra’el halo ’erkhats bahem vetahareti vayifen vayeilekh bekheimah. 
2_kings 5:13	vayigeshu ‘awadav vaydaberu ’eilav vayomeru ’awi dawar gadol hanawi diber ’eilekha halo ta‘aseh ve’af ki ’amar ’eilekha rekhats utehar. 
2_kings 5:14	vayeired vayitbol bayarden shewa‘ pe‘amim kidwar ’ish ha’elohim vayashaw besaro kiwsar na‘ar qaton vayithar. 
2_kings 5:15	vayashaw ’el ’ish ha’elohim hu vekhal makhaneihu vayawo vaya‘amod lefanav vayomer hineh na yada‘ti ki ’en ’elohim bekhal ha’arets ki ’im beyisra’el ve‘atah qakh na werakhah mei’et ‘awdekha. 
2_kings 5:16	vayomer khai yhoh ’asher ‘amadti lefanav ’im ’eqakh vayiftsar bo laqakhat vayma’en. 
2_kings 5:17	vayomer na‘aman valo yutan na le‘awdekha masa tsemed peradim ’adamah ki lo ya‘aseh ‘od ‘awdekha ‘olah vazewakh leilohim ’akheirim ki ’im yhoh. 
2_kings 5:18	ladawar hazeh yislakh yhoh le‘awdekha bewo ’adoni wet rimon lehishtakhavot shamah vehu nish‘an ‘al yadi vehishtakhaveiti bet rimon behishtakhavayati bet rimon yislakh na yhoh le‘awdekha badawar hazeh. 
2_kings 5:19	vayomer lo lekh leshalom vayeilekh mei’ito kiwrat ’arets. 
2_kings 5:20	vayomer geikhazi na‘ar ’elisha‘ ’ish ha’elohim hineh khasakh ’adoni ’et na‘aman ha’arami hazeh miqakhat miyado ’et ’asher heiwi khai yhoh ki ’im ratsti ’akharav velaqakhti mei’ito me’umah. 
2_kings 5:21	vayirdof geikhazi ’akharei na‘aman vayir’eh na‘aman rats ’akharav vayipol mei‘al hamerkawah liqrato vayomer hashalom. 
2_kings 5:22	vayomer shalom ’adoni shelakhani leimor hineh ‘atah zeh ba’u ’eilai shenei ne‘arim meihar ’efrayim mibenei hanewi’im tenah na lahem kikar kesef ushetei khalifot begadim. 
2_kings 5:23	vayomer na‘aman ho’el qakh kikarayim vayifrats bo vayatsar kikerayim kesef bishnei kharitim ushetei khalifot begadim vayiten ’el shenei ne‘arav vayis’u lefanav. 
2_kings 5:24	vayawo ’el ha‘ofel vayiqakh miyadam vayifqod babayit vayshalakh ’et ha’anashim vayeileikhu. 
2_kings 5:25	vehu wa vaya‘amod ’el ’adonav vayomer ’eilav ’elisha‘ mei’an mei’ayin geikhazi vayomer lo halakh ‘awdekha ’aneh va’anah. 
2_kings 5:26	vayomer ’eilav lo libi halakh ka’asher hafakh ’ish mei‘al merkawto liqratekha ha‘et laqakhat ’et hakesef velaqakhat begadim vezeitim ukheramim vetson uwaqar va‘awadim ushefakhot. 
2_kings 5:27	vetsara‘at na‘aman tidbaq bekha uwezar‘akha le‘olam vayeitsei milefanav metsora‘ kashaleg. 
2_kings 6:1	vayomeru wenei hanewi’im ’el ’elisha‘ hineh na hamaqom ’asher ’anakhnu yoshewim sham lefanekha tsar mimenu. 
2_kings 6:2	neilekhah na ‘ad hayarden veniqkhah misham ’ish qorah ’ekhat vena‘aseh lanu sham maqom lashewet sham vayomer leikhu. 
2_kings 6:3	vayomer ha’ekhad ho’el na velekh ’et ‘awadekha vayomer ’ani ’eilekh. 
2_kings 6:4	vayeilekh ’itam vayawo’u hayardeinah vayigzeru ha‘eitsim. 
2_kings 6:5	vayhi ha’ekhad mapil haqorah ve’et habarzel nafal ’el hamayim vayits‘aq vayomer ’ahah ’adoni vehu sha’ul. 
2_kings 6:6	vayomer ’ish ha’elohim ’anah nafal vayar’eihu ’et hamaqom vayiqtsaw ‘ets vayashlekh shamah vayatsef habarzel. 
2_kings 6:7	vayomer harem lakh vayishlakh yado vayiqakheihu. 
2_kings 6:8	umelekh ’aram hayah nilkham beyisra’el vayiva‘ats ’el ‘awadav leimor ’el meqom peloni ’almoni takhanoti. 
2_kings 6:9	vayishlakh ’ish ha’elohim ’el melekh yisra’el leimor hishamer mei‘awor hamaqom hazeh ki sham ’aram nekhitim. 
2_kings 6:10	vayishlakh melekh yisra’el ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amar lo ’ish ha’elohim vehizhirah vehizhiro venishmar sham lo ’akhat velo shetayim. 
2_kings 6:11	vayisa‘er lew melekh ’aram ‘al hadawar hazeh vayiqra ’el ‘awadav vayomer ’aleihem halo tagidu li mi mishelanu ’el melekh yisra’el. 
2_kings 6:12	vayomer ’akhad mei‘awadav lo ’adoni hamelekh ki ’elisha‘ hanawi ’asher beyisra’el yagid lemelekh yisra’el ’et hadewarim ’asher tedaber bakhadar mishkawekha. 
2_kings 6:13	vayomer lekhu ure’u ’eikhoh hu ve’eshlakh ve’eqakheihu vayugad lo leimor hineh wedotan. 
2_kings 6:14	vayishlakh shamah susim verekhew vekhayil kawed vayawo’u laylah vayaqifu ‘al ha‘ir. 
2_kings 6:15	vayashkem mesharet ’ish ha’elohim laqum vayeitsei vehineh khayil sowew ’et ha‘ir vesus varakhew vayomer na‘aro ’eilav ’ahah ’adoni ’eikhah na‘aseh. 
2_kings 6:16	vayomer ’al tira ki rabim ’asher ’itanu mei’asher ’otam. 
2_kings 6:17	vayitpalel ’elisha‘ vayomar yhoh peqakh na ’et ‘einav veyir’eh vayifqakh yhoh ’et ‘einei hana‘ar vayar vehineh hahar malei susim verekhew ’esh sewiwot ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 6:18	vayeiredu ’eilav vayitpalel ’elisha‘ ’el yhoh vayomar hakh na ’et hago hazeh basanveirim vayakem basanveirim kidwar ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 6:19	vayomer ’aleihem ’elisha‘ lo zeh haderekh velo zoh ha‘ir lekhu ’akharai ve’olikhah ’etkhem ’el ha’ish ’asher tewaqeishun vayolekh ’otam shomeronah. 
2_kings 6:20	vayhi kewo’am shomeron vayomer ’elisha‘ yhoh peqakh ’et ‘einei ’eleh veyir’u vayifqakh yhoh ’et ‘eineihem vayir’u vehineh betokh shomeron. 
2_kings 6:21	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el ’elisha‘ kir’oto ’otam ha’akeh ’akeh ’awi. 
2_kings 6:22	vayomer lo takeh ha’asher shawita bekharbekha uweqashtekha ’atah makeh sim lekhem vamayim lifneihem veyokhelu veyishtu veyeilekhu ’el ’adoneihem. 
2_kings 6:23	vayikhreh lahem keirah gedolah vayokhelu vayishtu vayshalekhem vayeilekhu ’el ’adoneihem velo yasefu ‘od gedudei ’aram lawo be’erets yisra’el. 
2_kings 6:24	vayhi ’akharei khen vayiqbots ben hadad melekh ’aram ’et kal makhaneihu vaya‘al vayatsar ‘al shomeron. 
2_kings 6:25	vayhi ra‘aw gadol beshomeron vehineh tsarim ‘aleha ‘ad heyot rosh khamor bishmonim kesef verowa‘ haqaw khareiyonim diwyonim bakhamishah khasef. 
2_kings 6:26	vayhi melekh yisra’el ‘ower ‘al hakhomah ve’ishah tsa‘aqah ’eilav leimor hoshi‘ah ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_kings 6:27	vayomer ’al yoshi‘ekh yhoh mei’ayin ’oshi‘ekh hamin hagoren ’o min hayaqew. 
2_kings 6:28	vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh vatomer ha’ishah hazot ’amerah ’eilai teni ’et benekh venokhelenu hayom ve’et beni nokhal makhar. 
2_kings 6:29	vanewashel ’et beni vanokheleihu va’omar ’eileha bayom ha’akher teni ’et benekh venokhelenu vatakhbi ’et benah. 
2_kings 6:30	vayhi khishmoa‘ hamelekh ’et diwrei ha’ishah vayiqra‘ ’et begadav vehu ‘ower ‘al hakhomah vayar ha‘am vehineh hasaq ‘al besaro mibayit. 
2_kings 6:31	vayomer koh ya‘aseh li ’elohim vekhoh yosif ’im ya‘amod rosh ’elisha‘ ben shafat ‘alav hayom. 
2_kings 6:32	ve’elisha‘ yoshew beweito vehazeqeinim yoshewim ’ito vayishlakh ’ish milefanav beterem yawo hamal’akh ’eilav vehu ’amar ’el hazeqeinim hare’item ki shalakh ben hamratseiakh hazeh lehasir ’et roshi re’u kewo hamal’akh sigru hadelet ulekhatstem ’oto badelet halo qol raglei ’adonav ’akharav. 
2_kings 6:33	‘odenu medaber ‘imam vehineh hamal’akh yored ’eilav vayomer hineh zot hara‘ah mei’et yhoh mah ’okhil yhoh ‘od. 
2_kings 7:1	vayomer ’elisha‘ shim‘u dewar yhoh koh ’amar yhoh ka‘et makhar se’ah solet besheqel vesatayim se‘orim besheqel besha‘ar shomeron. 
2_kings 7:2	vaya‘an hashalish ’asher lamelekh nish‘an ‘al yado ’et ’ish ha’elohim vayomar hineh yhoh ‘oseh ’arubot bashamayim hayihyeh hadawar hazeh vayomer hinekhah ro’eh be‘einekha umisham lo tokhel. 
2_kings 7:3	ve’arba‘ah ’anashim hayu metsora‘im petakh hasha‘ar vayomeru ’ish ’el rei‘eihu mah ’anakhnu yoshewim poh ‘ad matenu. 
2_kings 7:4	’im ’amarnu nawo ha‘ir vehara‘aw ba‘ir vamatnu sham ve’im yashawnu foh vamatenu ve‘atah lekhu venipelah ’el makhaneh ’aram ’im yekhayunu nikhyeh ve’im yemitunu vamatenu. 
2_kings 7:5	vayaqumu waneshef lawo ’el makhaneh ’aram vayawo’u ‘ad qetseh makhaneh ’aram vehineh ’en sham ’ish. 
2_kings 7:6	vadonai hishmia‘ ’et makhaneh ’aram qol rekhew qol sus qol khayil gadol vayomeru ’ish ’el ’akhiv hineh sakhar ‘aleinu melekh yisra’el ’et malkhei hakhitim ve’et malkhei mitsrayim lawo ‘aleinu. 
2_kings 7:7	vayaqumu vayanusu waneshef vaya‘azwu ’et ’aholeihem ve’et suseihem ve’et khamoreihem hamakhaneh ka’asher hi vayanusu ’el nafsham. 
2_kings 7:8	vayawo’u hamtsora‘im ha’eleh ‘ad qetseh hamakhaneh vayawo’u ’el ’ohel ’ekhad vayokhelu vayishtu vayis’u misham kesef vezahaw uwegadim vayeilekhu vayatminu vayashuwu vayawo’u ’el ’ohel ’akher vayis’u misham vayeilekhu vayatminu. 
2_kings 7:9	vayomeru ’ish ’el rei‘eihu lo khen ’anakhnu ‘osim hayom hazeh yom besorah hu va’anakhnu makhshim vekhikinu ‘ad ’or haboqer umetsa’anu ‘avon ve‘atah lekhu venawo’ah venagidah bet hamelekh. 
2_kings 7:10	vayawo’u vayiqre’u ’el sho‘er ha‘ir vayagidu lahem leimor banu ’el makhaneh ’aram vehineh ’en sham ’ish veqol ’adam ki ’im hasus ’asur vehakhamor ’asur ve’ohalim ka’asher hemah. 
2_kings 7:11	vayiqra hasho‘arim vayagidu bet hamelekh penimah. 
2_kings 7:12	vayaqam hamelekh laylah vayomer ’el ‘awadav ’agidah na lakhem ’et ’asher ‘asu lanu ’aram yade‘u ki re‘eiwim ’anakhnu vayeitse’u min hamakhaneh leheikhaweh wehasadeh wasadeh leimor ki yeitse’u min ha‘ir venitpesem khayim ve’el ha‘ir nawo. 
2_kings 7:13	vaya‘an ’ekhad mei‘awadav vayomer veyiqkhu na khamishah min hasusim hanish’arim ’asher nish’aru wah hinam kekhal hehamon hamon yisra’el ’asher nish’aru wah hinam kekhal hamon yisra’el ’asher tamu venishlekhah venir’eh. 
2_kings 7:14	vayiqkhu shenei rekhew susim vayishlakh hamelekh ’akharei makhaneh ’aram leimor lekhu ure’u. 
2_kings 7:15	vayeilekhu ’akhareihem ‘ad hayarden vehineh khal haderekh melei’ah wegadim vekheilim ’asher hishlikhu ’aram beheikhafezam bekhafezam vayashuwu hamal’akhim vayagidu lamelekh. 
2_kings 7:16	vayeitsei ha‘am vayawozu ’et makhaneh ’aram vayhi se’ah solet besheqel vesatayim se‘orim besheqel kidwar yhoh. 
2_kings 7:17	vehamelekh hifqid ’et hashalish ’asher nish‘an ‘al yado ‘al hasha‘ar vayirmesuhu ha‘am basha‘ar vayamot ka’asher diber ’ish ha’elohim ’asher diber beredet hamelekh ’eilav. 
2_kings 7:18	vayhi kedaber ’ish ha’elohim ’el hamelekh leimor satayim se‘orim besheqel use’ah solet besheqel yihyeh ka‘et makhar besha‘ar shomeron. 
2_kings 7:19	vaya‘an hashalish ’et ’ish ha’elohim vayomar vehineh yhoh ‘oseh ’arubot bashamayim hayihyeh kadawar hazeh vayomer hinekha ro’eh be‘einekha umisham lo tokhel. 
2_kings 7:20	vayhi lo ken vayirmesu ’oto ha‘am basha‘ar vayamot. 
2_kings 8:1	ve’elisha‘ diber ’el ha’ishah ’asher hekheyah ’et benah leimor qumi ulekhi ’ati ’at uweitekh veguri ba’asher taguri ki qara yhoh lara‘aw vegam ba ’el ha’arets shewa‘ shanim. 
2_kings 8:2	vataqam ha’ishah vata‘as kidwar ’ish ha’elohim vateilekh hi uweitah vatagar be’erets pelishtim shewa‘ shanim. 
2_kings 8:3	vayhi miqtseh shewa‘ shanim vatashaw ha’ishah mei’erets pelishtim vateitsei lits‘oq ’el hamelekh ’el beitah ve’el sadah. 
2_kings 8:4	vehamelekh medaber ’el geikhazi na‘ar ’ish ha’elohim leimor saperah na li ’et kal hagedolot ’asher ‘asah ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 8:5	vayhi hu mesaper lamelekh ’et ’asher hekheyah ’et hamet vehineh ha’ishah ’asher hekheyah ’et benah tso‘eqet ’el hamelekh ‘al beitah ve‘al sadah vayomer geikhazi ’adoni hamelekh zot ha’ishah vezeh benah ’asher hekheyah ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 8:6	vayish’al hamelekh la’ishah vatesaper lo vayiten lah hamelekh saris ’ekhad leimor hashew ’et kal ’asher lah ve’et kal tewu’ot hasadeh miyom ‘azewah ’et ha’arets ve‘ad ‘atah. 
2_kings 8:7	vayawo ’elisha‘ dameseq uwen hadad melekh ’aram kholeh vayugad lo leimor ba ’ish ha’elohim ‘ad henah. 
2_kings 8:8	vayomer hamelekh ’el khazah’el qakh beyadekha minkhah velekh liqrat ’ish ha’elohim vedarashta ’et yhoh mei’oto leimor ha’ekhyeh meikholi zeh. 
2_kings 8:9	vayeilekh khaza’el liqrato vayiqakh minkhah weyado vekhal tuw dameseq masa ’arba‘im gamal vayawo vaya‘amod lefanav vayomer binkha wen hadad melekh ’aram shelakhani ’eilekha leimor ha’ekhyeh meikholi zeh. 
2_kings 8:10	vayomer ’eilav ’elisha‘ lekh ’emar lo lo khayoh tikhyeh vehir’ani yhoh ki mot yamut. 
2_kings 8:11	vaya‘amed ’et panav vayasem ‘ad bosh vayeiwek ’ish ha’elohim. 
2_kings 8:12	vayomer khaza’el madua‘ ’adoni wokheh vayomer ki yada‘ti ’et ’asher ta‘aseh liwnei yisra’el ra‘ah miwtsereihem teshalakh ba’esh uwakhureihem bakherew taharog ve‘oleleihem teratesh veharoteihem tewaqeia‘. 
2_kings 8:13	vayomer khazah’el ki mah ‘awdekha hakelew ki ya‘aseh hadawar hagadol hazeh vayomer ’elisha‘ hir’ani yhoh ’otekha melekh ‘al ’aram. 
2_kings 8:14	vayeilekh mei’et ’elisha‘ vayawo ’el ’adonav vayomer lo mah ’amar lekha ’elisha‘ vayomer ’amar li khayoh tikhyeh. 
2_kings 8:15	vayhi mimakhorat vayiqakh hamakhber vayitbol bamayim vayifros ‘al panav vayamot vayimlokh khazah’el takhtav. 
2_kings 8:16	uwishnat khamesh leyoram ben ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el vihoshafat melekh yehudah malakh yehoram ben yehoshafat melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 8:17	ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah hayah wemalekho ushemoneh shanah shanim malakh birushalim. 
2_kings 8:18	vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’el ka’asher ‘asu bet ’akh’aw ki bat ’akh’aw hayetah lo le’ishah vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
2_kings 8:19	velo ’awah yhoh lehashkhit ’et yehudah lema‘an david ‘awdo ka’asher ’amar lo latet lo nir lewanav kal hayamim. 
2_kings 8:20	beyamav pasha‘ ’edom mitakhat yad yehudah vayamlikhu ‘aleihem melekh. 
2_kings 8:21	vaya‘awor yoram tsa‘irah vekhal harekhew ‘imo vayhi hu qam laylah vayakeh ’et ’edom hasowew ’eilav ve’et sarei harekhew vayanas ha‘am le’ohalav. 
2_kings 8:22	vayifsha‘ ’edom mitakhat yad yehudah ‘ad hayom hazeh ’az tifsha‘ liwnah ba‘et hahi. 
2_kings 8:23	veyeter diwrei yoram vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 8:24	vayishkaw yoram ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david vayimlokh ’akhazyahu weno takhtav. 
2_kings 8:25	bishnat shetem ‘esreh shanah leyoram ben ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el malakh ’akhazyahu wen yehoram melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 8:26	ben ‘esrim ushetayim shanah ’akhazyahu wemalekho veshanah ’akhat malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ‘atalyahu bat ‘ameri melekh yisra’el. 
2_kings 8:27	vayeilekh bederekh bet ’akh’aw vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh kewet ’akh’aw ki khatan bet ’akh’aw hu. 
2_kings 8:28	vayeilekh ’et yoram ben ’akh’aw lamilkhamah ‘im khazah’el melekh ’aram beramot gil‘ad vayaku ’aramim ’et yoram. 
2_kings 8:29	vayashaw yoram hamelekh lehitrapei weyizre‘el min hamakim ’asher yakuhu ’aramim baramah behilakhamo ’et khazah’el melekh ’aram va’akhazyahu wen yehoram melekh yehudah yarad lir’ot ’et yoram ben ’akh’aw beyizre‘el ki kholeh hu. 
2_kings 9:1	ve’elisha‘ hanawi qara le’akhad mibenei hanewi’im vayomer lo khagor matenekha veqakh pakh hashemen hazeh beyadekha velekh ramot gil‘ad. 
2_kings 9:2	uwata shamah ure’eihosha m yeihu wen yehoshafat ben nimshi uwata vahaqeimoto mitokh ’ekhav veheiweita ’oto kheder bekhader. 
2_kings 9:3	velaqakhta fakh hashemen veyatsaqta ‘al rosho ve’amarta koh ’amar yhoh meshakhtikha lemelekh ’el yisra’el ufatakhta hadelet venastah velo tekhakeh. 
2_kings 9:4	vayeilekh hana‘ar hana‘ar hanawi ramot gil‘ad. 
2_kings 9:5	vayawo vehineh sarei hakhayil yoshewim vayomer dawar li ’eilekha hasar vayomer yeihu ’el mi mikulanu vayomer ’eilekha hasar. 
2_kings 9:6	vayaqam vayawo habaytah vayitsoq hashemen ’el rosho vayomer lo koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el meshakhtikha lemelekh ’el ‘am yhoh ’el yisra’el. 
2_kings 9:7	vehikitah ’et bet ’akh’aw ’adonekha veniqamti demei ‘awadai hanewi’im udemei kal ‘awdei yhoh miyad ’izawel. 
2_kings 9:8	ve’awad kal bet ’akh’aw vehikhrati le’akh’aw mashtin beqir ve‘atsur ve‘azuw beyisra’el. 
2_kings 9:9	venatati ’et bet ’akh’aw kewet yarawe‘am ben newat ukhewet ba‘sha wen ’akhiyah. 
2_kings 9:10	ve’et ’izewel yokhelu hakelawim bekheileq yizre‘el ve’en qower vayiftakh hadelet vayanos. 
2_kings 9:11	veyeihu yatsa ’el ‘awdei ’adonav vayomer lo hashalom madua‘ ba hamshuga‘ hazeh ’eilekha vayomer ’aleihem ’atem yeda‘tem ’et ha’ish ve’et sikho. 
2_kings 9:12	vayomeru sheqer haged na lanu vayomer kazot vekhazot ’amar ’eilai leimor koh ’amar yhoh meshakhtikha lemelekh ’el yisra’el. 
2_kings 9:13	vaymaharu vayiqkhu ’ish bigdo vayasimu takhtav ’el gerem hama‘alot vayitqe‘u bashofar vayomeru malakh yeihu. 
2_kings 9:14	vayitqasher yeihu ben yehoshafat ben nimshi ’el yoram veyoram hayah shomer beramot gil‘ad hu vekhal yisra’el mipenei khaza’el melekh ’aram. 
2_kings 9:15	vayashaw yehoram hamelekh lehitrapei wiyzere‘el min hamakim ’asher yakuhu ’aramim behilakhamo ’et khaza’el melekh ’aram vayomer yeihu ’im yesh nafshekhem ’al yeitsei falit min ha‘ir lalekhet legid lehagid beyizre‘el. 
2_kings 9:16	vayirkaw yeihu vayeilekh yizre‘elah ki yoram shokhew shamah va’akhazyah melekh yehudah yarad lir’ot ’et yoram. 
2_kings 9:17	vehatsofeh ‘omed ‘al hamigdal beyizre‘el vayar ’et shif‘at yeihu bewo’o vayomer shif‘at ’ani ro’eh vayomer yehoram qakh rakaw ushelakh liqratam veyomar hashalom. 
2_kings 9:18	vayeilekh rokhew hasus liqrato vayomer koh ’amar hamelekh hashalom vayomer yeihu mah lekha uleshalom sow ’el ’akharai vayaged hatsofeh leimor ba hamal’akh ‘ad hem velo shaw. 
2_kings 9:19	vayishlakh rokhew sus sheini vayawo ’aleihem vayomer koh ’amar hamelekh shalom vayomer yeihu mah lekha uleshalom sow ’el ’akharai. 
2_kings 9:20	vayaged hatsofeh leimor ba ‘ad ’aleihem velo shaw vehaminhag keminhag yeihu wen nimshi ki weshiga‘on yinhag. 
2_kings 9:21	vayomer yehoram ’esor vaye’sor rikhbo vayeitsei yehoram melekh yisra’el va’akhazyahu melekh yehudah ’ish berikhbo vayeitse’u liqrat yeihu vayimtsa’uhu bekhelqat nawot hayizre‘eili. 
2_kings 9:22	vayhi kir’ot yehoram ’et yeihu vayomer hashalom yeihu vayomer mah hashalom ‘ad zenunei ’izewel ’imekha ukheshafeha harabim. 
2_kings 9:23	vayahafokh yehoram yadav vayanos vayomer ’el ’akhazyahu mirmah ’akhazyah. 
2_kings 9:24	veyeihu milei yado waqeshet vayakh ’et yehoram ben zero‘av vayeitsei hakheitsi milibo vayikhra‘ berikhbo. 
2_kings 9:25	vayomer ’el bidqar sheloshah shalisho sa hashlikheihu bekhelqat sedeh nawot hayizre‘eili ki zekhor ’ani va’atah ’et rokhewim tsemadim ’akharei ’akh’aw ’awiv yhoh nasa ‘alav ’et hamasa hazeh. 
2_kings 9:26	’im lo ’et demei nawot ve’et demei wanav ra’iti ’emesh ne’um yhoh veshilamti lekha bakhelqah hazot ne’um yhoh ve‘atah sa hashlikheihu bakhelqah kidwar yhoh. 
2_kings 9:27	va’akhazyah melekh yehudah ra’ah vayanas derekh bet hagan vayirdof ’akharav yeihu vayomer gam ’oto hakuhu ’el hamerkawah bema‘aleh gur ’asher ’et yiwle‘am vayanas megido vayamat sham. 
2_kings 9:28	vayarkiwu ’oto ‘awadav yerushalemah vayiqberu ’oto wiqwurato ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david. 
2_kings 9:29	uwishnat ’akhat ‘esreh shanah leyoram ben ’akh’aw malakh ’akhazyah ‘al yehudah. 
2_kings 9:30	vayawo yeihu yizre‘elah ve’izewel shame‘ah vatasem bapukh ‘eineha vateitew ’et roshah vatashqef be‘ad hakhalon. 
2_kings 9:31	veyeihu ba washa‘ar vatomer hashalom zimri horeg ’adonav. 
2_kings 9:32	vayisa fanav ’el hakhalon vayomer mi ’iti mi vayashqifu ’eilav shenayim sheloshah sarisim. 
2_kings 9:33	vayomer shimtuhu shimtuha vayishmetuha vayiz midamah ’el haqir ve’el hasusim vayirmesenah. 
2_kings 9:34	vayawo vayokhal vayeishet vayomer piqdu na ’et ha’arurah hazot veqiwruha ki wat melekh hi. 
2_kings 9:35	vayeilekhu leqawerah velo matse’u wah ki ’im hagulgolet veharaglayim vekhapot hayadayim. 
2_kings 9:36	vayashuwu vayagidu lo vayomer dewar yhoh hu ’asher diber beyad ‘awdo ’eiliyahu hatishbi leimor bekheileq yizre‘el yokhelu hakelawim ’et besar ’izawel. 
2_kings 9:37	vehayat vehayetah niwlat ’izewel kedomen ‘al penei hasadeh bekheileq yizre‘el ’asher lo yomeru zot ’izawel. 
2_kings 10:1	ule’akh’aw shiw‘im banim beshomeron vayikhtow yeihu sefarim vayishlakh shomeron ’el sarei yizre‘el hazeqeinim ve’el ha’omenim ’akh’aw leimor. 
2_kings 10:2	ve‘atah kewo haseifer hazeh ’aleikhem ve’itekhem benei ’adoneikhem ve’itekhem harekhew vehasusim ve‘ir miwtsar vehanasheq. 
2_kings 10:3	ure’item hatow vehayashar mibenei ’adoneikhem vesamtem ‘al kisei ’awiv vehilakhamu ‘al bet ’adoneikhem. 
2_kings 10:4	vayir’u me’od me’od vayomeru hineh shenei hamelakhim lo ‘amedu lefanav ve’ekh na‘amod ’anakhenu. 
2_kings 10:5	vayishlakh ’asher ‘al habayit va’asher ‘al ha‘ir vehazeqeinim veha’omenim ’el yeihu leimor ‘awadekha ’anakhnu vekhol ’asher tomar ’eileinu na‘aseh lo namlikh ’ish hatow be‘einekha ‘aseh. 
2_kings 10:6	vayikhtow ’aleihem seifer sheinit leimor ’im li ’atem uleqoli ’atem shome‘im qekhu ’et rashei ’anshei wenei ’adoneikhem uwo’u ’eilai ka‘et makhar yizre‘elah uwenei hamelekh shiw‘im ’ish ’et gedolei ha‘ir megadelim ’otam. 
2_kings 10:7	vayhi kewo haseifer ’aleihem vayiqkhu ’et benei hamelekh vayishkhatu shiw‘im ’ish vayasimu ’et rasheihem badudim vayishlekhu ’eilav yizre‘elah. 
2_kings 10:8	vayawo hamal’akh vayaged lo leimor heiwi’u rashei wenei hamelekh vayomer simu ’otam shenei tsiburim petakh hasha‘ar ‘ad haboqer. 
2_kings 10:9	vayhi waboqer vayeitsei vaya‘amod vayomer ’el kal ha‘am tsadiqim ’atem hineh ’ani qasharti ‘al ’adoni va’ehregeihu umi hikah ’et kal ’eleh. 
2_kings 10:10	de‘u ’eifo ki lo yipol midewar yhoh ’artsah ’asher diber yhoh ‘al bet ’akh’aw yhoh ‘asah ’et ’asher diber beyad ‘awdo ’eiliyahu. 
2_kings 10:11	vayakh yeihu ’et kal hanish’arim lewet ’akh’aw beyizre‘el vekhal gedolav umeyuda‘av vekhohanav ‘ad bilti hish’ir lo sarid. 
2_kings 10:12	vayaqam vayawo vayeilekh shomeron hu bet ‘eiqed haro‘im badarekh. 
2_kings 10:13	veyeihu matsa ’et ’akhei ’akhazyahu melekh yehudah vayomer mi ’atem vayomeru ’akhei ’akhazyahu ’anakhnu vaneired lishlom benei hamelekh uwenei hagewirah. 
2_kings 10:14	vayomer tifsum khayim vayitpesum khayim vayishkhatum ’el bor bet ‘eiqed ’arba‘im ushenayim ’ish velo hish’ir ’ish meihem. 
2_kings 10:15	vayeilekh misham vayimtsa ’et yehonadaw ben reikhaw liqrato vaywarekheihu vayomer ’eilav hayesh ’et lewawekha yashar ka’asher lewawi ‘im lewawekha vayomer yehonadaw yesh vayesh tenah ’et yadekha vayiten yado vaya‘aleihu ’eilav ’el hamerkawah. 
2_kings 10:16	vayomer lekhah ’iti ure’eh beqin’ati yhoh vayarkiwu ’oto berikhbo. 
2_kings 10:17	vayawo shomeron vayakh ’et kal hanish’arim le’akh’aw beshomeron ‘ad hishmido kidwar yhoh ’asher diber ’el ’eiliyahu. 
2_kings 10:18	vayiqbots yeihu ’et kal ha‘am vayomer ’aleihem ’akh’aw ‘awad ’et haba‘al me‘at yeihu ya‘awdenu harbeh. 
2_kings 10:19	ve‘atah khal newi’ei haba‘al kal ‘owedav vekhal kohanav qir’u ’eilai ’ish ’al yipaqed ki zewakh gadol li laba‘al kol ’asher yipaqed lo yikhyeh veyeihu ‘asah we‘aqebah lema‘an ha’awid ’et ‘owedei haba‘al. 
2_kings 10:20	vayomer yeihu qadeshu ‘atsarah laba‘al vayiqra’u. 
2_kings 10:21	vayishlakh yeihu bekhal yisra’el vayawo’u kal ‘owedei haba‘al velo nish’ar ’ish ’asher lo wa vayawo’u bet haba‘al vayimalei wet haba‘al peh lafeh. 
2_kings 10:22	vayomer la’asher ‘al hameltakhah hotsei lewush lekhol ‘owedei haba‘al vayotsei lahem hamalbush. 
2_kings 10:23	vayawo yeihu vihonadaw ben reikhaw bet haba‘al vayomer le‘owedei haba‘al khapesu ure’u pen yesh poh ‘imakhem mei‘awdei yhoh ki ’im ‘owedei haba‘al lewadam. 
2_kings 10:24	vayawo’u la‘asot zewakhim ve‘olot veyeihu sam lo wakhuts shemonim ’ish vayomer ha’ish ’asher yimalet min ha’anashim ’asher ’ani meiwi ‘al yedeikhem nafsho takhat nafsho. 
2_kings 10:25	vayhi kekhaloto la‘asot ha‘olah vayomer yeihu laratsim velashalishim bo’u hakum ’ish ’al yeitsei vayakum lefi kharew vayashlikhu haratsim vehashalishim vayeilekhu ‘ad ‘ir bet haba‘al. 
2_kings 10:26	vayotsi’u ’et matsewot bet haba‘al vayisrefuha. 
2_kings 10:27	vayitetsu ’et matsewat haba‘al vayitetsu ’et bet haba‘al vaysimuhu lemakhara’ot lemotsa’ot ‘ad hayom. 
2_kings 10:28	vayashmed yeihu ’et haba‘al miyisra’el. 
2_kings 10:29	raq khata’ei yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el lo sar yeihu mei’akhareihem ‘eglei hazahaw ’asher bet ’el va’asher bedan. 
2_kings 10:30	vayomer yhoh ’el yeihu ya‘an ’asher hetiwota la‘asot hayashar be‘einai kekhol ’asher bilwawi ‘asita lewet ’akh’aw benei rewi‘im yeishewu lekha ‘al kisei yisra’el. 
2_kings 10:31	veyeihu lo shamar lalekhet betorat yhoh ’elohei yisra’el bekhal lewawo lo sar mei‘al khatot yarawe‘am ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
2_kings 10:32	bayamim hahem heikhel yhoh leqatsot beyisra’el vayakem khaza’el bekhal gewul yisra’el. 
2_kings 10:33	min hayarden mizrakh hashemesh ’et kal ’erets hagil‘ad hagadi veharuvweini vehamnashi mei‘aro‘er ’asher ‘al nakhal ’arnon vehagil‘ad vehabashan. 
2_kings 10:34	veyeter diwrei yeihu vekhal ’asher ‘asah vekhal gewurato halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 10:35	vayishkaw yeihu ‘im ’awotav vayiqberu ’oto beshomeron vayimlokh yeho’akhaz beno takhtav. 
2_kings 10:36	vehayamim ’asher malakh yeihu ‘al yisra’el ‘esrim ushemoneh shanah beshomeron. 
2_kings 11:1	va‘atalyah ’em ’akhazyahu ura’atah ra’atah ki met benah vataqam vate’abed ’et kal zera‘ hamamlakhah. 
2_kings 11:2	vatiqakh yehoshewa‘ bat hamelekh yoram ’akhot ’akhazyahu ’et yo’ash ben ’akhazyah vatignow ’oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamamotim hamumatim ’oto ve’et meiniqto bakhadar hamitot vayastiru ’oto mipenei ‘atalyahu velo humat. 
2_kings 11:3	vayhi ’itah bet yhoh mitkhabei shesh shanim va‘atalyah molekhet ‘al ha’arets. 
2_kings 11:4	uwashanah hashewi‘it shalakh yehoyada‘ vayiqakh ’et sarei hameiyot hamei’ot lakari velaratsim vayawei ’otam ’eilav bet yhoh vayikhrot lahem berit vayashba‘ ’otam bewet yhoh vayar ’otam ’et ben hamelekh. 
2_kings 11:5	vaytsavem leimor zeh hadawar ’asher ta‘asun hashelishit mikem ba’ei hashabat veshomerei mishmeret bet hamelekh. 
2_kings 11:6	vehashelishit besha‘ar sur vehashelishit basha‘ar ’akhar haratsim ushemartem ’et mishmeret habayit masakh. 
2_kings 11:7	ushetei hayadot bakhem kol yotse’ei hashabat veshameru ’et mishmeret bet yhoh ’el hamelekh. 
2_kings 11:8	vehiqaftem ‘al hamelekh sawiw ’ish vekheilav beyado vehaba ’el hasedeirot yumat vihyu ’et hamelekh betseito uwewo’o. 
2_kings 11:9	vaya‘asu sarei hameiyot hamei’ot kekhol ’asher tsivah yehoyada‘ hakohen vayiqkhu ’ish ’et ’anashav ba’ei hashabat ‘im yotse’ei hashabat vayawo’u ’el yehoyada‘ hakohen. 
2_kings 11:10	vayiten hakohen lesarei hameiyot hamei’ot ’et hakhanit ve’et hashelatim ’asher lamelekh david ’asher bewet yhoh. 
2_kings 11:11	vaya‘amdu haratsim ’ish vekheilav beyado miketef habayit haymanit ‘ad ketef habayit hasemalit lamizbeiakh velabayit ‘al hamelekh sawiw. 
2_kings 11:12	vayotsi ’et ben hamelekh vayiten ‘alav ’et haneizer ve’et ha‘eidut vayamlikhu ’oto vayimshakhuhu vayaku khaf vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. 
2_kings 11:13	vatishma‘ ‘atalyah ’et qol haratsin ha‘am vatawo ’el ha‘am bet yhoh. 
2_kings 11:14	vateire vehineh hamelekh ‘omed ‘al ha‘amud kamishpat vehasarim vehakhatsotserot ’el hamelekh vekhal ‘am ha’arets sameiakh vetoqeia‘ bakhatsotserot vatiqra‘ ‘atalyah ’et begadeha vatiqra qesher qasher. 
2_kings 11:15	vaytsav yehoyada‘ hakohen ’et sarei hamei’ot hamei’ot pequdei hakhayil vayomer ’aleihem hotsi’u ’otah ’el mibet lasedeirot vehaba ’akhareha hamet bekharew ki ’amar hakohen ’al tumat bet yhoh. 
2_kings 11:16	vayasimu lah yadayim vatawo derekh mewo hasusim bet hamelekh vatumat sham. 
2_kings 11:17	vayikhrot yehoyada‘ ’et haberit ben yhoh uwen hamelekh uwen ha‘am lihyot le‘am yhoh uwen hamelekh uwen ha‘am. 
2_kings 11:18	vayawo’u khal ‘am ha’arets bet haba‘al vayitetsuhu ’et mizbekhoto mizbekhotav ve’et tselamav shiberu heitew ve’et matan kohen haba‘al haregu lifnei hamizbekhot vayasem hakohen pequdot ‘al bet yhoh. 
2_kings 11:19	vayiqakh ’et sarei hamei’ot ve’et hakari ve’et haratsim ve’et kal ‘am ha’arets vayoridu ’et hamelekh mibet yhoh vayawo’u derekh sha‘ar haratsim bet hamelekh vayeishew ‘al kisei hamelakhim. 
2_kings 11:20	vayismakh kal ‘am ha’arets veha‘ir shaqatah ve’et ‘atalyahu heimitu wakherew bet melekh hamelekh. 
2_kings 11:21	ben shewa‘ shanim yeho’ash bemalekho. 
2_kings 12:1	bishnat shewa‘ leyeihu malakh yeho’ash ve’arba‘im shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo tsiwyah mibe’er shawa‘. 
2_kings 12:2	vaya‘as yeho’ash hayashar be‘einei yhoh kal yamav ’asher horahu yehoyada‘ hakohen. 
2_kings 12:3	raq habamot lo saru ‘od ha‘am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. 
2_kings 12:4	vayomer yeho’ash ’el hakohanim kol kesef haqodashim ’asher yuwa wet yhoh kesef ‘ower ’ish kesef nafshot ‘erko kal kesef ’asher ya‘aleh ‘al lew ’ish lehawi bet yhoh. 
2_kings 12:5	yiqkhu lahem hakohanim ’ish mei’et makaro vehem yekhazequ ’et bedeq habayit lekhol ’asher yimatsei sham badeq. 
2_kings 12:6	vayhi bishnat ‘esrim veshalosh shanah lamelekh yeho’ash lo khizequ hakohanim ’et bedeq habayit. 
2_kings 12:7	vayiqra hamelekh yeho’ash lihoyada‘ hakohen velakohanim vayomer ’aleihem madua‘ ’einekhem mekhazeqim ’et bedeq habayit ve‘atah ’al tiqkhu khesef mei’et makareikhem ki lewedeq habayit titenuhu. 
2_kings 12:8	vayei’otu hakohanim lewilti qekhat kesef mei’et ha‘am ulewilti khazeq ’et bedeq habayit. 
2_kings 12:9	vayiqakh yehoyada‘ hakohen ’aron ’ekhad vayiqow khor bedalto vayiten ’oto ’eitsel hamizbeiakh bayamin miyamin bewo ’ish bet yhoh venatenu shamah hakohanim shomerei hasaf ’et kal hakesef hamuwa wet yhoh. 
2_kings 12:10	vayhi kir’otam ki raw hakesef ba’aron vaya‘al sofer hamelekh vehakohen hagadol vayatsuru vayimnu ’et hakesef hanimtsa wet yhoh. 
2_kings 12:11	venatenu ’et hakesef hamtukan ‘al yad yedei ‘osei hamelakhah hapequdim hamufqadim bet yhoh vayotsi’uhu lekharashei ha‘ets velabonim ha‘osim bet yhoh. 
2_kings 12:12	velagoderim ulekhotsewei ha’ewen veliqnot ‘eitsim ve’awnei makhtsew lekhazeq ’et bedeq bet yhoh ulekhol ’asher yeitsei ‘al habayit lekhazeqah. 
2_kings 12:13	’akh lo yei‘aseh bet yhoh sipot kesef mezamerot mizraqot khatsotserot kal keli zahaw ukheli khasef min hakesef hamuwa wet yhoh. 
2_kings 12:14	ki le‘osei hamelakhah yitenuhu vekhizequ wo ’et bet yhoh. 
2_kings 12:15	velo yekhashewu ’et ha’anashim ’asher yitenu ’et hakesef ‘al yadam latet le‘osei hamelakhah ki we’emunah hem ‘osim. 
2_kings 12:16	kesef ’asham vekhesef khata’ot lo yuwa bet yhoh lakohanim yihyu. 
2_kings 12:17	’az ya‘aleh khaza’el melekh ’aram vayilakhem ‘al gat vayilkedah vayasem khaza’el panav la‘alot ‘al yerushalim. 
2_kings 12:18	vayiqakh yeho’ash melekh yehudah ’et kal haqodashim ’asher hiqdishu yehoshafat vihoram va’akhazyahu ’awotav malkhei yehudah ve’et qodashav ve’et kal hazahaw hanimtsa be’otserot bet yhoh uwet hamelekh vayishlakh lakhaza’el melekh ’aram vaya‘al mei‘al yerushalim. 
2_kings 12:19	veyeter diwrei yo’ash vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 12:20	vayaqumu ‘awadav vayiqsheru qasher vayaku ’et yo’ash bet milo hayored sila. 
2_kings 12:21	veyozawad benoshi me‘at vihozawad ben shomer ‘awadav hikuhu vayamot vayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david vayimlokh ’amatsyah weno takhtav. 
2_kings 13:1	bishnat ‘esrim veshalosh shanah leyo’ash ben ’akhazyahu melekh yehudah malakh yeho’akhaz ben yeihu ‘al yisra’el beshomeron shewa‘ ‘esreh shanah. 
2_kings 13:2	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh vayeilekh ’akhar khatot yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el lo sar mimenah. 
2_kings 13:3	vayikhar ’af yhoh beyisra’el vayitenem beyad khaza’el melekh ’aram uweyad ben hadad ben khaza’el kal hayamim. 
2_kings 13:4	vaykhal yeho’akhaz ’et penei yhoh vayishma‘ ’eilav yhoh ki ra’ah ’et lakhats yisra’el ki lakhats ’otam melekh ’aram. 
2_kings 13:5	vayiten yhoh leyisra’el moshia‘ vayeitse’u mitakhat yad ’aram vayeishewu wenei yisra’el be’aholeihem kitmol shilshom. 
2_kings 13:6	’akh lo saru meikhatot bet yarawe‘am ’asher hekheti hekheti ’et yisra’el bah halakh vegam ha’asheirah ‘amedah beshomeron. 
2_kings 13:7	ki lo hish’ir liho’akhaz ‘am ki ’im khamishim parashim va‘asarah rekhew va‘aseret ’alafim ragli ki ’ibedam melekh ’aram vaysimem ke‘afar ladush. 
2_kings 13:8	veyeter diwrei yeho’akhaz vekhal ’asher ‘asah ugewurato halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 13:9	vayishkaw yeho’akhaz ‘im ’awotav vayiqberuhu beshomeron vayimlokh yo’ash beno takhtav. 
2_kings 13:10	bishnat sheloshim vashewa‘ shanah leyo’ash melekh yehudah malakh yeho’ash ben yeho’akhaz ‘al yisra’el beshomeron shesh ‘esreh shanah. 
2_kings 13:11	vaya‘aseh hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lo sar mikal khatot yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el bah halakh. 
2_kings 13:12	veyeter diwrei yo’ash vekhal ’asher ‘asah ugewurato ’asher nilkham ‘im ’amatsyah melekh yehudah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 13:13	vayishkaw yo’ash ‘im ’awotav veyarawe‘am yashaw ‘al kis’o vayiqawer yo’ash beshomeron ‘im malkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 13:14	ve’elisha‘ khalah ’et khaleyo ’asher yamut bo vayeired ’eilav yo’ash melekh yisra’el vayeiwek ‘al panav vayomar ’awi ’awi rekhew yisra’el ufarashav. 
2_kings 13:15	vayomer lo ’elisha‘ qakh qeshet vekhitsim vayiqakh ’eilav qeshet vekhitsim. 
2_kings 13:16	vayomer lemelekh yisra’el harkew yadekha ‘al haqeshet vayarkew yado vayasem ’elisha‘ yadav ‘al yedei hamelekh. 
2_kings 13:17	vayomer petakh hakhalon qeidemah vayiftakh vayomer ’elisha‘ yereh vayor vayomer khets teshu‘ah yhoh vekhets teshu‘ah wa’aram vehikita ’et ’aram ba’afeq ‘ad kaleh. 
2_kings 13:18	vayomer qakh hakhitsim vayiqakh vayomer lemelekh yisra’el hakh ’artsah vayakh shalosh pe‘amim vaya‘amod. 
2_kings 13:19	vayiqtsof ‘alav ’ish ha’elohim vayomer lehakot khamesh ’o shesh pe‘amim ’az hikita ’et ’aram ‘ad kaleh ve‘atah shalosh pe‘amim takeh ’et ’aram. 
2_kings 13:20	vayamat ’elisha‘ vayiqberuhu ugedudei mo’aw yawo’u wa’arets ba shanah. 
2_kings 13:21	vayhi hem qowerim ’ish vehineh ra’u ’et hagedud vayashlikhu ’et ha’ish beqewer ’elisha‘ vayeilekh vayiga‘ ha’ish be‘atsmot ’elisha‘ vaykhi vayaqam ‘al raglav. 
2_kings 13:22	vakhaza’el melekh ’aram lakhats ’et yisra’el kol yemei yeho’akhaz. 
2_kings 13:23	vayakhan yhoh ’otam vayrakhamem vayifen ’aleihem lema‘an berito ’et ’awraham yitskhaq veya‘aqow velo ’awah hashkhitam velo hishlikham mei‘al panav ‘ad ‘atah. 
2_kings 13:24	vayamat khaza’el melekh ’aram vayimlokh ben hadad beno takhtav. 
2_kings 13:25	vayashaw yeho’ash ben yeho’akhaz vayiqakh ’et he‘arim miyad ben hadad ben khaza’el ’asher laqakh miyad yeho’akhaz ’awiv bamilkhamah shalosh pe‘amim hikahu yo’ash vayashew ’et ‘arei yisra’el. 
2_kings 14:1	bishnat shetayim leyo’ash ben yo’akhaz melekh yisra’el malakh ’amatsyahu wen yo’ash melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 14:2	ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah wemalekho ve‘esrim vateisha‘ shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yeho‘adin yeho‘adan min yerushalim. 
2_kings 14:3	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh raq lo kedavid ’awiv kekhol ’asher ‘asah yo’ash ’awiv ‘asah. 
2_kings 14:4	raq habamot lo saru ‘od ha‘am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. 
2_kings 14:5	vayhi ka’asher khazeqah hamamlakhah beyado vayakh ’et ‘awadav hamakim ’et hamelekh ’awiv. 
2_kings 14:6	ve’et benei hamakim lo heimit kakatuw beseifer torat mosheh ’asher tsivah yhoh leimor lo yumetu ’awot ‘al banim uwanim lo yumetu ‘al ’awot ki ’im ’ish bekhet’o yamut yumat. 
2_kings 14:7	hu hikah ’et ’edom begei hamelakh melakh ‘aseret ’alafim vetafas ’et hasela‘ bamilkhamah vayiqra ’et shemah yaqete’el ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_kings 14:8	’az shalakh ’amatsyah mal’akhim ’el yeho’ash ben yeho’akhaz ben yeihu melekh yisra’el leimor lekhah nitra’eh fanim. 
2_kings 14:9	vayishlakh yeho’ash melekh yisra’el ’el ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah leimor hakhoakh ’asher balewanon lakh ’el ha’erez ’asher balewanon leimor tenah ’et bitekha liwni le’ishah vata‘awor khayat hasadeh ’asher balewanon vatirmos ’et hakhoakh. 
2_kings 14:10	hakeh hikita ’et ’edom unesa’akha libekha hikawed veshew beweitekha velamah titgareh bera‘ah venafaltah ’atah vihudah ‘imakh. 
2_kings 14:11	velo shama‘ ’amatsyahu vaya‘al yeho’ash melekh yisra’el vayitra’u fanim hu va’amatsyahu melekh yehudah bewet shemesh ’asher lihudah. 
2_kings 14:12	vayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra’el vayanusu ’ish le’aholo le’ohalav. 
2_kings 14:13	ve’et ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah ben yeho’ash ben ’akhazyahu tafas yeho’ash melekh yisra’el bewet shamesh vayawo’u vayawo yerushalim vayifrots bekhomat yerushalim besha‘ar ’efrayim ‘ad sha‘ar hapinah ’arba‘ mei’ot ’amah. 
2_kings 14:14	velaqakh ’et kal hazahaw vehakesef ve’et kal hakeilim hanimtse’im bet yhoh uwe’otserot bet hamelekh ve’et benei hata‘aruwot vayashaw shomeronah. 
2_kings 14:15	veyeter diwrei yeho’ash ’asher ‘asah ugewurato va’asher nilkham ‘im ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 14:16	vayishkaw yeho’ash ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer beshomeron ‘im malkhei yisra’el vayimlokh yarawe‘am beno takhtav. 
2_kings 14:17	vaykhi ’amatsyahu wen yo’ash melekh yehudah ’akharei mot yeho’ash ben yeho’akhaz melekh yisra’el khamesh ‘esreh shanah. 
2_kings 14:18	veyeter diwrei ’amatsyahu halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 14:19	vayiqsheru ‘alav qesher birushalim vayanas lakhishah vayishlekhu ’akharav lakhishah vaymituhu sham. 
2_kings 14:20	vayis’u ’oto ‘al hasusim vayiqawer birushalim ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david. 
2_kings 14:21	vayiqkhu kal ‘am yehudah ’et ‘azaryah vehu ben shesh ‘esreh shanah vayamlikhu ’oto takhat ’awiv ’amatsyahu. 
2_kings 14:22	hu banah ’et ’eilat vayshiweha lihudah ’akharei shekhaw hamelekh ‘im ’awotav. 
2_kings 14:23	bishnat khamesh ‘esreh shanah la’amatsyahu wen yo’ash melekh yehudah malakh yarawe‘am ben yo’ash melekh yisra’el beshomeron ’arba‘im ve’akhat shanah. 
2_kings 14:24	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lo sar mikal khatot yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
2_kings 14:25	hu heishiw ’et gewul yisra’el milewo khamat ‘ad yam ha‘arawah kidwar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher diber beyad ‘awdo yonah wen ’amitai hanawi ’asher migat hakheifer. 
2_kings 14:26	ki ra’ah yhoh ’et ‘oni yisra’el moreh me’od ve’efes ‘atsur ve’efes ‘azuw ve’en ‘ozer leyisra’el. 
2_kings 14:27	velo diber yhoh limkhot ’et shem yisra’el mitakhat hashamayim vayoshi‘em beyad yarawe‘am ben yo’ash. 
2_kings 14:28	veyeter diwrei yarawe‘am vekhal ’asher ‘asah ugewurato ’asher nilkham va’asher heishiw ’et dameseq ve’et khamat lihudah beyisra’el halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 14:29	vayishkaw yarawe‘am ‘im ’awotav ‘im malkhei yisra’el vayimlokh zekharyah weno takhtav. 
2_kings 15:1	bishnat ‘esrim vashewa‘ shanah leyarawe‘am melekh yisra’el malakh ‘azaryah wen ’amatsyah melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 15:2	ben shesh ‘esreh shanah hayah wemalekho vakhamishim ushetayim shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yekhaleyahu mirushalim. 
2_kings 15:3	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’amatsyahu ’awiv. 
2_kings 15:4	raq habamot lo saru ‘od ha‘am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. 
2_kings 15:5	vaynaga‘ yhoh ’et hamelekh vayhi metsora‘ ‘ad yom moto vayeishew bewet hakhafeshit veyotam ben hamelekh ‘al habayit shofet ’et ‘am ha’arets. 
2_kings 15:6	veyeter diwrei ‘azaryahu vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 15:7	vayishkaw ‘azaryah ‘im ’awotav vayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david vayimlokh yotam beno takhtav. 
2_kings 15:8	bishnat sheloshim ushemoneh shanah la‘azaryahu melekh yehudah malakh zekharyahu wen yarawe‘am ‘al yisra’el beshomeron shishah khodashim. 
2_kings 15:9	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ka’asher ‘asu ’awotav lo sar meikhatot yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
2_kings 15:10	vayiqshor ‘alav shalum ben yawesh vayakeihu qawale‘am ‘am vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. 
2_kings 15:11	veyeter diwrei zekharyah hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 15:12	hu dewar yhoh ’asher diber ’el yeihu leimor benei rewi‘im yeishewu lekha ‘al kisei yisra’el vayhi khen. 
2_kings 15:13	shalum ben yawesh malakh bishnat sheloshim vateisha‘ shanah le‘uziyah melekh yehudah vayimlokh yerakh yamim beshomeron.
