2_kings 15:14	vaya‘al menakhem ben gadi mitirtsah vayawo shomeron vayakh ’et shalum ben yawesh beshomeron vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. 
2_kings 15:15	veyeter diwrei shalum veqishro ’asher qashar hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 15:16	’az yakeh menakhem ’et tifsakh ve’et kal ’asher bah ve’et gewuleha mitirtsah ki lo fatakh vayakh ’et kal heharoteha biqeia‘. 
2_kings 15:17	bishnat sheloshim vateisha‘ shanah la‘azaryah melekh yehudah malakh menakhem ben gadi ‘al yisra’el ‘eser shanim beshomeron. 
2_kings 15:18	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lo sar mei‘al khatot yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el kal yamav. 
2_kings 15:19	ba ful melekh ’ashur ‘al ha’arets vayiten menakhem leful ’elef kikar kasef lihyot yadav ’ito lehakhaziq hamamlakhah beyado. 
2_kings 15:20	vayotsei menakhem ’et hakesef ‘al yisra’el ‘al kal giborei hakhayil latet lemelekh ’ashur khamishim sheqalim kesef le’ish ’ekhad vayashaw melekh ’ashur velo ‘amad sham ba’arets. 
2_kings 15:21	veyeter diwrei menakhem vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 15:22	vayishkaw menakhem ‘im ’awotav vayimlokh peqakhyah weno takhtav. 
2_kings 15:23	bishnat khamishim shanah la‘azaryah melekh yehudah malakh peqakhyah wen menakhem ‘al yisra’el beshomeron shenatayim. 
2_kings 15:24	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lo sar meikhatot yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
2_kings 15:25	vayiqshor ‘alav peqakh ben remalyahu shalisho vayakeihu weshomeron be’armon bet melekh hamelekh ’et ’argow ve’et ha’aryeh ve‘imo khamishim ’ish mibenei gil‘adim vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. 
2_kings 15:26	veyeter diwrei feqakhyah vekhal ’asher ‘asah hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 15:27	bishnat khamishim ushetayim shanah la‘azaryah melekh yehudah malakh peqakh ben remalyahu ‘al yisra’el beshomeron ‘esrim shanah. 
2_kings 15:28	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lo sar min khatot yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el. 
2_kings 15:29	bimei peqakh melekh yisra’el ba tiglat pil’eser melekh ’ashur vayiqakh ’et ‘iyon ve’et ’awel bet ma‘akhah ve’et yanoakh ve’et qedesh ve’et khatsor ve’et hagil‘ad ve’et hagalilah kol ’erets naftali vayaglem ’ashurah. 
2_kings 15:30	vayiqshar qesher hosheia‘ ben ’eilah ‘al peqakh ben remalyahu vayakeihu vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav bishnat ‘esrim leyotam ben ‘uziyah. 
2_kings 15:31	veyeter diwrei feqakh vekhal ’asher ‘asah hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’el. 
2_kings 15:32	bishnat shetayim lefeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra’el malakh yotam ben ‘uziyahu melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 15:33	ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah wemalekho veshesh ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yerusha bat tsadoq. 
2_kings 15:34	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah ‘uziyahu ’awiv ‘asah. 
2_kings 15:35	raq habamot lo saru ‘od ha‘am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot hu banah ’et sha‘ar bet yhoh ha‘elyon. 
2_kings 15:36	veyeter diwrei yotam ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 15:37	bayamim hahem heikhel yhoh lehashliakh bihudah retsin melekh ’aram ve’et peqakh ben remalyahu. 
2_kings 15:38	vayishkaw yotam ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david ’awiv vayimlokh ’akhaz beno takhtav. 
2_kings 16:1	bishnat shewa‘ ‘esreh shanah lefeqakh ben remalyahu malakh ’akhaz ben yotam melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 16:2	ben ‘esrim shanah ’akhaz bemalekho veshesh ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim velo ‘asah hayashar be‘einei yhoh ’elohav kedavid ’awiv. 
2_kings 16:3	vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’el vegam ’et beno he‘ewir ba’esh keto‘awot hagoyim ’asher horish yhoh ’otam mipenei benei yisra’el. 
2_kings 16:4	vayzabeiakh vayqater babamot ve‘al hagewa‘ot vetakhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan. 
2_kings 16:5	’az ya‘aleh retsin melekh ’aram ufeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra’el yerushalim lamilkhamah vayatsuru ‘al ’akhaz velo yakhelu lehilakhem. 
2_kings 16:6	ba‘et hahi heishiw retsin melekh ’aram ’et ’eilat la’aram vaynashel ’et hayhudim mei’eilot va’aramim va’adomim ba’u ’eilat vayeishewu sham ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_kings 16:7	vayishlakh ’akhaz mal’akhim ’el tiglat peleser melekh ’ashur leimor ‘awdekha uwinkha ’ani ‘aleh vehoshi‘eini mikaf melekh ’aram umikaf melekh yisra’el haqomim ‘alai. 
2_kings 16:8	vayiqakh ’akhaz ’et hakesef ve’et hazahaw hanimtsa bet yhoh uwe’otserot bet hamelekh vayishlakh lemelekh ’ashur shokhad. 
2_kings 16:9	vayishma‘ ’eilav melekh ’ashur vaya‘al melekh ’ashur ’el dameseq vayitpeseha vayagleha qirah ve’et retsin heimit. 
2_kings 16:10	vayeilekh hamelekh ’akhaz liqrat tiglat pil’eser melekh ’ashur dumeseq vayar ’et hamizbeiakh ’asher bedamaseq vayishlakh hamelekh ’akhaz ’el ’uriyah hakohen ’et demut hamizbeiakh ve’et tawnito lekhal ma‘aseihu. 
2_kings 16:11	vayiwen ’uriyah hakohen ’et hamizbeiakh kekhol ’asher shalakh hamelekh ’akhaz midameseq ken ‘asah ’uriyah hakohen ‘ad bo hamelekh ’akhaz midamaseq. 
2_kings 16:12	vayawo hamelekh midameseq vayar hamelekh ’et hamizbeiakh vayiqraw hamelekh ‘al hamizbeiakh vaya‘al ‘alav. 
2_kings 16:13	vayaqter ’et ‘olato ve’et minkhato vayasekh ’et nisko vayizroq ’et dam hashelamim ’asher lo ‘al hamizbeiakh. 
2_kings 16:14	ve’et hamizbakh hanekhoshet ’asher lifnei yhoh vayaqrew mei’et penei habayit miben hamizbeiakh umiben bet yhoh vayiten ’oto ‘al yerekh hamizbeiakh tsafonah. 
2_kings 16:15	vaytsaveihu vaytsaveh hamelekh ’akhaz ’et ’uriyah hakohen leimor ‘al hamizbeiakh hagadol haqter ’et ‘olat haboqer ve’et minkhat ha‘erew ve’et ‘olat hamelekh ve’et minkhato ve’et ‘olat kal ‘am ha’arets uminkhatam veniskeihem vekhal dam ‘olah vekhal dam zewakh ‘alav tizroq umizbakh hanekhoshet yihyeh li lewaqer. 
2_kings 16:16	vaya‘as ’uriyah hakohen kekhol ’asher tsivah hamelekh ’akhaz. 
2_kings 16:17	vayqatsets hamelekh ’akhaz ’et hamisgerot hamekhonot vayasar mei‘aleihem ve’et ’et hakiyor ve’et hayam horid mei‘al habaqar hanekhoshet ’asher takhteha vayiten ’oto ‘al martsefet ’awanim. 
2_kings 16:18	ve’et misakh musakh hashabat ’asher banu wabayit ve’et mewo hamelekh hakhitsonah heisew bet yhoh mipenei melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 16:19	veyeter diwrei ’akhaz ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 16:20	vayishkaw ’akhaz ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david vayimlokh khizqiyahu weno takhtav. 
2_kings 17:1	bishnat shetem ‘esreh le’akhaz melekh yehudah malakh hosheia‘ ben ’eilah weshomeron ‘al yisra’el teisha‘ shanim. 
2_kings 17:2	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh raq lo kemalkhei yisra’el ’asher hayu lefanav. 
2_kings 17:3	‘alav ‘alah shalman’eser melekh ’ashur vayhi lo hosheia‘ ‘ewed vayashew lo minkhah. 
2_kings 17:4	vayimtsa melekh ’ashur behosheia‘ qesher ’asher shalakh mal’akhim ’el so melekh mitsrayim velo he‘elah minkhah lemelekh ’ashur keshanah weshanah vaya‘atsreihu melekh ’ashur vaya’asreihu bet kele. 
2_kings 17:5	vaya‘al melekh ’ashur bekhal ha’arets vaya‘al shomeron vayatsar ‘aleha shalosh shanim. 
2_kings 17:6	bishnat hateshi‘it lehosheia‘ lakhad melekh ’ashur ’et shomeron vayegel ’et yisra’el ’ashurah vayoshew ’otam bakhlakh uwekhawor nehar gozan ve‘arei madai. 
2_kings 17:7	vayhi ki khate’u wenei yisra’el yhoh ’eloheihem hama‘aleh ’otam mei’erets mitsrayim mitakhat yad par‘oh melekh mitsrayim vayire’u ’elohim ’akheirim. 
2_kings 17:8	vayeilekhu bekhuqot hagoyim ’asher horish yhoh mipenei benei yisra’el umalkhei yisra’el ’asher ‘asu. 
2_kings 17:9	vaykhape’u wenei yisra’el dewarim ’asher lo khen ‘al yhoh ’eloheihem vayiwnu lahem bamot bekhal ‘areihem mimigdal notsrim ‘ad ‘ir miwtsar. 
2_kings 17:10	vayatsiwu lahem matseiwot va’asheirim ‘al kal giw‘ah gewohah vetakhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan. 
2_kings 17:11	vayqateru sham bekhal bamot kagoyim ’asher heglah yhoh mipeneihem vaya‘asu dewarim ra‘im lehakh‘is ’et yhoh. 
2_kings 17:12	vaya‘awdu hagilulim ’asher ’amar yhoh lahem lo ta‘asu ’et hadawar hazeh. 
2_kings 17:13	vaya‘ad yhoh beyisra’el uwihudah beyad kal newi’o newi’ei khal khozeh leimor wu midarkheikhem hara‘im veshimru mitsvotai khuqotai kekhal hatorah ’asher tsiviti ’et ’awoteikhem va’asher shalakhti ’aleikhem beyad ‘awadai hanewi’im. 
2_kings 17:14	velo shamei‘u vayaqshu ’et ‘arepam ke‘oref ’awotam ’asher lo he’eminu yhoh ’eloheihem. 
2_kings 17:15	vayim’asu ’et khuqav ve’et berito ’asher karat ’et ’awotam ve’et ‘eidevotav ’asher hei‘id bam vayeilekhu ’akharei hahewel vayehbalu ve’akharei hagoyim ’asher sewiwotam ’asher tsivah yhoh ’otam lewilti ‘asot kahem. 
2_kings 17:16	vaya‘azwu ’et kal mitsvot yhoh ’eloheihem vaya‘asu lahem maseikhah shenem shenei ‘agalim vaya‘asu ’asheirah vayishtakhavu lekhal tsewa hashamayim vaya‘awdu ’et haba‘al. 
2_kings 17:17	vaya‘awiru ’et beneihem ve’et benoteihem ba’esh vayiqsemu qesamim vaynakheishu vayitmakeru la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lehakh‘iso. 
2_kings 17:18	vayit’anaf yhoh me’od beyisra’el vaysirem mei‘al panav lo nish’ar raq sheiwet yehudah lewado. 
2_kings 17:19	gam yehudah lo shamar ’et mitsvot yhoh ’eloheihem vayeilekhu bekhuqot yisra’el ’asher ‘asu. 
2_kings 17:20	vayim’as yhoh bekhal zera‘ yisra’el vai‘anem vayitenem beyad shosim ‘ad ’asher hishlikham mipanav. 
2_kings 17:21	ki qara‘ yisra’el mei‘al bet david vayamlikhu ’et yarawe‘am ben newat vayadei vayadakh yarawe‘am ’et yisra’el mei’akharei yhoh vehekhetei’am khata’ah gedolah. 
2_kings 17:22	vayeilekhu benei yisra’el bekhal khatot yarawe‘am ’asher ‘asah lo saru mimenah. 
2_kings 17:23	‘ad ’asher heisir yhoh ’et yisra’el mei‘al panav ka’asher diber beyad kal ‘awadav hanewi’im vayigel yisra’el mei‘al ’admato ’ashurah ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_kings 17:24	vayawei melekh ’ashur mibawel umikutah umei‘ava umeikhamat usefarvayim vayoshew be‘arei shomeron takhat benei yisra’el vayirshu ’et shomeron vayeishewu be‘areha. 
2_kings 17:25	vayhi bitkhilat shiwtam sham lo yare’u ’et yhoh vayshalakh yhoh bahem ’et ha’arayot vayihyu horegim bahem. 
2_kings 17:26	vayomeru lemelekh ’ashur leimor hagoyim ’asher higlita vatoshew be‘arei shomeron lo yade‘u ’et mishpat ’elohei ha’arets vayshalakh bam ’et ha’arayot vehinam memitim ’otam ka’asher ’einam yode‘im ’et mishpat ’elohei ha’arets. 
2_kings 17:27	vaytsav melekh ’ashur leimor holikhu shamah ’ekhad meihakohanim ’asher higlitem misham veyeilekhu veyeishewu sham veyorem ’et mishpat ’elohei ha’arets. 
2_kings 17:28	vayawo ’ekhad meihakohanim ’asher higlu mishomeron vayeishew bewet ’el vayhi moreh ’otam ’ekh yire’u ’et yhoh. 
2_kings 17:29	vayihyu ‘osim go go ’elohav vayanikhu bewet habamot ’asher ‘asu hashomeronim go go be‘areihem ’asher hem yoshewim sham. 
2_kings 17:30	ve’anshei wawel ‘asu ’et sukot benot ve’anshei khut ‘asu ’et neiregal ve’anshei khamat ‘asu ’et ’ashima. 
2_kings 17:31	veha‘avim ‘asu niwkhaz ve’et tartaq vehasfarvim sorefim ’et beneihem ba’esh le’adramelekh va‘anamelekh ’eloah ’elohei sefarim sefarvayim. 
2_kings 17:32	vayihyu yerei’im ’et yhoh vaya‘asu lahem miqtsotam kohanei wamot vayihyu ‘osim lahem bewet habamot. 
2_kings 17:33	’et yhoh hayu yerei’im ve’et ’eloheihem hayu ‘owedim kemishpat hagoyim ’asher higlu ’otam misham. 
2_kings 17:34	‘ad hayom hazeh hem ‘osim kamishpatim harishonim ’einam yerei’im ’et yhoh ve’einam ‘osim kekhuqotam ukhemishpatam vekhatorah vekhamitsvah ’asher tsivah yhoh ’et benei ya‘aqow ’asher sam shemo yisra’el. 
2_kings 17:35	vayikhrot yhoh ’itam berit vaytsavem leimor lo tire’u ’elohim ’akheirim velo tishtakhavu lahem velo ta‘awdum velo tizbekhu lahem. 
2_kings 17:36	ki ’im ’et yhoh ’asher he‘elah ’etkhem mei’erets mitsrayim bekhoakh gadol uwizroa‘ netuyah ’oto tira’u velo tishtakhavu velo tizbakhu. 
2_kings 17:37	ve’et hakhuqim ve’et hamishpatim vehatorah vehamitsvah ’asher kataw lakhem tishmerun la‘asot kal hayamim velo tire’u ’elohim ’akheirim. 
2_kings 17:38	vehaberit ’asher karati ’itekhem lo tishkakhu velo tire’u ’elohim ’akheirim. 
2_kings 17:39	ki ’im ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem tira’u vehu yatsil ’etkhem miyad kal ’oyeweikhem. 
2_kings 17:40	velo shamei‘u ki ’im kemishpatam harishon hem ‘osim. 
2_kings 17:41	vayihyu hagoyim ha’eleh yerei’im ’et yhoh ve’et pesileihem hayu ‘owedim gam beneihem uwenei weneihem ka’asher ‘asu ’awotam hem ‘osim ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_kings 18:1	vayhi bishnat shalosh lehosheia‘ ben ’eilah melekh yisra’el malakh khizqiyah wen ’akhaz melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 18:2	ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah wemalekho ve‘esrim vateisha‘ shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ’awi bat zekharyah. 
2_kings 18:3	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah david ’awiv. 
2_kings 18:4	hu heisir ’et habamot veshibar ’et hamatseiwot vekharat ’et ha’asheirah vekhitat nekhash hanekhoshet ’asher ‘asah mosheh ki ‘ad hayamim hahemah hayu wenei yisra’el meqaterim lo vayiqra lo nekhushtan. 
2_kings 18:5	yhoh ’elohei yisra’el batakh ve’akharav lo hayah khamohu bekhol malkhei yehudah va’asher hayu lefanav. 
2_kings 18:6	vayidbaq yhoh lo sar mei’akharav vayishmor mitsvotav ’asher tsivah yhoh ’et mosheh. 
2_kings 18:7	vehayah yhoh ‘imo bekhol ’asher yeitsei yaskil vayimrod bemelekh ’ashur velo ‘awado. 
2_kings 18:8	hu hikah ’et pelishtim ‘ad ‘azah ve’et gewuleha mimigdal notsrim ‘ad ‘ir miwtsar. 
2_kings 18:9	vayhi bashanah harewi‘it lamelekh khizqiyahu hi hashanah hashewi‘it lehosheia‘ ben ’eilah melekh yisra’el ‘alah shalman’eser melekh ’ashur ‘al shomeron vayatsar ‘aleha. 
2_kings 18:10	vayilkeduha miqtseh shalosh shanim bishnat shesh lekhizqiyah hi shenat teisha‘ lehosheia‘ melekh yisra’el nilkedah shomeron. 
2_kings 18:11	vayegel melekh ’ashur ’et yisra’el ’ashurah vayankhem bakhlakh uwekhawor nehar gozan ve‘arei madai. 
2_kings 18:12	‘al ’asher lo shame‘u beqol yhoh ’eloheihem vaya‘awru ’et berito ’et kal ’asher tsivah mosheh ‘ewed yhoh velo shame‘u velo ‘asu. 
2_kings 18:13	uwe’arba‘ ‘esreh shanah lamelekh khizqiyah ‘alah sankheiriw melekh ’ashur ‘al kal ‘arei yehudah habetsurot vayitpesem. 
2_kings 18:14	vayishlakh khizqiyah melekh yehudah ’el melekh ’ashur lakhishah leimor khatati shuw mei‘alai ’et ’asher titen ‘alai ’esa vayasem melekh ’ashur ‘al khizqiyah melekh yehudah shelosh mei’ot kikar kesef usheloshim kikar zahaw. 
2_kings 18:15	vayiten khizqiyah ’et kal hakesef hanimtsa wet yhoh uwe’otserot bet hamelekh. 
2_kings 18:16	ba‘et hahi qitsats khizqiyah ’et daltot heikhal yhoh ve’et ha’omenot ’asher tsipah khizqiyah melekh yehudah vayitenem lemelekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 18:17	vayishlakh melekh ’ashur ’et tartan ve’et raw saris ve’et raw shaqeh min lakhish ’el hamelekh khizqiyahu bekhel kawed yerushalim vaya‘alu vayawo’u yerushalim vaya‘alu vayawo’u vaya‘amdu bit‘alat habereikhah ha‘elyonah ’asher bimsilat sedeh khowes. 
2_kings 18:18	vayiqre’u ’el hamelekh vayeitsei ’aleihem ’elyaqim ben khilqiyahu ’asher ‘al habayit veshewnah hasofer veyo’akh ben ’asaf hamazkir. 
2_kings 18:19	vayomer ’aleihem raw shaqeh ’imru na ’el khizqiyahu koh ’amar hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur mah habitakhon hazeh ’asher batakheta. 
2_kings 18:20	’amarta ’akh dewar sefatayim ‘eitsah ugewurah lamilkhamah ‘atah ‘al mi watakhta ki maradta bi. 
2_kings 18:21	‘atah hineh watakhta lekha ‘al mish‘enet haqaneh haratsuts hazeh ‘al mitsrayim ’asher yisamekh ’ish ‘alav uwa wekhapo uneqawah ken par‘oh melekh mitsrayim lekhal habotekhim ‘alav. 
2_kings 18:22	vekhi tomerun ’eilai ’el yhoh ’eloheinu batakhenu halo hu ’asher heisir khizqiyahu ’et bamotav ve’et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim lifnei hamizbeiakh hazeh tishtakhavu birushalim. 
2_kings 18:23	ve‘atah hit‘arew na ’et ’adoni ’et melekh ’ashur ve’etenah lekha ’alpayim susim ’im tukhal latet lekha rokhewim ‘aleihem. 
2_kings 18:24	ve’ekh tashiw ’et penei fakhat ’akhad ‘awdei ’adoni haqetanim vatiwtakh lekha ‘al mitsrayim lerekhew ulefarashim. 
2_kings 18:25	‘atah hamibal‘adei yhoh ‘aliti ‘al hamaqom hazeh lehashkhito yhoh ’amar ’eilai ‘aleh ‘al ha’arets hazot vehashkhitah. 
2_kings 18:26	vayomer ’elyaqim ben khilqiyahu veshewnah veyo’akh ’el raw shaqeh daber na ’el ‘awadekha ’aramit ki shome‘im ’anakhenu ve’al tedaber ‘imanu yehudit be’azenei ha‘am ’asher ‘al hakhomah. 
2_kings 18:27	vayomer ’aleihem raw shaqeh ha‘al ’adonekha ve’eilekha shelakhani ’adoni ledaber ’et hadewarim ha’eleh halo ‘al ha’anashim hayoshewim ‘al hakhomah le’ekhol ’et khareihem tso’atam velishtot ’et sheineihem meimei ragleihem ‘imakhem. 
2_kings 18:28	vaya‘amod raw shaqeh vayiqra weqol gadol yehudit vaydaber vayomer shim‘u dewar hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 18:29	koh ’amar hamelekh ’al yashi lakhem khizqiyahu ki lo yukhal lehatsil ’etkhem miyado. 
2_kings 18:30	ve’al yawtakh ’etkhem khizqiyahu ’el yhoh leimor hatsel yatsileinu yhoh velo tinaten ’et ha‘ir hazot beyad melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 18:31	’al tishme‘u ’el khizqiyahu ki khoh ’amar melekh ’ashur ‘asu ’iti werakhah utse’u ’eilai ve’ikhlu ’ish gafno ve’ish te’einato ushetu ’ish mei woro. 
2_kings 18:32	‘ad bo’i velaqakhti ’etkhem ’el ’erets ke’artsekhem ’erets dagan vetirosh ’erets lekhem ukheramim ’erets zet yitshar udewash vikhyu velo tamutu ve’al tishme‘u ’el khizqiyahu ki yasit ’etkhem leimor yhoh yatsileinu. 
2_kings 18:33	hahatsel hitsilu ’elohei hagoyim ’ish ’et ’artso miyad melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 18:34	’ayeh ’elohei khamat ve’arpad ’ayeh ’elohei sefarvayim heina‘ ve‘ivah ki hitsilu ’et shomeron miyadi. 
2_kings 18:35	mi bekhal ’elohei ha’aratsot ’asher hitsilu ’et ’artsam miyadi ki yatsil yhoh ’et yerushalim miyadi. 
2_kings 18:36	vehekherishu ha‘am velo ‘anu ’oto dawar ki mitsvat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta‘anuhu. 
2_kings 18:37	vayawo ’elyaqim ben khilqiyah ’asher ‘al habayit veshewna hasofer veyo’akh ben ’asaf hamazkir ’el khizqiyahu qeru‘ei wegadim vayagidu lo diwrei raw shaqeh. 
2_kings 19:1	vayhi kishmoa‘ hamelekh khizqiyahu vayiqra‘ ’et begadav vayitkas basaq vayawo bet yhoh. 
2_kings 19:2	vayishlakh ’et ’elyaqim ’asher ‘al habayit veshewna hasofer ve’et ziqnei hakohanim mitkasim basaqim ’el yesha‘yahu hanawi ben ’amots. 
2_kings 19:3	vayomeru ’eilav koh ’amar khizqiyahu yom tsarah vetokheikhah une’atsah hayom hazeh ki wa’u wanim ‘ad mashber vekhoakh ’ayin leleidah. 
2_kings 19:4	’ulai yishma‘ yhoh ’elohekha ’et kal diwrei raw shaqeh ’asher shelakho melekh ’ashur ’adonav lekharef ’elohim khai vehokhiakh badewarim ’asher shama‘ yhoh ’elohekha venasata tefilah be‘ad hashe’eirit hanimtsa’ah. 
2_kings 19:5	vayawo’u ‘awdei hamelekh khizqiyahu ’el yesha‘ayahu. 
2_kings 19:6	vayomer lahem yesha‘yahu koh tomerun ’el ’adoneikhem koh ’amar yhoh ’al tira mipenei hadewarim ’asher shama‘ta ’asher gidefu na‘arei melekh ’ashur ’oti. 
2_kings 19:7	hini noten bo ruakh veshama‘ shemu‘ah veshaw le’artso vehipaltiv bakherew be’artso. 
2_kings 19:8	vayashaw raw shaqeh vayimtsa ’et melekh ’ashur nilkham ‘al liwnah ki shama‘ ki nasa‘ milakhish. 
2_kings 19:9	vayishma‘ ’el tirhaqah melekh kush leimor hineh yatsa lehilakhem ’itakh vayashaw vayishlakh mal’akhim ’el khizqiyahu leimor. 
2_kings 19:10	koh tomerun ’el khizqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor ’al yashi’akha ’elohekha ’asher ’atah boteiakh bo leimor lo tinaten yerushalim beyad melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 19:11	hineh ’atah shama‘ta ’et ’asher ‘asu malkhei ’ashur lekhal ha’aratsot lehakharimam ve’atah tinatsel. 
2_kings 19:12	hahitsilu ’otam ’elohei hagoyim ’asher shikhatu ’awotai ’et gozan ve’et kharan veretsef uwenei ‘eden ’asher bitlasar. 
2_kings 19:13	’ayo melekh khamat umelekh ’arpad umelekh la‘ir sefarvayim heina‘ ve‘ivah. 
2_kings 19:14	vayiqakh khizqiyahu ’et hasefarim miyad hamal’akhim vayiqra’em vaya‘al bet yhoh vayifreseihu khizqiyahu lifnei yhoh. 
2_kings 19:15	vayitpalel khizqiyahu lifnei yhoh vayomar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el yoshew hakeruwim ’atah hu ha’elohim lewadekha lekhol mamlekhot ha’arets ’atah ‘asita ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets. 
2_kings 19:16	hateh yhoh ’azenekha ushama‘ peqakh yhoh ‘einekha ure’eh ushema‘ ’et diwrei sankheiriw ’asher shelakho lekharef ’elohim khai. 
2_kings 19:17	’amenam yhoh hekheriwu malkhei ’ashur ’et hagoyim ve’et ’artsam. 
2_kings 19:18	venatenu ’et ’eloheihem ba’esh ki lo ’elohim hemah ki ’im ma‘aseh yedei ’adam ‘ets va’ewen vai’abedum. 
2_kings 19:19	ve‘atah yhoh ’eloheinu hoshi‘einu na miyado veyeide‘u kal mamlekhot ha’arets ki ’atah yhoh ’elohim lewadekha. 
2_kings 19:20	vayishlakh yesha‘yahu wen ’amots ’el khizqiyahu leimor koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher hitpalalta ’eilai ’el sankheiriw melekh ’ashur shama‘eti. 
2_kings 19:21	zeh hadawar ’asher diber yhoh ‘alav bazah lekha la‘agah lekha betulat bat tsiyon ’akharekha rosh heini‘ah bat yerushalim. 
2_kings 19:22	’et mi kheirafta vegidafta ve‘al mi harimota qol vatisa marom ‘einekha ‘al qedosh yisra’el. 
2_kings 19:23	beyad mal’akhekha kheirafta ’adonai vatomer berekhew berow rikhbi ’ani ‘aliti merom harim yarketei lewanon ve’ekhrot qomat ’arazav miwkhor beroshav ve’awo’ah melon qitsoh ya‘ar karmilo. 
2_kings 19:24	’ani qarti veshatiti mayim zarim ve’akhriw bekhaf pe‘amai kol ye’orei matsor. 
2_kings 19:25	halo shama‘ta lemeirakhoq ’otah ‘asiti lemimei qedem vitsartiha ‘atah haweitiha utehi lahshot galim nitsim ‘arim betsurot. 
2_kings 19:26	veyosheweihen qitsrei yad khatu vayeiwoshu hayu ‘eisew sadeh viraq deshe khatsir gagot ushedeifah lifnei qamah. 
2_kings 19:27	veshiwtekha vetseitekha uwo’akha yada‘eti ve’et hitragezkha ’eilai. 
2_kings 19:28	ya‘an hitragezkha ’eilai vesha’anankha ‘alah we’azenai vesamti khakhi be’apekha umitgi bisfatekha vahashiwotikha baderekh ’asher bata bah. 
2_kings 19:29	vezeh lekha ha’ot ’akhol hashanah safiakh uwashanah hasheinit sakhish uwashanah hashelishit zir‘u veqitsru venit‘u kheramim ve’ikhlu firyam. 
2_kings 19:30	veyasefah peleitat bet yehudah hanish’arah shoresh lematah ve‘asah feri lema‘elah. 
2_kings 19:31	ki mirushalim teitsei she’eirit ufeleitah meihar tsiyon qin’at yhoh tsewa’ot ta‘aseh zot. 
2_kings 19:32	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’el melekh ’ashur lo yawo ’el ha‘ir hazot velo yoreh sham khets velo yeqademenah magen velo yishpokh ‘aleha solelah. 
2_kings 19:33	baderekh ’asher yawo bah yashuw ve’el ha‘ir hazot lo yawo ne’um yhoh. 
2_kings 19:34	veganoti ’el ha‘ir hazot lehoshi‘ah lema‘ani ulema‘an david ‘awdi. 
2_kings 19:35	vayhi balaylah hahu vayeitsei mal’akh yhoh vayakh bemakhaneh ’ashur mei’ah shemonim vakhamishah ’alef vayashkimu waboqer vehineh khulam pegarim meitim. 
2_kings 19:36	vayisa‘ vayeilekh vayashaw sankheiriw melekh ’ashur vayeishew benineveh. 
2_kings 19:37	vayhi hu mishtakhaveh bet nisrokh ’elohav ve’adramelekh vesar’etser banav hikuhu wakherew vehemah nimletu ’erets ’ararat vayimlokh ’eisar khadon beno takhtav. 
2_kings 20:1	bayamim hahem khalah khizqiyahu lamut vayawo ’eilav yesha‘yahu wen ’amots hanawi vayomer ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh tsav leweitekha ki met ’atah velo tikhyeh. 
2_kings 20:2	vayasew ’et panav ’el haqir vayitpalel ’el yhoh leimor. 
2_kings 20:3	’anah yhoh zekhar na ’et ’asher hithalakhti lefanekha be’emet uweleiwaw shalem vehatow be‘einekha ‘asiti vayeiwek khizqiyahu bekhi gadol. 
2_kings 20:4	vayhi yesha‘yahu lo yatsa ha‘ir khatser hatikhonah udewar yhoh hayah ’eilav leimor. 
2_kings 20:5	shuw ve’amarta ’el khizqiyahu negid ‘ami koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei david ’awikha shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha ra’iti ’et dim‘atekha hini rofe lakh bayom hashelishi ta‘aleh bet yhoh. 
2_kings 20:6	vehosafti ‘al yamekha khamesh ‘esreh shanah umikaf melekh ’ashur ’atsilekha ve’et ha‘ir hazot veganoti ‘al ha‘ir hazot lema‘ani ulema‘an david ‘awdi. 
2_kings 20:7	vayomer yesha‘yahu qekhu dewelet te’einim vayiqkhu vayasimu ‘al hashekhin vayekhi. 
2_kings 20:8	vayomer khizqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu mah ’ot ki yirpa yhoh li ve‘aliti bayom hashelishi bet yhoh. 
2_kings 20:9	vayomer yesha‘yahu zeh lekha ha’ot mei’et yhoh ki ya‘aseh yhoh ’et hadawar ’asher diber halakh hatsel ‘eser ma‘alot ’im yashuw ‘eser ma‘alot. 
2_kings 20:10	vayomer yekhizqiyahu naqel latsel lintot ‘eser ma‘alot lo khi yashuw hatsel ’akhoranit ‘eser ma‘alot. 
2_kings 20:11	vayiqra yesha‘yahu hanawi ’el yhoh vayashew ’et hatsel bama‘alot ’asher yaredah bema‘alot ’akhaz ’akhoranit ‘eser ma‘alot. 
2_kings 20:12	ba‘et hahi shalakh berodakh bal’adan ben bal’adan melekh bawel sefarim uminkhah ’el khizqiyahu ki shama‘ ki khalah khizqiyahu. 
2_kings 20:13	vayishma‘ ‘aleihem khizqiyahu vayar’em ’et kal bet nekhotoh ’et hakesef ve’et hazahaw ve’et habesamim ve’et shemen hatow ve’et bet keilav ve’et kal ’asher nimtsa be’otsrotav lo hayah dawar ’asher lo her’am khizqiyahu beweito uwekhal memshalto. 
2_kings 20:14	vayawo yesha‘yahu hanawi ’el hamelekh khizqiyahu vayomer ’eilav mah ’ameru ha’anashim ha’eleh umei’ayin yawo’u ’eilekha vayomer khizqiyahu mei’erets rekhoqah ba’u mibawel. 
2_kings 20:15	vayomer mah ra’u beweitekha vayomer khizqiyahu ’et kal ’asher beweiti ra’u lo hayah dawar ’asher lo hir’itim be’otserotai. 
2_kings 20:16	vayomer yesha‘yahu ’el khizqiyahu shema‘ dewar yhoh. 
2_kings 20:17	hineh yamim ba’im venisa kal ’asher beweitekha va’asher ’atseru ’awotekha ‘ad hayom hazeh bawelah lo yivater dawar ’amar yhoh. 
2_kings 20:18	umibanekha ’asher yeitse’u mimekha ’asher tolid yiqakh yiqakhu vehayu sarisim beheikhal melekh bawel. 
2_kings 20:19	vayomer khizqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu tow dewar yhoh ’asher dibarta vayomer halo ’im shalom ve’emet yihyeh weyamai. 
2_kings 20:20	veyeter diwrei khizqiyahu vekhal gewurato va’asher ‘asah ’et habereikhah ve’et hate‘alah vayawei ’et hamayim ha‘irah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 20:21	vayishkaw khizqiyahu ‘im ’awotav vayimlokh menasheh weno takhtav. 
2_kings 21:1	ben shetem ‘esreh shanah menasheh wemalekho vakhamishim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo kheftsi wah. 
2_kings 21:2	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh keto‘awot hagoyim ’asher horish yhoh mipenei benei yisra’el. 
2_kings 21:3	vayashaw vayiwen ’et habamot ’asher ’ibad khizqiyahu ’awiv vayaqem mizbekhot laba‘al vaya‘as ’asheirah ka’asher ‘asah ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el vayishtakhu lekhal tsewa hashamayim vaya‘awod ’otam. 
2_kings 21:4	uwanah mizbekhot bewet yhoh ’asher ’amar yhoh birushalim ’asim ’et shemi. 
2_kings 21:5	vayiwen mizbekhot lekhal tsewa hashamayim bishtei khatsrot bet yhoh. 
2_kings 21:6	vehe‘ewir ’et beno ba’esh ve‘onen venikhesh ve‘asah ’ow veyide‘onim hirbah la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lehakh‘is. 
2_kings 21:7	vayasem ’et pesel ha’asheirah ’asher ‘asah babayit ’asher ’amar yhoh ’el david ve’el shelomoh weno babayit hazeh uwirushalim ’asher bakharti mikol shiwtei yisra’el ’asim ’et shemi le‘olam. 
2_kings 21:8	velo ’osif lehanid regel yisra’el min ha’adamah ’asher natati la’awotam raq ’im yishmeru la‘asot kekhol ’asher tsivitim ulekhal hatorah ’asher tsivah ’otam ‘awdi mosheh. 
2_kings 21:9	velo shamei‘u vayat‘em menasheh la‘asot ’et hara‘ min hagoyim ’asher hishmid yhoh mipenei benei yisra’el. 
2_kings 21:10	vaydaber yhoh beyad ‘awadav hanewi’im leimor. 
2_kings 21:11	ya‘an ’asher ‘asah menasheh melekh yehudah hato‘eiwot ha’eleh heira‘ mikol ’asher ‘asu ha’emori ’asher lefanav vayakhati gam ’et yehudah begilulav. 
2_kings 21:12	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hini meiwi ra‘ah ‘al yerushalim vihudah ’asher kal shome‘av shome‘ah titsalnah shetei ’azenav. 
2_kings 21:13	venatiti ‘al yerushalim ’et qav shomeron ve’et mishqolet bet ’akh’aw umakhiti ’et yerushalim ka’asher yimkheh ’et hatsalakhat makhah vehafakh ‘al paneha. 
2_kings 21:14	venatashti ’et she’eirit nakhalati unetatim beyad ’oyeweihem vehayu lewaz velimshisah lekhal ’oyeweihem. 
2_kings 21:15	ya‘an ’asher ‘asu ’et hara‘ be‘einai vayihyu makh‘isim ’oti min hayom ’asher yatse’u ’awotam mimitsrayim ve‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_kings 21:16	vegam dam naqi shafakh menasheh harbeh me’od ‘ad ’asher milei ’et yerushalim peh lafeh lewad meikhatato ’asher hekheti ’et yehudah la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
2_kings 21:17	veyeter diwrei menasheh vekhal ’asher ‘asah vekhatato ’asher khata halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 21:18	vayishkaw menasheh ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer began beito began ‘uza vayimlokh ’amon beno takhtav. 
2_kings 21:19	ben ‘esrim ushetayim shanah ’amon bemalekho ushetayim shanim malakh birushalim veshem ’imo meshulemet bat kharuts min yatewah. 
2_kings 21:20	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ka’asher ‘asah menasheh ’awiv. 
2_kings 21:21	vayeilekh bekhal haderekh ’asher halakh ’awiv vaya‘awod ’et hagilulim ’asher ‘awad ’awiv vayishtakhu lahem. 
2_kings 21:22	vaya‘azow ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotav velo halakh bederekh yhoh. 
2_kings 21:23	vayiqsheru ‘awdei ’amon ‘alav vayamitu ’et hamelekh beweito. 
2_kings 21:24	vayakh ‘am ha’arets ’et kal haqosherim ‘al hamelekh ’amon vayamlikhu ‘am ha’arets ’et yoshiyahu weno takhtav. 
2_kings 21:25	veyeter diwrei ’amon ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 21:26	vayiqber ’oto biqwurato began ‘uza vayimlokh yoshiyahu weno takhtav. 
2_kings 22:1	ben shemoneh shanah yoshiyahu wemalekho usheloshim ve’akhat shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yedidah wat ‘adayah mibatseqat. 
2_kings 22:2	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh vayeilekh bekhal derekh david ’awiv velo sar yamin usemol. 
2_kings 22:3	vayhi bishmoneh ‘esreh shanah lamelekh yoshiyahu shalakh hamelekh ’et shafan ben ’atsalyahu wen meshulam hasofer bet yhoh leimor. 
2_kings 22:4	‘aleh ’el khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol veyatem ’et hakesef hamuwa bet yhoh ’asher ’asefu shomerei hasaf mei’et ha‘am. 
2_kings 22:5	veyitenoh veyitenuhu ‘al yad ‘osei hamelakhah hamufqadim bewet bet yhoh veyitenu ’oto le‘osei hamelakhah ’asher bewet yhoh lekhazeq bedeq habayit. 
2_kings 22:6	lekharashim velabonim velagoderim veliqnot ‘eitsim ve’awnei makhtsew lekhazeq ’et habayit. 
2_kings 22:7	’akh lo yeikhashew ’itam hakesef hanitan ‘al yadam ki we’emunah hem ‘osim. 
2_kings 22:8	vayomer khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol ‘al shafan hasofer seifer hatorah matsati bewet yhoh vayiten khilqiyah ’et haseifer ’el shafan vayiqra’eihu. 
2_kings 22:9	vayawo shafan hasofer ’el hamelekh vayashew ’et hamelekh dawar vayomer hitikhu ‘awadekha ’et hakesef hanimtsa wabayit vayitenuhu ‘al yad ‘osei hamelakhah hamufqadim bet yhoh. 
2_kings 22:10	vayaged shafan hasofer lamelekh leimor seifer natan li khilqiyah hakohen vayiqra’eihu shafan lifnei hamelekh. 
2_kings 22:11	vayhi kishmoa‘ hamelekh ’et diwrei seifer hatorah vayiqra‘ ’et begadav. 
2_kings 22:12	vaytsav hamelekh ’et khilqiyah hakohen ve’et ’akhiqam benosha fan ve’et ‘akhbor ben mikhayah ve’et shafan hasofer ve’et ‘asayah ‘ewed hamelekh leimor. 
2_kings 22:13	lekhu dirshu ’et yhoh ba‘adi uwe‘ad ha‘am uwe‘ad kal yehudah ‘al diwrei haseifer hanimtsa hazeh ki gedolah khamat yhoh ’asher hi nitsetah wanu ‘al ’asher lo shame‘u ’awoteinu ‘al diwrei haseifer hazeh la‘asot kekhal hakatuw ‘aleinu. 
2_kings 22:14	vayeilekh khilqiyahu hakohen va’akhiqam ve‘akhbor veshafan va‘asayah ’el khuldah hanewi’ah ’eishet shalum ben tiqvah ben kharkhas shomer habegadim vehi yoshewet birushalim bamishneh vaydaberu ’eileha. 
2_kings 22:15	vatomer ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’imru la’ish ’asher shalakh ’etkhem ’eilai. 
2_kings 22:16	koh ’amar yhoh hini meiwi ra‘ah ’el hamaqom hazeh ve‘al yoshewav ’et kal diwrei haseifer ’asher qara melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 22:17	takhat ’asher ‘azawuni vayqateru leilohim ’akheirim lema‘an hakh‘iseini bekhol ma‘aseh yedeihem venitsetah khamati bamaqom hazeh velo tikhbeh. 
2_kings 22:18	ve’el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh ’etkhem lidrosh ’et yhoh koh tomeru ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hadewarim ’asher shama‘eta. 
2_kings 22:19	ya‘an rakh lewawekha vatikana‘ mipenei yhoh beshame‘akha ’asher dibarti ‘al hamaqom hazeh ve‘al yoshewav lihyot leshamah veliqlalah vatiqra‘ ’et begadekha vatiwkeh lefanai vegam ’anokhi shama‘ti ne’um yhoh. 
2_kings 22:20	lakhen hini ’osifkha ‘al ’awotekha vene’esafta ’el qiwrotekha beshalom velo tir’enah ‘einekha bekhol hara‘ah ’asher ’ani meiwi ‘al hamaqom hazeh vayashiwu ’et hamelekh dawar. 
2_kings 23:1	vayishlakh hamelekh vaya’asfu ’eilav kal ziqnei yehudah virushalim. 
2_kings 23:2	vaya‘al hamelekh bet yhoh vekhal ’ish yehudah vekhal yoshewei yerushalim ’ito vehakohanim vehanewi’im vekhal ha‘am lemiqaton ve‘ad gadol vayiqra we’azeneihem ’et kal diwrei seifer haberit hanimtsa bewet yhoh. 
2_kings 23:3	vaya‘amod hamelekh ‘al ha‘amud vayikhrot ’et haberit lifnei yhoh lalekhet ’akhar yhoh velishmor mitsvotav ve’et ‘eidevotav ve’et khuqotav bekhal lew uwekhal nefesh lehaqim ’et diwrei haberit hazot haketuwim ‘al haseifer hazeh vaya‘amod kal ha‘am baberit. 
2_kings 23:4	vaytsav hamelekh ’et khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol ve’et kohanei hamishneh ve’et shomerei hasaf lehotsi meiheikhal yhoh ’et kal hakeilim ha‘asuyim laba‘al vela’asheirah ulekhol tsewa hashamayim vayisrefem mikhuts lirushalim beshadmot qidron venasa ’et ‘afaram bet ’el. 
2_kings 23:5	vehishbit ’et hakemarim ’asher natenu malkhei yehudah vayqater babamot be‘arei yehudah umesibei yerushalim ve’et hamqaterim laba‘al lashemesh velayareiakh velamazalot ulekhol tsewa hashamayim. 
2_kings 23:6	vayotsei ’et ha’asheirah mibet yhoh mikhuts lirushalim ’el nakhal qidron vayisrof ’otah benakhal qidron vayadeq le‘afar vayashlekh ’et ‘afarah ‘al qewer benei ha‘am. 
2_kings 23:7	vayitots ’et batei haqedeishim ’asher bewet yhoh ’asher hanashim ’oregot sham batim la’asheirah. 
2_kings 23:8	vayawei ’et kal hakohanim mei‘arei yehudah vaytamei ’et habamot ’asher qiteru shamah hakohanim migewa‘ ‘ad be’er shawa‘ venatats ’et bamot hashe‘arim ’asher petakh sha‘ar yehoshua‘ sar ha‘ir ’asher ‘al semol ’ish besha‘ar ha‘ir. 
2_kings 23:9	’akh lo ya‘alu kohanei habamot ’el mizbakh yhoh birushalim ki ’im ’akhelu matsot betokh ’akheihem. 
2_kings 23:10	vetimei ’et hatofet ’asher begei wenei wen hinom lewilti leha‘awir ’ish ’et beno ve’et bito ba’esh lamolekh. 
2_kings 23:11	vayashbet ’et hasusim ’asher natenu malkhei yehudah lashemesh mibo wet yhoh ’el lishkat netan melekh hasaris ’asher baparvarim ve’et markewot hashemesh saraf ba’esh. 
2_kings 23:12	ve’et hamizbekhot ’asher ‘al hagag ‘aliyat ’akhaz ’asher ‘asu malkhei yehudah ve’et hamizbekhot ’asher ‘asah menasheh bishtei khatsrot bet yhoh natats hamelekh vayarats misham vehishlikh ’et ‘afaram ’el nakhal qidron. 
2_kings 23:13	ve’et habamot ’asher ‘al penei yerushalim ’asher mimin lehar hamashkhit ’asher banah shelomoh melekh yisra’el le‘ashtoret shiquts tsidonim velikhmosh shiquts mo’aw ulemilkom to‘awat benei ‘amon timei hamelekh. 
2_kings 23:14	veshibar ’et hamatseiwot vayikhrot ’et ha’asheirim vaymalei ’et meqomam ‘atsmot ’adam. 
2_kings 23:15	vegam ’et hamizbeiakh ’asher bewet ’el habamah ’asher ‘asah yarawe‘am ben newat ’asher hekheti ’et yisra’el gam ’et hamizbeiakh hahu ve’et habamah natats vayisrof ’et habamah heidaq le‘afar vesaraf ’asheirah. 
2_kings 23:16	vayifen yoshiyahu vayar ’et haqewarim ’asher sham bahar vayishlakh vayiqakh ’et ha‘atsamot min haqewarim vayisrof ‘al hamizbeiakh vaytame’eihu kidwar yhoh ’asher qara ’ish ha’elohim ’asher qara ’et hadewarim ha’eleh. 
2_kings 23:17	vayomer mah hatsiyun halaz ’asher ’ani ro’eh vayomeru ’eilav ’anshei ha‘ir haqewer ’ish ha’elohim ’asher ba mihudah vayiqra ’et hadewarim ha’eleh ’asher ‘asita ‘al hamizbakh bet ’el. 
2_kings 23:18	vayomer hanikhu lo ’ish ’al yana‘ ‘atsmotav vaymaletu ‘atsmotav ’et ‘atsmot hanawi ’asher ba mishomeron. 
2_kings 23:19	vegam ’et kal batei habamot ’asher be‘arei shomeron ’asher ‘asu malkhei yisra’el lehakh‘is heisir yoshiyahu vaya‘as lahem kekhal hama‘asim ’asher ‘asah bewet ’el. 
2_kings 23:20	vayizbakh ’et kal kohanei habamot ’asher sham ‘al hamizbekhot vayisrof ’et ‘atsmot ’adam ‘aleihem vayashaw yerushalim. 
2_kings 23:21	vaytsav hamelekh ’et kal ha‘am leimor ‘asu fesakh yhoh ’eloheikhem kakatuw ‘al seifer haberit hazeh. 
2_kings 23:22	ki lo na‘asah kapesakh hazeh mimei hashofetim ’asher shafetu ’et yisra’el vekhol yemei malkhei yisra’el umalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 23:23	ki ’im bishmoneh ‘esreh shanah lamelekh yoshiyahu na‘asah hapesakh hazeh yhoh birushalim. 
2_kings 23:24	vegam ’et ha’owot ve’et hayide‘onim ve’et haterafim ve’et hagilulim ve’et kal hashiqutsim ’asher nir’u be’erets yehudah uwirushalim bi‘er yoshiyahu lema‘an haqim ’et diwrei hatorah haketuwim ‘al haseifer ’asher matsa khilqiyahu hakohen bet yhoh. 
2_kings 23:25	vekhamohu lo hayah lefanav melekh ’asher shaw ’el yhoh bekhal lewawo uwekhal nafsho uwekhal me’odo kekhol torat mosheh ve’akharav lo qam kamohu. 
2_kings 23:26	’akh lo shaw yhoh meikharon ’apo hagadol ’asher kharah ’apo bihudah ‘al kal hake‘asim ’asher hikh‘iso menasheh. 
2_kings 23:27	vayomer yhoh gam ’et yehudah ’asir mei‘al panai ka’asher hasiroti ’et yisra’el uma’asti ’et ha‘ir hazot ’asher bakharti ’et yerushalim ve’et habayit ’asher ’amarti yihyeh shemi sham. 
2_kings 23:28	veyeter diwrei yoshiyahu vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 23:29	beyamav ‘alah far‘oh nekhoh melekh mitsrayim ‘al melekh ’ashur ‘al nehar perat vayeilekh hamelekh yoshiyahu liqrato vaymiteihu bimgido kir’oto ’oto. 
2_kings 23:30	vayarkiwuhu ‘awadav met mimegido vaywi’uhu yerushalim vayiqberuhu biqwurato vayiqakh ‘am ha’arets ’et yeho’akhaz ben yoshiyahu vayimshekhu ’oto vayamlikhu ’oto takhat ’awiv. 
2_kings 23:31	ben ‘esrim veshalosh shanah yeho’akhaz bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim veshem ’imo khamutal bat yirmeyahu miliwnah. 
2_kings 23:32	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asu ’awotav. 
2_kings 23:33	vaya’asreihu far‘oh nekhoh weriwlah be’erets khamat bimlokh mimelokh birushalim vayiten ‘onesh ‘al ha’arets mei’ah khikar kesef vekhikar zahaw. 
2_kings 23:34	vayamlekh par‘oh nekhoh ’et ’elyaqim ben yoshiyahu takhat yoshiyahu ’awiv vayasew ’et shemo yehoyaqim ve’et yeho’akhaz laqakh vayawo mitsrayim vayamat sham. 
2_kings 23:35	vehakesef vehazahaw natan yehoyaqim lefar‘oh ’akh he‘erikh ’et ha’arets latet ’et hakesef ‘al pi far‘oh ’ish ke‘erko nagas ’et hakesef ve’et hazahaw ’et ‘am ha’arets latet lefar‘oh nekhoh. 
2_kings 23:36	ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho ve’akhat ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo zewidah zewudah wat pedayah min rumah. 
2_kings 23:37	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asu ’awotav. 
2_kings 24:1	beyamav ‘alah newukhadnetsar melekh bawel vayhi lo yehoyaqim ‘ewed shalosh shanim vayashaw vayimrad bo. 
2_kings 24:2	vayshalakh yhoh bo ’et gedudei khasdim ve’et gedudei ’aram ve’et gedudei mo’aw ve’et gedudei wenei ‘amon vayshalekhem bihudah leha’awido kidwar yhoh ’asher diber beyad ‘awadav hanewi’im. 
2_kings 24:3	’akh ‘al pi yhoh hayetah bihudah lehasir mei‘al panav bekhatot menasheh kekhol ’asher ‘asah. 
2_kings 24:4	vegam dam hanaqi ’asher shafakh vaymalei ’et yerushalim dam naqi velo ’awah yhoh lisloakh. 
2_kings 24:5	veyeter diwrei yehoyaqim vekhal ’asher ‘asah halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 24:6	vayishkaw yehoyaqim ‘im ’awotav vayimlokh yehoyakhin beno takhtav. 
2_kings 24:7	velo hosif ‘od melekh mitsrayim latset mei’artso ki laqakh melekh bawel minakhal mitsrayim ‘ad nehar perat kol ’asher hayetah lemelekh mitsrayim. 
2_kings 24:8	ben shemoneh ‘esreh shanah yehoyakhin bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim veshem ’imo nekhushta wat ’elnatan mirushalim. 
2_kings 24:9	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’awiv. 
2_kings 24:10	ba‘et hahi ‘alah ‘alu ‘awdei newukhadnetsar melekh bawel yerushalim vatawo ha‘ir bamatsor. 
2_kings 24:11	vayawo newukhadnetsar melekh bawel ‘al ha‘ir va‘awadav tsarim ‘aleha. 
2_kings 24:12	vayeitsei yehoyakhin melekh yehudah ‘al melekh bawel hu ve’imo va‘awadav vesarav vesarisav vayiqakh ’oto melekh bawel bishnat shemoneh lemalekho. 
2_kings 24:13	vayotsei misham ’et kal ’otsrot bet yhoh ve’otsrot bet hamelekh vayqatsets ’et kal kelei hazahaw ’asher ‘asah shelomoh melekh yisra’el beheikhal yhoh ka’asher diber yhoh. 
2_kings 24:14	vehiglah ’et kal yerushalim ve’et kal hasarim ve’et kal giborei hakhayil ‘asarah ‘aseret ’alafim goleh vekhal hekharash vehamasger lo nish’ar zulat dalat ‘am ha’arets. 
2_kings 24:15	vayegel ’et yehoyakhin bawelah ve’et ’em hamelekh ve’et neshei hamelekh ve’et sarisav ve’et ’evilei ’eilei ha’arets holikh golah mirushalim bawelah. 
2_kings 24:16	ve’et kal ’anshei hakhayil shiw‘at ’alafim vehekharash vehamasger ’elef hakol giborim ‘osei milkhamah vaywi’em melekh bawel golah bawelah. 
2_kings 24:17	vayamlekh melekh bawel ’et matanyah dodo takhtav vayasew ’et shemo tsidqiyahu. 
2_kings 24:18	ben ‘esrim ve’akhat shanah tsidqiyahu wemalekho ve’akhat ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo khamital khamutal bat yirmeyahu miliwnah. 
2_kings 24:19	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah yehoyaqim. 
2_kings 24:20	ki ‘al ’af yhoh hayetah wirushalim uwihudah ‘ad hishlikho ’otam mei‘al panav vayimrod tsidqiyahu bemelekh bawel. 
2_kings 25:1	vayhi wishnat hateshi‘it lemalekho bakhodesh ha‘asiri be‘asor lakhodesh ba newukhadnetsar melekh bawel hu vekhal kheilo ‘al yerushalim vayikhan ‘aleha vayiwnu ‘aleha dayeq sawiw. 
2_kings 25:2	vatawo ha‘ir bamatsor ‘ad ‘ashtei ‘esreh shanah lamelekh tsidqiyahu. 
2_kings 25:3	betish‘ah lakhodesh vayekhezaq hara‘aw ba‘ir velo hayah lekhem le‘am ha’arets. 
2_kings 25:4	vatibaqa‘ ha‘ir vekhal ’anshei hamilkhamah halaylah derekh sha‘ar ben hakhomotayim ’asher ‘al gan hamelekh vekhasdim ‘al ha‘ir sawiw vayeilekh derekh ha‘arawah. 
2_kings 25:5	vayirdefu khel kasdim ’akhar hamelekh vayasigu ’oto be‘arwot yereikho vekhal kheilo nafotsu mei‘alav. 
2_kings 25:6	vayitpesu ’et hamelekh vaya‘alu ’oto ’el melekh bawel riwlatah vaydaberu ’ito mishpat. 
2_kings 25:7	ve’et benei tsidqiyahu shakhatu le‘einav ve’et ‘einei tsidqiyahu ‘iver vaya’asreihu wankhushtayim vaywi’eihu bawel. 
2_kings 25:8	uwakhodesh hakhamishi beshiw‘ah lakhodesh hi shenat tesha‘ ‘esreh shanah lamelekh newukhadnetsar melekh bawel ba newuzar’adan raw tabakhim ‘ewed melekh bawel yerushalim. 
2_kings 25:9	vayisrof ’et bet yhoh ve’et bet hamelekh ve’et kal batei yerushalim ve’et kal bet gadol saraf ba’esh. 
2_kings 25:10	ve’et khomot yerushalim sawiw natetsu kal khel kasdim ’asher raw tabakhim. 
2_kings 25:11	ve’et yeter ha‘am hanish’arim ba‘ir ve’et hanofelim ’asher nafelu ‘al hamelekh bawel ve’et yeter hehamon heglah newuzar’adan raw tabakhim. 
2_kings 25:12	umidalat ha’arets hish’ir raw tabakhim lekhoremim uleyogewim. 
2_kings 25:13	ve’et ‘amudei hanekhoshet ’asher bet yhoh ve’et hamekhonot ve’et yam hanekhoshet ’asher bewet yhoh shiberu khasdim vayis’u ’et nekhushtam bawelah. 
2_kings 25:14	ve’et hasirot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamzamerot ve’et hakapot ve’et kal kelei hanekhoshet ’asher yesharetu wam laqakhu. 
2_kings 25:15	ve’et hamakhtot ve’et hamizraqot ’asher zahaw zahaw va’asher kesef kasef laqakh raw tabakhim. 
2_kings 25:16	ha‘amudim shenayim hayam ha’ekhad vehamekhonot ’asher ‘asah shelomoh lewet yhoh lo hayah mishqal linkhoshet kal hakeilim ha’eleh. 
2_kings 25:17	shemoneh ‘esreh ’amah qomat ha‘amud ha’ekhad vekhoteret ‘alav nekhoshet veqomat hakoteret shalosh ’amah ’amot usewakhah verimonim ‘al hakoteret sawiw hakol nekhoshet vekha’eleh la‘amud hasheini ‘al hasewakhah. 
2_kings 25:18	vayiqakh raw tabakhim ’et serayah kohen harosh ve’et tsefanyahu kohen mishneh ve’et sheloshet shomerei hasaf. 
2_kings 25:19	umin ha‘ir laqakh saris ’ekhad ’asher hu faqid ‘al ’anshei hamilkhamah vakhamishah ’anashim meiro’ei fenei hamelekh ’asher nimtse’u wa‘ir ve’et hasofer sar hatsawa hamatsbi ’et ‘am ha’arets veshishim ’ish mei‘am ha’arets hanimtse’im ba‘ir. 
2_kings 25:20	vayiqakh ’otam newuzar’adan raw tabakhim vayolekh ’otam ‘al melekh bawel riwlatah. 
2_kings 25:21	vayakh ’otam melekh bawel vaymitem beriwlah be’erets khamat vayigel yehudah mei‘al ’admato. 
2_kings 25:22	veha‘am hanish’ar be’erets yehudah ’asher hish’ir newukhadnetsar melekh bawel vayafqed ‘aleihem ’et gedalyahu ben ’akhiqam ben shafan. 
2_kings 25:23	vayishme‘u khal sarei hakhayalim hemah veha’anashim ki hifqid melekh bawel ’et gedalyahu vayawo’u ’el gedalyahu hamitspah veyishma‘el ben netanyah veyokhanan ben qareiakh userayah wen tankhumet hanetofati veya’azanyahu ben hama‘akhati hemah ve’ansheihem. 
2_kings 25:24	vayishawa‘ lahem gedalyahu ule’ansheihem vayomer lahem ’al tire’u mei‘awdei hakasdim shewu wa’arets ve‘iwdu ’et melekh bawel veyitaw lakhem. 
2_kings 25:25	vayhi bakhodesh hashewi‘i ba yishma‘el ben netanyah ben ’elishama‘ mizera‘ hamelukhah va‘asarah ’anashim ’ito vayaku ’et gedalyahu vayamot ve’et hayehudim ve’et hakasdim ’asher hayu ’ito bamitspah. 
2_kings 25:26	vayaqumu khal ha‘am miqaton ve‘ad gadol vesarei hakhayalim vayawo’u mitsrayim ki yare’u mipenei khasdim. 
2_kings 25:27	vayhi wishloshim vashewa‘ shanah legalut yehoyakhin melekh yehudah bishnem ‘asar khodesh be‘esrim veshiw‘ah lakhodesh nasa ’evil merodakh melekh bawel bishnat malekho ’et rosh yehoyakhin melekh yehudah mibet kele. 
2_kings 25:28	vaydaber ’ito towot vayiten ’et kis’o mei‘al kisei hamelakhim ’asher ’ito bewawel. 
2_kings 25:29	veshina ’et bigdei khil’o ve’akhal lekhem tamid lefanav kal yemei khayav. 
2_kings 25:30	va’arukhato ’arukhat tamid nitenah lo mei’et hamelekh dewar yom beyomo kol yemei khayav. 
isaiah 1:1	khazon yesha‘yahu wen ’amots ’asher khazah ‘al yehudah virushalim bimei ‘uziyahu yotam ’akhaz yekhizqiyahu malkhei yehudah. 
isaiah 1:2	shim‘u shamayim veha’azini ’erets ki yhoh diber banim gidalti veromamti vehem pashe‘u wi. 
isaiah 1:3	yada‘ shor qoneihu vakhamor ’eiwus be‘alav yisra’el lo yada‘ ‘ami lo hitbonan. 
isaiah 1:4	ho go khotei ‘am kewed ‘avon zera‘ merei‘im banim mashkhitim ‘azewu ’et yhoh ni’atsu ’et qedosh yisra’el nazoru ’akhor. 
isaiah 1:5	‘al meh tuku ‘od tosifu sarah kal rosh lakholi vekhal leiwaw davai. 
isaiah 1:6	mikaf regel ve‘ad rosh ’en bo metom petsa‘ vekhaburah umakah teriyah lo zoru velo khubashu velo rukekhah bashamen. 
isaiah 1:7	’artsekhem shemamah ‘areikhem serufot ’esh ’admatkhem lenegdekhem zarim ’okhelim ’otah ushemamah kemahpeikhat zarim. 
isaiah 1:8	venotrah wat tsiyon kesukah wekharem kimlunah wemiqshah ke‘ir netsurah. 
isaiah 1:9	lulei yhoh tsewa’ot hotir lanu sarid kim‘at kisdom hayinu la‘amorah daminu. 
isaiah 1:10	shim‘u dewar yhoh qetsinei sedom ha’azinu torat ’eloheinu ‘am ‘amorah. 
isaiah 1:11	lamah li row ziwkheikhem yomar yhoh sawa‘ti ‘olot ’eilim vekheilew meri’im vedam parim ukhewasim ve‘atudim lo khafatseti. 
isaiah 1:12	ki tawo’u leira’ot panai mi wiqesh zot miyedkhem remos khatseirai. 
isaiah 1:13	lo tosifu hawi minkhat shav qetoret to‘eiwah hi li khodesh veshabat qero miqra lo ’ukhal ’aven va‘atsarah. 
isaiah 1:14	khadesheikhem umo‘adeikhem sane’ah nafshi hayu ‘alai latorakh nil’eiti neso. 
isaiah 1:15	uwefariskhem kapeikhem ’a‘lim ‘einai mikem gam ki tarbu tefilah ’eineni shomeia‘ yedeikhem damim malei’u. 
isaiah 1:16	rakhatsu hizaku hasiru roa‘ ma‘aleikhem mineged ‘einai khidlu hareia‘. 
isaiah 1:17	limdu heitew dirshu mishpat ’asheru khamots shiftu yatom riwu ’almanah. 
isaiah 1:18	lekhu na venivakhekhah yomar yhoh ’im yihyu khata’eikhem kashanim kasheleg yalbinu ’im ya’dimu khatola‘ katsemer yihyu. 
isaiah 1:19	’im towu ushema‘tem tuw ha’arets tokheilu. 
isaiah 1:20	ve’im tema’anu umeritem kherew te’ukelu ki pi yhoh diber. 
isaiah 1:21	’eikhah hayetah lezonah qiryah ne’emanah melei’ati mishpat tsedeq yalin bah ve‘atah meratsekhim. 
isaiah 1:22	kaspekh hayah lesigim sawe’ekh mahul bamayim. 
isaiah 1:23	sarayikh sorim vekhawrei ganawim kulo ’ohew shokhad verodef shalmonim yatom lo yishpotu veriw ’almanah lo yawo ’aleihem. 
isaiah 1:24	lakhen ne’um ha’adon yhoh tsewa’ot ’awir yisra’el ho ’enakhem mitsarai ve’inaqemah mei’oywai. 
isaiah 1:25	ve’ashiwah yadi ‘alayikh ve’etsrof kabor sigayikh ve’asirah kal bedilayikh. 
isaiah 1:26	ve’ashiwah shofetayikh kewarishonah veyo‘atsayikh kewatekhilah ’akharei khen yiqarei lakh ‘ir hatsedeq qiryah ne’emanah. 
isaiah 1:27	tsiyon bemishpat tipadeh veshaweha bitsdaqah. 
isaiah 1:28	veshewer poshe‘im vekhata’im yakhdav ve‘ozewei yhoh yikhlu. 
isaiah 1:29	ki yeiwoshu mei’eilim ’asher khamadtem vetakhperu meihaganot ’asher bekhartem. 
isaiah 1:30	ki tihyu ke’eilah nowelet ‘aleha ukheganah ’asher mayim ’en lah. 
isaiah 1:31	vehayah hekhason lin‘oret ufo‘alo lenitsots uwa‘aru sheneihem yakhdav ve’en mekhabeh. 
isaiah 2:1	hadawar ’asher khazah yesha‘yahu ben ’amots ‘al yehudah virushalim. 
isaiah 2:2	vehayah be’akharit hayamim nakhon yihyeh har bet yhoh berosh heharim venisa migewa‘ot venaharu ’eilav kal hagoyim. 
isaiah 2:3	vehalekhu ‘amim rabim ve’ameru lekhu vena‘aleh ’el har yhoh ’el bet ’elohei ya‘aqow veyoreinu miderakhav veneilekhah be’orekhotav ki mitsiyon teitsei torah udewar yhoh mirushalim. 
isaiah 2:4	veshafat ben hagoyim vehokhiakh le‘amim rabim vekhitetu kharwotam le’itim vakhanitoteihem lemazmeirot lo yisa go ’el go kherew velo yilmedu ‘od milkhamah. 
isaiah 2:5	bet ya‘aqow lekhu veneilekhah be’or yhoh. 
isaiah 2:6	ki natashtah ‘amekha bet ya‘aqow ki male’u miqedem ve‘onenim kapelishtim uweyaldei nakherim yaspiqu. 
isaiah 2:7	vatimalei ’artso kesef vezahaw ve’en qeitseh le’otserotav vatimalei ’artso susim ve’en qeitseh lemarkewotav. 
isaiah 2:8	vatimalei ’artso ’elilim lema‘aseh yadav yishtakhavu la’asher ‘asu ’etsbe‘otav. 
isaiah 2:9	vayishakh ’adam vayishpal ’ish ve’al tisa lahem. 
isaiah 2:10	bo watsur vehitamen be‘afar mipenei pakhad yhoh umeihadar ge’ono. 
isaiah 2:11	‘einei gawhut ’adam shafel veshakh rum ’anashim venisgaw yhoh lewado bayom hahu. 
isaiah 2:12	ki yom yhoh tsewa’ot ‘al kal gei’eh varam ve‘al kal nisa veshafel. 
isaiah 2:13	ve‘al kal ’arzei halewanon haramim vehanisa’im ve‘al kal ’alonei habashan. 
isaiah 2:14	ve‘al kal heharim haramim ve‘al kal hagewa‘ot hanisa’ot. 
isaiah 2:15	ve‘al kal migdal gawoha ve‘al kal khomah wetsurah. 
isaiah 2:16	ve‘al kal ’oniyot tarshish ve‘al kal sekhiyot hakhemdah. 
isaiah 2:17	veshakh gawhut ha’adam veshafel rum ’anashim venisgaw yhoh lewado bayom hahu. 
isaiah 2:18	veha’elilim kalil yakhalof. 
isaiah 2:19	uwa’u bim‘arot tsurim uwimkhilot ‘afar mipenei pakhad yhoh umeihadar ge’ono bequmo la‘arots ha’arets. 
isaiah 2:20	bayom hahu yashlikh ha’adam ’et ’elilei khaspo ve’et ’elilei zehawo ’asher ‘asu lo lehishtakhavot lakhpor peirot vela‘ataleifim. 
isaiah 2:21	lawo beniqrot hatsurim uwis‘ifei hasela‘im mipenei pakhad yhoh umeihadar ge’ono bequmo la‘arots ha’arets. 
isaiah 2:22	khidlu lakhem min ha’adam ’asher neshamah be’apo ki wameh nekhshaw hu. 
isaiah 3:1	ki hineh ha’adon yhoh tsewa’ot meisir mirushalim umihudah mash‘en umash‘einah kol mish‘an lekhem vekhol mish‘an mayim. 
isaiah 3:2	gibor ve’ish milkhamah shofet venawi veqosem vezaqen. 
isaiah 3:3	sar khamishim unesu fanim veyo‘ets vakhakham kharashim unewon lakhash. 
isaiah 3:4	venatati ne‘arim sareihem veta‘alulim yimshelu wam. 
isaiah 3:5	venigas ha‘am ’ish be’ish ve’ish berei‘eihu yirhawu hana‘ar bazaqen vehaniqleh banikhbad. 
isaiah 3:6	ki yitpos ’ish be’akhiv bet ’awiv simlah lekhah qatsin tihyeh lanu vehamakhsheilah hazot takhat yadekha. 
isaiah 3:7	yisa wayom hahu leimor lo ’ehyeh khowesh uweweiti ’en lekhem ve’en simlah lo tesimuni qetsin ‘am. 
isaiah 3:8	ki khashelah yerushalim vihudah nafal ki leshonam uma‘aleihem ’el yhoh lamrot ‘einei khewodo. 
isaiah 3:9	hakarat peneihem ‘anetah bam vekhatatam kisdom higidu lo khikheidu ’o lenafsham ki gamelu lahem ra‘ah. 
isaiah 3:10	’imru tsadiq ki tow ki feri ma‘aleihem yokheilu. 
isaiah 3:11	’o lerasha‘ ra‘ ki gemul yadav yei‘aseh lo. 
isaiah 3:12	‘ami nogesav me‘olel venashim mashelu wo ‘ami me’asherekha mat‘im vederekh ’orekhotekha bilei‘u. 
isaiah 3:13	nitsaw lariw yhoh ve‘omed ladin ‘amim. 
isaiah 3:14	yhoh bemishpat yawo ‘im ziqnei ‘amo vesarav ve’atem bi‘artem hakerem gezeilat he‘ani bewateikhem. 
isaiah 3:15	malakhem mah lakhem tedake’u ‘ami ufenei ‘aniyim titkhanu ne’um ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot. 
isaiah 3:16	vayomer yhoh ya‘an ki gawehu benot tsiyon vateilakhnah netvot netuyot garon umesaqerot ‘einayim halokh vetafof teilakhnah uweragleihem te‘akasnah. 
isaiah 3:17	vesipakh ’adonai qadeqod benot tsiyon yhoh patehen ye‘areh. 
isaiah 3:18	bayom hahu yasir ’adonai ’et tif’eret ha‘akhasim vehashewisim vehasaharonim. 
isaiah 3:19	hanetifot vehasheirot vehare‘alot. 
isaiah 3:20	hape’eirim vehatse‘adot vehaqishurim uwatei hanefesh vehalekhashim. 
isaiah 3:21	hataba‘ot venizmei ha’af. 
isaiah 3:22	hamakhalatsot vehama‘atafot vehamitpakhot vehakharitim. 
isaiah 3:23	vehagilyonim vehasedinim vehatsenifot veharedidim. 
isaiah 3:24	vehayah takhat bosem maq yihyeh vetakhat khagorah niqpah vetakhat ma‘aseh miqsheh qarekhah vetakhat petigil makhagoret saq ki takhat yofi. 
isaiah 3:25	metayikh bakherew yipolu ugewuratekh bamilkhamah. 
isaiah 3:26	ve’anu ve’awelu petakheha veniqatah la’arets teishew. 
isaiah 4:1	vehekheziqu shewa‘ nashim be’ish ’ekhad bayom hahu leimor lakhmeinu nokhel vesimlateinu nilbash raq yiqarei shimkha ‘aleinu ’esof kherpateinu. 
isaiah 4:2	bayom hahu yihyeh tsemakh yhoh litswi ulekhawod uferi ha’arets lega’on uletif’eret lifleitat yisra’el. 
isaiah 4:3	vehayah hanish’ar betsiyon vehanotar birushalim qadosh yei’amer lo kal hakatuw lakhayim birushalim. 
isaiah 4:4	’im rakhats ’adonai ’et tso’at benot tsiyon ve’et demei yerushalim yadiakh miqirbah beruakh mishpat uweruakh ba‘er. 
isaiah 4:5	uwara yhoh ‘al kal mekhon har tsiyon ve‘al miqra’eha ‘anan yomam ve‘ashan venogah ’esh lehawah layelah ki ‘al kal kawod khupah. 
isaiah 4:6	vesukah tihyeh letsel yomam meikhorew ulemakhseh ulemistor mizerem umimatar. 
isaiah 5:1	’ashirah na lididi shirat dodi lekharmo kerem hayah lididi beqeren ben shamen. 
isaiah 5:2	vai‘azeqeihu vaysaqeleihu vayita‘eihu soreq vayiwen migdal betokho vegam yeqew khatsew bo vayqav la‘asot ‘anawim vaya‘as be’ushim. 
isaiah 5:3	ve‘atah yoshew yerushalim ve’ish yehudah shiftu na beini uwen karmi. 
isaiah 5:4	mah la‘asot ‘od lekharmi velo ‘asiti bo madua‘ qiveiti la‘asot ‘anawim vaya‘as be’ushim. 
isaiah 5:5	ve‘atah ’odi‘ah na ’etkhem ’et ’asher ’ani ‘oseh lekharmi haser mesukato vehayah lewa‘er parots gedeiro vehayah lemirmas. 
isaiah 5:6	va’ashiteihu watah lo yizamer velo yei‘ader ve‘alah shamir vashayit ve‘al he‘awim ’atsaveh meihamtir ‘alav matar. 
isaiah 5:7	ki kherem yhoh tsewa’ot bet yisra’el ve’ish yehudah neta‘ sha‘ashu‘av vayqav lemishpat vehineh mispakh litsdaqah vehineh tse‘aqah. 
isaiah 5:8	ho magi‘ei wayit bewayit sadeh wesadeh yaqriwu ‘ad ’efes maqom vehushawtem lewadekhem beqerew ha’arets. 
isaiah 5:9	be’azenai yhoh tsewa’ot ’im lo batim rabim leshamah yihyu gedolim vetowim mei’en yoshew. 
isaiah 5:10	ki ‘aseret tsimdei kherem ya‘asu bat ’ekhat vezera‘ khomer ya‘aseh ’eifah. 
isaiah 5:11	ho mashkimei waboqer sheikhar yirdofu me’akharei waneshef yayin yadliqem. 
isaiah 5:12	vehayah khinor vanewel tof vekhalil vayayin mishteihem ve’et po‘al yhoh lo yabitu uma‘aseh yadav lo ra’u. 
isaiah 5:13	lakhen galah ‘ami mibeli da‘at ukhewodo metei ra‘aw vahamono tsikheh tsama. 
isaiah 5:14	lakhen hirkhiwah she’ol nafshah ufa‘arah fiha liwli khoq veyarad hadarah vahamonah ushe’onah ve‘alez bah. 
isaiah 5:15	vayishakh ’adam vayishpal ’ish ve‘einei gewohim tishpalnah. 
isaiah 5:16	vayigbah yhoh tsewa’ot bamishpat veha’el haqadosh niqdash bitsdaqah. 
isaiah 5:17	vera‘u khewasim kedaweram vekharewot meikhim garim yokheilu. 
isaiah 5:18	ho moshekhei he‘avon bekhawlei hashav vekha‘awot ha‘agalah khata’ah. 
isaiah 5:19	ha’omerim yemaher yakhishah ma‘aseihu lema‘an nir’eh vetiqraw vetawo’ah ‘atsat qedosh yisra’el veneida‘ah. 
isaiah 5:20	ho ha’omerim lara‘ tow velatow ra‘ samim khoshekh le’or ve’or lekhoshekh samim mar lematoq umatoq lemar. 
isaiah 5:21	ho khakhamim be‘eineihem veneged peneihem newonim. 
isaiah 5:22	ho giborim lishtot yayin ve’anshei khayil limsokh sheikhar. 
isaiah 5:23	matsdiqei rasha‘ ‘eiqew shokhad vetsidqat tsadiqim yasiru mimenu. 
isaiah 5:24	lakhen ke’ekhol qash leshon ’esh vakhashash lehawah yirpeh sharesham kamaq yihyeh ufirkham ka’awaq ya‘aleh ki ma’asu ’et torat yhoh tsewa’ot ve’et ’imrat qedosh yisra’el ni’eitsu. 
isaiah 5:25	‘al ken kharah ’af yhoh be‘amo vayet yado ‘alav vayakeihu vayirgezu heharim vatehi niwlatam kasukhah beqerew khutsot bekhal zot lo shaw ’apo ve‘od yado netuyah. 
isaiah 5:26	venasa nes lagoyim meirakhoq vesharaq lo miqtseh ha’arets vehineh meheirah qal yawo. 
isaiah 5:27	’en ‘ayef ve’en koshel bo lo yanum velo yishan velo niftakh ’eizor khalatsav velo nitaq serokh ne‘alav. 
isaiah 5:28	’asher khitsav shenunim vekhal qashetotav derukhot parsot susav katsar nekhshawu vegalgilav kasufah. 
isaiah 5:29	she’agah lo kalawi vesha’ag yish’ag kakefirim veyinhom veyokhez teref veyaflit ve’en matsil. 
isaiah 5:30	veyinhom ‘alav bayom hahu kenahamat yam venibat la’arets vehineh khoshekh tsar va’or khashakh ba‘arifeha. 
isaiah 6:1	bishnat mot hamelekh ‘uziyahu va’er’eh ’et ’adonai yoshew ‘al kisei ram venisa veshulav melei’im ’et haheikhal. 
isaiah 6:2	serafim ‘omedim mima‘al lo shesh kenafayim shesh kenafayim le’ekhad bishtayim yekhaseh fanav uwishtayim yekhaseh raglav uwishtayim ye‘ofef. 
isaiah 6:3	veqara zeh ’el zeh ve’amar qadosh qadosh qadosh yhoh tsewa’ot melo khal ha’arets kewodo. 
isaiah 6:4	vayanu‘u ’amot hasipim miqol haqorei vehabayit yimalei ‘ashan. 
isaiah 6:5	va’omar ’o li khi nidmeiti ki ’ish temei sefatayim ’anokhi uwetokh ‘am temei sefatayim ’anokhi yoshew ki ’et hamelekh yhoh tsewa’ot ra’u ‘einai. 
isaiah 6:6	vaya‘af ’eilai ’ekhad min haserafim uweyado ritspah bemelqakhayim laqakh mei‘al hamizbeiakh. 
isaiah 6:7	vayaga‘ ‘al pi vayomer hineh naga‘ zeh ‘al sefatekha vesar ‘avonekha vekhatatekha tekhupar. 
isaiah 6:8	va’eshma‘ ’et qol ’adonai ’omer ’et mi ’eshlakh umi yeilekh lanu va’omar hini shelakheini. 
isaiah 6:9	vayomer lekh ve’amarta la‘am hazeh shim‘u shamoa‘ ve’al tawinu ure’u ra’o ve’al teida‘u. 
isaiah 6:10	hashmen lew ha‘am hazeh ve’azenav hakhbed ve‘einav hasha‘ pen yir’eh we‘einav uwe’azenav yishma‘ ulewawo yawin vashaw verafa lo. 
isaiah 6:11	va’omar ‘ad matai ’adonai vayomer ‘ad ’asher ’im sha’u ‘arim mei’en yoshew uwatim mei’en ’adam veha’adamah tisha’eh shemamah. 
isaiah 6:12	verikhaq yhoh ’et ha’adam verabah ha‘azuwah beqerew ha’arets. 
isaiah 6:13	ve‘od bah ‘asiriyah veshawah vehayetah lewa‘er ka’eilah vekha’alon ’asher beshalekhet matsewet bam zera‘ qodesh matsawtah. 
isaiah 7:1	vayhi bimei ’akhaz ben yotam ben ‘uziyahu melekh yehudah ‘alah retsin melekh ’aram ufeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra’el yerushalim lamilkhamah ‘aleha velo yakhol lehilakhem ‘aleha. 
isaiah 7:2	vayugad lewet david leimor nakhah ’aram ‘al ’efrayim vayana‘ lewawo ulewaw ‘amo kenoa‘ ‘atsei ya‘ar mipenei ruakh. 
isaiah 7:3	vayomer yhoh ’el yesha‘yahu tsei na liqrat ’akhaz ’atah ushe’ar yashuw benekha ’el qetseh te‘alat habereikhah ha‘elyonah ’el mesilat sedeh khowes. 
isaiah 7:4	ve’amarta ’eilav hishamer vehashqet ’al tira ulewawekha ’al yeirakh mishenei zanwot ha’udim ha‘asheinim ha’eleh bakhori ’af retsin va’aram uwen remalyahu. 
isaiah 7:5	ya‘an ki ya‘ats ‘alekha ’aram ra‘ah ’efrayim uwen remalyahu leimor. 
isaiah 7:6	na‘aleh wihudah uneqitsenah venawqi‘enah ’eileinu venamlikh melekh betokhah ’et ben tawe’al. 
isaiah 7:7	koh ’amar ’adonai yhoh lo taqum velo tihyeh. 
isaiah 7:8	ki rosh ’aram dameseq verosh dameseq retsin uwe‘od shishim vekhamesh shanah yeikhat ’efrayim mei‘am. 
isaiah 7:9	verosh ’efrayim shomeron verosh shomeron ben remalyahu ’im lo ta’aminu ki lo tei’ameinu. 
isaiah 7:10	vayosef yhoh daber ’el ’akhaz leimor. 
isaiah 7:11	she’al lekha ’ot mei‘im yhoh ’elohekha ha‘meq she’alah ’o hagbeiah lema‘elah. 
isaiah 7:12	vayomer ’akhaz lo ’esh’al velo ’anaseh ’et yhoh. 
isaiah 7:13	vayomer shim‘u na bet david ham‘at mikem hal’ot ’anashim ki tal’u gam ’et ’elohai. 
isaiah 7:14	lakhen yiten ’adonai hu lakhem ’ot hineh ha‘almah harah veyoledet ben veqarat shemo ‘imanu ’el. 
isaiah 7:15	khem’ah udewash yokhel leda‘to ma’os bara‘ uwakhor batow. 
isaiah 7:16	ki beterem yeida‘ hana‘ar ma’os bara‘ uwakhor batow tei‘azew ha’adamah ’asher ’atah qats mipenei shenei melakheha. 
isaiah 7:17	yawi yhoh ‘alekha ve‘al ‘amekha ve‘al bet ’awikha yamim ’asher lo wa’u lemiyom sur ’efrayim mei‘al yehudah ’et melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 7:18	vehayah bayom hahu yishroq yhoh lazewuw ’asher biqtseh ye’orei mitsrayim veladeworah ’asher be’erets ’ashur. 
isaiah 7:19	uwa’u venakhu khulam benakhalei habatot uwinqiqei hasela‘im uwekhol hana‘atsutsim uwekhol hanahalolim. 
isaiah 7:20	bayom hahu yegalakh ’adonai beta‘ar hasekhirah be‘ewrei nahar bemelekh ’ashur ’et harosh vesa‘ar haraglayim vegam ’et hazaqan tispeh. 
isaiah 7:21	vehayah bayom hahu yekhayeh ’ish ‘eglat baqar ushetei tson. 
isaiah 7:22	vehayah meirow ‘asot khalaw yokhal khem’ah ki khem’ah udewash yokhel kal hanotar beqerew ha’arets. 
isaiah 7:23	vehayah bayom hahu yihyeh khal maqom ’asher yihyeh sham ’elef gefen be’elef kasef lashamir velashayit yihyeh. 
isaiah 7:24	bakhitsim uwaqeshet yawo shamah ki shamir vashayit tihyeh khal ha’arets. 
isaiah 7:25	vekhol heharim ’asher bama‘der yei‘adeirun lo tawo shamah yir’at shamir vashayit vehayah lemishlakh shor ulemirmas seh. 
isaiah 8:1	vayomer yhoh ’eilai qakh lekha gilayon gadol ukhetow ‘alav bekheret ’enosh lemaher shalal khash baz. 
isaiah 8:2	ve’a‘idah li ‘eidim ne’emanim ’et ’uriyah hakohen ve’et zekharyahu ben yewerekhyahu. 
isaiah 8:3	va’eqraw ’el hanewi’ah vatahar vateiled ben vayomer yhoh ’eilai qera shemo maher shalal khash baz. 
isaiah 8:4	ki beterem yeida‘ hana‘ar qero ’awi ve’imi yisa ’et khel dameseq ve’et shelal shomeron lifnei melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 8:5	vayosef yhoh daber ’eilai ‘od leimor. 
isaiah 8:6	ya‘an ki ma’as ha‘am hazeh ’et mei hashiloakh haholekhim le’at umesos ’et retsin uwen remalyahu. 
isaiah 8:7	velakhen hineh ’adonai ma‘aleh ‘aleihem ’et mei hanahar ha‘atsumim veharabim ’et melekh ’ashur ve’et kal kewodo ve‘alah ‘al kal ’afiqav vehalakh ‘al kal gedotav. 
isaiah 8:8	vekhalaf bihudah shataf ve‘awar ‘ad tsavar yagia‘ vehayah mutot kenafav melo rokhaw ’artsekha ‘imanu ’el. 
isaiah 8:9	ro‘u ‘amim vakhotu veha’azinu kol merkhaqei ’arets hit’azeru vakhotu hit’azeru vakhotu. 
isaiah 8:10	‘utsu ‘eitsah vetufar daberu dawar velo yaqum ki ‘imanu ’el. 
isaiah 8:11	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’eilai kekhezqat hayad veyisereini milekhet bederekh ha‘am hazeh leimor. 
isaiah 8:12	lo tomerun qesher lekhol ’asher yomar ha‘am hazeh qasher ve’et mora’o lo tire’u velo ta‘aritsu. 
isaiah 8:13	’et yhoh tsewa’ot ’oto taqdishu vehu mora’akhem vehu ma‘aritskhem. 
isaiah 8:14	vehayah lemiqdash ule’ewen negef uletsur mikhshol lishnei watei yisra’el lefakh ulemoqesh leyoshew yerushalim. 
isaiah 8:15	vekhashelu wam rabim venafelu venishbaru venoqshu venilkadu. 
isaiah 8:16	tsor te‘udah khatom torah belimudai. 
isaiah 8:17	vekhikiti yhoh hamastir panav mibet ya‘aqow veqiveiti lo. 
isaiah 8:18	hineh ’anokhi vehayladim ’asher natan li yhoh le’otot ulemoftim beyisra’el mei‘im yhoh tsewa’ot hashokhen behar tsiyon. 
isaiah 8:19	vekhi yomeru ’aleikhem dirshu ’el ha’owot ve’el hayide‘onim hamtsaftsefim vehamahgim halo ‘am ’el ’elohav yidrosh be‘ad hakhayim ’el hameitim. 
isaiah 8:20	letorah velit‘udah ’im lo yomeru kadawar hazeh ’asher ’en lo shakhar. 
isaiah 8:21	ve‘awar bah niqsheh vera‘ew vehayah khi yir‘aw vehitqatsaf veqilel bemalko uweilohav ufanah lema‘elah. 
isaiah 8:22	ve’el ’erets yabit vehineh tsarah vakhasheikhah me‘uf tsuqah va’afeilah menudakh. 
isaiah 9:1	ki lo mu‘af la’asher mutsaq lah ka‘et harishon heiqal ’artsah zewulun ve’artsah naftali veha’akharon hikhbid derekh hayam ‘eiwer hayarden gelil hagoyim. 
isaiah 9:2	ha‘am haholekhim bakhoshekh ra’u ’or gadol yoshewei be’erets tsalmavet ’or nagah ‘aleihem. 
isaiah 9:3	hirbita hago lo lo higdalta hasimkhah samekhu lefanekha kesimkhat baqatsir ka’asher yagilu bekhaleqam shalal. 
isaiah 9:4	ki ’et ‘ol subolo ve’et mateh shikhmo sheiwet hanoges bo hakhitota keyom midyan. 
isaiah 9:5	ki khal se’on so’en bera‘ash vesimlah megolalah wedamim vehayetah lisreifah ma’akholet ’esh. 
isaiah 9:6	ki yeled yulad lanu ben nitan lanu vatehi hamisrah ‘al shikhmo vayiqra shemo pele yo‘ets ’el gibor ’awi‘ad sar shalom. 
isaiah 9:7	lemarbeh lemarbeh hamisrah uleshalom ’en qets ‘al kisei david ve‘al mamlakhto lehakhin ’otah ulesa‘adah bemishpat uwitsdaqah mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam qin’at yhoh tsewa’ot ta‘aseh zot. 
isaiah 9:8	dawar shalakh ’adonai beya‘aqow venafal beyisra’el. 
isaiah 9:9	veyade‘u ha‘am kulo ’efrayim veyoshew shomeron bega’avah uwegodel leiwaw leimor. 
isaiah 9:10	leweinim nafalu vegazit niwneh shiqmim guda‘u va’arazim nakhalif. 
isaiah 9:11	vaysagew yhoh ’et tsarei retsin ‘alav ve’et ’oyewav yesakhsekh. 
isaiah 9:12	’aram miqedem ufelishtim mei’akhor vayokhelu ’et yisra’el bekhal peh bekhal zot lo shaw ’apo ve‘od yado netuyah. 
isaiah 9:13	veha‘am lo shaw ‘ad hamakeihu ve’et yhoh tsewa’ot lo darashu. 
isaiah 9:14	vayakhret yhoh miyisra’el rosh vezanaw kipah ve’agmon yom ’ekhad. 
isaiah 9:15	zaqen unesu fanim hu harosh venawi moreh sheqer hu hazanaw. 
isaiah 9:16	vayihyu me’asherei ha‘am hazeh mat‘im ume’usharav mewula‘im. 
isaiah 9:17	‘al ken ‘al bakhurav lo yismakh ’adonai ve’et yetomav ve’et ’almenotav lo yerakhem ki khulo khanef umeira‘ vekhal peh dower newalah bekhal zot lo shaw ’apo ve‘od yado netuyah. 
isaiah 9:18	ki wa‘arah kha’esh rish‘ah shamir vashayit tokhel vatitsat besiwkhei haya‘ar vayit’abekhu gei’ut ‘ashan. 
isaiah 9:19	be‘ewrat yhoh tsewa’ot ne‘tam ’arets vayhi ha‘am kema’akholet ’esh ’ish ’el ’akhiv lo yakhmolu. 
isaiah 9:20	vayigzor ‘al yamin vera‘ew vayokhal ‘al semol velo sawei‘u ’ish besar zero‘o yokheilu. 
isaiah 9:21	menasheh ’et ’efrayim ve’efrayim ’et menasheh yakhdav hemah ‘al yehudah bekhal zot lo shaw ’apo ve‘od yado netuyah. 
isaiah 10:1	ho hakhoqeqim khiqei ’aven umekhatewim ‘amal kiteiwu. 
isaiah 10:2	lehatot midin dalim veligzol mishpat ‘aniyei ‘ami lihyot ’almanot shelalam ve’et yetomim yawozu. 
isaiah 10:3	umah ta‘asu leyom pequdah ulesho’ah mimerkhaq tawo ‘al mi tanusu le‘ezrah ve’anah ta‘azwu kewodkhem. 
isaiah 10:4	bilti khara‘ takhat ’asir vetakhat harugim yipolu bekhal zot lo shaw ’apo ve‘od yado netuyah. 
isaiah 10:5	ho ’ashur sheiwet ’api umateh hu weyadam za‘mi. 
isaiah 10:6	bego khanef ’ashalekhenu ve‘al ‘am ‘ewrati ’atsavenu lishlol shalal velawoz baz ulesimo ulesumo mirmas kekhomer khutsot. 
isaiah 10:7	vehu lo khen yedameh ulewawo lo khen yakhshow ki lehashmid bilwawo ulehakhrit goyim lo me‘at. 
isaiah 10:8	ki yomar halo sarai yakhdav melakhim. 
isaiah 10:9	halo kekharkemish kalno ’im lo khe’arpad khamat ’im lo khedameseq shomeron. 
isaiah 10:10	ka’asher matse’ah yadi lemamlekhot ha’elil ufesileihem mirushalim umishomeron. 
isaiah 10:11	halo ka’asher ‘asiti leshomeron vele’elileha ken ’e‘eseh lirushalim vela‘atsabeha. 
isaiah 10:12	vehayah ki yewatsa‘ ’adonai ’et kal ma‘aseihu behar tsiyon uwirushalim ’efqod ‘al peri godel lewaw melekh ’ashur ve‘al tif’eret rum ‘einav. 
isaiah 10:13	ki ’amar bekhoakh yadi ‘asiti uwekhakhemati ki newunoti ve’asir gewulot ‘amim va‘atidoteihem va‘atudoteihem shoseiti ve’orid kabir yoshewim. 
isaiah 10:14	vatimtsa khaqen yadi lekhel ha‘amim vekhe’esof beitsim ‘azuwot kal ha’arets ’ani ’asafeti velo hayah noded kanaf ufotseh feh umetsaftsef. 
isaiah 10:15	hayitpa’er hagarzen ‘al hakhotsew bo ’im yitgadel hamasor ‘al menifo kehanif sheiwet ve’et merimav keharim mateh lo ‘ets. 
isaiah 10:16	lakhen yeshalakh ha’adon yhoh tsewa’ot bemishmanav razon vetakhat kewodo yeiqad yeqod kiqod ’esh. 
isaiah 10:17	vehayah ’or yisra’el le’esh uqedosho lelehawah uwa‘arah ve’akhelah shito ushemiro beyom ’ekhad. 
isaiah 10:18	ukhewod ya‘ro vekharmilo minefesh ve‘ad basar yekhaleh vehayah kimsos noses. 
isaiah 10:19	ushe’ar ‘ets ya‘ro mispar yihyu vena‘ar yikhtewem. 
isaiah 10:20	vehayah bayom hahu lo yosif ‘od she’ar yisra’el ufeleitat bet ya‘aqow lehisha‘en ‘al makeihu venish‘an ‘al yhoh qedosh yisra’el be’emet. 
isaiah 10:21	she’ar yashuw she’ar ya‘aqow ’el ’el gibor. 
isaiah 10:22	ki ’im yihyeh ‘amekha yisra’el kekhol hayam she’ar yashuw bo kilayon kharuts shotef tsedaqah. 
isaiah 10:23	ki khalah venekheratsah ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot ‘oseh beqerew kal ha’arets. 
isaiah 10:24	lakhen koh ’amar ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot ’al tira ‘ami yoshew tsiyon mei’ashur basheiwet yakekah umateihu yisa ‘alekha bederekh mitsrayim. 
isaiah 10:25	ki ‘od me‘at miz‘ar vekhalah za‘am ve’api ‘al tawlitam. 
isaiah 10:26	ve‘orer ‘alav yhoh tsewa’ot shot kemakat midyan betsur ‘orew umateihu ‘al hayam unesa’o bederekh mitsrayim. 
isaiah 10:27	vehayah bayom hahu yasur subolo mei‘al shikhmekha ve‘ulo mei‘al tsavarekha vekhubal ‘ol mipenei shamen. 
isaiah 10:28	ba ‘al ‘ayat ‘awar bemigron lemikhmas yafqid keilav. 
isaiah 10:29	‘aweru ma‘barah gewa‘ malon lanu kharedah haramah giw‘at sha’ul nasah. 
isaiah 10:30	tsahali qolekh bat galim haqshiwi layshah ‘aniyah ‘anatot. 
isaiah 10:31	nadedah madmeinah yoshewei hageiwim hei‘izu. 
isaiah 10:32	‘od hayom benow la‘amod yenofef yado har bet bat tsiyon giw‘at yerushalim. 
isaiah 10:33	hineh ha’adon yhoh tsewa’ot mesa‘ef purah bema‘aratsah veramei haqomah gedu‘im vehagewohim yishpalu. 
isaiah 10:34	veniqaf siwkhei haya‘ar babarzel vehalewanon be’adir yipol. 
isaiah 11:1	veyatsa khoter migeiza‘ yishai veneitser misharashav yifreh. 
isaiah 11:2	venakhah ‘alav ruakh yhoh ruakh khakhmah uwinah ruakh ‘eitsah ugewurah ruakh da‘at veyir’at yhoh. 
isaiah 11:3	vaharikho beyir’at yhoh velo lemar’eh ‘einav yishpot velo lemishma‘ ’azenav yokhiakh. 
isaiah 11:4	veshafat betsedeq dalim vehokhiakh bemishor le‘anvei ’arets vehikah ’erets besheiwet piv uweruakh sefatav yamit rasha‘. 
isaiah 11:5	vehayah tsedeq ’eizor matenav veha’emunah ’eizor khalatsav. 
isaiah 11:6	vegar ze’ew ‘im kewes venamer ‘im gedi yirbats ve‘eigel ukhefir umeri yakhdav vena‘ar qaton noheg bam. 
isaiah 11:7	ufarah vadow tir‘enah yakhdav yirbetsu yaldeihen ve’aryeh kabaqar yokhal tewen. 
isaiah 11:8	veshi‘asha‘ yoneq ‘al khur paten ve‘al me’urat tsif‘oni gamul yado hadah. 
isaiah 11:9	lo yarei‘u velo yashkhitu bekhal har qadshi ki male’ah ha’arets dei‘ah ’et yhoh kamayim layam mekhasim. 
isaiah 11:10	vehayah bayom hahu shoresh yishai ’asher ‘omed lenes ‘amim ’eilav goyim yidroshu vehayetah menukhato kawod. 
isaiah 11:11	vehayah bayom hahu yosif ’adonai sheinit yado liqnot ’et she’ar ‘amo ’asher yisha’er mei’ashur umimitsrayim umipatros umikush umei‘eilam umishin‘ar umeikhamat umei’iyei hayam. 
isaiah 11:12	venasa nes lagoyim ve’asaf nidkhei yisra’el unefutsot yehudah yeqabets mei’arba‘ kanfot ha’arets. 
isaiah 11:13	vesarah qin’at ’efrayim vetsorerei yehudah yikareitu ’efrayim lo yeqanei ’et yehudah vihudah lo yatsor ’et ’efrayim. 
isaiah 11:14	ve‘afu wekhatef pelishtim yamah yakhdav yawozu ’et benei qedem ’edom umo’aw mishlokh yadam uwenei ‘amon mishma‘tam. 
isaiah 11:15	vehekherim yhoh ’et leshon yam mitsrayim veheinif yado ‘al hanahar ba‘yam rukho vehikahu leshiw‘ah nekhalim vehidrikh bane‘alim. 
isaiah 11:16	vehayetah mesilah lish’ar ‘amo ’asher yisha’er mei’ashur ka’asher hayetah leyisra’el beyom ‘aloto mei’erets mitsrayim. 
isaiah 12:1	ve’amarta bayom hahu ’odkha yhoh ki ’anafta bi yashow ’apekha utenakhameini. 
isaiah 12:2	hineh ’el yeshu‘ati ’ewtakh velo ’efkhad ki ‘azi vezimrat yah yhoh vayhi li lishu‘ah. 
isaiah 12:3	ushe’awtem mayim besason mima‘aynei hayshu‘ah. 
isaiah 12:4	va’amartem bayom hahu hodu yhoh qir’u wishmo hodi‘u wa‘amim ‘alilotav hazkiru ki nisgaw shemo. 
isaiah 12:5	zameru yhoh ki gei’ut ‘asah meyuda‘at muda‘at zot bekhal ha’arets. 
isaiah 12:6	tsahali varoni yoshewet tsiyon ki gadol beqirbekh qedosh yisra’el. 
isaiah 13:1	masa bawel ’asher khazah yesha‘yahu ben ’amots. 
isaiah 13:2	‘al har nishpeh se’u nes harimu qol lahem hanifu yad veyawo’u pitkhei nediwim. 
isaiah 13:3	’ani tsiveiti limqudashai gam qarati giborai le’api ‘alizei ga’avati. 
isaiah 13:4	qol hamon beharim demut ‘am raw qol she’on mamlekhot goyim ne’esafim yhoh tsewa’ot mefaqed tsewa milkhamah. 
isaiah 13:5	ba’im mei’erets merkhaq miqtseh hashamayim yhoh ukhelei za‘mo lekhabel kal ha’arets. 
isaiah 13:6	heililu ki qarow yom yhoh keshod mishadai yawo. 
isaiah 13:7	‘al ken kal yadayim tirpenah vekhal lewaw ’enosh yimas 
isaiah 13:8	veniwhalu tsirim vakhawalim yokheizun kayoleidah yekhilun ’ish ’el rei‘eihu yitmahu penei lehawim peneihem. 
isaiah 13:9	hineh yom yhoh ba ’akhzari ve‘ewrah vakharon ’af lasum ha’arets leshamah vekhata’eha yashmid mimenah. 
isaiah 13:10	ki khokhwei hashamayim ukhesileihem lo yahelu ’oram khashakh hashemesh betseito veyareiakh lo yagiha ’oro. 
isaiah 13:11	ufaqadti ‘al teiwel ra‘ah ve‘al resha‘im ‘avonam vehishbati ge’on zeidim vega’avat ‘aritsim ’ashpil. 
isaiah 13:12	’oqir ’enosh mipaz ve’adam miketem ’ofir. 
isaiah 13:13	‘al ken shamayim ’argiz vetir‘ash ha’arets mimeqomah be‘ewrat yhoh tsewa’ot uweyom kharon ’apo. 
isaiah 13:14	vehayah kitswi mudakh ukhetson ve’en meqabets ’ish ’el ‘amo yifnu ve’ish ’el ’artso yanusu. 
isaiah 13:15	kal hanimtsa yidaqer vekhal hanispeh yipol bekharew. 
isaiah 13:16	ve‘oleleihem yeruteshu le‘eineihem yishasu bateihem unesheihem tishagalnah tishakhawnah. 
isaiah 13:17	hini mei‘ir ‘aleihem ’et madai ’asher kesef lo yakhshowu vezahaw lo yakhpetsu wo. 
isaiah 13:18	uqeshatot ne‘arim teratashnah uferi weten lo yerakheimu ‘al banim lo takhus ‘einam. 
isaiah 13:19	vehayetah wawel tsewi mamlakhot tif’eret ge’on kasdim kemahpeikhat ’elohim ’et sedom ve’et ‘amorah. 
isaiah 13:20	lo teishew lanetsakh velo tishkon ‘ad dor vador velo yahel sham ‘arawi vero‘im lo yarbitsu sham. 
isaiah 13:21	verawetsu sham tsiyim umale’u wateihem ’okhim veshakhenu sham benot ya‘anah use‘irim yeraqedu sham. 
isaiah 13:22	ve‘anah ’iyim be’almnotav vetanim beheikhelei ‘oneg veqarow lawo ‘itah veyameha lo yimasheikhu. 
isaiah 14:1	ki yerakhem yhoh ’et ya‘aqow uwakhar ‘od beyisra’el vehinikham ‘al ’admatam venilvah hager ‘aleihem venispekhu ‘al bet ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 14:2	uleqakhum ‘amim vehewi’um ’el meqomam vehitnakhalum bet yisra’el ‘al ’admat yhoh la‘awadim velishfakhot vehayu showim leshoweihem veradu benogeseihem. 
isaiah 14:3	vehayah beyom haniakh yhoh lekha mei‘atsebekha umeiragezekha umin ha‘awodah haqashah ’asher ‘ubad bakh. 
isaiah 14:4	venasata hamashal hazeh ‘al melekh bawel ve’amareta ’ekh shawat noges shawetah madheiwah. 
isaiah 14:5	shawar yhoh mateh resha‘im sheiwet moshelim. 
isaiah 14:6	makeh ‘amim be‘ewrah makat bilti sarah rodeh wa’af goyim murdaf beli khasakh. 
isaiah 14:7	nakhah shaqetah kal ha’arets patsekhu rinah. 
isaiah 14:8	gam beroshim samekhu lekha ’arzei lewanon mei’az shakhawta lo ya‘aleh hakoret ‘aleinu. 
isaiah 14:9	she’ol mitakhat ragezah lekha liqrat bo’ekha ‘orer lekha refa’im kal ‘atudei ’arets heiqim mikis’otam kol malkhei goyim. 
isaiah 14:10	kulam ya‘anu veyomeru ’eilekha gam ’atah khuleita khamonu ’eileinu nimshaleta. 
isaiah 14:11	hurad she’ol ge’onekha hemyat newalekha takhtekha yutsa‘ rimah umekhasekha tolei‘ah. 
isaiah 14:12	’ekh nafalta mishamayim heilel ben shakhar nigda‘ta la’arets kholesh ‘al goyim. 
isaiah 14:13	ve’atah ’amarta wilwawekha hashamayim ’e‘eleh mima‘al lekhokhwei ’el ’arim kis’i ve’eishew behar mo‘ed beyarketei tsafon. 
isaiah 14:14	’e‘eleh ‘al bamotei ‘aw ’edameh le‘elyon. 
isaiah 14:15	’akh ’el she’ol turad ’el yarketei wor. 
isaiah 14:16	ro’ekha ’eilekha yashgikhu ’eilekha yitbonanu hazeh ha’ish margiz ha’arets mar‘ish mamlakhot. 
isaiah 14:17	sam teiwel kamidbar ve‘arav haras ’asirav lo fatakh bayetah. 
isaiah 14:18	kal malkhei goyim kulam shakhewu wekhawod ’ish beweito. 
isaiah 14:19	ve’atah hashelakhta miqiwrekha keneitser nit‘aw lewush harugim meto‘anei kharew yordei ’el ’awnei wor kefeger muwas. 
isaiah 14:20	lo teikhad ’itam biqwurah ki ’artsekha shikhata ‘amekha harageta lo yiqarei le‘olam zera‘ merei‘im. 
isaiah 14:21	hakhinu lewanav matbeiakh ba‘avon ’awotam bal yaqumu veyareshu ’arets umale’u fenei teiwel ‘arim. 
isaiah 14:22	veqamti ‘aleihem ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot vehikhrati lewawel shem ushe’ar venin vanekhed ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 14:23	vesamtiha lemorash qipod ve’agmei mayim veteiteitiha bemat’atei hashmed ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
isaiah 14:24	nishba‘ yhoh tsewa’ot leimor ’im lo ka’asher dimiti ken hayatah vekha’asher ya‘atsti hi taqum. 
isaiah 14:25	lishbor ’ashur be’artsi ve‘al harai ’awusenu vesar mei‘aleihem ‘ulo vesubolo mei‘al shikhmo yasur. 
isaiah 14:26	zot ha‘eitsah haye‘utsah ‘al kal ha’arets vezot hayad hanetuyah ‘al kal hagoyim. 
isaiah 14:27	ki yhoh tsewa’ot ya‘ats umi yafer veyado hanetuyah umi yeshiwenah. 
isaiah 14:28	bishnat mot hamelekh ’akhaz hayah hamasa hazeh. 
isaiah 14:29	’al tismekhi feleshet kulekh ki nishbar sheiwet makekh ki mishoresh nakhash yeitsei tsefa‘ ufiryo saraf me‘ofef. 
isaiah 14:30	vera‘u bekhorei dalim ve’ewyonim lawetakh yirbatsu veheimati wara‘aw shareshekh ushe’eiritekh yaharog. 
isaiah 14:31	heilili sha‘ar za‘aqi ‘ir namog peleshet kulekh ki mitsafon ‘ashan ba ve’en boded bemo‘adav. 
isaiah 14:32	umah ya‘aneh mal’akhei go ki yhoh yisad tsiyon uwah yekhesu ‘aniyei ‘amo. 
isaiah 15:1	masa mo’aw ki belel shudad ‘ar mo’aw nidmah ki belel shudad qir mo’aw nidmah. 
isaiah 15:2	‘alah habayit vediwon habamot lewekhi ‘al newo ve‘al meidewa mo’aw yeyeilil bekhal roshav qarekhah kal zaqan geru‘ah. 
isaiah 15:3	bekhutsotav khageru saq ‘al gagoteha uwirkhowoteha kuloh yeyeilil yored babekhi. 
isaiah 15:4	vatiz‘aq kheshbon ve’el‘aleh ‘ad yahats nishma‘ qolam ‘al ken khalutsei mo’aw yari‘u nafsho yare‘ah lo. 
isaiah 15:5	libi lemo’aw yiz‘aq berikheha ‘ad tso‘ar ‘eglat shelishiyah ki ma‘aleh halukhit biwkhi ya‘aleh bo ki derekh khoronayim za‘aqat shewer ye‘o‘eiru. 
isaiah 15:6	ki mei nimrim meshamot yihyu ki yawesh khatsir kalah deshe yereq lo hayah. 
isaiah 15:7	‘al ken yitrah ‘asah ufequdatam ‘al nakhal ha‘arawim yisa’um. 
isaiah 15:8	ki hiqifah haze‘aqah ’et gewul mo’aw ‘ad ’eglayim yilatah uwe’er ’eilim yilatah. 
isaiah 15:9	ki mei dimon male’u dam ki ’ashit ‘al dimon nosafot lifleitat mo’aw ’aryeh velish’eirit ’adamah. 
isaiah 16:1	shilkhu khar moshel ’erets misela‘ midbarah ’el har bat tsiyon. 
isaiah 16:2	vehayah khe‘of noded qen meshulakh tihyenah benot mo’aw ma‘barot le’arnon. 
isaiah 16:3	hawi’u hawi’i ‘eitsah ‘asu felilah shiti khalayil tsilekh betokh tsahorayim sateri nidakhim noded ’al tegali. 
isaiah 16:4	yaguru wakh nidakhai mo’aw hevi seiter lamo mipenei shoded ki ’afes hamets kalah shod tamu romes min ha’arets. 
isaiah 16:5	vehukhan bakhesed kisei veyashaw ‘alav be’emet be’ohel david shofet vedoresh mishpat umehir tsedeq. 
isaiah 16:6	shama‘nu ge’on mo’aw gei me’od ga’avato uge’ono ve‘ewrato lo khen badav. 
isaiah 16:7	lakhen yeyeilil mo’aw lemo’aw kuloh yeyeilil la’ashishei qir khareset tehgu ’akh nekha’im. 
isaiah 16:8	ki shadmot kheshbon ’umlal gefen siwmah ba‘alei goyim halemu seruqeha ‘ad ya‘zer naga‘u ta‘u midbar shelukhoteha niteshu ‘aweru yam. 
isaiah 16:9	‘al ken ’ewkeh biwkhi ya‘zer gefen siwmah ’arayavekh dim‘ati kheshbon ve’el‘aleh ki ‘al qeitsekh ve‘al qetsirekh heidad nafal. 
isaiah 16:10	vene’esaf simkhah vagil min hakarmel uwakeramim lo yerunan lo yero‘a‘ yayin bayqawim lo yidrokh hadorekh heidad hishbati. 
isaiah 16:11	‘al ken mei‘ai lemo’aw kakinor yehemu veqirbi leqir khares. 
isaiah 16:12	vehayah khi nir’ah ki nil’ah mo’aw ‘al habamah uwa ’el miqdasho lehitpalel velo yukhal. 
isaiah 16:13	zeh hadawar ’asher diber yhoh ’el mo’aw mei’az. 
isaiah 16:14	ve‘atah diber yhoh leimor beshalosh shanim kishnei sakhir veniqlah kewod mo’aw bekhol hehamon haraw ushe’ar me‘at miz‘ar lo khabir. 
isaiah 17:1	masa damaseq hineh dameseq musar mei‘ir vehayetah me‘i mapalah. 
isaiah 17:2	‘azuwot ‘arei ‘aro‘er la‘adarim tihyenah verawetsu ve’en makharid. 
isaiah 17:3	venishbat miwtsar mei’efrayim umamlakhah midameseq ushe’ar ’aram kikhwod benei yisra’el yihyu ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
isaiah 17:4	vehayah bayom hahu yidal kewod ya‘aqow umishman besaro yeirazeh. 
isaiah 17:5	vehayah ke’esof qatsir qamah uzero‘o shibolim yiqtsor vehayah kimlaqet shibolim be‘eimeq refa’im. 
isaiah 17:6	venish’ar bo ‘oleilot kenoqef zayit shenayim sheloshah gargerim berosh ’amir ’arba‘ah khamishah bis‘ifeha poriyah ne’um yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
isaiah 17:7	bayom hahu yish‘eh ha’adam ‘al ‘oseihu ve‘einav ’el qedosh yisra’el tir’enah. 
isaiah 17:8	velo yish‘eh ’el hamizbekhot ma‘aseh yadav va’asher ‘asu ’etsbe‘otav lo yir’eh veha’asheirim vehakhamanim. 
isaiah 17:9	bayom hahu yihyu ‘arei ma‘uzo ka‘azuwat hakhoresh veha’amir ’asher ‘azewu mipenei benei yisra’el vehayetah shemamah. 
isaiah 17:10	ki shakhakhat ’elohei yish‘ekh vetsur ma‘uzekh lo zakharet ‘al ken tite‘i nit‘ei na‘amanim uzemorat zar tizra‘enu. 
isaiah 17:11	beyom nit‘ekh tesagseigi uwaboqer zar‘ekh tafrikhi ned qatsir beyom nakhalah ukhe’ew ’anush. 
isaiah 17:12	ho hamon ‘amim rabim kahamot yamim yehemayun ushe’on le’umim kish’on mayim kabirim yisha’un.
