isaiah 17:13	le’umim kish’on mayim rabim yisha’un vega‘ar bo venas mimerkhaq verudaf kemots harim lifnei ruakh ukhegalgal lifnei sufah. 
isaiah 17:14	le‘et ‘erew vehineh walahah beterem boqer ’einenu zeh kheileq shoseinu vegoral lewozezeinu. 
isaiah 18:1	ho ’erets tsiltsal kenafayim ’asher mei‘eiwer lenaharei khush. 
isaiah 18:2	hasholeiakh bayam tsirim uwikhlei gome ‘al penei mayim lekhu mal’akhim qalim ’el go memushakh umorat ’el ‘am nora min hu vahale’ah go qav qav umewusah ’asher baze’u neharim ’artso. 
isaiah 18:3	kal yoshewei teiwel veshokhenei ’arets kinso nes harim tir’u vekhitqoa‘ shofar tishma‘u. 
isaiah 18:4	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’eilai ’eshqotah ’eshqotah ve’abitah wimkhoni kekhom tsakh ‘alei ’or ke‘aw tal bekhom qatsir. 
isaiah 18:5	ki lifnei qatsir ketam perakh uwoser gomel yihyeh nitsah vekharat hazalzalim bamazmeirot ve’et hanetishot heisir heitaz. 
isaiah 18:6	yei‘azewu yakhdav le‘et harim ulewehemat ha’arets veqats ‘alav ha‘ayit vekhal behemat ha’arets ‘alav tekheraf. 
isaiah 18:7	ba‘et hahi yuwal shai yhoh tsewa’ot ‘am memushakh umorat umei‘am nora min hu vahale’ah go qav qav umewusah ’asher baze’u neharim ’artso ’el meqom shem yhoh tsewa’ot har tsiyon. 
isaiah 19:1	masa mitsrayim hineh yhoh rokhew ‘al ‘aw qal uwa mitsrayim vena‘u ’elilei mitsrayim mipanav ulewaw mitsrayim yimas beqirbo. 
isaiah 19:2	vesikhsakhti mitsrayim bemitsrayim venilkhamu ’ish be’akhiv ve’ish berei‘eihu ‘ir be‘ir mamlakhah bemamlakhah. 
isaiah 19:3	venaweqah ruakh mitsrayim beqirbo va‘atsato ’awaleia‘ vedareshu ’el ha’elilim ve’el ha’itim ve’el ha’owot ve’el hayide‘onim. 
isaiah 19:4	vesikarti ’et mitsrayim beyad ’adonim qasheh umelekh ‘az yimshal bam ne’um ha’adon yhoh tsewa’ot. 
isaiah 19:5	venishetu mayim meihayam venahar yekheraw veyawesh. 
isaiah 19:6	vehe’eznikhu neharot dalalu vekharewu ye’orei matsor qaneh vasuf qameilu. 
isaiah 19:7	‘arot ‘al ye’or ‘al pi ye’or vekhol mizra‘ ye’or yiwash nidaf ve’einenu. 
isaiah 19:8	ve’anu hadayagim ve’awelu kal mashlikhei wai’or khakah uforesei mikhmoret ‘al penei mayim ’umlalu. 
isaiah 19:9	uwoshu ‘owedei fishtim seriqot ve’oregim khorai. 
isaiah 19:10	vehayu shatoteha meduka’im kal ‘osei sekher ’agmei nafesh. 
isaiah 19:11	’akh ’evilim sarei tso‘an khakhmei yo‘atsei far‘oh ‘eitsah niw‘arah ’ekh tomeru ’el par‘oh ben khakhamim ’ani ben malkhei qedem. 
isaiah 19:12	’ayam ’eifo khakhamekha veyagidu na lakh veyeide‘u mah ya‘ats yhoh tsewa’ot ‘al mitsrayim. 
isaiah 19:13	no’alu sarei tso‘an nishe’u sarei nof hit‘u ’et mitsrayim pinat shewateha. 
isaiah 19:14	yhoh masakh beqirbah ruakh ‘iv‘im vehit‘u ’et mitsrayim bekhal ma‘aseihu kehita‘ot shikor beqi’o. 
isaiah 19:15	velo yihyeh lemitsrayim ma‘aseh ’asher ya‘aseh rosh vezanaw kipah ve’agmon. 
isaiah 19:16	bayom hahu yihyeh mitsrayim kanashim vekharad ufakhad mipenei tenufat yad yhoh tsewa’ot ’asher hu meinif ‘alav. 
isaiah 19:17	vehayetah ’admat yehudah lemitsrayim lekhaga kol ’asher yazkir ’otah ’eilav yifkhad mipenei ‘atsat yhoh tsewa’ot ’asher hu yo‘ets ‘alav. 
isaiah 19:18	bayom hahu yihyu khamesh ‘arim be’erets mitsrayim medaberot sefat kena‘an venishba‘ot yhoh tsewa’ot ‘ir haheres yei’amer le’ekhat. 
isaiah 19:19	bayom hahu yihyeh mizbeiakh yhoh betokh ’erets mitsrayim umatseiwah ’eitsel gewulah yhoh. 
isaiah 19:20	vehayah le’ot ule‘ed yhoh tsewa’ot be’erets mitsrayim ki yits‘aqu ’el yhoh mipenei lokhatsim veyishlakh lahem moshia‘ varaw vehitsilam. 
isaiah 19:21	venoda‘ yhoh lemitsrayim veyade‘u mitsrayim ’et yhoh bayom hahu ve‘awedu zewakh uminkhah venaderu neider yhoh veshileimu. 
isaiah 19:22	venagaf yhoh ’et mitsrayim nagof verafo veshawu ‘ad yhoh vene‘tar lahem urefa’am. 
isaiah 19:23	bayom hahu tihyeh mesilah mimitsrayim ’ashurah uwa ’ashur bemitsrayim umitsrayim be’ashur ve‘awedu mitsrayim ’et ’ashur. 
isaiah 19:24	bayom hahu yihyeh yisra’el shelishiyah lemitsrayim ule’ashur berakhah beqerew ha’arets. 
isaiah 19:25	’asher beirakho yhoh tsewa’ot leimor barukh ‘ami mitsrayim uma‘aseh yadai ’ashur venakhalati yisra’el. 
isaiah 20:1	bishnat bo tartan ’ashdodah bishlokh ’oto sargon melekh ’ashur vayilakhem be’ashdod vayilkedah. 
isaiah 20:2	ba‘et hahi diber yhoh beyad yesha‘yahu wen ’amots leimor lekh ufitakhta hasaq mei‘al matenekha vena‘alkha takhalots mei‘al raglekha vaya‘as ken halokh ‘arom veyakhef. 
isaiah 20:3	vayomer yhoh ka’asher halakh ‘awdi yesha‘yahu ‘arom veyakhef shalosh shanim ’ot umofet ‘al mitsrayim ve‘al kush. 
isaiah 20:4	ken yinhag melekh ’ashur ’et shewi mitsrayim ve’et galut kush ne‘arim uzeqeinim ‘arom veyakhef vakhasufai shet ‘ervat mitsrayim. 
isaiah 20:5	vekhatu vawoshu mikush mabatam umin mitsrayim tif’artam. 
isaiah 20:6	ve’amar yoshew ha’i hazeh bayom hahu hineh khoh mabateinu ’asher nasnu sham le‘ezrah lehinatsel mipenei melekh ’ashur ve’ekh nimalet ’anakhenu. 
isaiah 21:1	masa midbar yam kesufot banegew lakhalof mimidbar ba mei’erets nora’ah. 
isaiah 21:2	khazut qashah hugad li haboged boged vehashoded shoded ‘ali ‘eilam tsuri madai kal ’ankhatah hishbati. 
isaiah 21:3	‘al ken male’u matenai khalkhalah tsirim ’akhazuni ketsirei yoleidah na‘aveiti mishemoa‘ niwhalti meire’ot. 
isaiah 21:4	ta‘ah lewawi palatsut bi‘atateni ’et neshef khishqi sam li lakharadah. 
isaiah 21:5	‘arokh hashulkhan tsafoh hatsafit ’akhol shatoh qumu hasarim mishkhu magen. 
isaiah 21:6	ki khoh ’amar ’eilai ’adonai lekh ha‘amed hamtsapeh ’asher yir’eh yagid. 
isaiah 21:7	vera’ah rekhew tsemed parashim rekhew khamor rekhew gamal vehiqshiw qeshew raw qashew. 
isaiah 21:8	vayiqra ’aryeh ‘al mitspeh ’adonai ’anokhi ‘omed tamid yomam ve‘al mishmarti ’anokhi nitsaw kal haleilot. 
isaiah 21:9	vehineh zeh wa rekhew ’ish tsemed parashim vaya‘an vayomer nafelah nafelah bawel vekhal pesilei ’eloheha shibar la’arets. 
isaiah 21:10	medushati uwen gareni ’asher shama‘ti mei’et yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el higadti lakhem. 
isaiah 21:11	masa dumah ’eilai qorei misei‘ir shomer mah milaylah shomer mah milel. 
isaiah 21:12	’amar shomer ’atah woqer vegam layelah ’im tiw‘ayun be‘ayu shuwu ’eitayu. 
isaiah 21:13	masa ba‘raw baya‘ar ba‘raw talinu ’orekhot dedanim. 
isaiah 21:14	liqrat tsamei heitayu mayim yoshewei ’erets teima belakhmo qidemu noded. 
isaiah 21:15	ki mipenei kharawot nadadu mipenei kherew netushah umipenei qeshet derukhah umipenei kowed milkhamah. 
isaiah 21:16	ki khoh ’amar ’adonai ’eilai be‘od shanah kishnei sakhir vekhalah kal kewod qeidar. 
isaiah 21:17	ushe’ar mispar qeshet giborei wenei qeidar yim‘atu ki yhoh ’elohei yisra’el diber. 
isaiah 22:1	masa gei khizayon mah lakh ’eifo ki ‘alit kulakh lagagot. 
isaiah 22:2	teshu’ot melei’ah ‘ir homiyah qiryah ‘alizah khalalayikh lo khalei kherew velo meitei milkhamah. 
isaiah 22:3	kal qetsinayikh nadedu yakhad miqeshet ’usaru kal nimtsa’ayikh ’useru yakhdav meirakhoq barakhu. 
isaiah 22:4	‘al ken ’amarti she‘u mini ’amarer babekhi ’al ta’itsu lenakhameini ‘al shod bat ‘ami. 
isaiah 22:5	ki yom mehumah umewusah umewukhah ladonai yhoh tsewa’ot begei khizayon meqarqar qir veshoa‘ ’el hahar. 
isaiah 22:6	ve‘eilam nasa ’ashpah berekhew ’adam parashim veqir ‘eirah magen. 
isaiah 22:7	vayhi miwkhar ‘amaqayikh male’u rakhew vehaparashim shot shatu hasha‘erah. 
isaiah 22:8	vaygal ’et masakh yehudah vatabet bayom hahu ’el nesheq bet haya‘ar. 
isaiah 22:9	ve’et beqi‘ei ‘ir david re’item ki rabu vateqabetsu ’et mei habereikhah hatakhtonah. 
isaiah 22:10	ve’et batei yerushalim sefartem vatitsev habatim lewatser hakhomah. 
isaiah 22:11	umiqvah ‘asitem ben hakhomotayim lemei habereikhah hayshanah velo hibatem ’el ‘oseha veyotserah meirakhoq lo re’item. 
isaiah 22:12	vayiqra ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot bayom hahu liwkhi ulemisped uleqarekhah velakhagor saq. 
isaiah 22:13	vehineh sason vesimkhah harog baqar veshakhot tson ’akhol basar veshatot yayin ’akhol veshato ki makhar namut. 
isaiah 22:14	veniglah we’azenai yhoh tsewa’ot ’im yekhupar he‘avon hazeh lakhem ‘ad temutun ’amar ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot. 
isaiah 22:15	koh ’amar ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot lekh bo ’el hasokhen hazeh ‘al shewna ’asher ‘al habayit. 
isaiah 22:16	mah lekha foh umi lekha foh ki khatsawta lekha poh qawer khotsewi marom qiwro khoqeqi wasela‘ mishkan lo. 
isaiah 22:17	hineh yhoh metaltelkha talteilah gawer ve‘otekha ‘atoh. 
isaiah 22:18	tsanof yitsnafekha tseneifah kadur ’el ’erets rakhawat yadayim shamah tamut veshamah markewot kewodekha qelon bet ’adonekha. 
isaiah 22:19	vahadaftikha mimatsawekha umima‘amadekha yehersekha. 
isaiah 22:20	vehayah bayom hahu veqarati le‘awdi le’elyaqim ben khilqiyahu. 
isaiah 22:21	vehilbashtiv kutanetekha ve’awneitekha ’akhazeqenu umemsheltekha ’eten beyado vehayah le’aw leyoshew yerushalim ulewet yehudah. 
isaiah 22:22	venatati mafteiakh bet david ‘al shikhmo ufatakh ve’en soger vesagar ve’en poteiakh. 
isaiah 22:23	uteqa‘tiv yated bemaqom ne’eman vehayah lekhisei khawod lewet ’awiv. 
isaiah 22:24	vetalu ‘alav kol kewod bet ’awiv hatse’etsa’im vehatsefi‘ot kol kelei haqatan mikelei ha’aganot ve‘ad kal kelei hanewalim. 
isaiah 22:25	bayom hahu ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot tamush hayated hatequ‘ah bemaqom ne’eman venigde‘ah venafelah venikhrat hamasa ’asher ‘aleha ki yhoh diber. 
isaiah 23:1	masa tsor heililu ’oniyot tarshish ki shudad mibayit mibo mei’erets kitim niglah lamo. 
isaiah 23:2	domu yoshewei ’i sokher tsidon ‘ower yam mil’ukh. 
isaiah 23:3	uwemayim rabim zera‘ shikhor qetsir ye’or tewu’atah vatehi sekhar goyim. 
isaiah 23:4	boshi tsidon ki ’amar yam ma‘oz hayam leimor lo khalti velo yaladti velo gidalti bakhurim romamti wetulot. 
isaiah 23:5	ka’asher sheima‘ lemitsrayim yakhilu kesheima‘ tsor. 
isaiah 23:6	‘iwru tarshishah heililu yoshewei ’i. 
isaiah 23:7	hazot lakhem ‘alizah mimei qedem qadmatah yowiluha ragleha meirakhoq lagur. 
isaiah 23:8	mi ya‘ats zot ‘al tsor hama‘atirah ’asher sokhareh sarim kin‘aneha nikhbadei ’arets. 
isaiah 23:9	yhoh tsewa’ot ye‘atsah lekhalel ge’on kal tsewi lehaqel kal nikhbadei ’arets. 
isaiah 23:10	‘iwri ’artsekh kai’or bat tarshish ’en meizakh ‘od. 
isaiah 23:11	yado natah ‘al hayam hirgiz mamlakhot yhoh tsivah ’el kena‘an lashmid ma‘uzneha. 
isaiah 23:12	vayomer lo tosifi ‘od la‘loz ham‘ushaqah betulat bat tsidon kitiyim kitim qumi ‘awori gam sham lo yanuakh lakh. 
isaiah 23:13	hen ’erets kasdim zeh ha‘am lo hayah ’ashur yesadah letsiyim heiqimu wekhinav wakhunav ‘oreru ’armenoteha samah lemapeilah. 
isaiah 23:14	heililu ’oniyot tarshish ki shudad ma‘uzekhen. 
isaiah 23:15	vehayah bayom hahu venishkakhat tsor shiw‘im shanah kimei melekh ’ekhad miqets shiw‘im shanah yihyeh letsor keshirat hazonah. 
isaiah 23:16	qekhi khinor sobi ‘ir zonah nishkakhah heitiwi nagen harbi shir lema‘an tizakheiri. 
isaiah 23:17	vehayah miqets shiw‘im shanah yifqod yhoh ’et tsor veshawah le’etnanah vezanetah ’et kal mamlekhot ha’arets ‘al penei ha’adamah. 
isaiah 23:18	vehayah sakhrah ve’etnanah qodesh yhoh lo yei’atser velo yeikhasen ki layoshewim lifnei yhoh yihyeh sakhrah le’ekhol lesawe‘ah velimkhaseh ‘atiq. 
isaiah 24:1	hineh yhoh boqeq ha’arets uwolqah ve‘ivah faneha veheifits yosheweha. 
isaiah 24:2	vehayah kha‘am kakohen ka‘ewed kadonav kashifkhah kagewirtah kaqoneh kamokher kamalveh kaloeh kanosheh ka’asher noshe wo. 
isaiah 24:3	hiboq tiboq ha’arets vehiboz tiboz ki yhoh diber ’et hadawar hazeh. 
isaiah 24:4	’awelah nawelah ha’arets ’umlelah nawelah teiwel ’umlalu merom ‘am ha’arets. 
isaiah 24:5	veha’arets khanefah takhat yosheweha ki ‘aweru torot khalefu khoq heifeiru berit ‘olam. 
isaiah 24:6	‘al ken ’alah ’akhelah ’erets vaye’shemu yoshewei wah ‘al ken kharu yoshewei ’erets venish’ar ’enosh miz‘ar. 
isaiah 24:7	’awal tirosh ’umlelah gafen ne’enkhu kal simkhei lew. 
isaiah 24:8	shawat mesos tupim khadal she’on ‘alizim shawat mesos kinor. 
isaiah 24:9	bashir lo yishtu yayin yeimar sheikhar leshotav. 
isaiah 24:10	nishberah qiryat tohu sugar kal bayit mibo. 
isaiah 24:11	tsevakhah ‘al hayayin bakhutsot ‘arewah kal simkhah galah mesos ha’arets. 
isaiah 24:12	nish’ar ba‘ir shamah ushe’iyah yukat sha‘ar. 
isaiah 24:13	ki khoh yihyeh beqerew ha’arets betokh ha‘amim kenoqef zayit ke‘oleilot ’im kalah watsir. 
isaiah 24:14	hemah yis’u qolam yaronu big’on yhoh tsahalu miyam. 
isaiah 24:15	‘al ken ba’urim kabedu yhoh be’iyei hayam shem yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
isaiah 24:16	mikenaf ha’arets zemirot shama‘nu tsewi latsadiq va’omar razi li razi li ’o li bogedim bagadu uweged bogdim bagadu. 
isaiah 24:17	pakhad vafakhat vafakh ‘alekha yoshew ha’arets. 
isaiah 24:18	vehayah hanas miqol hapakhad yipol ’el hapakhat veha‘oleh mitokh hapakhat yilakhed bapakh ki ’arubot mimarom niftakhu vayir‘ashu mosdei ’arets. 
isaiah 24:19	ro‘ah hitro‘a‘ah ha’arets por hitporah ’erets mot hitmotah ’arets. 
isaiah 24:20	noa‘ tanua‘ ’erets kashikor vehitnoddah kamelunah vekhawad ‘aleha pish‘ah venafelah velo tosif qum. 
isaiah 24:21	vehayah bayom hahu yifqod yhoh ‘al tsewa hamarom bamarom ve‘al malkhei ha’adamah ‘al ha’adamah. 
isaiah 24:22	ve’usefu ’aseifah ’asir ‘al bor vesugeru ‘al masger umeirow yamim yipaqeidu. 
isaiah 24:23	vekhaferah halewanah uwoshah hakhamah ki malakh yhoh tsewa’ot behar tsiyon uwirushalim veneged zeqeinav kawod. 
isaiah 25:1	yhoh ’elohai ’atah ’aromimkha ’odeh shimkha ki ‘asita pele ‘eitsot meirakhoq ’emunah ’omen. 
isaiah 25:2	ki samta mei‘ir lagal qiryah wetsurah lemapeilah ’armon zarim mei‘ir le‘olam lo yibaneh. 
isaiah 25:3	‘al ken yekhabedukha ‘am ‘az qiryat goyim ‘aritsim yira’ukha. 
isaiah 25:4	ki hayita ma‘oz ladal ma‘oz la’ewyon batsar lo makhseh mizerem tsel meikhorew ki ruakh ‘aritsim kezerem qir. 
isaiah 25:5	kekhorew betsayon she’on zarim takhnia‘ khorew betsel ‘aw zemir ‘aritsim ya‘aneh. 
isaiah 25:6	ve‘asah yhoh tsewa’ot lekhal ha‘amim bahar hazeh mishteh shemanim mishteh shemarim shemanim memukhayim shemarim mezuqaqim. 
isaiah 25:7	uwila‘ bahar hazeh penei halot halot ‘al kal ha‘amim vehamaseikhah hanesukhah ‘al kal hagoyim. 
isaiah 25:8	bila‘ hamavet lanetsakh umakhah ’adonai yhoh dim‘ah mei‘al kal panim vekherpat ‘amo yasir mei‘al kal ha’arets ki yhoh diber. 
isaiah 25:9	ve’amar bayom hahu hineh ’eloheinu zeh qivinu lo veyoshi‘einu zeh yhoh qivinu lo nagilah venismekhah bishu‘ato. 
isaiah 25:10	ki tanuakh yad yhoh bahar hazeh venadosh mo’aw takhtav kehidush matben bemei bemo madmeinah. 
isaiah 25:11	ufeiras yadav beqirbo ka’asher yefares hasokheh liskhot vehishpil ga’avato ‘im ’arebot yadav. 
isaiah 25:12	umiwtsar misgaw khomotekha heishakh hishpil higia‘ la’arets ‘ad ‘afar. 
isaiah 26:1	bayom hahu yushar hashir hazeh be’erets yehudah ‘ir ‘az lanu yeshu‘ah yashit khomot vakhel. 
isaiah 26:2	pitkhu she‘arim veyawo go tsadiq shomer ’emunim. 
isaiah 26:3	yeitser samukh titsor shalom shalom ki wekha batuakh. 
isaiah 26:4	bitkhu yhoh ‘adei ‘ad ki beyah yhoh tsur ‘olamim. 
isaiah 26:5	ki heishakh yoshewei marom qiryah nisgawah yashpilenah yashpilah ‘ad ’erets yagi‘enah ‘ad ‘afar. 
isaiah 26:6	tirmesenah ragel raglei ‘ani pa‘amei dalim. 
isaiah 26:7	’orakh latsadiq meisharim yashar ma‘gal tsadiq tefales. 
isaiah 26:8	’af ’orakh mishpatekha yhoh qivinukha leshimkha ulezikhrekha ta’avat nafesh. 
isaiah 26:9	nafshi ’ivitikha balaylah ’af rukhi weqirbi ’ashakhareka ki ka’asher mishpatekha la’arets tsedeq lamedu yoshewei teiwel. 
isaiah 26:10	yukhan rasha‘ bal lamad tsedeq be’erets nekhokhot ye‘avel uwal yir’eh gei’ut yhoh. 
isaiah 26:11	yhoh ramah yadekha bal yekhezayun yekhezu veyeiwoshu qin’at ‘am ’af ’esh tsarekha tokhelem. 
isaiah 26:12	yhoh tishpot shalom lanu ki gam kal ma‘aseinu pa‘alta lanu. 
isaiah 26:13	yhoh ’eloheinu be‘alunu ’adonim zulatekha lewad bekha nazkir shemekha. 
isaiah 26:14	meitim bal yikhyu refa’im bal yaqumu lakhen paqadta vatashmidem vate’abed kal zeikher lamo. 
isaiah 26:15	yasafta lago yhoh yasafta lago nikhbadeta rikhaqta kal qatsvei ’arets. 
isaiah 26:16	yhoh batsar peqadukha tsaqun lakhash musarekha lamo. 
isaiah 26:17	kemo harah taqriw laledet takhil tiz‘aq bakhawaleha ken hayinu mipanekha yhoh. 
isaiah 26:18	harinu khalnu kemo yaladnu ruakh yeshu‘ot bal na‘aseh ’erets uwal yipelu yoshewei teiwel. 
isaiah 26:19	yikhyu meitekha neweilati yequmun haqitsu veranenu shokhenei ‘afar ki tal ’orot talekha va’arets refa’im tapil. 
isaiah 26:20	lekh ‘ami bo wakhadarekha usegor delatekha delatekha ba‘adekha khawi khim‘at rega‘ ‘ad ya‘awor ya‘awar za‘am. 
isaiah 26:21	ki hineh yhoh yotsei mimeqomo lifqod ‘avon yoshew ha’arets ‘alav vegiletah ha’arets ’et dameha velo tekhaseh ‘od ‘al harugeha. 
isaiah 27:1	bayom hahu yifqod yhoh bekharwo haqashah vehagedolah vehakhazaqah ‘al livyatan nakhash bariakh ve‘al livyatan nakhash ‘aqalaton veharag ’et hatanin ’asher bayam. 
isaiah 27:2	bayom hahu kerem khemed ‘anu lah. 
isaiah 27:3	’ani yhoh notserah lirga‘im ’ashqenah pen yifqod ‘aleha laylah vayom ’etsorenah. 
isaiah 27:4	kheimah ’en li mi yiteneini shamir shayit bamilkhamah ’efse‘ah wah ’atsitenah yakhad. 
isaiah 27:5	’o yakhazeq bema‘uzi ya‘aseh shalom li shalom ya‘aseh li. 
isaiah 27:6	haba’im yashresh ya‘aqow yatsits ufarakh yisra’el umale’u fenei teiwel tenuwah. 
isaiah 27:7	hakemakat makeihu hikahu ’im kehereg harugav horag. 
isaiah 27:8	besase’ah beshalkhah teriwenah hagah berukho haqashah beyom qadim. 
isaiah 27:9	lakhen bezot yekhupar ‘avon ya‘aqow vezeh kal peri hasir khatato besumo kal ’awnei mizbeiakh ke’awnei gir menupatsot lo yaqumu ’asheirim vekhamanim. 
isaiah 27:10	ki ‘ir betsurah badad naveh meshulakh vene‘ezaw kamidbar sham yir‘eh ‘eigel vesham yirbats vekhilah se‘ifeha. 
isaiah 27:11	biwosh qetsirah tishawarnah nashim ba’ot me’irot ’otah ki lo ‘am binot hu ‘al ken lo yerakhamenu ‘oseihu veyotsero lo yekhunenu. 
isaiah 27:12	vehayah bayom hahu yakhbot yhoh mishibolet hanahar ‘ad nakhal mitsrayim ve’atem teluqetu le’akhad ’ekhad benei yisra’el. 
isaiah 27:13	vehayah bayom hahu yitaqa‘ beshofar gadol uwa’u ha’owedim be’erets ’ashur vehanidakhim be’erets mitsrayim vehishtakhavu yhoh behar haqodesh birushalim. 
isaiah 28:1	ho ‘ateret gei’ut shikorei ’efrayim vetsits nowel tsewi tif’arto ’asher ‘al rosh gei shemanim halumei yayin. 
isaiah 28:2	hineh khazaq ve’amits ladonai kezerem barad sa‘ar qatew kezerem mayim kabirim shotefim hiniakh la’arets beyad. 
isaiah 28:3	beraglayim teiramasnah ‘ateret gei’ut shikorei ’efrayim. 
isaiah 28:4	vehayetah tsitsat nowel tsewi tif’arto ’asher ‘al rosh gei shemanim kewikurah beterem qayits ’asher yir’eh haro’eh ’otah be‘odah bekhapo yiwla‘enah. 
isaiah 28:5	bayom hahu yihyeh yhoh tsewa’ot la‘ateret tsewi velitsfirat tif’arah lish’ar ‘amo. 
isaiah 28:6	uleruakh mishpat layoshew ‘al hamishpat veligwurah meshiwei milkhamah sha‘erah. 
isaiah 28:7	vegam ’eleh bayayin shagu uwasheikhar ta‘u kohen venawi shagu washeikhar niwle‘u min hayayin ta‘u min hasheikhar shagu baro’eh paqu peliliyah. 
isaiah 28:8	ki kal shulkhanot male’u qi tso’ah beli maqom. 
isaiah 28:9	’et mi yoreh dei‘ah ve’et mi yawin shemu‘ah gemulei meikhalaw ‘atiqei mishadayim. 
isaiah 28:10	ki tsav latsav tsav latsav qav laqav qav laqav ze‘er sham ze‘er sham. 
isaiah 28:11	ki bela‘agei safah uwelashon ’akheret yedaber ’el ha‘am hazeh. 
isaiah 28:12	’asher ’amar ’aleihem zot hamenukhah hanikhu le‘ayef vezot hamargei‘ah velo ’awu shemoa‘. 
isaiah 28:13	vehayah lahem dewar yhoh tsav latsav tsav latsav qav laqav qav laqav ze‘er sham ze‘er sham lema‘an yeilekhu vekhashelu ’akhor venishbaru venoqshu venilkadu. 
isaiah 28:14	lakhen shim‘u dewar yhoh ’anshei latson moshelei ha‘am hazeh ’asher birushalim. 
isaiah 28:15	ki ’amartem karatnu werit ’et mavet ve‘im she’ol ‘asinu khozeh shit shot shotef ki ‘awar ya‘awor lo yewo’einu ki samnu khazaw makhseinu uwasheqer nistarenu. 
isaiah 28:16	lakhen koh ’amar ’adonai yhoh hini yisad betsiyon ’awen ’ewen bokhan pinat yiqrat musad musad hama’amin lo yakhish. 
isaiah 28:17	vesamti mishpat leqav utsedaqah lemishqalet veya‘ah warad makhseh khazaw veseiter mayim yishtofu. 
isaiah 28:18	vekhupar beritekhem ’et mavet vekhazutekhem ’et she’ol lo taqum shot shotef ki ya‘awor vihyitem lo lemirmas. 
isaiah 28:19	midei ‘awero yiqakh ’etkhem ki waboqer baboqer ya‘awor bayom uwalayelah vehayah raq zeva‘ah hawin shemu‘ah. 
isaiah 28:20	ki qatsar hamatsa‘ meihistareia‘ vehamaseikhah tsarah kehitkanes. 
isaiah 28:21	ki khehar peratsim yaqum yhoh ke‘eimeq begiw‘on yirgaz la‘asot ma‘aseihu zar ma‘aseihu vela‘awod ‘awodato nakheriyah ‘awodato. 
isaiah 28:22	ve‘atah ’al titlotsatsu pen yekhzequ mosreikhem ki khalah venekheratsah shama‘ti mei’et ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot ‘al kal ha’arets. 
isaiah 28:23	ha’azinu veshim‘u qoli haqshiwu veshim‘u ’imrati. 
isaiah 28:24	hakhol hayom yakharosh hakhoresh lizroa‘ yefatakh visaded ’admato. 
isaiah 28:25	halo ’im shivah faneha veheifits qetsakh vekhamon yizroq vesam khitah sorah use‘orah nisman vekhusemet gewulato. 
isaiah 28:26	veyisero lamishpat ’elohav yorenu. 
isaiah 28:27	ki lo wekharuts yudash qetsakh ve’ofan ‘agalah ‘al kamon yusaw ki wamateh yeikhawet qetsakh vekhamon bashawet. 
isaiah 28:28	lekhem yudaq ki lo lanetsakh ’adosh yedushenu vehamam gilgal ‘eglato ufarashav lo yeduqenu. 
isaiah 28:29	gam zot mei‘im yhoh tsewa’ot yatsa’ah hifli ‘eitsah higdil tushiyah. 
isaiah 29:1	ho ’ari’el ’ari’el qiryat khanah david sefu shanah ‘al shanah khagim yinqofu. 
isaiah 29:2	vahatsiqoti la’ari’el vehayetah ta’aniyah va’aniyah vehayetah li ka’ari’el. 
isaiah 29:3	vekhaniti khadur ‘alayikh vetsarti ‘alayikh mutsaw vahaqimoti ‘alayikh metsurot. 
isaiah 29:4	veshafalt mei’erets tedabeiri umei‘afar tishakh ’imratekh vehayah ke’ow mei’erets qolekh umei‘afar ’imratekh tetsaftsef. 
isaiah 29:5	vehayah ke’awaq daq hamon zarayikh ukhemots ‘ower hamon ‘aritsim vehayah lefeta‘ pit’om. 
isaiah 29:6	mei‘im yhoh tsewa’ot tipaqed bera‘am uwera‘ash veqol gadol sufah use‘arah velahaw ’esh ’okheilah. 
isaiah 29:7	vehayah kakhalom khazon laylah hamon kal hagoyim hatsowe’im ‘al ’ari’el vekhal tsoweha umetsodatah vehametsiqim lah. 
isaiah 29:8	vehayah ka’asher yakhalom hara‘ew vehineh ’okhel veheiqits vereiqah nafsho vekha’asher yakhalom hatsamei vehineh shoteh veheiqits vehineh ‘ayef venafsho shoqeiqah ken yihyeh hamon kal hagoyim hatsowe’im ‘al har tsiyon. 
isaiah 29:9	hitmahmehu utemahu hishta‘ash‘u vasho‘u shakheru velo yayin na‘u velo sheikhar. 
isaiah 29:10	ki nasakh ‘aleikhem yhoh ruakh tardeimah vai‘atsem ’et ‘eineikhem ’et hanewi’im ve’et rasheikhem hakhozim kisah. 
isaiah 29:11	vatehi lakhem khazut hakol kediwrei haseifer hekhatum ’asher yitenu ’oto ’el yodeia‘ haseifer seifer leimor qera na zeh ve’amar lo ’ukhal ki khatum hu. 
isaiah 29:12	venitan haseifer ‘al ’asher lo yada‘ seifer leimor qera na zeh ve’amar lo yada‘ti seifer. 
isaiah 29:13	vayomer ’adonai ya‘an ki nigash ha‘am hazeh befiv uwisfatav kibeduni velibo rikhaq mimeni vatehi yir’atam ’oti mitsvat ’anashim melumadah. 
isaiah 29:14	lakhen hini yosif lehafli ’et ha‘am hazeh haflei vafele ve’awedah khakhemat khakhamav uwinat newonav tistatar. 
isaiah 29:15	ho hama‘amiqim yhoh lastir ‘eitsah vehayah wemakhshakh ma‘aseihem vayomeru mi ro’einu umi yod‘einu. 
isaiah 29:16	hafkekhem ’im kekhomer hayotser yeikhashew ki yomar ma‘aseh le‘oseihu lo ‘asani veyeitser ’amar leyotsro lo heiwin. 
isaiah 29:17	halo ‘od me‘at miz‘ar veshaw lewanon lakarmel vehakarmel laya‘ar yeikhashew. 
isaiah 29:18	veshame‘u wayom hahu hakheireshim diwrei seifer umei’ofel umeikhoshekh ‘einei ‘ivrim tir’enah. 
isaiah 29:19	veyasefu ‘anavim yhoh simkhah ve’ewyonei ’adam biqdosh yisra’el yagilu. 
isaiah 29:20	ki ’afes ‘arits vekhalah lets venikhretu kal shoqedei ’aven. 
isaiah 29:21	makhati’ei ’adam bedawar velamokhiakh basha‘ar yeqoshun vayatu watohu tsadiq. 
isaiah 29:22	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’el bet ya‘aqow ’asher padah ’et ’awraham lo ‘atah yeiwosh ya‘aqow velo ‘atah panav yekhevaru. 
isaiah 29:23	ki wir’oto yeladav ma‘aseh yadai beqirbo yaqdishu shemi vehiqdishu ’et qedosh ya‘aqow ve’et ’elohei yisra’el ya‘aritsu. 
isaiah 29:24	veyade‘u to‘ei ruakh binah verognim yilmedu leqakh. 
isaiah 30:1	ho banim sorim ne’um yhoh la‘asot ‘eitsah velo mini velinsokh maseikhah velo rukhi lema‘an sefot khatat ‘al khatat. 
isaiah 30:2	haholekhim laredet mitsrayim ufi lo sha’alu la‘oz bema‘oz par‘oh velakhsot betsel mitsrayim. 
isaiah 30:3	vehayah lakhem ma‘oz par‘oh lewoshet vehekhasut betsel mitsrayim likhlimah. 
isaiah 30:4	ki hayu wetso‘an sarav umal’akhav khanes yagi‘u. 
isaiah 30:5	kol hiw’ish howish ‘al ‘am lo yo‘ilu lamo lo le‘eizer velo leho‘il ki lewoshet vegam lekherpah. 
isaiah 30:6	masa bahamot negew be’erets tsarah vetsuqah lawi valayish meihem ’ef‘eh vesaraf me‘ofef yis’u ‘al ketef ‘ayarim kheileihem ve‘al dabeshet gemalim ’otsrotam ‘al ‘am lo yo‘ilu. 
isaiah 30:7	umitsrayim hewel variq ya‘zoru lakhen qarati lazot rahaw hem shawet. 
isaiah 30:8	‘atah bo khatewah ‘al luakh ’itam ve‘al seifer khuqah utehi leyom ’akharon la‘ad ‘ad ‘olam. 
isaiah 30:9	ki ‘am meri hu banim kekhashim banim lo ’awu shemoa‘ torat yhoh. 
isaiah 30:10	’asher ’ameru laro’im lo tir’u velakhozim lo tekhezu lanu nekhokhot daberu lanu khalaqot khazu mahatalot. 
isaiah 30:11	suru minei derekh hatu minei ’orakh hashbitu mipaneinu ’et qedosh yisra’el. 
isaiah 30:12	lakhen koh ’amar qedosh yisra’el ya‘an ma’asekhem badawar hazeh vatiwtekhu be‘osheq venaloz vatisha‘anu ‘alav. 
isaiah 30:13	lakhen yihyeh lakhem he‘avon hazeh keferets nofel niw‘eh bekhomah nisgawah ’asher pit’om lefeta‘ yawo shiwrah. 
isaiah 30:14	ushewarah kesheiwer neiwel yotsrim katut lo yakhmol velo yimatsei wimkhitato kheres lakhtot ’esh miyaqud velakhsof mayim migewe. 
isaiah 30:15	ki khoh ’amar ’adonai yhoh qedosh yisra’el beshuwah vanakhat tivashei‘un behashqet uwewitkhah tihyeh gewuratkhem velo ’awitem. 
isaiah 30:16	vatomeru lo khi ‘al sus nanus ‘al ken tenusun ve‘al qal nirkaw ‘al ken yiqalu rodefeikhem. 
isaiah 30:17	’elef ’ekhad mipenei ga‘arat ’ekhad mipenei ga‘arat khamishah tanusu ‘ad ’im notartem katoren ‘al rosh hahar vekhanes ‘al hagiw‘ah. 
isaiah 30:18	velakhen yekhakeh yhoh lakhanankhem velakhen yarum lerakhemkhem ki ’elohei mishpat yhoh ’ashrei kal khokhei lo. 
isaiah 30:19	ki ‘am betsiyon yeishew birushalim bakho lo tiwkeh khanon yakhenekha leqol za‘aqekha keshame‘ato ‘anakh. 
isaiah 30:20	venatan lakhem ’adonai lekhem tsar umayim lakhats velo yikanef ‘od morekha vehayu ‘einekha ro’ot ’et morekha. 
isaiah 30:21	ve’azenekha tishma‘nah dawar mei’akharekha leimor zeh haderekh lekhu wo ki ta’aminu vekhi tasme’ilu. 
isaiah 30:22	vetimeitem ’et tsipui pesilei khaspekha ve’et ’afudat maseikhat zehawekha tizrem kemo davah tsei tomar lo. 
isaiah 30:23	venatan metar zar‘akha ’asher tizra‘ ’et ha’adamah velekhem tewu’at ha’adamah vehayah dashen veshamen yir‘eh miqnekha bayom hahu kar nirkhaw. 
isaiah 30:24	veha’alafim veha‘ayarim ‘owedei ha’adamah belil khamits yokheilu ’asher zoreh warakhat uwamizreh. 
isaiah 30:25	vehayah ‘al kal har gawoha ve‘al kal giw‘ah nisa’ah pelagim yiwlei mayim beyom hereg raw binfol migdalim. 
isaiah 30:26	vehayah ’or halewanah ke’or hakhamah ve’or hakhamah yihyeh shiw‘atayim ke’or shiw‘at hayamim beyom khawosh yhoh ’et shewer ‘amo umakhats makato yirpa. 
isaiah 30:27	hineh shem yhoh ba mimerkhaq bo‘er ’apo vekhowed masa’ah sefatav male’u za‘am uleshono ke’esh ’okhalet. 
isaiah 30:28	verukho kenakhal shotef ‘ad tsavar yekhetseh lahanafah goyim benafat shav veresen mat‘eh ‘al lekhayei ‘amim. 
isaiah 30:29	hashir yihyeh lakhem kelel hitqadesh khag vesimkhat leiwaw kaholekh bekhalil lawo wehar yhoh ’el tsur yisra’el. 
isaiah 30:30	vehishmia‘ yhoh ’et hod qolo venakhat zero‘o yar’eh beza‘af ’af velahaw ’esh ’okheilah nefets vazerem ve’ewen barad. 
isaiah 30:31	ki miqol yhoh yeikhat ’ashur basheiwet yakeh. 
isaiah 30:32	vehayah kol ma‘awar mateh musadah ’asher yaniakh yhoh ‘alav betupim uwekhinorot uwemilkhamot tenufah nilkham bah bam. 
isaiah 30:33	ki ‘arukh mei’etmul tafeteh gam hu hi lamelekh hukhan he‘miq hirkhiw meduratah ’esh ve‘eitsim harbeh nishmat yhoh kenakhal gaferit bo‘arah bah. 
isaiah 31:1	ho hayoredim mitsrayim le‘ezrah ‘al susim yisha‘einu vayiwtekhu ‘al rekhew ki raw ve‘al parashim ki ‘atsemu me’od velo sha‘u ‘al qedosh yisra’el ve’et yhoh lo darashu. 
isaiah 31:2	vegam hu khakham vayawei ra‘ ve’et dewarav lo heisir veqam ‘al bet merei‘im ve‘al ‘ezrat po‘alei ’aven. 
isaiah 31:3	umitsrayim ’adam velo ’el vesuseihem basar velo ruakh yhoh yateh yado vekhashal ‘ozer venafal ‘azur veyakhdav kulam yikhlayun. 
isaiah 31:4	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’eilai ka’asher yehgeh ha’aryeh vehakefir ‘al tarpo ’asher yiqarei ‘alav melo ro‘im miqolam lo yeikhat umeihamonam lo ya‘aneh ken yeired yhoh tsewa’ot litsbo ‘al har tsiyon ve‘al giw‘atah. 
isaiah 31:5	ketsiporim ‘afot ken yagen yhoh tsewa’ot ‘al yerushalim ganon vehitsil pasoakh vehimlit. 
isaiah 31:6	shuwu la’asher he‘miqu sarah benei yisra’el. 
isaiah 31:7	ki bayom hahu yim’asun ’ish ’elilei khaspo ve’elilei zehawo ’asher ‘asu lakhem yedeikhem khet. 
isaiah 31:8	venafal ’ashur bekherew lo ’ish vekherew lo ’adam tokhalenu venas lo mipenei kherew uwakhurav lamas yihyu. 
isaiah 31:9	vesal‘o mimagor ya‘awor vekhatu mines sarav ne’um yhoh ’asher ’ur lo betsiyon vetanur lo birushalim. 
isaiah 32:1	hen letsedeq yimlakh melekh ulesarim lemishpat yasoru. 
isaiah 32:2	vehayah ’ish kemakhawei ruakh veseiter zarem kefalgei mayim betsayon ketsel sela‘ kawed be’erets ‘ayeifah. 
isaiah 32:3	velo tish‘enah ‘einei ro’im ve’azenei shome‘im tiqshawnah. 
isaiah 32:4	ulewaw nimharim yawin lada‘at uleshon ‘ilegim temaher ledaber tsakhot. 
isaiah 32:5	lo yiqarei ‘od lenawal nadiw ulekhilai lo yei’amer shoa‘. 
isaiah 32:6	ki nawal newalah yedaber velibo ya‘aseh ’aven la‘asot khonef uledaber ’el yhoh to‘ah lehariq nefesh ra‘ew umashqeh tsamei yakhsir. 
isaiah 32:7	vekheilai keilav ra‘im hu zimot ya‘ats lekhabel ‘anavim ‘aniyim be’imrei sheqer uwedaber ’ewyon mishpat. 
isaiah 32:8	venadiw nediwot ya‘ats vehu ‘al nediwot yaqum. 
isaiah 32:9	nashim sha’ananot qomenah shema‘nah qoli banot botkhot ha’zenah ’imrati. 
isaiah 32:10	yamim ‘al shanah tirgaznah botekhot ki kalah watsir ’osef beli yawo. 
isaiah 32:11	khirdu sha’ananot regazah botekhot peshotah ve‘orah vakhagorah ‘al khalatsayim. 
isaiah 32:12	‘al shadayim sofedim ‘al sedei khemed ‘al gefen poriyah. 
isaiah 32:13	‘al ’admat ‘ami qots shamir ta‘aleh ki ‘al kal batei masos qiryah ‘alizah. 
isaiah 32:14	ki ’armon nutash hamon ‘ir ‘uzaw ‘ofel vawakhan hayah we‘ad me‘arot ‘ad ‘olam mesos pera’im mir‘eh ‘adarim. 
isaiah 32:15	‘ad yei‘areh ‘aleinu ruakh mimarom vehayah midbar lakarmel vekharmel vehakarmel laya‘ar yeikhashew. 
isaiah 32:16	veshakhan bamidbar mishpat utsedaqah bakarmel teishew. 
isaiah 32:17	vehayah ma‘aseh hatsedaqah shalom va‘awodat hatsedaqah hashqet vawetakh ‘ad ‘olam. 
isaiah 32:18	veyashaw ‘ami binveh shalom uwemishkenot miwtakhim uwimnukhot sha’ananot. 
isaiah 32:19	uwarad beredet haya‘ar uwashiflah tishpal ha‘ir. 
isaiah 32:20	’ashreikhem zore‘ei ‘al kal mayim meshalekhei regel hashor vehakhamor. 
isaiah 33:1	ho shoded ve’atah lo shadud uwoged velo wagedu wo kahatimkha shoded tushad kanelotekha liwgod yiwgedu wakh. 
isaiah 33:2	yhoh khaneinu lekha qivinu heyeh zero‘am labeqarim ’af yeshu‘ateinu be‘et tsarah. 
isaiah 33:3	miqol hamon nadedu ‘amim meiromutekha nafetsu goyim. 
isaiah 33:4	ve’usaf shelalkhem ’osef hekhasil kemashaq geiwim shoqeq bo. 
isaiah 33:5	nisgaw yhoh ki shokhen marom milei tsiyon mishpat utsedaqah. 
isaiah 33:6	vehayah ’emunat ‘itekha khosen yeshu‘ot khakhemat vada‘at yir’at yhoh hi ’otsaro. 
isaiah 33:7	hen ’er’elam tsa‘aqu khutsah mal’akhei shalom mar yiwkayun. 
isaiah 33:8	nashamu mesilot shawat ‘ower ’orakh heifer berit ma’as ‘arim lo khashaw ’enosh. 
isaiah 33:9	’awal ’umlelah ’arets hekhpir lewanon qamal hayah hasharon ka‘arawah veno‘er bashan vekharmel. 
isaiah 33:10	‘atah ’aqum yomar yhoh ‘atah ’eiromam ‘atah ’enasei. 
isaiah 33:11	taharu khashash teiledu qash rukhakhem ’esh tokhalkhem. 
isaiah 33:12	vehayu ‘amim misrefot sid qotsim kesukhim ba’esh yitsatu. 
isaiah 33:13	shim‘u rekhoqim ’asher ‘asiti ude‘u qerowim gewurati. 
isaiah 33:14	pakhadu wetsiyon khata’im ’akhazah re‘adah khaneifim mi yagur lanu ’esh ’okheilah mi yagur lanu moqdei ‘olam. 
isaiah 33:15	holekh tsedaqot vedower meisharim mo’es bewetsa‘ ma‘ashaqot no‘er kapav mitemokh bashokhad ’otem ’azeno mishemoa‘ damim ve‘otsem ‘einav meire’ot bera‘. 
isaiah 33:16	hu meromim yishkon metsadot sela‘im misgabo lakhmo nitan meimav ne’emanim. 
isaiah 33:17	melekh beyafeyo tekhezenah ‘einekha tir’enah ’erets markhaqim. 
isaiah 33:18	libekha yehgeh ’eimah ’ayeh sofer ’ayeh shoqel ’ayeh sofer ’et hamigdalim. 
isaiah 33:19	’et ‘am no‘az lo tir’eh ‘am ‘imqei safah mishemoa‘ nil‘ag lashon ’en binah. 
isaiah 33:20	khazeh tsiyon qiryat mo‘adeinu ‘einekha tir’enah yerushalim naveh sha’anan ’ohel bal yits‘an bal yisa‘ yeteidotav lanetsakh vekhal khawalav bal yinateiqu. 
isaiah 33:21	ki ’im sham ’adir yhoh lanu meqom neharim ye’orim rakhawei yadayim bal teilekh bo ’oni shayit vetsi ’adir lo ya‘awrenu. 
isaiah 33:22	ki yhoh shofeteinu yhoh mekhoqeqeinu yhoh malkeinu hu yoshi‘einu. 
isaiah 33:23	niteshu khawalayikh bal yekhazequ khen tarenam bal paresu nes ’az khulaq ‘ad shalal marbeh piskhim bazezu waz. 
isaiah 33:24	uwal yomar shakhen khaliti ha‘am hayoshew bah nesu ‘avon. 
isaiah 34:1	qirwu goyim lishmoa‘ ule’umim haqshiwu tishma‘ ha’arets umelo’ah teiwel vekhal tse’etsa’eha. 
isaiah 34:2	ki qetsef yhoh ‘al kal hagoyim vekheimah ‘al kal tsewa’am hekherimam netanam latawakh. 
isaiah 34:3	vekhaleihem yushlakhu ufigreihem ya‘aleh wa’esham venamasu harim midamam. 
isaiah 34:4	venamaqu kal tsewa hashamayim venagolu khaseifer hashamayim vekhal tsewa’am yibol kinwol ‘aleh migefen ukhenowelet mite’einah. 
isaiah 34:5	ki rivetah washamayim kharbi hineh ‘al ’edom teired ve‘al ‘am khermi lemishpat. 
isaiah 34:6	kherew yhoh male’ah dam hudashnah meikheilew midam karim ve‘atudim meikheilew kilyot ’eilim ki zewakh yhoh bewatserah vetewakh gadol be’erets ’edom. 
isaiah 34:7	veyaredu re’eimim ‘imam ufarim ‘im ’abirim verivetah ’artsam midam va‘afaram meikheilew yedushan. 
isaiah 34:8	ki yom naqam yhoh shenat shilumim leriw tsiyon. 
isaiah 34:9	venehefkhu nekhaleha lezefet va‘afarah legaferit vehayetah ’artsah lezefet bo‘eirah. 
isaiah 34:10	laylah veyomam lo tikhbeh le‘olam ya‘aleh ‘ashanah midor lador tekheraw leneitsakh netsakhim ’en ‘ower bah. 
isaiah 34:11	vireishuha qa’at veqipod veyanshof ve‘orew yishkenu wah venatah ‘aleha qav tohu ve’awnei wohu. 
isaiah 34:12	khoreha ve’en sham melukhah yiqra’u vekhal sareha yihyu ’afes. 
isaiah 34:13	ve‘aletah ’armenoteha sirim qimos vakhoakh bemiwtsareha vehayetah neveh tanim khatsir liwnot ya‘anah. 
isaiah 34:14	ufageshu tsiyim ’et ’iyim vesa‘ir ‘al rei‘eihu yiqra ’akh sham hirgi‘ah lilit umatse’ah lah manoakh. 
isaiah 34:15	shamah qinenah qipoz vatemalet uwaqe‘ah vedagerah wetsilah ’akh sham niqbetsu dayot ’ishah re‘utah. 
isaiah 34:16	dirshu mei‘al seifer yhoh uqera’u ’akhat meihenah lo ne‘darah ’ishah re‘utah lo faqadu ki fi hu tsivah verukho hu qibetsan. 
isaiah 34:17	vehu hipil lahen goral veyado khileqatah lahem baqav ‘ad ‘olam yirashuha ledor vador yishkenu wah. 
isaiah 35:1	yesusum midbar vetsiyah vetagel ‘arawah vetifrakh kakhawatsalet. 
isaiah 35:2	paroakh tifrakh vetagel ’af gilat veranen kewod halewanon nitan lah hadar hakarmel vehasharon hemah yir’u khewod yhoh hadar ’eloheinu. 
isaiah 35:3	khazequ yadayim rafot uwirkayim koshelot ’ameitsu. 
isaiah 35:4	’imru lenimharei lew khizqu ’al tira’u hineh ’eloheikhem naqam yawo gemul ’elohim hu yawo veyosha‘akhem. 
isaiah 35:5	’az tipaqakhnah ‘einei ‘ivrim ve’azenei kheireshim tipatakhnah. 
isaiah 35:6	’az yedaleg ka’ayal piseiakh vetaron leshon ’ilem ki niwqe‘u wamidbar mayim unekhalim ba‘arawah. 
isaiah 35:7	vehayah hasharaw la’agam vetsima’on lemabu‘ei mayim binveh tanim riwtsah khatsir leqaneh vagome. 
isaiah 35:8	vehayah sham maslul vaderekh vederekh haqodesh yiqarei lah lo ya‘awrenu tamei vehu lamo holekh derekh ve’evilim lo yit‘u. 
isaiah 35:9	lo yihyeh sham ’aryeh uferits khayot bal ya‘alenah lo timatsei sham vehalekhu ge’ulim. 
isaiah 35:10	ufeduyei yhoh yeshuwun uwa’u tsiyon berinah vesimkhat ‘olam ‘al rosham sason vesimkhah yasigu venasu yagon va’anakhah. 
isaiah 36:1	vayhi be’arba‘ ‘esreh shanah lamelekh khizqiyahu ‘alah sankheiriw melekh ’ashur ‘al kal ‘arei yehudah habetsurot vayitpesem. 
isaiah 36:2	vayishlakh melekh ’ashur ’et raw shaqeh milakhish yerushalemah ’el hamelekh khizqiyahu bekhel kawed vaya‘amod bit‘alat habereikhah ha‘elyonah bimsilat sedeh khowes. 
isaiah 36:3	vayeitsei ’eilav ’elyaqim ben khilqiyahu ’asher ‘al habayit veshewna hasofer veyo’akh ben ’asaf hamazkir. 
isaiah 36:4	vayomer ’aleihem raw shaqeh ’imru na ’el khizqiyahu koh ’amar hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur mah habitakhon hazeh ’asher batakheta. 
isaiah 36:5	’amarti ’akh dewar sefatayim ‘eitsah ugewurah lamilkhamah ‘atah ‘al mi watakhta ki maradta bi. 
isaiah 36:6	hineh watakhta ‘al mish‘enet haqaneh haratsuts hazeh ‘al mitsrayim ’asher yisamekh ’ish ‘alav uwa wekhapo uneqawah ken par‘oh melekh mitsrayim lekhal habotekhim ‘alav. 
isaiah 36:7	vekhi tomar ’eilai ’el yhoh ’eloheinu batakhenu halo hu ’asher heisir khizqiyahu ’et bamotav ve’et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim lifnei hamizbeiakh hazeh tishtakhavu. 
isaiah 36:8	ve‘atah hit‘arew na ’et ’adoni hamelekh ’ashur ve’etenah lekha ’alpayim susim ’im tukhal latet lekha rokhewim ‘aleihem. 
isaiah 36:9	ve’ekh tashiw ’et penei fakhat ’akhad ‘awdei ’adoni haqtanim vatiwtakh lekha ‘al mitsrayim lerekhew ulefarashim. 
isaiah 36:10	ve‘atah hamibal‘adei yhoh ‘aliti ‘al ha’arets hazot lehashkhitah yhoh ’amar ’eilai ‘aleh ’el ha’arets hazot vehashkhitah. 
isaiah 36:11	vayomer ’elyaqim veshewna veyo’akh ’el raw shaqeh daber na ’el ‘awadekha ’aramit ki shome‘im ’anakhenu ve’al tedaber ’eileinu yehudit be’azenei ha‘am ’asher ‘al hakhomah. 
isaiah 36:12	vayomer raw shaqeh ha’el ’adonekha ve’eilekha shelakhani ’adoni ledaber ’et hadewarim ha’eleh halo ‘al ha’anashim hayoshewim ‘al hakhomah le’ekhol ’et khar’eihem tso’atam velishtot ’et sheineihem meimei ragleihem ‘imakhem. 
isaiah 36:13	vaya‘amod raw shaqeh vayiqra weqol gadol yehudit vayomer shim‘u ’et diwrei hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 36:14	koh ’amar hamelekh ’al yashi lakhem khizqiyahu ki lo yukhal lehatsil ’etkhem. 
isaiah 36:15	ve’al yawtakh ’etkhem khizqiyahu ’el yhoh leimor hatsel yatsileinu yhoh lo tinaten ha‘ir hazot beyad melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 36:16	’al tishme‘u ’el khizqiyahu ki khoh ’amar hamelekh ’ashur ‘asu ’iti werakhah utse’u ’eilai ve’ikhlu ’ish gafno ve’ish te’einato ushetu ’ish mei woro. 
isaiah 36:17	‘ad bo’i velaqakhti ’etkhem ’el ’erets ke’artsekhem ’erets dagan vetirosh ’erets lekhem ukheramim. 
isaiah 36:18	pen yasit ’etkhem khizqiyahu leimor yhoh yatsileinu hahitsilu ’elohei hagoyim ’ish ’et ’artso miyad melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 36:19	’ayeh ’elohei khamat ve’arpad ’ayeh ’elohei sefarvayim vekhi hitsilu ’et shomeron miyadi. 
isaiah 36:20	mi bekhal ’elohei ha’aratsot ha’eleh ’asher hitsilu ’et ’artsam miyadi ki yatsil yhoh ’et yerushalim miyadi. 
isaiah 36:21	vayakharishu velo ‘anu ’oto dawar ki mitsvat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta‘anuhu. 
isaiah 36:22	vayawo ’elyaqim ben khilqiyahu ’asher ‘al habayit veshewna hasofer veyo’akh ben ’asaf hamazkir ’el khizqiyahu qeru‘ei wegadim vayagidu lo ’et diwrei raw shaqeh. 
isaiah 37:1	vayhi kishmoa‘ hamelekh khizqiyahu vayiqra‘ ’et begadav vayitkas basaq vayawo bet yhoh. 
isaiah 37:2	vayishlakh ’et ’elyaqim ’asher ‘al habayit ve’et shewna hasofer ve’et ziqnei hakohanim mitkasim basaqim ’el yesha‘yahu wen ’amots hanawi. 
isaiah 37:3	vayomeru ’eilav koh ’amar khizqiyahu yom tsarah vetokheikhah une’atsah hayom hazeh ki wa’u wanim ‘ad mashber vekhoakh ’ayin leleidah. 
isaiah 37:4	’ulai yishma‘ yhoh ’elohekha ’et diwrei raw shaqeh ’asher shelakho melekh ’ashur ’adonav lekharef ’elohim khai vehokhiakh badewarim ’asher shama‘ yhoh ’elohekha venasata tefilah be‘ad hashe’eirit hanimtsa’ah. 
isaiah 37:5	vayawo’u ‘awdei hamelekh khizqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu. 
isaiah 37:6	vayomer ’aleihem yesha‘yahu koh tomerun ’el ’adoneikhem koh ’amar yhoh ’al tira mipenei hadewarim ’asher shama‘ta ’asher gidefu na‘arei melekh ’ashur ’oti. 
isaiah 37:7	hini noten bo ruakh veshama‘ shemu‘ah veshaw ’el ’artso vehipaltiv bakherew be’artso. 
isaiah 37:8	vayashaw raw shaqeh vayimtsa ’et melekh ’ashur nilkham ‘al liwnah ki shama‘ ki nasa‘ milakhish. 
isaiah 37:9	vayishma‘ ‘al tirhaqah melekh kush leimor yatsa lehilakhem ’itakh vayishma‘ vayishlakh mal’akhim ’el khizqiyahu leimor. 
isaiah 37:10	koh tomerun ’el khizqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor ’al yashi’akha ’elohekha ’asher ’atah boteiakh bo leimor lo tinaten yerushalim beyad melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 37:11	hineh ’atah shama‘ta ’asher ‘asu malkhei ’ashur lekhal ha’aratsot lehakharimam ve’atah tinatsel. 
isaiah 37:12	hahitsilu ’otam ’elohei hagoyim ’asher hishkhitu ’awotai ’et gozan ve’et kharan veretsef uwenei ‘eden ’asher bitlasar. 
isaiah 37:13	’ayeh melekh khamat umelekh ’arpad umelekh la‘ir sefarvayim heina‘ ve‘ivah. 
isaiah 37:14	vayiqakh khizqiyahu ’et hasefarim miyad hamal’akhim vayiqra’eihu vaya‘al bet yhoh vayifreseihu khizqiyahu lifnei yhoh. 
isaiah 37:15	vayitpalel khizqiyahu ’el yhoh leimor. 
isaiah 37:16	yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el yoshew hakeruwim ’atah hu ha’elohim lewadekha lekhol mamlekhot ha’arets ’atah ‘asita ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets. 
isaiah 37:17	hateh yhoh ’azenekha ushema‘ peqakh yhoh ‘einekha ure’eh ushema‘ ’et kal diwrei sankheiriw ’asher shalakh lekharef ’elohim khai. 
isaiah 37:18	’amenam yhoh hekheriwu malkhei ’ashur ’et kal ha’aratsot ve’et ’artsam. 
isaiah 37:19	venaton ’et ’eloheihem ba’esh ki lo ’elohim hemah ki ’im ma‘aseh yedei ’adam ‘ets va’ewen vai’abedum. 
isaiah 37:20	ve‘atah yhoh ’eloheinu hoshi‘einu miyado veyeide‘u kal mamlekhot ha’arets ki ’atah yhoh lewadekha. 
isaiah 37:21	vayishlakh yesha‘yahu wen ’amots ’el khizqiyahu leimor koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher hitpalalta ’eilai ’el sankheiriw melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 37:22	zeh hadawar ’asher diber yhoh ‘alav bazah lekha la‘agah lekha betulat bat tsiyon ’akharekha rosh heini‘ah bat yerushalim. 
isaiah 37:23	’et mi kheirafta vegidafta ve‘al mi harimotah qol vatisa marom ‘einekha ’el qedosh yisra’el. 
isaiah 37:24	beyad ‘awadekha kheirafta ’adonai vatomer berow rikhbi ’ani ‘aliti merom harim yarketei lewanon ve’ekhrot qomat ’arazav miwkhar beroshav ve’awo merom qitso ya‘ar karmilo. 
isaiah 37:25	’ani qarti veshatiti mayim ve’akhriw bekhaf pe‘amai kol ye’orei matsor. 
isaiah 37:26	halo shama‘ta lemeirakhoq ’otah ‘asiti mimei qedem vitsartiha ‘atah haweitiha utehi lehash’ot galim nitsim ‘arim betsurot. 
isaiah 37:27	veyosheweihen qitsrei yad khatu vawoshu hayu ‘eisew sadeh viraq deshe khatsir gagot ushedeimah lifnei qamah. 
isaiah 37:28	veshiwtekha vetseitekha uwo’akha yada‘eti ve’et hitragezkha ’eilai. 
isaiah 37:29	ya‘an hitragezkha ’eilai vesha’anankha ‘alah we’azenai vesamti khakhi be’apekha umitgi bisfatekha vahashiwotikha baderekh ’asher bata bah. 
isaiah 37:30	vezeh lekha ha’ot ’akhol hashanah safiakh uwashanah hasheinit shakhis uwashanah hashelishit zir‘u veqitsru venit‘u kheramim ve’akhol ve’ikhlu firyam. 
isaiah 37:31	veyasefah peleitat bet yehudah hanish’arah shoresh lematah ve‘asah feri lema‘elah. 
isaiah 37:32	ki mirushalim teitsei she’eirit ufeleitah meihar tsiyon qin’at yhoh tsewa’ot ta‘aseh zot. 
isaiah 37:33	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’el melekh ’ashur lo yawo ’el ha‘ir hazot velo yoreh sham khets velo yeqademenah magen velo yishpokh ‘oleha solelah. 
isaiah 37:34	baderekh ’asher ba bah yashuw ve’el ha‘ir hazot lo yawo ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 37:35	veganoti ‘al ha‘ir hazot lehoshi‘ah lema‘ani ulema‘an david ‘awdi. 
isaiah 37:36	vayeitsei mal’akh yhoh vayakeh bemakhaneh ’ashur mei’ah ushemonim vakhamishah ’alef vayashkimu waboqer vehineh khulam pegarim meitim. 
isaiah 37:37	vayisa‘ vayeilekh vayashaw sankheiriw melekh ’ashur vayeishew benineveh. 
isaiah 37:38	vayhi hu mishtakhaveh bet nisrokh ’elohav ve’adramelekh vesar’etser banav hikuhu wakherew vehemah nimletu ’erets ’ararat vayimlokh ’eisar khadon beno takhtav. 
isaiah 38:1	bayamim hahem khalah khizqiyahu lamut vayawo ’eilav yesha‘yahu wen ’amots hanawi vayomer ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh tsav leweitekha ki met ’atah velo tikhyeh. 
isaiah 38:2	vayasew khizqiyahu panav ’el haqir vayitpalel ’el yhoh. 
isaiah 38:3	vayomar ’anah yhoh zekhar na ’et ’asher hithalakhti lefanekha be’emet uwelew shalem vehatow be‘einekha ‘asiti vayeiwek khizqiyahu bekhi gadol. 
isaiah 38:4	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yesha‘yahu leimor. 
isaiah 38:5	halokh ve’amarta ’el khizqiyahu koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei david ’awikha shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha ra’iti ’et dim‘atekha hini yosif ‘al yamekha khamesh ‘esreh shanah. 
isaiah 38:6	umikaf melekh ’ashur ’atsilekha ve’et ha‘ir hazot veganoti ‘al ha‘ir hazot. 
isaiah 38:7	vezeh lekha ha’ot mei’et yhoh ’asher ya‘aseh yhoh ’et hadawar hazeh ’asher diber. 
isaiah 38:8	hini meishiw ’et tsel hama‘alot ’asher yaredah wema‘alot ’akhaz bashemesh ’akhoranit ‘eser ma‘alot vatashaw hashemesh ‘eser ma‘alot bama‘alot ’asher yaradah. 
isaiah 38:9	mikhtaw lekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah bakhaloto vaykhi meikhaleyo. 
isaiah 38:10	’ani ’amarti bidmi yamai ’eileikhah besha‘arei she’ol puqadti yeter shenotai. 
isaiah 38:11	’amarti lo ’er’eh yah yah be’erets hakhayim lo ’abit ’adam ‘od ‘im yoshewei khadel. 
isaiah 38:12	dori nisa‘ veniglah mini ke’ohel ro‘i qipadti kha’oreg khayai midalah yewatse‘eini miyom ‘ad laylah tashlimeini. 
isaiah 38:13	shiviti ‘ad boqer ka’ari ken yeshaber kal ‘atsmotai miyom ‘ad laylah tashlimeini. 
isaiah 38:14	kesus ‘agur ken ’atsaftsef ’ehgeh kayonah dalu ‘einai lamarom ’adonai ‘asheqah li ‘areweini. 
isaiah 38:15	mah ’adaber ve’amar li vehu ‘asah ’edadeh khal shenotai ‘al mar nafshi. 
isaiah 38:16	’adonai ‘aleihem yikhyu ulekhal bahen khayei rukhi vetakhalimeini vehakhayeini. 
isaiah 38:17	hineh leshalom mar li mar ve’atah khashaqta nafshi mishakhat beli ki hishlakhta ’akharei geivekha kal khata’ai. 
isaiah 38:18	ki lo she’ol todeka mavet yehaleka lo yesaberu yordei wor ’el ’amitekha. 
isaiah 38:19	khai khai hu yodekha kamoni hayom ’aw lewanim yodia‘ ’el ’amitekha. 
isaiah 38:20	yhoh lehoshi‘eini uneginotai nenagen kal yemei khayeinu ‘al bet yhoh. 
isaiah 38:21	vayomer yesha‘yahu yis’u dewelet te’einim veyimrekhu ‘al hashekhin veyekhi. 
isaiah 38:22	vayomer khizqiyahu mah ’ot ki ’e‘eleh bet yhoh. 
isaiah 39:1	ba‘et hahiv shalakh merodakh bal’adan ben bal’adan melekh bawel sefarim uminkhah ’el khizqiyahu vayishma‘ ki khalah vayekhezaq. 
isaiah 39:2	vayismakh ‘aleihem khizqiyahu vayar’em ’et bet nekhotah nekhoto ’et hakesef ve’et hazahaw ve’et habesamim ve’et hashemen hatow ve’et kal bet keilav ve’et kal ’asher nimtsa be’otserotav lo hayah dawar ’asher lo her’am khizqiyahu beweito uwekhal memshalto. 
isaiah 39:3	vayawo yesha‘yahu hanawi ’el hamelekh khizqiyahu vayomer ’eilav mah ’ameru ha’anashim ha’eleh umei’ayin yawo’u ’eilekha vayomer khizqiyahu mei’erets rekhoqah ba’u ’eilai mibawel. 
isaiah 39:4	vayomer mah ra’u beweitekha vayomer khizqiyahu ’et kal ’asher beweiti ra’u lo hayah dawar ’asher lo hir’itim be’otsrotai. 
isaiah 39:5	vayomer yesha‘yahu ’el khizqiyahu shema‘ dewar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
isaiah 39:6	hineh yamim ba’im venisa kal ’asher beweitekha va’asher ’atseru ’awotekha ‘ad hayom hazeh bawel lo yivater dawar ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 39:7	umibanekha ’asher yeitse’u mimekha ’asher tolid yiqakhu vehayu sarisim beheikhal melekh bawel. 
isaiah 39:8	vayomer khizqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu tow dewar yhoh ’asher dibarta vayomer ki yihyeh shalom ve’emet beyamai. 
isaiah 40:1	nakhamu nakhamu ‘ami yomar ’eloheikhem. 
isaiah 40:2	daberu ‘al lew yerushalim veqir’u ’eileha ki male’ah tsewa’ah ki nirtsah ‘avonah ki laqekhah miyad yhoh kiflayim bekhal khatoteha. 
isaiah 40:3	qol qorei bamidbar panu derekh yhoh yasheru ba‘arawah mesilah leiloheinu. 
isaiah 40:4	kal ge yinasei vekhal har vegiw‘ah yishpalu vehayah he‘aqow lemishor veharekhasim lewiq‘ah. 
isaiah 40:5	veniglah kewod yhoh vera’u khal basar yakhdav ki pi yhoh diber. 
isaiah 40:6	qol ’omer qera ve’amar mah ’eqra kal habasar khatsir vekhal khasdo ketsits hasadeh. 
isaiah 40:7	yawesh khatsir nawel tsits ki ruakh yhoh nashewah bo ’akhen khatsir ha‘am. 
isaiah 40:8	yawesh khatsir nawel tsits udewar ’eloheinu yaqum le‘olam. 
isaiah 40:9	‘al har gawoha ‘ali lakh mewaseret tsiyon harimi wakoakh qolekh mewaseret yerushalim harimi ’al tira’i ’imri le‘arei yehudah hineh ’eloheikhem. 
isaiah 40:10	hineh ’adonai yhoh bekhazaq yawo uzero‘o moshelah lo hineh sekharo ’ito ufe‘ulato lefanav. 
isaiah 40:11	kero‘eh ‘edro yir‘eh bizro‘o yeqabets tela’im uwekheiqo yisa ‘alot yenahel. 
isaiah 40:12	mi madad besha‘olo mayim veshamayim bazeret tiken vekhal bashalish ‘afar ha’arets veshaqal bapeles harim ugewa‘ot bemozenayim. 
isaiah 40:13	mi tiken ’et ruakh yhoh ve’ish ‘atsato yodi‘enu. 
isaiah 40:14	’et mi no‘ats vaywineihu vaylamedeihu be’orakh mishpat vaylamedeihu da‘at vederekh tewunot yodi‘enu. 
isaiah 40:15	hen goyim kemar mideli ukheshakhaq mozenayim nekhshawu hen ’iyim kadaq yitol. 
isaiah 40:16	ulewanon ’en dei ba‘er vekhayato ’en dei ‘olah. 
isaiah 40:17	kal hagoyim ke’ayin negdo mei’efes vatohu nekhshewu lo. 
isaiah 40:18	ve’el mi tedameyun ’el umah demut ta‘arkhu lo. 
isaiah 40:19	hapesel nasakh kharash vetsoref bazahaw yeraqe‘enu uretuqot kesef tsoref. 
isaiah 40:20	hamsukan terumah ‘ets lo yirqaw yiwkhar kharash khakham yewaqesh lo lehakhin pesel lo yimot. 
isaiah 40:21	halo teide‘u halo tishma‘u halo hugad meirosh lakhem halo hawinotem mosdot ha’arets. 
isaiah 40:22	hayoshew ‘al khug ha’arets veyosheweha kakhagawim hanoteh khadoq shamayim vayimtakhem ka’ohel lashawet. 
isaiah 40:23	hanoten roznim le’ayin shofetei ’erets katohu ‘asah. 
isaiah 40:24	’af bal nita‘u ’af bal zora‘u ’af bal shoresh ba’arets giz‘am vegam nashaf bahem vayiwashu use‘arah kaqash tisa’em. 
isaiah 40:25	ve’el mi tedameyuni ve’eshveh yomar qadosh. 
isaiah 40:26	se’u marom ‘eineikhem ure’u mi wara ’eleh hamotsi wemispar tsewa’am lekhulam beshem yiqra meirow ’onim ve’amits koakh ’ish lo ne‘dar. 
isaiah 40:27	lamah tomar ya‘aqow utedaber yisra’el nisterah darki yhoh umei’elohai mishpati ya‘awor. 
isaiah 40:28	halo yada‘ta ’im lo shama‘ta ’elohei ‘olam yhoh borei qetsot ha’arets lo yi‘af velo yiga‘ ’en kheiqer litwunato. 
isaiah 40:29	noten laya‘ef koakh ule’en ’onim ‘atsemah yarbeh. 
isaiah 40:30	veyi‘afu ne‘arim veyiga‘u uwakhurim kashol yikasheilu. 
isaiah 40:31	veqoyei yhoh yakhalifu khoakh ya‘alu ’eiwer kanesharim yarutsu velo yiga‘u yeilekhu velo yi‘afu. 
isaiah 41:1	hakharishu ’eilai ’iyim ule’umim yakhalifu khoakh yigeshu ’az yedabeiru yakhdav lamishpat niqrawah. 
isaiah 41:2	mi hei‘ir mimizrakh tsedeq yiqra’eihu leraglo yiten lefanav goyim umelakhim yard yiten ke‘afar kharbo keqash nidaf qashto. 
isaiah 41:3	yirdefem ya‘awor shalom ’orakh beraglav lo yawo. 
isaiah 41:4	mi fa‘al ve‘asah qorei hadorot meirosh ’ani yhoh rishon ve’et ’akharonim ’ani hu. 
isaiah 41:5	ra’u ’iyim veyira’u qetsot ha’arets yekheradu qarewu vaye’etayun. 
isaiah 41:6	’ish ’et rei‘eihu ya‘zoru ule’akhiv yomar khazaq. 
isaiah 41:7	vaykhazeq kharash ’et tsoref makhaliq patish ’et holem pa‘am ’omer ladeweq tow hu vaykhazeqeihu wemasmerim lo yimot. 
isaiah 41:8	ve’atah yisra’el ‘awdi ya‘aqow ’asher bekhartikha zera‘ ’awraham ’ohawi. 
isaiah 41:9	’asher hekhezaqtikha miqtsot ha’arets umei’atsileha qeratikha va’omar lekha ‘awdi ’atah bekhartikha velo me’astikha. 
isaiah 41:10	’al tira ki ‘imekha ’ani ’al tishta‘ ki ’ani ’elohekha ’imatstikha ’af ‘azartikha ’af temakhtikha bimin tsidqi. 
isaiah 41:11	hen yeiwoshu veyikalemu kol hanekherim bakh yihyu khe’ayin veyowedu ’anshei riwekha. 
isaiah 41:12	tewaqshem velo timtsa’em ’anshei matsutekha yihyu khe’ayin ukhe’efes ’anshei milkhamtekha. 
isaiah 41:13	ki ’ani yhoh ’elohekha makhaziq yeminekha ha’omer lekha ’al tira ’ani ‘azartikha. 
isaiah 41:14	’al tire’i tola‘at ya‘aqow metei yisra’el ’ani ‘azartikh ne’um yhoh vego’alekh qedosh yisra’el. 
isaiah 41:15	hineh samtikh lemorag kharuts khadash ba‘al pifiyot tadush harim vetadoq ugewa‘ot kamots tasim. 
isaiah 41:16	tizrem veruakh tisa’em use‘arah tafits ’otam ve’atah tagil yhoh biqdosh yisra’el tithalal. 
isaiah 41:17	ha‘aniyim veha’ewyonim mewaqshim mayim va’ayin leshonam batsama nashatah ’ani yhoh ’e‘enem ’elohei yisra’el lo ’e‘ezwem. 
isaiah 41:18	’eftakh ‘al shefayim neharot uwetokh beqa‘ot ma‘yanot ’asim midbar la’agam mayim ve’erets tsiyah lemotsa’ei mayim. 
isaiah 41:19	’eten bamidbar ’erez shitah vahadas ve‘ets shamen ’asim ba‘arawah berosh tidhar ute’ashur yakhdav. 
isaiah 41:20	lema‘an yir’u veyeide‘u veyasimu veyaskilu yakhdav ki yad yhoh ‘asetah zot uqedosh yisra’el bera’ah. 
isaiah 41:21	qarewu riwekhem yomar yhoh hagishu ‘atsumoteikhem yomar melekh ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 41:22	yagishu veyagidu lanu ’et ’asher tiqrenah harishonot mah henah hagidu venasimah libeinu veneide‘ah ’akharitan ’o haba’ot hashmi‘unu. 
isaiah 41:23	hagidu ha’otiyot le’akhor veneide‘ah ki ’elohim ’atem ’af teitiwu vetarei‘u venishta‘ah veneire venir’eh yakhdav. 
isaiah 41:24	hen ’atem mei’ayin ufa‘alekhem mei’afa‘ to‘eiwah yiwkhar bakhem. 
isaiah 41:25	ha‘iroti mitsafon vayat mimizrakh shemesh yiqra wishmi veyawo seganim kemo khomer ukhemo yotser yirmas tit. 
isaiah 41:26	mi higid meirosh veneida‘ah umilefanim venomar tsadiq ’af ’en magid ’af ’en mashmia‘ ’af ’en shomeia‘ ’imreikhem. 
isaiah 41:27	rishon letsiyon hineh hinam velirushalim mewaser ’eten. 
isaiah 41:28	ve’eire ve’en ’ish umei’eleh ve’en yo‘ets ve’esh’alem veyashiwu dawar. 
isaiah 41:29	hen kulam ’aven ’efes ma‘aseihem ruakh vatohu niskeihem. 
isaiah 42:1	hen ‘awdi ’etmakh bo bekhiri ratsetah nafshi natati rukhi ‘alav mishpat lagoyim yotsi. 
isaiah 42:2	lo yits‘aq velo yisa velo yashmia‘ bakhuts qolo. 
isaiah 42:3	qaneh ratsuts lo yishbor ufishtah kheihah lo yekhabenah le’emet yotsi mishpat. 
isaiah 42:4	lo yikhheh velo yaruts ‘ad yasim ba’arets mishpat uletorato ’iyim yeyakheilu. 
isaiah 42:5	koh ’amar ha’el yhoh borei hashamayim venoteihem roqa‘ ha’arets vetse’etsa’eha noten neshamah la‘am ‘aleha veruakh laholekhim bah. 
isaiah 42:6	’ani yhoh qeratikha wetsedeq ve’akhzeq beyadekha ve’etsarekha ve’etenkha liwrit ‘am le’or goyim. 
isaiah 42:7	lifqoakh ‘einayim ‘ivrot lehotsi mimasger ’asir mibet kele yoshewei khoshekh. 
isaiah 42:8	’ani yhoh hu shemi ukhewodi le’akher lo ’eten utehilati lapesilim. 
isaiah 42:9	harishonot hineh wa’u vakhadashot ’ani magid beterem titsmakhnah ’ashmi‘ ’etkhem. 
isaiah 42:10	shiru yhoh shir khadash tehilato miqtseh ha’arets yordei hayam umelo’o ’iyim veyosheweihem. 
isaiah 42:11	yis’u midbar ve‘arav khatseirim teishew qeidar yaronu yoshewei sela‘ meirosh harim yitsvakhu. 
isaiah 42:12	yasimu yhoh kawod utehilato ba’iyim yagidu. 
isaiah 42:13	yhoh kagibor yeitsei ke’ish milkhamot ya‘ir qin’ah yaria‘ ’af yatsriakh ‘al ’oyewav yitgabar. 
isaiah 42:14	hekhesheiti mei‘olam ’akharish ’et’apaq kayoleidah ’ef‘eh ’eshom ve’esh’af yakhad. 
isaiah 42:15	’akhariw harim ugewa‘ot vekhal ‘esbam ’owish vesamti neharot la’iyim va’agamim ’owish. 
isaiah 42:16	veholakhti ‘ivrim bederekh lo yada‘u bintiwot lo yade‘u ’adrikhem ’asim makhshakh lifneihem la’or uma‘aqashim lemishor ’eleh hadewarim ‘asitim velo ‘azawtim. 
isaiah 42:17	nasogu ’akhor yeiwoshu woshet habotekhim bapasel ha’omerim lemaseikhah ’atem ’eloheinu. 
isaiah 42:18	hakheireshim shema‘u veha‘ivrim habitu lir’ot. 
isaiah 42:19	mi ‘iver ki ’im ‘awdi vekheiresh kemal’akhi ’eshlakh mi ‘iver kimshulam ve‘iver ke‘ewed yhoh. 
isaiah 42:20	ra’ita ra’ot rabot velo tishmor paqoakh ’azenayim velo yishma‘. 
isaiah 42:21	yhoh khafets lema‘an tsidqo yagdil torah veya’dir. 
isaiah 42:22	vehu ‘am bazuz veshasui hafeiakh bakhurim kulam uwewatei khela’im hakheba’u hayu lawaz ve’en matsil meshisah ve’en ’omer hashaw. 
isaiah 42:23	mi wakhem ya’azin zot yaqshiw veyishma‘ le’akhor. 
isaiah 42:24	mi natan limshoseh limshisah ya‘aqow veyisra’el lewozezim halo yhoh zu khatanu lo velo ’awu widrakhav halokh velo shame‘u betorato. 
isaiah 42:25	vayishpokh ‘alav kheimah ’apo ve‘ezuz milkhamah vatelahateihu misawiw velo yada‘ vatiw‘ar bo velo yasim ‘al lew. 
isaiah 43:1	ve‘atah koh ’amar yhoh bora’akha ya‘aqow veyotserkha yisra’el ’al tira ki ge’altikha qarati weshimkha li ’atah. 
isaiah 43:2	ki ta‘awor bamayim ’itekha ’ani uwaneharot lo yishtefukha ki teilekh bemo ’esh lo tikaveh velehawah lo tiw‘ar bakh. 
isaiah 43:3	ki ’ani yhoh ’elohekha qedosh yisra’el moshi‘ekha natati khaferekha mitsrayim kush usewa takhtekha. 
isaiah 43:4	mei’asher yaqarta we‘einai nikhbadta va’ani ’ahawtikha ve’eten ’adam takhtekha ule’umim takhat nafshekha. 
isaiah 43:5	’al tira ki ’itekha ’ani mimizrakh ’awi zar‘ekha umima‘araw ’aqabetseka. 
isaiah 43:6	’omar latsafon teini uleteiman ’al tikhla’i hawi’i wanai meirakhoq uwenotai miqtseh ha’arets. 
isaiah 43:7	kol haniqra wishmi velikhwodi berativ yetsartiv ’af ‘asitiv. 
isaiah 43:8	hotsi ‘am ‘iver ve‘einayim yesh vekheireshim ve’azenayim lamo. 
isaiah 43:9	kal hagoyim niqbetsu yakhdav veyei’asefu le’umim mi wahem yagid zot verishonot yashmi‘unu yitenu ‘eideihem veyitsdaqu veyishme‘u veyomeru ’emet. 
isaiah 43:10	’atem ‘eidai ne’um yhoh ve‘awdi ’asher bakhareti lema‘an teide‘u veta’aminu li vetawinu ki ’ani hu lefanai lo notsar ’el ve’akharai lo yihyeh. 
isaiah 43:11	’anokhi ’anokhi yhoh ve’en mibal‘adai moshia‘. 
isaiah 43:12	’anokhi higadti vehosha‘ti vehishma‘ti ve’en bakhem zar ve’atem ‘eidai ne’um yhoh va’ani ’el. 
isaiah 43:13	gam miyom ’ani hu ve’en miyadi matsil ’ef‘al umi yeshiwenah. 
isaiah 43:14	koh ’amar yhoh go’alkhem qedosh yisra’el lema‘ankhem shilakhti wawelah vehoradti warikhim kulam vekhasdim ba’oniyot rinatam. 
isaiah 43:15	’ani yhoh qedoshekhem borei yisra’el malkekhem. 
isaiah 43:16	koh ’amar yhoh hanoten bayam darekh uwemayim ‘azim netiwah. 
isaiah 43:17	hamotsi rekhew vasus khayil ve‘izuz yakhdav yishkewu bal yaqumu da‘akhu kapishtah khawu. 
isaiah 43:18	’al tizkeru rishonot veqadmoniyot ’al titbonanu. 
isaiah 43:19	hini ‘oseh khadashah ‘atah titsmakh halo teida‘uha ’af ’asim bamidbar derekh bishimon neharot. 
isaiah 43:20	tekhabedeini khayat hasadeh tanim uwenot ya‘anah ki natati wamidbar mayim neharot bishimon lehashqot ‘ami wekhiri. 
isaiah 43:21	‘am zu yatsarti li tehilati yesapeiru. 
isaiah 43:22	velo ’oti qarata ya‘aqow ki yaga‘ta bi yisra’el. 
isaiah 43:23	lo heiweita li seh ‘olotekha uzewakhekha lo khibadtani lo he‘ewadtikha beminkhah velo hoga‘tikha bilwonah. 
isaiah 43:24	lo qanita li wakesef qaneh vekheilew zewakhekha lo hirvitani ’akh he‘ewadtani bekhatotekha hoga‘tani ba‘avonotekha. 
isaiah 43:25	’anokhi ’anokhi hu mokheh fesha‘ekha lema‘ani vekhatotekha lo ’ezkor. 
isaiah 43:26	hazkireini nishafetah yakhad saper ’atah lema‘an titsdaq. 
isaiah 43:27	’awikha harishon khata umelitsekha pashe‘u wi. 
isaiah 43:28	va’akhalel sarei qodesh ve’etenah lakheirem ya‘aqow veyisra’el legidufim. 
isaiah 44:1	ve‘atah shema‘ ya‘aqow ‘awdi veyisra’el bakharti wo. 
isaiah 44:2	koh ’amar yhoh ‘osekha veyotserkha mibeten ya‘zereka ’al tira ‘awdi ya‘aqow vishurun bakharti wo. 
isaiah 44:3	ki ’etsaq mayim ‘al tsamei venozelim ‘al yabashah ’etsoq rukhi ‘al zar‘ekha uwirkhati ‘al tse’etsa’ekha. 
isaiah 44:4	vetsamekhu bewen khatsir ka‘arawim ‘al yiwlei mayim. 
isaiah 44:5	zeh yomar yhoh ’ani vezeh yiqra weshem ya‘aqow vezeh yikhtow yado yhoh uweshem yisra’el yekhaneh. 
isaiah 44:6	koh ’amar yhoh melekh yisra’el vego’alo yhoh tsewa’ot ’ani rishon va’ani ’akharon umibal‘adai ’en ’elohim. 
isaiah 44:7	umi khamoni yiqra veyagideha veya‘rekheha li misumi ‘am ‘olam ve’otiyot va’asher tawonah yagidu lamo. 
isaiah 44:8	’al tifkhadu ve’al tirhu halo mei’az hishma‘tikha vehigadti ve’atem ‘eidai hayesh ’eloah mibal‘adai ve’en tsur bal yada‘eti. 
isaiah 44:9	yotserei fesel kulam tohu vakhamudeihem bal yo‘ilu ve‘eideihem hemah bal yir’u uwal yeide‘u lema‘an yeiwoshu. 
isaiah 44:10	mi yatsar ’el ufesel nasakh lewilti ho‘il. 
isaiah 44:11	hen kal khaweirav yeiwoshu vekharashim hemah mei’adam yitqabetsu khulam ya‘amodu yifkhadu yeiwoshu yakhad. 
isaiah 44:12	kharash barzel ma‘atsad ufa‘al bapekham uwamaqawot yitsereihu vayif‘aleihu bizroa‘ kokho gam ra‘ew ve’en koakh lo shatah mayim vayi‘af. 
isaiah 44:13	kharash ‘eitsim natah qav yeta’areihu wasered ya‘aseihu bamaqtsu‘ot uwamekhugah yeta’oreihu vaya‘aseihu ketawnit ’ish ketif’eret ’adam lashewet bayit. 
isaiah 44:14	likhrat lo ’arazim vayiqakh tirzah ve’alon vai’amets lo ba‘atsei ya‘ar nata‘ ’oren vegeshem yegadel. 
isaiah 44:15	vehayah le’adam lewa‘er vayiqakh meihem vayakham ’af yasiq ve’afah lakhem ’af yif‘al ’el vayishtakhu ‘asahu fesel vayisgad lamo. 
isaiah 44:16	khetsyo saraf bemo ’esh ‘al khetsyo basar yokhel yitsleh tsali veyisba‘ ’af yakhom veyomar he’akh khamoti ra’iti ’ur. 
isaiah 44:17	ushe’eirito le’el ‘asah lefislo yisgod yisgad lo veyishtakhu veyitpalel ’eilav veyomar hatsileini ki ’eili ’atah. 
isaiah 44:18	lo yade‘u velo yawinu ki takh meire’ot ‘eineihem meihaskil libotam. 
isaiah 44:19	velo yashiw ’el libo velo da‘at velo tewunah leimor khetsyo sarafti wemo ’esh ve’af ’afiti ‘al gekhalav lekhem ’etsleh wasar ve’okhel veyitro leto‘eiwah ’e‘eseh lewul ‘ets ’esgod. 
isaiah 44:20	ro‘eh ’eifer lew hutal hitahu velo yatsil ’et nafsho velo yomar halo sheqer bimini. 
isaiah 44:21	zekhar ’eleh ya‘aqow veyisra’el ki ‘awdi ’atah yetsartikha ‘ewed li ’atah yisra’el lo tinasheini. 
isaiah 44:22	makhiti kha‘aw pesha‘ekha vekhe‘anan khatotekha shuwah ’eilai ki ge’altikha. 
isaiah 44:23	ranu shamayim ki ‘asah yhoh hari‘u takhtiyot ’arets pitskhu harim rinah ya‘ar vekhal ‘ets bo ki ga’al yhoh ya‘aqow uweyisra’el yitpa’ar. 
isaiah 44:24	koh ’amar yhoh go’alekha veyotserkha mibaten ’anokhi yhoh ‘oseh kol noteh shamayim lewadi roqa‘ ha’arets mi ’iti mei’iti. 
isaiah 44:25	meifer ’otot badim veqosemim yeholel meishiw khakhamim ’akhor veda‘tam yesakel. 
isaiah 44:26	meiqim dewar ‘awdo va‘atsat mal’akhav yashlim ha’omer lirushalim tushaw ule‘arei yehudah tibanenah vekharewoteha ’aqomem. 
isaiah 44:27	ha’omer latsulah khorawi venaharotayikh ’owish. 
isaiah 44:28	ha’omer lekhoresh ro‘i vekhal kheftsi yashlim veleimor lirushalim tibaneh veheikhal tivased. 
isaiah 45:1	koh ’amar yhoh limshikho lekhoresh ’asher hekhezaqti wimino lerad lefanav goyim umatenei melakhim ’afateiakh liftoakh lefanav delatayim ushe‘arim lo yisageiru. 
isaiah 45:2	’ani lefanekha ’eilekh vahadurim ’oshir ’ayasher daltot nekhushah ’ashaber uwerikhei warzel ’agadeia‘. 
isaiah 45:3	venatati lekha ’otsrot khoshekh umatmunei mistarim lema‘an teida‘ ki ’ani yhoh haqorei weshimkha ’elohei yisra’el. 
isaiah 45:4	lema‘an ‘awdi ya‘aqow veyisra’el bekhiri va’eqra lekha bishmekha ’akhanekha velo yeda‘tani. 
isaiah 45:5	’ani yhoh ve’en ‘od zulati ’en ’elohim ’a’azerkha velo yeda‘tani. 
isaiah 45:6	lema‘an yeide‘u mimizrakh shemesh umima‘arawah ki ’efes bil‘adai ’ani yhoh ve’en ‘od. 
isaiah 45:7	yotser ’or uworei khoshekh ‘oseh shalom uworei ra‘ ’ani yhoh ‘oseh khal ’eleh. 
isaiah 45:8	har‘ifu shamayim mima‘al ushekhaqim yizelu tsedeq tiftakh ’erets veyifru yesha‘ utsedaqah tatsmiakh yakhad ’ani yhoh berativ. 
isaiah 45:9	ho raw ’et yotsero kheres ’et kharsei ’adamah hayomar khomer leyotsero mah ta‘aseh ufa‘alekha ’en yadayim lo. 
isaiah 45:10	ho ’omer le’aw mah tolid ule’ishah mah tekhilin. 
isaiah 45:11	koh ’amar yhoh qedosh yisra’el veyotsero ha’otiyot she’aluni ‘al banai ve‘al po‘al yadai tetsavuni. 
isaiah 45:12	’anokhi ‘asiti ’erets ve’adam ‘aleha warati ’ani yadai natu shamayim vekhal tsewa’am tsiveiti. 
isaiah 45:13	’anokhi ha‘irotihu wetsedeq vekhal derakhav ’ayasher hu yiwneh ‘iri vegaluti yeshaleiakh lo wimkhir velo weshokhad ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
isaiah 45:14	koh ’amar yhoh yegia‘ mitsrayim usekhar kush usewa’im ’anshei midah ‘alayikh ya‘aworu velakh yihyu ’akharayikh yeileikhu baziqim ya‘aworu ve’eilayikh yishtakhavu ’eilayikh yitpalalu ’akh bakh ’el ve’en ‘od ’efes ’elohim. 
isaiah 45:15	’akhen ’atah ’el mistater ’elohei yisra’el moshia‘. 
isaiah 45:16	boshu vegam nikhlemu kulam yakhdav halekhu wakelimah kharashei tsirim. 
isaiah 45:17	yisra’el nosha‘ yhoh teshu‘at ‘olamim lo teiwoshu velo tikalemu ‘ad ‘olmei ‘ad. 
isaiah 45:18	ki khoh ’amar yhoh borei hashamayim hu ha’elohim yotser ha’arets ve‘osah hu khonah lo tohu wera’ah lashewet yetsarah ’ani yhoh ve’en ‘od. 
isaiah 45:19	lo waseiter dibarti bimqom ’erets khoshekh lo ’amarti lezera‘ ya‘aqow tohu waqeshuni ’ani yhoh dower tsedeq magid meisharim. 
isaiah 45:20	hiqawetsu vawo’u hitnageshu yakhdav pelitei hagoyim lo yade‘u hanose’im ’et ‘ets pislam umitpalim ’el ’el lo yoshia‘. 
isaiah 45:21	hagidu vehagishu ’af yiva‘atsu yakhdav mi hishmia‘ zot miqedem mei’az higidah halo ’ani yhoh ve’en ‘od ’elohim mibal‘adai ’el tsadiq umoshia‘ ’ayin zulati. 
isaiah 45:22	penu ’eilai vehivashe‘u kal ’afsei ’arets ki ’ani ’el ve’en ‘od. 
isaiah 45:23	bi nishba‘ti yatsa mipi tsedaqah dawar velo yashuw ki li tikhra‘ kal berekh tishawa‘ kal lashon. 
isaiah 45:24	’akh yhoh li ’amar tsedaqot va‘oz ‘adav yawo veyeiwoshu kol hanekherim bo. 
isaiah 45:25	yhoh yitsdequ veyithalelu kal zera‘ yisra’el. 
isaiah 46:1	kara‘ bel qores newo hayu ‘atsabeihem lakhayah velabeheimah nesu’oteikhem ‘amusot masa la‘ayeifah. 
isaiah 46:2	qaresu khare‘u yakhdav lo yakhelu malet masa venafsham bashewi halakhah. 
isaiah 46:3	shim‘u ’eilai bet ya‘aqow vekhal she’eirit bet yisra’el ha‘amusim mini weten hanesu’im mini rakham. 
isaiah 46:4	ve‘ad ziqnah ’ani hu ve‘ad sheiwah ’ani ’esbol ’ani ‘asiti va’ani ’esa va’ani ’esbol va’amalet. 
isaiah 46:5	lemi tedamyuni vetashvu vetamshiluni venidmeh. 
isaiah 46:6	hazalim zahaw mikis vekhesef baqaneh yishqolu yiskeru tsoref veya‘aseihu ’el yisgedu ’af yishtakhavu 
isaiah 46:7	yisa’uhu ‘al katef yisbeluhu veyanikhuhu takhtav veya‘amod mimeqomo lo yamish ’af yits‘aq ’eilav velo ya‘aneh mitsarato lo yoshi‘enu. 
isaiah 46:8	zikhru zot vehit’oshashu hashiwu foshe‘im ‘al lew. 
isaiah 46:9	zikhru rishonot mei‘olam ki ’anokhi ’el ve’en ‘od ’elohim ve’efes kamoni. 
isaiah 46:10	magid meireishit ’akharit umiqedem ’asher lo na‘asu ’omer ‘atsati taqum vekhal kheftsi ’e‘eseh. 
isaiah 46:11	qorei mimizrakh ‘ayit mei’erets merkhaq ’ish ‘atsato ‘atsati ’af dibarti ’af ’awi’enah yatsarti ’af ’e‘esenah. 
isaiah 46:12	shim‘u ’eilai ’abirei lew harekhoqim mitsedaqah. 
isaiah 46:13	qeirawti tsidqati lo tirkhaq uteshu‘ati lo te’akher venatati wetsiyon teshu‘ah leyisra’el tif’arti. 
isaiah 47:1	redi ushewi ‘al ‘afar betulat bat bawel shewi la’arets ’en kisei bat kasdim ki lo tosifi yiqre’u lakh rakah va‘anugah. 
isaiah 47:2	qekhi reikhayim vetakhani qamakh gali tsamatekh khespi showel gali shoq ‘iwri neharot. 
isaiah 47:3	tigal ‘ervatekh gam teira’eh kherpatekh naqam ’eqakh velo ’efga‘ ’adam. 
isaiah 47:4	go’aleinu yhoh tsewa’ot shemo qedosh yisra’el. 
isaiah 47:5	shewi dumam uwo’i wakhoshekh bat kasdim ki lo tosifi yiqre’u lakh geweret mamlakhot. 
isaiah 47:6	qatsafti ‘al ‘ami khilalti nakhalati va’etenem beyadekh lo samt lahem rakhamim ‘al zaqen hikhbadt ‘ulekh me’od. 
isaiah 47:7	vatomeri le‘olam ’ehyeh gewaret ‘ad lo samt ’eleh ‘al libekh lo zakhart ’akharitah. 
isaiah 47:8	ve‘atah shim‘i zot ‘adinah hayoshewet lawetakh ha’omerah bilwawah ’ani ve’afsi ‘od lo ’eishew ’almanah velo ’eida‘ shekhol. 
isaiah 47:9	vetawonah lakh shetei ’eleh rega‘ beyom ’ekhad shekhol ve’almon ketumam ba’u ‘alayikh berow keshafayikh be‘atsemat khawarayikh me’od. 
isaiah 47:10	vatiwtekhi wera‘atekh ’amart ’en ro’ani khakhematekh veda‘tekh hi showwatekh vatomeri welibekh ’ani ve’afsi ‘od. 
isaiah 47:11	uwa ‘alayikh ra‘ah lo teide‘i shakhrah vetipol ‘alayikh hoah lo tukheli kaperah vetawo ‘alayikh pit’om sho’ah lo teida‘i. 
isaiah 47:12	‘imdi na wakhawarayikh uwerow keshafayikh ba’asher yaga‘at mine‘urayikh ’ulai tukheli ho‘il ’ulai ta‘arotsi. 
isaiah 47:13	nil’et berow ‘atsatayikh ya‘amdu na veyoshi‘ukh haweru howerei shamayim hakhozim bakokhawim modi‘im lekhodashim mei’asher yawo’u ‘alayikh. 
isaiah 47:14	hineh hayu kheqash ’esh serafatam lo yatsilu ’et nafsham miyad lehawah ’en gakhelet lakhmam ’ur lashewet negdo. 
isaiah 47:15	ken hayu lakh ’asher yaga‘at sokharayikh mine‘urayikh ’ish le‘ewro ta‘u ’en moshi‘ekh. 
isaiah 48:1	shim‘u zot bet ya‘aqow haniqra’im beshem yisra’el umimei yehudah yatsa’u hanishba‘im beshem yhoh uweilohei yisra’el yazkiru lo we’emet velo witsdaqah. 
isaiah 48:2	ki mei‘ir haqodesh niqra’u ve‘al ’elohei yisra’el nismakhu yhoh tsewa’ot shemo. 
isaiah 48:3	harishonot mei’az higadti umipi yatse’u ve’ashmi‘em pit’om ‘asiti vatawonah. 
isaiah 48:4	mida‘ti ki qasheh ’atah vegid barzel ‘arepekha umitskhakha nekhushah. 
isaiah 48:5	va’agid lekha mei’az beterem tawo hishma‘tikha pen tomar ‘atsebi ‘asam ufisli veniski tsivam. 
isaiah 48:6	shama‘ta khazeh kulah ve’atem halo tagidu hishma‘tikha khadashot mei‘atah unetsurot velo yeda‘tam. 
isaiah 48:7	‘atah niwre’u velo mei’az velifnei yom velo shema‘tam pen tomar hineh yeda‘tin. 
isaiah 48:8	gam lo shama‘ta gam lo yada‘ta gam mei’az lo fitekhah ’azenekha ki yada‘ti bagod tiwgod ufosheia‘ mibeten qora lakh. 
isaiah 48:9	lema‘an shemi ’a’arikh ’api utehilati ’ekhetam lakh lewilti hakhritekha. 
isaiah 48:10	hineh tseraftikha velo wekhasef bekhartikha bekhur ‘oni. 
isaiah 48:11	lema‘ani lema‘ani ’e‘eseh ki ’ekh yeikhal ukhewodi le’akher lo ’eten. 
isaiah 48:12	shema‘ ’eilai ya‘aqow veyisra’el meqora’i ’ani hu ’ani rishon ’af ’ani ’akharon. 
isaiah 48:13	’af yadi yasedah ’erets vimini tipekhah shamayim qorei ’ani ’aleihem ya‘amdu yakhdav. 
isaiah 48:14	hiqawetsu khulekhem ushama‘u mi wahem higid ’et ’eleh yhoh ’aheiwo ya‘aseh kheftso bewawel uzero‘o kasdim. 
isaiah 48:15	’ani ’ani dibarti ’af qerativ hawi’otiv vehitsliakh darko. 
isaiah 48:16	qirwu ’eilai shim‘u zot lo meirosh baseiter dibarti mei‘et heyotah sham ’ani ve‘atah ’adonai yhoh shelakhani verukho. 
isaiah 48:17	koh ’amar yhoh go’alkha qedosh yisra’el ’ani yhoh ’elohekha melamedkha leho‘il madrikhakha bederekh teilekh. 
isaiah 48:18	lu hiqshawta lemitsvotai vayhi khanahar shelomekha vetsidqatekha kegalei hayam. 
isaiah 48:19	vayhi khakhol zar‘ekha vetse’etsa’ei mei‘ekha kim‘otav lo yikaret velo yishamed shemo milefanai. 
isaiah 48:20	tse’u mibawel birkhu mikasdim beqol rinah hagidu hashmi‘u zot hotsi’uha ‘ad qetseh ha’arets ’imru ga’al yhoh ‘awdo ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 48:21	velo tsame’u bakhorawot holikham mayim mitsur hizil lamo vayiwqa‘ tsur vayazuwu mayim. 
isaiah 48:22	’en shalom ’amar yhoh laresha‘im. 
isaiah 49:1	shim‘u ’iyim ’eilai vehaqshiwu le’umim meirakhoq yhoh mibeten qera’ani mime‘ei ’imi hizkir shemi. 
isaiah 49:2	vayasem pi kekherew khadah betsel yado hekhbi’ani vaysimeini lekhets barur be’ashpato histirani. 
isaiah 49:3	vayomer li ‘awdi ’atah yisra’el ’asher bekha ’etpa’ar. 
isaiah 49:4	va’ani ’amarti leriq yaga‘ti letohu vehewel kokhi khileiti ’akhen mishpati ’et yhoh ufe‘ulati ’et ’elohai. 
isaiah 49:5	ve‘atah ’amar yhoh yotseri mibeten le‘ewed lo leshowew ya‘aqow ’eilav veyisra’el lo lo yei’asef ve’ekawed be‘einei yhoh veilohai hayah ‘uzi. 
isaiah 49:6	vayomer naqel mihyotkha li ‘ewed lehaqim ’et shiwtei ya‘aqow unetsirei unetsurei yisra’el lehashiw unetatikha le’or goyim lihyot yeshu‘ati ‘ad qetseh ha’arets. 
isaiah 49:7	koh ’amar yhoh go’el yisra’el qedosho liwzoh nefesh limta‘ew go le‘ewed moshelim melakhim yir’u vaqamu sarim veyishtakhavu lema‘an yhoh ’asher ne’eman qedosh yisra’el vayiwkhareka. 
isaiah 49:8	koh ’amar yhoh be‘et ratson ‘anitikha uweyom yeshu‘ah ‘azartikha ve’etsarekha ve’etenkha liwrit ‘am lehaqim ’erets lehankhil nekhalot shomeimot. 
isaiah 49:9	leimor la’asurim tsei’u la’asher bakhoshekh higalu ‘al derakhim yir‘u uwekhal shefayim mar‘itam. 
isaiah 49:10	lo yir‘awu velo yitsma’u velo yakem sharaw vashamesh ki merakhamam yenahagem ve‘al mabu‘ei mayim yenahalem. 
isaiah 49:11	vesamti khal harai ladarekh umesilotai yerumun. 
isaiah 49:12	hineh ’eleh meirakhoq yawo’u vehineh ’eleh mitsafon umiyam ve’eleh mei’erets sinim. 
isaiah 49:13	ranu shamayim vegili ’arets yiftsekhu ufitskhu harim rinah ki nikham yhoh ‘amo va‘aniyav yerakhem. 
isaiah 49:14	vatomer tsiyon ‘azawani yhoh vadonai shekheikhani. 
isaiah 49:15	hatishkakh ’ishah ‘ulah meirakhem ben bitnah gam ’eleh tishkakhnah ve’anokhi lo ’eshkakhekh. 
isaiah 49:16	hen ‘al kapayim khaqotikh khomotayikh negdi tamid. 
isaiah 49:17	miharu banayikh meharesayikh umakhariwayikh mimekh yeitsei’u. 
isaiah 49:18	se’i sawiw ‘einayikh ure’i kulam niqbetsu wa’u lakh khai ’ani ne’um yhoh ki khulam ka‘adi tilbashi uteqasherim kakalah. 
isaiah 49:19	ki kharewotayikh veshomemotayikh ve’erets harisutekh ki ‘atah teitseri miyoshew verakhaqu mewale‘ayikh. 
isaiah 49:20	‘od yomeru we’azenayikh benei shikulayikh tsar li hamaqom geshah li ve’eisheiwah. 
isaiah 49:21	ve’amart bilwawekh mi yalad li ’et ’eleh va’ani shekhulah vegalmudah golah vesurah ve’eleh mi gidel hen ’ani nish’arti lewadi ’eleh ’eifoh hem. 
isaiah 49:22	koh ’amar ’adonai yhoh hineh ’esa ’el goyim yadi ve’el ‘amim ’arim nisi veheiwi’u wanayikh bekhotsen uwenotayikh ‘al katef tinasenah. 
isaiah 49:23	vehayu melakhim ’omenayikh vesaroteihem meiniqotayikh ’apayim ’erets yishtakhavu lakh va‘afar raglayikh yelakheikhu veyada‘at ki ’ani yhoh ’asher lo yeiwoshu qoai. 
isaiah 49:24	hayuqakh migibor malqoakh ve’im shewi tsadiq yimalet. 
isaiah 49:25	ki khoh ’amar yhoh gam shewi gibor yuqakh umalqoakh ‘arits yimalet ve’et yeriwekh ’anokhi ’ariw ve’et banayikh ’anokhi ’oshia‘. 
isaiah 49:26	veha’akhalti ’et monayikh ’et besaram vekhe‘asis damam yishkarun veyade‘u khal basar ki ’ani yhoh moshi‘ekh vego’alekh ’awir ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 50:1	koh ’amar yhoh ’ei zeh seifer keritut ’imekhem ’asher shilakhtiha ’o mi minoshai ’asher makharti ’etkhem lo hen ba‘avonoteikhem nimkartem uwefish‘eikhem shulekhah ’imekhem. 
isaiah 50:2	madua‘ bati ve’en ’ish qarati ve’en ‘oneh haqatsor qatserah yadi mipedut ve’im ’en bi khoakh lehatsil hen bega‘arati ’akhariw yam ’asim neharot midbar tiw’ash degatam mei’en mayim vetamot batsama. 
isaiah 50:3	’albish shamayim qadrut vesaq ’asim kesutam. 
isaiah 50:4	’adonai yhoh natan li leshon limudim lada‘at la‘ut ’et ya‘ef dawar ya‘ir baboqer baboqer ya‘ir li ’ozen lishmoa‘ kalimudim. 
isaiah 50:5	’adonai yhoh patakh li ’ozen ve’anokhi lo mariti ’akhor lo nesugoti. 
isaiah 50:6	geivi natati lemakim ulekhayai lemoretim panai lo histarti mikelimot varoq. 
isaiah 50:7	vadonai yhoh ya‘azar li ‘al ken lo nikhlameti ‘al ken samti fanai kakhalamish va’eida‘ ki lo ’eiwosh. 
isaiah 50:8	qarow matsdiqi mi yariw ’iti na‘amdah yakhad mi wa‘al mishpati yigash ’eilai. 
isaiah 50:9	hen ’adonai yhoh ya‘azar li mi hu yarshi‘eini hen kulam kabeged yiwlu ‘ash yokhelem. 
isaiah 50:10	mi wakhem yerei yhoh shomeia‘ beqol ‘awdo ’asher halakh khasheikhim ve’en nogah lo yiwtakh beshem yhoh veyisha‘en beilohav. 
isaiah 50:11	hen kulekhem qodekhei ’esh me’azerei ziqot lekhu be’ur ’eshkhem uweziqot bi‘artem miyadi hayetah zot lakhem lema‘atseiwah tishkawun. 
isaiah 51:1	shim‘u ’eilai rodefei tsedeq mewaqshei yhoh habitu ’el tsur khutsawtem ve’el maqewet bor nuqartem. 
isaiah 51:2	habitu ’el ’awraham ’awikhem ve’el sarah tekholelkhem ki ’ekhad qerativ va’awarekheihu ve’arbeihu. 
isaiah 51:3	ki nikham yhoh tsiyon nikham kal kharewoteha vayasem midbarah ke‘eiden ve‘arwatah kegan yhoh sason vesimkhah yimatsei wah todah veqol zimrah. 
isaiah 51:4	haqshiwu ’eilai ‘ami ule’umi ’eilai ha’azinu ki torah mei’iti teitsei umishpati le’or ‘amim ’argia‘. 
isaiah 51:5	qarow tsidqi yatsa yish‘i uzero‘ai ‘amim yishpotu ’eilai ’iyim yeqavu ve’el zero‘i yeyakheilun. 
isaiah 51:6	se’u lashamayim ‘eineikhem vehabitu ’el ha’arets mitakhat ki shamayim ke‘ashan nimlakhu veha’arets kabeged tiwleh veyosheweha kemo khen yemutun vishu‘ati le‘olam tihyeh vetsidqati lo teikhat. 
isaiah 51:7	shim‘u ’eilai yode‘ei tsedeq ‘am torati welibam ’al tire’u kherpat ’enosh umigidufotam ’al teikhatu. 
isaiah 51:8	ki khabeged yokhelem ‘ash vekhatsemer yokhelem sas vetsidqati le‘olam tihyeh vishu‘ati ledor dorim. 
isaiah 51:9	‘uri ‘uri liwshi ‘oz zeroa‘ yhoh ‘uri kimei qedem dorot ‘olamim halo ’at hi hamakhtsewet rahaw mekholelet tanin. 
isaiah 51:10	halo ’at hi hamakharewet yam mei tehom rabah hasamah ma‘amaqei yam derekh la‘awor ge’ulim. 
isaiah 51:11	ufeduyei yhoh yeshuwun uwa’u tsiyon berinah vesimkhat ‘olam ‘al rosham sason vesimkhah yasigun nasu yagon va’anakhah. 
isaiah 51:12	’anokhi ’anokhi hu menakhemkhem mi ’at vatire’i mei’enosh yamut umiben ’adam khatsir yinaten. 
isaiah 51:13	vatishkakh yhoh ‘osekha noteh shamayim veyosed ’arets vatefakhed tamid kal hayom mipenei khamat hameitsiq ka’asher konen lehashkhit ve’ayeh khamat hameitsiq. 
isaiah 51:14	mihar tso‘eh lehipateiakh velo yamut lashakhat velo yekhsar lakhmo. 
isaiah 51:15	ve’anokhi yhoh ’elohekha roga‘ hayam vayehemu galav yhoh tsewa’ot shemo. 
isaiah 51:16	va’asim dewarai befikha uwetsel yadi kisitikha lintoa‘ shamayim velisod ’arets veleimor letsiyon ‘ami ’atah. 
isaiah 51:17	hit‘ori hit‘ori qumi yerushalim ’asher shatit miyad yhoh ’et kos khamato ’et quba‘at kos hatar‘eilah shatit matsit. 
isaiah 51:18	’en menahel lah mikal banim yaladah ve’en makhaziq beyadah mikal banim gideilah. 
isaiah 51:19	shetayim henah qore’otayikh mi yanud lakh hashod vehashewer vehara‘aw vehakherew mi ’anakhamekh. 
isaiah 51:20	banayikh ‘ulefu shakhewu berosh kal khutsot keto mikhmar hamlei’im khamat yhoh ga‘arat ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 51:21	lakhen shim‘i na zot ‘aniyah ushekhurat velo miyayin. 
isaiah 51:22	koh ’amar ’adonayikh yhoh veilohayikh yariw ‘amo hineh laqakhti miyadekh ’et kos hatar‘eilah ’et quba‘at kos khamati lo tosifi lishtotah ‘od. 
isaiah 51:23	vesamtiha beyad mogayikh ’asher ’ameru lenafshekh shekhi vena‘aworah vatasimi kha’arets geivekh vekhakhuts la‘owerim. 
isaiah 52:1	‘uri ‘uri liwshi ‘uzekh tsiyon liwshi bigdei tif’artekh yerushalim ‘ir haqodesh ki lo yosif yawo wakh ‘od ‘arel vetamei. 
isaiah 52:2	hitna‘ari mei‘afar qumi shewi yerushalim hitpatekhu hitpatekhi mosrei tsavarekh shewiyah bat tsiyon. 
isaiah 52:3	ki khoh ’amar yhoh khinam nimkartem velo wekhesef tiga’eilu. 
isaiah 52:4	ki khoh ’amar ’adonai yhoh mitsrayim yarad ‘ami warishonah lagur sham ve’ashur be’efes ‘ashaqo. 
isaiah 52:5	ve‘atah mi li mah li foh ne’um yhoh ki luqakh ‘ami khinam moshelo moshelav yeheililu ne’um yhoh vetamid kal hayom shemi mino’ats. 
isaiah 52:6	lakhen yeida‘ ‘ami shemi lakhen bayom hahu ki ’ani hu hamdaber hineini. 
isaiah 52:7	mah navu ‘al heharim raglei mewaser mashmia‘ shalom mewaser tow mashmia‘ yeshu‘ah ’omer letsiyon malakh ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 52:8	qol tsofayikh nase’u qol yakhdav yeraneinu ki ‘ayin be‘ayin yir’u beshuw yhoh tsiyon. 
isaiah 52:9	pitskhu ranenu yakhdav kharewot yerushalim ki nikham yhoh ‘amo ga’al yerushalim. 
isaiah 52:10	khasaf yhoh ’et zeroa‘ qadesho le‘einei kal hagoyim vera’u kal ’afsei ’arets ’et yeshu‘at ’eloheinu. 
isaiah 52:11	suru suru tse’u misham tamei ’al tiga‘u tse’u mitokhah hibaru nose’ei kelei yhoh. 
isaiah 52:12	ki lo wekhipazon teitsei’u uwimnusah lo teileikhun ki holekh lifneikhem yhoh ume’asifkhem ’elohei yisra’el. 
isaiah 52:13	hineh yaskil ‘awdi yarum venisa vegawah me’od. 
isaiah 52:14	ka’asher shamemu ‘alekha rabim ken mishkhat mei’ish mar’eihu veto’aro mibenei ’adam. 
isaiah 52:15	ken yazeh goyim rabim ‘alav yiqpetsu melakhim pihem ki ’asher lo supar lahem ra’u va’asher lo shame‘u hitbonanu. 
isaiah 53:1	mi he’emin lishmu‘ateinu uzeroa‘ yhoh ‘al mi niglatah. 
isaiah 53:2	vaya‘al kayoneq lefanav vekhashoresh mei’erets tsiyah lo to’ar lo velo hadar venir’eihu velo mar’eh venekhmedeihu. 
isaiah 53:3	niwzeh vakhadal ’ishim ’ish makh’owot vidua‘ kholi ukhemaster panim mimenu niwzeh velo khashawnuhu. 
isaiah 53:4	’akhen kholayeinu hu nasa umakh’oweinu sewalam va’anakhnu khashawnuhu nagua‘ mukeh ’elohim ume‘uneh. 
isaiah 53:5	vehu mekholal mipesha‘einu meduka mei‘avonoteinu musar shelomeinu ‘alav uwakhawurato nirpa lanu. 
isaiah 53:6	kulanu katson ta‘inu ’ish ledarko paninu yhoh hifgia‘ bo ’et ‘avon kulanu. 
isaiah 53:7	nigas vehu na‘aneh velo yiftakh piv kaseh latewakh yuwal ukherakhel lifnei gozezeha ne’elamah velo yiftakh piv. 
isaiah 53:8	mei‘otser umimishpat luqakh ve’et doro mi yesokheiakh ki nigzar mei’erets khayim mipesha‘ ‘ami nega‘ lamo. 
isaiah 53:9	vayiten ’et resha‘im qiwro ve’et ‘ashir bemotav ‘al lo khamas ‘asah velo mirmah befiv. 
isaiah 53:10	yhoh khafets dake’o hekheli ’im tasim ’asham nafsho yir’eh zera‘ ya’arikh yamim vekheifets yhoh beyado yitslakh. 
isaiah 53:11	mei‘amal nafsho yir’eh yisba‘ beda‘to yatsdiq tsadiq ‘awdi larabim va‘avonotam hu yisbol.
