isaiah 53:12	lakhen ’akhaleq lo warabim ve’et ‘atsumim yekhaleq shalal takhat ’asher he‘erah lamavet nafsho ve’et poshe‘im nimnah vehu khet rabim nasa velaposhe‘im yafgia‘. 
isaiah 54:1	rani ‘aqarah lo yaladah pitskhi rinah vetsahali lo khalah ki rabim benei shomeimah mibenei we‘ulah ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 54:2	harkhiwi meqom ’aholekh viri‘ot mishkenotayikh yatu ’al takhsokhi ha’arikhi meitarayikh viteidotayikh khazeiqi. 
isaiah 54:3	ki yamin usemol tifrotsi vezar‘ekh goyim yirash ve‘arim neshamot yoshiwu. 
isaiah 54:4	’al tire’i ki lo teiwoshi ve’al tikalemi ki lo takhpiri ki woshet ‘alumayikh tishkakhi vekherpat ’almenutayikh lo tizkeri ‘od. 
isaiah 54:5	ki wo‘alayikh ‘osayikh yhoh tsewa’ot shemo vego’alekh qedosh yisra’el ’elohei khal ha’arets yiqarei. 
isaiah 54:6	ki khe’ishah ‘azuwah va‘atsuwat ruakh qera’akh yhoh ve’eishet ne‘urim ki tima’es ’amar ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 54:7	berega‘ qaton ‘azawtikh uwerakhamim gedolim ’aqabetsekh. 
isaiah 54:8	beshetsef qetsef histarti fanai rega‘ mimekh uwekhesed ‘olam rikhamtikh ’amar go’alekh yhoh. 
isaiah 54:9	ki mei noakh zot li ’asher nishba‘ti mei‘awor mei noakh ‘od ‘al ha’arets ken nishba‘ti miqetsof ‘alayikh umige‘ar bakh. 
isaiah 54:10	ki heharim yamushu vehagewa‘ot temutenah vekhasdi mei’itekh lo yamush uwerit shelomi lo tamut ’amar merakhamekh yhoh. 
isaiah 54:11	‘aniyah so‘arah lo nukhamah hineh ’anokhi marbits bapukh ’awanayikh visadtikh basapirim. 
isaiah 54:12	vesamti kadkhod shimshotayikh ushe‘arayikh le’awnei ’eqdakh vekhal gewulekh le’awnei kheifets. 
isaiah 54:13	vekhal banayikh limudei yhoh veraw shelom banayikh. 
isaiah 54:14	bitsdaqah tikonani rakhaqi mei‘osheq ki lo tira’i umimekhitah ki lo tiqraw ’eilayikh. 
isaiah 54:15	hen gor yagur ’efes mei’oti mi gar ’itakh ‘alayikh yipol. 
isaiah 54:16	hen hineh ’anokhi barati kharash nofeiakh be’esh pekham umotsi kheli lema‘aseihu ve’anokhi barati mashkhit lekhabel. 
isaiah 54:17	kal keli yutsar ‘alayikh lo yitslakh vekhal lashon taqum ’itakh lamishpat tarshi‘i zot nakhalat ‘awdei yhoh vetsidqatam mei’iti ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 55:1	ho kal tsamei lekhu lamayim va’asher ’en lo kasef lekhu shiwru ve’ekholu ulekhu shiwru belo khesef uwelo mekhir yayin vekhalaw. 
isaiah 55:2	lamah tishqelu khesef belo lekhem vigi‘akhem belo lesawe‘ah shim‘u shamoa‘ ’eilai ve’ikhlu tow vetit‘anag badeshen nafshekhem. 
isaiah 55:3	hatu ’azenekhem ulekhu ’eilai shim‘u utekhi nafshekhem ve’ekhretah lakhem berit ‘olam khasdei david hane’emanim. 
isaiah 55:4	hen ‘ed le’umim netativ nagid umetsaveh le’umim. 
isaiah 55:5	hen go lo teida‘ tiqra vego lo yeda‘ukha ’eilekha yarutsu lema‘an yhoh ’elohekha veliqdosh yisra’el ki fei’arakh. 
isaiah 55:6	dirshu yhoh behimatse’o qera’uhu bihyoto qarow. 
isaiah 55:7	ya‘azow rasha‘ darko ve’ish ’aven makhshewotav veyashow ’el yhoh virakhameihu ve’el ’eloheinu ki yarbeh lisloakh. 
isaiah 55:8	ki lo makhshewotai makhshewoteikhem velo darkheikhem derakhai ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 55:9	ki gawehu shamayim mei’arets ken gawehu derakhai midarkheikhem umakhshewotai mimakhshewoteikhem. 
isaiah 55:10	ki ka’asher yeired hageshem vehasheleg min hashamayim veshamah lo yashuw ki ’im hirvah ’et ha’arets veholidah vehitsmikhah venatan zera‘ lazoreia‘ velekhem la’okhel. 
isaiah 55:11	ken yihyeh dewari ’asher yeitsei mipi lo yashuw ’eilai reiqam ki ’im ‘asah ’et ’asher khafatsti vehitsliakh ’asher shelakhtiv. 
isaiah 55:12	ki wesimkhah teitsei’u uweshalom tuwalun heharim vehagewa‘ot yiftsekhu lifneikhem rinah vekhal ‘atsei hasadeh yimkha’u khaf. 
isaiah 55:13	takhat hana‘atsuts ya‘aleh werosh takhat vetakhat hasirpad ya‘aleh hadas vehayah yhoh leshem le’ot ‘olam lo yikaret. 
isaiah 56:1	koh ’amar yhoh shimru mishpat va‘asu tsedaqah ki qerowah yeshu‘ati lawo vetsidqati lehigalot. 
isaiah 56:2	’ashrei ’enosh ya‘aseh zot uwen ’adam yakhaziq bah shomer shabat meikhalelo veshomer yado mei‘asot kal ra‘. 
isaiah 56:3	ve’al yomar ben haneikhar hanilvah ’el yhoh leimor hawdel yawdilani yhoh mei‘al ‘amo ve’al yomar hasaris hen ’ani ‘ets yawesh. 
isaiah 56:4	ki khoh ’amar yhoh lasarisim ’asher yishmeru ’et shabetotai uwakharu ba’asher khafatseti umakhaziqim biwriti. 
isaiah 56:5	venatati lahem beweiti uwekhomotai yad vashem tow mibanim umibanot shem ‘olam ’eten lo ’asher lo yikaret. 
isaiah 56:6	uwenei haneikhar hanilvim ‘al yhoh leshareto ule’ahawah ’et shem yhoh lihyot lo la‘awadim kal shomer shabat meikhalelo umakhaziqim biwriti. 
isaiah 56:7	vahawi’otim ’el har qadshi vesimakhtim bewet tefilati ‘oloteihem veziwkheihem leratson ‘al mizbekhi ki weiti bet tefilah yiqarei lekhal ha‘amim. 
isaiah 56:8	ne’um ’adonai yhoh meqabets nidkhei yisra’el ‘od ’aqabets ‘alav leniqbatsav. 
isaiah 56:9	kol khayto sadai ’eitayu le’ekhol kal khayto baya‘ar. 
isaiah 56:10	tsafu tsofav ‘ivrim kulam lo yada‘u kulam kelawim ’ilemim lo yukhelu linboakh hozim shokhewim ’ohawei lanum. 
isaiah 56:11	vehakelawim ‘azei nefesh lo yade‘u sawe‘ah vehemah ro‘im lo yade‘u hawin kulam ledarkam panu ’ish lewits‘o miqatseihu. 
isaiah 56:12	’eitayu ’eqkhah yayin venisbe’ah sheikhar vehayah khazeh yom makhar gadol yeter me’od. 
isaiah 57:1	hatsadiq ’awad ve’en ’ish sam ‘al lew ve’anshei khesed ne’esafim be’en meiwin ki mipenei hara‘ah ne’esaf hatsadiq. 
isaiah 57:2	yawo shalom yanukhu ‘al mishkewotam holekh nekhokho. 
isaiah 57:3	ve’atem qirwu henah benei ‘onenah zera‘ mena’ef vatizneh. 
isaiah 57:4	‘al mi tit‘anagu ‘al mi tarkhiwu feh ta’arikhu lashon halo ’atem yildei fesha‘ zera‘ shaqer. 
isaiah 57:5	haneikhamim ba’eilim takhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan shokhatei hayladim banekhalim takhat se‘ifei hasela‘im. 
isaiah 57:6	bekhaleqei nakhal khelqekh hem hem goralekh gam lahem shafakht nesekh he‘elit minkhah ha‘al ’eleh ’enakhem. 
isaiah 57:7	‘al har gawoah venisa samt mishkawekh gam sham ‘alit lizboakh zawakh. 
isaiah 57:8	ve’akhar hadelet vehamezuzah samt zikhronekh ki mei’iti gilit vata‘ali hirkhawt mishkawekh vatikhrat lakh meihem ’ahawt mishkawam yad khazit. 
isaiah 57:9	vatashuri lamelekh bashemen vatarbi riqukhayikh vateshalekhi tsiraykh ‘ad meirakhoq vatashpili ‘ad she’ol. 
isaiah 57:10	berow darkekh yaga‘at lo ’amart no’ash khayat yadekh matsat ‘al ken lo khalit. 
isaiah 57:11	ve’et mi da’agt vatire’i ki tekhazeiwi ve’oti lo zakhart lo samt ‘al libekh halo ’ani makhsheh umei‘olam ve’oti lo tira’i. 
isaiah 57:12	’ani ’agid tsidqatekh ve’et ma‘asayikh velo yo‘ilukh. 
isaiah 57:13	beza‘aqekh yatsilukh qibutsayikh ve’et kulam yisa ruakh yiqakh hawel vehakhoseh wi yinkhal ’erets veyirash har qadshi 
isaiah 57:14	ve’amar solu solu panu darekh harimu mikhshol miderekh ‘ami. 
isaiah 57:15	ki khoh ’amar ram venisa shokhen ‘ad veqadosh shemo marom veqadosh ’eshkon ve’et daka ushefal ruakh lehakhayot ruakh shefalim ulehakhayot lew nidka’im. 
isaiah 57:16	ki lo le‘olam ’ariw velo lanetsakh ’eqetsof ki ruakh milefanai ya‘atof uneshamot ’ani ‘asiti. 
isaiah 57:17	ba‘avon bits‘o qatsafti ve’akeihu haster ve’eqtsof vayeilekh showaw bederekh libo. 
isaiah 57:18	derakhav ra’iti ve’erpa’eihu ve’ankheihu va’ashalem nikhumim lo vela’aweilav. 
isaiah 57:19	borei nuw niw sefatayim shalom shalom larakhoq velaqarow ’amar yhoh urefativ. 
isaiah 57:20	veharesha‘im kayam nigrash ki hashqet lo yukhal vayigreshu meimav refesh vatit. 
isaiah 57:21	’en shalom ’amar ’elohai laresha‘im. 
isaiah 58:1	qera wegaron ’al takhsokh kashofar harem qolekha vehaged le‘ami pish‘am ulewet ya‘aqow khatotam. 
isaiah 58:2	ve’oti yom yom yidroshun veda‘at derakhai yekhpatsun kego ’asher tsedaqah ‘asah umishpat ’elohav lo ‘azaw yish’aluni mishpetei tsedeq qirwat ’elohim yekhpatsun. 
isaiah 58:3	lamah tsamnu velo ra’ita ‘ininu nafsheinu velo teida‘ hen beyom tsomekhem timtse’u kheifets vekhal ‘atseweikhem tingosu. 
isaiah 58:4	hen leriw umatsah tatsumu ulehakot be’egrof resha‘ lo tatsumu khayom lehashmia‘ bamarom qolkhem. 
isaiah 58:5	hakhazeh yihyeh tsom ’ewkhareihu yom ‘anot ’adam nafsho halakhof ke’agmon rosho vesaq va’eifer yatsia‘ halazeh tiqra tsom veyom ratson yhoh. 
isaiah 58:6	halo zeh tsom ’ewkhareihu pateiakh khartsubot resha‘ hater ’agudot motah veshalakh retsutsim khafeshim vekhal motah tenateiqu. 
isaiah 58:7	halo faros lara‘ew lakhmekha va‘aniyim merudim tawi wayit ki tir’eh ‘arom vekhisito umibesarekha lo tit‘alam. 
isaiah 58:8	’az yibaqa‘ kashakhar ’orekha va’arukhatekha meheirah titsmakh vehalakh lefanekha tsidqekha kewod yhoh ya’asfekha. 
isaiah 58:9	’az tiqra yhoh ya‘aneh teshava‘ veyomar hineini ’im tasir mitokhkha motah shelakh ’etsba‘ vedaber ’aven. 
isaiah 58:10	vetafeq lara‘ew nafshekha venefesh na‘anah tasbia‘ vezarakh bakhoshekh ’orekha va’afeilatekha katsahorayim. 
isaiah 58:11	venakhakha yhoh tamid vehisbia‘ betsakhtsakhot nafshekha ve‘atsmotekha yakhalits vehayita kegan raveh ukhemotsa mayim ’asher lo yekhazewu meimav. 
isaiah 58:12	uwanu mimekha kharewot ‘olam mosdei dor vador teqomem veqora lekha goder perets meshowew netiwot lashawet. 
isaiah 58:13	’im tashiw mishabat raglekha ‘asot khafatsekha beyom qadshi veqarata lashabat ‘oneg liqdosh yhoh mekhubad vekhibadto mei‘asot derakhekha mimetso kheftsekha vedaber dawar. 
isaiah 58:14	’az tit‘anag ‘al yhoh vehirkawtikha ‘al bamotei ’arets veha’akhaltikha nakhalat ya‘aqow ’awikha ki pi yhoh diber. 
isaiah 59:1	hen lo qatserah yad yhoh meihoshia‘ velo khawedah ’azeno mishemoa‘. 
isaiah 59:2	ki ’im ‘avonoteikhem hayu mawdilim beineikhem lewen ’eloheikhem vekhatoteikhem histiru fanim mikem mishemoa‘. 
isaiah 59:3	ki khapeikhem nego’alu wadam ve’etsbe‘oteikhem be‘avon siftoteikhem diberu sheqer leshonkhem ‘avlah tehgeh. 
isaiah 59:4	’en qorei wetsedeq ve’en nishpat be’emunah batoakh ‘al tohu vedaber shav haro ‘amal veholed ’aven. 
isaiah 59:5	beitsei tsif‘oni biqei‘u vequrei ‘akawish ye’erogu ha’okhel mibeitseihem yamut vehazureh tibaqa‘ ’ef‘eh. 
isaiah 59:6	qureihem lo yihyu leweged velo yitkasu bema‘aseihem ma‘aseihem ma‘asei ’aven ufo‘al khamas bekhapeihem. 
isaiah 59:7	ragleihem lara‘ yarutsu vimaharu lishpokh dam naqi makhshewoteihem makhshewot ’aven shod vashewer bimsilotam. 
isaiah 59:8	derekh shalom lo yada‘u ve’en mishpat bema‘gelotam netiwoteihem ‘iqeshu lahem kol dorekh bah lo yada‘ shalom. 
isaiah 59:9	‘al ken rakhaq mishpat mimenu velo tasigeinu tsedaqah neqaveh la’or vehineh khoshekh lingohot ba’afeilot nehalekh. 
isaiah 59:10	negashah kha‘ivrim qir ukhe’en ‘einayim negasheishah kashalnu watsahorayim kaneshef ba’ashmanim kameitim. 
isaiah 59:11	nehemeh khadubim kulanu vekhayonim hagoh nehgeh neqaveh lamishpat va’ayin lishu‘ah rakhaqah mimenu. 
isaiah 59:12	ki rabu fesha‘einu negdekha vekhatoteinu ‘anetah banu ki fesha‘einu ’itanu va‘avonoteinu yeda‘anum. 
isaiah 59:13	pashoa‘ vekhakhesh yhoh venasog mei’akhar ’eloheinu daber ‘osheq vesarah horo vehogo milew diwrei shaqer. 
isaiah 59:14	vehusag ’akhor mishpat utsedaqah meirakhoq ta‘amod ki khashelah warekhow ’emet unekhokhah lo tukhal lawo. 
isaiah 59:15	vatehi ha’emet ne‘deret vesar meira‘ mishtolel vayar yhoh vayeira‘ be‘einav ki ’en mishpat. 
isaiah 59:16	vayar ki ’en ’ish vayishtomem ki ’en mafgia‘ vatosha‘ lo zero‘o vetsidqato hi semakhatehu. 
isaiah 59:17	vayilbash tsedaqah kashiryan vekhowa‘ yeshu‘ah berosho vayilbash bigdei naqam tilboshet vaya‘at kam‘il qin’ah. 
isaiah 59:18	ke‘al gemulot ke‘al yeshalem kheimah letsarav gemul le’oyewav la’iyim gemul yeshalem. 
isaiah 59:19	veyire’u mima‘araw ’et shem yhoh umimizrakh shemesh ’et kewodo ki yawo khanahar tsar ruakh yhoh nosesah wo. 
isaiah 59:20	uwa letsiyon go’el uleshawei fesha‘ beya‘aqow ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 59:21	va’ani zot beriti ’otam ’amar yhoh rukhi ’asher ‘alekha udewarai ’asher samti befikha lo yamushu mipikha umipi zar‘akha umipi zera‘ zar‘akha ’amar yhoh mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam. 
isaiah 60:1	qumi ’ori ki wa ’orekh ukhewod yhoh ‘alayikh zarakh. 
isaiah 60:2	ki hineh hakhoshekh yekhaseh ’erets va‘arafel le’umim ve‘alayikh yizrakh yhoh ukhewodo ‘alayikh yeira’eh. 
isaiah 60:3	vehalekhu goyim le’orekh umelakhim lenogah zarkhekh. 
isaiah 60:4	se’i sawiw ‘einayikh ure’i kulam niqbetsu wa’u lakh banayikh meirakhoq yawo’u uwenotayikh ‘al tsad tei’amanah. 
isaiah 60:5	’az tir’i venahart ufakhad verakhaw lewawekh ki yeihafekh ‘alayikh hamon yam khel goyim yawo’u lakh. 
isaiah 60:6	shif‘at gemalim tekhasekh bikhrei midyan ve‘eifah kulam mishewa yawo’u zahaw ulewonah yisa’u utehilot yhoh yewaseiru. 
isaiah 60:7	kal tson qeidar yiqawetsu lakh ’eilei newayot yesharetunekh ya‘alu ‘al ratson mizbekhi uwet tif’arti ’afa’er. 
isaiah 60:8	mi ’eleh ka‘aw te‘ufenah vekhayonim ’el ’aruboteihem. 
isaiah 60:9	ki li ’iyim yeqavu va’oniyot tarshish barishonah lehawi wanayikh meirakhoq kaspam uzehawam ’itam leshem yhoh ’elohayikh veliqdosh yisra’el ki fei’arakh. 
isaiah 60:10	uwanu wenei neikhar khomotayikh umalkheihem yesharetunekh ki weqitspi hikitikh uwirtsoni rikhamtikh. 
isaiah 60:11	ufitekhu she‘arayikh tamid yomam valaylah lo yisageiru lehawi ’eilayikh khel goyim umalkheihem nehugim. 
isaiah 60:12	ki hago vehamamlakhah ’asher lo ya‘awdukh yoweidu vehagoyim kharow yekherawu. 
isaiah 60:13	kewod halewanon ’eilayikh yawo berosh tidhar ute’ashur yakhdav lefa’er meqom miqdashi umeqom raglai ’akhabed. 
isaiah 60:14	vehalekhu ’eilayikh shekhoakh benei me‘anayikh vehishtakhavu ‘al kapot raglayikh kal mena’atsayikh veqare’u lakh ‘ir yhoh tsiyon qedosh yisra’el. 
isaiah 60:15	takhat heyotekh ‘azuwah usenu’ah ve’en ‘ower vesamtikh lig’on ‘olam mesos dor vador. 
isaiah 60:16	veyanaqt khalew goyim veshod melakhim tinaqi veyada‘at ki ’ani yhoh moshi‘ekh vego’alekh ’awir ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 60:17	takhat hanekhoshet ’awi zahaw vetakhat habarzel ’awi khesef vetakhat ha‘eitsim nekhoshet vetakhat ha’awanim barzel vesamti fequdatekh shalom venogesayikh tsedaqah. 
isaiah 60:18	lo yishama‘ ‘od khamas be’artsekh shod vashewer bigwulayikh veqarat yeshu‘ah khomotayikh ushe‘arayikh tehilah. 
isaiah 60:19	lo yihyeh lakh ‘od hashemesh le’or yomam ulenogah hayareiakh lo ya’ir lakh vehayah lakh yhoh le’or ‘olam veilohayikh letif’artekh. 
isaiah 60:20	lo yawo ‘od shimshekh vireikhekh lo yei’asef ki yhoh yihyeh lakh le’or ‘olam veshalemu yemei ’ewlekh. 
isaiah 60:21	ve‘amekh kulam tsadiqim le‘olam yireshu ’arets neitser mata‘o mata‘ai ma‘aseh yadai lehitpa’er. 
isaiah 60:22	haqaton yihyeh la’elef vehatsa‘ir lego ‘atsum ’ani yhoh be‘itah ’akhishenah. 
isaiah 61:1	ruakh ’adonai yhoh ‘alai ya‘an mashakh yhoh ’oti lewaser ‘anavim shelakhani lakhawosh lenishberei lew liqro lishwuyim deror vela’asurim peqakh qoakh. 
isaiah 61:2	liqro shenat ratson yhoh veyom naqam leiloheinu lenakhem kal ’aweilim. 
isaiah 61:3	lasum la’aweilei tsiyon latet lahem pe’er takhat ’eifer shemen sason takhat ’eiwel ma‘ateh tehilah takhat ruakh keihah veqora lahem ’eilei hatsedeq mata‘ yhoh lehitpa’er. 
isaiah 61:4	uwanu kharewot ‘olam shomemot rishonim yeqomeimu vekhideshu ‘arei khorew shomemot dor vador. 
isaiah 61:5	ve‘amedu zarim vera‘u tsonekhem uwenei neikhar ’ikareikhem vekhoremeikhem. 
isaiah 61:6	ve’atem kohanei yhoh tiqarei’u mesharetei ’eloheinu yei’amer lakhem khel goyim tokheilu uwikhwodam tityamaru. 
isaiah 61:7	takhat bashetekhem mishneh ukhelimah yaronu khelqam lakhen be’artsam mishneh yirashu simkhat ‘olam tihyeh lahem. 
isaiah 61:8	ki ’ani yhoh ’ohew mishpat sonei gazel be‘olah venatati fe‘ulatam be’emet uwerit ‘olam ’ekhrot lahem. 
isaiah 61:9	venoda‘ bagoyim zar‘am vetse’etsa’eihem betokh ha‘amim kal ro’eihem yakirum ki hem zera‘ beirakh yhoh. 
isaiah 61:10	sos ’asis yhoh tagel nafshi beilohai ki hilbishani bigdei yesha‘ me‘il tsedaqah ye‘atani kekhatan yekhahen pe’er vekhakalah ta‘deh kheileha. 
isaiah 61:11	ki kha’arets totsi tsimkhah ukheganah zeiru‘eha tatsmiakh ken ’adonai yhoh yatsmiakh tsedaqah utehilah neged kal hagoyim. 
isaiah 62:1	lema‘an tsiyon lo ’ekhesheh ulema‘an yerushalim lo ’eshqot ‘ad yeitsei khanogah tsidqah vishu‘atah kelapid yiw‘ar. 
isaiah 62:2	vera’u goyim tsidqekh vekhal melakhim kewodekh veqora lakh shem khadash ’asher pi yhoh yiqowenu. 
isaiah 62:3	vehayit ‘ateret tif’eret beyad yhoh utsenof utsenif melukhah bekhaf ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 62:4	lo yei’amer lakh ‘od ‘azuwah ule’artsekh lo yei’amer ‘od shemamah ki lakh yiqarei kheftsi wah ule’artsekh be‘ulah ki khafets yhoh bakh ve’artsekh tiba‘el. 
isaiah 62:5	ki yiw‘al bakhur betulah yiw‘alukh banayikh umesos khatan ‘al kalah yasis ‘alayikh ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 62:6	‘al khomotayikh yerushalim hifqadti shomerim kal hayom vekhal halaylah tamid lo yekheshu hamazkirim ’et yhoh ’al domi lakhem. 
isaiah 62:7	ve’al titenu domi lo ‘ad yekhonen ve‘ad yasim ’et yerushalim tehilah ba’arets. 
isaiah 62:8	nishba‘ yhoh bimino uwizroa‘ ‘uzo ’im ’eten ’et deganekh ‘od ma’akhal le’oyewayikh ve’im yishtu wenei neikhar tiroshekh ’asher yaga‘at bo. 
isaiah 62:9	ki me’asfav yokheluhu vehilu ’et yhoh umeqabetsav yishtuhu bekhatsrot qadshi 
isaiah 62:10	‘iwru ‘iwru bashe‘arim panu derekh ha‘am solu solu hamsilah saqelu mei’ewen harimu nes ‘al ha‘amim. 
isaiah 62:11	hineh yhoh hishmia‘ ’el qetseh ha’arets ’imru lewat tsiyon hineh yish‘ekh ba hineh sekharo ’ito ufe‘ulato lefanav. 
isaiah 62:12	veqare’u lahem ‘am haqodesh ge’ulei yhoh velakh yiqarei derushah ‘ir lo ne‘ezawah. 
isaiah 63:1	mi zeh ba mei’edom khamuts begadim mibatserah zeh hadur bilwusho tso‘eh berow kokho ’ani medaber bitsdaqah raw lehoshia‘. 
isaiah 63:2	madua‘ ’adom lilwushekha uwegadekha kedorekh begat. 
isaiah 63:3	purah darakhti lewadi umei‘amim ’en ’ish ’iti ve’edrekhem be’api ve’ermesem bakhamati veyez nitskham ‘al begadai vekhal malbushai ’eg’aleti. 
isaiah 63:4	ki yom naqam belibi ushenat ge’ulai ba’ah. 
isaiah 63:5	ve’abit ve’en ‘ozer ve’eshtomem ve’en somekh vatosha‘ li zero‘i vakhamati hi semakhateni. 
isaiah 63:6	ve’awus ‘amim be’api va’ashakerem bakhamati ve’orid la’arets nitskham. 
isaiah 63:7	khasdei yhoh ’azkir tehilot yhoh ke‘al kol ’asher gemalanu yhoh veraw tuw lewet yisra’el ’asher gemalam kerakhamav ukherow khasadav. 
isaiah 63:8	vayomer ’akh ‘ami hemah banim lo yeshaqeiru vayhi lahem lemoshia‘. 
isaiah 63:9	bekhal tsaratam lo lo tsar umal’akh panav hoshi‘am be’ahawato uwekhemlato hu ge’alam vaynatelem vaynase’em kal yemei ‘olam. 
isaiah 63:10	vehemah maru ve‘itsewu ’et ruakh qadesho vayeihafekh lahem le’oyew hu nilkham bam. 
isaiah 63:11	vayizkor yemei ‘olam mosheh ‘amo ’ayeh hama‘alem miyam ’et ro‘ei tsono ’ayeh hasam beqirbo ’et ruakh qadesho. 
isaiah 63:12	molikh limin mosheh zeroa‘ tif’arto boqeia‘ mayim mipeneihem la‘asot lo shem ‘olam. 
isaiah 63:13	molikham batehomot kasus bamidbar lo yikasheilu. 
isaiah 63:14	kabeheimah babiq‘ah teired ruakh yhoh tenikhenu ken nihagta ‘amekha la‘asot lekha shem tif’aret. 
isaiah 63:15	habet mishamayim ure’eh mizewul qadshekha vetif’artekha ’ayeh qin’atekha ugewurotekha hamon mei‘ekha verakhamekha ’eilai hit’apaqu. 
isaiah 63:16	ki ’atah ’awinu ki ’awraham lo yeda‘anu veyisra’el lo yakiranu ’atah yhoh ’awinu go’aleinu mei‘olam shemekha. 
isaiah 63:17	lamah tat‘einu yhoh miderakhekha taqshiakh libeinu miyir’atekha uw lema‘an ‘awadekha shiwtei nakhalatekha. 
isaiah 63:18	lamits‘ar yareshu ‘am qadshekha tsareinu bosu miqdashekha. 
isaiah 63:19	hayinu mei‘olam lo mashalta bam lo niqra shimkha ‘aleihem 
isaiah 64:1	lu qara‘ta shamayim yaradta mipanekha harim nazolu. 
isaiah 64:2	kiqdoakh ’esh hamasim mayim tiw‘eh ’esh lehodia‘ shimkha letsarekha mipanekha goyim yirgazu. 
isaiah 64:3	ba‘asotkha nora’ot lo neqaveh yaradta mipanekha harim nazolu. 
isaiah 64:4	umei‘olam lo shame‘u lo he’ezinu ‘ayin lo ra’atah ’elohim zulatekha ya‘aseh limkhakeh lo. 
isaiah 64:5	paga‘ta ’et sas ve‘oseh tsedeq bidrakhekha yizkerukha hen ’atah qatsafta vanekheta bahem ‘olam venivasheia‘. 
isaiah 64:6	vanehi khatamei kulanu ukheweged ‘idim kal tsidqoteinu vanawel ke‘aleh kulanu va‘avoneinu karuakh yisa’unu. 
isaiah 64:7	ve’en qorei weshimkha mit‘orer lehakhaziq bakh ki histarta fanekha mimenu vatemugeinu beyad ‘avoneinu. 
isaiah 64:8	ve‘atah yhoh ’awinu ’atah ’anakhnu hakhomer ve’atah yotsereinu uma‘aseh yadekha kulanu. 
isaiah 64:9	’al tiqtsof yhoh ‘ad me’od ve’al la‘ad tizkor ‘avon hen habet na ‘amekha khulanu. 
isaiah 64:10	‘arei qadshekha hayu midbar tsiyon midbar hayatah yerushalim shemamah. 
isaiah 64:11	bet qadesheinu vetif’arteinu ’asher hilukha ’awoteinu hayah lisreifat ’esh vekhal makhamadeinu hayah lekharebah. 
isaiah 64:12	ha‘al ’eleh tit’apaq yhoh tekhesheh ute‘aneinu ‘ad me’od. 
isaiah 65:1	nidrashti lelo sha’alu nimtseiti lelo wiqshuni ’amarti hineini hineini ’el go lo qora wishmi. 
isaiah 65:2	peirasti yadai kal hayom ’el ‘am sorer haholekhim haderekh lo tow ’akhar makhshewoteihem. 
isaiah 65:3	ha‘am hamakh‘isim ’oti ‘al panai tamid zowekhim baganot umeqaterim ‘al haleweinim. 
isaiah 65:4	hayoshewim baqewarim uwanetsurim yalinu ha’okhelim besar hakhazir uferaq umeraq pigulim keleihem. 
isaiah 65:5	ha’omerim qeraw ’eilekha ’al tigash bi ki qedashtikha ’eleh ‘ashan be’api ’esh yoqedet kal hayom. 
isaiah 65:6	hineh khetuwah lefanai lo ’ekheseh ki ’im shilamti veshilamti ‘al kheiqam. 
isaiah 65:7	‘avonoteikhem va‘avonot ’awoteikhem yakhdav ’amar yhoh ’asher qiteru ‘al heharim ve‘al hagewa‘ot kheirefuni umadoti fe‘ulatam rishonah ‘al ’el kheiqam. 
isaiah 65:8	koh ’amar yhoh ka’asher yimatsei hatirosh ba’eshkol ve’amar ’al tashkhiteihu ki werakhah bo ken ’e‘eseh lema‘an ‘awadai lewilti hashkhit hakol. 
isaiah 65:9	vehotseiti miya‘aqow zera‘ umihudah yoresh harai vireishuha wekhirai va‘awadai yishkenu shamah. 
isaiah 65:10	vehayah hasharon linveh tson ve‘eimeq ‘akhor lereiwets baqar le‘ami ’asher derashuni. 
isaiah 65:11	ve’atem ‘ozewei yhoh hashekheikhim ’et har qadshi ha‘orekhim lagad shulkhan vehamal’im lamni mimsakh. 
isaiah 65:12	umaniti ’etkhem lakherew vekhulekhem latewakh tikhra‘u ya‘an qarati velo ‘anitem dibarti velo shema‘tem vata‘asu hara‘ be‘einai uwa’asher lo khafatsti bekhartem. 
isaiah 65:13	lakhen koh ’amar ’adonai yhoh hineh ‘awadai yokheilu ve’atem tir‘awu hineh ‘awadai yishtu ve’atem titsma’u hineh ‘awadai yismakhu ve’atem teiwoshu. 
isaiah 65:14	hineh ‘awadai yaronu mituw lew ve’atem tits‘aqu mike’ew lew umisheiwer ruakh teyeililu. 
isaiah 65:15	vehinakhtem shimkhem lishwu‘ah liwkhirai vehemitekha ’adonai yhoh vela‘awadav yiqra shem ’akher. 
isaiah 65:16	’asher hamitbarekh ba’arets yitbarekh beilohei ’amen vehanishba‘ ba’arets yishawa‘ beilohei ’amen ki nishkekhu hatsarot harishonot vekhi nisteru mei‘einai. 
isaiah 65:17	ki hini worei shamayim khadashim va’arets khadashah velo tizakharnah harishonot velo ta‘alenah ‘al lew. 
isaiah 65:18	ki ’im sisu vegilu ‘adei ‘ad ’asher ’ani worei ki hini worei ’et yerushalim gilah ve‘amah masos. 
isaiah 65:19	vegalti wirushalim vesasti we‘ami velo yishama‘ bah ‘od qol bekhi veqol ze‘aqah. 
isaiah 65:20	lo yihyeh misham ‘od ‘ul yamim vezaqen ’asher lo yemalei ’et yamav ki hana‘ar ben mei’ah shanah yamut vehakhote ben mei’ah shanah yequlal. 
isaiah 65:21	uwanu watim veyashawu venate‘u kheramim ve’akhelu piryam. 
isaiah 65:22	lo yiwnu ve’akher yeishew lo yite‘u ve’akher yokhel ki khimei ha‘ets yemei ‘ami uma‘aseh yedeihem yewalu wekhirai. 
isaiah 65:23	lo yige‘u lariq velo yeiledu labehalah ki zera‘ berukhei yhoh hemah vetse’etsa’eihem ’itam. 
isaiah 65:24	vehayah terem yiqra’u va’ani ’e‘eneh ‘od hem medaberim va’ani ’eshma‘. 
isaiah 65:25	ze’ew vetaleh yir‘u khe’ekhad ve’aryeh kabaqar yokhal tewen venakhash ‘afar lakhmo lo yarei‘u velo yashkhitu bekhal har qadshi ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 66:1	koh ’amar yhoh hashamayim kis’i veha’arets hadom raglai ’ei zeh wayit ’asher tiwnu li ve’ei zeh maqom menukhati. 
isaiah 66:2	ve’et kal ’eleh yadi ‘asatah vayihyu khal ’eleh ne’um yhoh ve’el zeh ’abit ’el ‘ani unekheh ruakh vekhared ‘al dewari. 
isaiah 66:3	shokhet hashor makeh ’ish zoweiakh haseh ‘oref kelew ma‘aleh minkhah dam khazir mazkir lewonah mewarekh ’aven gam hemah bakharu bedarkheihem uweshiqutseihem nafsham khafeitsah. 
isaiah 66:4	gam ’ani ’ewkhar beta‘aluleihem umegurotam ’awi lahem ya‘an qarati ve’en ‘oneh dibarti velo shamei‘u vaya‘asu hara‘ be‘einai uwa’asher lo khafatsti bakharu. 
isaiah 66:5	shim‘u dewar yhoh hakhareidim ’el dewaro ’ameru ’akheikhem sone’eikhem menadeikhem lema‘an shemi yikhbad yhoh venir’eh wesimkhatkhem vehem yeiwoshu. 
isaiah 66:6	qol sha’on mei‘ir qol meiheikhal qol yhoh meshalem gemul le’oyewav. 
isaiah 66:7	beterem takhil yaladah beterem yawo kheiwel lah vehimlitah zakhar. 
isaiah 66:8	mi shama‘ kazot mi ra’ah ka’eleh hayukhal ’erets beyom ’ekhad ’im yivaled go pa‘am ’ekhat ki khalah gam yaledah tsiyon ’et baneha. 
isaiah 66:9	ha’ani ’ashbir velo ’olid yomar yhoh ’im ’ani hamolid ve‘atsarti ’amar ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 66:10	simkhu ’et yerushalim vegilu wah kal ’ohaweha sisu ’itah masos kal hamit’abelim ‘aleha. 
isaiah 66:11	lema‘an tinequ usewa‘tem mishod tankhumeha lema‘an tamotsu vehit‘anagtem miziz kewodah. 
isaiah 66:12	ki khoh ’amar yhoh hini noteh ’eileha kenahar shalom ukhenakhal shotef kewod goyim vinaqtem ‘al tsad tinasei’u ve‘al birkayim tesha‘osha‘u. 
isaiah 66:13	ke’ish ’asher ’imo tenakhamenu ken ’anokhi ’anakhemkhem uwirushalim tenukhamu. 
isaiah 66:14	ure’item vesas libekhem ve‘atsmoteikhem kadeshe tifrakhnah venod‘ah yad yhoh ’et ‘awadav veza‘am ’et ’oyewav. 
isaiah 66:15	ki hineh yhoh ba’esh yawo vekhasufah markewotav lehashiw bekheimah ’apo vega‘arato belahawei ’esh. 
isaiah 66:16	ki wa’esh yhoh nishpat uwekharbo ’et kal basar verabu khalei yhoh. 
isaiah 66:17	hamitqadeshim vehamitaharim ’el haganot ’akhar ’ekhad ’akhat batavekh ’okhelei besar hakhazir vehasheqets veha‘akhbar yakhdav yasufu ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 66:18	ve’anokhi ma‘aseihem umakhshewoteihem ba’ah leqabets ’et kal hagoyim vehaleshonot uwa’u vera’u ’et kewodi. 
isaiah 66:19	vesamti wahem ’ot veshilakhti meihem peleitim ’el hagoyim tarshish pul velud moshekhei qeshet tuwal veyavan ha’iyim harekhoqim ’asher lo shame‘u ’et shim‘i velo ra’u ’et kewodi vehigidu ’et kewodi bagoyim. 
isaiah 66:20	veheiwi’u ’et kal ’akheikhem mikal hagoyim minkhah yhoh basusim uwarekhew uwatsabim uwaperadim uwakirkarot ‘al har qadshi yerushalim ’amar yhoh ka’asher yawi’u wenei yisra’el ’et haminkhah bikhli tahor bet yhoh. 
isaiah 66:21	vegam meihem ’eqakh lakohanim lalviyim ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 66:22	ki kha’asher hashamayim hakhodashim veha’arets hakhadashah ’asher ’ani ‘oseh ‘omedim lefanai ne’um yhoh ken ya‘amod zar‘akhem veshimkhem. 
isaiah 66:23	vehayah midei khodesh bekhadesho umidei shabat beshabato yawo khal basar lehishtakhavot lefanai ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 66:24	veyatse’u vera’u befigrei ha’anashim haposhe‘im bi ki tola‘tam lo tamut ve’isham lo tikhbeh vehayu deira’on lekhal basar. 
jeremiah 1:1	diwrei yirmeyahu ben khilqiyahu min hakohanim ’asher ba‘anatot be’erets binyamin. 
jeremiah 1:2	’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’eilav bimei yoshiyahu wen ’amon melekh yehudah bishlosh ‘esreh shanah lemalekho. 
jeremiah 1:3	vayhi bimei yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah ‘ad tom ‘ashtei ‘esreh shanah letsidqiyahu wen yoshiyahu melekh yehudah ‘ad gelot yerushalim bakhodesh hakhamishi. 
jeremiah 1:4	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
jeremiah 1:5	beterem ’etsorkha ’etsarekha wabeten yeda‘tikha uweterem teitsei meirekhem hiqdashtikha nawi lagoyim netatikha. 
jeremiah 1:6	va’omar ’ahah ’adonai yhoh hineh lo yada‘ti daber ki na‘ar ’anokhi. 
jeremiah 1:7	vayomer yhoh ’eilai ’al tomar na‘ar ’anokhi ki ‘al kal ’asher ’eshlakhakha teilekh ve’et kal ’asher ’atsavekha tedaber. 
jeremiah 1:8	’al tira mipeneihem ki ’itekha ’ani lehatsilekha ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 1:9	vayishlakh yhoh ’et yado vayaga‘ ‘al pi vayomer yhoh ’eilai hineh natati dewarai befikha. 
jeremiah 1:10	re’eh hifqadtikha hayom hazeh ‘al hagoyim ve‘al hamamlakhot lintosh velintots uleha’awid velaharos liwnot velintoa‘. 
jeremiah 1:11	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor mah ’atah ro’eh yirmeyahu va’omar maqel shaqed ’ani ro’eh. 
jeremiah 1:12	vayomer yhoh ’eilai heitawta lir’ot ki shoqed ’ani ‘al dewari la‘asoto. 
jeremiah 1:13	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai sheinit leimor mah ’atah ro’eh va’omar sir nafuakh ’ani ro’eh ufanav mipenei tsafonah. 
jeremiah 1:14	vayomer yhoh ’eilai mitsafon tipatakh hara‘ah ‘al kal yoshewei ha’arets. 
jeremiah 1:15	ki hini qorei lekhal mishpekhot mamlekhot tsafonah ne’um yhoh uwa’u venatenu ’ish kis’o petakh sha‘arei yerushalim ve‘al kal khomoteha sawiw ve‘al kal ‘arei yehudah. 
jeremiah 1:16	vedibarti mishpatai ’otam ‘al kal ra‘atam ’asher ‘azawuni vayqateru leilohim ’akheirim vayishtakhavu lema‘asei yedeihem. 
jeremiah 1:17	ve’atah te’zor matenekha veqamta vedibarta ’aleihem ’et kal ’asher ’anokhi ’atsaveka ’al teikhat mipeneihem pen ’akhitekha lifneihem. 
jeremiah 1:18	va’ani hineh netatikha hayom le‘ir miwtsar ule‘amud barzel ulekhomot nekhoshet ‘al kal ha’arets lemalkhei yehudah lesareha lekhohaneha ule‘am ha’arets. 
jeremiah 1:19	venilkhamu ’eilekha velo yukhelu lakh ki ’itekha ’ani ne’um yhoh lehatsilekha. 
jeremiah 2:1	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
jeremiah 2:2	halokh veqarata we’azenei yerushalim leimor koh ’amar yhoh zakharti lakh khesed ne‘urayikh ’ahawat kelulotayikh lekhtekh ’akharai bamidbar be’erets lo zeru‘ah. 
jeremiah 2:3	qodesh yisra’el yhoh reishit tewu’atoh kal ’okhelav ye’shamu ra‘ah tawo ’aleihem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 2:4	shim‘u dewar yhoh bet ya‘aqow vekhal mishpekhot bet yisra’el. 
jeremiah 2:5	koh ’amar yhoh mah matse’u ’awoteikhem bi ‘avel ki rakhaqu mei‘alai vayeilekhu ’akharei hahewel vayehbalu. 
jeremiah 2:6	velo ’ameru ’ayeh yhoh hama‘aleh ’otanu mei’erets mitsrayim hamolikh ’otanu bamidbar be’erets ‘arawah veshukhah be’erets tsiyah vetsalmavet be’erets lo ‘awar bah ’ish velo yashaw ’adam sham. 
jeremiah 2:7	va’awi ’etkhem ’el ’erets hakarmel le’ekhol piryah vetuwah vatawo’u vatetame’u ’et ’artsi venakhalati samtem leto‘eiwah. 
jeremiah 2:8	hakohanim lo ’ameru ’ayeh yhoh vetofesei hatorah lo yeda‘uni veharo‘im pashe‘u wi vehanewi’im nibe’u waba‘al ve’akharei lo yo‘ilu halakhu. 
jeremiah 2:9	lakhen ‘od ’ariw ’itekhem ne’um yhoh ve’et benei weneikhem ’ariw. 
jeremiah 2:10	ki ‘iwru ’iyei khitiyim ure’u veqeidar shilkhu vehitbonu me’od ure’u hen hayetah kazot. 
jeremiah 2:11	haheimir go ’elohim vehemah lo ’elohim ve‘ami heimir kewodo belo yo‘il. 
jeremiah 2:12	shomu shamayim ‘al zot vesa‘aru kharewu me’od ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 2:13	ki shetayim ra‘ot ‘asah ‘ami ’oti ‘azewu meqor mayim khayim lakhtsow lahem borot borot nishbarim ’asher lo yakhilu hamayim. 
jeremiah 2:14	ha‘ewed yisra’el ’im yelid bayit hu madua‘ hayah lawaz. 
jeremiah 2:15	‘alav yish’agu khefirim natenu qolam vayashitu ’artso leshamah ‘arav nitsetah nitsetu mibeli yoshew. 
jeremiah 2:16	gam benei nof vetakhpenes vetakhpankhes yir‘ukh qadeqod. 
jeremiah 2:17	halo zot ta‘aseh lakh ‘azewekh ’et yhoh ’elohayikh be‘et molikhekh badarekh. 
jeremiah 2:18	ve‘atah mah lakh lederekh mitsrayim lishtot mei shikhor umah lakh lederekh ’ashur lishtot mei nahar. 
jeremiah 2:19	teyaserekh ra‘atekh umeshuwotayikh tokhikhukh ude‘i ure’i ki ra‘ vamar ‘azewekh ’et yhoh ’elohayikh velo fakhdati ’eilayikh ne’um ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot. 
jeremiah 2:20	ki mei‘olam shawarti ‘ulekh nitaqti mosrotayikh vatomeri lo ’e‘ewod ’e‘ewor ki ‘al kal giw‘ah gewohah vetakhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan ’at tso‘ah zonah. 
jeremiah 2:21	ve’anokhi neta‘tikh soreq kuloh zera‘ ’emet ve’ekh nehpakht li surei hagefen nakheriyah. 
jeremiah 2:22	ki ’im tekhabesi baneter vetarbi lakh borit nikhtam ‘avonekh lefanai ne’um ’adonai yhoh. 
jeremiah 2:23	’ekh tomeri lo nitmeiti ’akharei habe‘alim lo halakhti re’i darkekh bagai de‘i meh ‘asit bikhrah qalah mesarekhet derakheha. 
jeremiah 2:24	pereh limud midbar be’avat nafosho nafshah sha’afah ruakh ta’anatah mi yeshiwenah kal mewaqsheha lo yi‘afu bekhadeshah yimtsa’uneha. 
jeremiah 2:25	min‘i raglekh miyakhef ugoronekh ugeronekh mitsim’ah vatomeri no’ash lo ki ’ahawti zarim ve’akhareihem ’eilekh. 
jeremiah 2:26	kewoshet ganaw ki yimatsei ken howishu bet yisra’el hemah malkheihem sareihem vekhohaneihem unewi’eihem. 
jeremiah 2:27	’omerim la‘ets ’awi ’atah vela’ewen ’at yelidtin yelidtanu ki fanu ’eilai ‘oref velo fanim uwe‘et ra‘atam yomeru qumah vehoshi‘einu. 
jeremiah 2:28	ve’ayeh ’elohekha ’asher ‘asita lakh yaqumu ’im yoshi‘ukha be‘et ra‘atekha ki mispar ‘arekha hayu ’elohekha yehudah. 
jeremiah 2:29	lamah tariwu ’eilai kulekhem pesha‘tem bi ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 2:30	lashav hikeiti ’et beneikhem musar lo laqakhu ’akhelah kharbekhem newi’eikhem ke’aryeh mashkhit. 
jeremiah 2:31	hador ’atem re’u dewar yhoh hamidbar hayiti leyisra’el ’im ’erets ma’peileyah madua‘ ’ameru ‘ami radnu lo nawo ‘od ’eilekha. 
jeremiah 2:32	hatishkakh betulah ‘edyah kalah qishureha ve‘ami shekheikhuni yamim ’en mispar. 
jeremiah 2:33	mah teitiwi darkekh lewaqesh ’ahawah lakhen gam ’et hara‘ot limadti limadt ’et derakhayikh. 
jeremiah 2:34	gam bikhnafayikh nimtse’u dam nafshot ’ewyonim neqiyim lo wamakhteret metsatim ki ‘al kal ’eleh. 
jeremiah 2:35	vatomeri ki niqeiti ’akh shaw ’apo mimeni hini nishpat ’otakh ‘al ’amerekh lo khatati. 
jeremiah 2:36	mah teizeli me’od leshanot ’et darkekh gam mimitsrayim teiwoshi ka’asher boshet mei’ashur. 
jeremiah 2:37	gam mei’et zeh teitse’i veyadayikh ‘al roshekh ki ma’as yhoh bemiwtakhayikh velo tatslikhi lahem. 
jeremiah 3:1	leimor hen yeshalakh ’ish ’et ’ishto vehalekhah mei’ito vehayetah le’ish ’akher hayashuw ’eileha ‘od halo khanof tekhenaf ha’arets hahi ve’at zanit rei‘im rabim veshow ’eilai ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 3:2	se’i ‘einayikh ‘al shefayim ure’i ’eifoh lo shugalt shukabet ‘al derakhim yashawt lahem ka‘arawi bamidbar vatakhanifi ’erets biznutayikh uwera‘atekh. 
jeremiah 3:3	vayimane‘u rewiwim umalqosh lo hayah umeitsakh ’ishah zonah hayah lakh mei’ant hikalem. 
jeremiah 3:4	halo mei‘atah qarati qarat li ’awi ’aluf ne‘urai ’atah. 
jeremiah 3:5	hayintor le‘olam ’im yishmor lanetsakh hineh dibarti dibart vata‘asi hara‘ot vatukhal. 
jeremiah 3:6	vayomer yhoh ’eilai bimei yoshiyahu hamelekh hara’ita ’asher ‘asetah meshuwah yisra’el holekhah hi ‘al kal har gawoah ve’el takhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan vatizni sham. 
jeremiah 3:7	va’omar ’akharei ‘asotah ’et kal ’eleh ’eilai tashuw velo shawah vateireh vateire bagodah ’akhotah yehudah. 
jeremiah 3:8	va’eire ki ‘al kal ’odot ’asher ni’afah meshuwah yisra’el shilakhtiha va’eten ’et seifer kerituteha ’eileha velo yare’ah bogeidah yehudah ’akhotah vateilekh vatizen gam hi. 
jeremiah 3:9	vehayah miqol zenutah vatekhenaf ’et ha’arets vatin’af ’et ha’ewen ve’et ha‘ets. 
jeremiah 3:10	vegam bekhal zot lo shawah ’eilai bagodah ’akhotah yehudah bekhal libah ki ’im besheqer ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 3:11	vayomer yhoh ’eilai tsideqah nafshah meshuwah yisra’el mibogeidah yehudah. 
jeremiah 3:12	halokh veqarata ’et hadewarim ha’eleh tsafonah ve’amarta shuwah meshuwah yisra’el ne’um yhoh lo ’apil panai bakhem ki khasid ’ani ne’um yhoh lo ’etor le‘olam. 
jeremiah 3:13	’akh de‘i ‘avonekh ki yhoh ’elohayikh pasha‘at vatefazeri ’et derakhayikh lazarim takhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan uweqoli lo shema‘tem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 3:14	shuwu wanim showawim ne’um yhoh ki ’anokhi ba‘alti wakhem velaqakhti ’etkhem ’ekhad mei‘ir ushenayim mimishpakhah veheiweiti ’etkhem tsiyon. 
jeremiah 3:15	venatati lakhem ro‘im kelibi vera‘u ’etkhem dei‘ah vehaskel. 
jeremiah 3:16	vehayah ki tirbu uferitem ba’arets bayamim hahemah ne’um yhoh lo yomeru ‘od ’aron berit yhoh velo ya‘aleh ‘al lew velo yizkeru wo velo yifqodu velo yei‘aseh ‘od. 
jeremiah 3:17	ba‘et hahi yiqre’u lirushalim kisei yhoh veniqvu ’eileha khal hagoyim leshem yhoh lirushalim velo yeilekhu ‘od ’akharei sherirut libam hara‘. 
jeremiah 3:18	bayamim hahemah yeilekhu wet yehudah ‘al bet yisra’el veyawo’u yakhdav mei’erets tsafon ‘al ha’arets ’asher hinkhalti ’et ’awoteikhem. 
jeremiah 3:19	ve’anokhi ’amarti ’ekh ’ashitekh babanim ve’eten lakh ’erets khemdah nakhalat tsewi tsiw’ot goyim va’omar ’awi tiqre’u tiqre’i li umei’akharai lo tashuwu tashuwi. 
jeremiah 3:20	’akhen bagedah ’ishah meirei‘ah ken begadtem bi bet yisra’el ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 3:21	qol ‘al shefayim nishma‘ bekhi takhanunei benei yisra’el ki he‘evu ’et darkam shakhekhu ’et yhoh ’eloheihem. 
jeremiah 3:22	uwu banim showawim ’erpah meshuwoteikhem hinu ’atanu lakh ki ’atah yhoh ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 3:23	’akhen lasheqer migewa‘ot hamon harim ’akhen yhoh ’eloheinu teshu‘at yisra’el. 
jeremiah 3:24	vehaboshet ’akhelah ’et yegia‘ ’awoteinu mine‘ureinu ’et tsonam ve’et beqaram ’et beneihem ve’et benoteihem. 
jeremiah 3:25	nishkewah bewasheteinu utekhaseinu kelimateinu ki yhoh ’eloheinu khatanu ’anakhnu va’awoteinu mine‘ureinu ve‘ad hayom hazeh velo shama‘nu beqol yhoh ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 4:1	’im tashuw yisra’el ne’um yhoh ’eilai tashuw ve’im tasir shiqutsekha mipanai velo tanud. 
jeremiah 4:2	venishba‘ta khai yhoh be’emet bemishpat uwitsdaqah vehitbarekhu wo goyim uwo yithalalu. 
jeremiah 4:3	ki khoh ’amar yhoh le’ish yehudah velirushalim niru lakhem nir ve’al tizre‘u ’el qotsim. 
jeremiah 4:4	himolu yhoh vehasiru ‘arelot lewawkhem ’ish yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim pen teitsei kha’esh khamati uwa‘arah ve’en mekhabeh mipenei roa‘ ma‘aleikhem. 
jeremiah 4:5	hagidu wihudah uwirushalim hashmi‘u ve’imru vtiq‘u tiq‘u shofar ba’arets qir’u mal’u ve’imru hei’asefu venawo’ah ’el ‘arei hamiwtsar. 
jeremiah 4:6	se’u nes tsiyonah ha‘izu ’al ta‘amodu ki ra‘ah ’anokhi meiwi mitsafon veshewer gadol. 
jeremiah 4:7	‘alah ’aryeh misubekho umashkhit goyim nasa‘ yatsa mimeqomo lasum ’artsekh leshamah ‘arayikh titsenah mei’en yoshew. 
jeremiah 4:8	‘al zot khigru saqim sifdu veheililu ki lo shaw kharon ’af yhoh mimenu. 
jeremiah 4:9	vehayah wayom hahu ne’um yhoh yowad lew hamelekh velew hasarim venashamu hakohanim vehanewi’im yitmahu. 
jeremiah 4:10	va’omar ’ahah ’adonai yhoh ’akhen hashei hisheita la‘am hazeh velirushalim leimor shalom yihyeh lakhem venage‘ah kherew ‘ad hanafesh. 
jeremiah 4:11	ba‘et hahi yei’amer la‘am hazeh velirushalim ruakh tsakh shefayim bamidbar derekh bat ‘ami lo lizrot velo lehawar. 
jeremiah 4:12	ruakh malei mei’eleh yawo li ‘atah gam ’ani ’adaber mishpatim ’otam. 
jeremiah 4:13	hineh ka‘ananim ya‘aleh vekhasufah markewotav qalu minesharim susav ’o lanu ki shudadenu. 
jeremiah 4:14	kabesi meira‘ah libekh yerushalim lema‘an tivashei‘i ‘ad matai talin beqirbekh makhshewot ’onekh. 
jeremiah 4:15	ki qol magid midan umashmia‘ ’aven meihar ’efrayim. 
jeremiah 4:16	hazkiru lagoyim hineh hashmi‘u ‘al yerushalim notserim ba’im mei’erets hamerkhaq vayitenu ‘al ‘arei yehudah qolam. 
jeremiah 4:17	keshomerei sadai hayu ‘aleha misawiw ki ’oti maratah ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 4:18	darkekh uma‘alalayikh ‘aso ’eleh lakh zot ra‘atekh ki mar ki naga‘ ‘ad libekh. 
jeremiah 4:19	mei‘ai mei‘ai ’akhulah ’okhilah qirot libi homeh li libi lo ’akharish ki qol shofar shama‘ti shama‘at nafshi teru‘at milkhamah. 
jeremiah 4:20	shewer ‘al shewer niqra ki shudedah kal ha’arets pit’om shudedu ’ohalai rega‘ yeri‘otai. 
jeremiah 4:21	‘ad matai ’er’eh nes ’eshme‘ah qol shofar. 
jeremiah 4:22	ki ’evil ‘ami ’oti lo yada‘u banim sekhalim hemah velo newonim hemah khakhamim hemah lehara‘ uleheitiw lo yada‘u. 
jeremiah 4:23	ra’iti ’et ha’arets vehineh tohu vawohu ve’el hashamayim ve’en ’oram. 
jeremiah 4:24	ra’iti heharim vehineh ro‘ashim vekhal hagewa‘ot hitqalqalu. 
jeremiah 4:25	ra’iti vehineh ’en ha’adam vekhal ‘of hashamayim nadadu. 
jeremiah 4:26	ra’iti vehineh hakarmel hamidbar vekhal ‘arav nitetsu mipenei yhoh mipenei kharon ’apo. 
jeremiah 4:27	ki khoh ’amar yhoh shemamah tihyeh kal ha’arets vekhalah lo ’e‘eseh. 
jeremiah 4:28	‘al zot te’ewal ha’arets veqaderu hashamayim mima‘al ‘al ki dibarti zamoti velo nikhamti velo ’ashuw mimenah. 
jeremiah 4:29	miqol parash veromeh qeshet borakhat kal ha‘ir ba’u be‘awim uwakeifim ‘alu kal ha‘ir ‘azuwah ve’en yoshew bahen ’ish. 
jeremiah 4:30	ve’ati ve’at shadud mah ta‘asi ki tilbeshi shani ki ta‘di ‘adi zahaw ki tiqre‘i wapukh ‘einayikh lashav tityapi ma’asu wakh ‘ogewim nafshekh yewaqeishu. 
jeremiah 4:31	ki qol kekholah shama‘ti tsarah kemawkirah qol bat tsiyon tityapeiakh tefares kapeha ’o na li ki ‘ayefah nafshi lehoregim. 
jeremiah 5:1	shotu bekhutsot yerushalim ure’u na ude‘u uwaqshu wirkhowoteha ’im timtse’u ’ish ’im yesh ‘oseh mishpat mewaqesh ’emunah ve’eslakh lah. 
jeremiah 5:2	ve’im khai yhoh yomeiru lakhen lasheqer yishawei‘u. 
jeremiah 5:3	yhoh ‘einekha halo le’emunah hikitah ’otam velo khalu kilitam mei’anu qakhat musar khizequ feneihem misela‘ mei’anu lashuw. 
jeremiah 5:4	va’ani ’amarti ’akh dalim hem no’alu ki lo yade‘u derekh yhoh mishpat ’eloheihem. 
jeremiah 5:5	’eilakhah li ’el hagedolim va’adaberah ’otam ki hemah yade‘u derekh yhoh mishpat ’eloheihem ’akh hemah yakhdav shaweru ‘ol nitequ moseirot. 
jeremiah 5:6	‘al ken hikam ’aryeh miya‘ar ze’ew ‘arawot yeshadedem namer shoqed ‘al ‘areihem kal hayotsei meihenah yitaref ki rabu pish‘eihem ‘atsemu meshuwoteihem meshuwoteihem 
jeremiah 5:7	’ei lazot ’esloakh ’eslakh lakh banayikh ‘azawuni vayishawe‘u belo ’elohim va’asbia‘ ’otam vayin’afu uwet zonah yitgodadu. 
jeremiah 5:8	susim meyuzanim mashkim hayu ’ish ’el ’eishet rei‘eihu yitshalu. 
jeremiah 5:9	ha‘al ’eleh lo ’efqod ne’um yhoh ve’im bego ’asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. 
jeremiah 5:10	‘alu wesharoteha veshakheitu vekhalah ’al ta‘asu hasiru netishoteha ki lo yhoh hemah. 
jeremiah 5:11	ki wagod bagedu bi bet yisra’el uwet yehudah ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 5:12	kikhashu yhoh vayomeru lo hu velo tawo ‘aleinu ra‘ah vekherew vera‘aw lo nir’eh. 
jeremiah 5:13	vehanewi’im yihyu leruakh vehadiber ’en bahem koh yei‘aseh lahem. 
jeremiah 5:14	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot ya‘an daberkhem ’et hadawar hazeh hini noten dewarai befikha le’esh veha‘am hazeh ‘eitsim va’akhalatam. 
jeremiah 5:15	hini meiwi ‘aleikhem go mimerkhaq bet yisra’el ne’um yhoh go ’eitan hu go mei‘olam hu go lo teida‘ leshono velo tishma‘ mah yedaber. 
jeremiah 5:16	’ashpato keqewer patuakh kulam giborim. 
jeremiah 5:17	ve’akhal qetsirekha velakhmekha yokhelu banekha uwenotekha yokhal tsonekha uweqarekha yokhal gafnekha ute’einatekha yeroshesh ‘arei miwtsarekha ’asher ’atah boteiakh bahenah bekharew. 
jeremiah 5:18	vegam bayamim hahemah ne’um yhoh lo ’e‘eseh ’itekhem kalah. 
jeremiah 5:19	vehayah ki tomeru takhat meh ‘asah yhoh ’eloheinu lanu ’et kal ’eleh ve’amarta ’aleihem ka’asher ‘azawtem ’oti vata‘awdu ’elohei neikhar be’artsekhem ken ta‘awdu zarim be’erets lo lakhem. 
jeremiah 5:20	hagidu zot bewet ya‘aqow vehashmi‘uha wihudah leimor. 
jeremiah 5:21	shim‘u na zot ‘am sakhal ve’en lew ‘einayim lahem velo yir’u ’azenayim lahem velo yishma‘u. 
jeremiah 5:22	ha’oti lo tira’u ne’um yhoh ’im mipanai lo takhilu ’asher samti khol gewul layam khaq ‘olam velo ya‘awrenhu vayitga‘ashu velo yukhalu vehamu galav velo ya‘awrunhu. 
jeremiah 5:23	vela‘am hazeh hayah lew sorer umoreh saru vayeileikhu. 
jeremiah 5:24	velo ’ameru wilwawam nira na ’et yhoh ’eloheinu hanoten geshem veyoreh yoreh umalqosh be‘ito shewu‘ot khuqot qatsir yishmar lanu. 
jeremiah 5:25	‘avonoteikhem hitu ’eleh vekhatoteikhem mane‘u hatow mikem. 
jeremiah 5:26	ki nimtse’u we‘ami resha‘im yashur keshakh yequshim hitsiwu mashkhit ’anashim yilkodu. 
jeremiah 5:27	kikhluw malei ‘of ken bateihem melei’im mirmah ‘al ken gadelu vaya‘ashiru. 
jeremiah 5:28	shamenu ‘ashetu gam ‘aweru diwrei ra‘ din lo danu din yatom veyatslikhu umishpat ’ewyonim lo shafatu. 
jeremiah 5:29	ha‘al ’eleh lo ’efqod ne’um yhoh ’im bego ’asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. 
jeremiah 5:30	shamah vesha‘arurah nihyetah ba’arets. 
jeremiah 5:31	hanewi’im nibe’u washeqer vehakohanim yirdu ‘al yedeihem ve‘ami ’ahawu khen umah ta‘asu le’akharitah. 
jeremiah 6:1	ha‘izu benei winyamin miqerew yerushalim uwitqoa‘ tiq‘u shofar ve‘al bet hakerem se’u mas’et ki ra‘ah nishqefah mitsafon veshewer gadol. 
jeremiah 6:2	hanavah vehame‘unagah damiti bat tsiyon. 
jeremiah 6:3	’eileha yawo’u ro‘im ve‘edreihem taqe‘u ‘aleha ’ohalim sawiw ra‘u ’ish ’et yado. 
jeremiah 6:4	qadeshu ‘aleha milkhamah qumu vena‘aleh watsahorayim ’o lanu ki fanah hayom ki yinatu tsilei ‘arew. 
jeremiah 6:5	qumu vena‘aleh walayelah venashkhitah ’armenoteha. 
jeremiah 6:6	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot kirtu ‘eitsah veshifkhu ‘al yerushalim solelah hi ha‘ir hafeqad kulah ‘osheq beqirbah. 
jeremiah 6:7	kehaqir bever bayir meimeha ken heiqeirah ra‘atah khamas vashod yishama‘ bah ‘al panai tamid kholi umakah. 
jeremiah 6:8	hivaseri yerushalim pen teiqa‘ nafshi mimekh pen ’asimekh shemamah ’erets lo noshawah. 
jeremiah 6:9	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ‘olel ye‘olu khagefen she’eirit yisra’el hashew yadekha kewotser ‘al salsilot. 
jeremiah 6:10	‘al mi ’adaberah ve’a‘idah veyishma‘u hineh ‘areilah ’azenam velo yukhelu lehaqshiw hineh dewar yhoh hayah lahem lekherpah lo yakhpetsu wo. 
jeremiah 6:11	ve’et khamat yhoh maleiti nil’eiti hakhil shefokh ‘al ‘olal bakhuts ve‘al sod bakhurim yakhdav ki gam ’ish ‘im ’ishah yilakheidu zaqen ‘im melei yamim. 
jeremiah 6:12	venasabu wateihem la’akheirim sadot venashim yakhdav ki ’ateh ’et yadi ‘al yoshewei ha’arets ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 6:13	ki miqetanam ve‘ad gedolam kulo botseia‘ batsa‘ uminawi ve‘ad kohen kulo ‘oseh shaqer. 
jeremiah 6:14	vayrape’u ’et shewer ‘ami ‘al neqalah leimor shalom shalom ve’en shalom. 
jeremiah 6:15	howishu ki to‘eiwah ‘asu gam bosh lo yeiwoshu gam hakhlim lo yada‘u lakhen yipelu wanofelim be‘et peqadtim yikashelu ’amar yhoh. 
jeremiah 6:16	koh ’amar yhoh ‘imdu ‘al derakhim ure’u vesha’alu lintiwot ‘olam ’ei zeh derekh hatow ulekhu wah umits’u margoa‘ lenafshekhem vayomeru lo neilekh. 
jeremiah 6:17	vahaqimoti ‘aleikhem tsofim haqshiwu leqol shofar vayomeru lo naqshiw. 
jeremiah 6:18	lakhen shim‘u hagoyim ude‘i ‘eidah ’et ’asher bam. 
jeremiah 6:19	shim‘i ha’arets hineh ’anokhi meiwi ra‘ah ’el ha‘am hazeh peri makhshewotam ki ‘al dewarai lo hiqshiwu vetorati vayim’asu wah. 
jeremiah 6:20	lamah zeh li lewonah mishewa tawo veqaneh hatow mei’erets merkhaq ‘oloteikhem lo leratson veziwkheikhem lo ‘arewu li. 
jeremiah 6:21	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh hini noten ’el ha‘am hazeh mikhsholim vekhashelu wam ’awot uwanim yakhdav shakhen verei‘o yoweidu ve’awadu. 
jeremiah 6:22	koh ’amar yhoh hineh ‘am ba mei’erets tsafon vego gadol yei‘or miyarketei ’arets. 
jeremiah 6:23	qeshet vekhidon yakhaziqu ’akhzari hu velo yerakheimu qolam kayam yehemeh ve‘al susim yirkawu ‘arukh ke’ish lamilkhamah ‘alayikh bat tsiyon. 
jeremiah 6:24	shama‘nu ’et shame‘o rafu yadeinu tsarah hekheziqatnu khil kayoleidah. 
jeremiah 6:25	’al teitse’i teitse’u hasadeh uwaderekh ’al teileikhi teileikhu ki kherew le’oyew magor misawiw. 
jeremiah 6:26	bat ‘ami khigri saq vehitpaleshi wa’eifer ’eiwel yakhid ‘asi lakh mispad tamrurim ki fit’om yawo hashoded ‘aleinu. 
jeremiah 6:27	bakhon netatikha we‘ami miwtsar veteida‘ uwakhanta ’et darkam. 
jeremiah 6:28	kulam sarei sorim holekhei rakhil nekhoshet uwarzel kulam mashkhitim hemah. 
jeremiah 6:29	nakhar mapuakh mei’ishtam mei’esh tam ‘ofaret lashav tsaraf tsarof vera‘im lo nitaqu. 
jeremiah 6:30	kesef nim’as qare’u lahem ki ma’as yhoh bahem. 
jeremiah 7:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 7:2	‘amod besha‘ar bet yhoh veqarata sham ’et hadawar hazeh ve’amarta shim‘u dewar yhoh kal yehudah haba’im bashe‘arim ha’eleh lehishtakhavot yhoh. 
jeremiah 7:3	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el heitiwu darkheikhem uma‘aleikhem va’ashakenah ’etkhem bamaqom hazeh. 
jeremiah 7:4	’al tiwtekhu lakhem ’el diwrei hasheqer leimor heikhal yhoh heikhal yhoh heikhal yhoh hemah. 
jeremiah 7:5	ki ’im heitew teitiwu ’et darkheikhem ve’et ma‘aleikhem ’im ‘aso ta‘asu mishpat ben ’ish uwen rei‘eihu. 
jeremiah 7:6	ger yatom ve’almanah lo ta‘ashoqu vedam naqi ’al tishpekhu bamaqom hazeh ve’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim lo teilekhu lera‘ lakhem. 
jeremiah 7:7	veshikanti ’etkhem bamaqom hazeh ba’arets ’asher natati la’awoteikhem lemin ‘olam ve‘ad ‘olam. 
jeremiah 7:8	hineh ’atem botekhim lakhem ‘al diwrei hashaqer lewilti ho‘il. 
jeremiah 7:9	haganow ratsoakh vena’of vehishaweia‘ lasheqer veqater laba‘al vehalokh ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim ’asher lo yeda‘tem. 
jeremiah 7:10	uwatem va‘amadtem lefanai babayit hazeh ’asher niqra shemi ‘alav va’amartem nitsalnu lema‘an ‘asot ’et kal hato‘eiwot ha’eleh. 
jeremiah 7:11	ham‘arat paritsim hayah habayit hazeh ’asher niqra shemi ‘alav be‘eineikhem gam ’anokhi hineh ra’iti ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 7:12	ki lekhu na ’el meqomi ’asher beshilo ’asher shikanti shemi sham barishonah ure’u ’et ’asher ‘asiti lo mipenei ra‘at ‘ami yisra’el. 
jeremiah 7:13	ve‘atah ya‘an ‘asotkhem ’et kal hama‘asim ha’eleh ne’um yhoh va’adaber ’aleikhem hashkem vedaber velo shema‘tem va’eqra ’etkhem velo ‘anitem. 
jeremiah 7:14	ve‘asiti labayit ’asher niqra shemi ‘alav ’asher ’atem botekhim bo velamaqom ’asher natati lakhem vela’awoteikhem ka’asher ‘asiti leshilo. 
jeremiah 7:15	vehishlakhti ’etkhem mei‘al panai ka’asher hishlakhti ’et kal ’akheikhem ’et kal zera‘ ’efrayim. 
jeremiah 7:16	ve’atah ’al titpalel be‘ad ha‘am hazeh ve’al tisa wa‘adam rinah utefilah ve’al tifga‘ bi ki ’eineni shomeia‘ ’otakh. 
jeremiah 7:17	ha’einekha ro’eh mah hemah ‘osim be‘arei yehudah uwekhutsot yerushalim. 
jeremiah 7:18	habanim melaqetim ‘eitsim veha’awot mewa‘arim ’et ha’esh vehanashim lashot batseq la‘asot kavanim limlekhet hashamayim vehasekh nesakhim leilohim ’akheirim lema‘an hakh‘iseini. 
jeremiah 7:19	ha’oti hem makh‘isim ne’um yhoh halo ’otam lema‘an boshet peneihem. 
jeremiah 7:20	lakhen koh ’amar ’adonai yhoh hineh ’api vakhamati nitekhet ’el hamaqom hazeh ‘al ha’adam ve‘al habeheimah ve‘al ‘ets hasadeh ve‘al peri ha’adamah uwa‘arah velo tikhbeh. 
jeremiah 7:21	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ‘oloteikhem sefu ‘al ziwkheikhem ve’ikhlu wasar. 
jeremiah 7:22	ki lo dibarti ’et ’awoteikhem velo tsivitim beyom hotsi hotsi’i ’otam mei’erets mitsrayim ‘al diwrei ‘olah vazawakh. 
jeremiah 7:23	ki ’im ’et hadawar hazeh tsiviti ’otam leimor shim‘u weqoli vehayiti lakhem leilohim ve’atem tihyu li le‘am vahalakhtem bekhal haderekh ’asher ’atsaveh ’etkhem lema‘an yitaw lakhem. 
jeremiah 7:24	velo shame‘u velo hitu ’et ’azenam vayeilekhu bemo‘eitsot bishrirut libam hara‘ vayihyu le’akhor velo lefanim. 
jeremiah 7:25	lemin hayom ’asher yatse’u ’awoteikhem mei’erets mitsrayim ‘ad hayom hazeh va’eshlakh ’aleikhem ’et kal ‘awadai hanewi’im yom hashkem veshaloakh. 
jeremiah 7:26	velo shame‘u ’eilai velo hitu ’et ’azenam vayaqshu ’et ‘arepam heirei‘u mei’awotam. 
jeremiah 7:27	vedibarta ’aleihem ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh velo yishme‘u ’eilekha veqarata ’aleihem velo ya‘anukhah. 
jeremiah 7:28	ve’amarta ’aleihem zeh hago ’asher lo shame‘u beqol yhoh ’elohav velo laqekhu musar ’awedah ha’emunah venikhretah mipihem. 
jeremiah 7:29	gazi nizrekh vehashlikhi use’i ‘al shefayim qinah ki ma’as yhoh vayitosh ’et dor ‘ewrato. 
jeremiah 7:30	ki ‘asu wenei yehudah hara‘ be‘einai ne’uvm yhoh samu shiqutseihem babayit ’asher niqra shemi ‘alav letame’o. 
jeremiah 7:31	uwanu bamot hatofet ’asher begei wen hinom lisrof ’et beneihem ve’et benoteihem ba’esh ’asher lo tsiviti velo ‘aletah ‘al libi. 
jeremiah 7:32	lakhen hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh velo yei’amer ‘od hatofet vegei wen hinom ki ’im gei hahareigah veqaweru wetofet mei’en maqom. 
jeremiah 7:33	vehayetah niwlat ha‘am hazeh lema’akhal le‘of hashamayim ulewehemat ha’arets ve’en makharid. 
jeremiah 7:34	vehishbati mei‘arei yehudah umeikhutsot yerushalim qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah ki lekharebah tihyeh ha’arets. 
jeremiah 8:1	ba‘et hahi ne’um yhoh veyotsi’u yotsi’u ’et ‘atsmot malkhei yehudah ve’et ‘atsmot sarav ve’et ‘atsmot hakohanim ve’et ‘atsmot hanewi’im ve’et ‘atsmot yoshewei yerushalim miqiwreihem. 
jeremiah 8:2	ushetakhum lashemesh velayareiakh ulekhol tsewa hashamayim ’asher ’aheiwum va’asher ‘awadum va’asher halekhu ’akhareihem va’asher derashum va’asher hishtakhavu lahem lo yei’asefu velo yiqaweiru ledomen ‘al penei ha’adamah yihyu. 
jeremiah 8:3	veniwkhar mavet meikhayim lekhol hashe’eirit hanish’arim min hamishpakhah hara‘ah hazot bekhal hameqomot hanish’arim ’asher hidakhtim sham ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
jeremiah 8:4	ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh hayipelu velo yaqumu ’im yashuw velo yashuw. 
jeremiah 8:5	madua‘ showwah ha‘am hazeh yerushalim meshuwah nitsakhat hekheziqu batarmit mei’anu lashuw. 
jeremiah 8:6	hiqshawti va’eshma‘ lo khen yedabeiru ’en ’ish nikham ‘al ra‘ato leimor meh ‘asiti kuloh w bimrutsotam bimrutsatam kesus shotef bamilkhamah. 
jeremiah 8:7	gam khasidah washamayim yade‘ah mo‘adeha vetor vesus vesis ve‘agur shameru ’et ‘et bo’anah ve‘ami lo yade‘u ’et mishpat yhoh. 
jeremiah 8:8	’eikhah tomeru khakhamim ’anakhnu vetorat yhoh ’itanu ’akhen hineh lasheqer ‘asah ‘et sheqer soferim. 
jeremiah 8:9	howishu khakhamim khatu vayilakheidu hineh widwar yhoh ma’asu vekhakhemat meh lahem. 
jeremiah 8:10	lakhen ’eten ’et nesheihem la’akheirim sedoteihem leyorshim ki miqaton ve‘ad gadol kuloh botseia‘ batsa‘ minawi ve‘ad kohen kuloh ‘oseh shaqer. 
jeremiah 8:11	vayrapu ’et shewer bat ‘ami ‘al neqalah leimor shalom shalom ve’en shalom. 
jeremiah 8:12	howishu ki to‘eiwah ‘asu gam bosh lo yeiwoshu vehikalem lo yada‘u lakhen yipelu wanofelim be‘et pequdatam yikashelu ’amar yhoh. 
jeremiah 8:13	’asof ’asifem ne’um yhoh ’en ‘anawim bagefen ve’en te’einim bate’einah vehe‘aleh nawel va’eten lahem ya‘awrum. 
jeremiah 8:14	‘al mah ’anakhnu yoshewim hei’asefu venawo ’el ‘arei hamiwtsar venidemah sham ki yhoh ’eloheinu hadimanu vayashqeinu mei rosh ki khatanu yhoh. 
jeremiah 8:15	qaveh leshalom ve’en tow le‘et marpeh vehineh we‘atah. 
jeremiah 8:16	midan nishma‘ nakhrat susav miqol mitshalot ’abirav ra‘ashah kal ha’arets vayawo’u vayokhelu ’erets umelo’ah ‘ir veyoshewei wah. 
jeremiah 8:17	ki hini meshaleiakh bakhem nekhashim tsif‘onim ’asher ’en lahem lakhash venishekhu ’etkhem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 8:18	mawligiti ‘alei yagon ‘alai libi davai. 
jeremiah 8:19	hineh qol shav‘at bat ‘ami mei’erets markhaqim yhoh ’en betsiyon ’im malkah ’en bah madua‘ hikh‘isuni bifsileihem behawlei neikhar. 
jeremiah 8:20	‘awar qatsir kalah qayits va’anakhnu lo nosha‘enu. 
jeremiah 8:21	‘al shewer bat ‘ami hashebareti qadarti shamah hekheziqateni. 
jeremiah 8:22	hatsori ’en begil‘ad ’im rofei ’en sham ki madua‘ lo ‘aletah ’arukhat bat ‘ami. 
jeremiah 9:1	mi yiten roshi mayim ve‘eini meqor dim‘ah ve’ewkeh yomam valaylah ’et khalei wat ‘ami. 
jeremiah 9:2	mi yiteneini wamidbar melon ’orekhim ve’e‘ezwah ’et ‘ami ve’eilekhah mei’itam ki khulam mena’afim ‘atseret bogedim. 
jeremiah 9:3	vayadrekhu ’et leshonam qashtam sheqer velo le’emunah gaweru wa’arets ki meira‘ah ’el ra‘ah yatsa’u ve’oti lo yada‘u ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 9:4	’ish meirei‘eihu hishameiru ve‘al kal ’akh ’al tiwtakhu ki khal ’akh ‘aqow ya‘qow vekhal reia‘ rakhil yahalokh. 
jeremiah 9:5	ve’ish berei‘eihu yehatelu ve’emet lo yedabeiru limedu leshonam daber sheqer ha‘aveh nil’u. 
jeremiah 9:6	shiwtekha betokh mirmah bemirmah mei’anu da‘at ’oti ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 9:7	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot hini tsorfam uwekhantim ki ’ekh ’e‘eseh mipenei bat ‘ami. 
jeremiah 9:8	khets shokhet shakhut leshonam mirmah diber befiv shalom ’et rei‘eihu yedaber uweqirbo yasim ’arebo. 
jeremiah 9:9	ha‘al ’eleh lo ’efqad bam ne’um yhoh ’im bego ’asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. 
jeremiah 9:10	‘al heharim ’esa wekhi vanehi ve‘al ne’ot midbar qinah ki nitsetu mibeli ’ish ‘ower velo shame‘u qol miqneh mei‘of hashamayim ve‘ad beheimah nadedu halakhu. 
jeremiah 9:11	venatati ’et yerushalim legalim me‘on tanim ve’et ‘arei yehudah ’eten shemamah mibeli yoshew. 
jeremiah 9:12	mi ha’ish hekhakham veyawen ’et zot va’asher diber pi yhoh ’eilav veyagidah ‘al mah ’awedah ha’arets nitsetah khamidbar mibeli ‘ower. 
jeremiah 9:13	vayomer yhoh ‘al ‘azewam ’et torati ’asher natati lifneihem velo shame‘u weqoli velo halekhu wah. 
jeremiah 9:14	vayeilekhu ’akharei sherirut libam ve’akharei habe‘alim ’asher limedum ’awotam. 
jeremiah 9:15	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el hini ma’akhilam ’et ha‘am hazeh la‘anah vehishqitim mei rosh. 
jeremiah 9:16	vahafitsotim bagoyim ’asher lo yade‘u hemah va’awotam veshilakhti ’akhareihem ’et hakherew ‘ad kaloti ’otam. 
jeremiah 9:17	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot hitbonu veqir’u lamqonot utewo’enah ve’el hakhakhamot shilkhu vetawonah. 
jeremiah 9:18	utemaheirenah vetisenah ‘aleinu nehi veteiradnah ‘eineinu dim‘ah ve‘af‘apeinu yizelu mayim. 
jeremiah 9:19	ki qol nehi nishma‘ mitsiyon ’ekh shudadenu boshenu me’od ki ‘azawnu ’arets ki hishlikhu mishkenoteinu. 
jeremiah 9:20	ki shema‘nah nashim dewar yhoh vetiqakh ’azenekhem dewar piv velameidenah wenoteikhem nehi ve’ishah re‘utah qinah. 
jeremiah 9:21	ki ‘alah mavet bekhaloneinu ba be’armenoteinu lehakhrit ‘olal mikhuts bakhurim meirekhowot. 
jeremiah 9:22	daber koh ne’um yhoh venafelah niwlat ha’adam kedomen ‘al penei hasadeh ukhe‘amir mei’akharei haqotser ve’en me’asef. 
jeremiah 9:23	koh ’amar yhoh ’al yithalel khakham bekhakhemato ve’al yithalel hagibor bigwurato ’al yithalel ‘ashir be‘ashero. 
jeremiah 9:24	ki ’im bezot yithalel hamithalel haskel veyadoa‘ ’oti ki ’ani yhoh ‘oseh khesed mishpat utsedaqah ba’arets ki we’eleh khafatsti ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 9:25	hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh ufaqadti ‘al kal mul be‘arelah. 
jeremiah 9:26	‘al mitsrayim ve‘al yehudah ve‘al ’edom ve‘al benei ‘amon ve‘al mo’aw ve‘al kal qetsutsei fei’ah hayoshewim bamidbar ki khal hagoyim ‘areilim vekhal bet yisra’el ‘arlei lew. 
jeremiah 10:1	shim‘u ’et hadawar ’asher diber yhoh ‘aleikhem bet yisra’el. 
jeremiah 10:2	koh ’amar yhoh ’el derekh hagoyim ’al tilmadu umei’otot hashamayim ’al teikhatu ki yeikhatu hagoyim meihemah. 
jeremiah 10:3	ki khuqot ha‘amim hewel hu ki ‘ets miya‘ar kerato ma‘aseh yedei kharash bama‘atsad. 
jeremiah 10:4	bekhesef uwezahaw yeyapeihu bemasmerot uwemaqawot yekhazequm velo yafiq. 
jeremiah 10:5	ketomer miqshah hemah velo yedabeiru naso yinasu ki lo yits‘adu ’al tire’u meihem ki lo yarei‘u vegam heitew ’en ’otam. 
jeremiah 10:6	mei’en kamokha yhoh gadol ’atah vegadol shimkha bigwurah. 
jeremiah 10:7	mi lo yira’akha melekh hagoyim ki lekha ya’atah ki wekhal khakhmei hagoyim uwekhal malkhutam mei’en kamokha. 
jeremiah 10:8	uwe’akhat yiw‘aru veyikhsalu musar hawalim ‘ets hu. 
jeremiah 10:9	kesef meruqa‘ mitarshish yuwa vezahaw mei’ufaz ma‘aseh kharash videi tsoref tekheilet ve’argaman lewusham ma‘aseh khakhamim kulam. 
jeremiah 10:10	yhoh ’elohim ’emet hu ’elohim khayim umelekh ‘olam miqitspo tir‘ash ha’arets velo yakhilu goyim za‘mo. 
jeremiah 10:11	kidnah teimerun lehom ’elahaya di shemaya ve’arqa la ‘awadu yeiwadu mei’ar‘a umin tekhot shemaya ’eleh. 
jeremiah 10:12	‘oseh ’erets bekhokho meikhin teiwel bekhakhemato uwitwunato natah shamayim. 
jeremiah 10:13	leqol tito hamon mayim bashamayim vaya‘aleh nesi’im miqtseh ’erets ha’arets beraqim lamatar ‘asah vayotsei ruakh mei’otserotav. 
jeremiah 10:14	niw‘ar kal ’adam mida‘at howish kal tsoref mipasel ki sheqer nisko velo ruakh bam. 
jeremiah 10:15	hewel hemah ma‘aseh ta‘tu‘im be‘et pequdatam yoweidu. 
jeremiah 10:16	lo khe’eleh kheileq ya‘aqow ki yotser hakol hu veyisra’el sheiwet nakhalato yhoh tsewa’ot shemo. 
jeremiah 10:17	’ispi mei’erets kin‘atekh yoshawti yoshewet bamatsor. 
jeremiah 10:18	ki khoh ’amar yhoh hini qoleia‘ ’et yoshewei ha’arets bapa‘am hazot vahatseiroti lahem lema‘an yimtsa’u. 
jeremiah 10:19	’o li ‘al shiwri nakhlah makati va’ani ’amarti ’akh zeh kholi ve’esa’enu. 
jeremiah 10:20	’aholi shudad vekhal meitarai nitaqu banai yetsa’uni ve’einam ’en noteh ‘od ’aholi umeiqim yeri‘otai. 
jeremiah 10:21	ki niw‘aru haro‘im ve’et yhoh lo darashu ‘al ken lo hiskilu vekhal mar‘itam nafotsah. 
jeremiah 10:22	qol shemu‘ah hineh wa’ah vera‘ash gadol mei’erets tsafon lasum ’et ‘arei yehudah shemamah me‘on tanim. 
jeremiah 10:23	yada‘ti yhoh ki lo la’adam darko lo le’ish holekh vehakhin ’et tsa‘ado. 
jeremiah 10:24	yasereini yhoh ’akh bemishpat ’al be’apekha pen tam‘iteini. 
jeremiah 10:25	shefokh khamatekha ‘al hagoyim ’asher lo yeda‘ukha ve‘al mishpakhot ’asher beshimkha lo qara’u ki ’akhelu ’et ya‘aqow va’akhaluhu vaykhaluhu ve’et naveihu heishamu. 
jeremiah 11:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 11:2	shim‘u ’et diwrei haberit hazot vedibartam ’el ’ish yehudah ve‘al yoshewei yerushalim. 
jeremiah 11:3	ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’arur ha’ish ’asher lo yishma‘ ’et diwrei haberit hazot. 
jeremiah 11:4	’asher tsiviti ’et ’awoteikhem beyom hotsi’i ’otam mei’erets mitsrayim mikur habarzel leimor shim‘u weqoli va‘asitem ’otam kekhol ’asher ’atsaveh ’etkhem vihyitem li le‘am ve’anokhi ’ehyeh lakhem leilohim. 
jeremiah 11:5	lema‘an haqim ’et hashewu‘ah ’asher nishba‘ti la’awoteikhem latet lahem ’erets zawat khalaw udewash kayom hazeh va’a‘an va’omar ’amen yhoh. 
jeremiah 11:6	vayomer yhoh ’eilai qera ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh be‘arei yehudah uwekhutsot yerushalim leimor shim‘u ’et diwrei haberit hazot va‘asitem ’otam. 
jeremiah 11:7	ki ha‘ed ha‘idoti ba’awoteikhem beyom ha‘aloti ’otam mei’erets mitsrayim ve‘ad hayom hazeh hashkem veha‘ed leimor shim‘u beqoli. 
jeremiah 11:8	velo shame‘u velo hitu ’et ’azenam vayeilekhu ’ish bishrirut libam hara‘ va’awi ‘aleihem ’et kal diwrei haberit hazot ’asher tsiviti la‘asot velo ‘asu. 
jeremiah 11:9	vayomer yhoh ’eilai nimtsa qesher be’ish yehudah uweyoshewei yerushalim. 
jeremiah 11:10	shawu ‘al ‘avonot ’awotam harishonim ’asher mei’anu lishmoa‘ ’et dewarai vehemah halekhu ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim le‘awedam heifeiru wet yisra’el uwet yehudah ’et beriti ’asher karati ’et ’awotam. 
jeremiah 11:11	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh hini meiwi ’aleihem ra‘ah ’asher lo yukhelu latset mimenah veza‘aqu ’eilai velo ’eshma‘ ’aleihem. 
jeremiah 11:12	vehalekhu ‘arei yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim veza‘aqu ’el ha’elohim ’asher hem meqaterim lahem vehosheia‘ lo yoshi‘u lahem be‘et ra‘atam. 
jeremiah 11:13	ki mispar ‘arekha hayu ’elohekha yehudah umispar khutsot yerushalim samtem mizbekhot laboshet mizbekhot leqater laba‘al. 
jeremiah 11:14	ve’atah ’al titpalel be‘ad ha‘am hazeh ve’al tisa wa‘adam rinah utefilah ki ’eineni shomeia‘ be‘et qare’am ’eilai be‘ad ra‘atam. 
jeremiah 11:15	meh lididi beweiti ‘asotah hamzimatah harabim uwesar qodesh ya‘awru mei‘alayikh ki ra‘ateikhi ’az ta‘alozi. 
jeremiah 11:16	zayit ra‘anan yefeh feri to’ar qara yhoh shemekh leqol hamulah gedolah hitsit ’esh ‘aleha vera‘u daliyotav. 
jeremiah 11:17	yhoh tsewa’ot hanoteia‘ ’otakh diber ‘alayikh ra‘ah biglal ra‘at bet yisra’el uwet yehudah ’asher ‘asu lahem lehakh‘iseini leqater laba‘al. 
jeremiah 11:18	yhoh hodi‘ani va’eida‘ah ’az hir’itani ma‘aleihem. 
jeremiah 11:19	va’ani kekhewes ’aluf yuwal litwoakh velo yada‘ti ki ‘alai khashewu makhashawot nashkhitah ‘ets belakhmo venikhretenu mei’erets khayim ushemo lo yizakher ‘od. 
jeremiah 11:20	yhoh tsewa’ot shofet tsedeq bokhen kelayot valew ’er’eh niqmatekha meihem ki ’eilekha giliti ’et riwi. 
jeremiah 11:21	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ‘al ’anshei ‘anatot hamwaqshim ’et nafshekha leimor lo tinawei beshem yhoh velo tamut beyadeinu. 
jeremiah 11:22	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot hini foqed ‘aleihem habakhurim yamutu wakherew beneihem uwenoteihem yamutu bara‘aw. 
jeremiah 11:23	ushe’eirit lo tihyeh lahem ki ’awi ra‘ah ’el ’anshei ‘anatot shenat pequdatam. 
jeremiah 12:1	tsadiq ’atah yhoh ki ’ariw ’eilekha ’akh mishpatim ’adaber ’otakh madua‘ derekh resha‘im tsaleikhah shalu kal bogedei waged. 
jeremiah 12:2	neta‘tam gam shorashu yeilekhu gam ‘asu feri qarow ’atah befihem verakhoq mikilyoteihem. 
jeremiah 12:3	ve’atah yhoh yeda‘tani tir’eini uwakhanta libi ’itakh hatiqem ketson letiwkhah vehaqdishem leyom hareigah. 
jeremiah 12:4	‘ad matai te’ewal ha’arets ve‘eisew kal hasadeh yiwash meira‘at yoshewei wah safetah weheimot va‘of ki ’ameru lo yir’eh ’et ’akhariteinu. 
jeremiah 12:5	ki ’et raglim ratstah vayal’ukha ve’ekh tetakhareh ’et hasusim uwe’erets shalom ’atah woteiakh ve’ekh ta‘aseh big’on hayarden. 
jeremiah 12:6	ki gam ’akhekha uwet ’awikha gam hemah bagedu wakh gam hemah qare’u ’akharekha malei ’al ta’amen bam ki yedaberu ’eilekha towot. 
jeremiah 12:7	‘azawti ’et beiti natashti ’et nakhalati natati ’et yedidut nafshi bekhaf ’oyeweha. 
jeremiah 12:8	hayetah li nakhalati ke’aryeh waya‘ar natenah ‘alai beqolah ‘al ken seneitiha. 
jeremiah 12:9	ha‘ayit tsawua‘ nakhalati li ha‘ayit sawiw ‘aleha lekhu ’isfu kal khayat hasadeh heitayu le’akhlah 
jeremiah 12:10	ro‘im rabim shikhatu kharmi bosesu ’et khelqati natenu ’et khelqat khemdati lemidbar shemamah. 
jeremiah 12:11	samah lishmamah ’awelah ‘alai shemeimah nashamah kal ha’arets ki ’en ’ish sam ‘al lew. 
jeremiah 12:12	‘al kal shefayim bamidbar ba’u shodedim ki kherew yhoh ’okhelah miqtseh ’erets ve‘ad qetseh ha’arets ’en shalom lekhal basar. 
jeremiah 12:13	zare‘u khitim veqotsim qatsaru nekhlu lo yo‘ilu uwoshu mitewu’oteikhem meikharon ’af yhoh. 
jeremiah 12:14	koh ’amar yhoh ‘al kal shekheinai hara‘im hanoge‘im banakhalah ’asher hinkhalti ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’el hini notesham mei‘al ’admatam ve’et bet yehudah ’etosh mitokham. 
jeremiah 12:15	vehayah ’akharei nateshi ’otam ’ashuw verikhamtim vahashiwotim ’ish lenakhalato ve’ish le’artso. 
jeremiah 12:16	vehayah ’im lamod yilmedu ’et darkhei ‘ami lehishaweia‘ bishmi khai yhoh ka’asher limedu ’et ‘ami lehishaweia‘ baba‘al veniwnu betokh ‘ami. 
jeremiah 12:17	ve’im lo yishma‘u venatashti ’et hago hahu natosh ve’abed ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 13:1	koh ’amar yhoh ’eilai halokh veqanita lekha ’eizor pishtim vesamto ‘al matenekha uwamayim lo tewi’eihu. 
jeremiah 13:2	va’eqneh ’et ha’eizor kidwar yhoh va’asim ‘al matenai. 
jeremiah 13:3	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai sheinit leimor. 
jeremiah 13:4	qakh ’et ha’eizor ’asher qanita ’asher ‘al matenekha vequm lekh peratah vetameneihu sham binqiq hasala‘. 
jeremiah 13:5	va’eilekh va’etmeneihu bifrat ka’asher tsivah yhoh ’oti. 
jeremiah 13:6	vayhi miqets yamim rabim vayomer yhoh ’eilai qum lekh peratah veqakh misham ’et ha’eizor ’asher tsivitikha letameno sham. 
jeremiah 13:7	va’eilekh peratah va’ekhpor va’eqakh ’et ha’eizor min hamaqom ’asher temantiv shamah vehineh nishkhat ha’eizor lo yitslakh lakol. 
jeremiah 13:8	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
jeremiah 13:9	koh ’amar yhoh kakhah ’ashkhit ’et ge’on yehudah ve’et ge’on yerushalim haraw. 
jeremiah 13:10	ha‘am hazeh hara‘ hamei’anim lishmoa‘ ’et dewarai haholekhim bishrirut libam vayeilekhu ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim le‘awedam ulehishtakhavot lahem vihi ka’eizor hazeh ’asher lo yitslakh lakol. 
jeremiah 13:11	ki ka’asher yidbaq ha’eizor ’el matenei ’ish ken hidbaqti ’eilai ’et kal bet yisra’el ve’et kal bet yehudah ne’um yhoh lihyot li le‘am uleshem velithilah uletif’aret velo shamei‘u. 
jeremiah 13:12	ve’amarta ’aleihem ’et hadawar hazeh koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el kal neiwel yimalei yayin ve’ameru ’eilekha hayadoa‘ lo neida‘ ki khal neiwel yimalei yayin. 
jeremiah 13:13	ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh hini memalei ’et kal yoshewei ha’arets hazot ve’et hamelakhim hayoshewim ledavid ‘al kis’o ve’et hakohanim ve’et hanewi’im ve’et kal yoshewei yerushalim shikaron. 
jeremiah 13:14	venipatstim ’ish ’el ’akhiv veha’awot vehabanim yakhdav ne’um yhoh lo ’ekhmol velo ’akhus velo ’arakhem meihashkhitam. 
jeremiah 13:15	shim‘u veha’azinu ’al tigbahu ki yhoh diber. 
jeremiah 13:16	tenu yhoh ’eloheikhem kawod beterem yakhshikh uweterem yitnagefu ragleikhem ‘al harei nashef veqivitem le’or vesamah letsalmavet yashit veshit la‘arafel. 
jeremiah 13:17	ve’im lo tishma‘uha bemistarim tiwkeh nafshi mipenei geivah vedamoa‘ tidma‘ veteirad ‘eini dim‘ah ki nishbah ‘eider yhoh. 
jeremiah 13:18	’emor lamelekh velagewirah hashpilu sheiwu ki yarad mar’ashoteikhem ‘ateret tif’artekhem. 
jeremiah 13:19	‘arei hanegew sugeru ve’en poteiakh hagelat yehudah kulah hagelat shelomim. 
jeremiah 13:20	se’i se’u ‘eineikhem ure’i ure’u haba’im mitsafon ’ayeh ha‘eider nitan lakh tson tif’artekh. 
jeremiah 13:21	mah tomeri ki yifqod ‘alayikh ve’at limadt ’otam ‘alayikh ’alufim lerosh halo khawalim yokhezukh kemo ’eishet leidah. 
jeremiah 13:22	vekhi tomeri bilwawekh madua‘ qera’uni ’eleh berow ‘avonekh niglu shulayikh nekhmesu ‘aqeiwayikh. 
jeremiah 13:23	hayahafokh kushi ‘oro venamer khawarburotav gam ’atem tukhelu leheitiw limudei hareia‘. 
jeremiah 13:24	va’afitsem keqash ‘ower leruakh midbar. 
jeremiah 13:25	zeh goralekh menat midayikh mei’iti ne’um yhoh ’asher shakhakhat ’oti vatiwtekhi bashaqer. 
jeremiah 13:26	vegam ’ani khasafti shulayikh ‘al panayikh venir’ah qelonekh. 
jeremiah 13:27	ni’ufayikh umitshalotayikh zimat zenutekh ‘al gewa‘ot basadeh ra’iti shiqutsayikh ’o lakh yerushalim lo tithari ’akharei matai ‘od. 
jeremiah 14:1	’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu ‘al diwrei habatsarot. 
jeremiah 14:2	’awelah yehudah ushe‘areha ’umlelu qaderu la’arets vetsivkhat yerushalim ‘alatah. 
jeremiah 14:3	ve’adireihem shalekhu tse‘oreihem tse‘ireihem lamayim ba’u ‘al geiwim lo matse’u mayim shawu kheleihem reiqam boshu vehakhelemu vekhafu rosham. 
jeremiah 14:4	ba‘awur ha’adamah khatah ki lo hayah geshem ba’arets boshu ’ikarim khafu rosham. 
jeremiah 14:5	ki gam ’ayelet basadeh yaledah ve‘azow ki lo hayah deshe. 
jeremiah 14:6	ufera’im ‘amedu ‘al shefayim sha’afu ruakh katanim kalu ‘eineihem ki ’en ‘eisew. 
jeremiah 14:7	’im ‘avoneinu ‘anu wanu yhoh ‘aseh lema‘an shemekha ki rabu meshuwoteinu lekha khatanu. 
jeremiah 14:8	miqveh yisra’el moshi‘o be‘et tsarah lamah tihyeh keger ba’arets ukhe’oreiakh natah lalun. 
jeremiah 14:9	lamah tihyeh ke’ish nidham kegibor lo yukhal lehoshia‘ ve’atah weqirbeinu yhoh veshimkha ‘aleinu niqra ’al tanikheinu. 
jeremiah 14:10	koh ’amar yhoh la‘am hazeh ken ’ahawu lanua‘ ragleihem lo khasakhu yhoh lo ratsam ‘atah yizkor ‘avonam veyifqod khatotam. 
jeremiah 14:11	vayomer yhoh ’eilai ’al titpalel be‘ad ha‘am hazeh letowah. 
jeremiah 14:12	ki yatsumu ’eineni shomeia‘ ’el rinatam vekhi ya‘alu ‘olah uminkhah ’eineni rotsam ki bakherew uwara‘aw uwadewer ’anokhi mekhaleh ’otam. 
jeremiah 14:13	va’omar ’ahah ’adonai yhoh hineh hanewi’im ’omerim lahem lo tir’u kherew vera‘aw lo yihyeh lakhem ki shelom ’emet ’eten lakhem bamaqom hazeh. 
jeremiah 14:14	vayomer yhoh ’eilai qer hanewi’im nibe’im bishmi lo shelakhtim velo tsivitim velo dibarti ’aleihem khazon sheqer veqesem ve’elul ve’elil vetarmut vetarmit libam hemah mitnabe’im lakhem. 
jeremiah 14:15	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ‘al hanewi’im hanibe’im bishmi va’ani lo shelakhtim vehemah ’omerim kherew vera‘aw lo yihyeh ba’arets hazot bakherew uwara‘aw yitamu hanewi’im hahemah. 
jeremiah 14:16	veha‘am ’asher hemah nibe’im lahem yihyu mushlakhim bekhutsot yerushalim mipenei hara‘aw vehakherew ve’en meqaber lahemah hemah nesheihem uweneihem uwenoteihem veshafakhti ‘aleihem ’et ra‘atam. 
jeremiah 14:17	ve’amarta ’aleihem ’et hadawar hazeh teiradnah ‘einai dim‘ah laylah veyomam ve’al tidmenah ki shewer gadol nishberah betulat bat ‘ami makah nakhlah me’od. 
jeremiah 14:18	’im yatsati hasadeh vehineh khalei kherew ve’im bati ha‘ir vehineh takhalu’ei ra‘aw ki gam nawi gam kohen sakharu ’el ’erets velo yada‘u. 
jeremiah 14:19	hama’os ma’asta ’et yehudah ’im betsiyon ga‘alah nafshekha madua‘ hikitanu ve’en lanu marpei qaveh leshalom ve’en tow ule‘et marpei vehineh we‘atah. 
jeremiah 14:20	yada‘nu yhoh rish‘einu ‘avon ’awoteinu ki khatanu lakh. 
jeremiah 14:21	’al tin’ats lema‘an shimkha ’al tenabel kisei khewodekha zekhor ’al tafer beritekha ’itanu. 
jeremiah 14:22	hayesh behawlei hagoyim magshimim ve’im hashamayim yitenu rewiwim halo ’atah hu yhoh ’eloheinu uneqaveh lakh ki ’atah ‘asita ’et kal ’eleh. 
jeremiah 15:1	vayomer yhoh ’eilai ’im ya‘amod mosheh ushemu’el lefanai ’en nafshi ’el ha‘am hazeh shalakh mei‘al panai veyeitsei’u. 
jeremiah 15:2	vehayah ki yomeru ’eilekha ’anah neitsei ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh ’asher lamavet lamavet va’asher lakherew lakherew va’asher lara‘aw lara‘aw va’asher lashewi lashewi. 
jeremiah 15:3	ufaqadti ‘aleihem ’arba‘ mishpakhot ne’um yhoh ’et hakherew laharog ve’et hakelawim liskhow ve’et ‘of hashamayim ve’et behemat ha’arets le’ekhol ulehashkhit. 
jeremiah 15:4	unetatim lizva‘ah leza‘avah lekhol mamlekhot ha’arets biglal menasheh wen yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah ‘al ’asher ‘asah birushalim. 
jeremiah 15:5	ki mi yakhmol ‘alayikh yerushalim umi yanud lakh umi yasur lish’ol leshalom lakh. 
jeremiah 15:6	’at natasht ’oti ne’um yhoh ’akhor teileikhi va’at ’et yadi ‘alayikh va’ashkhitekh nil’eiti hinakhem. 
jeremiah 15:7	va’ezrem bemizreh besha‘arei ha’arets shikalti ’ibadti ’et ‘ami midarkheihem lo shawu. 
jeremiah 15:8	‘atsemu li ’almenotav meikhol yamim heiweiti lahem ‘al ’em bakhur shoded batsahorayim hipalti ‘aleha pit’om ‘ir uwehalot. 
jeremiah 15:9	’umlelah yoledet hashiw‘ah nafekhah nafshah ba’ah ba shimshah be‘od yomam boshah vekhafeirah ushe’eiritam lakherew ’eten lifnei ’oyeweihem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 15:10	’o li ’imi ki yelidtini ’ish riw ve’ish madon lekhal ha’arets lo nashiti velo nashu wi kuloh meqalavni. 
jeremiah 15:11	’amar yhoh ’im lo sharotikha sheiritikha letow ’im lo hifga‘ti wekha be‘et ra‘ah uwe‘et tsarah ’et ha’oyew. 
jeremiah 15:12	hayaroa‘ barzel barzel mitsafon unekhoshet. 
jeremiah 15:13	kheilekha ve’otsrotekha lawaz ’eten lo wimkhir uwekhal khatotekha uwekhal gewulekha. 
jeremiah 15:14	veha‘awarti ’et ’oyewekha be’erets lo yada‘eta ki ’esh qadekhah we’api ‘aleikhem tuqad. 
jeremiah 15:15	’atah yada‘ta yhoh zakhereini ufaqedeini vehinaqem li meirodefai ’al le’erekh ’apekha tiqakheini da‘ se’eiti ‘alekha kherpah. 
jeremiah 15:16	nimtse’u dewarekha va’okhelem vayhi dewarekha dewarekha li lesason ulesimkhat lewawi ki niqra shimkha ‘alai yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot. 
jeremiah 15:17	lo yashawti wesod mesakhaqim va’e‘loz mipenei yadekha badad yashawti ki za‘am mileitani. 
jeremiah 15:18	lamah hayah khe’eiwi netsakh umakati ’anushah mei’anah heirafei hayo tihyeh li kemo ’akhzaw mayim lo ne’emanu. 
jeremiah 15:19	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’im tashuw va’ashiwekha lefanai ta‘amod ve’im totsi yaqar mizolel kefi tihyeh yashuwu hemah ’eilekha ve’atah lo tashuw ’aleihem. 
jeremiah 15:20	unetatikha la‘am hazeh lekhomat nekhoshet betsurah venilkhamu ’eilekha velo yukhelu lakh ki ’itekha ’ani lehoshi‘akha ulehatsilekha ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 15:21	vehitsaltikha miyad ra‘im ufeditikha mikaf ‘aritsim. 
jeremiah 16:1	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
jeremiah 16:2	lo tiqakh lekha ’ishah velo yihyu lekha banim uwanot bamaqom hazeh. 
jeremiah 16:3	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ‘al habanim ve‘al habanot hayilodim bamaqom hazeh ve‘al ’imotam hayoledot ’otam ve‘al ’awotam hamolidim ’otam ba’arets hazot. 
jeremiah 16:4	memotei takhalu’im yamutu lo yisafedu velo yiqaweiru ledomen ‘al penei ha’adamah yihyu uwakherew uwara‘aw yikhlu vehayetah niwlatam lema’akhal le‘of hashamayim ulewehemat ha’arets. 
jeremiah 16:5	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’al tawo bet marzeiakh ve’al teilekh lispod ve’al tanod lahem ki ’asafti ’et shelomi mei’et ha‘am hazeh ne’um yhoh ’et hakhesed ve’et harakhamim. 
jeremiah 16:6	umeitu gedolim uqetanim ba’arets hazot lo yiqaweiru velo yispedu lahem velo yitgodad velo yiqareiakh lahem. 
jeremiah 16:7	velo yifresu lahem ‘al ’eiwel lenakhamo ‘al met velo yashqu ’otam kos tankhumim ‘al ’awiv ve‘al ’imo. 
jeremiah 16:8	uwet mishteh lo tawo lashewet ’otam le’ekhol velishtot. 
jeremiah 16:9	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el hini mashbit min hamaqom hazeh le‘eineikhem uwimeikhem qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah. 
jeremiah 16:10	vehayah ki tagid la‘am hazeh ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh ve’ameru ’eilekha ‘al meh diber yhoh ‘aleinu ’et kal hara‘ah hagedolah hazot umeh ‘avoneinu umeh khatateinu ’asher khatanu yhoh ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 16:11	ve’amarta ’aleihem ‘al ’asher ‘azewu ’awoteikhem ’oti ne’um yhoh vayeilekhu ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim vaya‘awdum vayishtakhavu lahem ve’oti ‘azawu ve’et torati lo shamaru. 
jeremiah 16:12	ve’atem harei‘otem la‘asot mei’awoteikhem vehinekhem holekhim ’ish ’akharei sherirut libo hara‘ lewilti shemoa‘ ’eilai. 
jeremiah 16:13	veheitalti ’etkhem mei‘al ha’arets hazot ‘al ha’arets ’asher lo yeda‘tem ’atem va’awoteikhem va‘awadtem sham ’et ’elohim ’akheirim yomam valaylah ’asher lo ’eten lakhem khaninah. 
jeremiah 16:14	lakhen hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh velo yei’amer ‘od khai yhoh ’asher he‘elah ’et benei yisra’el mei’erets mitsrayim. 
jeremiah 16:15	ki ’im khai yhoh ’asher he‘elah ’et benei yisra’el mei’erets tsafon umikol ha’aratsot ’asher hidikham shamah vahashiwotim ‘al ’admatam ’asher natati la’awotam. 
jeremiah 16:16	hini sholeiakh ledavagim ledayagim rabim ne’um yhoh vedigum ve’akharei khen ’eshlakh lerabim tsayadim vetsadum mei‘al kal har umei‘al kal giw‘ah umineqiqei hasela‘im. 
jeremiah 16:17	ki ‘einai ‘al kal darkheihem lo nisteru milefanai velo nitspan ‘avonam mineged ‘einai. 
jeremiah 16:18	veshilamti rishonah mishneh ‘avonam vekhatatam ‘al khalelam ’et ’artsi beniwlat shiqutseihem veto‘awoteihem male’u ’et nakhalati. 
jeremiah 16:19	yhoh ‘uzi uma‘uzi umenusi beyom tsarah ’eilekha goyim yawo’u mei’afsei ’arets veyomeru ’akh sheqer nakhalu ’awoteinu hewel ve’en bam mo‘il. 
jeremiah 16:20	haya‘aseh lo ’adam ’elohim vehemah lo ’elohim. 
jeremiah 16:21	lakhen hini modi‘am bapa‘am hazot ’odi‘em ’et yadi ve’et gewurati veyade‘u ki shemi yhoh. 
jeremiah 17:1	khatat yehudah ketuwah be‘et barzel betsiporen shamir kharushah ‘al luakh libam uleqarnot mizbekhoteikhem. 
jeremiah 17:2	kizkor beneihem mizbekhotam va’asheireihem ‘al ‘ets ra‘anan ‘al gewa‘ot hagewohot. 
jeremiah 17:3	harari basadeh kheilekha khal ’otsrotekha lawaz ’eten bamotekha bekhatat bekhal gewulekha. 
jeremiah 17:4	veshamatah uwekha minakhalatekha ’asher natati lakh veha‘awadtikha ’et ’oyewekha ba’arets ’asher lo yada‘eta ki ’esh qedakhtem be’api ‘ad ‘olam tuqad. 
jeremiah 17:5	koh ’amar yhoh ’arur hagewer ’asher yiwtakh ba’adam vesam basar zero‘o umin yhoh yasur libo. 
jeremiah 17:6	vehayah ke‘ar‘ar ba‘arawah velo yir’eh ki yawo tow veshakhan khareirim bamidbar ’erets meleikhah velo teishew. 
jeremiah 17:7	barukh hagewer ’asher yiwtakh yhoh vehayah yhoh miwtakho. 
jeremiah 17:8	vehayah ke‘ets shatul ‘al mayim ve‘al yuwal yeshalakh sharashav velo yira yir’eh ki yawo khom vehayah ‘aleihu ra‘anan uwishnat batsoret lo yid’ag velo yamish mei‘asot peri. 
jeremiah 17:9	‘aqow halew mikol ve’anush hu mi yeida‘enu. 
jeremiah 17:10	’ani yhoh khoqer lew bokhen kelayot velatet le’ish kedarko kidrakhav kifri ma‘alalav. 
jeremiah 17:11	qorei dagar velo yalad ‘oseh ‘osher velo wemishpat bakhatsi yomo yamav ya‘azwenu uwe’akharito yihyeh nawal. 
jeremiah 17:12	kisei khawod marom meirishon meqom miqdasheinu. 
jeremiah 17:13	miqveh yisra’el yhoh kal ‘ozewekha yeiwoshu yisorai vesurai ba’arets yikateiwu ki ‘azewu meqor mayim khayim ’et yhoh. 
jeremiah 17:14	refa’eini yhoh ve’eirafei hoshi‘eini ve’ivashei‘ah ki tehilati ’atah. 
jeremiah 17:15	hineh hemah ’omerim ’eilai ’ayeh dewar yhoh yawo na. 
jeremiah 17:16	va’ani lo ’atsti meiro‘eh ’akharekha veyom ’anush lo hit’aveiti ’atah yada‘eta motsa sefatai nokhakh panekha hayah. 
jeremiah 17:17	’al tihyeh li limkhitah makhasi ’atah beyom ra‘ah. 
jeremiah 17:18	yeiwoshu rodefai ve’al ’eiwoshah ’ani yeikhatu hemah ve’al ’eikhatah ’ani hawi ‘aleihem yom ra‘ah umishneh shibaron shawerem. 
jeremiah 17:19	koh ’amar yhoh ’eilai halokh ve‘amadta besha‘ar benei ‘am ha‘am ’asher yawo’u wo malkhei yehudah va’asher yeitse’u wo uwekhol sha‘arei yerushalim. 
jeremiah 17:20	ve’amarta ’aleihem shim‘u dewar yhoh malkhei yehudah vekhal yehudah vekhol yoshewei yerushalim haba’im bashe‘arim ha’eleh. 
jeremiah 17:21	koh ’amar yhoh hishameru benafshoteikhem ve’al tis’u masa beyom hashabat vahaweitem besha‘arei yerushalim. 
jeremiah 17:22	velo totsi’u masa mibateikhem beyom hashabat vekhal melakhah lo ta‘asu veqidashtem ’et yom hashabat ka’asher tsiviti ’et ’awoteikhem. 
jeremiah 17:23	velo shame‘u velo hitu ’et ’azenam vayaqshu ’et ‘arepam lewilti shomeia‘ shemoa‘ ulewilti qakhat musar. 
jeremiah 17:24	vehayah ’im shamoa‘ tishme‘un ’eilai ne’um yhoh lewilti hawi masa besha‘arei ha‘ir hazot beyom hashabat uleqadesh ’et yom hashabat lewilti ‘asot boh bo kal melakhah. 
jeremiah 17:25	uwa’u wesha‘arei ha‘ir hazot melakhim vesarim yoshewim ‘al kisei david rokhewim barekhew uwasusim hemah vesareihem ’ish yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim veyashewah ha‘ir hazot le‘olam. 
jeremiah 17:26	uwa’u mei‘arei yehudah umisewiwot yerushalim umei’erets binyamin umin hashefeilah umin hahar umin hanegew mewi’im ‘olah vezewakh uminkhah ulewonah umewi’ei todah bet yhoh. 
jeremiah 17:27	ve’im lo tishme‘u ’eilai leqadesh ’et yom hashabat ulewilti se’et masa uwo besha‘arei yerushalim beyom hashabat vehitsati ’esh bish‘areha ve’akhelah ’armenot yerushalim velo tikhbeh. 
jeremiah 18:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 18:2	qum veyaradta bet hayotser veshamah ’ashmi‘akha ’et dewarai.
