jeremiah 18:3	va’eired bet hayotser vehineihu vehineh hu ‘oseh melakhah ‘al ha’awenayim. 
jeremiah 18:4	venishkhat hakeli ’asher hu ‘oseh bakhomer beyad hayotser veshaw vaya‘aseihu keli ’akher ka’asher yashar be‘einei hayotser la‘asot. 
jeremiah 18:5	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
jeremiah 18:6	hakhayotser hazeh lo ’ukhal la‘asot lakhem bet yisra’el ne’um yhoh hineh khakhomer beyad hayotser ken ’atem beyadi bet yisra’el. 
jeremiah 18:7	rega‘ ’adaber ‘al go ve‘al mamlakhah lintosh velintots uleha’awid. 
jeremiah 18:8	veshaw hago hahu meira‘ato ’asher dibarti ‘alav venikhamti ‘al hara‘ah ’asher khashawti la‘asot lo. 
jeremiah 18:9	verega‘ ’adaber ‘al go ve‘al mamlakhah liwnot velintoa‘. 
jeremiah 18:10	ve‘asah hara‘ah hara‘ be‘einai lewilti shemoa‘ beqoli venikhamti ‘al hatowah ’asher ’amarti leheitiw ’oto. 
jeremiah 18:11	ve‘atah ’emar na ’el ’ish yehudah ve‘al yoshewei yerushalim leimor koh ’amar yhoh hineh ’anokhi yotser ‘aleikhem ra‘ah vekhoshew ‘aleikhem makhashawah shuwu na ’ish midarko hara‘ah veheitiwu darkheikhem uma‘aleikhem. 
jeremiah 18:12	ve’ameru no’ash ki ’akharei makhshewoteinu neilekh ve’ish sherirut libo hara‘ na‘aseh. 
jeremiah 18:13	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh sha’alu na bagoyim mi shama‘ ka’eleh sha‘arurit ‘asetah me’od betulat yisra’el. 
jeremiah 18:14	haya‘azow mitsur sadai sheleg lewanon ’im yinateshu mayim zarim qarim nozlim. 
jeremiah 18:15	ki shekheikhuni ‘ami lashav yeqateiru vayakhshilum bedarkheihem shewilei ‘olam lalekhet netiwot derekh lo selulah. 
jeremiah 18:16	lasum ’artsam leshamah sheruqat sheriqot ‘olam kol ‘ower ‘aleha yishom veyanid berosho. 
jeremiah 18:17	keruakh qadim ’afitsem lifnei ’oyew ‘oref velo fanim ’er’em beyom ’eidam. 
jeremiah 18:18	vayomeru lekhu venakhshewah ‘al yirmeyahu makhashawot ki lo towad torah mikohen ve‘eitsah meikhakham vedawar minawi lekhu venakeihu walashon ve’al naqshiwah ’el kal dewarav. 
jeremiah 18:19	haqshiwah yhoh ’eilai ushema‘ leqol yeriwai. 
jeremiah 18:20	hayshulam takhat towah ra‘ah ki kharu shukhah lenafshi zekhor ‘amedi lefanekha ledaber ‘aleihem towah lehashiw ’et khamatekha meihem. 
jeremiah 18:21	lakhen ten ’et beneihem lara‘aw vehagirem ‘al yedei kherew vetihyenah nesheihem shakulot ve’almanot ve’ansheihem yihyu harugei mavet bakhureihem mukei kherew bamilkhamah. 
jeremiah 18:22	tishama‘ ze‘aqah mibateihem ki tawi ‘aleihem gedud pit’om ki kharu shikhah shukhah lelakhedeini ufakhim tamenu leraglai. 
jeremiah 18:23	ve’atah yhoh yada‘ta ’et kal ‘atsatam ‘alai lamavet ’al tekhaper ‘al ‘avonam vekhatatam milefanekha ’al temkhi vehayu veyihyu mukhshalim lefanekha be‘et ’apekha ‘aseh wahem. 
jeremiah 19:1	koh ’amar yhoh halokh veqanita waqbuq yotser khares umiziqnei ha‘am umiziqnei hakohanim. 
jeremiah 19:2	veyatsata ’el gei wen hinom ’asher petakh sha‘ar hakharasut hakharsit veqarata sham ’et hadewarim ’asher ’adaber ’eilekha. 
jeremiah 19:3	ve’amarta shim‘u dewar yhoh malkhei yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el hini meiwi ra‘ah ‘al hamaqom hazeh ’asher kal shome‘ah titsalnah ’azenav. 
jeremiah 19:4	ya‘an ’asher ‘azawuni vaynakeru ’et hamaqom hazeh vayqateru wo leilohim ’akheirim ’asher lo yeda‘um hemah va’awoteihem umalkhei yehudah umale’u ’et hamaqom hazeh dam neqiyim. 
jeremiah 19:5	uwanu ’et bamot haba‘al lisrof ’et beneihem ba’esh ‘olot laba‘al ’asher lo tsiviti velo dibarti velo ‘aletah ‘al libi. 
jeremiah 19:6	lakhen hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh velo yiqarei lamaqom hazeh ‘od hatofet vegei wen hinom ki ’im gei hahareigah. 
jeremiah 19:7	uwaqoti ’et ‘atsat yehudah virushalim bamaqom hazeh vehipaltim bakherew lifnei ’oyeweihem uweyad mewaqshei nafsham venatati ’et niwlatam lema’akhal le‘of hashamayim ulewehemat ha’arets. 
jeremiah 19:8	vesamti ’et ha‘ir hazot leshamah velishreiqah kol ‘ower ‘aleha yishom veyishroq ‘al kal makoteha. 
jeremiah 19:9	veha’akhaltim ’et besar beneihem ve’et besar benoteihem ve’ish besar rei‘eihu yokheilu bematsor uwematsoq ’asher yatsiqu lahem ’oyeweihem umewaqshei nafsham. 
jeremiah 19:10	veshawarta habaqbuq le‘einei ha’anashim haholekhim ’otakh. 
jeremiah 19:11	ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot kakhah ’eshbor ’et ha‘am hazeh ve’et ha‘ir hazot ka’asher yishbor ’et keli hayotser ’asher lo yukhal leheirafeh ‘od uwetofet yiqberu mei’en maqom liqbor. 
jeremiah 19:12	ken ’e‘eseh lamaqom hazeh ne’um yhoh uleyoshewav velatet ’et ha‘ir hazot ketofet. 
jeremiah 19:13	vehayu batei yerushalim uwatei malkhei yehudah kimqom hatofet hatemei’im lekhol habatim ’asher qiteru ‘al gagoteihem lekhol tsewa hashamayim vehasekh nesakhim leilohim ’akheirim. 
jeremiah 19:14	vayawo yirmeyahu meihatofet ’asher shelakho yhoh sham lehinawei vaya‘amod bakhatsar bet yhoh vayomer ’el kal ha‘am. 
jeremiah 19:15	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el hini meiwi meiwi ’el ha‘ir hazot ve‘al kal ‘areha ’et kal hara‘ah ’asher dibarti ‘aleha ki hiqshu ’et ‘arepam lewilti shemoa‘ ’et dewarai. 
jeremiah 20:1	vayishma‘ pashkhur ben ’imer hakohen vehu faqid nagid bewet yhoh ’et yirmeyahu niba ’et hadewarim ha’eleh. 
jeremiah 20:2	vayakeh fashkhur ’et yirmeyahu hanawi vayiten ’oto ‘al hamahpekhet ’asher besha‘ar binyamin ha‘elyon ’asher bewet yhoh. 
jeremiah 20:3	vayhi mimakhorat vayotsei fashkhur ’et yirmeyahu min hamahpakhet vayomer ’eilav yirmeyahu lo fashkhur qara yhoh shemekha ki ’im magor misawiw. 
jeremiah 20:4	ki khoh ’amar yhoh hini notenkha lemagor lekha ulekhal ’ohawekha venafelu bekherew ’oyeweihem ve‘einekha ro’ot ve’et kal yehudah ’eten beyad melekh bawel vehiglam bawelah vehikam bekharew. 
jeremiah 20:5	venatati ’et kal khosen ha‘ir hazot ve’et kal yegi‘ah ve’et kal yeqarah ve’et kal ’otsrot malkhei yehudah ’eten beyad ’oyeweihem uwezazum uleqakhum vehewi’um bawelah. 
jeremiah 20:6	ve’atah fashkhur vekhol yoshewei weitekha teilekhu bashewi uwawel tawo vesham tamut vesham tiqawer ’atah vekhal ’ohawekha ’asher nibeita lahem bashaqer. 
jeremiah 20:7	pititani yhoh va’epat khazaqtani vatukhal hayiti liskhoq kal hayom kuloh lo‘eg li. 
jeremiah 20:8	ki midei ’adaber ’ez‘aq khamas vashod ’eqra ki hayah dewar yhoh li lekherpah uleqeles kal hayom. 
jeremiah 20:9	ve’amarti lo ’ezkerenu velo ’adaber ‘od bishmo vehayah welibi ke’esh bo‘eret ‘atsur be‘atsmotai venil’eiti kalkhel velo ’ukhal. 
jeremiah 20:10	ki shama‘ti dibat rabim magor misawiw hagidu venagidenu kol ’enosh shelomi shomerei tsal‘i ’ulai yefuteh venukhelah lo veniqkhah niqmateinu mimenu. 
jeremiah 20:11	yhoh ’oti kegibor ‘arits ‘al ken rodefai yikashelu velo yukhalu boshu me’od ki lo hiskilu kelimat ‘olam lo tishakheiakh. 
jeremiah 20:12	yhoh tsewa’ot bokhen tsadiq ro’eh khelayot valew ’er’eh niqmatekha meihem ki ’eilekha giliti ’et riwi. 
jeremiah 20:13	ru yhoh halelu ’et yhoh ki hitsil ’et nefesh ’ewyon miyad merei‘im. 
jeremiah 20:14	’arur hayom ’asher yuladti bo yom ’asher yeladatni ’imi ’al yehi warukh. 
jeremiah 20:15	’arur ha’ish ’asher bisar ’et ’awi leimor yulad lekha ben zakhar sameiakh simokhahu. 
jeremiah 20:16	vehayah ha’ish hahu ke‘arim ’asher hafakh yhoh velo nikham veshama‘ ze‘aqah baboqer uteru‘ah be‘et tsahorayim. 
jeremiah 20:17	’asher lo motani meirakhem vatehi li ’imi qiwri verakhmah harat ‘olam. 
jeremiah 20:18	lamah zeh meirekhem yatsati lir’ot ‘amal veyagon vayikhlu bewoshet yamai. 
jeremiah 21:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh bishloakh ’eilav hamelekh tsidqiyahu ’et pashkhur ben malkiyah ve’et tsefanyah wen ma‘aseiyah hakohen leimor. 
jeremiah 21:2	derash na wa‘adeinu ’et yhoh ki newukhadretsar melekh bawel nilkham ‘aleinu ’ulai ya‘aseh yhoh ’otanu kekhal nifle’otav veya‘aleh mei‘aleinu. 
jeremiah 21:3	vayomer yirmeyahu ’aleihem koh tomerun ’el tsidqiyahu. 
jeremiah 21:4	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hini meisew ’et kelei hamilkhamah ’asher beyedkhem ’asher ’atem nilkhamim bam ’et melekh bawel ve’et hakasdim hatsarim ‘aleikhem mikhuts lakhomah ve’asafti ’otam ’el tokh ha‘ir hazot. 
jeremiah 21:5	venilkhamti ’ani ’itekhem beyad netuyah uwizroa‘ khazaqah uwe’af uwekheimah uweqetsef gadol. 
jeremiah 21:6	vehikeiti ’et yoshewei ha‘ir hazot ve’et ha’adam ve’et habeheimah bedewer gadol yamutu. 
jeremiah 21:7	ve’akharei khen ne’um yhoh ’eten ’et tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve’et ‘awadav ve’et ha‘am ve’et hanish’arim ba‘ir hazot min hadewer min hakherew umin hara‘aw beyad newukhadretsar melekh bawel uweyad ’oyeweihem uweyad mewaqshei nafsham vehikam lefi kherew lo yakhus ‘aleihem velo yakhmol velo yerakhem. 
jeremiah 21:8	ve’el ha‘am hazeh tomar koh ’amar yhoh hini noten lifneikhem ’et derekh hakhayim ve’et derekh hamavet. 
jeremiah 21:9	hayoshew ba‘ir hazot yamut bakherew uwara‘aw uwadawer vehayotsei venafal ‘al hakasdim hatsarim ‘aleikhem yikhyeh vekhayah vehayetah lo nafsho leshalal. 
jeremiah 21:10	ki samti fanai ba‘ir hazot lera‘ah velo letowah ne’um yhoh beyad melekh bawel tinaten userafah ba’esh. 
jeremiah 21:11	ulewet melekh yehudah shim‘u dewar yhoh. 
jeremiah 21:12	bet david koh ’amar yhoh dinu laboqer mishpat vehatsilu gazul miyad ‘osheq pen teitsei kha’esh khamati uwa‘arah ve’en mekhabeh mipenei roa‘ ma‘aleihem ma‘aleikhem. 
jeremiah 21:13	hini ’eilayikh yoshewet ha‘eimeq tsur hamishor ne’um yhoh ha’omerim mi yeikhat ‘aleinu umi yawo bim‘onoteinu. 
jeremiah 21:14	ufaqadti ‘aleikhem kifri ma‘aleikhem ne’um yhoh vehitsati ’esh beya‘rah ve’akhelah kal sewiweha. 
jeremiah 22:1	koh ’amar yhoh red bet melekh yehudah vedibarta sham ’et hadawar hazeh. 
jeremiah 22:2	ve’amarta shema‘ dewar yhoh melekh yehudah hayoshew ‘al kisei david ’atah va‘awadekha ve‘amekha haba’im bashe‘arim ha’eleh. 
jeremiah 22:3	koh ’amar yhoh ‘asu mishpat utsedaqah vehatsilu gazul miyad ‘ashoq veger yatom ve’almanah ’al tonu ’al takhmosu vedam naqi ’al tishpekhu bamaqom hazeh. 
jeremiah 22:4	ki ’im ‘aso ta‘asu ’et hadawar hazeh uwa’u wesha‘arei habayit hazeh melakhim yoshewim ledavid ‘al kis’o rokhewim barekhew uwasusim hu ve‘awdav va‘awadav ve‘amo. 
jeremiah 22:5	ve’im lo tishme‘u ’et hadewarim ha’eleh bi nishba‘ti ne’um yhoh ki lekharebah yihyeh habayit hazeh. 
jeremiah 22:6	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ‘al bet melekh yehudah gil‘ad ’atah li rosh halewanon ’im lo ’ashitekha midbar ‘arim lo noshawah noshawu. 
jeremiah 22:7	veqidashti ‘alekha mashkhitim ’ish vekheilav vekharetu miwkhar ’arazekha vehipilu ‘al ha’esh. 
jeremiah 22:8	ve‘aweru goyim rabim ‘al ha‘ir hazot ve’ameru ’ish ’el rei‘eihu ‘al meh ‘asah yhoh kakhah la‘ir hagedolah hazot. 
jeremiah 22:9	ve’ameru ‘al ’asher ‘azewu ’et berit yhoh ’eloheihem vayishtakhavu leilohim ’akheirim vaya‘awdum. 
jeremiah 22:10	’al tiwku lemet ve’al tanudu lo bekhu wakho laholekh ki lo yashuw ‘od vera’ah ’et ’erets moladto. 
jeremiah 22:11	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’el shalum ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hamolekh takhat yoshiyahu ’awiv ’asher yatsa min hamaqom hazeh lo yashuw sham ‘od. 
jeremiah 22:12	ki bimqom ’asher higlu ’oto sham yamut ve’et ha’arets hazot lo yir’eh ‘od. 
jeremiah 22:13	ho boneh weito belo tsedeq va‘aliyotav belo mishpat berei‘eihu ya‘awod khinam ufo‘alo lo yiten lo. 
jeremiah 22:14	ha’omer ’ewneh li bet midot va‘aliyot meruvakhim veqara‘ lo khalonai vesafun ba’arez umashoakh bashashar. 
jeremiah 22:15	hatimlokh ki ’atah metakhareh wa’arez ’awikha halo ’akhal veshatah ve‘asah mishpat utsedaqah ’az tow lo. 
jeremiah 22:16	dan din ‘ani ve’ewyon ’az tow halo hi hada‘at ’oti ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 22:17	ki ’en ‘einekha velibekha ki ’im ‘al bits‘ekha ve‘al dam hanaqi lishpokh ve‘al ha‘osheq ve‘al hamerutsah la‘asot. 
jeremiah 22:18	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’el yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah lo yispedu lo ho ’akhi veho ’akhot lo yispedu lo ho ’adon veho hodoh 
jeremiah 22:19	qewurat khamor yiqawer sakhow vehashlekh meihale’ah lesha‘arei yerushalim. 
jeremiah 22:20	‘ali halewanon utse‘aqi uwabashan teni qolekh vetsa‘aqi mei‘awarim ki nishberu kal me’ahawayikh. 
jeremiah 22:21	dibarti ’eilayikh beshalvotayikh ’amart lo ’eshma‘ zeh darkekh mine‘urayikh ki lo shama‘at beqoli. 
jeremiah 22:22	kal ro‘ayikh tir‘eh ruakh ume’ahawayikh bashewi yeileikhu ki ’az teiwoshi venikhlamt mikol ra‘atekh. 
jeremiah 22:23	yoshawti yoshawt balewanon mequnanti mequnant ba’arazim mah neikhant bewo lakh khawalim khil kayoleidah 
jeremiah 22:24	khai ’ani ne’um yhoh ki ’im yihyeh kaneyahu wen yehoyaqim melekh yehudah khotam ‘al yad yemini ki misham ’eteqenka. 
jeremiah 22:25	unetatikha beyad mewaqshei nafshekha uweyad ’asher ’atah yagor mipeneihem uweyad newukhadretsar melekh bawel uweyad hakasdim. 
jeremiah 22:26	veheitalti ’otekha ve’et ’imekha ’asher yeladatkha ‘al ha’arets ’akheret ’asher lo yuladtem sham vesham tamutu. 
jeremiah 22:27	ve‘al ha’arets ’asher hem menase’im ’et nafsham lashuw sham shamah lo yashuwu. 
jeremiah 22:28	ha‘etsew niwzeh nafuts ha’ish hazeh kaneyahu ’im keli ’en kheifets bo madua‘ hutalu hu vezar‘o vehushlekhu ‘al ha’arets ’asher lo yada‘u. 
jeremiah 22:29	’erets ’erets ’arets shim‘i dewar yhoh. 
jeremiah 22:30	koh ’amar yhoh kitwu ’et ha’ish hazeh ‘ariri gewer lo yitslakh beyamav ki lo yitslakh mizar‘o ’ish yoshew ‘al kisei david umoshel ‘od bihudah. 
jeremiah 23:1	ho ro‘im me’abedim umefitsim ’et tson mar‘iti ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:2	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ‘al haro‘im haro‘im ’et ‘ami ’atem hafitsotem ’et tsoni vatadikhum velo feqadtem ’otam hini foqed ‘aleikhem ’et roa‘ ma‘aleikhem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:3	va’ani ’aqabets ’et she’eirit tsoni mikol ha’aratsot ’asher hidakhti ’otam sham vahashiwoti ’ethen ‘al neveihen ufaru verawu. 
jeremiah 23:4	vahaqimoti ‘aleihem ro‘im vera‘um velo yire’u ‘od velo yeikhatu velo yipaqeidu ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:5	hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh vahaqimoti ledavid tsemakh tsadiq umalakh melekh vehiskil ve‘asah mishpat utsedaqah ba’arets. 
jeremiah 23:6	beyamav tivasha‘ yehudah veyisra’el yishkon lawetakh vezeh shemo ’asher yiqre’o yhoh tsidqeinu. 
jeremiah 23:7	lakhen hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh velo yomeru ‘od khai yhoh ’asher he‘elah ’et benei yisra’el mei’erets mitsrayim. 
jeremiah 23:8	ki ’im khai yhoh ’asher he‘elah va’asher heiwi ’et zera‘ bet yisra’el mei’erets tsafonah umikol ha’aratsot ’asher hidakhtim sham veyashewu ‘al ’admatam. 
jeremiah 23:9	lanewi’im nishbar libi weqirbi rakhafu kal ‘atsmotai hayiti ke’ish shikor ukhegewer ‘awaro yayin mipenei yhoh umipenei diwrei qadesho. 
jeremiah 23:10	ki mena’afim male’ah ha’arets ki mipenei ’alah ’awelah ha’arets yaweshu ne’ot midbar vatehi merutsatam ra‘ah ugewuratam lo khen. 
jeremiah 23:11	ki gam nawi gam kohen khaneifu gam beweiti matsati ra‘atam ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:12	lakhen yihyeh darkam lahem kakhalaqlaqot ba’afeilah yidakhu venafelu wah ki ’awi ‘aleihem ra‘ah shenat pequdatam ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:13	uwinwi’ei shomeron ra’iti tiflah hinabe’u waba‘al vayat‘u ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’el. 
jeremiah 23:14	uwinwi’ei yerushalim ra’iti sha‘arurah na’of vehalokh basheqer vekhizequ yedei merei‘im lewilti shawu ’ish meira‘ato hayu li khulam kisdom veyosheweha ka‘amorah. 
jeremiah 23:15	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ‘al hanewi’im hini ma’akhil ’otam la‘anah vehishqitim mei rosh ki mei’et newi’ei yerushalim yatse’ah khanupah lekhal ha’arets. 
jeremiah 23:16	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’al tishme‘u ‘al diwrei hanewi’im hanibe’im lakhem mahbilim hemah ’etkhem khazon libam yedabeiru lo mipi yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:17	’omerim ’amor limna’atsai diber yhoh shalom yihyeh lakhem vekhol holekh bishrirut libo ’ameru lo tawo ‘aleikhem ra‘ah. 
jeremiah 23:18	ki mi ‘amad besod yhoh veyeire veyishma‘ ’et dewaro mi hiqshiw dewari dewaro vayishma‘. 
jeremiah 23:19	hineh sa‘arat yhoh kheimah yatse’ah vesa‘ar mitkholel ‘al rosh resha‘im yakhul. 
jeremiah 23:20	lo yashuw ’af yhoh ‘ad ‘asoto ve‘ad haqimo mezimot libo be’akharit hayamim titbonu wah binah. 
jeremiah 23:21	lo shalakhti ’et hanewi’im vehem ratsu lo dibarti ’aleihem vehem niba’u. 
jeremiah 23:22	ve’im ‘amedu besodi veyashmi‘u dewarai ’et ‘ami vishiwum midarkam hara‘ umeiroa‘ ma‘aleihem. 
jeremiah 23:23	ha’elohei miqarow ’ani ne’um yhoh velo ’elohei meirakhoq. 
jeremiah 23:24	’im yisater ’ish bamistarim va’ani lo ’er’enu ne’um yhoh halo ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets ’ani malei ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:25	shama‘ti ’et ’asher ’ameru hanewi’im hanibe’im bishmi sheqer leimor khalamti khalameti. 
jeremiah 23:26	‘ad matai hayesh belew hanewi’im nibe’ei hashaqer unewi’ei tarmit libam. 
jeremiah 23:27	hakhoshewim lehashkiakh ’et ‘ami shemi bakhalomotam ’asher yesaperu ’ish lerei‘eihu ka’asher shakhekhu ’awotam ’et shemi baba‘al. 
jeremiah 23:28	hanawi ’asher ’ito khalom yesaper khalom va’asher dewari ’ito yedaber dewari ’emet mah latewen ’et habar ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:29	halo khoh dewari ka’esh ne’um yhoh ukhefatish yefotsets sala‘. 
jeremiah 23:30	lakhen hini ‘al hanewi’im ne’um yhoh meganewei dewarai ’ish mei’et rei‘eihu. 
jeremiah 23:31	hini ‘al hanewi’im ne’um yhoh haloqekhim leshonam vayin’amu ne’um. 
jeremiah 23:32	hini ‘al nibe’ei khalomot sheqer ne’um yhoh vaysaperum vayat‘u ’et ‘ami beshiqreihem uwefakhazutam ve’anokhi lo shelakhtim velo tsivitim veho‘el lo yo‘ilu la‘am hazeh ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:33	vekhi yish’alekha ha‘am hazeh ’o hanawi ’o khohen leimor mah masa yhoh ve’amarta ’aleihem ’et mah masa venatashti ’etkhem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:34	vehanawi vehakohen veha‘am ’asher yomar masa yhoh ufaqadti ‘al ha’ish hahu ve‘al beito. 
jeremiah 23:35	koh tomeru ’ish ‘al rei‘eihu ve’ish ’el ’akhiv meh ‘anah yhoh umah diber yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:36	umasa yhoh lo tizkeru ‘od ki hamasa yihyeh le’ish dewaro vahafakhtem ’et diwrei ’elohim khayim yhoh tsewa’ot ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 23:37	koh tomar ’el hanawi meh ‘anakh yhoh umah diber yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:38	ve’im masa yhoh tomeiru lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ya‘an ’amarekhem ’et hadawar hazeh masa yhoh va’eshlakh ’aleikhem leimor lo tomeru masa yhoh. 
jeremiah 23:39	lakhen hini venashiti ’etkhem nasho venatashti ’etkhem ve’et ha‘ir ’asher natati lakhem vela’awoteikhem mei‘al panai. 
jeremiah 23:40	venatati ‘aleikhem kherpat ‘olam ukhelimut ‘olam ’asher lo tishakheiakh. 
jeremiah 24:1	hir’ani yhoh vehineh shenei duda’ei te’einim mu‘adim lifnei heikhal yhoh ’akharei haglot newukhadretsar melekh bawel ’et yekhaneyahu wen yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ve’et sarei yehudah ve’et hekharash ve’et hamasger mirushalim vaywi’em bawel. 
jeremiah 24:2	hadud ’ekhad te’einim towot me’od kit’einei habakurot vehadud ’ekhad te’einim ra‘ot me’od ’asher lo tei’akhalnah meiroa‘. 
jeremiah 24:3	vayomer yhoh ’eilai mah ’atah ro’eh yirmeyahu va’omar te’einim hate’einim hatowot towot me’od vehara‘ot ra‘ot me’od ’asher lo tei’akhalnah meiroa‘. 
jeremiah 24:4	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
jeremiah 24:5	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el kate’einim hatowot ha’eleh ken ’akir ’et galut yehudah ’asher shilakhti min hamaqom hazeh ’erets kasdim letowah. 
jeremiah 24:6	vesamti ‘eini ‘aleihem letowah vahashiwotim ‘al ha’arets hazot uwenitim velo ’eheros uneta‘tim velo ’etosh. 
jeremiah 24:7	venatati lahem lew lada‘at ’oti ki ’ani yhoh vehayu li le‘am ve’anokhi ’ehyeh lahem leilohim ki yashuwu ’eilai bekhal libam. 
jeremiah 24:8	vekhate’einim hara‘ot ’asher lo tei’akhalnah meiroa‘ ki khoh ’amar yhoh ken ’eten ’et tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve’et sarav ve’et she’eirit yerushalim hanish’arim ba’arets hazot vehayoshewim be’erets mitsrayim. 
jeremiah 24:9	unetatim lizva‘ah leza‘avah lera‘ah lekhol mamlekhot ha’arets lekherpah ulemashal lishninah veliqlalah bekhal hameqomot ’asher ’adikhem sham. 
jeremiah 24:10	veshilakhti wam ’et hakherew ’et hara‘aw ve’et hadawer ‘ad tumam mei‘al ha’adamah ’asher natati lahem vela’awoteihem. 
jeremiah 25:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ‘al yirmeyahu ‘al kal ‘am yehudah bashanah harewi‘it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hi hashanah harishonit linwukhadretsar melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 25:2	’asher diber yirmeyahu hanawi ‘al kal ‘am yehudah ve’el kal yoshewei yerushalim leimor. 
jeremiah 25:3	min shelosh ‘esreh shanah leyoshiyahu wen ’amon melekh yehudah ve‘ad hayom hazeh zeh shalosh ve‘esrim shanah hayah dewar yhoh ’eilai va’adaber ’aleikhem ’ashkem vedaber velo shema‘tem. 
jeremiah 25:4	veshalakh yhoh ’aleikhem ’et kal ‘awadav hanewi’im hashkem veshaloakh velo shema‘tem velo hititem ’et ’azenekhem lishmoa‘. 
jeremiah 25:5	leimor shuwu na ’ish midarko hara‘ah umeiroa‘ ma‘aleikhem ushewu ‘al ha’adamah ’asher natan yhoh lakhem vela’awoteikhem lemin ‘olam ve‘ad ‘olam. 
jeremiah 25:6	ve’al teilekhu ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim le‘awedam ulehishtakhavot lahem velo takh‘isu ’oti bema‘aseh yedeikhem velo ’ara‘ lakhem. 
jeremiah 25:7	velo shema‘tem ’eilai ne’um yhoh lema‘an hikh‘isuni hakh‘iseini bema‘aseh yedeikhem lera‘ lakhem. 
jeremiah 25:8	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ya‘an ’asher lo shema‘tem ’et dewarai. 
jeremiah 25:9	hini sholeiakh velaqakhti ’et kal mishpekhot tsafon ne’um yhoh ve’el newukhadretsar melekh bawel ‘awdi vahawi’otim ‘al ha’arets hazot ve‘al yosheweha ve‘al kal hagoyim ha’eleh sawiw vehakharamtim vesamtim leshamah velishreiqah ulekharewot ‘olam. 
jeremiah 25:10	veha’awadti meihem qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah qol reikhayim ve’or ner. 
jeremiah 25:11	vehayetah kal ha’arets hazot lekharebah leshamah ve‘awedu hagoyim ha’eleh ’et melekh bawel shiw‘im shanah. 
jeremiah 25:12	vehayah khimlot shiw‘im shanah ’efqod ‘al melekh bawel ve‘al hago hahu ne’um yhoh ’et ‘avonam ve‘al ’erets kasdim vesamti ’oto leshimot ‘olam. 
jeremiah 25:13	veheiweiti veheiweiti ‘al ha’arets hahi ’et kal dewarai ’asher dibarti ‘aleha ’et kal hakatuw baseifer hazeh ’asher niba yirmeyahu ‘al kal hagoyim. 
jeremiah 25:14	ki ‘awedu wam gam hemah goyim rabim umelakhim gedolim veshilamti lahem kefa‘olam ukhema‘aseh yedeihem. 
jeremiah 25:15	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’eilai qakh ’et kos hayayin hakheimah hazot miyadi vehishqitah ’oto ’et kal hagoyim ’asher ’anokhi sholeiakh ’otkha ’aleihem. 
jeremiah 25:16	veshatu vehitgo‘ashu vehitholalu mipenei hakherew ’asher ’anokhi sholeiakh beinotam. 
jeremiah 25:17	va’eqakh ’et hakos miyad yhoh va’ashqeh ’et kal hagoyim ’asher shelakhani yhoh ’aleihem. 
jeremiah 25:18	’et yerushalim ve’et ‘arei yehudah ve’et melakheha ’et sareha latet ’otam lekharebah leshamah lishreiqah veliqlalah kayom hazeh. 
jeremiah 25:19	’et par‘oh melekh mitsrayim ve’et ‘awadav ve’et sarav ve’et kal ‘amo. 
jeremiah 25:20	ve’et kal ha‘erew ve’et kal malkhei ’erets ha‘uts ve’et kal malkhei ’erets pelishtim ve’et ’ashqelon ve’et ‘azah ve’et ‘eqron ve’et she’eirit ’ashdod. 
jeremiah 25:21	’et ’edom ve’et mo’aw ve’et benei ‘amon. 
jeremiah 25:22	ve’et kal malkhei tsor ve’et kal malkhei tsidon ve’et malkhei ha’i ’asher be‘eiwer hayam. 
jeremiah 25:23	ve’et dedan ve’et teima ve’et buz ve’et kal qetsutsei fei’ah. 
jeremiah 25:24	ve’et kal malkhei ‘araw ve’et kal malkhei ha‘erew hashokhenim bamidbar. 
jeremiah 25:25	ve’et kal malkhei zimri ve’et kal malkhei ‘eilam ve’et kal malkhei madai. 
jeremiah 25:26	ve’et kal malkhei hatsafon haqerowim veharekhoqim ’ish ’el ’akhiv ve’et kal hamamlekhot ha’arets ’asher ‘al penei ha’adamah umelekh sheishakh yishteh ’akhareihem. 
jeremiah 25:27	ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el shetu veshikhru uqeyu veniflu velo taqumu mipenei hakherew ’asher ’anokhi sholeiakh beineikhem. 
jeremiah 25:28	vehayah ki yema’anu laqakhat hakos miyadekha lishtot ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot shato tishtu. 
jeremiah 25:29	ki hineh wa‘ir ’asher niqra shemi ‘aleha ’anokhi meikhel lehara‘ ve’atem hinaqeh tinaqu lo tinaqu ki kherew ’ani qorei ‘al kal yoshewei ha’arets ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
jeremiah 25:30	ve’atah tinawei ’aleihem ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh ve’amarta ’aleihem yhoh mimarom yish’ag umime‘on qadesho yiten qolo sha’og yish’ag ‘al naveihu heidad kedorekhim ya‘aneh ’el kal yoshewei ha’arets. 
jeremiah 25:31	ba sha’on ‘ad qetseh ha’arets ki riw yhoh bagoyim nishpat hu lekhal basar haresha‘im netanam lakherew ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 25:32	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot hineh ra‘ah yotset migo ’el go vesa‘ar gadol yei‘or miyarketei ’arets. 
jeremiah 25:33	vehayu khalei yhoh bayom hahu miqtseh ha’arets ve‘ad qetseh ha’arets lo yisafedu velo yei’asefu velo yiqaweiru ledomen ‘al penei ha’adamah yihyu. 
jeremiah 25:34	heililu haro‘im veza‘aqu vehitpaleshu ’adirei hatson ki male’u yemeikhem litwoakh utefotsotikhem unefaltem kikhli khemdah. 
jeremiah 25:35	ve’awad manos min haro‘im ufeleitah mei’adirei hatson. 
jeremiah 25:36	qol tsa‘aqat haro‘im vilelat ’adirei hatson ki shoded yhoh ’et mar‘itam. 
jeremiah 25:37	venadamu ne’ot hashalom mipenei kharon ’af yhoh. 
jeremiah 25:38	‘azaw kakefir suko ki hayetah ’artsam leshamah mipenei kharon hayonah umipenei kharon ’apo. 
jeremiah 26:1	bereishit mamlekhut yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadawar hazeh mei’et yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 26:2	koh ’amar yhoh ‘amod bakhatsar bet yhoh vedibarta ‘al kal ‘arei yehudah haba’im lehishtakhavot bet yhoh ’et kal hadewarim ’asher tsivitikha ledaber ’aleihem ’al tigra‘ dawar. 
jeremiah 26:3	’ulai yishme‘u veyashuwu ’ish midarko hara‘ah venikhamti ’el hara‘ah ’asher ’anokhi khoshew la‘asot lahem mipenei roa‘ ma‘aleihem. 
jeremiah 26:4	ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh ’im lo tishme‘u ’eilai lalekhet betorati ’asher natati lifneikhem. 
jeremiah 26:5	lishmoa‘ ‘al diwrei ‘awadai hanewi’im ’asher ’anokhi sholeiakh ’aleikhem vehashkem veshaloakh velo shema‘tem. 
jeremiah 26:6	venatati ’et habayit hazeh keshiloh ve’et ha‘ir hazotah hazot ’eten liqlalah lekhol goyei ha’arets. 
jeremiah 26:7	vayishme‘u hakohanim vehanewi’im vekhal ha‘am ’et yirmeyahu medaber ’et hadewarim ha’eleh bewet yhoh. 
jeremiah 26:8	vayhi kekhalot yirmeyahu ledaber ’et kal ’asher tsivah yhoh ledaber ’el kal ha‘am vayitpesu ’oto hakohanim vehanewi’im vekhal ha‘am leimor mot tamut. 
jeremiah 26:9	madua‘ nibeita weshem yhoh leimor keshilo yihyeh habayit hazeh veha‘ir hazot tekheraw mei’en yoshew vayiqahel kal ha‘am ’el yirmeyahu bewet yhoh. 
jeremiah 26:10	vayishme‘u sarei yehudah ’et hadewarim ha’eleh vaya‘alu mibet hamelekh bet yhoh vayeishewu befetakh sha‘ar yhoh hekhadash. 
jeremiah 26:11	vayomeru hakohanim vehanewi’im ’el hasarim ve’el kal ha‘am leimor mishpat mavet la’ish hazeh ki niba ’el ha‘ir hazot ka’asher shema‘tem be’azeneikhem. 
jeremiah 26:12	vayomer yirmeyahu ’el kal hasarim ve’el kal ha‘am leimor yhoh shelakhani lehinawei ’el habayit hazeh ve’el ha‘ir hazot ’et kal hadewarim ’asher shema‘tem. 
jeremiah 26:13	ve‘atah heitiwu darkheikhem uma‘aleikhem veshim‘u beqol yhoh ’eloheikhem veyinakhem yhoh ’el hara‘ah ’asher diber ‘aleikhem. 
jeremiah 26:14	va’ani hini weyedkhem ‘asu li katow vekhayashar be‘eineikhem. 
jeremiah 26:15	’akh yadoa‘ teide‘u ki ’im memitim ’atem ’oti ki dam naqi ’atem notenim ‘aleikhem ve’el ha‘ir hazot ve’el yosheweha ki we’emet shelakhani yhoh ‘aleikhem ledaber be’azeneikhem ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh. 
jeremiah 26:16	vayomeru hasarim vekhal ha‘am ’el hakohanim ve’el hanewi’im ’en la’ish hazeh mishpat mavet ki beshem yhoh ’eloheinu diber ’eileinu. 
jeremiah 26:17	vayaqumu ’anashim miziqnei ha’arets vayomeru ’el kal qehal ha‘am leimor. 
jeremiah 26:18	mikhayah mikhah hamorashti hayah niba bimei khizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayomer ’el kal ‘am yehudah leimor koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot tsiyon sadeh teikharesh virushalayim ‘iyim tihyeh vehar habayit lewamot ya‘ar. 
jeremiah 26:19	hehamet hemituhu khizqiyahu melekh yehudah vekhal yehudah halo yarei ’et yhoh vaykhal ’et penei yhoh vayinakhem yhoh ’el hara‘ah ’asher diber ‘aleihem va’anakhnu ‘osim ra‘ah gedolah ‘al nafshoteinu. 
jeremiah 26:20	vegam ’ish hayah mitnabei beshem yhoh ’uriyahu ben shema‘yahu miqiryat haye‘arim vayinawei ‘al ha‘ir hazot ve‘al ha’arets hazot kekhol diwrei yirmeyahu. 
jeremiah 26:21	vayishma‘ hamelekh yehoyaqim vekhal giborav vekhal hasarim ’et dewarav vaywaqesh hamelekh hamito vayishma‘ ’uriyahu vayira vayiwrakh vayawo mitsrayim. 
jeremiah 26:22	vayishlakh hamelekh yehoyaqim ’anashim mitsrayim ’et ’elnatan ben ‘akhbor va’anashim ’ito ’el mitsrayim. 
jeremiah 26:23	vayotsi’u ’et ’uriyahu mimitsrayim vaywi’uhu ’el hamelekh yehoyaqim vayakeihu bekharew vayashlekh ’et niwlato ’el qiwrei benei ha‘am. 
jeremiah 26:24	’akh yad ’akhiqam ben shafan hayetah ’et yirmeyahu lewilti tet ’oto weyad ha‘am lahamito. 
jeremiah 27:1	bereishit mamlekhet yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadawar hazeh ’el yirmeyah mei’et yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 27:2	koh ’amar yhoh ’eilai ‘aseh lekha moseirot umotot unetatam ‘al tsavarekha. 
jeremiah 27:3	veshilakhtam ’el melekh ’edom ve’el melekh mo’aw ve’el melekh benei ‘amon ve’el melekh tsor ve’el melekh tsidon beyad mal’akhim haba’im yerushalim ’el tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah. 
jeremiah 27:4	vetsivita ’otam ’el ’adoneihem leimor koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el koh tomeru ’el ’adoneikhem. 
jeremiah 27:5	’anokhi ‘asiti ’et ha’arets ’et ha’adam ve’et habeheimah ’asher ‘al penei ha’arets bekhokhi hagadol uwizro‘i hanetuyah unetatiha la’asher yashar be‘einai. 
jeremiah 27:6	ve‘atah ’anokhi natati ’et kal ha’aratsot ha’eleh beyad newukhadnetsar melekh bawel ‘awdi vegam ’et khayat hasadeh natati lo le‘awedo. 
jeremiah 27:7	ve‘awedu ’oto kal hagoyim ve’et beno ve’et ben beno ‘ad bo ‘et ’artso gam hu ve‘awedu wo goyim rabim umelakhim gedolim. 
jeremiah 27:8	vehayah hago vehamamlakhah ’asher lo ya‘awdu ’oto ’et newukhadnetsar melekh bawel ve’et ’asher lo yiten ’et tsavaro be‘ol melekh bawel bakherew uwara‘aw uwadewer ’efqod ‘al hago hahu ne’um yhoh ‘ad tumi ’otam beyado. 
jeremiah 27:9	ve’atem ’al tishme‘u ’el newi’eikhem ve’el qosemeikhem ve’el khalomoteikhem ve’el ‘oneneikhem ve’el kashafeikhem ’asher hem ’omerim ’aleikhem leimor lo ta‘awdu ’et melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 27:10	ki sheqer hem nibe’im lakhem lema‘an harkhiq ’etkhem mei‘al ’admatkhem vehidakhti ’etkhem va’awadtem. 
jeremiah 27:11	vehago ’asher yawi ’et tsavaro be‘ol melekh bawel va‘awado vehinakhtiv ‘al ’admato ne’um yhoh va‘awadah veyashaw bah. 
jeremiah 27:12	ve’el tsidqiyah melekh yehudah dibarti kekhal hadewarim ha’eleh leimor hawi’u ’et tsavereikhem be‘ol melekh bawel ve‘iwdu ’oto ve‘amo vikhyu. 
jeremiah 27:13	lamah tamutu ’atah ve‘amekha bakherew bara‘aw uwadawer ka’asher diber yhoh ’el hago ’asher lo ya‘awod ’et melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 27:14	ve’al tishme‘u ’el diwrei hanewi’im ha’omerim ’aleikhem leimor lo ta‘awdu ’et melekh bawel ki sheqer hem nibe’im lakhem. 
jeremiah 27:15	ki lo shelakhtim ne’um yhoh vehem nibe’im bishmi lashaqer lema‘an hadikhi ’etkhem va’awadtem ’atem vehanewi’im hanibe’im lakhem. 
jeremiah 27:16	ve’el hakohanim ve’el kal ha‘am hazeh dibarti leimor koh ’amar yhoh ’al tishme‘u ’el diwrei newi’eikhem hanibe’im lakhem leimor hineh khelei wet yhoh mushawim mibawelah ‘atah meheirah ki sheqer hemah nibe’im lakhem. 
jeremiah 27:17	’al tishme‘u ’aleihem ‘iwdu ’et melekh bawel vikhyu lamah tihyeh ha‘ir hazot kharebah. 
jeremiah 27:18	ve’im newi’im hem ve’im yesh dewar yhoh ’itam yifge‘u na yhoh tsewa’ot lewilti wo’u hakeilim hanotarim bewet yhoh uwet melekh yehudah uwirushalim bawelah. 
jeremiah 27:19	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’el ha‘amudim ve‘al hayam ve‘al hamekhonot ve‘al yeter hakeilim hanotarim ba‘ir hazot. 
jeremiah 27:20	’asher lo leqakham newukhadnetsar melekh bawel bagloto ’et yekhonyah wen yehoyaqim melekh yehudah mirushalim bawelah ve’et kal khorei yehudah virushalim. 
jeremiah 27:21	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ‘al hakeilim hanotarim bet yhoh uwet melekh yehudah virushalim. 
jeremiah 27:22	bawelah yuwa’u veshamah yihyu ‘ad yom paqedi ’otam ne’um yhoh veha‘alitim vahashiwotim ’el hamaqom hazeh. 
jeremiah 28:1	vayhi bashanah hahi bereishit mamlekhet tsidqiyah melekh yehudah bishnat bashanah harewi‘it bakhodesh hakhamishi ’amar ’eilai khananyah wen ‘azur hanawi ’asher migiw‘on bewet yhoh le‘einei hakohanim vekhal ha‘am leimor. 
jeremiah 28:2	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el leimor shawarti ’et ‘ol melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 28:3	be‘od shenatayim yamim ’ani meishiw ’el hamaqom hazeh ’et kal kelei bet yhoh ’asher laqakh newukhadnetsar melekh bawel min hamaqom hazeh vaywi’em bawel. 
jeremiah 28:4	ve’et yekhaneyah wen yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ve’et kal galut yehudah haba’im bawelah ’ani meishiw ’el hamaqom hazeh ne’um yhoh ki ’eshbor ’et ‘ol melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 28:5	vayomer yirmeyah hanawi ’el khananyah hanawi le‘einei hakohanim ule‘einei khal ha‘am ha‘omedim bewet yhoh. 
jeremiah 28:6	vayomer yirmeyah hanawi ’amen ken ya‘aseh yhoh yaqem yhoh ’et dewarekha ’asher nibeita lehashiw kelei wet yhoh vekhal hagolah mibawel ’el hamaqom hazeh. 
jeremiah 28:7	’akh shema‘ na hadawar hazeh ’asher ’anokhi dower be’azenekha uwe’azenei kal ha‘am. 
jeremiah 28:8	hanewi’im ’asher hayu lefanai ulefanekha min ha‘olam vayinawe’u ’el ’aratsot rabot ve‘al mamlakhot gedolot lemilkhamah ulera‘ah uledawer. 
jeremiah 28:9	hanawi ’asher yinawei leshalom bewo dewar hanawi yivada‘ hanawi ’asher shelakho yhoh be’emet. 
jeremiah 28:10	vayiqakh khananyah hanawi ’et hamotah mei‘al tsavar yirmeyah hanawi vayishbereihu. 
jeremiah 28:11	vayomer khananyah le‘einei khal ha‘am leimor koh ’amar yhoh kakhah ’eshbor ’et ‘ol newukhadnetsar melekh bawel be‘od shenatayim yamim mei‘al tsavar kal hagoyim vayeilekh yirmeyah hanawi ledarko. 
jeremiah 28:12	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyah ’akharei shewor khananyah hanawi ’et hamotah mei‘al tsavar yirmeyah hanawi leimor. 
jeremiah 28:13	halokh ve’amarta ’el khananyah leimor koh ’amar yhoh motot ‘ets shawareta ve‘asita takhteihen motot barzel. 
jeremiah 28:14	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ‘ol barzel natati ‘al tsavar kal hagoyim ha’eleh la‘awod ’et newukhadnetsar melekh bawel va‘awaduhu vegam ’et khayat hasadeh natati lo. 
jeremiah 28:15	vayomer yirmeyah hanawi ’el khananyah hanawi shema‘ na khananyah lo shelakhakha yhoh ve’atah hiwtakhta ’et ha‘am hazeh ‘al shaqer. 
jeremiah 28:16	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh hini meshaleikhakha mei‘al penei ha’adamah hashanah ’atah met ki sarah dibarta ’el yhoh. 
jeremiah 28:17	vayamat khananyah hanawi bashanah hahi bakhodesh hashewi‘i. 
jeremiah 29:1	ve’eleh diwrei haseifer ’asher shalakh yirmeyah hanawi mirushalim ’el yeter ziqnei hagolah ve’el hakohanim ve’el hanewi’im ve’el kal ha‘am ’asher heglah newukhadnetsar mirushalim bawelah. 
jeremiah 29:2	’akharei tset yekhaneyah hamelekh vehagewirah vehasarisim sarei yehudah virushalim vehekharash vehamasger mirushalim. 
jeremiah 29:3	beyad ’el‘asah wen shafan ugemaryah ben khilqiyah ’asher shalakh tsidqiyah melekh yehudah ’el newukhadnetsar melekh bawel bawelah leimor. 
jeremiah 29:4	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el lekhal hagolah ’asher higleiti mirushalim bawelah. 
jeremiah 29:5	benu watim vesheiwu venit‘u ganot ve’ikhlu ’et piryan. 
jeremiah 29:6	qekhu nashim veholidu banim uwanot uqekhu liwneikhem nashim ve’et benoteikhem tenu la’anashim veteiladnah banim uwanot urewu sham ve’al tim‘atu. 
jeremiah 29:7	vedirshu ’et shelom ha‘ir ’asher higleiti ’etkhem shamah vehitpalu wa‘adah ’el yhoh ki wishlomah yihyeh lakhem shalom. 
jeremiah 29:8	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ’al yashi’u lakhem newi’eikhem ’asher beqirbekhem veqosemeikhem ve’al tishme‘u ’el khalomoteikhem ’asher ’atem makhlemim. 
jeremiah 29:9	ki wesheqer hem nibe’im lakhem bishmi lo shelakhtim ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 29:10	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ki lefi melot lewawel shiw‘im shanah ’efqod ’etkhem vahaqimoti ‘aleikhem ’et dewari hatow lehashiw ’etkhem ’el hamaqom hazeh. 
jeremiah 29:11	ki ’anokhi yada‘ti ’et hamakhashawot ’asher ’anokhi khoshew ‘aleikhem ne’um yhoh makhshewot shalom velo lera‘ah latet lakhem ’akharit vetiqvah. 
jeremiah 29:12	uqeratem ’oti vahalakhtem vehitpalaltem ’eilai veshama‘ti ’aleikhem. 
jeremiah 29:13	uwiqashtem ’oti umetsatem ki tidreshuni bekhal lewawkhem. 
jeremiah 29:14	venimtseiti lakhem ne’um yhoh veshawti ’et shewitekhem shewutekhem veqibatsti ’etkhem mikal hagoyim umikal hameqomot ’asher hidakhti ’etkhem sham ne’um yhoh vahashiwoti ’etkhem ’el hamaqom ’asher higleiti ’etkhem misham. 
jeremiah 29:15	ki ’amartem heiqim lanu yhoh newi’im bawelah. 
jeremiah 29:16	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’el hamelekh hayoshew ’el kisei david ve’el kal ha‘am hayoshew ba‘ir hazot ’akheikhem ’asher lo yatse’u ’itekhem bagolah. 
jeremiah 29:17	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot hini meshaleiakh bam ’et hakherew ’et hara‘aw ve’et hadawer venatati ’otam kate’einim hasho‘arim ’asher lo tei’akhalnah meiroa‘. 
jeremiah 29:18	veradafti ’akhareihem bakherew bara‘aw uwadawer unetatim lizva‘ah leza‘avah lekhol mamlekhot ha’arets le’alah uleshamah velishreiqah ulekherpah bekhal hagoyim ’asher hidakhtim sham. 
jeremiah 29:19	takhat ’asher lo shame‘u ’el dewarai ne’um yhoh ’asher shalakhti ’aleihem ’et ‘awadai hanewi’im hashkem veshaloakh velo shema‘tem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 29:20	ve’atem shim‘u dewar yhoh kal hagolah ’asher shilakhti mirushalim bawelah. 
jeremiah 29:21	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ’el ’akh’aw ben qolayah ve’el tsidqiyahu wen ma‘aseiyah hanibe’im lakhem bishmi shaqer hini noten ’otam beyad newukhadretsar melekh bawel vehikam le‘eineikhem. 
jeremiah 29:22	veluqakh meihem qelalah lekhol galut yehudah ’asher bewawel leimor yesimkha yhoh ketsidqiyahu ukhe’ekhaw ’asher qalam melekh bawel ba’esh. 
jeremiah 29:23	ya‘an ’asher ‘asu newalah beyisra’el vayna’afu ’et neshei rei‘eihem vaydaberu dawar bishmi sheqer ’asher lo tsivitim ve’anokhi huyodeia‘ hayodeia‘ va‘ed ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 29:24	ve’el shema‘yahu hanekhelami tomar leimor. 
jeremiah 29:25	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el leimor ya‘an ’asher ’atah shalakhta weshimkhah sefarim ’el kal ha‘am ’asher birushalim ve’el tsefanyah wen ma‘aseiyah hakohen ve’el kal hakohanim leimor. 
jeremiah 29:26	yhoh netanekha khohen takhat yehoyada‘ hakohen lihyot peqidim bet yhoh lekhal ’ish meshuga‘ umitnabei venatatah ’oto ’el hamahpekhet ve’el hatsinoq. 
jeremiah 29:27	ve‘atah lamah lo ga‘arta beyirmeyahu ha‘anetoti hamitnabei lakhem. 
jeremiah 29:28	ki ‘al ken shalakh ’eileinu bawel leimor ’arukah hi benu watim vesheiwu venit‘u ganot ve’ikhlu ’et perihen. 
jeremiah 29:29	vayiqra tsefanyah hakohen ’et haseifer hazeh be’azenei yirmeyahu hanawi. 
jeremiah 29:30	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 29:31	shelakh ‘al kal hagolah leimor koh ’amar yhoh ’el shema‘yah hanekhelami ya‘an ’asher niba lakhem shema‘yah va’ani lo shelakhtiv vayawtakh ’etkhem ‘al shaqer. 
jeremiah 29:32	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh hini foqed ‘al shema‘yah hanekhelami ve‘al zar‘o lo yihyeh lo ’ish yoshew betokh ha‘am hazeh velo yir’eh watow ’asher ’ani ‘oseh le‘ami ne’um yhoh ki sarah diber ‘al yhoh. 
jeremiah 30:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 30:2	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el leimor ketaw lekha ’et kal hadewarim ’asher dibarti ’eilekha ’el seifer. 
jeremiah 30:3	ki hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh veshawti ’et shewut ‘ami yisra’el vihudah ’amar yhoh vahashiwotim ’el ha’arets ’asher natati la’awotam vireishuha. 
jeremiah 30:4	ve’eleh hadewarim ’asher diber yhoh ’el yisra’el ve’el yehudah. 
jeremiah 30:5	ki khoh ’amar yhoh qol kharadah shama‘enu pakhad ve’en shalom. 
jeremiah 30:6	sha’alu na ure’u ’im yoled zakhar madua‘ ra’iti khal gewer yadav ‘al khalatsav kayoleidah venehefkhu khal panim leyeiraqon. 
jeremiah 30:7	ho ki gadol hayom hahu mei’ayin kamohu ve‘et tsarah hi leya‘aqow umimenah yivasheia‘. 
jeremiah 30:8	vehayah wayom hahu ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot ’eshbor ‘ulo mei‘al tsavarekha umosrotekha ’anateq velo ya‘awdu wo ‘od zarim. 
jeremiah 30:9	ve‘awedu ’et yhoh ’eloheihem ve’et david malkam ’asher ’aqim lahem. 
jeremiah 30:10	ve’atah ’al tira ‘awdi ya‘aqow ne’um yhoh ve’al teikhat yisra’el ki hini moshi‘akha meirakhoq ve’et zar‘akha mei’erets shiwyam veshaw ya‘aqow veshaqat vesha’anan ve’en makharid. 
jeremiah 30:11	ki ’itekha ’ani ne’um yhoh lehoshi‘ekha ki ’e‘eseh khalah bekhal hagoyim ’asher hafitsotikha sham ’akh ’otekha lo ’e‘eseh khalah veyisartikha lamishpat venaqeh lo ’anaqeka. 
jeremiah 30:12	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’anush leshiwrekh nakhlah makatekh. 
jeremiah 30:13	’en dan dinekh lemazor refu’ot te‘alah ’en lakh. 
jeremiah 30:14	kal me’ahawayikh shekheikhukh ’otakh lo yidroshu ki makat ’oyew hikitikh musar ’akhzari ‘al row ‘avonekh ‘atsemu khatotayikh. 
jeremiah 30:15	mah tiz‘aq ‘al shiwrekh ’anush makh’owekh ‘al row ‘avonekh ‘atsemu khatotayikh ‘asiti ’eleh lakh. 
jeremiah 30:16	lakhen kal ’okhelayikh yei’akheilu vekhal tsarayikh kulam bashewi yeileikhu vehayu shosayikh limshisah vekhal bozezayikh ’eten lawaz. 
jeremiah 30:17	ki ’a‘aleh ’arukhah lakh umimakotayikh ’erpa’ekh ne’um yhoh ki nidakhah qare’u lakh tsiyon hi doresh ’en lah. 
jeremiah 30:18	koh ’amar yhoh hini shaw shewut ’aholei ya‘aqow umishkenotav ’arakhem veniwnetah ‘ir ‘al tilah ve’armon ‘al mishpato yeishew. 
jeremiah 30:19	veyatsa meihem todah veqol mesakhaqim vehirbitim velo yim‘atu vehikhbadtim velo yits‘aru. 
jeremiah 30:20	vehayu wanav keqedem va‘adato lefanai tikon ufaqadti ‘al kal lokhatsav. 
jeremiah 30:21	vehayah ’adiro mimenu umoshelo miqirbo yeitsei vehiqrawtiv venigash ’eilai ki mi hu zeh ‘araw ’et libo lageshet ’eilai ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 30:22	vihyitem li le‘am ve’anokhi ’ehyeh lakhem leilohim. 
jeremiah 30:23	hineh sa‘arat yhoh kheimah yatse’ah sa‘ar mitgorer ‘al rosh resha‘im yakhul. 
jeremiah 30:24	lo yashuw kharon ’af yhoh ‘ad ‘asoto ve‘ad haqimo mezimot libo be’akharit hayamim titbonu wah. 
jeremiah 31:1	ba‘et hahi ne’um yhoh ’ehyeh leilohim lekhol mishpekhot yisra’el vehemah yihyu li le‘am. 
jeremiah 31:2	koh ’amar yhoh matsa khen bamidbar ‘am seridei kharew halokh lehargi‘o yisra’el. 
jeremiah 31:3	meirakhoq yhoh nir’ah li ve’ahawat ‘olam ’ahawtikh ‘al ken meshakhtikh khased. 
jeremiah 31:4	‘od ’ewnekh veniwnet betulat yisra’el ‘od ta‘di tupayikh veyatsat bimkhol mesakhaqim. 
jeremiah 31:5	‘od tite‘i kheramim beharei shomeron nate‘u note‘im vekhileilu. 
jeremiah 31:6	ki yesh yom qare’u notserim behar ’efrayim qumu vena‘aleh tsiyon ’el yhoh ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 31:7	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ranu leya‘aqow simkhah vetsahalu berosh hagoyim hashmi‘u halelu ve’imru hosha‘ yhoh ’et ‘amekha ’et she’eirit yisra’el. 
jeremiah 31:8	hini meiwi ’otam mei’erets tsafon veqibatstim miyarketei ’arets bam ‘iver ufiseiakh harah veyoledet yakhdav qahal gadol yashuwu henah. 
jeremiah 31:9	biwkhi yawo’u uwetakhanunim ’owilem ’olikhem ’el nakhalei mayim bederekh yashar lo yikashelu bah ki hayiti leyisra’el le’aw ve’efrayim bekhori hu. 
jeremiah 31:10	shim‘u dewar yhoh goyim vehagidu wa’iyim mimerkhaq ve’imru mezareh yisra’el yeqabetsenu ushemaro kero‘eh ‘edro. 
jeremiah 31:11	ki fadah yhoh ’et ya‘aqow uge’alo miyad khazaq mimenu. 
jeremiah 31:12	uwa’u verinenu wimrom tsiyon venaharu ’el tuw yhoh ‘al dagan ve‘al tirosh ve‘al yitshar ve‘al benei tson uwaqar vehayetah nafsham kegan raveh velo yosifu leda’awah ‘od. 
jeremiah 31:13	’az tismakh betulah bemakhol uwakhurim uzeqeinim yakhdav vehafakhti ’ewlam lesason venikhamtim vesimakhtim migonam. 
jeremiah 31:14	veriveiti nefesh hakohanim dashen ve‘ami ’et tuwi yisba‘u ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 31:15	koh ’amar yhoh qol beramah nishma‘ nehi bekhi tamrurim rakhel mewakah ‘al baneha mei’anah lehinakhem ‘al baneha ki ’einenu. 
jeremiah 31:16	koh ’amar yhoh min‘i qolekh mibekhi ve‘einayikh midim‘ah ki yesh sakhar lif‘ulatekh ne’um yhoh veshawu mei’erets ’oyew. 
jeremiah 31:17	veyesh tiqvah le’akharitekh ne’um yhoh veshawu wanim ligwulam. 
jeremiah 31:18	shamoa‘ shama‘ti ’efrayim mitnoded yisartani va’ivaser ke‘eigel lo lumad hashiweini ve’ashuwah ki ’atah yhoh ’elohai. 
jeremiah 31:19	ki ’akharei shuwi nikhamti ve’akharei hivade‘i safaqti ‘al yarekh bosheti vegam nikhlamti ki nasati kherpat ne‘urai. 
jeremiah 31:20	hawen yaqir li ’efrayim ’im yeled sha‘ashu‘im ki midei daberi bo zakhor ’ezkerenu ‘od ‘al ken hamu mei‘ai lo rakhem ’arakhamenu ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 31:21	hatsiwi lakh tsiyunim simi lakh tamrurim shiti libekh lamsilah derekh halakheti halakhet uwi betulat yisra’el shuwi ’el ‘arayikh ’eleh. 
jeremiah 31:22	‘ad matai titkhamaqin habat hashoweiwah ki wara yhoh khadashah ba’arets neqeiwah tesowew gawer. 
jeremiah 31:23	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ‘od yomeru ’et hadawar hazeh be’erets yehudah uwe‘arav beshuwi ’et shewutam yewarekhkha yhoh neveh tsedeq har haqodesh. 
jeremiah 31:24	veyashewu wah yehudah vekhal ‘arav yakhdav ’ikarim venase‘u ba‘eider. 
jeremiah 31:25	ki hirveiti nefesh ‘ayeifah vekhal nefesh da’awah mileiti. 
jeremiah 31:26	‘al zot heqitsoti va’er’eh ushenati ‘arewah li. 
jeremiah 31:27	hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh vezara‘ti ’et bet yisra’el ve’et bet yehudah zera‘ ’adam vezera‘ beheimah. 
jeremiah 31:28	vehayah ka’asher shaqadti ‘aleihem lintosh velintots velaharos uleha’awid ulehareia‘ ken ’eshqod ‘aleihem liwnot velintoa‘ ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 31:29	bayamim hahem lo yomeru ‘od ’awot ’akhelu woser veshinei wanim tiqhenah. 
jeremiah 31:30	ki ’im ’ish ba‘avono yamut kal ha’adam ha’okhel haboser tiqhenah shinav. 
jeremiah 31:31	hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh vekharati ’et bet yisra’el ve’et bet yehudah berit khadashah. 
jeremiah 31:32	lo khaberit ’asher karati ’et ’awotam beyom hekheziqi weyadam lehotsi’am mei’erets mitsrayim ’asher hemah heifeiru ’et beriti ve’anokhi ba‘alti wam ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 31:33	ki zot haberit ’asher ’ekhrot ’et bet yisra’el ’akharei hayamim hahem ne’um yhoh natati ’et torati beqirbam ve‘al libam ’ekhtawenah vehayiti lahem leilohim vehemah yihyu li le‘am. 
jeremiah 31:34	velo yelamedu ‘od ’ish ’et rei‘eihu ve’ish ’et ’akhiv leimor de‘u ’et yhoh ki khulam yeide‘u ’oti lemiqtanam ve‘ad gedolam ne’um yhoh ki ’eslakh la‘avonam ulekhatatam lo ’ezkar ‘od. 
jeremiah 31:35	koh ’amar yhoh noten shemesh le’or yomam khuqot yareiakh vekhokhawim le’or layelah roga‘ hayam vayehemu galav yhoh tsewa’ot shemo. 
jeremiah 31:36	’im yamushu hakhuqim ha’eleh milefanai ne’um yhoh gam zera‘ yisra’el yishbetu mihyot go lefanai kal hayamim. 
jeremiah 31:37	koh ’amar yhoh ’im yimadu shamayim milma‘lah veyeikhaqeru mosdei ’erets lematah gam ’ani ’em’as bekhal zera‘ yisra’el ‘al kal ’asher ‘asu ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 31:38	hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh veniwnetah ha‘ir yhoh mimigdal khanan’el sha‘ar hapinah. 
jeremiah 31:39	veyatsa ‘od qeveh qav hamidah negdo ‘al giw‘at garew venasaw go‘atah. 
jeremiah 31:40	vekhal ha‘eimeq hapegarim vehadeshen vekhal hashereimot hashedeimot ‘ad nakhal qidron ‘ad pinat sha‘ar hasusim mizrakhah qodesh yhoh lo yinatesh velo yeihares ‘od le‘olam. 
jeremiah 32:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh bishnat bashanah ha‘asirit letsidqiyahu melekh yehudah hi hashanah shemoneh ‘esreh shanah linwukhadretsar. 
jeremiah 32:2	ve’az khel melekh bawel tsarim ‘al yerushalim veyirmeyahu hanawi hayah khalu bakhatsar hamatarah ’asher bet melekh yehudah. 
jeremiah 32:3	’asher kela’o tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor madua‘ ’atah niba leimor koh ’amar yhoh hini noten ’et ha‘ir hazot beyad melekh bawel ulekhadah. 
jeremiah 32:4	vetsidqiyahu melekh yehudah lo yimalet miyad hakasdim ki hinaton yinaten beyad melekh bawel vediber piv ‘im piv ve‘einav ’et ‘eino ‘einav tir’enah. 
jeremiah 32:5	uwawel yolikh ’et tsidqiyahu vesham yihyeh ‘ad paqedi ’oto ne’um yhoh ki tilakhamu ’et hakasdim lo tatslikhu. 
jeremiah 32:6	vayomer yirmeyahu hayah dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
jeremiah 32:7	hineh khanam’el ben shalum dodekha ba ’eilekha leimor qeneh lekha ’et sadi ’asher ba‘anatot ki lekha mishpat hage’ulah liqnot. 
jeremiah 32:8	vayawo ’eilai khanam’el ben dodi kidwar yhoh ’el khatsar hamatarah vayomer ’eilai qeneh na ’et sadi ’asher ba‘anatot ’asher be’erets binyamin ki lekha mishpat hayrushah ulekha hage’ulah qeneh lakh va’eida‘ ki dewar yhoh hu. 
jeremiah 32:9	va’eqneh ’et hasadeh mei’et khanam’el ben dodi ’asher ba‘anatot va’eshqalah lo ’et hakesef shiw‘ah sheqalim va‘asarah hakasef. 
jeremiah 32:10	va’ekhtow baseifer va’ekhtom va’a‘ed ‘eidim va’eshqol hakesef bemozenayim. 
jeremiah 32:11	va’eqakh ’et seifer hamiqnah ’et hekhatum hamitsvah vehakhuqim ve’et hagalui. 
jeremiah 32:12	va’eten ’et haseifer hamiqnah ’el barukh ben neiriyah ben makhseiyah le‘einei khanam’el dodi ule‘einei ha‘eidim hakotewim beseifer hamiqnah le‘einei kal hayehudim hayoshewim bakhatsar hamatarah. 
jeremiah 32:13	va’atsaveh ’et barukh le‘eineihem leimor. 
jeremiah 32:14	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el laqoakh ’et hasefarim ha’eleh ’et seifer hamiqnah hazeh ve’et hekhatum ve’et seifer hagalui hazeh unetatam bikhli khares lema‘an ya‘amdu yamim rabim. 
jeremiah 32:15	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ‘od yiqanu watim vesadot ukheramim ba’arets hazot. 
jeremiah 32:16	va’etpalel ’el yhoh ’akharei titi ’et seifer hamiqnah ’el barukh ben neiriyah leimor. 
jeremiah 32:17	’ahah ’adonai yhoh hineh ’atah ‘asita ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets bekhokhakha hagadol uwizro‘akha hanetuyah lo yipalei mimekha kal dawar. 
jeremiah 32:18	‘oseh khesed la’alafim umeshalem ‘avon ’awot ’el kheq beneihem ’akhareihem ha’el hagadol hagibor yhoh tsewa’ot shemo. 
jeremiah 32:19	gedol ha‘eitsah veraw ha‘aliliyah ’asher ‘einekha fequkhot ‘al kal darkhei benei ’adam latet le’ish kidrakhav vekhifri ma‘alalav. 
jeremiah 32:20	’ashersa meta ’otot umofetim be’erets mitsrayim ‘ad hayom hazeh uweyisra’el uwa’adam vata‘aseh lekha shem kayom hazeh. 
jeremiah 32:21	vatotsei ’et ‘amekha ’et yisra’el mei’erets mitsrayim be’otot uwemoftim uweyad khazaqah uwe’ezroa‘ netuyah uwemora gadol. 
jeremiah 32:22	vatiten lahem ’et ha’arets hazot ’asher nishba‘ta la’awotam latet lahem ’erets zawat khalaw udewash. 
jeremiah 32:23	vayawo’u vayirshu ’otah velo shame‘u weqolekha uwetorotekha uwetoratekha lo halakhu ’et kal ’asher tsivitah lahem la‘asot lo ‘asu vataqrei ’otam ’et kal hara‘ah hazot. 
jeremiah 32:24	hineh hasolelot ba’u ha‘ir lelakhedah veha‘ir nitenah beyad hakasdim hanilkhamim ‘aleha mipenei hakherew vehara‘aw vehadawer va’asher dibarta hayah vehinekha ro’eh. 
jeremiah 32:25	ve’atah ’amarta ’eilai ’adonai yhoh qeneh lekha hasadeh bakesef veha‘ed ‘eidim veha‘ir nitenah beyad hakasdim. 
jeremiah 32:26	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 32:27	hineh ’ani yhoh ’elohei kal basar hamimeni yipalei kal dawar. 
jeremiah 32:28	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh hini noten ’et ha‘ir hazot beyad hakasdim uweyad newukhadretsar melekh bawel ulekhadah. 
jeremiah 32:29	uwa’u hakasdim hanilkhamim ‘al ha‘ir hazot vehitsitu ’et ha‘ir hazot ba’esh userafuha ve’et habatim ’asher qiteru ‘al gagoteihem laba‘al vehisikhu nesakhim leilohim ’akheirim lema‘an hakh‘iseini. 
jeremiah 32:30	ki hayu wenei yisra’el uwenei yehudah ’akh ‘osim hara‘ be‘einai mine‘uroteihem ki wenei yisra’el ’akh makh‘isim ’oti bema‘aseh yedeihem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 32:31	ki ‘al ’api ve‘al khamati hayetah li ha‘ir hazot lemin hayom ’asher banu ’otah ve‘ad hayom hazeh lahasirah mei‘al panai. 
jeremiah 32:32	‘al kal ra‘at benei yisra’el uwenei yehudah ’asher ‘asu lehakh‘iseini hemah malkheihem sareihem kohaneihem unewi’eihem ve’ish yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim. 
jeremiah 32:33	vayifnu ’eilai ‘oref velo fanim velamed ’otam hashkem velamed ve’einam shome‘im laqakhat musar. 
jeremiah 32:34	vayasimu shiqutseihem babayit ’asher niqra shemi ‘alav letame’o. 
jeremiah 32:35	vayiwnu ’et bamot haba‘al ’asher begei wen hinom leha‘awir ’et beneihem ve’et benoteihem lamolekh ’asher lo tsivitim velo ‘aletah ‘al libi la‘asot hato‘eiwah hazot lema‘an hakhati hakhati ’et yehudah. 
jeremiah 32:36	ve‘atah lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’el ha‘ir hazot ’asher ’atem ’omerim nitenah beyad melekh bawel bakherew uwara‘aw uwadawer. 
jeremiah 32:37	hini meqabetsam mikal ha’aratsot ’asher hidakhtim sham be’api uwakhamati uweqetsef gadol vahashiwotim ’el hamaqom hazeh vehoshawtim lawetakh. 
jeremiah 32:38	vehayu li le‘am va’ani ’ehyeh lahem leilohim. 
jeremiah 32:39	venatati lahem lew ’ekhad vederekh ’ekhad leyir’ah ’oti kal hayamim letow lahem veliwneihem ’akhareihem. 
jeremiah 32:40	vekharati lahem berit ‘olam ’asher lo ’ashuw mei’akhareihem leheitiwi ’otam ve’et yir’ati ’eten bilwawam lewilti sur mei‘alai. 
jeremiah 32:41	vesasti ‘aleihem leheitiw ’otam uneta‘tim ba’arets hazot be’emet bekhal libi uwekhal nafshi. 
jeremiah 32:42	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ka’asher heiweiti ’el ha‘am hazeh ’et kal hara‘ah hagedolah hazot ken ’anokhi meiwi ‘aleihem ’et kal hatowah ’asher ’anokhi dower ‘aleihem. 
jeremiah 32:43	veniqnah hasadeh ba’arets hazot ’asher ’atem ’omerim shemamah hi mei’en ’adam uweheimah nitenah beyad hakasdim. 
jeremiah 32:44	sadot bakesef yiqnu vekhatow baseifer vekhatom veha‘ed ‘eidim be’erets binyamin uwiswiwei yerushalim uwe‘arei yehudah uwe‘arei hahar uwe‘arei hashefeilah uwe‘arei hanegew ki ’ashiw ’et shewutam ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 33:1	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu sheinit vehu ‘odenu ‘atsur bakhatsar hamatarah leimor. 
jeremiah 33:2	koh ’amar yhoh ‘osah yhoh yotser ’otah lahakhinah yhoh shemo. 
jeremiah 33:3	qera ’eilai ve’e‘eneka ve’agidah lekha gedolot uwetsurot lo yeda‘tam. 
jeremiah 33:4	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ‘al batei ha‘ir hazot ve‘al batei malkhei yehudah hanetutsim ’el hasolelot ve’el hekharew. 
jeremiah 33:5	ba’im lehilakhem ’et hakasdim ulemal’am ’et pigrei ha’adam ’asher hikeiti we’api uwakhamati va’asher histarti fanai meiha‘ir hazot ‘al kal ra‘atam. 
jeremiah 33:6	hini ma‘aleh lah ’arukhah umarpei urefatim vegileiti lahem ‘ateret shalom ve’emet. 
jeremiah 33:7	vahashiwoti ’et shewut yehudah ve’et shewut yisra’el uwenitim kewarishonah. 
jeremiah 33:8	vetihartim mikal ‘avonam ’asher khate’u li vesalakhti lekhol lekhal ‘avonoteihem ’asher khate’u li va’asher pashe‘u wi. 
jeremiah 33:9	vehayetah li leshem sason lithilah uletif’eret lekhol goyei ha’arets ’asher yishme‘u ’et kal hatowah ’asher ’anokhi ‘oseh ’otam ufakhadu veragezu ‘al kal hatowah ve‘al kal hashalom ’asher ’anokhi ‘oseh lah. 
jeremiah 33:10	koh ’amar yhoh ‘od yishama‘ bamaqom hazeh ’asher ’atem ’omerim kharew hu mei’en ’adam umei’en beheimah be‘arei yehudah uwekhutsot yerushalim hanshamot mei’en ’adam umei’en yoshew umei’en beheimah. 
jeremiah 33:11	qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah qol ’omerim hodu ’et yhoh tsewa’ot ki tow yhoh ki le‘olam khasdo mewi’im todah bet yhoh ki ’ashiw ’et shewut ha’arets kewarishonah ’amar yhoh. 
jeremiah 33:12	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ‘od yihyeh bamaqom hazeh hekharew mei’en ’adam ve‘ad beheimah uwekhal ‘arav neveh ro‘im marbitsim tson. 
jeremiah 33:13	be‘arei hahar be‘arei hashefeilah uwe‘arei hanegew uwe’erets binyamin uwiswiwei yerushalim uwe‘arei yehudah ‘od ta‘aworenah hatson ‘al yedei moneh ’amar yhoh. 
jeremiah 33:14	hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh vahaqimoti ’et hadawar hatow ’asher dibarti ’el bet yisra’el ve‘al bet yehudah. 
jeremiah 33:15	bayamim hahem uwa‘et hahi ’atsmiakh ledavid tsemakh tsedaqah ve‘asah mishpat utsedaqah ba’arets. 
jeremiah 33:16	bayamim hahem tivasha‘ yehudah virushalim tishkon lawetakh vezeh ’asher yiqra lah yhoh tsidqeinu. 
jeremiah 33:17	ki khoh ’amar yhoh lo yikaret ledavid ’ish yoshew ‘al kisei wet yisra’el. 
jeremiah 33:18	velakohanim halviyim lo yikaret ’ish milefanai ma‘aleh ‘olah umaqtir minkhah ve‘oseh zewakh kal hayamim. 
jeremiah 33:19	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 33:20	koh ’amar yhoh ’im tafeiru ’et beriti hayom ve’et beriti halayelah ulewilti heyot yomam valaylah be‘itam. 
jeremiah 33:21	gam beriti tufar ’et david ‘awdi mihyot lo wen molekh ‘al kis’o ve’et halviyim hakohanim mesharetai. 
jeremiah 33:22	’asher lo yisafer tsewa hashamayim velo yimad khol hayam ken ’arbeh ’et zera‘ david ‘awdi ve’et halviyim mesharetei ’oti. 
jeremiah 33:23	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 33:24	halo ra’ita mah ha‘am hazeh diberu leimor shetei hamishpakhot ’asher bakhar yhoh bahem vayim’asem ve’et ‘ami yin’atsun mihyot ‘od go lifneihem. 
jeremiah 33:25	koh ’amar yhoh ’im lo weriti yomam valayelah khuqot shamayim va’arets lo sameti. 
jeremiah 33:26	gam zera‘ ya‘aqow vedavid ‘awdi ’em’as miqakhat mizar‘o moshelim ’el zera‘ ’awraham yiskhaq veya‘aqow ki ’ashuw ’ashiw ’et shewutam verikhamtim. 
jeremiah 34:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh unewukhadretsar melekh bawel vekhal kheilo vekhal mamlekhot ’erets memshelet yado vekhal ha‘amim nilkhamim ‘al yerushalim ve‘al kal ‘areha leimor. 
jeremiah 34:2	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el halokh ve’amarta ’el tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve’amarta ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh hini noten ’et ha‘ir hazot beyad melekh bawel userafah ba’esh. 
jeremiah 34:3	ve’atah lo timalet miyado ki tafos titafes uweyado tinaten ve‘einekha ’et ‘einei melekh bawel tir’enah ufihu ’et pikha yedaber uwawel tawo. 
jeremiah 34:4	’akh shema‘ dewar yhoh tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah koh ’amar yhoh ‘alekha lo tamut bekharew. 
jeremiah 34:5	beshalom tamut ukhemisrefot ’awotekha hamelakhim harishonim ’asher hayu lefanekha ken yisrefu lakh veho ’adon yispedu lakh ki dawar ’ani dibarti ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 34:6	vaydaber yirmeyahu hanawi ’el tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh birushalim. 
jeremiah 34:7	vekhel melekh bawel nilkhamim ‘al yerushalim ve‘al kal ‘arei yehudah hanotarot ’el lakhish ve’el ‘azeiqah ki henah nish’aru be‘arei yehudah ‘arei miwtsar. 
jeremiah 34:8	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh ’akharei kerot hamelekh tsidqiyahu berit ’et kal ha‘am ’asher birushalim liqro lahem deror. 
jeremiah 34:9	leshalakh ’ish ’et ‘awdo ve’ish ’et shifkhato ha‘iwri veha‘iwriyah khafeshim lewilti ‘awad bam bihudi ’akhihu ’ish. 
jeremiah 34:10	vayishme‘u khal hasarim vekhal ha‘am ’asher ba’u waberit leshalakh ’ish ’et ‘awdo ve’ish ’et shifkhato khafeshim lewilti ‘awad bam ‘od vayishme‘u vayshaleikhu. 
jeremiah 34:11	vayashuwu ’akharei khen vayashiwu ’et ha‘awadim ve’et hashefakhot ’asher shilekhu khafeshim vayakhbishum vayikhbeshum la‘awadim velishfakhot. 
jeremiah 34:12	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 34:13	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’anokhi karati werit ’et ’awoteikhem beyom hotsi’i ’otam mei’erets mitsrayim mibet ‘awadim leimor. 
jeremiah 34:14	miqets shewa‘ shanim teshalekhu ’ish ’et ’akhiv ha‘iwri ’asher yimakher lekha va‘awadekha shesh shanim veshilakhto khafeshi mei‘imakh velo shame‘u ’awoteikhem ’eilai velo hitu ’et ’azenam. 
jeremiah 34:15	vatashuwu ’atem hayom vata‘asu ’et hayashar be‘einai liqro deror ’ish lerei‘eihu vatikhretu werit lefanai babayit ’asher niqra shemi ‘alav. 
jeremiah 34:16	vatashuwu vatekhalelu ’et shemi vatashiwu ’ish ’et ‘awdo ve’ish ’et shifkhato ’asher shilakhtem khafeshim lenafsham vatikhbeshu ’otam lihyot lakhem la‘awadim velishfakhot. 
jeremiah 34:17	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’atem lo shema‘tem ’eilai liqro deror ’ish le’akhiv ve’ish lerei‘eihu hini qorei lakhem deror ne’um yhoh ’el hakherew ’el hadewer ve’el hara‘aw venatati ’etkhem lizva‘ah leza‘avah lekhol mamlekhot ha’arets. 
jeremiah 34:18	venatati ’et ha’anashim ha‘owerim ’et beriti ’asher lo heiqimu ’et diwrei haberit ’asher karetu lefanai ha‘eigel ’asher karetu lishnayim vaya‘awru ben betarav. 
jeremiah 34:19	sarei yehudah vesarei yerushalim hasarisim vehakohanim vekhol ‘am ha’arets ha‘owerim ben bitrei ha‘eigel. 
jeremiah 34:20	venatati ’otam beyad ’oyeweihem uweyad mewaqshei nafsham vehayetah niwlatam lema’akhal le‘of hashamayim ulewehemat ha’arets. 
jeremiah 34:21	ve’et tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve’et sarav ’eten beyad ’oyeweihem uweyad mewaqshei nafsham uweyad khel melekh bawel ha‘olim mei‘aleikhem. 
jeremiah 34:22	hini metsaveh ne’um yhoh vahashiwotim ’el ha‘ir hazot venilkhamu ‘aleha ulekhaduha userafuha wa’esh ve’et ‘arei yehudah ’eten shemamah mei’en yoshew. 
jeremiah 35:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh bimei yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah leimor. 
jeremiah 35:2	halokh ’el bet hareikhawim vedibarta ’otam vahawi’otam bet yhoh ’el ’akhat haleshakhot vehishqita ’otam yayin. 
jeremiah 35:3	va’eqakh ’et ya’azanyah wen yirmeyahu ben khawatsinyah ve’et ’ekhav ve’et kal banav ve’et kal bet hareikhawim. 
jeremiah 35:4	va’awi ’otam bet yhoh ’el lishkat benei khanan ben yigdalyahu ’ish ha’elohim ’asher ’eitsel lishkat hasarim ’asher mima‘al lelishkat ma‘aseiyahu wen shalum shomer hasaf. 
jeremiah 35:5	va’eten lifnei benei wet hareikhawim gewi‘im melei’im yayin vekhosot va’omar ’aleihem shetu yayin. 
jeremiah 35:6	vayomeru lo nishteh yayin ki yonadaw ben reikhaw ’awinu tsivah ‘aleinu leimor lo tishtu yayin ’atem uweneikhem ‘ad ‘olam. 
jeremiah 35:7	uwayit lo tiwnu vezera‘ lo tizra‘u vekherem lo tita‘u velo yihyeh lakhem ki ba’ohalim teishewu kal yemeikhem lema‘an tikhyu yamim rabim ‘al penei ha’adamah ’asher ’atem garim sham. 
jeremiah 35:8	vanishma‘ beqol yehonadaw ben reikhaw ’awinu lekhol ’asher tsivanu lewilti shetot yayin kal yameinu ’anakhnu nasheinu baneinu uwenoteinu. 
jeremiah 35:9	ulewilti benot batim leshiwteinu vekherem vesadeh vazera‘ lo yihyeh lanu. 
jeremiah 35:10	vaneishew ba’ohalim vanishma‘ vana‘as kekhol ’asher tsivanu yonadaw ’awinu. 
jeremiah 35:11	vayhi ba‘alot newukhadretsar melekh bawel ’el ha’arets vanomer bo’u venawo yerushalim mipenei khel hakasdim umipenei khel ’aram vaneishew birushalim. 
jeremiah 35:12	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 35:13	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el halokh ve’amarta le’ish yehudah uleyoshewei yerushalim halo tiqkhu musar lishmoa‘ ’el dewarai ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 35:14	huqam ’et diwrei yehonadaw ben reikhaw ’asher tsivah ’et banav lewilti shetot yayin velo shatu ‘ad hayom hazeh ki shame‘u ’et mitsvat ’awihem ve’anokhi dibarti ’aleikhem hashkem vedaber velo shema‘tem ’eilai. 
jeremiah 35:15	va’eshlakh ’aleikhem ’et kal ‘awadai hanewi’im hashkem veshaloakh leimor shuwu na ’ish midarko hara‘ah veheitiwu ma‘aleikhem ve’al teilekhu ’akharei ’elohim ’akheirim le‘awedam ushewu ’el ha’adamah ’asher natati lakhem vela’awoteikhem velo hititem ’et ’azenekhem velo shema‘tem ’eilai. 
jeremiah 35:16	ki heiqimu benei yehonadaw ben reikhaw ’et mitsvat ’awihem ’asher tsivam veha‘am hazeh lo shame‘u ’eilai. 
jeremiah 35:17	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el hini meiwi ’el yehudah ve’el kal yoshewei yerushalim ’et kal hara‘ah ’asher dibarti ‘aleihem ya‘an dibarti ’aleihem velo shamei‘u va’eqra lahem velo ‘anu. 
jeremiah 35:18	ulewet hareikhawim ’amar yirmeyahu koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ya‘an ’asher shema‘tem ‘al mitsvat yehonadaw ’awikhem vatishmeru ’et kal mitsvotav vata‘asu kekhol ’asher tsivah ’etkhem. 
jeremiah 35:19	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el lo yikaret ’ish leyonadaw ben reikhaw ‘omed lefanai kal hayamim. 
jeremiah 36:1	vayhi bashanah harewi‘it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadawar hazeh ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 36:2	qakh lekha megilat seifer vekhatawta ’eileha ’et kal hadewarim ’asher dibarti ’eilekha ‘al yisra’el ve‘al yehudah ve‘al kal hagoyim miyom dibarti ’eilekha mimei yoshiyahu ve‘ad hayom hazeh. 
jeremiah 36:3	’ulai yishme‘u bet yehudah ’et kal hara‘ah ’asher ’anokhi khoshew la‘asot lahem lema‘an yashuwu ’ish midarko hara‘ah vesalakhti la‘avonam ulekhatatam. 
jeremiah 36:4	vayiqra yirmeyahu ’et barukh ben neiriyah vayikhtow barukh mipi yirmeyahu ’et kal diwrei yhoh ’asher diber ’eilav ‘al megilat seifer. 
jeremiah 36:5	vaytsaveh yirmeyahu ’et barukh leimor ’ani ‘atsur lo ’ukhal lawo bet yhoh. 
jeremiah 36:6	uwata ’atah veqarata wamegilah ’asher katawta mipi ’et diwrei yhoh be’azenei ha‘am bet yhoh beyom tsom vegam be’azenei khal yehudah haba’im mei‘areihem tiqra’em. 
jeremiah 36:7	’ulai tipol tekhinatam lifnei yhoh veyashuwu ’ish midarko hara‘ah ki gadol ha’af vehakheimah ’asher diber yhoh ’el ha‘am hazeh. 
jeremiah 36:8	vaya‘as barukh ben neiriyah kekhol ’asher tsivahu yirmeyahu hanawi liqro waseifer diwrei yhoh bet yhoh. 
jeremiah 36:9	vayhi washanah hakhamishit lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah bakhodesh hateshi‘i qare’u tsom lifnei yhoh kal ha‘am birushalim vekhal ha‘am haba’im mei‘arei yehudah birushalim. 
jeremiah 36:10	vayiqra warukh baseifer ’et diwrei yirmeyahu bet yhoh belishkat gemaryahu wen shafan hasofer bekhatser ha‘elyon petakh sha‘ar bet yhoh hekhadash be’azenei kal ha‘am. 
jeremiah 36:11	vayishma‘ mikhayehu wen gemaryahu wen shafan ’et kal diwrei yhoh mei‘al haseifer. 
jeremiah 36:12	vayeired bet hamelekh ‘al lishkat hasofer vehineh sham kal hasarim yoshewim ’elishama‘ hasofer udelayahu wenosh ma‘yahu ve’elnatan ben ‘akhbor ugemaryahu wen shafan vetsidqiyahu wen khananyahu vekhal hasarim. 
jeremiah 36:13	vayaged lahem mikhayehu ’et kal hadewarim ’asher shameia‘ biqro warukh baseifer be’azenei ha‘am. 
jeremiah 36:14	vayishlekhu khal hasarim ’el barukh ’et yehudi ben netanyahu ben shelemyahu wen kushi leimor hamegilah ’asher qarata bah be’azenei ha‘am qakhenah weyadekha valekh vayiqakh barukh ben neiriyahu ’et hamegilah beyado vayawo ’aleihem. 
jeremiah 36:15	vayomeru ’eilav shew na uqera’enah be’azeneinu vayiqra warukh be’azeneihem. 
jeremiah 36:16	vayhi keshame‘am ’et kal hadewarim pakhadu ’ish ’el rei‘eihu vayomeru ’el barukh haged nagid lamelekh ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh. 
jeremiah 36:17	ve’et barukh sha’alu leimor haged na lanu ’ekh katawta ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh mipiv. 
jeremiah 36:18	vayomer lahem barukh mipiv yiqra ’eilai ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh va’ani kotew ‘al haseifer badeyo. 
jeremiah 36:19	vayomeru hasarim ’el barukh lekh hisater ’atah veyirmeyahu ve’ish ’al yeida‘ ’eifoh ’atem. 
jeremiah 36:20	vayawo’u ’el hamelekh khatseirah ve’et hamegilah hifqidu belishkat ’elishama‘ hasofer vayagidu be’azenei hamelekh ’et kal hadewarim. 
jeremiah 36:21	vayishlakh hamelekh ’et yehudi laqakhat ’et hamegilah vayiqakheha milishkat ’elishama‘ hasofer vayiqra’eha yehudi be’azenei hamelekh uwe’azenei kal hasarim ha‘omedim mei‘al hamelekh. 
jeremiah 36:22	vehamelekh yoshew bet hakhoref bakhodesh hateshi‘i ve’et ha’akh lefanav mewo‘aret. 
jeremiah 36:23	vayhi kiqro yehudi shalosh delatot ve’arba‘ah yiqra‘eha beta‘ar hasofer vehashlekh ’el ha’esh ’asher ’el ha’akh ‘ad tom kal hamegilah ‘al ha’esh ’asher ‘al ha’akh. 
jeremiah 36:24	velo fakhadu velo qare‘u ’et bigdeihem hamelekh vekhal ‘awadav hashome‘im ’et kal hadewarim ha’eleh. 
jeremiah 36:25	vegam ’elnatan udelayahu ugemaryahu hifgi‘u wamelekh lewilti serof ’et hamegilah velo shama‘ ’aleihem. 
jeremiah 36:26	vaytsaveh hamelekh ’et yerakhme’el ben hamelekh ve’et serayahu wen ‘azri’el ve’et shelemyahu ben ‘awde’el laqakhat ’et barukh hasofer ve’et yirmeyahu hanawi vayastirem yhoh. 
jeremiah 36:27	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu ’akharei serof hamelekh ’et hamegilah ve’et hadewarim ’asher kataw barukh mipi yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 36:28	shuw qakh lekha megilah ’akheret ukhetow ‘aleha ’et kal hadewarim harishonim ’asher hayu ‘al hamegilah harishonah ’asher saraf yehoyaqim melekh yehudah. 
jeremiah 36:29	ve‘al yehoyaqim melekh yehudah tomar koh ’amar yhoh ’atah sarafta ’et hamegilah hazot leimor madua‘ katawta ‘aleha leimor bo yawo melekh bawel vehishkhit ’et ha’arets hazot vehishbit mimenah ’adam uweheimah. 
jeremiah 36:30	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ‘al yehoyaqim melekh yehudah lo yihyeh lo yoshew ‘al kisei david veniwlato tihyeh mushlekhet lakhorew bayom velaqerakh balayelah. 
jeremiah 36:31	ufaqadti ‘alav ve‘al zar‘o ve‘al ‘awadav ’et ‘avonam veheiweiti ‘aleihem ve‘al yoshewei yerushalim ve’el ’ish yehudah ’et kal hara‘ah ’asher dibarti ’aleihem velo shamei‘u. 
jeremiah 36:32	veyirmeyahu laqakh megilah ’akheret vayitenah ’el barukh ben neiriyahu hasofer vayikhtow ‘aleha mipi yirmeyahu ’et kal diwrei haseifer ’asher saraf yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ba’esh ve‘od nosaf ‘aleihem dewarim rabim kahemah. 
jeremiah 37:1	vayimlakh melekh tsidqiyahu ben yoshiyahu takhat kaneyahu ben yehoyaqim ’asher himlikh newukhadretsar melekh bawel be’erets yehudah. 
jeremiah 37:2	velo shama‘ hu va‘awadav ve‘am ha’arets ’el diwrei yhoh ’asher diber beyad yirmeyahu hanawi. 
jeremiah 37:3	vayishlakh hamelekh tsidqiyahu ’et yehukhal ben shelemyah ve’et tsefanyahu wen ma‘aseiyah hakohen ’el yirmeyahu hanawi leimor hitpalel na wa‘adeinu ’el yhoh ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 37:4	veyirmeyahu ba veyotsei betokh ha‘am velo natenu ’oto bet hakeli hakelu. 
jeremiah 37:5	vekhel par‘oh yatsa mimitsrayim vayishme‘u hakasdim hatsarim ‘al yerushalim ’et shim‘am vayei‘alu mei‘al yerushalim. 
jeremiah 37:6	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu hanawi leimor. 
jeremiah 37:7	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el koh tomeru ’el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh ’etkhem ’eilai ledaresheini hineh khel par‘oh hayotsei lakhem le‘ezrah shaw le’artso mitsrayim. 
jeremiah 37:8	veshawu hakasdim venilkhamu ‘al ha‘ir hazot ulekhaduha userafuha wa’esh. 
jeremiah 37:9	koh ’amar yhoh ’al tashi’u nafshoteikhem leimor halokh yeilekhu mei‘aleinu hakasdim ki lo yeileikhu. 
jeremiah 37:10	ki ’im hikitem kal khel kasdim hanilkhamim ’itekhem venish’aru wam ’anashim meduqarim ’ish be’aholo yaqumu vesarefu ’et ha‘ir hazot ba’esh. 
jeremiah 37:11	vehayah behei‘alot khel hakasdim mei‘al yerushalim mipenei khel par‘oh. 
jeremiah 37:12	vayeitsei yirmeyahu mirushalim lalekhet ’erets binyamin lakhaliq misham betokh ha‘am. 
jeremiah 37:13	vayhi hu besha‘ar binyamin vesham ba‘al peqidut ushemo yir’iyayh ben shelemyah ben khananyah vayitpos ’et yirmeyahu hanawi leimor ’el hakasdim ’atah nofel. 
jeremiah 37:14	vayomer yirmeyahu sheqer ’eineni nofel ‘al hakasdim velo shama‘ ’eilav vayitpos yir’iyayh beyirmeyahu vaywi’eihu ’el hasarim. 
jeremiah 37:15	vayiqtsefu hasarim ‘al yirmeyahu vehiku ’oto venatenu ’oto bet ha’eisur bet yehonatan hasofer ki ’oto ‘asu lewet hakele. 
jeremiah 37:16	ki wa yirmeyahu ’el bet habor ve’el hakhanuyot vayeishew sham yirmeyahu yamim rabim. 
jeremiah 37:17	vayishlakh hamelekh tsidqiyahu vayiqakheihu vayish’aleihu hamelekh beweito baseiter vayomer hayesh dawar mei’et yhoh vayomer yirmeyahu yesh vayomer beyad melekh bawel tinaten. 
jeremiah 37:18	vayomer yirmeyahu ’el hamelekh tsidqiyahu meh khatati lekha vela‘awadekha vela‘am hazeh ki netatem ’oti ’el bet hakele. 
jeremiah 37:19	ve’ayo ve’ayeh newi’eikhem ’asher nibe’u lakhem leimor lo yawo melekh bawel ‘aleikhem ve‘al ha’arets hazot. 
jeremiah 37:20	ve‘atah shema‘ na ’adoni hamelekh tipal na tekhinati lefanekha ve’al teshiweini bet yehonatan hasofer velo ’amut sham. 
jeremiah 37:21	vaytsaveh hamelekh tsidqiyahu vayafqidu ’et yirmeyahu bakhatsar hamatarah venaton lo khikar lekhem layom mikhuts ha’ofim ‘ad tom kal halekhem min ha‘ir vayeishew yirmeyahu bakhatsar hamatarah. 
jeremiah 38:1	vayishma‘ shefatyah wen matan ugedalyahu ben pashkhur veyukhal ben shelemyahu ufashkhur ben malkiyah ’et hadewarim ’asher yirmeyahu medaber ’el kal ha‘am leimor. 
jeremiah 38:2	koh ’amar yhoh hayoshew ba‘ir hazot yamut bakherew bara‘aw uwadawer vehayotsei ’el hakasdim yikhyeh vekhayah vehayetah lo nafsho leshalal vakhai. 
jeremiah 38:3	koh ’amar yhoh hinaton tinaten ha‘ir hazot beyad khel melekh bawel ulekhadah. 
jeremiah 38:4	vayomeru hasarim ’el hamelekh yumat na ’et ha’ish hazeh ki ‘al ken hu merapei ’et yedei ’anshei hamilkhamah hanish’arim ba‘ir hazot ve’et yedei khal ha‘am ledaber ’aleihem kadewarim ha’eleh ki ha’ish hazeh ’einenu doresh leshalom la‘am hazeh ki ’im lera‘ah. 
jeremiah 38:5	vayomer hamelekh tsidqiyahu hineh hu beyedkhem ki ’en hamelekh yukhal ’etkhem dawar. 
jeremiah 38:6	vayiqkhu ’et yirmeyahu vayashlikhu ’oto ’el habor malkiyahu wen hamelekh ’asher bakhatsar hamatarah vayshalekhu ’et yirmeyahu bakhawalim uwabor ’en mayim ki ’im tit vayitba‘ yirmeyahu batit. 
jeremiah 38:7	vayishma‘ ‘ewed melekh hakushi ’ish saris vehu bewet hamelekh ki natenu ’et yirmeyahu ’el habor vehamelekh yoshew besha‘ar binyamin. 
jeremiah 38:8	vayeitsei ‘ewed melekh mibet hamelekh vaydaber ’el hamelekh leimor. 
jeremiah 38:9	’adoni hamelekh heirei‘u ha’anashim ha’eleh ’et kal ’asher ‘asu leyirmeyahu hanawi ’et ’asher hishlikhu ’el habor vayamat takhtav mipenei hara‘aw ki ’en halekhem ‘od ba‘ir. 
jeremiah 38:10	vaytsaveh hamelekh ’et ‘ewed melekh hakushi leimor qakh beyadekha mizeh sheloshim ’anashim veha‘alita ’et yirmeyahu hanawi min habor beterem yamut. 
jeremiah 38:11	vayiqakh ‘ewed melekh ’et ha’anashim beyado vayawo wet hamelekh ’el takhat ha’otsar vayiqakh misham beloyei hasekhawot sekhawot uweloyei melakhim vayshalekhem ’el yirmeyahu ’el habor bakhawalim. 
jeremiah 38:12	vayomer ‘ewed melekh hakushi ’el yirmeyahu sim na belo’ei hasekhawot vehamelakhim takhat ’atsilot yadekha mitakhat lakhawalim vaya‘as yirmeyahu ken. 
jeremiah 38:13	vayimshekhu ’et yirmeyahu bakhawalim vaya‘alu ’oto min habor vayeishew yirmeyahu bakhatsar hamatarah. 
jeremiah 38:14	vayishlakh hamelekh tsidqiyahu vayiqakh ’et yirmeyahu hanawi ’eilav ’el mawo hashelishi ’asher bewet yhoh vayomer hamelekh ’el yirmeyahu sho’el ’ani ’otekha dawar ’al tekhakhed mimeni dawar. 
jeremiah 38:15	vayomer yirmeyahu ’el tsidqiyahu ki ’agid lekha halo hamet temiteini vekhi ’i‘atsekha lo tishma‘ ’eilai. 
jeremiah 38:16	vayishawa‘ hamelekh tsidqiyahu ’el yirmeyahu baseiter leimor khai yhoh ’et ’asher ‘asah lanu ’et hanefesh hazot ’im ’amitekha ve’im ’etenkha beyad ha’anashim ha’eleh ’asher mewaqshim ’et nafshekha. 
jeremiah 38:17	vayomer yirmeyahu ’el tsidqiyahu koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ’im yatso teitsei ’el sarei melekh bawel vekhayetah nafshekha veha‘ir hazot lo tisaref ba’esh vekhayitah ’atah uweitekha. 
jeremiah 38:18	ve’im lo teitsei ’el sarei melekh bawel venitenah ha‘ir hazot beyad hakasdim userafuha ba’esh ve’atah lo timalet miyadam. 
jeremiah 38:19	vayomer hamelekh tsidqiyahu ’el yirmeyahu ’ani do’eg ’et hayehudim ’asher nafelu ’el hakasdim pen yitenu ’oti beyadam vehit‘alelu wi. 
jeremiah 38:20	vayomer yirmeyahu lo yiteinu shema‘ na beqol yhoh la’asher ’ani dower ’eilekha veyitaw lekha utekhi nafshekha. 
jeremiah 38:21	ve’im ma’en ’atah latset zeh hadawar ’asher hir’ani yhoh. 
jeremiah 38:22	vehineh khal hanashim ’asher nish’aru bewet melekh yehudah mutsa’ot ’el sarei melekh bawel vehenah ’omerot hisitukha veyakhelu lekha ’anshei shelomekha hatebe‘u wabots raglekha nasogu ’akhor. 
jeremiah 38:23	ve’et kal nashekha ve’et banekha motsi’im ’el hakasdim ve’atah lo timalet miyadam ki weyad melekh bawel titafes ve’et ha‘ir hazot tisrof ba’esh. 
jeremiah 38:24	vayomer tsidqiyahu ’el yirmeyahu ’ish ’al yeida‘ badewarim ha’eleh velo tamut. 
jeremiah 38:25	vekhi yishme‘u hasarim ki dibarti ’itakh uwa’u ’eilekha ve’ameru ’eilekha hagidah na lanu mah dibarta ’el hamelekh ’al tekhakhed mimenu velo nemitekha umah diber ’eilekha hamelekh. 
jeremiah 38:26	ve’amarta ’aleihem mapil ’ani tekhinati lifnei hamelekh lewilti hashiweini bet yehonatan lamut sham. 
jeremiah 38:27	vayawo’u khal hasarim ’el yirmeyahu vayish’alu ’oto vayaged lahem kekhal hadewarim ha’eleh ’asher tsivah hamelekh vayakharishu mimenu ki lo nishma‘ hadawar. 
jeremiah 38:28	vayeishew yirmeyahu bakhatsar hamatarah ‘ad yom ’asher nilkedah yerushalim vehayah ka’asher nilkedah yerushalim. 
jeremiah 39:1	bashanah hateshi‘it letsidqiyahu melekh yehudah bakhodesh ha‘asiri ba newukhadretsar melekh bawel vekhal kheilo ’el yerushalim vayatsuru ‘aleha. 
jeremiah 39:2	be‘ashtei ‘esreh shanah letsidqiyahu bakhodesh harewi‘i betish‘ah lakhodesh haweqe‘ah ha‘ir. 
jeremiah 39:3	vayawo’u kol sarei melekh bawel vayeishewu besha‘ar hatavekh neiregal sar ’etser samgar newu sar sekhim raw saris neiregal sar ’etser raw mag vekhal she’eirit sarei melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 39:4	vayhi ka’asher ra’am tsidqiyahu melekh yehudah vekhol ’anshei hamilkhamah vayiwrekhu vayeitse’u laylah min ha‘ir derekh gan hamelekh besha‘ar ben hakhomotayim vayeitsei derekh ha‘arawah. 
jeremiah 39:5	vayirdefu khel kasdim ’akhareihem vayasigu ’et tsidqiyahu be‘arwot yereikho vayiqkhu ’oto vaya‘aluhu ’el newukhadretsar melekh bawel riwlatah be’erets khamat vaydaber ’ito mishpatim. 
jeremiah 39:6	vayishkhat melekh bawel ’et benei tsidqiyahu beriwlah le‘einav ve’et kal khorei yehudah shakhat melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 39:7	ve’et ‘einei tsidqiyahu ‘iver vaya’asreihu bankhushtayim lawi ’oto bawelah. 
jeremiah 39:8	ve’et bet hamelekh ve’et bet ha‘am sarefu hakasdim ba’esh ve’et khomot yerushalim natatsu. 
jeremiah 39:9	ve’et yeter ha‘am hanish’arim ba‘ir ve’et hanofelim ’asher nafelu ‘alav ve’et yeter ha‘am hanish’arim heglah newuzar ’adan raw tabakhim bawel. 
jeremiah 39:10	umin ha‘am hadalim ’asher ’en lahem me’umah hish’ir newuzar’adan raw tabakhim be’erets yehudah vayiten lahem keramim vigeiwim bayom hahu. 
jeremiah 39:11	vaytsav newukhadretsar melekh bawel ‘al yirmeyahu beyad newuzar’adan raw tabakhim leimor. 
jeremiah 39:12	qakhenu ve‘einekha sim ‘alav ve’al ta‘as lo me’umah ra‘ ki ’im ka’asher yedaber ’eilekha ken ‘aseh ‘imo. 
jeremiah 39:13	vayishlakh newuzar’adan raw tabakhim unewushazban raw saris veneiregal sar ’etser raw mag vekhol rabei melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 39:14	vayishlekhu vayiqkhu ’et yirmeyahu meikhatsar hamatarah vayitenu ’oto ’el gedalyahu ben ’akhiqam ben shafan lehotsi’eihu ’el habayit vayeishew betokh ha‘am. 
jeremiah 39:15	ve’el yirmeyahu hayah dewar yhoh bihyoto ‘atsur bakhatsar hamatarah leimor. 
jeremiah 39:16	halokh ve’amarta le‘ewed melekh hakushi leimor koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el hini meiwi meiwi ’et dewarai ’el ha‘ir hazot lera‘ah velo letowah vehayu lefanekha bayom hahu. 
jeremiah 39:17	vehitsaltikha wayom hahu ne’um yhoh velo tinaten beyad ha’anashim ’asher ’atah yagor mipeneihem. 
jeremiah 39:18	ki malet ’amaletkha uwakherew lo tipol vehayetah lekha nafshekha leshalal ki watakhta bi ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 40:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’et yhoh ’akhar shalakh ’oto newuzar’adan raw tabakhim min haramah beqakhto ’oto vehu ’asur baziqim betokh kal galut yerushalim vihudah hamuglim bawelah. 
jeremiah 40:2	vayiqakh raw tabakhim leyirmeyahu vayomer ’eilav yhoh ’elohekha diber ’et hara‘ah hazot ’el hamaqom hazeh. 
jeremiah 40:3	vayawei vaya‘as yhoh ka’asher diber ki khatatem yhoh velo shema‘tem beqolo vehayah lakhem dawar hadawar hazeh. 
jeremiah 40:4	ve‘atah hineh fitakhtikha hayom min haziqim ’asher ‘al yadekha ’im tow be‘einekha lawo ’iti wawel bo ve’asim ’et ‘eini ‘alekha ve’im ra‘ be‘einekha lawo ’iti wawel khadal re’eh kal ha’arets lefanekha ’el tow ve’el hayashar be‘einekha lalekhet shamah lekh. 
jeremiah 40:5	ve‘odenu lo yashuw veshuwah ’el gedalyah wen ’akhiqam ben shafan ’asher hifqid melekh bawel be‘arei yehudah veshew ’ito betokh ha‘am ’o ’el kal hayashar be‘einekha lalekhet lekh vayiten lo raw tabakhim ’arukhah umas’et vayshalekheihu. 
jeremiah 40:6	vayawo yirmeyahu ’el gedalyah wen ’akhiqam hamitspatah vayeishew ’ito betokh ha‘am hanish’arim ba’arets. 
jeremiah 40:7	vayishme‘u khal sarei hakhayalim ’asher basadeh hemah ve’ansheihem ki hifqid melekh bawel ’et gedalyahu wen ’akhiqam ba’arets vekhi hifqid ’ito ’anashim venashim vataf umidalat ha’arets mei’asher lo hagelu bawelah. 
jeremiah 40:8	vayawo’u ’el gedalyah hamitspatah veyishma‘el ben netanyahu veyokhanan veyonatan benei qareiakh userayah wen tankhumet uwenei ‘ofai ‘eifai hanetofati vizanyahu ben hama‘akhati hemah ve’ansheihem. 
jeremiah 40:9	vayishawa‘ lahem gedalyahu wen ’akhiqam ben shafan ule’ansheihem leimor ’al tire’u mei‘awod hakasdim shewu wa’arets ve‘iwdu ’et melekh bawel veyitaw lakhem. 
jeremiah 40:10	va’ani hini yoshew bamitspah la‘amod lifnei hakasdim ’asher yawo’u ’eileinu ve’atem ’isfu yayin veqayits veshemen vesimu bikhleikhem ushewu be‘areikhem ’asher tefastem. 
jeremiah 40:11	vegam kal hayehudim ’asher bemo’aw uwiwnei ‘amon uwe’edom va’asher bekhal ha’aratsot shame‘u ki natan melekh bawel she’eirit lihudah vekhi hifqid ‘aleihem ’et gedalyahu ben ’akhiqam ben shafan. 
jeremiah 40:12	vayashuwu khal hayehudim mikal hameqomot ’asher nidekhu sham vayawo’u ’erets yehudah ’el gedalyahu hamitspatah vaya’asfu yayin vaqayits harbeh me’od. 
jeremiah 40:13	veyokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim ’asher basadeh ba’u ’el gedalyahu hamitspatah. 
jeremiah 40:14	vayomeru ’eilav hayadoa‘ teida‘ ki ba‘alis melekh benei ‘amon shalakh ’et yishma‘el ben netanyah lehakotekha nafesh velo he’emin lahem gedalyahu ben ’akhiqam. 
jeremiah 40:15	veyokhanan ben qareiakh ’amar ’el gedalyahu waseiter bamitspah leimor ’eilekhah na ve’akeh ’et yishma‘el ben netanyah ve’ish lo yeida‘ lamah yakekah nefesh venafotsu kal yehudah haniqbatsim ’eilekha ve’awedah she’eirit yehudah. 
jeremiah 40:16	vayomer gedalyahu wen ’akhiqam ’el yokhanan ben qareiakh ’al ta‘as ta‘aseh ’et hadawar hazeh ki sheqer ’atah dower ’el yishma‘el. 
jeremiah 41:1	vayhi bakhodesh hashewi‘i ba yishma‘el ben netanyah wen ’elishama‘ mizera‘ hamelukhah verabei hamelekh va‘asarah ’anashim ’ito ’el gedalyahu wen ’akhiqam hamitspatah vayokhelu sham lekhem yakhdav bamitspah. 
jeremiah 41:2	vayaqam yishma‘el ben netanyah va‘aseret ha’anashim ’asher hayu ’ito vayaku ’et gedalyahu wen ’akhiqam ben shafan bakherew vayamet ’oto ’asher hifqid melekh bawel ba’arets.
