amos 5:15	sin’u ra‘ ve’ehewu tow vehatsigu washa‘ar mishpat ’ulai yekhenan yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot she’eirit yosef. 
amos 5:16	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot ’adonai bekhal rekhowot misped uwekhal khutsot yomeru ho ho veqare’u ’ikar ’el ’eiwel umisped ’el yod‘ei nehi. 
amos 5:17	uwekhal keramim misped ki ’e‘ewor beqirbekha ’amar yhoh. 
amos 5:18	ho hamit’avim ’et yom yhoh lamah zeh lakhem yom yhoh hu khoshekh velo ’or. 
amos 5:19	ka’asher yanus ’ish mipenei ha’ari ufega‘o hadow uwa habayit vesamakh yado ‘al haqir uneshakho hanakhash. 
amos 5:20	halo khoshekh yom yhoh velo ’or ve’afel velo nogah lo. 
amos 5:21	saneiti ma’asti khageikhem velo ’ariakh be‘atseroteikhem. 
amos 5:22	ki ’im ta‘alu li ‘olot uminkhoteikhem lo ’ertseh veshelem meri’eikhem lo ’abit. 
amos 5:23	haser mei‘alai hamon shirekha vezimrat newalekha lo ’eshma‘. 
amos 5:24	veyigal kamayim mishpat utsedaqah kenakhal ’eitan. 
amos 5:25	hazewakhim uminkhah higashtem li wamidbar ’arba‘im shanah bet yisra’el. 
amos 5:26	unesatem ’et sikut malkekhem ve’et kiyun tsalmeikhem kokhaw ’eloheikhem ’asher ‘asitem lakhem. 
amos 5:27	vehigleiti ’etkhem meihale’ah ledamaseq ’amar yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot shemo. 
amos 6:1	ho hasha’ananim betsiyon vehabotekhim behar shomeron nequwei reishit hagoyim uwa’u lahem bet yisra’el. 
amos 6:2	‘iwru khalneh ure’u ulekhu misham khamat rabah uredu gat pelishtm hatowim min hamamlakhot ha’eleh ’im raw gewulam migewulkhem. 
amos 6:3	hamnadim leyom ra‘ vatagishun shewet khamas. 
amos 6:4	hashokhewim ‘al mitot shen userukhim ‘al ‘arsotam ve’okhelim karim mitson va‘agalim mitokh marbeq. 
amos 6:5	haporetim ‘al pi hanawel kedavid khashewu lahem kelei shir. 
amos 6:6	hashotim bemizreqei yayin vereishit shemanim yimshakhu velo nekhlu ‘al sheiwer yosef. 
amos 6:7	lakhen ‘atah yiglu berosh golim vesar mirzakh serukhim. 
amos 6:8	nishba‘ ’adonai yhoh benafsho ne’um yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot meta’ew ’anokhi ’et ge’on ya‘aqow ve’armenotav saneiti vehisgarti ‘ir umelo’ah. 
amos 6:9	vehayah ’im yivateru ‘asarah ’anashim bewayit ’ekhad vameitu. 
amos 6:10	unesa’o dodo umesarefo lehotsi ‘atsamim min habayit ve’amar la’asher beyarketei habayit ha‘od ‘imakh ve’amar ’afes ve’amar has ki lo lehazkir beshem yhoh. 
amos 6:11	ki hineh yhoh metsaveh vehikah habayit hagadol resisim vehabayit haqaton beqi‘im. 
amos 6:12	hayrutsun basela‘ susim ’im yakharosh babeqarim ki hafakhtem lerosh mishpat uferi tsedaqah lela‘anah. 
amos 6:13	hasemeikhim lelo dawar ha’omerim halo wekhazeqeinu laqakhnu lanu qarnayim. 
amos 6:14	ki hini meiqim ‘aleikhem bet yisra’el ne’um yhoh ’elohei hatsewa’ot go velakhatsu ’etkhem milewo khamat ‘ad nakhal ha‘arawah. 
amos 7:1	koh hir’ani ’adonai yhoh vehineh yotser gowai bitkhilat ‘alot halaqesh vehineh leqesh ’akhar gizei hamelekh. 
amos 7:2	vehayah ’im kilah le’ekhol ’et ‘eisew ha’arets va’omar ’adonai yhoh selakh na mi yaqum ya‘aqow ki qaton hu. 
amos 7:3	nikham yhoh ‘al zot lo tihyeh ’amar yhoh. 
amos 7:4	koh hir’ani ’adonai yhoh vehineh qorei lariw ba’esh ’adonai yhoh vatokhal ’et tehom rabah ve’akhelah ’et hakheileq. 
amos 7:5	va’omar ’adonai yhoh khadal na mi yaqum ya‘aqow ki qaton hu. 
amos 7:6	nikham yhoh ‘al zot gam hi lo tihyeh ’amar ’adonai yhoh. 
amos 7:7	koh hir’ani vehineh ’adonai nitsaw ‘al khomat ’anakh uweyado ’anakh. 
amos 7:8	vayomer yhoh ’eilai mah ’atah ro’eh ‘amos va’omar ’anakh vayomer ’adonai hini sam ’anakh beqerew ‘ami yisra’el lo ’osif ‘od ‘awor lo. 
amos 7:9	venashamu bamot yiskhaq umiqdeshei yisra’el yekherawu veqamti ‘al bet yarawe‘am bekharew. 
amos 7:10	vayishlakh ’amatsyah kohen bet ’el ’el yarawe‘am melekh yisra’el leimor qashar ‘alekha ‘amos beqerew bet yisra’el lo tukhal ha’arets lehakhil ’et kal dewarav. 
amos 7:11	ki khoh ’amar ‘amos bakherew yamut yarawe‘am veyisra’el galoh yigleh mei‘al ’admato. 
amos 7:12	vayomer ’amatsyah ’el ‘amos khozeh lekh berakh lekha ’el ’erets yehudah ve’ekhal sham lekhem vesham tinawei. 
amos 7:13	uwet ’el lo tosif ‘od lehinawei ki miqdash melekh hu uwet mamlakhah hu. 
amos 7:14	vaya‘an ‘amos vayomer ’el ’amatsyah lo nawi ’anokhi velo wen nawi ’anokhi ki woqer ’anokhi uwoles shiqmim. 
amos 7:15	vayiqakheini yhoh mei’akharei hatson vayomer ’eilai yhoh lekh hinawei ’el ‘ami yisra’el. 
amos 7:16	ve‘atah shema‘ dewar yhoh ’atah ’omer lo tinawei ‘al yisra’el velo tatif ‘al bet yiskhaq. 
amos 7:17	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh ’ishtekha ba‘ir tizneh uwanekha uwenotekha bakherew yipolu ve’admatekha bakhewel tekhulaq ve’atah ‘al ’adamah temei’ah tamut veyisra’el galoh yigleh mei‘al ’admato. 
amos 8:1	koh hir’ani ’adonai yhoh vehineh keluw qayits. 
amos 8:2	vayomer mah ’atah ro’eh ‘amos va’omar keluw qayits vayomer yhoh ’eilai ba haqets ’el ‘ami yisra’el lo ’osif ‘od ‘awor lo. 
amos 8:3	veheililu shirot heikhal bayom hahu ne’um ’adonai yhoh raw hapeger bekhal maqom hishlikh has. 
amos 8:4	shim‘u zot hasho’afim ’ewyon velashbit ‘anvei ‘aniyei ’arets. 
amos 8:5	leimor matai ya‘awor hakhodesh venashbirah shewer vehashabat veniftekhah bar lehaqtin ’eifah ulehagdil sheqel ule‘avet mozenei mirmah. 
amos 8:6	liqnot bakesef dalim ve’ewyon ba‘awur na‘alayim umapal bar nashbir. 
amos 8:7	nishba‘ yhoh big’on ya‘aqow ’im ’eshkakh lanetsakh kal ma‘aseihem. 
amos 8:8	ha‘al zot lo tirgaz ha’arets ve’awal kal yoshew bah ve‘aletah kha’or kulah venigreshah venishqah venishqe‘ah ki’or mitsrayim. 
amos 8:9	vehayah bayom hahu ne’um ’adonai yhoh veheiweiti hashemesh batsahorayim vehakhashakhti la’arets beyom ’or. 
amos 8:10	vehafakhti khageikhem le’eiwel vekhal shireikhem leqinah veha‘aleiti ‘al kal matenayim saq ve‘al kal rosh qarekhah vesamtiha ke’eiwel yakhid ve’akharitah keyom mar. 
amos 8:11	hineh yamim ba’im ne’um ’adonai yhoh vehishlakhti ra‘aw ba’arets lo ra‘aw lalekhem velo tsama lamayim ki ’im lishmoa‘ ’et diwrei yhoh. 
amos 8:12	vena‘u miyam ‘ad yam umitsafon ve‘ad mizrakh yeshotu lewaqesh ’et dewar yhoh velo yimtsa’u. 
amos 8:13	bayom hahu tit‘alafnah habetulot hayafot vehabakhurim batsama. 
amos 8:14	hanishba‘im be’ashmat shomeron ve’ameru khei ’elohekha dan vekhei derekh be’er shawa‘ venafelu velo yaqumu ‘od. 
amos 9:1	ra’iti ’et ’adonai nitsaw ‘al hamizbeiakh vayomer hakh hakaftor veyir‘ashu hasipim uwetsa‘am berosh kulam ve’akharitam bakherew ’eherog lo yanus lahem nas velo yimalet lahem palit. 
amos 9:2	’im yakhteru wish’ol misham yadi tiqakhem ve’im ya‘alu hashamayim misham ’oridem. 
amos 9:3	ve’im yeikhawe’u berosh hakarmel misham ’akhapes uleqakhtim ve’im yisateru mineged ‘einai beqarqa‘ hayam misham ’atsaveh ’et hanakhash uneshakham. 
amos 9:4	ve’im yeilekhu washewi lifnei ’weihem misham ’atsaveh ’et hakherew vaharagatam vesamti ‘eini ‘aleihem lera‘ah velo letowah. 
amos 9:5	vadonai yhoh hatsewa’ot hanogeia‘ ba’arets vatamog ve’awelu kal yoshewei wah ve‘aletah khai’or kulah veshaqe‘ah ki’or mitsrayim. 
amos 9:6	haboneh washamayim ma‘aloto ma‘alotav va’agudato ‘al ’erets yesadah haqorei lemei hayam vayishpekhem ‘al penei ha’arets yhoh shemo. 
amos 9:7	halo khiwnei khushiyim ’atem li benei yisra’el ne’um yhoh halo ’et yisra’el he‘eleiti mei’erets mitsrayim ufelishtiyim mikaftor va’aram miqir. 
amos 9:8	hineh ‘einei ’adonai yhoh bamamlakhah hakhata’ah vehishmadti ’otah mei‘al penei ha’adamah ’efes ki lo hashmed ’ashmid ’et bet ya‘aqow ne’um yhoh. 
amos 9:9	ki hineh ’anokhi metsaveh vahani‘oti wekhal hagoyim ’et bet yisra’el ka’asher yinoa‘ bakewarah velo yipol tseror ’arets. 
amos 9:10	bakherew yamutu kol khata’ei ‘ami ha’omerim lo tagish vetaqdim ba‘adeinu hara‘ah. 
amos 9:11	bayom hahu ’aqim ’et sukat david hanofelet vegadarti ’et pirtseihen vaharisotav ’aqim uwenitiha kimei ‘olam. 
amos 9:12	lema‘an yireshu ’et she’eirit ’edom vekhal hagoyim ’asher niqra shemi ‘aleihem ne’um yhoh ‘oseh zot. 
amos 9:13	hineh yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh venigash khoresh baqotser vedorekh ‘anawim bemoshekh hazara‘ vehitifu heharim ‘asis vekhal hagewa‘ot titmogagnah. 
amos 9:14	veshawti ’et shewut ‘ami yisra’el uwanu ‘arim neshamot veyashawu venate‘u kheramim veshatu ’et yeinam ve‘asu ganot ve’akhelu ’et perihem. 
amos 9:15	uneta‘tim ‘al ’admatam velo yinateshu ‘od mei‘al ’admatam ’asher natati lahem ’amar yhoh ’elohekha. 
obadiah 1:1	khazon ‘owadyah koh ’amar ’adonai yhoh le’edom shemu‘ah shama‘nu mei’et yhoh vetsir bagoyim shulakh qumu venaqumah ‘aleha lamilkhamah. 
obadiah 1:2	hineh qaton netatikha bagoyim bazui ’atah me’od. 
obadiah 1:3	zedon libekha hishi’ekha shokheni wekhagvei sela‘ merom shiwto ’omer belibo mi yorideini ’arets. 
obadiah 1:4	’im tagbiah kanesher ve’im ben kokhawim sim qinekha misham ’oridekha ne’um yhoh. 
obadiah 1:5	’im ganawim ba’u lekha ’im shoddei laylah ’ekh nidmeitah halo yignewu dayam ’im botserim ba’u lakh halo yash’iru ‘oleilot. 
obadiah 1:6	’ekh nekhpesu ‘eisav niw‘u matspunav. 
obadiah 1:7	‘ad hagewul shilekhukha kol ’anshei weritekha hishi’ukha yakhelu lekha ’anshei shelomekha lakhmekha yasimu mazor takhtekha ’en tewunah bo. 
obadiah 1:8	halo bayom hahu ne’um yhoh veha’awadti khakhamim mei’edom utewunah meihar ‘eisav. 
obadiah 1:9	vekhatu giborekha teiman lema‘an yikaret ’ish meihar ‘eisav miqatel. 
obadiah 1:10	meikhamas ’akhikha ya‘aqow tekhasekha wushah venikhrata le‘olam. 
obadiah 1:11	beyom ‘amadekha mineged beyom shewot zarim kheilo venakherim ba’u sha‘aro she‘arav ve‘al yerushalim yadu goral gam ’atah ke’akhad meihem. 
obadiah 1:12	ve’al teire weyom ’akhikha beyom nakhero ve’al tismakh liwnei yehudah beyom ’awedam ve’al tagdel pikha beyom tsarah. 
obadiah 1:13	’al tawo wesha‘ar ‘ami beyom ’eidam ’al teire gam ’atah bera‘ato beyom ’eido ve’al tishlakhnah wekheilo beyom ’eido. 
obadiah 1:14	ve’al ta‘amod ‘al hapereq lehakhrit ’et pelitav ve’al tasger seridav beyom tsarah. 
obadiah 1:15	ki qarow yom yhoh ‘al kal hagoyim ka’asher ‘asita yei‘aseh lakh gemulkha yashuw beroshekha. 
obadiah 1:16	ki ka’asher shetitem ‘al har qadshi yishtu khal hagoyim tamid veshatu vela‘u vehayu kelo hayu. 
obadiah 1:17	uwehar tsiyon tihyeh feleitah vehayah qodesh veyareshu bet ya‘aqow ’et morasheihem 
obadiah 1:18	vehayah wet ya‘aqow ’esh uwet yosef lehawah uwet ‘eisav leqash vedalequ wahem va’akhalum velo yihyeh sarid lewet ‘eisav ki yhoh diber. 
obadiah 1:19	veyareshu hanegew ’et har ‘eisav vehashefeilah ’et pelishtim veyareshu ’et sedeh ’efrayim ve’et sedeh shomeron uwinyamin ’et hagil‘ad. 
obadiah 1:20	vegalut hakhel hazeh liwnei yisra’el ’asher kena‘anim ‘ad tsarefat vegalut yerushalim ’asher bisfarad yirshu ’et ‘arei hanegew. 
obadiah 1:21	ve‘alu moshi‘im behar tsiyon lishpot ’et har ‘eisav vehayetah yhoh hamelukhah. 
jonah 1:1	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yonah wen ’amitai leimor. 
jonah 1:2	qum lekh ’el nineveh ha‘ir hagedolah uqera ‘aleha ki ‘aletah ra‘atam lefanai. 
jonah 1:3	vayaqam yonah liwroakh tarshishah milifnei yhoh vayeired yafo vayimtsa ’aniyah ba’ah tarshish vayiten sekharah vayeired bah lawo ‘imahem tarshishah milifnei yhoh. 
jonah 1:4	yhoh heitil ruakh gedolah ’el hayam vayhi sa‘ar gadol bayam veha’oniyah khishewah lehishawer. 
jonah 1:5	vayire’u hamalakhim vayiz‘aqu ’ish ’el ’elohav vayatilu ’et hakeilim ’asher ba’oniyah ’el hayam lehaqel mei‘aleihem veyonah yarad ’el yarketei hasefinah vayishkaw vayeiradam. 
jonah 1:6	vayiqraw ’eilav raw hakhowel vayomer lo mah lekha nirdam qum qera ’el ’elohekha ’ulai yit‘ashet ha’elohim lanu velo nowed. 
jonah 1:7	vayomeru ’ish ’el rei‘eihu lekhu venapilah goralot veneide‘ah beshelemi hara‘ah hazot lanu vayapilu goralot vayipol hagoral ‘al yonah. 
jonah 1:8	vayomeru ’eilav hagidah na lanu ba’asher lemi hara‘ah hazot lanu mah melakhtekha umei’ayin tawo mah ’artsekha ve’ei mizeh ‘am ’atah. 
jonah 1:9	vayomer ’aleihem ‘iwri ’anokhi ve’et yhoh ’elohei hashamayim ’ani yarei ’asher ‘asah ’et hayam ve’et hayabashah. 
jonah 1:10	vayire’u ha’anashim yir’ah gedolah vayomeru ’eilav mah zot ‘asita ki yade‘u ha’anashim ki milifnei yhoh hu woreiakh ki higid lahem. 
jonah 1:11	vayomeru ’eilav mah na‘aseh lakh veyishtoq hayam mei‘aleinu ki hayam holekh veso‘er. 
jonah 1:12	vayomer ’aleihem sa’uni vahatiluni ’el hayam veyishtoq hayam mei‘aleikhem ki yodeia‘ ’ani ki wesheli hasa‘ar hagadol hazeh ‘aleikhem. 
jonah 1:13	vayakhteru ha’anashim lehashiw ’el hayabashah velo yakholu ki hayam holekh veso‘er ‘aleihem. 
jonah 1:14	vayiqre’u ’el yhoh vayomeru ’anah yhoh ’al na nowedah benefesh ha’ish hazeh ve’al titen ‘aleinu dam naqi ki ’atah yhoh ka’asher khafatsta ‘asita. 
jonah 1:15	vayis’u ’et yonah vaytiluhu ’el hayam vaya‘amod hayam miza‘po. 
jonah 1:16	vayire’u ha’anashim yir’ah gedolah ’et yhoh vayizbekhu zewakh yhoh vayideru nedarim. 
jonah 1:17	vayman yhoh dag gadol liwloa‘ ’et yonah vayhi yonah bim‘ei hadag sheloshah yamim usheloshah leilot. 
jonah 2:1	vayitpalel yonah ’el yhoh ’elohav mime‘ei hadagah. 
jonah 2:2	vayomer qarati mitsarah li ’el yhoh vaya‘aneini mibeten she’ol shiva‘ti shama‘ta qoli. 
jonah 2:3	vatashlikheini metsulah bilwaw yamim venahar yesoweweini kal mishbarekha vegalekha ‘alai ‘awaru. 
jonah 2:4	va’ani ’amarti nigrashti mineged ‘einekha ’akh ’osif lehabit ’el heikhal qadshekha 
jonah 2:5	’afafuni mayim ‘ad nefesh tehom yesoweweini suf khawush leroshi. 
jonah 2:6	leqitswei harim yaradti ha’arets berikheha wa‘adi le‘olam vata‘al mishakhat khayai yhoh ’elohai. 
jonah 2:7	behit‘atef ‘alai nafshi ’et yhoh zakhareti vatawo ’eilekha tefilati ’el heikhal qadshekha 
jonah 2:8	meshamerim hawlei shav khasdam ya‘azowu. 
jonah 2:9	va’ani beqol todah ’ezbekhah lakh ’asher nadarti ’ashaleimah yeshu‘atah yhoh. 
jonah 2:10	vayomer yhoh ladag vayaqei ’et yonah ’el hayabashah. 
jonah 3:1	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el yonah sheinit leimor. 
jonah 3:2	qum lekh ’el nineveh ha‘ir hagedolah viqra ’eileha ’et haqeri’ah ’asher ’anokhi dower ’eilekha. 
jonah 3:3	vayaqam yonah vayeilekh ’el nineveh kidwar yhoh venineveh hayetah ‘ir gedolah leilohim mahalakh sheloshet yamim. 
jonah 3:4	vayakhel yonah lawo wa‘ir mahalakh yom ’ekhad vayiqra vayomar ‘od ’arba‘im yom venineveh nehpakhet. 
jonah 3:5	vaya’aminu ’anshei nineveh beilohim vayiqre’u tsom vayilbeshu saqim migedolam ve‘ad qetanam. 
jonah 3:6	vayiga‘ hadawar ’el melekh nineveh vayaqam mikis’o vaya‘awer ’adarto mei‘alav vaykhas saq vayeishew ‘al ha’eifer. 
jonah 3:7	vayaz‘eq vayomer benineveh mita‘am hamelekh ugedolav leimor ha’adam vehabeheimah habaqar vehatson ’al yit‘amu me’umah ’al yir‘u umayim ’al yishtu. 
jonah 3:8	veyitkasu saqim ha’adam vehabeheimah veyiqre’u ’el ’elohim bekhazeqah veyashuwu ’ish midarko hara‘ah umin hekhamas ’asher bekhapeihem. 
jonah 3:9	mi yodeia‘ yashuw venikham ha’elohim veshaw meikharon ’apo velo nowed. 
jonah 3:10	vayar ha’elohim ’et ma‘aseihem ki shawu midarkam hara‘ah vayinakhem ha’elohim ‘al hara‘ah ’asher diber la‘asot lahem velo ‘asah. 
jonah 4:1	vayeira‘ ’el yonah ra‘ah gedolah vayikhar lo. 
jonah 4:2	vayitpalel ’el yhoh vayomar ’anah yhoh halo zeh dewari ‘ad heyoti ‘al ’admati ‘al ken qidamti liwroakh tarshishah ki yada‘ti ki ’atah ’el khanun verakhum ’erekh ’apayim veraw khesed venikham ‘al hara‘ah. 
jonah 4:3	ve‘atah yhoh qakh na ’et nafshi mimeni ki tow moti meikhayai. 
jonah 4:4	vayomer yhoh haheitew kharah lakh. 
jonah 4:5	vayeitsei yonah min ha‘ir vayeishew miqedem la‘ir vaya‘as lo sham sukah vayeishew takhteha batsel ‘ad ’asher yir’eh mah yihyeh ba‘ir. 
jonah 4:6	vayman yhoh ’elohim qiqayon vaya‘al mei‘al leyonah lihyot tsel ‘al rosho lehatsil lo meira‘ato vayismakh yonah ‘al haqiqayon simkhah gedolah. 
jonah 4:7	vayman ha’elohim tola‘at ba‘alot hashakhar lamakhorat vatakh ’et haqiqayon vayiwash. 
jonah 4:8	vayhi kizroakh hashemesh vayman ’elohim ruakh qadim kharishit vatakh hashemesh ‘al rosh yonah vayit‘alaf vayish’al ’et nafsho lamut vayomer tow moti meikhayai. 
jonah 4:9	vayomer ’elohim ’el yonah haheitew kharah lekha ‘al haqiqayon vayomer heitew kharah li ‘ad mavet. 
jonah 4:10	vayomer yhoh ’atah khasta ‘al haqiqayon ’asher lo ‘amalta bo velo gidalto shebin laylah hayah uwin laylah ’awad. 
jonah 4:11	va’ani lo ’akhus ‘al nineveh ha‘ir hagedolah ’asher yesh bah harbeh mishtem ‘esreh ribo ’adam ’asher lo yada‘ ben yemino lismolo uweheimah rabah. 
micah 1:1	dewar yhoh ’asher hayah ’el mikhah hamorashti bimei yotam ’akhaz yekhizqiyah malkhei yehudah ’asher khazah ‘al shomeron virushalim. 
micah 1:2	shim‘u ‘amim kulam haqshiwi ’erets umelo’ah vihi ’adonai yhoh bakhem le‘ed ’adonai meiheikhal qadesho. 
micah 1:3	ki hineh yhoh yotsei mimeqomo veyarad vedarakh ‘al bamotei bamotei ’arets. 
micah 1:4	venamasu heharim takhtav veha‘amaqim yitbaqa‘u kadonag mipenei ha’esh kemayim mugarim bemorad. 
micah 1:5	befesha‘ ya‘aqow kal zot uwekhatot bet yisra’el mi fesha‘ ya‘aqow halo shomeron umi bamot yehudah halo yerushalim. 
micah 1:6	vesamti shomeron le‘i hasadeh lemata‘ei kharem vehigarti lagai ’awaneha visodeha ’agaleh. 
micah 1:7	vekhal pesileha yukatu vekhal ’etnaneha yisarefu wa’esh vekhal ‘atsabeha ’asim shemamah ki mei’etnan zonah qibatsah ve‘ad ’etnan zonah yashuwu. 
micah 1:8	‘al zot ’espedah ve’eililah ’eilekhah shilal sholal ve‘arom ’e‘eseh misped katanim ve’eiwel kiwnot ya‘anah. 
micah 1:9	ki ’anushah makoteha ki wa’ah ‘ad yehudah naga‘ ‘ad sha‘ar ‘ami ‘ad yerushalim. 
micah 1:10	begat ’al tagidu bakho ’al tiwku bewet le‘afrah ‘afar hitpalasheti hitpalashi. 
micah 1:11	‘iwri lakhem yoshewet shafir ‘eryah woshet lo yatse’ah yoshewet tsa’anan mispad bet ha’eitsel yiqakh mikem ‘emdato. 
micah 1:12	ki khalah letow yoshewet marot ki yarad ra‘ mei’et yhoh lesha‘ar yerushalim. 
micah 1:13	retom hamerkawah larekhesh yoshewet lakhish reishit khatat hi lewat tsiyon ki wakh nimtse’u pish‘ei yisra’el. 
micah 1:14	lakhen titeni shilukhim ‘al moreshet gat batei ’akhziw le’akhzaw lemalkhei yisra’el. 
micah 1:15	‘od hayoresh ’awi lakh yoshewet mareishah ‘ad ‘adulam yawo kewod yisra’el. 
micah 1:16	qarekhi vagozi ‘al benei ta‘anugayikh harkhiwi qarekhatekh kanesher ki galu mimekh. 
micah 2:1	ho khoshewei ’aven ufo‘alei ra‘ ‘al mishkewotam be’or haboqer ya‘asuha ki yesh le’el yadam. 
micah 2:2	vekhamedu sadot vegazalu uwatim venasa’u ve‘ashequ gewer uweito ve’ish venakhalato. 
micah 2:3	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh hini khoshew ‘al hamishpakhah hazot ra‘ah ’asher lo tamishu misham tsaveroteikhem velo teilekhu romah ki ‘et ra‘ah hi. 
micah 2:4	bayom hahu yisa ‘aleikhem mashal venahah nehi nihyah ’amar shadod neshadunu kheileq ‘ami yamir ’ekh yamish li leshowew sadeinu yekhaleq. 
micah 2:5	lakhen lo yihyeh lekha mashlikh khewel begoral biqhal yhoh. 
micah 2:6	’al tatifu yatifun lo yatifu la’eleh lo yisag kelimot. 
micah 2:7	he’amur bet ya‘aqow haqatsar ruakh yhoh ’im ’eleh ma‘alalav halo dewarai yeitiwu ‘im hayashar holekh. 
micah 2:8	ve’etmul ‘ami le’oyew yeqomem mimul salmah ’eder tafshitun mei‘owerim betakh shuwei milkhamah. 
micah 2:9	neshei ‘ami tegareshun mibet ta‘anugeha mei‘al ‘olaleha tiqkhu hadari le‘olam. 
micah 2:10	qumu ulekhu ki lo zot hamenukhah ba‘awur tame’ah tekhabel vekhewel nimrats. 
micah 2:11	lu ’ish holekh ruakh vasheqer kizew ’atif lekha layayin velasheikhar vehayah matif ha‘am hazeh. 
micah 2:12	’asof ’e’esof ya‘aqow kulakh qabets ’aqabets she’eirit yisra’el yakhad ’asimenu ketson batsrah ke‘eider betokh hadawero tehimenah mei’adam. 
micah 2:13	‘alah haporets lifneihem paretsu vaya‘aworu sha‘ar vayeitse’u wo vaya‘awor malkam lifneihem yhoh berosham. 
micah 3:1	va’omar shim‘u na rashei ya‘aqow uqetsinei bet yisra’el halo lakhem lada‘at ’et hamishpat. 
micah 3:2	sone’ei tow ve’ohawei ra‘ah ra‘ gozelei ‘oram mei‘aleihem ushe’eiram mei‘al ‘atsmotam. 
micah 3:3	va’asher ’akhelu she’er ‘ami ve‘oram mei‘aleihem hifshitu ve’et ‘atsmoteihem pitseikhu ufaresu ka’asher basir ukhewasar betokh qalakhat. 
micah 3:4	’az yiz‘aqu ’el yhoh velo ya‘aneh ’otam veyaster panav meihem ba‘et hahi ka’asher heirei‘u ma‘aleihem. 
micah 3:5	koh ’amar yhoh ‘al hanewi’im hamat‘im ’et ‘ami hanoshekhim beshineihem veqare’u shalom va’asher lo yiten ‘al pihem veqideshu ‘alav milkhamah. 
micah 3:6	lakhen laylah lakhem meikhazon vekhashekhah lakhem miqesom uwa’ah hashemesh ‘al hanewi’im veqadar ‘aleihem hayom. 
micah 3:7	uwoshu hakhozim vekhaferu haqosemim ve‘atu ‘al safam kulam ki ’en ma‘aneh ’elohim. 
micah 3:8	ve’ulam ’anokhi maleiti khoakh ’et ruakh yhoh umishpat ugewurah lehagid leya‘aqow pish‘o uleyisra’el khatato. 
micah 3:9	shim‘u na zot rashei bet ya‘aqow uqetsinei bet yisra’el hamata‘awim mishpat ve’et kal haysharah ye‘aqeishu. 
micah 3:10	boneh tsiyon bedamim virushalim be‘avlah. 
micah 3:11	rasheha beshokhad yishpotu vekhohaneha bimkhir yoru unewi’eha bekhesef yiqsomu ve‘al yhoh yisha‘einu leimor halo yhoh beqirbeinu lo tawo ‘aleinu ra‘ah. 
micah 3:12	lakhen biglalkhem tsiyon sadeh teikharesh virushalim ‘iyin tihyeh vehar habayit lewamot ya‘ar. 
micah 4:1	vehayah be’akharit hayamim yihyeh har bet yhoh nakhon berosh heharim venisa hu migewa‘ot venaharu ‘alav ‘amim 
micah 4:2	vehalekhu goyim rabim ve’ameru lekhu vena‘aleh ’el har yhoh ve’el bet ’elohei ya‘aqow veyoreinu miderakhav veneilekhah be’orekhotav ki mitsiyon teitsei torah udewar yhoh mirushalim. 
micah 4:3	veshafat ben ‘amim rabim vehokhiakh legoyim ‘atsumim ‘ad rakhoq vekhitetu kharwoteihem le’itim vakhanitoteihem lemazmeirot lo yis’u go ’el go kherew velo yilmedun ‘od milkhamah. 
micah 4:4	veyashewu ’ish takhat gafno vetakhat te’einato ve’en makharid ki fi yhoh tsewa’ot diber. 
micah 4:5	ki kal ha‘amim yeilekhu ’ish beshem ’elohav va’anakhnu neilekh beshem yhoh ’eloheinu le‘olam va‘ed. 
micah 4:6	bayom hahu ne’um yhoh ’osefah hatsolei‘ah vehanidakhah ’aqabeitsah va’asher harei‘oti. 
micah 4:7	vesamti ’et hatsolei‘ah lish’eirit vehanahala’ah lego ‘atsum umalakh yhoh ‘aleihem behar tsiyon mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam. 
micah 4:8	ve’atah migdal ‘eider ‘ofel bat tsiyon ‘adekha teiteh uwa’ah hamemshalah harishonah mamlekhet lewat yerushalim. 
micah 4:9	‘atah lamah tari‘i reia‘ hamelekh ’en bakh ’im yo‘atsekh ’awad ki hekheziqekh khil kayoleidah. 
micah 4:10	khuli vagokhi bat tsiyon kayoleidah ki ‘atah teitse’i miqiryah veshakhant basadeh uwat ‘ad bawel sham tinatseili m yig’alekh yhoh mikaf ’oyewayikh. 
micah 4:11	ve‘atah ne’esfu ‘alayikh goyim rabim ha’omerim tekhenaf vetakhaz betsiyon ‘eineinu. 
micah 4:12	vehemah lo yade‘u makhshewot yhoh velo heiwinu ‘atsato ki qibetsam ke‘amir gorenah. 
micah 4:13	qumi vadoshi wat tsiyon ki qarnekh ’asim barzel ufarsotayikh ’asim nekhushah vahadiqot ‘amim rabim vehakharamti yhoh bits‘am vekheilam la’adon kal ha’arets. 
micah 5:1	‘atah titgodedi wat gedud matsor sam ‘aleinu basheiwet yaku ‘al halekhi ’et shofet yisra’el. 
micah 5:2	ve’atah bet lekhem ’efratah tsa‘ir lihyot be’alfei yehudah mimekha li yeitsei lihyot moshel beyisra’el umotsa’otav miqedem mimei ‘olam. 
micah 5:3	lakhen yitenem ‘ad ‘et yoleidah yaladah veyeter ’ekhav yeshuwun ‘al benei yisra’el. 
micah 5:4	ve‘amad vera‘ah be‘oz yhoh big’on shem yhoh ’elohav veyashawu ki ‘atah yigdal ‘ad ’afsei ’arets. 
micah 5:5	vehayah zeh shalom ’ashur ki yawo we’artseinu vekhi yidrokh be’armenoteinu vahaqeimonu ‘alav shiw‘ah ro‘im ushemonah nesikhei ’adam. 
micah 5:6	vera‘u ’et ’erets ’ashur bakherew ve’et ’erets nimrod biftakheha vehitsil mei’ashur ki yawo we’artseinu vekhi yidrokh bigwuleinu. 
micah 5:7	vehayah she’eirit ya‘aqow beqerew ‘amim rabim ketal mei’et yhoh kirwiwim ‘alei ‘eisew ’asher lo yeqaveh le’ish velo yeyakhel liwnei ’adam. 
micah 5:8	vehayah she’eirit ya‘aqow bagoyim beqerew ‘amim rabim ke’aryeh bewahamot ya‘ar kikhfir be‘edrei tson ’asher ’im ‘awar veramas vetaraf ve’en matsil. 
micah 5:9	tarom yadekha ‘al tsarekha vekhal ’oyewekha yikareitu. 
micah 5:10	vehayah wayom hahu ne’um yhoh vehikhrati susekha miqirbekha veha’awadti markewotekha. 
micah 5:11	vehikhrati ‘arei ’artsekha veharasti kal miwtsarekha. 
micah 5:12	vehikhrati kheshafim miyadekha ume‘onim lo yihyu lakh. 
micah 5:13	vehikhrati fesilekha umatseiwotekha miqirbekha velo tishtakhaveh ‘od lema‘aseh yadekha. 
micah 5:14	venatashti ’asheirekha miqirbekha vehishmadti ‘arekha. 
micah 5:15	ve‘asiti be’af uwekheimah naqam ’et hagoyim ’asher lo shamei‘u. 
micah 6:1	shim‘u na ’et ’asher yhoh ’omer qum riw ’et heharim vetishma‘nah hagewa‘ot qolekha. 
micah 6:2	shim‘u harim ’et riw yhoh veha’eitanim mosedei ’arets ki riw yhoh ‘im ‘amo ve‘im yisra’el yitvakakh. 
micah 6:3	‘ami meh ‘asiti lekha umah hel’eitikha ‘aneh wi. 
micah 6:4	ki he‘elitikha mei’erets mitsrayim umibet ‘awadim peditikha va’eshlakh lefanekha ’et mosheh ’aharon umiryam. 
micah 6:5	‘ami zekhar na mah ya‘ats balaq melekh mo’aw umeh ‘anah ’oto bil‘am ben be‘or min hashitim ‘ad hagilgal lema‘an da‘at tsidqot yhoh. 
micah 6:6	bamah ’aqadem yhoh ’ikaf leilohei marom ha’aqademenu we‘olot ba‘agalim benei shanah. 
micah 6:7	hayirtseh yhoh be’alfei ’eilim beriwwot nakhalei shamen ha’eten bekhori pish‘i peri witni khatat nafshi. 
micah 6:8	higid lekha ’adam mah tow umah yhoh doresh mimekha ki ’im ‘asot mishpat ve’ahawat khesed vehatsneia‘ lekhet ‘im ’elohekha. 
micah 6:9	qol yhoh la‘ir yiqra vetushiyah yir’eh shemekha shim‘u mateh umi ye‘adah. 
micah 6:10	‘od ha’ish bet rasha‘ ’otserot resha‘ ve’eifat razon ze‘umah. 
micah 6:11	ha’ezkeh bemozenei resha‘ uwekhis ’awnei mirmah. 
micah 6:12	’asher ‘ashireha male’u khamas veyosheweha diberu shaqer uleshonam remiyah befihem. 
micah 6:13	vegam ’ani hekheleiti hakotekha hashmem ‘al khatotekha. 
micah 6:14	’atah tokhal velo tisba‘ veyeshkhakha beqirbekha vetaseg velo taflit va’asher tefalet lakherew ’eten. 
micah 6:15	’atah tizra‘ velo tiqtsor ’atah tidrokh zayit velo tasukh shemen vetirosh velo tishteh yayin. 
micah 6:16	veyishtamer khuqot ‘ameri vekhol ma‘aseh wet ’akh’aw vateilekhu bemo‘atsotam lema‘an titi ’otekha leshamah veyosheweha lishreiqah vekherpat ‘ami tisa’u. 
micah 7:1	’alai li ki hayiti ke’asepei qayits ke‘olelot batsir ’en ’eshkol le’ekhol bikurah ’ivetah nafshi. 
micah 7:2	’awad khasid min ha’arets veyashar ba’adam ’ayin kulam ledamim ye’erowu ’ish ’et ’akhihu yatsudu kheirem. 
micah 7:3	‘al hara‘ kapayim leheitiw hasar sho’el vehashofet bashilum vehagadol dower havat nafsho hu vai‘abetuha. 
micah 7:4	towam kekheideq yashar mimesukhah yom metsapekha pequdatekha wa’ah ‘atah tihyeh mewukhatam. 
micah 7:5	’al ta’aminu wereia‘ ’al tiwtekhu be’aluf mishokhewet kheiqekha shemor pitkhei fikha. 
micah 7:6	ki wen menabel ’aw bat qamah we’imah kalah bakhamotah ’oyewei ’ish ’anshei weito. 
micah 7:7	va’ani yhoh ’atsapeh ’okhilah leilohei yish‘i yishma‘eini ’elohai. 
micah 7:8	’al tismekhi ’oyawti li ki nafalti qameti ki ’eishew bakhoshekh yhoh ’or li. 
micah 7:9	za‘af yhoh ’esa ki khatati lo ‘ad ’asher yariw riwi ve‘asah mishpati yotsi’eini la’or ’er’eh betsidqato. 
micah 7:10	veteire ’oyawti utekhaseha wushah ha’omerah ’eilai ’ayo yhoh ’elohayikh ‘einai tir’enah bah ‘atah tihyeh lemirmas ketit khutsot. 
micah 7:11	yom liwnot gedeirayikh yom hahu yirkhaq khoq. 
micah 7:12	yom hu ve‘adekha yawo lemini ’ashur ve‘arei matsor ulemini matsor ve‘ad nahar veyam miyam vehar hahar. 
micah 7:13	vehayetah ha’arets lishmamah ‘al yosheweha miperi ma‘aleihem. 
micah 7:14	re‘eh ‘amekha weshiwtekha tson nakhalatekha shokheni lewadad ya‘ar betokh karmel yir‘u washan vegil‘ad kimei ‘olam. 
micah 7:15	kimei tseitekha mei’erets mitsrayim ’ar’enu nifla’ot. 
micah 7:16	yir’u goyim veyeiwoshu mikol gewuratam yasimu yad ‘al peh ’azeneihem tekherashnah. 
micah 7:17	yelakhakhu ‘afar kanakhash kezokhalei ’erets yirgezu mimisgeroteihem ’el yhoh ’eloheinu yifkhadu veyir’u mimeka. 
micah 7:18	mi ’el kamokha nosei ‘avon ve‘ower ‘al pesha‘ lish’eirit nakhalato lo hekheziq la‘ad ’apo ki khafets khesed hu. 
micah 7:19	yashuw yerakhameinu yikhbosh ‘avonoteinu vetashlikh bimtsulot yam kal khatotam. 
micah 7:20	titen ’emet leya‘aqow khesed le’awraham ’asher nishba‘ta la’awoteinu mimei qedem. 
nahum 1:1	masa nineveh seifer khazon nakhum ha’elqoshi. 
nahum 1:2	’el qano venoqem yhoh noqem yhoh uwa‘al kheimah noqem yhoh letsarav venoter hu le’oyewav. 
nahum 1:3	yhoh ’erekh ’apayim ugedol ugedal koakh venaqeh lo yenaqeh yhoh besufah uwis‘arah darko ve‘anan ’awaq raglav. 
nahum 1:4	go‘er bayam vayabesheihu vekhal haneharot hekheriw ’umlal bashan vekharmel uferakh lewanon ’umlal. 
nahum 1:5	harim ra‘ashu mimenu vehagewa‘ot hitmogagu vatisa ha’arets mipanav veteiwel vekhal yoshewei wah. 
nahum 1:6	lifnei za‘mo mi ya‘amod umi yaqum bakharon ’apo khamato nitekhah kha’esh vehatsurim nitetsu mimenu. 
nahum 1:7	tow yhoh lema‘oz beyom tsarah veyodeia‘ khosei wo. 
nahum 1:8	uweshetef ‘ower kalah ya‘aseh meqomah ve’oyewav yeradef khoshekh 
nahum 1:9	mah tekhashewun ’el yhoh kalah hu ‘oseh lo taqum pa‘amayim tsarah. 
nahum 1:10	ki ‘ad sirim sewukhim ukhesawe’am sewu’im ’ukelu keqash yawesh malei. 
nahum 1:11	mimekh yatsa khoshew ‘al yhoh ra‘ah yo‘ets beliya‘al. 
nahum 1:12	koh ’amar yhoh ’im sheleimim vekhen rabim vekhen nagozu ve‘awar ve‘initikh lo ’a‘anekh ‘od. 
nahum 1:13	ve‘atah ’eshbor moteihu mei‘alayikh umosrotayikh ’anateq. 
nahum 1:14	vetsivah ‘alekha yhoh lo yizara‘ mishimkha ‘od mibet ’elohekha ’akhrit pesel umaseikhah ’asim qiwrekha ki qalota. 
nahum 1:15	hineh ‘al heharim raglei mewaser mashmia‘ shalom khagi yehudah khagayikh shalemi nedarayikh ki lo yosif ‘od la‘awor la‘awar bakh beliya‘al kuloh nikhrat. 
nahum 2:1	‘alah meifits ‘al panayikh natsor metsurah tsapeh derekh khazeq matenayim ’amets koakh me’od. 
nahum 2:2	ki shaw yhoh ’et ge’on ya‘aqow kig’on yisra’el ki weqaqum boqeqim uzemoreihem shikheitu. 
nahum 2:3	magen giboreihu me’adam ’anshei khayil metula‘im be’esh peladot harekhew beyom hakhino vehaberoshim hare‘alu. 
nahum 2:4	bakhutsot yitholu harekhew yishtaqshequn barekhowot mar’eihen kalapidim kaberaqim yerotseitsu. 
nahum 2:5	yizkor ’adirav yikashelu wahalikhotam bahalikhatam yemaharu khomatah vehukhan hasokhekh. 
nahum 2:6	sha‘arei haneharot niftakhu vehaheikhal namog. 
nahum 2:7	vehutsaw guletah ho‘alatah ve’amhoteha menahagot keqol yonim metofefot ‘al liwweihen. 
nahum 2:8	venineveh khiwreikhat mayim mimei hi vehemah nasim ‘imdu ‘amodu ve’en mafneh. 
nahum 2:9	bozu khesef bozu zahaw ve’en qeitseh latekhunah kawod mikol keli khemdah. 
nahum 2:10	buqah umewuqah umewulaqah velew names ufiq birkayim vekhalkhalah bekhal matenayim ufenei khulam qibetsu farur. 
nahum 2:11	’ayeh me‘on ’arayot umir‘eh hu lakefirim ’asher halakh ’aryeh lawi sham gur ’aryeh ve’en makharid. 
nahum 2:12	’aryeh toref bedei gorotav umekhaneq leliw’otav vaymalei teref khorav ume‘onotav tereifah. 
nahum 2:13	hini ’eilayikh ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot vehiw‘arti we‘ashan rikhbah ukhefirayikh tokhal kharew vehikhrati mei’erets tarpekh velo yishama‘ ‘od qol mal’akheikheh. 
nahum 3:1	ho ‘ir damim kulah kakhash pereq melei’ah lo yamish taref. 
nahum 3:2	qol shot veqol ra‘ash ’ofan vesus doher umerkawah meraqeidah. 
nahum 3:3	parash ma‘aleh velahaw kherew uweraq khanit verow khalal vekhowed pager ve’en qeitseh lageviyah yikhshelu vekhashelu bigviyatam. 
nahum 3:4	meirow zenunei zonah towat khen ba‘alat keshafim hamokheret goyim biznuneha umishpakhot bikhshafeha. 
nahum 3:5	hini ’eilayikh ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot vegileiti shulayikh ‘al panayikh vehar’eiti goyim ma‘rekh umamlakhot qelonekh. 
nahum 3:6	vehishlakhti ‘alayikh shiqutsim venibaltikh vesamtikh kero’i. 
nahum 3:7	vehayah khal ro’ayikh yidod mimekh ve’amar shadedah nineveh mi yanud lah mei’ayin ’awaqesh menakhamim lakh. 
nahum 3:8	hateitewi mino ’amon hayoshewah bai’orim mayim sawiw lah ’asher khel yam miyam khomatah. 
nahum 3:9	kush ‘atsemah umitsrayim ve’en qeitseh put veluwim hayu be‘ezratekh. 
nahum 3:10	gam hi lagolah halekhah washewi gam ‘olaleha yeruteshu berosh kal khutsot ve‘al nikhbadeha yadu goral vekhal gedoleha rutequ waziqim. 
nahum 3:11	gam ’at tishkeri tehi na‘alamah gam ’at tewaqshi ma‘oz mei’oyew. 
nahum 3:12	kal miwtsarayikh te’einim ‘im bikurim ’im yino‘u venafelu ‘al pi ’okhel. 
nahum 3:13	hineh ‘amekh nashim beqirbekh le’oyewayikh patoakh niftekhu sha‘arei ’artsekh ’akhelah ’esh berikhayikh. 
nahum 3:14	mei matsor sha’awi lakh khazeqi miwtsarayikh bo’i watit verimsi wakhomer hakhaziqi malben. 
nahum 3:15	m tokhelekh ’esh takhritekh kherew tokhelekh kayaleq hitkabed kayeleq hitkabedi ka’arbeh. 
nahum 3:16	hirbet rokhelayikh mikokhwei hashamayim yeleq pashat vaya‘of. 
nahum 3:17	minezarayikh ka’arbeh vetafserayikh kegow gowai hakhonim bagedeirot beyom qarah shemesh zarekhah venodad velo noda‘ meqomo ’ayam. 
nahum 3:18	namu ro‘ekha melekh ’ashur yishkenu ’adirekha nafoshu ‘amekha ‘al heharim ve’en meqabets. 
nahum 3:19	’en keihah leshiwrekha nakhlah makatekha kol shome‘ei shim‘akha taqe‘u khaf ‘alekha ki ‘al mi lo ‘awerah ra‘atekha tamid. 
habakkuk 1:1	hamasa ’asher khazah khawaquq hanawi. 
habakkuk 1:2	‘ad ’anah yhoh shiva‘ti velo tishma‘ ’ez‘aq ’eilekha khamas velo toshia‘. 
habakkuk 1:3	lamah tar’eini ’aven ve‘amal tabit veshod vekhamas lenegdi vayhi riw umadon yisa. 
habakkuk 1:4	‘al ken tafug torah velo yeitsei lanetsakh mishpat ki rasha‘ makhtir ’et hatsadiq ‘al ken yeitsei mishpat me‘uqal. 
habakkuk 1:5	re’u wagoyim vehabitu vehitamehu temahu ki fo‘al po‘el bimeikhem lo ta’aminu ki yesupar. 
habakkuk 1:6	ki hini meiqim ’et hakasdim hago hamar vehanimhar haholekh lemerkhawei ’erets lareshet mishkanot lo lo. 
habakkuk 1:7	’ayom venora hu mimenu mishpato use’eito yeitsei. 
habakkuk 1:8	veqalu minemeirim susav vekhadu mize’eiwei ‘erew ufashu parashav ufarashav meirakhoq yawo’u ya‘ufu kenesher khash le’ekhol. 
habakkuk 1:9	kuloh lekhamas yawo megamat peneihem qadimah vaye’esof kakhol shewi. 
habakkuk 1:10	vehu bamelakhim yitqalas verozenim miskhaq lo hu lekhal miwtsar yiskhaq vayitsbor ‘afar vayilkedah. 
habakkuk 1:11	’az khalaf ruakh vaya‘awor ve’ashem zu khokho leiloho. 
habakkuk 1:12	halo ’atah miqedem yhoh ’elohai qedoshi lo namut yhoh lemishpat samto vetsur lehokhiakh yesadto. 
habakkuk 1:13	tehor ‘einayim meire’ot ra‘ vehabit ’el ‘amal lo tukhal lamah tabit bogdim takharish bewala‘ rasha‘ tsadiq mimenu. 
habakkuk 1:14	vata‘aseh ’adam kidgei hayam keremes lo moshel bo. 
habakkuk 1:15	kuloh bekhakah hei‘alah yegoreihu wekhermo veya’asfeihu bemikhmarto ‘al ken yismakh veyagil. 
habakkuk 1:16	‘al ken yezabeiakh lekhermo viqater lemikhmarto ki wahemah shamen khelqo uma’akhalo beri’ah. 
habakkuk 1:17	ha‘al ken yariq khermo vetamid laharog goyim lo yakhmol. 
habakkuk 2:1	‘al mishmarti ’e‘emodah ve’etyatsewah ‘al matsor va’atsapeh lir’ot mah yedaber bi umah ’ashiw ‘al tokhakhti. 
habakkuk 2:2	vaya‘aneini yhoh vayomer ketow khazon uwa’er ‘al halukhot lema‘an yaruts qorei wo. 
habakkuk 2:3	ki ‘od khazon lamo‘ed veyafeiakh laqets velo yekhazew ’im yitmahmah khakeh lo ki wo yawo lo ye’akher. 
habakkuk 2:4	hineh ‘upelah lo yasherah nafsho bo vetsadiq be’emunato yikhyeh. 
habakkuk 2:5	ve’af ki hayayin boged gewer yahir velo yinveh ’asher hirkhiw kish’ol nafsho vehu khamavet velo yisba‘ vaye’esof ’eilav kal hagoyim vayiqbots ’eilav kal ha‘amim. 
habakkuk 2:6	halo ’eleh khulam ‘alav mashal yisa’u umelitsah khidot lo veyomar ho hamarbeh lo lo ‘ad matai umakhbid ‘alav ‘awtit. 
habakkuk 2:7	halo feta‘ yaqumu noshekhekha veyiqtsu meza‘ze‘ekha vehayita limshisot lamo. 
habakkuk 2:8	ki ’atah shalota goyim rabim yeshalukha kal yeter ‘amim midemei ’adam vakhamas ’erets qiryah vekhal yoshewei wah. 
habakkuk 2:9	ho botseia‘ betsa‘ ra‘ leweito lasum bamarom qino lehinatsel mikaf ra‘. 
habakkuk 2:10	ya‘atsta boshet leweitekha qetsot ‘amim rabim vekhotei nafshekha. 
habakkuk 2:11	ki ’ewen miqir tiz‘aq vekhafis mei‘ets ya‘anenah. 
habakkuk 2:12	ho boneh ‘ir bedamim vekhonen qiryah be‘avlah. 
habakkuk 2:13	halo hineh mei’et yhoh tsewa’ot veyige‘u ‘amim bedei ’esh ule’umim bedei riq yi‘afu. 
habakkuk 2:14	ki timalei ha’arets lada‘at ’et kewod yhoh kamayim yekhasu ‘al yam. 
habakkuk 2:15	ho mashqeh rei‘eihu mesapeiakh khamatekha ve’af shaker lema‘an habit ‘al me‘oreihem. 
habakkuk 2:16	sawa‘ta qalon mikawod sheteh gam ’atah vehei‘arel tisow ‘alekha kos yemin yhoh veqiqalon ‘al kewodekha. 
habakkuk 2:17	ki khamas lewanon yekhaseka veshod beheimot yekhitan midemei ’adam vakhamas ’erets qiryah vekhal yoshewei wah. 
habakkuk 2:18	mah ho‘il pesel ki fesalo yotsero maseikhah umoreh shaqer ki watakh yotser yitsro ‘alav la‘asot ’elilim ’ilemim. 
habakkuk 2:19	ho ’omer la‘ets haqitsah ‘uri le’ewen dumam hu yoreh hineh hu tafus zahaw vakhesef vekhal ruakh ’en beqirbo. 
habakkuk 2:20	yhoh beheikhal qadesho has mipanav kal ha’arets. 
habakkuk 3:1	tefilah lakhawaquq hanawi ‘al shigyonot. 
habakkuk 3:2	yhoh shama‘ti shim‘akha yareiti yhoh pa‘alekha beqerew shanim khayeihu beqerew shanim todia‘ berogez rakhem tizkor. 
habakkuk 3:3	’eloha miteiman yawo veqadosh meihar paran selah kisah shamayim hodo utehilato male’ah ha’arets. 
habakkuk 3:4	venogah ka’or tihyeh qarnayim miyado lo vesham khewyon ‘uzoh 
habakkuk 3:5	lefanav yeilekh dawer veyeitsei reshef leraglav. 
habakkuk 3:6	‘amad vaymoded ’erets ra’ah vayater goyim vayitpotsetsu harei ‘ad shakhu giw‘ot ‘olam halikhot ‘olam lo 
habakkuk 3:7	takhat ’aven ra’iti ’aholei khushan yirgezun yeri‘ot ’erets midyan. 
habakkuk 3:8	hawinharim kharah yhoh ’im baneharim ’apekha ’im bayam ‘ewratekha ki tirkaw ‘al susekha markewotekha yeshu‘ah. 
habakkuk 3:9	‘eryah tei‘or qashtekha shewu‘ot matot ’omer selah neharot tewaqa‘ ’arets. 
habakkuk 3:10	ra’ukha yakhilu harim zerem mayim ‘awar natan tehom qolo rom yadeihu nasa. 
habakkuk 3:11	shemesh yareiakh ‘amad zewulah le’or khitsekha yehaleikhu lenogah beraq khanitekha. 
habakkuk 3:12	beza‘am tits‘ad ’arets be’af tadush goyim. 
habakkuk 3:13	yatsata leyeisha‘ ‘amekha leyeisha‘ ’et meshikhekha makhatsta rosh mibet rasha‘ ‘arot yesod ‘ad tsavar selah. 
habakkuk 3:14	naqawta wematav rosh perazo perazav yis‘aru lahafitseini ‘alitsutam kemo le’ekhol ‘ani bamistar. 
habakkuk 3:15	darakhta wayam susekha khomer mayim rabim. 
habakkuk 3:16	shama‘ti vatirgaz bitni leqol tsalalu sefatai yawo raqaw ba‘atsamai vetakhtai ’ergaz ’asher ’anuakh leyom tsarah la‘alot le‘am yegudenu. 
habakkuk 3:17	ki te’einah lo tifrakh ve’en yewul bagefanim kikhesh ma‘aseh zayit ushedeimot lo ‘asah ’okhel gazar mimikhlah tson ve’en baqar barefatim. 
habakkuk 3:18	va’ani yhoh ’e‘lozah ’agilah beilohei yish‘i. 
habakkuk 3:19	yhoh ’adonai kheili vayasem raglai ka’ayalot ve‘al bamotai yadrikheini lamnatseiakh binginotai. 
zephaniah 1:1	dewar yhoh ’asher hayah ’el tsefanyah ben kushi wen gedalyah ben ’amaryah ben khizqiyah bimei yoshiyahu wen ’amon melekh yehudah. 
zephaniah 1:2	’asof ’asef kol mei‘al penei ha’adamah ne’um yhoh. 
zephaniah 1:3	’asef ’adam uweheimah ’asef ‘of hashamayim udegei hayam vehamakhsheilot ’et haresha‘im vehikhrati ’et ha’adam mei‘al penei ha’adamah ne’um yhoh. 
zephaniah 1:4	venatiti yadi ‘al yehudah ve‘al kal yoshewei yerushalim vehikhrati min hamaqom hazeh ’et she’ar haba‘al ’et shem hakemarim ‘im hakohanim. 
zephaniah 1:5	ve’et hamishtakhavim ‘al hagagot litswa hashamayim ve’et hamishtakhavim hanishba‘im yhoh vehanishba‘im bemalkam. 
zephaniah 1:6	ve’et hanesogim mei’akharei yhoh va’asher lo wiqshu ’et yhoh velo derashuhu. 
zephaniah 1:7	has mipenei ’adonai yhoh ki qarow yom yhoh ki heikhin yhoh zewakh hiqdish qeru’av. 
zephaniah 1:8	vehayah beyom zewakh yhoh ufaqadti ‘al hasarim ve‘al benei hamelekh ve‘al kal haloweshim malbush nakheri. 
zephaniah 1:9	ufaqadti ‘al kal hadoleg ‘al hamiftan bayom hahu hamal’im bet ’adoneihem khamas umirmah. 
zephaniah 1:10	vehayah wayom hahu ne’um yhoh qol tse‘aqah misha‘ar hadagim vilalah min hamishneh veshewer gadol meihagewa‘ot. 
zephaniah 1:11	heililu yoshewei hamakhtesh ki nidmah kal ‘am kena‘an nikhretu kal netilei khasef. 
zephaniah 1:12	vehayah ba‘et hahi ’akhapes ’et yerushalim baneirot ufaqadti ‘al ha’anashim haqofe’im ‘al shimreihem ha’omerim bilwawam lo yeitiw yhoh velo yareia‘. 
zephaniah 1:13	vehayah kheilam limshisah uwateihem lishmamah uwanu watim velo yeisheiwu venate‘u kheramim velo yishtu ’et yeinam. 
zephaniah 1:14	qarow yom yhoh hagadol qarow umaher me’od qol yom yhoh mar tsoreiakh sham gibor. 
zephaniah 1:15	yom ‘ewrah hayom hahu yom tsarah umetsuqah yom sho’ah umesho’ah yom khoshekh va’afeilah yom ‘anan va‘arafel. 
zephaniah 1:16	yom shofar uteru‘ah ‘al he‘arim habetsurot ve‘al hapinot hagewohot. 
zephaniah 1:17	vahatseiroti la’adam vehalekhu ka‘ivrim ki yhoh khata’u veshupakh damam ke‘afar ulekhumam kagelalim. 
zephaniah 1:18	gam kaspam gam zehawam lo yukhal lehatsilam beyom ‘ewrat yhoh uwe’esh qin’ato tei’akhel kal ha’arets ki khalah ’akh niwhalah ya‘aseh ’et kal yoshewei ha’arets. 
zephaniah 2:1	hitqosheshu vaqoshu hago lo nikhsaf. 
zephaniah 2:2	beterem ledet khoq kemots ‘awar yom beterem lo yawo ‘aleikhem kharon ’af yhoh beterem lo yawo ‘aleikhem yom ’af yhoh. 
zephaniah 2:3	baqeshu ’et yhoh kal ‘anvei ha’arets ’asher mishpato pa‘alu baqeshu tsedeq baqeshu ‘anavah ’ulai tisateru beyom ’af yhoh. 
zephaniah 2:4	ki ‘azah ‘azuwah tihyeh ve’ashqelon lishmamah ’ashdod batsahorayim yegareshuha ve‘eqron tei‘aqer. 
zephaniah 2:5	ho yoshewei khewel hayam go kereitim dewar yhoh ‘aleikhem kena‘an ’erets pelishtim veha’awadtikh mei’en yoshew. 
zephaniah 2:6	vehayetah khewel hayam nevot kerot ro‘im vegidrot tson. 
zephaniah 2:7	vehayah khewel lish’eirit bet yehudah ‘aleihem yir‘un bewatei ’ashqelon ba‘erew yirbatsun ki yifqedem yhoh ’eloheihem veshaw shewutam shewitam. 
zephaniah 2:8	shama‘ti kherpat mo’aw vegidufei benei ‘amon ’asher kheirefu ’et ‘ami vayagdilu ‘al gewulam. 
zephaniah 2:9	lakhen khai ’ani ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ki mo’aw kisdom tihyeh uwenei ‘amon ka‘amorah mimshaq kharul umikhreh melakh ushemamah ‘ad ‘olam she’eirit ‘ami yewazum veyeter go goyi yinkhalum. 
zephaniah 2:10	zot lahem takhat ge’onam ki kheirefu vayagdilu ‘al ‘am yhoh tsewa’ot. 
zephaniah 2:11	nora yhoh ‘aleihem ki razah ’et kal ’elohei ha’arets veyishtakhavu lo ’ish mimeqomo kol ’iyei hagoyim. 
zephaniah 2:12	gam ’atem kushim khalei kharbi hemah. 
zephaniah 2:13	veyet yado ‘al tsafon vi’abed ’et ’ashur veyasem ’et nineveh lishmamah tsiyah kamidbar. 
zephaniah 2:14	verawetsu wetokhah ‘adarim kal khayto go gam qa’at gam qipod bekhaftoreha yalinu qol yeshorer bakhalon khorew basaf ki ’arzah ‘eirah. 
zephaniah 2:15	zot ha‘ir ha‘alizah hayoshewet lawetakh ha’omerah bilwawah ’ani ve’afsi ‘od ’ekh hayetah leshamah marbets lakhayah kol ‘ower ‘aleha yishroq yania‘ yado. 
zephaniah 3:1	ho more’ah venig’alah ha‘ir hayonah. 
zephaniah 3:2	lo shame‘ah beqol lo laqekhah musar yhoh lo watakhah ’el ’eloheha lo qareiwah. 
zephaniah 3:3	sareha weqirbah ’arayot sho’agim shofeteha ze’eiwei ‘erew lo garemu laboqer. 
zephaniah 3:4	newi’eha pokhazim ’anshei bogedot kohaneha khilelu qodesh khamesu torah. 
zephaniah 3:5	yhoh tsadiq beqirbah lo ya‘aseh ‘avlah baboqer baboqer mishpato yiten la’or lo ne‘dar velo yodeia‘ ‘aval boshet. 
zephaniah 3:6	hikhrati goyim nashamu pinotam hekherawti khutsotam mibeli ‘ower nitsdu ‘areihem mibeli ’ish mei’en yoshew. 
zephaniah 3:7	’amarti ’akh tire’i ’oti tiqkhi musar velo yikaret me‘onah kol ’asher paqadti ‘aleha ’akhen hishkimu hishkhitu kol ‘alilotam. 
zephaniah 3:8	lakhen khaku li ne’um yhoh leyom qumi le‘ad ki mishpati le’esof goyim leqawetsi mamlakhot lishpokh ‘aleihem za‘mi kol kharon ’api ki be’esh qin’ati tei’akhel kal ha’arets. 
zephaniah 3:9	ki ’az ’ehpokh ’el ‘amim safah werurah liqro khulam beshem yhoh le‘awedo shekhem ’ekhad. 
zephaniah 3:10	mei‘eiwer lenaharei khush ‘atarai bat putsai yowilun minkhati. 
zephaniah 3:11	bayom hahu lo teiwoshi mikol ‘alilotayikh ’asher pasha‘at bi ki ’az ’asir miqirbekh ‘alizei ga’avatekh velo tosifi legawehah ‘od behar qadshi 
zephaniah 3:12	vehish’arti weqirbekh ‘am ‘ani vadal vekhasu beshem yhoh. 
zephaniah 3:13	she’eirit yisra’el lo ya‘asu ‘avlah velo yedaberu khazaw velo yimatsei befihem leshon tarmit ki hemah yir‘u verawetsu ve’en makharid. 
zephaniah 3:14	rani bat tsiyon hari‘u yisra’el simkhi ve‘alezi bekhal lew bat yerushalim. 
zephaniah 3:15	heisir yhoh mishpatayikh pinah ’oyewekh melekh yisra’el yhoh beqirbekh lo tire’i ra‘ ‘od. 
zephaniah 3:16	bayom hahu yei’amer lirushalim ’al tira’i tsiyon ’al yirpu yadayikh. 
zephaniah 3:17	yhoh ’elohayikh beqirbekh gibor yoshia‘ yasis ‘alayikh besimkhah yakharish be’ahawato yagil ‘alayikh berinah. 
zephaniah 3:18	nugei mimo‘ed ’asafti mimekh hayu mas’et ‘aleha kherpah. 
zephaniah 3:19	hini ‘oseh ’et kal me‘anayikh ba‘et hahi vehosha‘ti ’et hatsolei‘ah vehanidakhah ’aqabets vesamtim lithilah uleshem bekhal ha’arets bashetam. 
zephaniah 3:20	ba‘et hahi ’awi ’etkhem uwa‘et qabetsi ’etkhem ki ’eten ’etkhem leshem velithilah bekhol ‘amei ha’arets beshuwi ’et shewuteikhem le‘eineikhem ’amar yhoh. 
haggai 1:1	bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hamelekh bakhodesh hashishi beyom ’ekhad lakhodesh hayah dewar yhoh beyad khagai hanawi ’el zerubawel ben she’alti’el pakhat yehudah ve’el yehoshua‘ ben yehotsadaq hakohen hagadol leimor. 
haggai 1:2	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot leimor ha‘am hazeh ’ameru lo ‘et bo ‘et bet yhoh lehibanot. 
haggai 1:3	vayhi dewar yhoh beyad khagai hanawi leimor. 
haggai 1:4	ha‘et lakhem ’atem lashewet bewateikhem sefunim vehabayit hazeh kharew. 
haggai 1:5	ve‘atah koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot simu lewawkhem ‘al darkheikhem. 
haggai 1:6	zera‘tem harbeh vehawei me‘at ’akhol ve’en lesawe‘ah shato ve’en leshakherah lawosh ve’en lekhom lo vehamistaker mistaker ’el tseror naquw. 
haggai 1:7	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot simu lewawkhem ‘al darkheikhem. 
haggai 1:8	‘alu hahar vahaweitem ‘ets uwenu habayit ve’ertseh bo ve’ekawed ve’ekawedah ’amar yhoh. 
haggai 1:9	panoh ’el harbeh vehineh lim‘at vahaweitem habayit venafakhti wo ya‘an meh ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot ya‘an beiti ’asher hu kharew ve’atem ratsim ’ish leweito. 
haggai 1:10	‘al ken ‘aleikhem kale’u shamayim mital veha’arets kale’ah yewulah. 
haggai 1:11	va’eqra khorew ‘al ha’arets ve‘al heharim ve‘al hadagan ve‘al hatirosh ve‘al hayitshar ve‘al ’asher totsi ha’adamah ve‘al ha’adam ve‘al habeheimah ve‘al kal yegia‘ kapayim. 
haggai 1:12	vayishma‘ zerubawel ben shalti’el vihoshua‘ ben yehotsadaq hakohen hagadol vekhol she’eirit ha‘am beqol yhoh ’eloheihem ve‘al diwrei khagai hanawi ka’asher shelakho yhoh ’eloheihem vayire’u ha‘am mipenei yhoh. 
haggai 1:13	vayomer khagai mal’akh yhoh bemal’akhut yhoh la‘am leimor ’ani ’itekhem ne’um yhoh. 
haggai 1:14	vaya‘ar yhoh ’et ruakh zerubawel ben shalti’el pakhat yehudah ve’et ruakh yehoshua‘ ben yehotsadaq hakohen hagadol ve’et ruakh kol she’eirit ha‘am vayawo’u vaya‘asu melakhah bewet yhoh tsewa’ot ’eloheihem. 
haggai 1:15	beyom ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah lakhodesh bashishi bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hamelekh. 
haggai 2:1	bashewi‘i be‘esrim ve’ekhad lakhodesh hayah dewar yhoh beyad khagai hanawi leimor. 
haggai 2:2	’emar na ’el zerubawel ben shalti’el pakhat yehudah ve’el yehoshua‘ ben yehotsadaq hakohen hagadol ve’el she’eirit ha‘am leimor. 
haggai 2:3	mi wakhem hanish’ar ’asher ra’ah ’et habayit hazeh bikhwodo harishon umah ’atem ro’im ’oto ‘atah halo khamohu ke’ayin be‘eineikhem. 
haggai 2:4	ve‘atah khazaq zerubawel ne’um yhoh vakhazaq yehoshua‘ ben yehotsadaq hakohen hagadol vakhazaq kal ‘am ha’arets ne’um yhoh va‘asu ki ’ani ’itekhem ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
haggai 2:5	’et hadawar ’asher karati ’itekhem betseitekhem mimitsrayim verukhi ‘omedet betokhkhem ’al tira’u. 
haggai 2:6	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ‘od ’akhat me‘at hi va’ani mar‘ish ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets ve’et hayam ve’et hekharawah. 
haggai 2:7	vehir‘ashti ’et kal hagoyim uwa’u khemdat kal hagoyim umileiti ’et habayit hazeh kawod ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
haggai 2:8	li hakesef veli hazahaw ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
haggai 2:9	gadol yihyeh kewod habayit hazeh ha’akharon min harishon ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot uwamaqom hazeh ’eten shalom ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
haggai 2:10	be‘esrim ve’arba‘ah lateshi‘i bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hayah dewar yhoh ’el khagai hanawi leimor. 
haggai 2:11	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot she’al na ’et hakohanim torah leimor. 
haggai 2:12	hen yisa ’ish besar qodesh bikhnaf bigdo venaga‘ bikhnafo ’el halekhem ve’el hanazid ve’el hayayin ve’el shemen ve’el kal ma’akhal hayiqdash vaya‘anu hakohanim vayomeru lo. 
haggai 2:13	vayomer khagai ’im yiga‘ temei nefesh bekhal ’eleh hayitma vaya‘anu hakohanim vayomeru yitma. 
haggai 2:14	vaya‘an khagai vayomer ken ha‘am hazeh vekhen hago hazeh lefanai ne’um yhoh vekhen kal ma‘aseh yedeihem va’asher yaqriwu sham tamei hu. 
haggai 2:15	ve‘atah simu na lewawkhem min hayom hazeh vama‘elah miterem sum ’ewen ’el ’ewen beheikhal yhoh. 
haggai 2:16	mihyotam ba ’el ‘areimat ‘esrim vehayetah ‘asarah ba ’el hayeqew lakhsof khamishim purah vehayetah ‘esrim. 
haggai 2:17	hikeiti ’etkhem bashidafon uwayeiraqon uwabarad ’et kal ma‘aseh yedeikhem ve’en ’etkhem ’eilai ne’um yhoh. 
haggai 2:18	simu na lewawkhem min hayom hazeh vama‘elah miyom ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah lateshi‘i lemin hayom ’asher yusad heikhal yhoh simu lewawkhem. 
haggai 2:19	ha‘od hazera‘ bamegurah ve‘ad hagefen vehate’einah veharimon ve‘ets hazayit lo nasa min hayom hazeh ’awarekh. 
haggai 2:20	vayhi dewar yhoh sheinit ’el khagai be‘esrim ve’arba‘ah lakhodesh leimor. 
haggai 2:21	’emor ’el zerubawel pakhat yehudah leimor ’ani mar‘ish ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets. 
haggai 2:22	vehafakhti kisei mamlakhot vehishmadti khozeq mamlekhot hagoyim vehafakhti merkawah verokheweha veyaredu susim verokheweihem ’ish bekherew ’akhiv. 
haggai 2:23	bayom hahu ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot ’eqakhakha zerubawel ben she’alti’el ‘awdi ne’um yhoh vesamtikha kakhotam ki wekha wakharti ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
zechariah 1:1	bakhodesh hashemini bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hayah dewar yhoh ’el zekharyah ben berekhyah ben ‘ido hanawi leimor. 
zechariah 1:2	qatsaf yhoh ‘al ’awoteikhem qatsef. 
zechariah 1:3	ve’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot shuwu ’eilai ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot ve’ashuw ’aleikhem ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
zechariah 1:4	’al tihyu kha’awoteikhem ’asher qare’u ’aleihem hanewi’im harishonim leimor koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot shuwu na midarkheikhem hara‘im uma‘alileikhem uma‘aleikhem hara‘im velo shame‘u velo hiqshiwu ’eilai ne’um yhoh. 
zechariah 1:5	’awoteikhem ’ayeh hem vehanewi’im hal‘olam yikhyu. 
zechariah 1:6	’akh dewarai vekhuqai ’asher tsiviti ’et ‘awadai hanewi’im halo hisigu ’awoteikhem vayashuwu vayomeru ka’asher zamam yhoh tsewa’ot la‘asot lanu kidrakheinu ukhema‘alaleinu ken ‘asah ’itanu. 
zechariah 1:7	beyom ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah le‘ashtei ‘asar khodesh hu khodesh shewat bishnat shetayim ledareyavesh hayah dewar yhoh ’el zekharyah ben berekhyahu ben ‘ido hanawi leimor. 
zechariah 1:8	ra’iti halaylah vehineh ’ish rokhew ‘al sus ’adom vehu ‘omed ben hahadasim ’asher bametsulah ve’akharav susim ’adumim seruqim ulewanim. 
zechariah 1:9	va’omar mah ’eleh ’adoni vayomer ’eilai hamal’akh hadower bi ’ani ’ar’eka mah hemah ’eleh. 
zechariah 1:10	vaya‘an ha’ish ha‘omed ben hahadasim vayomar ’eleh ’asher shalakh yhoh lehithalekh ba’arets. 
zechariah 1:11	vaya‘anu ’et mal’akh yhoh ha‘omed ben hahadasim vayomeru hithalakhnu wa’arets vehineh khal ha’arets yoshewet veshoqatet. 
zechariah 1:12	vaya‘an mal’akh yhoh vayomar yhoh tsewa’ot ‘ad matai ’atah lo terakhem ’et yerushalim ve’et ‘arei yehudah ’asher za‘amtah zeh shiw‘im shanah. 
zechariah 1:13	vaya‘an yhoh ’et hamal’akh hadower bi dewarim towim dewarim nikhumim. 
zechariah 1:14	vayomer ’eilai hamal’akh hadower bi qera leimor koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot qineiti lirushalim uletsiyon qin’ah gedolah. 
zechariah 1:15	veqetsef gadol ’ani qotsef ‘al hagoyim hasha’ananim ’asher ’ani qatsafti me‘at vehemah ‘azeru lera‘ah. 
zechariah 1:16	lakhen koh ’amar yhoh shawti lirushalim berakhamim beiti yibaneh bah ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot veqavah veqav yinateh ‘al yerushalim. 
zechariah 1:17	‘od qera leimor koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ‘od tefutsenah ‘arai mitow venikham yhoh ‘od ’et tsiyon uwakhar ‘od birushalim. 
zechariah 1:18	va’esa ’et ‘einai va’eire vehineh ’arba‘ qeranot. 
zechariah 1:19	va’omar ’el hamal’akh hadower bi mah ’eleh vayomer ’eilai ’eleh haqeranot ’asher zeiru ’et yehudah ’et yisra’el virushalam 
zechariah 1:20	vayar’eini yhoh ’arba‘ah kharashim. 
zechariah 1:21	va’omar mah ’eleh wa’im la‘asot vayomer leimor ’eleh haqeranot ’asher zeiru ’et yehudah kefi ’ish lo nasa rosho vayawo’u ’eleh lehakharid ’otam leyadot ’et qarnot hagoyim hanose’im qeren ’el ’erets yehudah lezarotah. 
zechariah 2:1	va’esa ‘einai va’eire vehineh ’ish uweyado khewel midah. 
zechariah 2:2	va’omar ’anah ’atah holekh vayomer ’eilai lamod ’et yerushalim lir’ot kamah rakhebah vekhamah ’arekah. 
zechariah 2:3	vehineh hamal’akh hadower bi yotsei umal’akh ’akher yotsei liqrato. 
zechariah 2:4	vayomer ’eilav ruts daber ’el hana‘ar halaz leimor perazot teishew yerushalim meirow ’adam uweheimah betokhah. 
zechariah 2:5	va’ani ’ehyeh lah ne’um yhoh khomat ’esh sawiw ulekhawod ’ehyeh wetokhah. 
zechariah 2:6	ho ho venusu mei’erets tsafon ne’um yhoh ki ke’arba‘ rukhot hashamayim peirasti ’etkhem ne’um yhoh. 
zechariah 2:7	ho tsiyon himaleti yoshewet bat bawel. 
zechariah 2:8	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’akhar kawod shelakhani ’el hagoyim hasholelim ’etkhem ki hanogeia‘ bakhem nogeia‘ bewawat ‘eino. 
zechariah 2:9	ki hini meinif ’et yadi ‘aleihem vehayu shalal le‘awdeihem vida‘tem ki yhoh tsewa’ot shelakhani. 
zechariah 2:10	rani vesimkhi bat tsiyon ki hini wa veshakhanti wetokhekh ne’um yhoh. 
zechariah 2:11	venilvu goyim rabim ’el yhoh bayom hahu vehayu li le‘am veshakhanti wetokhekh veyada‘at ki yhoh tsewa’ot shelakhani ’eilayikh. 
zechariah 2:12	venakhal yhoh ’et yehudah khelqo ‘al ’admat haqodesh uwakhar ‘od birushalim. 
zechariah 2:13	has kal basar mipenei yhoh ki nei‘or mime‘on qadesho. 
zechariah 3:1	vayar’eini ’et yehoshua‘ hakohen hagadol ‘omed lifnei mal’akh yhoh vehasatan ‘omed ‘al yemino lesitno. 
zechariah 3:2	vayomer yhoh ’el hasatan yig‘ar yhoh bekha hasatan veyig‘ar yhoh bekha habokher birushalim halo zeh ’ud mutsal mei’esh. 
zechariah 3:3	vihoshua‘ hayah lawush begadim tso’im ve‘omed lifnei hamal’akh. 
zechariah 3:4	vaya‘an vayomer ’el ha‘omedim lefanav leimor hasiru habegadim hatso’im mei‘alav vayomer ’eilav re’eh he‘ewarti mei‘alekha ‘avonekha vehalbesh ’otekha makhalatsot. 
zechariah 3:5	va’omar yasimu tsanif tahor ‘al rosho vayasimu hatsanif hatahor ‘al rosho vayalbishuhu begadim umal’akh yhoh ‘omed. 
zechariah 3:6	vaya‘ad mal’akh yhoh bihoshua‘ leimor. 
zechariah 3:7	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’im bidrakhai teilekh ve’im ’et mishmarti tishmor vegam ’atah tadin ’et beiti vegam tishmor ’et khatseirai venatati lekha mahlekhim ben ha‘omedim ha’eleh. 
zechariah 3:8	shema‘ na yehoshua‘ hakohen hagadol ’atah verei‘ekha hayoshewim lefanekha ki ’anshei mofet hemah ki hini meiwi ’et ‘awdi tsemakh. 
zechariah 3:9	ki hineh ha’ewen ’asher natati lifnei yehoshua‘ ‘al ’ewen ’akhat shiw‘ah ‘einayim hini mefateiakh pitukhah ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot umashti ’et ‘avon ha’arets hahi beyom ’ekhad. 
zechariah 3:10	bayom hahu ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot tiqre’u ’ish lerei‘eihu ’el takhat gefen ve’el takhat te’einah. 
zechariah 4:1	vayashaw hamal’akh hadower bi vai‘ireini ke’ish ’asher yei‘or mishenato. 
zechariah 4:2	vayomer ’eilai mah ’atah ro’eh vayomer va’omar ra’iti vehineh menorat zahaw kulah vegulah ‘al roshah veshiw‘ah neiroteha ‘aleha shiw‘ah veshiw‘ah mutsaqot laneirot ’asher ‘al roshah. 
zechariah 4:3	ushenayim zeitim ‘aleha ’ekhad mimin hagulah ve’ekhad ‘al semolah. 
zechariah 4:4	va’a‘an va’omar ’el hamal’akh hadower bi leimor mah ’eleh ’adoni. 
zechariah 4:5	vaya‘an hamal’akh hadower bi vayomer ’eilai halo yada‘ta mah hemah ’eleh va’omar lo ’adoni. 
zechariah 4:6	vaya‘an vayomer ’eilai leimor zeh dewar yhoh ’el zerubawel leimor lo wekhayil velo wekhoakh ki ’im berukhi ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
zechariah 4:7	mi ’atah har hagadol lifnei zerubawel lemishor vehotsi ’et ha’ewen haroshah teshu’ot khen khen lah. 
zechariah 4:8	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
zechariah 4:9	yedei zerubawel yisedu habayit hazeh veyadav tewatsa‘nah veyada‘ta ki yhoh tsewa’ot shelakhani ’aleikhem. 
zechariah 4:10	ki mi waz leyom qetanot vesamekhu vera’u ’et ha’ewen habedil beyad zerubawel shiw‘ah ’eleh ‘einei yhoh hemah meshotim bekhal ha’arets. 
zechariah 4:11	va’a‘an va’omar ’eilav mah shenei hazeitim ha’eileh ‘al yemin hamenorah ve‘al semolah. 
zechariah 4:12	va’a‘an sheinit va’omar ’eilav mah shetei shibalei hazeitim ’asher beyad shenei tsanterot hazahaw hamriqim mei‘aleihem hazahaw. 
zechariah 4:13	vayomer ’eilai leimor halo yada‘ta mah ’eleh va’omar lo ’adoni. 
zechariah 4:14	vayomer ’eleh shenei wenei hayitshar ha‘omedim ‘al ’adon kal ha’arets. 
zechariah 5:1	va’ashuw va’esa ‘einai va’er’eh vehineh megilah ‘afah. 
zechariah 5:2	vayomer ’eilai mah ’atah ro’eh va’omar ’ani ro’eh megilah ‘afah ’arekah ‘esrim ba’amah verakhebah ‘eser ba’amah. 
zechariah 5:3	vayomer ’eilai zot ha’alah hayotset ‘al penei khal ha’arets ki khal hagonew mizeh kamoha niqah vekhal hanishba‘ mizeh kamoha niqah. 
zechariah 5:4	hotseitiha ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot uwa’ah ’el bet haganaw ve’el bet hanishba‘ bishmi lashaqer velaneh betokh beito vekhilatu ve’et ‘eitsav ve’et ’awanav. 
zechariah 5:5	vayeitsei hamal’akh hadower bi vayomer ’eilai sa na ‘einekha ure’eh mah hayotset hazot. 
zechariah 5:6	va’omar mah hi vayomer zot ha’eifah hayotset vayomer zot ‘einam bekhal ha’arets. 
zechariah 5:7	vehineh kikar ‘oferet niset vezot ’ishah ’akhat yoshewet betokh ha’eifah. 
zechariah 5:8	vayomer zot harish‘ah vayashlekh ’otah ’el tokh ha’eifah vayashlekh ’et ’ewen ha‘oferet ’el piha. 
zechariah 5:9	va’esa ‘einai va’eire vehineh shetayim nashim yots’ot veruakh bekhanfeihem velahenah khenafayim kekhanfei hakhasidah vatisenah ’et ha’eifah ben ha’arets uwen hashamayim. 
zechariah 5:10	va’omar ’el hamal’akh hadower bi ’anah hemah molikhot ’et ha’eifah. 
zechariah 5:11	vayomer ’eilai liwnot lah wayit be’erets shin‘ar vehukhan vehunikhah sham ‘al mekhunatah. 
zechariah 6:1	va’ashuw va’esa ‘einai va’er’eh vehineh ’arba‘ markawot yotse’ot miben shenei heharim veheharim harei nekhoshet. 
zechariah 6:2	bamerkawah harishonah susim ’adumim uwamerkawah hasheinit susim shekhorim. 
zechariah 6:3	uwamerkawah hashelishit susim lewanim uwamerkawah harewi‘it susim berudim ’amutsim. 
zechariah 6:4	va’a‘an va’omar ’el hamal’akh hadower bi mah ’eleh ’adoni. 
zechariah 6:5	vaya‘an hamal’akh vayomer ’eilai ’eleh ’arba‘ rukhot hashamayim yots’ot meihityatsew ‘al ’adon kal ha’arets. 
zechariah 6:6	’asher bah hasusim hashekhorim yotse’im ’el ’erets tsafon vehalewanim yatse’u ’el ’akhareihem vehaberudim yatse’u ’el ’erets hateiman. 
zechariah 6:7	veha’amutsim yatse’u vaywaqshu lalekhet lehithalekh ba’arets vayomer lekhu hithalekhu wa’arets vatithalakhnah ba’arets. 
zechariah 6:8	vayaz‘eq ’oti vaydaber ’eilai leimor re’eh hayots’im ’el ’erets tsafon heinikhu ’et rukhi be’erets tsafon. 
zechariah 6:9	vayhi dewar yhoh ’eilai leimor. 
zechariah 6:10	laqoakh mei’et hagolah meikheldai umei’et towiyah umei’et yeda‘yah uwata ’atah bayom hahu uwata bet yoshiyah wen tsefanyah ’asher ba’u mibawel. 
zechariah 6:11	velaqakhta khesef vezahaw ve‘asita ‘atarot vesamta berosh yehoshua‘ ben yehotsadaq hakohen hagadol. 
zechariah 6:12	ve’amarta ’eilav leimor koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot leimor hineh ’ish tsemakh shemo umitakhtav yitsmakh uwanah ’et heikhal yhoh. 
zechariah 6:13	vehu yiwneh ’et heikhal yhoh vehu yisa hod veyashaw umashal ‘al kis’o vehayah khohen ‘al kis’o va‘atsat shalom tihyeh ben sheneihem. 
zechariah 6:14	veha‘atarot tihyeh lekheilem uletowiyah velida‘yah ulekhen ben tsefanyah lezikaron beheikhal yhoh. 
zechariah 6:15	urekhoqim yawo’u uwanu beheikhal yhoh vida‘tem ki yhoh tsewa’ot shelakhani ’aleikhem vehayah ’im shamoa‘ tishme‘un beqol yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
zechariah 7:1	vayhi bishnat ’arba‘ ledareyavesh hamelekh hayah dewar yhoh ’el zekharyah be’arba‘ah lakhodesh hateshi‘i bekhislev. 
zechariah 7:2	vayishlakh bet ’el sar ’etser veregem melekh va’anashav lekhalot ’et penei yhoh. 
zechariah 7:3	leimor ’el hakohanim ’asher lewet yhoh tsewa’ot ve’el hanewi’im leimor ha’ewkeh bakhodesh hakhamishi hinazer ka’asher ‘asiti zeh kameh shanim. 
zechariah 7:4	vayhi dewar yhoh tsewa’ot ’eilai leimor. 
zechariah 7:5	’emor ’el kal ‘am ha’arets ve’el hakohanim leimor ki tsamtem vesafod bakhamishi uwashewi‘i vezeh shiw‘im shanah hatsom tsamtuni ’ani. 
zechariah 7:6	vekhi tokhelu vekhi tishtu halo ’atem ha’okhelim ve’atem hashotim. 
zechariah 7:7	halo ’et hadewarim ’asher qara yhoh beyad hanewi’im harishonim bihyot yerushalim yoshewet usheleivah ve‘areha sewiwoteha vehanegew vehashefeilah yoshew. 
zechariah 7:8	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el zekharyah leimor. 
zechariah 7:9	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot leimor mishpat ’emet shefotu vekhesed verakhamim ‘asu ’ish ’et ’akhiv. 
zechariah 7:10	ve’almanah veyatom ger ve‘ani ’al ta‘ashoqu vera‘at ’ish ’akhiv ’al takhshewu bilwawkhem. 
zechariah 7:11	vayma’anu lehaqshiw vayitenu khatef soraret ve’azeneihem hikhbidu mishemoa‘. 
zechariah 7:12	velibam samu shamir mishemoa‘ ’et hatorah ve’et hadewarim ’asher shalakh yhoh tsewa’ot berukho beyad hanewi’im harishonim vayhi qetsef gadol mei’et yhoh tsewa’ot. 
zechariah 7:13	vayhi kha’asher qara velo shamei‘u ken yiqre’u velo ’eshma‘ ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
zechariah 7:14	ve’eisa‘arem ‘al kal hagoyim ’asher lo yeda‘um veha’arets nashamah ’akhareihem mei‘ower umishaw vayasimu ’erets khemdah leshamah. 
zechariah 8:1	vayhi dewar yhoh tsewa’ot leimor. 
zechariah 8:2	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot qineiti letsiyon qin’ah gedolah vekheimah gedolah qineiti lah. 
zechariah 8:3	koh ’amar yhoh weti ’el tsiyon veshakhanti betokh yerushalim veniqre’ah yerushalim ‘ir ha’emet vehar yhoh tsewa’ot har haqodesh. 
zechariah 8:4	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ‘od yeishewu zeqeinim uzeqeinot birkhowot yerushalim ve’ish mish‘anto beyado meirow yamim. 
zechariah 8:5	urekhowot ha‘ir yimale’u yeladim viladot mesakhaqim birkhowoteha. 
zechariah 8:6	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ki yipalei be‘einei she’eirit ha‘am hazeh bayamim hahem gam be‘einai yipalei ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
zechariah 8:7	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot hini moshia‘ ’et ‘ami mei’erets mizrakh umei’erets mewo hashamesh. 
zechariah 8:8	veheiweiti ’otam veshakhenu betokh yerushalim vehayu li le‘am va’ani ’ehyeh lahem leilohim be’emet uwitsdaqah. 
zechariah 8:9	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot tekhezaqnah yedeikhem hashome‘im bayamim ha’eleh ’et hadewarim ha’eleh mipi hanewi’im ’asher beyom yusad bet yhoh tsewa’ot haheikhal lehibanot. 
zechariah 8:10	ki lifnei hayamim hahem sekhar ha’adam lo nihyah usekhar habeheimah ’einenah velayotsei velaba ’en shalom min hatsar va’ashalakh ’et kal ha’adam ’ish berei‘eihu. 
zechariah 8:11	ve‘atah lo khayamim harishonim ’ani lish’eirit ha‘am hazeh ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot. 
zechariah 8:12	ki zera‘ hashalom hagefen titen piryah veha’arets titen ’et yewulah vehashamayim yitenu talam vehinkhalti ’et she’eirit ha‘am hazeh ’et kal ’eleh. 
zechariah 8:13	vehayah ka’asher heyitem qelalah bagoyim bet yehudah uwet yisra’el ken ’oshia‘ ’etkhem vihyitem berakhah ’al tira’u tekhezaqnah yedeikhem. 
zechariah 8:14	ki khoh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ka’asher zamamti lehara‘ lakhem behaqtsif ’awoteikhem ’oti ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot velo nikhameti. 
zechariah 8:15	ken shawti zamamti bayamim ha’eleh leheitiw ’et yerushalim ve’et bet yehudah ’al tira’u. 
zechariah 8:16	’eleh hadewarim ’asher ta‘asu daberu ’emet ’ish ’et rei‘eihu ’emet umishpat shalom shiftu besha‘areikhem. 
zechariah 8:17	ve’ish ’et ra‘at rei‘eihu ’al takhshewu bilwawkhem ushewu‘at sheqer ’al te’ehawu ki ’et kal ’eleh ’asher saneiti ne’um yhoh. 
zechariah 8:18	vayhi dewar yhoh tsewa’ot ’eilai leimor. 
zechariah 8:19	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot tsom harewi‘i vetsom hakhamishi vetsom hashewi‘i vetsom ha‘asiri yihyeh lewet yehudah lesason ulesimkhah ulemo‘adim towim veha’emet vehashalom ’ehawu. 
zechariah 8:20	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ‘od ’asher yawo’u ‘amim veyoshewei ‘arim rabot. 
zechariah 8:21	vehalekhu yoshewei ’akhat ’el ’akhat leimor neilekhah halokh lekhalot ’et penei yhoh ulewaqesh ’et yhoh tsewa’ot ’eilekhah gam ’ani. 
zechariah 8:22	uwa’u ‘amim rabim vegoyim ‘atsumim lewaqesh ’et yhoh tsewa’ot birushalim ulekhalot ’et penei yhoh. 
zechariah 8:23	koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot bayamim hahemah ’asher yakhaziqu ‘asarah ’anashim mikol leshonot hagoyim vehekheziqu bikhnaf ’ish yehudi leimor neilekhah ‘imakhem ki shama‘nu ’elohim ‘imakhem. 
zechariah 9:1	masa dewar yhoh be’erets khadrakh vedameseq menukhato ki yhoh ‘en ’adam vekhol shiwtei yisra’el. 
zechariah 9:2	vegam khamat tigbal bah tsor vetsidon ki khakhmah me’od. 
zechariah 9:3	vatiwen tsor matsor lah vatitsbar kesef ke‘afar vekharuts ketit khutsot. 
zechariah 9:4	hineh ’adonai yorishenah vehikah wayam kheilah vehi ba’esh tei’akhel. 
zechariah 9:5	teire ’ashqelon vetira ve‘azah vetakhil me’od ve‘eqron ki howish mebatah ve’awad melekh mei‘azah ve’ashqelon lo teishew. 
zechariah 9:6	veyashaw mamzer be’ashdod vehikhrati ge’on pelishtim. 
zechariah 9:7	vahasiroti damav mipiv veshiqutsav miben shinav venish’ar gam hu leiloheinu vehayah ke’aluf bihudah ve‘eqron kiwusi. 
zechariah 9:8	vekhaniti leweiti mitsawah mei‘ower umishaw velo ya‘awor ‘aleihem ‘od noges ki ‘atah ra’iti we‘einai. 
zechariah 9:9	gili me’od bat tsiyon hari‘i bat yerushalim hineh malkekh yawo lakh tsadiq venosha‘ hu ‘ani verokhew ‘al khamor ve‘al ‘ayir ben ’atonot. 
zechariah 9:10	vehikhrati rekhew mei’efrayim vesus mirushalim venikhretah qeshet milkhamah vediber shalom lagoyim umashelo miyam ‘ad yam uminahar ‘ad ’afsei ’arets. 
zechariah 9:11	gam ’at bedam beritekh shilakhti ’asirayikh mibor ’en mayim bo. 
zechariah 9:12	uwu lewitsaron ’asirei hatiqvah gam hayom magid mishneh ’ashiw lakh. 
zechariah 9:13	ki darakhti li yehudah qeshet mileiti ’efrayim ve‘orarti wanayikh tsiyon ‘al banayikh yavan vesamtikh kekherew gibor. 
zechariah 9:14	yhoh ‘aleihem yeira’eh veyatsa khabaraq khitso vadonai yhoh bashofar yitqa‘ vehalakh besa‘arot teiman. 
zechariah 9:15	yhoh tsewa’ot yagen ‘aleihem ve’akhelu vekhaweshu ’awnei qela‘ veshatu hamu kemo yayin umale’u kamizraq kezaviyot mizbeiakh. 
zechariah 9:16	vehoshi‘am yhoh ’eloheihem bayom hahu ketson ‘amo ki ’awnei neizer mitnosot ‘al ’admato. 
zechariah 9:17	ki mah tuwo umah yafeyo dagan bakhurim vetirosh yenowew betulot. 
zechariah 10:1	sha’alu yhoh matar be‘et malqosh yhoh ‘oseh khazizim umetar geshem yiten lahem le’ish ‘eisew basadeh. 
zechariah 10:2	ki haterafim diberu ’aven vehaqosmim khazu sheqer vakhalomot hashav yedabeiru hewel yenakheimun ‘al ken nase‘u khemo tson ya‘anu ki ’en ro‘eh. 
zechariah 10:3	‘al haro‘im kharah ’api ve‘al ha‘atudim ’efqod ki faqad yhoh tsewa’ot ’et ‘edro ’et bet yehudah vesam ’otam kesus hodo bamilkhamah. 
zechariah 10:4	mimenu finah mimenu yated mimenu qeshet milkhamah mimenu yeitsei khal noges yakhdav. 
zechariah 10:5	vehayu khegiborim bosim betit khutsot bamilkhamah venilkhamu ki yhoh ‘imam vehowishu rokhewei susim. 
zechariah 10:6	vegibarti ’et bet yehudah ve’et bet yosef ’oshia‘ vehoshewotim ki rikhamtim vehayu ka’asher lo zenakhtim ki ’ani yhoh ’eloheihem ve’e‘enem. 
zechariah 10:7	vehayu khegibor ’efrayim vesamakh libam kemo yayin uweneihem yir’u vesameikhu yagel libam yhoh. 
zechariah 10:8	’eshreqah lahem va’aqabetsem ki feditim verawu kemo rawu. 
zechariah 10:9	ve’ezra‘em ba‘amim uwamerkhaqim yizkeruni vekhayu ’et beneihem vashawu. 
zechariah 10:10	vahashiwotim mei’erets mitsrayim umei’ashur ’aqabetsem ve’el ’erets gil‘ad ulewanon ’awi’em velo yimatsei lahem. 
zechariah 10:11	ve‘awar bayam tsarah vehikah wayam galim vehowishu kol metsulot ye’or vehurad ge’on ’ashur vesheiwet mitsrayim yasur. 
zechariah 10:12	vegibartim yhoh uwishmo yithalakhu ne’um yhoh. 
zechariah 11:1	petakh lewanon delatekha vetokhal ’esh ba’arazekha. 
zechariah 11:2	heilel berosh ki nafal ’erez ’asher ’adirim shudadu heililu ’alonei washan ki yarad ya‘ar habatsur habatsir. 
zechariah 11:3	qol yilat haro‘im ki shudedah ’adartam qol sha’agat kefirim ki shudad ge’on hayarden. 
zechariah 11:4	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohai re‘eh ’et tson hahareigah. 
zechariah 11:5	’asher qoneihen yahargun velo ye’shamu umokhereihen yomar barukh yhoh va‘shir vero‘eihem lo yakhmol ‘aleihen. 
zechariah 11:6	ki lo ’ekhmol ‘od ‘al yoshewei ha’arets ne’um yhoh vehineh ’anokhi mamtsi ’et ha’adam ’ish beyad rei‘eihu uweyad malko vekhitetu ’et ha’arets velo ’atsil miyadam. 
zechariah 11:7	va’er‘eh ’et tson hahareigah lakhen ‘aniyei hatson va’eqakh li shenei maqlot le’akhad qarati no‘am ule’akhad qarati khowelim va’er‘eh ’et hatson. 
zechariah 11:8	va’akhkhid ’et sheloshet haro‘im beyerakh ’ekhad vatiqtsar nafshi bahem vegam nafsham bakhalah wi. 
zechariah 11:9	va’omar lo ’er‘eh ’etkhem hameitah tamut vehanikhkhedet tikakhed vehanish’arot tokhalnah ’ishah ’et besar re‘utah. 
zechariah 11:10	va’eqakh ’et maqli ’et no‘am va’egda‘ ’oto lehafer ’et beriti ’asher karati ’et kal ha‘amim. 
zechariah 11:11	vatufar bayom hahu vayeide‘u khen ‘aniyei hatson hashomerim ’oti ki dewar yhoh hu. 
zechariah 11:12	va’omar ’aleihem ’im tow be‘eineikhem hawu sekhari ve’im lo khadalu vayishqelu ’et sekhari sheloshim kasef. 
zechariah 11:13	vayomer yhoh ’eilai hashlikheihu ’el hayotser ’eder hayqar ’asher yaqarti mei‘aleihem va’eqkhah sheloshim hakesef va’ashlikh ’oto bet yhoh ’el hayotser. 
zechariah 11:14	va’egda‘ ’et maqli hasheini ’et hakhowelim lehafer ’et ha’akhavah ben yehudah uwen yisra’el. 
zechariah 11:15	vayomer yhoh ’eilai ‘od qakh lekha keli ro‘eh ’evili. 
zechariah 11:16	ki hineh ’anokhi meiqim ro‘eh ba’arets hanikhkhadot lo yifqod hana‘ar lo yewaqesh vehanishberet lo yerapei hanitsawah lo yekhalkel uwesar haberi’ah yokhal ufarseihen yefareq. 
zechariah 11:17	ho ro‘i ha’elil ‘ozewi hatson kherew ‘al zero‘o ve‘al ‘en yemino zero‘o yawosh tiwash ve‘en yemino kahoh tikhheh. 
zechariah 12:1	masa dewar yhoh ‘al yisra’el ne’um yhoh noteh shamayim veyosed ’arets veyotser ruakh ’adam beqirbo. 
zechariah 12:2	hineh ’anokhi sam ’et yerushalim saf ra‘al lekhal ha‘amim sawiw vegam ‘al yehudah yihyeh wamatsor ‘al yerushalim. 
zechariah 12:3	vehayah wayom hahu ’asim ’et yerushalim ’ewen ma‘amasah lekhal ha‘amim kal ‘omeseha sarot yisareitu vene’esfu ‘aleha kol goyei ha’arets. 
zechariah 12:4	bayom hahu ne’um yhoh ’akeh khal sus batimahon verokhewo bashiga‘on ve‘al bet yehudah ’efqakh ’et ‘einai vekhol sus ha‘amim ’akeh ba‘ivaron. 
zechariah 12:5	ve’ameru ’alufei yehudah belibam ’amtsah li yoshewei yerushalim yhoh tsewa’ot ’eloheihem. 
zechariah 12:6	bayom hahu ’asim ’et ’alufei yehudah kekhiyor ’esh be‘eitsim ukhelapid ’esh be‘amir ve’akhelu ‘al yamin ve‘al semol ’et kal ha‘amim sawiw veyashewah yerushalim ‘od takhteha birushalim. 
zechariah 12:7	vehoshia‘ yhoh ’et ’aholei yehudah barishonah lema‘an lo tigdal tif’eret bet david vetif’eret yoshew yerushalim ‘al yehudah. 
zechariah 12:8	bayom hahu yagen yhoh be‘ad yoshew yerushalim vehayah hanikhshal bahem bayom hahu kedavid uwet david keilohim kemal’akh yhoh lifneihem. 
zechariah 12:9	vehayah bayom hahu ’awaqesh lehashmid ’et kal hagoyim haba’im ‘al yerushalim. 
zechariah 12:10	veshafakhti ‘al bet david ve‘al yoshew yerushalim ruakh khen vetakhanunim vehibitu ’eilai ’et ’asher daqaru vesafedu ‘alav kemisped ‘al hayakhid vehamer ‘alav kehamer ‘al habekhor. 
zechariah 12:11	bayom hahu yigdal hamisped birushalim kemispad hadad rimon bewiq‘at megidon. 
zechariah 12:12	vesafedah ha’arets mishpakhot mishpakhot lewad mishpakhat bet david lewad unesheihem lewad mishpakhat bet natan lewad unesheihem lewad. 
zechariah 12:13	mishpakhat bet leivi lewad unesheihem lewad mishpakhat hashim‘i lewad unesheihem lewad. 
zechariah 12:14	kol hamishpakhot hanish’arot mishpakhot mishpakhot lewad unesheihem lewad. 
zechariah 13:1	bayom hahu yihyeh maqor niftakh lewet david uleyoshewei yerushalim lekhatat ulenidah. 
zechariah 13:2	vehayah wayom hahu ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot ’akhrit ’et shemot ha‘atsabim min ha’arets velo yizakheru ‘od vegam ’et hanewi’im ve’et ruakh hatum’ah ’a‘awir min ha’arets. 
zechariah 13:3	vehayah ki yinawei ’ish ‘od ve’ameru ’eilav ’awiv ve’imo yoledav lo tikhyeh ki sheqer dibarta beshem yhoh udeqaruhu ’awihu ve’imo yoledav behinawe’o. 
zechariah 13:4	vehayah bayom hahu yeiwoshu hanewi’im ’ish meikhezyono behinawe’oto velo yilbeshu ’aderet sei‘ar lema‘an kakhesh. 
zechariah 13:5	ve’amar lo nawi ’anokhi ’ish ‘owed ’adamah ’anokhi ki ’adam hiqnani mine‘urai. 
zechariah 13:6	ve’amar ’eilav mah hamakot ha’eleh ben yadekha ve’amar ’asher hukeiti bet me’ahawai. 
zechariah 13:7	kherew ‘uri ‘al ro‘i ve‘al gewer ‘amiti ne’um yhoh tsewa’ot hakh ’et haro‘eh utefutsena hatson vahashiwoti yadi ‘al hatso‘arim. 
zechariah 13:8	vehayah wekhal ha’arets ne’um yhoh pi shenayim bah yikaretu yigva‘u vehashelishit yivater bah. 
zechariah 13:9	veheiweiti ’et hashelishit ba’esh utseraftim kitsrof ’et hakesef uwekhantim kiwkhon ’et hazahaw hu yiqra wishmi va’ani ’e‘eneh ’oto ’amarti ‘ami hu vehu yomar yhoh ’elohai. 
zechariah 14:1	hineh yom ba yhoh vekhulaq shelalekh beqirbekh. 
zechariah 14:2	ve’asafti ’et kal hagoyim ’el yerushalim lamilkhamah venilkedah ha‘ir venashasu habatim vehanashim tishagalnah tishakhawnah veyatsa khatsi ha‘ir bagolah veyeter ha‘am lo yikaret min ha‘ir. 
zechariah 14:3	veyatsa yhoh venilkham bagoyim hahem keyom hilakhamo beyom qeraw. 
zechariah 14:4	ve‘amedu raglav bayom hahu ‘al har hazeitim ’asher ‘al penei yerushalim miqedem veniwqa‘ har hazeitim meikhetsyo mizrakhah vayamah gei gedolah me’od umash khatsi hahar tsafonah vekhetsyo negbah. 
zechariah 14:5	venastem gei harai ki yagia‘ gei harim ’el ’atsal venastem ka’asher nastem mipenei hara‘ash bimei ‘uziyah melekh yehudah uwa yhoh ’elohai kal qedoshim ‘imakh. 
zechariah 14:6	vehayah bayom hahu lo yihyeh ’or yeqarot yiqpe’un veqipa’on. 
zechariah 14:7	vehayah yom ’ekhad hu yivada‘ yhoh lo yom velo layelah vehayah le‘et ‘erew yihyeh ’or. 
zechariah 14:8	vehayah bayom hahu yeitse’u mayim khayim mirushalim khetsyam ’el hayam haqadmoni vekhetsyam ’el hayam ha’akharon baqayits uwakhoref yihyeh. 
zechariah 14:9	vehayah yhoh lemelekh ‘al kal ha’arets bayom hahu yihyeh yhoh ’ekhad ushemo ’ekhad. 
zechariah 14:10	yisow kal ha’arets ka‘arawah migewa‘ lerimon negew yerushalim vera’amah veyashewah takhteha lemisha‘ar binyamin ‘ad meqom sha‘ar harishon ‘ad sha‘ar hapinim umigdal khanan’el ‘ad yiqwei hamelekh. 
zechariah 14:11	veyashewu wah vekheirem lo yihyeh ‘od veyashewah yerushalim lawetakh. 
zechariah 14:12	vezot tihyeh hamageifah ’asher yigof yhoh ’et kal ha‘amim ’asher tsawe’u ‘al yerushalim hameq besaro vehu ‘omed ‘al raglav ve‘einav timaqnah wekhoreihen uleshono timaq befihem. 
zechariah 14:13	vehayah bayom hahu tihyeh mehumat yhoh rabah bahem vehekheziqu ’ish yad rei‘eihu ve‘aletah yado ‘al yad rei‘eihu. 
zechariah 14:14	vegam yehudah tilakhem birushalim ve’usaf khel kal hagoyim sawiw zahaw vakhesef uwegadim larow me’od. 
zechariah 14:15	vekhen tihyeh mageifat hasus hapered hagamal vehakhamor vekhal habeheimah ’asher yihyeh bamakhanot hahemah kamageifah hazot. 
zechariah 14:16	vehayah kal hanotar mikal hagoyim haba’im ‘al yerushalim ve‘alu midei shanah weshanah lehishtakhavot lemelekh yhoh tsewa’ot velakhog ’et khag hasukot. 
zechariah 14:17	vehayah ’asher lo ya‘aleh mei’et mishpekhot ha’arets ’el yerushalim lehishtakhavot lemelekh yhoh tsewa’ot velo ‘aleihem yihyeh hagashem. 
zechariah 14:18	ve’im mishpakhat mitsrayim lo ta‘aleh velo wa’ah velo ‘aleihem tihyeh hamageifah ’asher yigof yhoh ’et hagoyim ’asher lo ya‘alu lakhog ’et khag hasukot. 
zechariah 14:19	zot tihyeh khatat mitsrayim vekhatat kal hagoyim ’asher lo ya‘alu lakhog ’et khag hasukot. 
zechariah 14:20	bayom hahu yihyeh ‘al metsilot hasus qodesh yhoh vehayah hasirot bewet yhoh kamizraqim lifnei hamizbeiakh. 
zechariah 14:21	vehayah kal sir birushalim uwihudah qodesh yhoh tsewa’ot uwa’u kal hazowekhim velaqekhu meihem uwishelu wahem velo yihyeh khena‘ani ‘od bewet yhoh tsewa’ot bayom hahu. 
malachi 1:1	masa dewar yhoh ’el yisra’el beyad mal’akhi. 
malachi 1:2	’ahawti ’etkhem ’amar yhoh va’amartem bamah ’ahawtanu halo ’akh ‘eisav leya‘aqow ne’um yhoh va’ohaw ’et ya‘aqow. 
malachi 1:3	ve’et ‘eisav saneiti va’asim ’et harav shemamah ve’et nakhalato letanot midbar. 
malachi 1:4	ki tomar ’edom rushashnu venashuw veniwneh khorawot koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot hemah yiwnu va’ani ’eheros veqare’u lahem gewul rish‘ah veha‘am ’asher za‘am yhoh ‘ad ‘olam. 
malachi 1:5	ve‘eineikhem tir’enah ve’atem tomeru yigdal yhoh mei‘al ligwul yisra’el. 
malachi 1:6	ben yekhabed ’aw ve‘ewed ’adonav ve’im ’aw ’ani ’ayeh khewodi ve’im ’adonim ’ani ’ayeh mora’i ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot lakhem hakohanim bozei shemi va’amartem bameh wazinu ’et shemekha. 
malachi 1:7	magishim ‘al mizbekhi lekhem mego’al va’amartem bameh gei’alnukha be’emarekhem shulkhan yhoh niwzeh hu. 
malachi 1:8	vekhi tagishun ‘iver lizboakh ’en ra‘ vekhi tagishu piseiakh vekholeh ’en ra‘ haqriweihu na lefekhatekha hayirtsekha ’o hayisa fanekha ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 1:9	ve‘atah khalu na fenei ’el vikhaneinu miyedkhem hayetah zot hayisa mikem panim ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 1:10	mi gam bakhem veyisgor delatayim velo ta’iru mizbekhi khinam ’en li kheifets bakhem ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot uminkhah lo ’ertseh miyedkhem. 
malachi 1:11	ki mimizrakh shemesh ve‘ad mewo’o gadol shemi bagoyim uwekhal maqom muqtar mugash lishmi uminkhah tehorah ki gadol shemi bagoyim ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 1:12	ve’atem mekhalelim ’oto be’emarekhem shulkhan ’adonai mego’al hu veniwo niwzeh ’akhelo. 
malachi 1:13	va’amartem hineh matela’ah vehipakhtem ’oto ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot vahaweitem gazul ve’et hapiseiakh ve’et hakholeh vahaweitem ’et haminkhah ha’ertseh ’otah miyedkhem ’amar yhoh. 
malachi 1:14	ve’arur nokhel veyesh be‘edro zakhar venoder vezoweiakh mashekhat ladonai ki melekh gadol ’ani ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ushemi nora wagoyim. 
malachi 2:1	ve‘atah ’aleikhem hamitsvah hazot hakohanim. 
malachi 2:2	’im lo tishme‘u ve’im lo tasimu ‘al lew latet kawod lishmi ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot veshilakhti wakhem ’et hame’eirah ve’aroti ’et birkhoteikhem vegam ’arotiha ki ’einekhem samim ‘al lew. 
malachi 2:3	hini go‘er lakhem ’et hazera‘ vezeiriti feresh ‘al peneikhem peresh khageikhem venasa ’etkhem ’eilav. 
malachi 2:4	vida‘tem ki shilakhti ’aleikhem ’et hamitsvah hazot lihyot beriti ’et leivi ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 2:5	beriti hayetah ’ito hakhayim vehashalom va’etenem lo mora vayira’eini umipenei shemi nikhat hu. 
malachi 2:6	torat ’emet hayetah befihu ve‘avlah lo nimtsa wisfatav beshalom uwemishor halakh ’iti verabim heishiw mei‘avon. 
malachi 2:7	ki siftei khohen yishmeru da‘at vetorah yewaqshu mipihu ki mal’akh yhoh tsewa’ot hu. 
malachi 2:8	ve’atem sartem min haderekh hikhshaltem rabim batorah shikhatem berit haleivi ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 2:9	vegam ’ani natati ’etkhem niwzim ushefalim lekhal ha‘am kefi ’asher ’einekhem shomerim ’et derakhai venose’im panim batorah. 
malachi 2:10	halo ’aw ’ekhad lekhulanu halo ’el ’ekhad bera’anu madua‘ niwgad ’ish be’akhiv lekhalel berit ’awoteinu. 
malachi 2:11	bagedah yehudah veto‘eiwah ne‘estah weyisra’el uwirushalim ki khilel yehudah qodesh yhoh ’asher ’ahew uwa‘al bat ’el neikhar. 
malachi 2:12	yakhret yhoh la’ish ’asher ya‘asenah ‘er ve‘oneh mei’aholei ya‘aqow umagish minkhah yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 2:13	vezot sheinit ta‘asu kasot dim‘ah ’et mizbakh yhoh bekhi va’anaqah mei’en ‘od penot ’el haminkhah velaqakhat ratson miyedkhem. 
malachi 2:14	va’amartem ‘al mah ‘al ki yhoh hei‘id beinekha uwen ’eishet ne‘urekha ’asher ’atah bagadtah bah vehi khawertekha ve’eishet beritekha. 
malachi 2:15	velo ’ekhad ‘asah ushe’ar ruakh lo umah ha’ekhad mewaqesh zera‘ ’elohim venishmartem berukhakhem uwe’eishet ne‘urekha ’al yiwgod. 
malachi 2:16	ki sanei shalakh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el vekhisah khamas ‘al lewusho ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot venishmartem berukhakhem velo tiwgodu. 
malachi 2:17	hoga‘tem yhoh bediwreikhem va’amartem bamah hoga‘enu be’emarekhem kal ‘oseh ra‘ tow be‘einei yhoh uwahem hu khafets ’o ’ayeh ’elohei hamishpat. 
malachi 3:1	hini sholeiakh mal’akhi ufinah derekh lefanai ufit’om yawo ’el heikhalo ha’adon ’asher ’atem mewaqshim umal’akh haberit ’asher ’atem khafeitsim hineh wa ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 3:2	umi mekhalkel ’et yom bo’o umi ha‘omed beheira’oto ki hu ke’esh metsaref ukheworit mekhabesim. 
malachi 3:3	veyashaw metsaref umetaher kesef vetihar ’et benei leivi veziqaq ’otam kazahaw vekhakasef vehayu yhoh magishei minkhah bitsdaqah. 
malachi 3:4	ve‘arewah yhoh minkhat yehudah virushalim kimei ‘olam ukheshanim qadmoniyot. 
malachi 3:5	veqarawti ’aleikhem lamishpat vehayiti ‘ed memaher bamkhashefim uwamna’afim uwanishba‘im lashaqer uwe‘osheqei sekharsa khir ’almanah veyatom umatei ger velo yerei’uni ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 3:6	ki ’ani yhoh lo shaniti ve’atem benei ya‘aqow lo khelitem. 
malachi 3:7	lemimei ’awoteikhem sartem meikhuqai velo shemartem shuwu ’eilai ve’ashuwah ’aleikhem ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot va’amartem bameh nashuw.
