malachi 3:8	hayiqba‘ ’adam ’elohim ki ’atem qowe‘im ’oti va’amartem bameh qewa‘anukha hama‘aser vehaterumah. 
malachi 3:9	bame’eirah ’atem nei’arim ve’oti ’atem qowe‘im hago kulo. 
malachi 3:10	hawi’u ’et kal hama‘aser ’el bet ha’otsar vihi teref beweiti uwekhanuni na bazot ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’im lo ’eftakh lakhem ’et ’arubot hashamayim vahariqoti lakhem berakhah ‘ad beli dai. 
malachi 3:11	vega‘arti lakhem ba’okhel velo yashkhit lakhem ’et peri ha’adamah velo teshakel lakhem hagefen basadeh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 3:12	ve’isheru ’etkhem kal hagoyim ki tihyu ’atem ’erets kheifets ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 3:13	khazequ ‘alai diwreikhem ’amar yhoh va’amartem mah nidbarnu ‘alekha. 
malachi 3:14	’amartem shav ‘awod ’elohim umah betsa‘ ki shamarnu mishmarto vekhi halakhnu qedoranit mipenei yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 3:15	ve‘atah ’anakhnu me’asherim zeidim gam niwnu ‘osei rish‘ah gam bakhanu ’elohim vayimaleitu. 
malachi 3:16	’az nidberu yir’ei yhoh ’ish ’et rei‘eihu vayaqshew yhoh vayishma‘ vayikatew seifer zikaron lefanav leyir’ei yhoh ulekhoshewei shemo. 
malachi 3:17	vehayu li ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot layom ’asher ’ani ‘oseh segulah vekhamalti ‘aleihem ka’asher yakhmol ’ish ‘al beno ha‘owed ’oto. 
malachi 3:18	veshawtem ure’item ben tsadiq lerasha‘ ben ‘owed ’elohim la’asher lo ‘awado. 
malachi 4:1	ki hineh hayom ba bo‘er katanur vehayu khal zeidim vekhal ‘oseh rish‘ah qash velihat ’otam hayom haba ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’asher lo ya‘azow lahem shoresh ve‘anaf. 
malachi 4:2	vezarekhah lakhem yir’ei shemi shemesh tsedaqah umarpei bikhnafeha vitsatem ufishtem ke‘eglei marbeq. 
malachi 4:3	ve‘asotem resha‘im ki yihyu ’eifer takhat kapot ragleikhem bayom ’asher ’ani ‘oseh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot. 
malachi 4:4	zikhru torat mosheh ‘awdi ’asher tsiviti ’oto wekhorew ‘al kal yisra’el khuqim umishpatim. 
malachi 4:5	hineh ’anokhi sholeiakh lakhem ’et ’eiliyah hanawi lifnei bo yom yhoh hagadol vehanora. 
malachi 4:6	veheishiw lew ’awot ‘al banim velew banim ‘al ’awotam pen ’awo vehikeiti ’et ha’arets kheirem. 
psalms 1:1	’ashrei ha’ish ’asher lo halakh ba‘atsat resha‘im uwederekh khata’im lo ‘amad uwemoshaw leitsim lo yashaw. 
psalms 1:2	ki ’im betorat yhoh kheftso uwetorato yehgeh yomam valayelah. 
psalms 1:3	vehayah ke‘ets shatul ‘al palgei mayim ’asher piryo yiten be‘ito ve‘aleihu lo yibol vekhol ’asher ya‘aseh yatsliakh. 
psalms 1:4	lo khen haresha‘im ki ’im kamots ’asher tidefenu ruakh. 
psalms 1:5	‘al ken lo yaqumu resha‘im bamishpat vekhata’im ba‘adat tsadiqim. 
psalms 1:6	ki yodeia‘ yhoh derekh tsadiqim vederekh resha‘im towed. 
psalms 2:1	lamah rageshu goyim ule’umim yehgu riq. 
psalms 2:2	yityatsewu malkhei ’erets veroznim nosdu yakhad ‘al yhoh ve‘al meshikho. 
psalms 2:3	nenateqah ’et mosroteimo venashlikhah mimenu ‘awoteimo. 
psalms 2:4	yoshew bashamayim yiskhaq ’adonai yil‘ag lamo. 
psalms 2:5	’az yedaber ’eileimo we’apo uwakharono yewahaleimo. 
psalms 2:6	va’ani nasakhti malki ‘al tsiyon har qadshi 
psalms 2:7	’asaperah ’el khoq yhoh ’amar ’eilai beni ’atah ’ani hayom yelidtikha. 
psalms 2:8	she’al mimeni ve’etenah goyim nakhalatekha va’akhuzatekha ’afsei ’arets. 
psalms 2:9	tero‘em besheiwet barzel kikhli yotser tenapetsem. 
psalms 2:10	ve‘atah melakhim haskilu hivaseru shofetei ’arets. 
psalms 2:11	‘iwdu ’et yhoh beyir’ah vegilu bir‘adah. 
psalms 2:12	nashequ war pen ye’enaf vetowedu derekh ki yiw‘ar kim‘at ’apo ’ashrei kal khosei wo. 
psalms 3:1	mizmor ledavid bewarekho mipenei ’awshalom beno. yhoh mah rabu tsarai rabim qamim ‘alai. 
psalms 3:2	rabim ’omerim lenafshi ’en yeshu‘atah lo weilohim selah. 
psalms 3:3	ve’atah yhoh magen ba‘adi kewodi umeirim roshi. 
psalms 3:4	qoli ’el yhoh ’eqra vaya‘aneini meihar qadesho selah. 
psalms 3:5	’ani shakhawti va’ishanah heqitsoti ki yhoh yismekheini. 
psalms 3:6	lo ’ira meiriwwot ‘am ’asher sawiw shatu ‘alai. 
psalms 3:7	qumah yhoh hoshi‘eini ’elohai ki hikita ’et kal ’oyewai lekhi shinei resha‘im shibarta. 
psalms 3:8	yhoh hayshu‘ah ‘al ‘amekha wirkhatekha selah. 
psalms 4:1	lamnatseiakh binginot mizmor ledavid. beqare’i ‘aneini ’elohei tsidqi batsar hirkhawta li khaneini ushema‘ tefilati. 
psalms 4:2	benei ’ish ‘ad meh khewodi likhlimah te’ehawun riq tewaqshu khazaw selah. 
psalms 4:3	ude‘u ki hiflah yhoh khasid lo yhoh yishma‘ beqare’i ’eilav. 
psalms 4:4	rigzu ve’al tekheta’u ’imru wilwawkhem ‘al mishkawkhem vedomu selah. 
psalms 4:5	ziwkhu ziwkhei tsedeq uwitkhu ’el yhoh. 
psalms 4:6	rabim ’omerim mi yar’einu tow nesah ‘aleinu ’or panekha yhoh. 
psalms 4:7	natatah simkhah welibi mei‘et deganam vetirosham rabu. 
psalms 4:8	beshalom yakhdav ’eshkewah ve’ishan ki ’atah yhoh lewadad lawetakh toshiweini. 
psalms 5:1	lamnatseiakh ’el hanekhilot mizmor ledavid. ’amarai ha’azinah yhoh binah hagigi. 
psalms 5:2	haqshiwah leqol shav‘i malki veilohai ki ’eilekha ’etpalal. 
psalms 5:3	yhoh boqer tishma‘ qoli boqer ’e‘erakh lekha va’atsapeh. 
psalms 5:4	ki lo ’el khafets resha‘ ’atah lo yegurkha ra‘. 
psalms 5:5	lo yityatsewu holim leneged ‘einekha neita kal po‘alei ’aven. 
psalms 5:6	te’abed dowerei khazaw ’ish damim umirmah yeta‘ew yhoh. 
psalms 5:7	va’ani berow khasdekha ’awo weitekha ’eshtakhaveh ’el heikhal qadshekha beyir’atekha. 
psalms 5:8	yhoh nekheini wetsidqatekha lema‘an shorai hoshar hayshar lefanai darkekha. 
psalms 5:9	ki ’en befihu nekhonah qirbam havot qewer patuakh geronam leshonam yakhaliqun. 
psalms 5:10	ha’ashimem ’elohim yipelu mimo‘atsoteihem berow pish‘eihem hadikheimo ki maru wakh. 
psalms 5:11	veyismekhu khal khosei wakh le‘olam yeraneinu vetasekh ‘aleimo veya‘letsu wekha ’ohawei shemekha. 
psalms 5:12	ki ’atah tewarekh tsadiq yhoh katsinah ratson ta‘terenu. 
psalms 6:1	lamnatseiakh binginot ‘al hasheminit mizmor ledavid. yhoh ’al be’apekha tokhikheini ve’al bakhamatekha teyasereini. 
psalms 6:2	khaneini yhoh ki ’umlal ’ani refa’eini yhoh ki niwhalu ‘atsamai. 
psalms 6:3	venafshi niwhalah me’od ve’at ve’atah yhoh ‘ad matai. 
psalms 6:4	shuwah yhoh khaletsah nafshi hoshi‘eini lema‘an khasdekha. 
psalms 6:5	ki ’en bamavet zikhrekha bish’ol mi yodeh lakh. 
psalms 6:6	yaga‘ti be’ankhati ’askheh wekhal laylah mitati bedim‘ati ‘arsi ’amseh. 
psalms 6:7	‘asheshah mika‘as ‘eini ‘ateqah bekhal tsorai. 
psalms 6:8	suru mimeni kal po‘alei ’aven ki shama‘ yhoh qol bikhyi. 
psalms 6:9	shama‘ yhoh tekhinati yhoh tefilati yiqakh. 
psalms 6:10	yeiwoshu veyibahalu me’od kal ’oyewai yashuwu yeiwoshu raga‘. 
psalms 7:1	shigayon ledavid ’asher shar yhoh ‘al diwrei khush ben yemini. yhoh ’elohai bekha khasiti hoshi‘eini mikal rodefai vehatsileini. 
psalms 7:2	pen yitrof ke’aryeh nafshi poreq ve’en matsil. 
psalms 7:3	yhoh ’elohai ’im ‘asiti zot ’im yesh ‘avel bekhapai. 
psalms 7:4	’im gamalti sholmi ra‘ va’akhaletsah tsori reiqam. 
psalms 7:5	yiradof ’oyew nafshi veyaseg veyirmos la’arets khayai ukhewodi le‘afar yashken selah. 
psalms 7:6	qumah yhoh be’apekha hinasei be‘awrot tsorai ve‘urah ’eilai mishpat tsivita. 
psalms 7:7	va‘adat le’umim tesowweka ve‘aleha lamarom shuwah. 
psalms 7:8	yhoh yadin ‘amim shafeteini yhoh ketsidqi ukhetumi ‘alai. 
psalms 7:9	yigmar na ra‘ resha‘im utekhonen tsadiq uwokhen libot ukhelayot ’elohim tsadiq. 
psalms 7:10	magini ‘al ’elohim moshia‘ yishrei lew. 
psalms 7:11	’elohim shofet tsadiq ve’el zo‘em bekhal yom. 
psalms 7:12	’im lo yashuw kharbo yiltosh qashto darakh vaykhoneha. 
psalms 7:13	velo heikhin kelei mavet khitsav ledoleqim yif‘al. 
psalms 7:14	hineh yekhabel ’aven veharah ‘amal veyalad shaqer. 
psalms 7:15	bor karah vayakhpereihu vayipol beshakhat yif‘al. 
psalms 7:16	yashuw ‘amalo werosho ve‘al qadeqodo khamaso yeired. 
psalms 7:17	’odeh yhoh ketsidqo va’azamerah shem yhoh ‘elyon. 
psalms 8:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al hagitit mizmor ledavid. yhoh ’adoneinu mah ’adir mekha bekhal ha’arets ’asher tenah hodkha ‘al hashamayim. 
psalms 8:2	mipi ‘olim veyoneqim yisadta ‘oz lema‘an tsorekha lehashbit ’oyew umitnaqem. 
psalms 8:3	ki ’er’eh mekha ma‘asei ’etsbe‘otekha yareiakh vekhokhawim ’asher konanetah. 
psalms 8:4	mah ’enosh ki tizkerenu uwen ’adam ki tifqedenu. 
psalms 8:5	vatekhasereihu me‘at mei’elohim vekhawod vehadar te‘atereihu. 
psalms 8:6	tamshileihu bema‘asei yadekha kol shatah takhat raglav. 
psalms 8:7	tsoneh va’alafim kulam vegam bahamot sadai. 
psalms 8:8	tsipor mayim udegei hayam ‘ower ’arekhot yamim. 
psalms 8:9	yhoh ’adoneinu mah ’adir mekha bekhal ha’arets. 
psalms 9:1	lamnatseiakh ‘almut laben mizmor ledavid. ’odeh yhoh bekhal libi ’asaperah kal nifle’otekha. 
psalms 9:2	’esmekhah ve’e‘eltsah wakh ’azamerah shimkha ‘elyon. 
psalms 9:3	beshuw ’oywai ’akhor yikashelu veyowedu mipanekha. 
psalms 9:4	ki ‘asita mishpati vedini yashawta lekhisei shofet tsedeq. 
psalms 9:5	ga‘arta goyim ’ibadta rasha‘ shemam makhita le‘olam va‘ed. 
psalms 9:6	ha’oyew tamu khorawot lanetsakh ve‘arim natashta ’awad zikhram hemah. 
psalms 9:7	yhoh le‘olam yeishew konen lamishpat kis’o. 
psalms 9:8	vehu yishpot teiwel betsedeq yadin le’umim bemeisharim. 
psalms 9:9	vihi yhoh misgaw ladakh misgaw le‘itot batsarah. 
psalms 9:10	veyiwtekhu wekha yod‘ei shemekha ki lo ‘azawta doreshekha yhoh. 
psalms 9:11	zameru yhoh yoshew tsiyon hagidu wa‘amim ‘alilotav. 
psalms 9:12	ki doresh damim ’otam zakhar losha khakh tsa‘aqat ‘aniyim ‘anavim. 
psalms 9:13	khaneneini yhoh re’eh ‘aneyi misone’ai meromi misha‘arei mavet. 
psalms 9:14	lema‘an ’asaperah kal tehilatekha besha‘arei wat tsiyon ’agilah bishu‘atekha. 
psalms 9:15	tawe‘u goyim beshakhat ‘asu bereshet zu tamanu nilkedah raglam. 
psalms 9:16	noda‘ yhoh mishpat ‘asah befo‘al kapav noqesh rasha‘ higayon selah. 
psalms 9:17	yashuwu resha‘im lish’olah kal goyim shekheikhei ’elohim. 
psalms 9:18	ki lo lanetsakh yishakhakh ’ewyon tiqvat ‘anavim ‘aniyim towad la‘ad. 
psalms 9:19	qumah yhoh ’al ya‘oz ’enosh yishafetu goyim ‘al panekha. 
psalms 9:20	shitah yhoh morah lahem yeide‘u goyim ’enosh hemah selah. 
psalms 10:1	lamah yhoh ta‘amod berakhoq ta‘lim le‘itot batsarah. 
psalms 10:2	bega’avat rasha‘ yidlaq ‘ani yitafesu bimzimot zu khashawu. 
psalms 10:3	ki hilel rasha‘ ‘al ta’avat nafsho uwotseia‘ beirekh ni’ets yhoh. 
psalms 10:4	rasha‘ kegowah ’apo bal yidrosh ’en ’elohim kal mezimotav. 
psalms 10:5	yakhilu darekv derakhav bekhal ‘et marom mishpatekha minegdo kal tsorav yafiakh bahem. 
psalms 10:6	’amar belibo bal ’emot ledor vador ’asher lo wera‘. 
psalms 10:7	’alah pihu malei umirmot vatokh takhat leshono ‘amal va’aven. 
psalms 10:8	yeishew bema’raw khatseirim bamistarim yaharog naqi ‘einav lekheilekhah yitsponu. 
psalms 10:9	ye’erow bamistar ke’aryeh wesukoh ye’erow lakhatof ‘ani yakhtof ‘ani bemashekho werishto. 
psalms 10:10	vadakhah yidkeh yashoakh venafal ba‘atsumav khelka’im khel ka’im. 
psalms 10:11	’amar belibo shakhakh ’el histir panav bal ra’ah lanetsakh. 
psalms 10:12	qumah yhoh ’el nesa yadekha ’al tishkakh ‘aniyim ‘anavim. 
psalms 10:13	‘al meh ni’ets rasha‘ ’elohim ’amar belibo lo tidrosh. 
psalms 10:14	ra’itah ki ’atah ‘amal vakha‘as tabit latet beyadekha ‘alekha ya‘azow kheilekhah yatom ’atah hayita ‘ozer. 
psalms 10:15	wor zeroa‘ rasha‘ vara‘ tidrosh rish‘o wal timtsa. 
psalms 10:16	yhoh melekh ‘olam va‘ed ’awedu goyim mei’artso. 
psalms 10:17	ta’avat ‘anavim shama‘ta yhoh takhin libam taqshiw ’azenekha. 
psalms 10:18	lishpot yatom vadakh bal yosif ‘od la‘arots ’enosh min ha’arets. 
psalms 11:1	lamnatseiakh ledavid yhoh khasiti ’ekh tomeru lenafshi nudu nudi harkhem tsipor. 
psalms 11:2	ki hineh haresha‘im yidrekhun qeshet konu khitsam ‘al yeter lirot bemo ’ofel leyishrei lew. 
psalms 11:3	ki hashatot yeihareisun tsadiq mah pa‘al. 
psalms 11:4	yhoh beheikhal qadesho yhoh bashamayim kis’o ‘einav yekhezu ‘af‘apav yiwkhanu benei ’adam. 
psalms 11:5	yhoh tsadiq yiwkhan verasha‘ ve’ohew khamas sane’ah nafsho. 
psalms 11:6	yamter ‘al resha‘im pakhim ’esh vegaferit veruakh zil‘afot menat kosam. 
psalms 11:7	ki tsadiq yhoh tsedaqot ’ahew yashar yekhezu faneimo. 
psalms 12:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al hasheminit mizmor ledavid. hoshi‘ah yhoh ki gamar khasid ki fasu ’emunim mibenei ’adam. 
psalms 12:2	shav yedaberu ’ish ’et rei‘eihu sefat khalaqot belew valew yedabeiru. 
psalms 12:3	yakhret yhoh kal siftei khalaqot lashon medaberet gedolot. 
psalms 12:4	’asher ’ameru lilshoneinu nagbir sefateinu ’itanu mi ’adon lanu. 
psalms 12:5	mishod ‘aniyim mei’anqat ’ewyonim ‘atah ’aqum yomar yhoh ’ashit beyeisha‘ yafiakh lo. 
psalms 12:6	’imarot yhoh ’amarot tehorot kesef tsaruf ba‘alil la’arets mezuqaq shiw‘atayim. 
psalms 12:7	’atah yhoh tishmerem titserenu min hador zu le‘olam. 
psalms 12:8	sawiw resha‘im yithalakhun kerum zulut liwnei ’adam. 
psalms 13:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. ‘ad ’anah yhoh tishkakheini netsakh ‘ad ’anah tastir ’et panekha mimeni. 
psalms 13:2	‘ad ’anah ’ashit ‘eitsot benafshi yagon bilwawi yomam ‘ad ’anah yarum ’oyewi ‘alai. 
psalms 13:3	habitah ‘aneini yhoh ’elohai ha’irah ‘einai pen ’ishan hamavet. 
psalms 13:4	pen yomar ’oyewi yekhaletiv tsarai yagilu ki ’emot. 
psalms 13:5	va’ani bekhasdekha watakhti yagel libi bishu‘atekha 
psalms 13:6	’ashirah yhoh ki gamal ‘alai. 
psalms 14:1	lamnatseiakh ledavid ’amar nawal belibo ’en ’elohim hishkhitu hit‘iwu ‘alilah ’en ‘oseh tow. 
psalms 14:2	yhoh mishamayim hishqif ‘al benei ’adam lir’ot hayesh maskil doresh ’et ’elohim. 
psalms 14:3	hakol sar yakhdav ne’elakhu ’en ‘oseh tow ’en gam ’ekhad. 
psalms 14:4	halo yade‘u kal po‘alei ’aven ’okhelei ‘ami ’akhelu lekhem yhoh lo qara’u. 
psalms 14:5	sham pakhadu fakhad ki ’elohim bedor tsadiq. 
psalms 14:6	‘atsat ‘ani tawishu ki yhoh makhseihu. 
psalms 14:7	mi yiten mitsiyon yeshu‘at yisra’el beshuw yhoh shewut ‘amo yagel ya‘aqow yismakh yisra’el 
psalms 15:1	mizmor ledavid yhoh mi yagur be’aholekha mi yishkon behar qadshekha 
psalms 15:2	holekh tamim ufo‘el tsedeq vedower ’emet bilwawo. 
psalms 15:3	lo ragal ‘al leshono lo ‘asah lerei‘eihu ra‘ah vekherpah lo nasa ‘al qerowo. 
psalms 15:4	niwzeh be‘einav nim’as ve’et yir’ei yhoh yekhabed nishba‘ lehara‘ velo yamir. 
psalms 15:5	kaspo lo natan beneshekh veshokhad ‘al naqi lo laqakh ‘oseh ’eleh lo yimot le‘olam. 
psalms 16:1	mikhtam ledavid shamereini ’el ki khasiti wakh. 
psalms 16:2	’amart yhoh ’adonai ’atah towati bal ‘alekha. 
psalms 16:3	liqdoshim ’asher ba’arets hemah ve’adirei kal kheftsi wam. 
psalms 16:4	yirbu ‘atsewotam ’akher maharu bal ’asikh niskeihem midam uwal ’esa ’etosh motam ‘al sefatai. 
psalms 16:5	yhoh menat khelqi vekhosi ’atah tomikh gorali. 
psalms 16:6	khawalim nafelu li bane‘imim ’af nakhalat shaferah ‘alai. 
psalms 16:7	’awarekh ’et yhoh ’asher ye‘atsani ’af leilot yiseruni khilyotai. 
psalms 16:8	shiviti yhoh lenegdi tamid ki mimini bal ’emot. 
psalms 16:9	lakhen samakh libi vayagel kewodi ’af besari yishkon lawetakh. 
psalms 16:10	ki lo ta‘azow nafshi lish’ol lo titen khasidekha lir’ot shakhat 
psalms 16:11	todi‘eini ’orakh khayim sowa‘ makhot ’et panekha ne‘imot biminekha netsakh. 
psalms 17:1	tefilah ledavid shim‘ah yhoh tsedeq haqshiwah rinati ha’azinah tefilati belo siftei mirmah. 
psalms 17:2	milefanekha mishpati yeitsei ‘einekha tekhezenah meisharim. 
psalms 17:3	bakhanta libi paqadta laylah tseraftani wal timtsa zamoti bal ya‘awar pi. 
psalms 17:4	lif‘ulot ’adam bidwar sefatekha ’ani marti ’arekhot parits. 
psalms 17:5	tamokh ’ashurai bema‘gelotekha bal namotu fe‘amai. 
psalms 17:6	’ani qeratikha khi ta‘aneini ’el hat ’azenekha li shema‘ ’imrati. 
psalms 17:7	hafleh khasadekha moshia‘ khosim mimitqomim biminekha. 
psalms 17:8	mereini ke’ishon bat ‘ayin betsel kenafekha tastireini. 
psalms 17:9	mipenei resha‘im zu shaduni ’oyewai benefesh yaqifu ‘alai. 
psalms 17:10	khelbamo sageru pimo diberu wegei’ut. 
psalms 17:11	’ashureinu ‘atah sewawuni sewawunu ‘eineihem yashitu lintot ba’arets. 
psalms 17:12	dimyono ke’aryeh yikhsof litrof vekhikhfir yoshew bemistarim. 
psalms 17:13	qumah yhoh qademah fanav hakhri‘eihu paletah nafshi meirasha‘ kharbekha. 
psalms 17:14	mimtim yadekha yhoh mimtim meikheled khelqam bakhayim utsefinekha utsefunekha temalei witnam yisbe‘u wanim vehinikhu yitram le‘oleihem. 
psalms 17:15	’ani betsedeq ’ekhezeh fanekha ’esbe‘ah wehaqits temunatekha. 
psalms 18:1	lamnatseiakh le‘ewed yhoh ledavid ’asher diber yhoh ’et diwrei hashirah hazot beyom hitsil yhoh ’oto mikaf kal ’oyewav umiyad sha’ul. vayomar ’erkhamekha yhoh khizqi. 
psalms 18:2	yhoh sal‘i umetsudati umefalti ’eili tsuri ’ekheseh bo magini veqeren yish‘i misgabi. 
psalms 18:3	mehulal ’eqra yhoh umin ’oyewai ’ivasheia‘. 
psalms 18:4	’afafuni khewlei mavet venakhalei weliya‘al yewa‘atuni. 
psalms 18:5	khewlei she’ol sewawuni qidemuni moqshei mavet. 
psalms 18:6	batsar li ’eqra yhoh ve’el ’elohai ’ashaveia‘ yishma‘ meiheikhalo qoli veshav‘ati lefanav tawo we’azenav. 
psalms 18:7	vatig‘ash vatir‘ash ha’arets umosdei harim yirgazu vayitga‘ashu ki kharah lo. 
psalms 18:8	‘alah ‘ashan be’apo ve’esh mipiv tokhel gekhalim ba‘aru mimenu. 
psalms 18:9	vayet mayim vayeirad va‘arafel takhat raglav. 
psalms 18:10	vayirkaw ‘al keruw vaya‘of vayeide ‘al kanfei ruakh. 
psalms 18:11	yashet khoshekh sitro sewiwotav sukato kheshkhat mayim ‘awei shekhaqim. 
psalms 18:12	minogah negdo ‘awav ‘aweru barad vegakhalei ’esh. 
psalms 18:13	vayar‘em bashamayim yhoh ve‘elyon yiten qolo barad vegakhalei ’esh. 
psalms 18:14	vayishlakh khitsav vayfitsem uweraqim raw vayhumem. 
psalms 18:15	vayeira’u ’afiqei mayim vayigalu mosdot teiwel miga‘aratekha yhoh minishmat ruakh ’apekha. 
psalms 18:16	yishlakh mimarom yiqakheini yamsheini mimayim rabim. 
psalms 18:17	yatsileini mei’oyewi ‘az umisone’ai ki ’ametsu mimeni. 
psalms 18:18	yeqademuni weyom ’eidi vayhi yhoh lemish‘an li. 
psalms 18:19	vayotsi’eini lamerkhaw yekhaletseini ki khafets bi. 
psalms 18:20	yigmeleini yhoh ketsidqi kewor yadai yashiw li. 
psalms 18:21	kisha marti darkhei yhoh velo rasha‘ti mei’elohai. 
psalms 18:22	ki khal mishpatav lenegdi vekhuqotav lo ’asir meni. 
psalms 18:23	va’ehi tamim ‘imo va’eshtamer mei‘avoni. 
psalms 18:24	vayashew yhoh li khetsidqi kewor yadai leneged ‘einav. 
psalms 18:25	‘im khasid titkhasad ‘im gewar tamim titamam. 
psalms 18:26	‘im nawar titbarar ve‘im ‘iqesh titpatal. 
psalms 18:27	ki ’atah ‘am ‘ani toshia‘ ve‘einayim ramot tashpil. 
psalms 18:28	ki ’atah ta’ir neiri yhoh ’elohai yagiah khasheki. 
psalms 18:29	ki wekha ’aruts gedud uweilohai ’adaleg shur. 
psalms 18:30	ha’el tamim darko ’imrat yhoh tserufah magen hu lekhol hakhosim bo. 
psalms 18:31	ki mi ’eloah mibal‘adei yhoh umi tsur zulati ’eloheinu. 
psalms 18:32	ha’el ham’azereini khayil vayiten tamim darki. 
psalms 18:33	meshaveh raglai ka’ayalot ve‘al bamotai ya‘amideini. 
psalms 18:34	melamed yadai lamilkhamah venikhatah qeshet nekhushah zero‘otai. 
psalms 18:35	vatiten li magen yish‘ekha viminekha tis‘adeini ve‘anvatkha tarbeini. 
psalms 18:36	tarkhiw tsa‘adi takhtai velo ma‘adu qarsulai. 
psalms 18:37	’erdof ’oywai ve’asigem velo ’ashuw ‘ad kalotam. 
psalms 18:38	’emkhatsem velo yukhlu qum yipelu takhat raglai. 
psalms 18:39	vate’azereini khayil lamilkhamah takhria‘ qamai takhtai. 
psalms 18:40	ve’oyewai natatah li ‘oref umesan’ai ’atsmitem. 
psalms 18:41	yeshave‘u ve’en moshia‘ ‘al yhoh velo ‘anam. 
psalms 18:42	ve’eshkhaqem ke‘afar ‘al penei ruakh ketit khutsot ’ariqem. 
psalms 18:43	tefaleteini meiriwei ‘am tesimeini lerosh goyim ‘am lo yada‘ti ya‘awduni. 
psalms 18:44	lesheima‘ ’ozen yishame‘u li benei neikhar yekhakhashu li. 
psalms 18:45	benei neikhar yibolu veyakhregu mimisgeroteihem. 
psalms 18:46	khai yhoh uwarukh tsuri veyarum ’elohei yish‘i. 
psalms 18:47	ha’el hanoten neqamot li vayadber ‘amim takhtai. 
psalms 18:48	mefaleti mei’oyewai ’af min qamai teromeini mei’ish khamas tatsileini. 
psalms 18:49	‘al ken ’odkha wagoyim yhoh uleshimkha ’azameirah. 
psalms 18:50	migdol magdil yeshu‘ot malko ve‘oseh khesed limshikho ledavid ulezar‘o ‘ad ‘olam. 
psalms 19:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. hashamayim mesaperim kewod ’el uma‘aseh yadav magid haraqia‘. 
psalms 19:2	yom leyom yabia‘ ’omer velaylah lelaylah yekhaveh da‘at. 
psalms 19:3	’en ’omer ve’en dewarim beli nishma‘ qolam. 
psalms 19:4	bekhal ha’arets yatsa qavam uwiqtseh teiwel mileihem lashemesh sam ’ohel bahem. 
psalms 19:5	vehu kekhatan yotsei meikhupato yasis kegibor laruts ’orakh. 
psalms 19:6	miqtseh hashamayim motsa’o utequfato ‘al qetsotam ve’en nistar meikhamato 
psalms 19:7	torat yhoh temimah meshiwat nafesh ‘eidut yhoh ne’emanah makhkimat peti. 
psalms 19:8	piqudei yhoh yesharim mesamekhei lew mitsvat yhoh barah me’irat ‘einayim. 
psalms 19:9	yir’at yhoh tehorah ‘omedet la‘ad mishpetei yhoh ’emet tsadequ yakhdav. 
psalms 19:10	hanekhemadim mizahaw umipaz raw umetuqim midewash venofet tsufim. 
psalms 19:11	gam ‘awdekha nizhar bahem beshameram ‘eiqew raw. 
psalms 19:12	shegi’ot mi yawin ministarot naqeini. 
psalms 19:13	gam mizeidim khasokh ‘awdekha ’al yimshelu wi ’az ’eitam veniqeiti mipesha‘ raw. 
psalms 19:14	yihyu leratson ’imrei fi vehegyon libi lefanekha yhoh tsuri vego’ali. 
psalms 20:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. ya‘ankha yhoh beyom tsarah yesagewkha shem ’elohei ya‘aqow. 
psalms 20:2	yishlakh ‘ezrekha miqodesh umitsiyon yis‘adeka. 
psalms 20:3	yizkor kal minkhotekha ve‘olatekha yedasheneh selah. 
psalms 20:4	yiten lekha khilwawekha vekhal ‘atsatekha yemalei. 
psalms 20:5	neranenah bishu‘atekha uweshem ’eloheinu nidgol yemalei yhoh kal mish’alotekha. 
psalms 20:6	‘atah yada‘ti ki hoshia‘ yhoh meshikho ya‘aneihu mishemei qadesho bigwurot yeisha‘ yemino. 
psalms 20:7	’eleh warekhew ve’eleh wasusim va’anakhnu beshem yhoh ’eloheinu nazkir. 
psalms 20:8	hemah kare‘u venafalu va’anakhnu qamnu vanit‘odad. 
psalms 20:9	yhoh hoshi‘ah hamelekh ya‘aneinu weyom qare’einu. 
psalms 21:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. yhoh be‘azekha yismakh melekh uwishu‘atekha mah yagel me’od. 
psalms 21:2	ta’avat libo natatah lo va’areshet fatav bal mana‘ta selah. 
psalms 21:3	ki teqademenu birkhot tow tashit lerosho ‘ateret paz. 
psalms 21:4	khayim sha’al mimekha natatah lo ’orekh yamim ‘olam va‘ed. 
psalms 21:5	gadol kewodo bishu‘atekha hod vehadar teshaveh ‘alav. 
psalms 21:6	ki teshiteihu werakhot la‘ad tekhadeihu wesimkhah ’et panekha. 
psalms 21:7	ki hamelekh boteiakh yhoh uwekhesed ‘elyon bal yimot. 
psalms 21:8	timtsa yadekha lekhal ’oyewekha yeminekha timtsa sone’ekha. 
psalms 21:9	teshiteimo ketanur ’esh le‘et panekha yhoh be’apo yewale‘em vetokhelem ’esh. 
psalms 21:10	piryamo mei’erets te’abed vezar‘am mibenei ’adam. 
psalms 21:11	ki natu ‘alekha ra‘ah khashewu mezimah bal yukhalu. 
psalms 21:12	ki teshiteimo shekhem bemeitarekha tekhonen ‘al peneihem. 
psalms 21:13	rumah yhoh we‘uzekha nashirah unezamerah gewuratekha. 
psalms 22:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al ’ayelet hashakhar mizmor ledavid. ’eili ’eili lamah ‘azawtani rakhoq mishu‘ati diwrei sha’agati. 
psalms 22:2	’elohai ’eqra yomam velo ta‘aneh velaylah velo dumiyah li. 
psalms 22:3	ve’atah qadosh yoshew tehilot yisra’el. 
psalms 22:4	bekha batekhu ’awoteinu batekhu vatefaleteimo. 
psalms 22:5	’eilekha za‘aqu venimlatu bekha watekhu velo woshu. 
psalms 22:6	ve’anokhi tola‘at velo ’ish kherpat ’adam uwezui ‘am. 
psalms 22:7	kal ro’ai yal‘igu li yaftiru wesafah yani‘u rosh. 
psalms 22:8	gol ’el yhoh yefaleteihu yatsileihu ki khafets bo. 
psalms 22:9	ki ’atah gokhi mibaten mawtikhi ‘al shedei ’imi. 
psalms 22:10	‘alekha hashelakhti meirakhem mibeten ’imi ’eili ’atah. 
psalms 22:11	’al tirkhaq mimeni ki tsarah qerowah ki ’en ‘ozer. 
psalms 22:12	sewawuni parim rabim ’abirei washan kiteruni. 
psalms 22:13	patsu ‘alai pihem ’aryeh toref vesho’eg. 
psalms 22:14	kamayim nishpakhti vehitparedu kal ‘atsmotai hayah libi kadonag names betokh mei‘ai. 
psalms 22:15	yawesh kakheres kokhi uleshoni mudbaq malqokhai vela‘afar mavet tishpeteini. 
psalms 22:16	ki sewawuni kelawim ‘adat merei‘im hiqifuni ka’ari yadai veraglai. 
psalms 22:17	’asaper kal ‘atsmotai hemah yabitu yir’u wi. 
psalms 22:18	yekhalequ wegadai lahem ve‘al lewushi yapilu goral. 
psalms 22:19	ve’atah yhoh ’al tirkhaq ’eyaluti le‘ezrati khushah. 
psalms 22:20	hatsilah meikherew nafshi miyad kelew yekhidati. 
psalms 22:21	hoshi‘eini mipi ’aryeh umiqarnei reimim ‘anitani. 
psalms 22:22	’asaperah shimkha le’ekhai betokh qahal ’ahaleka. 
psalms 22:23	yir’ei yhoh haleluhu kal zera‘ ya‘aqow kabeduhu veguru mimenu kal zera‘ yisra’el. 
psalms 22:24	ki lo wazah velo shiqats ‘enut ‘ani velo histir panav mimenu uweshave‘o ’eilav shameia‘. 
psalms 22:25	mei’itekha tehilati beqahal raw nedarai ’ashalem neged yerei’av. 
psalms 22:26	yokhelu ‘anavim veyisba‘u yehalelu yhoh doreshav yekhi lewawkhem la‘ad. 
psalms 22:27	yizkeru veyashuwu ’el yhoh kal ’afsei ’arets veyishtakhavu lefanekha kal mishpekhot goyim. 
psalms 22:28	ki yhoh hamelukhah umoshel bagoyim. 
psalms 22:29	’akhelu vayishtakhavu kal dishnei ’erets lefanav yikhre‘u kal yordei ‘afar venafsho lo khiyah. 
psalms 22:30	zera‘ ya‘awdenu yesupar ladonai lador. 
psalms 22:31	yawo’u veyagidu tsidqato le‘am nolad ki ‘asah. 
psalms 23:1	mizmor ledavid yhoh ro‘i lo ’ekhsar. 
psalms 23:2	bin’ot deshe yarbitseini ‘al mei menukhot yenahaleini. 
psalms 23:3	nafshi yeshowew yankheini wema‘gelei tsedeq lema‘an shemo. 
psalms 23:4	gam ki ’eilekh begei tsalmavet lo ’ira ra‘ ki ’atah ‘imadi shiwtekha umish‘antekha hemah yenakhamuni. 
psalms 23:5	ta‘arokh lefanai shulkhan neged tsorerai dishanta washemen roshi kosi revayah. 
psalms 23:6	’akh tow vakhesed yirdefuni kal yemei khayai veshawti bewet yhoh le’orekh yamim. 
psalms 24:1	ledavid mizmor yhoh ha’arets umelo’ah teiwel veyoshewei wah. 
psalms 24:2	ki hu ‘al yamim yesadah ve‘al neharot yekhoneha. 
psalms 24:3	mi ya‘aleh wehar yhoh umi yaqum bimqom qadesho. 
psalms 24:4	neqi khapayim uwar leiwaw ’asher lo nasa lashav nafshi velo nishba‘ lemirmah. 
psalms 24:5	yisa werakhah mei’et yhoh utsedaqah mei’elohei yish‘o. 
psalms 24:6	zeh dor doresho doreshav mewaqshei fanekha ya‘aqow selah. 
psalms 24:7	se’u she‘arim rasheikhem vehinase’u pitkhei ‘olam veyawo melekh hakawod. 
psalms 24:8	mi zeh melekh hakawod yhoh ‘izuz vegibor yhoh gibor milkhamah. 
psalms 24:9	se’u she‘arim rasheikhem use’u pitkhei ‘olam veyawo melekh hakawod. 
psalms 24:10	mi hu zeh melekh hakawod yhoh tsewa’ot hu melekh hakawod selah. 
psalms 25:1	ledavid ’eilekha yhoh nafshi ’esa. 
psalms 25:2	’elohai bekha watakhti ’al ’eiwoshah ’al ya‘altsu ’oyewai li. 
psalms 25:3	gam kal qoekha lo yeiwoshu yeiwoshu habogdim reiqam. 
psalms 25:4	derakhekha yhoh hodi‘eini ’orekhotekha lamedeini. 
psalms 25:5	hadrikheini wa’amitekha velamedeini ki ’atah ’elohei yish‘i ’otkha qiviti kal hayom. 
psalms 25:6	zekhor rakhamekha yhoh vakhasadekha ki mei‘olam hemah. 
psalms 25:7	khatot ne‘urai ufesha‘ai ’al tizkor kekhasdekha zekhar li ’atah lema‘an tuwekha yhoh. 
psalms 25:8	tow veyashar yhoh ‘al ken yoreh khata’im badarekh. 
psalms 25:9	yadrekh ‘anavim bamishpat vilamed ‘anavim darko. 
psalms 25:10	kal ’arekhot yhoh khesed ve’emet lenotserei werito ve‘eidotav. 
psalms 25:11	lema‘an shimkha yhoh vesalakhta la‘avoni ki raw hu. 
psalms 25:12	mi zeh ha’ish yerei yhoh yorenu bederekh yiwkhar. 
psalms 25:13	nafsho betow talin vezar‘o yirash ’arets. 
psalms 25:14	sod yhoh lirei’av uwerito lehodi‘am. 
psalms 25:15	‘einai tamid ’el yhoh ki hu yotsi meireshet raglai. 
psalms 25:16	peneh ’eilai vekhaneini ki yakhid ve‘ani ’ani. 
psalms 25:17	tsarot lewawi hirkhiwu mimetsuqotai hotsi’eini. 
psalms 25:18	re’eh ‘aneyi va‘amali vesa lekhal khatotai. 
psalms 25:19	re’eh ’oywai ki rabu vesin’at khamas senei’uni. 
psalms 25:20	shamerah nafshi vehatsileini ’al ’eiwosh ki khasiti wakh. 
psalms 25:21	tom vayosher yitseruni ki qivitikha. 
psalms 25:22	pedeh ’elohim ’et yisra’el mikol tsarotav 
psalms 26:1	ledavid shafeteini yhoh ki ’ani betumi halakhti yhoh batakhti lo ’em‘ad. 
psalms 26:2	bekhaneini yhoh venaseini tserofah tsarefah khilyotai velibi. 
psalms 26:3	ki khasdekha leneged ‘einai vehithalakhti ba’amitekha. 
psalms 26:4	lo yashawti ‘im metei shav ve‘im na‘alamim lo ’awo. 
psalms 26:5	neiti qehal merei‘im ve‘im resha‘im lo ’eishew. 
psalms 26:6	’erkhats beniqayon kapai va’asowewah ’et mizbakhakha yhoh. 
psalms 26:7	lashmia‘ beqol todah ulesaper kal nifle’otekha. 
psalms 26:8	yhoh ’ahawti me‘on beitekha umeqom mishkan kewodekha. 
psalms 26:9	’al te’esof ‘im khata’im nafshi ve‘im ’anshei damim khayai. 
psalms 26:10	’asher bideihem zimah viminam male’ah shokhad. 
psalms 26:11	va’ani betumi ’eilekh pedeini vekhaneini 
psalms 26:12	ragli ‘amedah wemishor bemaqheilim ’awarekh yhoh. 
psalms 27:1	ledavid yhoh ’ori veyish‘i mimi ’ira yhoh ma‘oz khayai mimi ’efkhad. 
psalms 27:2	biqrow ‘alai merei‘im le’ekhol ’et besari tsarai ve’oyewai li hemah khashelu venafalu. 
psalms 27:3	’im takhaneh ‘alai makhaneh lo yira libi ’im taqum ‘alai milkhamah bezot ’ani woteiakh. 
psalms 27:4	’akhat sha’alti mei’et yhoh ’otah ’awaqesh shiwti bewet yhoh kal yemei khayai lakhazot beno‘am yhoh ulewaqer beheikhalo. 
psalms 27:5	ki yitspeneini besukoh beyom ra‘ah yastireini beseiter ’aholo betsur yeromeini. 
psalms 27:6	ve‘atah yarum roshi ‘al ’oyewai sewiwotai ve’ezbekhah we’aholo ziwkhei teru‘ah ’ashirah va’azamerah yhoh. 
psalms 27:7	shema‘ yhoh qoli ’eqra vekhaneini va‘aneini. 
psalms 27:8	lekha ’amar libi baqeshu fanai ’et panekha yhoh ’awaqesh. 
psalms 27:9	’al taster panekha mimeni ’al tat be’af ‘awdekha ‘ezrati hayita ’al titesheini ve’al ta‘azweini ’elohei yish‘i. 
psalms 27:10	ki ’awi ve’imi ‘azawuni yhoh ya’asfeini. 
psalms 27:11	horeini yhoh darkekha unekheini be’orakh mishor lema‘an shorai. 
psalms 27:12	’al titeneini benefesh tsarai ki qamu wi ‘eideishe qer vifeiakh khamas. 
psalms 27:13	lulei he’emanti lir’ot betuw yhoh be’erets khayim. 
psalms 27:14	qaveh ’el yhoh khazaq veya’amets libekha veqaveh ’el yhoh. 
psalms 28:1	ledavid ’eilekha yhoh ’eqra tsuri ’al tekherash mimeni pen tekhesheh mimeni venimshalti ‘im yordei wor. 
psalms 28:2	shema‘ qol takhanunai beshave‘i ’eilekha benase’i yadai ’el dewir qadshekha 
psalms 28:3	’al timshekheini ‘im resha‘im ve‘im po‘alei ’aven dowerei lom ‘im rei‘eihem vera‘ah bilwawam. 
psalms 28:4	ten lahem kefa‘olam ukheroa‘ ma‘aleihem kema‘aseh yedeihem ten lahem hashew gemulam lahem. 
psalms 28:5	ki lo yawinu ’el pe‘ulot yhoh ve’el ma‘aseh yadav yehersem velo yiwnem. 
psalms 28:6	barukh yhoh kisha ma‘ qol takhanunai. 
psalms 28:7	yhoh ‘uzi umagini bo watakh libi vene‘ezareti vaya‘aloz libi umishiri ’ahodenu. 
psalms 28:8	yhoh ‘oz lamo uma‘oz yeshu‘ot meshikho hu. 
psalms 28:9	hoshi‘ah ’et ‘amekha uwarekh ’et nakhalatekha ure‘em venase’em ‘ad ha‘olam. 
psalms 29:1	mizmor ledavid hawu yhoh benei ’eilim hawu yhoh kawod va‘oz. 
psalms 29:2	hawu yhoh kewod shemo hishtakhavu yhoh behadrat qodesh. 
psalms 29:3	qol yhoh ‘al hamayim ’el hakawod hir‘im yhoh ‘al mayim rabim. 
psalms 29:4	qol yhoh bakoakh qol yhoh behadar. 
psalms 29:5	qol yhoh shower ’arazim vayshaber yhoh ’et ’arzei halewanon. 
psalms 29:6	vayarqidem kemo ‘eigel lewanon vesiryon kemo wen re’eimim. 
psalms 29:7	qol yhoh khotsew lahawot ’esh. 
psalms 29:8	qol yhoh yakhil midbar yakhil yhoh midbar qadesh. 
psalms 29:9	qol yhoh yekholel ’ayalot vayekhesof ye‘arot uweheikhalo kulo ’omer kawod. 
psalms 29:10	yhoh lamabul yashaw vayeishew yhoh melekh le‘olam. 
psalms 29:11	yhoh ‘oz le‘amo yiten yhoh yewarekh ’et ‘amo washalom. 
psalms 30:1	mizmor shir khanukat habayit ledavid. ’aromimkha yhoh ki dilitani velo simakhta ’oyewai li. 
psalms 30:2	yhoh ’elohai shiva‘ti ’eilekha vatirpa’eini. 
psalms 30:3	yhoh he‘elita min she’ol nafshi khiyitani miyordei miyaredi wor. 
psalms 30:4	zameru yhoh khasidav vehodu lezeikher qadesho. 
psalms 30:5	ki rega‘ be’apo khayim birtsono ba‘erew yalin bekhi velaboqer rinah. 
psalms 30:6	va’ani ’amarti weshalvi bal ’emot le‘olam. 
psalms 30:7	yhoh birtsonkha he‘emadtah lehari ‘oz histarta fanekha hayiti niwhal. 
psalms 30:8	’eilekha yhoh ’eqra ve’el ’adonai ’etkhanan. 
psalms 30:9	mah betsa‘ bedami beridti ’el shakhat hayodkha ‘afar hayagid ’amitekha. 
psalms 30:10	shema‘ yhoh vekhaneini yhoh heyeh ‘ozer li. 
psalms 30:11	hafakhta mispedi lemakhol li pitakhta saqi vate’azereini simkhah. 
psalms 30:12	lema‘an yezamerkha khawod velo yidom yhoh ’elohai le‘olam ’odeka. 
psalms 31:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. bekha yhoh khasiti ’al ’eiwoshah le‘olam betsidqatekha faleteini. 
psalms 31:2	hateh ’eilai ’azenekha meheirah hatsileini heyeh li letsur ma‘oz lewet metsudot lehoshi‘eini. 
psalms 31:3	ki sal‘i umetsudati ’atah ulema‘an mekha tankheini utenahaleini. 
psalms 31:4	totsi’eini meireshet zu tamenu li ki ’atah ma‘uzi. 
psalms 31:5	beyadekha ’afqid rukhi paditah ’oti yhoh ’el ’emet. 
psalms 31:6	saneiti hashomerim hawlei shav va’ani ’el yhoh batakheti. 
psalms 31:7	’agilah ve’esmekhah bekhasdekha ’asher ra’ita ’et ‘aneyi yada‘ta betsarot nafshi. 
psalms 31:8	velo hisgartani beyad ’oyew he‘emadta wamerkhaw raglai. 
psalms 31:9	khaneini yhoh ki tsar li ‘asheshah wekha‘as ‘eini nafshi uwitni. 
psalms 31:10	ki khalu weyagon khayai ushenotai ba’anakhah kashal ba‘avoni khokhi va‘atsamai ‘asheishu. 
psalms 31:11	mikal tsorerai hayiti kherpah velishakheinai me’od ufakhad limyuda‘ai ro’ai bakhuts nadedu mimeni. 
psalms 31:12	nishkakhti kemet milew hayiti kikhli ’owed. 
psalms 31:13	ki shama‘ti dibat rabim magor misawiw behivasedam yakhad ‘alai laqakhat nafshi zamamu. 
psalms 31:14	va’ani ‘alekha watakhti yhoh ’amarti ’elohai ’atah. 
psalms 31:15	beyadekha ‘itotai hatsileini miyad ’oywai umeirodefai. 
psalms 31:16	ha’irah fanekha ‘al ‘awdekha hoshi‘eini wekhasdekha. 
psalms 31:17	yhoh ’al ’eiwoshah ki qeratikha yeiwoshu resha‘im yidemu lish’ol. 
psalms 31:18	tei’alamnah siftei shaqer hadowerot ‘al tsadiq ‘ataq bega’avah vawuz. 
psalms 31:19	mah raw tuwekha ’asher tsafanta lirei’ekha pa‘alta lakhosim bakh neged benei ’adam 
psalms 31:20	tastirem beseiter panekha meirukhsei ’ish titspenem besukah meiriw leshonot. 
psalms 31:21	barukh yhoh ki hifli khasdo li be‘ir matsor. 
psalms 31:22	va’ani ’amarti wekhafezi nigrazti mineged ‘einekha ’akhen ma‘ta qol takhanunai beshave‘i ’eilekha. 
psalms 31:23	’ehewu ’et yhoh kal khasidav ’emunim notser yhoh umeshalem ‘al yeter ‘oseh ga’avah. 
psalms 31:24	khizqu veya’amets lewawkhem kal hamyakhalim yhoh. 
psalms 32:1	ledavid maskil ’ashrei nesui pesha‘ kesui khata’ah. 
psalms 32:2	’ashrei ’adam lo yakhshow yhoh lo ‘avon ve’en berukho remiyah 
psalms 32:3	ki hekherashti balu ‘atsamai besha’agati kal hayom. 
psalms 32:4	ki yomam valaylah tikhbad ‘alai yadekha nehpakh leshadi bekharwonei qayits selah. 
psalms 32:5	khatati ’odi‘akha va‘avoni lo khisiti ’amarti ’odeh ‘alei fesha‘ai yhoh ve’atah nasata ‘avon khatati selah. 
psalms 32:6	‘al zot yitpalel kal khasid ’eilekha le‘et metso raq lesheitef mayim rabim ’eilav lo yagi‘u. 
psalms 32:7	’atah seiter li mitsar titsereini ranei falet tesowweini selah. 
psalms 32:8	’askilekha ve’orkha bederekh zu teilekh ’i‘atsah ‘alekha ‘eini. 
psalms 32:9	’al tihyu kesus kefered ’en hawin bemeteg varesen ‘edyo liwlom bal qerow ’eilekha. 
psalms 32:10	rabim makh’owim larasha‘ vehaboteiakh yhoh khesed yesowwenu. 
psalms 32:11	simkhu yhoh vegilu tsadiqim veharninu kal yishrei lew. 
psalms 33:1	ranenu tsadiqim yhoh laysharim navah tehilah. 
psalms 33:2	hodu yhoh bekhinor beneiwel ‘asor zameru lo. 
psalms 33:3	shiru lo shir khadash heitiwu nagen bitru‘ah. 
psalms 33:4	ki yashar dewar yhoh vekhal ma‘aseihu be’emunah. 
psalms 33:5	’ohew tsedaqah umishpat khesed yhoh male’ah ha’arets. 
psalms 33:6	bidwar yhoh shamayim na‘asu uweruakh piv kal tsewa’am. 
psalms 33:7	kones kaned mei hayam noten be’otsarot tehomot. 
psalms 33:8	yire’u yhoh kal ha’arets mimenu yaguru kal yoshewei teiwel. 
psalms 33:9	ki hu ’amar vayehi hu tsivah vaya‘amod. 
psalms 33:10	yhoh heifir ‘atsat goyim heini makhshewot ‘amim. 
psalms 33:11	‘atsat yhoh le‘olam ta‘amod makhshewot libo ledor vador. 
psalms 33:12	’ashrei hago ’asher yhoh ’elohav ha‘am bakhar lenakhalah lo. 
psalms 33:13	mishamayim hibit yhoh ra’ah ’et kal benei ha’adam. 
psalms 33:14	mimekhon shiwto hishgiakh ’el kal yoshewei ha’arets. 
psalms 33:15	hayotser yakhad libam hameiwin ’el kal ma‘aseihem. 
psalms 33:16	’en hamelekh nosha‘ beraw khayil gibor lo yinatsel beraw koakh. 
psalms 33:17	sheqer hasus litshu‘ah uwerow kheilo lo yemalet. 
psalms 33:18	hineh ‘en yhoh ’el yerei’av lamyakhalim lekhasdo. 
psalms 33:19	lehatsil mimavet nafsham ulekhayotam bara‘aw. 
psalms 33:20	nafsheinu khiketah yhoh ‘ezreinu umagineinu hu. 
psalms 33:21	ki wo yismakh libeinu ki weshem qadesho watakhenu. 
psalms 33:22	yehi khasdekha yhoh ‘aleinu ka’asher yikhalnu lakh. 
psalms 34:1	ledavid beshanoto ’et ta‘mo lifnei ’awimelekh vaygarasheihu vayeilakh. ’awarakhah ’et yhoh bekhal ‘et tamid tehilato befi. 
psalms 34:2	yhoh tithalel nafshi yishme‘u ‘anavim veyismakhu. 
psalms 34:3	gadelu yhoh ’iti uneromah shemo yakhdav. 
psalms 34:4	darashti ’et yhoh ve‘anani umikal megurotai hitsilani. 
psalms 34:5	hibitu ’eilav venaharu ufeneihem ’al yekhparu. 
psalms 34:6	zeh ‘ani qara yhoh shameia‘ umikal tsarotav hoshi‘o. 
psalms 34:7	khoneh mal’akh yhoh sawiw lirei’av vaykhaletsem. 
psalms 34:8	ta‘amu ure’u ki tow yhoh ’ashrei hagewer yekheseh bo. 
psalms 34:9	yer’u ’et yhoh qedoshav ki ’en makhsor lirei’av. 
psalms 34:10	kefirim rashu vera‘eiwu vedoreshei yhoh lo yakhseru khal tow. 
psalms 34:11	lekhu wanim shim‘u li yir’at yhoh ’alamedkhem. 
psalms 34:12	mi ha’ish hekhafets khayim ’ohew yamim lir’ot tow. 
psalms 34:13	netsor leshonkha meira‘ usefatekha midaber mirmah. 
psalms 34:14	sur meira‘ va‘aseh tow baqesh shalom veradefeihu. 
psalms 34:15	‘einei yhoh ’el tsadiqim ve’azenav ’el shav‘atam. 
psalms 34:16	penei yhoh be‘osei ra‘ lehakhrit mei’erets zikhram. 
psalms 34:17	tsa‘aqu yhoh shameia‘ umikal tsarotam hitsilam. 
psalms 34:18	qarow yhoh lenishberei lew ve’et dake’ei ruakh yoshia‘. 
psalms 34:19	rabot ra‘ot tsadiq umikulam yatsilenu yhoh. 
psalms 34:20	shomer kal ‘atsmotav ’akhat meihenah lo nishbarah. 
psalms 34:21	temotet rasha‘ ra‘ah vesone’ei tsadiq ye’shamu. 
psalms 34:22	podeh yhoh nefesh ‘awadav velo ye’shemu kal hakhosim bo. 
psalms 35:1	ledavid riwah yhoh ’et yeriwai lekham ’et lokhamai. 
psalms 35:2	hakhazeq magen vetsinah vequmah be‘ezrati. 
psalms 35:3	vehareq khanit usegor liqrat rodefai ’emor lenafshi yeshu‘atekh ’ani. 
psalms 35:4	yeiwoshu veyikalemu mewaqshei nafshi yisogu ’akhor veyakhperu khoshewei ra‘ati. 
psalms 35:5	yihyu kemots lifnei ruakh umal’akh yhoh dokheh. 
psalms 35:6	yehi darkam khoshekh vakhalaqlaqot umal’akh yhoh rodefam. 
psalms 35:7	ki khinam tamenu li shakhat rishtam khinam khaferu lenafshi. 
psalms 35:8	tewo’eihu sho’ah lo yeida‘ verishto ’asher taman tilkedo besho’ah yipal bah. 
psalms 35:9	venafshi tagil yhoh tasis bishu‘ato. 
psalms 35:10	kal ‘atsmotai tomarnah yhoh mi khamokha matsil ‘ani meikhazaq mimenu ve‘ani ve’ewyon migozelo. 
psalms 35:11	yequmun ‘eidei khamas ’asher lo yada‘ti yish’aluni. 
psalms 35:12	yeshalemuni ra‘ah takhat towah shekhol lenafshi. 
psalms 35:13	va’ani bakhalotam lewushi saq ‘ineiti watsom nafshi utefilati ‘al kheiqi tashuw. 
psalms 35:14	kereia‘ ke’akh li hithalakheti ka’awel ’em qoder shakhoti. 
psalms 35:15	uwetsal‘i samekhu vene’esafu ne’esfu ‘alai neikhim velo yada‘ti qare‘u velo damu. 
psalms 35:16	bekhanfei la‘agei ma‘og kharoq ‘alai shineimo. 
psalms 35:17	’adonai kamah tir’eh hashiwah nafshi misho’eihem mikefirim yekhidati. 
psalms 35:18	’odkha beqahal raw be‘am ‘atsum ’ahaleka. 
psalms 35:19	’al yismekhu li ’oyewai sheqer sone’ai khinam yiqretsu ‘ayin. 
psalms 35:20	ki lo shalom yedabeiru ve‘al rig‘ei ’erets diwrei mirmot yakhashowun. 
psalms 35:21	vayarkhiwu ‘alai pihem ’ameru he’akh he’akh ra’atah ‘eineinu. 
psalms 35:22	ra’itah yhoh ’al tekherash ’adonai ’al tirkhaq mimeni. 
psalms 35:23	ha‘irah vehaqitsah lemishpati ’elohai vadonai leriwi. 
psalms 35:24	shafeteini khetsidqekha yhoh ’elohai ve’al yismekhu li. 
psalms 35:25	’al yomeru welibam he’akh nafsheinu ’al yomeru bila‘anuhu. 
psalms 35:26	yeiwoshu veyakhperu yakhdav semeikhei ra‘ati yilbeshu woshet ukhelimah hamagdilim ‘alai. 
psalms 35:27	yaronu veyismekhu khafeitsei tsidqi veyomeru tamid yigdal yhoh hekhafets shelom ‘awdo. 
psalms 35:28	uleshoni tehgeh tsidqekha kal hayom tehilatekha. 
psalms 36:1	lamnatseiakh le‘ewed yhoh ledavid. ne’um pesha‘ larasha‘ beqerew libi ’en pakhad ’elohim leneged ‘einav. 
psalms 36:2	ki hekheliq ’eilav be‘einav limtso ‘avono lisno. 
psalms 36:3	diwrei fiv ’aven umirmah khadal lehaskil leheitiw. 
psalms 36:4	’aven yakhshow ‘al mishkawo yityatsew ‘al derekh lo tow ra‘ lo yim’as. 
psalms 36:5	yhoh behashamayim khasdekha ’emunatekha ‘ad shekhaqim. 
psalms 36:6	tsidqatekha keharei ’el mishpatekha tehom rabah ’adam uweheimah toshia‘ yhoh. 
psalms 36:7	mah yaqar khasdekha ’elohim uwenei ’adam betsel kenafekha yekhesayun. 
psalms 36:8	yirveyun mideshen beitekha venakhal ‘adanekha tashqem. 
psalms 36:9	ki ‘imekha meqor khayim be’orkha nir’eh ’or. 
psalms 36:10	meshokh khasdekha leyode‘ekha vetsidqatekha leyishrei lew. 
psalms 36:11	’al tewo’eini regel ga’avah veyad resha‘im ’al tenideini. 
psalms 36:12	sham nafelu po‘alei ’aven dokhu velo yakhelu qum. 
psalms 37:1	ledavid ’al titkhar bamerei‘im ’al teqanei be‘osei ‘avlah. 
psalms 37:2	ki khekhatsir meheirah yimalu ukheyereq deshe yibolun. 
psalms 37:3	betakh yhoh va‘aseh tow shekhan ’erets ure‘eh ’emunah. 
psalms 37:4	vehit‘anag ‘al yhoh veyiten lekha mish’alot libekha. 
psalms 37:5	gol ‘al yhoh darkekha uwetakh ‘alav vehu ya‘aseh. 
psalms 37:6	vehotsi kha’or tsidqekha umishpatekha katsahorayim. 
psalms 37:7	dom yhoh vehitkholel lo ’al titkhar bematsliakh darko be’ish ‘oseh mezimot. 
psalms 37:8	heref mei’af va‘azow kheimah ’al titkhar ’akh lehareia‘. 
psalms 37:9	ki merei‘im yikareitun veqoei yhoh hemah yireshu ’arets. 
psalms 37:10	ve‘od me‘at ve’en rasha‘ vehitbonanta ‘al meqomo ve’einenu. 
psalms 37:11	va‘anavim yireshu ’arets vehit‘anegu ‘al row shalom. 
psalms 37:12	zomem rasha‘ latsadiq vekhoreq ‘alav shinav. 
psalms 37:13	’adonai yiskhaq lo ki ra’ah ki yawo yomo. 
psalms 37:14	kherew patekhu resha‘im vedarekhu qashtam lehapil ‘ani ve’ewyon litwoakh yishrei darekh. 
psalms 37:15	kharbam tawo welibam veqashetotam tishawarnah. 
psalms 37:16	tow me‘at latsadiq meihamon resha‘im rabim. 
psalms 37:17	ki zero‘ot resha‘im tishawarnah vesomekh tsadiqim yhoh. 
psalms 37:18	yodeia‘ yhoh yemei temimim venakhalatam le‘olam tihyeh. 
psalms 37:19	lo yeiwoshu be‘et ra‘ah uwimei re‘awon yisba‘u. 
psalms 37:20	ki resha‘im yoweidu ve’oyewei yhoh kiqar karim kalu we‘ashan kalu. 
psalms 37:21	loeh rasha‘ velo yeshalem vetsadiq khonen venoten. 
psalms 37:22	ki meworakhav yireshu ’arets umequlalav yikareitu. 
psalms 37:23	yhoh mits‘adei gewer konanu vedarko yekhpats. 
psalms 37:24	ki yipol lo yutal ki yhoh somekh yado. 
psalms 37:25	na‘ar hayiti gam zaqanti velo ra’iti tsadiq ne‘ezaw vezar‘o mewaqesh lakhem. 
psalms 37:26	kal hayom khonen umalveh vezar‘o liwrakhah. 
psalms 37:27	sur meira‘ va‘aseh tow ushekhon le‘olam. 
psalms 37:28	ki yhoh ’ohew mishpat velo ya‘azow ’et khasidav le‘olam nishmaru vezera‘ resha‘im nikhrat. 
psalms 37:29	tsadiqim yireshu ’arets veyishkenu la‘ad ‘aleha. 
psalms 37:30	pi tsadiq yehgeh khakhmah uleshono tedaber mishpat. 
psalms 37:31	torat ’elohav belibo lo tim‘ad ’ashurav. 
psalms 37:32	tsofeh rasha‘ latsadiq umewaqesh lahamito 
psalms 37:33	yhoh lo ya‘azwenu weyado velo yarshi‘enu behishafeto. 
psalms 37:34	qaveh ’el yhoh ushemor darko viromimkha lareshet ’arets behikaret resha‘im tir’eh. 
psalms 37:35	ra’iti rasha‘ ‘arits umit‘areh ke’ezrakh ra‘anan. 
psalms 37:36	vaya‘awor vehineh ’einenu va’awaqsheihu velo nimtsa. 
psalms 37:37	shemar tam ure’eh yashar ki ’akharit le’ish shalom. 
psalms 37:38	ufoshe‘im nishmedu yakhdav ’akharit resha‘im nikhratah. 
psalms 37:39	uteshu‘at tsadiqim yhoh ma‘uzam be‘et tsarah. 
psalms 37:40	vaya‘zerem yhoh vayfaletem yefaletem meiresha‘im veyoshi‘em ki khasu wo. 
psalms 38:1	mizmor ledavid lehazkir. yhoh ’al beqetspekha tokhikheini uwakhamatekha teyasereini. 
psalms 38:2	ki khitsekha nikhatu wi vatinkhat ‘alai yadekha. 
psalms 38:3	’en metom biwsari mipenei za‘mekha ’en shalom ba‘atsamai mipenei khatati. 
psalms 38:4	ki ‘avonotai ‘aweru roshi kemasa khawed yikhbedu mimeni. 
psalms 38:5	hiw’ishu namaqu khaburotai mipenei ’ivalti. 
psalms 38:6	na‘aveiti shakhoti ‘ad me’od kal hayom qoder hilakheti. 
psalms 38:7	ki khesalai male’u niqleh ve’en metom biwsari. 
psalms 38:8	nefugoti venidkeiti ‘ad me’od ’agti minahamat libi. 
psalms 38:9	’adonai negdekha khal ta’avati ve’ankhati mimekha lo nistarah. 
psalms 38:10	libi sekharkhar ‘azawani khokhi ve’or ‘einai gam hem ’en ’iti. 
psalms 38:11	’ohawai verei‘ai mineged nig‘i ya‘amodu uqerowai meirakhoq ‘amadu. 
psalms 38:12	vaynaqshu mewaqshei nafshi vedoreshei ra‘ati diberu havot umirmot kal hayom yehgu. 
psalms 38:13	va’ani khekheiresh lo ’eshma‘ ukhe’ilem lo yiftakh piv. 
psalms 38:14	va’ehi ke’ish ’asher lo shomeia‘ ve’en befiv tokhakhot. 
psalms 38:15	ki lekha yhoh hokhaleti ’atah ta‘aneh ’adonai ’elohai. 
psalms 38:16	ki ’amarti pen yismekhu li bemot ragli ‘alai higdilu. 
psalms 38:17	ki ’ani letsela‘ nakhon umakh’owi negdi tamid. 
psalms 38:18	ki ‘avoni ’agid ’ed’ag meikhatati. 
psalms 38:19	ve’oyewai khayim ‘atseimu verabu sone’ai shaqer. 
psalms 38:20	umeshalemei ra‘ah takhat towah yistenuni takhat redofi radefi tow. 
psalms 38:21	’al ta‘azweini yhoh ’elohai ’al tirkhaq mimeni. 
psalms 38:22	khushah le‘ezrati ’adonai teshu‘ati. 
psalms 39:1	lamnatseiakh liditun lidutun mizmor ledavid. ’amarti ’eshmerah derakhai meikhato wilshoni ’eshmerah lefi makhsom be‘od rasha‘ lenegdi. 
psalms 39:2	ne’elamti dumiyah hekhesheiti mitow ukhe’eiwi ne‘kar. 
psalms 39:3	kham libi beqirbi bahagigi tiw‘ar ’esh dibarti bilshoni. 
psalms 39:4	hodi‘eini yhoh qitsi umidat yamai mah hi ’eide‘ah meh khadel ’ani. 
psalms 39:5	hineh tefakhot natatah yamai vekheldi khe’ayin negdekha ’akh kal hewel kal ’adam nitsaw selah. 
psalms 39:6	’akh betselem yithalekh ’ish ’akh hewel yehemayun yitsbor velo yeida‘ mi ’osefam. 
psalms 39:7	ve‘atah mah qiviti ’adonai tokhalti lekha hi. 
psalms 39:8	mikal pesha‘ai hatsileini kherpat nawal ’al tesimeini. 
psalms 39:9	ne’elamti lo ’eftakh pi ki ’atah ‘asita. 
psalms 39:10	haser mei‘alai nig‘ekha mitigrat yadekha ’ani khaliti. 
psalms 39:11	betokhakhot ‘al ‘avon yisarta ’ish vatemes ka‘ash khamudo ’akh hewel kal ’adam selah. 
psalms 39:12	shim‘ah tefilati yhoh veshav‘ati ha’azinah ’el dim‘ati ’al tekherash ki ger ’anokhi ‘imakh toshaw kekhal ’awotai. 
psalms 39:13	hasha‘ mimeni ve’awligah beterem ’eilekh ve’eineni. 
psalms 40:1	lamnatseiakh ledavid mizmor. qavoh qiviti yhoh vayet ’eilai vayishma‘ shav‘ati. 
psalms 40:2	vaya‘aleini mibor sha’on mitit hayaven vayaqem ‘al sela‘ raglai konen ’ashurai. 
psalms 40:3	vayiten befi shir khadash tehilah leiloheinu yir’u rabim veyira’u veyiwtekhu yhoh. 
psalms 40:4	’ashrei hagewer ’asher sam yhoh miwtakho velo fanah ’el rehawim vesatei khazaw. 
psalms 40:5	rabot ‘asita ’atah yhoh ’elohai nifle’otekha umakhshewotekha ’eileinu ’en ‘arokh ’eilekha ’agidah va’adabeirah ‘atsemu misaper. 
psalms 40:6	zewakh uminkhah lo khafatsta ’azenayim karita li ‘olah vakhata’ah lo sha’aleta. 
psalms 40:7	’az ’amarti hineh wati bimgilat seifer katuw ‘alai. 
psalms 40:8	la‘asot retsonkha ’elohai khafatseti vetoratekha betokh mei‘ai. 
psalms 40:9	bisarti tsedeq beqahal raw hineh fatai lo ’ekhla yhoh ’atah yada‘eta. 
psalms 40:10	tsidqatekha lo khisiti betokh libi ’emunatekha uteshu‘atekha ’amareti lo khikhadti khasdekha va’amitekha leqahal raw. 
psalms 40:11	’atah yhoh lo tikhla rakhamekha mimeni khasdekha va’amitekha tamid yitseruni. 
psalms 40:12	ki ’afefu ‘alai ra‘ot ‘ad ’en mispar hisiguni ‘avonotai velo yakholeti lir’ot ‘atsemu misa‘arot roshi velibi ‘azawani. 
psalms 40:13	retseh yhoh lehatsileini yhoh le‘ezrati khushah. 
psalms 40:14	yeiwoshu veyakhperu yakhad mewaqshei nafshi lispotah yisogu ’akhor veyikalemu khafeitsei ra‘ati. 
psalms 40:15	yashomu ‘al ‘eiqew bashetam ha’omerim li he’akh he’akh. 
psalms 40:16	yasisu veyismekhu bekha kal mewaqshekha yomeru tamid yigdal yhoh ’ohawei teshu‘atekha. 
psalms 40:17	va’ani ‘ani ve’ewyon ’adonai yakhashaw li ‘ezrati umefalti ’atah ’elohai ’al te’akhar. 
psalms 41:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. ’ashrei maskil ’el dal beyom ra‘ah yemaleteihu yhoh. 
psalms 41:2	yhoh yishmereihu vikhayeihu ye’shor ve’ushar ba’arets ve’al titeneihu benefesh ’oyewav. 
psalms 41:3	yhoh yis‘adenu ‘al ‘eres devai kal mishkawo hafakhta wekhaleyo. 
psalms 41:4	’ani ’amarti yhoh khaneini refa’ah nafshi ki khatati lakh. 
psalms 41:5	’oywai yomeru ra‘ li matai yamut ve’awad shemo. 
psalms 41:6	ve’im ba lir’ot shav yedaber libo yiqbats ’aven lo yeitsei lakhuts yedaber. 
psalms 41:7	yakhad ‘alai yitlakhashu kal sone’ai ‘alai yakhshewu ra‘ah li. 
psalms 41:8	dewar beliya‘al yatsuq bo va’asher khaw lo yosif laqum. 
psalms 41:9	gam ’ish shelomi ’asher batakhti wo ’okhel lakhmi higdil ‘alai ‘aqew. 
psalms 41:10	ve’atah yhoh khaneini vahaqimeini va’ashalemah lahem. 
psalms 41:11	bezot yada‘ti ki khafatsta bi ki lo yaria‘ ’oyewi ‘alai. 
psalms 41:12	va’ani betumi tamakhta bi vatatsiweini lefanekha le‘olam. 
psalms 41:13	barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el meiha‘olam ve‘ad ha‘olam ’amen ve’amen. 
psalms 42:1	lamnatseiakh maskil liwnei qorakh. ke’ayal ta‘arog ‘al ’afiqei mayim ken nafshi ta‘arog ’eilekha ’elohim. 
psalms 42:2	tsame’ah nafshi leilohim le’el khai matai ’awo ve’eira’eh penei ’elohim. 
psalms 42:3	hayetah li dim‘ati lekhem yomam valayelah be’emor ’eilai kal hayom ’ayeh ’elohekha. 
psalms 42:4	’eleh ’ezkerah ve’eshpekhah ‘alai nafshi ki ’e‘ewor basakh ’edadem ‘ad bet ’elohim beqol rinah vetodah hamon khogeg. 
psalms 42:5	mah tishtokhakhi nafshi vatehemi ‘alai hokhili leilohim ki ‘od ’odenu yeshu‘ot panav. 
psalms 42:6	’elohai ‘alai nafshi tishtokhakh ‘al ken ’ezkarekha mei’erets yarden vekhermonim meihar mits‘ar. 
psalms 42:7	tehom ’el tehom qorei leqol tsinorekha kal mishbarekha vegalekha ‘alai ‘awaru. 
psalms 42:8	yomam yetsaveh yhoh khasdo uwalaylah shirah shiro ‘imi tefilah le’el khayai. 
psalms 42:9	’omrah le’el sal‘i lamah shekhakhtani lamah qoder ’eilekh belakhats ’oyew. 
psalms 42:10	beretsakh be‘atsmotai kheirefuni tsorai be’ameram ’eilai kal hayom ’ayeh ’elohekha. 
psalms 42:11	mah tishtokhakhi nafshi umah tehemi ‘alai hokhili leilohim ki ‘od ’odenu yeshu‘ot panai veilohai. 
psalms 43:1	shafeteini ’elohim veriwah riwi migo lo khasid mei’ish mirmah ve‘avlah tefaleteini. 
psalms 43:2	ki ’atah ’elohei ma‘uzi lamah zenakhtani lamah qoder ’ethalekh belakhats ’oyew. 
psalms 43:3	shelakh ’orkha va’amitekha hemah yankhuni yewi’uni ’el har qadshekha ve’el mishkenotekha. 
psalms 43:4	ve’awo’ah ’el mizbakh ’elohim ’el ’el simkhat gili ve’odkha wekhinor ’elohim ’elohai. 
psalms 43:5	mah tishtokhakhi nafshi umah tehemi ‘alai hokhili leilohim ki ‘od ’odenu yeshu‘ot panai veilohai. 
psalms 44:1	lamnatseiakh liwnei qorakh maskil. ’elohim be’azeneinu shama‘nu ’awoteinu siperu lanu po‘al pa‘alta wimeihem bimei qedem. 
psalms 44:2	’atah yadekha goyim horashta vatita‘em tara‘ le’umim vateshalekhem. 
psalms 44:3	ki lo wekharbam yareshu ’arets uzero‘am lo hoshi‘ah lamo ki yeminekha uzero‘akha ve’or panekha ki retsitam. 
psalms 44:4	’atah hu malki ’elohim tsaveh yeshu‘ot ya‘aqow. 
psalms 44:5	bekha tsareinu nenageiakh beshimkha nawus qameinu. 
psalms 44:6	ki lo weqashti ’ewtakh vekharbi lo toshi‘eini. 
psalms 44:7	ki hosha‘tanu mitsareinu umesan’einu hewishota. 
psalms 44:8	beilohim hilalnu khal hayom veshimkha le‘olam nodeh selah. 
psalms 44:9	’af zanakhta vatakhlimeinu velo teitsei betsiw’oteinu. 
psalms 44:10	teshiweinu ’akhor mini tsar umesan’einu shasu lamo. 
psalms 44:11	titeneinu ketson ma’akhal uwagoyim zeiritanu. 
psalms 44:12	timkor ‘amekha welo hon velo ribita bimkhireihem. 
psalms 44:13	tesimeinu kherpah lishkheineinu la‘ag vaqeles liswiwoteinu. 
psalms 44:14	tesimeinu mashal bagoyim menod rosh bal ’umim. 
psalms 44:15	kal hayom kelimati negdi uwoshet panai kisateni. 
psalms 44:16	miqol mekharef umegadef mipenei ’oyew umitnaqem. 
psalms 44:17	kal zot ba’atnu velo shekhakhanukha veloshi qarnu biwritekha. 
psalms 44:18	lo nasog ’akhor libeinu vatet ’ashureinu mini ’arekhekha. 
psalms 44:19	ki dikitanu bimqom tanim vatekhas ‘aleinu wetsalmavet. 
psalms 44:20	’imosha khakhnu shem ’eloheinu vanifros kapeinu le’el zar. 
psalms 44:21	halo ’elohim yakhaqar zot ki hu yodeia‘ ta‘alumot lew. 
psalms 44:22	ki ‘alekha horagnu khal hayom nekhshawnu ketson tiwkhah. 
psalms 44:23	‘urah lamah tishan ’adonai haqitsah ’al tiznakh lanetsakh. 
psalms 44:24	lamah fanekha tastir tishkakh ‘aneyeinu velakhatseinu. 
psalms 44:25	ki shakhah le‘afar nafsheinu daweqah la’arets bitneinu. 
psalms 44:26	qumah ‘ezratah lanu ufedeinu lema‘an khasdekha. 
psalms 45:1	lamnatseiakh ‘alosho shanim liwnei qorakh maskil shir yedidot. rakhash libi dawar tow ’omer ’ani ma‘asai lemelekh leshoni ‘et sofer mahir. 
psalms 45:2	yafeyafita mibenei ’adam hutsaq khen besefetotekha ‘al ken beirakhkha ’elohim le‘olam. 
psalms 45:3	khagor kharbekha ‘al yarekh gibor hodkha vahadarekha. 
psalms 45:4	vahadarekha tselakh rekhaw ‘al dewar ’emet ve‘anvah tsedeq vetorkha nora’ot yeminekha. 
psalms 45:5	khitsekha shenunim ‘amim takhtekha yipelu belew ’oywei hamelekh. 
psalms 45:6	kis’akha ’elohim ‘olam va‘ed sheiwet mishor sheiwet malkhutekha. 
psalms 45:7	’ahawta tsedeq vatisna resha‘ ‘al ken meshakhakha ’elohim ’elohekha shemen sason meikhaweirekha. 
psalms 45:8	mor va’ahalot qetsi‘ot kal bigdotekha min heikhelei n mini simekhukha. 
psalms 45:9	benot melakhim beyiqerotekha nitsewah sheigal liminekha bekhetem ’ofir. 
psalms 45:10	shim‘i wat ure’i vehati ’azenekh veshikhkhi ‘amekh uwet ’awikh. 
psalms 45:11	veyit’av hamelekh yafeyekh ki hu ’adonayikh vehishtakhavi lo. 
psalms 45:12	uwat tsor beminkhah panayikh yekhalu ‘ashirei ‘am. 
psalms 45:13	kal kewudah wat melekh penimah mimishbetsot zahaw lewushah. 
psalms 45:14	lirqamot tuwal lamelekh betulot ’akhareha rei‘oteha muwa’ot lakh. 
psalms 45:15	tuwalnah bismakhot vagil tewo’enah beheikhal melekh. 
psalms 45:16	takhat ’awotekha yihyu wanekha teshiteimo lesarim bekhal ha’arets. 
psalms 45:17	’azkirah mekha bekhal dor vador ‘al ken ‘amim yehodukha le‘olam va‘ed. 
psalms 46:1	lamnatseiakh liwnei qorakh ‘al ‘alamot shir. ’elohim lanu makhaseh va‘oz ‘ezrah wetsarot nimtsa me’od. 
psalms 46:2	‘al ken lo nira behamir ’arets uwemot harim belew yamim. 
psalms 46:3	yehemu yekhmeru meimav yir‘ashu harim bega’avato selah. 
psalms 46:4	nahar pelagav yesamekhu ‘ir ’elohim qedosh mishkenei ‘elyon. 
psalms 46:5	’elohim beqirbah bal timot ya‘zereha ’elohim lifnot boqer. 
psalms 46:6	hamu goyim matu mamlakhot natan beqolo tamug ’arets. 
psalms 46:7	yhoh tsewa’ot ‘imanu misgaw lanu ’elohei ya‘aqow selah. 
psalms 46:8	lekhu khazu mif‘alot yhoh ’asher sam shamot ba’arets. 
psalms 46:9	mashbit milkhamot ‘ad qetseh ha’arets qeshet yeshaber veqitsets khanit ‘agalot yisrof ba’esh. 
psalms 46:10	harpu ude‘u ki ’anokhi ’elohim ’arum bagoyim ’arum ba’arets. 
psalms 46:11	yhoh tsewa’ot ‘imanu misgaw lanu ’elohei ya‘aqow selah. 
psalms 47:1	lamnatseiakh liwnei qorakh mizmor. kal ha‘amim tiq‘u khaf hari‘u leilohim beqol rinah. 
psalms 47:2	ki yhoh ‘elyon nora melekh gadol ‘al kal ha’arets. 
psalms 47:3	yadber ‘amim takhteinu ule’umim takhat ragleinu. 
psalms 47:4	yiwkhar lanu ’et nakhalateinu ’et ge’on ya‘aqow ’asher ’ahew selah. 
psalms 47:5	‘alah ’elohim bitru‘ah yhoh beqol shofar. 
psalms 47:6	zameru ’elohim zameiru zameru lemalkeinu zameiru. 
psalms 47:7	ki melekh kal ha’arets ’elohim zameru maskil. 
psalms 47:8	malakh ’elohim ‘al goyim ’elohim yashaw ‘al kisei qadesho. 
psalms 47:9	nediwei ‘amim ne’esafu ‘am ’elohei ’awraham ki leilohim maginei ’erets me’od na‘alah. 
psalms 48:1	shir mizmor liwnei qorakh. gadol yhoh umehulal me’od be‘ir ’eloheinu har qadesho. 
psalms 48:2	yefeh nof mesos kal ha’arets har tsiyon yarketei tsafon qiryat melekh raw. 
psalms 48:3	’elohim be’armenoteha noda‘ lemisgaw. 
psalms 48:4	ki hineh hamelakhim no‘adu ‘aweru yakhdav. 
psalms 48:5	hemah ra’u ken tamahu niwhalu nekhpazu. 
psalms 48:6	re‘adah ’akhazatam sham khil kayoleidah. 
psalms 48:7	beruakh qadim teshaber ’oniyot tarshish. 
psalms 48:8	ka’asher shama‘nu ken ra’inu be‘ir yhoh tsewa’ot be‘ir ’eloheinu ’elohim yekhoneha ‘ad ‘olam selah. 
psalms 48:9	diminu ’elohim khasdekha beqerew heikhalekha. 
psalms 48:10	keshimkha ’elohim ken tehilatekha ‘al qatsvei ’erets tsedeq male’ah yeminekha. 
psalms 48:11	yismakh har tsiyon tageilenah benot yehudah lema‘an mishpatekha. 
psalms 48:12	sobu tsiyon vehaqifuha sifru migdaleha. 
psalms 48:13	shitu libekhem lekheilah pasegu ’armenoteha lema‘an tesaperu ledor ’akharon. 
psalms 48:14	ki zeh ’elohim ’eloheinu ‘olam va‘ed hu yenahageinu ‘al mut. 
psalms 49:1	lamnatseiakh liwnei qorakh mizmor. shim‘u zot kal ha‘amim ha’azinu kal yoshewei khaled. 
psalms 49:2	gam benei ’adam gam benei ’ish yakhad ‘ashir ve’ewyon. 
psalms 49:3	pi yedaber khakhemot vehagut libi tewunot. 
psalms 49:4	’ateh lemashal ’azeni ’eftakh bekhinor khidati. 
psalms 49:5	lamah ’ira bimei ra‘ ‘avon ‘aqeiwai yesubeini. 
psalms 49:6	habotekhim ‘al kheilam uwerow ‘asheram yithalalu. 
psalms 49:7	’akh lo fadoh yifdeh ’ish lo yiten leilohim kafero. 
psalms 49:8	veyeiqar pidyon nafsham vekhadal le‘olam. 
psalms 49:9	vikhi ‘od lanetsakh lo yir’eh hashakhat. 
psalms 49:10	ki yir’eh khakhamim yamutu yakhad kesil vawa‘ar yoweidu ve‘azewu la’akheirim kheilam. 
psalms 49:11	qirbam bateimo le‘olam mishkenotam ledor vador qare’u wishmotam ‘alei ’adamot. 
psalms 49:12	ve’adam biqar bal yalin nimshal kabeheimot nidmu. 
psalms 49:13	zeh darkam keisel lamo ve’akhareihem befihem yirtsu selah. 
psalms 49:14	katson lish’ol shatu mavet yir‘em vayirdu wam yesharim laboqer vetsiram vetsuram lewalot she’ol mizewul lo. 
psalms 49:15	’akh ’elohim yifdeh nafshi miyad she’ol ki yiqakheini selah. 
psalms 49:16	’al tira ki ya‘ashir ’ish ki yirbeh kewod beito. 
psalms 49:17	ki lo wemoto yiqakh hakol lo yeired ’akharav kewodo. 
psalms 49:18	ki nafsho bekhayav yewarekh veyodukha ki teitiw lakh. 
psalms 49:19	tawo ‘ad dor ’awotav ‘ad neitsakh lo yir’u ’or. 
psalms 49:20	’adam biqar velo yawin nimshal kabeheimot nidmu. 
psalms 50:1	mizmor le’asaf ’el ’elohim yhoh diber vayiqra ’arets mimizrakhoshe mesh ‘ad mewo’o. 
psalms 50:2	mitsiyon mikhlal yofi ’elohim hofia‘. 
psalms 50:3	yawo ’eloheinu ve’al yekherash ’esh lefanav tokhel usewiwav nis‘arah me’od. 
psalms 50:4	yiqra ’el hashamayim mei‘al ve’el ha’arets ladin ‘amo. 
psalms 50:5	’isfu li khasidai koretei weriti ‘alei zawakh. 
psalms 50:6	vayagidu shamayim tsidqo ki ’elohim shofet hu selah. 
psalms 50:7	shim‘ah ‘ami va’adabeirah yisra’el ve’a‘idah bakh ’elohim ’elohekha ’anokhi. 
psalms 50:8	lo ‘al zewakhekha ’okhikhekha ve‘olotekha lenegdi tamid. 
psalms 50:9	lo ’eqakh mibeitekha far mimikhle’otekha ‘atudim. 
psalms 50:10	ki li khal khayto ya‘ar beheimot beharei ’alef. 
psalms 50:11	yada‘ti kal ‘of harim veziz dai ‘imadi. 
psalms 50:12	’im ’er‘aw lo ’omar lakh ki li teiwel umelo’ah. 
psalms 50:13	ha’okhal besar ’abirim vedam ‘atudim ’eshteh. 
psalms 50:14	zewakh leilohim todah veshalem le‘elyon nedarekha. 
psalms 50:15	uqera’eini beyom tsarah ’akhaletskha utekhabedeini. 
psalms 50:16	velarasha‘ ’amar ’elohim mah lekha lesaper khuqai vatisa weriti ‘alei fikha. 
psalms 50:17	ve’atah saneita musar vatashlekh dewarai ’akharekha. 
psalms 50:18	’im ra’ita ganaw vatirets ‘imo ve‘im mena’afim khelqekha. 
psalms 50:19	pikha shalakhta wera‘ah uleshonkha tatsmid mirmah. 
psalms 50:20	teishew be’akhikha tedaber bewen ’imekha titen dofi. 
psalms 50:21	’eleh ‘asita vehekherashti dimita heyot ’ehyeh khamokha ’okhikhakha ve’e‘erkhah le‘einekha. 
psalms 50:22	binu na zot shokhekhei ’eloah pen ’etrof ve’en matsil. 
psalms 50:23	zoweiakh todah yekhabedaneni vesam derekh ’ar’enu beyeisha‘ ’elohim. 
psalms 51:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. bewo ’eilav natan hanawi ka’asher ba ’el bat shawa‘. khaneini ’elohim kekhasdekha kerow rakhamekha mekheh fesha‘ai. 
psalms 51:2	harbeh herew kabeseini mei‘avoni umeikhatati tahareini. 
psalms 51:3	ki fesha‘ai ’ani ’eida‘ vekhatati negdi tamid. 
psalms 51:4	lekha lewadekha khatati vehara‘ be‘einekha ‘asiti lema‘an titsdaq bedawerekha tizkeh weshafetekha. 
psalms 51:5	hen be‘avon kholaleti uwekhet yekhematni ’imi. 
psalms 51:6	hen ’emet khafatsta watukhot uwesatum khakhmah todi‘eini. 
psalms 51:7	tekhate’eini we’eizow ve’ethar tekhabeseini umisheleg ’albin. 
psalms 51:8	tashmi‘eini sason vesimkhah tageilenah ‘atsamot dikita. 
psalms 51:9	haster panekha meikhata’ai vekhal ‘avonotai mekheh. 
psalms 51:10	lew tahor bera li ’elohim veruakh nakhon khadesh beqirbi. 
psalms 51:11	’al tashlikheini milefanekha veruakh qadshekha ’al tiqakh mimeni. 
psalms 51:12	hashiwah li seson yish‘ekha veruakh nediwah tismekheini. 
psalms 51:13	’alamedah foshe‘im derakhekha vekhata’im ’eilekha yashuwu. 
psalms 51:14	hatsileini midamim ’elohim ’elohei teshu‘ati teranen leshoni tsidqatekha. 
psalms 51:15	’adonai sefatai tiftakh ufi yagid tehilatekha. 
psalms 51:16	ki lo takhpots zewakh ve’eteinah ‘olah lo tirtseh. 
psalms 51:17	ziwkhei ’elohim ruakh nishbarah lew nishbar venidkeh ’elohim lo tiwzeh. 
psalms 51:18	heitiwah wirtsonkha ’et tsiyon tiwneh khomot yerushalim. 
psalms 51:19	’az takhpots ziwkhei tsedeq ‘olah vekhalil ’az ya‘alu ‘al mizbakhakha farim. 
psalms 52:1	lamnatseiakh maskil ledavid. bewo do’eg ha’adomi vayaged lesha’ul vayomer lo ba david ’el bet ’akhimelekh. mah tithalel bera‘ah hagibor khesed ’el kal hayom. 
psalms 52:2	havot takhshow leshonekha keta‘ar melutash ‘oseh remiyah. 
psalms 52:3	’ahawta ra‘ mitow sheqer midaber tsedeq selah. 
psalms 52:4	’ahawta khal diwrei wala‘ leshon mirmah. 
psalms 52:5	gam ’el yitatsekha lanetsakh yakhtekha veyisakhakha mei’ohel vesheireshkha mei’erets khayim selah. 
psalms 52:6	veyir’u tsadiqim veyira’u ve‘alav yiskhaqu. 
psalms 52:7	hineh hagewer lo yasim ’elohim ma‘uzo vayiwtakh berow ‘ashero ya‘oz behavato. 
psalms 52:8	va’ani kezayit ra‘anan bewet ’elohim batakhti wekhesed ’elohim ‘olam va‘ed. 
psalms 52:9	’odkha le‘olam ki ‘asita va’aqaveh shimkha khi tow neged khasidekha. 
psalms 53:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al makhalat maskil ledavid. ’amar nawal belibo ’en ’elohim hishkhitu vehit‘iwu ‘avel ’en ‘oseh tow. 
psalms 53:2	’elohim mishamayim hishqif ‘al benei ’adam lir’ot hayesh maskil doresh ’et ’elohim. 
psalms 53:3	kulo sag yakhdav ne’elakhu ’en ‘oseh tow ’en gam ’ekhad. 
psalms 53:4	halo yade‘u po‘alei ’aven ’okhelei ‘ami ’akhelu lekhem ’elohim lo qara’u. 
psalms 53:5	sham pakhadu fakhad lo hayah fakhad ki ’elohim pizar ‘atsmot khonakh hewishotah ki ’elohim me’asam. 
psalms 53:6	mi yiten mitsiyon yeshu‘ot yisra’el beshuw ’elohim shewut ‘amo yagel ya‘aqow yismakh yisra’el. 
psalms 54:1	lamnatseiakh binginot maskil ledavid. bewo hazifim vayomeru lesha’ul halo david mistater ‘imanu. ’elohim beshimkha hoshi‘eini uwigwuratekha tedineini. 
psalms 54:2	’elohim shema‘ tefilati ha’azinah le’imrei fi. 
psalms 54:3	ki zarim qamu ‘alai ve‘aritsim biqshu nafshi lo samu ’elohim lenegdam selah. 
psalms 54:4	hineh ’elohim ‘ozer li ’adonai besomekhei nafshi. 
psalms 54:5	yashow yashiw hara‘ leshorerai ba’amitekha hatsmitem. 
psalms 54:6	bindawah ’ezbekhah lakh ’odeh shimkha yhoh ki tow. 
psalms 54:7	ki mikal tsarah hitsilani uwe’oyewai ra’atah ‘eini. 
psalms 55:1	lamnatseiakh binginot maskil ledavid. ha’azinah ’elohim tefilati ve’al tit‘alam mitekhinati. 
psalms 55:2	haqshiwah li va‘aneini ’arid besikhi ve’ahimah. 
psalms 55:3	miqol ’oyew mipenei ‘aqat rasha‘ ki yamitu ‘alai ’aven uwe’af yistemuni. 
psalms 55:4	libi yakhil beqirbi ve’eimot mavet nafelu ‘alai. 
psalms 55:5	yir’ah vara‘ad yawo wi vatekhaseini palatsut. 
psalms 55:6	va’omar mi yiten li ’eiwer kayonah ’a‘ufah ve’eshkonah. 
psalms 55:7	hineh ’arkhiq nedod ’alin bamidbar selah. 
psalms 55:8	’akhishah miflat li meiruakh so‘ah misa‘ar. 
psalms 55:9	bala‘ ’adonai palag leshonam ki ra’iti khamas veriw ba‘ir. 
psalms 55:10	yomam valaylah yesowwuha ‘al khomoteha ve’aven ve‘amal beqirbah. 
psalms 55:11	havot beqirbah velo yamish meirekhowah tokh umirmah. 
psalms 55:12	ki lo ’oyew yekharefeini ve’esa lo mesan’i ‘alai higdil ve’esater mimenu. 
psalms 55:13	ve’atah ’enosh ke‘erki ’alufi umeyuda‘i. 
psalms 55:14	’asher yakhdav namtiq sod bewet ’elohim nehalekh beragesh. 
psalms 55:15	yashimavet yashi mavet ‘aleimo yeiredu she’ol khayim ki ra‘ot bimguram beqirbam. 
psalms 55:16	’ani ’el ’elohim ’eqra yhoh yoshi‘eini. 
psalms 55:17	‘erew vawoqer vetsahorayim ’asikhah ve’ehemeh vayishma‘ qoli. 
psalms 55:18	padah weshalom nafshi miqaraw li ki werabim hayu ‘imadi. 
psalms 55:19	yishma‘ ’el veya‘anem veyoshew qedem selah ’asher ’en khalifot lamo velo yare’u ’elohim. 
psalms 55:20	shalakh yadav bishlomav khilel berito. 
psalms 55:21	khalequ makhma’ot piv uqaraw libo raku dewarav mishemen vehemah fetikhot. 
psalms 55:22	hashlekh ‘al yhoh yehawekha vehu yekhalkelekha lo yiten le‘olam mot latsadiq. 
psalms 55:23	ve’atah ’elohim toridem liw’er shakhat ’anshei damim umirmah lo yekhetsu yemeihem va’ani ’ewtakh bakh. 
psalms 56:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al yonat ’eilem rekhoqim ledavid mikhtam be’ekhoz ’oto felishtim begat. khaneini ’elohim ki she’afani ’enosh kal hayom lokhem yilkhatseini. 
psalms 56:2	sha’afu vrai kal hayom ki rabim lokhamim li marom. 
psalms 56:3	yom ’ira ’ani ’eilekha ’ewtakh. 
psalms 56:4	beilohim ’ahalel dewaro beilohim batakhti lo ’ira mah ya‘aseh wasar li. 
psalms 56:5	kal hayom dewarai ye‘atseiwu ‘alai kal makhshewotam lara‘. 
psalms 56:6	yaguru yatspinu yitsponu hemah ‘aqeiwai yishmoru ka’asher qivu nafshi. 
psalms 56:7	‘al ’aven palet lamo be’af ‘amim hored ’elohim. 
psalms 56:8	nodi safartah ’atah simah dim‘ati wenodekha halo besifratekha. 
psalms 56:9	’az yashuwu ’oywai ’akhor beyom ’eqra zeh yada‘ti ki ’elohim li. 
psalms 56:10	beilohim ’ahalel dawar yhoh ’ahalel dawar. 
psalms 56:11	beilohim batakhti lo ’ira mah ya‘aseh ’adam li. 
psalms 56:12	‘alai ’elohim nedarekha ’ashalem todot lakh. 
psalms 56:13	ki hitsalta nafshi mimavet halo raglai midekhi lehithalekh lifnei ’elohim be’or hakhayim. 
psalms 57:1	lamnatseiakh ’al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam bewarekho mipeneisha ’ul bame‘arah. khaneini ’elohim khaneini ki wekha khasayah nafshi uwetsel kenafekha ’ekhseh ‘ad ya‘awor havot. 
psalms 57:2	’eqra leilohim ‘elyon la’el gomer ‘alai. 
psalms 57:3	yishlakh mishamayim veyoshi‘eini kheiref sho’afi selah yishlakh ’elohim khasdo va’amito. 
psalms 57:4	nafshi betokh lewa’im ’eshkewah lohatim benei ’adam neihem khanit vekhitsim uleshonam kherew khadah. 
psalms 57:5	rumah ‘al hashamayim ’elohim ‘al kal ha’arets kewodekha. 
psalms 57:6	reshet heikhinu lif‘amai kafaf nafshi karu lefanai shikhah nafelu wetokhah selah. 
psalms 57:7	nakhon libi ’elohim nakhon libi ’ashirah va’azameirah. 
psalms 57:8	‘urah khewodi ‘urah haneiwel vekhinor ’a‘irah shakhar. 
psalms 57:9	’odkha wa‘amim ’adonai ’azamerkha bal ’umim. 
psalms 57:10	ki gadol ‘ad shamayim khasdekha ve‘ad shekhaqim ’amitekha. 
psalms 57:11	rumah ‘al shamayim ’elohim ‘al kal ha’arets kewodekha. 
psalms 58:1	lamnatseiakh ’al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam. ha’umnam ’eilem tsedeq tedabeirun meisharim tishpetu benei ’adam. 
psalms 58:2	’af belew ‘olot tif‘alun ba’arets khamas yedeikhem tefaleisun. 
psalms 58:3	zoru resha‘im meirakhem ta‘u mibeten dowerei khazaw. 
psalms 58:4	khamat lamo kidmut khamat nakhash kemo feten kheiresh ya’tem ’azeno. 
psalms 58:5	’asher lo yishma‘ leqol melakhashim khower khawarim mekhukam. 
psalms 58:6	’elohim haras shineimo befimo malte‘ot kefirim netots yhoh. 
psalms 58:7	yima’asu khemo mayim yithalekhu lamo yidrokh khitso khitsav kemo yitmolalu. 
psalms 58:8	kemo belul temes yahalokh neifel ’eishet bal khazu shamesh. 
psalms 58:9	beterem yawinu siroteikhem ’atad kemo khai kemo kharon yis‘arenu. 
psalms 58:10	yismakh tsadiq ki khazah naqam pe‘amav yirkhats bedam harasha‘. 
psalms 58:11	veyomar ’adam ’akh peri latsadiq ’akh yesh ’elohim shofetim ba’arets. 
psalms 59:1	lamnatseiakh ’al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam bishloakh sha’ul vayishmeru ’et habayit lahamito. hatsileini mei’oyewai ’elohai mimitqomai tesageweini. 
psalms 59:2	hatsileini mipo‘alei ’aven umei’anshei damim hoshi‘eini. 
psalms 59:3	ki hineh ’arewu lenafshi yaguru ‘alai ‘azim lo fish‘i velo khatati yhoh. 
psalms 59:4	beli ‘avon yerutsun veyikonanu ‘urah liqrati ure’eh. 
psalms 59:5	ve’atah yhoh ’elohim tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el haqitsah lifqod kal hagoyim ’al takhon kal bogedei ’aven selah. 
psalms 59:6	yashuwu la‘erew yehemu khakalew visowwu ‘ir. 
psalms 59:7	hineh yabi‘un befihem kharawot besiftoteihem ki mi shomeia‘. 
psalms 59:8	ve’atah yhoh tiskhaq lamo til‘ag lekhal goyim. 
psalms 59:9	‘uzo ’eilekha ’eshmorah ki ’elohim misgabi. 
psalms 59:10	’elohei khasdo khasdi yeqademeini ’elohim yar’eini weshorerai. 
psalms 59:11	’al tahargem pen yishkekhu ‘ami hani‘eimo wekheilekha vehorideimo magineinu ’adonai. 
psalms 59:12	khatat pimo dewar sefateimo veyilakhedu wig’onam umei’alah umikakhash yesapeiru. 
psalms 59:13	kaleh wekheimah kaleh ve’eineimo veyeide‘u ki ’elohim moshel beya‘aqow le’afsei ha’arets selah. 
psalms 59:14	veyashuwu la‘erew yehemu khakalew visowwu ‘ir. 
psalms 59:15	hemah yenu‘un yeni‘un le’ekhol ’im lo yisbe‘u vayalinu. 
psalms 59:16	va’ani ’ashir ‘uzekha va’aranen laboqer khasdekha ki hayita misgaw li umanos beyom tsar li. 
psalms 59:17	‘uzi ’eilekha ’azameirah ki ’elohim misgabi ’elohei khasdi. 
psalms 60:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al shushan ‘eidut mikhtam ledavid lelamed. behatsoto ’et ’aram naharayim ve’et ’aram tsowah vayashaw yo’aw vayakh ’et ’edom begei melakh shenem ‘asar ’alef. ’elohim zenakhtanu feratstanu ’anafta teshowew lanu. 
psalms 60:2	hir‘ashtah ’erets petsamtah refah shewareha khi matah. 
psalms 60:3	hir’itah ‘amekha qashah hishqitanu yayin tar‘eilah. 
psalms 60:4	natatah lirei’ekha nes lehitnoses mipenei qoshet selah. 
psalms 60:5	lema‘an yeikhaletsun yedidekha hoshi‘ah yeminekha va‘aneinu va‘aneini. 
psalms 60:6	’elohim diber beqadesho ’e‘lozah ’akhaleqah shekhem ve‘eimeq sukot ’amaded. 
psalms 60:7	li gil‘ad veli menasheh ve’efrayim ma‘oz roshi yehudah mekhoqeqi. 
psalms 60:8	mo’aw sir rakhtsi ‘al ’edom ’ashlikh na‘ali ‘alai peleshet hitro‘a‘i. 
psalms 60:9	mi yowileini ‘ir matsor mi nakhani ‘ad ’edom. 
psalms 60:10	halo ’atah ’elohim zenakhtanu velo teitsei ’elohim betsiw’oteinu. 
psalms 60:11	hawah lanu ‘ezrat mitsar veshav teshu‘at ’adam 
psalms 60:12	beilohim na‘aseh khayil vehu yawus tsareinu. 
psalms 61:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al neginat ledavid. shim‘ah ’elohim rinati haqshiwah tefilati. 
psalms 61:2	miqtseh ha’arets ’eilekha ’eqra ba‘atof libi betsur yarum mimeni tankheini. 
psalms 61:3	ki hayita makhseh li migdal ‘oz mipenei ’oyew. 
psalms 61:4	’agurah we’ahalekha ‘olamim ’ekheseh weseiter kenafekha selah. 
psalms 61:5	ki ’atah ’elohim shama‘ta lindarai natata yerushat yir’ei shemekha. 
psalms 61:6	yamim ‘al yemei melekh tosif notav kemo dor vador. 
psalms 61:7	yeishew ‘olam lifnei ’elohim khesed ve’emet man yintseruhu. 
psalms 61:8	ken ’azamerah shimkha la‘ad leshalemi nedarai yom yom. 
psalms 62:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al yedutun mizmor ledavid. ’akh ’el ’elohim dumiyah nafshi mimenu yeshu‘ati. 
psalms 62:2	’akh hu tsuri vishu‘ati misgabi lo ’emot rabah. 
psalms 62:3	‘ad ’anah tehotu ‘al ’ish teratsekhu khulekhem keqir natui gader hadekhuyah. 
psalms 62:4	’akh mise’eito ya‘atsu lehadiakh yirtsu khazaw befiv yewareikhu uweqirbam yeqalu selah. 
psalms 62:5	’akh leilohim domi nafshi ki mimenu tiqvati. 
psalms 62:6	’akh hu tsuri vishu‘ati misgabi lo ’emot. 
psalms 62:7	‘al ’elohim yish‘i ukhewodi tsur ‘uzi makhsi beilohim. 
psalms 62:8	bitkhu wo wekhal ‘et ‘am shifkhu lefanav lewawkhem ’elohim makhaseh lanu selah. 
psalms 62:9	’akh hewel benei ’adam kazaw benei ’ish bemozenayim la‘alot hemah meihewel yakhad. 
psalms 62:10	’al tiwtekhu we‘osheq uwegazel ’al tehbalu khayil ki yanuw ’al tashitu lew. 
psalms 62:11	’akhat diber ’elohim shetayim zu shama‘eti ki ‘oz leilohim. 
psalms 62:12	ulekha ’adonai khased ki ’atah teshalem le’ish kema‘aseihu. 
psalms 63:1	mizmor ledavid bihyoto bemidbar yehudah. ’elohim ’eili ’atah ’ashakhareka tsame’ah lekha nafshi kamah lekha wesari be’erets tsiyah ve‘ayef beli mayim. 
psalms 63:2	ken baqodesh khazitikha lir’ot ‘uzekha ukhewodekha. 
psalms 63:3	ki tow khasdekha meikhayim sefatai yeshabekhunekha. 
psalms 63:4	ken ’awarekhkha wekhayai beshimkha ’esa khapai. 
psalms 63:5	kemo kheilew vadeshen tisba‘ nafshi vesiftei renanot yehalel pi. 
psalms 63:6	’im zekhartikha ‘al yetsu‘ai be’ashmurot ’ehgeh bakh. 
psalms 63:7	ki hayita ‘ezratah li uwetsel kenafekha ’aranen. 
psalms 63:8	daweqah nafshi ’akharekha bi tamekhah yeminekha. 
psalms 63:9	vehemah lesho’ah yewaqshu nafshi yawo’u betakhtiyot ha’arets. 
psalms 63:10	yagiruhu ‘al yedei kharew menat shu‘alim yihyu. 
psalms 63:11	vehamelekh yismakh beilohim yithalel kal hanishba‘ bo ki yisakher pi dowrei shaqer. 
psalms 64:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. shema‘ ’elohim qoli wesikhi mipakhad ’oyew titsor khayai. 
psalms 64:2	tastireini misod merei‘im meirigshat po‘alei ’aven. 
psalms 64:3	’asher shanenu khakherew leshonam darekhu khitsam dawar mar. 
psalms 64:4	lirot bamistarim tam pit’om yoruhu velo yira’u. 
psalms 64:5	yekhazequ lamo dawar ra‘ yesaperu litmon moqshim ’ameru mi yir’eh lamo. 
psalms 64:6	yakhpesu ‘olot tamnu kheifes mekhupas veqerew ’ish velew ‘amoq. 
psalms 64:7	vayorem ’elohim khets pit’om hayu makotam. 
psalms 64:8	vayakhshiluhu ‘aleimo leshonam yitnodadu kal ro’eh wam. 
psalms 64:9	vayire’u kal ’adam vayagidu po‘al ’elohim uma‘aseihu hiskilu. 
psalms 64:10	yismakh tsadiq yhoh vekhasah wo veyithalelu kal yishrei lew. 
psalms 65:1	lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid shir. lekha dumiyah tehilah ’elohim betsiyon ulekha yeshulam neder. 
psalms 65:2	shomeia‘ tefilah ‘adekha kal basar yawo’u. 
psalms 65:3	diwrei ‘avonot gaweru meni pesha‘einu ’atah tekhaperem. 
psalms 65:4	’ashrei tiwkhar uteqarew yishkon khatseirekha nisbe‘ah betuw beitekha qedosh heikhalekha. 
psalms 65:5	nora’ot betsedeq ta‘aneinu ’elohei yish‘einu miwtakh kal qatsvei ’erets veyam rekhoqim. 
psalms 65:6	meikhin harim bekhokho ne’zar bigwurah. 
psalms 65:7	mashbiakh she’on yamim she’on galeihem vahamon le’umim. 
psalms 65:8	vayire’u yoshewei qetsavot mei’ototekha motsa’ei woqer va‘erew tarnin. 
psalms 65:9	paqadta ha’arets vateshoqeqeha rabat ta‘sherenah peleg ’elohim malei mayim takhin deganam ki khen tekhineha. 
psalms 65:10	telameha raveh nakhet gedudeha birwiwim temogegenah tsimkhah tewarekh. 
psalms 65:11	‘itarta shenat towatekha uma‘galekha yir‘afun dashen. 
psalms 65:12	yir‘afu ne’ot midbar vegil gewa‘ot takhgorenah. 
psalms 65:13	laweshu kharim hatson va‘amaqim ya‘atfu war yitro‘a‘u ’af yashiru. 
psalms 66:1	lamnatseiakh shir mizmor hari‘u leilohim kal ha’arets. 
psalms 66:2	zameru khewod shemo simu khawod tehilato. 
psalms 66:3	’imru leilohim mah nora ma‘asekha berow ‘uzekha yekhakhashu lekha ’oyewekha. 
psalms 66:4	kal ha’arets yishtakhavu lekha vizameru lakh yezameru shimkha selah. 
psalms 66:5	lekhu ure’u mif‘alot ’elohim nora ‘alilah ‘al benei ’adam. 
psalms 66:6	hafakh yam leyabashah banahar ya‘awru weragel m nismekhah bo. 
psalms 66:7	moshel bigwurato ‘olam ‘einav bagoyim titspenah hasorim ’al yarimu yarumu lamo selah. 
psalms 66:8	barekhu ‘amim ’eloheinu vehashmi‘u qol tehilato. 
psalms 66:9	hasam nafsheinu bakhayim velo natan lamot ragleinu. 
psalms 66:10	ki wekhantanu ’elohim tseraftanu kitsraf kasef. 
psalms 66:11	haweitanu wametsudah samta mu‘aqah wemateneinu. 
psalms 66:12	hirkawta ’enosh lerosheinu banu wa’esh uwamayim vatotsi’einu larevayah. 
psalms 66:13	’awo weitekha we‘olot ’ashalem lekha nedarai. 
psalms 66:14	’asher patsu sefatai vediber pi batsar li. 
psalms 66:15	‘olot meikhim ’a‘aleh lakh ‘im qetoret ’eilim ’e‘eseh waqar ‘im ‘atudim selah. 
psalms 66:16	lekhu shim‘u va’asaperah kal yir’ei ’elohim ’asher ‘asah lenafshi. 
psalms 66:17	’eilav pi qarati veromam takhat leshoni. 
psalms 66:18	’aven ’im ra’iti welibi lo yishma‘ ’adonai. 
psalms 66:19	’akhen shama‘ ’elohim hiqshiw beqol tefilati. 
psalms 66:20	barukh ’elohim ’asher lo heisir tefilati vekhasdo mei’iti. 
psalms 67:1	lamnatsekh binginot mizmor shir. ’elohim yekhaneinu viwarekheinu ya’er panav ’itanu selah. 
psalms 67:2	lada‘at ba’arets darkekha bekhal goyim yeshu‘atekha. 
psalms 67:3	yodukha ‘amim ’elohim yodukha ‘amim kulam. 
psalms 67:4	yismekhu viranenu le’umim ki tishpot ‘amim mishor ule’umim ba’arets tankhem selah. 
psalms 67:5	yodukha ‘amim ’elohim yodukha ‘amim kulam. 
psalms 67:6	’erets natenah yewulah yewarekheinu ’elohim ’eloheinu. 
psalms 67:7	yewarekheinu ’elohim veyire’u ’oto kal ’afsei ’arets. 
psalms 68:1	lamnatseiakh ledavid mizmor shir. yaqum ’elohim yafutsu ’oywav veyanusu mesan’av mipanav. 
psalms 68:2	kehindof ‘ashan tindof kehimes donag mipenei ’esh yowedu resha‘im mipenei ’elohim. 
psalms 68:3	vetsadiqim yismekhu ya‘altsu lifnei ’elohim veyasisu wesimkhah. 
psalms 68:4	shiru leilohim zameru shemo solu larokhew ba‘arawot beyah shemo ve‘ilzu lefanav. 
psalms 68:5	’awi yetomim vedayan ’almanot ’elohim bim‘on qadesho. 
psalms 68:6	’elohim moshiw yekhidim baytah motsi ’asirim bakosharot ’akh sorarim shakhenu tsekhikhah. 
psalms 68:7	’elohim betseitekha lifnei ‘amekha betsa‘dekha wishimon selah. 
psalms 68:8	’erets ra‘ashah ’af shamayim natefu mipenei ’elohim zeh sinai mipenei ’elohim ’elohei yisra’el. 
psalms 68:9	geshem nedawot tanif ’elohim nakhalatekha venil’ah ’atah khonantah. 
psalms 68:10	khayatekha yashewu wah takhin betowatekha le‘ani ’elohim. 
psalms 68:11	’adonai yiten ’omer hamwaserot tsawa raw. 
psalms 68:12	malkhei tsewa’ot yidodun yidodun unevat bayit tekhaleq shalal. 
psalms 68:13	’im tishkewun ben shefatayim kanfei yonah nekhpah wakesef ve’ewroteha biraqraq kharuts. 
psalms 68:14	befares shadai melakhim bah tashleg betsalmon. 
psalms 68:15	har ’elohim har bashan har gawnunim har bashan. 
psalms 68:16	lamah teratsedun harim gawnunim hahar khamad ’elohim leshiwto ’af yhoh yishkon lanetsakh. 
psalms 68:17	rekhew ’elohim ribotayim ’alfei shin’an ’adonai wam sinai baqodesh. 
psalms 68:18	‘alita lamarom shawita shewi laqakhta matanot ba’adam ve’af sorim lishkon yah ’elohim. 
psalms 68:19	barukh ’adonai yom yom ya‘amas lanu ha’el yeshu‘ateinu selah. 
psalms 68:20	ha’el lanu ’el lemosha‘ot yhoh ’adonai lamavet totsa’ot. 
psalms 68:21	’akh ’elohim yimkhats rosh ’oyewav qadeqod sei‘ar mithalekh ba’ashamav. 
psalms 68:22	’amar ’adonai mibashan ’ashiw ’ashiw mimetsulot yam. 
psalms 68:23	lema‘an timkhats raglekha bedam leshon kelawekha mei’oyewim mineihu. 
psalms 68:24	ra’u halikhotekha ’elohim halikhot ’eili malki waqodesh. 
psalms 68:25	qidemu rim ’akhar nogenim betokh ‘alamot tofeifot. 
psalms 68:26	bemaqheilot barekhu ’elohim yhoh mimeqor yisra’el. 
psalms 68:27	sham binyamin tsa‘ir rodem sarei yehudah rigmatam sarei zewulun sarei naftali. 
psalms 68:28	tsivah ’elohekha ‘uzekha ‘uzah ’elohim zu pa‘alta lanu. 
psalms 68:29	meiheikhalekha ‘al yerushalim lekha yowilu melakhim shai. 
psalms 68:30	ge‘ar khayat qaneh ‘adat ’abirim be‘eglei ‘amim mitrapes beratsei khasef bizar ‘amim qerawot yekhpatsu. 
psalms 68:31	ye’etayu khashmanim mini mitsrayim kush tarits yadav leilohim. 
psalms 68:32	mamlekhot ha’arets shiru leilohim zameru ’adonai selah. 
psalms 68:33	larokhew bishmei shemei qedem hen yiten beqolo qol ‘oz. 
psalms 68:34	tenu ‘oz leilohim ‘al yisra’el ga’avato ve‘uzo bashekhaqim. 
psalms 68:35	nora ’elohim mimiqdashekha ’el yisra’el hu noten ‘oz veta‘atsumot la‘am barukh ’elohim. 
psalms 69:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al shoshanim ledavid. hoshi‘eini ’elohim ki wa’u mayim ‘ad nafesh. 
psalms 69:2	tawa‘ti biven metsulah ve’en ma‘omad bati wema‘amaqei mayim veshibolet shetafateni. 
psalms 69:3	yaga‘ti weqare’i nikhar geroni kalu ‘einai meyakhel leilohai. 
psalms 69:4	rabu misa‘arot roshi sone’ai khinam ‘atsemu matsmitai ’oyewai sheqer ’asher lo gazalti ’az ’ashiw. 
psalms 69:5	’elohim ’atah yada‘ta le’ivalti ve’ashmotai mimekha lo nikhkhadu. 
psalms 69:6	’al yeiwoshu wi qoekha ’adonai yhoh tsewa’ot ’al yikalemu wi mewaqshekha ’elohei yisra’el. 
psalms 69:7	ki ‘alekha nasati kherpah kisetah khelimah fanai. 
psalms 69:8	muzar hayiti le’ekhai venakheri liwnei ’imi. 
psalms 69:9	ki qin’at beitekha ’akhalateni vekherpot khorfekha nafelu ‘alai. 
psalms 69:10	va’ewkeh watsom nafshi vatehi lakharafot li. 
psalms 69:11	va’etenah lewushi saq va’ehi lahem lemashal. 
psalms 69:12	yasikhu wi yoshewei sha‘ar uneginot shotei sheikhar. 
psalms 69:13	va’ani tefilati lekha yhoh ‘et ratson ’elohim beraw khasdekha ‘aneini be’emet yish‘ekha.
