psalms 69:14	hatsileini mitit ve’al ’etba‘ah ’inatselah misone’ai umima‘amaqei mayim. 
psalms 69:15	’al tishtefeini shibolet mayim ve’al tiwla‘eini metsulah ve’al te’tar ‘alai be’er piha. 
psalms 69:16	‘aneini yhoh ki tow khasdekha kerow rakhamekha peneh ’eilai. 
psalms 69:17	ve’al taster panekha mei‘awdekha ki tsar li maher ‘aneini. 
psalms 69:18	qarewah ’el nafshi ge’alah lema‘an ’oyewai pedeini. 
psalms 69:19	’atah yada‘ta kherpati uwasheti ukhelimati negdekha kal tsorai. 
psalms 69:20	kherpah shawerah libi va’anushah va’aqaveh lanud va’ayin velamnakhamim velo matsati. 
psalms 69:21	vayitenu bewaruti rosh velitsma’i yashquni khomets. 
psalms 69:22	yehi shulkhanam lifneihem lefakh velishlomim lemoqesh. 
psalms 69:23	tekhshakhnah ‘eineihem meire’ot umateneihem tamid ham‘ad. 
psalms 69:24	shefakh ‘aleihem za‘mekha vakharon ’apekha yasigem. 
psalms 69:25	tehi tiratam neshamah be’aholeihem ’al yehi yoshew. 
psalms 69:26	ki ’atah ’asher hikita radafu ve’el makh’ow khalalekha yesapeiru. 
psalms 69:27	tenah ‘avon ‘al ‘avonam ve’al yawo’u betsidqatekha. 
psalms 69:28	yimakhu miseifer khayim ve‘im tsadiqim ’al yikateiwu. 
psalms 69:29	va’ani ‘ani vekho’ew yeshu‘atekha ’elohim tesageweini. 
psalms 69:30	’ahalah shem ’elohim beshir va’agadelenu wetodah. 
psalms 69:31	vetitaw yhoh mishor par maqrin mafris. 
psalms 69:32	ra’u ‘anavim yismakhu doreshei ’elohim vikhi lewawkhem. 
psalms 69:33	ki shomeia‘ ’el ’ewyonim yhoh ve’et ’asirav lo wazah. 
psalms 69:34	yehaleluhu shamayim va’arets yamim vekhal romes bam. 
psalms 69:35	ki ’elohim yoshia‘ tsiyon veyiwneh ‘arei yehudah veyashewu m vireishuha. 
psalms 69:36	vezera‘ ‘awadav yinkhaluha ve’ohawei mo yishkenu wah. 
psalms 70:1	lamnatseiakh ledavid lehazkir. ’elohim lehatsileini yhoh le‘ezrati khushah. 
psalms 70:2	yeiwoshu veyakhperu mewaqshei nafshi yisogu ’akhor veyikalemu khafeitsei ra‘ati. 
psalms 70:3	yashuwu ‘al ‘eiqew bashetam ha’omerim he’akh he’akh. 
psalms 70:4	yasisu veyismekhu bekha kal mewaqshekha veyomeru tamid yigdal ’elohim ’ohawei yeshu‘atekha. 
psalms 70:5	va’ani ‘ani ve’ewyon ’elohim khushah li ‘ezri umefalti ’atah yhoh ’al te’akhar. 
psalms 71:1	bekha yhoh khasiti ’al ’eiwoshah le‘olam. 
psalms 71:2	betsidqatekha tatsileini utefaleteini hateh ’eilai ’azenekha vehoshi‘eini. 
psalms 71:3	heyeh li letsur ma‘on lawo tamid tsivita lehoshi‘eini ki sal‘i umetsudati ’atah. 
psalms 71:4	’elohai paleteini miyad rasha‘ mikaf me‘avel vekhomets 
psalms 71:5	ki ’atah tiqvati ’adonai yhoh miwtakhi mine‘urai. 
psalms 71:6	‘alekha nismakhti mibeten mime‘ei ’imi ’atah gozi bekha tehilati tamid. 
psalms 71:7	kemofet hayiti lerabim ve’atah makhasi ‘oz. 
psalms 71:8	yimalei fi tehilatekha kal hayom tif’artekha. 
psalms 71:9	’al tashlikheini le‘et ziqnah kikhlot kokhi ’al ta‘azweini. 
psalms 71:10	ki ’ameru ’oywai li veshomerei nafshi no‘atsu yakhdav. 
psalms 71:11	leimor ’elohim ‘azawo ridfu vetifsuhu ki ’en matsil. 
psalms 71:12	’elohim ’al tirkhaq mimeni ’elohai le‘ezrati khishah khushah. 
psalms 71:13	yeiwoshu yikhlu sotenei nafshi ya‘atu kherpah ukhelimah mewaqshei ra‘ati. 
psalms 71:14	va’ani tamid ’ayakhel vehosafti ‘al kal tehilatekha. 
psalms 71:15	pi yesaper tsidqatekha kal hayom teshu‘atekha ki lo yada‘ti seforot. 
psalms 71:16	’awo bigwurot ’adonai yhoh ’azkir tsidqatekha lewadekha. 
psalms 71:17	’elohim limadtani mine‘urai ve‘ad henah ’agid nifle’otekha. 
psalms 71:18	vegam ‘ad ziqnah veseiwah ’elohim ’al ta‘azweini ‘ad ’agid zero‘akha ledor lekhal yawo gewuratekha. 
psalms 71:19	vetsidqatekha ’elohim ‘ad marom ’asher ‘asita gedolot ’elohim mi khamokha. 
psalms 71:20	’asher hir’itanu hir’itani tsarot rabot vera‘ot tashuw tekhayeinu tekhayeini umitehomot ha’arets tashuw ta‘aleini. 
psalms 71:21	terew gedulati vetisow tenakhameini. 
psalms 71:22	gam ’ani ’odkha wikhli newel ’amitekha ’elohai ’azamerah lekha wekhinor qedosh yisra’el. 
psalms 71:23	teranenah fatai ki ’azamerah lakh venafshi ’asher padita. 
psalms 71:24	gam leshoni kal hayom tehgeh tsidqatekha ki woshu khi khaferu mewaqshei ra‘ati. 
psalms 72:1	lishlomoh ’elohim mishpatekha lemelekh ten vetsidqatekha lewen melekh. 
psalms 72:2	yadin ‘amekha wetsedeq va‘aniyekha wemishpat. 
psalms 72:3	yis’u harim shalom la‘am ugewa‘ot bitsdaqah. 
psalms 72:4	yishpot ‘aniyei ‘am yoshia‘ liwnei ’ewyon vidakei ‘osheq. 
psalms 72:5	yira’ukha ‘im shamesh velifnei yareiakh dor dorim. 
psalms 72:6	yeired kematar ‘al gez kirwiwim zarzif ’arets. 
psalms 72:7	yifrakh beyamav tsadiq verow lom ‘ad beli yareiakh. 
psalms 72:8	veyeired miyam ‘ad yam uminahar ‘ad ’afsei ’arets. 
psalms 72:9	lefanav yikhre‘u tsiyim ve’oyewav ‘afar yelakheikhu. 
psalms 72:10	malkhei tarshish ve’iyim minkhah yashiwu malkhei shewa usewa ’eshkar yaqriwu. 
psalms 72:11	veyishtakhavu lo khal melakhim kal goyim ya‘awduhu. 
psalms 72:12	ki yatsil ’ewyon meshaveia‘ ve‘ani ve’en ‘ozer lo. 
psalms 72:13	yakhos ‘al dal ve’ewyon venafshot ’ewyonim yoshia‘. 
psalms 72:14	mitokh umeikhamas yig’al nafsham veyeiqar damam be‘einav. 
psalms 72:15	vikhi veyiten lo mizehaw shewa veyitpalel ba‘ado tamid kal hayom yewarakhenhu. 
psalms 72:16	yehi fisat bar ba’arets berosh harim yir‘ash kalewanon piryo veyatsitsu mei‘ir ke‘eisew ha’arets. 
psalms 72:17	yehi shemo le‘olam lifnei shemesh yanin yinon shemo veyitbarekhu wo kal goyim ye’asheruhu. 
psalms 72:18	barukh yhoh ’elohim ’elohei yisra’el ‘oseh nifla’ot lewado. 
psalms 72:19	uwarukh shem kewodo le‘olam veyimalei khewodo ’et kol ha’arets ’amen ve’amen. 
psalms 72:20	kalu tefilot david ben yishai. 
psalms 73:1	mizmor le’asaf ’akh tow leyisra’el ’elohim lewarei leiwaw. 
psalms 73:2	va’ani kim‘at natui natayu raglai ke’ayin shupekhah shupekhu ’ashurai. 
psalms 73:3	ki qineiti baholim shelom resha‘im ’er’eh. 
psalms 73:4	ki ’en khartsubot lemotam uwari ’ulam. 
psalms 73:5	ba‘amal ’enosh ’eineimo ve‘im ’adam lo yenuga‘u. 
psalms 73:6	lakhen ‘anaqatmo ga’avah ya‘atafoshi t khamas lamo. 
psalms 73:7	yatsa meikheilew ‘eineimo ‘aweru maskiyot leiwaw. 
psalms 73:8	yamiqu vidaberu wera‘ ‘osheq mimarom yedabeiru. 
psalms 73:9	shatu washamayim pihem uleshonam tihalakh ba’arets. 
psalms 73:10	lakhen yashiw yashuw ‘amo halom umei malei yimatsu lamo. 
psalms 73:11	ve’ameru ’eikhah yada‘ ’el veyesh dei‘ah we‘elyon. 
psalms 73:12	hineh ’eleh resha‘im veshalvei ‘olam hisgu khayil. 
psalms 73:13	’akh riq zikiti lewawi va’erkhats beniqayon kapai. 
psalms 73:14	va’ehi nagua‘ kal hayom vetokhakhti labeqarim. 
psalms 73:15	’im ’amarti ’asaperah khemo hineh dor banekha wagadeti. 
psalms 73:16	va’akhashewah lada‘at zot ‘amal hi hu we‘einai. 
psalms 73:17	‘ad ’awo ’el miqdeshei ’el ’awinah le’akharitam. 
psalms 73:18	’akh bakhalaqot tashit lamo hipaltam lemashu’ot. 
psalms 73:19	’ekh hayu leshamah kheraga‘ safu tamu min balahot. 
psalms 73:20	kakhalom meihaqits ’adonai ba‘ir tsalmam tiwzeh. 
psalms 73:21	ki yitkhamets lewawi vekhilyotai ’eshtonan. 
psalms 73:22	va’ani wa‘ar velo ’eida‘ beheimot hayiti ‘imakh. 
psalms 73:23	va’ani tamid ‘imakh ’akhazta beyad yemini. 
psalms 73:24	ba‘atsatekha tankheini ve’akhar kawod tiqakheini. 
psalms 73:25	mi li washamayim ve‘imekha lo khafatsti wa’arets. 
psalms 73:26	kalah she’eiri ulewawi tsur lewawi vekhelqi ’elohim le‘olam. 
psalms 73:27	ki hineh rekheiqekha yoweidu hitsmatah kal zoneh mimeka. 
psalms 73:28	va’ani qirawat ’elohim li tow shati badonai yhoh makhsi lesaper kal mal’akhotekha. 
psalms 74:1	maskil le’asaf lamah ’elohim zanakhta lanetsakh ye‘shan ’apekha betson mar‘itekha. 
psalms 74:2	zekhor ‘adatekha qanita qedem ga’alta sheiwet nakhalatekha har tsiyon zeh shakhanta bo. 
psalms 74:3	harimah fe‘amekha lemashu’ot netsakh kal heira‘ ’oyew baqodesh. 
psalms 74:4	sha’agu tsorerekha beqerew mo‘adekha samu ’ototam ’otot. 
psalms 74:5	yivada‘ kemeiwi lema‘elah bisawakh ‘ets qardumot. 
psalms 74:6	ve‘et ve‘atah pitukheha yakhad bekhashil vekheilapot yahalomun. 
psalms 74:7	shilkhu wa’esh miqdashekha la’arets khilelu mishkan shemekha. 
psalms 74:8	’ameru welibam ninam yakhad sarefu khal mo‘adei ’el ba’arets. 
psalms 74:9	’ototeinu lo ra’inu ’en ‘od nawi velo ’itanu yodeia‘ ‘ad mah. 
psalms 74:10	‘ad matai ’elohim yekharef tsar yena’ets ’oyew shimkha lanetsakh. 
psalms 74:11	lamah tashiw yadekha viminekha miqerew khoqkha kheiqekha khaleh. 
psalms 74:12	veilohim malki miqedem po‘el yeshu‘ot beqerew ha’arets. 
psalms 74:13	’atah forarta we‘azekha yam shibarta rashei taninim ‘al hamayim. 
psalms 74:14	’atah ritsatsta rashei livyatan titenenu ma’akhal le‘am letsiyim. 
psalms 74:15	’atah waqa‘ta ma‘yan vanakhal ’atah howashta naharot ’eitan. 
psalms 74:16	lekha yom ’af lekha layelah ’atah hakhinota ma’or vashamesh. 
psalms 74:17	’atah hitsawta kal gewulot ’arets qayits vakhoref ’atah yetsartam 
psalms 74:18	zekhar zot ’oyew kheiref yhoh ve‘am nawal ni’atsu shemekha. 
psalms 74:19	’al titen lekhayat nefesh torekha khayat ‘aniyekha ’al tishkakh lanetsakh. 
psalms 74:20	habet laberit ki male’u makhashakei ’erets ne’ot khamas. 
psalms 74:21	’al yashow dakh nikhlam ‘ani ve’ewyon yehalelu shemekha. 
psalms 74:22	qumah ’elohim riwah riwekha zekhor kherpatekha mini nawal kal hayom. 
psalms 74:23	’al tishkakh qol tsorerekha she’on qamekha ‘oleh tamid. 
psalms 75:1	lamnatseiakh ’al tashkhet mizmor le’asaf shir. hodinu lekha ’elohim hodinu veqarow shemekha siperu nifle’otekha. 
psalms 75:2	ki ’eqakh mo‘ed ’ani meisharim ’eshpot. 
psalms 75:3	nemogim ’erets vekhal yosheweha ’anokhi tikanti ‘amudeha selah. 
psalms 75:4	’amarti laholim ’al taholu velaresha‘im ’al tarimu qaren. 
psalms 75:5	’al tarimu lamarom qarnekhem tedaberu wetsavar ‘ataq. 
psalms 75:6	ki lo mimotsa umima‘araw velo mimidbar harim. 
psalms 75:7	ki ’elohim shofet zeh yashpil vezeh yarim. 
psalms 75:8	ki khos beyad yhoh veyayin khamar malei mesekh vayager mizeh ’akhosh mareha yimtsu yishtu kol rish‘ei ’arets. 
psalms 75:9	va’ani ’agid le‘olam ’azamerah leilohei ya‘aqow. 
psalms 75:10	vekhal qarnei resha‘im ’agadeia‘ teromamnah qarnot tsadiq. 
psalms 76:1	lamnatseiakh binginot mizmor le’asaf shir. noda‘ bihudah ’elohim beyisra’el gadol shemo. 
psalms 76:2	vayhi weshalem suko ume‘onato wetsiyon. 
psalms 76:3	mah shibar rishfei qashet magen vekherew umilkhamah selah. 
psalms 76:4	na’or ’atah ’adir meiharei taref. 
psalms 76:5	’eshtolu ’abirei lew namu shenatam velo matse’u khal ’anshei khayil yedeihem. 
psalms 76:6	miga‘aratekha ’elohei ya‘aqow nirdam verekhew vasus. 
psalms 76:7	’atah nora ’atah umi ya‘amod lefanekha mei’az ’apekha. 
psalms 76:8	mishamayim hishma‘ta din ’erets yare’ah veshaqatah. 
psalms 76:9	bequm lamishpat ’elohim lehoshia‘ kal ‘anvei ’erets selah.

psalms 76:12	yiwtsor ruakh negidim nora lemalkhei ’arets. 
psalms 77:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al yeditun yedutun le’asaf mizmor. qoli ’el ’elohim ve’ets‘aqah qoli ’el ’elohim veha’azin ’eilai. 
psalms 77:2	beyom tsarati ’adonai darasheti yadi laylah nigerah velo tafug mei’anah hinakhem nafshi. 
psalms 77:3	’ezkerah ’elohim ve’ehemayah ’asikhah vetit‘atef rukhi selah. 
psalms 77:4	’akhazta shemurot ‘einai nif‘amti velo ’adaber. 
psalms 77:5	khishawti yamim miqedem not ‘olamim. 
psalms 77:6	’ezkerah neginati balayelah ‘im lewawi ’asikhah vaykhapes rukhi. 
psalms 77:7	hal‘olamim yiznakh ’adonai velo yosif lirtsot ‘od. 
psalms 77:8	he’afes lanetsakh khasdo gamar ’omer ledor vador. 
psalms 77:9	hashakhakh khanot ’el ’im qafats be’af rakhamav selah. 
psalms 77:10	va’omar khaloti hi not yemin ‘elyon. 
psalms 77:11	’azkir ’ezkor ma‘alei yah ki ’ezkerah miqedem pil’ekha. 
psalms 77:12	vehagiti wekhal pa‘olekha uwa‘alilotekha ’asikhah. 
psalms 77:13	’elohim baqodesh darkekha mi ’el gadol keilohim. 
psalms 77:14	’atah ha’el ‘oseh fele hoda‘ta wa‘amim ‘uzekha. 
psalms 77:15	ga’alta bizroa‘ ‘amekha benei ya‘aqow veyosef selah. 
psalms 77:16	ra’ukha mayim ’elohim ra’ukha mayim yakhilu ’af yirgezu tehomot. 
psalms 77:17	zoremu mayim ‘awot qol natenu shekhaqim ’af khatsatsekha yithalakhu. 
psalms 77:18	qol ra‘amkha bagalgal hei’iru weraqim teiwel ragezah vatir‘ash ha’arets. 
psalms 77:19	bayam darkekha ushewilekha ushewilekha bemayim rabim ve‘iqewotekha lo noda‘u. 
psalms 77:20	nakhita khatson ‘amekha beyad mosheh ve’aharon. 
psalms 78:1	maskil le’asaf ha’azinah ‘ami torati hatu ’azenekhem le’imrei fi. 
psalms 78:2	’eftekhah wemashal pi ’abi‘ah khidot mini qedem. 
psalms 78:3	’asher ma‘nu vaneida‘em va’awoteinu siperu lanu. 
psalms 78:4	lo nekhakhed mibeneihem ledor ’akharon mesaperim tehilot yhoh ve‘ezuzo venifle’otav ’asher ‘asah. 
psalms 78:5	vayaqem ‘eidut beya‘aqow vetorah sam beyisra’el ’asher tsivah ’et ’awoteinu lehodi‘am liwneihem. 
psalms 78:6	lema‘an yeide‘u dor ’akharon banim yivaleidu yaqumu visaperu liwneihem. 
psalms 78:7	veyasimu weilohim kislam velo yishkekhu ma‘alei ’el umitsvotav yintsoru. 
psalms 78:8	velo yihyu ka’awotam dor sorer umoreh dor lo heikhin libo velo ne’emnah ’et ’el rukho. 
psalms 78:9	benei ’efrayim nosheqei romei qashet hafekhu beyom qeraw. 
psalms 78:10	lo meru berit ’elohim uwetorato mei’anu lalekhet. 
psalms 78:11	vayishkekhu ‘alilotav venifle’otav ’asher her’am. 
psalms 78:12	neged ’awotam ‘asah fele be’erets mitsrayim sedeh tso‘an. 
psalms 78:13	baqa‘ yam vaya‘awirem vayatsew mayim kemo ned. 
psalms 78:14	vayankhem be‘anan yomam vekhal halaylah be’or ’esh. 
psalms 78:15	yewaqa‘ tsurim bamidbar vayashq kithomot rabah. 
psalms 78:16	vayotsi nozlim misala‘ vayored kaneharot mayim. 
psalms 78:17	vayosifu ‘od lakhato lo lamrot ‘elyon batsiyah. 
psalms 78:18	vaynasu ’el bilwawam lish’al ’okhel lenafsham. 
psalms 78:19	vaydaberu beilohim ’ameru hayukhal ’el la‘arokh lekhan bamidbar. 
psalms 78:20	hen hikah tsur vayazuwu mayim unekhalim yishtofu hagam lekhem yukhal tet ’im yakhin she’er le‘amo. 
psalms 78:21	lakhen shama‘ yhoh vayit‘abar ve’esh niseqah weya‘aqow vegam ’af ‘alah weyisra’el. 
psalms 78:22	ki lo he’eminu beilohim velo watekhu bishu‘ato. 
psalms 78:23	vaytsav shekhaqim mima‘al vedaltei shamayim patakh. 
psalms 78:24	vayamter ‘aleihem man le’ekhol udeganosha mayim natan lamo. 
psalms 78:25	lekhem ’abirim ’akhal ’ish tseidah shalakh lahem lasowa‘. 
psalms 78:26	yasa‘ qadim bashamayim vaynaheg be‘uzo teiman. 
psalms 78:27	vayamter ‘aleihem ke‘afar she’er ukhekhol yamim ‘of kanaf. 
psalms 78:28	vayapel beqerew makhaneihu sawiw lemishkenotav. 
psalms 78:29	vayokhelu vayisbe‘u me’od veta’avatam yawi lahem. 
psalms 78:30	lo zaru mita’avatam ‘od ’akhelam befihem. 
psalms 78:31	ve’af ’elohim ‘alah wahem vayaharog bemishmaneihem uwakhurei yisra’el hikhria‘. 
psalms 78:32	bekhal zot khate’u ‘od velo he’eminu benifle’otav. 
psalms 78:33	vaykhal bahewel yemeihem ushenotam babehalah. 
psalms 78:34	’im haragam uderashuhu veshawu veshikharu ’el. 
psalms 78:35	vayizkeru ki ’elohim tsuram ve’el ‘elyon go’alam. 
psalms 78:36	vayfatuhu befihem uwilshonam yekhazewu lo. 
psalms 78:37	velibam lo nakhon ‘imo velo ne’emnu biwrito. 
psalms 78:38	vehu rakhum yekhaper ‘avon velo yashkhit vehirbah lehashiw ’apo velo ya‘ir kal khamato. 
psalms 78:39	vayizkor ki wasar hemah ruakh holekh velo yashuw. 
psalms 78:40	kamah yamruhu wamidbar ya‘atsiwuhu bishimon. 
psalms 78:41	vayashuwu vaynasu ’el uqedosh yisra’el hitvu. 
psalms 78:42	lo zakheru ’et yado yom ’asher padam mini tsar. 
psalms 78:43	’asher sam bemitsrayim ’ototav umoftav bisdeh tso‘an. 
psalms 78:44	vayahafokh ledam ye’oreihem venozeleihem bal yishtayun. 
psalms 78:45	yeshalakh bahem ‘arow vayokhelem utsefardeia‘ vatashkhitem. 
psalms 78:46	vayiten lekhasil yewulam vigi‘am la’arbeh. 
psalms 78:47	yaharog babarad gafnam veshiqmotam bakhanamal. 
psalms 78:48	vayasger labarad be‘iram umiqneihem lareshafim. 
psalms 78:49	yeshalakh bam kharon ’apo ‘ewrah vaza‘am vetsarah mishlakhat mal’akhei ra‘im. 
psalms 78:50	yefales natiw le’apo lo khasakh mimavet nafsham vekhayatam ladewer hisgir. 
psalms 78:51	vayakh kal bekhor bemitsrayim reishit ’onim be’aholei kham. 
psalms 78:52	vayasa‘ katson ‘amo vaynahagem ka‘eider bamidbar. 
psalms 78:53	vayankhem lawetakh velo fakhadu ve’et ’oyweihem kisah hayam. 
psalms 78:54	vaywi’em ’el gewul qadesho har zeh qanetah yemino. 
psalms 78:55	vaygaresh mipeneihem goyim vayapilem bekhewel nakhalah vayashken be’aholeihem shiwtei yisra’el. 
psalms 78:56	vaynasu vayamru ’et ’elohim ‘elyon ve‘eidotav lo shamaru. 
psalms 78:57	vayisogu vayiwgedu ka’awotam nehpekhu keqeshet remiyah. 
psalms 78:58	vayakh‘isuhu bewamotam uwifsileihem yaqni’uhu. 
psalms 78:59	shama‘ ’elohim vayit‘abar vayim’as me’od beyisra’el. 
psalms 78:60	vayitosh mishkan shilo ’ohel shiken ba’adam. 
psalms 78:61	vayiten lashewi ‘uzo vetif’arto weyad tsar. 
psalms 78:62	vayasger lakherew ‘amo uwenakhalato hit‘abar. 
psalms 78:63	bakhurav ’akhelah ’esh uwetulotav lo hulalu. 
psalms 78:64	kohanav bakherew nafalu ve’almenotav lo tiwkenah. 
psalms 78:65	vayiqats keyashen ’adonai kegibor mitronen miyayin. 
psalms 78:66	vayakh tsarav ’akhor kherpat ‘olam natan lamo. 
psalms 78:67	vayim’as be’ohel yosef uwesheiwet ’efrayim lo wakhar. 
psalms 78:68	vayiwkhar ’et sheiwet yehudah ’et har tsiyon ’asher ’ahew. 
psalms 78:69	vayiwen kemo ramim miqdasho ke’erets yesadah le‘olam. 
psalms 78:70	vayiwkhar bedavid ‘awdo vayiqakheihu mimikhle’ot tson. 
psalms 78:71	mei’akhar ‘alot hewi’o lir‘ot beya‘aqow ‘amo uweyisra’el nakhalato. 
psalms 78:72	vayir‘em ketom lewawo uwitwunot kapav yankhem. 
psalms 79:1	mizmor le’asaf ’elohim ba’u goyim benakhalatekha time’u ’et heikhal qadshekha samu ’et yerushalim le‘iyim. 
psalms 79:2	natenu ’et niwlat ‘awadekha ma’akhal le‘of hashamayim besar khasidekha lekhayto ’arets. 
psalms 79:3	shafekhu damam kamayim sewiwot yerushalim ve’en qower. 
psalms 79:4	hayinu kherpah lishkheineinu la‘ag vaqeles liswiwoteinu. 
psalms 79:5	‘ad mah yhoh te’enaf lanetsakh tiw‘ar kemo ’esh qin’atekha. 
psalms 79:6	shefokh khamatekha ’el hagoyim ’asher lo yeda‘ukha ve‘al mamlakhot ’asher beshimkha lo qara’u. 
psalms 79:7	ki ’akhal ’et ya‘aqow ve’et naveihu heishamu. 
psalms 79:8	’al tizkar lanu ‘avonot rishonim maher yeqademunu rakhamekha ki dalonu me’od. 
psalms 79:9	‘azereinu ’elohei yish‘einu ‘al dewar kewod shemekha vehatsileinu vekhaper ‘al khatoteinu lema‘an shemekha. 
psalms 79:10	lamah yomeru hagoyim ’ayeh ’eloheihem yivada‘ bagiyim bagoyim le‘eineinu niqmat dam ‘awadekha hashafukh. 
psalms 79:11	tawo lefanekha ’enqat ’asir kegodel zero‘akha hoter benei temutah. 
psalms 79:12	vehashew lishkheineinu we‘atayim ’el kheiqam kherpatam ’asher kheirefukha ’adonai. 
psalms 79:13	va’anakhnu ‘amekha vetson mar‘itekha nodeh lekha le‘olam ledor vador nesaper tehilatekha. 
psalms 80:1	lamnatseiakh ’el shoshanim ‘eidut le’asaf mizmor. ro‘eh yisra’el ha’azinah noheg katson yosef yoshew hakeruwim hofi‘ah. 
psalms 80:2	lifnei ’efrayim uwinyamin umenasheh ‘orah ’et gewuratekha ulekhah lishu‘atah lanu. 
psalms 80:3	’elohim hashiweinu veha’er panekha venivashei‘ah. 
psalms 80:4	yhoh ’elohim tsewa’ot ‘ad matai ‘ashanta bitfilat ‘amekha. 
psalms 80:5	he’ekhaltam lekhem dim‘ah vatashqeimo bidma‘ot shalish. 
psalms 80:6	tesimeinu madon lishkheineinu ve’oyeweinu yil‘agu lamo. 
psalms 80:7	’elohim tsewa’ot hashiweinu veha’er panekha venivashei‘ah. 
psalms 80:8	gefen mimitsrayim tasia‘ tegaresh goyim vatita‘eha. 
psalms 80:9	pinita lefaneha vatashresh rasheha vatemalei ’arets. 
psalms 80:10	kasu harim tsilah va‘anafeha ’arzei ’el. 
psalms 80:11	teshalakh qetsireha ‘ad yam ve’el nahar yonqoteha. 
psalms 80:12	lamah paratsta gedeireha ve’aruha kal ‘owerei darekh. 
psalms 80:13	yekharsemenah khazir miya‘ar veziz sadai yir‘enah. 
psalms 80:14	’elohim tsewa’ot shuw na habet mishamayim ure’eh ufeqod gefen zot. 
psalms 80:15	vekhanah ’asher nate‘ah yeminekha ve‘al ben ’imatstah lakh. 
psalms 80:16	serufah wa’esh kesukhah miga‘arat panekha yoweidu. 
psalms 80:17	tehi yadekha ‘al ’ish yeminekha ‘al ben ’adam ’imatsta lakh. 
psalms 80:18	velo nasog mimeka tekhayeinu uweshimkha niqra. 
psalms 80:19	yhoh ’elohim tsewa’ot hashiweinu ha’er panekha venivashei‘ah. 
psalms 81:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al hagitit le’asaf. harninu leilohim ‘uzeinu hari‘u leilohei ya‘aqow. 
psalms 81:2	se’u zimrah utenu tof kinor na‘im ‘im nawel. 
psalms 81:3	tiq‘u wakhodesh shofar bakeiseh leyom khageinu. 
psalms 81:4	ki khoq leyisra’el hu mishpat leilohei ya‘aqow. 
psalms 81:5	‘eidut bihosef samo betseito ‘al ’erets mitsrayim sefat lo yada‘ti ’eshma‘. 
psalms 81:6	hasiroti miseiwel shikhmo kapav midud ta‘aworenah. 
psalms 81:7	batsarah qarata va’akhaletseka ’e‘enkha beseiter ra‘am ’ewkhanekha ‘al mei meriwah selah. 
psalms 81:8	shema‘ ‘ami ve’a‘idah bakh yisra’el ’im tishma‘ li. 
psalms 81:9	lo yihyeh wekha ’el zar velo tishtakhaveh le’el neikhar. 
psalms 81:10	’anokhi yhoh ’elohekha hama‘alkha mei’erets mitsrayim harkhew pikha va’amal’eihu. 
psalms 81:11	velo shama‘ ‘ami leqoli veyisra’el lo ’awah li. 
psalms 81:12	va’ashalekheihu bishrirut libam yeilekhu bemo‘atsoteihem. 
psalms 81:13	lu ‘ami shomeia‘ li yisra’el bidrakhai yehaleikhu. 
psalms 81:14	kim‘at ’oyweihem ’akhnia‘ ve‘al tsareihem ’ashiw yadi. 
psalms 81:15	mesan’ei yhoh yekhakhashu lo vihi ‘itam le‘olam. 
psalms 81:16	vaya’akhileihu meikheilew khitah umitsur dewash ’asbi‘ekha. 
psalms 82:1	mizmor le’asaf ’elohim nitsaw ba‘adat ’el beqerew ’elohim yishpot. 
psalms 82:2	‘ad matai tishpetu ‘avel ufenei resha‘im tis’u selah. 
psalms 82:3	shiftu dal veyatom ‘ani varash hatsdiqu. 
psalms 82:4	paletu dal ve’ewyon miyad resha‘im hatsilu. 
psalms 82:5	lo yade‘u velo yawinu bakhasheikhah yithalakhu yimotu kal mosdei ’arets. 
psalms 82:6	’ani ’amarti ’elohim ’atem uwenei ‘elyon kulekhem. 
psalms 82:7	’akhen ke’adam temutun ukhe’akhad hasarim tipolu. 
psalms 82:8	qumah ’elohim shafetah ha’arets ki ’atah tinkhal bekhal hagoyim. 
psalms 83:1	shir mizmor le’asaf. ’elohim ’al domi lakh ’al tekherash ve’al tishqot ’el. 
psalms 83:2	ki hineh ’oywekha yehemayun umesan’ekha nase’u rosh. 
psalms 83:3	‘al ‘amekha ya‘arimu sod veyitya‘atsu ‘al tsefunekha. 
psalms 83:4	’ameru lekhu venakhkhidem migo velo yizakher shem yisra’el ‘od. 
psalms 83:5	ki no‘atsu lew yakhdav ‘alekha berit yikhrotu. 
psalms 83:6	’aholei ’edom veyishme‘eilim mo’aw vehagrim. 
psalms 83:7	gewal ve‘amon va‘amaleq peleshet ‘im yoshewei tsor. 
psalms 83:8	gam ’ashur nilvah ‘imam hayu zeroa‘ liwnei lot selah. 
psalms 83:9	‘aseh lahem kemidyan kesisera kheyawin benakhal qishon. 
psalms 83:10	nishmedu we‘en dor hayu domen la’adamah. 
psalms 83:11	shiteimo nediweimo ke‘orew vekhiz’ew ukhezewakh ukhetsalmuna‘ kal nesikheimo. 
psalms 83:12	’asher ’ameru nirashah lanu ’et ne’ot ’elohim. 
psalms 83:13	’elohai shiteimo khagalgal keqash lifnei ruakh. 
psalms 83:14	ke’esh tiw‘ar ya‘ar ukhelehawah telahet harim. 
psalms 83:15	ken tirdefem besa‘arekha uwesufatekha tewahalem. 
psalms 83:16	malei feneihem qalon viwaqshu shimkha yhoh. 
psalms 83:17	yeiwoshu veyibahalu ‘adei ‘ad veyakhperu veyoweidu. 
psalms 83:18	veyeide‘u ki ’atah shimkha yhoh lewadekha ‘elyon ‘al kal ha’arets. 
psalms 84:1	lamnatseiakh ‘al hagitit liwnei qorakh mizmor. mah yedidot mishkenotekha yhoh tsewa’ot. 
psalms 84:2	nikhsefah vegam kaletah nafshi lekhatsrot yhoh libi uwesari yeranenu ’el ’el khai. 
psalms 84:3	gam tsipor matse’ah wayit uderor qen lah ’asher shatah ’efrokheha ’et mizbekhotekha yhoh tsewa’ot malki veilohai. 
psalms 84:4	’ashrei yoshewei weitekha ‘od yehalelukha selah. 
psalms 84:5	’ashrei ’adam ‘oz lo wakh mesilot bilwawam. 
psalms 84:6	‘owerei be‘eimeq habakha ma‘yan yeshituhu gam berakhot ya‘teh moreh. 
psalms 84:7	yeilekhu meikhayil ’el khayil yeira’eh ’el ’elohim betsiyon. 
psalms 84:8	yhoh ’elohim tsewa’ot shim‘ah tefilati ha’azinah ’elohei ya‘aqow selah. 
psalms 84:9	magineinu re’eh ’elohim vehabet penei meshikhekha. 
psalms 84:10	ki tow yom bakhatseirekha mei’alef bakharti histofef bewet ’elohai midur be’aholei resha‘. 
psalms 84:11	ki shemesh umagen yhoh ’elohim khen vekhawod yiten yhoh lo yimna‘ tow laholekhim betamim. 
psalms 84:12	yhoh tsewa’ot ’ashrei ’adam boteiakh bakh. 
psalms 85:1	lamnatseiakh liwnei qorakh mizmor. ratsita yhoh ’artsekha weta shewut shewit ya‘aqow. 
psalms 85:2	nasata ‘avon ‘amekha kisita khal khatatam selah. 
psalms 85:3	’asafta khal ‘ewratekha heshiwota meikharon ’apekha. 
psalms 85:4	uweinu ’elohei yish‘einu vehafer ka‘askha ‘imanu. 
psalms 85:5	hal‘olam te’enaf banu timshokh ’apekha ledor vador. 
psalms 85:6	halo ’atah tashuw tekhayeinu ve‘amekha yismekhu wakh. 
psalms 85:7	har’einu yhoh khasdekha veyesh‘akha titen lanu. 
psalms 85:8	’eshme‘ah mah yedaber ha’el yhoh ki yedaber shalom ’el ‘amo ve’el khasidav ve’al yashuwu lekhislah. 
psalms 85:9	’akh qarow lirei’av yish‘o lishkon kawod be’artseinu. 
psalms 85:10	khesed ve’emet nifgashu tsedeq veshalom nashaqu. 
psalms 85:11	’emet mei’erets titsmakh vetsedeq mishamayim nishqaf. 
psalms 85:12	gam yhoh yiten hatow ve’artseinu titen yewulah. 
psalms 85:13	tsedeq lefanav yehalekh veyasem lederekh pe‘amav. 
psalms 86:1	tefilah ledavid hateh yhoh ’azenekha ‘aneini ki ‘ani ve’ewyon ’ani. 
psalms 86:2	shamerah nafshi ki khasid ’ani hosha‘ ‘awdekha ’atah ’elohai haboteiakh ’eilekha. 
psalms 86:3	khaneini ’adonai ki ’eilekha ’eqra kal hayom. 
psalms 86:4	meiakh nefesh ‘awdekha ki ’eilekha ’adonai nafshi ’esa. 
psalms 86:5	ki ’atah ’adonai tow vesalakh veraw khesed lekhal qore’ekha. 
psalms 86:6	ha’azinah yhoh tefilati vehaqshiwah beqol takhanunotai. 
psalms 86:7	beyom tsarati ’eqra’eka ki ta‘aneini. 
psalms 86:8	’en kamokha wa’elohim ’adonai ve’en kema‘asekha. 
psalms 86:9	kal goyim ’asher ‘asita yawo’u veyishtakhavu lefanekha ’adonai vikhabedu lishmekha. 
psalms 86:10	ki gadol ’atah ve‘oseh nifla’ot ’atah ’elohim lewadekha. 
psalms 86:11	horeini yhoh darkekha ’ahalekh ba’amitekha yakhed lewawi leyir’ah shemekha. 
psalms 86:12	’odkha ’adonai ’elohai bekhal lewawi va’akhabedah shimkha le‘olam. 
psalms 86:13	ki khasdekha gadol ‘alai vehitsalta nafshi mishe’ol takhtiyah. 
psalms 86:14	’elohim zeidim qamu ‘alai va‘adat ‘aritsim biqshu nafshi velo samukha lenegdam. 
psalms 86:15	ve’atah ’adonai ’el rakhum vekhanun ’erekh ’apayim veraw khesed ve’emet. 
psalms 86:16	peneh ’eilai vekhaneini tenah ‘uzekha le‘awdekha vehoshi‘ah lewen ’amatekha. 
psalms 86:17	‘aseh ‘imi ’ot letowah veyir’u sone’ai veyeiwoshu ki ’atah yhoh ‘azartani venikhamtani. 
psalms 87:1	liwnei qorakh mizmor shir yesudato beharei qodesh. 
psalms 87:2	’ohew yhoh sha‘arei tsiyon mikol mishkenot ya‘aqow. 
psalms 87:3	nikhbadot medubar bakh ‘ir ha’elohim selah. 
psalms 87:4	’azkir rahaw uwawel leyode‘ai hineh feleshet vetsor ‘im kush zeh yulad sham. 
psalms 87:5	ulatsiyon yei’amar ’ish ve’ish yulad bah vehu yekhoneha ‘elyon. 
psalms 87:6	yhoh yispor bikhtow ‘amim zeh yulad sham selah. 
psalms 87:7	vesharim kekholelim kal ma‘yanai bakh. 
psalms 88:1	shir mizmor liwnei qorakh lamnatseiakh ‘al makhalat le‘anot maskil leheiman ha’ezrakhi. yhoh ’elohei yeshu‘ati yom tsa‘aqti walaylah negdekha. 
psalms 88:2	tawo lefanekha tefilati hateh ’azenekha lerinati. 
psalms 88:3	ki sawe‘ah wera‘ot nafshi vekhayai lish’ol higi‘u. 
psalms 88:4	nekhshawti ‘im yordei wor hayiti kegewer ’en ’eyal. 
psalms 88:5	bameitim khafeshi kemo khalalim shokhewei qewer ’asher lo zekhartam ‘od vehemah miyadekha nigzaru. 
psalms 88:6	tani bewor takhtiyot bemakhashakim bimtsolot. 
psalms 88:7	‘alai samekhah khamatekha vekhal mishbarekha ‘inita selah. 
psalms 88:8	hirkhaqta meyuda‘ai mimeni shatani to‘eiwot lamo kalu velo ’eitsei. 
psalms 88:9	‘eini da’awah mini ‘oni qeratikha yhoh bekhal yom shitakhti ’eilekha khapai. 
psalms 88:10	halameitim ta‘aseh pele ’im refa’im yaqumu yodukha selah. 
psalms 88:11	haysupar baqewer khasdekha ’emunatekha ba’awadon. 
psalms 88:12	hayivada‘ bakhoshekh pil’ekha vetsidqatekha be’erets neshiyah. 
psalms 88:13	va’ani ’eilekha yhoh shiva‘ti uwaboqer tefilati teqademeka. 
psalms 88:14	lamah yhoh tiznakh nafshi tastir panekha mimeni. 
psalms 88:15	‘ani ’ani vegoeia‘ mino‘ar nasati ’eimekha ’afunah. 
psalms 88:16	‘alai ‘aweru kharonekha bi‘utekha tsimetutuni. 
psalms 88:17	sabuni khamayim kal hayom hiqifu ‘alai yakhad. 
psalms 88:18	hirkhaqta mimeni ’ohew vareia‘ meyuda‘ai makhshakh. 
psalms 89:1	maskil le’eitan ha’ezrakhi. khasdei yhoh ‘olam ’ashirah ledor vador ’odia‘ ’emunatekha befi. 
psalms 89:2	ki ’amarti ‘olam khesed yibaneh shamayim takhin ’emunatekha wahem. 
psalms 89:3	karati werit liwkhiri nishba‘ti ledavid ‘awdi. 
psalms 89:4	‘ad ‘olam ’akhin zar‘ekha uwaniti ledor vador kis’akha selah. 
psalms 89:5	veyodu shamayim pil’akha yhoh ’af ’emunatekha biqhal qedoshim. 
psalms 89:6	ki mi washakhaq ya‘arokh yhoh yidmeh yhoh biwnei ’eilim 
psalms 89:7	’el na‘arats besod qedoshim rabah venora ‘al kal sewiwav. 
psalms 89:8	yhoh ’elohei tsewa’ot mi khamokha khasin yah ve’emunatekha sewiwotekha. 
psalms 89:9	’atah moshel begei’ut hayam beso galav ’atah teshabekhem. 
psalms 89:10	’atah dikita khekhalal rahaw bizroa‘ ‘uzekha pizarta ’oywekha. 
psalms 89:11	lekha mayim ’af lekha ’arets teiwel umelo’ah ’atah yesadtam. 
psalms 89:12	tsafon veyamin ’atah weratam tawor vekhermon beshimkha yeraneinu. 
psalms 89:13	lekha zeroa‘ ‘im gewurah ta‘oz yadekha tarum yeminekha. 
psalms 89:14	tsedeq umishpat mekhon kis’ekha khesed ve’emet yeqademu fanekha. 
psalms 89:15	’ashrei ha‘am yod‘ei teru‘ah yhoh be’or panekha yehaleikhun. 
psalms 89:16	beshimkha yegilun kal hayom uwetsidqatekha yarumu. 
psalms 89:17	ki tif’eret ‘uzamo ’atah uwirtsonekha tarim tarum qarneinu. 
psalms 89:18	ki yhoh magineinu veliqdosh yisra’el malkeinu. 
psalms 89:19	’az dibarta wekhazon lakhasidekha vatomer shiviti ‘eizer ‘al gibor harimoti wakhur mei‘am. 
psalms 89:20	matsati david ‘awdi beshemen qadshi meshakhtiv. 
psalms 89:21	’asher yadi tikon ‘imo ’af zero‘i te’ametsenu. 
psalms 89:22	lo yashi ’oyew bo uwen ‘avlah lo ye‘anenu. 
psalms 89:23	vekhatoti mipanav tsarav umesan’av ’egof. 
psalms 89:24	ve’emunati vekhasdi ‘imo uwishmi tarum qarno. 
psalms 89:25	vesamti wayam yado uwaneharot yemino. 
psalms 89:26	hu yiqra’eini ’awi ’atah ’eili vetsur yeshu‘ati. 
psalms 89:27	’af ’ani bekhor ’eteneihu ‘elyon lemalkhei ’arets. 
psalms 89:28	le‘olam ’eshmor ’eshmar lo khasdi uweriti ne’emenet lo. 
psalms 89:29	vesamti la‘ad zar‘o vekhis’o kimei shamayim. 
psalms 89:30	’im ya‘azwu wanav torati uwemishpatai lo yeileikhun. 
psalms 89:31	’im khuqotai yekhaleilu umitsvotai lo yishmoru. 
psalms 89:32	ufaqadti wesheiwet pish‘am uwinga‘im ‘avonam. 
psalms 89:33	vekhasdi lo ’afir mei‘imo velo ’ashaqer be’emunati. 
psalms 89:34	lo ’akhalel beriti umotsa fatai lo ’ashaneh. 
psalms 89:35	’akhat nishba‘ti weqadeshi ’im ledavid ’akhazew. 
psalms 89:36	zar‘o le‘olam yihyeh vekhis’o khashemesh negdi. 
psalms 89:37	keyareiakh yikon ‘olam ve‘ed bashakhaq ne’eman selah. 
psalms 89:38	ve’atah zanakhta vatim’as hit‘abarta ‘im meshikhekha. 
psalms 89:39	nei’artah berit ‘awdekha khilalta la’arets nizro. 
psalms 89:40	paratsta khal gedeirotav samta miwtsarav mekhitah 
psalms 89:41	suhu kal ‘owerei darekh hayah kherpah lishkheinav. 
psalms 89:42	harimota yemin tsarav hismakhta kal ’oywav. 
psalms 89:43	’af tashiw tsur kharbo velo haqeimoto bamilkhamah. 
psalms 89:44	hishbata miteharo vekhis’o la’arets migartah. 
psalms 89:45	hiqtsarta yemei ‘alumav he‘etita ‘alav bushah selah. 
psalms 89:46	‘ad mah yhoh tisater lanetsakh tiw‘ar kemo ’esh khamatekha. 
psalms 89:47	zekhar ’ani meh khaled ‘al mahosha v barata khal benei ’adam. 
psalms 89:48	mi gewer yikhyeh velo yir’eh mavet yemalet nafsho miyad she’ol selah. 
psalms 89:49	’ayeh khasadekha harishonim ’adonai nishba‘ta ledavid be’emunatekha. 
psalms 89:50	zekhor ’adonai kherpat ‘awadekha se’eiti wekheiqi kal rabim ‘amim. 
psalms 89:51	’asher kheirefu ’oywekha yhoh ’asher kheirefu ‘iqewot meshikhekha. 
psalms 89:52	barukh yhoh le‘olam ’amen ve’amen. 
psalms 90:1	tefilah lemosheh ’ish ha’elohim ’adonai ma‘on ’atah hayita lanu bedor vador. 
psalms 90:2	beterem harim yuladu vatekholel ’erets veteiwel umei‘olam ‘ad ‘olam ’atah ’el. 
psalms 90:3	tashew ’enosh ‘ad daka vatomer shuwu wenei ’adam. 
psalms 90:4	ki ’elef shanim be‘einekha keyom ’etmol ki ya‘awor ve’ashmurah walayelah. 
psalms 90:5	zeramtam sheinah yihyu baboqer kekhatsir yakhalof. 
psalms 90:6	baboqer yatsits vekhalaf la‘erew yemolel veyawesh. 
psalms 90:7	ki khalinu we’apekha uwakhamatekha niwhalenu. 
psalms 90:8	shata shatah ‘avonoteinu lenegdekha ‘alumeinu lim’or panekha. 
psalms 90:9	ki khal yameinu panu we‘ewratekha kilinu shaneinu khemo hegeh. 
psalms 90:10	yemei shenoteinu wahem shiw‘im shanah ve’im bigwurot shemonim shanah verahebam ‘amal va’aven ki gaz khish vana‘ufah. 
psalms 90:11	mi yodeia‘ ‘oz ’apekha ukheyir’atekha ‘ewratekha. 
psalms 90:12	limnot yameinu ken hoda‘ venawi lewaw khakhmah 
psalms 90:13	shuwah yhoh ‘ad matai vehinakhem ‘al ‘awadekha. 
psalms 90:14	sabe‘einu waboqer khasdekha uneranenah venismekhah bekhal yameinu. 
psalms 90:15	mekheinu kimot ‘initanu not ra’inu ra‘ah. 
psalms 90:16	yeira’eh ’el ‘awadekha fa‘olekha vahadarekha ‘al beneihem. 
psalms 90:17	vihi no‘am ’adonai ’eloheinu ‘aleinu uma‘aseh yadeinu konah ‘aleinu uma‘aseh yadeinu koneihu. 
psalms 91:1	yoshew beseiter ‘elyon betsel dai yitlonan. 
psalms 91:2	’omar yhoh makhsi umetsudati ’elohai ’ewtakh bo. 
psalms 91:3	ki hu yatsilekha mipakh yaqush midewer havot. 
psalms 91:4	be’ewrato yasekh lakh vetakhat kenafav tekhseh tsinah vesokheirah ’amito. 
psalms 91:5	lo tira mipakhad layelah meikhets ya‘uf yomam. 
psalms 91:6	midewer ba’ofel yahalokh miqetew yashud tsahorayim.

psalms 91:8	raq be‘einekha tabit veshilumat resha‘im tir’eh. 
psalms 91:9	ki ’atah yhoh makhsi ‘elyon samta me‘onekha. 
psalms 91:10	lo te’uneh ’eilekha ra‘ah venega‘ lo yiqraw be’aholekha. 
psalms 91:11	ki mal’akhav yetsaveh lakh lishmarekha bekhal derakhekha.

psalms 91:13	‘al shakhal vafeten tidrokh tirmos kefir vetanin.

psalms 91:16	’orekh yamim ’asbi‘eihu ve’ar’eihu bishu‘ati. 
psalms 92:1	mizmor shir leyom hashabat. tow lehodot yhoh ulezamer leshimkha ‘elyon.

psalms 104:5	yasad ’erets ‘al mekhoneha bal timot ‘olam va‘ed. 
psalms 104:6	tehom kalewush kisito ‘al harim ya‘amdu mayim. 
psalms 104:7	min ga‘aratekha yenusun min qol ra‘amkha yeikhafeizun. 
psalms 104:8	ya‘alu harim yeiredu weqa‘ot ’el meqom zeh yasadta lahem. 
psalms 104:9	gewulsa meta bal ya‘aworun bal yeshuwun lekhasot ha’arets.

psalms 104:16	yisbe‘u ‘atsei yhoh ’arzei lewanon ’asher nata‘. 
psalms 104:17	’asherosha m tsiporim yeqaneinu khasidah beroshim beitah. 
psalms 104:18	harim hagewohim laye‘eilim sela‘im makhseh lashfanim. 
psalms 104:19	‘asah yareiakh lemo‘adim mesh yada‘ mewo’o. 
psalms 104:20	tashet khoshekh vihi layelah bo tirmos kal khayto ya‘ar. 
psalms 104:21	hakefirim sho’agim lataref ulewaqesh mei’el ’akhelam. 
psalms 104:22	tizrakh hashemesh yei’aseifun ve’el me‘onotam yirbatsun. 
psalms 104:23	yeitsei ’adam lefa‘olo vela‘awodato ‘adei ‘arew. 
psalms 104:24	mah rabu ma‘asekha yhoh kulam bekhakhemah ‘asita male’ah ha’arets qinyanekha. 
psalms 104:25	zeh hayam gadol urekhaw yadayim sham remes ve’en mispar khayot qetanot ‘im gedolot. 
psalms 104:26	m ’oniyot yehaleikhun livyatan zeh yatsarta lesakheq bo. 
psalms 104:27	kulam ’eilekha yesabeirun latet ’akhelam be‘ito. 
psalms 104:28	titen lahem yilqotun tiftakh yadekha yisbe‘un tow. 
psalms 104:29	tastir panekha yibaheilun tosef rukham yigva‘un ve’el ‘afaram yeshuwun. 
psalms 104:30	teshalakh rukhakha yibarei’un utekhadesh penei ’adamah. 
psalms 104:31	yehi khewod yhoh le‘olam yismakh yhoh bema‘asav. 
psalms 104:32	hamabit la’arets vatir‘ad yiga‘ beharim veye‘eshanu. 
psalms 104:33	’ashirah yhoh bekhayai ’azamerah leilohai be‘odi. 
psalms 104:34	ye‘eraw ‘alav sikhi ’anokhi ’esmakh yhoh. 
psalms 104:35	yitamu khata’im min ha’arets uresha‘im ‘od ’einam barakhi nafshi ’et yhoh halelu yah. 
psalms 105:1	hodu yhoh qir’u bishmo hodi‘u wa‘amim ‘alilotav. 
psalms 105:2	shiru lo zameru lo khu bekhal nifle’otav. 
psalms 105:3	hithalelu beshem qadesho yismakh lew mewaqshei yhoh. 
psalms 105:4	dirshu yhoh ve‘uzo baqeshu fanav tamid. 
psalms 105:5	zikhru nifle’otav ’asher ‘asah mofetav umishpetei fiv. 
psalms 105:6	zera‘ ’awraham ‘awdo benei ya‘aqow bekhirav. 
psalms 105:7	hu yhoh ’eloheinu bekhal ha’arets mishpatav. 
psalms 105:8	zakhar le‘olam berito dawar tsivah le’elef dor. 
psalms 105:9	’asher karat ’et ’awraham ushewu‘ato leyiskhaq. 
psalms 105:10	vaya‘amideha leya‘aqow lekhoq leyisra’el berit ‘olam. 
psalms 105:11	leimor lekha ’eten ’et ’erets kena‘an khewel nakhalatkhem. 
psalms 105:12	bihyotam metei mispar kim‘at vegarim bah. 
psalms 105:13	vayithalekhu migo ’el go mimamlakhah ’el ‘am ’akher. 
psalms 105:14	lo hiniakh ’adam le‘asheqam vayokhakh ‘aleihem melakhim. 
psalms 105:15	’al tige‘u wimshikhai velinwi’ai ’al tarei‘u. 
psalms 105:16	vayiqra ra‘aw ‘al ha’arets kal mateh lekhem shawar. 
psalms 105:17	shalakh lifneihem ’ish le‘ewed nimkar yosef. 
psalms 105:18	‘inu wakewel raglav raglo barzel ba’ah nafsho. 
psalms 105:19	‘ad ‘et bo dewaro ’imrat yhoh tserafatehu. 
psalms 105:20	shalakh melekh vayatireihu moshel ‘amim vayfatekheihu. 
psalms 105:21	samo ’adon leweito umoshel bekhal qinyano. 
psalms 105:22	le’sor sarav benafsho uzeqeinav yekhakem. 
psalms 105:23	vayawo yisra’el mitsrayim veya‘aqow gar be’erets kham. 
psalms 105:24	vayefer ’et ‘amo me’od vaya‘atsimeihu mitsarav.

psalms 105:26	lakh mosheh ‘awdo ’aharon ’asher bakhar bo. 
psalms 105:27	samu wam diwrei ’ototav umofetim be’erets kham. 
psalms 105:28	shalakh khoshekh vayakhshikh velo maru ’et dewarav dewaro. 
psalms 105:29	hafakh ’et meimeihem ledam vayamet ’et degatam. 
psalms 105:30	sharats ’artsam tsefarde‘im bekhadrei malkheihem. 
psalms 105:31	’amar vayawo ‘arow kinim bekhal gewulam. 
psalms 105:32	natan gishmeihem barad ’esh lehawot be’artsam. 
psalms 105:33	vayakh gafnam ute’einatam vayshaber ‘ets gewulam. 
psalms 105:34	’amar vayawo ’arbeh veyeleq ve’en mispar. 
psalms 105:35	vayokhal kal ‘eisew be’artsam vayokhal peri ’admatam. 
psalms 105:36	vayakh kal bekhor be’artsam reishit lekhal ’onam. 
psalms 105:37	vayotsi’em bekhesef vezahaw ve’en bishwatav koshel. 
psalms 105:38	samakh mitsrayim betseitam ki nafal pakhdam ‘aleihem. 
psalms 105:39	paras ‘anan lemasakh ve’esh leha’ir layelah. 
psalms 105:40	sha’al vayawei selav velekhem mayim yasbi‘em. 
psalms 105:41	patakh tsur vayazuwu mayim halekhu batsiyot nahar. 
psalms 105:42	ki zakhar ’et dewar qadesho ’et ’awraham ‘awdo. 
psalms 105:43	vayotsi ‘amo wesason berinah ’et bekhirav. 
psalms 105:44	vayiten lahem ’artsot goyim va‘amal le’umim yirashu.

psalms 108:5	rumah ‘al shamayim ’elohim ve‘al kal ha’arets kewodekha. 
psalms 108:6	lema‘an yeikhaletsun yedidekha hoshi‘ah yeminekha va‘aneini. 
psalms 108:7	’elohim diber beqadesho ’e‘lozah ’akhaleqah shekhem ve‘eimeq sukot ’amaded. 
psalms 108:8	li gil‘ad li menasheh ve’efrayim ma‘oz roshi yehudah mekhoqeqi.

psalms 108:10	mi yowileini ‘ir miwtsar mi nakhani ‘ad ’edom.

psalms 115:1	lo lanu yhoh lo lanu ki leshimkha ten kawod ‘al khasdekha ‘al ’amitekha. 
psalms 115:2	lamah yomeru hagoyim ’ayeh na ’eloheihem. 
psalms 115:3	veiloheinu washamayim kol ’asher khafets ‘asah. 
psalms 115:4	‘atsabeihem kesef vezahaw ma‘aseh yedei ’adam. 
psalms 115:5	peh lahem velo yedabeiru ‘einayim lahem velo yir’u. 
psalms 115:6	’azenayim lahem velo yishma‘u ’af lahem velo yerikhun. 
psalms 115:7	yedeihem velo yemishun ragleihem velo yehaleikhu lo yehgu bigronam. 
psalms 115:8	kemohem yihyu ‘oseihem kol ’asher boteiakh bahem. 
psalms 115:9	yisra’el betakh yhoh ‘ezram umaginam hu. 
psalms 115:10	bet ’aharon bitkhu yhoh ‘ezram umaginam hu. 
psalms 115:11	yir’ei yhoh bitkhu yhoh ‘ezram umaginam hu. 
psalms 115:12	yhoh zekharanu yewarekh yewarekh ’et bet yisra’el yewarekh ’et bet ’aharon. 
psalms 115:13	yewarekh yir’ei yhoh haqetanim ‘im hagedolim.

psalms 115:15	berukhim ’atem yhoh ‘oseh shamayim va’arets. 
psalms 115:16	hashamayim mayim yhoh veha’arets natan liwnei ’adam. 
psalms 115:17	lo hameitim yehalelu yah velo kal yoredei dumah. 
psalms 115:18	va’anakhnu newarekh yah mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam halelu yah. 
psalms 116:1	’ahawti ki yishma‘ yhoh ’et qoli takhanunai. 
psalms 116:2	ki hitah ’azeno li uweyamai ’eqra. 
psalms 116:3	’afafuni khewlei mavet umetsarei she’ol metsa’uni tsarah veyagon ’emtsa. 
psalms 116:4	uweshem yhoh ’eqra ’anah yhoh maletah nafshi. 
psalms 116:5	khanun yhoh vetsadiq veiloheinu merakhem. 
psalms 116:6	shomer petayim yhoh daloti veli yehoshia‘. 
psalms 116:7	shuwi nafshi limnukhayekhi ki yhoh gamal ‘alayekhi. 
psalms 116:8	ki khilatsta nafshi mimavet ’et ‘eini min dim‘ah ’et ragli midekhi. 
psalms 116:9	’ethalekh lifnei yhoh be’artsot hakhayim. 
psalms 116:10	he’emanti ki ’adaber ’ani ‘aniti me’od. 
psalms 116:11	’ani ’amarti wekhafezi kal ha’adam kozew. 
psalms 116:12	mah ’ashiw yhoh kal tagmulohi ‘alai. 
psalms 116:13	kos yeshu‘ot ’esa uweshem yhoh ’eqra. 
psalms 116:14	nedarai yhoh ’ashalem negdah na lekhal ‘amo. 
psalms 116:15	yaqar be‘einei yhoh hamavetah lakhasidav. 
psalms 116:16	’anah yhoh ki ’ani ‘awdekha ’ani ‘awdekha ben ’amatekha pitakhta lemoseirai. 
psalms 116:17	lekha ’ezbakh zewakh todah uweshem yhoh ’eqra. 
psalms 116:18	nedarai yhoh ’ashalem negdah na lekhal ‘amo. 
psalms 116:19	bekhatsrot bet yhoh betokheikhi yerushalim halelu yah. 
psalms 117:1	halelu ’et yhoh kal goyim bekhuhu kal ha’umim. 
psalms 117:2	ki gawar ‘aleinu khasdo ve’emet yhoh le‘olam halelu yah. 
psalms 118:1	hodu yhoh ki tow ki le‘olam khasdo. 
psalms 118:2	yomar na yisra’el ki le‘olam khasdo. 
psalms 118:3	yomeru na wet ’aharon ki le‘olam khasdo. 
psalms 118:4	yomeru na yir’ei yhoh ki le‘olam khasdo. 
psalms 118:5	min hameitsar qarati yah ‘anani wamerkhaw yah. 
psalms 118:6	yhoh li lo ’ira mah ya‘aseh li ’adam. 
psalms 118:7	yhoh li be‘ozerai va’ani ’er’eh wesone’ai. 
psalms 118:8	tow lakhasot yhoh mibetoakh ba’adam. 
psalms 118:9	tow lakhasot yhoh mibetoakh bindiwim. 
psalms 118:10	kal goyim sewawuni beshem yhoh ki ’amilam. 
psalms 118:11	sabuni gam sewawuni beshem yhoh ki ’amilam. 
psalms 118:12	sabuni khidworim do‘akhu ke’esh qotsim beshem yhoh ki ’amilam. 
psalms 118:13	dakhoh dekhitani linpol yhoh ‘azarani. 
psalms 118:14	‘azi vezimrat yah vayhi li lishu‘ah. 
psalms 118:15	qol rinah vishu‘ah be’aholei tsadiqim yemin yhoh ‘osah khayil. 
psalms 118:16	yemin yhoh romeimah yemin yhoh ‘osah khayil. 
psalms 118:17	lo ’amut ki ’ekhyeh va’asaper ma‘asei yah. 
psalms 118:18	yasor yiserani yah velamavet lo netanani. 
psalms 118:19	pitkhu li sha‘arei tsedeq ’awo wam ’odeh yah. 
psalms 118:20	zeh hasha‘ar yhoh tsadiqim yawo’u wo. 
psalms 118:21	’odkha ki ‘anitani vatehi li lishu‘ah. 
psalms 118:22	’ewen ma’asu habonim hayetah lerosh pinah. 
psalms 118:23	mei’et yhoh hayetah zot hi niflat be‘eineinu. 
psalms 118:24	zeh hayom ‘asah yhoh nagilah venismekhah wo. 
psalms 118:25	’ana yhoh hoshi‘ah na ’ana yhoh hatslikhah na. 
psalms 118:26	barukh haba beshem yhoh beirakhnukhem mibet yhoh. 
psalms 118:27	’el yhoh vaya’er lanu ’isru khag ba‘awotim ‘ad qarnot hamizbeiakh. 
psalms 118:28	’eili ’atah ve’odeka ’elohai ’aromeka. 
psalms 118:29	hodu yhoh ki tow ki le‘olam khasdo. 
psalms 119:1	’ashrei temimei darekh haholekhim betorat yhoh. 
psalms 119:2	’ashrei notserei ‘eidotav bekhal lew yidreshuhu. 
psalms 119:3	’af lo fa‘alu ‘avlah bidrakhav halakhu. 
psalms 119:4	’atah tsivitah fiqudekha lishmor me’od. 
psalms 119:5	’akhalai yikonu derakhai lishmor khuqekha. 
psalms 119:6	’az lo ’eiwosh behabiti ’el kal mitsvotekha. 
psalms 119:7	’odkha beyosher leiwaw belamedi mishpetei tsidqekha. 
psalms 119:8	’et khuqekha ’eshmor ’al ta‘azweini ‘ad me’od. 
psalms 119:9	bameh yezakeh na‘ar ’et ’arekho lishmor kidwarekha. 
psalms 119:10	bekhal libi derashtikha ’al tashgeini mimitsvotekha. 
psalms 119:11	belibi tsafanti ’imratekha lema‘an lo ’ekheta lakh. 
psalms 119:12	barukh ’atah yhoh lamedeini khuqekha. 
psalms 119:13	bisfatai siparti kol mishpetei fikha. 
psalms 119:14	bederekh ‘eidevotekha sasti ke‘al kal hon. 
psalms 119:15	befiqudekha ’asikhah ve’abitah ’orekhotekha. 
psalms 119:16	bekhuqotekha ’eshta‘asha‘ lo ’eshkakh dewarekha. 
psalms 119:17	gemol ‘al ‘awdekha ’ekhyeh ve’eshmerah dewarekha. 
psalms 119:18	gal ‘einai ve’abitah nifla’ot mitoratekha. 
psalms 119:19	ger ’anokhi wa’arets ’al taster mimeni mitsvotekha. 
psalms 119:20	garesah nafshi leta’awah ’el mishpatekha wekhal ‘et. 
psalms 119:21	ga‘arta zeidim ’arurim hashogim mimitsvotekha. 
psalms 119:22	gal mei‘alai kherpah vawuz ki ‘eidotekha natsareti. 
psalms 119:23	gam yashewu rim bi nidbaru ‘awdekha yasiakh bekhuqekha. 
psalms 119:24	gam ‘eidotekha sha‘ashu‘ai ’anshei ‘atsati. 
psalms 119:25	daweqah le‘afar nafshi khayeini kidwarekha. 
psalms 119:26	derakhai siparti vata‘aneini lamedeini khuqekha. 
psalms 119:27	derekh piqudekha hawineini ve’asikhah benifle’otekha. 
psalms 119:28	dalefah nafshi mitugah qayemeini kidwarekha. 
psalms 119:29	derekhoshe qer haser mimeni vetoratekha khaneini 
psalms 119:30	derekh ’emunah wakhareti mishpatekha shiviti. 
psalms 119:31	dawaqti we‘eidevotekha yhoh ’al tewisheini. 
psalms 119:32	derekh mitsvotekha ’aruts ki tarkhiw libi. 
psalms 119:33	horeini yhoh derekh khuqekha ve’etserenah ‘eiqew. 
psalms 119:34	hawineini ve’etserah toratekha ve’eshmerenah wekhal lew. 
psalms 119:35	hadrikheini bintiw mitsvotekha ki wo khafatseti. 
psalms 119:36	hat libi ’el ‘eidevotekha ve’al ’el batsa‘. 
psalms 119:37	ha‘awer ‘einai meire’ot shav bidrakhekha khayeini. 
psalms 119:38	haqem le‘awdekha ’imratekha ’asher leyir’atekha. 
psalms 119:39	ha‘awer kherpati ’asher yagoreti ki mishpatekha towim. 
psalms 119:40	hineh ta’awti lefiqudekha betsidqatekha khayeini. 
psalms 119:41	viwo’uni khasadekha yhoh teshu‘atekha ke’imratekha. 
psalms 119:42	ve’e‘eneh khorefi dawar ki watakhti bidwarekha. 
psalms 119:43	ve’al tatsel mipi dewar ’emet ‘ad me’od ki lemishpatekha yikhaleti. 
psalms 119:44	ve’eshmerah toratekha tamid le‘olam va‘ed. 
psalms 119:45	ve’ethalekhah warekhawah ki fiqudekha darasheti. 
psalms 119:46	va’adaberah we‘eidotekha neged melakhim velo ’eiwosh. 
psalms 119:47	ve’eshta‘asha‘ bemitsvotekha ’asher ’ahaweti. 
psalms 119:48	ve’esa khapai ’el mitsvotekha ’asher ’ahaweti ve’asikhah wekhuqekha. 
psalms 119:49	zekhor dawar le‘awdekha ‘al ’asher yikhaltani. 
psalms 119:50	zot nekhamati we‘aneyi ki ’imratekha khiyateni. 
psalms 119:51	zeidim helitsuni ‘ad me’od mitoratekha lo natiti. 
psalms 119:52	zakharti mishpatekha mei‘olam yhoh va’etnekham. 
psalms 119:53	zal‘afah ’akhazatni meiresha‘im ‘ozewei toratekha. 
psalms 119:54	zemirot hayu li khuqekha bewet megurai. 
psalms 119:55	zakharti walaylah shimkha yhoh va’eshmerah toratekha. 
psalms 119:56	zot hayetah li ki fiqudekha natsareti. 
psalms 119:57	khelqi yhoh ’amarti lishmor dewarekha. 
psalms 119:58	khiliti fanekha wekhal lew khaneini ke’imratekha. 
psalms 119:59	khishawti derakhai va’ashiwah raglai ’el ‘eidotekha. 
psalms 119:60	khashti velo hitmahmaheti lishmor mitsvotekha. 
psalms 119:61	khewlei resha‘im ‘iveduni toratekha lo shakhakheti. 
psalms 119:62	khatsot laylah ’aqum lehodot lakh ‘al mishpetei tsidqekha. 
psalms 119:63	khawer ’ani lekhal ’asher yerei’ukha uleshomerei piqudekha. 
psalms 119:64	khasdekha yhoh male’ah ha’arets khuqekha lamedeini. 
psalms 119:65	tow ‘asita ‘im ‘awdekha yhoh kidwarekha. 
psalms 119:66	tuw ta‘am vada‘at lamedeini ki wemitsvotekha he’emaneti. 
psalms 119:67	terem ’e‘eneh ’ani shogeg ve‘atah ’imratekha shamareti. 
psalms 119:68	tow ’atah umeitiw lamedeini khuqekha. 
psalms 119:69	tafelu ‘alai sheqer zeidim ’ani bekhal lew ’etsor piqudekha. 
psalms 119:70	tafash kakheilew libam ’ani toratekha shi‘asha‘eti. 
psalms 119:71	tow li khi ‘uneiti lema‘an ’elmad khuqekha. 
psalms 119:72	tow li torat pikha mei’alfei zahaw vakhasef. 
psalms 119:73	yadekha ‘asuni vaykhonuni hawineini ve’elmedah mitsvotekha. 
psalms 119:74	yerei’ekha yir’uni veyismakhu ki lidwarekha yikhaleti. 
psalms 119:75	yada‘ti yhoh ki tsedeq mishpatekha ve’emunah ‘initani. 
psalms 119:76	yehi na khasdekha lenakhameini ke’imratekha le‘awdekha. 
psalms 119:77	yewo’uni rakhamekha ve’ekhyeh ki toratekha sha‘ashu‘ai. 
psalms 119:78	yeiwoshu zeidim ki sheqer ‘ivetuni ’ani ’asiakh befiqudekha. 
psalms 119:79	yashuwu li yerei’ekha veyade‘u veyode‘ei ‘eidotekha. 
psalms 119:80	yehi libi tamim bekhuqekha lema‘an lo ’eiwosh. 
psalms 119:81	kaletah litshu‘atekha nafshi lidwarekha yikhaleti. 
psalms 119:82	kalu ‘einai le’imratekha leimor matai tenakhameini. 
psalms 119:83	ki hayiti kenod beqitor khuqekha lo shakhakheti. 
psalms 119:84	kamah yemei ‘awdekha matai ta‘aseh werodefai mishpat. 
psalms 119:85	karu li zeidim shikhot ’asher lo khetoratekha. 
psalms 119:86	kal mitsvotekha ’emunah sheqer redafuni ‘azereini. 
psalms 119:87	kim‘at kiluni wa’arets va’ani lo ‘azawti fiquvdekha 
psalms 119:88	kekhasdekha khayeini ve’eshmerah ‘eidut pikha. 
psalms 119:89	le‘olam yhoh dewarekha nitsaw bashamayim. 
psalms 119:90	ledor vador ’emunatekha konanta ’erets vata‘amod. 
psalms 119:91	lemishpatekha ‘amedu hayom ki hakol ‘awadekha. 
psalms 119:92	lulei toratekha sha‘ashu‘ai ’az ’awadti we‘aneyi. 
psalms 119:93	le‘olam lo ’eshkakh piqudekha ki wam khiyitani. 
psalms 119:94	lekha ’ani hoshi‘eini ki fiqudekha darasheti. 
psalms 119:95	li qivu resha‘im le’abedeini ‘eidotekha ’etbonan. 
psalms 119:96	lekhal tikhlah ra’iti qets rekhawah mitsvatekha me’od. 
psalms 119:97	mah ’ahawti toratekha kal hayom hi sikhati. 
psalms 119:98	mei’oyewai tekhakemeini mitsvotekha ki le‘olam hi li. 
psalms 119:99	mikal melamedai hiskalti ki ‘eidevotekha sikhah lyi. 
psalms 119:100	mizeqeinim ’etbonan ki fiqudekha natsareti. 
psalms 119:101	mikal ’orakh ra‘ kaliti raglai lema‘an ’eshmor dewarekha. 
psalms 119:102	mimishpatekha lo sareti ki ’atah horeitani. 
psalms 119:103	mah nimletsu lekhiki ’imratekha midewash lefi. 
psalms 119:104	mipiqudekha ’etbonan ‘al ken saneiti kal ’orakh shaqer. 
psalms 119:105	ner leragli dewarekha ve’or lintiwati. 
psalms 119:106	nishba‘ti va’aqayeimah lishmor mishpetei tsidqekha. 
psalms 119:107	na‘aneiti ‘ad me’od yhoh khayeini khidwarekha. 
psalms 119:108	nidwot pi retseh na yhoh umishpatekha lamedeini. 
psalms 119:109	nafshi wekhapi tamid vetoratekha lo shakhakheti. 
psalms 119:110	natenu resha‘im pakh li umipiqudekha lo ta‘iti. 
psalms 119:111	nakhalti ‘eidevotekha le‘olam ki seson libi hemah. 
psalms 119:112	natiti libi la‘asot khuqekha le‘olam ‘eiqew. 
psalms 119:113	sei‘afim saneiti vetoratekha ’ahaweti. 
psalms 119:114	sitri umagini ’atah lidwarekha yikhaleti. 
psalms 119:115	suru mimeni merei‘im ve’etserah mitsvot ’elohai. 
psalms 119:116	samekheini khe’imratekha ve’ekhyeh ve’al tewisheini misiwri. 
psalms 119:117	se‘adeini ve’ivashei‘ah ve’esh‘ah wekhuqekha tamid. 
psalms 119:118	salita kal shogim meikhuqekha kishe qer tarmitam. 
psalms 119:119	sigim hishbata khal rish‘ei ’arets lakhen ’ahawti ‘eidotekha. 
psalms 119:120	samar mipakhdekha wesari umimishpatekha yareiti. 
psalms 119:121	‘asiti mishpat vatsedeq bal tanikheini le‘osheqai. 
psalms 119:122	‘arow ‘awdekha letow ’al ya‘ashquni zeidim. 
psalms 119:123	‘einai kalu lishu‘atekha ule’imrat tsidqekha. 
psalms 119:124	‘aseh ‘im ‘awdekha khekhasdekha vekhuqekha lamedeini. 
psalms 119:125	‘awdekha ’ani hawineini ve’eide‘ah ‘eidotekha. 
psalms 119:126	‘et la‘asot yhoh heifeiru toratekha. 
psalms 119:127	‘al ken ’ahawti mitsvotekha mizahaw umipaz. 
psalms 119:128	‘al ken kal piqudei khol yishareti kal ’orakh sheqer saneiti. 
psalms 119:129	pela’ot ‘eidevotekha ‘al ken netsaratam nafshi. 
psalms 119:130	peitakh dewarekha ya’ir meiwin petayim. 
psalms 119:131	pi fa‘arti va’esh’afah ki lemitsvotekha ya’aweti. 
psalms 119:132	peneh ’eilai vekhaneini kemishpat le’ohawei shemekha. 
psalms 119:133	pe‘amai hakhen be’imratekha ve’al tashlet bi khal ’aven. 
psalms 119:134	pedeini mei‘osheq ’adam ve’eshmerah piqudekha. 
psalms 119:135	panekha ha’er be‘awdekha velamedeini ’et khuqekha. 
psalms 119:136	palgei mayim yaredu ‘einai ‘al lo shameru toratekha. 
psalms 119:137	tsadiq ’atah yhoh veyashar mishpatekha. 
psalms 119:138	tsivita tsedeq ‘eidotekha ve’emunah me’od. 
psalms 119:139	tsimetatni qin’ati ki shakhekhu dewarekha tsarai. 
psalms 119:140	tserufah ’imratekha me’od ve‘awdekha ’aheiwah. 
psalms 119:141	tsa‘ir ’anokhi veniwzeh piqudekha lo shakhakheti. 
psalms 119:142	tsidqatekha tsedeq le‘olam vetoratekha ’emet. 
psalms 119:143	tsar umatsoq metsa’uni mitsvotekha sha‘ashu‘ai. 
psalms 119:144	tsedeq ‘eidevotekha le‘olam hawineini ve’ekhyeh. 
psalms 119:145	qarati wekhal lew ‘aneini yhoh khuqekha ’etsorah. 
psalms 119:146	qeratikha hoshi‘eini ve’eshmerah ‘eidotekha. 
psalms 119:147	qidamti waneshef va’ashavei‘ah lidwarekha lidwarekha yikhaleti. 
psalms 119:148	qidemu ‘einai ’ashmurot lasiakh be’imratekha. 
psalms 119:149	qoli shim‘ah khekhasdekha yhoh kemishpatekha khayeini. 
psalms 119:150	qarewu rodefei zimah mitoratekha rakhaqu. 
psalms 119:151	qarow ’atah yhoh vekhal mitsvotekha ’emet. 
psalms 119:152	qedem yada‘ti mei‘eidotekha ki le‘olam yesadtam. 
psalms 119:153	re’eh ‘aneyi vekhaletseini ki toratekha lo shakhakheti. 
psalms 119:154	riwah riwi uge’aleini le’imratekha khayeini. 
psalms 119:155	rakhoq meiresha‘im yeshu‘ah ki khuqekha lo darashu. 
psalms 119:156	rakhamekha rabim yhoh kemishpatekha khayeini. 
psalms 119:157	rabim rodefai vetsarai mei‘eidevotekha lo natiti. 
psalms 119:158	ra’iti wogedim va’etqotatah ’asher ’imratekha lo shamaru. 
psalms 119:159	re’eh ki fiqudekha ’ahaweti yhoh kekhasdekha khayeini. 
psalms 119:160	rosh dewarekha ’emet ule‘olam kal mishpat tsidqekha. 
psalms 119:161	rim redafuni khinam umidewarekha umidewarekha pakhad libi. 
psalms 119:162	sas ’anokhi ‘al ’imratekha kemotsei shalal raw. 
psalms 119:163	sheqer neiti va’ata‘eiwah toratekha ’ahaweti. 
psalms 119:164	shewa‘ bayom hilaltikha ‘al mishpetei tsidqekha. 
psalms 119:165	shalom raw le’ohawei toratekha ve’en lamo mikhshol. 
psalms 119:166	sibarti lishu‘atekha yhoh umitsvotekha ‘asiti. 
psalms 119:167	shamerah nafshi ‘eidotekha va’ohawem me’od. 
psalms 119:168	shamarti fiqudekha ve‘eidotekha ki khal derakhai negdekha. 
psalms 119:169	tiqraw rinati lefanekha yhoh kidwarekha hawineini. 
psalms 119:170	tawo tekhinati lefanekha ke’imratekha hatsileini. 
psalms 119:171	taba‘nah sefatai tehilah ki telamedeini khuqekha. 
psalms 119:172	ta‘an leshoni ’imratekha ki khal mitsvotekha tsedeq. 
psalms 119:173	tehi yadekha le‘azereini ki fiqudekha wakhareti. 
psalms 119:174	ta’awti lishu‘atekha yhoh vetoratekha sha‘ashu‘ai. 
psalms 119:175	tekhi nafshi utehaleka umishpatekha ya‘azruni. 
psalms 119:176	ta‘iti keseh ’owed baqesh ‘awdekha ki mitsvotekha lo shakhakheti. 
psalms 120:1	shir hama‘alot ’el yhoh batsaratah li qarati vaya‘aneini. 
psalms 120:2	yhoh hatsilah nafshi misefat sheqer milashon remiyah. 
psalms 120:3	mah yiten lekha umah yosif lakh lashon remiyah. 
psalms 120:4	khitsei gibor shenunim ‘im gakhalei retamim. 
psalms 120:5	’oyah li ki garti meshekh khanti ‘im ’aholei qeidar. 
psalms 120:6	rabat shakhenah lah nafshi ‘im sonei shalom. 
psalms 120:7	’anisha lom vekhi ’adaber hemah lamilkhamah. 
psalms 121:1	shir lama‘alot ’esa ‘einai ’el heharim mei’ayin yawo ‘ezri. 
psalms 121:2	‘ezri mei‘im yhoh ‘oseh shamayim va’arets. 
psalms 121:3	’al yiten lamot raglekha ’al yanum shomerekha. 
psalms 121:4	hineh lo yanum velo yishan vmer yisra’el. 
psalms 121:5	yhoh shomerekha yhoh tsilekha ‘al yad yeminekha. 
psalms 121:6	yomam hashemesh lo yakekah veyareiakh balayelah. 
psalms 121:7	yhoh yishmarekha mikal ra‘ yishmor ’et nafshekha. 
psalms 121:8	yhoh yishmar tseitekha uwo’ekha mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam. 
psalms 122:1	shir hama‘alot ledavid makhti be’omerim li bet yhoh neilekh. 
psalms 122:2	‘omedot hayu ragleinu bish‘arayikh yerushalim. 
psalms 122:3	yerushalim habenuyah ke‘ir shekhuberah lah yakhdav. 
psalms 122:4	shesham ‘alu shewatim shiwtei yah ‘eidut leyisra’el lehodot leshem yhoh. 
psalms 122:5	ki shamah yashewu khis’ot lemishpat kis’ot lewet david. 
psalms 122:6	’alu shelom yerushalim yishlayu ’ohawayikh. 
psalms 122:7	yehi shalom bekheilekh levah be’armenotayikh. 
psalms 122:8	lema‘an ’akhai verei‘ai ’adaberah na shalom bakh. 
psalms 122:9	lema‘an bet yhoh ’eloheinu ’awaqshah tow lakh. 
psalms 123:1	shir hama‘alot ’eilekha nasati ’et ‘einai hayoshewi bashamayim. 
psalms 123:2	hineh khe‘einei ‘awadim ’el yad ’adoneihem ke‘einei shifkhah ’el yad gewirtah ken ‘eineinu ’el yhoh ’eloheinu ‘ad sheyekhaneinu. 
psalms 123:3	khaneinu yhoh khaneinu ki raw sawa‘nu wuz. 
psalms 123:4	rabat sawe‘ah lah nafsheinu hala‘ag hasha’ananim habuz lig’eiyonim 
psalms 124:1	shir hama‘alot ledavid lulei yhoh shehayah lanu yomar na yisra’el. 
psalms 124:2	lulei yhoh shehayah lanu bequm ‘aleinu ’adam. 
psalms 124:3	’azai khayim bela‘unu bakharot ’apam banu. 
psalms 124:4	’azai hamayim shetafunu nakhlah ‘awar ‘al nafsheinu. 
psalms 124:5	’azai ‘awar ‘al nafsheinu hamayim hazeidonim. 
psalms 124:6	barukh yhoh shelo netananu teref leshineihem. 
psalms 124:7	nafsheinu ketsipor nimletah mipakh yoqshim hapakh nishbar va’anakhnu nimlatenu. 
psalms 124:8	‘ezreinu beshem yhoh ‘oseh shamayim va’arets. 
psalms 125:1	shir hama‘alot habotekhim yhoh kehar tsiyon lo yimot le‘olam yeishew. 
psalms 125:2	yerushalim harim sawiw lah yhoh sawiw le‘amo mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam. 
psalms 125:3	ki lo yanuakh sheiwet haresha‘ ‘al goral hatsadiqim lema‘an lo yishlekhu hatsadiqim be‘avlatah yedeihem.

psalms 126:1	shir hama‘alot beshuw yhoh ’et shiwat tsiyon hayinu kekholemim.

psalms 126:3	higdil yhoh la‘asot ‘imanu hayinu semeikhim.

psalms 127:3	hineh nakhalat yhoh banim khar peri habaten.

psalms 145:11	kewod malkhutekha yomeiru ugewuratekha yedabeiru. 
psalms 145:12	lehodia‘ liwnei ha’adam gewurotav ukhewod hadar malkhuto. 
psalms 145:13	malkhutekha malkhut kal ‘olamim umemsheltekha bekhal dor vador. 
psalms 145:14	somekh yhoh lekhal hanofelim vezoqef lekhal hakefufim. 
psalms 145:15	‘einei khol ’eilekha yesabeiru ve’atah noten lahem ’et ’akhelam be‘ito. 
psalms 145:16	poteiakh ’et yadekha umasbia‘ lekhal khai ratson. 
psalms 145:17	tsadiq yhoh bekhal derakhav vekhasid bekhal ma‘asav. 
psalms 145:18	qarow yhoh lekhal qore’av lekhol ’asher yiqra’uhu we’emet. 
psalms 145:19	retson yerei’av ya‘aseh ve’et shav‘atam yishma‘ veyoshi‘em. 
psalms 145:20	shomer yhoh ’et kal ’ohawav ve’et kal haresha‘im yashmid. 
psalms 145:21	tehilat yhoh yedaber pi viwarekh kal basar shem qadesho le‘olam va‘ed. 
psalms 146:1	halelu yah hali nafshi ’et yhoh. 
psalms 146:2	’ahalah yhoh bekhayai ’azamerah leilohai be‘odi. 
psalms 146:3	’al tiwtekhu windiwim bewen ’adam she’en lo teshu‘ah. 
psalms 146:4	teitsei rukho yashuw le’admato bayom hahu ’awedu ‘eshtonotav. 
psalms 146:5	’ashrei she’el ya‘aqow be‘ezro wero ‘al yhoh ’elohav. 
psalms 146:6	‘oseh shamayim va’arets ’et hayam ve’et kal ’asher bam hashomer ’emet le‘olam. 
psalms 146:7	‘oseh mishpat la‘ashuqim noten lekhem lare‘eiwim yhoh matir ’asurim. 
psalms 146:8	yhoh poqeiakh ‘ivrim yhoh zoqef kefufim yhoh ’ohew tsadiqim. 
psalms 146:9	yhoh shomer ’et geirim yatom ve’almanah ye‘oded vederekh resha‘im ye‘avet. 
psalms 146:10	yimlokh yhoh le‘olam ’elohayikh tsiyon ledor vador halelu yah. 
psalms 147:1	halelu yah ki tow zamerah ’eloheinu ki na‘im navah tehilah. 
psalms 147:2	boneh yerushalim yhoh nidkhei yisra’el yekhanes. 
psalms 147:3	harofei lishwurei lew umekhabesh le‘atsewotam. 
psalms 147:4	moneh mispar lakokhawim lekhulam sheimot yiqra. 
psalms 147:5	gadol ’adoneinu veraw koakh litwunato ’en mispar. 
psalms 147:6	me‘oded ‘anavim yhoh mashpil resha‘im ‘adei ’arets. 
psalms 147:7	‘enu yhoh betodah zameru leiloheinu wekhinor. 
psalms 147:8	hamkhaseh shamayim be‘awim hameikhin la’arets matar hamatsmiakh harim khatsir. 
psalms 147:9	noten liwheimah lakhmah liwnei ‘orew ’asher yiqra’u. 
psalms 147:10	lo wigwurat hasus yekhpats lo weshoqei ha’ish yirtseh. 
psalms 147:11	rotseh yhoh ’et yerei’av ’et hamyakhalim lekhasdo. 
psalms 147:12	shabekhi yerushalim ’et yhoh hali ’elohayikh tsiyon. 
psalms 147:13	ki khizaq berikhei she‘arayikh beirakh banayikh beqirbekh. 
psalms 147:14	hasam gewulekh shalom kheilew khitim yasbi‘ekh. 
psalms 147:15	hasholeiakh ’imrato ’arets ‘ad meheirah yaruts dewaro. 
psalms 147:16	hanoten sheleg katsamer kefor ka’eifer yefazer. 
psalms 147:17	mashlikh qarkho khefitim lifnei qarato mi ya‘amod. 
psalms 147:18	yishlakh dewaro veyamsem yashew rukho yizelu mayim. 
psalms 147:19	magid dewaro dewarav leya‘aqow khuqav umishpatav leyisra’el. 
psalms 147:20	lo ‘asah khen lekhal go umishpatim bal yeda‘um halelu yah. 
psalms 148:1	halelu yah halelu ’et yhoh min hashamayim haleluhu bameromim. 
psalms 148:2	haleluhu khal mal’akhav haleluhu kal tsewa’o tsewa’av. 
psalms 148:3	haleluhu shemesh veyareiakh haleluhu kal kokhwei ’or. 
psalms 148:4	haleluhu shemei hashamayim vehamayim ’asher mei‘al hashamayim. 
psalms 148:5	yehalelu ’et shem yhoh ki hu tsivah veniwra’u. 
psalms 148:6	vaya‘amidem la‘ad le‘olam khaq natan velo ya‘awor. 
psalms 148:7	halelu ’et yhoh min ha’arets taninim vekhal tehomot. 
psalms 148:8	’esh uwarad sheleg veqitor ruakh se‘arah ‘osah dewaro. 
psalms 148:9	heharim vekhal gewa‘ot ‘ets peri vekhal ’arazim. 
psalms 148:10	hakhayah vekhal beheimah remes vetsipor kanaf. 
psalms 148:11	malkhei ’erets vekhal le’umim rim vekhal shofetei ’arets. 
psalms 148:12	bakhurim vegam betulot zeqeinim ‘im ne‘arim. 
psalms 148:13	yehalelu ’et shem yhoh ki nisgaw shemo lewado hodo ‘al ’erets veshamayim. 
psalms 148:14	vayarem qeren le‘amo tehilah lekhal khasidav liwnei yisra’el ‘am qerowo halelu yah. 
psalms 149:1	halelu yah shiru yhoh shir khadash tehilato biqhal khasidim. 
psalms 149:2	yismakh yisra’el be‘osav benei tsiyon yagilu wemalkam. 
psalms 149:3	yehalelu shemo wemakhol betof vekhinor yezameru lo. 
psalms 149:4	ki rotseh yhoh be‘amo yefa’er ‘anavim bishu‘ah. 
psalms 149:5	ya‘lezu khasidim bekhawod yeranenu ‘al mishkewotam. 
psalms 149:6	romot ’el bigronam vekherew pifiyot beyadam.

psalms 149:8	le’sor malkheihem beziqim venikhbedeihem bekhawlei warzel. 
psalms 149:9	la‘asot bahem mishpat katuw hadar hu lekhal khasidav halelu yah.

psalms 150:6	kol haneshamah tehalel yah halelu yah. 
proverbs 1:1	mishlei shelomoh wen david melekh yisra’el.

proverbs 6:15	‘al ken pit’om yawo ’eido peta‘ yishawer ve’en marpei. 
proverbs 6:16	shesh henah sanei yhoh veshewa‘ to‘awot to‘awat nafsho. 
proverbs 6:17	‘einayim ramot leshon shaqer veyadayim shofekhot dam naqi. 
proverbs 6:18	lew khoresh makhshewot ’aven raglayim memaharot laruts lara‘ah. 
proverbs 6:19	yafiakh kezawim ‘ed shaqer umeshaleiakh medanim ben ’akhim. 
proverbs 6:20	netsor beni mitsvat ’awikha ve’al titosh torat ’imekha. 
proverbs 6:21	qasherem ‘al libekha tamid ‘anedem ‘al gargerotekha. 
proverbs 6:22	behithalekhkha tankheh ’otakh beshakhebekha tishmor ‘alekha vahaqitsota hi tesikhekha. 
proverbs 6:23	ki ner mitsvah vetorah ’or vederekh khayim tokhkhot musar. 
proverbs 6:24	lishmarekha mei’eishet ra‘ meikhelqat lashon nakheriyah. 
proverbs 6:25	’al takhmod yafeyah bilwawekha ve’al tiqakhakha be‘af‘apeha. 
proverbs 6:26	ki we‘ad ’ishah zonah ‘ad kikar lakhem ve’eishet ’ish nefesh yeqarah tatsud. 
proverbs 6:27	hayakhteh ’ish ’esh bekheiqo uwegadav lo tisarafnah. 
proverbs 6:28	’im yehalekh ’ish ‘al hagekhalim veraglav lo tikavenah. 
proverbs 6:29	ken haba ’el ’eishet rei‘eihu lo yinaqeh kal hanogeia‘ bah. 
proverbs 6:30	lo yawuzu laganaw ki yignow lemalei nafsho ki yir‘aw. 
proverbs 6:31	venimtsa yeshalem shiw‘atayim ’et kal hon beito yiten. 
proverbs 6:32	no’ef ’ishah khasar lew mashkhit nafsho hu ya‘asenah. 
proverbs 6:33	nega‘ veqalon yimtsa vekherpato lo timakheh.

proverbs 15:2	leshon khakhamim teitiw da‘at ufi khesilim yabia‘ ’ivelet. 
proverbs 15:3	bekhal maqom ‘einei yhoh tsofot ra‘im vtowim

proverbs 15:5	’evil yin’ats musar ’awiv veshomer tokhakhat ya‘rim. 
proverbs 15:6	bet tsadiq khosen raw uwitwu’at rasha‘ ne‘karet. 
proverbs 15:7	siftei khakhamim yezaru da‘at velew kesilim lo khen. 
proverbs 15:8	zewakh resha‘im to‘awat yhoh utefilat yesharim retsono. 
proverbs 15:9	to‘awat yhoh derekh rasha‘ umeradef tsedaqah ye’ehaw. 
proverbs 15:10	musar ra‘ le‘ozew ’orakh sonei tokhakhat yamut. 
proverbs 15:11	she’ol va’awadon neged yhoh ’af ki libot benei ’adam. 
proverbs 15:12	lo ye’ehaw lets hokheiakh lo ’el khakhamim lo yeilekh. 
proverbs 15:13	lew meiakh yeitiw panim uwe‘atsewat lew ruakh nekhei’ah. 
proverbs 15:14	lew nawon yewaqesh da‘at ufenei ufi khesilim yir‘eh ’ivelet. 
proverbs 15:15	kal yemei ‘ani ra‘im vetow lew mishteh tamid. 
proverbs 15:16	tow me‘at beyir’at yhoh mei’otsar raw umehumah wo.
