proverbs 31:16	zamemah deh vatiqakheihu miperi khapeha neta‘ nate‘ah karem. 
proverbs 31:17	khagerah we‘oz mateneha vate’amets zero‘oteha. 
proverbs 31:18	ta‘amah ki tow sakhrah lo yikhbeh walayil walaylah neirah. 
proverbs 31:19	yadeha shilekhah wakishor vekhapeha tamekhu falekh. 
proverbs 31:20	kapah paresah le‘ani veyadeha shilekhah la’ewyon. 
proverbs 31:21	lo tira leweitah mishaleg ki khal beitah lawush shanim. 
proverbs 31:22	marwadim ‘asetah lah shesh ve’argaman lewushah. 
proverbs 31:23	noda‘ bashe‘arim ba‘lah beshiwto ‘im ziqnei ’arets. 
proverbs 31:24	sadin ‘asetah vatimkor vakhagor natenah lakena‘ani. 
proverbs 31:25	‘oz vehadar lewushah vatiskhaq leyom ’akharon. 
proverbs 31:26	piha patekhah wekhakhemah vetorat khesed ‘al leshonah. 
proverbs 31:27	tsofiyah halikhot beitah velekhem ‘atslut lo tokhel. 
proverbs 31:28	qamu waneha vai’asheruha ba‘lah vayhalah. 
proverbs 31:29	rabot banot ‘asu khayil ve’at ‘alit ‘al kulanah. 
proverbs 31:30	sheqer hakhen vehewel hayofi ’ishah yir’at yhoh hi tithalal. 
proverbs 31:31	tenu lah miperi yadeha vihaleluha washe‘arim ma‘aseha. 
job 1:1	’ish hayah we’erets ‘uts ’iyow shemo vehayah ha’ish hahu tam veyashar virei ’elohim vesar meira‘. 
job 1:2	vayivaledu lo shiw‘ah wanim veshalosh banot. 
job 1:3	vayhi miqneihu shiw‘at ’alfei tson usheloshet ’alfei gemalim vakhamesh mei’ot tsemed baqar vakhamesh mei’ot ’atonot va‘awudah rabah me’od vayhi ha’ish hahu gadol mikal benei qedem. 
job 1:4	vehalekhu wanav ve‘asu mishteh bet ’ish yomo veshalekhu veqare’u lishloshet ’akhyoteihem ’akhyoteihem le’ekhol velishtot ‘imahem. 
job 1:5	vayhi ki hiqifu yemei hamishteh vayishlakh ’iyow vayqadeshem vehishkim baboqer vehe‘elah ‘olot mispar kulam ki ’amar ’iyow ’ulai khate’u wanai uweirakhu ’elohim bilwawam kakhah ya‘aseh ’iyow kal hayamim. 
job 1:6	vayhi hayom vayawo’u benei ha’elohim lehityatsew ‘al yhoh vayawo gam hasatan betokham. 
job 1:7	vayomer yhoh ’el hasatan mei’ayin tawo vaya‘an hasatan ’et yhoh vayomar mishut ba’arets umeihithalekh bah. 
job 1:8	vayomer yhoh ’el hasatan hasamta libekha ‘al ‘awdi ’iyow ki ’en kamohu ba’arets ’ish tam veyashar yerei ’elohim vesar meira‘. 
job 1:9	vaya‘an hasatan ’et yhoh vayomar hakhinam yarei ’iyow ’elohim. 
job 1:10	halo ’at ’atah sakhta wa‘ado uwe‘ad beito uwe‘ad kal ’asher lo misawiw ma‘aseh yadav beirakhta umiqneihu parats ba’arets. 
job 1:11	ve’ulam shelakh na yadekha vega‘ bekhal ’asher lo ’im lo ‘al panekha yewarakheka. 
job 1:12	vayomer yhoh ’el hasatan hineh khal ’asher lo beyadekha raq ’eilav ’al tishlakh yadekha vayeitsei hasatan mei‘im penei yhoh. 
job 1:13	vayhi hayom uwanav uwenotav ’okhelim veshotim yayin bewet ’akhihem habekhor. 
job 1:14	umal’akh ba ’el ’iyow vayomar habaqar hayu khoreshot veha’atonot ro‘ot ‘al yedeihem. 
job 1:15	vatipol shewa vatiqakhem ve’et hane‘arim hiku lefi kharew va’imaletah raq ’ani lewadi lehagid lakh. 
job 1:16	‘od zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar ’esh ’elohim nafelah min hashamayim vatiw‘ar batson uwane‘arim vatokhelem va’imaletah raq ’ani lewadi lehagid lakh. 
job 1:17	‘od zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar kasdim samu sheloshah rashim vayifshetu ‘al hagemalim vayiqakhum ve’et hane‘arim hiku lefi kharew va’imaletah raq ’ani lewadi lehagid lakh. 
job 1:18	‘ad zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar banekha uwenotekha ’okhelim veshotim yayin bewet ’akhihem habekhor. 
job 1:19	vehineh ruakh gedolah ba’ah mei‘eiwer hamidbar vayiga‘ be’arba‘ pinot habayit vayipol ‘al hane‘arim vayamutu va’imaletah raq ’ani lewadi lehagid lakh. 
job 1:20	vayaqam ’iyow vayiqra‘ ’et me‘ilo vayagaz ’et rosho vayipol ’artsah vayishtakhu. 
job 1:21	vayomer ‘arom yatsati yatsati mibeten ’imi ve‘arom ’ashuw shamah yhoh natan yhoh laqakh yehi shem yhoh meworakh. 
job 1:22	bekhal zot lo khata ’iyow velo natan tiflah leilohim. 
job 2:1	vayhi hayom vayawo’u benei ha’elohim lehityatsew ‘al yhoh vayawo gam hasatan betokham lehityatsew ‘al yhoh. 
job 2:2	vayomer yhoh ’el hasatan ’ei mizeh tawo vaya‘an hasatan ’et yhoh vayomar mishut ba’arets umeihithalekh bah. 
job 2:3	vayomer yhoh ’el hasatan hasamta libekha ’el ‘awdi ’iyow ki ’en kamohu ba’arets ’ish tam veyashar yerei ’elohim vesar meira‘ ve‘odenu makhaziq betumato vatesiteini wo lewale‘o khinam. 
job 2:4	vaya‘an hasatan ’et yhoh vayomar ‘or be‘ad ‘or vekhol ’asher la’ish yiten be‘ad nafsho. 
job 2:5	’ulam shelakh na yadekha vega‘ ’el ‘atsmo ve’el besaro ’im lo ’el panekha yewarakheka. 
job 2:6	vayomer yhoh ’el hasatan hino weyadekha ’akh ’et nafsho shemor. 
job 2:7	vayeitsei hasatan mei’et penei yhoh vayakh ’et ’iyow bishkhin ra‘ mikaf raglo ‘ad ve‘ad qadeqodo. 
job 2:8	vayiqakh lo kheres lehitgared bo vehu yoshew betokh ha’eifer. 
job 2:9	vatomer lo ’ishto ‘odekha makhaziq betumatekha barekh ’elohim vamut. 
job 2:10	vayomer ’eileha kedaber ’akhat hanewalot tedabeiri gam ’et hatow neqabel mei’et ha’elohim ve’et hara‘ lo neqabel bekhal zot lo khata ’iyow bisfatav. 
job 2:11	vayishme‘u sheloshet rei‘ei ’iyow ’et kal hara‘ah hazot haba’ah ‘alav vayawo’u ’ish mimeqomo ’elifaz hateimani uwildad hashukhi vetsofar hana‘amati vayiva‘adu yakhdav lawo lanud lo ulenakhamo. 
job 2:12	vayis’u ’et ‘eineihem meirakhoq velo hikiruhu vayis’u qolam vayiwku vayiqre‘u ’ish me‘ilo vayizrequ ‘afar ‘al rasheihem hashamayemah. 
job 2:13	vayeishewu ’ito la’arets shiw‘at yamim veshiw‘at leilot ve’en dower ’eilav dawar ki ra’u ki gadal hake’ew me’od. 
job 3:1	’akharei khen patakh ’iyow ’et pihu vayqalel ’et yomo. 
job 3:2	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 3:3	yowad yom ’ivaled bo vehalaylah ’amar horah gawer. 
job 3:4	hayom hahu yehi khoshekh ’al yidresheihu ’eloah mima‘al ve’al tofa‘ ‘alav neharah. 
job 3:5	yig’aluhu khoshekh vetsalmavet tishkan ‘alav ‘ananah yewa‘atuhu kimrirei yom. 
job 3:6	halaylah hahu yiqakheihu ’ofel ’al yikhad bimei shanah bemispar yerakhim ’al yawo. 
job 3:7	hineh halaylah hahu yehi galmud ’al tawo renanah wo. 
job 3:8	yiqewuhu ’orerei yom ha‘atidim ‘orer livyatan. 
job 3:9	yekhshekhu kokhwei nishpo yeqav le’or va’ayin ve’al yir’eh be‘af‘apei shakhar. 
job 3:10	ki lo sagar daltei witni vayaster ‘amal mei‘einai. 
job 3:11	lamah lo meirekhem ’amut mibeten yatsati ve’egva‘. 
job 3:12	madua‘ qidemuni wirkayim umahosha dayim ki ’inaq. 
job 3:13	ki ‘atah shakhawti ve’eshqot yashanti ’az yanuakh li. 
job 3:14	‘im melakhim veyo‘atsei ’arets habonim khorawot lamo. 
job 3:15	’o ‘imsa rim zahaw lahem hamal’im bateihem kasef. 
job 3:16	’o kheneifel tamun lo ’ehyeh ke‘olelim lo ra’u ’or. 
job 3:17	sham resha‘im khadelu rogez vesham yanukhu yegi‘ei khoakh. 
job 3:18	yakhad ’asirim sha’ananu lo me‘u qol noges. 
job 3:19	qaton vegadol sham hu ve‘ewed khafeshi mei’adonav. 
job 3:20	lamah yiten le‘amel ’or vekhayim lemarei nafesh. 
job 3:21	hamkhakim lamavet ve’einenu vayakhperuhu mimatmonim. 
job 3:22	hasemeikhim ’elei gil yasisu ki yimtse’u qawer. 
job 3:23	legewer ’asher darko nistarah vayasekh ’eloah ba‘ado. 
job 3:24	ki lifnei lakhmi ’ankhati tawo vayitekhu khamayim sha’agotai. 
job 3:25	ki fakhad pakhadti vaye’etayeini va’asher yagoreti yawo li. 
job 3:26	lo shalavti velo shaqati velo nakheti vayawo rogez. 
job 4:1	vaya‘an ’elifaz hateimani vayomar. 
job 4:2	hanisah dawar ’eilekha til’eh va‘tsor bemilin mi yukhal. 
job 4:3	hineh yisarta rabim veyadayim rafot tekhazeq. 
job 4:4	koshel yeqimun milekha uwirkayim kore‘ot te’amets. 
job 4:5	ki ‘atah tawo ’eilekha vateile tiga‘ ‘adekha vatibahel. 
job 4:6	halo yir’atekha kislatekha tiqvatekha vetom derakhekha. 
job 4:7	zekhar na mi hu naqi ’awad ve’eifoh yesharim nikhkhadu. 
job 4:8	ka’asher ra’iti khoreshei ’aven vezore‘ei ‘amal yiqtseruhu. 
job 4:9	minishmat ’eloha yoweidu umeiruakh ’apo yikhlu. 
job 4:10	sha’agat ’aryeh veqol shakhal veshinei khefirim nita‘u. 
job 4:11	layish ’owed mibeli taref uwenei lawi yitparadu. 
job 4:12	ve’eilai dawar yegunaw vatiqakh ’azeni sheimets menhu. 
job 4:13	bis‘ipim meikhezyonot layelah binfol tardeimah ‘al ’anashim. 
job 4:14	pakhad qera’ani ure‘adah verow ‘atsmotai hifkhid. 
job 4:15	veruakh ‘al panai yakhalof tesamer sa‘arat besari. 
job 4:16	ya‘amod velo ’akir mar’eihu temunah leneged ‘einai demamah vaqol ’eshma‘. 
job 4:17	ha’enosh mei’eloha yitsdaq ’im mei‘oseihu yithar gawer. 
job 4:18	hen ba‘awadav lo ya’amin uwemal’akhav yasim taholah. 
job 4:19	’af shokhenei watei khomer ’asher be‘afar yesodam yedake’um lifnei ‘ash. 
job 4:20	miboqer la‘erew yukatu mibeli meisim lanetsakh yoweidu. 
job 4:21	halo nisa‘ yitram bam yamutu velo wekhakhemah. 
job 5:1	qera na hayesh ‘oneka ve’el mi miqedoshim tifneh. 
job 5:2	ki le’evil yaharag ka‘as ufoteh tamit qin’ah. 
job 5:3	’ani ra’iti ’evil mashrish va’eqow naveihu fit’om. 
job 5:4	yirkhaqu wanav miyesha‘ veyidake’u washa‘ar ve’en matsil. 
job 5:5	’asher qetsiro ra‘ew yokhel ve’el mitsinim yiqakheihu vesha’af tsamim kheilam. 
job 5:6	ki lo yeitsei mei‘afar ’aven umei’adamah lo yitsmakh ‘amal. 
job 5:7	ki ’adam le‘amal yulad uwenei reshef yagbihu ‘uf. 
job 5:8	’ulam ’ani ’edrosh ’el ’el ve’el ’elohim ’asim diwrati. 
job 5:9	‘oseh gedolot ve’en kheiqer nifla’ot ‘ad ’en mispar. 
job 5:10	hanoten matar ‘al penei ’arets vesholeiakh mayim ‘al penei khutsot. 
job 5:11	lasum shefalim lemarom veqoderim sagewu yesha‘. 
job 5:12	meifer makhshewot ‘arumim velo ta‘asenah yedeihem tushiyah. 
job 5:13	lokhed khakhamim be‘aremam va‘atsat niftalim nimharah. 
job 5:14	yomam yefageshu khoshekh vekhalaylah yemashu watsahorayim. 
job 5:15	vayosha‘ meikherew mipihem umiyad khazaq ’ewyon. 
job 5:16	vatehi ladal tiqvah ve‘olatah qafetsah piha. 
job 5:17	hineh ’ashrei ’enosh yokhikhenu ’eloah umusar dai ’al tim’as. 
job 5:18	ki hu yakh’iw veyekhbash yimkhats veyado veyadav tirpenah. 
job 5:19	beshesh tsarot yatsileka uweshewa‘ lo yiga‘ bekha ra‘. 
job 5:20	bera‘aw padekha mimavet uwemilkhamah midei kharew. 
job 5:21	beshot lashon teikhawei velo tira mishod ki yawo. 
job 5:22	leshod ulekhafan tiskhaq umeikhayat ha’arets ’al tira. 
job 5:23	ki ‘im ’awnei hasadeh weritekha vekhayat hasadeh hashelemah lakh. 
job 5:24	veyada‘ta ki shalom ’aholekha ufaqadta navekha velo tekheta. 
job 5:25	veyada‘ta ki raw zar‘ekha vetse’etsa’ekha ke‘eisew ha’arets. 
job 5:26	tawo wekhelakh ’elei qawer ka‘alot gadish be‘ito. 
job 5:27	hineh zot khaqarnuha ken hi ma‘enah ve’atah da‘ lakh. 
job 6:1	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 6:2	lu shaqol yishaqel ka‘si vehayati vehavati bemozenayim yis’u yakhad. 
job 6:3	ki ‘atah meikhol yamim yikhbad ‘al ken dewarai la‘u. 
job 6:4	ki khitsei shadai ‘imadi ’asher khamatam shotah rukhi bi‘utei ’eloah ya‘arkhuni. 
job 6:5	hayinhaq pere ‘alei deshe ’im yig‘ehosho vr ‘al belilo. 
job 6:6	hayei’akhel tafel mibeli melakh ’im yesh ta‘am berir khalamut. 
job 6:7	mei’anah lingoa‘ nafshi hemah kidvei lakhmi. 
job 6:8	mi yiten tawo she’elati vetiqvati yiten ’eloah. 
job 6:9	veyo’el ’eloah vidake’eini yater yado viwatse‘eini. 
job 6:10	utehi ‘od nekhamati va’asaledah wekhilah lo yakhmol ki lo khikhadti ’imrei qadosh. 
job 6:11	mah kokhi khi ’ayakhel umah qitsi ki ’a’arikh nafshi. 
job 6:12	’im koakh ’awanim kokhi ’im besari nakhush. 
job 6:13	ha’im ’en ‘ezrati wi vetushiyah nidekhah mimeni. 
job 6:14	lamas meirei‘eihu khased veyir’at shadai ya‘azow. 
job 6:15	’akhai bagedu khemo nakhal ka’afiq nekhalim ya‘aworu. 
job 6:16	haqoderim mini qarakh ‘aleimo yit‘alem shaleg. 
job 6:17	be‘et yezorewu nitsmatu bekhumo nid‘akhu mimeqomam. 
job 6:18	yilafetu ’arekhot darkam ya‘alu watohu veyoweidu. 
job 6:19	hibitu ’arekhot teima halikhot wa qivu lamo. 
job 6:20	boshu ki watakh ba’u ‘adeha vayekhparu. 
job 6:21	ki ‘atah heyitem lo lo tir’u khatat vatira’u. 
job 6:22	hakhi ’amarti hawu li umikokhakhem shikhadu wa‘adi. 
job 6:23	umaletuni miyad tsar umiyad ‘aritsim tifduni. 
job 6:24	horuni va’ani ’akharish umahosha giti hawinu li. 
job 6:25	mah nimretsu ’imrei yosher umah yokhiakh hokheiakh mikem. 
job 6:26	halhokhakh milim takhshowu uleruakh ’imrei no’ash. 
job 6:27	’af ‘al yatom tapilu vetikhru ‘al rei‘akhem. 
job 6:28	ve‘atah ho’ilu fenu wi ve‘al peneikhem ’im ’akhazew. 
job 6:29	shuwu na ’al tehi ‘avlah veshuwi veshuwu ‘od tsidqi wah. 
job 6:30	hayesh bilshoni ‘avlah ’im khiki lo yawin havot. 
job 7:1	halo tsawa le’enosh ‘al ‘alei ’arets vekhimei sakhir yamav. 
job 7:2	ke‘ewed yish’af tsel ukhesakhir yeqaveh fa‘olo. 
job 7:3	ken hanekhalti li yarkhei shav veleilot ‘amal minu li. 
job 7:4	’im shakhawti ve’amarti matai ’aqum umidad ‘arew vesawa‘ti nedudim ‘adei nashef. 
job 7:5	lawash besari rimah vegish vegush ‘afar ‘ori raga‘ vayima’es. 
job 7:6	yamai qalu mini ’areg vayikhlu be’efes tiqvah. 
job 7:7	zekhor ki ruakh khayai lo tashuw ‘eini lir’ot tow. 
job 7:8	lo teshureini ‘en ro’i ‘einekha bi ve’eineni. 
job 7:9	kalah ‘anan vayeilakh ken yored ’ol lo ya‘aleh. 
job 7:10	lo yashuw ‘od leweito velo yakirenu ‘od meqomo. 
job 7:11	gam ’ani lo ’ekhesakh pi ’adaberah betsar rukhi ’asikhah bemar nafshi. 
job 7:12	hayam ’ani ’im tanin ki tasim ‘alai mishmar. 
job 7:13	ki ’amarti tenakhameini ‘arsi yisa wesikhi mishkawi. 
job 7:14	vekhitatani wakhalomot umeikhezyonot tewa‘atani. 
job 7:15	vatiwkhar makhanaq nafshi mavet mei‘atsmotai. 
job 7:16	ma’asti lo le‘olam ’ekhyeh khadal mimeni ki hewel yamai. 
job 7:17	mah ’enosh ki tegadelenu vekhi tashit ’eilav libekha. 
job 7:18	vatifqedenu liwqarim lirga‘im tiwkhanenu. 
job 7:19	kamah lo tish‘eh mimeni lo tarpeini ‘ad bil‘i ruqi. 
job 7:20	khatati mah ’ef‘al lakh notser ha’adam lamah samtani lemifga‘ lakh va’ehyeh ‘alai lemasa. 
job 7:21	umeh lo tisa fish‘i veta‘awir ’et ‘avoni ki ‘atah le‘afar ’eshkaw veshikhartani ve’eineni. 
job 8:1	vaya‘an bildad hashukhi vayomar 
job 8:2	‘ad ’an temalel ’eleh veruakh kabir ’imrei fikha. 
job 8:3	ha’el ye‘avet mishpat ve’imosha dai ye‘avet tsedeq. 
job 8:4	’im banekha khate’u lo vayshalekhem beyad pish‘am. 
job 8:5	’im ’atah teshakher ’el ’el ve’elosha dai titkhanan. 
job 8:6	’im zakh veyashar ’atah ki ‘atah ya‘ir ‘alekha veshilam nevat tsidqekha. 
job 8:7	vehayah reishitekha mits‘ar ve’akharitekha yisgeh me’od. 
job 8:8	ki she’al na ledor rishon vekhonen lekheiqer ’awotam. 
job 8:9	ki temol ’anakhnu velo neida‘ ki tsel yameinu ‘alei ’arets. 
job 8:10	halo hem yorukha yomeru lakh umilibam yotsi’u milim. 
job 8:11	hayig’eh gome belo witsah yisgeh ’akhu weli mayim. 
job 8:12	‘odenu we’ibo lo yiqatef velifnei khal khatsir yiwash. 
job 8:13	ken ’arekhot kal shokhekhei ’el vetiqvat khanef towed. 
job 8:14	’asher yaqot kislo uwet ‘akawish miwtakho. 
job 8:15	yisha‘en ‘al beito velo ya‘amod yakhaziq bo velo yaqum. 
job 8:16	ratow hu lifnei shamesh ve‘al ganato yonaqto teitsei. 
job 8:17	‘al gal sharashav yesubakhu bet ’awanim yekhezeh. 
job 8:18	’im yewale‘enu mimeqomo vekhikhesh bo lo re’itikha. 
job 8:19	hen hu mesos darko umei‘afar ’akher yitsmakhu. 
job 8:20	hen ’el lo yim’as tam velo yakhaziq beyad merei‘im. 
job 8:21	‘ad yemaleh sekhoq pikha usefatekha teru‘ah. 
job 8:22	sone’ekha yilbeshu woshet ve’ohel resha‘im ’einenu. 
job 9:1	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 9:2	’amenam yada‘ti khi khen umah yitsdaq ’enosh ‘im ’el. 
job 9:3	’im yakhpots lariw ‘imo lo ya‘anenu ’akhat mini ’alef. 
job 9:4	khakham leiwaw ve’amits koakh mi hiqshah ’eilav vayishlam. 
job 9:5	hama‘tiq harim velo yada‘u ’asher hafakham be’apo. 
job 9:6	hamargiz ’erets mimeqomah ve‘amudeha yitfalatsun 
job 9:7	ha’omer lakheres velo yizrakh uwe‘ad kokhawim yakhtom. 
job 9:8	noteh shamayim lewado vedorekh ‘al bamotei yam. 
job 9:9	‘oseh ‘ash kesil vekhimah vekhadrei teiman. 
job 9:10	‘oseh gedolot ‘ad ’en kheiqer venifla’ot ‘ad ’en mispar. 
job 9:11	hen ya‘awor ‘alai velo ’er’eh veyakhalof velo ’awin lo. 
job 9:12	hen yakhtof mi yeshiwenu mi yomar ’eilav mah ta‘aseh. 
job 9:13	’eloah lo yashiw ’apo takhato takhtav khakhu ‘ozerei rahaw. 
job 9:14	’af ki ’anokhi ’e‘enenu ’ewkharah dewarai ‘imo. 
job 9:15	’asher ’im tsadaqti lo ’e‘eneh limshofeti ’etkhanan. 
job 9:16	’im qarati vaya‘aneini lo ’a’amin ki ya’azin qoli. 
job 9:17	’asher bis‘arah yeshufeini vehirbah fetsa‘ai khinam. 
job 9:18	lo yiteneini hashew rukhi ki yasbi‘ani mamerorim. 
job 9:19	’im lekhoakh ’amits hineh ve’im lemishpat mi yo‘ideini. 
job 9:20	’im ’etsdaq pi yarshi‘eini tam ’ani vaya‘qesheini. 
job 9:21	tam ’ani lo ’eida‘ nafshi ’em’as khayai. 
job 9:22	’akhat hi ‘al ken ’amarti tam verasha‘ hu mekhaleh. 
job 9:23	’imosho vt yamit pit’om lemasat neqiyim yil‘ag. 
job 9:24	’erets nitenah weyad rasha‘ penei shofeteha yekhaseh ’im lo ’eifo mi hu. 
job 9:25	veyamai qalu mini rats barekhu lo ra’u towah. 
job 9:26	khalefu ‘im ’oniyot ’eiweh kenesher yatus ‘alei ’okhel. 
job 9:27	’im ’ameri ’eshkekhah sikhi ’e‘ezwah fanai ve’awligah. 
job 9:28	yagoreti khal ‘atsewotai yada‘ti ki lo tenaqeini. 
job 9:29	’anokhi ’ersha‘ lamah zeh hewel ’iga‘. 
job 9:30	’im hitrakhatsti wemo wemei shaleg vahazikoti bewor kapai. 
job 9:31	’az bashakhat titbeleini veti‘awuni salmotai. 
job 9:32	ki lo ’ish kamoni ’e‘enenu nawo yakhdav bamishpat. 
job 9:33	lo yesh beineinu mokhiakh yashet yado ‘al sheneinu. 
job 9:34	yaser mei‘alai shiwto ve’eimato ’al tewa‘atani. 
job 9:35	’adaberah velo ’ira’enu ki lo khen ’anokhi ‘imadi. 
job 10:1	naqetah nafshi bekhayai ’e‘ezwah ‘alai sikhi ’adaberah bemar nafshi. 
job 10:2	’omar ’el ’eloah ’al tarshi‘eini hodi‘eini ‘al mah teriweini. 
job 10:3	hatow lekha ki ta‘ashoq ki tim’as yegia‘ kapekha ve‘al ‘atsat resha‘im hofa‘eta. 
job 10:4	ha‘einei wasar lakh ’im kir’ot ’enosh tir’eh. 
job 10:5	hakhimei ’enosh yamekha ’imosh notekha kimei gawer. 
job 10:6	ki tewaqesh la‘avoni ulekhatati tidrosh. 
job 10:7	‘al da‘tekha ki lo ’ersha‘ ve’en miyadekha matsil. 
job 10:8	yadekha ‘itsewuni vaya‘asuni yakhad sawiw vatewale‘eini. 
job 10:9	zekhar na ki khakhomer ‘asitani ve’el ‘afar teshiweini. 
job 10:10	halo khekhalaw tatikheini vekhagewinah taqpi’eini. 
job 10:11	‘or uwasar talbisheini uwa‘atsamot vegidim tesokhekheini. 
job 10:12	khayim vakhesed ‘asita ‘imadi ufequdatekha shamerah rukhi. 
job 10:13	ve’eleh tsafanta wilwawekha yada‘ti ki zot ‘imakh. 
job 10:14	’im khatati ushemartani umei‘avoni lo tenaqeini. 
job 10:15	’im rasha‘ti ’alai li vetsadaqti lo ’esa roshi sewa‘ qalon ure’eh ‘aneyi. 
job 10:16	veyig’eh kashakhal tetsudeini vetashow titpala wi. 
job 10:17	tekhadesh ‘eidekha negdi veterew ka‘askha ‘imadi khalifot vetsawa ‘imi. 
job 10:18	velamah meirekhem hotseitani ’egva‘ ve‘ayin lo tir’eini. 
job 10:19	ka’asher lo hayiti ’ehyeh mibeten laqewer ’uwal. 
job 10:20	halo me‘at yamai yekhdal vakhadal yashit veshit mimeni ve’awligah me‘at. 
job 10:21	beterem ’eilekh velo ’ashuw ’el ’erets khoshekh vetsalmavet. 
job 10:22	’erets ‘eifatah kemo ’ofel tsalmavet velo sedarim vatofa‘ kemo ’ofel. 
job 11:1	vaya‘an tsofar hana‘amati vayomar. 
job 11:2	harow dewarim lo yei‘aneh ve’im ’ish sefatayim yitsdaq. 
job 11:3	badekha metim yakharishv vatil‘ag ve’en makhlim. 
job 11:4	vatomer zakh liqkhi uwar hayiti we‘einekha. 
job 11:5	ve’ulam mi yiten ’eloah daber veyiftakh sefatav ‘imakh. 
job 11:6	veyaged lekha ta‘alumot khakhmah ki khiflayim letushiyah veda‘ ki yasheh lekha ’eloha mei‘avonekha. 
job 11:7	hakheiqer ’eloha timtsa ’im ‘ad takhlit shadai timtsa. 
job 11:8	gawehei mayim mah tif‘al ‘amuqah mishe’ol mah teida‘. 
job 11:9	’arukah mei’erets midah urekhawah mini yam. 
job 11:10	’im yakhalof veyasgir veyaqhil umi yeshiwenu. 
job 11:11	ki hu yada‘ metei shav vayar ’aven velo yitbonan. 
job 11:12	ve’ish nawuw yilawew ve‘ayir pere ’adam yivaled. 
job 11:13	’im ’atah hakhinota libekha ufarasta ’eilav kapekha. 
job 11:14	’im ’aven beyadekha harkhiqeihu ve’al tashken be’ohalekha ‘avlah. 
job 11:15	ki ’az tisa fanekha mimum vehayita mutsaq velo tira. 
job 11:16	ki ’atah ‘amal tishkakh kemayim ‘aweru tizkor. 
job 11:17	umitsahorayim yaqum khaled ta‘ufah kaboqer tihyeh. 
job 11:18	uwatakhta ki yesh tiqvah vekhafarta lawetakh tishkaw. 
job 11:19	verawatsta ve’en makharid vekhilu fanekha rabim. 
job 11:20	ve‘einei resha‘im tikhlenah umanos ’awad minhem vetiqvatam mapakh nafesh. 
job 12:1	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 12:2	’amenam ki ’atem ‘am ve‘imakhem tamut khakhmah 
job 12:3	gam li leiwaw kemokhem lo nofel ’anokhi mikem ve’et mi ’en kemo ’eleh. 
job 12:4	sekhoq lerei‘eihu ’ehyeh qorei le’eloah vaya‘aneihu khoq tsadiq tamim. 
job 12:5	lapid buz le‘ashtut sha’anan nakhon lemo‘adei ragel. 
job 12:6	yishlayu ’ohalim leshodedim uwatukhot lemargizei ’el la’asher heiwi ’eloah beyado. 
job 12:7	ve’ulam she’al na weheimot vetoreka ve‘of hashamayim veyaged lakh. 
job 12:8	’o siakh la’arets vetoreka visaperu lekha degei hayam. 
job 12:9	mi lo yada‘ bekhal ’eleh ki yad yhoh ‘asetah zot. 
job 12:10	’asher beyado nefesh kal khai veruakh kal besar ’ish. 
job 12:11	halo ’ozen milin tiwkhan vekhekh ’okhel yit‘am lo. 
job 12:12	bishishim khakhmah ve’orekh yamim tewunah. 
job 12:13	‘imo khakhmah ugewurah lo ‘eitsah utewunah. 
job 12:14	hen yaharos velo yibaneh yisgor ‘al ’ish velo yipateiakh. 
job 12:15	hen ya‘tsor bamayim veyiwashu vishalekhem veyahafkhu ’arets. 
job 12:16	‘imo ‘oz vetushiyah lo shogeg umashgeh. 
job 12:17	molikh yo‘atsim sholal veshofetim yeholel. 
job 12:18	musar melakhim piteiakh vaye’sor ’eizor bemateneihem. 
job 12:19	molikh kohanim sholal ve’eitanim yesalef. 
job 12:20	meisir fah lene’emanim veta‘am zeqeinim yiqakh. 
job 12:21	shofekh buz ‘al nediwim umeziakh ’afiqim ripah. 
job 12:22	megaleh ‘amuqot mini khoshekh vayotsei la’or tsalmavet. 
job 12:23	masgi lagoyim vai’abedem shoteiakh lagoyim vayankhem. 
job 12:24	meisir lew rashei ‘am ha’arets vayat‘em betohu lo darekh. 
job 12:25	yemashu khoshekh velo ’or vayat‘em kashikor. 
job 13:1	hen kol ra’atah ‘eini shame‘ah ’azeni vatawen lah. 
job 13:2	keda‘tekhem yada‘ti gam ’ani lo nofel ’anokhi mikem. 
job 13:3	’ulam ’ani ’el shadai ’adaber vehokheiakh ’el ’el ’ekhpats. 
job 13:4	ve’ulam ’atem tofelei shaqer rofe’ei ’elil kulekhem. 
job 13:5	mi yiten hakharesh takharishun utehi lakhem lekhakhemah. 
job 13:6	shim‘u na tokhakhti veriwot sefatai haqshiwu. 
job 13:7	hal’el tedaberu ‘avlah velo tedaberu remiyah. 
job 13:8	hafanav tisa’un ’im la’el teriwun. 
job 13:9	hatow ki yakhqor ’etkhem ’im kehatel be’enosh tehatelu wo. 
job 13:10	hokheiakh yokhiakh ’etkhem ’im baseiter panim tisa’un. 
job 13:11	halo ’eito tewa‘et ’etkhem ufakhdo yipol ‘aleikhem. 
job 13:12	zikhroneikhem mishlei ’eifer legabei khomer gabeikhem. 
job 13:13	hakharishu mimeni va’adaberah ’ani veya‘awor ‘alai mah. 
job 13:14	‘al mah ’esa wesari weshinai venafshi ’asim bekhapi. 
job 13:15	hen yiqteleini lo lo ’ayakhel ’akh derakhai ’el panav ’okhiakh. 
job 13:16	gam hu li lishu‘ah ki lo lefanav khanef yawo. 
job 13:17	shim‘u moa‘ milati ve’akhavati be’azeneikhem. 
job 13:18	hineh na ‘arakhti mishpat yada‘ti ki ’ani ’etsdaq. 
job 13:19	mi hu yariw ‘imadi ki ‘atah ’akharish ve’egva‘. 
job 13:20	’akhosh tayim ’al ta‘as ‘imadi ’az mipanekha lo ’esater. 
job 13:21	kapekha mei‘alai harkhaq ve’eimatekha ’al tewa‘atani. 
job 13:22	uqera ve’anokhi ’e‘eneh ’o ’adaber vahashiweini. 
job 13:23	kamah li ‘avonot vekhata’ot pish‘i vekhatati hodi‘eini 
job 13:24	lamah fanekha tastir vetakhsheweini le’oyew lakh. 
job 13:25	he‘aleh nidaf ta‘arots ve’et qash yawesh tirdof. 
job 13:26	ki tikhtow ‘alai merorot vetorisheini ‘avonot ne‘urai. 
job 13:27	vetasem basad raglai vetishmor kal ’arekhotai ‘al shareshei raglai titkhaqeh. 
job 13:28	vehu keraqaw yiwleh keweged ’akhalo ‘ash. 
job 14:1	’adam yelud ’ishah qetsar yamim usewa‘ rogez. 
job 14:2	ketsits yatsa vayimal vayiwrakh katsel velo ya‘amod. 
job 14:3	’af ‘al zeh paqakhta ‘einekha ve’oti tawi wemishpat ‘imakh. 
job 14:4	mi yiten tahor mitamei lo ’ekhad. 
job 14:5	’im kharutsim yamav mispar khodashav ’itakh khuqo khuqav ‘asita velo ya‘awor. 
job 14:6	she‘eh mei‘alav veyekhdal ‘ad yirtseh kesakhir yomo. 
job 14:7	ki yesh la‘ets tiqvah ’im yikaret ve‘od yakhalif veyonaqto lo tekhdal. 
job 14:8	’im yazqin ba’arets sharesho uwe‘afar yamut giz‘o. 
job 14:9	meireiakh mayim yafriakh ve‘asah qatsir kemo nata‘. 
job 14:10	vegewer yamut vayekhelash vayigva‘ ’adam ve’ayo. 
job 14:11	’azelu mayim mini yam venahar yekheraw veyawesh. 
job 14:12	ve’ish shakhaw velo yaqum ‘ad bilti mayim lo yaqitsu velo yei‘oru mishenatam. 
job 14:13	mi yiten bish’ol tatspineini tastireini ‘ad shuw ’apekha tashit li khoq vetizkereini. 
job 14:14	’im yamut gewer hayikhyeh kal yemei tsewa’i ’ayakhel ‘ad bo khalifati. 
job 14:15	tiqra ve’anokhi ’e‘eneka lema‘aseh yadekha tikhsof. 
job 14:16	ki ‘atah tse‘adai tispor lo tishmor ‘al khatati. 
job 14:17	khatum bitsror pish‘i vatitpol ‘al ‘avoni. 
job 14:18	ve’ulam har nofel yibol vetsur ye‘taq mimeqomo. 
job 14:19	’awanim shakhaqu mayim tishtof sefikheha ‘afar ’arets vetiqvat ’enosh he’ewadta. 
job 14:20	titqefeihu lanetsakh vayahalokh meshaneh fanav vateshalekheihu. 
job 14:21	yikhbedu wanav velo yeida‘ veyits‘aru velo yawin lamo. 
job 14:22	’akh besaro ‘alav yikh’aw venafsho ‘alav te’ewal. 
job 15:1	vaya‘an ’elifaz hateimani vayomar. 
job 15:2	hekhakham ya‘aneh da‘at ruakh vimalei qadim bitno. 
job 15:3	hokheiakh bedawar lo yiskon umilim lo yo‘il bam. 
job 15:4	’af ’atah tafer yir’ah vetigra‘ khah lifnei ’el. 
job 15:5	ki ye’alef ‘avonekha fikha vetiwkhar leshon ‘arumim. 
job 15:6	yarshi‘akha fikha velo ’ani usefatekha ya‘anu wakh. 
job 15:7	hariyoshon ’adam tivaled velifnei gewa‘ot kholaleta. 
job 15:8	hawsod ’eloha tishma‘ vetigra‘ ’eilekha khakhmah 
job 15:9	mah yada‘ta velo neida‘ tawin velo ‘imanu hu. 
job 15:10	gam saw gam yashish banu kabir mei’awikha yamim. 
job 15:11	ham‘at mimekha tankhumot ’el vedawar la’at ‘imakh. 
job 15:12	mah yiqakhakha libekha umah yirzemun ‘einekha. 
job 15:13	ki tashiw ’el ’el rukhekha vehotseita mipikha milin. 
job 15:14	mah ’enosh ki yizkeh vekhi yitsdaq yelud ’ishah. 
job 15:15	hen biqdosho biqdoshav lo ya’amin veshamayim lo zaku we‘einav. 
job 15:16	’af ki nit‘aw vene’elakh ’ish shoteh khamayim ‘avlah. 
job 15:17	’akhavkha shema‘ li vezeh khaziti va’asapeirah. 
job 15:18	’asher khakhamim yagidu velo khikhadu mei’awotam. 
job 15:19	lahem lewadam nitenah ha’arets velo ‘awar zar betokham. 
job 15:20	kal yemei rasha‘ hu mitkholel umispar nim nitspenu le‘arits. 
job 15:21	qol pekhadim be’azenav bashalom shoded yewo’enu. 
job 15:22	lo ya’amin uw mini khoshekh vetsafu vetsafui hu ’elei kharew. 
job 15:23	noded hu lalekhem ’ayeh yada‘ ki nakhon beyado yom khoshekh. 
job 15:24	yewa‘atuhu tsar umetsuqah titqefeihu kemelekh ‘atid lakidor. 
job 15:25	ki natah ’el ’el yado ve’elosha dai yitgabar. 
job 15:26	yaruts ’eilav betsavar ba‘awi gabei maginav. 
job 15:27	ki khisah fanav bekhelbo vaya‘as pimah ‘alei khasel. 
job 15:28	vayishkon ‘arim nikhkhadot batim lo yeishewu lamo ’asher hit‘atedu legalim. 
job 15:29	lo ye‘shar velo yaqum kheilo velo yiteh la’arets minlam. 
job 15:30	lo yasur mini khoshekh yonaqto teyabesh shalhawet veyasur beruakh piv. 
job 15:31	’al ya’amen basho bashav nit‘ah kisha v tihyeh temurato. 
job 15:32	belo yomo timalei vekhipato lo ra‘ananah. 
job 15:33	yakhmos kagefen bisro veyashlekh kazayit nitsato. 
job 15:34	ki ‘adat khanef galmud ve’esh ’akhelah ’aholei shokhad. 
job 15:35	haroh ‘amal veyalod ’aven uwitnam takhin mirmah. 
job 16:1	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 16:2	shama‘ti khe’eleh rabot menakhamei ‘amal kulekhem. 
job 16:3	haqets lediwrei ruakh ’o mah yamritsekha ki ta‘aneh. 
job 16:4	gam ’anokhi kakhem ’adabeirah lu yesh nafshekhem takhat nafshi ’akhbirah ‘aleikhem bemilim ve’ani‘ah ‘aleikhem bemo roshi. 
job 16:5	’a’amitskhem bemo fi venid sefatai yakhsokh. 
job 16:6	’im ’adaberah lo yeikhasekh ke’eiwi ve’akhdelah mah mini yahalokh. 
job 16:7	’akh ‘atah hel’ani hashimota kal ‘adati. 
job 16:8	vatiqmeteini le‘ed hayah vayaqam bi khakhashi befanai ya‘aneh. 
job 16:9	’apo taraf vayistemeini kharaq ‘alai beshinav tsari yiltosh ‘einav li. 
job 16:10	pa‘aru ‘alai befihem bekherpah hiku lekhayai yakhad ‘alai yitmala’un. 
job 16:11	yasgireini ’el ’el ‘avil ve‘al yedei resha‘im yirteini. 
job 16:12	shalev hayiti vayfarpereini ve’akhaz be‘arepi vayfatspetseini vayqimeini lo lematarah. 
job 16:13	yasobu ‘alai rabav yefalakh kilyotai velo yakhmol yishpokh la’arets mereirati. 
job 16:14	yifretseini ferets ‘al penei farets yaruts ‘alai kegibor. 
job 16:15	saq tafarti ‘alei gildi ve‘olalti we‘afar qarni. 
job 16:16	panai khomarmerah khomarmeru mini wekhi ve‘al ‘af‘apai tsalmavet. 
job 16:17	‘al lo khamas bekhapai utefilati zakah. 
job 16:18	’erets ’al tekhasi dami ve’al yehi maqom leza‘aqati. 
job 16:19	gam ‘atah hineh washamayim ‘eidi vesahadi bameromim. 
job 16:20	melitsai rei‘ai ’el ’eloha dalefah ‘eini. 
job 16:21	veyokhakh legewer ‘im ’eloah uwen ’adam lerei‘eihu. 
job 16:22	ki shenot mispar ye’etayu ve’orakh lo ’ashuw ’ehelokh. 
job 17:1	rukhi khubalah yamai niz‘akhu qewarim li. 
job 17:2	’im lo hatulim ‘imadi uwehamerotam talan ‘eini. 
job 17:3	simah na ‘areweini ‘imakh mi hu leyadi yitaqeia‘. 
job 17:4	ki libam tsafanta misakhel ‘al ken lo teromem. 
job 17:5	lekheileq yagid rei‘im ve‘einei wanav tikhlenah. 
job 17:6	vehitsigani limshol ‘amim vetofet lefanim ’ehyeh. 
job 17:7	vateikhah mika‘as ‘eini vitsurai katsel kulam. 
job 17:8	yashomu yesharim ‘al zot venaqi ‘al khanef yit‘orar. 
job 17:9	veyokhez tsadiq darko utohar yadayim yosif ’omets. 
job 17:10	ve’ulam kulam tashuwu uwo’u na velo ’emtsa wakhem khakham. 
job 17:11	yamai ‘aweru zimotai nitequ morashei lewawi. 
job 17:12	laylah leyom yasimu ’or qarow mipenei khoshekh. 
job 17:13	’im ’aqaveh she’ol beiti bakhoshekh ripadti yetsu‘ai. 
job 17:14	lashakhat qarati ’awi ’atah ’imi va’akhoti larimah. 
job 17:15	ve’ayeh ’eifo tiqvati vetiqvati mi yeshurenah. 
job 17:16	badei she’ol teiradnah ’im yakhad ‘al ‘afar nakhat. 
job 18:1	vaya‘an bildad hashukhi vayomar. 
job 18:2	‘ad ’anah tesimun qintsei lemilin tawinu ve’akhar nedaber. 
job 18:3	madua‘ nekhshawnu khabeheimah nitminu be‘eineikhem. 
job 18:4	toref nafsho be’apo halma‘ankha tei‘azaw ’arets veye‘taq tsur mimeqomo. 
job 18:5	gam ’or resha‘im yid‘akh velo yigah shewiw ’isho. 
job 18:6	’or khashakh be’aholo veneiro ‘alav yid‘akh. 
job 18:7	yeitseru tsa‘adei ’ono vetashlikheihu ‘atsato. 
job 18:8	ki shulakh bereshet beraglav ve‘als wakhah yithalakh. 
job 18:9	yokhez be‘aqew pakh yakhazeq ‘alav tsamim. 
job 18:10	tamun ba’arets khawlo umalkudto ‘alei natiw. 
job 18:11	sawiw bi‘atuhu walahot vehefitsuhu leraglav. 
job 18:12	yehi ra‘ew ’ono ve’ed nakhon letsal‘o. 
job 18:13	yokhal badei ‘oro yokhal badav bekhor mavet. 
job 18:14	yinateq mei’aholo miwtakho vetats‘ideihu lemelekh balahot. 
job 18:15	tishkon be’aholo mibeli lo yezoreh ‘al naveihu gaferit. 
job 18:16	mitakhat sharashav yiwashu umima‘al yimal qetsiro. 
job 18:17	zikhro ’awad mini ’arets velo shem lo ‘al penei khuts. 
job 18:18	yehdefuhu mei’or ’el khoshekh umiteiwel yeniduhu. 
job 18:19	lo nin lo velo nekhed be‘amo ve’en rid bimgurav. 
job 18:20	‘al yomo nashamu ’akharonim veqadmonim ’akhazu sa‘ar. 
job 18:21	’akh ’eleh mishkenot ‘aval vezeh meqom lo yada‘ ’el. 
job 19:1	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 19:2	‘ad ’anah togyun nafshi utedake’unani wemilim. 
job 19:3	zeh ‘eser pe‘amim takhlimuni lo teiwoshu tahkeru li. 
job 19:4	ve’af ’amenam shagiti ’iti talin meshugati. 
job 19:5	’im ’amenam ‘alai tagdilu vetokhikhu ‘alai kherpati 
job 19:6	de‘u ’eifo ki ’eloah ‘ivetani umetsudo ‘alai hiqif. 
job 19:7	hen ’ets‘aq khamas velo ’ei‘aneh ’ashava‘ ve’en mishpat. 
job 19:8	’arekhi gadar velo ’e‘ewor ve‘al netiwotai khoshekh yasim. 
job 19:9	kewodi mei‘alai hifshit vayasar ‘ateret roshi. 
job 19:10	yitetseini sawiw va’eilakh vayasa‘ ka‘ets tiqvati. 
job 19:11	vayakhar ‘alai ’apo vayakhsheweini lo khetsarav. 
job 19:12	yakhad yawo’u gedudav vayasolu ‘alai darkam vayakhanu sawiw le’aholi. 
job 19:13	’akhai mei‘alai hirkhiq veyode‘ai ’akh zaru mimeni. 
job 19:14	khadelu qerowai umeyuda‘ai shekheikhuni. 
job 19:15	garei weiti ve’amhotai lezar takhshewuni nakheri hayiti we‘eineihem. 
job 19:16	le‘awdi qarati velo ya‘aneh bemo fi ’etkhanen lo. 
job 19:17	rukhi zarah le’ishti vekhanoti liwnei witni. 
job 19:18	gam ‘avilim ma’asu wi ’aqumah vaydaberu wi. 
job 19:19	ti‘awuni kal metei sodi vezeh ’ahawti nehpekhu wi. 
job 19:20	be‘ori uwiwsari daweqah ‘atsmi va’etmaletah be‘or shinai. 
job 19:21	khanuni khanuni ’atem rei‘ai ki yad ’eloah nage‘ah bi. 
job 19:22	lamah tirdefuni khemo ’el umibesari lo tisba‘u. 
job 19:23	mi yiten ’eifo veyikatewun milai mi yiten baseifer veyukhaqu. 
job 19:24	be‘et barzel ve‘ofaret la‘ad batsur yeikhatsewun. 
job 19:25	va’ani yada‘ti go’ali khai ve’akharon ‘al ‘afar yaqum. 
job 19:26	ve’akhar ‘ori niqefu zot umibesari ’ekhezeh ’eloah. 
job 19:27	’asher ’ani ’ekhezeh li ve‘einai ra’u velo zar kalu khilyotai bekheiqi. 
job 19:28	ki tomeru mah nirdaf lo veshoresh dawar nimtsa wi. 
job 19:29	guru lakhem mipenei kherew ki kheimah ‘avonot kharew lema‘an teide‘un shadin shadun. 
job 20:1	vaya‘an tsofar hana‘amati vayomar. 
job 20:2	lakhen se‘ipai yeshiwuni uwa‘awur khushi wi. 
job 20:3	musar kelimati ’eshma‘ veruakh mibinati ya‘aneini. 
job 20:4	hazot yada‘ta mini ‘ad mini sim ’adam ‘alei ’arets. 
job 20:5	ki rinat resha‘im miqarow vesimkhat khanef ‘adei raga‘. 
job 20:6	’im ya‘aleh lashamayim si’o verosho la‘aw yagia‘. 
job 20:7	kegelalo lanetsakh yowed ro’av yomeru ’ayo. 
job 20:8	kakhalom ya‘uf velo yimtsa’uhu veyudad kekhezyon layelah. 
job 20:9	‘ayin zafatu velo tosif velo ‘od teshurenu meqomo. 
job 20:10	banav yeratsu dalim veyadav tasheiwenah ’ono. 
job 20:11	‘atsmotav male’u ‘alumo ‘alumav ve‘imo ‘al ‘afar tishkaw. 
job 20:12	’im tamtiq befiv ra‘ah yakhkhidenah takhat leshono. 
job 20:13	yakhmol ‘aleha velo ya‘azwenah veyimna‘enah betokh khiko. 
job 20:14	lakhmo bemei‘av nehpakh merorat petanim beqirbo. 
job 20:15	khayil bala‘ vayqi’enu mibitno yorishenu ’el. 
job 20:16	rosh petanim yinaq tahargeihu leshon ’ef‘eh. 
job 20:17	’al yeire wiflagot naharei nakhalei dewash vekhem’ah. 
job 20:18	meishiw yaga‘ velo yiwla‘ kekhel temurato velo ya‘alos. 
job 20:19	ki ritsats ‘azaw dalim bayit gazal velo yiweneihu. 
job 20:20	ki lo yada‘ shalev bewitno bakhamudo lo yemalet. 
job 20:21	’en sarid le’akhelo ‘al ken lo yakhil tuwo. 
job 20:22	bimlot feqo yeitser lo kal yad ‘amel tewo’enu. 
job 20:23	yehi lemalei witno yeshalakh bo kharon ’apo veyamter ‘aleimo bilkhumo. 
job 20:24	yiwrakh mineisheq barzel takhlefeihu qeshet nekhushah. 
job 20:25	shalaf vayeitsei migeivah uwaraq mimerorato yahalokh ‘alav ’eimim. 
job 20:26	kal khoshekh tamun litspunav te’akheleihu ’esh lo nupakh yeira‘ sarid be’aholo. 
job 20:27	yegalu shamayim ‘avono ve’erets mitqomamah lo. 
job 20:28	yigel yewul beito nigarot beyom ’apo. 
job 20:29	zeh kheileq ’adam rasha‘ mei’elohim venakhalat ’imro mei’el. 
job 21:1	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 21:2	shim‘u moa‘ milati utehi zot tankhumoteikhem. 
job 21:3	’uni ve’anokhi ’adaber ve’akhar daberi tal‘ig. 
job 21:4	he’anokhi le’adam sikhi ve’im madua‘ lo tiqtsar rukhi. 
job 21:5	penu ’eilai vehashamu vesimu yad ‘al peh. 
job 21:6	ve’im zakharti veniwhaleti ve’akhaz besari palatsut. 
job 21:7	madua‘ resha‘im yikhyu ‘atequ gam gaweru khayil. 
job 21:8	zar‘am nakhon lifneihem ‘imam vetse’etsa’eihem le‘eineihem. 
job 21:9	bateihem shalom mipakhad velo sheiwet ’eloah ‘aleihem. 
job 21:10	shoro ‘ibar velo yag‘il tefalet parato velo teshakel. 
job 21:11	yeshalekhu khatson ‘avileihem veyaldeihem yeraqeidun. 
job 21:12	yis’u ketof vekhinor veyismekhu leqol ‘ugaw. 
job 21:13	yewalu yekhalu watow yemeihem uwerega‘ she’ol yeikhatu. 
job 21:14	vayomeru la’el sur mimenu veda‘at derakhekha lo khafatsenu. 
job 21:15	mah shadai ki na‘awdenu umah no‘il ki nifga‘ bo. 
job 21:16	hen lo weyadam tuwam ‘atsat resha‘im rakhaqah meni. 
job 21:17	kamah ner resha‘im yid‘akh veyawo ‘aleimo ’eidam khawalim yekhaleq be’apo. 
job 21:18	yihyu ketewen lifnei ruakh ukhemots genawatu sufah. 
job 21:19	’eloah yitspon lewanav ’ono yeshalem ’eilav veyeida‘. 
job 21:20	yir’u ‘eino ‘einav kido umeikhamat shadai yishteh. 
job 21:21	ki mah kheftso beweito ’akharav umispar khodashav khutsatsu. 
job 21:22	hal’el yelamed da‘at vehu ramim yishpot. 
job 21:23	zeh yamut be‘etsem tumo kulo shal’anan veshalev. 
job 21:24	‘atinav male’u khalaw umoakh ‘atsmotav yeshuqeh. 
job 21:25	vezeh yamut benefesh marah velo ’akhal batowah. 
job 21:26	yakhad ‘al ‘afar yishkawu verimah tekhaseh ‘aleihem. 
job 21:27	hen yada‘ti makhshewoteikhem umezimot ‘alai takhmosu. 
job 21:28	ki tomeru ’ayeh wet nadiw ve’ayeh ’ohel mishkenot resha‘im. 
job 21:29	halo ’eltem ‘owrei darekh ve’ototam lo tenakeiru. 
job 21:30	ki leyom ’ed yeikhasekh ra‘ leyom ‘awarot yuwalu. 
job 21:31	mi yagid ‘al panav darko vehu ‘asah mi yeshalem lo. 
job 21:32	vehu liqwarot yuwal ve‘al gadish yishqod. 
job 21:33	matequ lo rigwei nakhal ve’akharav kal ’adam yimshokh ulefanav ’en mispar. 
job 21:34	ve’ekh tenakhamuni hawel uteshuwoteikhem nish’ar ma‘al. 
job 22:1	vaya‘an ’elifaz hateimani vayomar. 
job 22:2	hal’el yiskan gawer ki yiskon ‘aleimo maskil. 
job 22:3	hakheifets leshadai ki titsdaq ve’im betsa‘ ki tatem derakhekha. 
job 22:4	hamiyir’atekha yokhikhekha yawo ‘imekha bamishpat. 
job 22:5	halo ra‘atekha rabah ve’en qets la‘avonotekha. 
job 22:6	ki takhbol ’akhekha khinam uwigdei ‘arumim tafshit. 
job 22:7	lo mayim ‘ayef tashqeh umeira‘ew timna‘ lakhem. 
job 22:8	ve’ish zeroa‘ lo ha’arets unesu fanim yeishew bah. 
job 22:9	’almanot shilakhta reiqam uzero‘ot yetomim yeduka. 
job 22:10	‘al ken sewiwotekha fakhim viwahelkha pakhad pit’om. 
job 22:11	’o khoshekh lo tir’eh veshif‘at mayim tekhaseka. 
job 22:12	halo ’eloah gowah shamayim ure’eh rosh kokhawim ki ramu. 
job 22:13	ve’amarta mah yada‘ ’el haw‘ad ‘arafel yishpot. 
job 22:14	‘awim seiter lo velo yir’eh vekhug mayim yithalakh. 
job 22:15	ha’orakh ‘olam tishmor ’asher darekhu metei ’aven. 
job 22:16	’asher qumetu velo ‘et nahar yutsaq yesodam. 
job 22:17	ha’omerim la’el sur mimenu umah yif‘al shadai lamo. 
job 22:18	vehu milei wateihem tow va‘atsat resha‘im rakhaqah meni. 
job 22:19	yir’u tsadiqim veyismakhu venaqi yil‘ag lamo. 
job 22:20	’im lo nikhkhad qimanu veyitram ’akhelah ’esh. 
job 22:21	hasken na ‘imo ushelm bahem tewo’atkha towah. 
job 22:22	qakh na mipiv torah vesim ’amarav bilwawekha. 
job 22:23	’im tashuw ‘adosha dai tibaneh tarkhiq ‘avlah mei’aholekha. 
job 22:24	veshit ‘al ‘afar batser uwetsur nekhalim ’ofir. 
job 22:25	vehayah shadai betsarekha vekhesef to‘afot lakh. 
job 22:26	ki ’az ‘al shadai tit‘anag vetisa ’el ’eloah panekha. 
job 22:27	ta‘tir ’eilav veyishma‘eka unedarekha teshalem. 
job 22:28	vetigzar ’omer veyaqam lakh ve‘al derakhekha nagah ’or. 
job 22:29	ki hishpilu vatomer geivah veshakh ‘einayim yoshia‘. 
job 22:30	yemalet ’i naqi venimlat bewor kapekha. 
job 23:1	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 23:2	gam hayom meri sikhi yadi kawedah ‘al ’ankhati. 
job 23:3	mi yiten yada‘ti ve’emtsa’eihu ’awo ‘ad tekhunato. 
job 23:4	’e‘erkhah lefanav mishpat ufi ’amalei tokhakhot. 
job 23:5	’eide‘ah milim ya‘aneini ve’awinah mah yomar li. 
job 23:6	haberaw koakh yariw ‘imadi lo ’akh hu yasim bi. 
job 23:7	sham yashar nokhakh ‘imo va’afaletah lanetsakh mishofeti. 
job 23:8	hen qedem ’ehelokh ve’einenu ve’akhor velo ’awin lo. 
job 23:9	semol ba‘asoto velo ’akhaz ya‘tof yamin velo ’er’eh. 
job 23:10	ki yada‘ derekh ‘imadi bekhanani kazahaw ’eitsei. 
job 23:11	ba’ashuro ’akhazah ragli darko shamarti velo ’at. 
job 23:12	mitsvat fatav velo ’amish meikhuqi tsafanti ’imrei fiv. 
job 23:13	vehu we’ekhad umi yeshiwenu venafsho ’ivetah vaya‘as. 
job 23:14	ki yashlim khuqi vekhahenah rabot ‘imo. 
job 23:15	‘al ken mipanav ’ebahel ’etbonen ve’efkhad mimenu. 
job 23:16	ve’el heirakh libi veshadai hiwhilani. 
job 23:17	ki lo nitsmati mipenei khoshekh umipanai kisah ’ofel. 
job 24:1	madua‘ mishadai lo nitspenu ‘itim veyode‘o veyode‘av lo khazu yamav. 
job 24:2	gewulot yasigu ‘eider gazelu vayir‘u. 
job 24:3	khamor yetomim yinhagu yakhbelu shor ’almanah. 
job 24:4	yatu ’ewyonim midarekh yakhad khube’u ‘aniyei ’arets. 
job 24:5	hen pera’im bamidbar yatse’u befa‘olam meshakharei lataref ‘arawah lo lekhem lane‘arim. 
job 24:6	basadeh belilo yaqtsiru yiqtsoru vekherem rasha‘ yelaqeishu. 
job 24:7	‘arom yalinu mibeli lewush ve’en kesut baqarah. 
job 24:8	mizerem harim yirtawu umibeli makhseh khibequ tsur. 
job 24:9	yigzelu mishod yatom ve‘al ‘ani yakhbolu. 
job 24:10	‘arom hilekhu beli lewush ure‘eiwim nase’u ‘omer. 
job 24:11	ben shurotam yatshiru yeqawim darekhu vayitsma’u. 
job 24:12	mei‘ir metim yin’aqu venefesh khalalim teshaveia‘ ve’eloah lo yasim tiflah. 
job 24:13	hemah hayu bemoredei ’or lo hikiru derakhav velo yashewu bintiwotav. 
job 24:14	la’or yaqum rotseiakh yiqtal ‘ani ve’ewyon uwalaylah yehi khaganaw. 
job 24:15	ve‘en no’ef shamerah neshef leimor lo teshureini ‘ayin veseiter panim yasim. 
job 24:16	khatar bakhoshekh batim yomam khitemu lamo lo yade‘u ’or. 
job 24:17	ki yakhdav boqer lamo tsalmavet ki yakir balhot tsalmavet. 
job 24:18	qal hu ‘al penei mayim tequlal khelqatam ba’arets lo yifneh derekh keramim. 
job 24:19	tsiyah gam khom yigzelu meimei sheleg she’ol khata’u. 
job 24:20	yishkakheihu rekhem metaqo rimah ‘od lo yizakher vatishawer ka‘ets ‘avlah. 
job 24:21	ro‘eh ‘aqarah lo teiled ve’almanah lo yeyeitiw. 
job 24:22	umashakh ’abirim bekhokho yaqum velo ya’amin bakhayin. 
job 24:23	yiten lo lawetakh veyisha‘en ve‘eineihu ‘al darkheihem. 
job 24:24	romu me‘at ve’einenu vehumekhu kakol yiqafetsun ukherosh shibolet yimalu. 
job 24:25	ve’im lo ’eifo mi yakhziweini veyasem le’al milati. 
job 25:1	vaya‘an bildad hashukhi vayomar. 
job 25:2	hamshel vafakhad ‘imo ‘oseh lom bimromav. 
job 25:3	hayesh mispar ligdudav ve‘al mi lo yaqum ’oreihu. 
job 25:4	umah yitsdaq ’enosh ‘im ’el umah yizkeh yelud ’ishah. 
job 25:5	hen ‘ad yareiakh velo ya’ahil vekhokhawim lo zaku we‘einav. 
job 25:6	’af ki ’enosh rimah uwen ’adam tolei‘ah. 
job 26:1	vaya‘an ’iyow vayomar. 
job 26:2	meh ‘azarta lelo khoakh hosha‘ta zeroa‘ lo ‘oz. 
job 26:3	mah ya‘atsta lelo khakhmah vetushiyah larow hoda‘eta. 
job 26:4	’et mi higadta milin venishmat mi yatse’ah mimeka. 
job 26:5	harefa’im yekholalu mitakhat mayim veshokheneihem. 
job 26:6	‘arom she’ol negdo ve’en kesut la’awadon. 
job 26:7	noteh tsafon ‘al tohu toleh ’erets ‘al beli mah. 
job 26:8	tsorer mayim be‘awav velo niwqa‘ ‘anan takhtam. 
job 26:9	me’akhez penei khiseh parshez ‘alav ‘anano. 
job 26:10	khoq khag ‘al penei mayim ‘ad takhlit ’or ‘im khoshekh. 
job 26:11	‘amudei shamayim yerofafu veyitmehu miga‘arato. 
job 26:12	bekhokho raga‘ hayam uwituwenato uwitwunato makhats rahaw. 
job 26:13	berukho shamayim shifrah kholalah yado nakhash bariakh. 
job 26:14	hen ’eleh qetsot darko derakhav umah sheimets dawar nishma‘ bo vera‘am gewurato gewurotav mi yitbonan. 
job 27:1	vayosef ’iyow se’et meshalo vayomar. 
job 27:2	khai ’el heisir mishpati veshadai heimar nafshi. 
job 27:3	ki khal ‘od nishmati wi veruakh ’eloah be’api. 
job 27:4	’im tedabeirenah sefatai ‘avlah uleshoni ’im yehgeh remiyah. 
job 27:5	khalilah li ’im ’atsdiq ’etkhem ‘ad ’egva‘ lo ’asir tumati mimeni. 
job 27:6	betsidqati hekhezaqti velo ’arpeha lo yekheraf lewawi miyamai. 
job 27:7	yehi kherasha‘ ’oyewi umitqomi khe‘aval. 
job 27:8	ki mah tiqvat khanef ki yiwtsa‘ ki yeishel ’eloah nafsho. 
job 27:9	hatsa‘aqato yishma‘ ’el ki tawo ‘alav tsarah. 
job 27:10	’im ‘al shadai yit‘anag yiqra ’eloah bekhal ‘et. 
job 27:11	’oreh ’etkhem beyad ’el ’asher ‘imosha dai lo ’akhakhed. 
job 27:12	hen ’atem kulekhem khazitem velamah zeh hewel tehbalu. 
job 27:13	zeh kheileq ’adam rasha‘ ‘im ’el venakhalat ‘aritsim mishadai yiqakhu. 
job 27:14	’im yirbu wanav lemo kharew vetse’etsa’av lo yisbe‘u lakhem. 
job 27:15	serido ridav bamavet yiqaweiru ve’almenotav lo tiwkenah. 
job 27:16	’im yitsbor ke‘afar kasef vekhakhomer yakhin malbush. 
job 27:17	yakhin vetsadiq yilbash vekhesef naqi yakhaloq. 
job 27:18	banah kha‘ash beito ukhesukah ‘asah notser. 
job 27:19	‘ashir yishkaw velo yei’asef ‘einav paqakh ve’einenu. 
job 27:20	tasigeihu khamayim balahot laylah genawatu sufah. 
job 27:21	yisa’eihu qadim veyeilakh visa‘areihu mimeqomo. 
job 27:22	veyashlekh ‘alav velo yakhmol miyado baroakh yiwrakh. 
job 27:23	yispoq ‘aleimo khapeimo veyishroq ‘alav mimeqomo. 
job 28:1	ki yesh lakesef motsa umaqom lazahaw yazoqu. 
job 28:2	barzel mei‘afar yuqakh ve’ewen yatsuq nekhushah. 
job 28:3	qets sam lakhoshekh ulekhal takhlit hu khoqer ’ewen ’ofel vetsalmavet. 
job 28:4	parats nakhal mei‘im gar hanishkakhim mini ragel dalu mei’enosh na‘u. 
job 28:5	’erets mimenah yeitsei lakhem vetakhteha nehpakh kemo ’esh. 
job 28:6	meqom sapir ’awaneha ve‘afrot zahaw lo. 
job 28:7	natiw lo yeda‘o ‘ayit velo zafatu ‘en ’ayah. 
job 28:8	lo hidrikhuhu wenei shakhats lo ‘adah ‘alav shakhal. 
job 28:9	bakhalamish shalakh yado hafakh mishoresh harim. 
job 28:10	batsurot ye’orim biqeia‘ vekhal yeqar ra’atah ‘eino. 
job 28:11	mibekhi neharot khibesh veta‘alumah yotsi ’or. 
job 28:12	vehakhakhemah mei’ayin timatsei ve’ei zeh meqom binah. 
job 28:13	lo yada‘ ’enosh ‘erkah velo timatsei be’erets hakhayim. 
job 28:14	tehom ’amar lo wi hi veyam ’amar ’en ‘imadi. 
job 28:15	lo yutan segor takhteha velo yishaqel kesef mekhirah. 
job 28:16	lo tesuleh bekhetem ’ofir beshoham yaqar vesapir. 
job 28:17	lo ya‘arkhenah zahaw uzekhokhit utemuratah keli faz. 
job 28:18	ramot vegawish lo yizakher umeshekh khakhmah mipeninim. 
job 28:19	lo ya‘arkhenah pitdat kush bekhetem tahor lo tesuleh. 
job 28:20	vehakhakhemah mei’ayin tawo ve’ei zeh meqom binah. 
job 28:21	vene‘elmah mei‘einei khal khai umei‘of hashamayim nistarah. 
job 28:22	’awadon vamavet ’ameru be’azeneinu shama‘nu shim‘ah. 
job 28:23	’elohim heiwin darkah vehu yada‘ ’et meqomah. 
job 28:24	ki hu liqtsot ha’arets yabit takhat kal hashamayim yir’eh. 
job 28:25	la‘asot laruakh mishqal umayim tiken bemidah. 
job 28:26	ba‘asto lamatar khoq vederekh lakhaziz qolot. 
job 28:27	’az ra’ah vaysaperah hekhinah vegam khaqarah. 
job 28:28	vayomer la’adam hen yir’at ’adonai hi khakhmah vesur meira‘ binah. 
job 29:1	vayosef ’iyow se’et meshalo vayomar. 
job 29:2	mi yiteneini kheyarkhei qedem kimei ’eloah yishmereini. 
job 29:3	behilo neiro ‘alei roshi le’oro ’eilekh khoshekh. 
job 29:4	ka’asher hayiti bimei kharepi besod ’eloah ‘alei ’aholi. 
job 29:5	be‘od dai ‘imadi sewiwotai ne‘arai. 
job 29:6	birkhots halikhai bekheimah vetsur yatsuq ‘imadi palgei shamen. 
job 29:7	betseiti sha‘ar ‘alei qaret barekhow ’akhin moshawi. 
job 29:8	ra’uni ne‘arim venekhba’u vishishim qamu ‘amadu. 
job 29:9	rim ‘atseru wemilim vekhaf yasimu lefihem. 
job 29:10	qol negidim nekhba’u uleshonam lekhikam daweiqah. 
job 29:11	ki ’ozen me‘ah vate’ashereini ve‘ayin ra’atah vate‘ideini. 
job 29:12	ki ’amalet ‘ani meshaveia‘ veyatom velo ‘ozer lo. 
job 29:13	birkat ’owed ‘alai tawo velew ’almanah ’arnin. 
job 29:14	tsedeq lawashti vayilbasheini kim‘il vetsanif mishpati. 
job 29:15	‘einayim hayiti la‘iver veraglayim lapiseiakh ’ani. 
job 29:16	’aw ’anokhi la’ewyonim veriw lo yada‘ti ’ekhqereihu. 
job 29:17	va’ashaberah metale‘ot ‘aval umishinav ’ashlikh taref. 
job 29:18	va’omar ‘im qini ’egva‘ vekhakhol ’arbeh yamim. 
job 29:19	shareshi fatuakh ’elei mayim vetal yalin biqtsiri. 
job 29:20	kewodi khadash ‘imadi veqashti beyadi takhalif. 
job 29:21	li shame‘u veyikhelu veyidemu lemo ‘atsati. 
job 29:22	’akharei dewari lo yishnu ve‘aleimo titof milati. 
job 29:23	veyikhalu khamatar li ufihem pa‘aru lemalqosh. 
job 29:24	’eskhaq ’aleihem lo ya’aminu ve’or panai lo yapilun. 
job 29:25	’ewakhar darkam ve’eishew rosh ve’eshkon kemelekh bagedud ka’asher ’aweilim yenakhem. 
job 30:1	ve‘atah sakhaqu ‘alai tse‘irim mimeni leyamim ’asher ma’asti ’awotam lashit ‘im kalwei tsoni. 
job 30:2	gam koakh yedeihem lamah li ‘aleimo ’awad kalakh. 
job 30:3	bekheser uwekhafan galmud ha‘oreqim tsiyah ’emesh sho’ah umesho’ah. 
job 30:4	haqotefim maluakh ‘alei siakh veshoresh retamim lakhmam. 
job 30:5	min gev yegorashu yari‘u ‘aleimo kaganaw. 
job 30:6	ba‘aruts nekhalim lishkon khorei ‘afar vekheifim. 
job 30:7	ben sikhim yinhaqu takhat kharul yesupakhu. 
job 30:8	benei nawal gam benei weli shem nike’u min ha’arets. 
job 30:9	ve‘atah neginatam hayiti va’ehi lahem lemilah. 
job 30:10	ti‘awuni rakhaqu meni umipanai lo khasekhu roq. 
job 30:11	ki yitro yitri fitakh vai‘aneini veresen mipanai shileikhu. 
job 30:12	‘al yamin pirkhakh yaqumu raglai shileikhu vayasolu ‘alai ’arekhot ’eidam. 
job 30:13	natesu netiwati lehavati yo‘ilu lo ‘ozer lamo. 
job 30:14	keferets rakhaw ye’etayu takhat ’ah hitgalgalu. 
job 30:15	hahepakh ‘alai balahot tirdof karuakh nediwati ukhe‘aw ‘awerah yeshu‘ati. 
job 30:16	ve‘atah ‘alai tishtapekh nafshi yokhazuni yemei ‘oni. 
job 30:17	laylah ‘atsamai niqar mei‘alai ve‘oreqai lo yishkawun. 
job 30:18	beraw koakh yitkhapes lewushi kefi khutaneti ya’azreini. 
job 30:19	horani lakhomer va’etmashel ke‘afar va’eifer. 
job 30:20	’ashava‘ ’eilekha velo ta‘aneini ‘amadti vatitbonen bi. 
job 30:21	teihafekh le’akhzar li be‘otsem yadekha tistemeini. 
job 30:22	tisa’eini ’el ruakh tarkiweini utemogegeini teshuveh tushiyah. 
job 30:23	ki yada‘ti mavet teshiweini uwet mo‘ed lekhal khai. 
job 30:24	’akh lo we‘i yishlakh yad ’im befido lahen shua‘. 
job 30:25	’im lo wakhiti liqsheh yom ‘agemah nafshi la’ewyon. 
job 30:26	ki tow qiviti vayawo ra‘ va’ayakhalah le’or vayawo ’ofel. 
job 30:27	mei‘ai rutekhu velo damu qidemuni yemei ‘oni. 
job 30:28	qoder hilakhti belo khamah qamti waqahal ’ashaveia‘. 
job 30:29	’akh hayiti letanim vereia‘ liwnot ya‘anah. 
job 30:30	‘ori shakhar mei‘alai ve‘atsmi kharah mini khorew. 
job 30:31	vayhi le’eiwel kinori ve‘ugawi leqol bokhim. 
job 31:1	berit karati le‘einai umah ’etbonen ‘al betulah. 
job 31:2	umeh kheileq ’eloah mima‘al venakhalat dai mimeromim. 
job 31:3	halo ’ed le‘aval veneikher lefo‘alei ’aven. 
job 31:4	halo hu yir’eh derakhai vekhal tse‘adai yispor. 
job 31:5	’im halakhti ‘im shav vatakhash ‘al mirmah ragli. 
job 31:6	yishqeleini wemozenei tsedeq veyeida‘ ’eloah tumati. 
job 31:7	’im titeh ’ashuri mini hadarekh ve’akhar ‘einai halakh libi uwekhapai dawaq mu’um 
job 31:8	’ezre‘ah ve’akher yokhel vetse’etsa’ai yeshorashu. 
job 31:9	’im niftah libi ‘al ’ishah ve‘al petakh rei‘i ’araweti. 
job 31:10	titkhan le’akher ’ishti ve‘aleha yikhre‘un ’akheirin. 
job 31:11	ki hu hi zimah vehi vehu ‘avon pelilim. 
job 31:12	ki ’esh hi ‘ad ’awadon tokhel uwekhal tewu’ati tesharesh. 
job 31:13	’im ’em’as mishpat ‘awdi va’amati beriwam ‘imadi. 
job 31:14	umah ’e‘eseh ki yaqum ’el vekhi yifqod mah ’ashiwenu. 
job 31:15	halo wabeten ‘oseini ‘asahu vaykhunenu barekhem ’ekhad. 
job 31:16	’im ’emna‘ meikheifets dalim ve‘einei ’almanah ’akhaleh. 
job 31:17	ve’okhal piti lewadi velo ’akhal yatom mimenah. 
job 31:18	ki mine‘urai gedeilani khe’aw umibeten ’imi ’ankhenah. 
job 31:19	’im ’er’eh ’owed mibeli lewush ve’en kesut la’ewyon. 
job 31:20	’im lo weirakhuni khalatso khalatsav umigez kewasai yitkhamam. 
job 31:21	’im hanifoti ‘al yatom yadi ki ’er’eh washa‘ar ‘ezrati. 
job 31:22	keteifi mishikhmah tipol ve’ezro‘i miqanah tishawer. 
job 31:23	ki fakhad ’eilai ’ed ’el umise’eito lo ’ukhal. 
job 31:24	’im samti zahaw kisli velaketem ’amarti miwtakhi. 
job 31:25	’im ’esmakh ki raw kheili vekhi khabir matse’ah yadi. 
job 31:26	’im ’er’eh ’or ki yahel veyareiakh yaqar holekh. 
job 31:27	vayift baseiter libi vatishaq yadi lefi. 
job 31:28	gam hu ‘avon pelili ki khikhashti la’el mima‘al. 
job 31:29	’im ’esmakh befid mesan’i vehit‘orarti ki metsa’o ra‘. 
job 31:30	velo natati lakhato khiki lish’ol be’alah nafsho. 
job 31:31	’im lo ’ameru metei ’aholi mi yiten mibesaro lo nisba‘. 
job 31:32	bakhuts lo yalin ger delatai la’orakh ’eftakh. 
job 31:33	’im kisiti khe’adam pesha‘ai litmon bekhubi ‘avoni. 
job 31:34	ki ’e‘erots hamon rabah uwuz mishpakhot yekhiteini va’edom lo ’eitsei fatakh. 
job 31:35	mi yiten li shomeia‘ li hen tavi shadai ya‘aneini veseifer kataw ’ish riwi. 
job 31:36	’im lo ‘aloshi khemi ’esa’enu ’e‘endenu ‘atarot li. 
job 31:37	mispar tse‘adai ’agidenu kemo nagid ’aqarawenu. 
job 31:38	’im ‘alai ’admati tiz‘aq veyakhad telameha yiwkayun. 
job 31:39	’im kokhah ’akhalti weli khasef venefesh be‘aleha hipakheti. 
job 31:40	takhat khitah yeitsei khoakh vetakhat se‘orah wa’eshah tamu diwrei ’iyow. 
job 32:1	vayishbetu sheloshet ha’anashim ha’eleh mei‘anot ’et ’iyow ki hu tsadiq be‘einav. 
job 32:2	vayikhar ’af ’elihu wen barakh’el habuzi mimishpakhat ram be’iyow kharah ’apo ‘al tsadeqo nafsho mei’elohim. 
job 32:3	uwishloshet rei‘av kharah ’apo ‘al ’asher lo matse’u ma‘aneh vayarshi‘u ’et ’iyow. 
job 32:4	ve’elihu khikah ’et ’iyow bidwarim ki zeqeinim hemah mimenu leyamim. 
job 32:5	vayar ’elihu ki ’en ma‘aneh befi sheloshet ha’anashim vayikhar ’apo. 
job 32:6	vaya‘an ’elihu wen barakh’el habuzi vayomar tsa‘ir ’ani leyamim ve’atem yeshishim ‘al ken zakhalti va’ira meikhavot dei‘i ’etkhem. 
job 32:7	’amarti yamim yedabeiru verow nim yodi‘u khakhmah 
job 32:8	’akhen ruakh hi we’enosh venishmat shadai tewinem. 
job 32:9	lo rabim yekhkamu uzeqeinim yawinu mishpat. 
job 32:10	lakhen ’amarti shim‘ah li ’akhaveh dei‘i ’af ’ani. 
job 32:11	hen hokhalti lediwreikhem ’azin ‘ad tewunoteikhem ‘ad takhqerun milin. 
job 32:12	ve‘adeikhem ’etbonan vehineh ’en le’iyow mokhiakh ‘oneh ’amarav mikem. 
job 32:13	pen tomeru matsanu khakhmah ’el yidefenu lo ’ish. 
job 32:14	velo ‘arakh ’eilai milin uwe’imreikhem lo ’ashiwenu. 
job 32:15	khatu lo ‘anu ‘od he‘tiqu meihem milim. 
job 32:16	vehokhalti ki lo yedabeiru ki ‘amedu lo ‘anu ‘od. 
job 32:17	’a‘aneh ’af ’ani khelqi ’akhaveh dei‘i ’af ’ani. 
job 32:18	ki maleiti milim hetsiqatni ruakh bitni. 
job 32:19	hineh witni keyayin lo yipateiakh ke’owot khadashim yibaqeia‘. 
job 32:20	’adaberah veyirvakh li ’eftakh sefatai ve’e‘eneh. 
job 32:21	’al na ’esa fenei ’ish ve’el ’adam lo ’akhaneh. 
job 32:22	ki lo yada‘ti ’akhaneh kim‘at yisa’eini ‘oseini. 
job 33:1	ve’ulam shema‘ na ’iyow milai vekhal dewarai ha’azinah. 
job 33:2	hineh na patakhti fi diberah leshoni wekhiki. 
job 33:3	yosher libi ’amarai veda‘at fatai barur mileilu. 
job 33:4	ruakh ’el ‘asateni venishmat shadai tekhayeini. 
job 33:5	’im tukhal hashiweini ‘erkhah lefanai hityatsawah. 
job 33:6	hen ’ani khefikha la’el meikhomer qoratsti gam ’ani. 
job 33:7	hineh ’eimati lo tewa‘ateka ve’akhpi ‘alekha lo yikhbad. 
job 33:8	’akh ’amarta we’azenai veqol milin ’eshma‘. 
job 33:9	zakh ’ani beli fasha‘ khaf ’anokhi velo ‘avon li. 
job 33:10	hen tenu’ot ‘alai yimtsa yakhsheweini le’oyew lo. 
job 33:11	yasem basad raglai yishmor kal ’arekhotai. 
job 33:12	hen zot lo tsadaqta ’e‘eneka ki yirbeh ’eloha mei’enosh. 
job 33:13	madua‘ ’eilav riwota ki khal dewarav lo ya‘aneh. 
job 33:14	ki we’akhat yedaber ’el uwishtayim lo yeshurenah. 
job 33:15	bakhalom khezyon laylah binfol tardeimah ‘al ’anashim bitnumot ‘alei mishkaw. 
job 33:16	’az yigleh ’ozen ’anashim uwemosaram yakhtom. 
job 33:17	lehasir ’adam ma‘aseh vegeivah migewer yekhaseh. 
job 33:18	yakhsokh nafsho mini shakhat vekhayato mei‘awor bashalakh. 
job 33:19	vehukhakh bemakh’ow ‘al mishkawo veriw verow ‘atsamav ’eitan. 
job 33:20	vezihamatu khayato lakhem venafsho ma’akhal ta’avah. 
job 33:21	yikhel besaro meiro’i ushefi veshupu ‘atsmotav lo ru’’u. 
job 33:22	vatiqraw lashakhat nafsho vekhayato lamitim. 
job 33:23	’im yesh ‘alav mal’akh meilits ’ekhad mini ’alef lehagid le’adam yashero. 
job 33:24	vaykhunenu vayomer peda‘eihu meiredet shakhat matsati khofer. 
job 33:25	rutafash besaro mino‘ar yashuw limei ‘alumav. 
job 33:26	ye‘tar ’el ’eloah vayirtseihu vayar panav bitru‘ah vayashew le’enosh tsidqato. 
job 33:27	yashor ‘al ’anashim vayomer khatati veyashar he‘eveiti velo shavah li. 
job 33:28	padah nafshi nafsho mei‘awor bashakhat vekhayati vekhayato ba’or tir’eh. 
job 33:29	hen kal ’eleh yif‘al ’el pa‘amayim shalosh ‘im gawer. 
job 33:30	lehashiw nafsho mini shakhat lei’or be’or hakhayim. 
job 33:31	haqshew ’iyow shema‘ li hakharesh ve’anokhi ’adaber. 
job 33:32	’im yesh milin hashiweini daber ki khafatsti tsadeqeka. 
job 33:33	’im ’ayin ’atah shema‘ li hakharesh va’a’alefkha khakhmah 
job 34:1	vaya‘an ’elihu vayomar. 
job 34:2	shim‘u khakhamim milai veyode‘im ha’azinu li. 
job 34:3	ki ’ozen milin tiwkhan vekhekh yit‘am le’ekhol. 
job 34:4	mishpat niwkharah lanu neide‘ah weineinu mah tow. 
job 34:5	ki ’amar ’iyow tsadaqti ve’el heisir mishpati. 
job 34:6	‘al mishpati ’akhazew ’anush khitsi weli fasha‘. 
job 34:7	mi gewer ke’iyow yishteh la‘ag kamayim. 
job 34:8	ve’arakh lekhewrah ‘im po‘alei ’aven velalekhet ‘im ’anshei resha‘. 
job 34:9	ki ’amar lo yiskan gawer birtsoto ‘im ’elohim. 
job 34:10	lakhen ’anashei leiwaw shim‘u li khalilah la’el meiresha‘ veshadai mei‘avel. 
job 34:11	ki fo‘al ’adam yeshalem lo ukhe’orakh ’ish yamtsi’enu. 
job 34:12	’af ’amenam ’el lo yarshia‘ veshadai lo ye‘avet mishpat. 
job 34:13	mi faqad ‘alav ’aretsah umi m teiwel kulah. 
job 34:14	’im yasim ’eilav libo rukho venishmato ’eilav ye’esof. 
job 34:15	yigva‘ kal basar yakhad ve’adam ‘al ‘afar yashuw. 
job 34:16	ve’im binah shim‘ah zot ha’azinah leqol milai. 
job 34:17	ha’af sonei mishpat yakhawosh ve’im tsadiq kabir tarshia‘. 
job 34:18	ha’amor lemelekh beliya‘al rasha‘ ’el nediwim. 
job 34:19	’asher lo nasa penei sarim velo nikar shoa‘ lifnei dal ki ma‘aseh yadav kulam. 
job 34:20	rega‘ yamutu vakhatsot layelah yego‘ashu ‘am veya‘aworu veyasiru ’abir lo weyad. 
job 34:21	ki ‘einav ‘al darkhei ’ish vekhal tse‘adav yir’eh. 
job 34:22	’en khoshekh ve’en tsalmavet lehisater m po‘alei ’aven. 
job 34:23	ki lo ‘al ’ish yasim ‘od lahalokh ’el ’el bamishpat. 
job 34:24	yaroa‘ kabirim lo kheiqer vaya‘amed ’akheirim takhtam. 
job 34:25	lakhen yakir ma‘badeihem vehafakh laylah veyidaka’u. 
job 34:26	takhat resha‘im sefaqam bimqom ro’im. 
job 34:27	’asher ‘al ken saru mei’akharav vekhal derakhav lo hiskilu. 
job 34:28	lehawi ‘alav tsa‘aqat dal vetsa‘aqat ‘aniyim yishma‘. 
job 34:29	vehu yashqit umi yarshia‘ veyaster panim umi yeshurenu ve‘al go ve‘al ’adam yakhad. 
job 34:30	mimelokh ’adam khanef mimoqeshei ‘am. 
job 34:31	ki ’el ’el he’amar nasati lo ’ekhbol. 
job 34:32	bil‘adei ’ekhezeh ’atah horeini ’im ‘avel pa‘alti lo ’osif. 
job 34:33	hamei‘imekha yeshalmenah ki ma’asta ki ’atah tiwkhar velo ’ani umah yada‘ta daber. 
job 34:34	’anshei leiwaw yomeru li vegewer khakham shomeia‘ li. 
job 34:35	’iyow lo weda‘at yedaber udewarav lo wehaskel. 
job 34:36	’awi yibakhen ’iyow ‘ad netsakh ‘al teshuwot be’anshei ’aven. 
job 34:37	ki yosif ‘al khatato fesha‘ beineinu yispoq veyerew ’amarav la’el. 
job 35:1	vaya‘an ’elihu vayomar. 
job 35:2	hazot khashawta lemishpat ’amarta tsidqi mei’el. 
job 35:3	ki tomar mah yiskan lakh mah ’o‘il meikhatati. 
job 35:4	’ani ’ashiwekha milin ve’et rei‘ekha ‘imakh. 
job 35:5	habet shamayim ure’eh veshur khaqim gawehu mimeka. 
job 35:6	’im khatata mah tif‘al bo verabu fesha‘ekha mah ta‘aseh lo. 
job 35:7	’im tsadaqta mah titen lo ’o mah miyadekha yiqakh. 
job 35:8	le’ish kamokha rish‘ekha ulewen ’adam tsidqatekha. 
job 35:9	meirow ‘ashuqim yaz‘iqu yeshave‘u mizeroa‘ rabim. 
job 35:10	velo ’amar ’ayeh ’eloah ‘osai noten zemirot balayelah.

job 36:1	vayosef ’elihu vayomar. 
job 36:2	katar li ze‘er va’akhaveka ki ‘od le’eloah milim. 
job 36:3	’esa dei‘i lemeirakhoq ulefo‘ali ’eten tsedeq. 
job 36:4	ki ’amenam lo sheqer milai temim dei‘ot ‘imakh. 
job 36:5	hen ’el kabir velo yim’as kabir koakh lew. 
job 36:6	lo yekhayeh rasha‘ umishpat ‘aniyim yiten. 
job 36:7	lo yigra‘ mitsadiq ‘einav ve’et melakhim lakisei vayoshiwem lanetsakh vayigbahu. 
job 36:8	ve’im ’asurim baziqim yilakhedun bekhawlei ‘oni. 
job 36:9	vayaged lahem pa‘olam ufish‘eihem ki yitgabaru. 
job 36:10	vayigel ’azenam lamusar vayomer ki yeshuwun mei’aven. 
job 36:11	’im yishme‘u veya‘awodu yekhalu yemeihem batow usheneihem bane‘imim. 
job 36:12	ve’im lo yishme‘u beshelakh ya‘aworu veyigve‘u kiwli da‘at 
job 36:13	vekhanfei lew yasimu ’af lo yeshave‘u ki ’asaram. 
job 36:14	tamot bano‘ar nafsham vekhayatam baqedeishim. 
job 36:15	yekhalets ‘ani we‘aneyo veyigel balakhats ’azenam. 
job 36:16	ve’af hasitekha mipi tsar rakhaw lo mutsaq takhteha venakhat lekhanekha malei dashen. 
job 36:17	vedin rasha‘ maleita din umishpat yitmokhu. 
job 36:18	ki kheimah pen yesitekha wesafeq veraw kofer ’al yateka. 
job 36:19	haya‘arokh shu‘akha lo wetsar vekhol ma’amatsei khoakh. 
job 36:20	’al tish’af halayelah la‘alot ‘amim takhtam. 
job 36:21	hishamer ’al teifen ’el ’aven ki ‘al zeh bakharta mei‘oni. 
job 36:22	hen ’el yasgiw bekhokho mi khamohu moreh. 
job 36:23	mi faqad ‘alav darko umi ’amar pa‘alta ‘avlah. 
job 36:24	zekhor ki tasgi fa‘olo ’asher shoreru ’anashim. 
job 36:25	kal ’adam khazu wo ’enosh yabit meirakhoq. 
job 36:26	hen ’el gi velo neida‘ mispar shanav velo kheiqer. 
job 36:27	ki yegara‘ nitfei mayim yazoqu matar le’eido. 
job 36:28	’asher yizelu shekhaqim yir‘afu ‘alei ’adam raw. 
job 36:29	’af ’im yawin mifresei ‘aw teshu’ot sukato. 
job 36:30	hen paras ‘alav ’oro veshareshei hayam kisah. 
job 36:31	ki wam yadin ‘amim yiten ’okhel lemakhbir.

job 36:33	yagid ‘alav rei‘o miqneh ’af ‘al ‘oleh. 
job 37:1	’af lezot yekherad libi veyitar mimeqomo. 
job 37:2	shim‘u shamoa‘ berogez qolo vehegeh mipiv yeitsei.

job 37:4	’akharav yish’ag qol yar‘em beqol ge’ono velo ye‘aqewem ki yishama‘ qolo. 
job 37:5	yar‘em ’el beqolo nifla’ot ‘oseh gedolot velo neida‘. 
job 37:6	ki lashelag yomar hevei ’arets vegeshem matar vegeshem mitrot ‘uzo. 
job 37:7	beyad kal ’adam yakhtom lada‘at kal ’anshei ma‘aseihu.

job 38:1	vaya‘an yhoh ’et ’iyow min hase‘arah min hase‘arah vayomar. 
job 38:2	mi zeh makhshikh ‘eitsah wemilin beli da‘at. 
job 38:3	’ezar na khegewer khalatsekha ve’esh’alekha vehodi‘eini. 
job 38:4	’eifoh hayita beyasedi ’arets haged ’im yada‘ta winah. 
job 38:5	mi sam memadeha ki teida‘ ’o mi natah ‘aleha qav. 
job 38:6	‘al mah ’adaneha hateba‘u ’o mi yarah ’ewen pinatah. 
job 38:7	beran yakhad kokhwei woqer vayari‘u kal benei ’elohim. 
job 38:8	vayasekh bidlatayim yam begikho meirekhem yeitsei. 
job 38:9	besumi ‘anan lewusho va‘arafel khatulato. 
job 38:10	va’eshbor ‘alav khuqi va’asim beriakh udelatayim.

job 39:2	tispor yerakhim temalenah veyada‘ta ‘et lidtanah. 
job 39:3	tikhra‘nah yaldeihen tefalakhnah khewleihem teshalakhnah. 
job 39:4	yakhlemu weneihem yirbu wabar yatse’u velo shawu lamo. 
job 39:5	mi shilakh pere khafeshi umoserot ‘arod mi fiteiakh. 
job 39:6	’asher samti ‘arawah weito umishkenotav meleikhah. 
job 39:7	yiskhaq lahamon qiryah teshu’ot noges lo yishma‘. 
job 39:8	yetur harim mir‘eihu ve’akhar kal yaroq yidrosh. 
job 39:9	hayoweh rem ‘awedekha ’im yalin ‘al ’awusekha. 
job 39:10	hatiqshar rem betelem ‘awoto ’im yesaded ‘amaqim ’akharekha. 
job 39:11	hatiwtakh bo ki raw kokho veta‘azow ’eilav yegi‘ekha. 
job 39:12	hata’amin bo ki yashuw yashiw zar‘ekha vegarenekha ye’esof. 
job 39:13	kenaf renanim ne‘elasah ’im ’ewrah khasidah venotsah. 
job 39:14	ki ta‘azow la’arets beitseha ve‘al ‘afar tekhamem. 
job 39:15	vatishkakh ki regel tezureha vekhayat hasadeh tedusheha. 
job 39:16	hiqshiakh baneha lelo lah leriq yegi‘ah beli fakhad. 
job 39:17	ki hishah ’eloah khakhmah velo khalaq lah babinah. 
job 39:18	ka‘et bamarom tamri tiskhaq lasus ulerokhewo. 
job 39:19	hatiten lasus gewurah hatalbish tsavaro ra‘mah. 
job 39:20	hetar‘ishenu ka’arbeh hod nakhro ’eimah. 
job 39:21	yakhperu wa‘eimeq veyasis bekhoakh yeitsei liqrat nasheq. 
job 39:22	yiskhaq lefakhad velo yeikhat velo yashuw mipenei kharew. 
job 39:23	‘alav tirneh ’ashpah lahaw khanit vekhidon. 
job 39:24	bera‘ash verogez yegame ’arets velo ya’amin ki qol shofar. 
job 39:25	bedei shofar yomar he’akh umeirakhoq yariakh milkhamah ra‘am rim uteru‘ah. 
job 39:26	hamibinatekha ya’awer nets yifros kenafo kenafav leteiman. 
job 39:27	’im ‘al pikha yagbiah nasher vekhi yarim qino. 
job 39:28	sela‘ yishkon veyitlonan ‘al shen sela‘ umetsudah. 
job 39:29	misham khafar ’okhel lemeirakhoq ‘einav yabitu. 
job 39:30	ve’efrokho ve’efrokhav ye‘al‘u dam uwa’asher khalalim sham hu. 
job 40:1	vaya‘an yhoh ’et ’iyow vayomar. 
job 40:2	harow ‘im shadai yisor mokhiakh ’eloah ya‘anenah. 
job 40:3	vaya‘an ’iyow ’et yhoh vayomar. 
job 40:4	hen qaloti mah ’ashiweka yadi samti lemo fi. 
job 40:5	’akhat dibarti velo ’e‘eneh ushetayim velo ’osif. 
job 40:6	vaya‘an yhoh ’et ’iyow min se‘arah min se‘arah vayomar. 
job 40:7	’ezar na khegewer khalatsekha ’esh’alekha vehodi‘eini. 
job 40:8	ha’af tafer mishpati tarshi‘eini lema‘an titsdaq. 
job 40:9	ve’im zeroa‘ ka’el lakh uweqol kamohu tar‘em. 
job 40:10	‘adeh na ga’on vagowah vehod vehadar tilbash. 
job 40:11	hafets ‘ewrot ’apekha ure’eh khal gei’eh vehashpileihu. 
job 40:12	re’eh khal gei’eh hakhni‘eihu vahadokh resha‘im takhtam. 
job 40:13	tamenem be‘afar yakhad peneihem khawosh batamun. 
job 40:14	vegam ’ani ’odeka ki toshia‘ lekha yeminekha. 
job 40:15	hineh na weheimot ’asher ‘asiti ‘imakh khatsir kabaqar yokhel. 
job 40:16	hineh na khokho wematenav ve’ono bishrirei witno. 
job 40:17	yakhpots zenawo khemo ’arez gidei fakhado fakhadav yesoragu. 
job 40:18	‘atsamav ’afiqei nekhushah geramav kimtil barzel. 
job 40:19	hu reishit darkhei ’el ha‘oso yagesh kharbo. 
job 40:20	ki wul harim yis’u lo vekhal khayat hasadeh yesakhaqu sham. 
job 40:21	takhat tse’elim yishkaw beseiter qaneh uwitsah. 
job 40:22	yesukuhu tse’elim tsilalo yesubuhu ‘arwei nakhal. 
job 40:23	hen ya‘ashoq nahar lo yakhpoz yiwtakh ki yagiakh yarden ’el pihu. 
job 40:24	be‘einav yiqakhenu bemoqshim yinqaw ’af. 
job 41:1	timshokh livyatan bekhakah uwekhewel tashqia‘ leshono. 
job 41:2	hatasim ’agmon be’apo uwekhoakh tiqow lekheyo. 
job 41:3	hayarbeh ’eilekha takhanunim ’im yedaber ’eilekha rakot. 
job 41:4	hayikhrot berit ‘imakh tiqakhenu le‘ewed ‘olam. 
job 41:5	hatsakheq bo katsipor vetiqsherenu lena‘arotekha. 
job 41:6	yikhru ‘alav khabarim yekhetsuhu ben kena‘anim. 
job 41:7	hatmalei wesukot ‘oro uwetsiltsal dagim rosho. 
job 41:8	sim ‘alav kapekha zekhor milkhamah ’al tosaf. 
job 41:9	hen tokhalto nikhzawah hagam ’el mar’av yutal. 
job 41:10	lo ’akhzar ki ye‘urenu umi hu lefanai yityatsaw. 
job 41:11	mi hiqdimani va’ashalem takhat kal hashamayim li hu. 
job 41:12	lo lo ’akharish badav udewar gewurot vekhin ‘erko. 
job 41:13	mi gilah penei lewusho bekhefel risno mi yawo. 
job 41:14	daltei fanav mi fiteiakh sewiwot shinav ’eimah. 
job 41:15	ga’avah ’afiqei maginim sagur khotam tsar. 
job 41:16	’ekhad be’ekhad yigashu veruakh lo yawo weineihem. 
job 41:17	’ish be’akhihu yedubaqu yitlakedu velo yitparadu. 
job 41:18	‘atishotav tahel ’or ve‘einav ke‘af‘apei shakhar. 
job 41:19	mipiv lapidim yahalokhu kidodei ’esh yitmalatu. 
job 41:20	minekhirav yeitsei ‘ashan kedud nafuakh ve’agmon. 
job 41:21	nafsho gekhalim telahet velahaw mipiv yeitsei. 
job 41:22	betsavaro yalin ‘oz ulefanav taduts de’awah. 
job 41:23	mapelei wesaro daweiqu yatsuq ‘alav bal yimot. 
job 41:24	libo yatsuq kemo ’awen veyatsuq kefelakh takhtit. 
job 41:25	miseito yaguru ’eilim mishewarim yitkhata’u. 
job 41:26	masigeihu kherew beli taqum khanit masa‘ veshiryah. 
job 41:27	yakhshow letewen barzel le‘ets riqawon nekhushah. 
job 41:28	lo yawrikhenu wen qashet leqash nehpekhu lo ’awnei qala‘. 
job 41:29	keqash nekhshewu totakh veyiskhaq lera‘ash kidon. 
job 41:30	takhtav khadudei khares yirpad kharuts ‘alei tit. 
job 41:31	yartiakh kasir metsulah yam yasim kamerqakhah. 
job 41:32	’akharav ya’ir natiw yakhshow tehom leseiwah. 
job 41:33	’en ‘al ‘afar mashelo he‘asu liwli khat. 
job 41:34	’et kal gawoah yir’eh hu melekh ‘al kal benei shakhats. 
job 42:1	vaya‘an ’iyow ’et yhoh vayomar. 
job 42:2	yada‘ta yada‘ti ki khol tukhal velo yibatser mimekha mezimah. 
job 42:3	mi zeh ma‘lim ‘eitsah beli da‘at lakhen higadti velo ’awin nifla’ot mimeni velo ’eida‘. 
job 42:4	shema‘ na ve’anokhi ’adaber ’esh’alekha vehodi‘eini. 
job 42:5	lesheima‘ ’ozen shema‘tikha ve‘atah ‘eini ra’atekha. 
job 42:6	‘al ken ’em’as venikhamti ‘al ‘afar va’eifer. 
job 42:7	vayhi ’akhar diber yhoh ’et hadewarim ha’eleh ’el ’iyow vayomer yhoh ’el ’elifaz hateimani kharah ’api wekha uwishnei rei‘ekha ki lo dibartem ’eilai nekhonah ke‘awdi ’iyow. 
job 42:8	ve‘atah qekhu lakhem shiw‘ah farim veshiw‘ah ’eilim ulekhu ’el ‘awdi ’iyow veha‘alitem ‘olah ba‘adkhem ve’iyow ‘awdi yitpalel ‘aleikhem ki ’im panav ’esa lewilti ‘asot ‘imakhem newalah ki lo dibartem ’eilai nekhonah ke‘awdi ’iyow. 
job 42:9	vayeilekhu ’elifaz hateimani uwildad hashukhi tsofar hana‘amati vaya‘asu ka’asher diber ’aleihem yhoh vayisa yhoh ’et penei ’iyow. 
job 42:10	yhoh w ’et shewit shewut ’iyow behitpalo be‘ad rei‘eihu vayosef yhoh ’et kal ’asher le’iyow lemishneh. 
job 42:11	vayawo’u ’eilav kal ’ekhav vekhal ’akhyotav ’akhyotav vekhal yode‘av lefanim vayokhelu ‘imo lekhem beweito vayanudu lo vaynakhamu ’oto ‘al kal hara‘ah ’asher heiwi yhoh ‘alav vayitenu lo ’ish qesitah ’ekhat ve’ish nezem zahaw ’ekhad. 
job 42:12	yhoh beirakh ’et ’akharit ’iyow meireishito vayhi lo ’arba‘ah ‘asar ’elef tson vesheishet ’alafim gemalim ve’elef tsemed baqar ve’elef ’atonot. 
job 42:13	vayhi lo shiw‘anah wanim veshalosh banot. 
job 42:14	vayiqra shem ha’akhat yemimah veshem hasheinit qetsi‘ah veshem hashelishit qeren hapukh. 
job 42:15	velo nimtsa nashim yafot kiwnot ’iyow bekhal ha’arets vayiten lahem ’awihem nakhalah betokh ’akheihem. 
job 42:16	vaykhi ’iyow ’akharei zot mei’ah ve’arba‘im shanah vayar vayir’eh ’et banav ve’et benei wanav ’arba‘ah dorot. 
job 42:17	vayamat ’iyow zaqen usewa‘ yamim. 
songs 1:1	shir hashirim ’asher lishlomoh. 
songs 1:2	yishaqeini mineshiqot pihu ki towim dodekha miyayin. 
songs 1:3	lereiakh shemanekha towim shemen turaq shemekha ‘al ken ‘alamot ’aheiwukha. 
songs 1:4	mashekheini ’akharekha narutsah hewi’ani hamelekh khadarav nagilah venismekhah bakh nazkirah dodekha miyayin meisharim ’aheiwukha. 
songs 1:5	shekhorah ’ani venavah benot yerushalim ke’aholei qeidar kiri‘ot shelomoh. 
songs 1:6	’al tir’uni she’ani shekharkhoret sheshezafatni hashamesh benei ’imi nikharu wi samuni noteirah ’et hakeramim karmi sheli lo natareti. 
songs 1:7	hagidah li she’ahawah nafshi ’eikhah tir‘eh ’eikhah tarbits batsahorayim shalamah ’ehyeh ke‘oteyah ‘al ‘edrei khaweirekha. 
songs 1:8	’im lo teide‘i lakh hayafah banashim tse’i lakh be‘iqwei hatson ure‘i ’et gediyotayikh ‘al mishkenot haro‘im. 
songs 1:9	lesusati berikhwei far‘oh dimitikh ra‘yati. 
songs 1:10	navu lekhayayikh batorim tsavarekh bakharuzim. 
songs 1:11	torei zahaw na‘aseh lakh ‘im nequdot hakasef. 
songs 1:12	‘ad shehamelekh bimsibo nirdi natan reikho. 
songs 1:13	tseror hamor dodi li ben shadai yalin. 
songs 1:14	’eshkol hakofer dodi li bekharmei ‘en gedi. 
songs 1:15	hinakh yafah ra‘yati hinakh yafah ‘einayikh yonim. 
songs 1:16	hinekha yafeh dodi ’af na‘im ’af ‘arseinu ra‘ananah. 
songs 1:17	qorot bateinu ’arazim rakhiteinu rahiteinu berotim. 
songs 2:1	’ani khawatselet hasharon shoshanat ha‘amaqim. 
songs 2:2	keshoshanah ben hakhokhim ken ra‘yati ben habanot. 
songs 2:3	ketapuakh ba‘atsei haya‘ar ken dodi ben habanim betsilo khimadti veyashawti ufiryo matoq lekhiki. 
songs 2:4	hewi’ani ’el bet hayayin vediglo ‘alai ’ahawah. 
songs 2:5	samekhuni ba’ashishot rapeduni batapukhim ki kholat ’ahawah ’ani. 
songs 2:6	semolo takhat leroshi vimino tekhabeqeini. 
songs 2:7	hishba‘ti ’etkhem benot yerushalim bitswa’ot ’o be’aylot hasadeh ’im ta‘iru ve’im te‘oru ’et ha’ahawah ‘ad shetekhpats. 
songs 2:8	qol dodi hineh zeh ba medaleg ‘al heharim meqapets ‘al hagewa‘ot. 
songs 2:9	domeh dodi litswi ’o le‘ofer ha’ayalim hineh zeh ‘omed ’akhar kateleinu mashgiakh min hakhalonot meitsits min hakharakim. 
songs 2:10	‘anah dodi ve’amar li qumi lakh ra‘yati yafati ulekhi lakh. 
songs 2:11	ki hineh hasetav hasetav ‘awar hageshem khalaf halakh lo. 
songs 2:12	hanitsanim nir’u wa’arets ‘et hazamir higia‘ veqol hator nishma‘ be’artseinu. 
songs 2:13	hate’einah khanetah fageha vehagefanim semadar natenu reiakh qumi lekhi lakh ra‘yati yafati ulekhi lakh. 
songs 2:14	yonati bekhagvei hasela‘ beseiter hamadreigah har’ini ’et mar’ayikh hashmi‘ini ’et qolekh ki qolekh ‘arew umar’ekh naveh. 
songs 2:15	’ekhezu lanu shu‘alim shu‘alim qetanim mekhabelim keramim ukherameinu semadar. 
songs 2:16	dodi li va’ani lo haro‘eh bashoshanim. 
songs 2:17	‘ad sheyafuakh hayom venasu hatselalim sow demeh lekha dodi litswi ’o le‘ofer ha’ayalim ‘al harei water. 
songs 3:1	‘al mishkawi baleilot biqashti ’et she’ahawah nafshi biqashtiv velo metsativ. 
songs 3:2	’aqumah na va’asowwah wa‘ir bashevaqim uwarekhowot ’awaqshah ’et she’ahawah nafshi biqashtiv velo metsativ. 
songs 3:3	metsa’uni hashomerim hasowewim ba‘ir ’et she’ahawah nafshi re’item. 
songs 3:4	kim‘at she‘awarti meihem ‘ad shematsati ’et she’ahawah nafshi ’akhaztiv velo ’arpenu ‘ad shehaweitiv ’el bet ’imi ve’el kheder horati. 
songs 3:5	hishba‘ti ’etkhem benot yerushalim bitswa’ot ’o be’aylot hasadeh ’im ta‘iru ve’im te‘oru ’et ha’ahawah ‘ad shetekhpats. 
songs 3:6	mi zot ‘olah min hamidbar ketimarot ‘ashan mequteret mor ulewonah mikol ’awqat rokhel. 
songs 3:7	hineh mitato shelishlomoh shishim giborim sawiw lah migiborei yisra’el. 
songs 3:8	kulam ’akhuzei kherew melumedei milkhamah ’ish kharbo ‘al yereikho mipakhad baleilot. 
songs 3:9	’apiryon ‘asah lo hamelekh shelomoh mei‘atsei halewanon. 
songs 3:10	‘amudav ‘asah khesef refidato zahaw merkawo ’argaman tokho ratsuf ’ahawah mibenot yerushalim. 
songs 3:11	tse’enah ure’enah benot tsiyon bamelekh shelomoh ba‘atarah she‘iterah lo ’imo beyom khatunato uweyom simkhat libo. 
songs 4:1	hinakh yafah ra‘yati hinakh yafah ‘einayikh yonim miba‘ad letsamatekh sa‘rekh ke‘eider ha‘izim shegaleshu meihar gil‘ad. 
songs 4:2	shinayikh ke‘eider haqetsuwot she‘alu min harakhtsah shekulam mat’imot veshakulah ’en bahem. 
songs 4:3	kekhut hashani siftotayikh umidbarekh naveh kefelakh harimon raqatekh miba‘ad letsamatekh. 
songs 4:4	kemigdal david tsavarekh banui letalpiyot ’elef hamagen talui ‘alav kol shiltei hagiborim. 
songs 4:5	shenei shadayikh kishnei ‘ofarim te’omei tsewiyah haro‘im bashoshanim. 
songs 4:6	‘ad sheyafuakh hayom venasu hatselalim ’eilekh li ’el har hamor ve’el giw‘at halewonah. 
songs 4:7	kulakh yafah ra‘yati umum ’en bakh. 
songs 4:8	’iti milewanon kalah ’iti milewanon tawo’i tashuri meirosh ’amanah meirosh senir vekhermon mime‘onot ’arayot meiharei nemeirim. 
songs 4:9	libawtini ’akhoti khalah libawtini be’akhad be’akhat mei‘einayikh be’akhad ‘anaq mitsaveronayikh. 
songs 4:10	mah yafu dodayikh ’akhoti khalah mah towu dodayikh miyayin vereiakh shemanayikh mikal besamim. 
songs 4:11	nofet titofenah siftotayikh kalah dewash vekhalaw takhat leshonekh vereiakh salmotayikh kereiakh lewanon. 
songs 4:12	gan na‘ul ’akhoti khalah gal na‘ul ma‘yan khatum. 
songs 4:13	shelakhayikh pardes rimonim ‘im peri megadim kefarim ‘im neradim. 
songs 4:14	neired vekharkom qaneh veqinamon ‘im kal ‘atsei lewonah mor va’ahalot ‘im kal rashei wesamim. 
songs 4:15	ma‘yan ganim be’er mayim khayim venozelim min lewanon. 
songs 4:16	‘uri tsafon uwo’i teiman hafikhi gani yizelu wesamav yawo dodi legano veyokhal peri megadav. 
songs 5:1	bati legani ’akhoti khalah ’ariti mori ‘im besami ’akhalti ya‘ri ‘im diwshi shatiti yeini ‘im khalawi ’ikhlu rei‘im shetu veshikhru dodim. 
songs 5:2	’ani yesheinah velibi ‘er qol dodi dofeq pitkhi li ’akhoti ra‘yati yonati tamati sheroshi nimla tal qevutsotai resisei layelah. 
songs 5:3	pashati ’et kutaneti ’eikhakhah ’elbashenah rakhatsti ’et raglai ’eikhakhah ’atanefem. 
songs 5:4	dodi shalakh yado min hakhor umei‘ai hamu ‘alav. 
songs 5:5	qamti ’ani liftoakh ledodi veyadai natefu mor ve’etsbe‘otai mor ‘ower ‘al kapot haman‘ul. 
songs 5:6	patakhti ’ani ledodi vedodi khamaq ‘awar nafshi yatse’ah wedabero biqashtihu velo metsatihu qerativ velo ‘anani. 
songs 5:7	metsa’uni hashomerim hasowewim ba‘ir hikuni fetsa‘uni nase’u ’et redidi mei‘alai shomerei hakhomot. 
songs 5:8	hishba‘ti ’etkhem benot yerushalim ’im timtse’u ’et dodi mah tagidu lo shekholat ’ahawah ’ani. 
songs 5:9	mah dodekh midod hayafah banashim mah dodekh midod shekakhah hishba‘tanu. 
songs 5:10	dodi tsakh ve’adom dagul meirewawah. 
songs 5:11	rosho ketem paz qevtsotav taltalim shekhorot ka‘orew. 
songs 5:12	‘einav keyonim ‘al ’afiqei mayim rokhatsot bekhalaw yoshewot ‘al milet. 
songs 5:13	lekhayav ka‘arugat habosem migdelot merqakhim siftotav shoshanim notefot mor ‘ower. 
songs 5:14	yadav gelilei zahaw memula’im batarshish mei‘av ‘eshet shen me‘ulefet sapirim. 
songs 5:15	shoqav ‘amudei shesh meyusadim ‘al ’adnei faz mar’eihu kalewanon bakhur ka’arazim. 
songs 5:16	khiko mamtaqim vekhulo makhamadim zeh dodi vezeh rei‘i benot yerushalim. 
songs 6:1	’anah halakh dodekh hayafah banashim ’anah panah dodekh unewaqshenu ‘imakh. 
songs 6:2	dodi yarad legano la‘arugot habosem lir‘ot baganim velilqot shoshanim. 
songs 6:3	’ani ledodi vedodi li haro‘eh bashoshanim. 
songs 6:4	yafah ’at ra‘yati ketirtsah navah kirushalim ’ayumah kanidgalot. 
songs 6:5	hasebi ‘einayikh minegdi shehem hirhiwuni sa‘rekh ke‘eider ha‘izim shegaleshu min hagil‘ad. 
songs 6:6	shinayikh ke‘eider harekheilim she‘alu min harakhtsah shekulam mat’imot veshakulah ’en bahem. 
songs 6:7	kefelakh harimon raqatekh miba‘ad letsamatekh. 
songs 6:8	shishim hemah melakhot ushemonim pilagshim va‘alamot ’en mispar. 
songs 6:9	’akhat hi yonati tamati ’akhat hi le’imah barah hi leyoladtah ra’uha wanot vai’asheruha melakhot ufilagshim vayhaleluha. 
songs 6:10	mi zot hanishqafah kemo shakhar yafah khalewanah barah kakhamah ’ayumah kanidgalot. 
songs 6:11	’el ginat ’egoz yaradti lir’ot be’ibei hanakhal lir’ot hafarekhah hagefen heineitsu harimonim. 
songs 6:12	lo yada‘ti nafshi samatni markewot ‘ami nadiw. 
songs 6:13	shuwi shuwi hashulamit shuwi shuwi venekhezeh bakh mah tekhezu bashulamit kimkholat hamakhanayim. 
songs 7:1	mah yafu fe‘amayikh bane‘alim bat nadiw khamuqei yereikhayikh kemo khala’im ma‘aseh yedei ’aman. 
songs 7:2	sharerekh ’agan hasahar ’al yekhsar hamazeg bitnekh ‘areimat khitim sugah bashoshanim. 
songs 7:3	shenei shadayikh kishnei ‘ofarim ta’omei tsewiyah. 
songs 7:4	tsavarekh kemigdal hashen ‘einayikh bereikhot bekheshbon ‘al sha‘ar bat rabim ’apekh kemigdal halewanon tsofeh penei damaseq. 
songs 7:5	roshekh ‘alayikh kakarmel vedalat roshekh ka’argaman melekh ’asur barehatim. 
songs 7:6	mah yafit umah na‘amt ’ahawah bata‘anugim. 
songs 7:7	zot qomatekh dametah letamar veshadayikh le’ashkolot. 
songs 7:8	’amarti ’e‘eleh wetamar ’okhazah besansinav veyihyu na shadayikh ke’eshkelot hagefen vereiakh ’apekh katapukhim. 
songs 7:9	vekhikekh keyen hatow holekh ledodi lemeisharim dowew siftei yesheinim. 
songs 7:10	’ani ledodi ve‘alai teshuqato. 
songs 7:11	lekhah dodi neitsei hasadeh nalinah bakefarim. 
songs 7:12	nashkimah lakeramim nir’eh ’im parekhah hagefen pitakh hasemadar heineitsu harimonim sham ’eten ’et dodai lakh. 
songs 7:13	haduda’im natenu reiakh ve‘al petakheinu kal megadim khadashim gam yeshanim dodi tsafanti lakh. 
songs 8:1	mi yitenkha ke’akh li yoneq shedei ’imi ’emtsa’akha wakhuts ’eshaqekha gam lo yawuzu li. 
songs 8:2	’enhagakha ’awi’akha ’el bet ’imi telamedeini ’ashqekha miyayin hareqakh mei‘asis rimoni. 
songs 8:3	semolo takhat roshi vimino tekhabeqeini. 
songs 8:4	hishba‘ti ’etkhem benot yerushalim mah ta‘iru umah te‘oreru ’et ha’ahawah ‘ad shetekhpats. 
songs 8:5	mi zot ‘olah min hamidbar mitrapeqet ‘al dodah takhat hatapuakh ‘orartikha mah khibelatkha ’imekha shamah khibelah yeladatkha. 
songs 8:6	simeini khakhotam ‘al libekha kakhotam ‘al zero‘ekha ki ‘azah khamavet ’ahawah qashah khish’ol qin’ah reshafeha rishpei ’esh shalhewetyah. 
songs 8:7	mayim rabim lo yukhelu lekhabot ’et ha’ahawah uneharot lo yishtefuha ’im yiten ’ish ’et kal hon beito ba’ahawah boz yawuzu lo. 
songs 8:8	’akhot lanu qetanah veshadayim ’en lah mah na‘aseh la’akhoteinu bayom sheyedubar bah. 
songs 8:9	’im khomah hi niwneh ‘aleha tirat kasef ve’im delet hi natsur ‘aleha luakh ’arez. 
songs 8:10	’ani khomah veshadai kamigdalot ’az hayiti we‘einav kemots’et shalom. 
songs 8:11	kerem hayah lishlomoh bewa‘al hamon natan ’et hakerem lanoterim ’ish yawi befiryo ’elef kasef. 
songs 8:12	karmi sheli lefanai ha’elef lekha shelomoh umatayim lenoterim ’et piryo. 
songs 8:13	hayoshewet baganim khaweirim maqshiwim leqolekh hashmi‘ini. 
songs 8:14	berakh dodi udemeh lekha litswi ’o le‘ofer ha’ayalim ‘al harei wesamim. 
ruth 1:1	vayhi bimei shefot hashofetim vayhi ra‘aw ba’arets vayeilekh ’ish mibet lekhem yehudah lagur bisdei mo’aw hu ve’ishto ushenei wanav. 
ruth 1:2	veshem ha’ish ’elimelekh veshem ’ishto na‘omi veshem shenei wanav makhlon vekhilyon ’efratim mibet lekhem yehudah vayawo’u sedei mo’aw vayihyu sham. 
ruth 1:3	vayamat ’elimelekh ’ish na‘omi vatisha’er hi ushenei waneha. 
ruth 1:4	vayis’u lahem nashim mo’awiyot shem ha’akhat ‘arepah veshem hasheinit rut vayeishewu sham ke‘eser shanim.
