ruth 1:5	vayamutu gam sheneihem makhlon vekhilyon vatisha’er ha’ishah mishenei yeladeha umei’ishah. 
ruth 1:6	vataqam hi vekhaloteha vatashaw misedei mo’aw ki shame‘ah bisdeh mo’aw ki faqad yhoh ’et ‘amo latet lahem lakhem. 
ruth 1:7	vateitsei min hamaqom ’asher hayetah shamah ushetei khaloteha ‘imah vateilakhnah waderekh lashuw ’el ’erets yehudah. 
ruth 1:8	vatomer na‘omi lishtei khaloteha leikhenah showenah ’ishah lewet ’imah ya‘aseh ya‘as yhoh ‘imakhem khesed ka’asher ‘asitem ‘im hameitim ve‘imadi. 
ruth 1:9	yiten yhoh lakhem umetsena menukhah ’ishah bet ’ishah vatishaq lahen vatisenah qolan vatiwkenah. 
ruth 1:10	vatomarnah lah ki ’itakh nashuw le‘amekh. 
ruth 1:11	vatomer na‘omi showenah wenotai lamah teilakhnah ‘imi ha‘od li wanim bemei‘ai vehayu lakhem la’anashim. 
ruth 1:12	showenah wenotai leikhena ki zaqanti mihyot le’ish ki ’amarti yesh li tiqvah gam hayiti halaylah le’ish vegam yaladti wanim. 
ruth 1:13	halahen tesabeirenah ‘ad ’asher yigdalu halahen tei‘ageinah lewilti heyot le’ish ’al benotai ki mar li me’od mikem ki yatse’ah wi yad yhoh. 
ruth 1:14	vatisenah qolan vatiwkenah ‘od vatishaq ‘arepah lakhamotah verut daweqah bah. 
ruth 1:15	vatomer hineh shawah yewimtekh ’el ‘amah ve’el ’eloheha shuwi ’akharei yewimtekh. 
ruth 1:16	vatomer rut ’al tifge‘i wi le‘azewekh lashuw mei’akharayikh ki ’el ’asher teilekhi ’eilekh uwa’asher talini ’alin ‘amekh ‘ami veilohayikh ’elohai. 
ruth 1:17	ba’asher tamuti ’amut vesham ’eqawer koh ya‘aseh yhoh li vekhoh yosif ki hamavet yafrid beini uweinekh. 
ruth 1:18	vateire ki mit’ametset hi lalekhet ’itah vatekhdal ledaber ’eileha. 
ruth 1:19	vateilakhnah sheteihem ‘ad bo’anah bet lakhem vayhi kewo’anah bet lekhem vateihom kal ha‘ir ‘aleihen vatomarnah hazot na‘omi. 
ruth 1:20	vatomer ’aleihen ’al tiqrenah li na‘omi qerena li mara ki heimar shadai li me’od. 
ruth 1:21	’ani melei’ah halakhti vereiqam heshiwani yhoh lamah tiqrenah li na‘omi yhoh ‘anah wi veshadai heira‘ li. 
ruth 1:22	vatashaw na‘omi verut hamo’awiyah khalatah ‘imah hashawah misedei mo’aw vehemah ba’u bet lekhem bitkhilat qetsir se‘orim. 
ruth 2:1	ulena‘omi meyuda‘ moda‘ le’ishah ’ish gibor khayil mimishpakhat ’elimelekh ushemo bo‘az. 
ruth 2:2	vatomer rut hamo’awiyah ’el na‘omi ’eilekhah na hasadeh va’alaqotah washibolim ’akhar ’asher ’emtsa khen be‘einav vatomer lah lekhi witi. 
ruth 2:3	vateilekh vatawo vatelaqet basadeh ’akharei haqotserim vayiqer miqreha khelqat hasadeh lewo‘az ’asher mimishpakhat ’elimelekh. 
ruth 2:4	vehineh wo‘az ba mibet lekhem vayomer laqotsrim yhoh ‘imakhem vayomeru lo yewarekhkha yhoh. 
ruth 2:5	vayomer bo‘az lena‘aro hanitsaw ‘al haqotsrim lemi hana‘arah hazot. 
ruth 2:6	vaya‘an hana‘ar hanitsaw ‘al haqotsrim vayomar na‘arah mo’awiyah hi hashawah ‘im na‘omi misedeh mo’aw. 
ruth 2:7	vatomer ’alaqotah na ve’asafti wa‘omarim ’akharei haqotsrim vatawo vata‘amod mei’az haboqer ve‘ad ‘atah zeh shiwtah habayit me‘at. 
ruth 2:8	vayomer bo‘az ’el rut halo shama‘at biti ’al teilekhi lilqot besadeh ’akher vegam lo ta‘awuri mizeh vekhoh tidbaqin ‘im na‘arotai. 
ruth 2:9	‘einayikh basadeh ’asher yiqtsorun vehalakht ’akhareihen halo tsiviti ’et hane‘arim lewilti nage‘ekh vetsamit vehalakht ’el hakeilim veshatit mei’asher yish’awun hane‘arim. 
ruth 2:10	vatipol ‘al paneha vatishtakhu ’aretsah vatomer ’eilav madua‘ matsati khen be‘einekha lehakireini ve’anokhi nakheriyah. 
ruth 2:11	vaya‘an bo‘az vayomer lah huged hugad li kol ’asher ‘asit ’et khamotekh ’akharei mot ’ishekh vata‘azwi ’awikh ve’imekh ve’erets moladtekh vateilekhi ’el ‘am ’asher lo yada‘at temol shilshom. 
ruth 2:12	yeshalem yhoh pa‘olekh utehi maskurtekh sheleimah mei‘im yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher bat lakhasot takhat kenafav. 
ruth 2:13	vatomer ’emtsa khen be‘einekha ’adoni ki nikhamtani vekhi dibarta ‘al lew shifkhatekha ve’anokhi lo ’ehyeh ke’akhat shifkhotekha. 
ruth 2:14	vayomer lah wo‘az le‘et ha’okhel goshi halom ve’akhalt min halekhem vetawalt pitekh bakhomets vateishew mitsad haqotsrim vayitsbat lah qali vatokhal vatisba‘ vatotar. 
ruth 2:15	vataqam lelaqet vaytsav bo‘az ’et ne‘arav leimor gam ben ha‘omarim telaqet velo takhlimuha. 
ruth 2:16	vegam shol tasholu lah min hatsewatim va‘azawtem veliqetah velo tig‘aru wah. 
ruth 2:17	vatelaqet basadeh ‘ad ha‘arew vatakhbot ’et ’asher liqeitah vayhi ke’eifah se‘orim. 
ruth 2:18	vatisa vatawo ha‘ir vateire khamotah ’et ’asher liqeitah vatotsei vatiten lah ’et ’asher hotirah misawe‘ah. 
ruth 2:19	vatomer lah khamotah ’eifoh liqat hayom ve’anah ‘asit yehi makirekh barukh vataged lakhamotah ’et ’asher ‘asetah ‘imo vatomer shem ha’ish ’asher ‘asiti ‘imo hayom bo‘az. 
ruth 2:20	vatomer na‘omi lekhalatah barukh hu yhoh ’asher lo ‘azaw khasdo ’et hakhayim ve’et hameitim vatomer lah na‘omi qarow lanu ha’ish migo’aleinu hu. 
ruth 2:21	vatomer rut hamo’awiyah gam ki ’amar ’eilai ‘im hane‘arim ’asher li tidbaqin ‘ad ’im kilu ’et kal haqatsir ’asher li. 
ruth 2:22	vatomer na‘omi ’el rut kalatah tow biti ki teitse’i ‘im na‘arotav velo yifge‘u wakh besadeh ’akher. 
ruth 2:23	vatidbaq bena‘arot bo‘az lelaqet ‘ad kelot qetsir hase‘orim uqetsir hakhitim vateishew ’et khamotah. 
ruth 3:1	vatomer lah na‘omi khamotah biti halo ’awaqesh lakh manoakh ’asher yitaw lakh. 
ruth 3:2	ve‘atah halo wo‘az moda‘tanu ’asher hayit ’et na‘arotav hineh hu zoreh ’et goren hase‘orim halayelah. 
ruth 3:3	verakhatst vasakht vesamt simlotekh simlotayikh ‘alayikh veyaradti veyaradt hagoren ’al tivade‘i la’ish ‘ad kaloto le’ekhol velishtot. 
ruth 3:4	vihi weshakhewo veyada‘at ’et hamaqom ’asher yishkaw sham uwat vegilit margelotav veshakhaweti veshakhawet vehu yagid lakh ’et ’asher ta‘asin. 
ruth 3:5	vatomer ’eileha kol ’asher tomeri ’eilai ’e‘eseh. 
ruth 3:6	vateired hagoren vata‘as kekhol ’asher tsivatah khamotah. 
ruth 3:7	vayokhal bo‘az vayeishet vayitaw libo vayawo lishkaw biqtseh ha‘areimah vatawo walat vategal margelotav vatishkaw. 
ruth 3:8	vayhi bakhatsi halaylah vayekherad ha’ish vayilafet vehineh ’ishah shokhewet margelotav. 
ruth 3:9	vayomer mi ’at vatomer ’anokhi rut ’amatekha ufarasta khenafekha ‘al ’amatekha ki go’el ’atah. 
ruth 3:10	vayomer berukhah ’at yhoh biti heitawt khasdekh ha’akharon min harishon lewilti lekhet ’akharei habakhurim ’im dal ve’im ‘ashir. 
ruth 3:11	ve‘atah biti ’al tire’i kol ’asher tomeri ’e‘eseh lakh ki yodeia‘ kal sha‘ar ‘ami ki ’eishet khayil ’at. 
ruth 3:12	ve‘atah ki ’amenam ki ’im go’el ’anokhi vegam yesh go’el qarow mimeni. 
ruth 3:13	lini halaylah vehayah waboqer ’im yig’alekh tow yig’al ve’im lo yakhpots lega’olekh uge’altikh ’anokhi khai yhoh shikhwi ‘ad haboqer. 
ruth 3:14	vatishkaw margelatav margelotav ‘ad haboqer vataqam bitrom beterem yakir ’ish ’et rei‘eihu vayomer ’al yivada‘ ki wa’ah ha’ishah hagoren. 
ruth 3:15	vayomer hawi hamitpakhat ’asher ‘alayikh ve’ekhozi wah vatokhez bah vayamad shesh se‘orim vayashet ‘aleha vayawo ha‘ir. 
ruth 3:16	vatawo ’el khamotah vatomer mi ’at biti vataged lah ’et kal ’asher ‘asah lah ha’ish. 
ruth 3:17	vatomer shesh hase‘orim ha’eleh natan li ki ’amar ’eilai ’al tawo’i reiqam ’el khamotekh. 
ruth 3:18	vatomer shewi witi ‘ad ’asher teide‘in ’ekh yipol dawar ki lo yishqot ha’ish ki ’im kilah hadawar hayom. 
ruth 4:1	uwo‘az ‘alah hasha‘ar vayeishew sham vehineh hago’el ‘ower ’asher diber bo‘az vayomer surah shewah poh peloni ’almoni vayasar vayeishew. 
ruth 4:2	vayiqakh ‘asarah ’anashim miziqnei ha‘ir vayomer shewu foh vayeisheiwu. 
ruth 4:3	vayomer lago’el khelqat hasadeh ’asher le’akhinu le’elimelekh makherah na‘omi hashawah misedeh mo’aw. 
ruth 4:4	va’ani ’amarti ’egleh ’azenekha leimor qeneh neged hayoshewim veneged ziqnei ‘ami ’im tig’al ge’al ve’im lo yig’al hagidah li ve’eida‘ ve’eide‘ah ki ’en zulatekha lig’ol ve’anokhi ’akharekha vayomer ’anokhi ’eg’al. 
ruth 4:5	vayomer bo‘az beyom qenotkha hasadeh miyad na‘omi umei’et rut hamo’awiyah ’eishet hamet qaniti qanitah lehaqim shem hamet ‘al nakhalato. 
ruth 4:6	vayomer hago’el lo ’ukhal lig’ol lig’al  pen ’ashkhit ’et nakhalati ge’al lekha ’atah ’et ge’ulati ki lo ’ukhal lig’ol. 
ruth 4:7	vezot lefanim beyisra’el ‘al hage’ulah ve‘al hatemurah leqayem kal dawar shalaf ’ish na‘alo venatan lerei‘eihu vezot hate‘udah beyisra’el. 
ruth 4:8	vayomer hago’el lewo‘az qeneh lakh vayishlof na‘alo. 
ruth 4:9	vayomer bo‘az lazeqeinim vekhal ha‘am ‘eidim ’atem hayom ki qaniti ’et kal ’asher le’elimelekh ve’et kal ’asher lekhilyon umakhlon miyad na‘omi. 
ruth 4:10	vegam ’et rut hamo’awiyah ’eishet makhlon qaniti li le’ishah lehaqim shem hamet ‘al nakhalato velo yikaret shem hamet mei‘im ’ekhav umisha‘ar meqomo ‘eidim ’atem hayom. 
ruth 4:11	vayomeru kal ha‘am ’asher basha‘ar vehazeqeinim ‘eidim yiten yhoh ’et ha’ishah haba’ah ’el beitekha kerakhel ukhelei’ah ’asher banu sheteihem ’et bet yisra’el va‘aseh khayil be’efratah uqera shem bewet lakhem. 
ruth 4:12	vihi weitekha kewet perets ’asher yaledah tamar lihudah min hazera‘ ’asher yiten yhoh lekha min hana‘arah hazot. 
ruth 4:13	vayiqakh bo‘az ’et rut vatehi lo le’ishah vayawo ’eileha vayiten yhoh lah heirayon vateiled ben. 
ruth 4:14	vatomarnah hanashim ’el na‘omi barukh yhoh ’asher lo hishbit lakh go’el hayom veyiqarei shemo beyisra’el. 
ruth 4:15	vehayah lakh lemeishiw nefesh ulekhalkel ’et seiwatekh ki khalatekh ’asher ’aheiwatekh yeladatu ’asher hi towah lakh mishiw‘ah banim. 
ruth 4:16	vatiqakh na‘omi ’et hayeled vateshiteihu wekheiqah vatehi lo le’omenet. 
ruth 4:17	vatiqrenah lo hashekheinot shem leimor yulad ben lena‘omi vatiqrenah shemo ‘owed hu ’awi yishai ’awi david. 
ruth 4:18	ve’eleh toldot parets perets holid ’et khetsron. 
ruth 4:19	vekhetsron holid ’et ram veram holid ’et ‘aminadaw. 
ruth 4:20	ve‘aminadaw holid ’et nakhshon venakhshon holid ’et salmah. 
ruth 4:21	vesalmon holid ’et bo‘az uwo‘az holid ’et ‘owed. 
ruth 4:22	ve‘owed holid ’et yishai veyishai holid ’et david. 
lamentations 1:1	’eikhah yashewah wadad ha‘ir rabati ‘am hayetah ke’almanah rabati wagoyim sarati bamedinot hayetah lamas. 
lamentations 1:2	bakho tiwkeh balaylah vedim‘atah ‘al lekheyah ’en lah menakhem mikal ’ohaweha kal rei‘eha bagedu wah hayu lah le’oyewim. 
lamentations 1:3	galetah yehudah mei‘oni umeirow ‘awodah hi yashewah wagoyim lo matse’ah manoakh kal rodefeha hisiguha ben hametsarim. 
lamentations 1:4	darkhei tsiyon ’aweilot mibeli ba’ei mo‘ed kal she‘areha shomeimin kohaneha ne’enakhim betuloteha nugot vehi mar lah. 
lamentations 1:5	hayu tsareha lerosh ’oyeweha shalu ki yhoh hogah ‘al row pesha‘eha ‘olaleha halekhu shewi lifnei tsar. 
lamentations 1:6	vayeitsei min wat mibat tsiyon kal hadarah hayu sareha ke’ayalim lo matse’u mir‘eh vayeilekhu welo khoakh lifnei rodef. 
lamentations 1:7	zakherah yerushalim yemei ‘aneyah umerudeha kol makhamudeha ’asher hayu mimei qedem binfol ‘amah beyad tsar ve’en ‘ozer lah ra’uha tsarim sakhaqu ‘al mishbateha. 
lamentations 1:8	khet khate’ah yerushalim ‘al ken lenidah hayatah kal mekhabedeha hiziluha ki ra’u ‘ervatah gam hi ne’enkhah vatashaw ’akhor. 
lamentations 1:9	tum’atah beshuleha lo zakherah ’akharitah vateired pela’im ’en menakhem lah re’eh yhoh ’et ‘aneyi ki higdil ’oyew. 
lamentations 1:10	yado paras tsar ‘al kal makhamadeha ki ra’atah goyim ba’u miqdashah ’asher tsivitah lo yawo’u waqahal lakh. 
lamentations 1:11	kal ‘amah ne’enakhim mewaqeshim lekhem natenu makhamodeihem makhamadeihem be’okhel lehashiw nafesh re’eh yhoh vehabitah ki hayiti zoleilah. 
lamentations 1:12	lo ’aleikhem kal ‘owerei derekh habitu ure’u ’im yesh makh’ow kemakh’owi ’asher ‘olal li ’asher hogah yhoh beyom kharon ’apo. 
lamentations 1:13	mimarom shalakh ’esh be‘atsmotai vayirdenah paras reshet leraglai heshiwani ’akhor netanani shomeimah kal hayom davah. 
lamentations 1:14	nisqad ‘ol pesha‘ai beyado yistaregu ‘alu ‘al tsavari hikhshil kokhi netanani ’adonai bidei lo ’ukhal qum. 
lamentations 1:15	silah khal ’abirai ’adonai beqirbi qara ‘alai mo‘ed lishbor bakhurai gat darakh ’adonai liwtulat bat yehudah. 
lamentations 1:16	‘al ’eleh ’ani wokhiyah ‘eini ‘eini yoredah mayim ki rakhaq mimeni menakhem meishiw nafshi hayu wanai shomeimim ki gawar ’oyew. 
lamentations 1:17	peiresah tsiyon beyadeha ’en menakhem lah tsivah yhoh leya‘aqow sewiwav tsarav hayetah yerushalim lenidah beineihem. 
lamentations 1:18	tsadiq hu yhoh ki fihu mariti shim‘u na khal ‘amim ha‘amim ure’u makh’owi betulotai uwakhurai halekhu washewi. 
lamentations 1:19	qarati lam’ahawai hemah rimuni kohanai uzeqeinai ba‘ir gava‘u ki wiqshu ’okhel lamo veyashiwu ’et nafsham. 
lamentations 1:20	re’eh yhoh ki tsar li mei‘ai khomarmaru nehpakh libi beqirbi ki maro mariti mikhuts shikelah kherew babayit kamavet. 
lamentations 1:21	shame‘u ki ne’enakhah ’ani ’en menakhem li kal ’oyewai shame‘u ra‘ati sasu ki ’atah ‘asita heiweita yom qarata veyihyu khamoni. 
lamentations 1:22	tawo khal ra‘atam lefanekha ve‘olel lamo ka’asher ‘olalta li ‘al kal pesha‘ai ki rabot ’ankhotai velibi davai. 
lamentations 2:1	’eikhah ya‘iw be’apo ’adonai ’et bat tsiyon hishlikh mishamayim ’erets tif’eret yisra’el velo zakhar hadom raglav beyom ’apo. 
lamentations 2:2	bila‘ ’adonai lo velo khamal ’et kal ne’ot ya‘aqow haras be‘ewrato miwtserei wat yehudah higia‘ la’arets khilel mamlakhah vesareha. 
lamentations 2:3	gada‘ bakhori ’af kol qeren yisra’el heishiw ’akhor yemino mipenei ’oyew vayiw‘ar beya‘aqow ke’esh lehawah ’akhelah sawiw. 
lamentations 2:4	darakh qashto ke’oyew nitsaw yemino ketsar vayaharog kol makhamadei ‘ayin be’ohel bat tsiyon shafakh ka’esh khamato. 
lamentations 2:5	hayah ’adonai ke’oyew bila‘ yisra’el bila‘ kal ’armenoteha shikhet miwtsarav vayerew bewat yehudah ta’aniyah va’aniyah. 
lamentations 2:6	vayakhmos kagan suko shikhet mo‘ado shikakh yhoh betsiyon mo‘ed veshabat vayin’ats beza‘am ’apo melekh vekhohen. 
lamentations 2:7	zanakh ’adonai mizbekho ni’er miqdasho hisgir beyad ’oyew khomot ’armenoteha qol natenu bewet yhoh keyom mo‘ed. 
lamentations 2:8	khashaw yhoh lehashkhit khomat bat tsiyon natah qav lo heishiw yado mibaleia‘ vaya’awel khel vekhomah yakhdav ’umlalu. 
lamentations 2:9	tawe‘u wa’arets she‘areha ’ibad veshibar berikheha malkah vesareha wagoyim ’en torah gam newi’eha lo matse’u khazon yhoh. 
lamentations 2:10	yeishewu la’arets yidemu ziqnei wat tsiyon he‘elu ‘afar ‘al rosham khageru saqim horidu la’arets roshan betulot yerushalim. 
lamentations 2:11	kalu wadema‘ot ‘einai khomarmeru mei‘ai nishpakh la’arets keweidi ‘al shewer bat ‘ami bei‘atef ‘olel veyoneq birkhowot qiryah. 
lamentations 2:12	le’imotam yomeru ’ayeh dagan vayayin behit‘atefam kekhalal birkhowot ‘ir behishtapekh nafsham ’el kheq ’imotam. 
lamentations 2:13	mah ’a‘idekh mah ’adameh lakh habat yerushalim mah ’ashveh lakh va’anakhamekh betulat bat tsiyon ki gadol kayam shiwrekh mi yirpa lakh. 
lamentations 2:14	newi’ayikh khazu lakh shav vetafel velo gilu ‘al ‘avonekh lehashiw shewitekh shewutekh vayekhezu lakh mas’ot shav umadukhim. 
lamentations 2:15	safequ ‘alayikh kapayim kal ‘owerei derekh sharequ vayani‘u rosham ‘al bat yerushalim hazot ha‘ir sheyomeru kelilat yofi masos lekhal ha’arets. 
lamentations 2:16	patsu ‘alayikh pihem kal ’oywayikh sharequ vayakharqu shen ’ameru bila‘enu ’akh zeh hayom sheqivinuhu matsanu ra’inu. 
lamentations 2:17	‘asah yhoh ’asher zamam bitsa‘ ’emrato ’asher tsivah mimei qedem haras velo khamal vaysamakh ‘alayikh ’oyew heirim qeren tsarayikh. 
lamentations 2:18	tsa‘aq libam ’el ’adonai khomat bat tsiyon horidi khanakhal dim‘ah yomam valaylah ’al titeni fugat lakh ’al tidom bat ‘einekh. 
lamentations 2:19	qumi roni walayil walaylah lerosh ’ashmurot shifkhi khamayim libekh nokhakh penei ’adonai se’i ’eilav kapayikh ‘al nefesh ‘olalayikh ha‘atufim bera‘aw berosh kal khutsot. 
lamentations 2:20	re’eh yhoh vehabitah lemi ‘olalta koh ’im tokhalnah nashim piryam ‘olalei tipukhim ’im yeihareg bemiqdash ’adonai kohen venawi. 
lamentations 2:21	shakhewu la’arets khutsot na‘ar vezaqen betulotai uwakhurai nafelu wekharew haragta beyom ’apekha tawakhta lo khamaleta. 
lamentations 2:22	tiqra kheyom mo‘ed megurai misawiw velo hayah beyom ’af yhoh palit vesarid ’asher tipakhti veribiti ’oyewi khilam. 
lamentations 3:1	’ani hagewer ra’ah ‘oni besheiwet ‘ewrato. 
lamentations 3:2	’oti nahag vayolakh khoshekh velo ’or. 
lamentations 3:3	’akh bi yashuw yahafokh yado kal hayom. 
lamentations 3:4	bilah wesari ve‘ori shibar ‘atsmotai. 
lamentations 3:5	banah ‘alai vayaqaf rosh utela’ah. 
lamentations 3:6	bemakhashakim hoshiwani kemeitei ‘olam. 
lamentations 3:7	gadar ba‘adi velo ’eitsei hikhbid nekhasheti. 
lamentations 3:8	gam ki ’ez‘aq va’ashaveia‘ satam tefilati. 
lamentations 3:9	gadar derakhai begazit netiwotai ‘ivah. 
lamentations 3:10	dow ’orew hu li ’aryeh ’ari bemistarim. 
lamentations 3:11	derakhai sorer vayfashekheini samani shomem. 
lamentations 3:12	darakh qashto vayatsiweini kamatara lakhets. 
lamentations 3:13	heiwi bekhilyotai benei ’ashpato. 
lamentations 3:14	hayiti sekhoq lekhal ‘ami neginatam kal hayom. 
lamentations 3:15	hisbi‘ani wamerorim hirvani la‘anah. 
lamentations 3:16	vayagres bekhatsats shinai hikhpishani ba’eifer. 
lamentations 3:17	vatiznakh mishalom nafshi nashiti towah. 
lamentations 3:18	va’omar ’awad nitskhi vetokhalti yhoh. 
lamentations 3:19	zekhar ‘aneyi umerudi la‘anah varosh. 
lamentations 3:20	zakhor tizkor vetashiakh vetashoakh ‘alai nafshi. 
lamentations 3:21	zot ’ashiw ’el libi ‘al ken ’okhil. 
lamentations 3:22	khasdei yhoh ki lo tamenu ki lo khalu rakhamav. 
lamentations 3:23	khadashim labeqarim rabah ’emunatekha. 
lamentations 3:24	khelqi yhoh ’amerah nafshi ‘al ken ’okhil lo. 
lamentations 3:25	tow yhoh leqoav lenefesh tidreshenu. 
lamentations 3:26	tow veyakhil vedumam litshu‘at yhoh. 
lamentations 3:27	tow lagewer ki yisa ‘ol bin‘urav. 
lamentations 3:28	yeishew badad veyidom ki natal ‘alav. 
lamentations 3:29	yiten be‘afar pihu ’ulai yesh tiqvah. 
lamentations 3:30	yiten lemakeihu lekhi yisba‘ bekherpah. 
lamentations 3:31	ki lo yiznakh le‘olam ’adonai. 
lamentations 3:32	ki ’im hogah verikham kerow khasdo khasadav. 
lamentations 3:33	ki lo ‘inah milibo vayageh benei ’ish. 
lamentations 3:34	ledakei takhat raglav kol ’asirei ’arets. 
lamentations 3:35	lehatot mishpat gawer neged penei ‘elyon. 
lamentations 3:36	le‘avet ’adam beriwo ’adonai lo ra’ah. 
lamentations 3:37	mi zeh ’amar vatehi ’adonai lo tsivah. 
lamentations 3:38	mipi ‘elyon lo teitsei hara‘ot vehatow. 
lamentations 3:39	mah yit’onen ’adam khai gewer ‘al khet’o khata’av. 
lamentations 3:40	nakhpesah derakheinu venakhqorah venashuwah ‘ad yhoh. 
lamentations 3:41	nisa lewaweinu ’el kapayim ’el ’el bashamayim. 
lamentations 3:42	nakhnu fasha‘nu umarinu ’atah lo salakheta. 
lamentations 3:43	sakotah wa’af vatirdefeinu haragta lo khamaleta. 
lamentations 3:44	sakotah we‘anan lakh mei‘awor tefilah. 
lamentations 3:45	sekhi uma’os tesimeinu beqerew ha‘amim. 
lamentations 3:46	patsu ‘aleinu pihem kal ’oyeweinu. 
lamentations 3:47	pakhad vafakhat hayah lanu hashet vehashawer. 
lamentations 3:48	palgei mayim teirad ‘eini ‘al shewer bat ‘ami. 
lamentations 3:49	‘eini nigerah velo tidmeh mei’en hafugot. 
lamentations 3:50	‘ad yashqif veyeire yhoh mishamayim. 
lamentations 3:51	‘eini ‘olah lenafshi mikol benot ‘iri. 
lamentations 3:52	tsod tsaduni katsipor ’oyewai khinam. 
lamentations 3:53	tsametu wabor khayai vayadu ’ewen bi. 
lamentations 3:54	tsafu mayim ‘al roshi ’amarti nigzareti. 
lamentations 3:55	qarati shimkha yhoh mibor takhtiyot. 
lamentations 3:56	qoli shama‘eta ’al ta‘lem ’azenekha leravkhati leshav‘ati. 
lamentations 3:57	qarawta beyom ’eqra’eka ’amarta ’al tira. 
lamentations 3:58	rawta ’adonai riwei nafshi ga’alta khayai. 
lamentations 3:59	ra’itah yhoh ‘avatati shafetah mishpati. 
lamentations 3:60	ra’itah kal niqmatam kal makhshewotam li. 
lamentations 3:61	shama‘ta kherpatam yhoh kal makhshewotam ‘alai. 
lamentations 3:62	siftei qamai vehegyonam ‘alai kal hayom. 
lamentations 3:63	shiwtam veqimatam habitah ’ani manginatam. 
lamentations 3:64	tashiw lahem gemul yhoh kema‘aseh yedeihem. 
lamentations 3:65	titen lahem meginat lew ta’alatekha lahem. 
lamentations 3:66	tirdof be’af vetashmidem mitakhat shemei yhoh. 
lamentations 4:1	’eikhah yu‘am zahaw yishne haketem hatow tishtapeikhenah ’awnei qodesh berosh kal khutsot. 
lamentations 4:2	benei tsiyon hayqarim hamsula’im bapaz ’eikhah nekhshewu leniwlei kheres ma‘aseh yedei yotser. 
lamentations 4:3	gam tanin tanim khaletsu shad heiniqu gureihen bat ‘ami le’akhzar ki ‘einim kai‘einim bamidbar. 
lamentations 4:4	dawaq leshon yoneq ’el khiko batsama ‘olalim sha’alu lekhem pores ’en lahem. 
lamentations 4:5	ha’okhelim lema‘adanim nashamu bakhutsot ha’emunim ‘alei tola‘ khibequ ’ashpatot. 
lamentations 4:6	vayigdal ‘avon bat ‘ami meikhatat sedom hahafukhah khemo raga‘ velo khalu wah yadayim. 
lamentations 4:7	zaku nezireha misheleg tsakhu meikhalaw ’ademu ‘etsem mipeninim sapir gizratam. 
lamentations 4:8	khashakh mishekhor ta’oram lo nikeru bakhutsot tsafad ‘oram ‘al ‘atsmam yawesh hayah kha‘ets. 
lamentations 4:9	towim hayu khalei kherew meikhalei ra‘aw shehem yazuwu meduqarim mitenuwot sadai. 
lamentations 4:10	yedei nashim rakhamaniyot bishelu yaldeihen hayu lewarot lamo beshewer bat ‘ami. 
lamentations 4:11	kilah yhoh ’et khamato shafakh kharon ’apo vayatset ’esh betsiyon vatokhal yesodoteha. 
lamentations 4:12	lo he’eminu malkhei ’erets vekhol kol yoshewei teiwel ki yawo tsar ve’oyew besha‘arei yerushalim. 
lamentations 4:13	meikhatot newi’eha ‘avonot kohaneha hashofekhim beqirbah dam tsadiqim. 
lamentations 4:14	na‘u ‘ivrim bakhutsot nego’alu badam belo yukhelu yige‘u bilwusheihem. 
lamentations 4:15	suru tamei qare’u lamo suru suru ’al tiga‘u ki natsu gam na‘u ’ameru bagoyim lo yosifu lagur. 
lamentations 4:16	penei yhoh khileqam lo yosif lehabitam penei khohanim lo nasa’u zeqeinim uzeqeinim lo khananu. 
lamentations 4:17	‘odeinah ‘odeinu tikhlenah ‘eineinu ’el ‘ezrateinu hawel betsipiyateinu tsipinu ’el go lo yoshia‘. 
lamentations 4:18	tsadu tse‘adeinu milekhet birkhowoteinu qaraw qitseinu male’u yameinu ki wa qitseinu. 
lamentations 4:19	qalim hayu rodefeinu minishrei shamayim ‘al heharim delaqunu bamidbar ’arewu lanu. 
lamentations 4:20	ruakh ’apeinu meshiakh yhoh nilkad bishkhitotam ’asher ’amarnu betsilo nikhyeh wagoyim. 
lamentations 4:21	sisi vesimkhi bat ’edom yoshawti yoshewet be’erets ‘uts gam ‘alayikh ta‘awar kos tishkeri vetit‘ari. 
lamentations 4:22	tam ‘avonekh bat tsiyon lo yosif lehaglotekh paqad ‘avonekh bat ’edom gilah ‘al khatotayikh. 
lamentations 5:1	zekhor yhoh meh hayah lanu habet habitah ure’eh ’et kherpateinu. 
lamentations 5:2	nakhalateinu nehefkhah lezarim bateinu lenakherim. 
lamentations 5:3	yetomim hayinu ’en ve’en ’aw ’imoteinu ke’almanot. 
lamentations 5:4	meimeinu bekhesef shatinu ‘eitseinu bimkhir yawo’u. 
lamentations 5:5	‘al tsavareinu nirdafenu yaga‘nu lo velo hunakh lanu. 
lamentations 5:6	mitsrayim natanu yad ’ashur lisboa‘ lakhem. 
lamentations 5:7	’awoteinu khate’u ’einam ve’einam ’anakhnu va’anakhnu ‘avonoteihem sawalenu. 
lamentations 5:8	‘awadim mashelu wanu poreq ’en miyadam. 
lamentations 5:9	benafsheinu nawi lakhmeinu mipenei kherew hamidbar. 
lamentations 5:10	‘oreinu ketanur nikhmaru mipenei zal‘afot ra‘aw. 
lamentations 5:11	nashim betsiyon ‘inu betulot be‘arei yehudah. 
lamentations 5:12	sarim beyadam nitlu penei zeqeinim lo nehdaru. 
lamentations 5:13	bakhurim tekhon nasa’u une‘arim ba‘ets kashalu. 
lamentations 5:14	zeqeinim misha‘ar shawatu bakhurim mineginatam. 
lamentations 5:15	shawat mesos libeinu nehpakh le’eiwel mekholeinu. 
lamentations 5:16	nafelah ‘ateret rosheinu ’o na lanu ki khatanu. 
lamentations 5:17	‘al zeh hayah daveh libeinu ‘al ’eleh khashekhu ‘eineinu. 
lamentations 5:18	‘al har tsiyon sheshamem shu‘alim hilekhu wo. 
lamentations 5:19	’atah yhoh le‘olam teishew kis’akha ledor vador. 
lamentations 5:20	lamah lanetsakh tishkakheinu ta‘azweinu le’orekh yamim. 
lamentations 5:21	hashiweinu yhoh ’eilekha venashuw venashuwah khadesh yameinu keqedem. 
lamentations 5:22	ki ’im ma’os me’astanu qatsafta ‘aleinu ‘ad me’od. 
ecclesiastes 1:1	diwrei qohelet ben david melekh birushalim. 
ecclesiastes 1:2	hawel hawalim ’amar qohelet hawel hawalim hakol hawel. 
ecclesiastes 1:3	mah yitron la’adam bekhal ‘amalo sheya‘amol takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 1:4	dor holekh vedor ba veha’arets le‘olam ‘omadet. 
ecclesiastes 1:5	vezarakh hashemesh uwa hashamesh ve’el meqomo sho’ef zoreiakh hu sham. 
ecclesiastes 1:6	holekh ’el darom vesowew ’el tsafon sowew sowew holekh haruakh ve‘al sewiwotav shaw haruakh. 
ecclesiastes 1:7	kal hanekhalim holekhim ’el hayam vehayam ’einenu malei ’el meqom shehanekhalim holekhim sham hem shawim lalakhet. 
ecclesiastes 1:8	kal hadewarim yegei‘im lo yukhal ’ish ledaber lo tisba‘ ‘ayin lir’ot velo timalei ’ozen mishemoa‘. 
ecclesiastes 1:9	mah shehayah hu sheyihyeh umah shena‘asah hu sheyei‘aseh ve’en kal khadash takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 1:10	yesh dawar sheyomar re’eh zeh khadash hu kewar hayah le‘olamim ’asher hayah milefaneinu. 
ecclesiastes 1:11	’en zikhron larishonim vegam la’akharonim sheyihyu lo yihyeh lahem zikaron ‘im sheyihyu la’akharonah. 
ecclesiastes 1:12	’ani qohelet hayiti melekh ‘al yisra’el birushalim. 
ecclesiastes 1:13	venatati ’et libi lidrosh velatur bakhakhemah ‘al kal ’asher na‘asah takhat hashamayim hu ‘inyan ra‘ natan ’elohim liwnei ha’adam la‘anot bo. 
ecclesiastes 1:14	ra’iti ’et kal hama‘asim shena‘asu takhat hashamesh vehineh hakol hewel ure‘ut ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 1:15	me‘uvat lo yukhal litqon vekhesron lo yukhal lehimanot. 
ecclesiastes 1:16	dibarti ’ani ‘im libi leimor ’ani hineh higdalti vehosafti khakhmah ‘al kal ’asher hayah lefanai ‘al yerushalim velibi ra’ah harbeh khakhmah vada‘at. 
ecclesiastes 1:17	va’etenah libi lada‘at khakhmah veda‘at holeilot vesikhlut yada‘ti shegam zeh hu ra‘yon ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 1:18	ki berow khakhmah raw ka‘as veyosif da‘at yosif makh’ow. 
ecclesiastes 2:1	’amarti ’ani belibi lekhah na ’anasekhah wesimkhah ure’eh wetow vehineh gam hu hawel. 
ecclesiastes 2:2	liskhoq ’amarti meholal ulesimkhah mah zoh ‘osah. 
ecclesiastes 2:3	tarti welibi limshokh bayayin ’et besari velibi noheg bakhakhemah vele’ekhoz besikhlut ‘ad ’asher ’er’eh ’ei zeh tow liwnei ha’adam ’asher ya‘asu takhat hashamayim mispar yemei khayeihem. 
ecclesiastes 2:4	higdalti ma‘asai baniti li batim nata‘ti li keramim. 
ecclesiastes 2:5	‘asiti li ganot ufardeisim venata‘ti wahem ‘ets kal peri. 
ecclesiastes 2:6	‘asiti li bereikhot mayim lehashqot meihem ya‘ar tsomeiakh ‘eitsim. 
ecclesiastes 2:7	qaniti ‘awadim ushefakhot uwenei wayit hayah li gam miqneh waqar vatson harbeh hayah li mikol shehayu lefanai birushalim. 
ecclesiastes 2:8	kanasti li gam kesef vezahaw usegulat melakhim vehamedinot ‘asiti li sharim vesharot veta‘anugot benei ha’adam shidah veshidot. 
ecclesiastes 2:9	vegadalti vehosafti mikol shehayah lefanai birushalim ’af khakhemati ‘amedah li. 
ecclesiastes 2:10	vekhol ’asher sha’alu ‘einai lo ’atsalti meihem lo mana‘ti ’et libi mikal simkhah ki libi sameiakh mikal ‘amali vezeh hayah khelqi mikal ‘amali. 
ecclesiastes 2:11	ufaniti ’ani bekhal ma‘asai she‘asu yadai uwe‘amal she‘amalti la‘asot vehineh hakol hewel ure‘ut ruakh ve’en yitron takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 2:12	ufaniti ’ani lir’ot khakhmah veholeilot vesikhlut ki meh ha’adam sheyawo ’akharei hamelekh ’et ’asher kewar ‘asuhu. 
ecclesiastes 2:13	vera’iti ’ani sheyesh yitron lakhakhemah min hasikhlut kiteron ha’or min hakhoshekh. 
ecclesiastes 2:14	hekhakham ‘einav berosho vehakesil bakhoshekh holekh veyada‘ti gam ’ani shemiqreh ’ekhad yiqreh ’et kulam. 
ecclesiastes 2:15	ve’amarti ’ani belibi kemiqreh hakesil gam ’ani yiqreini velamah khakhamti ’ani ’az yoter vedibarti welibi shegam zeh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 2:16	ki ’en zikhron lekhakham ‘im hakesil le‘olam beshekewar hayamim haba’im hakol nishkakh ve’ekh yamut hekhakham ‘im hakesil. 
ecclesiastes 2:17	vesaneiti ’et hakhayim ki ra‘ ‘alai hama‘aseh shena‘asah takhat hashamesh ki hakol hewel ure‘ut ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 2:18	vesaneiti ’ani ’et kal ‘amali she’ani ‘amel takhat hashamesh she’anikhenu la’adam sheyihyeh ’akharai. 
ecclesiastes 2:19	umi yodeia‘ hekhakham yihyeh ’o sakhal veyishlat bekhal ‘amali she‘amalti veshekhakhamti takhat hashamesh gam zeh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 2:20	vesaboti ’ani leya’esh ’et libi ‘al kal he‘amal she‘amalti takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 2:21	ki yesh ’adam she‘amalo bekhakhemah uweda‘at uwekhishron ule’adam shelo ‘amal bo yitenenu khelqo gam zeh hewel vera‘ah rabah. 
ecclesiastes 2:22	ki meh hoeh la’adam bekhal ‘amalo uwera‘yon libo shehu ‘amel takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 2:23	ki khal yamav makh’owim vakha‘as ‘inyano gam balaylah lo shakhaw libo gam zeh hewel hu. 
ecclesiastes 2:24	’en tow ba’adam sheyokhal veshatah veher’ah ’et nafsho tow ba‘amalo gam zoh ra’iti ’ani ki miyad ha’elohim hi. 
ecclesiastes 2:25	ki mi yokhal umi yakhush khuts mimeni. 
ecclesiastes 2:26	ki le’adam shetow lefanav natan khakhmah veda‘at vesimkhah velakhote natan ‘inyan le’esof velikhnos latet letow lifnei ha’elohim gam zeh hewel ure‘ut ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 3:1	lakol zeman ve‘et lekhal kheifets takhat hashamayim. 
ecclesiastes 3:2	‘et laledet ve‘et lamut ‘et lata‘at ve‘et la‘aqor natua‘. 
ecclesiastes 3:3	‘et laharog ve‘et lirpo ‘et lifrots ve‘et liwnot. 
ecclesiastes 3:4	‘et liwkot ve‘et liskhoq ‘et sefod ve‘et reqod. 
ecclesiastes 3:5	‘et lehashlikh ’awanim ve‘et kenos ’awanim ‘et lakhawoq ve‘et lirkhoq meikhabeq. 
ecclesiastes 3:6	‘et lewaqesh ve‘et le’abed ‘et lishmor ve‘et lehashlikh. 
ecclesiastes 3:7	‘et liqroa‘ ve‘et litpor ‘et lakhashot ve‘et ledaber. 
ecclesiastes 3:8	‘et le’ehow ve‘et lisno ‘et milkhamah ve‘et shalom. 
ecclesiastes 3:9	mah yitron ha‘oseh ba’asher hu ‘amel. 
ecclesiastes 3:10	ra’iti ’et ha‘inyan ’asher natan ’elohim liwnei ha’adam la‘anot bo. 
ecclesiastes 3:11	’et hakol ‘asah yafeh we‘ito gam ’et ha‘olam natan belibam mibeli ’asher lo yimtsa ha’adam ’et hama‘aseh ’asher ‘asah ha’elohim meirosh ve‘ad sof. 
ecclesiastes 3:12	yada‘ti ki ’en tow bam ki ’im lismoakh vela‘asot tow bekhayav. 
ecclesiastes 3:13	vegam kal ha’adam sheyokhal veshatah vera’ah tow bekhal ‘amalo matat ’elohim hi. 
ecclesiastes 3:14	yada‘ti ki kal ’asher ya‘aseh ha’elohim hu yihyeh le‘olam ‘alav ’en lehosif umimenu ’en ligroa‘ veha’elohim ‘asah sheyir’u milefanav. 
ecclesiastes 3:15	mah shehayah kewar hu va’asher lihyot kewar hayah veha’elohim yewaqesh ’et nirdaf. 
ecclesiastes 3:16	ve‘od ra’iti takhat hashamesh meqom hamishpat shamah haresha‘ umeqom hatsedeq shamah harasha‘. 
ecclesiastes 3:17	’amarti ’ani belibi ’et hatsadiq ve’et harasha‘ yishpot ha’elohim ki ‘et lekhal kheifets ve‘al kal hama‘aseh sham. 
ecclesiastes 3:18	’amarti ’ani belibi ‘al diwrat benei ha’adam lewaram ha’elohim velir’ot shehem beheimah hemah lahem. 
ecclesiastes 3:19	ki miqreh wenei ha’adam umiqreh habeheimah umiqreh ’ekhad lahem kemot zeh ken mot zeh veruakh ’ekhad lakol umotar ha’adam min habeheimah ’ayin ki hakol hawel. 
ecclesiastes 3:20	hakol holekh ’el maqom ’ekhad hakol hayah min he‘afar vehakol shaw ’el he‘afar. 
ecclesiastes 3:21	mi yodeia‘ ruakh benei ha’adam ha‘olah hi lema‘elah veruakh habeheimah hayoredet hi lematah la’arets. 
ecclesiastes 3:22	vera’iti ki ’en tow mei’asher yismakh ha’adam bema‘asav ki hu khelqo ki mi yewi’enu lir’ot bemeh sheyihyeh ’akharav. 
ecclesiastes 4:1	veshawti ’ani va’er’eh ’et kal ha‘ashuqim ’asher na‘asim takhat hashamesh vehineh dim‘at ha‘ashuqim ve’en lahem menakhem umiyad ‘osheqeihem koakh ve’en lahem menakhem. 
ecclesiastes 4:2	veshabeiakh ’ani ’et hameitim shekewar meitu min hakhayim ’asher hemah khayim ‘adenah. 
ecclesiastes 4:3	vetow misheneihem ’et ’asher ‘aden lo hayah ’asher lo ra’ah ’et hama‘aseh hara‘ ’asher na‘asah takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 4:4	vera’iti ’ani ’et kal ‘amal ve’et kal kishron hama‘aseh ki hi qin’at ’ish meirei‘eihu gam zeh hewel ure‘ut ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 4:5	hakesil khoweq ’et yadav ve’okhel ’et besaro. 
ecclesiastes 4:6	tow melo khaf nakhat mimelo khafenayim ‘amal ure‘ut ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 4:7	veshawti ’ani va’er’eh hewel takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 4:8	yesh ’ekhad ve’en sheini gam ben va’akh ’en lo ve’en qets lekhal ‘amalo gam ‘einav ‘eino lo tisba‘ ‘osher ulemi ’ani ‘amel umekhaser ’et nafshi mitowah gam zeh hewel ve‘inyan ra‘ hu. 
ecclesiastes 4:9	towim hashenayim min ha’ekhad ’asher yesh lahem sakhar tow ba‘amalam. 
ecclesiastes 4:10	ki ’im yipolu ha’ekhad yaqim ’et khaweiro ve’ilo ha’ekhad sheyipol ve’en sheini lahaqimo. 
ecclesiastes 4:11	gam ’im yishkewu shenayim vekham lahem ule’ekhad ’ekh yeikham. 
ecclesiastes 4:12	ve’im yitqefo ha’ekhad hashenayim ya‘amdu negdo vehakhut hamshulash lo wimheirah yinateq. 
ecclesiastes 4:13	tow yeled misken vekhakham mimelekh zaqen ukhesil ’asher lo yada‘ lehizaher ‘od. 
ecclesiastes 4:14	ki mibet hasurim yatsa limlokh ki gam bemalkhuto nolad rash. 
ecclesiastes 4:15	ra’iti ’et kal hakhayim hamhalekhim takhat hashamesh ‘im hayeled hasheini ’asher ya‘amod takhtav. 
ecclesiastes 4:16	’en qets lekhal ha‘am lekhol ’asher hayah lifneihem gam ha’akharonim lo yismekhu wo ki gam zeh hewel vera‘yon ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 5:1	shemor raglekha raglekha ka’asher teilekh ’el bet ha’elohim veqarow lishmoa‘ mitet hakesilim zawakh ki ’einam yod‘im la‘asot ra‘. 
ecclesiastes 5:2	’al tewahel ‘al pikha velibekha ’al yemaher lehotsi dawar lifnei ha’elohim ki ha’elohim bashamayim ve’atah ‘al ha’arets ‘al ken yihyu dewarekha me‘atim. 
ecclesiastes 5:3	ki ba hakhalom berow ‘inyan veqol kesil berow dewarim. 
ecclesiastes 5:4	ka’asher tidor neder leilohim ’al te’akher leshalemo ki ’en kheifets bakesilim ’et ’asher tidor shalem. 
ecclesiastes 5:5	tow ’asher lo tidor mishetidor velo teshalem. 
ecclesiastes 5:6	’al titen ’et pikha lakhati ’et besarekha ve’al tomar lifnei hamal’akh ki shegagah hi lamah yiqtsof ha’elohim ‘al qolekha vekhibel ’et ma‘aseh yadekha. 
ecclesiastes 5:7	ki werow khalomot vahawalim udewarim harbeh ki ’et ha’elohim yera. 
ecclesiastes 5:8	’im ‘osheq rash vegeizel mishpat vatsedeq tir’eh wamedinah ’al titmah ‘al hakheifets ki gawoah mei‘al gawoah shomer ugewohim ‘aleihem. 
ecclesiastes 5:9	veyitron ’erets bakol hi hu melekh lesadeh ne‘ewad. 
ecclesiastes 5:10	’ohew kesef lo yisba‘ kesef umi ’ohew behamon lo tewu’ah gam zeh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 5:11	birwot hatowah rabu ’okhleha umah kishron liw‘aleha ki ’im re’iyat re’ut ‘einav. 
ecclesiastes 5:12	metuqah shenat ha‘owed ’im me‘at ve’im harbeh yokhel vehasawa‘ le‘ashir ’einenu maniakh lo lishon. 
ecclesiastes 5:13	yesh ra‘ah kholah ra’iti takhat hashamesh ‘osher shamur liw‘alav lera‘ato. 
ecclesiastes 5:14	ve’awad ha‘osher hahu be‘inyan ra‘ veholid ben ve’en beyado me’umah. 
ecclesiastes 5:15	ka’asher yatsa mibeten ’imo ‘arom yashuw lalekhet kesheba ume’umah lo yisa wa‘amalo sheyolekh beyado. 
ecclesiastes 5:16	vegam zoh ra‘ah kholah kal ‘umat sheba ken yeilekh umah yitron lo sheya‘amol laruakh. 
ecclesiastes 5:17	gam kal yamav bakhoshekh yokhel vekha‘as harbeh vekhaleyo vaqatsef. 
ecclesiastes 5:18	hineh ’asher ra’iti ’ani tow ’asher yafeh le’ekhol velishtot velir’ot towah bekhal ‘amalo sheya‘amol takhat hashemesh mispar yemei khayav khayav ’asher natan lo ha’elohim ki hu khelqo. 
ecclesiastes 5:19	gam kal ha’adam ’asher natan lo ha’elohim ‘osher unekhasim vehishlito le’ekhol mimenu velaset ’et khelqo velismoakh ba‘amalo zoh matat ’elohim hi. 
ecclesiastes 5:20	ki lo harbeh yizkor ’et yemei khayav ki ha’elohim ma‘aneh besimkhat libo. 
ecclesiastes 6:1	yesh ra‘ah ’asher ra’iti takhat hashamesh verabah hi ‘al ha’adam. 
ecclesiastes 6:2	’ish ’asher yiten lo ha’elohim ‘osher unekhasim vekhawod ve’einenu khaser lenafsho mikol ’asher yit’aveh velo yashlitenu ha’elohim le’ekhol mimenu ki ’ish nakheri yokhalenu zeh hewel vakholi ra‘ hu. 
ecclesiastes 6:3	’im yolid ’ish mei’ah veshanim rabot yikhyeh veraw sheyihyu yemei shanav venafsho lo tisba‘ min hatowah vegam qewurah lo hayetah lo ’amarti tow mimenu hanafel. 
ecclesiastes 6:4	ki wahewel ba uwakhoshekh yeilekh uwakhoshekh shemo yekhuseh. 
ecclesiastes 6:5	gam shemesh lo ra’ah velo yada‘ nakhat lazeh mizeh. 
ecclesiastes 6:6	ve’ilu khayah ’elef shanim pa‘amayim vetowah lo ra’ah halo ’el maqom ’ekhad hakol holekh. 
ecclesiastes 6:7	kal ‘amal ha’adam lefihu vegam hanefesh lo timalei. 
ecclesiastes 6:8	ki mah yoter lekhakham min hakesil mah le‘ani yodeia‘ lahalokh neged hakhayim. 
ecclesiastes 6:9	tow mar’eh ‘einayim meihalakh nafesh gam zeh hewel ure‘ut ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 6:10	mah shehayah kewar niqra shemo venoda‘ ’asher hu ’adam velo yukhal ladin ‘im shehatqif shetaqif mimenu. 
ecclesiastes 6:11	ki yesh dewarim harbeh marbim hawel mah yoter la’adam. 
ecclesiastes 6:12	ki mi yodeia‘ mah tow la’adam bakhayim mispar yemei khayei hewlo veya‘asem katsel ’asher mi yagid la’adam mah yihyeh ’akharav takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 7:1	tow shem mishemen tow veyom hamavet miyom hivaledo. 
ecclesiastes 7:2	tow lalekhet ’el bet ’eiwel milekhet ’el bet mishteh ba’asher hu sof kal ha’adam vehakhai yiten ’el libo. 
ecclesiastes 7:3	tow ka‘as misekhoq ki weroa‘ panim yitaw lew. 
ecclesiastes 7:4	lew khakhamim bewet ’eiwel velew kesilim bewet simkhah. 
ecclesiastes 7:5	tow lishmoa‘ ga‘arat khakham mei’ish shomeia‘ shir kesilim. 
ecclesiastes 7:6	ki kheqol hasirim takhat hasir ken sekhoq hakesil vegam zeh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 7:7	ki ha‘osheq yeholel khakham vi’abed ’et lew matanah. 
ecclesiastes 7:8	tow ’akharit dawar meireishito tow ’erekh ruakh migewah ruakh. 
ecclesiastes 7:9	’al tewahel berukhakha likh‘os ki kha‘as bekheq kesilim yanuakh. 
ecclesiastes 7:10	’al tomar meh hayah shehayamim harishonim hayu towim mei’eleh ki lo meikhakhemah sha’alta ‘al zeh. 
ecclesiastes 7:11	towah khakhmah ‘im nakhalah veyoter lero’ei hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 7:12	ki betsel hakhakhemah betsel hakasef veyitron da‘at hakhakhemah tekhayeh we‘aleha. 
ecclesiastes 7:13	re’eh ’et ma‘aseh ha’elohim ki mi yukhal letaqen ’et ’asher ‘iveto. 
ecclesiastes 7:14	beyom towah heyeh wetow uweyom ra‘ah re’eh gam ’et zeh le‘umat zeh ‘asah ha’elohim ‘al diwrat shelo yimtsa ha’adam ’akharav me’umah. 
ecclesiastes 7:15	’et hakol ra’iti bimei hewli yesh tsadiq ’owed betsidqo veyesh rasha‘ ma’arikh bera‘ato. 
ecclesiastes 7:16	’al tehi tsadiq harbeh ve’al titkhakam yoter lamah tishomem. 
ecclesiastes 7:17	’al tirsha‘ harbeh ve’al tehi sakhal lamah tamut belo ‘itekha. 
ecclesiastes 7:18	tow ’asher te’ekhoz bazeh vegam mizeh ’al tanakh ’et yadekha ki yerei ’elohim yeitsei ’et kulam. 
ecclesiastes 7:19	hakhakhemah ta‘oz lekhakham mei‘asarah shalitim ’asher hayu ba‘ir. 
ecclesiastes 7:20	ki ’adam ’en tsadiq ba’arets ’asher ya‘aseh tow velo yekheta. 
ecclesiastes 7:21	gam lekhal hadewarim ’asher yedabeiru ’al titen libekha ’asher lo tishma‘ ’et ‘awdekha meqalekha. 
ecclesiastes 7:22	ki gam pe‘amim rabot yada‘ libekha ’asher gam ’at ’atah qilalta ’akheirim. 
ecclesiastes 7:23	kal zoh nisiti wakhakhemah ’amarti ’ekhkamah vehi rekhoqah mimeni. 
ecclesiastes 7:24	rakhoq mah shehayah ve‘amoq ‘amoq mi yimtsa’enu. 
ecclesiastes 7:25	saboti ’ani velibi lada‘at velatur uwaqesh khakhmah vekheshbon velada‘at resha‘ kesel vehasikhlut holeilot. 
ecclesiastes 7:26	umotse ’ani mar mimavet ’et ha’ishah ’asher hi metsodim vakharamim libah ’asurim yadeha tow lifnei ha’elohim yimalet mimenah vekhotei yilakhed bah. 
ecclesiastes 7:27	re’eh zeh matsati ’amerah qohelet ’akhat le’akhat limtso kheshbon. 
ecclesiastes 7:28	’asher ‘od biqshah nafshi velo matsati ’adam ’ekhad mei’elef matsati ve’ishah wekhal ’eleh lo matsati. 
ecclesiastes 7:29	lewad re’eh zeh matsati ’asher ‘asah ha’elohim ’et ha’adam yashar vehemah wiqshu khishewonot rabim. 
ecclesiastes 8:1	mi kehekhakham umi yodeia‘ peisher dawar khakhemat ’adam ta’ir panav ve‘oz panav yeshune. 
ecclesiastes 8:2	’ani pi melekh shemor ve‘al diwrat shewu‘at ’elohim. 
ecclesiastes 8:3	’al tibahel mipanav teilekh ’al ta‘amod bedawar ra‘ ki kal ’asher yakhpots ya‘aseh. 
ecclesiastes 8:4	ba’asher dewar melekh shilton umi yomar lo mah ta‘aseh. 
ecclesiastes 8:5	shomer mitsvah lo yeida‘ dawar ra‘ ve‘et umishpat yeida‘ lew khakham. 
ecclesiastes 8:6	ki lekhal kheifets yesh ‘et umishpat ki ra‘at ha’adam rabah ‘alav. 
ecclesiastes 8:7	ki ’einenu yodeia‘ mah sheyihyeh ki ka’asher yihyeh mi yagid lo. 
ecclesiastes 8:8	’en ’adam shalit baruakh likhlo ’et haruakh ve’en shilton beyom hamavet ve’en mishlakhat bamilkhamah velo yemalet resha‘ ’et be‘alav. 
ecclesiastes 8:9	’et kal zeh ra’iti venaton ’et libi lekhal ma‘aseh ’asher na‘asah takhat hashamesh ‘et ’asher shalat ha’adam be’adam lera‘ lo. 
ecclesiastes 8:10	uwekhen ra’iti resha‘im qewurim vawa’u umimeqom qadosh yehaleikhu veyishtakekhu wa‘ir ’asher ken ‘asu gam zeh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 8:11	’asher ’en na‘asah fitgam ma‘aseh hara‘ah meheirah ‘al ken malei lew benei ha’adam bahem la‘asot ra‘. 
ecclesiastes 8:12	’asher khote ‘oseh ra‘ me’at uma’arikh lo ki gam yodeia‘ ’ani ’asher yihyeh tow leyir’ei ha’elohim ’asher yire’u milefanav. 
ecclesiastes 8:13	vetow lo yihyeh larasha‘ velo ya’arikh yamim katsel ’asher ’einenu yarei milifnei ’elohim. 
ecclesiastes 8:14	yesh hewel ’asher na‘asah ‘al ha’arets ’asher yesh tsadiqim ’asher magia‘ ’aleihem kema‘aseh haresha‘im veyesh resha‘im shemagia‘ ’aleihem kema‘aseh hatsadiqim ’amarti shegam zeh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 8:15	veshibakhti ’ani ’et hasimkhah ’asher ’en tow la’adam takhat hashemesh ki ’im le’ekhol velishtot velismoakh vehu yilvenu wa‘amalo yemei khayav ’asher natan lo ha’elohim takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 8:16	ka’asher natati ’et libi lada‘at khakhmah velir’ot ’et ha‘inyan ’asher na‘asah ‘al ha’arets ki gam bayom uwalaylah sheinah be‘einav ’einenu ro’eh. 
ecclesiastes 8:17	vera’iti ’et kal ma‘aseh ha’elohim ki lo yukhal ha’adam limtso ’et hama‘aseh ’asher na‘asah takhat hashemesh beshel ’asher ya‘amol ha’adam lewaqesh velo yimtsa vegam ’im yomar hekhakham lada‘at lo yukhal limtso. 
ecclesiastes 9:1	ki ’et kal zeh natati ’el libi velawur ’et kal zeh ’asher hatsadiqim vehakhakhamim va‘awadeihem beyad ha’elohim gam ’ahawah gam sin’ah ’en yodeia‘ ha’adam hakol lifneihem. 
ecclesiastes 9:2	hakol ka’asher lakol miqreh ’ekhad latsadiq velarasha‘ latow velatahor velatamei velazoweiakh vela’asher ’einenu zoweiakh katow kakhote hanishba‘ ka’asher shewu‘ah yarei. 
ecclesiastes 9:3	zeh ra‘ bekhol ’asher na‘asah takhat hashemesh ki miqreh ’ekhad lakol vegam lew benei ha’adam malei ra‘ veholeilot bilwawam bekhayeihem ve’akharav ’el hameitim. 
ecclesiastes 9:4	ki mi ’asher yibakher yekhubar ’el kal hakhayim yesh bitakhon ki lekhelew khai hu tow min ha’aryeh hamet. 
ecclesiastes 9:5	ki hakhayim yod‘im sheyamutu vehameitim ’einam yod‘im me’umah ve’en ‘od lahem sakhar ki nishkakh zikhram. 
ecclesiastes 9:6	gam ’ahawatam gam sin’atam gam qin’atam kewar ’awadah vekheileq ’en lahem ‘od le‘olam bekhol ’asher na‘asah takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 9:7	lekh ’ekhol besimkhah lakhmekha ushateh welew tow yeinekha ki khewar ratsah ha’elohim ’et ma‘asekha. 
ecclesiastes 9:8	bekhal ‘et yihyu wegadekha lewanim veshemen ‘al roshekha ’al yekhsar. 
ecclesiastes 9:9	re’eh khayim ‘im ’ishah ’asher ’ahawta kal yemei khayei hewlekha ’asher natan lekha takhat hashemesh kol yemei hewlekha ki hu khelqekha bakhayim uwa‘amalekha ’asher ’atah ‘amel takhat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 9:10	kol ’asher timtsa yadekha la‘asot bekhokhakha ‘aseh ki ’en ma‘aseh vekheshbon veda‘at vekhakhemah bish’ol ’asher ’atah holekh shamah. 
ecclesiastes 9:11	shawti vera’oh takhat hashemesh ki lo laqalim hameirots velo lagiborim hamilkhamah vegam lo lakhakhamim lekhem vegam lo lanewonim ‘osher vegam lo layode‘im khen ki ‘et vafega‘ yiqreh ’et kulam. 
ecclesiastes 9:12	ki gam lo yeida‘ ha’adam ’et ‘ito kadagim shene’ekhazim bimtsodah ra‘ah vekhatsiporim ha’akhuzot bapakh kahem yuqashim benei ha’adam le‘et ra‘ah keshetipol ‘aleihem pit’om. 
ecclesiastes 9:13	gam zoh ra’iti khakhmah takhat hashamesh ugedolah hi ’eilai. 
ecclesiastes 9:14	‘ir qetanah va’anashim bah me‘at uwa ’eileha melekh gadol vesawaw ’otah uwanah ‘aleha metsodim gedolim. 
ecclesiastes 9:15	umatsa wah ’ish misken khakham umilat hu ’et ha‘ir bekhakhemato ve’adam lo zakhar ’et ha’ish hamisken hahu. 
ecclesiastes 9:16	ve’amarti ’ani towah khakhmah migewurah vekhakhemat hamisken bezuyah udewarav ’einam nishma‘im. 
ecclesiastes 9:17	diwrei khakhamim benakhat nishma‘im miza‘aqat moshel bakesilim. 
ecclesiastes 9:18	towah khakhmah mikelei qeraw vekhote ’ekhad ye’abed towah harbeh. 
ecclesiastes 10:1	zewuwei mavet yaw’ish yabia‘ shemen roqeiakh yaqar meikhakhemah mikawod sikhlut me‘at. 
ecclesiastes 10:2	lew khakham limino velew kesil lismolo. 
ecclesiastes 10:3	vegam baderekh keshehasakhal keshesakhal holekh libo khaser ve’amar lakol sakhal hu. 
ecclesiastes 10:4	’im ruakh hamoshel ta‘aleh ‘alekha meqomkha ’al tanakh ki marpei yaniakh khata’im gedolim. 
ecclesiastes 10:5	yesh ra‘ah ra’iti takhat hashamesh kishgagah sheyotsa milifnei hashalit. 
ecclesiastes 10:6	nitan hasekhel bameromim rabim va‘ashirim basheifel yeisheiwu. 
ecclesiastes 10:7	ra’iti ‘awadim ‘al susim vesarim holekhim ka‘awadim ‘al ha’arets. 
ecclesiastes 10:8	khofer gumats bo yipol uforets gader yishekhenu nakhash. 
ecclesiastes 10:9	masia‘ ’awanim yei‘atsew bahem boqeia‘ ‘eitsim yisakhen bam. 
ecclesiastes 10:10	’im qeihah habarzel vehu lo fanim qilqal vakhayalim yegaber veyitron hakhsher khakhmah 
ecclesiastes 10:11	’im yishokh hanakhash belo lakhash ve’en yitron lewa‘al halashon. 
ecclesiastes 10:12	diwrei fi khakham khen vesiftot kesil tewale‘enu. 
ecclesiastes 10:13	tekhilat diwrei fihu sikhlut ve’akharit pihu holeilut ra‘ah. 
ecclesiastes 10:14	vehasakhal yarbeh dewarim lo yeida‘ ha’adam mah sheyihyeh va’asher yihyeh mei’akharav mi yagid lo. 
ecclesiastes 10:15	‘amal hakesilim teyage‘enu ’asher lo yada‘ lalekhet ’el ‘ir. 
ecclesiastes 10:16	’i lakh ’erets shemalkekh na‘ar vesarayikh baboqer yokheilu. 
ecclesiastes 10:17	’ashrekh ’erets shemalkekh ben khorim vesarayikh ba‘et yokheilu bigwurah velo washeti. 
ecclesiastes 10:18	ba‘atsaltayim yimakh hameqareh uweshiflut yadayim yidlof habayit. 
ecclesiastes 10:19	liskhoq ‘osim lekhem veyayin yesamakh khayim vehakesef ya‘aneh ’et hakol. 
ecclesiastes 10:20	gam bemada‘akha melekh ’al teqalel uwekhadrei mishkawekha ’al teqalel ‘ashir ki ‘of hashamayim yolikh ’et haqol uwa‘al hakenafayim kenafayim yaged dawar. 
ecclesiastes 11:1	shalakh lakhmekha ‘al penei hamayim ki werow hayamim timtsa’enu. 
ecclesiastes 11:2	ten kheileq leshiw‘ah vegam lishmonah ki lo teida‘ mah yihyeh ra‘ah ‘al ha’arets. 
ecclesiastes 11:3	’im yimale’u he‘awim geshem ‘al ha’arets yariqu ve’im yipol ‘ets badarom ve’im batsafon meqom sheyipol ha‘ets sham yehu. 
ecclesiastes 11:4	shomer ruakh lo yizra‘ vero’eh we‘awim lo yiqtsor. 
ecclesiastes 11:5	ka’asher ’einekha yodeia‘ mah derekh haruakh ka‘atsamim beweten hamelei’ah kakhah lo teida‘ ’et ma‘aseh ha’elohim ’asher ya‘aseh ’et hakol. 
ecclesiastes 11:6	baboqer zera‘ ’et zar‘ekha vela‘erew ’al tanakh yadekha ki ’einekha yodei‘ ’ei zeh yikhshar hazeh ’o zeh ve’im sheneihem ke’ekhad towim. 
ecclesiastes 11:7	umatoq ha’or vetow la‘einayim lir’ot ’et hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 11:8	ki ’im shanim harbeh yikhyeh ha’adam bekhulam yismakh veyizkor ’et yemei hakhoshekh ki harbeh yihyu kal sheba hawel. 
ecclesiastes 11:9	semakh bakhur beyaldutekha vitiwekha libekha bimei wekhurotekha vehalekh bedarkhei libekha uwemar’ei ‘einekha veda‘ ki ‘al kal ’eleh yewi’akha ha’elohim bamishpat. 
ecclesiastes 11:10	vehaser ka‘as milibekha veha‘awer ra‘ah mibesarekha ki hayaldut vehashakharut hawel. 
ecclesiastes 12:1	uzekhor ’et bor’ekha bimei bekhurotekha ‘ad ’asher lo yawo’u yemei hara‘ah vehigi‘u shanim ’asher tomar ’en li wahem kheifets. 
ecclesiastes 12:2	‘ad ’asher lo tekhshakh hashemesh veha’or vehayareiakh vehakokhawim veshawu he‘awim ’akhar hagashem. 
ecclesiastes 12:3	bayom sheyazu‘u shomerei habayit vehit‘avetu ’anshei hekhayil uwatelu hatokhanot ki mi‘eitu vekhashekhu haro’ot ba’arubot. 
ecclesiastes 12:4	vesugeru delatayim bashuq bishfal qol hatakhanah veyaqum leqol hatsipor veyishakhu kal benot hashir. 
ecclesiastes 12:5	gam migawoah yira’u vekhatkhatim baderekh veyanets hashaqed veyistabel hekhagaw vetafer ha’awiyonah ki holekh ha’adam ’el bet ‘olamo vesawewu washuq hasofedim. 
ecclesiastes 12:6	‘ad ’asher lo yirkhaq yeirateq khewel hakesef vetaruts gulat hazahaw vetishawer kad ‘al hamabua‘ venarots hagalgal ’el habor. 
ecclesiastes 12:7	veyashow he‘afar ‘al ha’arets keshehayah veharuakh tashuw ’el ha’elohim ’asher netanah. 
ecclesiastes 12:8	hawel hawalim ’amar haqohelet hakol hawel. 
ecclesiastes 12:9	veyoter shehayah qohelet khakham ‘od limad da‘at ’et ha‘am ve’izen vekhiqer tiqen meshalim harbeh. 
ecclesiastes 12:10	biqesh qohelet limtso diwrei kheifets vekhatuw yosher diwrei ’emet. 
ecclesiastes 12:11	diwrei khakhamim kadarewonot ukhemasmerot netu‘im ba‘alei ’asupot nitenu meiro‘eh ’ekhad. 
ecclesiastes 12:12	veyoter meihemah beni hizaher ‘asot sefarim harbeh ’en qets velahag harbeh yegi‘at basar. 
ecclesiastes 12:13	sof dawar hakol nishma‘ ’et ha’elohim yera ve’et mitsvotav shemor ki zeh kal ha’adam. 
ecclesiastes 12:14	ki ’et kal ma‘aseh ha’elohim yawi wemishpat ‘al kal ne‘lam ’im tow ve’im ra‘. 
esther 1:1	vayhi bimei ’akhashveirosh hu ’akhashveirosh hamolekh meihodu ve‘ad kush shewa‘ ve‘esrim umei’ah medinah. 
esther 1:2	bayamim hahem keshewet hamelekh ’akhashveirosh ‘al kisei malkhuto ’asher beshushan habirah. 
esther 1:3	bishnat shalosh lemalekho ‘asah mishteh lekhal sarav va‘awadav khel paras umadai hapartemim vesarei hamedinot lefanav. 
esther 1:4	behar’oto ’et ‘osher kewod malkhuto ve’et yeqar tif’eret gedulato yamim rabim shemonim ume’at yom. 
esther 1:5	uwimlot hayamim ha’eleh ‘asah hamelekh lekhal ha‘am hanimtse’im beshushan habirah lemigadol ve‘ad qatan mishteh shiw‘at yamim bakhatsar ginat bitan hamelekh. 
esther 1:6	khur karpas utekheilet ’akhuz bekhawlei wuts ve’argaman ‘al gelilei khesef ve‘amudei shesh mitot zahaw vakhesef ‘al ritsfat bahat vashesh vedar vesokharet. 
esther 1:7	vehashqot bikhlei zahaw vekheilim mikeilim shonim veyen malkhut raw keyad hamelekh. 
esther 1:8	vehashetiyah khadat ’en ’ones ki khen yisad hamelekh ‘al kal raw beito la‘asot kirtson ’ish va’ish. 
esther 1:9	gam vashti hamalkah ‘asetah mishteh nashim bet hamalkhut ’asher lamelekh ’akhashveirosh. 
esther 1:10	bayom hashewi‘i ketow lew hamelekh bayayin ’amar limhuman bizeta kharwona bigta va’awagta zeitar vekharkas shiw‘at hasarisim hamsharetim ’et penei hamelekh ’akhashveirosh. 
esther 1:11	lehawi ’et vashti hamalkah lifnei hamelekh bekheter malkhut lehar’ot ha‘amim vehasarim ’et yafeyah ki towat mar’eh hi. 
esther 1:12	vatema’en hamalkah vashti lawo bidwar hamelekh ’asher beyad hasarisim vayiqtsof hamelekh me’od vakhamato ba‘arah wo. 
esther 1:13	vayomer hamelekh lakhakhamim yode‘ei ha‘itim ki khen dewar hamelekh lifnei kal yode‘ei dat vadin. 
esther 1:14	vehaqarow ’eilav karshena sheitar ’admata tarshish meres marsena memukhan shiw‘at sarei paras umadai ro’ei penei hamelekh hayoshewim rishonah bamalkhut. 
esther 1:15	kedat mah la‘asot bamalkah vashti ‘al ’asher lo ‘asetah ’et ma’amar hamelekh ’akhashveirosh beyad hasarisim. 
esther 1:16	vayomer mumekhan memukhan lifnei hamelekh vehasarim lo ‘al hamelekh lewado ‘avetah vashti hamalkah ki ‘al kal hasarim ve‘al kal ha‘amim ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh ’akhashveirosh. 
esther 1:17	ki yeitsei dewar hamalkah ‘al kal hanashim lehawzot ba‘leihen be‘eineihen be’ameram hamelekh ’akhashveirosh ’amar lehawi ’et vashti hamalkah lefanav velo wa’ah. 
esther 1:18	vehayom hazeh tomarnah sarot paras umadai ’asher shame‘u ’et dewar hamalkah lekhol sarei hamelekh ukhedai bizayon vaqatsef. 
esther 1:19	’im ‘al hamelekh tow yeitsei dewar malkhut milefanav veyikatew bedatei faras umadai velo ya‘awor ’asher lo tawo vashti lifnei hamelekh ’akhashveirosh umalkhutah yiten hamelekh lir‘utah hatowah mimenah. 
esther 1:20	venishma‘ pitgam hamelekh ’asher ya‘aseh bekhal malkhuto ki rabah hi vekhal hanashim yitenu yeqar lewa‘leihen lemigadol ve‘ad qatan. 
esther 1:21	vayitaw hadawar be‘einei hamelekh vehasarim vaya‘as hamelekh kidwar memukhan. 
esther 1:22	vayishlakh sefarim ’el kal medinot hamelekh ’el medinah umedinah kikhtawah ve’el ‘am va‘am kilshono lihyot kal ’ish sorer beweito umedaber kilshon ‘amo. 
esther 2:1	’akhar hadewarim ha’eleh keshokh khamat hamelekh ’akhashveirosh zakhar ’et vashti ve’et ’asher ‘asatah ve’et ’asher nigzar ‘aleha. 
esther 2:2	vayomeru na‘arei hamelekh mesharetav yewaqshu lamelekh ne‘arot betulot towot mar’eh. 
esther 2:3	veyafqed hamelekh peqidim bekhal medinot malkhuto veyiqbetsu ’et kal na‘arah wetulah towat mar’eh ’el shushan habirah ’el bet hanashim ’el yad heige seris hamelekh shomer hanashim venaton tamruqeihen. 
esther 2:4	vehana‘arah ’asher titaw be‘einei hamelekh timlokh takhat vashti vayitaw hadawar be‘einei hamelekh vaya‘as ken. 
esther 2:5	’ish yehudi hayah beshushan habirah ushemo maredokhai ben ya’ir ben shim‘i ben qish ’ish yemini. 
esther 2:6	’asher hagelah mirushalayim ‘im hagolah ’asher hageletah ‘im yekhaneyah melekh yehudah ’asher heglah newukhadnetsar melekh bawel. 
esther 2:7	vayhi ’omen ’et hadasah hi ’ester bat dodo ki ’en lah ’aw va’em vehana‘arah yefat to’ar vetowat mar’eh uwemot ’awiha ve’imah leqakhah maredokhai lo lewat. 
esther 2:8	vayhi behishama‘ dewar hamelekh vedato uwehiqawets ne‘arot rabot ’el shushan habirah ’el yad heigai vatilaqakh ’ester ’el bet hamelekh ’el yad heigai shomer hanashim. 
esther 2:9	vatitaw hana‘arah we‘einav vatisa khesed lefanav vaywahel ’et tamruqeha ve’et manoteha latet lah ve’et shewa‘ hane‘arot hare’uyot latet lah mibet hamelekh vayshaneha ve’et na‘aroteha letow bet hanashim. 
esther 2:10	lo higidah ’ester ’et ‘amah ve’et moladtah ki maredokhai tsivah ‘aleha ’asher lo tagid. 
esther 2:11	uwekhal yom vayom maredokhai mithalekh lifnei khatsar bet hanashim lada‘at ’et shelom ’ester umah yei‘aseh bah. 
esther 2:12	uwehagia‘ tor na‘arah vena‘arah lawo ’el hamelekh ’akhashveirosh miqets heyot lah kedat hanashim shenem ‘asar khodesh ki ken yimle’u yemei meruqeihen shishah khodashim beshemen hamor veshishah khodashim babesamim uwetamruqei hanashim. 
esther 2:13	uwazeh hana‘arah ba’ah ’el hamelekh ’et kal ’asher tomar yinaten lah lawo ‘imah mibet hanashim ‘ad bet hamelekh. 
esther 2:14	ba‘erew hi wa’ah uwaboqer hi shawah ’el bet hanashim sheini ’el yad sha‘ashgaz seris hamelekh shomer hapilagshim lo tawo ‘od ’el hamelekh ki ’im khafets bah hamelekh veniqre’ah weshem. 
esther 2:15	uwehagia‘ tor ’ester bat ’awikhayil dod maredokhai ’asher laqakh lo lewat lawo ’el hamelekh lo wiqshah dawar ki ’im ’et ’asher yomar heigai seris hamelekh shomer hanashim vatehi ’ester noset khen be‘einei kal ro’eha. 
esther 2:16	vatilaqakh ’ester ’el hamelekh ’akhashveirosh ’el bet malkhuto bakhodesh ha‘asiri hu khodesh teiwet bishnat shewa‘ lemalkhuto. 
esther 2:17	vaye’ehaw hamelekh ’et ’ester mikal hanashim vatisa khen vakhesed lefanav mikal habetulot vayasem keter malkhut beroshah vayamlikheha takhat vashti. 
esther 2:18	vaya‘as hamelekh mishteh gadol lekhal sarav va‘awadav ’et mishteh ’ester vahanakhah lamedinot ‘asah vayiten mas’et keyad hamelekh. 
esther 2:19	uwehiqawets betulot sheinit umaredokhai yoshew besha‘ar hamelekh. 
esther 2:20	’en ’ester magedet moladtah ve’et ‘amah ka’asher tsivah ‘aleha maredokhai ve’et ma’amar maredokhai ’ester ‘osah ka’asher hayetah we’amenah ’ito. 
esther 2:21	bayamim hahem umaredokhai yoshew besha‘ar hamelekh qatsaf bigtan vateresh shenei sarisei hamelekh mishomerei hasaf vaywaqshu lishloakh yad bamelekh ’akhashveirosh. 
esther 2:22	vayivada‘ hadawar lemaredokhai vayaged le’ester hamalkah vatomer ’ester lamelekh beshem maredokhai. 
esther 2:23	vaywuqash hadawar vayimatsei vayitalu sheneihem ‘al ‘ets vayikatew beseifer diwrei hayamim lifnei hamelekh. 
esther 3:1	’akhar hadewarim ha’eleh gidal hamelekh ’akhashveirosh ’et haman ben hamedata ha’agagi vaynase’eihu vayasem ’et kis’o mei‘al kal hasarim ’asher ’ito. 
esther 3:2	vekhal ‘awdei hamelekh ’asher besha‘ar hamelekh kore‘im umishtakhavim lehaman ki khen tsivah lo hamelekh umaredokhai lo yikhra‘ velo yishtakhaveh. 
esther 3:3	vayomeru ‘awdei hamelekh ’asher besha‘ar hamelekh lemaredokhai madua‘ ’atah ‘ower ’et mitsvat hamelekh. 
esther 3:4	vayhi be’ameram ke’ameram ’eilav yom vayom velo shama‘ ’aleihem vayagidu lehaman lir’ot haya‘amdu diwrei maredokhai ki higid lahem ’asher hu yehudi. 
esther 3:5	vayar haman ki ’en maredokhai koreia‘ umishtakhaveh lo vayimalei haman kheimah. 
esther 3:6	vayiwez be‘einav lishlokh yad bemaredokhai lewado ki higidu lo ’et ‘am maredokhai vaywaqesh haman lehashmid ’et kal hayehudim ’asher bekhal malkhut ’akhashveirosh ‘am maredokhai. 
esther 3:7	bakhodesh harishon hu khodesh nisan bishnat shetem ‘esreh lamelekh ’akhashveirosh hipil pur hu hagoral lifnei haman miyom leyom umeikhodesh lekhodesh shenem ‘asar hu khodesh ’adar. 
esther 3:8	vayomer haman lamelekh ’akhashveirosh yeshno ‘am ’ekhad mefuzar umeforad ben ha‘amim bekhol medinot malkhutekha vedateihem shonot mikal ‘am ve’et datei hamelekh ’einam ‘osim velamelekh ’en shoeh lehanikham. 
esther 3:9	’im ‘al hamelekh tow yikatew le’abedam va‘aseret ’alafim kikar kesef ’eshqol ‘al yedei ‘osei hamelakhah lehawi ’el ginzei hamelekh. 
esther 3:10	vayasar hamelekh ’et taba‘to mei‘al yado vayitenah lehaman ben hamedata ha’agagi tsorer hayehudim. 
esther 3:11	vayomer hamelekh lehaman hakesef natun lakh veha‘am la‘asot bo katow be‘einekha. 
esther 3:12	vayiqare’u soferei hamelekh bakhodesh harishon bishloshah ‘asar yom bo vayikatew kekhal ’asher tsivah haman ’el ’akhashdarpenei hamelekh ve’el hapakhot ’asher ‘al medinah umedinah ve’el sarei ‘am va‘am medinah umedinah kikhtawah ve‘am va‘am kilshono beshem hamelekh ’akhashveirosh nikhtaw venekhtam betaba‘at hamelekh. 
esther 3:13	venishloakh sefarim beyad haratsim ’el kal medinot hamelekh lehashmid laharog ule’abed ’et kal hayehudim mina‘ar ve‘ad zaqen taf venashim beyom ’ekhad bishloshah ‘asar lekhodesh shenem ‘asar hu khodesh ’adar ushelalam lawoz. 
esther 3:14	patshegen haketaw lehinaten dat bekhal medinah umedinah galui lekhal ha‘amim lihyot ‘atidim layom hazeh. 
esther 3:15	haratsim yatse’u dekhufim bidwar hamelekh vehadat nitenah beshushan habirah vehamelekh vehaman yashewu lishtot veha‘ir shushan nawokhah. 
esther 4:1	umaredokhai yada‘ ’et kal ’asher na‘asah vayiqra‘ maredokhai ’et begadav vayilbash saq va’eifer vayeitsei betokh ha‘ir vayiz‘aq ze‘aqah gedolah umarah. 
esther 4:2	vayawo ‘ad lifnei sha‘ar hamelekh ki ’en lawo ’el sha‘ar hamelekh bilwush saq. 
esther 4:3	uwekhal medinah umedinah meqom ’asher dewar hamelekh vedato magia‘ ’eiwel gadol layehudim vetsom uwekhi umisped saq va’eifer yutsa‘ larabim. 
esther 4:4	vatewo’enah na‘arot ’ester vesariseha vayagidu lah vatitkhalkhal hamalkah me’od vatishlakh begadim lehalbish ’et maredokhai ulehasir saqo mei‘alav velo qibel. 
esther 4:5	vatiqra ’ester lahatakh misarisei hamelekh ’asher he‘emid lefaneha vatetsaveihu ‘al maredokhai lada‘at mah zeh ve‘al mah zeh. 
esther 4:6	vayeitsei hatakh ’el maredokhai ’el rekhow ha‘ir ’asher lifnei sha‘ar hamelekh. 
esther 4:7	vayaged lo maredokhai ’et kal ’asher qarahu ve’et parashat hakesef ’asher ’amar haman lishqol ‘al ginzei hamelekh bayehudiyim bayehudim le’abedam. 
esther 4:8	ve’et patshegen ketaw hadat ’asher nitan beshushan lehashmidam natan lo lehar’ot ’et ’ester ulehagid lah uletsavot ‘aleha lawo ’el hamelekh lehitkhanen lo ulewaqesh milefanav ‘al ‘amah. 
esther 4:9	vayawo hatakh vayaged le’ester ’et diwrei maredokhai. 
esther 4:10	vatomer ’ester lahatakh vatetsaveihu ’el maredokhai. 
esther 4:11	kal ‘awdei hamelekh ve‘am medinot hamelekh yod‘im ’asher kal ’ish ve’ishah ’asher yawo ’el hamelekh ’el hekhatser hapenimit ’asher lo yiqarei ’akhat dato lehamit lewad mei’asher yoshit lo hamelekh ’et sharwit hazahaw vekhayah va’ani lo niqreiti lawo ’el hamelekh zeh sheloshim yom. 
esther 4:12	vayagidu lemaredokhai ’et diwrei ’ester. 
esther 4:13	vayomer maredokhai lehashiw ’el ’ester ’al tedami wenafshekh lehimalet bet hamelekh mikal hayehudim. 
esther 4:14	ki ’im hakharesh takharishi ba‘et hazot revakh vehatsalah ya‘amod layehudim mimaqom ’akher ve’at uwet ’awikh toweidu umi yodeia‘ ’im le‘et kazot higa‘at lamalkhut. 
esther 4:15	vatomer ’ester lehashiw ’el maredokhai. 
esther 4:16	lekh kenos ’et kal hayehudim hanimtse’im beshushan vetsumu ‘alai ve’al tokhelu ve’al tishtu sheloshet yamim laylah vayom gam ’ani vena‘arotai ’atsum ken uwekhen ’awo ’el hamelekh ’asher lo khadat vekha’asher ’awadti ’awadeti. 
esther 4:17	vaya‘awor maredokhai vaya‘as kekhol ’asher tsivetah ‘alav ’ester. 
esther 5:1	vayhi bayom hashelishi vatilbash ’ester malkhut vata‘amod bakhatsar bet hamelekh hapenimit nokhakh bet hamelekh vehamelekh yoshew ‘al kisei malkhuto bewet hamalkhut nokhakh petakh habayit. 
esther 5:2	vayhi khir’ot hamelekh ’et ’ester hamalkah ‘omedet bekhatser nase’ah khen be‘einav vayoshet hamelekh le’ester ’et sharwit hazahaw ’asher beyado vatiqraw ’ester vatiga‘ berosh hasharwit. 
esther 5:3	vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh ’ester hamalkah umah baqashatekh ‘ad khatsi hamalkhut veyinaten lakh. 
esther 5:4	vatomer ’ester ’im ‘al hamelekh tow yawo hamelekh vehaman hayom ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asiti lo. 
esther 5:5	vayomer hamelekh maharu ’et haman la‘asot ’et dewar ’ester vayawo hamelekh vehaman ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asetah ’ester. 
esther 5:6	vayomer hamelekh le’ester bemishteh hayayin mah she’eilatekh veyinaten lakh umah baqashatekh ‘ad khatsi hamalkhut vetei‘as. 
esther 5:7	vata‘an ’ester vatomar she’eilati uwaqashati. 
esther 5:8	’im matsati khen be‘einei hamelekh ve’im ‘al hamelekh tow latet ’et she’eilati vela‘asot ’et baqashati yawo hamelekh vehaman ’el hamishteh ’asher ’e‘eseh lahem umakhar ’e‘eseh kidwar hamelekh. 
esther 5:9	vayeitsei haman bayom hahu sameiakh vetow lew vekhir’ot haman ’et maredokhai besha‘ar hamelekh velo qam velo za‘ mimenu vayimalei haman ‘al maredokhai kheimah. 
esther 5:10	vayit’apaq haman vayawo ’el beito vayishlakh vayawei ’et ’ohawav ve’et zeresh ’ishto. 
esther 5:11	vaysaper lahem haman ’et kewod ‘ashero verow banav ve’et kal ’asher gidelo hamelekh ve’et ’asher nise’o ‘al hasarim ve‘awdei hamelekh. 
esther 5:12	vayomer haman ’af lo heiwi’ah ’ester hamalkah ‘im hamelekh ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asatah ki ’im ’oti vegam lemakhar ’ani qaru lah ‘im hamelekh. 
esther 5:13	vekhal zeh ’einenu shoeh li bekhal ‘et ’asher ’ani ro’eh ’et maredokhai hayehudi yoshew besha‘ar hamelekh. 
esther 5:14	vatomer lo zeresh ’ishto vekhal ’ohawav ya‘asu ‘ets gawoah khamishim ’amah uwaboqer ’emor lamelekh veyitlu ’et maredokhai ‘alav uwo ‘im hamelekh ’el hamishteh sameiakh vayitaw hadawar lifnei haman vaya‘as ha‘ets. 
esther 6:1	balaylah hahu nadedah shenat hamelekh vayomer lehawi ’et seifer hazikhronot diwrei hayamim vayihyu niqra’im lifnei hamelekh. 
esther 6:2	vayimatsei khatuw ’asher higid maredokhai ‘al bigtana vateresh shenei sarisei hamelekh mishomerei hasaf ’asher biqshu lishloakh yad bamelekh ’akhashveirosh. 
esther 6:3	vayomer hamelekh mah na‘asah yeqar ugedulah lemaredokhai ‘al zeh vayomeru na‘arei hamelekh mesharetav lo na‘asah ‘imo dawar. 
esther 6:4	vayomer hamelekh mi wekhatser vehaman ba lakhatsar bet hamelekh hakhitsonah leimor lamelekh litlot ’et maredokhai ‘al ha‘ets ’asher heikhin lo. 
esther 6:5	vayomeru na‘arei hamelekh ’eilav hineh haman ‘omed bekhatser vayomer hamelekh yawo. 
esther 6:6	vayawo haman vayomer lo hamelekh mah la‘asot ba’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro vayomer haman belibo lemi yakhpots hamelekh la‘asot yeqar yoter mimeni. 
esther 6:7	vayomer haman ’el hamelekh ’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro. 
esther 6:8	yawi’u lewush malkhut ’asher lawash bo hamelekh vesus ’asher rakhaw ‘alav hamelekh va’asher nitan keter malkhut berosho. 
esther 6:9	venaton halewush vehasus ‘al yad ’ish misarei hamelekh hapartemim vehilbishu ’et ha’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro vehirkiwuhu ‘al hasus birkhow ha‘ir veqare’u lefanav kakhah yei‘aseh la’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro. 
esther 6:10	vayomer hamelekh lehaman maher qakh ’et halewush ve’et hasus ka’asher dibarta va‘aseh khen lemaredokhai hayehudi hayoshew besha‘ar hamelekh ’al tapel dawar mikol ’asher dibarta. 
esther 6:11	vayiqakh haman ’et halewush ve’et hasus vayalbesh ’et maredokhai vayarkiweihu birkhow ha‘ir vayiqra lefanav kakhah yei‘aseh la’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro. 
esther 6:12	vayashaw maredokhai ’el sha‘ar hamelekh vehaman nidkhaf ’el beito ’awel vakhafui rosh. 
esther 6:13	vaysaper haman lezeresh ’ishto ulekhal ’ohawav ’et kal ’asher qarahu vayomeru lo khakhamav vezeresh ’ishto ’im mizera‘ hayehudim maredokhai ’asher hakhilota linpol lefanav lo tukhal lo ki nafol tipol lefanav. 
esther 6:14	‘odam medaberim ‘imo vesarisei hamelekh higi‘u vayawhilu lehawi ’et haman ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asetah ’ester. 
esther 7:1	vayawo hamelekh vehaman lishtot ‘im ’ester hamalkah. 
esther 7:2	vayomer hamelekh le’ester gam bayom hasheini bemishteh hayayin mah she’eilatekh ’ester hamalkah vetinaten lakh umah baqashatekh ‘ad khatsi hamalkhut vetei‘as. 
esther 7:3	vata‘an ’ester hamalkah vatomar ’im matsati khen be‘einekha hamelekh ve’im ‘al hamelekh tow tinaten li nafshi bish’eilati ve‘ami bewaqashati. 
esther 7:4	ki nimkarnu ’ani ve‘ami lehashmid laharog ule’abed ve’ilu la‘awadim velishfakhot nimkarnu hekherashti ki ’en hatsar shoeh beneizeq hamelekh. 
esther 7:5	vayomer hamelekh ’akhashveirosh vayomer le’ester hamalkah mi hu zeh ve’ei zeh hu ’asher mela’o libo la‘asot ken. 
esther 7:6	vatomer ’ester ’ish tsar ve’oyew haman hara‘ hazeh vehaman niw‘at milifnei hamelekh vehamalkah. 
esther 7:7	vehamelekh qam bakhamato mimishteh hayayin ’el ginat habitan vehaman ‘amad lewaqesh ‘al nafsho mei’ester hamalkah ki ra’ah ki khaletah ’eilav hara‘ah mei’et hamelekh. 
esther 7:8	vehamelekh shaw miginat habitan ’el bet mishteh hayayin vehaman nofel ‘al hamitah ’asher ’ester ‘aleha vayomer hamelekh hagam likhbosh ’et hamalkah ‘imi babayit hadawar yatsa mipi hamelekh ufenei haman khafu. 
esther 7:9	vayomer kharwonah ’ekhad min hasarisim lifnei hamelekh gam hineh ha‘ets ’asher ‘asah haman lemaredokhai ’asher diber tow ‘al hamelekh ‘omed bewet haman gawoah khamishim ’amah vayomer hamelekh teluhu ‘alav. 
esther 7:10	vayitlu ’et haman ‘al ha‘ets ’asher heikhin lemaredokhai vakhamat hamelekh shakhakhah. 
esther 8:1	bayom hahu natan hamelekh ’akhashveirosh le’ester hamalkah ’et bet haman tsorer hayehudiyim hayehudim umaredokhai ba lifnei hamelekh ki higidah ’ester mah hu lah. 
esther 8:2	vayasar hamelekh ’et taba‘to ’asher he‘ewir meihaman vayitenah lemaredokhai vatasem ’ester ’et maredokhai ‘al bet haman. 
esther 8:3	vatosef ’ester vatedaber lifnei hamelekh vatipol lifnei raglav vateiwek vatitkhanen lo leha‘awir ’et ra‘at haman ha’agagi ve’et makhashawto ’asher khashaw ‘al hayehudim. 
esther 8:4	vayoshet hamelekh le’ester ’et sharwit hazahaw vataqam ’ester vata‘amod lifnei hamelekh. 
esther 8:5	vatomer ’im ‘al hamelekh tow ve’im matsati khen lefanav vekhasher hadawar lifnei hamelekh vetowah ’ani be‘einav yikatew lehashiw ’et hasefarim makhashewet haman ben hamedata ha’agagi ’asher kataw le’abed ’et hayehudim ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh. 
esther 8:6	ki ’eikhakhah ’ukhal vera’iti bara‘ah ’asher yimtsa ’et ‘ami ve’eikhakhah ’ukhal vera’iti be’awedan moladti. 
esther 8:7	vayomer hamelekh ’akhashveirosh le’ester hamalkah ulemaredokhai hayehudi hineh wet haman natati le’ester ve’oto talu ‘al ha‘ets ‘al ’asher shalakh yado bayehudiyim bayehudim. 
esther 8:8	ve’atem kitwu ‘al hayehudim katow be‘eineikhem beshem hamelekh vekhitmu betaba‘at hamelekh ki khetaw ’asher nikhtaw beshem hamelekh venakhtom betaba‘at hamelekh ’en lehashiw. 
esther 8:9	vayiqare’u soferei hamelekh ba‘et hahi bakhodesh hashelishi hu khodesh sivan bishloshah ve‘esrim bo vayikatew kekhal ’asher tsivah maredokhai ’el hayehudim ve’el ha’akhashdarpenim vehapakhot vesarei hamedinot ’asher meihodu ve‘ad kush shewa‘ ve‘esrim umei’ah medinah medinah umedinah kikhtawah ve‘am va‘am kilshono ve’el hayehudim kikhtawam vekhilshonam. 
esther 8:10	vayikhtow beshem hamelekh ’akhashveirosh vayakhtom betaba‘at hamelekh vayishlakh sefarim beyad haratsim basusim rokhewei harekhesh ha’akhashteranim benei haramakhim. 
esther 8:11	’asher natan hamelekh layehudim ’asher bekhal ‘ir va‘ir lehiqahel vela‘amod ‘al nafsham lehashmid velaharog ule’abed ’et kal khel ‘am umedinah hatsarim ’otam taf venashim ushelalam lawoz. 
esther 8:12	beyom ’ekhad bekhal medinot hamelekh ’akhashveirosh bishloshah ‘asar lekhodesh shenem ‘asar hu khodesh ’adar. 
esther 8:13	patshegen haketaw lehinaten dat bekhal medinah umedinah galui lekhal ha‘amim velihyot hayehudiyim hayehudim ‘atudim ‘atidim layom hazeh lehinaqem mei’oyeweihem. 
esther 8:14	haratsim rokhewei harekhesh ha’akhashteranim yatse’u mewohalim udekhufim bidwar hamelekh vehadat nitenah beshushan habirah. 
esther 8:15	umaredokhai yatsa milifnei hamelekh bilwush malkhut tekheilet vakhur va‘ateret zahaw gedolah vetakhrikh buts ve’argaman veha‘ir shushan tsahalah vesameikhah. 
esther 8:16	layehudim hayetah ’orah vesimkhah vesason viqar. 
esther 8:17	uwekhal medinah umedinah uwekhal ‘ir va‘ir meqom ’asher dewar hamelekh vedato magia‘ simkhah vesason layehudim mishteh veyom tow verabim mei‘amei ha’arets mityahadim ki nafal pakhad hayehudim ‘aleihem. 
esther 9:1	uwishnem ‘asar khodesh hu khodesh ’adar bishloshah ‘asar yom bo ’asher higia‘ dewar hamelekh vedato lehei‘asot bayom ’asher siberu ’oyewei hayehudim lishlot bahem venahafokh hu ’asher yishletu hayehudim hemah besone’eihem. 
esther 9:2	niqhalu hayehudim be‘areihem bekhal medinot hamelekh ’okhashveirosh lishloakh yad bimwaqshei ra‘atam ve’ish lo ‘amad lifneihem ki nafal pakhdam ‘al kal ha‘amim. 
esther 9:3	vekhal sarei hamedinot veha’akhashdarpenim vehapakhot ve‘osei hamelakhah ’asher lamelekh menase’im ’et hayehudim ki nafal pakhad maredokhai ‘aleihem. 
esther 9:4	ki gadol maredokhai bewet hamelekh veshame‘o holekh bekhal hamedinot ki ha’ish maredokhai holekh vegadol. 
esther 9:5	vayaku hayehudim bekhal ’oyeweihem makat kherew vehereg ve’awdan vaya‘asu wesone’eihem kirtsonam. 
esther 9:6	uweshushan habirah haregu hayehudim ve’abed khamesh mei’ot ’ish. 
esther 9:7	ve’et parshandata ve’et dalfon ve’et ’aspata. 
esther 9:8	ve’et porata ve’et ’adalya ve’et ’aridata. 
esther 9:9	ve’et parmashta ve’et ’arisai ve’et ’aridai ve’et vayzata. 
esther 9:10	‘aseret benei haman ben hamedata tsorer hayehudim haragu uwabizah lo shalekhu ’et yadam. 
esther 9:11	bayom hahu ba mispar haharugim beshushan habirah lifnei hamelekh. 
esther 9:12	vayomer hamelekh le’ester hamalkah beshushan habirah haregu hayehudim ve’abed khamesh mei’ot ’ish ve’et ‘aseret benei haman bish’ar medinot hamelekh meh ‘asu umah she’eilatekh veyinaten lakh umah baqashatekh ‘od vetei‘as. 
esther 9:13	vatomer ’ester ’im ‘al hamelekh tow yinaten gam makhar layehudim ’asher beshushan la‘asot kedat hayom ve’et ‘aseret benei haman yitlu ‘al ha‘ets. 
esther 9:14	vayomer hamelekh lehei‘asot ken vatinaten dat beshushan ve’et ‘aseret benei haman talu. 
esther 9:15	vayiqahalu hayehudiyim hayehudim ’asher beshushan gam beyom ’arba‘ah ‘asar lekhodesh ’adar vayahargu weshushan shelosh mei’ot ’ish uwabizah lo shalekhu ’et yadam. 
esther 9:16	ushe’ar hayehudim ’asher bimdinot hamelekh niqhalu ve‘amod ‘al nafsham venoakh mei’oyeweihem veharog besone’eihem khamishah veshiw‘im ’alef uwabizah lo shalekhu ’et yadam. 
esther 9:17	beyom sheloshah ‘asar lekhodesh ’adar venoakh be’arba‘ah ‘asar bo ve‘asoh ’oto yom mishteh vesimkhah. 
esther 9:18	vehayehudiyim vehayehudim ’asher beshushan niqhalu bishloshah ‘asar bo uwe’arba‘ah ‘asar bo venoakh bakhamishah ‘asar bo ve‘asoh ’oto yom mishteh vesimkhah. 
esther 9:19	‘al ken hayehudim haperozim haperazim hayoshewim be‘arei haperazot ‘osim ’et yom ’arba‘ah ‘asar lekhodesh ’adar simkhah umishteh veyom tow umishloakh manot ’ish lerei‘eihu. 
esther 9:20	vayikhtow maredokhai ’et hadewarim ha’eleh vayishlakh sefarim ’el kal hayehudim ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh ’akhashveirosh haqerowim veharekhoqim. 
esther 9:21	leqayem ‘aleihem lihyot ‘osim ’et yom ’arba‘ah ‘asar lekhodesh ’adar ve’et yom khamishah ‘asar bo bekhal shanah veshanah. 
esther 9:22	kayamim ’asher nakhu wahem hayehudim mei’oyweihem vehakhodesh ’asher nehpakh lahem miyagon lesimkhah umei’eiwel leyom tow la‘asot ’otam yemei mishteh vesimkhah umishloakh manot ’ish lerei‘eihu umatanot la’ewyonim. 
esther 9:23	veqibel hayehudim ’et ’asher heikhelu la‘asot ve’et ’asher kataw maredokhai ’aleihem. 
esther 9:24	ki haman ben hamedata ha’agagi tsorer kal hayehudim khashaw ‘al hayehudim le’abedam vehipil pur hu hagoral lehumam ule’abedam. 
esther 9:25	uwewo’ah lifnei hamelekh ’amar ‘im haseifer yashuw makhashawto hara‘ah ’asher khashaw ‘al hayehudim ‘al rosho vetalu ’oto ve’et banav ‘al ha‘ets. 
esther 9:26	‘al ken qare’u layamim ha’eleh furim ‘al shem hapur ‘al ken ‘al kal diwrei ha’igeret hazot umah ra’u ‘al kakhah umah higia‘ ’aleihem. 
esther 9:27	qiyemu veqibel veqibelu hayehudim ‘aleihem ve‘al zar‘am ve‘al kal hanilvim ‘aleihem velo ya‘awor lihyot ‘osim ’et shenei hayamim ha’eleh kikhtawam vekhizmanam bekhal shanah veshanah. 
esther 9:28	vehayamim ha’eleh nizkarim vena‘asim bekhal dor vador mishpakhah umishpakhah medinah umedinah ve‘ir va‘ir vimei hapurim ha’eleh lo ya‘awru mitokh hayehudim vezikhram lo yasuf mizar‘am. 
esther 9:29	vatikhtow ’ester hamalkah wat ’awikhayil umaredokhai hayehudi ’et kal toqef leqayem ’et ’igeret hapurim hazot hasheinit. 
esther 9:30	vayishlakh sefarim ’el kal hayehudim ’el shewa‘ ve‘esrim umei’ah medinah malkhut ’akhashveirosh diwrei shalom ve’emet. 
esther 9:31	leqayem ’et yemei hapurim ha’eleh bizmaneihem ka’asher qiyam ‘aleihem maredokhai hayehudi ve’ester hamalkah vekha’asher qiyemu ‘al nafsham ve‘al zar‘am diwrei hatsomot veza‘aqatam. 
esther 9:32	uma’amar ’ester qiyam diwrei hapurim ha’eleh venikhtaw baseifer. 
esther 10:1	vayasem hamelekh ’akhasheirosh ’akhashveirosh mas ‘al ha’arets ve’iyei hayam. 
esther 10:2	vekhal ma‘aseh taqepo ugewurato ufarashat gedulat maredokhai ’asher gidelo hamelekh halo hem ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei madai ufaras. 
esther 10:3	ki maredokhai hayehudi mishneh lamelekh ’akhashveirosh vegadol layehudim veratsui lerow ’ekhav doresh tow le‘amo vedower shalom lekhal zar‘o. 
daniel 1:1	bishnat shalosh lemalkhut yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ba newukhadnetsar melekh bawel yerushalim vayatsar ‘aleha. 
daniel 1:2	vayiten ’adonai beyado ’et yehoyaqim melekh yehudah umiqtsat kelei wet ha’elohim vaywi’em ’erets shin‘ar bet ’elohav ve’et hakeilim heiwi bet ’otsar ’elohav. 
daniel 1:3	vayomer hamelekh le’ashpenaz raw sarisav lehawi mibenei yisra’el umizera‘ hamelukhah umin hapartemim. 
daniel 1:4	yeladim ’asher ’en bahem kal me’um mum vetowei mar’eh umaskilim bekhal khakhmah veyode‘ei da‘at umewinei mada‘ va’asher koakh bahem la‘amod beheikhal hamelekh ulalamedam seifer uleshon kasdim. 
daniel 1:5	vayman lahem hamelekh dewar yom beyomo mipat bag hamelekh umiyen mishtav ulegadelam shanim shalosh umiqtsatam ya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. 
daniel 1:6	vayhi wahem mibenei yehudah daniyel khananyah misha’el va‘azaryah. 
daniel 1:7	vayasem lahem sar hasarisim sheimot vayasem ledaniyel beileteshatsar velakhananyah shadrakh ulemisha’el meishakh vela‘azaryah ‘awed nego. 
daniel 1:8	vayasem daniyel ‘al libo ’asher lo yitga’al befatbag hamelekh uweyen mishtav vaywaqesh misar hasarisim ’asher lo yitga’al. 
daniel 1:9	vayiten ha’elohim ’et daniyel lekhesed ulerakhamim lifnei sar hasarisim. 
daniel 1:10	vayomer sar hasarisim ledaniyel yarei ’ani ’et ’adoni hamelekh ’asher minah ’et ma’akhalkhem ve’et mishteikhem ’asher lamah yir’eh ’et peneikhem zo‘afim min hayladim ’asher kegilekhem vekhiyawtem ’et roshi lamelekh. 
daniel 1:11	vayomer daniyel ’el hameltsar ’asher minah sar hasarisim ‘al daniyel khananyah misha’el va‘azaryah. 
daniel 1:12	nas na ’et ‘awadekha yamim ‘asarah veyitenu lanu min hazeiro‘im venokhelah umayim venishteh. 
daniel 1:13	veyeira’u lefanekha mar’einu umar’eh hayladim ha’okhelim ’et patbag hamelekh vekha’asher tir’eh ‘aseh ‘im ‘awadekha. 
daniel 1:14	vayishma‘ lahem ladawar hazeh vaynasem yamim ‘asarah. 
daniel 1:15	umiqtsat yamim ‘asarah nir’ah mar’eihem tow uweri’ei basar min kal hayladim ha’okhelim ’et patbag hamelekh. 
daniel 1:16	vayhi hameltsar nosei ’et patbagam veyen mishteihem venoten lahem zeire‘onim. 
daniel 1:17	vehayladim ha’eleh ’arba‘tam natan lahem ha’elohim mada‘ vehaskel bekhal seifer vekhakhemah vedaniyel heiwin bekhal khazon vakhalomot. 
daniel 1:18	ulemiqtsat hayamim ’asher ’amar hamelekh lahawi’am vaywi’em sar hasarisim lifnei newukhadnetsar. 
daniel 1:19	vaydaber ’itam hamelekh velo nimtsa mikulam kedaniyel khananyah misha’el va‘azaryah vaya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. 
daniel 1:20	vekhol dewar khakhemat binah ’asher biqesh meihem hamelekh vayimtsa’em ‘eser yadot ‘al kal hakhartumim ha’ashafim ’asher bekhal malkhuto. 
daniel 1:21	vayhi daniyel ‘ad shenat ’akhat lekhoresh hamelekh. 
daniel 2:1	uwishnat shetayim lemalkhut newukhadnetsar khalam newukhadnetsar khalomot vatitpa‘em rukho ushenato nihyetah ‘alav. 
daniel 2:2	vayomer hamelekh liqro lakhartumim vela’ashafim velamkhashefim velakasdim lehagid lamelekh khalomotav vayawo’u vaya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. 
daniel 2:3	vayomer lahem hamelekh khalom khalameti vatipa‘em rukhi lada‘at ’et hakhalom. 
daniel 2:4	vaydaberu hakasdim lamelekh ’aramit malka le‘alemin kheyi ’emar khelma le‘awdayikh le‘awdakh ufishra nekhavei. 
daniel 2:5	‘aneh malka ve’amar lekhasdayei lekhasda’ei mileta mini ’azda hen la tehod‘unani khelma ufishreh hadamin tit‘awdun uwateikhon nevali yitesamun. 
daniel 2:6	vehen khelma ufishreh tehakhavon matenan unewizbah viqar sagi teqabelun min qodamai lahen khelma ufishreh hakhavoni. 
daniel 2:7	‘ano tinyanut ve’amerin malka khelma yeimar le‘awdohi ufishrah nehakhaveh. 
daniel 2:8	‘aneh malka ve’amar min yatsiw yada‘ ’anah di ‘idana ’antun zawenin kal qowel di khazeiton di ’azda mini mileta. 
daniel 2:9	di hen khelma la tehod‘unani khadah hi datekhon umilah khidwah ushekhitah hazmintun hizdemintun lemeimar qadamai ‘ad di ‘idana yishtanei lahen khelma ’emaru li ve’inda‘ di fishreh tehakhavunani. 
daniel 2:10	‘ano khasdayei khasda’ei qodam malka ve’amerin la ’itai ’anash ‘al yabeshta di milat malka yukhal lehakhavayah kal qowel di kal melekh raw veshalit milah khidnah la she’el lekhal khartom ve’ashaf vekhasdai. 
daniel 2:11	umileta di malkah sha’el yaqirah ve’akhoran la ’itai di yekhavinah qodam malka lahen ’elahin di medarehon ‘im bisra la ’itohi. 
daniel 2:12	kal qowel denah malka benas uqetsaf sagi va’amar lehowadah lekhol khakimei wawel. 
daniel 2:13	vedata nefqat vekhakimaya mitqatelin uwe‘o daniyel vekhawrohi lehitqetalah. 
daniel 2:14	beidayin daniyel hatiw ‘eita ute‘em le’aryokh raw tabakhaya di malka di nefaq leqatalah lekhakimei bawel. 
daniel 2:15	‘aneh ve’amar le’aryokh shalita di malka ‘al mah data mehakhtsefah min qodam malka ’edayin mileta hoda‘ ’aryokh ledaniyel. 
daniel 2:16	vedaniyel ‘al uwe‘ah min malka di zeman yinten leh ufishra lehakhavayah lemalka. 
daniel 2:17	’edayin daniyel lewayteh ’azal velakhananyah misha’el va‘azaryah khawrohi mileta hoda‘. 
daniel 2:18	verakhamin lemiw‘ei min qodam ’elah shemaya ‘al razah denah di la yehowedun daniyel vekhawrohi ‘im she’ar khakimei wawel. 
daniel 2:19	’edayin ledaniyel bekhezva di leileya razah gali ’edayin daniyel barikh le’elah shemaya. 
daniel 2:20	‘aneh daniyel ve’amar lehevei shemeh di ’elaha mewarakh min ‘alema ve‘ad ‘alema di khakhemeta ugewureta di leh hi. 
daniel 2:21	vehu mehashnei ‘idanaya vezimnaya meha‘deh malkhin umehaqem malkhin yahew khakhemeta lekhakimin umande‘a leyade‘ei winah. 
daniel 2:22	hu galei ‘amiqata umesaterata yada‘ mah wakhashokha unehira unehora ‘imeh sherei. 
daniel 2:23	lakh ’elah ’awahati mehodei umeshabakh ’anah di khakhemeta ugewureta yehawt li ukhe‘an hoda‘tani di we‘eina minakh di milat malka hoda‘tena. 
daniel 2:24	kal qowel denah daniyel ‘al ‘al ’aryokh di mani malka lehowadah lekhakimei wawel ’azal vekhen ’amar leh lekhakimei wawel ’al tehowed ha‘eileni qodam malka ufishra lemalka ’akhavei. 
daniel 2:25	’edayin ’aryokh behitbehalah han‘el ledaniyel qodam malka vekhen ’amar leh di hashkakhat gewar min benei galuta di yehud di fishra lemalka yehoda‘. 
daniel 2:26	‘aneh malka ve’amar ledaniyel di shemeh beileteshatsar ha’itayikh ha’itakh kahel lehoda‘utani khelma di khazet ufishreh.
