daniel 2:27	‘aneh daniyel qodam malka ve’amar razah di malka sha’el la khakimin ’ashefin khartumin gazerin yakhelin lehakhavayah lemalka. 
daniel 2:28	beram ’itai ’elah bishmaya galei razin vehoda‘ lemalka newukhadnetsar mah di lehevei be’akharit yomaya khelmakh vekhezvei reishakh ‘al mishkewakh denah hu. 
daniel 2:29	’antah malka ra‘yonakh ‘al mishkewakh seliqu mah di lehevei ’akharei denah vegalei razaya hod‘akh mah di lehevei. 
daniel 2:30	va’anah la wekhakhemah di ’itai bi min kal khayaya raza denah geli li lahen ‘al diwrat di fishra lemalka yehod‘un vera‘yonei liwwakh tinda‘. 
daniel 2:31	’antah malka khazeh havayta va’alu tselem khad sagi tsalma diken raw veziveh yatir qa’em leqawelakh vereiveh dekhil. 
daniel 2:32	hu tsalma reisheh di dehaw taw khadohi udera‘ohi di khesaf me‘ohi veyarkhateh di nekhash. 
daniel 2:33	shaqohi di farzel raglohi minehon minehen di farzel uminehon uminehen di khasaf. 
daniel 2:34	khazeh havayta ‘ad di hitgezeret ’ewen di la widayin umekhat letsalma ‘al raglohi di farzela vekhaspa vehadeiqet himon. 
daniel 2:35	beidayin daqu khakhadah parzela khaspa nekhasha kaspa vedahawa vahavo ke‘ur min ’iderei qayit unesa himon rukha vekhal ’atar la hishtakhakh lehon ve’awna di mekhat letsalma havat letur raw umelat kal ’ar‘a. 
daniel 2:36	denah khelma ufishreh neimar qodam malka. 
daniel 2:37	’antah malka melekh malkhaya di ’elah shemaya malkhuta khisna vetaqepa viqara yehaw lakh. 
daniel 2:38	uwekhal di da’arin dayerin benei ’anasha kheivat bara ve‘of shemaya yehaw bidakh vehashletakh bekhalehon ’antah hu reishah di dahawa. 
daniel 2:39	uwaterakh tequm malkhu ’akhori ’ara‘ minakh umalkhu telitaya telita’ah ’akhori di nekhasha di tishlat bekhal ’ar‘a. 
daniel 2:40	umalkhu rewi‘ayah rewi‘a’ah tehevei taqifah kefarzela kal qowel di farzela mehadeq vekhashel kola ukhefarzela di mera‘a‘ kal ’ilen tadiq veteiroa‘. 
daniel 2:41	vedi khazaytah raglaya ve’etsbe‘ata minehon minehen khasaf di fekhar uminehon uminehen parzel malkhu feligah teheveh umin nitsbeta di farzela lehevei wah kal qowel di khazaytah parzela me‘araw bakhasaf tina. 
daniel 2:42	ve’etsbe‘at raglaya minehon minehen parzel uminehon uminehen khasaf min qetsat malkhuta teheveh taqifah uminah teheveh tewirah. 
daniel 2:43	di vedi khazayta parzela me‘araw bakhasaf tina mit‘arewin lehevon bizra‘ ’anasha vela lehevon daweqin denah ‘im denah hei khedi farzela la mit‘araw ‘im khaspa. 
daniel 2:44	uweyomeihon di malkhaya ’inun yeqim ’elah shemaya malkhu di le‘alemin la titkhabal umalkhutah le‘am ’akhoran la tishtewiq tadiq vetasef kal ’ilen malkhevata vehi tequm le‘alemaya. 
daniel 2:45	kal qowel di khazayta di mitura ’itgezeret ’ewen di la widayin vehadeqet parzela nekhasha khaspa kaspa vedahawa ’elah raw hoda‘ lemalka mah di lehevei ’akharei denah veyatsiw khelma umeheiman pishreh. 
daniel 2:46	beidayin malka newukhadnetsar nefal ‘al ’anpohi uledaniyel segid uminkhah venikhokhin ’amar lenasakhah leh. 
daniel 2:47	‘aneh malka ledaniyel ve’amar min qeshot di ’elahakhon hu ’elah ’elahin umarei malkhin vegaleh razin di yekheileta lemiglei razah denah. 
daniel 2:48	’edayin malka ledaniyel rabi umatenan rawrewan sagi’an yehaw leh vehashleteh ‘al kal medinat bawel veraw signin ‘al kal khakimei wawel. 
daniel 2:49	vedaniyel be‘a min malka umani ‘al ‘awideta di medinat bawel leshadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego vedaniyel bitra‘ malka. 
daniel 3:1	newukhadnetsar malka ‘awad tselem di dehaw rumeh ’amin shitin petayeh ’amin shit ’aqimeh bewiq‘at dura bimdinat bawel. 
daniel 3:2	unewukhadnetsar malka shelakh lemikhnash la’akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata ’adargazeraya gedaweraya detaweraya tiftayei vekhol shiltonei medinata lemeitei lakhanukat tsalma di haqem newukhadnetsar malka. 
daniel 3:3	beidayin mitkaneshin ’akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata ’adargazeraya gedaweraya detaweraya tiftayei vekhol shiltonei medinata lakhanukat tsalma di haqem newukhadnetsar malka veqa’amin veqayemin laqowel tsalma di haqem newukhadnetsar. 
daniel 3:4	vekharoza qarei wekhayil lekhon ’amerin ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya. 
daniel 3:5	be‘idana di tishme‘un qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin sumeponeyah vekhol zenei zemara tipelun vetisgedun letselem dahawa di haqem newukhadnetsar malka. 
daniel 3:6	uman di la yipel veyisgud bah sha‘ata yitremei lego ’atun nura yaqidta. 
daniel 3:7	kal qowel denah beh zimna kedi shame‘in kal ‘amaya qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin vekhol zenei zemara nafelin kal ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya sagedin letselem dahawa di haqem newukhadnetsar malka. 
daniel 3:8	kal qowel denah beh zimna qeriwu guwrin kasda’in va’akhalu qartseihon di yehudayei. 
daniel 3:9	‘ano ve’amerin linwukhadnetsar malka malka le‘alemin kheyi. 
daniel 3:10	’antah ’ant malka sameta te‘em di khal ’enash di yishma‘ qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha fesanteirin vesiponeyah vesuponeyah vekhol zenei zemara yipel veyisgud letselem dahawa. 
daniel 3:11	uman di la yipel veyisgud yitremei lego ’atun nura yaqidta. 
daniel 3:12	’itai guwrin yehudayin di manita yatehon ‘al ‘awidat medinat bawel shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego guwraya ’ilekh la samu ‘alayikh ‘alakh malka te‘em leilahayikh leilahakh la falekhin uletselem dahawa di haqeimeta la sagedin. 
daniel 3:13	beidayin newukhadnetsar birgaz vakhamah ’amar lehaytayah leshadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego beidayin guwraya ’ilekh heitayu qodam malka. 
daniel 3:14	‘aneh newukhadnetsar ve’amar lehon hatsda shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego leilahai la ’iteikhon palekhin uletselem dahawa di haqeimet la sagedin. 
daniel 3:15	ke‘an hen ’iteikhon ‘atidin di we‘idana di tishme‘un qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin vesumeponeyah vekhol zenei zemara tipelun vetisgedun letsalma di ‘awdet vehen la tisgedun bah sha‘atah titremon lego ’atun nura yaqidta uman hu ’elah dei yesheizewinkhon min yedai. 
daniel 3:16	‘ano shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego ve’amerin lemalka newukhadnetsar la khashkhin ’anakhnah ‘al denah pitgam lahatawutakh. 
daniel 3:17	hen ’itai ’elahana di ’anakhna falekhin yakhil lesheizawutana min ’atun nura yaqidta umin yedakh malka yesheiziw. 
daniel 3:18	vehen la yedia‘ lehevei lakh malka di leilahayikh la ’itayna ’itana falekhin uletselem dahawa di haqeimeta la nisgud. 
daniel 3:19	beidayin newukhadnetsar hitmeli khema utselem ’anpohi ’eshtanu ’eshtani ‘al shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego ‘aneh ve’amar lemeizei le’atuna khad shiw‘ah ‘al di khazeh lemeizeyeh. 
daniel 3:20	uleguwrin gibarei khayil di wekhayleh ’amar lekhapatah leshadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego lemirmei le’atun nura yaqidta. 
daniel 3:21	beidayin guwraya ’ilekh kefitu besarbaleihon patisheihon patesheihon vekharbelatehon ulewusheihon uremiv lego ’atun nura yaqidta. 
daniel 3:22	kal qowel denah min di milat malka makhtsefah ve’atuna ’eizeh yatira guwraya ’ilekh di hasiqu leshadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego qatil himon shewiwa di nura. 
daniel 3:23	veguwraya ’ilekh telateihon shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego nefalu lego ’atun nura yaqidta mekhapetin. 
daniel 3:24	’edayin newukhadnetsar malka tevah veqam behitbehalah ‘aneh ve’amar lehadawerohi hala guwrin telata remeina lego nura mekhapetin ‘anayin ve’amerin lemalka yatsiwa malka. 
daniel 3:25	‘aneh ve’amar ha ’anah khazeh guwrin ’arbe‘ah sherayin mahlekhin bego nura vakhawal la ’itai behon vereiveh di rewi‘aya rewi‘a’ah dameh lewar ’elahin. 
daniel 3:26	beidayin qerew newukhadnetsar litra‘ ’atun nura yaqidta ‘aneh ve’amar shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego ‘awdohi di ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah puqu ve’eto beidayin nafeqin shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego min go nura. 
daniel 3:27	umitkaneshin ’akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata vehadawerei malka khazayin leguwraya ’ilekh di la shelet nura begeshmehon use‘ar reishehon la hitkharakh vesarebaleihon la sheno vereiakh nur la ‘adat behon. 
daniel 3:28	‘aneh newukhadnetsar ve’amar berikh ’elahahon di shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego di shelakh mal’akheh vesheiziw le‘awdohi di hitrekhitsu ‘alohi umilat malka shaniv vihawu geshmeihon geshmehon di la yiflekhun vela yisgedun lekhal ’elah lahen leilahahon. 
daniel 3:29	umini sim te‘em di khal ‘am ’umah velishan di yeimar sheilah shalu ‘al ’elahahon di shadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego hadamin yit‘awed uwayteh nevali yishtaveh kal qowel di la ’itai ’elah ’akhoran di yikul lehatsalah kidnah. 
daniel 3:30	beidayin malka hatslakh leshadrakh meishakh va‘awed nego bimdinat bawel. 
daniel 4:1	newukhadnetsar malka lekhal ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya di da’arin dayerin bekhal ’ar‘a shelamekhon yisgei. 
daniel 4:2	’ataya vetimhaya di ‘awad ‘imi ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah shefar qadamai lehakhavayah. 
daniel 4:3	’atohi kemah rawrewin vetimhohi kemah taqifin malkhuteh malkhut ‘alam veshaletaneh ‘im dar vedar. 
daniel 4:4	’anah newukhadnetsar sheleh havet beweiti vera‘nan beheikheli. 
daniel 4:5	kheilem khazet vidakhalinani veharhorin ‘al mishkewi vekhezvei reishi yewahalunani. 
daniel 4:6	umini sim te‘em lehan‘alah qadamai lekhol khakimei wawel di feshar khelma yehod‘unani. 
daniel 4:7	beidayin ‘alalin ‘alin khartumaya ’ashefaya kasdayei kasda’ei vegazeraya vekhelma ’amar ’anah qodameihon ufishreh la mehod‘in li. 
daniel 4:8	ve‘ad ’akhoren ‘al qadamai daniyel di shemeh beileteshatsar keshum ’elahi vedi ruakh ’elahin qadishin beh vekhelma qadamohi ’amret. 
daniel 4:9	beileteshatsar raw khartumaya di ’anah yid‘et di ruakh ’elahin qadishin bakh vekhal raz la ’anes lakh khezvei khelmi di khazet ufishreh ’emar. 
daniel 4:10	vekhezvei reishi ‘al mishkewi khazeh havet va’alu ’ilan bego ’ar‘a verumeh sagi. 
daniel 4:11	rewah ’ilana uteqif verumeh yimtei lishmaya vakhazoteh lesof kal ’ar‘a. 
daniel 4:12	‘afeyeh shapir ve’inbeh sagi umazon lekhola weh tekhotohi tatlel kheivat bara uwe‘anfohi yedurun yeduran tsiparei shemaya umineh yitezin kal bisra. 
daniel 4:13	khazeh havet bekhezvei reishi ‘al mishkewi va’alu ‘ir veqadish min shemaya nakhit. 
daniel 4:14	qarei wekhayil vekhen ’amar godu ’ilana veqatsitsu ‘anfohi ’ataru ‘afeyeh uwadaru ’inbeh tenud kheiveta min takhtohi vetsiperaya min ‘anfohi. 
daniel 4:15	beram ‘iqar shareshohi be’ar‘a shewuqu uwe’esur di farzel unekhash bedit’a di wara uwetal shemaya yitstaba‘ ve‘im kheiveta khalaqeh ba‘asaw ’ar‘a. 
daniel 4:16	liwweh min ’enosha ’anasha yeshanon ulewaw kheivah yityehiw leh veshiw‘ah ‘idanin yakhlefun ‘alohi. 
daniel 4:17	bigzeirat ‘irin pitgama umeimar qadishin she’eileta ‘ad diwrat di yinde‘un khayaya di shalit ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah bemalkhut ’enosha ’anasha uleman di yitsbei yiteninah ushefal ’anashim yeqim ‘alayah ‘alah. 
daniel 4:18	denah khelma khazet ’anah malka newukhadnetsar ve’antah ve’ant beileteshatsar pishrei ’emar kal qowel di kal khakimei malkhuti la yakhelin pishra lehoda‘utani ve’antah ve’ant kahel di ruakh ’elahin qadishin bakh. 
daniel 4:19	’edayin daniyel di shemeh beileteshatsar ’eshtomam kesha‘ah khadah vera‘yonohi yewahaluneh ‘aneh malka ve’amar beileteshatsar khelma ufishrei ’al yewahalakh ‘aneh weileteshatsar ve’amar mare’i mari khelma lesane’ayikh lesane’akh ufishreh le‘arayikh le‘arakh 
daniel 4:20	’ilana di khazayta di rewah uteqif verumeh yimtei lishmaya vakhazoteh lekhal ’ar‘a. 
daniel 4:21	ve‘afeyeh shapir ve’inbeh sagi umazon lekhola weh tekhotohi tedur kheivat bara uwe‘anfohi yishkenan tsiparei shemaya. 
daniel 4:22	’antah ’ant hu malka di rewayt uteqeifet urewutakh rewat umetat lishmaya veshaletanakh lesof ’ar‘a. 
daniel 4:23	vedi khazah malka ‘ir veqadish nakhit min shemaya ve’amar godu ’ilana vekhabeluhi beram ‘iqar shareshohi be’ar‘a shewuqu uwe’esur di farzel unekhash bedit’a di wara uwetal shemaya yitstaba‘ ve‘im kheivat bara khalaqeh ‘ad di shiw‘ah ‘idanin yakhlefun ‘alohi. 
daniel 4:24	denah fishra malka ugezeirat ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah hi di metat ‘al mar’i mari malka. 
daniel 4:25	velakh taredin min ’anasha ve‘im kheivat bara leheveh medorakh ve‘isba khetorin lakh yeta‘amun umital shemaya lakh metsabe‘in veshiw‘ah ‘idanin yakhlefun ‘alayikh ‘ad di tinda‘ di shalit ‘ilaya bemalkhut ’anasha uleman di yitsbei yiteninah. 
daniel 4:26	vedi ’amaru lemishbaq ‘iqar shareshohi di ’ilana malkhutakh lakh qayamah min di tinda‘ di shalitin shemaya. 
daniel 4:27	lahen malka milki yishpar ‘alayikh ‘alakh vakhatayakh vakhata’akh betsidqah feruq va‘avayatakh bemikhan ‘anayin hen tehevei ’arkhah lishleivetakh. 
daniel 4:28	kola meta ‘al newukhadnetsar malka. 
daniel 4:29	liqtsat yarkhin terei ‘asar ‘al heikhal malkhuta di wawel mehalekh havah. 
daniel 4:30	‘aneh malka ve’amar hala da hi bawel rabeta di ’anah wenaytah lewet malkhu bitqaf khisni veliqar hadri. 
daniel 4:31	‘od mileta befum malka qal min shemaya nefal lakh ’amerin newukhadnetsar malka malkhutah ‘adat minakh. 
daniel 4:32	umin ’anasha lakh taredin ve‘im kheivat bara medorakh ‘isba khetorin lakh yeta‘amun veshiw‘ah ‘idanin yakhlefun ‘alayikh ‘alakh ‘ad di tinda‘ di shalit ‘ilaya bemalkhut ’anasha uleman di yitsbei yiteninah. 
daniel 4:33	bah sha‘ata mileta safat ‘al newukhadnetsar umin ’anasha terid ve‘isba khetorin yeikhul umital shemaya gishmeh yitstaba‘ ‘ad di sa‘reh kenishrin rewah vetifrohi khetsiperin. 
daniel 4:34	veliqtsat yomayah ’anah newukhadnetsar ‘aynai lishmaya nitlet umande‘i ‘alai yetuw ule‘ilaya ule‘ila’ah barekhet ulekhai ‘alema shabekhet vehaderet di shaletaneh shaletan ‘alam umalkhuteh ‘im dar vedar. 
daniel 4:35	vekhal da’arei dayerei ’ar‘a kelah khashiwin ukhemitsbeyeh ‘awed bekhel shemaya veda’arei vedayerei ’ar‘a vela ’itai di yemakhei wideh veyeimar leh mah ‘awadt. 
daniel 4:36	beh zimna mande‘i yetuw ‘alai veliqar malkhuti hadri vezivi yetuw ‘alai veli hadawerai verawrewanai yewa‘on ve‘al malkhuti hateqenat urewu yatirah husefat li. 
daniel 4:37	ke‘an ’anah newukhadnetsar meshabakh umeromem umehadar lemelekh shemaya di khal ma‘awadohi qeshot ve’orekhateh din vedi mahlekhin begeivah yakhil lehashpalah. 
daniel 5:1	beileshatsar malka ‘awad lekhem raw lerawrewanohi ’alaf velaqowel ’alpa khamra shateh. 
daniel 5:2	beileshatsar ’amar bit‘em khamra lehaytayah lemanei dahawa vekhaspa di hanpeq newukhadnetsar ’awuhi min heikhela di wirushelem veyishton behon malka verawrewanohi sheigelateh ulekheinateh. 
daniel 5:3	beidayin haytiv manei dahawa di hanpiqu min heikhela di wet ’elaha di wirushelem ve’ishtiv behon malka verawrewanohi sheigelateh ulekheinateh. 
daniel 5:4	’ishtiv khamra veshabakhu leilahei dahawa vekhaspa nekhasha farzela ’a‘a ve’awna. 
daniel 5:5	bah sha‘atah nefaqu nefaqah ’etsbe‘an di yad ’enash vekhatewan laqowel newrashta ‘al gira di khetal heikhela di malka umalka khazeh pas yedah di khatewah. 
daniel 5:6	’edayin malka ziyohi shenohi vera‘yonohi yewahaluneh veqitrei khartseh mishtarayin ve’arkhubateh da leda naqeshan. 
daniel 5:7	qarei malka bekhayil lehe‘alah le’ashefaya kasdayei kasda’ei vegazeraya ‘aneh malka ve’amar lekhakimei wawel di khal ’enash di yiqreh ketawah denah ufishreh yekhavinani ’argevana yilbash vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahawa ‘al tsavereh vetalti wemalkhuta yishlat. 
daniel 5:8	’edayin ‘alalin ‘alin kol khakimei malka vela khahalin ketawa lemiqrei ufishra ufishreh lehoda‘ah lemalka. 
daniel 5:9	’edayin malka weileshatsar sagi mitbahal veziyohi shanayin ‘alohi verawrewanohi mishtabeshin. 
daniel 5:10	malketa laqowel milei malka verawrewanohi lewet mishteya ‘alalat ‘alat ‘anat malketa va’ameret malka le‘alemin kheyi ’al yewahalukh ra‘yonakh vezivaykh ’al yishtano. 
daniel 5:11	’itai gewar bemalkhutakh di ruakh ’elahin qadishin beh uweyomei ’awukh nahiru vesakheletanu vekhakhemah kekhakhemat ’elahin hishtekhakhat beh umalka newukhadnetsar ’awukh raw khartumin ’ashefin kasda’in gazerin haqimeh ’awukh malka. 
daniel 5:12	kal qowel di ruakh yatirah umanda‘ vesakheletanu mefashar khelmin va’akhavayat ’akhidan umesharei qitrin hishtekhakhat beh bedaniyel di malka sam shemeh beileteshatsar ke‘an daniyel yitqerei ufishrah yehakhaveh. 
daniel 5:13	beidayin daniyel hu‘al qodam malka ‘aneh malka ve’amar ledaniyel ’antah ’ant hu daniyel di min benei galuta di yehud di hayti malka ’awi min yehud. 
daniel 5:14	veshim‘et ‘alayikh ‘alakh di ruakh ’elahin bakh venahiru vesakheletanu vekhakhemah yatirah hishtekhakhat bakh. 
daniel 5:15	ukhe‘an hu‘alu qadamai khakimaya ’ashefaya di khetawah denah yiqron ufishreh lehoda‘utani vela khahalin peshar mileta lehakhavayah. 
daniel 5:16	va’anah shim‘et ‘alayikh ‘alakh di tukhal tikul pishrin lemifshar veqitrin lemishrei ke‘an hen tukhal tikhul ketawa lemiqrei ufishreh lehoda‘utani ’argevana tilbash vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahawa ‘al tsaverakh vetalta wemalkhuta tishlat. 
daniel 5:17	beidayin ‘aneh daniyel ve’amar qodam malka matenatakh lakh lehevyan unewazebeyatakh le’akhoran haw beram ketawa ’eqrei lemalka ufishra ’ahod‘ineh. 
daniel 5:18	’antah ’ant malka ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah malkhuta urewuta viqara vehadrah yehaw linwukhadnetsar ’awukh. 
daniel 5:19	umin rewuta di yehaw leh kol ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya havo za’a‘in zaye‘in vedakhalin min qodamohi di havah tsawei hava qatel vedi havah tsawei havah makhei vedi havah tsawei havah marim vedi havah tsawei havah mashpil. 
daniel 5:20	ukhedi rim liwweh verukheh tiqfat lahazadah hanekhat min karesei malkhuteh viqarah he‘diyu mineh. 
daniel 5:21	umin benei ’anasha terid veliwweh ‘im kheiveta shevi shaviyv ve‘im ‘aradaya medoreh ‘isba khetorin yeta‘amuneh umital shemaya gishmeh yitstaba‘ ‘ad di yeda‘ di shalit ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah bemalkhut ’anasha uleman di yitsbeh yehaqem ‘alayeh ‘alah. 
daniel 5:22	ve’antah ve’ant bereh beileshatsar la hashpeilet liwwakh kal qowel di khal denah yeda‘ta. 
daniel 5:23	ve‘al marei shemaya hitromamta ulemanaya di wayteh haytiv qadamayikh qadamakh ve’antah ve’ant verawrewanayikh verawrewanakh sheigelatakh ulekheinatakh khamra shatayin behon veleilahei khaspa vedahawa nekhasha farzela ’a‘a ve’awna di la khazayin vela shame‘in vela yade‘in shabakhta veleilaha di nishmetakh bideh vekhal ’orekhatakh leh la hadarta. 
daniel 5:24	beidayin min qodamohi sheliyaakh pasa di yeda ukhetawa denah reshim. 
daniel 5:25	udenah khetawa di reshim menei menei teqel ufarsin. 
daniel 5:26	denah peshar mileta menei menah ’elaha malkhutakh vehashlemah. 
daniel 5:27	teqel teqiletah wemozanya vehishtekhakhat khasir. 
daniel 5:28	peres perisat malkhutakh vihiwat lemadai ufaras. 
daniel 5:29	beidayin ’amar beileshatsar vehalbishu ledaniyel ’argevana vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahawa ‘al tsavereh vehakhrizu ‘alohi di lehevei shalit talta bemalkhuta. 
daniel 5:30	beh beleileya qetil beileshatsar malka khasdaya khasda’ah. 
daniel 5:31	vedareyavesh madaya qabel malkhuta kewar shenin shitin vetarten. 
daniel 6:1	shefar qodam dareyavesh vahaqim ‘al malkhuta la’akhashdarpenaya me’ah ve‘esrin di lehevon bekhal malkhuta. 
daniel 6:2	ve‘ela minehon sarekhin telata di daniyel khad minehon di lehevon ’akhashdarpenaya ’ilen yahawin lehon ta‘ma umalka la lehevei naziq. 
daniel 6:3	’edayin daniyel denah hava mitnatsakh ‘al sarekhaya va’akhashdarpenaya kal qowel di ruakh yatira beh umalka ‘ashit lahaqamuteh ‘al kal malkhuta. 
daniel 6:4	’edayin sarekhaya va’akhashdarpenaya havo wa‘ayin ‘ilah lehashkakhah ledaniyel mitsad malkhuta vekhal ‘ilah ushekhitah la yakhelin lehashkakhah kal qowel di meheiman hu vekhal shalu ushekhitah la hishtekhakhat ‘alohi. 
daniel 6:5	’edayin guwraya ’ilekh ’amerin di la nehashkakh ledaniyel denah kal ‘ila lahen hashkakhnah ‘alohi bedat ’elaheh. 
daniel 6:6	’edayin sarekhaya va’akhashdarpenaya ’ilen hargishu ‘al malka vekhen ’amerin leh dareyavesh malka le‘alemin kheyi. 
daniel 6:7	’itya‘atu kol sarekhei malkhuta signaya va’akhashdarpenaya hadaweraya ufakhavata leqayamah qeyam malka uletaqafah ’esar di khal di yiw‘eh wa‘u min kal ’elah ve’enash ‘ad yomin telatin lahen minakh malka yitremei legow ’aryavata. 
daniel 6:8	ke‘an malka teqim ’esara vetirshum ketawa di la lehashnayah kedat madai ufaras di la te‘dei. 
daniel 6:9	kal qowel denah malka dareyavesh resham ketawa ve’esara. 
daniel 6:10	vedaniyel kedi yeda‘ di reshim ketawa ‘al lewayteh vekhavin petikhan leh be‘iliteh neged yerushelem vezimnin telatah weyoma hu barekh ‘al birkhohi umetsalei umodei qodam ’elaheh kal qowel di hava ‘awed min qadmat denah. 
daniel 6:11	’edayin guwraya ’ilekh hargishu vehashkakhu ledaniyel ba‘ei umitkhanan qodam ’elaheh. 
daniel 6:12	beidayin qeriwu ve’amerin qodam malka ‘al ’esar malka hala ’esar reshamta di khal ’enash di yiw‘eh min kal ’elah ve’enash ‘ad yomin telatin lahen minakh malka yitremei legow ’aryavta ‘aneh malka ve’amar yatsiwa mileta kedat madai ufaras di la te‘dei. 
daniel 6:13	beidayin ‘ano ve’amerin qodam malka di daniyel di min benei galuta di yehud la sam ‘alayikh ‘alakh malka te‘em ve‘al ’esara di reshamta vezimnin telatah beyoma ba‘ei ba‘uteh. 
daniel 6:14	’edayin malka kedi mileta shema‘ sagi be’esh ‘alohi ve‘al daniyel sam bal lesheizawuteh ve‘ad me‘alei shimsha hava mishtadar lehatsaluteh. 
daniel 6:15	beidayin guwraya ’ilekh hargishu ‘al malka ve’amerin lemalka da‘ malka di dat lemadai ufaras di khal ’esar uqeyam di malka yehaqem la lehashnayah. 
daniel 6:16	beidayin malka ’amar vehaytiv ledaniyel uremo leguba di ’aryavata ‘aneh malka ve’amar ledaniyel ’elahakh di ’antah ’ant palakh leh bitdira hu yesheizewinakh. 
daniel 6:17	veheitayit ’ewen khadah vesumat ‘al pum guba vekhatmah malka be‘izqeteh uwe‘izqat rawrewanohi di la tishnei tsewu bedaniyel. 
daniel 6:18	’edayin ’azal malka leheikheleh uwat tevat vedakhavan la han‘el qadamohi veshinteh nadat ‘alohi. 
daniel 6:19	beidayin malka bishparpara yequm benageha uwehitbehalah leguba di ’aryavata ’azal. 
daniel 6:20	ukhemiqreweh leguba ledaniyel beqal ‘atsiw ze‘iq ‘aneh malka ve’amar ledaniyel daniyel ‘awed ’elaha khaya ’elahakh di ’antah ’ant palakh leh bitdira haykhil lesheizawutakh min ’aryavata. 
daniel 6:21	’edayin daniyel ‘im malka malil malka le‘alemin kheyi. 
daniel 6:22	’elahi shelakh mal’akheh usagar pum ’aryavata vela khabeluni kal qowel di qadamohi zakhu hishtekhakhat li ve’af qadamayikh qadamakh malka khawulah la ‘awdet. 
daniel 6:23	beidayin malka sagi te’ew ‘alohi uledaniyel ’amar lehansaqah min guba vehusaq daniyel min guba vekhal khawal la hishtekhakh beh di heimin beilaheh. 
daniel 6:24	va’amar malka vehaytiv guwraya ’ilekh di ’akhalu qartsohi di daniyel ulegow ’aryavata remo ’inun beneihon unesheihon vela meto le’ar‘it guba ‘ad di shelitu wehon ’aryavata vekhal garmeihon hadiqu. 
daniel 6:25	beidayin dareyavesh malka ketaw lekhal ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya di da’arin dayerin bekhal ’ar‘a shelamekhon yisgei. 
daniel 6:26	min qodamai sim te‘em di bekhal shaletan malkhuti lehevon za’a‘in zaye‘in vedakhalin min qodam ’elaheh di daniyel di hu ’elaha khaya veqayam le‘alemin umalkhuteh di la titkhabal veshaletaneh ‘ad sofa. 
daniel 6:27	mesheiziw umatsil ve‘awed ’atin vetimhin bishmaya uwe’ar‘a di sheiziw ledaniyel min yad ’aryavata. 
daniel 6:28	vedaniyel denah hatslakh bemalkhut dareyavesh uwemalkhut koresh paresaya paresa’ah. 
daniel 7:1	bishnat khadah leweileshatsar melekh bawel daniyel kheilem khazah vekhezvei reisheh ‘al mishkeweh beidayin khelma khetaw resh milin ’amar. 
daniel 7:2	‘aneh daniyel ve’amar khazeh havet bekhezvi ‘im leileya va’aru ’arba‘ rukhei shemaya megikhan leyama raba. 
daniel 7:3	ve’arba‘ kheivan rawrewan saleqan min yama shaneyan da min da. 
daniel 7:4	qadmayeta khe’aryeh vegapin di neshar lah khazeh havet ‘ad di meritu gapayh unetilat min ’ar‘a ve‘al raglayin ke’enash hoqimat ulewaw ’enash yehiw lah. 
daniel 7:5	va’aru kheivah ’akhori tinyanah dameyah ledow velistar khad hoqimat utelat ‘il‘in befumah ben shinayah shinah vekhen ’amerin lah qumi ’akhuli besar sagi. 
daniel 7:6	batar denah khazeh havet va’aru ’akhori kinmar velah gapin ’arba‘ di ‘of ‘al gabayah gabah ve’arbe‘ah reishin lekheiveta veshaletan yehiw lah. 
daniel 7:7	batar denah khazeh havet bekhezvei leileya va’aru kheivah rewi‘ayah rewi‘a’ah dekhilah ve’eimetani vetaqifa yatira veshinayin di farzel lah rawrewan ’akhelah umadeqah ushe’ara beraglayah beraglah rafesah vehi meshaneyah min kal kheivata di qadamayh veqarnayin ‘asar lah. 
daniel 7:8	mistakal havet beqarnaya va’alu qeren ’akhori ze‘eirah silqat beineihon beineihen utelat min qarnaya qadmayata ’et‘aqaru ’et‘aqarah min qodamayah qodamah va’alu ‘aynin ke‘aynei ’anasha beqarna da ufum memalil rawrewan. 
daniel 7:9	khazeh havet ‘ad di kharesavan remiv ve‘atiq yomin yetiw lewusheh kitlag khivar use‘ar reisheh ka‘amar neqei kareseyeh shewiwin di nur galgilohi nur daliq. 
daniel 7:10	nehar di nur naged venafeq min qodamohi ’elef ’alfayim ’alfin yeshameshuneh veribo rabevan riwwan qadamohi yequmun dina yetiw vesifrin petikhu. 
daniel 7:11	khazeh havet beidayin min qal milaya rawrewata di qarna memalelah khazeh havet ‘ad di qetilat kheiveta vehuwad gishmah vihiwat liqeidat ’esha. 
daniel 7:12	ushe’ar kheivata he‘div shaletanehon ve’arkhah wekhayin yehiwat lehon ‘ad zeman ve‘idan. 
daniel 7:13	khazeh havet bekhezvei leileya va’aru ‘im ‘ananei shemaya kewar ’enash ’ateh havah ve‘ad ‘atiq yomaya metah uqedamohi haqrewuhi. 
daniel 7:14	veleh yehiw shaletan viqar umalkhu vekhol ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya leh yiflekhun shaletaneh shaletan ‘alam di la ye‘deh umalkhuteh di la titkhabal. 
daniel 7:15	’etkeriyat rukhi ’anah daniyel bego nidneh vekhezvei reishi yewahalunani. 
daniel 7:16	qirwet ‘al khad min qa’amaya veyatsiwa ’ew‘ei mineh ‘al kal denah va’amar li ufeshar milaya yehod‘inani. 
daniel 7:17	’ilen kheivata rawrewata di ’inin ’arba‘ ’arbe‘ah malkhin yequmun min ’ar‘a. 
daniel 7:18	viqabelun malkhuta qadishei ‘elyonin veyakhsenun malkhuta ‘ad ‘alema ve‘ad ‘alam ‘alemaya. 
daniel 7:19	’edayin tsewit leyatsawa ‘al kheiveta rewi‘ayeta di havat shaneyah min kalehon kalehen dekhilah yatirah shinayah shinah di farzel vetifrayh di nekhash ’akhelah madaqah ushe’ara beraglayh rafesah. 
daniel 7:20	ve‘al qarnaya ‘asar di wereishah ve’akhori di silqat unefalu unefalah min qodamayah qodamah telat veqarna diken ve‘aynin lah vefum memalil rawrewan vekhezvah raw min khawratah. 
daniel 7:21	khazeh havet veqarna diken ‘awedah qeraw ‘im qadishin veyakhelah lehon. 
daniel 7:22	‘ad di ’atah ‘atiq yomaya vedina yehiw leqadishei ‘elyonin vezimna metah umalkhuta hekhesinu qadishin. 
daniel 7:23	ken ’amar kheiveta rewi‘ayeta malkhu rewi‘aya rewi‘a’ah tehevei we’ar‘a di tishnei min kal malkhevata veteikhul kal ’ar‘a utedushinah vetadeqinah. 
daniel 7:24	veqarnaya ‘asar minah malkhutah ‘asrah malkhin yequmun ve’akhoran yequm ’akhareihon vehu yishnei min qadmayei utelatah malkhin yehashpil. 
daniel 7:25	umilin letsad ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah yemalil uleqadishei ‘elyonin yewalei veyisbar lehashnayah zimnin vedat veyityahawun bideh ‘ad ‘idan ve‘idanin ufelag ‘idan. 
daniel 7:26	vedina yitiw veshaletaneh yeha‘don lehashmadah ulehowadah ‘ad sofa. 
daniel 7:27	umalkhutah veshaletana urewuta di malkhevat tekhot kal shemaya yehiwat le‘am qadishei ‘elyonin malkhuteh malkhut ‘alam vekhol shaletanaya leh yiflekhun veyishtame‘un. 
daniel 7:28	‘ad kah sofa di mileta ’anah daniyel sagi ra‘yonai yewahalunani vezivai yishtanon ‘alai umileta belibi nitret. 
daniel 8:1	bishnat shalosh lemalkhut beileshatsar hamelekh khazon nir’ah ’eilai ’ani daniyel ’akharei hanir’ah ’eilai batekhilah. 
daniel 8:2	va’er’eh bekhazon vayhi bir’oti va’ani beshushan habirah ’asher be‘eilam hamedinah va’er’eh bekhazon va’ani hayiti ‘al ’uwal ’ulai. 
daniel 8:3	va’esa ‘einai va’er’eh vehineh ’ayil ’ekhad ‘omed lifnei ha’uwal velo qeranayim vehaqeranayim gewohot veha’akhat gewohah min hasheinit vehagewohah ‘olah ba’akharonah. 
daniel 8:4	ra’iti ’et ha’ayil menageiakh yamah vetsafonah vanegbah vekhal khayot lo ya‘amdu lefanav ve’en matsil miyado ve‘asah khirtsono vehigdil. 
daniel 8:5	va’ani hayiti meiwin vehineh tsefir ha‘izim ba min hama‘araw ‘al penei khal ha’arets ve’en nogeia‘ ba’arets vehatsafir qeren khazut ben ‘einav. 
daniel 8:6	vayawo ‘ad ha’ayil ba‘al haqeranayim ’asher ra’iti ‘omed lifnei ha’uwal vayarats ’eilav bakhamat kokho. 
daniel 8:7	ure’itiv magia‘ ’eitsel ha’ayil vayitmarmar ’eilav vayakh ’et ha’ayil vayshaber ’et shetei qeranav velo hayah khoakh ba’ayil la‘amod lefanav vayashlikheihu ’artsah vayirmeseihu velo hayah matsil la’ayil miyado. 
daniel 8:8	utsefir ha‘izim higdil ‘ad me’od ukhe‘atsemo nishberah haqeren hagedolah vata‘alenah khazut ’arba‘ takhteha le’arba‘ rukhot hashamayim. 
daniel 8:9	umin ha’akhat meihem yatsa qeren ’akhat mitse‘irah vatigdal yeter ’el hanegew ve’el hamizrakh ve’el hatsewi. 
daniel 8:10	vatigdal ‘ad tsewa hashamayim vatapel ’artsah min hatsawa umin hakokhawim vatirmesem. 
daniel 8:11	ve‘ad sar hatsawa higdil umimenu heirim huram hatamid vehushlakh mekhon miqdasho. 
daniel 8:12	vetsawa tinaten ‘al hatamid befasha‘ vetashlekh ’emet ’artsah ve‘asetah vehitslikhah. 
daniel 8:13	va’eshme‘ah ’ekhad qadosh medaber vayomer ’ekhad qadosh lapalmoni hamdaber ‘ad matai hekhazon hatamid vehapesha‘ shomem tet veqodesh vetsawa mirmas. 
daniel 8:14	vayomer ’eilai ‘ad ‘erew boqer ’alpayim ushelosh mei’ot venitsdaq qodesh. 
daniel 8:15	vayhi bir’oti ’ani daniyel ’et hekhazon va’awaqshah winah vehineh ‘omed lenegdi kemar’eh gawer. 
daniel 8:16	va’eshma‘ qol ’adam ben ’ulai vayiqra vayomar gawri’el hawen lehalaz ’et hamar’eh. 
daniel 8:17	vayawo ’eitsel ‘amedi uwewo’o niw‘ati va’epelah ‘al panai vayomer ’eilai hawen ben ’adam ki le‘et qets hekhazon. 
daniel 8:18	uwedabero ‘imi nirdamti ‘al panai ’aretsah vayiga‘ bi vaya‘amideini ‘al ‘amedi. 
daniel 8:19	vayomer hini modi‘akha ’et ’asher yihyeh be’akharit haza‘am ki lemo‘ed qets. 
daniel 8:20	ha’ayil ’asher ra’ita ba‘al haqeranayim malkhei madai ufaras. 
daniel 8:21	vehatsafir hasa‘ir melekh yavan vehaqeren hagedolah ’asher ben ‘einav hu hamelekh harishon. 
daniel 8:22	vehanishberet vata‘amodenah ’arba‘ takhteha ’arba‘ malkhuyot migo ya‘amodenah velo wekhokho. 
daniel 8:23	uwe’akharit malkhutam kehatem haposhe‘im ya‘amod melekh ‘az panim umeiwin khidot. 
daniel 8:24	ve‘atsam kokho velo wekhokho venifla’ot yashkhit vehitsliakh ve‘asah vehishkhit ‘atsumim ve‘am qedoshim. 
daniel 8:25	ve‘al sikhlo vehitsliakh mirmah beyado uwilwawo yagdil uweshalvah yashkhit rabim ve‘al sar sarim ya‘amod uwe’efes yad yishawer. 
daniel 8:26	umar’eh ha‘erew vehaboqer ’asher ne’emar ’emet hu ve’atah setom hekhazon ki leyamim rabim. 
daniel 8:27	va’ani daniyel nihyeiti venekheleiti yamim va’aqum va’e‘eseh ’et melekhet hamelekh va’eshtomem ‘al hamar’eh ve’en meiwin. 
daniel 9:1	bishnat ’akhat ledareyavesh ben ’akhashveirosh mizera‘ madai ’asher hamelakh ‘al malkhut kasdim. 
daniel 9:2	bishnat ’akhat lemalekho ’ani daniyel binoti basefarim mispar hashanim ’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’el yirmiyah hanawi lemalot lekharewot yerushalim shiw‘im shanah. 
daniel 9:3	va’etenah ’et panai ’el ’adonai ha’elohim lewaqesh tefilah vetakhanunim betsom vesaq va’eifer. 
daniel 9:4	va’etpalah yhoh ’elohai va’etvadeh va’omerah ’ana ’adonai ha’el hagadol vehanora shomer haberit vehakhesed le’ohawav uleshomerei mitsvotav. 
daniel 9:5	khatanu ve‘avinu vehirsha‘nu hirsha‘nu umaradenu vesor mimitsvotekha umimishpatekha. 
daniel 9:6	velo shama‘nu ’el ‘awadekha hanewi’im ’asher diberu beshimkha ’el melakheinu sareinu va’awoteinu ve’el kal ‘am ha’arets. 
daniel 9:7	lekha ’adonai hatsedaqah velanu boshet hapanim kayom hazeh le’ish yehudah uleyoshewei yerushalim ulekhal yisra’el haqerowim veharekhoqim bekhal ha’aratsot ’asher hidakhtam sham bema‘alam ’asher ma‘alu wakh. 
daniel 9:8	yhoh lanu boshet hapanim limlakheinu lesareinu vela’awoteinu ’asher khatanu lakh. 
daniel 9:9	ladonai ’eloheinu harakhamim vehaselikhot ki maradnu bo. 
daniel 9:10	velo shama‘nu beqol yhoh ’eloheinu lalekhet betorotav ’asher natan lefaneinu beyad ‘awadav hanewi’im. 
daniel 9:11	vekhal yisra’el ‘aweru ’et toratekha vesor lewilti shemoa‘ beqolekha vatitakh ‘aleinu ha’alah vehashewu‘ah ’asher ketuwah betorat mosheh ‘ewed ha’elohim ki khatanu lo. 
daniel 9:12	vayaqem ’et dewarav dewaro ’asher diber ‘aleinu ve‘al shofeteinu ’asher shefatunu lehawi ‘aleinu ra‘ah gedolah ’asher lo ne‘estah takhat kal hashamayim ka’asher ne‘estah birushalim. 
daniel 9:13	ka’asher katuw betorat mosheh ’et kal hara‘ah hazot ba’ah ‘aleinu velo khilinu ’et penei yhoh ’eloheinu lashuw mei‘avoneinu ulehaskil ba’amitekha. 
daniel 9:14	vayishqod yhoh ‘al hara‘ah vaywi’eha ‘aleinu ki tsadiq yhoh ’eloheinu ‘al kal ma‘asav ’asher ‘asah velo shama‘nu beqolo. 
daniel 9:15	ve‘atah ’adonai ’eloheinu ’asher hotseita ’et ‘amekha mei’erets mitsrayim beyad khazaqah vata‘as lekha shem kayom hazeh khatanu rasha‘enu. 
daniel 9:16	’adonai kekhal tsidqotekha yashaw na ’apekha vakhamatekha mei‘irekha yerushalim har qadshekha ki wakhata’einu uwa‘avonot ’awoteinu yerushalim ve‘amekha lekherpah lekhal sewiwoteinu. 
daniel 9:17	ve‘atah shema‘ ’eloheinu ’el tefilat ‘awdekha ve’el takhanunav veha’er panekha ‘al miqdashekha hashamem lema‘an ’adonai. 
daniel 9:18	hateh ’elohai ’azenekha ushama‘ piqkhah peqakh ‘einekha ure’eh shomemoteinu veha‘ir ’asher niqra shimkha ‘aleha ki lo ‘al tsidqoteinu ’anakhnu mapilim takhanuneinu lefanekha ki ‘al rakhamekha harabim. 
daniel 9:19	’adonai shema‘ah ’adonai selakhah ’adonai haqashiwah va‘aseh ’al te’akhar lema‘ankha ’elohai ki shimkha niqra ‘al ‘irekha ve‘al ‘amekha. 
daniel 9:20	ve‘od ’ani medaber umitpalel umitvadeh khatati vekhatat ‘ami yisra’el umapil tekhinati lifnei yhoh ’elohai ‘al har qodesh ’elohai. 
daniel 9:21	ve‘od ’ani medaber batefilah veha’ish gawri’el ’asher ra’iti wekhazon batekhilah mu‘af bi‘af nogeia‘ ’eilai ke‘et minkhat ‘arew. 
daniel 9:22	vayawen vaydaber ‘imi vayomar daniyel ‘atah yatsati lehaskilekha winah. 
daniel 9:23	bitkhilat takhanunekha yatsa dawar va’ani bati lehagid ki khamudot ’atah uwin badawar vehawen bamar’eh. 
daniel 9:24	shawu‘im shiw‘im nekhtakh ‘al ‘amekha ve‘al ‘ir qadshekha lekhalei hapesha‘ ulakhtom ulehatem khata’ot khatat ulekhaper ‘avon ulehawi tsedeq ‘olamim velakhtom khazon venawi velimshoakh qodesh qadashim. 
daniel 9:25	veteida‘ vetaskel min motsa dawar lehashiw veliwnot yerushalim ‘ad mashiakh nagid shawu‘im shiw‘ah veshawu‘im shishim ushenayim tashuw veniwnetah rekhow vekharuts uwetsoq ha‘itim. 
daniel 9:26	ve’akharei hashawu‘im shishim ushenayim yikaret mashiakh ve’en lo veha‘ir vehaqodesh yashkhit ‘am nagid haba veqitso washetef ve‘ad qets milkhamah nekheretset shomeimot. 
daniel 9:27	vehigbir berit larabim shawua‘ ’ekhad vakhatsi hashawua‘ yashbit zewakh uminkhah ve‘al kenaf shiqutsim meshomem ve‘ad kalah venekheratsah titakh ‘al shomem. 
daniel 10:1	bishnat shalosh lekhoresh melekh paras dawar niglah ledaniyel ’asher niqra shemo beileteshatsar ve’emet hadawar vetsawa gadol uwin ’et hadawar uwinah lo bamar’eh. 
daniel 10:2	bayamim hahem ’ani daniyel hayiti mit’abel sheloshah shawu‘im yamim. 
daniel 10:3	lekhem khamudot lo ’akhalti uwasar vayayin lo wa ’el pi vesokh lo sakheti ‘ad melot sheloshet shawu‘im yamim. 
daniel 10:4	uweyom ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah lakhodesh harishon va’ani hayiti ‘al yad hanahar hagadol hu khidaqel. 
daniel 10:5	va’esa ’et ‘einai va’eire vehineh ’ish ’ekhad lawush badim umatenav khagurim bekhetem ’ufaz. 
daniel 10:6	ugeviyato khetarshish ufanav kemar’eh waraq ve‘einav kelapidei ’esh uzero‘otav umargelotav ke‘en nekhoshet qalal veqol dewarav keqol hamon. 
daniel 10:7	vera’iti ’ani daniyel lewadi ’et hamar’ah veha’anashim ’asher hayu ‘imi lo ra’u ’et hamar’ah ’awal kharadah gedolah nafelah ‘aleihem vayiwrekhu beheikhawei. 
daniel 10:8	va’ani nish’arti lewadi va’er’eh ’et hamar’ah hagedolah hazot velo nish’ar bi kokh vehodi nehpakh ‘alai lemashkhit velo ‘atsarti koakh. 
daniel 10:9	va’eshma‘ ’et qol dewarav ukheshame‘i ’et qol dewarav va’ani hayiti nirdam ‘al panai ufanai ’aretsah. 
daniel 10:10	vehineh yad nage‘ah bi vateni‘eini ‘al birkai vekhapot yadai. 
daniel 10:11	vayomer ’eilai daniyel ’ish khamudot hawen badewarim ’asher ’anokhi dower ’eilekha va‘amod ‘al ‘amedekha ki ‘atah shulakhti ’eilekha uwedabero ‘imi ’et hadawar hazeh ‘amadti mar‘id. 
daniel 10:12	vayomer ’eilai ’al tira daniyel ki min hayom harishon ’asher natata ’et libekha lehawin ulehit‘anot lifnei ’elohekha nishme‘u dewarekha va’ani wati bidwarekha. 
daniel 10:13	vesar malkhut paras ‘omed lenegdi ‘esrim ve’ekhad yom vehineh mikha’el ’akhad hasarim harishonim ba le‘azereini va’ani notarti sham ’eitsel malkhei faras. 
daniel 10:14	uwati lahawinekha ’et ’asher yiqrah le‘amekha be’akharit hayamim ki ‘od khazon layamim. 
daniel 10:15	uwedabero ‘imi kadewarim ha’eleh natati fanai ’artsah vene’elameti. 
daniel 10:16	vehineh kidmut benei ’adam nogeia‘ ‘al sefatai va’eftakh pi va’adaberah va’omerah ’el ha‘omed lenegdi ’adoni bamar’ah nehefkhu tsirai ‘alai velo ‘atsarti koakh. 
daniel 10:17	vehekh yukhal ‘ewed ’adoni zeh ledaber ‘im ’adoni zeh va’ani mei‘atah lo ya‘amad bi khoakh uneshamah lo nish’arah wi. 
daniel 10:18	vayosef vayiga‘ bi kemar’eh ’adam vaykhazeqeini. 
daniel 10:19	vayomer ’al tira ’ish khamudot shalom lakh khazaq vakhazaq ukhedabero ‘imi hitkhazaqti va’omerah yedaber ’adoni ki khizaqtani. 
daniel 10:20	vayomer hayada‘ta lamah bati ’eilekha ve‘atah ’ashuw lehilakhem ‘im sar paras va’ani yotsei vehineh sar yavan ba. 
daniel 10:21	’awal ’agid lekha ’et harashum bikhtaw ’emet ve’en ’ekhad mitkhazeq ‘imi ‘al ’eleh ki ’im mikha’el sarkhem. 
daniel 11:1	va’ani bishnat ’akhat ledareyavesh hamadi ‘amedi lemakhaziq ulema‘oz lo. 
daniel 11:2	ve‘atah ’emet ’agid lakh hineh ‘od sheloshah melakhim ‘omedim lefaras veharewi‘i ya‘ashir ‘osher gadol mikol ukhekhezqato we‘ashero ya‘ir hakol ’et malkhut yavan. 
daniel 11:3	ve‘amad melekh gibor umashal mimshal raw ve‘asah kirtsono. 
daniel 11:4	ukhe‘amedo tishawer malkhuto veteikhats le’arba‘ rukhot hashamayim velo le’akharito velo khemashelo ’asher mashal ki tinatesh malkhuto vela’akheirim milewad ’eleh. 
daniel 11:5	veyekhezaq melekh hanegew umin sarav veyekhezaq ‘alav umashal mimshal raw memshalto. 
daniel 11:6	uleqets shanim yitkhabaru uwat melekh hanegew tawo ’el melekh hatsafon la‘asot meisharim velo ta‘tsor koakh hazeroa‘ velo ya‘amod uzero‘o vetinaten hi umewi’eha vehayoledah umakhaziqah ba‘itim. 
daniel 11:7	ve‘amad mineitser sharasheha kano veyawo ’el hakhayil veyawo bema‘oz melekh hatsafon ve‘asah wahem vehekheziq. 
daniel 11:8	vegam ’eloheihem ‘im nesikheihem ‘im kelei khemdatam kesef vezahaw bashewi yawi mitsrayim vehu shanim ya‘amod mimelekh hatsafon 
daniel 11:9	uwa bemalkhut melekh hanegew veshaw ’el ’admato. 
daniel 11:10	uweno uwanav yitgaru ve’asefu hamon khayalim rabim uwa wo veshataf ve‘awar veyashow veyitgaru veyitgareh ‘ad ma‘uzah ma‘uzo. 
daniel 11:11	veyitmarmar melekh hanegew veyatsa venilkham ‘imo ‘im melekh hatsafon vehe‘emid hamon raw venitan hehamon beyado. 
daniel 11:12	venisa hehamon yarum veram lewawo vehipil ribo’ot velo ya‘oz. 
daniel 11:13	veshaw melekh hatsafon vehe‘emid hamon raw min harishon uleqets ha‘itim shanim yawo wo bekhayil gadol uwirkhush raw. 
daniel 11:14	uwa‘itim hahem rabim ya‘amdu ‘al melekh hanegew uwenei paritsei ‘amekha yinase’u leha‘amid khazon venikhshalu. 
daniel 11:15	veyawo melekh hatsafon veyishpokh solalah velakhad ‘ir miwtsarot uzero‘ot hanegew lo ya‘amodu ve‘am miwkharav ve’en koakh la‘amod. 
daniel 11:16	veya‘as haba ’eilav kirtsono ve’en ‘omed lefanav veya‘amod be’erets hatsewi vekhalah weyado. 
daniel 11:17	veyasem panav lawo betoqef kal malkhuto visharim ‘imo ve‘asah uwat hanashim yiten lo lehashkhitah velo ta‘amod velo lo tihyeh. 
daniel 11:18	veyashew veyasem panav le’iyim velakhad rabim vehishbit qatsin kherpato lo bilti kherpato yashiw lo. 
daniel 11:19	veyashew panav lema‘uzei ’artso venikhshal venafal velo yimatsei. 
daniel 11:20	ve‘amad ‘al kano ma‘awir noges heder malkhut uweyamim ’akhadim yishawer velo we’apayim velo wemilkhamah. 
daniel 11:21	ve‘amad ‘al kano niwzeh velo natenu ‘alav hod malkhut uwa weshalvah vehekheziq malkhut bakhalaqlaqot. 
daniel 11:22	uzero‘ot hashetef yishatefu milefanav veyishaweiru vegam negid berit. 
daniel 11:23	umin hitkhaberut ’eilav ya‘aseh mirmah ve‘alah ve‘atsam bim‘at go. 
daniel 11:24	beshalvah uwemishmanei medinah yawo ve‘asah ’asher lo ‘asu ’awotav va’awot ’awotav bizah veshalal urekhush lahem yiwzor ve‘al miwtsarim yekhashew makhshewotav ve‘ad ‘et. 
daniel 11:25	veya‘er kokho ulewawo ‘al melekh hanegew bekhayil gadol umelekh hanegew yitgareh lamilkhamah bekhayil gadol ve‘atsum ‘ad me’od velo ya‘amod ki yakhshewu ‘alav makhashawot. 
daniel 11:26	ve’okhelei fat bago yishberuhu vekheilo yishtof venafelu khalalim rabim. 
daniel 11:27	usheneihem hamelakhim lewawam lemeira‘ ve‘al shulkhan ’ekhad kazaw yedabeiru velo titslakh ki ‘od qets lamo‘ed. 
daniel 11:28	veyashow ’artso birkhush gadol ulewawo ‘al berit qodesh ve‘asah veshaw le’artso. 
daniel 11:29	lamo‘ed yashuw uwa wanegew velo tihyeh kharishonah vekha’akharonah. 
daniel 11:30	uwa’u wo tsiyim kitim venikh’ah veshaw veza‘am ‘al berit qodesh ve‘asah veshaw veyawen ‘al ‘ozewei berit qodesh. 
daniel 11:31	uzero‘im mimenu ya‘amodu vekhilelu hamiqdash hama‘oz veheisiru hatamid venatenu hashiquts meshomem. 
daniel 11:32	umarshi‘ei werit yakhanif bakhalaqot ve‘am yode‘ei ’elohav yakhaziqu ve‘asu. 
daniel 11:33	umaskilei ‘am yawinu larabim venikhshelu bekherew uwelehawah bishwi uwewizah yamim. 
daniel 11:34	uwehikashelam yei‘azeru ‘eizer me‘at venilvu ‘aleihem rabim bakhalaqlaqot. 
daniel 11:35	umin hamaskilim yikashelu litsrof bahem ulewarer velalben ‘ad ‘et qets ki ‘od lamo‘ed. 
daniel 11:36	ve‘asah khirtsono hamelekh veyitromem veyitgadel ‘al kal ’el ve‘al ’el ’eilim yedaber nifla’ot vehitsliakh ‘ad kalah za‘am ki nekheratsah ne‘esatah. 
daniel 11:37	ve‘al ’elohei ’awotav lo yawin ve‘al khemdat nashim ve‘al kal ’eloah lo yawin ki ‘al kol yitgadal. 
daniel 11:38	vele’eloah ma‘uzim ‘al kano yekhabed vele’eloah ’asher lo yeda‘uhu ’awotav yekhabed bezahaw uwekhesef uwe’ewen yeqarah uwakhamudot. 
daniel 11:39	ve‘asah lemiwtserei ma‘uzim ‘im ’eloah neikhar ’asher hikir yakir yarbeh khawod vehimshilam barabim va’adamah yekhaleq bimkhir. 
daniel 11:40	uwe‘et qets yitnagakh ‘imo melekh hanegew veyista‘er ‘alav melekh hatsafon berekhew uwefarashim uwa’oniyot rabot uwa wa’aratsot veshataf ve‘awar. 
daniel 11:41	uwa be’erets hatsewi verabot yikasheilu ve’eleh yimaletu miyado ’edom umo’aw vereishit benei ‘amon. 
daniel 11:42	veyishlakh yado ba’aratsot ve’erets mitsrayim lo tihyeh lifleitah. 
daniel 11:43	umashal bemikhmanei hazahaw vehakesef uwekhol khamudot mitsrayim veluwim vekhushim bemits‘adav. 
daniel 11:44	ushemu‘ot yewahaluhu mimizrakh umitsafon veyatsa bekheima gedolah lehashmid ulehakharim rabim. 
daniel 11:45	veyita‘ ’ahole ’apadno ben yamim lehar tsewi qodesh uwa ‘ad qitso ve’en ‘ozer lo. 
daniel 12:1	uwa‘et hahi ya‘amod mikha’el hasar hagadol ha‘omed ‘al benei ‘amekha vehayetah ‘et tsarah ’asher lo nihyetah mihyot go ‘ad ha‘et hahi uwa‘et hahi yimalet ‘amekha kal hanimtsa katuw baseifer. 
daniel 12:2	verabim miyesheinei ’admat ‘afar yaqitsu ’eleh lekhayei ‘olam ve’eleh lakharafot ledir’on ‘olam. 
daniel 12:3	vehamaskilim yazhiru kezohar haraqia‘ umatsdiqei harabim kakokhawim le‘olam va‘ed. 
daniel 12:4	ve’atah daniyel setom hadewarim vakhatom haseifer ‘ad ‘et qets yeshotetu rabim vetirbeh hada‘at. 
daniel 12:5	vera’iti ’ani daniyel vehineh shenayim ’akheirim ‘omedim ’ekhad henah lisfat hai’or ve’ekhad henah lisfat hai’or. 
daniel 12:6	vayomer la’ish lewush habadim ’asher mima‘al lemeimei hai’or ‘ad matai qets hapela’ot. 
daniel 12:7	va’eshma‘ ’et ha’ish lewush habadim ’asher mima‘al lemeimei hai’or vayarem yemino usemolo ’el hashamayim vayishawa‘ bekhei ha‘olam ki lemo‘ed mo‘adim vakheitsi ukhekhalot napets yad ‘am qodesh tikhlenah khal ’eleh. 
daniel 12:8	va’ani shama‘ti velo ’awin va’omerah ’adoni mah ’akharit ’eleh. 
daniel 12:9	vayomer lekh daniyel ki setumim vakhatumim hadewarim ‘ad ‘et qets. 
daniel 12:10	yitbararu veyitlabenu veyitsarefu rabim vehirshi‘u resha‘im velo yawinu kal resha‘im vehamaskilim yawinu. 
daniel 12:11	umei‘et husar hatamid velatet shiquts shomem yamim ’elef matayim vetish‘im. 
daniel 12:12	’ashrei hamkhakeh veyagia‘ leyamim ’elef shelosh mei’ot sheloshim vakhamishah. 
daniel 12:13	ve’atah lekh laqets vetanuakh veta‘amod legoralekha leqets hayamin. 
ezra 1:1	uwishnat ’akhat lekhoresh melekh paras likhlot dewar yhoh mipi yirmeyah hei‘ir yhoh ’et ruakh koresh melekh paras vaya‘awer qol bekhal malkhuto vegam bemikhtaw leimor. 
ezra 1:2	koh ’amar koresh melekh paras kol mamlekhot ha’arets natan li yhoh ’elohei hashamayim vehu faqad ‘alai liwnot lo wayit birushalim ’asher bihudah. 
ezra 1:3	mi wakhem mikal ‘amo yehi ’elohav ‘imo veya‘al lirushalim ’asher bihudah veyiwen ’et bet yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hu ha’elohim ’asher birushalim. 
ezra 1:4	vekhal hanish’ar mikal hameqomot ’asher hu gar sham yenase’uhu ’anshei meqomo bekhesef uwezahaw uwirkhush uwiwheimah ‘im hanedawah lewet ha’elohim ’asher birushalim. 
ezra 1:5	vayaqumu rashei ha’awot lihudah uwinyamin vehakohanim vehalviyim lekhol hei‘ir ha’elohim ’et rukho la‘alot liwnot ’et bet yhoh ’asher birushalim. 
ezra 1:6	vekhal sewiwoteihem khizequ wideihem bikhlei khesef bazahaw barekhush uwabeheimah uwamigdanot lewad ‘al kal hitnadew. 
ezra 1:7	vehamelekh koresh hotsi ’et kelei wet yhoh ’asher hotsi newukhadnetsar mirushalim vayitenem bewet ’elohav. 
ezra 1:8	vayotsi’em koresh melekh paras ‘al yad mitredat hagizbar vayisperem lesheishebatsar hanasi lihudah. 
ezra 1:9	ve’eleh misparam ’agartelei zahaw sheloshim ’agartelei khesef ’alef makhalafim tish‘ah ve‘esrim. 
ezra 1:10	keforei zahaw sheloshim keforei khesef mishnim ’arba‘ mei’ot va‘asarah keilim ’akheirim ’alef. 
ezra 1:11	kal keilim lazahaw velakesef khameishet ’alafim ve’arba‘ mei’ot hakol he‘elah sheishebatsar ‘im hei‘alot hagolah mibawel lirushalim. 
ezra 2:1	ve’eleh benei hamedinah ha‘olim mishewi hagolah ’asher heglah newukhadnetsor newukhadnetsar melekh bawel lewawel vayashuwu lirushalim vihudah ’ish le‘iro. 
ezra 2:2	’asher ba’u ‘im zerubawel yeishua‘ nekhemyah serayah re‘eilayah maredokhai bilshan mispar bigvai rekhum ba‘anah mispar ’anshei ‘am yisra’el. 
ezra 2:3	benei far‘osh ’alpayim mei’ah shiw‘im ushenayim. 
ezra 2:4	benei shefatyah shelosh mei’ot shiw‘im ushenayim. 
ezra 2:5	benei ’arakh shewa‘ mei’ot khamishah veshiw‘im. 
ezra 2:6	benei fakhat mo’aw liwnei yeishua‘ yo’aw ’alpayim shemoneh mei’ot ushenem ‘asar. 
ezra 2:7	benei ‘eilam ’elef matayim khamishim ve’arba‘ah. 
ezra 2:8	benei zatu tesha‘ mei’ot ve’arba‘im vakhamishah. 
ezra 2:9	benei zakai shewa‘ mei’ot veshishim. 
ezra 2:10	benei wani shesh mei’ot ’arba‘im ushenayim. 
ezra 2:11	benei weiwai shesh mei’ot ‘esrim usheloshah. 
ezra 2:12	benei ‘azgad ’elef matayim ‘esrim ushenayim. 
ezra 2:13	benei ’adoniqam shesh mei’ot shishim veshishah. 
ezra 2:14	benei wigvai ’alpayim khamishim veshishah. 
ezra 2:15	benei ‘adin ’arba‘ mei’ot khamishim ve’arba‘ah. 
ezra 2:16	benei ’ater likhizqiyah tish‘im ushemonah. 
ezra 2:17	benei weitsai shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim usheloshah. 
ezra 2:18	benei yorah mei’ah ushenem ‘asar. 
ezra 2:19	benei khashum matayim ‘esrim usheloshah. 
ezra 2:20	benei gibar tish‘im vakhamishah. 
ezra 2:21	benei wet lakhem mei’ah ‘esrim usheloshah. 
ezra 2:22	’anshei netofah khamishim veshishah. 
ezra 2:23	’anshei ‘anatot mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah. 
ezra 2:24	benei ‘azmavet ’arba‘im ushenayim. 
ezra 2:25	benei qiryat ‘arim kefirah uwe’eirot shewa‘ mei’ot ve’arba‘im usheloshah. 
ezra 2:26	benei haramah vagawa‘ shesh mei’ot ‘esrim ve’ekhad. 
ezra 2:27	’anshei mikhmas mei’ah ‘esrim ushenayim. 
ezra 2:28	’anshei wet ’el veha‘ai matayim ‘esrim usheloshah. 
ezra 2:29	benei newo khamishim ushenayim. 
ezra 2:30	benei magbish mei’ah khamishim veshishah. 
ezra 2:31	benei ‘eilam ’akher ’elef matayim khamishim ve’arba‘ah. 
ezra 2:32	benei kharim shelosh mei’ot ve‘esrim. 
ezra 2:33	benei lod khadid ve’ono shewa‘ mei’ot ‘esrim vakhamishah. 
ezra 2:34	benei yereikho shelosh mei’ot ’arba‘im vakhamishah. 
ezra 2:35	benei sena’ah sheloshet ’alafim veshesh mei’ot usheloshim. 
ezra 2:36	hakohanim benei yeda‘yah lewet yeishua‘ tesha‘ mei’ot shiw‘im usheloshah. 
ezra 2:37	benei ’imer ’elef khamishim ushenayim. 
ezra 2:38	benei fashkhur ’elef matayim ’arba‘im veshiw‘ah. 
ezra 2:39	benei kharim ’elef veshiw‘ah ‘asar. 
ezra 2:40	halviyim benei yeishua‘ veqadmi’el liwnei hodavyah shiw‘im ve’arba‘ah. 
ezra 2:41	hamshorerim benei ’asaf mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah. 
ezra 2:42	benei hasho‘arim benei shalum benei ’ater benei talmon benei ‘aquw benei khatita benei showai hakol mei’ah sheloshim vetish‘ah. 
ezra 2:43	hanetinim benei tsikha wenei khasufa benei taba‘ot. 
ezra 2:44	benei qeiros benei si‘aha benei fadon. 
ezra 2:45	benei lewanah wenei khagawah benei ‘aquw. 
ezra 2:46	benei khagaw benei shamlai shalmai benei khanan. 
ezra 2:47	benei gidel benei gakhar benei re’ayah. 
ezra 2:48	benei retsin benei neqoda benei gazam. 
ezra 2:49	benei ‘uza wenei faseiakh benei weisai. 
ezra 2:50	benei ’asnah wenei me‘inim me‘unim benei nefisim nefusim. 
ezra 2:51	benei waqbuq benei khaqufa benei kharkhur. 
ezra 2:52	benei watslut benei mekhida benei kharsha. 
ezra 2:53	benei warqos benei sisera benei tamakh. 
ezra 2:54	benei netsiakh benei khatifa. 
ezra 2:55	benei ‘awdei shelomoh benei sotai benei hasoferet benei feruda. 
ezra 2:56	benei ya‘lah wenei darqon benei gidel. 
ezra 2:57	benei shefatyah wenei khatil benei pokheret hatsewayim benei ’ami. 
ezra 2:58	kal hanetinim uwenei ‘awdei shelomoh shelosh mei’ot tish‘im ushenayim. 
ezra 2:59	ve’eleh ha‘olim mitel melakh tel kharsha keruw ’adan ’imer velo yakhelu lehagid bet ’awotam vezar‘am ’im miyisra’el hem. 
ezra 2:60	benei delayah wenei towiyah benei neqoda shesh mei’ot khamishim ushenayim. 
ezra 2:61	umibenei hakohanim benei khowayah benei haqots benei warzilai ’asher laqakh mibenot barzilai hagil‘adi ’ishah vayiqarei ‘al shemam. 
ezra 2:62	’eleh biqshu khetawam hamityakhsim velo nimtsa’u vaygo’alu min hakehunah. 
ezra 2:63	vayomer hatirshata lahem ’asher lo yokhelu miqodesh haqodashim ‘ad ‘amod kohen le’urim uletumim. 
ezra 2:64	kal haqahal ke’ekhad ’arba‘ ribo ’alpayim shelosh mei’ot shishim. 
ezra 2:65	milewad ‘awdeihem ve’amhoteihem ’eleh shiw‘at ’alafim shelosh mei’ot sheloshim veshiw‘ah velahem meshorerim umeshorerot matayim. 
ezra 2:66	suseihem shewa‘ mei’ot sheloshim veshishah pirdeihem matayim ’arba‘im vakhamishah. 
ezra 2:67	gemaleihem ’arba‘ mei’ot sheloshim vakhamishah khamorim sheishet ’alafim shewa‘ mei’ot ve‘esrim. 
ezra 2:68	umeirashei ha’awot bewo’am lewet yhoh ’asher birushalim hitnadewu lewet ha’elohim leha‘amido ‘al mekhono. 
ezra 2:69	kekhokham natenu le’otsar hamelakhah zahaw darkemonim shesh ribot va’elef vekhesef manim khameishet ’alafim vekhatenot kohanim mei’ah. 
ezra 2:70	vayeishewu hakohanim vehalviyim umin ha‘am vehamshorerim vehasho‘arim vehanetinim be‘areihem vekhal yisra’el be‘areihem. 
ezra 3:1	vayiga‘ hakhodesh hashewi‘i uwenei yisra’el be‘arim vayei’asefu ha‘am ke’ish ’ekhad ’el yerushalim. 
ezra 3:2	vayaqam yeishua‘ ben yotsadaq ve’ekhav hakohanim uzerubawel ben she’alti’el ve’ekhav vayiwnu ’et mizbakh ’elohei yisra’el leha‘alot ‘alav ‘olot kakatuw betorat mosheh ’ish ha’elohim. 
ezra 3:3	vayakhinu hamizbeiakh ‘al mekhonotav ki be’eimah ‘aleihem mei‘amei ha’aratsot vaya‘al vaya‘alu ‘alav ‘olot yhoh ‘olot laboqer vela‘arew. 
ezra 3:4	vaya‘asu ’et khag hasukot kakatuw ve‘olat yom beyom bemispar kemishpat dewar yom beyomo. 
ezra 3:5	ve’akhareikhen ‘olat tamid velekhodashim ulekhal mo‘adei yhoh hamqudashim ulekhol mitnadew nedawah yhoh. 
ezra 3:6	miyom ’ekhad lakhodesh hashewi‘i heikhelu leha‘alot ‘olot yhoh veheikhal yhoh lo yusad. 
ezra 3:7	vayitenu khesef lakhotsewim velekharashim uma’akhal umishteh vashemen latsidonim velatsorim lehawi ‘atsei ’arazim min halewanon ’el yam yafo kerishyon koresh melekh paras ‘aleihem. 
ezra 3:8	uwashanah hasheinit lewo’am ’el bet ha’elohim lirushalim bakhodesh hasheini heikhelu zerubawel benosh ’alti’el veyeishua‘ ben yotsadaq ushe’ar ’akheihem hakohanim vehalviyim vekhal haba’im meihashewi yerushalim vaya‘amidu ’et halviyim miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah lenatseiakh ‘al melekhet bet yhoh. 
ezra 3:9	vaya‘amod yeishua‘ banav ve’ekhav qadmi’el uwanav benei yehudah ke’ekhad lenatseiakh ‘al ‘oseh hamelakhah bewet ha’elohim benei kheinadad beneihem va’akheihem halviyim. 
ezra 3:10	veyisedu habonim ’et heikhal yhoh vaya‘amidu hakohanim melubashim bakhatsotserot vehalviyim benei ’asaf bamtsiltayim lehalel ’et yhoh ‘al yedei david melekh yisra’el. 
ezra 3:11	vaya‘anu behalel uwehodot yhoh ki tow ki le‘olam khasdo ‘al yisra’el vekhal ha‘am heiri‘u teru‘ah gedolah wehalel yhoh ‘al husad bet yhoh. 
ezra 3:12	verabim meihakohanim vehalviyim verashei ha’awot hazeqeinim ’asher ra’u ’et habayit harishon beyasedo zeh habayit be‘eineihem bokhim beqol gadol verabim bitru‘ah wesimkhah leharim qol. 
ezra 3:13	ve’en ha‘am makirim qol teru‘at hasimkhah leqol bekhi ha‘am ki ha‘am meri‘im teru‘ah gedolah vehaqol nishma‘ ‘ad lemeirakhoq. 
ezra 4:1	vayishme‘u tsarei yehudah uwinyamin ki wenei hagolah bonim heikhal yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
ezra 4:2	vayigeshu ’el zerubawel ve’el rashei ha’awot vayomeru lahem niwneh ‘imakhem ki khakhem nidrosh leiloheikhem velo velo ’anakhnu zowekhim mimei ’eisar khadon melekh ’ashur hama‘aleh ’otanu poh. 
ezra 4:3	vayomer lahem zerubawel veyeishua‘ ushe’ar rashei ha’awot leyisra’el lo lakhem valanu liwnot bayit leiloheinu ki ’anakhnu yakhad niwneh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ka’asher tsivanu hamelekh koresh melekh paras. 
ezra 4:4	vayhi ‘am ha’arets merapim yedei ‘am yehudah umewalahim umewahalim ’otam liwnot. 
ezra 4:5	vesokherim ‘aleihem yo‘atsim lehafer ‘atsatam kal yemei koresh melekh paras ve‘ad malkhut dareyavesh melekh paras. 
ezra 4:6	uwemalkhut ’akhashveirosh bitkhilat malkhuto katewu sitnah ‘al yoshewei yehudah virushalim. 
ezra 4:7	uwimei ’artakhshasta kataw bishlam mitredat tawe’el ushe’ar kenavoto kenavotav ‘al ’artakhshasta ’artakhshast melekh paras ukhetaw hanishtevan katuw ’aramit umeturgam ’aramit. 
ezra 4:8	rekhum be‘el te‘em veshimshai safera ketawu ’igerah khadah ‘al yerushelem le’artakhshast malka keneima. 
ezra 4:9	’edayin rekhum be‘el te‘em veshimshai safera ushe’ar kenavatehon dinayei va’afarsatkhayei tarpelayei ’afaresayei ’arkevai ’arkevayei wawelayei shushankhayei dihu dehayei ‘eilemayei. 
ezra 4:10	ushe’ar ’umaya di hagli ’asenapar raba veyaqira vehotew himo beqiryah di shamerayin ushe’ar ‘awar naharah ukhe‘enet. 
ezra 4:11	denah parshegen ’igarta di shelakhu ‘alohi ‘al ’artakhshast malka ‘awdayikh ’enash ‘awar naharah ukhe‘enet. 
ezra 4:12	yedia‘ lehevei lemalka di yehudayei di seliqu min levatakh ‘alena ’ato lirushelem qiryeta maradeta uwiyosheta veshuraya  veshuraya ’eshkhelilu shakhlilu  ve’ushaya yakhitu. 
ezra 4:13	ke‘an yedia‘ lehevei lemalka di hen qiryeta dakh titbenei veshurayah yishtakhlelun mindah welo vahalakh la yintenun ve’apetom malkhim tehanziq. 
ezra 4:14	ke‘an kal qowel di melakh heikhela melakhna ve‘arvat malka la ’arikh lana lemekhezei ‘al denah shelakhna vehoda‘na lemalka. 
ezra 4:15	di yewaqar bisfar dakheranaya di ’awahatakh utehashkakh bisfar dakheranaya vetinda‘ di qiryeta dakh qirya marada umehanzeqat malkhin umedinan ve’eshtadur ‘awedin begavah min yomat ‘alema ‘al denah qiryeta dakh hakharewat. 
ezra 4:16	mehod‘in ’anakhnah lemalka di hen qiryeta dakh titbenei veshurayah yishtakhlelun laqowel denah khalaq ba‘awar nahara la ’itai lakh. 
ezra 4:17	pitgama shelakh malka ‘al rekhum be‘el te‘em veshimshai safera ushe’ar kenavatehon di yatewin beshamerayin ushe’ar ‘awar naharah shelam ukhe‘et. 
ezra 4:18	nishtevana di shelakhtun ‘alena mefarash qeri qadamai. 
ezra 4:19	umini sim te‘em uwaqaru vehashkakhu di qiryeta dakh min yomat ‘alema ‘al malkhin mitnase’ah umerad ve’eshtadur mit‘awed bah. 
ezra 4:20	umalkhin taqifin havo ‘al yerushelem veshalitin bekhol ‘awar naharah umidah welo vahalakh mityehew lehon. 
ezra 4:21	ke‘an simu te‘em lewatala guwraya ’ilekh veqiryeta dakh la titbenei ‘ad mini ta‘ma yitesam. 
ezra 4:22	uzehirin hevo shalu leme‘bad ‘al denah lemah yisgei khawala lehanzaqat malkhin. 
ezra 4:23	’edayin min di parshegen nishtevana di ’artakhshasta ’artakhshast malka qeri qodam rekhum veshimshai safera ukhenavatehon ’azalu wiwhilu lirushelem ‘al yehudayei uwatilu himo be’edra‘ vekhayil. 
ezra 4:24	beidayin beteilat ‘awidat bet ’elaha di birushelem vahavat batela ‘ad shenat tarten lemalkhut dareyavesh melekh paras. 
ezra 5:1	vehitnabi khagai newi’ah newiya uzekharyah war ‘ido newi’aya newiyaya ‘al yehudayei di wihud uwirushelem beshum ’elah yisra’el ‘aleihon. 
ezra 5:2	beidayin qamu zerubawel bar she’alti’el veyeishua‘ bar yotsadaq veshariv lemiwnei bet ’elaha di wirushelem ve‘imehon newi’aya newiyaya di ’elaha mesa‘adin lehon 
ezra 5:3	beh zimna ’ata ‘aleihon tatenai pakhat ‘awar naharah ushetar boznai ukhenavatehon vekhen ’amerin lehom man sam lekhom te‘em bayta denah libenei ve’usharna denah leshakhlalah. 
ezra 5:4	’edayin keneima ’amarna lehom man ’inun shemahat guwraya di denah winyana banayin. 
ezra 5:5	ve‘en ’elahahom havat ‘al sawei yehudayei vela watilu himo ‘ad ta‘ma ledareyavesh yehakh ve’edayin yetiwun nishtevana ‘al denah. 
ezra 5:6	parshegen ’igarta di shelakh tatenai pakhat ‘awar naharah ushetar boznai ukhenavateh ’afarsekhayei di ba‘awar naharah ‘al dareyavesh malka. 
ezra 5:7	pitgama shelakhu ‘alohi vekhidnah ketiw begaveh ledareyavesh malka shelama khola. 
ezra 5:8	yedia‘ lehevei lemalka di ’azalna lihud medineta lewet ’elaha raba vehu mitbenei ’ewen gelal ve’a‘ mitesam bekhutlaya va‘awideta dakh ’aseparna mit‘awda umatslakh beyedhom. 
ezra 5:9	’edayin she’eilena lesawaya ’ilekh keneima ’amarna lehom man sam lekhom te‘em bayta denah lemiwneyah ve’usharna denah leshakhlalah. 
ezra 5:10	ve’af shemahatehom she’eilena lehom lehoda‘utakh di nikhtuw shum guwraya di werasheihom. 
ezra 5:11	ukheneima fitgama hatiwuna lemeimar ’anakhna himo ‘awdohi di ’elah shemaya ve’ar‘a uwanayin bayta di hava weneh miqadmat denah shenin sagi’an umelekh leyisra’el raw benahi veshakhleleh. 
ezra 5:12	lahen min di hargizu ’awahotana le’elah shemaya yehaw himo beyad newukhadnetsar melekh bawel kasdaya kasda’ah uwaytah denah satreh ve‘amah hagli lewawel. 
ezra 5:13	beram bishnat khadah lekhoresh malka di wawel koresh malka sam te‘em bet ’elaha denah libenei. 
ezra 5:14	ve’af manaya di wet ’elaha di dahawah vekhaspa di newukhadnetsar hanpeq min heikhela di wirushelem veheiwel himo leheikhela di wawel hanpeq himo koresh malka min heikhela di wawel vihiwu lesheishebatsar shemeh di fekhah sameh. 
ezra 5:15	va’amar leh ’eleh ’el manaya se ’eizel ’akhet himo beheikhela di wirushelem uwet ’elaha yitbenei ‘al ’atreh. 
ezra 5:16	’edayin sheishebatsar dekh ’ata yehaw ’ushaya di wet ’elaha di wirushelem umin ’edayin ve‘ad ke‘an mitbenei vela shelim. 
ezra 5:17	ukhe‘an hen ‘al malka taw yitbaqar bewet ginzaya di malka tamah di bewawel hen ’itai di min koresh malka sim te‘em lemiwnei bet ’elaha dekh birushelem ure‘ut malka ‘al denah yishlakh ‘alena. 
ezra 6:1	beidayin dareyavesh malka sam te‘em uwaqaru bewet sifraya di ginzaya mehakhatin tamah bewawel. 
ezra 6:2	vehishtekhakh be’akhmeta bewireta di bemadai medinetah megilah khadah vekhen ketiw begavah dikhronah. 
ezra 6:3	bishnat khadah lekhoresh malka koresh malka sam te‘em bet ’elaha wirushelem bayta yitbenei ’atar di dawekhin diwkhin ve’ushohi mesowlin rumeh ’amin shitin petayeh ’amin shitin. 
ezra 6:4	nidbakhin di ’ewen gelal telata venidbakh di ’a‘ khadat venifqeta min bet malka tityehiw. 
ezra 6:5	ve’af manei wet ’elaha di dahawah vekhaspa di newukhadnetsar hanpeq min heikhela di wirushelem veheiwel lewawel yahatiwun vihakh leheikhela di wirushelem le’atreh vetakhet bewet ’elaha. 
ezra 6:6	ke‘an tatenai pakhat ‘awar naharah shetar boznai ukhenavatehon ’afarsekhayei di ba‘awar naharah rakhiqin havo min tamah. 
ezra 6:7	shewuqu la‘awidat bet ’elaha dekh pakhat yehudayei ulesawei yehudayei bet ’elaha dekh yiwnon ‘al ’atreh. 
ezra 6:8	umini sim te‘em lema di ta‘awdun ‘im sawei yehudayei ’ilekh lemiwnei bet ’elaha dekh uminikhsei malka di midat ‘awar naharah ’aseparna nifqeta tehevei mityahawa leguwraya ’ilekh di la lewatala. 
ezra 6:9	umah khashkhan uwenei torin vedikhrin ve’imerin la‘alavan le’elah shemaya khintin melakh khamar umeshakh kemeimar kahanaya di wirushelem lehevei mityehew lehom yom beyom di la shalu. 
ezra 6:10	di lehevon mehaqrewin nikhokhin le’elah shemaya umetsalayin lekhayei malka uwenohi. 
ezra 6:11	umini sim te‘em di khal ’enash di yehashnei pitgama denah yitnesakh ’a‘ min bayteh uzeqif yitmekhei ‘alohi uwayteh nevalu yit‘awed ‘al denah. 
ezra 6:12	veilaha di shakin shemeh tamah yemagar kal melekh ve‘am di yishlakh yedeh lehashnayah lekhabalah bet ’elaha dekh di wirushelem ’anah dareyavesh samet te‘em ’aseparna yit‘awid. 
ezra 6:13	’edayin tatenai pakhat ‘awar naharah shetar boznai ukhenavatehon laqowel di shelakh dareyavesh malka keneima ’aseparna ‘awadu. 
ezra 6:14	vesawei yehudayei banayin umatslekhin binwu’at khagai newi’ah newiya uzekharyah bar ‘ido uweno veshakhlilu min ta‘am ’elah yisra’el umite‘em koresh vedareyavesh ve’artakhshast melekh paras. 
ezra 6:15	vesheitsi baytah denah ‘ad yom telatah lirakh ’adar di hi shenat shet lemalkhut dareyavesh malka. 
ezra 6:16	va‘awadu wenei yisra’el kahanaya veleivayei ushe’ar benei galuta khanukat bet ’elaha denah bekhedvah. 
ezra 6:17	vehaqriwu lakhanukat bet ’elaha denah torin me’ah dikhrin matayin ’imerin ’arba‘ me’ah utsefirei ‘izin lekhataya lekhata’ah ‘al kal yisra’el terei ‘asar leminyan shiwtei yisra’el. 
ezra 6:18	vahaqimu khahanaya biflugatehon veleivayei bemakhleqatehon ‘al ‘awidat ’elaha di wirushelem kikhtaw sefar mosheh. 
ezra 6:19	vaya‘asu wenei hagolah ’et hapasakh be’arba‘ah ‘asar lakhodesh harishon. 
ezra 6:20	ki hitaharu hakohanim vehalviyim ke’ekhad kulam tehorim vayishkhatu hapesakh lekhal benei hagolah vela’akheihem hakohanim velahem. 
ezra 6:21	vayokhelu wenei yisra’el hashawim meihagolah vekhol haniwdal mitum’at goyei ha’arets ’aleihem lidrosh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
ezra 6:22	vaya‘asu khag matsot shiw‘at yamim besimkhah ki simekham yhoh veheisew lew melekh ’ashur ‘aleihem lekhazeq yedeihem bimlekhet bet ha’elohim ’elohei yisra’el. 
ezra 7:1	ve’akhar hadewarim ha’eleh bemalkhut ’artakhshast melekh paras ‘ezra ben serayah ben ‘azaryah ben khilqiyah. 
ezra 7:2	ben shalum ben tsadoq ben ’akhituw. 
ezra 7:3	ben ’amaryah wen ‘azaryah ben merayot. 
ezra 7:4	ben zerakhyah wen ‘uzi ben buqi. 
ezra 7:5	ben ’awishua‘ ben pinekhas ben ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen harosh. 
ezra 7:6	hu ‘ezra ‘alah mibawel vehu sofer mahir betorat mosheh ’asher natan yhoh ’elohei yisra’el vayiten lo hamelekh keyad yhoh ’elohav ‘alav kol baqashato. 
ezra 7:7	vaya‘alu mibenei yisra’el umin hakohanim vehalviyim vehamshorerim vehasho‘arim vehanetinim ’el yerushalim bishnat shewa‘ le’artakhshast hamelekh. 
ezra 7:8	vayawo yerushalim bakhodesh hakhamishi hi shenat hashewi‘it lamelekh. 
ezra 7:9	ki be’ekhad lakhodesh harishon hu yesud hama‘alah mibawel uwe’ekhad lakhodesh hakhamishi ba ’el yerushalim keyad ’elohav hatowah ‘alav. 
ezra 7:10	ki ‘ezra heikhin lewawo lidrosh ’et torat yhoh vela‘asot ulelamed beyisra’el khoq umishpat. 
ezra 7:11	vezeh parshegen hanishtevan ’asher natan hamelekh ’artakhshast le‘ezra hakohen hasofer sofer diwrei mitsvot yhoh vekhuqav ‘al yisra’el. 
ezra 7:12	’artakhshast melekh malkhaya le‘ezra khahana safar data di ’elah shemaya gemir ukhe‘enet. 
ezra 7:13	mini sim te‘em di khal mitnadaw bemalkhuti min ‘amah yisra’el vekhahanohi veleivayei limhakh lirushelem ‘imakh yehakh. 
ezra 7:14	kal qowel di min qodam malka veshiw‘at ya‘atohi sheliakh lewaqara ‘al yehud velirushelem bedat ’elahakh di widakh. 
ezra 7:15	uleheiwalah kesaf udehaw di malka veya‘atohi hitnadawu le’elah yisra’el di wirushelem mishkeneh. 
ezra 7:16	vekhol kesaf udehaw di tehashkakh bekhol medinat bawel ‘im hitnadawut ‘ama vekhahanaya mitnadewin lewet ’elahahom di wirushelem. 
ezra 7:17	kal qowel denah ’aseparna tiqnei bekhaspa denah torin dikhrin ’imerin uminkhatehon veniskeihon uteqarew himo ‘al madbekhah di bet ’elahakhom di wirushelem. 
ezra 7:18	umah di ‘alayikh ‘alakh ve‘al ’ekhayikh ’ekhakh yitaw bish’ar kaspa vedahawah leme‘bad kir‘ut ’elahakhom ta‘awdun. 
ezra 7:19	umanaya di mityahawin lakh lefalekhan bet ’elahakh hashlem qodam ’elah yerushelem. 
ezra 7:20	ushe’ar khashkhut bet ’elahakh di yipel lakh lemintan tinten min bet ginzei malka. 
ezra 7:21	umini ’anah ’artakhshast malka sim te‘em lekhol gizawraya di ba‘awar naharah di khal di yish’alenkhon ‘ezra khahanah safar data di ’elah shemaya ’aseparna yit‘awid. 
ezra 7:22	‘ad kesaf kakerin me’ah ve‘ad khintin korin me’ah ve‘ad khamar batin me’ah ve‘ad batin meshakh me’ah umelakh di la khetaw. 
ezra 7:23	kal di min ta‘am ’elah shemaya yit‘awed ’adrazda lewet ’elah shemaya di lemah lehevei qetsaf ‘al malkhut malka uwenohi. 
ezra 7:24	ulekhom mehod‘in di khal kahanaya veleivayei zamaraya tara‘aya netinaya ufalekhei bet ’elaha denah mindah welo vahalakh la shalit lemirmei ‘aleihom. 
ezra 7:25	ve’ant ‘ezra kekhakhemat ’elahakh di widakh meni shafetin vedayanin di lehevon da’anin dayenin lekhal ‘amah di ba‘awar naharah lekhal yade‘ei datei ’elahakh vedi la yada‘ tehod‘un. 
ezra 7:26	vekhal di la lehevei ‘awed data di ’elahakh vedata di malka ’aseparna dinah lehevei mit‘awed mineh hen lemot hen lishroshu lishroshi hen la‘anash nikhsin vele’esurin. 
ezra 7:27	barukh yhoh ’elohei ’awoteinu ’asher natan kazot belew hamelekh lefa’er ’et bet yhoh ’asher birushalim. 
ezra 7:28	ve‘alai hitah khesed lifnei hamelekh veyo‘atsav ulekhal sarei hamelekh hagiborim va’ani hitkhazaqti keyad yhoh ’elohai ‘alai va’eqbetsah miyisra’el rashim la‘alot ‘imi. 
ezra 8:1	ve’eleh rashei ’awoteihem vehityakhsam ha‘olim ‘imi bemalkhut ’artakhshast hamelekh mibawel. 
ezra 8:2	mibenei finekhas geireshom mibenei ’itamar daniyel mibenei david khatush. 
ezra 8:3	mibenei shekhanyah mibenei far‘osh zekharyah ve‘imo hityakhes lizkharim mei’ah vakhamishim. 
ezra 8:4	mibenei pakhat mo’aw ’elyeho‘einai ben zerakhyah ve‘imo matayim hazekharim. 
ezra 8:5	mibenei shekhanyah ben yakhazi’el ve‘imo shelosh mei’ot hazekharim. 
ezra 8:6	umibenei ‘adin ‘ewed ben yonatan ve‘imo khamishim hazekharim. 
ezra 8:7	umibenei ‘eilam yesha‘yah ben ‘atalyah ve‘imo shiw‘im hazekharim. 
ezra 8:8	umibenei shefatyah zewadyah ben mikha’el ve‘imo shemonim hazekharim. 
ezra 8:9	mibenei yo’aw ‘owadyah ben yekhi’el ve‘imo matayim ushemonah ‘asar hazekharim. 
ezra 8:10	umibenei shelomit ben yosifyah ve‘imo mei’ah veshishim hazekharim. 
ezra 8:11	umibenei weiwai zekharyah ben beiwai ve‘imo ‘esrim ushemonah hazekharim. 
ezra 8:12	umibenei ‘azgad yokhanan ben haqatan ve‘imo mei’ah va‘asarah hazekharim. 
ezra 8:13	umibenei ’adoniqam ’akharonim ve’eleh shemotam ’elifelet ye‘i’el ushema‘yah ve‘imahem shishim hazekharim. 
ezra 8:14	umibenei wigvai ‘utai vezawud vezakur ve‘imo shiw‘im hazekharim. 
ezra 8:15	va’eqbetsem ’el hanahar haba ’el ’ahava vanakhaneh sham yamim sheloshah va’awinah wa‘am uwakohanim umibenei leivi lo matsati sham. 
ezra 8:16	va’eshlekhah le’eli‘ezer la’ari’el lishma‘yah ule’elnatan uleyariw ule’elnatan ulenatan velizkharyah velimshulam rashim uleyoyariw ule’elnatan mewinim 
ezra 8:17	va’otsi’ah va’atsaveh ’otam ‘al ’ido harosh bekhasifya hamaqom va’asimah befihem dewarim ledaber ’el ’ido ’akhiv hanetunim hanetinim bekhasifya hamaqom lehawi lanu mesharetim lewet ’eloheinu. 
ezra 8:18	vayawi’’u lanu keyad ’eloheinu hatowah ‘aleinu ’ish sekhel mibenei makhli ben leivi ben yisra’el vesheireiweyah uwanav ve’ekhav shemonah ‘asar. 
ezra 8:19	ve’et khashawyah ve’ito yesha‘yah mibenei merari ’ekhav uweneihem ‘esrim. 
ezra 8:20	umin hanetinim shenatan david vehasarim la‘awodat halviyim netinim matayim ve‘esrim kulam niqewu wesheimot. 
ezra 8:21	va’eqra sham tsom ‘al hanahar ’ahava lehit‘anot lifnei ’eloheinu lewaqesh mimenu derekh yesharah lanu uletapeinu ulekhal rekhusheinu. 
ezra 8:22	ki wosheti lish’ol min hamelekh khayil ufarashim le‘azereinu mei’oyew badarekh ki ’amarnu lamelekh leimor yad ’eloheinu ‘al kal mewaqshav letowah ve‘uzo ve’apo ‘al kal ‘ozewav. 
ezra 8:23	vanatsumah vanewaqshah mei’eloheinu ‘al zot vayei‘ater lanu. 
ezra 8:24	va’awdilah misarei hakohanim shenem ‘asar lesheireiweyah khashawyah ve‘imahem mei’akheihem ‘asarah. 
ezra 8:25	va’eshqolah va’eshqolah lahem ’et hakesef ve’et hazahaw ve’et hakeilim terumat bet ’eloheinu haheirimu hamelekh veyo‘atsav vesarav vekhal yisra’el hanimtsa’im. 
ezra 8:26	va’eshqalah ‘al yadam kesef kikarim shesh mei’ot vakhamishim ukhelei khesef mei’ah lekhikarim zahaw mei’ah khikar. 
ezra 8:27	ukheforei zahaw ‘esrim la’adarkhonim ’alef ukhelei nekhoshet mutshaw towah shenayim khamudot kazahaw. 
ezra 8:28	va’omerah ’aleihem ’atem qodesh yhoh vehakeilim qodesh vehakesef vehazahaw nedawah yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem. 
ezra 8:29	shiqdu veshimru ‘ad tishqelu lifnei sarei hakohanim vehalviyim vesarei ha’awot leyisra’el birushalim halishkhot bet yhoh. 
ezra 8:30	veqibelu hakohanim vehalviyim mishqal hakesef vehazahaw vehakeilim lehawi lirushalim lewet ’eloheinu. 
ezra 8:31	vanis‘ah minehar ’ahava bishnem ‘asar lakhodesh harishon lalekhet yerushalim veyad ’eloheinu hayetah ‘aleinu vayatsileinu mikaf ’oyew ve’orew ‘al hadarekh. 
ezra 8:32	vanawo yerushalim vaneishew sham yamim sheloshah. 
ezra 8:33	uwayom harewi‘i nishqal hakesef vehazahaw vehakeilim bewet ’eloheinu ‘al yad mereimot ben ’uriyah hakohen ve‘imo ’el‘azar ben pinekhas ve‘imahem yozawad ben yeishua‘ veno‘adyah wen binui halviyim. 
ezra 8:34	bemispar bemishqal lakol vayikatew kal hamishqal ba‘et hahi. 
ezra 8:35	haba’im meihashewi wenei hagolah hiqriwu ‘olot leilohei yisra’el parim shenem ‘asar ‘al kal yisra’el ’eilim tish‘im veshishah kewasim shiw‘im veshiw‘ah tsefirei khatat shenem ‘asar hakol ‘olah yhoh. 
ezra 8:36	vayitenu ’et datei hamelekh la’akhashdarpenei hamelekh ufakhavot ‘eiwer hanahar venise’u ’et ha‘am ve’et bet ha’elohim. 
ezra 9:1	ukhekhalot ’eleh nigeshu ’eilai hasarim leimor lo niwdelu ha‘am yisra’el vehakohanim vehalviyim mei‘amei ha’aratsot keto‘awoteihem lakena‘ani hakhiti haperizi haywusi ha‘amoni hamo’awi hamitsri veha’emori. 
ezra 9:2	ki nase’u mibenoteihem lahem veliwneihem vehit‘arewu zera‘ haqodesh be‘amei ha’aratsot veyad hasarim vehaseganim hayetah bama‘al hazeh rishonah. 
ezra 9:3	ukheshame‘i ’et hadawar hazeh qara‘ti ’et bigdi ume‘ili va’emretah mise‘ar roshi uzeqani va’eishewah meshomem. 
ezra 9:4	ve’eilai yei’asefu kol khared bediwrei ’elohei yisra’el ‘al ma‘al hagolah va’ani yoshew meshomem ‘ad leminkhat ha‘arew. 
ezra 9:5	uweminkhat ha‘erew qamti mita‘aniti uweqare‘i wigdi ume‘ili va’ekhre‘ah ‘al birkai va’efresah khapai ’el yhoh ’elohai. 
ezra 9:6	va’omerah ’elohai bosheti venikhlamti leharim ’elohai panai ’eilekha ki ‘avonoteinu rawu lema‘lah rosh ve’ashmateinu gadelah ‘ad lashamayim. 
ezra 9:7	mimei ’awoteinu ’anakhnu be’ashmah gedolah ‘ad hayom hazeh uwa‘avonoteinu nitanu ’anakhnu melakheinu khohaneinu beyad malkhei ha’aratsot bakherew bashewi uwabizah uwewoshet panim kehayom hazeh. 
ezra 9:8	ve‘atah kim‘at rega‘ hayetah tekhinah mei’et yhoh ’eloheinu lehash’ir lanu peleitah velatet lanu yated bimqom qadesho leha’ir ‘eineinu ’eloheinu uletiteinu mikhyah me‘at be‘awduteinu. 
ezra 9:9	ki ‘awadim ’anakhnu uwe‘awduteinu lo ‘azawanu ’eloheinu vayat ‘aleinu khesed lifnei malkhei faras latet lanu mikhyah leromem ’et bet ’eloheinu uleha‘amid ’et kharewotav velatet lanu gader bihudah uwirushalim. 
ezra 9:10	ve‘atah mah nomar ’eloheinu ’akharei zot ki ‘azawnu mitsvotekha. 
ezra 9:11	’asher tsivita beyad ‘awadekha hanewi’im leimor ha’arets ’asher ’atem ba’im lerishtah ’erets nidah hi benidat ‘amei ha’aratsot beto‘awoteihem ’asher mil’uha mipeh ’el peh betum’atam. 
ezra 9:12	ve‘atah benoteikhem ’al titenu liwneihem uwenoteihem ’al tis’u liwneikhem velo tidreshu shelomam vetowatam ‘ad ‘olam lema‘an tekhezqu va’akhaltem ’et tuw ha’arets vehorashtem liwneikhem ‘ad ‘olam. 
ezra 9:13	ve’akharei kal haba ‘aleinu bema‘aseinu hara‘im uwe’ashmateinu hagedolah ki ’atah ’eloheinu khasakhta lematah mei‘avoneinu venatatah lanu peleitah kazot. 
ezra 9:14	hanashuw lehafer mitsvotekha ulehitkhaten be‘amei hato‘eiwot ha’eleh halo te’enaf banu ‘ad kaleh le’en she’eirit ufeleitah. 
ezra 9:15	yhoh ’elohei yisra’el tsadiq ’atah ki nish’arnu feleitah kehayom hazeh hinu lefanekha be’ashmateinu ki ’en la‘amod lefanekha ‘al zot. 
ezra 10:1	ukhehitpalel ‘ezra ukhehitvadoto bokheh umitnapel lifnei bet ha’elohim niqbetsu ’eilav miyisra’el qahal raw me’od ’anashim venashim viladim ki wakhu ha‘am harbeh wekheh. 
ezra 10:2	vaya‘an shekhanyah wen yekhi’el mibenei ‘olam ‘eilam vayomer le‘ezra ’anakhnu ma‘alnu weiloheinu vanoshew nashim nakheriyot mei‘amei ha’arets ve‘atah yesh miqveh leyisra’el ‘al zot. 
ezra 10:3	ve‘atah nikhrat berit leiloheinu lehotsi khal nashim vehanolad meihem ba‘atsat ’adonai vehakhareidim bemitsvat ’eloheinu vekhatorah yei‘aseh. 
ezra 10:4	qum ki ‘alekha hadawar va’anakhnu ‘imakh khazaq va‘aseh. 
ezra 10:5	vayaqam ‘ezra vayashba‘ ’et sarei hakohanim halviyim vekhal yisra’el la‘asot kadawar hazeh vayishawei‘u. 
ezra 10:6	vayaqam ‘ezra milifnei bet ha’elohim vayeilekh ’el lishkat yehokhanan ben ’elyashiw vayeilekh sham lekhem lo ’akhal umayim lo shatah ki mit’abel ‘al ma‘al hagolah. 
ezra 10:7	vaya‘awiru qol bihudah virushalim lekhol benei hagolah lehiqawets yerushalim. 
ezra 10:8	vekhol ’asher lo yawo lishloshet hayamim ka‘atsat hasarim vehazeqeinim yakhoram kal rekhusho vehu yibadel miqehal hagolah. 
ezra 10:9	vayiqawetsu khal ’anshei yehudah uwinyamin yerushalim lishloshet hayamim hu khodesh hateshi‘i be‘esrim bakhodesh vayeishewu khal ha‘am birkhow bet ha’elohim mar‘idim ‘al hadawar umeihageshamim. 
ezra 10:10	vayaqam ‘ezra hakohen vayomer ’aleihem ’atem me‘altem vatoshiwu nashim nakheriyot lehosif ‘al ’ashmat yisra’el. 
ezra 10:11	ve‘atah tenu todah yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem va‘asu retsono vehibadelu mei‘amei ha’arets umin hanashim hanakheriyot. 
ezra 10:12	vaya‘nu khal haqahal vayomeru qol gadol ken kediwrekha kidwarekha ‘aleinu la‘asot. 
ezra 10:13	’awal ha‘am raw veha‘et geshamim ve’en koakh la‘amod bakhuts vehamelakhah lo leyom ’ekhad velo lishnayim ki hirbinu lifshoa‘ badawar hazeh. 
ezra 10:14	ya‘amdu na reinu lekhal haqahal vekhol ’asher be‘areinu hahoshiw nashim nakheriyot yawo le‘itim mezumanim ve‘imahem ziqnei ‘ir va‘ir veshofeteha ‘ad lehashiw kharon ’af ’eloheinu mimenu ‘ad ladawar hazeh. 
ezra 10:15	’akh yonatan ben ‘asah’el veyakhzeyah wen tiqvah ‘amedu ‘al zot umeshulam veshabetai haleivi ‘azarum. 
ezra 10:16	vaya‘asu khen benei hagolah vayibadelu ‘ezra hakohen ’anashim rashei ha’awot lewet ’awotam vekhulam besheimot vayeishewu beyom ’ekhad lakhodesh ha‘asiri ledaryosh hadawar. 
ezra 10:17	vaykhalu wakol ’anashim hahoshiwu nashim nakheriyot ‘ad yom ’ekhad lakhodesh harishon. 
ezra 10:18	vayimatsei mibenei hakohanim ’asher hoshiwu nashim nakheriyot mibenei yeishua‘ ben yotsadaq ve’ekhav ma‘aseiyah ve’eli‘ezer veyariw ugedalyah. 
ezra 10:19	vayitenu yadam lehotsi nesheihem va’asheimim ’el tson ‘al ’ashmatam. 
ezra 10:20	umibenei ’imer khanani uzewadyah. 
ezra 10:21	umibenei kharim ma‘aseiyah ve’eiliyah ushema‘yah vikhi’el ve‘uziyah. 
ezra 10:22	umibenei pashkhur ’elyo‘einai ma‘aseiyah yishma‘el netan’el yozawad ve’el‘asah. 
ezra 10:23	umin halviyim yozawad veshim‘i veqeilayah hu qelita petakhyah yehudah ve’eli‘ezer. 
ezra 10:24	umin hamshorerim ’elyashiw umin hasho‘arim shalum vatelem ve’uri. 
ezra 10:25	umiyisra’el mibenei far‘osh ramyah veyiziyah umalkiyah umiyamin ve’el‘azar umalkiyah uwenayah. 
ezra 10:26	umibenei ‘eilam matanyah zekharyah vikhi’el ve‘awdi vireimot ve’eiliyah. 
ezra 10:27	umibenei zatu ’elyo‘einai ’elyashiw matanyah vireimot vezawad va‘aziza. 
ezra 10:28	umibenei beiwai yehokhanan khananyah zabai ‘atlai. 
ezra 10:29	umibenei bani meshulam malukh va‘adayah yashuw ushe’al yereimot veramot. 
ezra 10:30	umibenei pakhat mo’aw ‘adna ukhelal benayah ma‘aseiyah matanyah wetsal’el uwinui umenasheh. 
ezra 10:31	uwenei kharim ’eli‘ezer yishiyah malkiyah shema‘yah shim‘on. 
ezra 10:32	beneyamin malukh shemaryah. 
ezra 10:33	mibenei khashum matenai matatah zawad ’elifelet yereimai menasheh shim‘i. 
ezra 10:34	mibenei wani ma‘adai ‘amram ve’u’el. 
ezra 10:35	benayah weideyah kelahai keluhu. 
ezra 10:36	vanyah mereimot ’elyashiw. 
ezra 10:37	matanyah matenai veya‘aso veya‘asai. 
ezra 10:38	uwani uwinui shim‘i. 
ezra 10:39	veshelemyah venatan va‘adayah. 
ezra 10:40	makhnadwai shashai sharai. 
ezra 10:41	‘azar’el veshelemyahu shemaryah. 
ezra 10:42	shalum ’amaryah yosef. 
ezra 10:43	mibenei newo ye‘i’el matityah zawad zewina yado yadai veyo’el benayah. 
ezra 10:44	kal ’eleh nase’u nase’u nashim nakheriyot veyesh meihem nashim vayasimu banim. 
nehemiah 1:1	diwrei nekhemyah ben khakhalyah vayhi wekhodesh kislev kislev shenat ‘esrim va’ani hayiti beshushan habirah. 
nehemiah 1:2	vayawo khanani ’ekhad mei’akhai hu va’anashim mihudah va’esh’alem ‘al hayehudim hapeleitah ’asher nish’aru min hashewi ve‘al yerushalim. 
nehemiah 1:3	vayomeru li hanish’arim ’asher nish’aru min hashewi sham bamedinah bera‘ah gedolah uwekherpah vekhomat yerushalim meforatset ushe‘areha nitsetu wa’esh. 
nehemiah 1:4	vayhi keshame‘i ’et hadewarim ha’eleh yashawti va’ewkeh va’et’abelah yamim va’ehi tsam umitpalel lifnei ’elohei hashamayim. 
nehemiah 1:5	va’omar ’ana yhoh ’elohei hashamayim ha’el hagadol vehanora shomer haberit vakhesed le’ohawav uleshomerei mitsvotav. 
nehemiah 1:6	tehi na ’azenekha qashewet ve‘einekha fetuvkhot lishmoa‘ ’el tefilat ‘awdekha ’asher ’anokhi mitpalel lefanekha hayom yomam valaylah ‘al benei yisra’el ‘awadekha umitvadeh ‘al khatot benei yisra’el ’asher khatanu lakh va’ani uwet ’awi khatanu. 
nehemiah 1:7	khawol khawalnu lakh velo shamarnu ’et hamitsvot ve’et hakhuqim ve’et hamishpatim ’asher tsivita ’et mosheh ‘awdekha. 
nehemiah 1:8	zekhar na ’et hadawar ’asher tsivita ’et mosheh ‘awdekha leimor ’atem tim‘alu ’ani ’afits ’etkhem ba‘amim. 
nehemiah 1:9	veshawtem ’eilai ushemartem mitsvotai va‘asitem ’otam ’im yihyeh nidakhakhem biqtseh hashamayim misham ’aqabetsem vahawo’otim vahawi’otim ’el hamaqom ’asher bakharti leshaken ’et shemi sham. 
nehemiah 1:10	vehem ‘awadekha ve‘amekha ’asher padita bekhokhakha hagadol uweyadekha hakhazaqah. 
nehemiah 1:11	’ana ’adonai tehi na ’azenekha qashewet ’el tefilat ‘awdekha ve’el tefilat ‘awadekha hakhafeitsim leyir’ah ’et shemekha vehatslikhah na le‘awdekha hayom uteneihu lerakhamim lifnei ha’ish hazeh va’ani hayiti mashqeh lamelekh. 
nehemiah 2:1	vayhi bekhodesh nisan shenat ‘esrim le’artakhshast hamelekh yayin lefanav va’esa ’et hayayin va’etenah lamelekh velo hayiti ra‘ lefanav. 
nehemiah 2:2	vayomer li hamelekh madua‘ panekha ra‘im ve’atah ’einekha kholeh ’en zeh ki ’im roa‘ lew va’ira harbeh me’od. 
nehemiah 2:3	va’omar lamelekh hamelekh le‘olam yikhyeh madua‘ lo yeire‘u fanai ’asher ha‘ir bet qiwrot ’awotai khareiwah ushe‘areha ’ukelu wa’esh. 
nehemiah 2:4	vayomer li hamelekh ‘al mah zeh ’atah mewaqesh va’etpalel ’el ’elohei hashamayim. 
nehemiah 2:5	va’omar lamelekh ’im ‘al hamelekh tow ve’im yitaw ‘awdekha lefanekha ’asher tishlakheini ’el yehudah ’el ‘ir qiwrot ’awotai ve’ewnenah. 
nehemiah 2:6	vayomer li hamelekh vehasheigal yoshewet ’etslo ‘ad matai yihyeh mahalakhakha umatai tashuw vayitaw lifnei hamelekh vayishlakheini va’etenah lo zeman. 
nehemiah 2:7	va’omar lamelekh ’im ‘al hamelekh tow ’igerot yitenu li ‘al pakhavot ‘eiwer hanahar ’asher ya‘awiruni ‘ad ’asher ’awo ’el yehudah. 
nehemiah 2:8	ve’igeret ’el ’asaf shomer hapardes ’asher lamelekh ’asher yiten li ‘eitsim leqarot ’et sha‘arei habirah ’asher labayit ulekhomat ha‘ir velabayit ’asher ’awo ’eilav vayiten li hamelekh keyad ’elohai hatowah ‘alai. 
nehemiah 2:9	va’awo ’el pakhavot ‘eiwer hanahar va’etenah lahem ’et ’igerot hamelekh vayishlakh ‘imi hamelekh sarei khayil ufarashim. 
nehemiah 2:10	vayishma‘ sanwalat hakhoroni vetowiyah ha‘ewed ha‘amoni vayeira‘ lahem ra‘ah gedolah ’asher ba ’adam lewaqesh towah liwnei yisra’el. 
nehemiah 2:11	va’awo ’el yerushalim va’ehi sham yamim sheloshah. 
nehemiah 2:12	va’aqum laylah ’ani va’anashim me‘at ‘imi velo higadti le’adam mah ’elohai noten ’el libi la‘asot lirushalim uweheimah ’en ‘imi ki ’im habeheimah ’asher ’ani rokhew bah. 
nehemiah 2:13	va’eitse’ah wesha‘ar hagai laylah ve’el penei ‘en hatanin ve’el sha‘ar ha’ashpot va’ehi sower bekhomot yerushalim ’asher hamforvatsim hem perutsim ushe‘areha ’ukelu wa’esh. 
nehemiah 2:14	va’e‘ewor ’el sha‘ar ha‘ayin ve’el bereikhat hamelekh ve’en maqom labeheimah la‘awor takhtai. 
nehemiah 2:15	va’ehi ‘oleh wanakhal laylah va’ehi sower bakhomah va’ashuw va’awo besha‘ar hagai va’ashuw.
