nehemiah 2:16	vehaseganim lo yade‘u ’anah halakhti umah ’ani ‘oseh velayehudim velakohanim velakhorim velaseganim uleyeter ‘oseh hamelakhah ‘ad ken lo higadti. 
nehemiah 2:17	va’omar ’aleihem ’atem ro’im hara‘ah ’asher ’anakhnu wah ’asher yerushalim khareiwah ushe‘areha nitsetu wa’esh lekhu veniwneh ’et khomat yerushalim velo nihyeh ‘od kherpah. 
nehemiah 2:18	va’agid lahem ’et yad ’elohai ’asher hi towah ‘alai ve’af diwrei hamelekh ’asher ’amar li vayomeru naqum uwaninu vaykhazequ yedeihem latowah. 
nehemiah 2:19	vayishma‘ sanwalat hakhoroni vetowiyah ha‘ewed ha‘amoni vegeshem ha‘arwi vayal‘igu lanu vayiwzu ‘aleinu vayomeru mah hadawar hazeh ’asher ’atem ‘osim ha‘al hamelekh ’atem moredim. 
nehemiah 2:20	va’ashiw ’otam dawar va’omar lahem ’elohei hashamayim hu yatsliakh lanu va’anakhnu ‘awadav naqum uwaninu velakhem ’en kheileq utsedaqah vezikaron birushalim. 
nehemiah 3:1	vayaqam ’elyashiw hakohen hagadol ve’ekhav hakohanim vayiwnu ’et sha‘ar hatson hemah qideshuhu vaya‘amidu daltotav ve‘ad migdal hamei’ah qideshuhu ‘ad migdal khanan’el. 
nehemiah 3:2	ve‘al yado wanu ’anshei yereikho ve‘al yado wanah zakur ben ’imri. 
nehemiah 3:3	ve’et sha‘ar hadagim banu benei hasena’ah hemah qeiruhu vaya‘amidu daltotav man‘ulav uwerikhav. 
nehemiah 3:4	ve‘al yadam hekheziq mereimot ben ’uriyah ben haqots ve‘al yadam hekheziq meshulam ben berekhyah ben mesheizaw’el ve‘al yadam hekheziq tsadoq ben ba‘ana. 
nehemiah 3:5	ve‘al yadam hekheziqu hateqo‘im ve’adireihem lo heiwi’u tsavaram ba‘awodat ’adoneihem. 
nehemiah 3:6	ve’et sha‘ar hayshanah hekheziqu yoyada‘ ben paseiakh umeshulam ben besodyah hemah qeiruhu vaya‘amidu daltotav uman‘ulav uwerikhav. 
nehemiah 3:7	ve‘al yadam hekheziq melatyah hagiw‘oni veyadon hameironoti ’anshei giw‘on vehamitspah lekhisei pakhat ‘eiwer hanahar. 
nehemiah 3:8	‘al yado hekheziq ‘uzi’el ben kharhayah tsorfim ve‘al yado hekheziq khananyah ben haraqakhim vaya‘azwu yerushalim ‘ad hakhomah harekhawah. 
nehemiah 3:9	ve‘al yadam hekheziq refayah wen khur sar khatsi pelekh yerushalim. 
nehemiah 3:10	ve‘al yadam hekheziq yedayah wen kharumaf veneged beito ve‘al yado hekheziq khatush ben khashawneyah. 
nehemiah 3:11	midah sheinit hekheziq malkiyah wen kharim vekhashuw ben pakhat mo’aw ve’et migdal hatanurim. 
nehemiah 3:12	ve‘al yado hekheziq shalum ben halokhesh sar khatsi pelekh yerushalim hu uwenotav. 
nehemiah 3:13	’et sha‘ar hagai hekheziq khanun veyoshewei zanoakh hemah wanuhu vaya‘amidu daltotav man‘ulav uwerikhav ve’elef ’amah bakhomah ‘ad sha‘ar hashafot. 
nehemiah 3:14	ve’et sha‘ar ha’ashpot hekheziq malkiyah wen reikhaw sar pelekh bet hakarem hu yiwnenu veya‘amid daltotav man‘ulav uwerikhav. 
nehemiah 3:15	ve’et sha‘ar ha‘ayin hekheziq shalun ben kal khozeh sar pelekh hamitspah hu yiwnenu vitalenu veya‘amidu veya‘amid daltotav man‘ulav uwerikhav ve’et khomat bereikhat hashelakh legan hamelekh ve‘ad hama‘alot hayordot mei‘ir david. 
nehemiah 3:16	’akharav hekheziq nekhemyah wen ‘azbuq sar khatsi pelekh bet tsur ‘ad neged qiwrei david ve‘ad habereikhah ha‘asuyah ve‘ad bet hagiborim. 
nehemiah 3:17	’akharav hekheziqu halviyim rekhum ben bani ‘al yado hekheziq khashawyah sar khatsi felekh qe‘ilah lefilko. 
nehemiah 3:18	’akharav hekheziqu ’akheihem bavai ben kheinadad sar khatsi pelekh qe‘ilah. 
nehemiah 3:19	vaykhazeq ‘al yado ‘eizer ben yeishua‘ sar hamitspah midah sheinit mineged ‘alot hanesheq hamiqtsoa‘. 
nehemiah 3:20	’akharav hekherah hekheziq barukh ben zabai zakai midah sheinit min hamiqtsoa‘ ‘ad petakh bet ’elyashiw hakohen hagadol. 
nehemiah 3:21	’akharav hekheziq mereimot ben ’uriyah ben haqots midah sheinit mipetakh bet ’elyashiw ve‘ad takhlit bet ’elyashiw. 
nehemiah 3:22	ve’akharav hekheziqu hakohanim ’anshei hakikar. 
nehemiah 3:23	’akharav hekheziq binyamin vekhashuw neged beitam ’akharav hekheziq ‘azaryah wen ma‘aseiyah ben ‘ananeyah ’eitsel beito. 
nehemiah 3:24	’akharav hekheziq binui ben kheinadad midah sheinit mibet ‘azaryah ‘ad hamiqtsoa‘ ve‘ad hapinah. 
nehemiah 3:25	palal ben ’uzai mineged hamiqtsoa‘ vehamigdal hayotsei mibet hamelekh ha‘elyon ’asher lakhatsar hamatarah ’akharav pedayah wen par‘osh. 
nehemiah 3:26	vehanetinim hayu yoshewim ba‘ofel ‘ad neged sha‘ar hamayim lamizrakh vehamigdal hayotsei. 
nehemiah 3:27	’akharav hekheziqu hateqo‘im midah sheinit mineged hamigdal hagadol hayotsei ve‘ad khomat ha‘ofel. 
nehemiah 3:28	mei‘al sha‘ar hasusim hekheziqu hakohanim ’ish leneged beito. 
nehemiah 3:29	’akharav hekheziq tsadoq ben ’imer neged beito ve’akharav hekheziq shema‘yah wen shekhanyah shomer sha‘ar hamizrakh. 
nehemiah 3:30	’akharei ’akharav hekheziq khananyah wen shelemyah vekhanun ben tsalaf hashishi midah sheini ’akharav hekheziq meshulam ben berekhyah neged nishkato. 
nehemiah 3:31	’akharei ’akharav hekheziq malkiyah ben hatsorefi ‘ad bet hanetinim veharokhelim neged sha‘ar hamifqad ve‘ad ‘aliyat hapinah. 
nehemiah 3:32	uwen ‘aliyat hapinah lesha‘ar hatson hekheziqu hatsorefim veharokhelim. 
nehemiah 4:1	yehi ka’asher shama‘ sanwalat ki ’anakhnu wonim ’et hakhomah vayikhar lo vayikh‘as harbeh vayal‘eg ‘al hayehudim. 
nehemiah 4:2	vayomer lifnei ’ekhav vekhel shomeron vayomer mah hayehudim ha’ameilalim ‘osim haya‘azwu lahem hayizbakhu haykhalu wayom haykhayu ’et ha’awanim mei‘areimot he‘afar vehemah serufot. 
nehemiah 4:3	vetowiyah ha‘amoni ’etslo vayomer gam ’asher hem bonim ’im ya‘aleh shu‘al ufarats khomat ’awneihem. 
nehemiah 4:4	shema‘ ’eloheinu ki hayinu wuzah vehashew kherpatam ’el rosham utenem lewizah be’erets shiwyah. 
nehemiah 4:5	ve’al tekhas ‘al ‘avonam vekhatatam milefanekha ’al timakheh ki hikh‘isu leneged habonim. 
nehemiah 4:6	vaniwneh ’et hakhomah vatiqasher kal hakhomah ‘ad khetsyah vayhi lew la‘am la‘asot. 
nehemiah 4:7	vayhi kha’asher shama‘ sanwalat vetowiyah veha‘arwim veha‘amonim veha’ashdodim ki ‘aletah ’arukhah lekhomot yerushalim ki heikhelu haperutsim lehisatem vayikhar lahem me’od. 
nehemiah 4:8	vayiqsheru khulam yakhdav lawo lehilakhem birushalim vela‘asot lo to‘ah. 
nehemiah 4:9	vanitpalel ’el ’eloheinu vana‘amid mishmar ‘aleihem yomam valaylah mipeneihem. 
nehemiah 4:10	vayomer yehudah kashal koakh hasabal vehe‘afar harbeh va’anakhnu lo nukhal liwnot bakhomah. 
nehemiah 4:11	vayomeru tsareinu lo yeide‘u velo yir’u ‘ad ’asher nawo ’el tokham vaharagnum vehishbatnu ’et hamelakhah. 
nehemiah 4:12	vayhi ka’asher ba’u hayehudim hayoshewim ’etslam vayomeru lanu ‘eser pe‘amim mikal hameqomot ’asher tashuwu ‘aleinu. 
nehemiah 4:13	va’a‘amid mitakhtiyot lamaqom mei’akharei lakhomah batsekhikhiyim batsekhikhim va’a‘amid ’et ha‘am lemishpakhot ‘im kharwoteihem ramekheihem veqashetoteihem. 
nehemiah 4:14	va’eire va’aqum va’omar ’el hakhorim ve’el haseganim ve’el yeter ha‘am ’al tire’u mipeneihem ’et ’adonai hagadol vehanora zekhoru vehilakhamu ‘al ’akheikhem beneikhem uwenoteikhem nesheikhem uwateikhem. 
nehemiah 4:15	vayhi ka’asher shame‘u ’oyweinu ki noda‘ lanu vayafer ha’elohim ’et ‘atsatam vanashuw vanashaw kulanu ’el hakhomah ’ish ’el melakhto. 
nehemiah 4:16	vayhi min hayom hahu khatsi ne‘arai ‘osim bamelakhah vekhetsyam makhaziqim veharemakhim hamaginim vehaqeshatot vehashiryonim vehasarim ’akharei kal bet yehudah. 
nehemiah 4:17	habonim bakhomah vehanose’im basewel ‘omesim be’akhat yado ‘oseh wamelakhah ve’akhat makhazeqet hashalakh. 
nehemiah 4:18	vehabonim ’ish kharbo ’asurim ‘al matenav uwonim vehatoqeia‘ bashofar ’etsli. 
nehemiah 4:19	va’omar ’el hakhorim ve’el haseganim ve’el yeter ha‘am hamelakhah harbeh urekhawah va’anakhnu nifradim ‘al hakhomah rekhoqim ’ish mei’akhiv. 
nehemiah 4:20	bimqom ’asher tishme‘u ’et qol hashofar shamah tiqawetsu ’eileinu ’eloheinu yilakhem lanu. 
nehemiah 4:21	va’anakhnu ‘osim bamelakhah vekhetsyam makhaziqim baremakhim mei‘alot hashakhar ‘ad tset hakokhawim. 
nehemiah 4:22	gam ba‘et hahi ’amarti la‘am ’ish vena‘aro yalinu betokh yerushalim vehayu lanu halaylah mishmar vehayom melakhah. 
nehemiah 4:23	ve’en ’ani ve’akhai une‘arai ve’anshei hamishmar ’asher ’akharai ’en ’anakhnu foshetim begadeinu ’ish shilkho hamayim. 
nehemiah 5:1	vatehi tsa‘aqat ha‘am unesheihem gedolah ’el ’akheihem hayehudim. 
nehemiah 5:2	veyesh ’asher ’omerim baneinu uwenoteinu ’anakhnu rabim veniqkhah dagan venokhelah venikhyeh. 
nehemiah 5:3	veyesh ’asher ’omerim sedoteinu ukherameinu uwateinu ’anakhnu ‘orewim veniqkhah dagan bara‘aw. 
nehemiah 5:4	veyesh ’asher ’omerim lavinu khesef lemidat hamelekh sedoteinu ukherameinu. 
nehemiah 5:5	ve‘atah kiwsar ’akheinu besareinu kiwneihem baneinu vehineh ’anakhnu khoweshim ’et baneinu ve’et benoteinu la‘awadim veyesh mibenoteinu nikhbashot ve’en le’el yadeinu usedoteinu ukherameinu la’akheirim. 
nehemiah 5:6	vayikhar li me’od ka’asher shama‘ti ’et za‘aqatam ve’et hadewarim ha’eleh. 
nehemiah 5:7	vayimalekh libi ‘alai va’ariwah ’et hakhorim ve’et haseganim va’omerah lahem masha ’ish be’akhiv ’atem noshim va’eten ‘aleihem qehilah gedolah. 
nehemiah 5:8	va’omerah lahem ’anakhnu qaninu ’et ’akheinu hayehudim hanimkarim lagoyim kedei wanu vegam ’atem timkeru ’et ’akheikhem venimkeru lanu vayakharishu velo matse’u dawar. 
nehemiah 5:9	vayomer va’omar lo tow hadawar ’asher ’atem ‘osim halo beyir’at ’eloheinu teileikhu meikherpat hagoyim ’oyweinu. 
nehemiah 5:10	vegam ’ani ’akhai une‘arai noshim bahem kesef vedagan na‘azwah na ’et hamasha hazeh. 
nehemiah 5:11	hashiwu na lahem kehayom sedoteihem karmeihem zeiteihem uwateihem ume’at hakesef vehadagan hatirosh vehayitshar ’asher ’atem noshim bahem. 
nehemiah 5:12	vayomeru nashiw umeihem lo newaqesh ken na‘aseh ka’asher ’atah ’omer va’eqra ’et hakohanim va’ashbi‘em la‘asot kadawar hazeh. 
nehemiah 5:13	gam khatseni na‘arti va’omerah kakhah yena‘er ha’elohim ’et kal ha’ish ’asher lo yaqim ’et hadawar hazeh mibeito umigi‘o vekhakhah yihyeh na‘ur vareq vayomeru khal haqahal ’amen vayhalelu ’et yhoh vaya‘as ha‘am kadawar hazeh. 
nehemiah 5:14	gam miyom ’asher tsivah ’oti lihyot pekham be’erets yehudah mishenat ‘esrim ve‘ad shenat sheloshim ushetayim le’artakhshast hamelekh shanim shetem ‘esreh ’ani ve’akhai lekhem hapekhah lo ’akhalti. 
nehemiah 5:15	vehapakhot harishonim ’asher lefanai hikhbidu ‘al ha‘am vayiqkhu meihem belekhem vayayin ’akhar kesef sheqalim ’arba‘im gam na‘areihem shaletu ‘al ha‘am va’ani lo ‘asiti khen mipenei yir’at ’elohim. 
nehemiah 5:16	vegam bimlekhet hakhomah hazot hekhezaqti vesadeh lo qaninu vekhal ne‘arai qewutsim sham ‘al hamelakhah. 
nehemiah 5:17	vehayehudim vehaseganim mei’ah vakhamishim ’ish vehaba’im ’eileinu min hagoyim ’asher sewiwoteinu ‘al shulkhani. 
nehemiah 5:18	va’asher hayah na‘aseh leyom ’ekhad shor ’ekhad tson shesh berurot vetsiporim na‘asu li uwen ‘aseret yamim bekhal yayin leharbeh ve‘im zeh lekhem hapekhah lo wiqashti ki khawedah ha‘awodah ‘al ha‘am hazeh. 
nehemiah 5:19	zakherah li ’elohai letowah kol ’asher ‘asiti ‘al ha‘am hazeh. 
nehemiah 6:1	vayhi kha’asher nishma‘ lesanwalat vetowiyah ulegeshem ha‘arwi uleyeter ’oyeweinu ki waniti ’et hakhomah velo notar bah parets gam ‘ad ha‘et hahi delatot lo he‘emadti washe‘arim. 
nehemiah 6:2	vayishlakh sanwalat vegeshem ’eilai leimor lekhah veniva‘adah yakhdav bakefirim bewiq‘at ’ono vehemah khoshewim la‘asot li ra‘ah. 
nehemiah 6:3	va’eshlekhah ‘aleihem mal’akhim leimor melakhah gedolah ’ani ‘oseh velo ’ukhal laredet lamah tishbat hamelakhah ka’asher ’arpeha veyaradti ’aleikhem. 
nehemiah 6:4	vayishlekhu ’eilai kadawar hazeh ’arba‘ pe‘amim va’ashiw ’otam kadawar hazeh. 
nehemiah 6:5	vayishlakh ’eilai sanwalat kadawar hazeh pa‘am khamishit ’et na‘aro ve’igeret petukhah beyado. 
nehemiah 6:6	katuw bah bagoyim nishma‘ vegashmu ’omer ’atah vehayehudim khoshewim limrod ‘al ken ’atah woneh hakhomah ve’atah hoeh lahem lemelekh kadewarim ha’eleh. 
nehemiah 6:7	vegam newi’im he‘emadta liqro ‘alekha wirushalim leimor melekh bihudah ve‘atah yishama‘ lamelekh kadewarim ha’eleh ve‘atah lekhah veniva‘atsah yakhdav. 
nehemiah 6:8	va’eshlekhah ’eilav leimor lo nihyah kadewarim ha’eleh ’asher ’atah ’omer ki milibekha ’atah wodam 
nehemiah 6:9	ki khulam meyare’im ’otanu leimor yirpu yedeihem min hamelakhah velo tei‘aseh ve‘atah khazeq ’et yadai. 
nehemiah 6:10	va’ani wati bet shema‘yah wen delayah ben meheitaw’el vehu ‘atsur vayomer niva‘ed ’el bet ha’elohim ’el tokh haheikhal venisgerah daltot haheikhal ki ba’im leharegekha velaylah ba’im leharegekha. 
nehemiah 6:11	va’omerah ha’ish kamoni yiwrakh umi khamoni ’asher yawo ’el haheikhal vakhai lo ’awo. 
nehemiah 6:12	va’akirah vehineh lo ’elohim shelakho ki hanewu’ah diber ‘alai vetowiyah vesanwalat sekharo. 
nehemiah 6:13	lema‘an sakhur hu lema‘an ’ira ve’e‘eseh ken vekhatati vehayah lahem leshem ra‘ lema‘an yekharefuni. 
nehemiah 6:14	zakherah ’elohai letowiyah ulesanwalat kema‘asav ’eleh vegam leno‘adyah hanewi’ah uleyeter hanewi’im ’asher hayu meyare’im ’oti. 
nehemiah 6:15	vatishlam hakhomah be‘esrim vakhamishah le’elul lakhamishim ushenayim yom. 
nehemiah 6:16	vayhi ka’asher shame‘u kal ’oyweinu vayir’u kal hagoyim ’asher sewiwoteinu vayipelu me’od be‘eineihem vayeide‘u ki mei’et ’eloheinu ne‘estah hamelakhah hazot. 
nehemiah 6:17	gam bayamim hahem marbim khorei yehudah ’igeroteihem holkhot ‘al towiyah va’asher letowiyah ba’ot ’aleihem. 
nehemiah 6:18	ki rabim bihudah ba‘alei shewu‘ah lo ki khatan hu lishkhanyah wen ’arakh vihokhanan beno laqakh ’et bat meshulam ben berekhyah. 
nehemiah 6:19	gam towotav hayu ’omerim lefanai udewarai hayu motsi’im lo ’igerot shalakh towiyah leyare’eini. 
nehemiah 7:1	vayhi ka’asher niwnetah hakhomah va’a‘amid hadelatot vayipaqedu hasho‘arim vehamshorerim vehalviyim. 
nehemiah 7:2	va’atsaveh ’et khanani ’akhi ve’et khananyah sar habirah ‘al yerushalim ki hu ke’ish ’emet veyarei ’et ha’elohim meirabim. 
nehemiah 7:3	vayomer va’omar lahem lo yipatekhu sha‘arei yerushalim ‘ad khom hashemesh ve‘ad hem ‘omedim yagifu hadelatot ve’ekhozu veha‘amed mishmerot yoshewei yerushalim ’ish bemishmaro ve’ish neged beito. 
nehemiah 7:4	veha‘ir rakhawat yadayim ugedolah veha‘am me‘at betokhah ve’en batim benuyim. 
nehemiah 7:5	vayiten ’elohai ’el libi va’eqbetsah ’et hakhorim ve’et haseganim ve’et ha‘am lehityakhes va’emtsa seifer hayakhas ha‘olim barishonah va’emtsa katuw bo. 
nehemiah 7:6	’eleh benei hamedinah ha‘olim mishewi hagolah ’asher heglah newukhadnetsar melekh bawel vayashuwu lirushalim velihudah ’ish le‘iro. 
nehemiah 7:7	haba’im ‘im zerubawel yeishua‘ nekhemyah ‘azaryah ra‘amyah nakhamani maredokhai bilshan misperet bigvai nekhum ba‘anah mispar ’anshei ‘am yisra’el. 
nehemiah 7:8	benei far‘osh ’alpayim mei’ah veshiw‘im ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:9	benei shefatyah shelosh mei’ot shiw‘im ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:10	benei ’arakh shesh mei’ot khamishim ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:11	benei fakhat mo’aw liwnei yeishua‘ veyo’aw ’alpayim ushemoneh mei’ot shemonah ‘asar. 
nehemiah 7:12	benei ‘eilam ’elef matayim khamishim ve’arba‘ah. 
nehemiah 7:13	benei zatu shemoneh mei’ot ’arba‘im vakhamishah. 
nehemiah 7:14	benei zakai shewa‘ mei’ot veshishim. 
nehemiah 7:15	benei winui shesh mei’ot ’arba‘im ushemonah. 
nehemiah 7:16	benei weiwai shesh mei’ot ‘esrim ushemonah. 
nehemiah 7:17	benei ‘azgad ’alpayim shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:18	benei ’adoniqam shesh mei’ot shishim veshiw‘ah. 
nehemiah 7:19	benei wigvai ’alpayim shishim veshiw‘ah. 
nehemiah 7:20	benei ‘adin shesh mei’ot khamishim vakhamishah. 
nehemiah 7:21	benei ’ater lekhizqiyah tish‘im ushemonah. 
nehemiah 7:22	benei khashum shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim ushemonah. 
nehemiah 7:23	benei weitsai shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah. 
nehemiah 7:24	benei kharif mei’ah shenem ‘asar. 
nehemiah 7:25	benei giw‘on tish‘im vakhamishah. 
nehemiah 7:26	’anshei wet lekhem unetofah mei’ah shemonim ushemonah. 
nehemiah 7:27	’anshei ‘anatot mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah. 
nehemiah 7:28	’anshei wet ‘azmavet ’arba‘im ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:29	’anshei qiryat ye‘arim kefirah uwe’eirot shewa‘ mei’ot ’arba‘im usheloshah. 
nehemiah 7:30	’anshei haramah vagawa‘ shesh mei’ot ‘esrim ve’ekhad. 
nehemiah 7:31	’anshei mikhmas mei’ah ve‘esrim ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:32	’anshei wet ’el veha‘ai mei’ah ‘esrim usheloshah. 
nehemiah 7:33	’anshei newo ’akher khamishim ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:34	benei ‘eilam ’akher ’elef matayim khamishim ve’arba‘ah. 
nehemiah 7:35	benei kharim shelosh mei’ot ve‘esrim. 
nehemiah 7:36	benei yereikho shelosh mei’ot ’arba‘im vakhamishah. 
nehemiah 7:37	benei lod khadid ve’ono shewa‘ mei’ot ve‘esrim ve’ekhad. 
nehemiah 7:38	benei sena’ah sheloshet ’alafim tesha‘ mei’ot usheloshim. 
nehemiah 7:39	hakohanim benei yeda‘yah lewet yeishua‘ tesha‘ mei’ot shiw‘im usheloshah. 
nehemiah 7:40	benei ’imer ’elef khamishim ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:41	benei fashkhur ’elef matayim ’arba‘im veshiw‘ah. 
nehemiah 7:42	benei kharim ’elef shiw‘ah ‘asar. 
nehemiah 7:43	halviyim benei yeishua‘ leqadmi’el liwnei lehodvah shiw‘im ve’arba‘ah. 
nehemiah 7:44	hamshorerim benei ’asaf mei’ah ’arba‘im ushemonah. 
nehemiah 7:45	hasho‘arim benei shalum benei ’ater benei talmon benei ‘aquw benei khatita benei showai mei’ah sheloshim ushemonah. 
nehemiah 7:46	hanetinim benei tsikha wenei khasufa benei taba‘ot. 
nehemiah 7:47	benei qeiros benei si‘a benei fadon. 
nehemiah 7:48	benei lewanah wenei khagawah benei shalmai. 
nehemiah 7:49	benei khanan benei gidel benei gakhar. 
nehemiah 7:50	benei re’ayah wenei retsin benei neqoda. 
nehemiah 7:51	benei gazam benei ‘uza benei faseiakh. 
nehemiah 7:52	benei weisai benei me‘unim benei nefushesim nefishesim. 
nehemiah 7:53	benei waqbuq benei khaqufa benei kharkhur. 
nehemiah 7:54	benei watslit benei mekhida benei kharsha. 
nehemiah 7:55	benei warqos benei sisera benei tamakh. 
nehemiah 7:56	benei netsiakh benei khatifa. 
nehemiah 7:57	benei ‘awdei shelomoh benei sotai benei soferet benei ferida. 
nehemiah 7:58	benei ya‘la wenei darqon benei gidel. 
nehemiah 7:59	benei shefatyah wenei khatil benei pokheret hatsewayim benei ’amon. 
nehemiah 7:60	kal hanetinim uwenei ‘awdei shelomoh shelosh mei’ot tish‘im ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:61	ve’eleh ha‘olim mitel melakh tel kharsha keruw ’adon ve’imer velo yakhelu lehagid bet ’awotam vezar‘am ’im miyisra’el hem. 
nehemiah 7:62	benei delayah wenei towiyah benei neqoda shesh mei’ot ve’arba‘im ushenayim. 
nehemiah 7:63	umin hakohanim benei khowayah benei haqots benei warzilai ’asher laqakh mibenot barzilai hagil‘adi ’ishah vayiqarei ‘al shemam. 
nehemiah 7:64	’eleh biqshu khetawam hamityakhsim velo nimtsa vaygo’alu min hakehunah. 
nehemiah 7:65	vayomer hatirshata lahem ’asher lo yokhelu miqodesh haqodashim ‘ad ‘amod hakohen le’urim vetumim. 
nehemiah 7:66	kal haqahal ke’ekhad ’arba‘ ribo ’alpayim shelosh mei’ot veshishim. 
nehemiah 7:67	milewad ‘awdeihem ve’amhoteihem ’eleh shiw‘at ’alafim shelosh mei’ot sheloshim veshiw‘ah velahem meshorarim umeshorarot matayim ve’arba‘im vakhamishah. 
nehemiah 7:68	gemalim ’arba‘ mei’ot sheloshim vakhamishah khamorim sheishet ’alafim shewa‘ mei’ot ve‘esrim. 
nehemiah 7:69	umiqtsat rashei ha’awot natenu lamelakhah hatirshata natan la’otsar zahaw darkemonim ’elef mizraqot khamishim katenot kohanim sheloshim vakhamesh mei’ot. 
nehemiah 7:70	umeirashei ha’awot natenu le’otsar hamelakhah zahaw darkemonim shetei ribot vekhesef manim ’alpayim umatayim. 
nehemiah 7:71	va’asher natenu she’eirit ha‘am zahaw darkemonim shetei ribo vekhesef manim ’alpayim vekhatenot kohanim shishim veshiw‘ah. 
nehemiah 7:72	vayeishewu hakohanim vehalviyim vehasho‘arim vehamshorerim umin ha‘am vehanetinim vekhal yisra’el be‘areihem vayiga‘ hakhodesh hashewi‘i uwenei yisra’el be‘areihem. 
nehemiah 8:1	vayei’asefu khal ha‘am ke’ish ’ekhad ’el harekhow ’asher lifnei sha‘ar hamayim vayomeru le‘ezra hasofer lehawi ’et seifer torat mosheh ’asher tsivah yhoh ’et yisra’el. 
nehemiah 8:2	vayawi ‘ezra hakohen ’et hatorah lifnei haqahal mei’ish ve‘ad ’ishah vekhol meiwin lishmoa‘ beyom ’ekhad lakhodesh hashewi‘i. 
nehemiah 8:3	vayiqra wo lifnei harekhow ’asher lifnei sha‘ar hamayim min ha’or ‘ad makhatsit hayom neged ha’anashim vehanashim vehamewinim ve’azenei khal ha‘am ’el seifer hatorah. 
nehemiah 8:4	vaya‘amod ‘ezra hasofer ‘al migdal ‘ets ’asher ‘asu ladawar vaya‘amod ’etslo matityah veshema‘ va‘anayah ve’uriyah vekhilqiyah uma‘aseiyah ‘al yemino umisemolo pedayah umisha’el umalkiyah vekhashum vekhashbadanah zekharyah meshulam. 
nehemiah 8:5	vayiftakh ‘ezra haseifer le‘einei khal ha‘am ki mei‘al kal ha‘am hayah ukhefitkho ‘amedu khal ha‘am. 
nehemiah 8:6	vaywarekh ‘ezra ’et yhoh ha’elohim hagadol vaya‘anu khal ha‘am ’amen ’amen bemo‘al yedeihem vayiqedu vayishtakhavu yhoh ’apayim ’aretsah. 
nehemiah 8:7	veyeishua‘ uwani vesheireiweyah yamin ‘aquw shabetai hodiyah ma‘aseiyah qelita ‘azaryah yozawad khanan pelayah vehalviyim mewinim ’et ha‘am latorah veha‘am ‘al ‘amedam. 
nehemiah 8:8	vayiqre’u waseifer betorat ha’elohim meforash vesom sekhel vayawinu bamiqra. 
nehemiah 8:9	vayomer nekhemyah hu hatirshata ve‘ezra hakohen hasofer vehalviyim hamewinim ’et ha‘am lekhal ha‘am hayom qadosh hu yhoh ’eloheikhem ’al tit’abelu ve’al tiwku ki wokhim kal ha‘am keshame‘am ’et diwrei hatorah. 
nehemiah 8:10	vayomer lahem lekhu ’ikhlu mashmanim ushetu mamtaqim veshilkhu manot le’en nakhon lo ki qadosh hayom la’adoneinu ve’al tei‘atseiwu ki khedvat yhoh hi ma‘uzekhem. 
nehemiah 8:11	vehalviyim makhshim lekhal ha‘am leimor hasu ki hayom qadosh ve’al tei‘atseiwu. 
nehemiah 8:12	vayeilekhu khal ha‘am le’ekhol velishtot uleshalakh manot vela‘asot simkhah gedolah ki heiwinu badewarim ’asher hodi‘u lahem. 
nehemiah 8:13	uwayom hasheini ne’esfu rashei ha’awot lekhal ha‘am hakohanim vehalviyim ’el ‘ezra hasofer ulehaskil ’el diwrei hatorah. 
nehemiah 8:14	vayimtse’u katuw batorah ’asher tsivah yhoh beyad mosheh ’asher yeishewu wenei yisra’el basukot bekhag bakhodesh hashewi‘i. 
nehemiah 8:15	va’asher yashmi‘u veya‘awiru qol bekhal ‘areihem uwirushalim leimor tse’u hahar vehawi’u ‘alei zayit va‘alei ‘ets shemen va‘alei hadas va‘alei temarim va‘alei ‘ets ‘awot la‘asot sukot kakatuw. 
nehemiah 8:16	vayeitse’u ha‘am vayawi’u vaya‘asu lahem sukot ’ish ‘al gago uwekhatsroteihem uwekhatsrot bet ha’elohim uwirkhow sha‘ar hamayim uwirkhow sha‘ar ’efrayim. 
nehemiah 8:17	vaya‘asu khal haqahal hashawim min hashewi sukot vayeishewu wasukot ki lo ‘asu mimei yeishua‘ bin nun ken benei yisra’el ‘ad hayom hahu vatehi simkhah gedolah me’od. 
nehemiah 8:18	vayiqra beseifer torat ha’elohim yom beyom min hayom harishon ‘ad hayom ha’akharon vaya‘asu khag shiw‘at yamim uwayom hashemini ‘atseret kamishpat. 
nehemiah 9:1	uweyom ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah lakhodesh hazeh ne’esfu wenei yisra’el betsom uwesaqim va’adamah ‘aleihem. 
nehemiah 9:2	vayibadelu zera‘ yisra’el mikol benei neikhar vaya‘amdu vayitvadu ‘al khatoteihem va‘avonot ’awoteihem. 
nehemiah 9:3	vayaqumu ‘al ‘amedam vayiqre’u beseifer torat yhoh ’eloheihem rewi‘it hayom urewi‘it mitvadim umishtakhavim yhoh ’eloheihem. 
nehemiah 9:4	vayaqam ‘al ma‘aleh halviyim yeishua‘ uwani qadmi’el shewanyah buni sheireiweyah bani khenani vayiz‘aqu beqol gadol ’el yhoh ’eloheihem. 
nehemiah 9:5	vayomeru halviyim yeishua‘ veqadmi’el bani khashawneyah sheireiweyah hodiyah shewanyah fetakhyah qumu barakhu ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem min ha‘olam ‘ad ha‘olam viwarekhu shem kewodekha umeromam ‘al kal berakhah utehilah. 
nehemiah 9:6	’atah hu yhoh lewadekha ’at ’atah ‘asita ’et hashamayim shemei hashamayim vekhal tsewa’am ha’arets vekhal ’asher ‘aleha hayamim vekhal ’asher bahem ve’atah mekhayeh ’et kulam utsewa hashamayim lekha mishtakhavim. 
nehemiah 9:7	’atah hu yhoh ha’elohim ’asher bakharta be’awram vehotseito mei’ur kasdim vesamta shemo ’awraham. 
nehemiah 9:8	umatsata ’et lewawo ne’eman lefanekha vekharot ‘imo haberit latet ’et ’erets hakena‘ani hakhiti ha’emori vehaperizi vehaywusi vehagirgashi latet lezar‘o vataqem ’et dewarekha ki tsadiq ’atah. 
nehemiah 9:9	vateire ’et ‘oni ’awoteinu bemitsrayim ve’et za‘aqatam shama‘ta ‘al yam suf. 
nehemiah 9:10	vatiten ’otot umofetim befar‘oh uwekhal ‘awadav uwekhal ‘am ’artso ki yada‘ta ki heizidu ‘aleihem vata‘as lekha shem kehayom hazeh. 
nehemiah 9:11	vehayam baqa‘ta lifneihem vaya‘awru wetokh hayam bayabashah ve’et rodefeihem hishlakhta wimtsolot kemo ’ewen bemayim ‘azim. 
nehemiah 9:12	uwe‘amud ‘anan hinkhitam yomam uwe‘amud ’esh laylah leha’ir lahem ’et haderekh ’asher yeilekhu wah. 
nehemiah 9:13	ve‘al har sinai yaradta vedaber ‘imahem mishamayim vatiten lahem mishpatim yesharim vetorot ’emet khuqim umitsvot towim. 
nehemiah 9:14	ve’et shabat qadshekha hoda‘ata lahem umitsvot vekhuqim vetorah tsivita lahem beyad mosheh ‘awdekha. 
nehemiah 9:15	velekhem mishamayim natatah lahem lir‘awam umayim misela‘ hotseita lahem litsma’am vatomer lahem lawo lareshet ’et ha’arets ’asher nasata ’et yadekha latet lahem. 
nehemiah 9:16	vehem va’awoteinu heizidu vayaqshu ’et ‘arepam velo shame‘u ’el mitsvotekha. 
nehemiah 9:17	vayma’anu lishmoa‘ velo zakheru nifle’otekha ’asher ‘asita ‘imahem vayaqshu ’et ‘arepam vayitenu rosh lashuw le‘awdutam bemiryam ve’atah ’eloah selikhot khanun verakhum ’erekh ’apayim veraw vekhesed khesed velo ‘azawtam. 
nehemiah 9:18	’af ki ‘asu lahem ‘eigel maseikhah vayomeru zeh ’elohekha ’asher he‘elkha mimitsrayim vaya‘asu ne’atsot gedolot. 
nehemiah 9:19	ve’atah berakhamekha harabim lo ‘azawtam bamidbar ’et ‘amud he‘anan lo sar mei‘aleihem beyomam lehankhotam behaderekh ve’et ‘amud ha’esh belaylah leha’ir lahem ve’et haderekh ’asher yeilekhu wah. 
nehemiah 9:20	verukhakha hatowah natata lehaskilam umankha lo mana‘ta mipihem umayim natatah lahem litsma’am. 
nehemiah 9:21	ve’arba‘im shanah kilkaltam bamidbar lo khaseiru salmoteihem lo walu veragleihem lo watseiqu. 
nehemiah 9:22	vatiten lahem mamlakhot va‘amamim vatakhleqem lefei’ah vayireshu ’et ’erets sikhon ve’et ’erets melekh kheshbon ve’et ’erets ‘og melekh habashan. 
nehemiah 9:23	uweneihem hirbita kekhokhewei hashamayim vatewi’em ’el ha’arets ’asher ’amarta la’awoteihem lawo larashet. 
nehemiah 9:24	vayawo’u habanim vayireshu ’et ha’arets vatakhna‘ lifneihem ’et yoshewei ha’arets hakena‘anim vatitenem beyadam ve’et malkheihem ve’et ‘amei ha’arets la‘asot bahem kirtsonam. 
nehemiah 9:25	vayilkedu ‘arim betsurot va’adamah shemeinah vayireshu batim melei’im kal tuw borot khatsuwim keramim vezeitim ve‘ets ma’akhal larow vayokhelu vayisbe‘u vayashminu vayit‘adenu betuwekha hagadol. 
nehemiah 9:26	vayamru vayimredu bakh vayashlikhu ’et toratekha ’akharei gavam ve’et newi’ekha haragu ’asher hei‘idu wam lahashiwam ’eilekha vaya‘asu ne’atsot gedolot. 
nehemiah 9:27	vatitenem beyad tsareihem vayatseiru lahem uwe‘et tsaratam yits‘aqu ’eilekha ve’atah mishamayim tishma‘ ukherakhamekha harabim titen lahem moshi‘im veyoshi‘um miyad tsareihem. 
nehemiah 9:28	ukhenoakh lahem yashuwu la‘asot ra‘ lefanekha vata‘azwem beyad ’oyeweihem vayirdu wahem vayashuwu vayiz‘aqukha ve’atah mishamayim tishma‘ vetatsilem kerakhamekha rabot ‘itim. 
nehemiah 9:29	vata‘ad bahem lahashiwam ’el toratekha vehemah heizidu velo shame‘u lemitsvotekha uwemishpatekha khate’u wam ’asher ya‘aseh ’adam vekhayah wahem vayitenu khatef soreret ve‘arepam hiqshu velo shamei‘u. 
nehemiah 9:30	vatimshokh ‘aleihem shanim rabot vata‘ad bam berukhakha beyad newi’ekha velo he’ezinu vatitenem beyad ‘amei ha’aratsot. 
nehemiah 9:31	uwerakhamekha harabim lo ‘asitam kalah velo ‘azawtam ki ’el khanun verakhum ’atah. 
nehemiah 9:32	ve‘atah ’eloheinu ha’el hagadol hagibor vehanora shomer haberit vehakhesed ’al yim‘at lefanekha ’et kal hatela’ah ’asher metsa’atnu limlakheinu lesareinu ulekhohaneinu velinwi’einu vela’awoteinu ulekhal ‘amekha mimei malkhei ’ashur ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
nehemiah 9:33	ve’atah tsadiq ‘al kal haba ‘aleinu ki ’emet ‘asita va’anakhnu hirsha‘enu. 
nehemiah 9:34	ve’et melakheinu sareinu kohaneinu va’awoteinu lo ‘asu toratekha velo hiqshiwu ’el mitsvotekha ule‘eidevotekha ’asher ha‘idota bahem. 
nehemiah 9:35	vehem bemalkhutam uwetuwekha haraw ’asher natata lahem uwe’erets harekhawah vehashemeinah ’asher natata lifneihem lo ‘awadukha velo shawu mima‘aleihem hara‘im. 
nehemiah 9:36	hineh ’anakhnu hayom ‘awadim veha’arets ’asher natatah la’awoteinu le’ekhol ’et piryah ve’et tuwah hineh ’anakhnu ‘awadim ‘aleha. 
nehemiah 9:37	utewu’atah marbah lamelakhim ’asher natatah ‘aleinu bekhatoteinu ve‘al geviyoteinu moshelim uwiwhemteinu kirtsonam uwetsarah gedolah ’anakhenu. 
nehemiah 9:38	uwekhal zot ’anakhnu koretim ’amanah vekhotewim ve‘al hekhatum sareinu leviyeinu kohaneinu. 
nehemiah 10:1	ve‘al hakhatumim nekhemyah hatirshata ben khakhalyah vetsidqiyah. 
nehemiah 10:2	serayah ‘azaryah yirmeyah. 
nehemiah 10:3	pashkhur ’amaryah malkiyah. 
nehemiah 10:4	khatush shewanyah malukh. 
nehemiah 10:5	kharim mereimot ‘owadyah. 
nehemiah 10:6	daniyel gineton barukh. 
nehemiah 10:7	meshulam ’awiyah miyamin. 
nehemiah 10:8	ma‘azyah wilgai shema‘yah ’eleh hakohanim. 
nehemiah 10:9	vehalviyim veyeishua‘ ben ’azanyah binui mibenei kheinadad qadmi’el. 
nehemiah 10:10	va’akheihem shewanyah hodiyah qelita pelayah khanan. 
nehemiah 10:11	mikha rekhow khashawyah. 
nehemiah 10:12	zakur sheireiweyah shewanyah. 
nehemiah 10:13	hodiyah wani beninu. 
nehemiah 10:14	rashei ha‘am par‘osh pakhat mo’aw ‘eilam zatu bani. 
nehemiah 10:15	buni ‘azgad beiwai. 
nehemiah 10:16	’adoniyah wigvai ‘adin. 
nehemiah 10:17	’ater khizqiyah ‘azur. 
nehemiah 10:18	hodiyah khashum beitsai. 
nehemiah 10:19	kharif ‘anatot nowai neiwai. 
nehemiah 10:20	magpi‘ash meshulam kheizir. 
nehemiah 10:21	mesheizaw’el tsadoq yadua‘. 
nehemiah 10:22	pelatyah khanan ‘anayah. 
nehemiah 10:23	hosheia‘ khananyah khashuw. 
nehemiah 10:24	halokhesh pilkha showeq. 
nehemiah 10:25	rekhum khashawnah ma‘aseiyah. 
nehemiah 10:26	va’akhiyah khanan ‘anan. 
nehemiah 10:27	malukh kharim ba‘anah. 
nehemiah 10:28	ushe’ar ha‘am hakohanim halviyim hasho‘arim hamshorerim hanetinim vekhal haniwdal mei‘amei ha’aratsot ’el torat ha’elohim nesheihem beneihem uwenoteihem kol yodeia‘ meiwin. 
nehemiah 10:29	makhaziqim ‘al ’akheihem ’adireihem uwa’im be’alah uwishwu‘ah lalekhet betorat ha’elohim ’asher nitenah beyad mosheh ‘ewed ha’elohim velishmor vela‘asot ’et kal mitsvot yhoh ’adoneinu umishpatav vekhuqav. 
nehemiah 10:30	va’asher lo niten benoteinu le‘amei ha’arets ve’et benoteihem lo niqakh lewaneinu. 
nehemiah 10:31	ve‘amei ha’arets hamwi’im ’et hamaqakhot vekhal shewer beyom hashabat limkor lo niqakh meihem bashabat uweyom qodesh venitosh ’et hashanah hashewi‘it umasha khal yad. 
nehemiah 10:32	vehe‘emadnu ‘aleinu mitsvot latet ‘aleinu shelishit hasheqel bashanah la‘awodat bet ’eloheinu. 
nehemiah 10:33	lelekhem hama‘arekhet uminkhat hatamid ule‘olat hatamid hashabatot hekhodashim lamo‘adim velaqodashim velakhata’ot lekhaper ‘al yisra’el vekhol melekhet bet ’eloheinu. 
nehemiah 10:34	vehagoralot hipalnu ‘al qurban ha‘eitsim hakohanim halviyim veha‘am lehawi lewet ’eloheinu lewet ’awoteinu le‘itim mezumanim shanah weshanah lewa‘er ‘al mizbakh yhoh ’eloheinu kakatuw batorah. 
nehemiah 10:35	ulehawi ’et bikurei ’admateinu uwikurei kal peri khal ‘ets shanah weshanah lewet yhoh. 
nehemiah 10:36	ve’et bekhorot baneinu uwehemteinu kakatuw batorah ve’et bekhorei weqareinu vetsoneinu lehawi lewet ’eloheinu lakohanim hamsharetim bewet ’eloheinu. 
nehemiah 10:37	ve’et reishit ‘arisoteinu uterumoteinu uferi khal ‘ets tirosh veyitshar nawi lakohanim ’el lishkhot bet ’eloheinu uma‘sar ’admateinu lalviyim vehem halviyim ham‘aserim bekhol ‘arei ‘awodateinu. 
nehemiah 10:38	vehayah hakohen ben ’aharon ‘im halviyim ba‘ser halviyim vehalviyim ya‘alu ’et ma‘asar hama‘aser lewet ’eloheinu ’el haleshakhot lewet ha’otsar. 
nehemiah 10:39	ki ’el haleshakhot yawi’u wenei yisra’el uwenei haleivi ’et terumat hadagan hatirosh vehayitshar vesham kelei hamiqdash vehakohanim hamsharetim vehasho‘arim vehamshorerim velo na‘azow ’et bet ’eloheinu. 
nehemiah 11:1	vayeishewu sarei ha‘am birushalim ushe’ar ha‘am hipilu goralot lehawi ’ekhad min ha‘asarah lashewet birushalim ‘ir haqodesh veteisha‘ hayadot be‘arim. 
nehemiah 11:2	vaywarakhu ha‘am lekhol ha’anashim hamitnadewim lashewet birushalim. 
nehemiah 11:3	ve’eleh rashei hamedinah ’asher yashewu birushalim uwe‘arei yehudah yashewu ’ish ba’akhuzato be‘areihem yisra’el hakohanim vehalviyim vehanetinim uwenei ‘awdei shelomoh. 
nehemiah 11:4	uwirushalim yashewu mibenei yehudah umibenei winyamin mibenei yehudah ‘atayah wen ‘uziyah ben zekharyah wen ’amaryah ben shefatyah wen mahalal’el mibenei farets. 
nehemiah 11:5	uma‘aseiyah wen barukh ben kal khozeh ben khazayah wen ‘adayah wen yoyariw ben zekharyah ben hashiloni 
nehemiah 11:6	kal benei ferets hayoshewim birushalim ’arba‘ mei’ot shishim ushemonah ’anshei khayil. 
nehemiah 11:7	ve’eleh benei winyamin salu ben meshulam ben yo‘ed ben pedayah wen qolayah wen ma‘aseiyah ben ’iti’el ben yesha‘yah. 
nehemiah 11:8	ve’akharav gabai salai tesha‘ mei’ot ‘esrim ushemonah. 
nehemiah 11:9	veyo’el ben zikhri paqid ‘aleihem vihudah wen hasenu’ah ‘al ha‘ir mishneh. 
nehemiah 11:10	min hakohanim yeda‘yah wen yoyariw yakhin. 
nehemiah 11:11	serayah wen khilqiyah ben meshulam ben tsadoq ben merayot ben ’akhituw negid bet ha’elohim. 
nehemiah 11:12	va’akheihem ‘osei hamelakhah labayit shemoneh mei’ot ‘esrim ushenayim va‘adayah ben yerokham ben pelalyah ben ’amtsi wen zekharyah ben pashkhur ben malkiyah. 
nehemiah 11:13	ve’ekhav rashim le’awot matayim ’arba‘im ushenayim va‘amashsai ben ‘azar’el ben ’akhzai ben meshileimot ben ’imer. 
nehemiah 11:14	va’akheihem giborei khayil mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah ufaqid ‘aleihem zawdi’el ben hagedolim. 
nehemiah 11:15	umin halviyim shema‘yah wen khashuw ben ‘azriqam ben khashawyah ben buni. 
nehemiah 11:16	veshabetai veyozawad ‘al hamelakhah hakhitsonah lewet ha’elohim meirashei halviyim. 
nehemiah 11:17	umatanyah wen mikhah ben zawdi wen ’asaf rosh hatekhilah yehodeh latefilah uwaqbuqyah mishneh mei’ekhav ve‘awda ben shamua‘ ben galal ben yeditun yedutun. 
nehemiah 11:18	kal halviyim be‘ir haqodesh matayim shemonim ve’arba‘ah. 
nehemiah 11:19	vehasho‘arim ‘aquw talmon va’akheihem hashomerim bashe‘arim mei’ah shiw‘im ushenayim. 
nehemiah 11:20	ushe’ar yisra’el hakohanim halviyim bekhal ‘arei yehudah ’ish benakhalato. 
nehemiah 11:21	vehanetinim yoshewim ba‘ofel vetsikha vegishpa ‘al hanetinim. 
nehemiah 11:22	ufeqid halviyim birushalim ‘uzi wen bani ben khashawyah ben matanyah ben mikha mibenei ’asaf hamshorerim leneged melekhet bet ha’elohim. 
nehemiah 11:23	ki mitsvat hamelekh ‘aleihem va’amanah ‘al hamshorerim dewar yom beyomo. 
nehemiah 11:24	ufetakhyah ben mesheizaw’el mibenei zerakh ben yehudah leyad hamelekh lekhal dawar la‘am. 
nehemiah 11:25	ve’el hakhatseirim bisdotam mibenei yehudah yashewu beqiryat ha’arba‘ uwenoteha uwediwon uwenoteha uwiqawtse’el vakhatseireha. 
nehemiah 11:26	uweyeishua‘ uwemoladah uwewet palet. 
nehemiah 11:27	uwakhatsar shu‘al uwiw’er shewa‘ uwenoteha. 
nehemiah 11:28	uwetsiqlag uwimkhonah uwiwnoteha. 
nehemiah 11:29	uwe‘en rimon uwetsare‘ah uweyarmut. 
nehemiah 11:30	zanoakh ‘adulam vekhatsreihem lakhish usedoteha ‘azeiqah uwenoteha vayakhanu mibe’er shewa‘ ‘ad gei hinom. 
nehemiah 11:31	uwenei winyamin migawa‘ mikhmas ve‘ayah uwet ’el uwenoteha. 
nehemiah 11:32	‘anatot now ‘ananeyah. 
nehemiah 11:33	khatsor ramah gitayim. 
nehemiah 11:34	khadid tsewo‘im newalat. 
nehemiah 11:35	lod ve’ono gei hakharashim. 
nehemiah 11:36	umin halviyim makhleqot yehudah lewinyamin. 
nehemiah 12:1	ve’eleh hakohanim vehalviyim ’asher ‘alu ‘im zerubawel ben she’alti’el veyeishua‘ serayah yirmeyah ‘ezra. 
nehemiah 12:2	’amaryah malukh khatush. 
nehemiah 12:3	shekhanyah rekhum mereimot. 
nehemiah 12:4	‘ido gineto ’awiyah. 
nehemiah 12:5	miyamin ma‘adyah bilgah. 
nehemiah 12:6	shema‘yah veyoyariw yeda‘yah. 
nehemiah 12:7	salu ‘amoq khilqiyah yeda‘yah ’eleh rashei hakohanim va’akheihem bimei yeishua‘. 
nehemiah 12:8	vehalviyim yeishua‘ binui qadmi’el sheireiweyah yehudah matanyah ‘al hyedot hu ve’ekhav 
nehemiah 12:9	uwaqbuqyah ve‘uno ve‘uni ’akheihem lenegdam lemishmarot. 
nehemiah 12:10	veyeishua‘ holid ’et yoyaqim veyoyaqim holid ’et ’elyashiw ve’elyashiw ’et yoyada‘. 
nehemiah 12:11	veyoyada‘ holid ’et yonatan veyonatan holid ’et yadua‘. 
nehemiah 12:12	uwimei yoyaqim hayu khohanim rashei ha’awot lisrayah merayah leyirmeyah khananyah. 
nehemiah 12:13	le‘ezra meshulam la’amaryah yehokhanan. 
nehemiah 12:14	limlukhi limlikhu yonatan lishwanyah yosef. 
nehemiah 12:15	lekharim ‘adna limrayot khelqai. 
nehemiah 12:16	la‘adaya le‘ido zekharyah legineton meshulam. 
nehemiah 12:17	la’awiyah zikhri leminyamin lemo‘adyah piltai. 
nehemiah 12:18	lewilgah shamua‘ lishma‘yah yehonatan. 
nehemiah 12:19	uleyoyariw matenai lida‘yah ‘uzi. 
nehemiah 12:20	lesalai qalai le‘amoq ‘eiwer. 
nehemiah 12:21	lekhilqiyah khashawyah lida‘yah netan’el. 
nehemiah 12:22	halviyim bimei ’elyashiw yoyada‘ veyokhanan veyadua‘ ketuwim rashei ’awot vehakohanim ‘al malkhut dareyavesh haparesi. 
nehemiah 12:23	benei leivi rashei ha’awot ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim ve‘ad yemei yokhanan ben ’elyashiw. 
nehemiah 12:24	verashei halviyim khashawyah sheireiweyah veyeishua‘ ben qadmi’el va’akheihem lenegdam lehalel lehodot bemitsvat david ’ish ha’elohim mishmar le‘umat mishmar. 
nehemiah 12:25	matanyah uwaqbuqyah ‘owadyah meshulam talmon ‘aquw shomerim sho‘arim mishmar ba’asupei hashe‘arim. 
nehemiah 12:26	’eleh bimei yoyaqim ben yeishua‘ ben yotsadaq uwimei nekhemyah hapekhah ve‘ezra hakohen hasofer. 
nehemiah 12:27	uwakhanukat khomat yerushalim biqshu ’et halviyim mikal meqomotam lahawi’am lirushalim la‘asot khanukah vesimkhah uwetodot uweshir metsiltayim newalim uwekhinorot. 
nehemiah 12:28	vayei’asefu benei hamshorerim umin hakikar sewiwot yerushalim umin khatsrei netofati. 
nehemiah 12:29	umibet hagilgal umisedot gewa‘ ve‘azmavet ki khatseirim banu lahem hamshorarim sewiwot yerushalim. 
nehemiah 12:30	vayitaharu hakohanim vehalviyim vaytaharu ’et ha‘am ve’et hashe‘arim ve’et hakhomah. 
nehemiah 12:31	va’a‘aleh ’et sarei yehudah mei‘al lakhomah va’a‘amidah shetei todot gedolot vetahalukhot layamin mei‘al lakhomah lesha‘ar ha’ashpot. 
nehemiah 12:32	vayeilekh ’akhareihem hosha‘yah vakhatsi sarei yehudah. 
nehemiah 12:33	va‘azaryah ‘ezra umeshulam. 
nehemiah 12:34	yehudah uwinyamin ushema‘yah veyirmeyah. 
nehemiah 12:35	umibenei hakohanim bakhatsotserot zekharyah wen yonatan ben shema‘yah ben matanyah ben mikhayah ben zakur ben ’asaf. 
nehemiah 12:36	ve’ekhav shema‘yah va‘azar’el milalai gilalai ma‘ai netan’el vihudah khanani bikhlei shir david ’ish ha’elohim ve‘ezra hasofer lifneihem. 
nehemiah 12:37	ve‘al sha‘ar ha‘ayin venegdam ‘alu ‘al ma‘alot ‘ir david bama‘aleh lakhomah mei‘al lewet david ve‘ad sha‘ar hamayim mizrakh. 
nehemiah 12:38	vehatodah hasheinit haholekhet lemol va’ani ’akhareha vakhatsi ha‘am mei‘al lehakhomah mei‘al lemigdal hatanurim ve‘ad hakhomah harekhawah. 
nehemiah 12:39	umei‘al lesha‘ar ’efrayim ve‘al sha‘ar hayshanah ve‘al sha‘ar hadagim umigdal khanan’el umigdal hamei’ah ve‘ad sha‘ar hatson ve‘amedu besha‘ar hamatarah. 
nehemiah 12:40	vata‘amodenah shetei hatodot bewet ha’elohim va’ani vakhatsi haseganim ‘imi. 
nehemiah 12:41	vehakohanim ’elyaqim ma‘aseiyah minyamin mikhayah ’elyo‘einai zekharyah khananyah bakhatsotserot. 
nehemiah 12:42	uma‘aseiyah ushema‘yah ve’el‘azar ve‘uzi vihokhanan umalkiyah ve‘eilam va‘azer vayashmi‘u hamshorerim veyizrakhyah hapaqid. 
nehemiah 12:43	vayizbekhu wayom hahu zewakhim gedolim vayismakhu ki ha’elohim simekham simkhah gedolah vegam hanashim vehayladim sameikhu vatishama‘ simkhat yerushalim meirakhoq. 
nehemiah 12:44	vayipaqedu wayom hahu ’anashim ‘al haneshakhot la’otsarot laterumot lareishit velama‘asrot likhnos bahem lisdei he‘arim mena’ot hatorah lakohanim velalviyim ki simkhat yehudah ‘al hakohanim ve‘al halviyim ha‘omedim. 
nehemiah 12:45	vayishmeru mishmeret ’eloheihem umishmeret hatahorah vehamshorerim vehasho‘arim kemitsvat david shelomoh weno. 
nehemiah 12:46	ki wimei david ve’asaf miqedem rosh rashei hamshorerim veshir tehilah vehodot leilohim. 
nehemiah 12:47	vekhal yisra’el bimei zerubawel uwimei nekhemyah notenim menayot hamshorerim vehasho‘arim dewar yom beyomo umaqdishim lalviyim vehalviyim maqdishim liwnei ’aharon. 
nehemiah 13:1	bayom hahu niqra beseifer mosheh be’azenei ha‘am venimtsa katuw bo ’asher lo yawo ‘amoni umo’awi biqhal ha’elohim ‘ad ‘olam. 
nehemiah 13:2	ki lo qidemu ’et benei yisra’el balekhem uwamayim vayiskor ‘alav ’et bil‘am leqalo vayahafokh ’eloheinu haqelalah liwrakhah. 
nehemiah 13:3	vayhi keshame‘am ’et hatorah vayawdilu khal ‘eirew miyisra’el. 
nehemiah 13:4	velifnei mizeh ’elyashiw hakohen natun belishkat bet ’eloheinu qarow letowiyah. 
nehemiah 13:5	vaya‘as lo lishkah gedolah vesham hayu lefanim notenim ’et haminkhah halewonah vehakeilim uma‘sar hadagan hatirosh vehayitshar mitsvat halviyim vehamshorerim vehasho‘arim uterumat hakohanim. 
nehemiah 13:6	uwekhal zeh lo hayiti birushalim ki bishnat sheloshim ushetayim le’artakhshast melekh bawel bati ’el hamelekh uleqets yamim nish’alti min hamelekh. 
nehemiah 13:7	va’awo lirushalim va’awinah wara‘ah ’asher ‘asah ’elyashiw letowiyah la‘asot lo nishkah bekhatsrei bet ha’elohim. 
nehemiah 13:8	vayeira‘ li me’od va’ashlikhah ’et kal kelei wet towiyah hakhuts min halishkah. 
nehemiah 13:9	va’omerah vaytaharu haleshakhot va’ashiwah sham kelei bet ha’elohim ’et haminkhah vehalewonah. 
nehemiah 13:10	va’eide‘ah ki menayot halviyim lo nitanah vayiwrekhu ’ish lesadeihu halviyim vehamshorerim ‘osei hamelakhah. 
nehemiah 13:11	va’ariwah ’et haseganim va’omerah madua‘ ne‘ezaw bet ha’elohim va’eqbetsem va’a‘amidem ‘al ‘amedam. 
nehemiah 13:12	vekhal yehudah heiwi’u ma‘sar hadagan vehatirosh vehayitshar la’otsarot. 
nehemiah 13:13	va’otsrah ‘al ’otsarot shelemyah hakohen vetsadoq hasofer ufedayah min halviyim ve‘al yadam khanan ben zakur ben matanyah ki ne’emanim nekhshawu va‘aleihem lakhaloq la’akheihem. 
nehemiah 13:14	zakherah li ’elohai ‘al zot ve’al temakh khasadai ’asher ‘asiti bewet ’elohai uwemishmarav. 
nehemiah 13:15	bayamim hahemah ra’iti wihudah dorekhim gitot bashabat umewi’im ha‘areimot ve‘omesim ‘al hakhamorim ve’af yayin ‘anawim ute’einim vekhal masa umewi’im yerushalim beyom hashabat va’a‘id beyom mikhram tsayid. 
nehemiah 13:16	vehatsorim yashewu wah mewi’im dag vekhal mekher umokherim bashabat liwnei yehudah uwirushalim. 
nehemiah 13:17	va’ariwah ’et khorei yehudah va’omerah lahem mah hadawar hara‘ hazeh ’asher ’atem ‘osim umekhalelim ’et yom hashabat. 
nehemiah 13:18	halo khoh ‘asu ’awoteikhem vayawei ’eloheinu ‘aleinu ’et kal hara‘ah hazot ve‘al ha‘ir hazot ve’atem mosifim kharon ‘al yisra’el lekhalel ’et hashabat. 
nehemiah 13:19	vayhi ka’asher tsalalu sha‘arei yerushalim lifnei hashabat va’omerah vayisageru hadelatot va’omerah ’asher lo yiftakhum ‘ad ’akhar hashabat umine‘arai he‘emadti ‘al hashe‘arim lo yawo masa beyom hashabat. 
nehemiah 13:20	vayalinu harokhelim umokherei khal mimkar mikhuts lirushalim pa‘am ushetayim. 
nehemiah 13:21	va’a‘idah wahem va’omerah ’aleihem madua‘ ’atem leinim neged hakhomah ’im tishnu yad ’eshlakh bakhem min ha‘et hahi lo wa’u bashabat. 
nehemiah 13:22	va’omerah lalviyim ’asher yihyu mitaharim uwa’im shomerim hashe‘arim leqadesh ’et yom hashabat gam zot zakherah li ’elohai vekhusah ‘alai kerow khasdekha. 
nehemiah 13:23	gam bayamim hahem ra’iti ’et hayehudim hoshiwu nashim ’ashdodiyot ’ashdodiyot ‘amoniyot ‘amoniyot mo’awiyot. 
nehemiah 13:24	uweneihem khatsi medaber ’ashdodit ve’einam makirim ledaber yehudit vekhilshon ‘am va‘am. 
nehemiah 13:25	va’ariw ‘imam va’aqalem va’akeh meihem ’anashim va’emretem va’ashbi‘em beilohim ’im titenu wenoteikhem liwneihem ve’im tis’u mibenoteihem liwneikhem velakhem. 
nehemiah 13:26	halo ‘al ’eleh khata shelomoh melekh yisra’el uwagoyim harabim lo hayah melekh kamohu ve’ahuw leilohav hayah vayiteneihu ’elohim melekh ‘al kal yisra’el gam ’oto hekheti’u hanashim hanakheriyot. 
nehemiah 13:27	velakhem hanishma‘ la‘asot ’et kal hara‘ah hagedolah hazot lim‘ol beiloheinu lehoshiw nashim nakheriyot. 
nehemiah 13:28	umibenei yoyada‘ ben ’elyashiw hakohen hagadol khatan lesanwalat hakhoroni va’awrikheihu mei‘alai. 
nehemiah 13:29	zakherah lahem ’elohai ‘al ga’olei hakehunah uwerit hakehunah vehalviyim. 
nehemiah 13:30	vetihartim mikal neikhar va’a‘amidah mishmarot lakohanim velalviyim ’ish bimlakhto. 
nehemiah 13:31	ulequrban ha‘eitsim be‘itim mezumanot velabikurim zakherah li ’elohai letowah. 
1_chronicles 1:1	’adam shet ’enosh. 
1_chronicles 1:2	qeinan mahalal’el yared. 
1_chronicles 1:3	khanokh metushelakh lamekh. 
1_chronicles 1:4	noakh shem kham vayafet. 
1_chronicles 1:5	benei yefet gomer umagog umadai veyavan vetuwal umeshekh vetiras. 
1_chronicles 1:6	uwenei gomer ’ashkanaz vedifat vetogarmah. 
1_chronicles 1:7	uwenei yavan ’elishah vetarshishah kitim verodanim. 
1_chronicles 1:8	benei kham kush umitsrayim put ukhena‘an. 
1_chronicles 1:9	uwenei khush sewa vakhavilah vesawta vera‘ma vesawtekha uwenei ra‘ma shewa udedan. 
1_chronicles 1:10	vekhush yalad ’et nimrod hu heikhel lihyot gibor ba’arets. 
1_chronicles 1:11	umitsrayim yalad ’et ludiyim ludim ve’et ‘anamim ve’et lehawim ve’et naftukhim. 
1_chronicles 1:12	ve’et patrusim ve’et kaslukhim ’asher yatse’u misham pelishtim ve’et kaftorim. 
1_chronicles 1:13	ukhena‘an yalad ’et tsidon bekhoro ve’et khet. 
1_chronicles 1:14	ve’et haywusi ve’et ha’emori ve’et hagirgashi. 
1_chronicles 1:15	ve’et hakhivi ve’et ha‘arqi ve’et hasini. 
1_chronicles 1:16	ve’et ha’arvadi ve’et hatsemari ve’et hakhamati. 
1_chronicles 1:17	benei shem ‘eilam ve’ashur ve’arpakhshad velud va’aram ve‘uts vekhul vegeter vameshekh. 
1_chronicles 1:18	ve’arpakhshad yalad ’et shalakh veshelakh yalad ’et ‘eiwer. 
1_chronicles 1:19	ule‘eiwer yulad shenei wanim shem ha’ekhad peleg ki weyamav niflegah ha’arets veshem ’akhiv yaqetan. 
1_chronicles 1:20	veyaqetan yalad ’et ’almodad ve’et shalef ve’et khatsarmavet ve’et yarakh. 
1_chronicles 1:21	ve’et hadoram ve’et ’uzal ve’et diqlah. 
1_chronicles 1:22	ve’et ‘eiwal ve’et ’awima’el ve’et shewa. 
1_chronicles 1:23	ve’et ’ofir ve’et khavilah ve’et yowaw kal ’eleh benei yaqetan. 
1_chronicles 1:24	shem ’arpakhshad shalakh. 
1_chronicles 1:25	‘eiwer peleg re‘u. 
1_chronicles 1:26	serug nakhor tarakh. 
1_chronicles 1:27	’awram hu ’awraham. 
1_chronicles 1:28	benei ’awraham yitskhaq veyishma‘el. 
1_chronicles 1:29	’eleh toledotam bekhor yishma‘el newayot veqeidar ve’adbe’el umiwsam. 
1_chronicles 1:30	mishma‘ vedumah masa khadad veteima. 
1_chronicles 1:31	yetur nafish vaqeidemah ’eleh hem benei yishma‘el. 
1_chronicles 1:32	uwenei qeturah pilegesh ’awraham yaledah ’et zimran veyaqeshan umedan umidyan veyishbaq veshuakh uwenei yaqeshan shewa udedan. 
1_chronicles 1:33	uwenei midyan ‘eifah va‘eifer vakhanokh va’awida‘ ve’elda‘ah kal ’eleh benei qeturah. 
1_chronicles 1:34	vayoled ’awraham ’et yitskhaq benei yitskhaq ‘eisav veyisra’el. 
1_chronicles 1:35	benei ‘eisav ’elifaz re‘u’el vi‘ush veya‘lam veqorakh. 
1_chronicles 1:36	benei ’elifaz teiman ve’omar tsefi vega‘tam qenaz vetimna‘ va‘amaleq. 
1_chronicles 1:37	benei re‘u’el nakhat zerakh shamah umizah. 
1_chronicles 1:38	uwenei sei‘ir lotan veshowal vetsiw‘on va‘anah vedishon ve’eitser vedishan. 
1_chronicles 1:39	uwenei lotan khori vehomam va’akhot lotan timna‘. 
1_chronicles 1:40	benei showal ‘alyan umanakhat ve‘eiwal shefi ve’onam uwenei tsiw‘on ’ayah va‘anah. 
1_chronicles 1:41	benei ‘anah dishon uwenei dishon khamran ve’eshban veyitran ukheran. 
1_chronicles 1:42	benei ’eitser bilhan veza‘avan ya‘aqan benei dishon ‘uts va’aran. 
1_chronicles 1:43	ve’eleh hamelakhim ’asher malekhu be’erets ’edom lifnei melakh melekh liwnei yisra’el bela‘ ben be‘or veshem ‘iro dinhawah. 
1_chronicles 1:44	vayamat bala‘ vayimlokh takhtav yowaw ben zerakh mibatserah. 
1_chronicles 1:45	vayamat yowaw vayimlokh takhtav khusham mei’erets hateimani. 
1_chronicles 1:46	vayamat khusham vayimlokh takhtav hadad ben bedad hamakeh ’et midyan bisdeh mo’aw veshem ‘iro ‘ayot ‘avit. 
1_chronicles 1:47	vayamat hadad vayimlokh takhtav samlah mimasreiqah. 
1_chronicles 1:48	vayamat samlah vayimlokh takhtav sha’ul meirekhowot hanahar. 
1_chronicles 1:49	vayamat sha’ul vayimlokh takhtav ba‘al khanan ben ‘akhbor. 
1_chronicles 1:50	vayamat ba‘al khanan vayimlokh takhtav hadad veshem ‘iro pa‘i veshem ’ishto meheitaw’el bat matred bat mei zahaw. 
1_chronicles 1:51	vayamat hadad vayihyu ’alufei ’edom ’aluf timna‘ ’aluf ‘alyah ‘alvah ’aluf yetet. 
1_chronicles 1:52	’aluf ’aholiwamah ’aluf ’eilah ’aluf pinon. 
1_chronicles 1:53	’aluf qenaz ’aluf teiman ’aluf miwtsar. 
1_chronicles 1:54	’aluf magdi’el ’aluf ‘iram ’eleh ’alufei ’edom. 
1_chronicles 2:1	’eleh benei yisra’el re’uwen shim‘on leivi vihudah yisashkhar uzewulun. 
1_chronicles 2:2	dan yosef uwinyamin naftali gad ve’asher. 
1_chronicles 2:3	benei yehudah ‘er ve’onan vesheilah sheloshah nolad lo mibat shua‘ hakena‘anit vayhi ‘er bekhor yehudah ra‘ be‘einei yhoh vaymiteihu. 
1_chronicles 2:4	vetamar kalato yaledah lo ’et perets ve’et zarakh kal benei yehudah khamishah. 
1_chronicles 2:5	benei ferets khetsron vekhamul. 
1_chronicles 2:6	uwenei zerakh zimri ve’eitan veheiman vekhalkol vadara‘ kulam khamishah. 
1_chronicles 2:7	uwenei karmi ‘akhar ‘okher yisra’el ’asher ma‘al bakheirem. 
1_chronicles 2:8	uwenei ’eitan ‘azaryah. 
1_chronicles 2:9	uwenei khetsron ’asher nolad lo ’et yerakhme’el ve’et ram ve’et keluwai. 
1_chronicles 2:10	veram holid ’et ‘aminadaw ve‘aminadaw holid ’et nakhshon nesi benei yehudah. 
1_chronicles 2:11	venakhshon holid ’et salma vesalma holid ’et bo‘az. 
1_chronicles 2:12	uwo‘az holid ’et ‘owed ve‘owed holid ’et yishai. 
1_chronicles 2:13	ve’ishai holid ’et bekhoro ’et ’eli’aw va’awinadaw hasheini veshim‘a hashelishi. 
1_chronicles 2:14	netan’el harewi‘i radai hakhamishi. 
1_chronicles 2:15	’otsem hashishi david hashewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 2:16	ve’akhyoteihem ve’akhyoteihem tseruyah va’awigayil uwenei tseruyah ’awshai veyo’aw va‘asah ’el sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 2:17	va’awigayil yaledah ’et ‘amasa va’awi ‘amasa yeter hayishme‘eili. 
1_chronicles 2:18	vekhalew ben khetsron holid ’et ‘azuwah ’ishah ve’et yeri‘ot ve’eleh waneha yeisher veshowaw ve’ardon. 
1_chronicles 2:19	vatamat ‘azuwah vayiqakh lo khalew ’et ’efrat vateiled lo ’et khur. 
1_chronicles 2:20	vekhur holid ’et ’uri ve’uri holid ’et betsal’el. 
1_chronicles 2:21	ve’akhar ba khetsron ’el bat makhir ’awi gil‘ad vehu leqakhah vehu ben shishim shanah vateiled lo ’et seguw. 
1_chronicles 2:22	useguw holid ’et ya’ir vayhi lo ‘esrim veshalosh ‘arim be’erets hagil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 2:23	vayiqakh geshur va’aram ’et khavot ya’ir mei’itam ’et qenat ve’et benoteha shishim ‘ir kal ’eleh benei makhir ’awi gil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 2:24	ve’akhar mot khetsron bekhalew ’efratah ve’eishet khetsron ’awiyah vateiled lo ’et ’ashkhur ’awi teqoa‘. 
1_chronicles 2:25	vayihyu wenei yerakhme’el bekhor khetsron habekhor ram uwunah va’oren va’otsem ’akhiyah. 
1_chronicles 2:26	vatehi ’ishah ’akheret lirakhme’el ushemah ‘atarah hi ’em ’onam. 
1_chronicles 2:27	vayihyu wenei ram bekhor yerakhme’el ma‘ats veyamin va‘eiqer. 
1_chronicles 2:28	vayihyu wenei ’onam shamai veyada‘ uwenei shamai nadaw va’awishur. 
1_chronicles 2:29	veshem ’eishet ’awishur ’awihayil vateiled lo ’et ’akhban ve’et molid. 
1_chronicles 2:30	uwenei nadaw seled ve’apayim vayamat seled lo wanim. 
1_chronicles 2:31	uwenei ’apayim yish‘i uwenei yish‘i sheishan uwenei sheishan ’akhlai. 
1_chronicles 2:32	uwenei yada‘ ’akhi shamai yeter veyonatan vayamat yeter lo wanim. 
1_chronicles 2:33	uwenei yonatan pelet vezaza ’eleh hayu benei yerakhme’el. 
1_chronicles 2:34	velo hayah lesheishan banim ki ’im banot ulesheishan ‘ewed mitsri ushemo yarkha‘. 
1_chronicles 2:35	vayiten sheishan ’et bito leyarkha‘ ‘awdo le’ishah vateiled lo ’et ‘atai. 
1_chronicles 2:36	ve‘atai holid ’et natan venatan holid ’et zawad. 
1_chronicles 2:37	vezawad holid ’et ’eflal ve’eflal holid ’et ‘owed. 
1_chronicles 2:38	ve‘owed holid ’et yeihu veyeihu holid ’et ‘azaryah. 
1_chronicles 2:39	va‘azaryah holid ’et khalets vekhelets holid ’et ’el‘asah. 
1_chronicles 2:40	ve’el‘asah holid ’et sismai vesismai holid ’et shalum. 
1_chronicles 2:41	veshalum holid ’et yeqamyah viqamyah holid ’et ’elishama‘. 
1_chronicles 2:42	uwenei khalew ’akhi yerakhme’el meisha‘ bekhoro hu ’awi zif uwenei mareishah ’awi khewron. 
1_chronicles 2:43	uwenei khewron qorakh vetapuakh vereqem vashama‘. 
1_chronicles 2:44	veshema‘ holid ’et rakham ’awi yareqo‘am vereqem holid ’et shamai. 
1_chronicles 2:45	uwen shamai ma‘on uma‘on ’awi wet tsur. 
1_chronicles 2:46	ve‘eifah pilegesh kalew yaledah ’et kharan ve’et motsa ve’et gazez vekharan holid ’et gazez. 
1_chronicles 2:47	uwenei yahedai regem veyotam vegeishan vafelet ve‘eifah vasha‘af. 
1_chronicles 2:48	pilegesh kalew ma‘akhah yalad shewer ve’et tirkhanah. 
1_chronicles 2:49	vateiled ‘af ’awi madmanah ’et sheva ’awi makhbeinah va’awi giw‘a uwat kalew ‘akhsah. 
1_chronicles 2:50	’eleh hayu benei khalew ben khur bekhor ’efratah showal ’awi qiryat ye‘arim. 
1_chronicles 2:51	salma ’awi wet lakhem kharef ’awi wet gader. 
1_chronicles 2:52	vayihyu wanim leshowal ’awi qiryat ye‘arim haro’eh khatsi hamenukhot. 
1_chronicles 2:53	umishpekhot qiryat ye‘arim hayitri vehaputi vehashumati vehamishra‘i mei’eleh yatse’u hatsare‘ati veha’eshta’uli. 
1_chronicles 2:54	benei salma bet lekhem unetofati ‘atrot bet yo’aw vakhatsi hamanakhti hatsare‘i. 
1_chronicles 2:55	umishpekhot soferim yoshewu yoshewei ya‘bets tir‘atim shim‘atim sukhatim hemah haqinim haba’im meikhamat ’awi wet reikhaw. 
1_chronicles 3:1	ve’eleh hayu benei davyid ’asher nolad lo bekhewron habekhor ’amnon la’akhino‘am hayizre‘eilit sheini daniyel la’awigayil hakarmelit. 
1_chronicles 3:2	hashelishi le’awshalom ben ma‘akhah bat talmai melekh geshur harewi‘i ’adoniyah wen khagit. 
1_chronicles 3:3	hakhamishi shefatyah la’awital hashishi yitre‘am le‘eglah ’ishto. 
1_chronicles 3:4	shishah nolad lo wekhewron vayimlakh sham shewa‘ shanim veshishah khodashim usheloshim veshalosh shanah malakh birushalim. 
1_chronicles 3:5	ve’eleh nuledu lo birushalayim me‘a veshowaw venatan ushelomoh ’arba‘ah lewat shua‘ bat ‘ami’el. 
1_chronicles 3:6	veyiwkhar ve’elishama‘ ve’elifalet. 
1_chronicles 3:7	venogah venefeg veyafia‘. 
1_chronicles 3:8	ve’elishama‘ ve’elyada‘ ve’elifelet tish‘ah. 
1_chronicles 3:9	kol benei david milewad benei filagshim vetamar ’akhotam. 
1_chronicles 3:10	uwen shelomoh rekhaw‘am ’awiyah weno ’asa weno yehoshafat beno. 
1_chronicles 3:11	yoram beno ’akhazyahu weno yo’ash beno. 
1_chronicles 3:12	’amatsyahu weno ‘azaryah weno yotam beno. 
1_chronicles 3:13	’akhaz beno khizqiyahu weno menasheh weno. 
1_chronicles 3:14	’amon beno yoshiyahu weno. 
1_chronicles 3:15	uwenei yoshiyahu habekhor yokhanan hasheini yehoyaqim hashelishi tsidqiyahu harewi‘i shalum. 
1_chronicles 3:16	uwenei yehoyaqim yekhaneyah weno tsidqiyah weno. 
1_chronicles 3:17	uwenei yekhaneyah ’asir she’alti’el beno. 
1_chronicles 3:18	umalkiram ufedayah veshen’atsar yeqamyah hoshama‘ unedawyah. 
1_chronicles 3:19	uwenei fedayah zerubawel veshim‘i uwen zerubawel meshulam vakhananyah ushelomit ’akhotam. 
1_chronicles 3:20	vakhashuwah va’ohel uwerekhyah vakhasadyah yushaw khesed khamesh. 
1_chronicles 3:21	uwen khananyah pelatyah visha‘yah benei refayah benei ’arnan benei ‘owadyah benei shekhanyah. 
1_chronicles 3:22	uwenei shekhanyah shema‘yah uwenei shema‘yah khatush veyig’al uwariakh une‘aryah veshafat shishah. 
1_chronicles 3:23	uwen ne‘aryah ’elyo‘einai vekhizqiyah ve‘azriqam sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 3:24	uwenei ’elyo‘einai hodayvahu hodavyahu ve’elyashiw ufelayah ve‘aquw veyokhanan udelayah va‘anani shiw‘ah. 
1_chronicles 4:1	benei yehudah perets khetsron vekharmi vekhur veshowal. 
1_chronicles 4:2	ure’ayah wen showal holid ’et yakhat veyakhat holid ’et ’akhumai ve’et lahad ’eleh mishpekhot hatsare‘ati. 
1_chronicles 4:3	ve’eleh ’awi ‘eitam yizre‘el veyishma veyidbash veshem ’akhotam hatslelponi. 
1_chronicles 4:4	ufenu’el ’awi gedor ve‘eizer ’awi khushah ’eleh wenei khur bekhor ’efratah ’awi bet lakhem. 
1_chronicles 4:5	ule’ashkhur ’awi teqoa‘ hayu shetei nashim khel’ah vena‘arah. 
1_chronicles 4:6	vateiled lo na‘arah ’et ’akhuzam ve’et kheifer ve’et teimeni ve’et ha’akhashtari ’eleh benei na‘arah. 
1_chronicles 4:7	uwenei khel’ah tseret yitskhar vetsokhar ve’etnan. 
1_chronicles 4:8	veqots holid ’et ‘anuw ve’et hatsoweiwah umishpekhot ’akharkhel ben harum. 
1_chronicles 4:9	vayhi ya‘bets nikhbad mei’ekhav ve’imo qare’ah shemo ya‘bets leimor ki yaladti be‘otsew. 
1_chronicles 4:10	vayiqra ya‘bets leilohei yisra’el leimor ’im barekh tewarakheini vehirbita ’et gewuli vehayetah yadekha ‘imi ve‘asita meira‘ah lewilti ‘atsebi vayawei ’elohim ’et ’asher sha’al. 
1_chronicles 4:11	ukheluw ’akhi shukhah holid ’et mekhir hu ’awi ’eshton. 
1_chronicles 4:12	ve’eshton holid ’et bet rafa ve’et paseiakh ve’et tekhinah ’awi ‘ir nakhash ’eleh ’anshei reikhah. 
1_chronicles 4:13	uwenei qenaz ‘ateni’el userayah uwenei ‘ateni’el khatat. 
1_chronicles 4:14	ume‘onotai holid ’et ‘aferah userayah holid ’et yo’aw ’awi gei kharashim ki kharashim hayu. 
1_chronicles 4:15	uwenei kalew ben yefuneh ‘iru ’eilah vana‘am uwenei ’eilah uqenaz. 
1_chronicles 4:16	uwenei yehalel’el zif vezifah tireya va’asar’el. 
1_chronicles 4:17	uwen ‘ezrah yeter umered ve‘eifer veyalon vatahar ’et miryam ve’et shamai ve’et yishbakh ’awi ’eshtemoa‘. 
1_chronicles 4:18	ve’ishto hayhudiyah yaledah ’et yered ’awi gedor ve’et khewer ’awi sokho ve’et yequti’el ’awi zanoakh ve’eleh benei bityah wat par‘oh ’asher laqakh mared. 
1_chronicles 4:19	uwenei ’eishet hodiyah ’akhot nakham ’awi qe‘ilah hagarmi ve’eshtemoa‘ hama‘akhati. 
1_chronicles 4:20	uwenei shimon ’amnon verinah ben khanan vetolon vetilon uwenei yish‘i zokhet uwen zokhet. 
1_chronicles 4:21	benei sheilah wen yehudah ‘er ’awi leikhah vela‘dah ’awi mareishah umishpekhot bet ‘awodat habuts lewet ’ashbeia‘. 
1_chronicles 4:22	veyoqim ve’anshei khozeiwa veyo’ash vesaraf ’asher ba‘alu lemo’aw veyashuwi lakhem vehadewarim ‘atiqim. 
1_chronicles 4:23	hemah hayotsrim veyoshewei neta‘im ugedeirah ‘im hamelekh bimlakhto yashewu sham. 
1_chronicles 4:24	benei shim‘on nemu’el veyamin yariw zerakh sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 4:25	shalum beno miwsam beno mishma‘ beno. 
1_chronicles 4:26	uwenei mishma‘ khamu’el beno zakur beno shim‘i weno. 
1_chronicles 4:27	uleshim‘i banim shishah ‘asar uwanot shesh ule’ekhav ’en banim rabim vekhol mishpakhtam lo hirbu ‘ad benei yehudah. 
1_chronicles 4:28	vayeishewu biw’er shewa‘ umoladah vakhatsar shu‘al. 
1_chronicles 4:29	uwewilhah uwe‘etsem uwetolad. 
1_chronicles 4:30	uwiwtu’el uwekharemah uwetsiqelag. 
1_chronicles 4:31	uwewet markawot uwakhatsar susim uwewet bir’i uwesha‘arayim ’eleh ‘areihem ‘ad melokh david. 
1_chronicles 4:32	vekhatsreihem ‘eitam va‘ayin rimon vetokhen ve‘ashan ‘arim khamesh. 
1_chronicles 4:33	vekhal khatsreihem ’asher sewiwot he‘arim ha’eleh ‘ad ba‘al zot moshewotam vehityakhsam lahem. 
1_chronicles 4:34	umeshowaw veyamlekh veyoshah ben ’amatsyah. 
1_chronicles 4:35	veyo’el veyeihu ben yoshiwyah ben serayah ben ‘asi’el. 
1_chronicles 4:36	ve’elyo‘einai veya‘aqowah vishokhayah va‘asayah va‘adi’el visimi’el uwenayah. 
1_chronicles 4:37	veziza wen shif‘i wen ’alon ben yedayah wen shimri ben shema‘yah. 
1_chronicles 4:38	’eleh haba’im besheimot nesi’im bemishpekhotam uwet ’awoteihem paretsu larow. 
1_chronicles 4:39	vayeilekhu limwo gedor ‘ad lemizrakh hagai lewaqesh mir‘eh letsonam. 
1_chronicles 4:40	vayimtse’u mir‘eh shamen vatow veha’arets rakhawat yadayim veshoqetet usheleivah ki min kham hayoshewim sham lefanim. 
1_chronicles 4:41	vayawo’u ’eleh haketuwim besheimot bimei yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayaku ’et ’aholeihem ve’et hame‘inim hame‘unim ’asher nimtse’u shamah vayakharimum ‘ad hayom hazeh vayeishewu takhteihem ki mir‘eh letsonam sham. 
1_chronicles 4:42	umeihem min benei shim‘on halekhu lehar sei‘ir ’anashim khamesh mei’ot ufelatyah une‘aryah urefayah ve‘uzi’el benei yish‘i berosham. 
1_chronicles 4:43	vayaku ’et she’eirit hapeleitah la‘amaleq vayeishewu sham ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_chronicles 5:1	uwenei re’uwen bekhor yisra’el ki hu habekhor uwekhalelo yetsu‘ei ’awiv nitenah bekhorato liwnei yosef ben yisra’el velo lehityakhes labekhorah. 
1_chronicles 5:2	ki yehudah gawar be’ekhav ulenagid mimenu vehabekhorah leyosef. 
1_chronicles 5:3	benei re’uwen bekhor yisra’el khanokh ufalu khetsron vekharmi. 
1_chronicles 5:4	benei yo’el shema‘yah weno gog beno shim‘i weno. 
1_chronicles 5:5	mikhah weno re’ayah weno ba‘al beno. 
1_chronicles 5:6	be’eirah weno ’asher heglah tilegat pilne’eser melekh ’ashur hu nasi lar’uweini. 
1_chronicles 5:7	ve’ekhav lemishpekhotav behityakhes letoledotam harosh ye‘i’el uzekharyahu. 
1_chronicles 5:8	uwela‘ ben ‘azaz ben shema‘ ben yo’el hu yoshew ba‘aro‘er ve‘ad newo uwa‘al me‘on. 
1_chronicles 5:9	velamizrakh yashaw ‘ad lewo midbarah lemin hanahar perat ki miqneihem rawu be’erets gil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 5:10	uwimei sha’ul ‘asu milkhamah ‘im hahagri’im vayipelu beyadam vayeishewu be’aholeihem ‘al kal penei mizrakh lagil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 5:11	uwenei gad lenegdam yashewu be’erets habashan ‘ad salkhah. 
1_chronicles 5:12	yo’el harosh veshafam hamishneh veya‘nai veshafat babashan. 
1_chronicles 5:13	va’akheihem lewet ’awoteihem mikha’el umeshulam veshewa‘ veyorai veya‘kan vezia‘ va‘eiwer shiw‘ah. 
1_chronicles 5:14	’eleh benei ’awikhayil ben khuri ben yaroakh ben gil‘ad ben mikha’el ben yeshishai ben yakhdo ben buz. 
1_chronicles 5:15	’akhi ben ‘awdi’el ben guni rosh lewet ’awotam. 
1_chronicles 5:16	vayeishewu bagil‘ad babashan uwiwnoteha uwekhal migreshei sharon ‘al tots’otam. 
1_chronicles 5:17	kulam hityakhsu bimei yotam melekh yehudah uwimei yarawe‘am melekh yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 5:18	benei re’uwen vegadi vakhatsi sheiwet menasheh min benei khayil ’anashim nose’ei magen vekherew vedorekhei qeshet ulemudei milkhamah ’arba‘im ve’arba‘ah ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot veshishim yotse’ei tsawa. 
1_chronicles 5:19	vaya‘asu milkhamah ‘im hahagri’im vitur venafish venodaw. 
1_chronicles 5:20	vayei‘azeru ‘aleihem vayinatenu weyadam hahagri’im vekhol she‘imahem ki leilohim za‘aqu bamilkhamah vena‘tor lahem ki watekhu wo. 
1_chronicles 5:21	vayishbu miqneihem gemaleihem khamishim ’elef vetson matayim vakhamishim ’elef vakhamorim ’alpayim venefesh ’adam mei’ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 5:22	ki khalalim rabim nafalu ki meiha’elohim hamilkhamah vayeishewu takhteihem ‘ad hagolah. 
1_chronicles 5:23	uwenei khatsi sheiwet menasheh yashewu ba’arets mibashan ‘ad ba‘al khermon usenir vehar khermon hemah rawu. 
1_chronicles 5:24	ve’eleh rashei wet ’awotam ve‘eifer veyish‘i ve’eli’el ve‘azri’el veyirmeyah vehodavyah veyakhdi’el ’anashim giborei khayil ’anshei sheimot rashim lewet ’awotam. 
1_chronicles 5:25	vayim‘alu beilohei ’awoteihem vayiznu ’akharei ’elohei ‘amei ha’arets ’asher hishmid ’elohim mipeneihem. 
1_chronicles 5:26	vaya‘ar ’elohei yisra’el ’et ruakh pul melekh ’ashur ve’et ruakh tilegat pilneser melekh ’ashur vayaglem lar’uweini velagadi velakhatsi sheiwet menasheh vaywi’em lakhlakh vekhawor vehara unehar gozan ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_chronicles 6:1	benei leivi geireshon qehat umerari. 
1_chronicles 6:2	uwenei qehat ‘amram yitshar vekhewron ve‘uzi’el. 
1_chronicles 6:3	uwenei ‘amram ’aharon umosheh umiryam uwenei ’aharon nadaw va’awihu ’el‘azar ve’itamar. 
1_chronicles 6:4	’el‘azar holid ’et pinekhas pinekhas holid ’et ’awishua‘. 
1_chronicles 6:5	va’awishua‘ holid ’et buqi uwuqi holid ’et ‘uzi. 
1_chronicles 6:6	ve‘uzi holid ’et zerakhyah uzerakhyah holid ’et merayot. 
1_chronicles 6:7	merayot holid ’et ’amaryah va’amaryah holid ’et ’akhituw. 
1_chronicles 6:8	va’akhituw holid ’et tsadoq vetsadoq holid ’et ’akhima‘ats. 
1_chronicles 6:9	va’akhima‘ats holid ’et ‘azaryah va‘azaryah holid ’et yokhanan. 
1_chronicles 6:10	veyokhanan holid ’et ‘azaryah hu ’asher kihen babayit ’asher banah shelomoh birushalim. 
1_chronicles 6:11	vayoled ‘azaryah ’et ’amaryah va’amaryah holid ’et ’akhituw. 
1_chronicles 6:12	va’akhituw holid ’et tsadoq vetsadoq holid ’et shalum. 
1_chronicles 6:13	veshalum holid ’et khilqiyah vekhilqiyah holid ’et ‘azaryah. 
1_chronicles 6:14	va‘azaryah holid ’et serayah userayah holid ’et yehotsadaq. 
1_chronicles 6:15	vihotsadaq halakh behaglot yhoh ’et yehudah virushalim beyad newukhadnetsar. 
1_chronicles 6:16	benei leivi geireshom qehat umerari. 
1_chronicles 6:17	ve’eleh shemot benei geireshom liwni veshim‘i. 
1_chronicles 6:18	uwenei qehat ‘amram veyitshar vekhewron ve‘uzi’el. 
1_chronicles 6:19	benei merari makhli umushi ve’eleh mishpekhot haleivi la’awoteihem. 
1_chronicles 6:20	legeireshom liwni weno yakhat beno zimah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:21	yo’akh beno ‘ido weno zerakh beno ye’aterai beno. 
1_chronicles 6:22	benei qehat ‘aminadaw beno qorakh beno ’asir beno. 
1_chronicles 6:23	’elqanah weno ve’ewyasaf beno ve’asir beno. 
1_chronicles 6:24	takhat beno ’uri’el beno ‘uziyah weno vesha’ul beno. 
1_chronicles 6:25	uwenei ’elqanah ‘amasai va’akhimot. 
1_chronicles 6:26	’elqanah beno benei ’elqanah tsofai beno venakhat beno. 
1_chronicles 6:27	’eli’aw beno yerokham beno ’elqanah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:28	uwenei shemu’el habekhor vashni va’awiyah. 
1_chronicles 6:29	benei merari makhli liwni weno shim‘i weno ‘uzah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:30	shim‘a weno khagiyah weno ‘asayah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:31	ve’eleh ’asher he‘emid david ‘al yedei shir bet yhoh mimenoakh ha’aron. 
1_chronicles 6:32	vayihyu mesharetim lifnei mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed bashir ‘ad benot shelomoh ’et bet yhoh birushalim vaya‘amdu khemishpatam ‘al ‘awodatam. 
1_chronicles 6:33	ve’eleh ha‘omedim uweneihem mibenei haqehati heiman hamshorer ben yo’el ben shemu’el. 
1_chronicles 6:34	ben ’elqanah ben yerokham ben ’eli’el ben toakh. 
1_chronicles 6:35	ben tsif tsuf ben ’elqanah ben makhat ben ‘amasai. 
1_chronicles 6:36	ben ’elqanah ben yo’el ben ‘azaryah ben tsefanyah. 
1_chronicles 6:37	ben takhat ben ’asir ben ’ewyasaf ben qorakh. 
1_chronicles 6:38	ben yitshar ben qehat ben leivi ben yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 6:39	ve’akhiv ’asaf ha‘omed ‘al yemino ’asaf ben berekhyahu ben shim‘a. 
1_chronicles 6:40	ben mikha’el ben ba‘aseiyah ben malkiyah. 
1_chronicles 6:41	ben ’etni wen zerakh ben ‘adayah. 
1_chronicles 6:42	ben ’eitan ben zimah ben shim‘i. 
1_chronicles 6:43	ben yakhat ben geireshom ben leivi. 
1_chronicles 6:44	uwenei merari ’akheihem ‘al hasemol ’eitan ben qishi ben ‘awdi ben malukh. 
1_chronicles 6:45	ben khashawyah wen ’amatsyah ben khilqiyah. 
1_chronicles 6:46	ben ’amtsi wen bani ben shamer. 
1_chronicles 6:47	ben makhli ben mushi ben merari ben leivi. 
1_chronicles 6:48	va’akheihem halviyim netunim lekhal ‘awodat mishkan bet ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 6:49	ve’aharon uwanav maqtirim ‘al mizbakh ha‘olah ve‘al mizbakh haqetoret lekhol melekhet qodesh haqodashim ulekhaper ‘al yisra’el kekhol ’asher tsivah mosheh ‘ewed ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 6:50	ve’eleh benei ’aharon ’el‘azar beno pinekhas beno ’awishua‘ beno. 
1_chronicles 6:51	buqi weno ‘uzi weno zerakhyah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:52	merayot beno ’amaryah weno ’akhituw beno. 
1_chronicles 6:53	tsadoq beno ’akhima‘ats beno. 
1_chronicles 6:54	ve’eleh moshewotam letirotam bigwulam liwnei ’aharon lemishpakhat haqehati ki lahem hayah hagoral. 
1_chronicles 6:55	vayitenu lahem ’et khewron be’erets yehudah ve’et migrasheha sewiwoteha. 
1_chronicles 6:56	ve’et sedeh ha‘ir ve’et khatseireha natenu lekhalew ben yefuneh. 
1_chronicles 6:57	veliwnei ’aharon natenu ’et ‘arei hamiqlat ’et khewron ve’et liwnah ve’et migrasheha ve’et yatir ve’et ’eshtemoa‘ ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:58	ve’et khilez ve’et migrasheha ’et dewir ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:59	ve’et ‘ashan ve’et migrasheha ve’et bet shemesh ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:60	umimateh winyamin ’et gewa‘ ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘alemet ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘anatot ve’et migrasheha kal ‘areihem shelosh ‘esreh ‘ir bemishpekhoteihem. 
1_chronicles 6:61	veliwnei qehat hanotarim mimishpakhat hamateh mimakhatsit mateh khatsi menasheh bagoral ‘arim ‘aser. 
1_chronicles 6:62	veliwnei geireshom lemishpekhotam mimateh yisashkhar umimateh ’asher umimateh naftali umimateh menasheh babashan ‘arim shelosh ‘esreh. 
1_chronicles 6:63	liwnei merari lemishpekhotam mimateh re’uwen umimateh gad umimateh zewulun bagoral ‘arim shetem ‘esreh. 
1_chronicles 6:64	vayitenu wenei yisra’el lalviyim ’et he‘arim ve’et migresheihem. 
1_chronicles 6:65	vayitenu wagoral mimateh wenei yehudah umimateh wenei shim‘on umimateh benei winyamin ’et he‘arim ha’eleh ’asher yiqre’u ’ethem besheimot. 
1_chronicles 6:66	umimishpekhot benei qehat vayhi ‘arei gewulam mimateh ’efrayim. 
1_chronicles 6:67	vayitenu lahem ’et ‘arei hamiqlat ’et shekhem ve’et migrasheha behar ’efrayim ve’et gezer ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:68	ve’et yaqeme‘am ve’et migrasheha ve’et bet khoron ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:69	ve’et ’ayalon ve’et migrasheha ve’et gat rimon ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:70	umimakhatsit mateh menasheh ’et ‘aner ve’et migrasheha ve’et bil‘am ve’et migrasheha lemishpakhat liwnei qehat hanotarim. 
1_chronicles 6:71	liwnei geireshom mimishpakhat khatsi mateh menasheh ’et golan babashan ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘ashtarot ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:72	umimateh yisashkhar ’et qedesh ve’et migrasheha ’et dawerat ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:73	ve’et ramot ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘anem ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:74	umimateh ’asher ’et mashal ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘awdon ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:75	ve’et khuqoq ve’et migrasheha ve’et rekhow ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:76	umimateh naftali ’et qedesh bagalil ve’et migrasheha ve’et khamon ve’et migrasheha ve’et qiryatayim ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:77	liwnei merari hanotarim mimateh zewulun ’et rimono ve’et migrasheha ’et tawor ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:78	umei‘eiwer leyarden yereikho lemizrakh hayarden mimateh re’uwen ’et betser bamidbar ve’et migrasheha ve’et yahtsah ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:79	ve’et qedeimot ve’et migrasheha ve’et meifa‘at ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:80	umimateh gad ’et ramot bagil‘ad ve’et migrasheha ve’et makhanayim ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:81	ve’et kheshbon ve’et migrasheha ve’et ya‘zer ve’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 7:1	veliwnei yisashkhar tola‘ ufu’ah yashiw yashuw veshimron ’arba‘ah. 
1_chronicles 7:2	uwenei tola‘ ‘uzi urefayah viri’el veyakhmai veyiwsam ushemu’el rashim lewet ’awotam letola‘ giborei khayil letoledotam misparam bimei david ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef veshesh mei’ot. 
1_chronicles 7:3	uwenei ‘uzi yizrakhyah uwenei yizrakhyah mikha’el ve‘owadyah veyo’el yishiyah khamishah rashim kulam. 
1_chronicles 7:4	va‘aleihem letoledotam lewet ’awotam gedudei tsewa milkhamah sheloshim veshishah ’alef ki hirbu nashim uwanim. 
1_chronicles 7:5	va’akheihem lekhol mishpekhot yisashkhar giborei khayalim shemonim veshiw‘ah ’elef hityakhsam lakol. 
1_chronicles 7:6	binyamin bela‘ vawekher vidi‘a’el sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 7:7	uwenei wela‘ ’etsbon ve‘uzi ve‘uzi’el virimot ve‘iri khamishah rashei bet ’awot giborei khayalim vehityakhsam ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef usheloshim ve’arba‘ah. 
1_chronicles 7:8	uwenei wekher zemirah veyo‘ash ve’eli‘ezer ve’elyo‘einai ve‘ameri vireimot va’awiyah va‘anatot ve‘alamet kal ’eleh benei wakher. 
1_chronicles 7:9	vehityakhsam letoledotam rashei bet ’awotam giborei khayil ‘esrim ’elef umatayim. 
1_chronicles 7:10	uwenei yedi‘a’el bilhan uwenei wilhan ye‘ish ye‘ush uwinyamin ve’eihud ukhena‘anah vezeitan vetarshish va’akhishakhar. 
1_chronicles 7:11	kal ’eleh benei yedi‘a’el lerashei ha’awot giborei khayalim shiw‘ah ‘asar ’elef umatayim yotse’ei tsawa lamilkhamah. 
1_chronicles 7:12	veshupim vekhupim benei ‘ir khushim benei ’akher. 
1_chronicles 7:13	benei naftali yakhatsi’el veguni veyeitser veshalum benei wilhah. 
1_chronicles 7:14	benei menasheh ’asri’el ’asher yaladah pilagsho ha’aramiyah yaledah ’et makhir ’awi gil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 7:15	umakhir laqakh ’ishah lekhupim uleshupim veshem ’akhoto ma‘akhah veshem hasheini tselafekhad vatihyenah litslafekhad banot. 
1_chronicles 7:16	vateiled ma‘akhah ’eishet makhir ben vatiqra shemo peresh veshem ’akhiv sharesh uwanav ’ulam varaqem. 
1_chronicles 7:17	uwenei ’ulam bedan ’eleh benei gil‘ad ben makhir ben menasheh. 
1_chronicles 7:18	va’akhoto hamolekhet yaledah ’et ’ishehod ve’et ’awi‘ezer ve’et makhlah. 
1_chronicles 7:19	vayihyu benei shemida‘ ’akhyan vashekhem veliqkhi va’ani‘am. 
1_chronicles 7:20	uwenei ’efrayim shutalakh uwered beno vetakhat beno ve’el‘adah weno vetakhat beno. 
1_chronicles 7:21	vezawad beno veshutelakh beno ve‘eizer ve’el‘ad vaharagum ’anshei gat hanoladim ba’arets ki yaredu laqakhat ’et miqneihem. 
1_chronicles 7:22	vayit’abel ’efrayim ’awihem yamim rabim vayawo’u ’ekhav lenakhamo. 
1_chronicles 7:23	vayawo ’el ’ishto vatahar vateiled ben vayiqra ’et shemo beri‘ah ki wera‘ah hayetah beweito. 
1_chronicles 7:24	uwito she’erah vatiwen ’et bet khoron hatakhton ve’et ha‘elyon ve’et ’uzen she’erah. 
1_chronicles 7:25	verefakh beno vereshef vetelakh beno vetakhan beno. 
1_chronicles 7:26	la‘dan beno ‘amihud beno ’elishama‘ beno. 
1_chronicles 7:27	non beno yehoshua‘ beno. 
1_chronicles 7:28	va’akhuzatam umoshewotam bet ’el uwenoteha velamizrakh na‘aran velama‘araw gezer uwenoteha ushekhem uwenoteha ‘ad ‘ayah uwenoteha. 
1_chronicles 7:29	ve‘al yedei wenei menasheh bet she’an uwenoteha ta‘nakh uwenoteha megido uwenoteha dor uwenoteha be’eleh yashewu benei yosef ben yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 7:30	benei ’asher yimnah veyishvah veyishvi uweri‘ah veserakh ’akhotam. 
1_chronicles 7:31	uwenei weri‘ah khewer umalki’el hu ’awi wirzot wirzayit. 
1_chronicles 7:32	vekhewer holid ’et yaflet ve’et shomer ve’et khotam ve’et shu‘a ’akhotam. 
1_chronicles 7:33	uwenei yaflet pasakh uwimhal ve‘ashvat ’eleh benei yaflet. 
1_chronicles 7:34	uwenei shamer ’akhi verohagah verahegah yakhbah vekhubah va’aram. 
1_chronicles 7:35	uwen heilem ’akhiv tsofakh veyimna‘ vesheilesh ve‘amal. 
1_chronicles 7:36	benei tsofakh suakh vekharnefer veshu‘al uweiri veyimrah. 
1_chronicles 7:37	betser vahod veshama veshilshah veyitran uwe’eira. 
1_chronicles 7:38	uwenei yeter yefuneh ufispah va’ra. 
1_chronicles 7:39	uwenei ‘ula ’arakh vekhani’el veritsya. 
1_chronicles 7:40	kal ’eleh wenei ’asher rashei wet ha’awot berurim giborei khayalim rashei hanesi’im vehityakhsam batsawa bamilkhamah misparam ’anashim ‘esrim veshishah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 8:1	uwinyamin holid ’et bela‘ bekhoro ’ashbel hasheini ve’akhrakh hashelishi. 
1_chronicles 8:2	nokhah harewi‘i verafa hakhamishi. 
1_chronicles 8:3	vayihyu wanim lewala‘ ’adar vegeira va’awihud. 
1_chronicles 8:4	va’awishua‘ vena‘aman va’akhoakh. 
1_chronicles 8:5	vegeira ushefufan vekhuram. 
1_chronicles 8:6	ve’eleh benei ’eikhud ’eleh hem rashei ’awot leyoshewei gewa‘ vayaglum ’el manakhat. 
1_chronicles 8:7	vena‘aman va’akhiyah vegeira hu heglam veholid ’et ‘uza ve’et ’akhikhud. 
1_chronicles 8:8	veshakharayim holid bisdeh mo’aw min shilkho ’otam khushim ve’et ba‘ara nashav. 
1_chronicles 8:9	vayoled min khodesh ’ishto ’et yowaw ve’et tsiwya ve’et meisha ve’et malkam. 
1_chronicles 8:10	ve’et ye‘uts ve’et sakheyah ve’et mirmah ’eleh wanav rashei ’awot. 
1_chronicles 8:11	umeikhushim holid ’et ’awituw ve’et ’elpa‘al. 
1_chronicles 8:12	uwenei ’elpa‘al ‘eiwer umish‘am vashamed hu banah ’et ’ono ve’et lod uwenoteha. 
1_chronicles 8:13	uweri‘ah vashema‘ hemah rashei ha’awot leyoshewei ’ayalon hemah hiwrikhu ’et yoshewei gat. 
1_chronicles 8:14	ve’akhyo shashaq vireimot. 
1_chronicles 8:15	uzewadyah va‘arad va‘ader. 
1_chronicles 8:16	umikha’el veyishpah veyokha benei weri‘ah. 
1_chronicles 8:17	uzewadyah umeshulam vekhizqi vakhawer. 
1_chronicles 8:18	veyishmerai veyizli’ah veyowaw benei ’elpa‘al. 
1_chronicles 8:19	veyaqim vezikhri vezawdi. 
1_chronicles 8:20	ve’eli‘einai vetsiletai ve’eli’el. 
1_chronicles 8:21	va‘adayah uwerayah veshimrat benei shim‘i. 
1_chronicles 8:22	veyishpan va‘eiwer ve’eli’el. 
1_chronicles 8:23	ve‘awdon vezikhri vekhanan. 
1_chronicles 8:24	vakhananyah ve‘eilam ve‘antotiyah. 
1_chronicles 8:25	veyifdeyah ufeni’el ufenu’el benei shashaq. 
1_chronicles 8:26	veshamsherai ushekharyah va‘atalyah. 
1_chronicles 8:27	veya‘areshyah ve’eiliyah vezikhri benei yerokham. 
1_chronicles 8:28	’eleh rashei ’awot letoledotam rashim ’eleh yashewu wirushalim. 
1_chronicles 8:29	uwegiw‘on yashewu ’awi giw‘on veshem ’ishto ma‘akhah. 
1_chronicles 8:30	uweno habekhor ‘awdon vetsur veqish uwa‘al venadaw. 
1_chronicles 8:31	ugedor ve’akhyo vazakher. 
1_chronicles 8:32	umiqlot holid ’et shim’ah ve’af hemah neged ’akheihem yashewu wirushalim ‘im ’akheihem. 
1_chronicles 8:33	vener holid ’et qish veqish holid ’et sha’ul vesha’ul holid ’et yehonatan ve’et malki shua‘ ve’et ’awinadaw ve’et ’eshba‘al. 
1_chronicles 8:34	uwen yehonatan meriw ba‘al umeriw ba‘al holid ’et mikhah. 
1_chronicles 8:35	uwenei mikhah piton vamelekh veta’reia‘ ve’akhaz. 
1_chronicles 8:36	ve’akhaz holid ’et yeho‘adah viho‘adah holid ’et ‘alemet ve’et ‘azmavet ve’et zimri vezimri holid ’et motsa. 
1_chronicles 8:37	umotsa holid ’et bin‘a rafah weno ’el‘asah weno ’atsel beno. 
1_chronicles 8:38	ule’atsel shishah wanim ve’eleh shemotam ‘azriqam bokheru veyishma‘el ushe‘aryah ve‘owadyah vekhanan kal ’eleh benei ’atsal. 
1_chronicles 8:39	uwenei ‘eisheq ’akhiv ’ulam bekhoro ye‘ush hasheini ve’elifelet hashelishi. 
1_chronicles 8:40	vayihyu wenei ’ulam ’anashim giborei khayil dorekhei qeshet umarbim banim uwenei wanim mei’ah vakhamishim kal ’eleh mibenei winyamin. 
1_chronicles 9:1	vekhal yisra’el hityakhsu vehinam ketuwim ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el vihudah hagelu lewawel bema‘alam. 
1_chronicles 9:2	vehayoshewim harishonim ’asher ba’akhuzatam be‘areihem yisra’el hakohanim halviyim vehanetinim. 
1_chronicles 9:3	uwirushalim yashewu min benei yehudah umin benei winyamin umin benei ’efrayim umenasheh. 
1_chronicles 9:4	‘utai ben ‘amihud ben ‘ameri ben ’imri wen banimin bani min benei ferets ben yehudah. 
1_chronicles 9:5	umin hashiloni ‘asayah habekhor uwanav. 
1_chronicles 9:6	umin benei zerakh ye‘u’el va’akheihem shesh mei’ot vetish‘im. 
1_chronicles 9:7	umin benei binyamin salu ben meshulam ben hodavyah ben hasenu’ah. 
1_chronicles 9:8	veyiwneyah ben yerokham ve’eilah wen ‘uzi ben mikhri umeshulam ben shefatyah ben re‘u’el ben yiwniyah. 
1_chronicles 9:9	va’akheihem letoledotam tesha‘ mei’ot vakhamishim veshishah kal ’eleh ’anashim rashei ’awot lewet ’awoteihem. 
1_chronicles 9:10	umin hakohanim yeda‘yah vihoyariw veyakhin. 
1_chronicles 9:11	va‘azaryah wen khilqiyah ben meshulam ben tsadoq ben merayot ben ’akhituw negid bet ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 9:12	va‘adayah ben yerokham ben pashkhur ben malkiyah uma‘sai ben ‘adi’el ben yakhzeirah ben meshulam ben meshileimit ben ’imer. 
1_chronicles 9:13	va’akheihem rashim lewet ’awotam ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot veshishim giborei khel melekhet ‘awodat bet ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 9:14	umin halviyim shema‘yah wen khashuw ben ‘azriqam ben khashawyah min benei merari. 
1_chronicles 9:15	uwaqbaqar kheresh vegalal umatanyah ben mikha ben zikhri ben ’asaf. 
1_chronicles 9:16	ve‘owadyah ben shema‘yah ben galal ben yedutun uwerekhyah wen ’asa ben ’elqanah hayoshew bekhatsrei netofati. 
1_chronicles 9:17	vehasho‘arim shalum ve‘aquw vetalmon va’akhiman va’akhihem shalum harosh. 
1_chronicles 9:18	ve‘ad henah besha‘ar hamelekh mizrakhah hemah hasho‘arim lemakhanot benei leivi. 
1_chronicles 9:19	veshalum ben qorei ben ’ewyasaf ben qorakh ve’ekhav lewet ’awiv haqarekhim ‘al melekhet ha‘awodah shomerei hasipim la’ohel va’awoteihem ‘al makhaneh yhoh shomerei hamawo. 
1_chronicles 9:20	ufinekhas ben ’el‘azar nagid hayah ‘aleihem lefanim yhoh ‘imo. 
1_chronicles 9:21	zekharyah ben meshelemyah sho‘er petakh le’ohel mo‘ed. 
1_chronicles 9:22	kulam haberurim lesho‘arim basipim matayim ushenem ‘asar hemah wekhatsreihem hityakhsam hemah yisad david ushemu’el haro’eh be’emunatam. 
1_chronicles 9:23	vehem uweneihem ‘al hashe‘arim lewet yhoh lewet ha’ohel lemishmarot. 
1_chronicles 9:24	le’arba‘ rukhot yihyu hasho‘arim mizrakh yamah tsafonah vanegbah. 
1_chronicles 9:25	va’akheihem bekhatsreihem lawo leshiw‘at hayamim mei‘et ’el ‘et ‘im ’eleh. 
1_chronicles 9:26	ki we’emunah hemah ’arba‘at giborei hasho‘arim hem halviyim vehayu ‘al haleshakhot ve‘al ha’otserot bet ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 9:27	usewiwot bet ha’elohim yalinu ki ‘aleihem mishmeret vehem ‘al hamafteiakh velaboqer laboqer. 
1_chronicles 9:28	umeihem ‘al kelei ha‘awodah ki wemispar yewi’um uwemispar yotsi’um.
