1_chronicles 9:29	umeihem memunim ‘al hakeilim ve‘al kal kelei haqodesh ve‘al hasolet vehayayin vehashemen vehalewonah vehabesamim. 
1_chronicles 9:30	umin benei hakohanim roqekhei hamirqakhat labesamim. 
1_chronicles 9:31	umatityah min halviyim hu habekhor leshalum haqarekhi be’emunah ‘al ma‘aseh hakhawitim. 
1_chronicles 9:32	umin benei haqehati min ’akheihem ‘al lekhem hama‘arakhet lehakhin shabat shabat. 
1_chronicles 9:33	ve’eleh hamshorerim rashei ’awot lalviyim baleshakhot petirim peturim ki yomam valaylah ‘aleihem bamelakhah. 
1_chronicles 9:34	’eleh rashei ha’awot lalviyim letoledotam rashim ’eleh yashewu wirushalim. 
1_chronicles 9:35	uwegiw‘on yashewu ’awi giw‘on ye‘u’el ye‘i’el veshem ’ishto ma‘akhah. 
1_chronicles 9:36	uweno habekhor ‘awdon vetsur veqish uwa‘al vener venadaw. 
1_chronicles 9:37	ugedor ve’akhyo uzekharyah umiqlot. 
1_chronicles 9:38	umiqlot holid ’et shim’am ve’af hem neged ’akheihem yashewu wirushalim ‘im ’akheihem. 
1_chronicles 9:39	vener holid ’et qish veqish holid ’et sha’ul vesha’ul holid ’et yehonatan ve’et malki shua‘ ve’et ’awinadaw ve’et ’eshba‘al. 
1_chronicles 9:40	uwen yehonatan meriw ba‘al umeri wa‘al holid ’et mikhah. 
1_chronicles 9:41	uwenei mikhah piton vamelekh vetakhreia‘. 
1_chronicles 9:42	ve’akhaz holid ’et ya‘rah veya‘rah holid ’et ‘alemet ve’et ‘azmavet ve’et zimri vezimri holid ’et motsa. 
1_chronicles 9:43	umotsa holid ’et bin‘a urefayah weno ’el‘asah weno ’atsel beno. 
1_chronicles 9:44	ule’atsel shishah wanim ve’eleh shemotam ‘azriqam bokheru veyishma‘el ushe‘aryah ve‘owadyah vekhanan ’eleh benei ’atsal. 
1_chronicles 10:1	ufelishtim nilkhamu weyisra’el vayanas ’ish yisra’el mipenei felishtim vayipelu khalalim behar gilboa‘. 
1_chronicles 10:2	vayadbequ felishtim ’akharei sha’ul ve’akharei wanav vayaku felishtim ’et yonatan ve’et ’awinadaw ve’et malki shua‘ benei sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 10:3	vatikhbad hamilkhamah ‘al sha’ul vayimtsa’uhu hamorim baqashet vayakhel min hayorim. 
1_chronicles 10:4	vayomer sha’ul ’el nosei kheilav shelof kharbekha vedaqereini wah pen yawo’u ha‘areilim ha’eleh vehit‘alelu wi velo ’awah nosei kheilav ki yarei me’od vayiqakh sha’ul ’et hakherew vayipol ‘aleha. 
1_chronicles 10:5	vayar nosei kheilav ki met sha’ul vayipol gam hu ‘al hakherew vayamot. 
1_chronicles 10:6	vayamat sha’ul usheloshet banav vekhal beito yakhdav meitu. 
1_chronicles 10:7	vayir’u kal ’ish yisra’el ’asher ba‘eimeq ki nasu vekhi meitu sha’ul uwanav vaya‘azwu ‘areihem vayanusu vayawo’u felishtim vayeishewu bahem. 
1_chronicles 10:8	vayhi mimakhorat vayawo’u felishtim lefashet ’et hakhalalim vayimtse’u ’et sha’ul ve’et banav nofelim behar gilboa‘. 
1_chronicles 10:9	vayafshituhu vayis’u ’et rosho ve’et keilav vayshalekhu we’erets felishtim sawiw lewaser ’et ‘atsabeihem ve’et ha‘am. 
1_chronicles 10:10	vayasimu ’et keilav bet ’eloheihem ve’et gulgaleto taqe‘u bet dagon. 
1_chronicles 10:11	vayishme‘u kol yawesh gil‘ad ’et kal ’asher ‘asu felishtim lesha’ul. 
1_chronicles 10:12	vayaqumu kal ’ish khayil vayis’u ’et gufat sha’ul ve’et gufot banav vaywi’um yaweishah vayiqberu ’et ‘atsmoteihem takhat ha’eilah beyawesh vayatsumu shiw‘at yamim. 
1_chronicles 10:13	vayamat sha’ul bema‘alo ’asher ma‘al yhoh ‘al dewar yhoh ’asher lo shamar vegam lish’ol ba’ow lidrosh. 
1_chronicles 10:14	velo darash yhoh vaymiteihu vayasew ’et hamelukhah ledavid ben yishai. 
1_chronicles 11:1	vayiqawetsu khal yisra’el ’el david khewronah leimor hineh ‘atsmekha uwesarekha ’anakhenu. 
1_chronicles 11:2	gam temol gam shilshom gam bihyot sha’ul melekh ’atah hamotsi vehameiwi ’et yisra’el vayomer yhoh ’elohekha lekha ’atah tir‘eh ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’el ve’atah tihyeh nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 11:3	vayawo’u kal ziqnei yisra’el ’el hamelekh khewronah vayikhrot lahem david berit bekhewron lifnei yhoh vayimshekhu ’et david lemelekh ‘al yisra’el kidwar yhoh beyad shemu’el. 
1_chronicles 11:4	vayeilekh david vekhal yisra’el yerushalim hi yewus vesham haywusi yoshewei ha’arets. 
1_chronicles 11:5	vayomeru yoshewei yewus ledavid lo tawo henah vayilkod david ’et metsudat tsiyon hi ‘ir david. 
1_chronicles 11:6	vayomer david kal makeh yewusi barishonah yihyeh lerosh ulesar vaya‘al barishonah yo’aw ben tseruyah vayhi lerosh. 
1_chronicles 11:7	vayeishew david bamtsad ‘al ken qare’u lo ‘ir david. 
1_chronicles 11:8	vayiwen ha‘ir misawiw min hamilo ve‘ad hasawiw veyo’aw yekhayeh ’et she’ar ha‘ir. 
1_chronicles 11:9	vayeilekh david halokh vegadol yhoh tsewa’ot ‘imo. 
1_chronicles 11:10	ve’eleh rashei hagiborim ’asher ledavid hamitkhazeqim ‘imo wemalkhuto ‘im kal yisra’el lehamlikho kidwar yhoh ‘al yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 11:11	ve’eleh mispar hagiborim ’asher ledavid yashawe‘am ben khakhmoni rosh hasheloshim hashalishim hu ‘orer ’et khanito ‘al shelosh mei’ot khalal befa‘am ’ekhat. 
1_chronicles 11:12	ve’akharav ’el‘azar ben dodo ha’akhokhi hu bishloshah hagiborim. 
1_chronicles 11:13	hu hayah ‘im david bapas damim vehapelishtim ne’esfu sham lamilkhamah vatehi khelqat hasadeh melei’ah se‘orim veha‘am nasu mipenei felishtim. 
1_chronicles 11:14	vayityatsewu wetokh hakhelqah vayatsiluha vayaku ’et pelishtim vayosha‘ yhoh teshu‘ah gedolah. 
1_chronicles 11:15	vayeiredu sheloshah min hasheloshim rosh ‘al hatsur ’el david ’el me‘arat ‘adulam umakhaneh felishtim khonah be‘eimeq refa’im. 
1_chronicles 11:16	vedavid ’az bametsudah unetsiw pelishtim ’az bewet lakhem. 
1_chronicles 11:17	vayit’av vayit’av david vayomar mi yashqeini mayim mibor bet lekhem ’asher basha‘ar. 
1_chronicles 11:18	vayiwqe‘u hasheloshah bemakhaneh felishtim vayish’awu mayim mibor bet lekhem ’asher basha‘ar vayis’u vayawi’u ’el david velo ’awah david lishtotam vaynasekh ’otam yhoh. 
1_chronicles 11:19	vayomer khalilah li mei’elohai mei‘asot zot hadam ha’anashim ha’eleh ’eshteh wenafshotam ki wenafshotam hewi’um velo ’awah lishtotam ’eleh ‘asu sheloshet hagiborim. 
1_chronicles 11:20	ve’awshai ’akhi yo’aw hu hayah rosh hasheloshah vehu ‘orer ’et khanito ‘al shelosh mei’ot khalal velo velo shem basheloshah. 
1_chronicles 11:21	min hasheloshah washenayim nikhbad vayhi lahem lesar ve‘ad hasheloshah lo wa. 
1_chronicles 11:22	benayah wen yehoyada‘ ben ’ish khayil raw pe‘alim min qawtse’el hu hikah ’et shenei ’ari’el mo’aw vehu yarad vehikah ’et ha’ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. 
1_chronicles 11:23	vehu hikah ’et ha’ish hamitsri ’ish midah khamesh ba’amah uweyad hamitsri khanit kimnor ’oregim vayeired ’eilav bashawet vayigzol ’et hakhanit miyad hamitsri vayahargeihu bakhanito. 
1_chronicles 11:24	’eleh ‘asah benayahu ben yehoyada‘ velo shem bishloshah hagiborim. 
1_chronicles 11:25	min hasheloshim hino nikhbad hu ve’el hasheloshah lo wa vaysimeihu david ‘al mishma‘to. 
1_chronicles 11:26	vegiborei hakhayalim ‘asah ’el ’akhi yo’aw ’elkhanan ben dodo mibet lakhem. 
1_chronicles 11:27	shamot haharori khelets hapeloni. 
1_chronicles 11:28	‘ira wen ‘iqesh hateqo‘i ’awi‘ezer ha‘anetoti. 
1_chronicles 11:29	sibekhai hakhushati ‘ilai ha’akhokhi. 
1_chronicles 11:30	mahrai hanetofati kheiled ben ba‘anah hanetofati. 
1_chronicles 11:31	’itai ben riwai migiw‘at benei winyamin benayah hapir‘atoni. 
1_chronicles 11:32	khurai minakhalei ga‘ash ’awi’el ha‘arwati. 
1_chronicles 11:33	‘azmavet habakharumi ’elyakhba hasha‘alwoni. 
1_chronicles 11:34	benei hashem hagizoni yonatan ben shageh haharari. 
1_chronicles 11:35	’akhi’am ben sakhar haharari ’elifal ben ’ur. 
1_chronicles 11:36	kheifer hamekheirati ’akhiyah hapeloni. 
1_chronicles 11:37	khetsro hakarmeli na‘arai ben ’ezbai. 
1_chronicles 11:38	yo’el ’akhi natan miwkhar ben hagri. 
1_chronicles 11:39	tseleq ha‘amoni nakhrai habeiroti nosei kelei yo’aw ben tseruyah. 
1_chronicles 11:40	‘ira hayitri garew hayitri. 
1_chronicles 11:41	’uriyah hakhiti zawad ben ’akhlai. 
1_chronicles 11:42	‘adina wen shiza har’uweini rosh lar’uweini ve‘alav sheloshim. 
1_chronicles 11:43	khanan ben ma‘akhah veyoshafat hamitni. 
1_chronicles 11:44	‘uziya ha‘ashterati shama‘ vi‘u’el vi‘i’el benei khotam ha‘aro‘eiri. 
1_chronicles 11:45	yedi‘a’el ben shimri veyokha ’akhiv hatitsi. 
1_chronicles 11:46	’eli’el hamakhavim viriwai veyoshavyah benei ’elna‘am veyitmah hamo’awi. 
1_chronicles 11:47	’eli’el ve‘owed veya‘asi’el hametsowayah. 
1_chronicles 12:1	ve’eleh haba’im ’el david letsiqelag ‘od ‘atsur mipenei sha’ul ben qish vehemah bagiborim ‘ozerei hamilkhamah. 
1_chronicles 12:2	nosheqei qeshet mayminim umasmilim ba’awanim uwakhitsim baqashet mei’akhei sha’ul mibinyamin. 
1_chronicles 12:3	harosh ’akhi‘ezer veyo’ash benei hashema‘ah hagiw‘ati vizu’el vizi’el vafelet benei ‘azmavet uwerakhah veyeihu ha‘anetoti. 
1_chronicles 12:4	veyishma‘yah hagiw‘oni gibor basheloshim ve‘al hasheloshim. 
1_chronicles 12:5	veyirmeyah veyakhazi’el veyokhanan veyozawad hagedeirati. 
1_chronicles 12:6	’el‘uzai virimot uwe‘alyah ushemaryahu ushefatyahu hakharifi hakharufi. 
1_chronicles 12:7	’elqanah veyishiyahu va‘azar’el veyo‘ezer veyashawe‘am haqarekhim. 
1_chronicles 12:8	veyo‘eilah uzewadyah benei yerokham min hagedor. 
1_chronicles 12:9	umin hagadi niwdelu ’el david lamtsad midbarah giborei hakhayil ’anshei tsawa lamilkhamah ‘orekhei tsinah varomakh ufenei ’aryeh peneihem vekhitswayim ‘al heharim lemaher. 
1_chronicles 12:10	‘eizer harosh ‘owadyah hasheini ’eli’aw hashelishi. 
1_chronicles 12:11	mishmanah harewi‘i yirmeyah hakhamishi. 
1_chronicles 12:12	‘atai hashishi ’eli’el hashewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 12:13	yokhanan hashemini ’elzawad hateshi‘i. 
1_chronicles 12:14	yirmeyahu ha‘asiri makhbanai ‘ashtei ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 12:15	’eleh mibenei gad rashei hatsawa ’ekhad lemei’ah haqatan vehagadol le’alef. 
1_chronicles 12:16	’eleh hem ’asher ‘aweru ’et hayarden bakhodesh harishon vehu memalei ‘al kal gidyotav gedotav vayawrikhu ’et kal ha‘amaqim lamizrakh velama‘araw. 
1_chronicles 12:17	vayawo’u min benei winyamin vihudah ‘ad lamtsad ledavid. 
1_chronicles 12:18	vayeitsei david lifneihem vaya‘an vayomer lahem ’im leshalom batem ’eilai le‘azereini yihyeh li ‘aleikhem leiwaw leyakhad ve’im leramotani letsarai belo khamas bekhapai yeire ’elohei ’awoteinu veyokhakh. 
1_chronicles 12:19	veruakh laweshah ’et ‘amasai rosh hasheloshim hashalishim lekha david ve‘imekha wen yishai shalom shalom lekha veshalom le‘ozerekha ki ‘azarekha ’elohekha vayqabelem david vayitenem berashei hagedud. 
1_chronicles 12:20	umimenasheh nafelu ‘al david bewo’o ‘im pelishtim ‘al sha’ul lamilkhamah velo ‘azarum ki we‘eitsah shilekhuhu sarnei felishtim leimor berasheinu yipol ’el ’adonav sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 12:21	belekhto ’el tsiqelag nafelu ‘alav mimenasheh ‘adnakh veyozawad vidi‘a’el umikha’el veyozawad ve’elihu vetsiletai rashei ha’alafim ’asher limnasheh. 
1_chronicles 12:22	vehemah ‘azeru ‘im david ‘al hagedud ki giborei khayil kulam vayihyu sarim batsawa. 
1_chronicles 12:23	ki le‘et yom beyom yawo’u ‘al david le‘azero ‘ad lemakhaneh gadol kemakhaneh ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 12:24	ve’eleh misperei rashei hekhaluts latsawa ba’u ‘al david khewronah lehasew malkhut sha’ul ’eilav kefi yhoh. 
1_chronicles 12:25	benei yehudah nose’ei tsinah varomakh sheishet ’alafim ushemoneh mei’ot khalutsei tsawa. 
1_chronicles 12:26	min benei shim‘on giborei khayil latsawa shiw‘at ’alafim umei’ah. 
1_chronicles 12:27	min benei haleivi ’arba‘at ’alafim veshesh mei’ot. 
1_chronicles 12:28	vihoyada‘ hanagid le’aharon ve‘imo sheloshet ’alafim ushewa‘ mei’ot. 
1_chronicles 12:29	vetsadoq na‘ar gibor khayil uwet ’awiv sarim ‘esrim ushenayim. 
1_chronicles 12:30	umin benei winyamin ’akhei sha’ul sheloshet ’alafim ve‘ad henah marbitam shomerim mishmeret bet sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 12:31	umin benei ’efrayim ‘esrim ’elef ushemoneh mei’ot giborei khayil ’anshei sheimot lewet ’awotam. 
1_chronicles 12:32	umeikhatsi mateh menasheh shemonah ‘asar ’alef ’asher niqewu besheimot lawo lehamlikh ’et david. 
1_chronicles 12:33	umibenei yisashkhar yod‘ei winah la‘itim lada‘at mah ya‘aseh yisra’el rasheihem matayim vekhal ’akheihem ‘al pihem. 
1_chronicles 12:34	mizewulun yots’ei tsawa ‘orekhei milkhamah bekhal kelei milkhamah khamishim ’alef vela‘ador belo lew valew. 
1_chronicles 12:35	uminaftali sarim ’alef ve‘imahem betsinah vakhanit sheloshim veshiw‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 12:36	umin hadani ‘orekhei milkhamah ‘esrim ushemonah ’elef veshesh mei’ot. 
1_chronicles 12:37	umei’asher yots’ei tsawa la‘arokh milkhamah ’arba‘im ’alef. 
1_chronicles 12:38	umei‘eiwer layarden min har’uweini vehagadi vakhatsi sheiwet menasheh bekhol kelei tsewa milkhamah mei’ah ve‘esrim ’alef. 
1_chronicles 12:39	kal ’eleh ’anshei milkhamah ‘oderei ma‘arakhah beleiwaw shalem ba’u khewronah lehamlikh ’et david ‘al kal yisra’el vegam kal sheirit yisra’el lew ’ekhad lehamlikh ’et david. 
1_chronicles 12:40	vayihyu sham ‘im david yamim sheloshah ’okhelim veshotim ki heikhinu lahem ’akheihem. vegam haqerowim ’aleihem ‘ad yisashkhar uzewulun venaftali mewi’im lekhem bakhamorim uwagemalim uwaperadim uwabaqar ma’akhal qemakh deweilim vetsimuqim veyayin veshemen uwaqar vetson larow ki simkhah beyisra’el. 
1_chronicles 13:1	vayiva‘ats david ‘im sarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot lekhal nagid. 
1_chronicles 13:2	vayomer david lekhol qehal yisra’el ’im ‘aleikhem tow umin yhoh ’eloheinu nifretsah nishlekhah ‘al ’akheinu hanish’arim bekhol ’artsot yisra’el ve‘imahem hakohanim vehalviyim be‘arei migresheihem veyiqawetsu ’eileinu. 
1_chronicles 13:3	venasebah ’et ’aron ’eloheinu ’eileinu ki lo derashnuhu bimei sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 13:4	vayomeru khal haqahal la‘asot ken ki yashar hadawar be‘einei khal ha‘am. 
1_chronicles 13:5	vayaqhel david ’et kal yisra’el min shikhor mitsrayim ve‘ad lewo khamat lehawi ’et ’aron ha’elohim miqiryat ye‘arim. 
1_chronicles 13:6	vaya‘al david vekhal yisra’el ba‘alatah ’el qiryat ye‘arim ’asher lihudah leha‘alot misham ’et ’aron ha’elohim yhoh yoshew hakeruwim ’asher niqra shem. 
1_chronicles 13:7	vayarkiwu ’et ’aron ha’elohim ‘al ‘agalah khadashah mibet ’awinadaw ve‘uza ve’akhyo nohagim ba‘agalah. 
1_chronicles 13:8	vedavid vekhal yisra’el mesakhaqim lifnei ha’elohim bekhal ‘oz uweshirim uwekhinorot uwinwalim uwetupim uwimtsiltayim uwakhatsotserot. 
1_chronicles 13:9	vayawo’u ‘ad goren kidon vayishlakh ‘uza ’et yado le’ekhoz ’et ha’aron ki shametu habaqar. 
1_chronicles 13:10	vayikhar ’af yhoh be‘uza vayakeihu ‘al ’asher shalakh yado ‘al ha’aron vayamat sham lifnei ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 13:11	vayikhar ledavid ki farats yhoh perets be‘uza vayiqra lamaqom hahu perets ‘uza ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
1_chronicles 13:12	vayira david ’et ha’elohim bayom hahu leimor hekh ’awi ’eilai ’et ’aron ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 13:13	velo heisir david ’et ha’aron ’eilav ’el ‘ir david vayateihu ’el bet ‘owed ’edom hagiti. 
1_chronicles 13:14	vayeishew ’aron ha’elohim ‘im bet ‘owed ’edom beweito sheloshah khodashim vaywarekh yhoh ’et bet ‘owed ’edom ve’et kal ’asher lo. 
1_chronicles 14:1	vayishlakh khiram khuram melekh tsor mal’akhim ’el david va‘atsei ’arazim vekharashei qir vekharashei ‘eitsim liwnot lo bayit. 
1_chronicles 14:2	vayeida‘ david ki hekhino yhoh lemelekh ‘al yisra’el ki niset lema‘lah malkhuto ba‘awur ‘amo yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 14:3	vayiqakh david ‘od nashim birushalim vayoled david ‘od banim uwanot. 
1_chronicles 14:4	ve’eleh shemot hayludim ’asher hayu lo birushalim shamua‘ veshowaw natan ushelomoh. 
1_chronicles 14:5	veyiwkhar ve’elishua‘ ve’elpalet. 
1_chronicles 14:6	venogah venefeg veyafia‘. 
1_chronicles 14:7	ve’elishama‘ uwe‘elyada‘ ve’elifalet. 
1_chronicles 14:8	vayishme‘u felishtim ki nimshakh david lemelekh ‘al kal yisra’el vaya‘alu khal pelishtim lewaqesh ’et david vayishma‘ david vayeitsei lifneihem. 
1_chronicles 14:9	ufelishtim ba’u vayifshetu be‘eimeq refa’im. 
1_chronicles 14:10	vayish’al david beilohim leimor ha’e‘eleh ‘al pelishtiyim pelishtim unetatam beyadi vayomer lo yhoh ‘aleh unetatim beyadekha. 
1_chronicles 14:11	vaya‘alu bewa‘al peratsim vayakem sham david vayomer david parats ha’elohim ’et ’oywai beyadi keferets mayim ‘al ken qare’u shem hamaqom hahu ba‘al peratsim. 
1_chronicles 14:12	vaya‘azwu sham ’et ’eloheihem vayomer david vayisarefu ba’esh. 
1_chronicles 14:13	vayosifu ‘od pelishtim vayifshetu ba‘eimeq. 
1_chronicles 14:14	vayish’al ‘od david beilohim vayomer lo ha’elohim lo ta‘aleh ’akhareihem hasew mei‘aleihem uwata lahem mimul habekha’im. 
1_chronicles 14:15	vihi keshame‘akha ’et qol hatse‘adah berashei habekha’im ’az teitsei wamilkhamah ki yatsa ha’elohim lefanekha lehakot ’et makhaneh felishtim. 
1_chronicles 14:16	vaya‘as david ka’asher tsivahu ha’elohim vayaku ’et makhaneh felishtim migiw‘on ve‘ad gazerah. 
1_chronicles 14:17	vayeitsei shem david bekhal ha’aratsot yhoh natan ’et pakhdo ‘al kal hagoyim. 
1_chronicles 15:1	vaya‘as lo watim be‘ir david vayakhen maqom la’aron ha’elohim vayet lo ’ohel. 
1_chronicles 15:2	’az ’amar david lo laset ’et ’aron ha’elohim ki ’im halviyim ki wam bakhar yhoh laset ’et ’aron yhoh uleshareto ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 15:3	vayaqhel david ’et kal yisra’el ’el yerushalim leha‘alot ’et ’aron yhoh ’el meqomo ’asher heikhin lo. 
1_chronicles 15:4	vaye’esof david ’et benei ’aharon ve’et halviyim. 
1_chronicles 15:5	liwnei qehat ’uri’el hasar ve’ekhav mei’ah ve‘esrim. 
1_chronicles 15:6	liwnei merari ‘asayah hasar ve’ekhav matayim ve‘esrim. 
1_chronicles 15:7	liwnei geireshom yo’el hasar ve’ekhav mei’ah usheloshim. 
1_chronicles 15:8	liwnei ’elitsafan shema‘yah hasar ve’ekhav matayim. 
1_chronicles 15:9	liwnei khewron ’eli’el hasar ve’ekhav shemonim. 
1_chronicles 15:10	liwnei ‘uzi’el ‘aminadaw hasar ve’ekhav mei’ah ushenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 15:11	vayiqra david letsadoq ule’ewyatar hakohanim velalviyim le’uri’el ‘asayah veyo’el shema‘yah ve’eli’el ve‘aminadaw. 
1_chronicles 15:12	vayomer lahem ’atem rashei ha’awot lalviyim hitqadeshu ’atem va’akheikhem veha‘alitem ’et ’aron yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’el hakhinoti lo. 
1_chronicles 15:13	ki lemabarishonah lo ’atem parats yhoh ’eloheinu banu ki lo derashnuhu kamishpat. 
1_chronicles 15:14	vayitqadeshu hakohanim vehalviyim leha‘alot ’et ’aron yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 15:15	vayis’u wenei halviyim ’et ’aron ha’elohim ka’asher tsivah mosheh kidwar yhoh bikhteifam bamotot ‘aleihem. 
1_chronicles 15:16	vayomer david lesarei halviyim leha‘amid ’et ’akheihem hamshorerim bikhlei shir newalim vekhinorot umetsiltayim mashmi‘im leharim beqol lesimkhah. 
1_chronicles 15:17	vaya‘amidu halviyim ’et heiman ben yo’el umin ’ekhav ’asaf ben berekhyahu umin benei merari ’akheihem ’eitan ben qushayahu. 
1_chronicles 15:18	ve‘imahem ’akheihem hamishnim zekharyahu ben veya‘azi’el ushemiramot vikhi’el ve‘uni ’eli’aw uwenayahu uma‘aseiyahu umatityahu ve’elifeleihu umiqneiyahu ve‘owed ’edom vi‘i’el hasho‘arim. 
1_chronicles 15:19	vehamshorerim heiman ’asaf ve’eitan bimtsiltayim nekhoshet lehashmia‘. 
1_chronicles 15:20	uzekharyah va‘azi’el ushemiramot vikhi’el ve‘uni ve’eli’aw uma‘aseiyahu uwenayahu binwalim ‘al ‘alamot. 
1_chronicles 15:21	umatityahu ve’elifeleihu umiqneiyahu ve‘owed ’edom vi‘i’el va‘azazyahu bekhinorot ‘al hasheminit lenatseiakh. 
1_chronicles 15:22	ukhenanyahu sar halviyim bemasa yasor bamasa ki meiwin hu. 
1_chronicles 15:23	uwerekhyah ve’elqanah sho‘arim la’aron. 
1_chronicles 15:24	ushewanyahu veyoshafat unetan’el va‘amasai uzekharyahu uwenayahu ve’eli‘ezer hakohanim makhatsotserim makhtserim bakhatsotserot lifnei ’aron ha’elohim ve‘owed ’edom vikhiyah sho‘arim la’aron. 
1_chronicles 15:25	vayhi david veziqnei yisra’el vesarei ha’alafim haholekhim leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhoh min bet ‘owed ’edom besimkhah. 
1_chronicles 15:26	vayhi be‘zor ha’elohim ’et halviyim nose’ei ’aron berit yhoh vayizbekhu shiw‘ah farim veshiw‘ah ’eilim. 
1_chronicles 15:27	vedavid mekhurbal bim‘il buts vekhal halviyim hanose’im ’et ha’aron vehamshorerim ukhenanyah hasar hamasa hamshorerim ve‘al david ’eifod bad. 
1_chronicles 15:28	vekhal yisra’el ma‘alim ’et ’aron berit yhoh bitru‘ah uweqol shofar uwakhatsotserot uwimtsiltayim mashmi‘im binwalim vekhinorot. 
1_chronicles 15:29	vayhi ’aron berit yhoh ba ‘ad ‘ir david umikhal bat sha’ul nishqefah be‘ad hakhalon vateire ’et hamelekh david meraqed umesakheq vatiwez lo belibah. 
1_chronicles 16:1	vayawi’u ’et ’aron ha’elohim vayatsigu ’oto betokh ha’ohel ’asher natah lo david vayaqriwu ‘olot ushelamim lifnei ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 16:2	vaykhal david meiha‘alot ha‘olah vehashelamim vaywarekh ’et ha‘am beshem yhoh. 
1_chronicles 16:3	vaykhaleq lekhal ’ish yisra’el mei’ish ve‘ad ’ishah le’ish kikar lekhem ve’eshpar va’ashishah. 
1_chronicles 16:4	vayiten lifnei ’aron yhoh min halviyim mesharetim ulehazkir ulehodot ulehalel yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 16:5	’asaf harosh umishneihu zekharyah ye‘i’el ushemiramot vikhi’el umatityah ve’eli’aw uwenayahu ve‘owed ’edom vi‘i’el bikhlei newalim uwekhinorot ve’asaf bamtsiltayim mashmia‘. 
1_chronicles 16:6	uwenayahu veyakhazi’el hakohanim bakhatsotserot tamid lifnei ’aron berit ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 16:7	bayom hahu ’az natan david barosh lehodot yhoh beyad ’asaf ve’ekhav. 
1_chronicles 16:8	hodu yhoh qir’u wishmo hodi‘u wa‘amim ‘alilotav. 
1_chronicles 16:9	shiru lo zameru lo sikhu bekhal nifle’otav. 
1_chronicles 16:10	hithalelu beshem qadesho yismakh lew mewaqshei yhoh. 
1_chronicles 16:11	dirshu yhoh ve‘uzo baqeshu fanav tamid. 
1_chronicles 16:12	zikhru nifle’otav ’asher ‘asah mofetav umishpetei fihu. 
1_chronicles 16:13	zera‘ yisra’el ‘awdo benei ya‘aqow bekhirav. 
1_chronicles 16:14	hu yhoh ’eloheinu bekhal ha’arets mishpatav. 
1_chronicles 16:15	zikhru le‘olam berito dawar tsivah le’elef dor. 
1_chronicles 16:16	’asher karat ’et ’awraham ushewu‘ato leyitskhaq. 
1_chronicles 16:17	vaya‘amideha leya‘aqow lekhoq leyisra’el berit ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 16:18	leimor lekha ’eten ’erets kena‘an khewel nakhalatkhem. 
1_chronicles 16:19	bihyotkhem metei mispar kim‘at vegarim bah. 
1_chronicles 16:20	vayithalekhu migo ’el go umimamlakhah ’el ‘am ’akher. 
1_chronicles 16:21	lo hiniakh le’ish le‘asheqam vayokhakh ‘aleihem melakhim. 
1_chronicles 16:22	’al tige‘u bimshikhai uwinwi’ai ’al tarei‘u. 
1_chronicles 16:23	shiru yhoh kal ha’arets baseru miyom ’el yom yeshu‘ato. 
1_chronicles 16:24	saperu wagoyim ’et kewodo bekhal ha‘amim nifle’otav. 
1_chronicles 16:25	ki gadol yhoh umehulal me’od venora hu ‘al kal ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 16:26	ki kal ’elohei ha‘amim ’elilim yhoh shamayim ‘asah. 
1_chronicles 16:27	hod vehadar lefanav ‘oz vekhedvah bimqomo. 
1_chronicles 16:28	hawu yhoh mishpekhot ‘amim hawu yhoh kawod va‘oz. 
1_chronicles 16:29	hawu yhoh kewod shemo se’u minkhah uwo’u lefanav hishtakhavu yhoh behadrat qodesh. 
1_chronicles 16:30	khilu milefanav kal ha’arets ’af tikon teiwel bal timot. 
1_chronicles 16:31	yismekhu hashamayim vetagel ha’arets veyomeru wagoyim yhoh malakh. 
1_chronicles 16:32	yir‘am hayam umelo’o ya‘alots hasadeh vekhal ’asher bo. 
1_chronicles 16:33	’az yeranenu ‘atsei haya‘ar milifnei yhoh ki wa lishpot ’et ha’arets. 
1_chronicles 16:34	hodu yhoh ki tow ki le‘olam khasdo. 
1_chronicles 16:35	ve’imru hoshi‘einu ’elohei yish‘einu veqabetseinu vehatsileinu min hagoyim lehodot leshem qadshekha lehishtabeiakh bithilatekha. 
1_chronicles 16:36	barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el min ha‘olam ve‘ad ha‘olam vayomeru khal ha‘am ’amen vehalel yhoh. 
1_chronicles 16:37	vaya‘azaw sham lifnei ’aron berit yhoh le’asaf ule’ekhav lesharet lifnei ha’aron tamid lidwar yom beyomo. 
1_chronicles 16:38	ve‘owed ’edom va’akheihem shishim ushemonah ve‘owed ’edom ben yeditun vekhosah lesho‘arim. 
1_chronicles 16:39	ve’et tsadoq hakohen ve’ekhav hakohanim lifnei mishkan yhoh babamah ’asher begiw‘on. 
1_chronicles 16:40	leha‘alot ‘olot yhoh ‘al mizbakh ha‘olah tamid laboqer vela‘arew ulekhal hakatuw betorat yhoh ’asher tsivah ‘al yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 16:41	ve‘imahem heiman vidutun ushe’ar haberurim ’asher niqewu besheimot lehodot yhoh ki le‘olam khasdo. 
1_chronicles 16:42	ve‘imahem heiman vidutun khatsotserot umetsiltayim lemashmi‘im ukhelei shir ha’elohim uwenei yedutun lasha‘ar. 
1_chronicles 16:43	vayeilekhu khal ha‘am ’ish leweito vayisow david lewarekh ’et beito. 
1_chronicles 17:1	vayhi ka’asher yashaw david beweito vayomer david ’el natan hanawi hineh ’anokhi yoshew bewet ha’arazim va’aron berit yhoh takhat yeri‘ot. 
1_chronicles 17:2	vayomer natan ’el david kol ’asher bilwawekha ‘aseh ki ha’elohim ‘imakh. 
1_chronicles 17:3	vayhi balaylah hahu vayhi dewar ’elohim ’el natan leimor. 
1_chronicles 17:4	lekh ve’amarta ’el david ‘awdi koh ’amar yhoh lo ’atah tiwneh li habayit lashawet. 
1_chronicles 17:5	ki lo yashawti bewayit min hayom ’asher he‘eleiti ’et yisra’el ‘ad hayom hazeh va’ehyeh mei’ohel ’el ’ohel umimishkan. 
1_chronicles 17:6	bekhol ’asher hithalakhti bekhal yisra’el hadawar dibarti ’et ’akhad shofetei yisra’el ’asher tsiviti lir‘ot ’et ‘ami leimor lamah lo wenitem li bet ’arazim. 
1_chronicles 17:7	ve‘atah koh tomar le‘awdi ledavid koh ’amar yhoh tsewa’ot ’ani leqakhtikha min hanaveh min ’akharei hatson lihyot nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 17:8	va’ehyeh ‘imekha bekhol ’asher halakhta va’akhrit ’et kal ’oywekha mipanekha ve‘asiti lekha shem keshem hagedolim ’asher ba’arets. 
1_chronicles 17:9	vesamti maqom le‘ami yisra’el uneta‘tihu veshakhan takhtav velo yirgaz ‘od velo yosifu wenei ‘avlah lewaloto ka’asher barishonah. 
1_chronicles 17:10	ulemiyamim ’asher tsiviti shofetim ‘al ‘ami yisra’el vehikhna‘ti ’et kal ’oywekha va’agid lakh uwayit yiwneh lekha yhoh. 
1_chronicles 17:11	vehayah ki male’u yamekha lalekhet ‘im ’awotekha vahaqimoti ’et zar‘akha ’akharekha ’asher yihyeh mibanekha vahakhinoti ’et malkhuto. 
1_chronicles 17:12	hu yiwneh li bayit vekhonanti ’et kis’o ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 17:13	’ani ’ehyeh lo le’aw vehu yihyeh li lewen vekhasdi lo ’asir mei‘imo ka’asher hasiroti mei’asher hayah lefanekha. 
1_chronicles 17:14	veha‘amadtihu beweiti uwemalkhuti ‘ad ha‘olam vekhis’o yihyeh nakhon ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 17:15	kekhol hadewarim ha’eleh ukhekhol hekhazon hazeh ken diber natan ’el david. 
1_chronicles 17:16	vayawo hamelekh david vayeishew lifnei yhoh vayomer mi ’ani yhoh ’elohim umi weiti ki hawi’otani ‘ad halom. 
1_chronicles 17:17	vatiqtan zot be‘einekha ’elohim vatedaber ‘al bet ‘awdekha lemeirakhoq ure’itani ketor ha’adam hama‘alah yhoh ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 17:18	mah yosif ‘od david ’eilekha lekhawod ’et ‘awdekha ve’atah ’et ‘awdekha yada‘eta. 
1_chronicles 17:19	yhoh ba‘awur ‘awdekha ukhelibekha ‘asita ’et kal hagedulah hazot lehodia‘ ’et kal hagedulot. 
1_chronicles 17:20	yhoh ’en kamokha ve’en ’elohim zulatekha bekhol ’asher shama‘nu be’azeneinu. 
1_chronicles 17:21	umi ke‘amekha yisra’el go ’ekhad ba’arets ’asher halakh ha’elohim lifdot lo ‘am lasum lekha m gedulot venora’ot legaresh mipenei ‘amekha ’asher padita mimitsrayim goyim. 
1_chronicles 17:22	vatiten ’et ‘amekha yisra’el lekha le‘am ‘ad ‘olam ve’atah yhoh hayita lahem leilohim. 
1_chronicles 17:23	ve‘atah yhoh hadawar ’asher dibarta ‘al ‘awdekha ve‘al beito yei’amen ‘ad ‘olam va‘aseh ka’asher dibarta. 
1_chronicles 17:24	veyei’amen veyigdal shimkha ‘ad ‘olam leimor yhoh tsewa’ot ’elohei yisra’el ’elohim leyisra’el uwet david ‘awdekha nakhon lefanekha. 
1_chronicles 17:25	ki ’atah ’elohai galita ’et ’ozen ‘awdekha liwnot lo bayit ‘al ken matsa ‘awdekha lehitpalel lefanekha. 
1_chronicles 17:26	ve‘atah yhoh ’atah hu ha’elohim vatedaber ‘al ‘awdekha hatowah hazot. 
1_chronicles 17:27	ve‘atah ho’alta lewarekh ’et bet ‘awdekha lihyot le‘olam lefanekha ki ’atah yhoh beirakhta umeworakh le‘olam. 
1_chronicles 18:1	vayhi ’akharei khen vayakh david ’et pelishtim vayakhni‘em vayiqakh ’et gat uwenoteha miyad pelishtim. 
1_chronicles 18:2	vayakh ’et mo’aw vayihyu mo’aw ‘awadim ledavid nose’ei minkhah. 
1_chronicles 18:3	vayakh david ’et hadad‘ezer melekh tsowah khamatah belekhto lehatsiw yado binhar perat. 
1_chronicles 18:4	vayilkod david mimenu ’elef rekhew veshiw‘at ’alafim parashim ve‘esrim ’elef ’ish ragli vai‘aqer david ’et kal harekhew vayoter mimenu mei’ah rakhew. 
1_chronicles 18:5	vayawo ’aram darmeseq la‘zor lahadad‘ezer melekh tsowah vayakh david ba’aram ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef ’ish. 
1_chronicles 18:6	vayasem david ba’aram darmeseq vayhi ’aram ledavid ‘awadim nose’ei minkhah vayosha‘ yhoh ledavid bekhol ’asher halakh. 
1_chronicles 18:7	vayiqakh david ’et shiltei hazahaw ’asher hayu ‘al ‘awdei hadad‘azer vaywi’em yerushalim. 
1_chronicles 18:8	umitiwkhat umikun ‘arei hadad‘ezer laqakh david nekhoshet rabah me’od bah ‘asah shelomoh ’et yam hanekhoshet ve’et ha‘amudim ve’et kelei hanekhoshet. 
1_chronicles 18:9	vayishma‘ to‘u melekh khamat ki hikah david ’et kal khel hadad‘ezer melekh tsowah. 
1_chronicles 18:10	vayishlakh ’et hadoram beno ’el hamelekh david lish’ol lish’al lo leshalom ulewarakho ‘al ’asher nilkham bahadad‘ezer vayakeihu ki ’ish milkhamot to‘u hayah hadad‘azer vekhol kelei zahaw vakhesef unekhoshet. 
1_chronicles 18:11	gam ’otam hiqdish hamelekh david yhoh ‘im hakesef vehazahaw ’asher nasa mikal hagoyim mei’edom umimo’aw umibenei ‘amon umipelishtim umei‘amaleq. 
1_chronicles 18:12	ve’awshai ben tseruyah hikah ’et ’edom begei hamelakh shemonah ‘asar ’alef. 
1_chronicles 18:13	vayasem be’edom netsiwim vayihyu khal ’edom ‘awadim ledavid vayosha‘ yhoh ’et david bekhol ’asher halakh. 
1_chronicles 18:14	vayimlokh david ‘al kal yisra’el vayhi ‘oseh mishpat utsedaqah lekhal ‘amo. 
1_chronicles 18:15	veyo’aw ben tseruyah ‘al hatsawa vihoshafat ben ’akhilud mazkir. 
1_chronicles 18:16	vetsadoq ben ’akhituw va’awimelekh ben ’ewyatar kohanim veshavsha sofer. 
1_chronicles 18:17	uwenayahu ben yehoyada‘ ‘al hakereiti vehapeleiti uwenei david harishonim leyad hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 19:1	vayhi ’akharei khen vayamat nakhash melekh benei ‘amon vayimlokh beno takhtav. 
1_chronicles 19:2	vayomer david ’e‘eseh khesed ‘im khanun ben nakhash ki ‘asah ’awiv ‘imi khesed vayishlakh david mal’akhim lenakhamo ‘al ’awiv vayawo’u ‘awdei david ’el ’erets benei ‘amon ’el khanun lenakhamo. 
1_chronicles 19:3	vayomeru sarei wenei ‘amon lekhanun hamkhabed david ’et ’awikha be‘einekha ki shalakh lekha menakhamim halo ba‘awur lakhqor velahafokh uleragel ha’arets ba’u ‘awadav ’eilekha. 
1_chronicles 19:4	vayiqakh khanun ’et ‘awdei david vaygalekhem vayikhrot ’et madveihem bakheitsi ‘ad hamifsa‘ah vayshalekhem. 
1_chronicles 19:5	vayeilekhu vayagidu ledavid ‘al ha’anashim vayishlakh liqratam ki hayu ha’anashim nikhlamim me’od vayomer hamelekh shewu wireikho ‘ad ’asher yetsamakh zeqankhem veshawtem. 
1_chronicles 19:6	vayir’u benei ‘amon ki hitba’ashu ‘im david vayishlakh khanun uwenei ‘amon ’elef kikar kesef liskor lahem min ’aram naharayim umin ’aram ma‘akhah umitsowah rekhew ufarashim. 
1_chronicles 19:7	vayiskeru lahem shenayim usheloshim ’elef rekhew ve’et melekh ma‘akhah ve’et ‘amo vayawo’u vayakhanu lifnei meidewa uwenei ‘amon ne’esfu mei‘areihem vayawo’u lamilkhamah 
1_chronicles 19:8	vayishma‘ david vayishlakh ’et yo’aw ve’et kal tsawa hagiborim. 
1_chronicles 19:9	vayeitse’u benei ‘amon vaya‘arkhu milkhamah petakh ha‘ir vehamelakhim ’asher ba’u lewadam basadeh. 
1_chronicles 19:10	vayar yo’aw ki hayetah fenei hamilkhamah ’eilav panim ve’akhor vayiwkhar mikal bakhur beyisra’el vaya‘arokh liqrat ’aram. 
1_chronicles 19:11	ve’et yeter ha‘am natan beyad ’awshai ’akhiv vaya‘arkhu liqrat benei ‘amon. 
1_chronicles 19:12	vayomer ’im tekhezaq mimeni ’aram vehayita li litshu‘ah ve’im benei ‘amon yekhezqu mimekha vehosha‘tikha. 
1_chronicles 19:13	khazaq venitkhazeqah be‘ad ‘ameinu uwe‘ad ‘arei ’eloheinu yhoh hatow be‘einav ya‘aseh. 
1_chronicles 19:14	vayigash yo’aw veha‘am ’asher ‘imo lifnei ’aram lamilkhamah vayanusu mipanav. 
1_chronicles 19:15	uwenei ‘amon ra’u ki nas ’aram vayanusu gam hem mipenei ’awshai ’akhiv vayawo’u ha‘irah vayawo yo’aw yerushalim. 
1_chronicles 19:16	vayar ’aram ki nigefu lifnei yisra’el vayishlekhu mal’akhim vayotsi’u ’et ’aram ’asher mei‘eiwer hanahar veshofakh sar tsewa hadad‘ezer lifneihem. 
1_chronicles 19:17	vayugad ledavid vaye’esof ’et kal yisra’el vaya‘awor hayarden vayawo ’aleihem vaya‘arokh ’aleihem vaya‘arokh david liqrat ’aram milkhamah vayilakhamu ‘imo. 
1_chronicles 19:18	vayanas ’aram milifnei yisra’el vayaharog david mei’aram shiw‘at ’alafim rekhew ve’arba‘im ’elef ’ish ragli ve’et shofakh sar hatsawa heimit. 
1_chronicles 19:19	vayir’u ‘awdei hadad‘ezer ki nigefu lifnei yisra’el vayashlimu ‘im david vaya‘awduhu velo ’awah ’aram lehoshia‘ ’et benei ‘amon ‘od. 
1_chronicles 20:1	vayhi le‘et teshuwat hashanah le‘et tset hamelakhim vayinhag yo’aw ’et khel hatsawa vayashkhet ’et ’erets benei ‘amon vayawo vayatsar ’et rabah vedavid yoshew birushalim vayakh yo’aw ’et rabah vayeherseha. 
1_chronicles 20:2	vayiqakh david ’et ‘ateret malkam mei‘al rosho vayimtsa’ah mishqal kikar zahaw uwah ’ewen yeqarah vatehi ‘al rosh david ushelal ha‘ir hotsi harbeh me’od. 
1_chronicles 20:3	ve’et ha‘am ’asher bah hotsi vayasar bamegeirah uwakharitsei habarzel uwamegeirot vekhen ya‘aseh david lekhol ‘arei wenei ‘amon vayashaw david vekhal ha‘am yerushalim. 
1_chronicles 20:4	vayhi ’akhareikhen vata‘amod milkhamah begezer ‘im pelishtim ’az hikah sibekhai hakhushati ’et sipai milidei harefa’im vayikanei‘u. 
1_chronicles 20:5	vatehi ‘od milkhamah ’et pelishtim vayakh ’elkhanan ben ya‘ur ya‘ir ’et lakhmi ’akhi galeyat hagiti ve‘ets khanito kimnor ’oregim. 
1_chronicles 20:6	vatehi ‘od milkhamah begat vayhi ’ish midah ve’etsbe‘otav shesh vashesh ‘esrim ve’arba‘ vegam hu nolad leharafa. 
1_chronicles 20:7	vaykharef ’et yisra’el vayakeihu yehonatan ben shim‘a ’akhi david. 
1_chronicles 20:8	’el nuledu leharafa begat vayipelu weyad david uweyad ‘awadav. 
1_chronicles 21:1	vaya‘amod satan ‘al yisra’el vayaset ’et david limnot ’et yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 21:2	vayomer david ’el yo’aw ve’el sarei ha‘am lekhu sifru ’et yisra’el mibe’er shewa‘ ve‘ad dan vehawi’u ’eilai ve’eide‘ah ’et misparam. 
1_chronicles 21:3	vayomer yo’aw yosef yhoh ‘al ‘amo kahem mei’ah fe‘amim halo ’adoni hamelekh kulam ladoni la‘awadim lamah yewaqesh zot ’adoni lamah yihyeh le’ashmah leyisra’el. 
1_chronicles 21:4	udewar hamelekh khazaq ‘al yo’aw vayeitsei yo’aw vayithalekh bekhal yisra’el vayawo yerushalim. 
1_chronicles 21:5	vayiten yo’aw ’et mispar mifqad ha‘am ’el david vayhi khal yisra’el ’elef ’alafim umei’ah ’elef ’ish sholef kherew vihudah ’arba‘ mei’ot veshiw‘im ’elef ’ish sholef kharew. 
1_chronicles 21:6	veleivi uwinyamin lo faqad betokham ki nit‘aw dewar hamelekh ’et yo’aw. 
1_chronicles 21:7	vayeira‘ be‘einei ha’elohim ‘al hadawar hazeh vayakh ’et yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 21:8	vayomer david ’el ha’elohim khatati me’od ’asher ‘asiti ’et hadawar hazeh ve‘atah ha‘awer na ’et ‘avon ‘awdekha ki niskalti me’od. 
1_chronicles 21:9	vaydaber yhoh ’el gad khozeh david leimor. 
1_chronicles 21:10	lekh vedibarta ’el david leimor koh ’amar yhoh shalosh ’ani noteh ‘alekha bekhar lekha ’akhat meihenah ve’e‘eseh lakh. 
1_chronicles 21:11	vayawo gad ’el david vayomer lo koh ’amar yhoh qabel lakh. 
1_chronicles 21:12	’im shalosh shanim ra‘aw ve’im sheloshah khodashim nispeh mipenei tsarekha vekherew ’oywekha lemaseget ve’im sheloshet yamim kherew yhoh vedewer ba’arets umal’akh yhoh mashkhit bekhal gewul yisra’el ve‘atah re’eh mah ’ashiw ’et sholekhi dawar. 
1_chronicles 21:13	vayomer david ’el gad tsar li me’od ’epelah na weyad yhoh ki rabim rakhamav me’od uweyad ’adam ’al ’epol. 
1_chronicles 21:14	vayiten yhoh dewer beyisra’el vayipol miyisra’el shiw‘im ’elef ’ish. 
1_chronicles 21:15	vayishlakh ha’elohim mal’akh lirushalim lehashkhitah ukhehashkhit ra’ah yhoh vayinakhem ‘al hara‘ah vayomer lamal’akh hamashkhit raw ‘atah heref yadekha umal’akh yhoh ‘omed ‘im goren ’arenan haywusi. 
1_chronicles 21:16	vayisa david ’et ‘einav vayar ’et mal’akh yhoh ‘omed ben ha’arets uwen hashamayim vekharbo shelufah beyado netuyah ‘al yerushalim vayipol david vehazeqeinim mekhusim basaqim ‘al peneihem. 
1_chronicles 21:17	vayomer david ’el ha’elohim halo ’ani ’amarti limnot ba‘am va’ani hu ’asher khatati vehareia‘ harei‘oti ve’eleh hatson meh ‘asu yhoh ’elohai tehi na yadekha bi uwewet ’awi uwe‘amekha lo lemageifah. 
1_chronicles 21:18	umal’akh yhoh ’amar ’el gad leimor ledavid ki ya‘aleh david lehaqim mizbeiakh yhoh begoren ’arenan haywusi. 
1_chronicles 21:19	vaya‘al david bidwar gad ’asher diber beshem yhoh. 
1_chronicles 21:20	vayashaw ’arenan vayar ’et hamal’akh ve’arba‘at banav ‘imo mitkhabe’im ve’arenan dash khitim. 
1_chronicles 21:21	vayawo david ‘ad ’arenan vayabet ’arenan vayar ’et david vayeitsei min hagoren vayishtakhu ledavid ’apayim ’aretsah. 
1_chronicles 21:22	vayomer david ’el ’arenan tenah li meqom hagoren ve’ewneh bo mizbeiakh yhoh bekhesef malei teneihu li vetei‘atsar hamageifah mei‘al ha‘am. 
1_chronicles 21:23	vayomer ’arenan ’el david qakh lakh veya‘as ’adoni hamelekh hatow be‘einav re’eh natati habaqar la‘olot vehamorigim la‘eitsim vehakhitim laminkhah hakol natati. 
1_chronicles 21:24	vayomer hamelekh david le’arenan lo ki qanoh ’eqneh bekhesef malei ki lo ’esa ’asher lekha yhoh veha‘alot ‘olah khinam. 
1_chronicles 21:25	vayiten david le’arenan bamaqom shiqlei zahaw mishqal shesh mei’ot. 
1_chronicles 21:26	vayiwen sham david mizbeiakh yhoh vaya‘al ‘olot ushelamim vayiqra ’el yhoh vaya‘aneihu wa’esh min hashamayim ‘al mizbakh ha‘olah. 
1_chronicles 21:27	vayomer yhoh lamal’akh vayashew kharbo ’el nedanah. 
1_chronicles 21:28	ba‘et hahi bir’ot david ki ‘anahu yhoh begoren ’arenan haywusi vayizbakh sham. 
1_chronicles 21:29	umishkan yhoh ’asher ‘asah mosheh wamidbar umizbakh ha‘olah ba‘et hahi babamah begiw‘on. 
1_chronicles 21:30	velo yakhol david lalekhet lefanav lidrosh ’elohim ki niw‘at mipenei kherew mal’akh yhoh. 
1_chronicles 22:1	vayomer david zeh hu bet yhoh ha’elohim vezeh mizbeiakh le‘olah leyisra’el. 
1_chronicles 22:2	vayomer david likhnos ’et hageirim ’asher be’erets yisra’el vaya‘amed khotsewim lakhtsow ’awnei gazit liwnot bet ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 22:3	uwarzel larow lamismerim ledaltot hashe‘arim velamkhaberot heikhin david unekhoshet larow ’en mishqal. 
1_chronicles 22:4	va‘atsei ’arazim le’en mispar ki heiwi’u hatsidonim vehatsorim ‘atsei ’arazim larow ledavid. 
1_chronicles 22:5	vayomer david shelomoh weni na‘ar varakh vehabayit liwnot yhoh lehagdil lema‘lah leshem uletif’eret lekhal ha’aratsot ’akhinah na lo vayakhen david larow lifnei moto. 
1_chronicles 22:6	vayiqra lishlomoh weno vaytsaveihu liwnot bayit yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 22:7	vayomer david lishlomoh beno beni ’ani hayah ‘im lewawi liwnot bayit leshem yhoh ’elohai. 
1_chronicles 22:8	vayhi ‘alai dewar yhoh leimor dam larow shafakhta umilkhamot gedolot ‘asita lo tiwneh wayit lishmi ki damim rabim shafakhta ’artsah lefanai. 
1_chronicles 22:9	hineh wen nolad lakh hu yihyeh ’ish menukhah vahanikhoti lo mikal ’oywav misawiw ki shelomoh yihyeh shemo veshalom vasheqet ’eten ‘al yisra’el beyamav. 
1_chronicles 22:10	hu yiwneh wayit lishmi vehu yihyeh li lewen va’ani lo le’aw vahakhinoti kisei malkhuto ‘al yisra’el ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 22:11	‘atah weni yehi yhoh ‘imakh vehitslakhta uwanita bet yhoh ’elohekha ka’asher diber ‘alekha. 
1_chronicles 22:12	’akh yiten lekha yhoh seikhel uwinah vitsavekha ‘al yisra’el velishmor ’et torat yhoh ’elohekha. 
1_chronicles 22:13	’az tatsliakh ’im tishmor la‘asot ’et hakhuqim ve’et hamishpatim ’asher tsivah yhoh ’et mosheh ‘al yisra’el khazaq ve’emats ’al tira ve’al teikhat. 
1_chronicles 22:14	vehineh we‘aneyi hakhinoti lewet yhoh zahaw kikarim mei’ah ’elef vekhesef ’elef ’alafim kikarim velanekhoshet velabarzel ’en mishqal ki larow hayah ve‘eitsim va’awanim hakhinoti va‘aleihem tosif. 
1_chronicles 22:15	ve‘imekha larow ‘osei melakhah khotsewim vekharashei ’ewen va‘ets vekhal khakham bekhal melakhah. 
1_chronicles 22:16	lazahaw lakesef velanekhoshet velabarzel ’en mispar qum va‘aseh vihi yhoh ‘imakh. 
1_chronicles 22:17	vaytsav david lekhal sarei yisra’el la‘zor lishlomoh weno. 
1_chronicles 22:18	halo yhoh ’eloheikhem ‘imakhem veheiniakh lakhem misawiw ki natan beyadi ’et yoshewei ha’arets venikhbeshah ha’arets lifnei yhoh velifnei ‘amo. 
1_chronicles 22:19	‘atah tenu lewawkhem venafshekhem lidrosh yhoh ’eloheikhem vequmu uwenu ’et miqdash yhoh ha’elohim lehawi ’et ’aron berit yhoh ukhelei qodesh ha’elohim labayit haniwneh leshem yhoh. 
1_chronicles 23:1	vedavid zaqen vesawa‘ yamim vayamlekh ’et shelomoh weno ‘al yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 23:2	vaye’esof ’et kal sarei yisra’el vehakohanim vehalviyim. 
1_chronicles 23:3	vayisaferu halviyim miben sheloshim shanah vama‘elah vayhi misparam legulgelotam ligwarim sheloshim ushemonah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 23:4	mei’eleh lenatseiakh ‘al melekhet bet yhoh ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef veshoterim veshofetim sheishet ’alafim. 
1_chronicles 23:5	ve’arba‘at ’alafim sho‘arim ve’arba‘at ’alafim mehalim yhoh bakeilim ’asher ‘asiti lehalel. 
1_chronicles 23:6	vayekhaleqem david makhleqot liwnei leivi legeireshon qehat umerari. 
1_chronicles 23:7	lageireshuni la‘dan veshim‘i. 
1_chronicles 23:8	benei la‘dan harosh yekhi’el vezeitam veyo’el sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 23:9	benei shim‘i shelomot shelomit vakhazi’el veharan sheloshah ’eleh rashei ha’awot lela‘dan. 
1_chronicles 23:10	uwenei shim‘i yakhat zina vi‘ush uweri‘ah ’eleh wenei shim‘i ’arba‘ah. 
1_chronicles 23:11	vayhi yakhat harosh vezizah hasheini vi‘ush uweri‘ah lo hirbu wanim vayihyu lewet ’aw lifqudah ’ekhat. 
1_chronicles 23:12	benei qehat ‘amram yitshar khewron ve‘uzi’el ’arba‘ah. 
1_chronicles 23:13	benei ‘amram ’aharon umosheh vayibadel ’aharon lehaqdisho qodesh qadashim hu uwanav ‘ad ‘olam lehaqtir lifnei yhoh leshareto ulewarekh bishmo ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 23:14	umosheh ’ish ha’elohim banav yiqare’u ‘al sheiwet haleivi. 
1_chronicles 23:15	benei mosheh geireshom ve’eli‘ezer. 
1_chronicles 23:16	benei geireshom shewu’el harosh. 
1_chronicles 23:17	vayihyu wenei ’eli‘ezer rekhawyah harosh velo hayah le’eli‘ezer banim ’akheirim uwenei rekhawyah rawu lema‘elah. 
1_chronicles 23:18	benei yitshar shelomit harosh. 
1_chronicles 23:19	benei khewron yeriyahu harosh ’amaryah hasheini yakhazi’el hashelishi viqam‘am harewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 23:20	benei ‘uzi’el mikhah harosh veyishiyah hasheini. 
1_chronicles 23:21	benei merari makhli umushi benei makhli ’el‘azar veqish. 
1_chronicles 23:22	vayamat ’el‘azar velo hayu lo banim ki ’im banot vayisa’um benei qish ’akheihem. 
1_chronicles 23:23	benei mushi makhli ve‘eider vireimot sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 23:24	’eleh wenei leivi lewet ’awoteihem rashei ha’awot lifqudeihem bemispar sheimot legulgelotam ‘oseh hamelakhah la‘awodat bet yhoh miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘elah. 
1_chronicles 23:25	ki ’amar david heiniakh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el le‘amo vayishkon birushalim ‘ad le‘olam. 
1_chronicles 23:26	vegam lalviyim ’en laset ’et hamishkan ve’et kal keilav la‘awodato. 
1_chronicles 23:27	ki wediwrei david ha’akharonim hemah mispar benei leivi miben ‘esrim shanah ulema‘elah. 
1_chronicles 23:28	ki ma‘amadam leyad benei ’aharon la‘awodat bet yhoh ‘al hakhatseirot ve‘al haleshakhot ve‘al tahorat lekhal qodesh uma‘aseh ‘awodat bet ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 23:29	ulelekhem hama‘arekhet ulesolet leminkhah velirqiqei hamatsot velamakhawat velamurbakhet ulekhal mesurah umidah. 
1_chronicles 23:30	vela‘amod baboqer baboqer lehodot ulehalel yhoh vekhen la‘arew. 
1_chronicles 23:31	ulekhol ha‘alot ‘olot yhoh lashabatot lekhodashim velamo‘adim bemispar kemishpat ‘aleihem tamid lifnei yhoh. 
1_chronicles 23:32	veshameru ’et mishmeret ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et mishmeret haqodesh umishmeret benei ’aharon ’akheihem la‘awodat bet yhoh. 
1_chronicles 24:1	veliwnei ’aharon makhleqotam benei ’aharon nadaw va’awihu ’el‘azar ve’itamar. 
1_chronicles 24:2	vayamat nadaw va’awihu lifnei ’awihem uwanim lo hayu lahem vaykhahanu ’el‘azar ve’itamar. 
1_chronicles 24:3	vayekhaleqem david vetsadoq min benei ’el‘azar va’akhimelekh min benei ’itamar lifqudatam ba‘awodatam. 
1_chronicles 24:4	vayimatse’u wenei ’el‘azar rabim lerashei hagewarim min benei ’itamar vayakhlequm liwnei ’el‘azar rashim lewet ’awot shishah ‘asar veliwnei ’itamar lewet ’awotam shemonah. 
1_chronicles 24:5	vayakhlequm begoralot ’eleh ‘im ’eleh ki hayu sarei qodesh vesarei ha’elohim mibenei ’el‘azar uwiwnei ’itamar. 
1_chronicles 24:6	vayikhtewem shema‘yah wen netan’el hasofer min haleivi lifnei hamelekh vehasarim vetsadoq hakohen va’akhimelekh ben ’ewyatar verashei ha’awot lakohanim velalviyim bet ’aw ’ekhad ’akhuz le’el‘azar ve’akhuz ’akhuz le’itamar. 
1_chronicles 24:7	vayeitsei hagoral harishon lihoyariw lida‘yah hasheini. 
1_chronicles 24:8	lekharim hashelishi lis‘orim harewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 24:9	lemalkiyah hakhamishi lemiyamin hashishi. 
1_chronicles 24:10	lehaqots hashewi‘i la’awiyah hashemini. 
1_chronicles 24:11	leyeishua‘ hateshi‘i lishkhanyahu ha‘asiri. 
1_chronicles 24:12	le’elyashiw ‘ashtei ‘asar leyaqim shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 24:13	lekhupah sheloshah ‘asar leyeshew’aw ’arba‘ah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 24:14	lewilgah khamishah ‘asar le’imer shishah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 24:15	lekheizir shiw‘ah ‘asar lehapitsets shemonah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 24:16	liftakhyah tish‘ah ‘asar likhezqel ha‘esrim. 
1_chronicles 24:17	leyakhin ’ekhad ve‘esrim legamul shenayim ve‘esrim. 
1_chronicles 24:18	lidlayahu sheloshah ve‘esrim lema‘azyahu ’arba‘ah ve‘esrim. 
1_chronicles 24:19	’eleh fequdatam la‘awodatam lawo lewet yhoh kemishpatam beyad ’aharon ’awihem ka’asher tsivahu yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 24:20	veliwnei leivi hanotarim liwnei ‘amram shuwa’el liwnei shuwa’el yekhdeyahu. 
1_chronicles 24:21	lirkhawyahu liwnei rekhawyahu harosh yishiyah. 
1_chronicles 24:22	layitshari shelomot liwnei shelomot yakhat. 
1_chronicles 24:23	uwenai yeriyahu ’amaryahu hasheini yakhazi’el hashelishi yeqam‘am harewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 24:24	benei ‘uzi’el mikhah liwnei mikhah shamur shamir. 
1_chronicles 24:25	’akhi mikhah yishiyah liwnei yishiyah zekharyahu. 
1_chronicles 24:26	benei merari makhli umushi benei ya‘aziyahu weno. 
1_chronicles 24:27	benei merari leya‘aziyahu weno veshoham vezakur ve‘iwri. 
1_chronicles 24:28	lemakhli ’el‘azar velo hayah lo banim. 
1_chronicles 24:29	leqish benei qish yerakhme’el. 
1_chronicles 24:30	uwenei mushi makhli ve‘eider virimot ’eleh benei halviyim lewet ’awoteihem. 
1_chronicles 24:31	vayapilu gam hem goralot le‘umat ’akheihem benei ’aharon lifnei david hamelekh vetsadoq va’akhimelekh verashei ha’awot lakohanim velalviyim ’awot harosh le‘umat ’akhiv haqatan. 
1_chronicles 25:1	vayawdel david vesarei hatsawa la‘awodah liwnei ’asaf veheiman vidutun hanebi’im hanibe’im bekhinorot binwalim uwimtsiltayim vayhi misparam ’anshei melakhah la‘awodatam. 
1_chronicles 25:2	liwnei ’asaf zakur veyosef unetanyah va’asar’eilah benei ’asaf ‘al yad ’asaf haniba ‘al yedei hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 25:3	lidutun benei yedutun gedalyahu utseri visha‘yahu khashawyahu umatityahu shishah ‘al yedei ’awihem yedutun bakinor haniba ‘al hodot vehalel yhoh. 
1_chronicles 25:4	leheiman benei heiman buqiyahu matanyahu ‘uzi’el shewu’el virimot khananyah khanani ’eli’atah gidalti veromamti ‘ezer yashebeqashah maloti hotir makhazi’ot. 
1_chronicles 25:5	kal ’eleh wanim leheiman khozeh hamelekh bediwrei ha’elohim leharim qaren vayiten ha’elohim leheiman banim ’arba‘ah ‘asar uwanot shalosh. 
1_chronicles 25:6	kal ’eleh ‘al yedei ’awihem bashir bet yhoh bimtsiltayim newalim vekhinorot la‘awodat bet ha’elohim ‘al yedei hamelekh ’asaf vidutun veheiman. 
1_chronicles 25:7	vayhi misparam ‘im ’akheihem melumedei shir yhoh kal hameiwin matayim shemonim ushemonah. 
1_chronicles 25:8	vayapilu goralot mishmeret le‘umat kaqaton kagadol meiwin ‘im talmid. 
1_chronicles 25:9	vayeitsei hagoral harishon le’asaf leyosef gedalyahu hasheini hu ve’ekhav uwanav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:10	hashelishi zakur banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:11	harewi‘i layitsri banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:12	hakhamishi netanyahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:13	hashishi wuqiyahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:14	hashewi‘i yesar’eilah banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:15	hashemini yesha‘yahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:16	hateshi‘i matanyahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:17	ha‘asiri shim‘i banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:18	‘ashtei ‘asar ‘azar’el banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:19	hashenem ‘asar lakhashawyah banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:20	lishloshah ‘asar shuwa’el banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:21	le’arba‘ah ‘asar matityahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:22	lakhamishah ‘asar lireimot banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:23	leshishah ‘asar lakhananyahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:24	leshiw‘ah ‘asar leyashebeqashah banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:25	lishmonah ‘asar lakhanani banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:26	letish‘ah ‘asar lemaloti banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:27	le‘esrim le’eliyatah banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:28	le’ekhad ve‘esrim lehotir banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:29	lishnayim ve‘esrim legidalti banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:30	lishloshah ve‘esrim lemakhazi’ot banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:31	le’arba‘ah ve‘esrim leromamti ‘azer banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 26:1	lemakhleqot lesho‘arim laqarekhim meshelemyahu wen qorei min benei ’asaf. 
1_chronicles 26:2	velimshelemyahu banim zekharyahu habekhor yedi‘a’el hasheini zewadyahu hashelishi yatni’el harewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 26:3	‘eilam hakhamishi yehokhanan hashishi ’elyeho‘einai hashewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 26:4	ule‘owed ’edom banim shema‘yah habekhor yehozawad hasheini yo’akh hashelishi vesakhar harewi‘i unetan’el hakhamishi. 
1_chronicles 26:5	‘ami’el hashishi yisashkhar hashewi‘i pe‘uletai hashemini ki weirakho ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 26:6	velishma‘yah weno nolad banim hamimshalim lewet ’awihem ki giborei khayil hemah. 
1_chronicles 26:7	benei shema‘yah ‘ateni urefa’el ve‘owed ’elzawad ’ekhav benei khayil ’elihu usemakhyahu. 
1_chronicles 26:8	kal ’eleh mibenei ‘owed ’edom hemah uweneihem va’akheihem ’ish khayil bakoakh la‘awodah shishim ushenayim le‘owed ’edom. 
1_chronicles 26:9	velimshelemyahu banim ve’akhim benei khayil shemonah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 26:10	ulekhosah min benei merari banim shimri harosh ki lo hayah wekhor vaysimeihu ’awihu lerosh. 
1_chronicles 26:11	khilqiyahu hasheini tewalyahu hashelishi zekharyahu harewi‘i kal banim ve’akhim lekhosah sheloshah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 26:12	le’eleh makhleqot hasho‘arim lerashei hagewarim mishmarot le‘umat ’akheihem lesharet bewet yhoh. 
1_chronicles 26:13	vayapilu goralot kaqaton kagadol lewet ’awotam lesha‘ar vasha‘ar. 
1_chronicles 26:14	vayipol hagoral mizrakhah leshelemyahu uzekharyahu weno yo‘ets besekhel hipilu goralot vayeitsei goralo tsafonah. 
1_chronicles 26:15	le‘owed ’edom negbah ulewanav bet ha’asupim. 
1_chronicles 26:16	leshupim ulekhosah lama‘araw ‘im sha‘ar shalekhet bamsilah ha‘olah mishmar le‘umat mishmar. 
1_chronicles 26:17	lamizrakh halviyim shishah latsafonah layom ’arba‘ah lanegbah layom ’arba‘ah vela’asupim shenayim shenayim. 
1_chronicles 26:18	laparbar lama‘araw ’arba‘ah lamsilah shenayim laparbar. 
1_chronicles 26:19	’eleh makhleqot hasho‘arim liwnei haqarekhi veliwnei merari. 
1_chronicles 26:20	vehalviyim ’akhiyah ‘al ’otsrot bet ha’elohim ule’otserot haqodashim. 
1_chronicles 26:21	benei la‘dan benei hageireshuni lela‘dan rashei ha’awot lela‘dan hageireshuni yekhi’eili. 
1_chronicles 26:22	benei yekhi’eili zeitam veyo’el ’akhiv ‘al ’otserot bet yhoh. 
1_chronicles 26:23	la‘amrami layitshari lakhewroni la‘azi’eili. 
1_chronicles 26:24	ushewu’el ben geireshom ben mosheh nagid ‘al ha’otsarot. 
1_chronicles 26:25	ve’ekhav le’eli‘ezer rekhawyahu weno visha‘yahu weno veyoram beno vezikhri weno ushelomot ushelomit beno. 
1_chronicles 26:26	hu shelomot ve’ekhav ‘al kal ’otserot haqodashim ’asher hiqdish david hamelekh verashei ha’awot lesarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot vesarei hatsawa. 
1_chronicles 26:27	min hamilkhamot umin hashalal hiqdishu lekhazeq lewet yhoh. 
1_chronicles 26:28	vekhol hahiqdish shemu’el haro’eh vesha’ul ben qish ve’awner ben ner veyo’aw ben tseruyah kol hamaqdish ‘al yad shelomit ve’ekhav. 
1_chronicles 26:29	layitshari kenanyahu uwanav lamelakhah hakhitsonah ‘al yisra’el leshoterim uleshofetim. 
1_chronicles 26:30	lakhewroni khashawyahu ve’ekhav benei khayil ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot ‘al pequdat yisra’el mei‘eiwer layarden ma‘rawah lekhol melekhet yhoh vela‘awodat hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 26:31	lakhewroni yeriyah harosh lakhewroni letoledotav le’awot bishnat ha’arba‘im lemalkhut david nidrashu vayimatsei wahem giborei khayil beya‘zer gil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 26:32	ve’ekhav benei khayil ’alpayim ushewa‘ mei’ot rashei ha’awot vayafqidem david hamelekh ‘al har’uweini vehagadi vakhatsi sheiwet hamnashi lekhal dewar ha’elohim udewar hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 27:1	uwenei yisra’el lemisparam rashei ha’awot vesarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot veshotereihem hamsharetim ’et hamelekh lekhol dewar hamakhleqot haba’ah vehayotset khodesh bekhodesh lekhol khadeshei hashanah hamakhaloqet ha’akhat ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:2	‘al hamakhaloqet harishonah lakhodesh harishon yashawe‘am ben zawdi’el ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:3	min benei ferets harosh lekhal sarei hatsewa’ot lakhodesh harishon. 
1_chronicles 27:4	ve‘al makhaloqet hakhodesh hasheini dodai ha’akhokhi umakhaluqto umiqlot hanagid ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:5	sar hatsawa hashelishi lakhodesh hashelishi benayahu wen yehoyada‘ hakohen rosh ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:6	hu wenayahu gibor hasheloshim ve‘al hasheloshim umakhaluqto ‘amizawad beno. 
1_chronicles 27:7	harewi‘i lakhodesh harewi‘i ‘asah ’el ’akhi yo’aw uzewadyah weno ’akharav ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:8	hakhamishi lakhodesh hakhamishi hasar shamhut hayizrakh ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:9	hashishi lakhodesh hashishi ‘ira wen ‘iqesh hateqo‘i ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:10	hashewi‘i lakhodesh hashewi‘i khelets hapeloni min benei ’efrayim ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:11	hashemini lakhodesh hashemini sibekhai hakhushati lazarkhi ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:12	hateshi‘i lakhodesh hateshi‘i ’awi‘ezer ha‘anetoti labenyemini laben yemini ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:13	ha‘asiri lakhodesh ha‘asiri mahrai hanetofati lazarkhi ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:14	‘ashtei ‘asar le‘ashtei ‘asar hakhodesh benayah hapir‘atoni min benei ’efrayim ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:15	hashenem ‘asar lishnem ‘asar hakhodesh kheldai hanetofati le‘ateni’el ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:16	ve‘al shiwtei yisra’el lar’uweini nagid ’eli‘ezer ben zikhri lashim‘oni shefatyahu ben ma‘akhah. 
1_chronicles 27:17	leleivi khashawyah wen qemu’el le’aharon tsadoq. 
1_chronicles 27:18	lihudah ’elihu mei’akhei david leyisashkhar ‘ameri ben mikha’el. 
1_chronicles 27:19	lizwulun yishma‘yahu ben ‘owadyahu lenaftali yerimot ben ‘azri’el. 
1_chronicles 27:20	liwnei ’efrayim hosheia‘ ben ‘azazyahu lakhatsi sheiwet menasheh yo’el ben pedayahu. 
1_chronicles 27:21	lakhatsi hamnasheh gil‘adah yido ben zekharyahu lewinyamin ya‘asi’el ben ’awner. 
1_chronicles 27:22	ledan ‘azar’el ben yerokham ’eleh sarei shiwtei yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 27:23	velo nasa david misparam lemiben ‘esrim shanah ulematah ki ’amar yhoh leharbot ’et yisra’el kekhokhwei hashamayim. 
1_chronicles 27:24	yo’aw ben tseruyah heikhel limnot velo khilah vayhi wazot qetsef ‘al yisra’el velo ‘alah hamispar bemispar diwrei hayamim lamelekh david. 
1_chronicles 27:25	ve‘al ’otserot hamelekh ‘azmavet ben ‘adi’el ve‘al ha’otsarot basadeh be‘arim uwakefarim uwamigdalot yehonatan ben ‘uziyahu. 
1_chronicles 27:26	ve‘al ‘osei melekhet hasadeh la‘awodat ha’adamah ‘ezri ben keluw. 
1_chronicles 27:27	ve‘al hakeramim shim‘i haramati ve‘al shebakeramim le’otserot hayayin zawdi hashifmi. 
1_chronicles 27:28	ve‘al hazeitim vehashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah ba‘al khanan hagedeiri ve‘al ’otserot hashemen yo‘ash. 
1_chronicles 27:29	ve‘al habaqar haro‘im basharon shitrai shirtai hasharoni ve‘al habaqar ba‘amaqim shafat ben ‘adlai. 
1_chronicles 27:30	ve‘al hagemalim ’owil hayishme‘eili ve‘al ha’atonot yekhdeyahu hameironoti. 
1_chronicles 27:31	ve‘al hatson yaziz hahagri kal ’eleh sarei harekhush ’asher lamelekh david. 
1_chronicles 27:32	vihonatan dod david yo‘ets ’ish meiwin vesofer hu vikhi’el ben khakhmoni ‘im benei hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 27:33	va’akhitofel yo‘ets lamelekh vekhushai ha’arki reia‘ hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 27:34	ve’akharei ’akhitofel yehoyada‘ ben benayahu ve’ewyatar vesar tsawa lamelekh yo’aw. 
1_chronicles 28:1	vayaqhel david ’et kal sarei yisra’el sarei hashewatim vesarei hamakhleqot hamsharetim ’et hamelekh vesarei ha’alafim vesarei hamei’ot vesarei khal rekhush umiqneh lamelekh ulewanav ‘im hasarisim vehagiborim ulekhal gibor khayil ’el yerushalim. 
1_chronicles 28:2	vayaqam david hamelekh ‘al raglav vayomer shema‘uni ’akhai ve‘ami ’ani ‘im lewawi liwnot bet menukhah la’aron berit yhoh velahadom raglei ’eloheinu vahakhinoti liwnot. 
1_chronicles 28:3	veha’elohim ’amar li lo tiwneh wayit lishmi ki ’ish milkhamot ’atah vedamim shafakheta. 
1_chronicles 28:4	vayiwkhar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el bi mikol bet ’awi lihyot lemelekh ‘al yisra’el le‘olam ki wihudah bakhar lenagid uwewet yehudah bet ’awi uwiwnei ’awi bi ratsah lehamlikh ‘al kal yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 28:5	umikal banai ki rabim banim natan li yhoh vayiwkhar bishlomoh weni lashewet ‘al kisei malkhut yhoh ‘al yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 28:6	vayomer li shelomoh winkha hu yiwneh weiti vakhatseirotai ki wakharti wo li lewen va’ani ’ehyeh lo le’aw. 
1_chronicles 28:7	vahakhinoti ’et malkhuto ‘ad le‘olam ’im yekhezaq la‘asot mitsvotai umishpatai kayom hazeh. 
1_chronicles 28:8	ve‘atah le‘einei khal yisra’el qehal yhoh uwe’azenei ’eloheinu shimru vedirshu kal mitsvot yhoh ’eloheikhem lema‘an tireshu ’et ha’arets hatowah vehinkhaltem liwneikhem ’akhareikhem ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 28:9	ve’atah shelomoh weni da‘ ’et ’elohei ’awikha ve‘awedeihu belew shalem uwenefesh khafeitsah ki khal lewawot doresh yhoh vekhal yeitser makhashawot meiwin ’im tidreshenu yimatsei lakh ve’im ta‘azwenu yaznikhakha la‘ad. 
1_chronicles 28:10	re’eh ‘atah ki yhoh bakhar bekha liwnot bayit lamiqdash khazaq va‘aseh. 
1_chronicles 28:11	vayiten david lishlomoh weno ’et tawnit ha’ulam ve’et batav veganzakav va‘aliyotav vakhadarav hapenimim uwet hakaporet. 
1_chronicles 28:12	vetawnit kol ’asher hayah waruakh ‘imo lekhatsrot bet yhoh ulekhal haleshakhot sawiw le’otserot bet ha’elohim ule’otserot haqodashim. 
1_chronicles 28:13	ulemakhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim ulekhal melekhet ‘awodat bet yhoh ulekhal kelei ‘awodat bet yhoh. 
1_chronicles 28:14	lazahaw bamishqal lazahaw lekhal kelei ‘awodah va‘awodah lekhol kelei hakesef bemishqal lekhal kelei ‘awodah va‘awodah. 
1_chronicles 28:15	umishqal limnorot hazahaw veneiroteihem zahaw bemishqal menorah umenorah veneiroteha velimnorot hakesef bemishqal limnorah veneiroteha ka‘awodat menorah umenorah. 
1_chronicles 28:16	ve’et hazahaw mishqal leshulkhanot hama‘arekhet leshulkhan veshulkhan vekhesef leshulkhanot hakasef. 
1_chronicles 28:17	vehamizlagot vehamizraqot vehaqesavot zahaw tahor velikhforei hazahaw bemishqal likhfor ukhefor velikhforei hakesef bemishqal likhfor ukhefor. 
1_chronicles 28:18	ulemizbakh haqetoret zahaw mezuqaq bamishqal uletawnit hamerkawah hakeruwim zahaw leforesim vesokhekhim ‘al ’aron berit yhoh. 
1_chronicles 28:19	hakol bikhtaw miyad yhoh ‘alai hiskil kol mal’akhot hatawnit. 
1_chronicles 28:20	vayomer david lishlomoh weno khazaq ve’emats va‘aseh ’al tira ve’al teikhat ki yhoh ’elohim ’elohai ‘imakh lo yarpekha velo ya‘azweka ‘ad likhlot kal melekhet ‘awodat bet yhoh. 
1_chronicles 28:21	vehineh makhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim lekhal ‘awodat bet ha’elohim ve‘imekha wekhal melakhah lekhal nadiw bakhakhemah lekhal ‘awodah vehasarim vekhal ha‘am lekhal dewarekha. 
1_chronicles 29:1	vayomer david hamelekh lekhal haqahal shelomoh weni ’ekhad bakhar bo ’elohim na‘ar varakh vehamelakhah gedolah ki lo le’adam habirah ki yhoh ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 29:2	ukhekhal kokhi hakhinoti lewet ’elohai hazahaw lazahaw vehakesef lakesef vehanekhoshet lanekhoshet habarzel labarzel veha‘eitsim la‘eitsim ’awnei shoham umilu’im ’awnei fukh veriqmah vekhol ’ewen yeqarah ve’awnei shayish larow. 
1_chronicles 29:3	ve‘od birtsoti bewet ’elohai yesh li segulah zahaw vakhasef natati lewet ’elohai lema‘lah mikal hakhinoti lewet haqodesh. 
1_chronicles 29:4	sheloshet ’alafim kikerei zahaw mizehaw ’ofir veshiw‘at ’alafim kikar kesef mezuqaq latuakh qirot habatim. 
1_chronicles 29:5	lazahaw lazahaw velakesef lakesef ulekhal melakhah beyad kharashim umi mitnadew lemalot yado hayom yhoh. 
1_chronicles 29:6	vayitnadewu sarei ha’awot vesarei shiwtei yisra’el vesarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot ulesarei melekhet hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 29:7	vayitenu la‘awodat bet ha’elohim zahaw kikarim khameishet ’alafim va’adarkhonim ribo vekhesef kikarim ‘aseret ’alafim unekhoshet ribo ushemonat ’alafim kikarim uwarzel mei’ah ’elef kikarim. 
1_chronicles 29:8	vehanimtsa ’ito ’awanim natenu le’otsar bet yhoh ‘al yad yekhi’el hageireshuni. 
1_chronicles 29:9	vayismekhu ha‘am ‘al hitnadewam ki belew shalem hitnadewu yhoh vegam david hamelekh samakh simkhah gedolah. 
1_chronicles 29:10	vaywarekh david ’et yhoh le‘einei kal haqahal vayomer david barukh ’atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’awinu mei‘olam ve‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 29:11	lekha yhoh hagedulah vehagewurah vehatif’eret vehaneitsakh vehahod ki khol bashamayim uwa’arets lekha yhoh hamamlakhah vehamitnasei lekhol lerosh. 
1_chronicles 29:12	veha‘osher vehakawod milefanekha ve’atah moshel bakol uweyadekha koakh ugewurah uweyadekha legadel ulekhazeq lakol. 
1_chronicles 29:13	ve‘atah ’eloheinu modim ’anakhnu lakh umehalim leshem tif’artekha. 
1_chronicles 29:14	vekhi mi ’ani umi ‘ami ki na‘tsor koakh lehitnadew kazot ki mimekha hakol umiyadekha natanu lakh. 
1_chronicles 29:15	ki geirim ’anakhnu lefanekha vetoshawim kekhal ’awoteinu katsel yameinu ‘al ha’arets ve’en miqveh. 
1_chronicles 29:16	yhoh ’eloheinu khol hehamon hazeh ’asher hakhinonu liwnot lekha wayit leshem qadshekha miyadekha hi hu ulekha hakol. 
1_chronicles 29:17	veyada‘ti ’elohai ki ’atah bokhen leiwaw umeisharim tirtseh ’ani beyosher lewawi hitnadawti khal ’eleh ve‘atah ‘amekha hanimtse’u foh ra’iti wesimkhah lehitnadew lakh. 
1_chronicles 29:18	yhoh ’elohei ’awraham yitskhaq veyisra’el ’awoteinu shomrah zot le‘olam leyeitser makhshewot lewaw ‘amekha vehakhen lewawam ’eilekha. 
1_chronicles 29:19	velishlomoh weni ten leiwaw shalem lishmor mitsvotekha ‘eidevotekha vekhuqekha vela‘asot hakol veliwnot habirah ’asher hakhinoti. 
1_chronicles 29:20	vayomer david lekhal haqahal barekhu na ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem vaywarakhu khal haqahal yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem vayiqedu vayishtakhavu yhoh velamelekh. 
1_chronicles 29:21	vayizbekhu yhoh zewakhim vaya‘alu ‘olot yhoh lemakhorat hayom hahu parim ’elef ’eilim ’elef kewasim ’elef veniskeihem uzewakhim larow lekhal yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 29:22	vayokhelu vayishtu lifnei yhoh bayom hahu besimkhah gedolah vayamlikhu sheinit lishlomoh wen david vayimshekhu yhoh lenagid uletsadoq lekhohen. 
1_chronicles 29:23	vayeishew lomoh ‘al kisei yhoh lemelekh takhat david ’awiv vayatslakh vayishme‘u ’eilav kal yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 29:24	vekhal hasarim vehagiborim vegam kal benei hamelekh david natenu yad takhat shelomoh hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 29:25	vaygadel yhoh ’et shelomoh lema‘lah le‘einei kal yisra’el vayiten ‘alav hod malkhut ’asher lo hayah ‘al kal melekh lefanav ‘al yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 29:26	vedavid ben yishai malakh ‘al kal yisra’el. 
1_chronicles 29:27	vehayamim ’asher malakh ‘al yisra’el ’arba‘im shanah bekhewron malakh shewa‘ shanim uwirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh. 
1_chronicles 29:28	vayamat beseiwah towah sewa‘ yamim ‘osher vekhawod vayimlokh shelomoh weno takhtav. 
1_chronicles 29:29	vediwrei david hamelekh harishonim veha’akhronim hinam ketuwim ‘al diwrei shemu’el haro’eh ve‘al diwrei natan hanawi ve‘al diwrei gad hakhozeh. 
1_chronicles 29:30	‘im kal malkhuto ugewurato veha‘itim ’asher ‘aweru ‘alav ve‘al yisra’el ve‘al kal mamlekhot ha’aratsot. 
2_chronicles 1:1	vayitkhazeq shelomoh wen david ‘al malkhuto yhoh ’elohav ‘imo vaygadeleihu lema‘elah. 
2_chronicles 1:2	vayomer shelomoh lekhal yisra’el lesarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot velashofetim ulekhol nasi lekhal yisra’el rashei ha’awot. 
2_chronicles 1:3	vayeilekhu shelomoh vekhal haqahal ‘imo labamah ’asher begiw‘on ki sham hayah ’ohel mo‘ed ha’elohim ’asher ‘asah mosheh ‘ewed yhoh bamidbar. 
2_chronicles 1:4	’awal ’aron ha’elohim he‘elah david miqiryat ye‘arim baheikhin lo david ki natah lo ’ohel birushalim. 
2_chronicles 1:5	umizbakh hanekhoshet ’asher ‘asah betsal’el ben ’uri wen khur sam lifnei mishkan yhoh vayidresheihu shelomoh vehaqahal. 
2_chronicles 1:6	vaya‘al shelomoh sham ‘al mizbakh hanekhoshet lifnei yhoh ’asher le’ohel mo‘ed vaya‘al ‘alav ‘olot ’alef. 
2_chronicles 1:7	balaylah hahu nir’ah ’elohim lishlomoh vayomer lo she’al mah ’eten lakh. 
2_chronicles 1:8	vayomer shelomoh leilohim ’atah ‘asita ‘im david ’awi khesed gadol vehimlakhtani takhtav. 
2_chronicles 1:9	‘atah yhoh ’elohim yei’amen dewarekha ‘im david ’awi ki ’atah himlakhtani ‘al ‘am raw ka‘afar ha’arets. 
2_chronicles 1:10	‘atah khakhmah umada‘ ten li ve’eitse’ah lifnei ha‘am hazeh ve’awo’ah ki mi yishpot ’et ‘amekha hazeh hagadol. 
2_chronicles 1:11	vayomer ’elohim lishlomoh ya‘an ’asher hayetah zot ‘im lewawekha velosha ’alta ‘osher nekhasim vekhawod ve’et nefesh sone’ekha vegam yamim rabim lo sha’aleta vatish’al lekha khakhmah umada‘ ’asher tishpot ’et ‘ami ’asher himlakhtikha ‘alav. 
2_chronicles 1:12	hakhakhemah vehamada‘ natun lakh ve‘osher unekhasim vekhawod ’eten lakh ’asher lo hayah khen lamelakhim ’asher lefanekha ve’akharekha lo yihyeh ken. 
2_chronicles 1:13	vayawo shelomoh labamah ’asher begiw‘on yerushalim milifnei ’ohel mo‘ed vayimlokh ‘al yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 1:14	vaye’esof shelomoh rekhew ufarashim vayhi lo ’elef ve’arba‘ mei’ot rekhew ushenem ‘asar ’elef parashim vayanikhem be‘arei harekhew ve‘im hamelekh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 1:15	vayiten hamelekh ’et hakesef ve’et hazahaw birushalim ka’awanim ve’et ha’arazim natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larow. 
2_chronicles 1:16	umotsa hasusim ’asher lishlomoh mimitsrayim umiqvei sokharei hamelekh miqvei yiqkhu bimkhir. 
2_chronicles 1:17	vaya‘alu vayotsi’u mimitsrayim merkawah beshesh mei’ot kesef vesus bakhamishim umei’ah vekhen lekhal malkhei hakhitim umalkhei ’aram beyadam yotsi’u. 
2_chronicles 2:1	vayomer shelomoh liwnot bayit leshem yhoh uwayit lemalkhuto. 
2_chronicles 2:2	vayispor shelomoh shiw‘im ’elef ’ish sabal ushemonim ’elef ’ish khotsew bahar umenatsekhim ‘aleihem sheloshet ’alafim veshesh mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 2:3	vayishlakh shelomoh ’el khuram melekh tsor leimor ka’asher ‘asita ‘im david ’awi vatishlakh lo ’arazim liwnot lo wayit lashewet bo. 
2_chronicles 2:4	hineh ’ani woneh bayit leshem yhoh ’elohai lehaqdish lo lehaqtir lefanav qetoret samim uma‘arekhet tamid ve‘olot laboqer vela‘erew lashabatot velekhodashim ulemo‘adei yhoh ’eloheinu le‘olam zot ‘al yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 2:5	vehabayit ’asher ’ani woneh gadol ki gadol ’eloheinu mikal ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 2:6	umi ya‘atsar koakh liwnot lo wayit ki hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkeluhu umi ’ani ’asher ’ewneh lo wayit ki ’im lehaqtir lefanav. 
2_chronicles 2:7	ve‘atah shelakh li ’ish khakham la‘asot bazahaw uwakesef uwanekhoshet uwabarzel uwa’argevan vekharmil utekheilet veyodeia‘ lefateiakh pitukhim ‘im hakhakhamim ’asher ‘imi bihudah uwirushalim ’asher heikhin david ’awi. 
2_chronicles 2:8	ushelakh li ‘atsei ’arazim beroshim ve’algumim meihalewanon ki ’ani yada‘ti ’asher ‘awadekha yod‘im likhrot ‘atsei lewanon vehineh ‘awadai ‘im ‘awadekha. 
2_chronicles 2:9	ulehakhin li ‘eitsim larow ki habayit ’asher ’ani woneh gadol vehaflei. 
2_chronicles 2:10	vehineh lakhotewim lekhoretei ha‘eitsim natati khitim makot la‘awadekha korim ‘esrim ’elef use‘orim korim ‘esrim ’alef veyayin batim ‘esrim ’elef veshemen batim ‘esrim ’alef. 
2_chronicles 2:11	vayomer khuram melekh tsor bikhtaw vayishlakh ’el shelomoh be’ahawat yhoh ’et ‘amo netanekha ‘aleihem melekh. 
2_chronicles 2:12	vayomer khuram barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher ‘asah ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets ’asher natan ledavid hamelekh ben khakham yodeia‘ seikhel uwinah ’asher yiwneh bayit yhoh uwayit lemalkhuto. 
2_chronicles 2:13	ve‘atah shalakhti ’ish khakham yodeia‘ binah lekhuram ’awi. 
2_chronicles 2:14	ben ’ishah min benot dan ve’awiv ’ish tsori yodeia‘ la‘asot bazahaw uwakesef banekhoshet babarzel ba’awanim uwa‘eitsim ba’argaman batekheilet uwabuts uwakarmil ulefateiakh kal pituakh velakhshow kal makhashawet ’asher yinaten lo ‘im khakhamekha vekhakhmei ’adoni david ’awikha. 
2_chronicles 2:15	ve‘atah hakhitim vehase‘orim hashemen vehayayin ’asher ’amar ’adoni yishlakh la‘awadav. 
2_chronicles 2:16	va’anakhnu nikhrot ‘eitsim min halewanon kekhal tsarekekha unewi’em lekha rafsodot ‘al yam yafo ve’atah ta‘aleh ’otam yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 2:17	vayispor shelomoh kal ha’anashim hageirim ’asher be’erets yisra’el ’akharei hasefar ’asher sefaram david ’awiv vayimatse’u mei’ah vakhamishim ’elef usheloshet ’alafim veshesh mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 2:18	vaya‘as meihem shiw‘im ’elef sabal ushemonim ’elef khotsew bahar usheloshet ’alafim veshesh mei’ot menatsekhim leha‘awid ’et ha‘am. 
2_chronicles 3:1	vayakhel shelomoh liwnot ’et bet yhoh birushalim behar hamoriyah ’asher nir’ah ledavid ’awihu ’asher heikhin bimqom david begoren ’arenan haywusi. 
2_chronicles 3:2	vayakhel liwnot bakhodesh hasheini basheini bishnat ’arba‘ lemalkhuto. 
2_chronicles 3:3	ve’eleh husad shelomoh liwnot ’et bet ha’elohim ha’orekh ’amot bamidah harishonah ’amot shishim verokhaw ’amot ‘esrim. 
2_chronicles 3:4	veha’ulam ’asher ‘al penei ha’orekh ‘al penei rokhaw habayit ’amot ‘esrim vehagowah mei’ah ve‘esrim vaytsapeihu mipenimah zahaw tahor. 
2_chronicles 3:5	ve’et habayit hagadol khipah ‘ets beroshim vaykhapeihu zahaw tow vaya‘al ‘alav timorim vesharsherot. 
2_chronicles 3:6	vaytsaf ’et habayit ’ewen yeqarah letif’aret vehazahaw zehaw parvayim. 
2_chronicles 3:7	vaykhaf ’et habayit haqorot hasipim veqirotav vedaltotav zahaw ufitakh keruwim ‘al haqirot. 
2_chronicles 3:8	vaya‘as ’et bet qodesh haqodashim ’areko ‘al penei rokhaw habayit ’amot ‘esrim verakhebo ’amot ‘esrim vaykhapeihu zahaw tow lekhikarim shesh mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 3:9	umishqal lemismerot lishqalim khamishim zahaw veha‘aliyot khipah zahaw. 
2_chronicles 3:10	vaya‘as bewet qodesh haqodashim keruwim shenayim ma‘aseh tsa‘atsu‘im vaytsapu ’otam zahaw. 
2_chronicles 3:11	vekhanfei hakeruwim ’arekam ’amot ‘esrim kenaf ha’ekhad le’amot khamesh maga‘at leqir habayit vehakanaf ha’akheret ’amot khamesh magia‘ likhnaf hakeruw ha’akher. 
2_chronicles 3:12	ukhenaf hakeruw ha’ekhad ’amot khamesh magia‘ leqir habayit vehakanaf ha’akheret ’amot khamesh deweiqah likhnaf hakeruw ha’akher. 
2_chronicles 3:13	kanfei hakeruwim ha’eleh poresim ’amot ‘esrim vehem ‘omedim ‘al ragleihem ufeneihem labayit. 
2_chronicles 3:14	vaya‘as ’et haparokhet tekheilet ve’argaman vekharmil uwuts vaya‘al ‘alav keruwim. 
2_chronicles 3:15	vaya‘as lifnei habayit ‘amudim shenayim ’amot sheloshim vekhamesh ’orekh vehatsefet ’asher ‘al rosho ’amot khamesh. 
2_chronicles 3:16	vaya‘as sharsherot badewir vayiten ‘al rosh ha‘amudim vaya‘as rimonim mei’ah vayiten basharsherot. 
2_chronicles 3:17	vayaqem ’et ha‘amudim ‘al penei haheikhal ’ekhad miyamin ve’ekhad meihasemol vayiqra shem haymini haymani yakhin veshem hasemali bo‘az. 
2_chronicles 4:1	vaya‘as mizbakh nekhoshet ‘esrim ’amah ’areko ve‘esrim ’amah rakhebo ve‘eser ’amot qomato. 
2_chronicles 4:2	vaya‘as ’et hayam mutsaq ‘eser ba’amah misefato ’el sefato ‘agol sawiw vekhamesh ba’amah qomato veqav sheloshim ba’amah yasow ’oto sawiw. 
2_chronicles 4:3	udemut beqarim takhat lo sawiw sawiw sowwim ’oto ‘eser ba’amah maqifim ’et hayam sawiw shenayim turim habaqar yetsuqim bemutsaqto. 
2_chronicles 4:4	‘omed ‘al shenem ‘asar baqar sheloshah fonim tsafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah usheloshah ponim mizrakhah vehayam ‘aleihem milma‘elah vekhal ’akhoreihem bayetah. 
2_chronicles 4:5	ve‘aweyo tefakh usefato kema‘aseh sefat kos perakh shoshanah makhaziq batim sheloshet ’alafim yakhil. 
2_chronicles 4:6	vaya‘as kiyorim ‘asarah vayiten khamishah miyamin vakhamishah misemol lerakhetsah wahem ’et ma‘aseh ha‘olah yadikhu wam vehayam lerakhetsah lakohanim bo. 
2_chronicles 4:7	vaya‘as ’et menorot hazahaw ‘eser kemishpatam vayiten baheikhal khamesh miyamin vekhamesh misemol. 
2_chronicles 4:8	vaya‘as shulkhanot ‘asarah vayanakh baheikhal khamishah miyamin vakhamishah misemol vaya‘as mizreqei zahaw mei’ah. 
2_chronicles 4:9	vaya‘as khatsar hakohanim veha‘azarah hagedolah udelatot la‘azarah vedaltoteihem tsipah nekhoshet. 
2_chronicles 4:10	ve’et hayam natan miketef haymanit qeidemah mimul negbah. 
2_chronicles 4:11	vaya‘as khuram ’et hasirot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamizraqot vaykhal khyram khuram la‘asot ’et hamelakhah ’asher ‘asah lamelekh shelomoh bewet ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 4:12	‘amudim shenayim vehagulot vehakotarot ‘al rosh ha‘amudim shetayim vehasewakhot shetayim lekhasot ’et shetei gulot hakotarot ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim. 
2_chronicles 4:13	ve’et harimonim ’arba‘ mei’ot lishtei hasewakhot shenayim turim rimonim lasewakhah ha’ekhat lekhasot ’et shetei gulot hakotarot ’asher ‘al penei ha‘amudim. 
2_chronicles 4:14	ve’et hamekhonot ‘asah ve’et hakiyorot ‘asah ‘al hamekhonot. 
2_chronicles 4:15	’et hayam ’ekhad ve’et habaqar shenem ‘asar takhtav. 
2_chronicles 4:16	ve’et hasirot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamizlagot ve’et kal keleihem ‘asah khuram ’awiv lamelekh shelomoh lewet yhoh nekhoshet maruq. 
2_chronicles 4:17	bekhikar hayarden yetsaqam hamelekh ba‘awi ha’adamah ben sukot uwen tsereidatah. 
2_chronicles 4:18	vaya‘as shelomoh kal hakeilim ha’eleh larow me’od ki lo nekhqar mishqal hanekhoshet. 
2_chronicles 4:19	vaya‘as shelomoh ’et kal hakeilim ’asher bet ha’elohim ve’et mizbakh hazahaw ve’et hashulkhanot va‘aleihem lekhem hapanim. 
2_chronicles 4:20	ve’et hamenorot veneiroteihem lewa‘aram kamishpat lifnei hadewir zahaw sagur. 
2_chronicles 4:21	vehaperakh vehaneirot vehamelqakhayim zahaw hu mikhlot zahaw. 
2_chronicles 4:22	vehamzamerot vehamizraqot vehakapot vehamakhtot zahaw sagur ufetakh habayit daltotav hapenimiyot leqodesh haqodashim vedaltei habayit laheikhal zahaw. 
2_chronicles 5:1	vatishlam kal hamelakhah ’asher ‘asah shelomoh lewet yhoh vayawei shelomoh ’et qadeshei david ’awiv ve’et hakesef ve’et hazahaw ve’et kal hakeilim natan be’otserot bet ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 5:2	’az yaqhel shelomoh ’et ziqnei yisra’el ve’et kal rashei hamatot nesi’ei ha’awot liwnei yisra’el ’el yerushalim leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhoh mei‘ir david hi tsiyon. 
2_chronicles 5:3	vayiqahalu ’el hamelekh kal ’ish yisra’el bekhag hu hakhodesh hashewi‘i. 
2_chronicles 5:4	vayawo’u kol ziqnei yisra’el vayis’u halviyim ’et ha’aron. 
2_chronicles 5:5	vaya‘alu ’et ha’aron ve’et ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et kal kelei haqodesh ’asher ba’ohel he‘elu ’otam hakohanim halviyim. 
2_chronicles 5:6	vehamelekh shelomoh vekhal ‘adat yisra’el hano‘adim ‘alav lifnei ha’aron mezabekhim tson uwaqar ’asher lo yisaferu velo yimanu meirow. 
2_chronicles 5:7	vayawi’u hakohanim ’et ’aron berit yhoh ’el meqomo ’el dewir habayit ’el qodesh haqedashim ’el takhat kanfei hakeruwim. 
2_chronicles 5:8	vayihyu hakeruwim poresim kenafayim ‘al meqom ha’aron vaykhasu hakeruwim ‘al ha’aron ve‘al badav milma‘elah. 
2_chronicles 5:9	vaya’arikhu habadim vayeira’u rashei habadim min ha’aron ‘al penei hadewir velo yeira’u hakhutsah vayhi sham ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_chronicles 5:10	’en ba’aron raq shenei halukhot ’asher natan mosheh bekhorew ’asher karat yhoh ‘im benei yisra’el betseitam mimitsrayim. 
2_chronicles 5:11	vayhi betset hakohanim min haqodesh ki kal hakohanim hanimtse’im hitqadashu ’en lishmor lemakhleqot. 
2_chronicles 5:12	vehalviyim hamshorarim lekhulam le’asaf leheiman lidutun veliwneihem vela’akheihem melubashim buts bimtsiltayim uwinwalim vekhinorot ‘omedim mizrakh lamizbeiakh ve‘imahem kohanim lemei’ah ve‘esrim makhtseririm makhtserim bakhatsotserot. 
2_chronicles 5:13	vayhi khe’ekhad lamakhatsotserim lamkhatserim velamshorarim lehashmia‘ qol ’ekhad lehalel ulehodot yhoh ukheharim qol bakhatsotserot uwimtsiltayim uwikhlei hashir uwehalel yhoh ki tow ki le‘olam khasdo vehabayit malei ‘anan bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 5:14	velo yakhelu hakohanim la‘amod lesharet mipenei he‘anan ki malei khewod yhoh ’et bet ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 6:1	’az ’amar shelomoh yhoh ’amar lishkon ba‘arafel. 
2_chronicles 6:2	va’ani baniti wet zewul lakh umakhon leshiwtekha ‘olamim. 
2_chronicles 6:3	vayasew hamelekh ’et panav vaywarekh ’et kal qehal yisra’el vekhal qehal yisra’el ‘omed. 
2_chronicles 6:4	vayomer barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher diber befiv ’et david ’awi uweyadav milei leimor. 
2_chronicles 6:5	min hayom ’asher hotseiti ’et ‘ami mei’erets mitsrayim lo wakharti we‘ir mikol shiwtei yisra’el liwnot bayit lihyot shemi sham velo wakharti we’ish lihyot nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 6:6	va’ewkhar birushalim lihyot shemi sham va’ewkhar bedavid lihyot ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 6:7	vayhi ‘im lewaw david ’awi liwnot bayit leshem yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 6:8	vayomer yhoh ’el david ’awi ya‘an ’asher hayah ‘im lewawekha liwnot bayit lishmi hetiwota ki hayah ‘im lewawekha. 
2_chronicles 6:9	raq ’atah lo tiwneh habayit ki winkha hayotsei meikhalatsekha hu yiwneh habayit lishmi. 
2_chronicles 6:10	vayaqem yhoh ’et dewaro ’asher diber va’aqum takhat david ’awi va’eishew ‘al kisei yisra’el ka’asher diber yhoh va’ewneh habayit leshem yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 6:11	va’asim sham ’et ha’aron ’asher sham berit yhoh ’asher karat ‘im benei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 6:12	vaya‘amod lifnei mizbakh yhoh neged kal qehal yisra’el vayifros kapav. 
2_chronicles 6:13	ki ‘asah shelomoh kiyor nekhoshet vayiteneihu betokh ha‘azarah khamesh ’amot ’areko vekhamesh ’amot rakhebo ve’amot shalosh qomato vaya‘amod ‘alav vayiwrakh ‘al birkav neged kal qehal yisra’el vayifros kapav hashamayemah. 
2_chronicles 6:14	vayomar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’en kamokha ’elohim bashamayim uwa’arets shomer haberit vehakhesed la‘awadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. 
2_chronicles 6:15	’asher shamarta le‘awdekha david ’awi ’et ’asher dibarta lo vatedaber befikha uweyadekha mileita kayom hazeh. 
2_chronicles 6:16	ve‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’el mor le‘awdekha david ’awi ’et ’asher dibarta lo leimor lo yikaret lekha ’ish milefanai yoshew ‘al kisei yisra’el raq ’im yishmeru wanekha ’et darkam lalekhet betorati ka’asher halakhta lefanai. 
2_chronicles 6:17	ve‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’el yei’amen dewarekha ’asher dibarta le‘awdekha ledavid. 
2_chronicles 6:18	ki ha’umnam yeishew ’elohim ’et ha’adam ‘al ha’arets hineh shamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha ’af ki habayit hazeh ’asher baniti. 
2_chronicles 6:19	ufanita ’el tefilat ‘awdekha ve’el tekhinato yhoh ’elohai lishmoa‘ ’el harinah ve’el hatefilah ’asher ‘awdekha mitpalel lefanekha. 
2_chronicles 6:20	lihyot ‘einekha fetukhot ’el habayit hazeh yomam valaylah ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amarta lasum shimkha sham lishmoa‘ ’el hatefilah ’asher yitpalel ‘awdekha ’el hamaqom hazeh. 
2_chronicles 6:21	veshama‘ta ’el takhanunei ‘awdekha ve‘amekha yisra’el ’asher yitpalu ’el hamaqom hazeh ve’atah tishma‘ mimeqom shiwtekha min hashamayim veshama‘ta vesalakheta. 
2_chronicles 6:22	’im yekheta ’ish lerei‘eihu venasha wo ’alah leha’aloto uwa ’alah lifnei mizbakhakha babayit hazeh. 
2_chronicles 6:23	ve’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim ve‘asita veshafata ’et ‘awadekha lehashiw lerasha‘ latet darko berosho ulehatsdiq tsadiq latet lo ketsidqato. 
2_chronicles 6:24	ve’im yinagef ‘amekha yisra’el lifnei ’oyew ki yekhet’u lakh veshawu vehodu ’et shemekha vehitpalu vehitkhanenu lefanekha babayit hazeh.
