2_chronicles 6:25	ve’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat ‘amekha yisra’el vahasheiwotam ’el ha’adamah ’asher natatah lahem vela’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 6:26	behei‘atser hashamayim velo yihyeh matar ki yekhet’u lakh vehitpalu ’el hamaqom hazeh vehodu ’et shemekha meikhatatam yeshuwun ki ta‘anem. 
2_chronicles 6:27	ve’atah tishma‘ hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat ‘awadekha ve‘amekha yisra’el ki torem ’el haderekh hatowah ’asher yeilekhu wah venatatah matar ‘al ’artsekha ’asher natatah le‘amekha lenakhalah. 
2_chronicles 6:28	ra‘aw ki yihyeh wa’arets dewer ki yihyeh shidafon veyeiraqon ’arbeh vekhasil ki yihyeh ki yatsar lo ’oywav be’erets she‘arav kal nega‘ vekhal makhalah. 
2_chronicles 6:29	kal tefilah khal tekhinah ’asher yihyeh lekhal ha’adam ulekhol ‘amekha yisra’el ’asher yeide‘u ’ish nig‘o umakh’owo ufaras kapav ’el habayit hazeh. 
2_chronicles 6:30	ve’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha vesalakhta venatatah la’ish kekhal derakhav ’asher teida‘ ’et lewawo ki ’atah lewadekha yada‘ta ’et lewaw benei ha’adam. 
2_chronicles 6:31	lema‘an yira’ukha lalekhet bidrakhekha kal hayamim ’asher hem khayim ‘al penei ha’adamah ’asher natatah la’awoteinu. 
2_chronicles 6:32	vegam ’el hanakheri ’asher lo mei‘amekha yisra’el hu uwa mei’erets rekhoqah lema‘an shimkha hagadol veyadekha hakhazaqah uzero‘akha hanetuyah uwa’u vehitpalu ’el habayit hazeh. 
2_chronicles 6:33	ve’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim mimekhon shiwtekha ve‘asita kekhol ’asher yiqra ’eilekha hanakheri lema‘an yeide‘u khal ‘amei ha’arets ’et shemekha uleyir’ah ’otekha ke‘amekha yisra’el velada‘at ki shimkha niqra ‘al habayit hazeh ’asher baniti. 
2_chronicles 6:34	ki yeitsei ‘amekha lamilkhamah ‘al ’oywav baderekh ’asher tishlakhem vehitpalu ’eilekha derekh ha‘ir hazot ’asher bakharta bah vehabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. 
2_chronicles 6:35	veshama‘ta min hashamayim ’et tefilatam ve’et tekhinatam ve‘asita mishpatam. 
2_chronicles 6:36	ki yekhet’u lakh ki ’en ’adam ’asher lo yekheta ve’anafta wam unetatam lifnei ’oyew veshawum showeihem ’el ’erets rekhoqah ’o qerowah. 
2_chronicles 6:37	veheishiwu ’el lewawam ba’arets ’asher nishbu sham veshawu vehitkhanenu ’eilekha be’erets shiwyam leimor khatanu he‘evinu verasha‘enu. 
2_chronicles 6:38	veshawu ’eilekha bekhal libam uwekhal nafsham be’erets shiwyam ’asher shawu ’otam vehitpalu derekh ’artsam ’asher natatah la’awotam veha‘ir ’asher bakharta velabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. 
2_chronicles 6:39	veshama‘ta min hashamayim mimekhon shiwtekha ’et tefilatam ve’et tekhinoteihem ve‘asita mishpatam vesalakhta le‘amekha ’asher khate’u lakh. 
2_chronicles 6:40	‘atah ’elohai yihyu na ‘einekha petukhot ve’azenekha qashuwot litfilat hamaqom hazeh. 
2_chronicles 6:41	ve‘atah qumah yhoh ’elohim lenukhekha ’atah va’aron ‘uzekha kohanekha yhoh ’elohim yilbeshu teshu‘ah vakhasidekha yismekhu watow. 
2_chronicles 6:42	yhoh ’elohim ’al tashew penei meshikhekha zakherah lekhasdei david ‘awdekha. 
2_chronicles 7:1	ukhekhalot shelomoh lehitpalel veha’esh yaredah meihashamayim vatokhal ha‘olah vehazewakhim ukhewod yhoh malei ’et habayit. 
2_chronicles 7:2	velo yakhelu hakohanim lawo ’el bet yhoh ki malei khewod yhoh ’et bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 7:3	vekhol benei yisra’el ro’im beredet ha’esh ukhewod yhoh ‘al habayit vayikhre‘u ’apayim ’artsah ‘al haritsfah vayishtakhavu vehodot yhoh ki tow ki le‘olam khasdo. 
2_chronicles 7:4	vehamelekh vekhal ha‘am zowekhim zewakh lifnei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 7:5	vayizbakh hamelekh shelomoh ’et zewakh habaqar ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef vetson mei’ah ve‘esrim ’alef vayakhnekhu ’et bet ha’elohim hamelekh vekhal ha‘am. 
2_chronicles 7:6	vehakohanim ‘al mishmerotam ‘omedim vehalviyim bikhlei shir yhoh ’asher ‘asah david hamelekh lehodot yhoh ki le‘olam khasdo behalel david beyadam vehakohanim makhatsotserim makhtserim negdam vekhal yisra’el ‘omedim. 
2_chronicles 7:7	vayqadesh shelomoh ’et tokh hekhatser ’asher lifnei wet yhoh ki ‘asah sham ha‘olot ve’et khelwei hashelamim ki mizbakh hanekhoshet ’asher ‘asah shelomoh lo yakhol lehakhil ’et ha‘olah ve’et haminkhah ve’et hakhalawim. 
2_chronicles 7:8	vaya‘as shelomoh ’et hekhag ba‘et hahi shiw‘at yamim vekhal yisra’el ‘imo qahal gadol me’od milewo khamat ‘ad nakhal mitsrayim. 
2_chronicles 7:9	vaya‘asu bayom hashemini ‘atsaret ki khanukat hamizbeiakh ‘asu shiw‘at yamim vehekhag shiw‘at yamim. 
2_chronicles 7:10	uweyom ‘esrim usheloshah lakhodesh hashewi‘i shilakh ’et ha‘am le’aholeihem semeikhim vetowei lew ‘al hatowah ’asher ‘asah yhoh ledavid velishlomoh uleyisra’el ‘amo. 
2_chronicles 7:11	vaykhal shelomoh ’et bet yhoh ve’et bet hamelekh ve’et kal haba ‘al lew shelomoh la‘asot bewet yhoh uweweito hitsliakh. 
2_chronicles 7:12	vayeira yhoh ’el shelomoh balayelah vayomer lo shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha uwakharti bamaqom hazeh li lewet zawakh. 
2_chronicles 7:13	hen ’e‘etsor hashamayim velo yihyeh matar vehen ’atsaveh ‘al khagaw le’ekhol ha’arets ve’im ’ashalakh dewer be‘ami. 
2_chronicles 7:14	veyikane‘u ‘ami ’asher niqra shemi ‘aleihem veyitpalu viwaqshu fanai veyashuwu midarkheihem hara‘im va’ani ’eshma‘ min hashamayim ve’eslakh lekhatatam ve’erpa ’et ’artsam. 
2_chronicles 7:15	‘atah ‘einai yihyu fetukhot ve’azenai qashuwot litfilat hamaqom hazeh. 
2_chronicles 7:16	ve‘atah bakharti vehiqdashti ’et habayit hazeh lihyot shemi sham ‘ad ‘olam vehayu ‘einai velibi sham kal hayamim. 
2_chronicles 7:17	ve’atah ’im teilekh lefanai ka’asher halakh david ’awikha vela‘asot kekhol ’asher tsivitikha vekhuqai umishpatai tishmor. 
2_chronicles 7:18	vahaqimoti ’et kisei malkhutekha ka’asher karati ledavid ’awikha leimor lo yikaret lekha ’ish moshel beyisra’el. 
2_chronicles 7:19	ve’im teshuwun ’atem va‘azawtem khuqotai umitsvotai ’asher natati lifneikhem vahalakhtem va‘awadtem ’elohim ’akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. 
2_chronicles 7:20	unetashtim mei‘al ’admati ’asher natati lahem ve’et habayit hazeh ’asher hiqdashti lishmi ’ashlikh mei‘al panai ve’etenenu lemashal velishninah bekhal ha‘amim. 
2_chronicles 7:21	vehabayit hazeh ’asher hayah ‘elyon lekhal ‘ower ‘alav yishom ve’amar bameh ‘asah yhoh kakhah la’arets hazot velabayit hazeh. 
2_chronicles 7:22	ve’ameru ‘al ’asher ‘azewu ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem ’asher hotsi’am mei’erets mitsrayim vayakhaziqu beilohim ’akheirim vayishtakhavu lahem vaya‘awdum ‘al ken heiwi ‘aleihem ’et kal hara‘ah hazot. 
2_chronicles 8:1	vayhi miqets ‘esrim shanah ’asher banah shelomoh ’et bet yhoh ve’et beito. 
2_chronicles 8:2	vehe‘arim ’asher natan khuram lishlomoh banah shelomoh ’otam vayoshew sham ’et benei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 8:3	vayeilekh shelomoh khamat tsowah vayekhezaq ‘aleha. 
2_chronicles 8:4	vayiwen ’et tadmor bamidbar ve’et kal ‘arei hamiskenot ’asher banah bakhamat. 
2_chronicles 8:5	vayiwen ’et bet khoron ha‘elyon ve’et bet khoron hatakhton ‘arei matsor khomot delatayim uweriakh. 
2_chronicles 8:6	ve’et ba‘alat ve’et kal ‘arei hamiskenot ’asher hayu lishlomoh ve’et kal ‘arei harekhew ve’et ‘arei haparashim ve’et kal kheisheq shelomoh ’asher khashaq liwnot birushalim uwalewanon uwekhol ’erets memshalto. 
2_chronicles 8:7	kal ha‘am hanotar min hakhiti veha’emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaywusi ’asher lo miyisra’el hemah. 
2_chronicles 8:8	min beneihem ’asher notru ’akhareihem ba’arets ’asher lo khilum benei yisra’el vaya‘alem shelomoh lemas ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_chronicles 8:9	umin benei yisra’el ’asher lo natan shelomoh la‘awadim limlakhto ki hemah ’anshei milkhamah vesarei shalishav vesarei rikhbo ufarashav. 
2_chronicles 8:10	ve’eleh sarei hanetsiwim hanitsawim ’asher lamelekh shelomoh khamishim umatayim harodim ba‘am. 
2_chronicles 8:11	ve’et bat par‘oh he‘elah shelomoh mei‘ir david labayit ’asher banah lah ki ’amar lo teishew ’ishah li bewet david melekh yisra’el ki qodesh hemah ’asher ba’ah ’aleihem ’aron yhoh. 
2_chronicles 8:12	’az he‘elah shelomoh ‘olot yhoh ‘al mizbakh yhoh ’asher banah lifnei ha’ulam. 
2_chronicles 8:13	uwidwar yom beyom leha‘alot kemitsvat mosheh lashabatot velekhodashim velamo‘adot shalosh pe‘amim bashanah bekhag hamatsot uwekhag hashawu‘ot uwekhag hasukot. 
2_chronicles 8:14	vaya‘amed kemishpat david ’awiv ’et makhleqot hakohanim ‘al ‘awodatam vehalviyim ‘al mishmerotam lehalel ulesharet neged hakohanim lidwar yom beyomo vehasho‘arim bemakhleqotam lesha‘ar vasha‘ar ki khen mitsvat david ’ish ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 8:15	velo saru mitsvat hamelekh ‘al hakohanim vehalviyim lekhal dawar vela’otsarot. 
2_chronicles 8:16	vatikon kal melekhet shelomoh ‘ad hayom musad bet yhoh ve‘ad keloto shalem bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 8:17	’az halakh shelomoh le‘etsyon gewer ve’el ’eilot ‘al sefat hayam be’erets ’edom. 
2_chronicles 8:18	vayishlakh lo khuram beyad ‘awadav ’oniyot ’oniyot va‘awadim yod‘ei yam vayawo’u ‘im ‘awdei shelomoh ’ofirah vayiqkhu misham ’arba‘ mei’ot vakhamishim kikar zahaw vayawi’u ’el hamelekh shelomoh. 
2_chronicles 9:1	umalkat shewa shame‘ah ’et sheima‘ shelomoh vatawo lenasot ’et shelomoh wekhidot birushalim bekhayil kawed me’od ugemalim nose’im besamim vezahaw larow ve’ewen yeqarah vatawo ’el shelomoh vatedaber ‘imo ’et kal ’asher hayah ‘im lewawah. 
2_chronicles 9:2	vayaged lah shelomoh ’et kal dewareha velo ne‘lam dawar mishelomoh ’asher lo higid lah. 
2_chronicles 9:3	vateire malkat shewa ’et khakhemat shelomoh vehabayit ’asher banah. 
2_chronicles 9:4	uma’akhal shulkhano umoshaw ‘awadav uma‘amad mesharetav umalbusheihem umashqav umalbusheihem va‘aliyato ’asher ya‘aleh bet yhoh velo hayah ‘od bah ruakh. 
2_chronicles 9:5	vatomer ’el hamelekh ’emet hadawar ’asher shama‘ti be’artsi ‘al dewarekha ve‘al khakhematekha. 
2_chronicles 9:6	velo he’emanti lediwreihem ‘ad ’asher bati vatir’enah ‘einai vehineh lo hugad li khatsi marbit khakhematekha yasafta ‘al hashemu‘ah ’asher shama‘eti. 
2_chronicles 9:7	’ashrei ’anashekha ve’ashrei ‘awadekha ’eleh ha‘omedim lefanekha tamid veshome‘im ’et khakhematekha. 
2_chronicles 9:8	yehi yhoh ’elohekha barukh ’asher khafets bekha letitekha ‘al kis’o lemelekh yhoh ’elohekha be’ahawat ’elohekha ’et yisra’el leha‘amido le‘olam vayitenkha ‘aleihem lemelekh la‘asot mishpat utsedaqah. 
2_chronicles 9:9	vatiten lamelekh mei’ah ve‘esrim kikar zahaw uwesamim larow me’od ve’ewen yeqarah velo hayah kabosem hahu ’asher natenah malkat shewa lamelekh shelomoh. 
2_chronicles 9:10	vegam ‘awdei khiram khuram ve‘awdei shelomoh ’asher heiwi’u zahaw mei’ofir heiwi’u ‘atsei ’algumim ve’ewen yeqarah. 
2_chronicles 9:11	vaya‘as hamelekh ’et ‘atsei ha’algumim mesilot lewet yhoh ulewet hamelekh vekhinorot unewalim lasharim velo nir’u khahem lefanim be’erets yehudah. 
2_chronicles 9:12	vehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat shewa ’et kal kheftsah ’asher sha’alah milewad ’asher heiwi’ah ’el hamelekh vatahafokh vateilekh le’artsah hi va‘awadeha. 
2_chronicles 9:13	vayhi mishqal hazahaw ’asher ba lishlomoh beshanah ’ekhat shesh mei’ot veshishim vashesh kikerei zahaw. 
2_chronicles 9:14	lewad mei’anshei hatarim vehasokharim mewi’im vekhal malkhei ‘araw ufakhot ha’arets mewi’im zahaw vakhesef lishlomoh. 
2_chronicles 9:15	vaya‘as hamelekh shelomoh matayim tsinah zahaw shakhut shesh mei’ot zahaw shakhut ya‘aleh ‘al hatsinah ha’ekhat. 
2_chronicles 9:16	ushelosh mei’ot maginim zahaw shakhut shelosh mei’ot zahaw ya‘aleh ‘al hamagen ha’ekhat vayitenem hamelekh bewet ya‘ar halewanon. 
2_chronicles 9:17	vaya‘as hamelekh kisei shen gadol vaytsapeihu zahaw tahor. 
2_chronicles 9:18	veshesh ma‘alot lakisei vekhewesh bazahaw lakisei ma’okhazim veyadot mizeh umizeh ‘al meqom hashawet ushenayim ’arayot ‘omedim ’eitsel hayadot. 
2_chronicles 9:19	ushenem ‘asar ’arayot ‘omedim sham ‘al shesh hama‘alot mizeh umizeh lo na‘asah khen lekhal mamlakhah. 
2_chronicles 9:20	vekhol kelei mashqeh hamelekh shelomoh zahaw vekhol kelei bet ya‘ar halewanon zahaw sagur ’en kesef nekhshaw bimei shelomoh lim’umah. 
2_chronicles 9:21	ki ’oniyot lamelekh holekhot tarshish ‘im ‘awdei khuram ’akhat leshalosh shanim tawonah ’oniyot tarshish nose’ot zahaw vakhesef shenhabim veqofim vetukiyim. 
2_chronicles 9:22	vayigdal hamelekh shelomoh mikol malkhei ha’arets le‘osher vekhakhemah. 
2_chronicles 9:23	vekhol malkhei ha’arets mewaqshim ’et penei shelomoh lishmoa‘ ’et khakhemato ’asher natan ha’elohim belibo. 
2_chronicles 9:24	vehem mewi’im ’ish minkhato kelei khesef ukhelei zahaw uselamot neisheq uwesamim susim uferadim dewar shanah beshanah. 
2_chronicles 9:25	vayhi lishlomoh ’arba‘at ’alafim ’uryot susim umarkawot ushenem ‘asar ’elef parashim vayanikhem be‘arei harekhew ve‘im hamelekh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 9:26	vayhi moshel bekhal hamelakhim min hanahar ve‘ad ’erets pelishtim ve‘ad gewul mitsrayim. 
2_chronicles 9:27	vayiten hamelekh ’et hakesef birushalim ka’awanim ve’et ha’arazim natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larow. 
2_chronicles 9:28	umotsi’im susim mimitsrayim lishlomoh umikal ha’aratsot. 
2_chronicles 9:29	ushe’ar diwrei shelomoh harishonim veha’akharonim halo hem ketuwim ‘al diwrei natan hanawi ve‘al newu’at ’akhiyah hashiloni uwakhazot ye‘di ye‘do hakhozeh ‘al yarawe‘am ben newat. 
2_chronicles 9:30	vayimlokh shelomoh wirushalim ‘al kal yisra’el ’arba‘im shanah. 
2_chronicles 9:31	vayishkaw shelomoh ‘im ’awotav vayiqberuhu be‘ir david ’awiv vayimlokh rekhaw‘am beno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 10:1	vayeilekh rekhaw‘am shekhemah ki shekhem ba’u khal yisra’el lehamlikh ’oto. 
2_chronicles 10:2	vayhi kishmoa‘ yarawe‘am ben newat vehu wemitsrayim ’asher barakh mipenei shelomoh hamelekh vayashaw yarawe‘am mimitsrayim. 
2_chronicles 10:3	vayishlekhu vayiqre’u lo vayawo yarawe‘am vekhal yisra’el vaydaberu ’el rekhaw‘am leimor. 
2_chronicles 10:4	’awikha hiqshah ’et ‘uleinu ve‘atah haqel mei‘awodat ’awikha haqashah umei‘ulo hakawed ’asher natan ‘aleinu vena‘awdeka. 
2_chronicles 10:5	vayomer ’aleihem ‘od sheloshet yamim veshuwu ’eilai vayeilekh ha‘am. 
2_chronicles 10:6	vayiva‘ats hamelekh rekhaw‘am ’et hazeqeinim ’asher hayu ‘omedim lifnei shelomoh ’awiv bihyoto khai leimor ’ekh ’atem no‘atsim lehashiw la‘am hazeh dawar. 
2_chronicles 10:7	vaydaberu ’eilav leimor ’im tihyeh letow leha‘am hazeh uretsitam vedibarta ’aleihem dewarim towim vehayu lekha ‘awadim kal hayamim. 
2_chronicles 10:8	vaya‘azow ’et ‘atsat hazeqeinim ’asher ye‘atsuhu vayiva‘ats ’et hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito ha‘omedim lefanav. 
2_chronicles 10:9	vayomer ’aleihem mah ’atem no‘atsim venashiw dawar ’et ha‘am hazeh ’asher diberu ’eilai leimor haqel min ha‘ol ’asher natan ’awikha ‘aleinu. 
2_chronicles 10:10	vaydaberu ’ito hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito leimor koh tomar la‘am ’asher diberu ’eilekha leimor ’awikha hikhbid ’et ‘uleinu ve’atah haqel mei‘aleinu koh tomar ’aleihem qatani ‘awah mimatenei ’awi. 
2_chronicles 10:11	ve‘atah ’awi he‘mis ‘aleikhem ‘ol kawed va’ani ’osif ‘al ‘ulekhem ’awi yisar ’etkhem bashotim va’ani ba‘aqrabim. 
2_chronicles 10:12	vayawo yarawe‘am vekhal ha‘am ’el rekhaw‘am bayom hashelishi ka’asher diber hamelekh leimor shuwu ’eilai bayom hashelishi. 
2_chronicles 10:13	vaya‘anem hamelekh qashah vaya‘azow hamelekh rekhaw‘am ’et ‘atsat hazeqeinim. 
2_chronicles 10:14	vaydaber ’aleihem ka‘atsat hayladim leimor ’akhbid ’et ‘ulekhem va’ani ’osif ‘alav ’awi yisar ’etkhem bashotim va’ani ba‘aqrabim. 
2_chronicles 10:15	velo shama‘ hamelekh ’el ha‘am ki hayetah nesibah mei‘im ha’elohim lema‘an haqim yhoh ’et dewaro ’asher diber beyad ’akhiyahu hashiloni ’el yarawe‘am ben newat. 
2_chronicles 10:16	vekhal yisra’el ki lo shama‘ hamelekh lahem vayashiwu ha‘am ’et hamelekh leimor mah lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah bewen yishai ’ish le’ohalekha yisra’el ‘atah re’eh weitekha david vayeilekh kal yisra’el le’ohalav. 
2_chronicles 10:17	uwenei yisra’el hayoshewim be‘arei yehudah vayimlokh ‘aleihem rekhaw‘am. 
2_chronicles 10:18	vayishlakh hamelekh rekhaw‘am ’et hadoram ’asher ‘al hamas vayirgemu wo wenei yisra’el ’ewen vayamot vehamelekh rekhaw‘am hit’amets la‘alot bamerkawah lanus yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 10:19	vayifshe‘u yisra’el bewet david ‘ad hayom hazeh. 
2_chronicles 11:1	vayawo rekhaw‘am yerushalim vayaqhel ’et bet yehudah uwinyamin mei’ah ushemonim ’elef bakhur ‘oseh milkhamah lehilakhem ‘im yisra’el lehashiw ’et hamamlakhah lirkhaw‘am. 
2_chronicles 11:2	vayhi dewar yhoh ’el shema‘yahu ’ish ha’elohim leimor. 
2_chronicles 11:3	’emor ’el rekhaw‘am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah ve’el kal yisra’el bihudah uwinyamin leimor. 
2_chronicles 11:4	koh ’amar yhoh lo ta‘alu velo tilakhamu ‘im ’akheikhem uwu ’ish leweito ki mei’iti nihyah hadawar hazeh vayishme‘u ’et diwrei yhoh vayashuwu milekhet ’el yarawe‘am. 
2_chronicles 11:5	vayeishew rekhaw‘am birushalim vayiwen ‘arim lematsor bihudah. 
2_chronicles 11:6	vayiwen ’et bet lekhem ve’et ‘eitam ve’et teqoa‘. 
2_chronicles 11:7	ve’et bet tsur ve’et sokho ve’et ‘adulam. 
2_chronicles 11:8	ve’et gat ve’et mareishah ve’et zif. 
2_chronicles 11:9	ve’et ’adorayim ve’et lakhish ve’et ‘azeiqah. 
2_chronicles 11:10	ve’et tsare‘ah ve’et ’ayalon ve’et khewron ’asher bihudah uwewinyamin ‘arei metsurot. 
2_chronicles 11:11	vaykhazeq ’et hametsurot vayiten bahem negidim ve’otserot ma’akhal veshemen vayayin. 
2_chronicles 11:12	uwekhal ‘ir va‘ir tsinot uremakhim vaykhazeqem leharbeh me’od vayhi lo yehudah uwinyamin. 
2_chronicles 11:13	vehakohanim vehalviyim ’asher bekhal yisra’el hityatsewu ‘alav mikal gewulam. 
2_chronicles 11:14	ki ‘azewu halviyim ’et migresheihem va’akhuzatam vayeilekhu lihudah velirushalim ki hiznikham yarawe‘am uwanav mikahen yhoh. 
2_chronicles 11:15	vaya‘amed lo kohanim labamot velase‘irim vela‘agalim ’asher ‘asah. 
2_chronicles 11:16	ve’akhareihem mikol shiwtei yisra’el hanotenim ’et lewawam lewaqesh ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ba’u yerushalim lizboakh yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 11:17	vaykhazequ ’et malkhut yehudah vai’ametsu ’et rekhaw‘am ben shelomoh leshanim shalosh ki halekhu bederekh david ushelomoh leshanim shalosh. 
2_chronicles 11:18	vayiqakh lo rekhaw‘am ’ishah ’et makhalat ben bat yerimot ben david ’awihayil bat ’eli’aw ben yishai. 
2_chronicles 11:19	vateiled lo banim ’et ye‘ush ve’et shemaryah ve’et zaham. 
2_chronicles 11:20	ve’akhareha laqakh ’et ma‘akhah bat ’awshalom vateiled lo ’et ’awiyah ve’et ‘atai ve’et ziza ve’et shelomit. 
2_chronicles 11:21	vaye’ehaw rekhaw‘am ’et ma‘akhah wat ’awshalom mikal nashav ufilagshav ki nashim shemoneh ‘esreh nasa ufilagshim shishim vayoled ‘esrim ushemonah banim veshishim banot. 
2_chronicles 11:22	vaya‘amed larosh rekhaw‘am ’et ’awiyah wen ma‘akhah lenagid be’ekhav ki lehamlikho. 
2_chronicles 11:23	vayawen vayifrots mikal banav lekhal ’artsot yehudah uwinyamin lekhol ‘arei hametsurot vayiten lahem hamazon larow vayish’al hamon nashim. 
2_chronicles 12:1	vayhi kehakhin malkhut rekhaw‘am ukhekhezqato ‘azaw ’et torat yhoh vekhal yisra’el ‘imo. 
2_chronicles 12:2	vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lamelekh rekhaw‘am ‘alah shishaq melekh mitsrayim ‘al yerushalim ki ma‘alu yhoh. 
2_chronicles 12:3	be’elef umatayim rekhew uweshishim ’elef parashim ve’en mispar la‘am ’asher ba’u ‘imo mimitsrayim luwim sukiyim vekhushim. 
2_chronicles 12:4	vayilkod ’et ‘arei hametsurot ’asher lihudah vayawo ‘ad yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 12:5	ushema‘yah hanawi ba ’el rekhaw‘am vesarei yehudah ’asher ne’esfu ’el yerushalim mipenei shishaq vayomer lahem koh ’amar yhoh ’atem ‘azawtem ’oti ve’af ’ani ‘azawti ’etkhem beyad shishaq. 
2_chronicles 12:6	vayikane‘u sarei yisra’el vehamelekh vayomeru tsadiq yhoh. 
2_chronicles 12:7	uwir’ot yhoh ki nikhna‘u hayah dewar yhoh ’el shema‘yah leimor nikhne‘u lo ’ashkhitem venatati lahem kim‘at lifleitah velo titakh khamati birushalim beyad shishaq. 
2_chronicles 12:8	ki yihyu lo la‘awadim veyeide‘u ‘awodati va‘awodat mamlekhot ha’aratsot. 
2_chronicles 12:9	vaya‘al shishaq melekh mitsrayim ‘al yerushalim vayiqakh ’et ’otserot bet yhoh ve’et ’otserot bet hamelekh ’et hakol laqakh vayiqakh ’et maginei hazahaw ’asher ‘asah shelomoh. 
2_chronicles 12:10	vaya‘as hamelekh rekhaw‘am takhteihem maginei nekhoshet vehifqid ‘al yad sarei haratsim hashomerim petakh bet hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 12:11	vayhi midei wo hamelekh bet yhoh ba’u haratsim unesa’um veheshiwum ’el ta haratsim. 
2_chronicles 12:12	uwehikane‘o shaw mimenu ’af yhoh velo lehashkhit lekhalah vegam bihudah hayah dewarim towim. 
2_chronicles 12:13	vayitkhazeq hamelekh rekhaw‘am birushalim vayimlokh ki wen ’arba‘im ve’akhat shanah rekhaw‘am bemalekho ushawa‘ ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim ha‘ir ’asher bakhar yhoh lasum ’et shemo sham mikol shiwtei yisra’el veshem ’imo na‘amah ha‘amonit. 
2_chronicles 12:14	vaya‘as hara‘ ki lo heikhin libo lidrosh ’et yhoh. 
2_chronicles 12:15	vediwrei rekhaw‘am harishonim veha’akharonim halo hem ketuwim bediwrei shema‘yah hanawi ve‘ido hakhozeh lehityakhes umilkhamot rekhaw‘am veyarawe‘am kal hayamim. 
2_chronicles 12:16	vayishkaw rekhaw‘am ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer be‘ir david vayimlokh ’awiyah weno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 13:1	bishnat shemoneh ‘esreh lamelekh yarawe‘am vayimlokh ’awiyah ‘al yehudah. 
2_chronicles 13:2	shalosh shanim malakh birushalim veshem ’imo mikhayahu wat ’uri’el min giw‘ah umilkhamah hayetah ben ’awiyah uwen yarawe‘am. 
2_chronicles 13:3	vaye’sor ’awiyah ’et hamilkhamah bekhayil giborei milkhamah ’arba‘ mei’ot ’elef ’ish bakhur veyarawe‘am ‘arakh ‘imo milkhamah bishmoneh mei’ot ’elef ’ish bakhur gibor khayil. 
2_chronicles 13:4	vayaqam ’awiyah mei‘al lehar tsemarayim ’asher behar ’efrayim vayomer shema‘uni yarawe‘am vekhal yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 13:5	halo lakhem lada‘at ki yhoh ’elohei yisra’el natan mamlakhah ledavid ‘al yisra’el le‘olam lo ulewanav berit melakh. 
2_chronicles 13:6	vayaqam yarawe‘am ben newat ‘ewed shelomoh wen david vayimrod ‘al ’adonav. 
2_chronicles 13:7	vayiqawetsu ‘alav ’anashim reiqim benei weliya‘al vayit’ametsu ‘al rekhaw‘am ben shelomoh urekhaw‘am hayah na‘ar verakh leiwaw velo hitkhazaq lifneihem. 
2_chronicles 13:8	ve‘atah ’atem ’omerim lehitkhazeq lifnei mamlekhet yhoh beyad benei david ve’atem hamon raw ve‘imakhem ‘eglei zahaw ’asher ‘asah lakhem yarawe‘am leilohim. 
2_chronicles 13:9	halo hidakhtem ’et kohanei yhoh ’et benei ’aharon vehalviyim vata‘asu lakhem kohanim ke‘amei ha’aratsot kal haba lemalei yado befar ben baqar ve’eilim shiw‘ah vehayah khohen lelo ’elohim. 
2_chronicles 13:10	va’anakhnu yhoh ’eloheinu velo ‘azawnuhu vekhohanim mesharetim yhoh benei ’aharon vehalviyim bamlakhet. 
2_chronicles 13:11	umaqtirim yhoh ‘olot baboqer baboqer uwa‘erew ba‘erew uqetoret samim uma‘arekhet lekhem ‘al hashulkhan hatahor umenorat hazahaw veneiroteha lewa‘er ba‘erew ba‘erew ki shomerim ’anakhnu ’et mishmeret yhoh ’eloheinu ve’atem ‘azawtem ’oto. 
2_chronicles 13:12	vehineh ‘imanu warosh ha’elohim vekhohanav vakhatsotserot hateru‘ah leharia‘ ‘aleikhem benei yisra’el ’al tilakhamu ‘im yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem ki lo tatslikhu. 
2_chronicles 13:13	veyarawe‘am heisew ’et hama’raw lawo mei’akhareihem vayihyu lifnei yehudah vehama’raw mei’akhareihem. 
2_chronicles 13:14	vayifnu yehudah vehineh lahem hamilkhamah panim ve’akhor vayits‘aqu yhoh vehakohanim makhatsotserim makhtserim bakhatsotserot. 
2_chronicles 13:15	vayari‘u ’ish yehudah vayhi beharia‘ ’ish yehudah veha’elohim nagaf ’et yarawe‘am vekhal yisra’el lifnei ’awiyah vihudah. 
2_chronicles 13:16	vayanusu wenei yisra’el mipenei yehudah vayitenem ’elohim beyadam. 
2_chronicles 13:17	vayaku wahem ’awiyah ve‘amo makah rabah vayipelu khalalim miyisra’el khamesh mei’ot ’elef ’ish bakhur. 
2_chronicles 13:18	vayikane‘u wenei yisra’el ba‘et hahi vaye’emtsu benei yehudah ki nish‘anu ‘al yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 13:19	vayirdof ’awiyah ’akharei yarawe‘am vayilkod mimenu ‘arim ’et bet ’el ve’et benoteha ve’et yeshanah ve’et benoteha ve’et ‘efron ‘efrayin uwenoteha. 
2_chronicles 13:20	velo ‘atsar koakh yarawe‘am ‘od bimei ’awiyahu vayigefeihu yhoh vayamot. 
2_chronicles 13:21	vayitkhazeq ’awiyahu vayisa lo nashim ’arba‘ ‘esreh vayoled ‘esrim ushenayim banim veshesh ‘esreh banot. 
2_chronicles 13:22	veyeter diwrei ’awiyah uderakhav udewarav ketuwim bemidrash hanawi ‘ido. 
2_chronicles 14:1	vayishkaw ’awiyah ‘im ’awotav vayiqberu ’oto be‘ir david vayimlokh ’asa weno takhtav beyamav shaqetah ha’arets ‘eser shanim. 
2_chronicles 14:2	vaya‘as ’asa hatow vehayashar be‘einei yhoh ’elohav. 
2_chronicles 14:3	vayasar ’et mizbekhot haneikhar vehabamot vayshaber ’et hamatseiwot vaygada‘ ’et ha’asheirim. 
2_chronicles 14:4	vayomer lihudah lidrosh ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem vela‘asot hatorah vehamitsvah. 
2_chronicles 14:5	vayasar mikal ‘arei yehudah ’et habamot ve’et hakhamanim vatishqot hamamlakhah lefanav. 
2_chronicles 14:6	vayiwen ‘arei metsurah bihudah ki shaqetah ha’arets ve’en ‘imo milkhamah bashanim ha’eleh ki heiniakh yhoh lo. 
2_chronicles 14:7	vayomer lihudah niwneh ’et he‘arim ha’eleh venasew khomah umigdalim delatayim uwerikhim ‘odenu ha’arets lefaneinu ki darashnu ’et yhoh ’eloheinu darashnu vayanakh lanu misawiw vayiwnu vayatslikhu. 
2_chronicles 14:8	vayhi le’asa khayil nosei tsinah varomakh mihudah shelosh mei’ot ’elef umibinyamin nose’ei magen vedorekhei qeshet matayim ushemonim ’alef kal ’eleh giborei khayil. 
2_chronicles 14:9	vayeitsei ’aleihem zerakh hakushi bekhayil ’elef ’alafim umarkawot shelosh mei’ot vayawo ‘ad mareishah. 
2_chronicles 14:10	vayeitsei ’asa lefanav vaya‘arkhu milkhamah begei tsefatah lemareishah. 
2_chronicles 14:11	vayiqra ’asa ’el yhoh ’elohav vayomar yhoh ’en ‘imekha la‘zor ben raw le’en koakh ‘azereinu yhoh ’eloheinu ki ‘alekha nish‘anu uweshimkha wanu ‘al hehamon hazeh yhoh ’eloheinu ’atah ’al ya‘tsor ‘imekha ’enosh. 
2_chronicles 14:12	vayigof yhoh ’et hakushim lifnei ’asa velifnei yehudah vayanusu hakushim. 
2_chronicles 14:13	vayirdefem ’asa veha‘am ’asher ‘imo ‘ad ligrar vayipol mikushim le’en lahem mikhyah ki nishberu lifnei yhoh velifnei makhaneihu vayis’u shalal harbeh me’od. 
2_chronicles 14:14	vayaku ’et kal he‘arim sewiwot gerar ki hayah fakhad yhoh ‘aleihem vayawozu ’et kal he‘arim ki wizah rabah hayetah wahem. 
2_chronicles 14:15	vegam ’aholei miqneh hiku vayishbu tson larow ugemalim vayashuwu yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 15:1	va‘azaryahu ben ‘oded hayetah ‘alav ruakh ’elohim. 
2_chronicles 15:2	vayeitsei lifnei ’asa vayomer lo shema‘uni ’asa vekhal yehudah uwinyamin yhoh ‘imakhem bihyotkhem ‘imo ve’im tidreshuhu yimatsei lakhem ve’im ta‘azwuhu ya‘azow ’etkhem. 
2_chronicles 15:3	veyamim rabim leyisra’el lelo ’elohei ’emet ulelo kohen moreh ulelo torah. 
2_chronicles 15:4	vayashaw batsar lo ‘al yhoh ’elohei yisra’el vaywaqshuhu vayimatsei lahem. 
2_chronicles 15:5	uwa‘itim hahem ’en shalom layotsei velaba ki mehumot rabot ‘al kal yoshewei ha’aratsot. 
2_chronicles 15:6	vekhutetu go bego ve‘ir be‘ir ki ’elohim hamamam bekhal tsarah. 
2_chronicles 15:7	ve’atem khizqu ve’al yirpu yedeikhem ki yesh sakhar lif‘ulatkhem. 
2_chronicles 15:8	vekhishmoa‘ ’asa hadewarim ha’eleh vehanewu’ah ‘oded hanawi hitkhazaq vaya‘awer hashiqutsim mikal ’erets yehudah uwinyamin umin he‘arim ’asher lakhad meihar ’efrayim vaykhadesh ’et mizbakh yhoh ’asher lifnei ’ulam yhoh. 
2_chronicles 15:9	vayiqbots ’et kal yehudah uwinyamin vehagarim ‘imahem mei’efrayim umenasheh umishim‘on ki nafelu ‘alav miyisra’el larow bir’otam ki yhoh ’elohav ‘imo. 
2_chronicles 15:10	vayiqawetsu yerushalim bakhodesh hashelishi lishnat khamesh ‘esreh lemalkhut ’asa. 
2_chronicles 15:11	vayizbekhu yhoh bayom hahu min hashalal heiwi’u baqar shewa‘ mei’ot vetson shiw‘at ’alafim. 
2_chronicles 15:12	vayawo’u waberit lidrosh ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem bekhal lewawam uwekhal nafsham. 
2_chronicles 15:13	vekhol ’asher lo yidrosh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el yumat lemin qaton ve‘ad gadol lemei’ish ve‘ad ’ishah. 
2_chronicles 15:14	vayishawe‘u yhoh beqol gadol uwitru‘ah uwakhatsotserot uweshofarot. 
2_chronicles 15:15	vayismekhu khal yehudah ‘al hashewu‘ah ki wekhal lewawam nishba‘u uwekhal retsonam biqshuhu vayimatsei lahem vayanakh yhoh lahem misawiw. 
2_chronicles 15:16	vegam ma‘akhah ’em ’asa hamelekh hesirah migewirah ’asher ‘asetah la’asheirah miflatset vayikhrot ’asa ’et miflatstah vayadeq vayisrof benakhal qidron. 
2_chronicles 15:17	vehabamot lo saru miyisra’el raq lewaw ’asa hayah shalem kal yamav. 
2_chronicles 15:18	vayawei ’et qadeshei ’awiv veqadashav bet ha’elohim kesef vezahaw vekheilim. 
2_chronicles 15:19	umilkhamah lo hayatah ‘ad shenat sheloshim vekhamesh lemalkhut ’asa. 
2_chronicles 16:1	bishnat sheloshim vashesh lemalkhut ’asa ‘alah ba‘sha melekh yisra’el ‘al yehudah vayiwen ’et haramah lewilti tet yotsei vawa le’asa melekh yehudah. 
2_chronicles 16:2	vayotsei ’asa kesef vezahaw mei’otserot bet yhoh uwet hamelekh vayishlakh ’el ben hadad melekh ’aram hayoshew bedarmeseq leimor. 
2_chronicles 16:3	berit beini uweinekha uwen ’awi uwen ’awikha hineh shalakhti lekha kesef vezahaw lekh hafer beritekha ’et ba‘sha melekh yisra’el veya‘aleh mei‘alai. 
2_chronicles 16:4	vayishma‘ ben hadad ’el hamelekh ’asa vayishlakh ’et sarei hakhayalim ’asher lo ’el ‘arei yisra’el vayaku ’et ‘iyon ve’et dan ve’et ’awel mayim ve’et kal miskenot ‘arei naftali. 
2_chronicles 16:5	vayhi kishmoa‘ ba‘sha vayekhdal mibenot ’et haramah vayashbet ’et melakhto. 
2_chronicles 16:6	ve’asa hamelekh laqakh ’et kal yehudah vayis’u ’et ’awnei haramah ve’et ‘eitseha ’asher banah ba‘sha vayiwen bahem ’et gewa‘ ve’et hamitspah. 
2_chronicles 16:7	uwa‘et hahi ba khanani haro’eh ’el ’asa melekh yehudah vayomer ’eilav behisha‘enkha ‘al melekh ’aram velo nish‘anta ‘al yhoh ’elohekha ‘al ken nimlat khel melekh ’aram miyadekha. 
2_chronicles 16:8	halo hakushim vehalubim hayu lekhayil larow lerekhew ulefarashim leharbeh me’od uwehisha‘enkha ‘al yhoh netanam beyadekha. 
2_chronicles 16:9	ki yhoh ‘einav meshotetot bekhal ha’arets lehitkhazeq ‘im lewawam shalem ’eilav niskalta ‘al zot ki mei‘atah yesh ‘imekha milkhamot. 
2_chronicles 16:10	vayikh‘as ’asa ’el haro’eh vayiteneihu bet hamahpekhet ki weza‘af ‘imo ‘al zot vayratsets ’asa min ha‘am ba‘et hahi. 
2_chronicles 16:11	vehineh diwrei ’asa harishonim veha’akharonim hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer hamelakhim lihudah veyisra’el. 
2_chronicles 16:12	vayekhele ’asa bishnat sheloshim vateisha‘ lemalkhuto beraglav ‘ad lema‘lah khaleyo vegam bekhaleyo lo darash ’et yhoh ki barofe’im. 
2_chronicles 16:13	vayishkaw ’asa ‘im ’awotav vayamat bishnat ’arba‘im ve’akhat lemalekho. 
2_chronicles 16:14	vayiqberuhu weqiwrotav ’asher karah lo be‘ir david vayashkiwuhu bamishkaw ’asher milei besamim uzenim meruqakhim bemirqakhat ma‘aseh vayisrefu lo sereifah gedolah ‘ad lim’od. 
2_chronicles 17:1	vayimlokh yehoshafat beno takhtav vayitkhazeq ‘al yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 17:2	vayiten khayil bekhal ‘arei yehudah habetsurot vayiten netsiwim be’erets yehudah uwe‘arei ’efrayim ’asher lakhad ’asa ’awiv. 
2_chronicles 17:3	vayhi yhoh ‘im yehoshafat ki halakh bedarkhei david ’awiv harishonim velo darash labe‘alim. 
2_chronicles 17:4	ki leilohei ’awiv darash uwemitsvotav halakh velo kema‘aseh yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 17:5	vayakhen yhoh ’et hamamlakhah beyado vayitenu khal yehudah minkhah lihoshafat vayhi lo ‘osher vekhawod larow. 
2_chronicles 17:6	vayigbah libo bedarkhei yhoh ve‘od heisir ’et habamot ve’et ha’asheirim mihudah. 
2_chronicles 17:7	uwishnat shalosh lemalekho shalakh lesarav lewen khayil ule‘owadyah velizkharyah velintan’el ulemikhayahu lelamed be‘arei yehudah. 
2_chronicles 17:8	ve‘imahem halviyim shema‘yahu unetanyahu uzewadyahu va‘asah’el ushemirimot ushemiramot vihonatan va’adoniyahu vetowiyahu vetow ’adoniyah halviyim ve‘imahem ’elishama‘ vihoram hakohanim. 
2_chronicles 17:9	vaylamedu bihudah ve‘imahem seifer torat yhoh vayasobu bekhal ‘arei yehudah vaylamedu ba‘am. 
2_chronicles 17:10	vayhi pakhad yhoh ‘al kal mamlekhot ha’aratsot ’asher sewiwot yehudah velo nilkhamu ‘im yehoshafat. 
2_chronicles 17:11	umin pelishtim mewi’im lihoshafat minkhah vekhesef masa gam ha‘arwi’im mewi’im lo tson ’eilim shiw‘at ’alafim ushewa‘ mei’ot uteyashim shiw‘at ’alafim ushewa‘ mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 17:12	vayhi yehoshafat holekh vegadel ‘ad lema‘elah vayiwen bihudah biraniyot ve‘arei miskenot. 
2_chronicles 17:13	umelakhah rabah hayah lo be‘arei yehudah ve’anshei milkhamah giborei khayil birushalim. 
2_chronicles 17:14	ve’eleh fequdatam lewet ’awoteihem lihudah sarei ’alafim ‘adnah hasar ve‘imo giborei khayil shelosh mei’ot ’alef. 
2_chronicles 17:15	ve‘al yado yehokhanan hasar ve‘imo matayim ushemonim ’alef. 
2_chronicles 17:16	ve‘al yado ‘amasyah wen zikhri hamitnadew yhoh ve‘imo matayim ’elef gibor khayil. 
2_chronicles 17:17	umin binyamin gibor khayil ’elyada‘ ve‘imo nosheqei qeshet umagen matayim ’alef. 
2_chronicles 17:18	ve‘al yado yehozawad ve‘imo mei’ah ushemonim ’elef khalutsei tsawa. 
2_chronicles 17:19	’eleh hamsharetim ’et hamelekh milewad ’asher natan hamelekh be‘arei hamiwtsar bekhal yehudah. 
2_chronicles 18:1	vayhi lihoshafat ‘osher vekhawod larow vayitkhaten le’akh’aw. 
2_chronicles 18:2	vayeired leqets shanim ’el ’akh’aw leshomeron vayizbakh lo ’akh’aw tson uwaqar larow vela‘am ’asher ‘imo vaysiteihu la‘alot ’el ramot gil‘ad. 
2_chronicles 18:3	vayomer ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat melekh yehudah hateilekh ‘imi ramot gil‘ad vayomer lo kamoni khamokha ukhe‘amekha ‘ami ve‘imekha bamilkhamah. 
2_chronicles 18:4	vayomer yehoshafat ’el melekh yisra’el derash na khayom ’et dewar yhoh. 
2_chronicles 18:5	vayiqbots melekh yisra’el ’et hanewi’im ’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish vayomer ’aleihem haneilekh ’el ramot gil‘ad lamilkhamah ’im ’ekhdal vayomeru ‘aleh veyiten ha’elohim beyad hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 18:6	vayomer yehoshafat ha’en poh nawi yhoh ‘od venidreshah mei’oto. 
2_chronicles 18:7	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat ‘od ’ish ’ekhad lidrosh ’et yhoh mei’oto va’ani seneitihu ki ’einenu mitnabei ‘alai letowah ki khal yamav lera‘ah hu mikhayehu wen yimla vayomer yehoshafat ’al yomar hamelekh ken. 
2_chronicles 18:8	vayiqra melekh yisra’el ’el saris ’ekhad vayomer maher mikhahu mikhayehu wen yimla. 
2_chronicles 18:9	umelekh yisra’el vihoshafat melekh yehudah yoshewim ’ish ‘al kis’o melubashim begadim veyoshewim begoren petakh sha‘ar shomeron vekhal hanewi’im mitnabe’im lifneihem. 
2_chronicles 18:10	vaya‘as lo tsidqiyahu wen kena‘anah qarnei warzel vayomer koh ’amar yhoh be’eleh tenagakh ’et ’aram ‘ad kalotam. 
2_chronicles 18:11	vekhal hanewi’im nibe’im ken leimor ‘aleh ramot gil‘ad vehatslakh venatan yhoh beyad hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 18:12	vehamal’akh ’asher halakh liqro lemikhayehu diber ’eilav leimor hineh diwrei hanewi’im peh ’ekhad tow ’el hamelekh vihi na dewarekha ke’akhad meihem vedibarta tow. 
2_chronicles 18:13	vayomer mikhayehu khai yhoh ki ’et ’asher yomar ’elohai ’oto ’adaber. 
2_chronicles 18:14	vayawo ’el hamelekh vayomer hamelekh ’eilav mikhah haneilekh ’el ramot gil‘ad lamilkhamah ’im ’ekhdal vayomer ‘alu vehatslikhu veyinatenu beyedkhem. 
2_chronicles 18:15	vayomer ’eilav hamelekh ‘ad kameh fe‘amim ’ani mashbi‘ekha ’asher lo tedaber ’eilai raq ’emet beshem yhoh. 
2_chronicles 18:16	vayomer ra’iti ’et kal yisra’el nefotsim ‘al heharim katson ’asher ’en lahen ro‘eh vayomer yhoh lo ’adonim la’eleh yashuwu ’ish leweito beshalom. 
2_chronicles 18:17	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat halo ’amarti ’eilekha lo yitnabei ‘alai tow ki ’im lera‘. 
2_chronicles 18:18	vayomer lakhen shim‘u dewar yhoh ra’iti ’et yhoh yoshew ‘al kis’o vekhal tsewa hashamayim ‘omedim ‘al yemino usemolo. 
2_chronicles 18:19	vayomer yhoh mi yefateh ’et ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el veya‘al veyipol beramot gil‘ad vayomer zeh ’omer kakhah vezeh ’omer kakhah. 
2_chronicles 18:20	vayeitsei haruakh vaya‘amod lifnei yhoh vayomer ’ani ’afatenu vayomer yhoh ’eilav bamah. 
2_chronicles 18:21	vayomer ’eitsei vehayiti leruakh sheqer befi kal newi’av vayomer tefateh vegam tukhal tsei va‘aseh khen. 
2_chronicles 18:22	ve‘atah hineh natan yhoh ruakh sheqer befi newi’ekha ’eleh yhoh diber ‘alekha ra‘ah. 
2_chronicles 18:23	vayigash tsidqiyahu wen kena‘anah vayakh ’et mikhayehu ‘al halekhi vayomer ’ei zeh haderekh ‘awar ruakh yhoh mei’iti ledaber ’otakh. 
2_chronicles 18:24	vayomer mikhayehu hinekha ro’eh bayom hahu ’asher tawo kheder bekheder leheikhawei. 
2_chronicles 18:25	vayomer melekh yisra’el qekhu ’et mikhayehu vahashiwuhu ’el ’amon sar ha‘ir ve’el yo’ash ben hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 18:26	va’amartem koh ’amar hamelekh simu zeh bet hakele veha’akhiluhu lekhem lakhats umayim lakhats ‘ad shuwi weshalom. 
2_chronicles 18:27	vayomer mikhayehu ’im show tashuw beshalom lo diber yhoh bi vayomer shim‘u ‘amim kulam. 
2_chronicles 18:28	vaya‘al melekh yisra’el vihoshafat melekh yehudah ’el ramot gil‘ad. 
2_chronicles 18:29	vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat hitkhapes vawo wamilkhamah ve’atah lewash begadekha vayitkhapes melekh yisra’el vayawo’u bamilkhamah. 
2_chronicles 18:30	umelekh ’aram tsivah ’et sarei harekhew ’asher lo leimor lo tilakhamu ’et haqaton ’et hagadol ki ’im ’et melekh yisra’el lewado. 
2_chronicles 18:31	vayhi kir’ot sarei harekhew ’et yehoshafat vehemah ’ameru melekh yisra’el hu vayasobu ‘alav lehilakhem vayiz‘aq yehoshafat yhoh ‘azaro vaysitem ’elohim mimenu. 
2_chronicles 18:32	vayhi kir’ot sarei harekhew ki lo hayah melekh yisra’el vayashuwu mei’akharav. 
2_chronicles 18:33	ve’ish mashakh baqeshet letumo vayakh ’et melekh yisra’el ben hadewaqim uwen hashiryan vayomer larakaw hafokh yadekha yadekha vehotseitani min hamakhaneh ki hakholeiti. 
2_chronicles 18:34	vata‘al hamilkhamah bayom hahu umelekh yisra’el hayah ma‘amid bamerkawah nokhakh ’aram ‘ad ha‘arew vayamat le‘et bo hashamesh. 
2_chronicles 19:1	vayashaw yehoshafat melekh yehudah ’el beito beshalom lirushalim. 
2_chronicles 19:2	vayeitsei ’el panav yeihu wen khanani hakhozeh vayomer ’el hamelekh yehoshafat halarasha‘ la‘zor ulesone’ei yhoh te’ehaw uwazot ‘alekha qetsef milifnei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 19:3	’awal dewarim towim nimtse’u ‘imakh ki wi‘arta ha’asheirot min ha’arets vahakhinota lewawekha lidrosh ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 19:4	vayeishew yehoshafat birushalim vayashaw vayeitsei wa‘am mibe’er shewa‘ ‘ad har ’efrayim vayshiwem ’el yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 19:5	vaya‘amed shofetim ba’arets bekhal ‘arei yehudah habetsurot le‘ir va‘ir. 
2_chronicles 19:6	vayomer ’el hashofetim re’u mah ’atem ‘osim ki lo le’adam tishpetu ki yhoh ve‘imakhem bidwar mishpat. 
2_chronicles 19:7	ve‘atah yehi fakhad yhoh ‘aleikhem shimru va‘asu ki ’en ‘im yhoh ’eloheinu ‘avlah umaso fanim umiqakh shokhad. 
2_chronicles 19:8	vegam birushalim he‘emid yehoshafat min halviyim vehakohanim umeirashei ha’awot leyisra’el lemishpat yhoh velariw vayashuwu yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 19:9	vaytsav ‘aleihem leimor koh ta‘asun beyir’at yhoh be’emunah uweleiwaw shalem. 
2_chronicles 19:10	vekhal riw ’asher yawo ‘aleikhem mei’akheikhem hayoshewim be‘areihem ben dam ledam ben torah lemitsvah lekhuqim ulemishpatim vehizhartem ’otam velo ye’shemu yhoh vehayah qetsef ‘aleikhem ve‘al ’akheikhem koh ta‘asun velo te’shamu. 
2_chronicles 19:11	vehineh ’amaryahu khohen harosh ‘aleikhem lekhol dewar yhoh uzewadyahu wen yishma‘el hanagid lewet yehudah lekhol dewar hamelekh veshoterim halviyim lifneikhem khizqu va‘asu vihi yhoh ‘im hatow. 
2_chronicles 20:1	vayhi ’akhareikhen ba’u wenei mo’aw uwenei ‘amon ve‘imahem meiha‘amonim ‘al yehoshafat lamilkhamah. 
2_chronicles 20:2	vayawo’u vayagidu lihoshafat leimor ba ‘alekha hamon raw mei‘eiwer layam mei’aram vehinam bekhatson tamar hi ‘en gedi. 
2_chronicles 20:3	vayira vayiten yehoshafat ’et panav lidrosh yhoh vayiqra tsom ‘al kal yehudah. 
2_chronicles 20:4	vayiqawetsu yehudah lewaqesh yhoh gam mikal ‘arei yehudah ba’u lewaqesh ’et yhoh. 
2_chronicles 20:5	vaya‘amod yehoshafat biqhal yehudah virushalim bewet yhoh lifnei hekhatser hakhadashah. 
2_chronicles 20:6	vayomar yhoh ’elohei ’awoteinu halo ’atah hu ’elohim bashamayim ve’atah moshel bekhol mamlekhot hagoyim uweyadekha koakh ugewurah ve’en ‘imekha lehityatsew. 
2_chronicles 20:7	halo ’atah ’eloheinu horashta ’et yoshewei ha’arets hazot milifnei ‘amekha yisra’el vatitenah lezera‘ ’awraham ’ohawkha le‘olam. 
2_chronicles 20:8	vayeishewu wah vayiwnu lekha bah miqdash leshimkha leimor. 
2_chronicles 20:9	’im tawo ‘aleinu ra‘ah kherew shefot vedewer vera‘aw na‘amdah lifnei habayit hazeh ulefanekha ki shimkha babayit hazeh veniz‘aq ’eilekha mitsarateinu vetishma‘ vetoshia‘. 
2_chronicles 20:10	ve‘atah hineh wenei ‘amon umo’aw vehar sei‘ir ’asher lo natatah leyisra’el lawo wahem bewo’am mei’erets mitsrayim ki saru mei‘aleihem velo hishmidum. 
2_chronicles 20:11	vehineh hem gomelim ‘aleinu lawo legaresheinu miyerushatekha ’asher horashtanu. 
2_chronicles 20:12	’eloheinu halo tishpat bam ki ’en banu koakh lifnei hehamon haraw hazeh haba ‘aleinu va’anakhnu lo neida‘ mah na‘aseh ki ‘alekha ‘eineinu. 
2_chronicles 20:13	vekhol yehudah ‘omedim lifnei yhoh gam tapam nesheihem uweneihem. 
2_chronicles 20:14	veyakhazi’el ben zekharyahu ben benayah ben ye‘i’el ben matanyah haleivi min benei ’asaf hayetah ‘alav ruakh yhoh betokh haqahal. 
2_chronicles 20:15	vayomer haqshiwu khal yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim vehamelekh yehoshafat koh ’amar yhoh lakhem ’atem ’al tire’u ve’al teikhatu mipenei hehamon haraw hazeh ki lo lakhem hamilkhamah ki leilohim. 
2_chronicles 20:16	makhar redu ‘aleihem hinam ‘olim bema‘aleh hatsits umetsatem ’otam besof hanakhal penei midbar yeru’el. 
2_chronicles 20:17	lo lakhem lehilakhem bazot hityatsewu ‘imdu ure’u ’et yeshu‘at yhoh ‘imakhem yehudah virushalim ’al tire’u ve’al teikhatu makhar tse’u lifneihem yhoh ‘imakhem. 
2_chronicles 20:18	vayiqod yehoshafat ’apayim ’aretsah vekhal yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim nafelu lifnei yhoh lehishtakhavot yhoh. 
2_chronicles 20:19	vayaqumu halviyim min benei haqehatim umin benei haqarekhim lehalel yhoh ’elohei yisra’el beqol gadol lema‘elah. 
2_chronicles 20:20	vayashkimu waboqer vayeitse’u lemidbar teqoa‘ uwetseitam ‘amad yehoshafat vayomer shema‘uni yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim ha’aminu yhoh ’eloheikhem vetei’ameinu ha’aminu winwi’av vehatslikhu. 
2_chronicles 20:21	vayiva‘ats ’el ha‘am vaya‘amed meshorarim yhoh umehalim lehadrat qodesh betset lifnei hekhaluts ve’omerim hodu yhoh ki le‘olam khasdo. 
2_chronicles 20:22	uwe‘et heikhelu werinah utehilah natan yhoh me’arewim ‘al benei ‘amon mo’aw vehar sei‘ir haba’im lihudah vayinageifu. 
2_chronicles 20:23	vaya‘amdu benei ‘amon umo’aw ‘al yoshewei har sei‘ir lehakharim ulehashmid ukhekhalotam beyoshewei sei‘ir ‘azeru ’ish berei‘eihu lemashkhit. 
2_chronicles 20:24	vihudah ba ‘al hamitspeh lamidbar vayifnu ’el hehamon vehinam pegarim nofelim ’artsah ve’en peleitah. 
2_chronicles 20:25	vayawo yehoshafat ve‘amo lawoz ’et shelalam vayimtse’u wahem larow urekhush ufegarim ukhelei khamudot vaynatselu lahem le’en masa vayihyu yamim sheloshah bozezim ’et hashalal ki raw hu. 
2_chronicles 20:26	uwayom harewi‘i niqhalu le‘eimeq berakhah ki sham beirakhu ’et yhoh ‘al ken qare’u ’et shem hamaqom hahu ‘eimeq berakhah ‘ad hayom. 
2_chronicles 20:27	vayashuwu kal ’ish yehudah virushalim vihoshafat berosham lashuw ’el yerushalim besimkhah ki simekham yhoh mei’oyweihem. 
2_chronicles 20:28	vayawo’u yerushalim binwalim uwekhinorot uwakhatsotserot ’el bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 20:29	vayhi pakhad ’elohim ‘al kal mamlekhot ha’aratsot beshame‘am ki nilkham yhoh ‘im ’oywei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 20:30	vatishqot malkhut yehoshafat vayanakh lo ’elohav misawiw. 
2_chronicles 20:31	vayimlokh yehoshafat ‘al yehudah ben sheloshim vekhamesh shanah bemalekho ve‘esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ‘azuwah bat shilkhi. 
2_chronicles 20:32	vayeilekh bederekh ’awiv ’asa velo sar mimenah la‘asot hayashar be‘einei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 20:33	’akh habamot lo saru ve‘od ha‘am lo heikhinu lewawam leilohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 20:34	veyeter diwrei yehoshafat harishonim veha’akharonim hinam ketuwim bediwrei yeihu wen khanani ’asher ho‘alah ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 20:35	ve’akhareikhen ’etkhabar yehoshafat melekh yehudah ‘im ’akhazyah melekh yisra’el hu hirshia‘ la‘asot. 
2_chronicles 20:36	vaykhabereihu ‘imo la‘asot ’oniyot lalekhet tarshish vaya‘asu ’oniyot be‘etsyon gawer. 
2_chronicles 20:37	vayitnabei ’eli‘ezer ben dodavahu mimareishah ‘al yehoshafat leimor kehitkhaberkha ‘im ’akhazyahu parats yhoh ’et ma‘asekha vayishaweru ’oniyot velo ‘atseru lalekhet ’el tarshish. 
2_chronicles 21:1	vayishkaw yehoshafat ‘im ’awotav vayiqawer ‘im ’awotav be‘ir david vayimlokh yehoram beno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 21:2	velo ’akhim benei yehoshafat ‘azaryah vikhi’el uzekharyahu va‘azaryahu umikha’el ushefatyahu kal ’eleh benei yehoshafat melekh yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 21:3	vayiten lahem ’awihem matanot rabot lekhesef ulezahaw ulemigdanot ‘im ‘arei metsurot bihudah ve’et hamamlakhah natan lihoram ki hu habekhor. 
2_chronicles 21:4	vayaqam yehoram ‘al mamlekhat ’awiv vayitkhazaq vayaharog ’et kal ’ekhav bekharew vegam misarei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 21:5	ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah yehoram bemalekho ushemoneh shanim malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 21:6	vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’el ka’asher ‘asu bet ’akh’aw ki bat ’akh’aw hayetah lo ’ishah vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 21:7	velo ’awah yhoh lehashkhit ’et bet david lema‘an haberit ’asher karat ledavid vekha’asher ’amar latet lo nir ulewanav kal hayamim. 
2_chronicles 21:8	beyamav pasha‘ ’edom mitakhat yad yehudah vayamlikhu ‘aleihem melekh. 
2_chronicles 21:9	vaya‘awor yehoram ‘im sarav vekhal harekhew ‘imo vayhi qam laylah vayakh ’et ’edom hasowew ’eilav ve’et sarei harakhew. 
2_chronicles 21:10	vayifsha‘ ’edom mitakhat yad yehudah ‘ad hayom hazeh ’az tifsha‘ liwnah ba‘et hahi mitakhat yado ki ‘azaw ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotav. 
2_chronicles 21:11	gam hu ‘asah wamot beharei yehudah vayezen ’et yoshewei yerushalim vayadakh ’et yehudah. 
2_chronicles 21:12	vayawo ’eilav mikhtaw mei’eiliyahu hanawi leimor koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei david ’awikha takhat ’asher lo halakhta bedarkhei yehoshafat ’awikha uwedarkhei ’asa melekh yehudah. 
2_chronicles 21:13	vateilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’el vatazneh ’et yehudah ve’et yoshewei yerushalim kehaznot bet ’akh’aw vegam ’et ’akhekha wet ’awikha hatowim mimekha harageta. 
2_chronicles 21:14	hineh yhoh nogef mageifah gedolah be‘amekha uwewanekha uwenashekha uwekhal rekhushekha. 
2_chronicles 21:15	ve’atah bakholayim rabim bemakhaleh mei‘ekha ‘ad yeitse’u mei‘ekha min hakholi yamim ‘al yamim. 
2_chronicles 21:16	vaya‘ar yhoh ‘al yehoram ’et ruakh hapelishtim veha‘arwim ’asher ‘al yad kushim. 
2_chronicles 21:17	vaya‘alu wihudah vayiwqa‘uha vayishbu ’et kal harekhush hanimtsa lewet hamelekh vegam banav venashav velo nish’ar lo ben ki ’im yeho’akhaz qeton banav. 
2_chronicles 21:18	ve’akharei kal zot negafo yhoh bemei‘av lakholi le’en marpei. 
2_chronicles 21:19	vayhi leyamim miyamim ukhe‘et tset haqets leyamim shenayim yatse’u mei‘av ‘im khaleyo vayamat betakhalu’im ra‘im velo ‘asu lo ‘amo sereifah kisreifat ’awotav. 
2_chronicles 21:20	ben sheloshim ushetayim hayah wemalekho ushemoneh shanim malakh birushalim vayeilekh belo khemdah vayiqberuhu be‘ir david velo beqiwrot hamelakhim. 
2_chronicles 22:1	vayamlikhu yoshewei yerushalim ’et ’akhazyahu weno haqaton takhtav ki khal harishonim harag hagedud haba wa‘arwim lamakhaneh vayimlokh ’akhazyahu wen yehoram melekh yehudah. 
2_chronicles 22:2	ben ’arba‘im ushetayim shanah ’akhazyahu wemalekho veshanah ’akhat malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ‘atalyahu bat ‘ameri. 
2_chronicles 22:3	gam hu halakh bedarkhei bet ’akh’aw ki ’imo hayetah yo‘atsto leharshia‘. 
2_chronicles 22:4	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh kewet ’akh’aw ki hemah hayu lo yo‘atsim ’akharei mot ’awiv lemashkhit lo. 
2_chronicles 22:5	gam ba‘atsatam halakh vayeilekh ’et yehoram ben ’akh’aw melekh yisra’el lamilkhamah ‘al khaza’el melekh ’aram beramot gil‘ad vayaku haramim ’et yoram. 
2_chronicles 22:6	vayashaw lehitrapei weyizre‘el ki hamakim ’asher hikuhu waramah behilakhamo ’et khazah’el melekh ’aram va‘azaryahu wen yehoram melekh yehudah yarad lir’ot ’et yehoram ben ’akh’aw beyizre‘el ki kholeh hu. 
2_chronicles 22:7	umei’elohim hayetah tewusat ’akhazyahu lawo ’el yoram uwewo’o yatsa ‘im yehoram ’el yeihu wen nimshi ’asher meshakho yhoh lehakhrit ’et bet ’akh’aw. 
2_chronicles 22:8	vayhi kehishafet yeihu ‘im bet ’akh’aw vayimtsa ’et sarei yehudah uwenei ’akhei ’akhazyahu mesharetim la’akhazyahu vayahargem. 
2_chronicles 22:9	vaywaqesh ’et ’akhazyahu vayilkeduhu vehu mitkhabei weshomeron vaywi’uhu ’el yeihu vaymituhu vayiqberuhu ki ’ameru ben yehoshafat hu ’asher darash ’et yhoh bekhal lewawo ve’en lewet ’akhazyahu la‘tsor koakh lemamlakhah. 
2_chronicles 22:10	va‘atalyahu ’em ’akhazyahu ra’atah ki met benah vataqam vatedaber ’et kal zera‘ hamamlakhah lewet yehudah. 
2_chronicles 22:11	vatiqakh yehoshaw‘at bat hamelekh ’et yo’ash ben ’akhazyahu vatignow ’oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamumatim vatiten ’oto ve’et meiniqto bakhadar hamitot vatastireihu yehoshaw‘at bat hamelekh yehoram ’eishet yehoyada‘ hakohen ki hi hayetah ’akhot ’akhazyahu mipenei ‘atalyahu velo hemitatehu. 
2_chronicles 22:12	vayhi ’itam bewet ha’elohim mitkhabei shesh shanim va‘atalyah molekhet ‘al ha’arets. 
2_chronicles 23:1	uwashanah hashewi‘it hitkhazaq yehoyada‘ vayiqakh ’et sarei hamei’ot la‘azaryahu wen yerokham uleyishma‘el ben yehokhanan vela‘azaryahu wen ‘owed ve’et ma‘aseiyahu wen ‘adayahu ve’et ’elishafat ben zikhri ‘imo waberit. 
2_chronicles 23:2	vayasobu bihudah vayiqbetsu ’et halviyim mikal ‘arei yehudah verashei ha’awot leyisra’el vayawo’u ’el yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 23:3	vayikhrot kal haqahal berit bewet ha’elohim ‘im hamelekh vayomer lahem hineh wen hamelekh yimlokh ka’asher diber yhoh ‘al benei david. 
2_chronicles 23:4	zeh hadawar ’asher ta‘asu hashelishit mikem ba’ei hashabat lakohanim velalviyim lesho‘arei hasipim. 
2_chronicles 23:5	vehashelishit bewet hamelekh vehashelishit besha‘ar haysod vekhal ha‘am bekhatsrot bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:6	ve’al yawo wet yhoh ki ’im hakohanim vehamsharetim lalviyim hemah yawo’u ki qodesh hemah vekhal ha‘am yishmeru mishmeret yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:7	vehiqifu halviyim ’et hamelekh sawiw ’ish vekheilav beyado vehaba ’el habayit yumat vihyu ’et hamelekh bewo’o uwetseito. 
2_chronicles 23:8	vaya‘asu halviyim vekhal yehudah kekhol ’asher tsivah yehoyada‘ hakohen vayiqkhu ’ish ’et ’anashav ba’ei hashabat ‘im yots’ei hashabat ki lo fatar yehoyada‘ hakohen ’et hamakhleqot. 
2_chronicles 23:9	vayiten yehoyada‘ hakohen lesarei hamei’ot ’et hakhanitim ve’et hamaginot ve’et hashelatim ’asher lamelekh david ’asher bet ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 23:10	vaya‘amed ’et kal ha‘am ve’ish shilkho weyado miketef habayit haymanit ‘ad ketef habayit hasemalit lamizbeiakh velabayit ‘al hamelekh sawiw. 
2_chronicles 23:11	vayotsi’u ’et ben hamelekh vayitenu ‘alav ’et haneizer ve’et ha‘eidut vayamlikhu ’oto vayimshakhuhu yehoyada‘ uwanav vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 23:12	vatishma‘ ‘atalyahu ’et qol ha‘am haratsim vehamhalim ’et hamelekh vatawo ’el ha‘am bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:13	vateire vehineh hamelekh ‘omed ‘al ‘amudo bamawo vehasarim vehakhatsotserot ‘al hamelekh vekhal ‘am ha’arets sameiakh vetoqeia‘ bakhatsotserot vehamshorarim bikhlei hashir umodi‘im lehalel vatiqra‘ ‘atalyahu ’et begadeha vatomer qesher qasher. 
2_chronicles 23:14	vayotsei yehoyada‘ hakohen ’et sarei hamei’ot pequdei hakhayil vayomer ’aleihem hotsi’uha ’el mibet hasedeirot vehaba ’akhareha yumat bekharew ki ’amar hakohen lo temituha bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:15	vayasimu lah yadayim vatawo ’el mewo sha‘ar hasusim bet hamelekh vaymituha sham. 
2_chronicles 23:16	vayikhrot yehoyada‘ berit beino uwen kal ha‘am uwen hamelekh lihyot le‘am yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:17	vayawo’u khal ha‘am bet haba‘al vayitetsuhu ve’et mizbekhotav ve’et tselamav shibeiru ve’et matan kohen haba‘al haregu lifnei hamizbekhot. 
2_chronicles 23:18	vayasem yehoyada‘ pequdot bet yhoh beyad hakohanim halviyim ’asher khalaq david ‘al bet yhoh leha‘alot ‘olot yhoh kakatuw betorat mosheh besimkhah uweshir ‘al yedei david. 
2_chronicles 23:19	vaya‘amed hasho‘arim ‘al sha‘arei bet yhoh velo yawo tamei lekhal dawar. 
2_chronicles 23:20	vayiqakh ’et sarei hamei’ot ve’et ha’adirim ve’et hamoshelim ba‘am ve’et kal ‘am ha’arets vayored ’et hamelekh mibet yhoh vayawo’u betokh sha‘ar ha‘elyon bet hamelekh vayoshiwu ’et hamelekh ‘al kisei hamamlakhah. 
2_chronicles 23:21	vayismekhu khal ‘am ha’arets veha‘ir shaqatah ve’et ‘atalyahu heimitu wekharew. 
2_chronicles 24:1	ben shewa‘ shanim yo’ash bemalekho ve’arba‘im shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo tsiwyah mibe’er shawa‘. 
2_chronicles 24:2	vaya‘as yo’ash hayashar be‘einei yhoh kal yemei yehoyada‘ hakohen. 
2_chronicles 24:3	vayisa lo yehoyada‘ nashim shetayim vayoled banim uwanot. 
2_chronicles 24:4	vayhi ’akhareikhen hayah ‘im lew yo’ash lekhadesh ’et bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 24:5	vayiqbots ’et hakohanim vehalviyim vayomer lahem tse’u le‘arei yehudah veqiwtsu mikal yisra’el kesef lekhazeq ’et bet ’eloheikhem midei shanah beshanah ve’atem temaharu ladawar velo miharu halviyim. 
2_chronicles 24:6	vayiqra hamelekh lihoyada‘ harosh vayomer lo madua‘ lo darashta ‘al halviyim lehawi mihudah umirushalim ’et mas’at mosheh ‘ewed yhoh vehaqahal leyisra’el le’ohel ha‘eidut. 
2_chronicles 24:7	ki ‘atalyahu hamirsha‘at baneha faretsu ’et bet ha’elohim vegam kal qadeshei wet yhoh ‘asu labe‘alim. 
2_chronicles 24:8	vayomer hamelekh vaya‘asu ’aron ’ekhad vayitenuhu besha‘ar bet yhoh khutsah. 
2_chronicles 24:9	vayitenu qol bihudah uwirushalim lehawi yhoh mas’at mosheh ‘ewed ha’elohim ‘al yisra’el bamidbar. 
2_chronicles 24:10	vayismekhu khal hasarim vekhal ha‘am vayawi’u vayashlikhu la’aron ‘ad lekhaleh. 
2_chronicles 24:11	vayhi be‘et yawi ’et ha’aron ’el pequdat hamelekh beyad halviyim vekhir’otam ki raw hakesef uwa sofer hamelekh ufeqid kohen harosh vi‘aru ’et ha’aron veyisa’uhu vishiwuhu ’el meqomo koh ‘asu leyom beyom vaya’asfu khesef larow. 
2_chronicles 24:12	vayiteneihu hamelekh vihoyada‘ ’el ‘oseh melekhet ‘awodat bet yhoh vayihyu sokherim khotsewim vekharashim lekhadesh bet yhoh vegam lekharashei warzel unekhoshet lekhazeq ’et bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 24:13	vaya‘asu ‘osei hamelakhah vata‘al ’arukhah lamelakhah beyadam vaya‘amidu ’et bet ha’elohim ‘al matkunto vai’ametsuhu. 
2_chronicles 24:14	ukhekhalotam heiwi’u lifnei hamelekh vihoyada‘ ’et she’ar hakesef vaya‘aseihu kheilim lewet yhoh kelei sharet veha‘alot vekhapot ukhelei zahaw vakhasef vayihyu ma‘alim ‘olot bewet yhoh tamid kol yemei yehoyada‘. 
2_chronicles 24:15	vayizqan yehoyada‘ vayisba‘ yamim vayamot ben mei’ah usheloshim shanah bemoto. 
2_chronicles 24:16	vayiqberuhu we‘ir david ‘im hamelakhim ki ‘asah towah beyisra’el ve‘im ha’elohim uweito. 
2_chronicles 24:17	ve’akharei mot yehoyada‘ ba’u sarei yehudah vayishtakhavu lamelekh ’az shama‘ hamelekh ’aleihem. 
2_chronicles 24:18	vaya‘azwu ’et bet yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem vaya‘awdu ’et ha’asheirim ve’et ha‘atsabim vayhi qetsef ‘al yehudah virushalim be’ashmatam zot. 
2_chronicles 24:19	vayishlakh bahem newi’im lahashiwam ’el yhoh vaya‘idu wam velo he’ezinu. 
2_chronicles 24:20	veruakh ’elohim laweshah ’et zekharyah ben yehoyada‘ hakohen vaya‘amod mei‘al la‘am vayomer lahem koh ’amar ha’elohim lamah ’atem ‘owerim ’et mitsvot yhoh velo tatslikhu ki ‘azawtem ’et yhoh vaya‘azow ’etkhem. 
2_chronicles 24:21	vayiqsheru ‘alav vayirgemuhu ’ewen bemitsvat hamelekh bakhatsar bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 24:22	velo zakhar yo’ash hamelekh hakhesed ’asher ‘asah yehoyada‘ ’awiv ‘imo vayaharog ’et beno ukhemoto ’amar yeire yhoh veyidrosh. 
2_chronicles 24:23	vayhi litqufat hashanah ‘alah ‘alav khel ’aram vayawo’u ’el yehudah virushalim vayashkhitu ’et kal sarei ha‘am mei‘am vekhal shelalam shilekhu lemelekh darmaseq. 
2_chronicles 24:24	ki wemits‘ar ’anashim ba’u khel ’aram yhoh natan beyadam khayil larow me’od ki ‘azewu ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem ve’et yo’ash ‘asu shefatim. 
2_chronicles 24:25	uwelekhtam mimenu ki ‘azewu ’oto bemakhaliyim bemakhaluyim rabim hitqasheru ‘alav ‘awadav bidmei benei yehoyada‘ hakohen vayaharguhu ‘al mitato vayamot vayiqberuhu be‘ir david velo qewaruhu beqiwrot hamelakhim. 
2_chronicles 24:26	ve’eleh hamitqasherim ‘alav zawad ben shim‘at ha‘amonit vihozawad ben shimrit hamo’awit. 
2_chronicles 24:27	uwanav verow yirew hamasa ‘alav visod bet ha’elohim hinam ketuwim ‘al midrash seifer hamelakhim vayimlokh ’amatsyahu weno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 25:1	ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh ’amatsyahu ve‘esrim vateisha‘ shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yeho‘adan mirushalayim. 
2_chronicles 25:2	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh raq lo beleiwaw shalem. 
2_chronicles 25:3	vayhi ka’asher khazeqah hamamlakhah ‘alav vayaharog ’et ‘awadav hamakim ’et hamelekh ’awiv. 
2_chronicles 25:4	ve’et beneihem lo heimit ki khakatuw batorah beseifer mosheh ’asher tsivah yhoh leimor lo yamutu ’awot ‘al banim uwanim lo yamutu ‘al ’awot ki ’ish bekhet’o yamutu. 
2_chronicles 25:5	vayiqbots ’amatsyahu ’et yehudah vaya‘amidem lewet ’awot lesarei ha’alafim ulesarei hamei’ot lekhal yehudah uwinyamin vayifqedem lemiben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah vayimtsa’em shelosh mei’ot ’elef bakhur yotsei tsawa ’okhez romakh vetsinah. 
2_chronicles 25:6	vayiskor miyisra’el mei’ah ’elef gibor khayil bemei’ah khikar kasef. 
2_chronicles 25:7	ve’ish ha’elohim ba ’eilav leimor hamelekh ’al yawo ‘imekha tsewa yisra’el ki ’en yhoh ‘im yisra’el kol benei ’efrayim. 
2_chronicles 25:8	ki ’im bo ’atah ‘aseh khazaq lamilkhamah yakhshilekha ha’elohim lifnei ’oyew ki yesh koakh beilohim la‘zor ulehakhshil. 
2_chronicles 25:9	vayomer ’amatsyahu le’ish ha’elohim umah la‘asot lim’at hakikar ’asher natati ligdud yisra’el vayomer ’ish ha’elohim yesh yhoh latet lekha harbeh mizeh. 
2_chronicles 25:10	vayawdilem ’amatsyahu lehagedud ’asher ba ’eilav mei’efrayim lalekhet limqomam vayikhar ’apam me’od bihudah vayashuwu limqomam bakhori ’af. 
2_chronicles 25:11	va’amatsyahu hitkhazaq vayinhag ’et ‘amo vayeilekh gei hamelakh vayakh ’et benei sei‘ir ‘aseret ’alafim. 
2_chronicles 25:12	va‘aseret ’alafim khayim shawu benei yehudah vaywi’um lerosh hasala‘ vayashlikhum meirosh hasela‘ vekhulam niwqa‘u. 
2_chronicles 25:13	uwenei hagedud ’asher heishiw ’amatsyahu milekhet ‘imo lamilkhamah vayifshetu be‘arei yehudah mishomeron ve‘ad bet khoron vayaku meihem sheloshet ’alafim vayawozu bizah rabah. 
2_chronicles 25:14	vayhi ’akharei wo ’amatsyahu meihakot ’et ’adomim vayawei ’et ’elohei benei sei‘ir vaya‘amidem lo leilohim velifneihem yishtakhaveh velahem yeqater. 
2_chronicles 25:15	vayikhar ’af yhoh ba’amatsyahu vayishlakh ’eilav nawi vayomer lo lamah darashta ’et ’elohei ha‘am ’asher lo hitsilu ’et ‘amam miyadekha. 
2_chronicles 25:16	vayhi bedabero ’eilav vayomer lo halyo‘ets lamelekh netanukha khadal lekha lamah yakukha vayekhdal hanawi vayomer yada‘ti ki ya‘ats ’elohim lehashkhitekha ki ‘asita zot velo shama‘ta la‘atsati. 
2_chronicles 25:17	vayiva‘ats ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah vayishlakh ’el yo’ash ben yeho’akhaz ben yeihu melekh yisra’el leimor lekha lekhah nitra’eh fanim. 
2_chronicles 25:18	vayishlakh yo’ash melekh yisra’el ’el ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah leimor hakhoakh ’asher balewanon lakh ’el ha’erez ’asher balewanon leimor tenah ’et bitekha liwni le’ishah vata‘awor khayat hasadeh ’asher balewanon vatirmos ’et hakhoakh. 
2_chronicles 25:19	’amarta hineh hikita ’et ’edom unesa’akha libekha lehakhbid ‘atah shewah beweitekha lamah titgareh bera‘ah venafalta ’atah vihudah ‘imakh. 
2_chronicles 25:20	velo shama‘ ’amatsyahu ki meiha’elohim hi lema‘an titam beyad ki dareshu ’et ’elohei ’edom. 
2_chronicles 25:21	vaya‘al yo’ash melekh yisra’el vayitra’u fanim hu va’amatsyahu melekh yehudah bewet shemesh ’asher lihudah. 
2_chronicles 25:22	vayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra’el vayanusu ’ish le’ohalav. 
2_chronicles 25:23	ve’et ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah ben yo’ash ben yeho’akhaz tafas yo’ash melekh yisra’el bewet shamesh vaywi’eihu yerushalim vayifrots bekhomat yerushalim misha‘ar ’efrayim ‘ad sha‘ar haponeh ’arba‘ mei’ot ’amah. 
2_chronicles 25:24	vekhal hazahaw vehakesef ve’et kal hakeilim hanimtse’im bewet ha’elohim ‘im ‘owed ’edom ve’et ’otserot bet hamelekh ve’et benei hata‘aruwot vayashaw shomeron. 
2_chronicles 25:25	vaykhi ’amatsyahu wen yo’ash melekh yehudah ’akharei mot yo’ash ben yeho’akhaz melekh yisra’el khamesh ‘esreh shanah. 
2_chronicles 25:26	veyeter diwrei ’amatsyahu harishonim veha’akharonim halo hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra’el. 
2_chronicles 25:27	umei‘et ’asher sar ’amatsyahu mei’akharei yhoh vayiqsheru ‘alav qesher birushalim vayanas lakhishah vayishlekhu ’akharav lakhishah vaymituhu sham. 
2_chronicles 25:28	vayisa’uhu ‘al hasusim vayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’awotav be‘ir yehudah. 
2_chronicles 26:1	vayiqkhu kal ‘am yehudah ’et ‘uziyahu vehu ben shesh ‘esreh shanah vayamlikhu ’oto takhat ’awiv ’amatsyahu. 
2_chronicles 26:2	hu banah ’et ’eilot vayshiweha lihudah ’akharei shekhaw hamelekh ‘im ’awotav. 
2_chronicles 26:3	ben shesh ‘esreh shanah ‘uziyahu wemalekho vakhamishim ushetayim shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yekhileyah yekhaleyah min yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 26:4	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’amatsyahu ’awiv. 
2_chronicles 26:5	vayhi lidrosh ’elohim bimei zekharyahu hameiwin bir’ot ha’elohim uwimei daresho ’et yhoh hitslikho ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 26:6	vayeitsei vayilakhem bapelishtim vayifrots ’et khomat gat ve’et khomat yawneh ve’et khomat ’ashdod vayiwneh ‘arim be’ashdod uwapelishtim. 
2_chronicles 26:7	vaya‘zereihu ha’elohim ‘al pelishtim ve‘al ha‘arwiyim ha‘arwim hayoshewim begur ba‘al vehame‘unim. 
2_chronicles 26:8	vayitenu ha‘amonim minkhah le‘uziyahu vayeilekh shemo ‘ad lewo mitsrayim ki hekheziq ‘ad lema‘elah. 
2_chronicles 26:9	vayiwen ‘uziyahu migdalim birushalim ‘al sha‘ar hapinah ve‘al sha‘ar hagai ve‘al hamiqtsoa‘ vaykhazeqem. 
2_chronicles 26:10	vayiwen migdalim bamidbar vayakhtsow borot rabim ki miqneh raw hayah lo uwashefeilah uwamishor ’ikarim vekhoremim beharim uwakarmel ki ’ohew ’adamah hayah. 
2_chronicles 26:11	vayhi le‘uziyahu khayil ‘oseh milkhamah yots’ei tsawa ligdud bemispar pequdatam beyad ye‘u’el ye‘i’el hasofer uma‘aseiyahu hashoter ‘al yad khananyahu misarei hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 26:12	kol mispar rashei ha’awot legiborei khayil ’alpayim veshesh mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 26:13	ve‘al yadam khel tsawa shelosh mei’ot ’elef veshiw‘at ’alafim vakhamesh mei’ot ‘osei milkhamah bekhoakh khayil la‘zor lamelekh ‘al ha’oyew. 
2_chronicles 26:14	vayakhen lahem ‘uziyahu lekhal hatsawa maginim uremakhim vekhowa‘im veshiryonot uqeshatot ule’awnei qela‘im. 
2_chronicles 26:15	vaya‘as birushalim khishewonot makhashewet khoshew lihyot ‘al hamigdalim ve‘al hapinot liro bakhitsim uwa’awanim gedolot vayeitsei shemo ‘ad lemeirakhoq ki hifli lehei‘azer ‘ad ki khazaq. 
2_chronicles 26:16	ukhekhezqato gawah libo ‘ad lehashkhit vayim‘al yhoh ’elohav vayawo ’el heikhal yhoh lehaqtir ‘al mizbakh haqetoret. 
2_chronicles 26:17	vayawo ’akharav ‘azaryahu hakohen ve‘imo kohanim yhoh shemonim benei khayil. 
2_chronicles 26:18	vaya‘amdu ‘al ‘uziyahu hamelekh vayomeru lo lo lekha ‘uziyahu lehaqtir yhoh ki lakohanim benei ’aharon hamqudashim lehaqtir tsei min hamiqdash ki ma‘alta velo lekha lekhawod yhoh ’elohim. 
2_chronicles 26:19	vayiz‘af ‘uziyahu uweyado miqteret lehaqtir uweza‘po ‘im hakohanim vehatsara‘at zarekhah wemitskho lifnei hakohanim bewet yhoh mei‘al lemizbakh haqetoret. 
2_chronicles 26:20	vayifen ’eilav ‘azaryahu khohen harosh vekhal hakohanim vehineh hu metsora‘ bemitskho vayawhiluhu misham vegam hu nidkhaf latset ki nige‘o yhoh. 
2_chronicles 26:21	vayhi ‘uziyahu hamelekh metsora‘ ‘ad yom moto vayeishew bet hakhafeshut hakhafeshit metsora‘ ki nigzar mibet yhoh veyotam beno ‘al bet hamelekh shofet ’et ‘am ha’arets. 
2_chronicles 26:22	veyeter diwrei ‘uziyahu harishonim veha’akharonim kataw yesha‘yahu wen ’amots hanawi. 
2_chronicles 26:23	vayishkaw ‘uziyahu ‘im ’awotav vayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’awotav bisdeh haqewurah ’asher lamelakhim ki ’ameru metsora‘ hu vayimlokh yotam beno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 27:1	ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah yotam bemalekho veshesh ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yerushah bat tsadoq. 
2_chronicles 27:2	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah ‘uziyahu ’awiv raq lo wa ’el heikhal yhoh ve‘od ha‘am mashkhitim. 
2_chronicles 27:3	hu banah ’et sha‘ar bet yhoh ha‘elyon uwekhomat ha‘ofel banah larow. 
2_chronicles 27:4	ve‘arim banah behar yehudah uwekhorashim banah biraniyot umigdalim. 
2_chronicles 27:5	vehu nilkham ‘im melekh benei ‘amon vayekhezaq ‘aleihem vayitenu lo wenei ‘amon bashanah hahi mei’ah kikar kesef va‘aseret ’alafim korim khitim use‘orim ‘aseret ’alafim zot heishiwu lo benei ‘amon uwashanah hasheinit vehashelishit. 
2_chronicles 27:6	vayitkhazeq yotam ki heikhin derakhav lifnei yhoh ’elohav. 
2_chronicles 27:7	veyeter diwrei yotam vekhal milkhamotav uderakhav hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el vihudah. 
2_chronicles 27:8	ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah wemalekho veshesh ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 27:9	vayishkaw yotam ‘im ’awotav vayiqberu ’oto be‘ir david vayimlokh ’akhaz beno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 28:1	ben ‘esrim shanah ’akhaz bemalekho veshesh ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim velo ‘asah hayashar be‘einei yhoh kedavid ’awiv. 
2_chronicles 28:2	vayeilekh bedarkhei malkhei yisra’el vegam maseikhot ‘asah labe‘alim. 
2_chronicles 28:3	vehu hiqtir begei wen hinom vayaw‘er ’et banav ba’esh keto‘awot hagoyim ’asher horish hashem mipenei benei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 28:4	vayzabeiakh vayqater babamot ve‘al hagewa‘ot vetakhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan. 
2_chronicles 28:5	vayiteneihu yhoh ’elohav beyad melekh ’aram vayaku wo vayishbu mimenu shiwyah gedolah vayawi’u darmaseq vegam beyad melekh yisra’el nitan vayakh bo makah gedolah. 
2_chronicles 28:6	vayaharog peqakh ben remalyahu bihudah mei’ah ve‘esrim ’elef beyom ’ekhad hakol benei khayil be‘azewam ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotam. 
2_chronicles 28:7	vayaharog zikhri gibor ’efrayim ’et ma‘aseiyahu ben hamelekh ve’et ‘azriqam negid habayit ve’et ’elqanah mishneh hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 28:8	vayishbu wenei yisra’el mei’akheihem matayim ’elef nashim banim uwanot vegam shalal raw bazezu meihem vayawi’u ’et hashalal leshomeron. 
2_chronicles 28:9	vesham hayah nawi yhoh ‘oded shemo vayeitsei lifnei hatsawa haba leshomeron vayomer lahem hineh bakhamat yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem ‘al yehudah netanam beyedkhem vatahargu wam weza‘af ‘ad lashamayim higia‘. 
2_chronicles 28:10	ve‘atah benei yehudah virushalim ’atem ’omerim likhbosh la‘awadim velishfakhot lakhem halo raq ’atem ‘imakhem ’ashamot yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
2_chronicles 28:11	ve‘atah shema‘uni vehashiwu hashiwyah ’asher shewitem mei’akheikhem ki kharon ’af yhoh ‘aleikhem. 
2_chronicles 28:12	vayaqumu ’anashim meirashei wenei ’efrayim ‘azaryahu wen yehokhanan berekhyahu wen meshileimot vikhizqiyahu ben shalum va‘amasa ben khadlai ‘al haba’im min hatsawa. 
2_chronicles 28:13	vayomeru lahem lo tawi’u ’et hashiwyah henah ki le’ashmat yhoh ‘aleinu ’atem ’omerim lehosif ‘al khatoteinu ve‘al ’ashmateinu ki rabah ’ashmah lanu vakharon ’af ‘al yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 28:14	vaya‘azow hekhaluts ’et hashiwyah ve’et habizah lifnei hasarim vekhal haqahal. 
2_chronicles 28:15	vayaqumu ha’anashim ’asher niqewu wesheimot vayakhaziqu washiwyah vekhal ma‘arumeihem hilbishu min hashalal vayalbishum vayan‘ilum vaya’akhilum vayashqum vaysukhum vaynahalum bakhamorim lekhal koshel vaywi’um yereikho ‘ir hatemarim ’eitsel ’akheihem vayashuwu shomeron. 
2_chronicles 28:16	ba‘et hahi shalakh hamelekh ’akhaz ‘al malkhei ’ashur la‘zor lo. 
2_chronicles 28:17	ve‘od ’adomim ba’u vayaku wihudah vayishbu shewi. 
2_chronicles 28:18	ufelishtim pashetu be‘arei hashefeilah vehanegew lihudah vayilkedu ’et bet shemesh ve’et ’ayalon ve’et hagedeirot ve’et sokho uwenoteha ve’et timnah uwenoteha ve’et gimzo ve’et benoteha vayeishewu sham. 
2_chronicles 28:19	ki hikhnia‘ yhoh ’et yehudah ba‘awur ’akhaz melekh yisra’el ki hifria‘ bihudah uma‘ol ma‘al yhoh. 
2_chronicles 28:20	vayawo ‘alav tilegat pilne’eser melekh ’ashur vayatsar lo velo khazaqo. 
2_chronicles 28:21	ki khalaq ’akhaz ’et bet yhoh ve’et bet hamelekh vehasarim vayiten lemelekh ’ashur velo le‘ezrah lo. 
2_chronicles 28:22	uwe‘et hatser lo vayosef lim‘ol yhoh hu hamelekh ’akhaz. 
2_chronicles 28:23	vayizbakh leilohei darmeseq hamakim bo vayomer ki ’elohei malkhei ’aram hem ma‘zerim ’otam lahem ’azabeiakh veya‘zeruni vehem hayu lo lehakhshilo ulekhal yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 28:24	vaye’esof ’akhaz ’et kelei wet ha’elohim vayqatsets ’et kelei wet ha’elohim vayisgor ’et daltot bet yhoh vaya‘as lo mizbekhot bekhal pinah birushalim. 
2_chronicles 28:25	uwekhal ‘ir va‘ir lihudah ‘asah wamot leqater leilohim ’akheirim vayakh‘es ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotav. 
2_chronicles 28:26	veyeter dewarav vekhal derakhav harishonim veha’akharonim hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra’el. 
2_chronicles 28:27	vayishkaw ’akhaz ‘im ’awotav vayiqberuhu wa‘ir birushalim ki lo hewi’uhu leqiwrei malkhei yisra’el vayimlokh yekhizqiyahu weno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 29:1	yekhizqiyahu malakh ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah ve‘esrim vateisha‘ shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ’awiyah bat zekharyahu. 
2_chronicles 29:2	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah david ’awiv. 
2_chronicles 29:3	hu washanah harishonah lemalekho bakhodesh harishon patakh ’et daltot bet yhoh vaykhazeqem. 
2_chronicles 29:4	vayawei ’et hakohanim ve’et halviyim vaya’asfem lirkhow hamizrakh. 
2_chronicles 29:5	vayomer lahem shema‘uni halviyim ‘atah hitqadeshu veqadeshu ’et bet yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem vehotsi’u ’et hanidah min haqodesh. 
2_chronicles 29:6	ki ma‘alu ’awoteinu ve‘asu hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ’eloheinu vaya‘azwuhu vayasebu feneihem mimishkan yhoh vayitenu ‘oref. 
2_chronicles 29:7	gam sageru daltot ha’ulam vaykhabu ’et haneirot uqetoret lo hiqtiru ve‘olah lo he‘elu waqodesh leilohei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 29:8	vayhi qetsef yhoh ‘al yehudah virushalim vayitenem lizva‘ah leza‘avah leshamah velishreiqah ka’asher ’atem ro’im be‘eineikhem. 
2_chronicles 29:9	vehineh nafelu ’awoteinu bekharew uwaneinu uwenoteinu venasheinu bashewi ‘al zot. 
2_chronicles 29:10	‘atah ‘im lewawi likhrot berit yhoh ’elohei yisra’el veyashow mimenu kharon ’apo. 
2_chronicles 29:11	banai ‘atah ’al tishalu ki wakhem bakhar yhoh la‘amod lefanav leshareto velihyot lo mesharetim umaqtirim. 
2_chronicles 29:12	vayaqumu halviyim makhat ben ‘amasai veyo’el ben ‘azaryahu min benei haqehati umin benei merari qish ben ‘awdi va‘azaryahu ben yehalel’el umin hageireshuni yo’akh ben zimah ve‘eiden ben yo’akh. 
2_chronicles 29:13	umin benei ’elitsafan shimri vi‘u’el vi‘i’el umin benei ’asaf zekharyahu umatanyahu. 
2_chronicles 29:14	umin benei heiman yekhu’el yekhi’el veshim‘i umin benei yedutun shema‘yah ve‘uzi’el. 
2_chronicles 29:15	vaya’asfu ’et ’akheihem vayitqadeshu vayawo’u khemitsvat hamelekh bediwrei yhoh letaher bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:16	vayawo’u hakohanim lifnimah wet yhoh letaher vayotsi’u ’et kal hatum’ah ’asher matse’u beheikhal yhoh lakhatsar bet yhoh vayqabelu halviyim lehotsi lenakhal qidron khutsah. 
2_chronicles 29:17	vayakhelu be’ekhad lakhodesh harishon leqadesh uweyom shemonah lakhodesh ba’u le’ulam yhoh vayqadeshu ’et bet yhoh leyamim shemonah uweyom shishah ‘asar lakhodesh harishon kilu. 
2_chronicles 29:18	vayawo’u fenimah ’el khizqiyahu hamelekh vayomeru tiharnu ’et kal bet yhoh ’et mizbakh ha‘olah ve’et kal keilav ve’et shulkhan hama‘arekhet ve’et kal keilav. 
2_chronicles 29:19	ve’et kal hakeilim ’asher hizniakh hamelekh ’akhaz bemalkhuto bema‘alo heikhanu vehiqdashenu vehinam lifnei mizbakh yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:20	vayashkem yekhizqiyahu hamelekh vaye’esof ’et sarei ha‘ir vaya‘al bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:21	vayawi’u farim shiw‘ah ve’eilim shiw‘ah ukhewasim shiw‘ah utsefirei ‘izim shiw‘ah lekhatat ‘al hamamlakhah ve‘al hamiqdash ve‘al yehudah vayomer liwnei ’aharon hakohanim leha‘alot ‘al mizbakh yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:22	vayishkhatu habaqar vayqabelu hakohanim ’et hadam vayizrequ hamizbeikhah vayishkhatu ha’eilim vayizrequ hadam hamizbeikhah vayishkhatu hakewasim vayizrequ hadam hamizbeikhah. 
2_chronicles 29:23	vayagishu ’et se‘irei hakhatat lifnei hamelekh vehaqahal vayismekhu yedeihem ‘aleihem. 
2_chronicles 29:24	vayishkhatum hakohanim vaykhate’u ’et damam hamizbeikhah lekhaper ‘al kal yisra’el ki lekhal yisra’el ’amar hamelekh ha‘olah vehakhatat. 
2_chronicles 29:25	vaya‘amed ’et halviyim bet yhoh bimtsiltayim binwalim uwekhinorot bemitsvat david vegad khozeh hamelekh venatan hanawi ki weyad yhoh hamitsvah beyad newi’av. 
2_chronicles 29:26	vaya‘amdu halviyim bikhlei david vehakohanim bakhatsotserot. 
2_chronicles 29:27	vayomer khizqiyahu leha‘alot ha‘olah lehamizbeiakh uwe‘et heikhel ha‘olah heikhel shir yhoh vehakhatsotserot ve‘al yedei kelei david melekh yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 29:28	vekhal haqahal mishtakhavim vehashir meshorer vehakhatsotserot makhatsotserim makhtserim hakol ‘ad likhlot ha‘olah. 
2_chronicles 29:29	ukhekhalot leha‘alot kare‘u hamelekh vekhal hanimtse’im ’ito vayishtakhavu. 
2_chronicles 29:30	vayomer yekhizqiyahu hamelekh vehasarim lalviyim lehalel yhoh bediwrei david ve’asaf hakhozeh vayhalelu ‘ad lesimkhah vayiqedu vayishtakhavu. 
2_chronicles 29:31	vaya‘an yekhizqiyahu vayomer ‘atah mileitem yedkhem yhoh goshu vehawi’u zewakhim vetodot lewet yhoh vayawi’u haqahal zewakhim vetodot vekhal nediw lew ‘olot. 
2_chronicles 29:32	vayhi mispar ha‘olah ’asher heiwi’u haqahal baqar shiw‘im ’eilim mei’ah kewasim matayim le‘olah yhoh kal ’eleh. 
2_chronicles 29:33	vehaqodashim baqar shesh mei’ot vetson sheloshet ’alafim. 
2_chronicles 29:34	raq hakohanim hayu lim‘at velo yakhelu lehafshit ’et kal ha‘olot vayekhazequm ’akheihem halviyim ‘ad kelot hamelakhah ve‘ad yitqadeshu hakohanim ki halviyim yishrei leiwaw lehitqadesh meihakohanim. 
2_chronicles 29:35	vegam ‘olah larow bekhelwei hashelamim uwanesakhim la‘olah vatikon ‘awodat bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:36	vayismakh yekhizqiyahu vekhal ha‘am ‘al haheikhin ha’elohim la‘am ki befit’om hayah hadawar. 
2_chronicles 30:1	vayishlakh yekhizqiyahu ‘al kal yisra’el vihudah vegam ’igerot kataw ‘al ’efrayim umenasheh lawo lewet yhoh birushalim la‘asot pesakh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 30:2	vayiva‘ats hamelekh vesarav vekhal haqahal birushalim la‘asot hapesakh bakhodesh hasheini. 
2_chronicles 30:3	ki lo yakhelu la‘asoto ba‘et hahi ki hakohanim lo hitqadeshu lemadai veha‘am lo ne’esfu lirushalim. 
2_chronicles 30:4	vayishar hadawar be‘einei hamelekh uwe‘einei kal haqahal. 
2_chronicles 30:5	vaya‘amidu dawar leha‘awir qol bekhal yisra’el mibe’er shewa‘ ve‘ad dan lawo la‘asot pesakh yhoh ’elohei yisra’el birushalim ki lo larow ‘asu kakatuw. 
2_chronicles 30:6	vayeilekhu haratsim ba’igerot miyad hamelekh vesarav bekhal yisra’el vihudah ukhemitsvat hamelekh leimor benei yisra’el shuwu ’el yhoh ’elohei ’awraham yitskhaq veyisra’el veyashow ’el hapeleitah hanish’eret lakhem mikaf malkhei ’ashur. 
2_chronicles 30:7	ve’al tihyu ka’awoteikhem vekha’akheikhem ’asher ma‘alu yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem vayitenem leshamah ka’asher ’atem ro’im. 
2_chronicles 30:8	‘atah ’al taqshu ‘arepekhem ka’awoteikhem tenu yad yhoh uwo’u lemiqdasho ’asher hiqdish le‘olam ve‘iwdu ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem veyashow mikem kharon ’apo. 
2_chronicles 30:9	ki weshuwekhem ‘al yhoh ’akheikhem uweneikhem lerakhamim lifnei showeihem velashuw la’arets hazot ki khanun verakhum yhoh ’eloheikhem velo yasir panim mikem ’im tashuwu ’eilav. 
2_chronicles 30:10	vayihyu haratsim ‘owerim mei‘ir la‘ir be’erets ’efrayim umenasheh ve‘ad zewulun vayihyu maskhiqim ‘aleihem umal‘igim bam. 
2_chronicles 30:11	’akh ’anashim mei’asher umenasheh umizewulun nikhne‘u vayawo’u lirushalim. 
2_chronicles 30:12	gam bihudah hayetah yad ha’elohim latet lahem lew ’ekhad la‘asot mitsvat hamelekh vehasarim bidwar yhoh. 
2_chronicles 30:13	vayei’asefu yerushalim ‘am raw la‘asot ’et khag hamatsot bakhodesh hasheini qahal larow me’od. 
2_chronicles 30:14	vayaqumu vayasiru ’et hamizbekhot ’asher birushalim ve’et kal hamqaterot heisiru vayashlikhu lenakhal qidron. 
2_chronicles 30:15	vayishkhatu hapesakh be’arba‘ah ‘asar lakhodesh hasheini vehakohanim vehalviyim nikhlemu vayitqadeshu vayawi’u ‘olot bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 30:16	vaya‘amdu ‘al ‘amedam kemishpatam ketorat mosheh ’ish ha’elohim hakohanim zoreqim ’et hadam miyad halviyim. 
2_chronicles 30:17	ki rabat baqahal ’asher lo hitqadashu vehalviyim ‘al shekhitat hapesakhim lekhol lo tahor lehaqdish yhoh. 
2_chronicles 30:18	ki marbit ha‘am rabat mei’efrayim umenasheh yisashkhar uzewulun lo hiteharu ki ’akhelu ’et hapesakh belo khakatuw ki hitpalel yekhizqiyahu ‘aleihem leimor yhoh hatow yekhaper be‘ad. 
2_chronicles 30:19	kal lewawo heikhin lidrosh ha’elohim yhoh ’elohei ’awotav velo ketahorat haqodesh. 
2_chronicles 30:20	vayishma‘ yhoh ’el yekhizqiyahu vayirpa ’et ha‘am. 
2_chronicles 30:21	vaya‘asu wenei yisra’el hanimtse’im birushalim ’et khag hamatsot shiw‘at yamim besimkhah gedolah umehalim yhoh yom beyom halviyim vehakohanim bikhlei ‘oz yhoh. 
2_chronicles 30:22	vaydaber yekhizqiyahu ‘al lew kal halviyim hamaskilim seikhel tow yhoh vayokhelu ’et hamo‘ed shiw‘at hayamim mezabekhim ziwkhei shelamim umitvadim yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 30:23	vayiva‘atsu kal haqahal la‘asot shiw‘at yamim ’akheirim vaya‘asu shiw‘at yamim simkhah. 
2_chronicles 30:24	ki khizqiyahu melekh yehudah heirim laqahal ’elef parim veshiw‘at ’alafim tson vehasarim heirimu laqahal parim ’elef vetson ‘aseret ’alafim vayitqadeshu khohanim larow. 
2_chronicles 30:25	vayismekhu kal qehal yehudah vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal haqahal haba’im miyisra’el vehageirim haba’im mei’erets yisra’el vehayoshewim bihudah. 
2_chronicles 30:26	vatehi simkhah gedolah birushalim ki mimei shelomoh wen david melekh yisra’el lo khazot birushalim. 
2_chronicles 30:27	vayaqumu hakohanim halviyim vaywarakhu ’et ha‘am vayishama‘ beqolam vatawo tefilatam lim‘on qadesho lashamayim. 
2_chronicles 31:1	ukhekhalot kal zot yatse’u kal yisra’el hanimtse’im le‘arei yehudah vayshaberu hamatseiwot vaygade‘u ha’asheirim vaynatetsu ’et habamot ve’et hamizbekhot mikal yehudah uwinyamin uwe’efrayim umenasheh ‘ad lekhaleh vayashuwu kal benei yisra’el ’ish la’akhuzato le‘areihem. 
2_chronicles 31:2	vaya‘amed yekhizqiyahu ’et makhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim ‘al makhleqotam ’ish kefi ‘awodato lakohanim velalviyim le‘olah velishlamim lesharet ulehodot ulehalel besha‘arei makhanot yhoh. 
2_chronicles 31:3	umenat hamelekh min rekhusho la‘olot le‘olot haboqer veha‘erew veha‘olot lashabatot velekhodashim velamo‘adim kakatuw betorat yhoh. 
2_chronicles 31:4	vayomer la‘am leyoshewei yerushalim latet menat hakohanim vehalviyim lema‘an yekhezqu betorat yhoh. 
2_chronicles 31:5	vekhifrots hadawar hirbu wenei yisra’el reishit dagan tirosh veyitshar udewash vekhol tewu’at sadeh uma‘sar hakol larow heiwi’u. 
2_chronicles 31:6	uwenei yisra’el vihudah hayoshewim be‘arei yehudah gam hem ma‘sar baqar vatson uma‘sar qadashim hamqudashim yhoh ’eloheihem heiwi’u vayitenu ‘areimot ‘areimot. 
2_chronicles 31:7	bakhodesh hashelishi heikhelu ha‘areimot leyisod uwakhodesh hashewi‘i kilu. 
2_chronicles 31:8	vayawo’u yekhizqiyahu vehasarim vayir’u ’et ha‘areimot vaywarakhu ’et yhoh ve’et ‘amo yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 31:9	vayidrosh yekhizqiyahu ‘al hakohanim vehalviyim ‘al ha‘areimot. 
2_chronicles 31:10	vayomer ’eilav ‘azaryahu hakohen harosh lewet tsadoq vayomer meihakhel haterumah lawi wet yhoh ’akhol vesawoa‘ vehoter ‘ad larow ki yhoh beirakh ’et ‘amo vehanotar ’et hehamon hazeh. 
2_chronicles 31:11	vayomer yekhizqiyahu lehakhin leshakhot bewet yhoh vayakhinu. 
2_chronicles 31:12	vayawi’u ’et haterumah vehama‘aser vehaqodashim be’emunah va‘aleihem nagid konanyahu kananyahu haleivi veshim‘i ’akhihu mishneh. 
2_chronicles 31:13	vikhi’el va‘azazyahu venakhat va‘asah’el virimot veyozawad ve’eli’el veyismakhyahu umakhat uwenayahu peqidim miyad kavnanyahu kananyahu veshim‘i ’akhiv bemifqad yekhizqiyahu hamelekh va‘azaryahu negid bet ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 31:14	veqorei wen yimnah haleivi hasho‘er lamizrakhah ‘al nidwot ha’elohim latet terumat yhoh veqadeshei haqodashim. 
2_chronicles 31:15	ve‘al yado ‘eiden uminyamin veyeishua‘ ushema‘yahu ’amaryahu ushekhanyahu be‘arei hakohanim be’emunah latet la’akheihem bemakhleqot kagadol kaqatan. 
2_chronicles 31:16	milewad hityakhsam lizkharim miben shalosh shanim ulema‘lah lekhal haba lewet yhoh lidwar yom beyomo la‘awodatam bemishmerotam kemakhleqoteihem.
