2_chronicles 31:17	ve’et hityakhes hakohanim lewet ’awoteihem vehalviyim miben ‘esrim shanah ulema‘elah bemishmeroteihem bemakhleqoteihem. 
2_chronicles 31:18	ulehityakhes bekhal tapam nesheihem uweneihem uwenoteihem lekhal qahal ki we’emunatam yitqadeshu qodesh. 
2_chronicles 31:19	veliwnei ’aharon hakohanim bisdei migrash ‘areihem bekhal ‘ir va‘ir ’anashim ’asher niqewu besheimot latet manot lekhal zakhar bakohanim ulekhal hityakhes balviyim. 
2_chronicles 31:20	vaya‘as kazot yekhizqiyahu bekhal yehudah vaya‘as hatow vehayashar veha’emet lifnei yhoh ’elohav. 
2_chronicles 31:21	uwekhal ma‘aseh ’asher heikhel ba‘awodat bet ha’elohim uwatorah uwamitsvah lidrosh leilohav bekhal lewawo ‘asah vehitsliakh. 
2_chronicles 32:1	’akharei hadewarim veha’emet ha’eleh ba sankheiriw melekh ’ashur vayawo wihudah vayikhan ‘al he‘arim habetsurot vayomer lewiq‘am ’eilav. 
2_chronicles 32:2	vayar yekhizqiyahu ki wa sankheiriw ufanav lamilkhamah ‘al yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 32:3	vayiva‘ats ‘im sarav vegiborav listom ’et meimei ha‘ayanot ’asher mikhuts la‘ir vaya‘zeruhu. 
2_chronicles 32:4	vayiqawetsu ‘am raw vayistemu ’et kal hama‘yanot ve’et hanakhal hashotef betokh ha’arets leimor lamah yawo’u malkhei ’ashur umatse’u mayim rabim. 
2_chronicles 32:5	vayitkhazaq vayiwen ’et kal hakhomah haperutsah vaya‘al ‘al hamigdalot velakhutsah hakhomah ’akheret vaykhazeq ’et hamilo ‘ir david vaya‘as shelakh larow umaginim. 
2_chronicles 32:6	vayiten sarei milkhamot ‘al ha‘am vayiqbetsem ’eilav ’el rekhow sha‘ar ha‘ir vaydaber ‘al lewawam leimor. 
2_chronicles 32:7	khizqu ve’imtsu ’al tire’u ve’al teikhatu mipenei melekh ’ashur umilifnei kal hehamon ’asher ‘imo ki ‘imanu raw mei‘imo. 
2_chronicles 32:8	‘imo zeroa‘ basar ve‘imanu yhoh ’eloheinu le‘azereinu ulehilakhem milkhamoteinu vayisamekhu ha‘am ‘al diwrei yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah. 
2_chronicles 32:9	’akhar zeh lakh sankheiriw melekh ’ashur ‘awadav yerushalaymah vehu ‘al lakhish vekhal memshalto ‘imo ‘al yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah ve‘al kal yehudah ’asher birushalim leimor. 
2_chronicles 32:10	koh ’amar sankheiriw melekh ’ashur ‘al mah ’atem botekhim veyoshewim bematsor birushalim. 
2_chronicles 32:11	halo yekhizqiyahu masit ’etkhem latet ’etkhem lamut bera‘aw uwetsama leimor yhoh ’eloheinu yatsileinu mikaf melekh ’ashur. 
2_chronicles 32:12	halo hu yekhizqiyahu heisir ’et bamotav ve’et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim leimor lifnei mizbeiakh ’ekhad tishtakhavu ve‘alav taqtiru. 
2_chronicles 32:13	halo teide‘u meh ‘asiti ’ani va’awotai lekhol ‘amei ha’aratsot hayakhol yakhelu ’elohei goyei ha’aratsot lehatsil ’et ’artsam miyadi. 
2_chronicles 32:14	mi bekhal ’elohei hagoyim ha’eleh ’asher hekherimu ’awotai ’asher yakhol lehatsil ’et ‘amo miyadi ki yukhal ’eloheikhem lehatsil ’etkhem miyadi. 
2_chronicles 32:15	ve‘atah ’al yashi ’etkhem khizqiyahu ve’al yasit ’etkhem kazot ve’al ta’aminu lo ki lo yukhal kal ’eloha kal go umamlakhah lehatsil ‘amo miyadi umiyad ’awotai ’af ki ’eloheikhem lo yatsilu ’etkhem miyadi. 
2_chronicles 32:16	ve‘od diberu ‘awadav ‘al yhoh ha’elohim ve‘al yekhizqiyahu ‘awdo. 
2_chronicles 32:17	usefarim kataw lekharef yhoh ’elohei yisra’el veleimor ‘alav leimor keilohei goyei ha’aratsot ’asher lo hitsilu ‘amam miyadi ken lo yatsil ’elohei yekhizqiyahu ‘amo miyadi. 
2_chronicles 32:18	vayiqre’u weqol gadol yehudit ‘al ‘am yerushalim ’asher ‘al hakhomah leyare’am ulewahalam lema‘an yilkedu ’et ha‘ir. 
2_chronicles 32:19	vaydaberu ’el ’elohei yerushalim ke‘al ’elohei ‘amei ha’arets ma‘aseh yedei ha’adam. 
2_chronicles 32:20	vayitpalel yekhizqiyahu hamelekh visha‘yahu wen ’amots hanawi ‘al zot vayiz‘aqu hashamayim. 
2_chronicles 32:21	vayishlakh yhoh mal’akh vayakhkhed kal gibor khayil venagid vesar bemakhaneh melekh ’ashur vayashaw bewoshet panim le’artso vayawo bet ’elohav umitsi’o umitsi’ei mei‘av sham hipiluhu wekharew. 
2_chronicles 32:22	vayosha‘ yhoh ’et yekhizqiyahu ve’et yoshewei yerushalim miyad sankheiriw melekh ’ashur umiyad kol vaynahalem misawiw. 
2_chronicles 32:23	verabim mewi’im minkhah yhoh lirushalim umigdanot likhizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayinasei le‘einei khal hagoyim mei’akharei khen. 
2_chronicles 32:24	bayamim hahem khalah yekhizqiyahu ‘ad lamut vayitpalel ’el yhoh vayomer lo umofet natan lo. 
2_chronicles 32:25	velo khigmul ‘alav heishiw yekhizqiyahu ki gawah libo vayhi ‘alav qetsef ve‘al yehudah virushalim. 
2_chronicles 32:26	vayikana‘ yekhizqiyahu begowah libo hu veyoshewei yerushalim velo wa ‘aleihem qetsef yhoh bimei yekhizqiyahu. 
2_chronicles 32:27	vayhi likhizqiyahu ‘osher vekhawod harbeh me’od ve’otsarot ‘asah lo lekhesef ulezahaw ule’ewen yeqarah veliwsamim ulemaginim ulekhol kelei khemdah. 
2_chronicles 32:28	umiskenot litwu’at dagan vetirosh veyitshar ve’uravot lekhal beheimah uweheimah va‘adarim la’aveirot. 
2_chronicles 32:29	ve‘arim ‘asah lo umiqneh tson uwaqar larow ki natan lo ’elohim rekhush raw me’od. 
2_chronicles 32:30	vehu yekhizqiyahu satam ’et motsa meimei gikhon ha‘elyon vayaysherem lematah ma‘rawah le‘ir david vayatslakh yekhizqiyahu bekhal ma‘aseihu. 
2_chronicles 32:31	vekhen bimlitsei sarei bawel hamshalekhim ‘alav lidrosh hamofet ’asher hayah wa’arets ‘azawo ha’elohim lenasoto lada‘at kal bilwawo. 
2_chronicles 32:32	veyeter diwrei yekhizqiyahu vakhasadav hinam ketuwim bakhazon yesha‘yahu wen ’amots hanawi ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra’el. 
2_chronicles 32:33	vayishkaw yekhizqiyahu ‘im ’awotav vayiqberuhu bema‘aleh qiwrei wenei david vekhawod ‘asu lo wemoto kal yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim vayimlokh menasheh weno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 33:1	ben shetem ‘esreh shanah menasheh wemalekho vakhamishim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 33:2	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh keto‘awot hagoyim ’asher horish yhoh mipenei benei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 33:3	vayashaw vayiwen ’et habamot ’asher nitats yekhizqiyahu ’awiv vayaqem mizbekhot labe‘alim vaya‘as ’asheirot vayishtakhu lekhal tsewa hashamayim vaya‘awod ’otam. 
2_chronicles 33:4	uwanah mizbekhot bewet yhoh ’asher ’amar yhoh birushalim yihyeh shemi le‘olam. 
2_chronicles 33:5	vayiwen mizbekhot lekhal tsewa hashamayim bishtei khatsrot bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 33:6	vehu he‘ewir ’et banav ba’esh begei wen hinom ve‘onen venikhesh vekhishef ve‘asah ’ow veyide‘oni hirbah la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lehakh‘iso. 
2_chronicles 33:7	vayasem ’et pesel hasemel ’asher ‘asah bewet ha’elohim ’asher ’amar ’elohim ’el david ve’el shelomoh weno babayit hazeh uwirushalim ’asher bakharti mikol shiwtei yisra’el ’asim ’et shemi le‘eilom. 
2_chronicles 33:8	velo ’osif lehasir ’et regel yisra’el mei‘al ha’adamah ’asher he‘emadti la’awoteikhem raq ’im yishmeru la‘asot ’et kal ’asher tsivitim lekhal hatorah vehakhuqim vehamishpatim beyad mosheh. 
2_chronicles 33:9	vayeta‘ menasheh ’et yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim la‘asot ra‘ min hagoyim ’asher hishmid yhoh mipenei benei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 33:10	vaydaber yhoh ’el menasheh ve’el ‘amo velo hiqshiwu. 
2_chronicles 33:11	vayawei yhoh ‘aleihem ’et sarei hatsawa ’asher lemelekh ’ashur vayilkedu ’et menasheh bakhokhim vaya’asruhu bankhushtayim vayolikhuhu bawelah. 
2_chronicles 33:12	ukhehatser lo khilah ’et penei yhoh ’elohav vayikana‘ me’od milifnei ’elohei ’awotav. 
2_chronicles 33:13	vayitpalel ’eilav vayei‘ater lo vayishma‘ tekhinato vayshiweihu yerushalim lemalkhuto vayeida‘ menasheh ki yhoh hu ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 33:14	ve’akharei khen banah khomah khitsonah le‘ir david ma‘rawah legikhon banakhal velawo wesha‘ar hadagim vesawaw la‘ofel vayagbiheha me’od vayasem sarei khayil bekhal he‘arim habetsurot bihudah. 
2_chronicles 33:15	vayasar ’et ’elohei haneikhar ve’et hasemel mibet yhoh vekhal hamizbekhot ’asher banah behar bet yhoh uwirushalim vayashlekh khutsah la‘ir. 
2_chronicles 33:16	vayakhen vayiwen ’et mizbakh yhoh vayizbakh ‘alav ziwkhei shelamim vetodah vayomer lihudah la‘awod ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 33:17	’awal ‘od ha‘am zowekhim babamot raq yhoh ’eloheihem. 
2_chronicles 33:18	veyeter diwrei menasheh utefilato ’el ’elohav vediwrei hakhozim hamdaberim ’eilav beshem yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hinam ‘al diwrei malkhei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 33:19	utefilato vehei‘ater lo vekhal khatato uma‘lo vehameqomot ’asher banah wahem bamot vehe‘emid ha’asheirim vehapesilim lifnei hikane‘o hinam ketuwim ‘al diwrei khozai. 
2_chronicles 33:20	vayishkaw menasheh ‘im ’awotav vayiqberuhu beito vayimlokh ’amon beno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 33:21	ben ‘esrim ushetayim shanah ’amon bemalekho ushetayim shanim malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 33:22	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ka’asher ‘asah menasheh ’awiv ulekhal hapesilim ’asher ‘asah menasheh ’awiv zibakh ’amon vaya‘awdem. 
2_chronicles 33:23	velo nikhna‘ milifnei yhoh kehikana‘ menasheh ’awiv ki hu ’amon hirbah ’ashmah. 
2_chronicles 33:24	vayiqsheru ‘alav ‘awadav vaymituhu beweito. 
2_chronicles 33:25	vayaku ‘am ha’arets ’et kal haqosherim ‘al hamelekh ’amon vayamlikhu ‘am ha’arets ’et yoshiyahu weno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 34:1	ben shemoneh shanim yoshiyahu wemalekho usheloshim ve’akhat shanah malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:2	vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh vayeilekh bedarkhei david ’awiv velo sar yamin usemol. 
2_chronicles 34:3	uwishmoneh shanim lemalekho vehu ‘odenu na‘ar heikhel lidrosh leilohei david ’awiv uwishtem ‘esreh shanah heikhel letaher ’et yehudah virushalim min habamot veha’asheirim vehapesilim vehamaseikhot. 
2_chronicles 34:4	vaynatetsu lefanav ’et mizbekhot habe‘alim vehakhamanim ’asher lema‘lah mei‘aleihem gideia‘ veha’asheirim vehapesilim vehamaseikhot shibar veheidaq vayizroq ‘al penei haqewarim hazowekhim lahem. 
2_chronicles 34:5	ve‘atsmot kohanim saraf ‘al mizbekhotaym mizbekhotam vaytaher ’et yehudah ve’et yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:6	uwe‘arei menasheh ve’efrayim veshim‘on ve‘ad naftali bahar bateihem bekharwoteihem sawiw. 
2_chronicles 34:7	vaynatets ’et hamizbekhot ve’et ha’asheirim vehapesilim kitat leheidaq vekhal hakhamanim gida‘ bekhal ’erets yisra’el vayashaw lirushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:8	uwishnat shemoneh ‘esreh lemalekho letaher ha’arets vehabayit lakh ’et shafan ben ’atsalyahu ve’et ma‘aseiyahu sar ha‘ir ve’et yo’akh ben yo’akhaz hamazkir lekhazeq ’et bet yhoh ’elohav. 
2_chronicles 34:9	vayawo’u ’el khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol vayitenu ’et hakesef hamuwa wet ’elohim ’asher ’asefu halviyim shomerei hasaf miyad menasheh ve’efrayim umikol she’eirit yisra’el umikal yehudah uwinyamin veyoshewei vayashuwu yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:10	vayitenu ‘al yad ‘oseh hamelakhah hamufqadim bewet yhoh vayitenu ’oto ‘osei hamelakhah ’asher ‘osim bewet yhoh liwdoq ulekhazeq habayit. 
2_chronicles 34:11	vayitenu lekharashim velabonim liqnot ’awnei makhtsew ve‘eitsim lamkhaberot uleqarot ’et habatim ’asher hishkhitu malkhei yehudah. 
2_chronicles 34:12	veha’anashim ‘osim be’emunah bamelakhah va‘aleihem mufqadim yakhat ve‘owadyahu halviyim min benei merari uzekharyah umeshulam min benei haqehatim lenatseiakh vehalviyim kal meiwin bikhlei shir. 
2_chronicles 34:13	ve‘al hasabalim umenatsekhim lekhol ‘oseh melakhah la‘awodah va‘awodah umeihalviyim sofrim veshoterim vesho‘arim. 
2_chronicles 34:14	uwehotsi’am ’et hakesef hamuwa bet yhoh matsa khilqiyahu hakohen ’et seifer torat yhoh beyad mosheh. 
2_chronicles 34:15	vaya‘an khilqiyahu vayomer ’el shafan hasofer seifer hatorah matsati bewet yhoh vayiten khilqiyahu ’et haseifer ’el shafan. 
2_chronicles 34:16	vayawei shafan ’et haseifer ’el hamelekh vayashew ‘od ’et hamelekh dawar leimor kol ’asher nitan beyad ‘awadekha hem ‘osim. 
2_chronicles 34:17	vayatikhu ’et hakesef hanimtsa bewet yhoh vayitenuhu ‘al yad hamufqadim ve‘al yad ‘osei hamelakhah. 
2_chronicles 34:18	vayaged shafan hasofer lamelekh leimor seifer natan li khilqiyahu hakohen vayiqra wo shafan lifnei hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 34:19	vayhi kishmoa‘ hamelekh ’et diwrei hatorah vayiqra‘ ’et begadav. 
2_chronicles 34:20	vaytsav hamelekh ’et khilqiyahu ve’et ’akhiqam benosha fan ve’et ‘awdon ben mikhah ve’et shafan hasofer ve’et ‘asayah ‘ewed hamelekh leimor. 
2_chronicles 34:21	lekhu dirshu ’et yhoh ba‘adi uwe‘ad hanish’ar beyisra’el uwihudah ‘al diwrei haseifer ’asher nimtsa ki gedolah khamat yhoh ’asher nitekhah wanu ‘al ’asher lo shameru ’awoteinu ’et dewar yhoh la‘asot kekhal hakatuw ‘al haseifer hazeh. 
2_chronicles 34:22	vayeilekh khilqiyahu va’asher hamelekh ’el khuldah hanewi’ah ’eishet shalum ben toqhat taqehat ben khasrah shomer habegadim vehi yoshewet birushalim bamishneh vaydaberu ’eileha kazot. 
2_chronicles 34:23	vatomer lahem koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el ’imru la’ish ’asher shalakh ’etkhem ’eilai. 
2_chronicles 34:24	koh ’amar yhoh hini meiwi ra‘ah ‘al hamaqom hazeh ve‘al yoshewav ’et kal ha’alot haketuwot ‘al haseifer ’asher qare’u lifnei melekh yehudah. 
2_chronicles 34:25	takhat ’asher ‘azawuni vayaqtiru vayqateru leilohim ’akheirim lema‘an hakh‘iseini bekhol ma‘asei yedeihem vetitakh khamati bamaqom hazeh velo tikhbeh. 
2_chronicles 34:26	ve’el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh ’etkhem lidrosh yhoh koh tomeru ’eilav koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’el hadewarim ’asher shama‘eta. 
2_chronicles 34:27	ya‘an rakh lewawekha vatikana‘ milifnei ’elohim beshame‘akha ’et dewarav ‘al hamaqom hazeh ve‘al yoshewav vatikana‘ lefanai vatiqra‘ ’et begadekha vateiwek lefanai vegam ’ani shama‘ti ne’um yhoh. 
2_chronicles 34:28	hini ’osifkha ’el ’awotekha vene’esafta ’el qiwrotekha beshalom velo tir’enah ‘einekha bekhol hara‘ah ’asher ’ani meiwi ‘al hamaqom hazeh ve‘al yoshewav vayashiwu ’et hamelekh dawar. 
2_chronicles 34:29	vayishlakh hamelekh vaye’esof ’et kal ziqnei yehudah virushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:30	vaya‘al hamelekh bet yhoh vekhal ’ish yehudah veyoshewei yerushalim vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal ha‘am migadol ve‘ad qatan vayiqra we’azeneihem ’et kal diwrei seifer haberit hanimtsa bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 34:31	vaya‘amod hamelekh ‘al ‘amedo vayikhrot ’et haberit lifnei yhoh lalekhet ’akharei yhoh velishmor ’et mitsvotav ve‘eidevotav vekhuqav bekhal lewawo uwekhal nafsho la‘asot ’et diwrei haberit haketuwim ‘al haseifer hazeh. 
2_chronicles 34:32	vaya‘amed ’et kal hanimtsa wirushalim uwinyamin vaya‘asu yoshewei yerushalim kiwrit ’elohim ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 34:33	vayasar yoshiyahu ’et kal hato‘eiwot mikal ha’aratsot ’asher liwnei yisra’el vaya‘awed ’et kal hanimtsa beyisra’el la‘awod ’et yhoh ’eloheihem kal yamav lo saru mei’akharei yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 35:1	vaya‘as yoshiyahu wirushalim pesakh yhoh vayishkhatu hapesakh be’arba‘ah ‘asar lakhodesh harishon. 
2_chronicles 35:2	vaya‘amed hakohanim ‘al mishmerotam vaykhazeqem la‘awodat bet yhoh. 
2_chronicles 35:3	vayomer lalviyim hamewunim hamewinim lekhal yisra’el haqedoshim yhoh tenu ’et ’aron haqodesh babayit ’asher banah shelomoh wen david melekh yisra’el ’en lakhem masa bakatef ‘atah ‘iwdu ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem ve’et ‘amo yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 35:4	vehikonu lewet ’awoteikhem kemakhleqoteikhem bikhtaw david melekh yisra’el uwemikhtaw shelomoh weno. 
2_chronicles 35:5	ve‘imdu waqodesh liflugot bet ha’awot la’akheikhem benei ha‘am vakhaluqat bet ’aw lalviyim. 
2_chronicles 35:6	veshakhatu hapasakh vehitqadeshu vehakhinu la’akheikhem la‘asot kidwar yhoh beyad mosheh. 
2_chronicles 35:7	vayarem yoshiyahu liwnei ha‘am tson kewasim uwenei ‘izim hakol lapesakhim lekhal hanimtsa lemispar sheloshim ’elef uwaqar sheloshet ’alafim ’eleh meirekhush hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 35:8	vesarav lindawah la‘am lakohanim velalviyim heirimu khilqiyah uzekharyahu vikhi’el negidei bet ha’elohim lakohanim natenu lapesakhim ’alpayim veshesh mei’ot uwaqar shelosh mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 35:9	vekhavnanyahu vekhananyahu ushema‘yahu unetan’el ’ekhav vakhashawyahu vi‘i’el veyozawad sarei halviyim heirimu lalviyim lapesakhim khameishet ’alafim uwaqar khamesh mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 35:10	vatikon ha‘awodah vaya‘amdu hakohanim ‘al ‘amedam vehalviyim ‘al makhleqotam kemitsvat hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 35:11	vayishkhatu hapasakh vayizrequ hakohanim miyadam vehalviyim mafshitim. 
2_chronicles 35:12	vayasiru ha‘olah letitam lemiflagot lewet ’awot liwnei ha‘am lehaqriw yhoh kakatuw beseifer mosheh vekhen labaqar. 
2_chronicles 35:13	vaywashelu hapesakh ba’esh kamishpat vehaqodashim bishelu basirot uwadevadim uwatseilakhot vayaritsu lekhal benei ha‘am. 
2_chronicles 35:14	ve’akhar heikhinu lahem velakohanim ki hakohanim benei ’aharon beha‘alot ha‘olah vehakhalawim ‘ad layelah vehalviyim heikhinu lahem velakohanim benei ’aharon. 
2_chronicles 35:15	vehamshorarim benei ’asaf ‘al ma‘amadam kemitsvat david ve’asaf veheiman vidutun khozeh hamelekh vehasho‘arim lesha‘ar vasha‘ar ’en lahem lasur mei‘al ‘awodatam ki ’akheihem halviyim heikhinu lahem. 
2_chronicles 35:16	vatikon kal ‘awodat yhoh bayom hahu la‘asot hapesakh veha‘alot ‘olot ‘al mizbakh yhoh kemitsvat hamelekh yoshiyahu. 
2_chronicles 35:17	vaya‘asu wenei yisra’el hanimtse’im ’et hapesakh ba‘et hahi ve’et khag hamatsot shiw‘at yamim. 
2_chronicles 35:18	velo na‘asah fesakh kamohu beyisra’el mimei shemu’el hanawi vekhal malkhei yisra’el lo ‘asu kapesakh ’asher ‘asah yoshiyahu vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal yehudah veyisra’el hanimtsa veyoshewei yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 35:19	bishmoneh ‘esreh shanah lemalkhut yoshiyahu na‘asah hapesakh hazeh. 
2_chronicles 35:20	’akharei khal zot ’asher heikhin yoshiyahu ’et habayit ‘alah nekho melekh mitsrayim lehilakhem bekharkemish ‘al perat vayeitsei liqrato yoshiyahu. 
2_chronicles 35:21	vayishlakh ’eilav mal’akhim leimor mah li valakh melekh yehudah lo ‘alekha ’atah hayom ki ’el bet milkhamti veilohim ’amar lewahaleini khadal lekha mei’elohim ’asher ‘imi ve’al yashkhitekha. 
2_chronicles 35:22	velo heisew yoshiyahu fanav mimenu ki lehilakhem bo hitkhapes velo shama‘ ’el diwrei nekho mipi ’elohim vayawo lehilakhem bewiq‘at megido. 
2_chronicles 35:23	vayoru hayorim lamelekh yoshiyahu vayomer hamelekh la‘awadav ha‘awiruni ki hakholeiti me’od. 
2_chronicles 35:24	vaya‘awiruhu ‘awadav min hamerkawah vayarkiwuhu ‘al rekhew hamishneh ’asher lo vayolikhuhu yerushalim vayamat vayiqawer beqiwrot ’awotav vekhal yehudah virushalim mit’abelim ‘al yoshiyahu. 
2_chronicles 35:25	vayqonen yirmeyahu ‘al yoshiyahu vayomeru khal hasharim vehasharot beqinoteihem ‘al yoshiyahu ‘ad hayom vayitenum lekhoq ‘al yisra’el vehinam ketuwim ‘al haqinot. 
2_chronicles 35:26	veyeter diwrei yoshiyahu vakhasadav kakatuw betorat yhoh. 
2_chronicles 35:27	udewarav harishonim veha’akharonim hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el vihudah. 
2_chronicles 36:1	vayiqkhu ‘am ha’arets ’et yeho’akhaz ben yoshiyahu vayamlikhuhu takhat ’awiv birushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:2	ben shalosh ve‘esrim shanah yo’akhaz bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:3	vaysireihu melekh mitsrayim birushalim vaya‘anosh ’et ha’arets mei’ah khikar kesef vekhikar zahaw. 
2_chronicles 36:4	vayamlekh melekh mitsrayim ’et ’elyaqim ’akhiv ‘al yehudah virushalim vayasew ’et shemo yehoyaqim ve’et yo’akhaz ’akhiv laqakh nekho vaywi’eihu mitsrayemah. 
2_chronicles 36:5	ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho ve’akhat ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ’elohav. 
2_chronicles 36:6	‘alav ‘alah newukhadnetsar melekh bawel vaya’asreihu bankhushtayim leholikho bawelah. 
2_chronicles 36:7	umikelei bet yhoh heiwi newukhadnetsar lewawel vayitenem beheikhalo bewawel. 
2_chronicles 36:8	veyeter diwrei yehoyaqim veto‘awotav ’asher ‘asah vehanimtsa ‘alav hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el vihudah vayimlokh yehoyakhin beno takhtav. 
2_chronicles 36:9	ben shemoneh shanim yehoyakhin bemalekho usheloshah khodashim va‘aseret yamim malakh birushalim vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 36:10	velitshuwat hashanah shalakh hamelekh newukhadnetsar vaywi’eihu wawelah ‘im kelei khemdat bet yhoh vayamlekh ’et tsidqiyahu ’akhiv ‘al yehudah virushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:11	ben ‘esrim ve’akhat shanah tsidqiyahu wemalekho ve’akhat ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:12	vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ’elohav lo nikhna‘ milifnei yirmeyahu hanawi mipi yhoh. 
2_chronicles 36:13	vegam bamelekh newukhadnetsar marad ’asher hishbi‘o beilohim vayeqesh ’et ‘arepo vai’amets ’et lewawo mishuw ’el yhoh ’elohei yisra’el. 
2_chronicles 36:14	gam kal sarei hakohanim veha‘am hirbu lim‘al ma‘al kekhol to‘awot hagoyim vaytame’u ’et bet yhoh ’asher hiqdish birushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:15	vayishlakh yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem ‘aleihem beyad mal’akhav hashkem veshaloakh ki khamal ‘al ‘amo ve‘al me‘ono. 
2_chronicles 36:16	vayihyu mal‘iwim bemal’akhei ha’elohim uwozim dewarav umita‘te‘im binwi’av ‘ad ‘alot khamat yhoh be‘amo ‘ad le’en marpei. 
2_chronicles 36:17	vaya‘al ‘aleihem ’et melekh kasdiyim kasdim vayaharog bakhureihem bakherew bewet miqdasham velo khamal ‘al bakhur uwetulah zaqen veyashesh hakol natan beyado. 
2_chronicles 36:18	vekhol kelei bet ha’elohim hagedolim vehaqetanim ve’otserot bet yhoh ve’otserot hamelekh vesarav hakol heiwi wawel. 
2_chronicles 36:19	vayisrefu ’et bet ha’elohim vaynatetsu ’et khomat yerushalim vekhal ’armenoteha sarefu wa’esh vekhal kelei makhamadeha lehashkhit. 
2_chronicles 36:20	vayegel hashe’eirit min hakherew ’el bawel vayihyu lo ulewanav la‘awadim ‘ad melokh malkhut paras. 
2_chronicles 36:21	lemalot dewar yhoh befi yirmeyahu ‘ad ratsetah ha’arets ’et shabetoteha kal yemei hashamah shawatah lemalot shiw‘im shanah. 
2_chronicles 36:22	uwishnat ’akhat lekhoresh melekh paras likhlot dewar yhoh befi yirmeyahu hei‘ir yhoh ’et ruakh koresh melekh paras vaya‘awer qol bekhal malkhuto vegam bemikhtaw leimor. 
2_chronicles 36:23	koh ’amar koresh melekh paras kal mamlekhot ha’arets natan li yhoh ’elohei hashamayim vehu faqad ‘alai liwnot lo wayit birushalim ’asher bihudah mi wakhem mikal ‘amo yhoh ’elohav ‘imo veya‘al.
